A A A avya Apa kvip pf palopaH vAkye vAkyasyAnyaTAtvadyotane pUrbbammevamamaMsTA vAkyasyAnya TAtvadyotane pUrbbaMmevamamaMsTA idAnImevamiti pratipAdane smftO A evaM manyase iti smftasyAnyaTA pratipAdane anukampAyAm samuccaye aNgIkAre IzadarTe kriyAyoge sImAyAM vyAptO ca vAkyasmftiBinne sya NittvamicCanti aNato aNito sya ekAjnipAtatvAt pragfhyasaMjYA pragf hyasaMjYA Nitastu na ata voktam atavoktam maryyAdAyAmaBiviDO kriyAyogezadarTayoH ya AkAraH sa Nat Nit proktaH vAkyasmaraRayoraNat vAkya smaraRayoraNit tatra sImAyAm A AtmaboDAt AtmaboDAt udA lOkikaM tadvadevedaM pramARaM tvAtmaniScayAt vyAptO brahmAstyAsakalAt sakalaM vyApyetyarTaH etadarTe etadarTadvaye vikalpena avyayIBAvaH AtmaboDam Asakalam DAtuyogaH upasargaH yaTA AgacCat grAmAt IzadarTe AkampaH AkekaraH vAkyaYca vAkyArTadyotakatA smaraRaM pramARAntarAvAvagatasya dyAMtakftA na tu pramARA ntarAvAvagatasya natu SabdamAtreRAvagatasyeti tayorBedaH A AkArovijayo nantodIrGacCAyovinAyakaH kzIro daDipayodaSca pASodIrGAsyavfttake pracaRqaekajorudro nArAyaREBeSvaraH pratizWA mAnadA kAnto viSvAnta kagajA ntakO pitAmahodviWAntoBrUH kriyA kAntiSca samBavaH dvitIyA mAnadA kASI viGnarAjaH kujIvi yat surAntakaSca hfdayaYcANguzWoBagamAlinI A AkAraM paramAScaryyaM SaNKajyotirmayaM priye brahmavizRu mayaM varRaM taTA rudramayaM priye paYcaprARamayaM varRaM svayaM paramakuRqalIm A avya Apa kvip pf palopaH vAkye vAkyasyAnya TAtvadyotane pUrbbaMmevamamaMsTA idAnImevamiti pratipAdane smftO A evaM manyase iti smftasyAnyaTA pratipAdane anukampAyAm samuccaye aNgIkAre IzadarTe kriyAyoge sImAyAM vyAptO ca vAkyasmftiBinne sya NittvamicCanti aNito sya ekAjnipAtatvAt pragf hyasaMjYA Nitastu na atavoktam maryyAdAyAmaBiviDO kriyAyogezadarTayoH ya AkAraH sa Nit proktaH vAkya smaraRayoraNit tatra sImAyAm A AhitAgni AhitAgni AhitAgni tri Ahito gniryena vedamantrAdinA kfta Page b saMskArAgniyukte tadADAnaprakAraH ADAnaSabde pfzWe uktaprAyaH ASva SrO pra ka vistareRoktaH na darSena vinA SrAdDvamAhitAgnerdvijanmanaH manuH guro rapIdaM DanamAhitAgneH raGuH AhitAgniH sannavra tyamidaM caret tEtti na vA hitAgninAnftaM vaditavyam Sata brA devAn vA eza upAvarttate ya AhitAgnirBavati Eta brA AhAryyeREvAnAhitA gnim ASva SrO vA paranipAte agnyAhito pyatra

Ambikaya Ambikaya Ambikaya pu ambikAyA apatyaM SuBrA Qak vicitravI ryya sya kzetre kASirAjasya maDyamakanyAyAm ambikAyAM vyAse notpAdite DftarAzwre sa hiakAle divaM gatasya vicitra vIryyasya ambikAmbAlikayoHpatnyormaDye ambikAyAM jye zWaBAyyAyAM satyavatyAniyuktena vyAsenotpAditaH tatkaTA yaTA tato mbikAyAM praTamaM niyuktaH satyavAgfziH dIpya Page b mAnezu dIpezu SaraRaM praviveSaha tasya kfzRasya kapilA jawA dIpte ca locane baBrURi cEva SmaSrURi dfzwvA devI nyamIla yat saMbaBUva tayA sArdDaM mAtuH priyacikIrzayA BayAt kASIsutA tantu nASaknIdaBivIkzitum tato nizkrAnta mAgatya mAtA putramuvAca ha apyasyAM guRavAn putrorAja putro Bavizyati niSamya tadvacomAturvyAsaH satyavatIsutaH provAcAtIndriyajYAno viDinA saMpracoditaH nAgAyuta samaprARo vidvAn rAjarzisattamaH mahABAgo mahO dAryyo mahAbudDirmavizyati tasya cApi SataM putrA Bavi zyanti mahAtmanaH kintu mAtuH sa vEguRyAdanDa eva Bavi zyati ityupakramya pARquvidUrotpattimupavarRRya ca ete vicitravIryyasya kzetre dvEpAyanAdfzeH jajYire deva garBABAH kuruvaMSavivardDanAH ityuktam BA A pa a ambikAyASca yaTA vicitravIryyaBAryyAtvaM taToktaM ambASabde pfzWe Ambikeyena dadfSe rAjYA duryyoGanena ca BA va pa a paraM SreyaH pARqaveyA yaTAha BIzmastanna SrutavAnAmbikeyaH BA va pa a ambikAyAH pArvvatyA apatyam Qak kArttikeye tasya tadutpattikaTA agnikumAraSabde pfzWe dfSyA
Ambikeya Ambikeya Ambikeya pu ambikAyA apatyaM SuBrA Qak vicitravIryyasya kzetre kASirAjasya maDyamakanyAyAm ambikAyAM vyAsenotpAdite DftarAzwre sa hi akAle divaM gatasya vicitravIryyasya ambikAmbAlikayoH patnyormaDye ambikAyAM jyezWaBAryyAyAM satyavatyAniyuktena vyAsenotpAditaH tatkaTA yaTA tato mbikAyAM praTamaM niyuktaH satyavAgfziH dIpyamAnezu dIpezu SaraRaM praviveSa ha tasya kfzRasya kapilA jawA dIpte ca locane baBrURi cEva SmaSrURi dfzwvA devI nyamIlayat sambaBUva tayA sArdDaM mAtuH priyacikIrzayA BayAt kASIsutA tantu nASaknodaBivIkzitum tato nizkrAntamAgatya mAtA putrAmuvAca ha apyasyAM guRavAn putrorAjaputro Bavizyati niSamya tadvacomAturvyAsaH satyavatIsutaH provAcAtIndriyajYAno viDinA saMpracoditaH nAgAyutasamaprARo vidvAn rAjarzisattamaH mahABAgo mahOdAryyo mahAbudDirBavizyati tasya cApi SataM putrA Bavizyanti mahAtmanaH kintu mAtuH sa vEguRyAdanDa eva Bavizyati ityupakramyapARquvidUrotpattimupavarRya ca ete vicitravIryyasya kzetre dvEpAyanAdfzeH jajYire devagarBABAH kuruvaMSavivardDanAH ityuktam BA A pa a ambikAyASca yaTA vicitravIryyaBAryyAtvaM tayoktaM ambASabde Ambikeyena dadfSe rAjYA duryyoDanena ca BA va pa a paraM SreyaH pARqaveyA yaTA ha BIzmastanna SrutavAnAmbikeyaH BA va pa a ambikAyAH pArvvatyA apatyam Qak kArttikeye tasya tadutpattikaTA agnikumAraSabde dfSyA

AnandaBuj AnandaBuj AnandaBuj pu AnandaM BuNkte Buja kvip suzuptyavasTApanne prAjYe jIvaBede AnandaBuk cetomuKaH prAjYaH iti SrutiH yaTA loke AyAsaSUnyaH suKI AnandaBugucyate taTA suzupto pi sarvAyAsaSUnyataTA AnandaBugityucyate

Apo'SAna Apo'SAna Apo SAna na ApasA jalena aSanaM aSa vyAptO BAve bA Anac jalena uparizwAdaDastaccAstaraRarupe annAcCAdanArTe karmaRi Apo SAnenoparizwAdaDastAdaSnatA taTA anagnamamftaYcEva kAryyamannaM dvijatmanA yA smf BuYcAnena dvijanmanA uparizwAdaDastAcca Apo SAnAKyena karmmaRA annamanagnamfmftaM ca kAryyam mitA Apo SAnakriyA pUrvvaMsatkftAnnamakutsayan yA smf Apo SAnakriyA pUrvvam amftopastaraRamasi svAhetyAdikaM kftvA mitA Apo SAnaM karmma kuru BavadevaH
ApoSAna ApoSAna Apo SAna na ApasA jalena aSAnaM aSa vyAptO BAve bA Anac jalena uparizwAdaDastAccAstaraRa rUpe annAcCAdanArTe karmaRi Apo SAnenopa rizwAdaDastAdaSnatA taTA anagnamamftaYcEva kAryyamannaM dvijatmanA yA smf BujYAnena dvijanmanA upa rizwAdaDastAcca Apo SAnAKyena karmaRA anna managnamfmftaM ca kAryyam mitA Apo SAnakriyA pUrvvaM satkftAnnamakutsayan yA smf Apo SAnakriyA pUrvvam amftopastaraRamasi svAhetyAdikaM kftvA mitA Apo SAnaM karmma kuru BavadevaH
ArURi ArURi ArURi pu aruRasyApatyam iY uddAlake gOtame munO uddAlakohAruRiH SvetaketuM putramuvAca CA u vESampAyanAntevAsiBede tasyAntevAsinaSca Alamba laNga kamala rucABAruRi tARqyaSyAmAyan kaWa kalApinonaveti boDyam tenADItaM Rini brAhmaRe tasya luk AruRiH sAmaveda brAhmaRaBede AyodaDOmyaSizye muniBede AyodaSabde udA aruRamunerapatye puMstrI striyAM NIp yadAruRIzu tAvazIrayugDvam f aruRasyEdam iY aruRasambanDini aruRasya sUryyasyApatyam iY aruRatanaye aruRasutaSabdokte yamAdO aruRasyAyamanujAtatvAt iY aruRAnuje vinatAyAH sutaBede tArkzyaScArizwanemiSca garuqaSca mahAbalaH aruRaScAruRiScEva vinatAyAH sutAH smftaH harivaM a aruRaScAruRiScEva tasya prAYjalayaH sTitAH harivaM a aruRasya garuqAgrajasyApatyam iY garuqAgrajasyApatye puMstrI striyAM NIp
AraWWaja AraWWaja AraWWaja pu Arawwe deSe jAyate jana qa Arava deSajAte Gowake ArawwajaScawulanizWurapAtamuccEH mAGaH aSvaSabde tadde SASvaDarmmA jYeyAH
Arawwaja Arawwaja Arawwaja pu Arawwe deSe jAyate jana qa Arava deSajAte Gowake arawwajaScawulanizWurapAtamuccEH mAGaH aSvaSabde taddeSASvaDarmmA jYeyAH
ArttaparRRi ArttaparRRi ArttaparRRi pu ftaparRasyApatyam iY ftaparRRanfpasyApatye sudAse sUryyavaMSye nfpaBede BagIraTasuto rAjASruta itya BiviSrutaH nABAgastu SrutasyAsIt putraH paramaDArmikaH ambarIzastu nABAgiH sinDudvIpapitA Bavat ayutAjittu dAyAdaH sinDudvIpasya vIryyavAn ayutAjitsutAdA Page a sIdftaparRRo mahAyaSAH divyAkzahfdayajYovE rAjA nalasaKo balI ftaparRRasya tasyAsIdArttapaRirmahIpatiH sudAsa stasya tanayo rAjA indrasaKo Bavat hativaMSe a
ArttaparRi ArttaparRi ArttaparRi pu ftaparRasyApatyam iY ftaparRa nfpasyApatye sudAse sUryyavaMSye nfpaBede BagIraTasuto rAjA Sruta ityaBiviSrutaH nABAgastu SrutaSyAsIt putraH paramaDArmikaH ambarIzastu nABAgiH sinDudvIpapitA Bavat ayutAjittu dAyAdaH sinDudvIpasya vIryyavAn ayutAjitsutAdAsIdftaparRo mahAyaSAH divyAkzahfdaya jYovErAja nalasaKo balI ftaparRasya gtasyAsIdArtta paRirmahIpatiH sudAsastasya tanayo rAjA indrasaKo Bavat hativaMSe a
AruRi AruRi AruRi pu aruRasyApatyam iY uddAlake gOtame munO uddA lakohAruRiH SvetaketuM putramuvAca CA u vESampAya nAntevAsiBede tasyAntevAsinaSca Alamba laNga kamala rucABAruRi tARqyaSyAmAyana kaWa kalApinonaveti bo Dyam tenADItaM Rini brAhmaRe tasya luk AruRiH sAmavedabrAhmaRaBede AyodaDomyaSizye muniBede Ayo daSabde udA aruRamunerapatye puMstrI striyAM NIp yadAruRIzu tAvazIrayugDvam f aruRa syedam iY aruRasambanDini aruRasya sUryyasyApatyam iY aruRatanaye aruRasutaSabdokte yamAdO aruRasyAyamanujAtatvAt iY aruRAnuje vinatAyAH sutaBede tArkzya ScArizwanemiSca garuqaSca mahAbalaH aruRaScAruRiScEva vinatAyAH sutAH smftAH harivaM a aruRaScAruRiScEva tasya prAYjalayaH sTitAH harivaM a a ruRasya garuqAgrajasyApatyam iY garu qAgrajasyApatye puMstrI striyAM NIp
AsPujit AsPujit AsPujit pu asPulati A sPula bA qu taM jayati ji kvip SukrAcAryye SukroBfgurBfgusutaH sita AsPu jicca jyo ta
AsPujita AsPujita AsPujita pu asPulati A sPula bA qu taM jayati jikvip SukrAcAryye SukroBfgurBfgusutaH sita AsPujicca jyo ta
Asrava Asrava Asrava pu Asravati mano nena karaRe ap kleSe karttari ac arhanmatasidDe padArTaBede arhacCabde pfzWe vivftiH
AstIrRRa AstIrRRa AstIrRRa tri A stf kta vistIrRRe kftaprasAraRe A stIrRRatalparacitAvasaTaH kzaRena mAGaH AstIrRRAji naratnAsu raGuH
AstIrRa AstIrRa AstIrRa tri A stf kta vistIrRe kftaprasAraRe AstIrRa talparacitAvasaTaH kzaRena mAGaH AstIrRAjinaratnAsu raGuH
Astrava Astrava Astrava pu Asravati mano nena karaRe ap kleSe karttari ac arhanmatasidDe padArTaBede arhacCabde vivftiH
Asyaloman Asyaloman Asyaloman na AsyaBavaM loma puruzamuKajAte lomni dAqi
Asyalonan Asyalonan Asyalonan na AsyaBavaM loma puruzamuKajAte lomni dAqi
AvIracUrRRa AvIracUrRRa AvIracUrRRa pu A samantAt viSezeRa Iryyate kzipyate A vi Ira GaY karmmaDA AvIra iti KyAte Pal guni AvIracUrRaM ruciraM gfhyatAM parameSvara purA
AvIracUrRa AvIracUrRa AvIracUrRa pu A samantAt viSezeRa Iryyate kzipyate A vi Ira GaY karmma DA AvIra iti KyAte Palguni AvIracUrRaM rUciraM gfhyatAM parameSvara purA
AvidDakarRI AvidDakarRI AvidDakarRI strI AvadDO karRAviva patramasyAH gO NIz pAWAyAm
AvidDakarRo AvidDakarRo AvidDakarRo strI AvidDO karRAviva patramasyAH gO NIz pAWAyAm
AwaMrUza AwaMrUza AwaMrUza pu awarUza eva svArTe aR vAsakavfkze svArTe kan tatrEva AwarUzakavarRABAhayAH yAntyanuyAyinAm BA dro pa
AwarUza AwarUza AwarUza pu awarUza eva svArTe aR vAsakavfkze svArTe kan tatrEva AwarUzakavarRRABAhayAH yAntyanuyAyi nAm BA dro pa
AyuDaDarBiRI AyuDaDarBiRI AyuDaDarBiRI strI AyuDasyeva Darmo styasyA ini NIp jayantIvfkze Sabdaca sAhi roganASane AyuDasamA
AyuDaDarmiRI AyuDaDarmiRI AyuDaDarmiRI strI AyuDasyeva Darmo styasyA ini NIp jayantIvfkze Sabdaca sAhi roganASane AyuDasamA
Ayuzkft Ayuzkft Ayuzkft tri AyuH karoti kf kvip ta AyurvfdDi kare rasarasAyanAdO AyurvfdDiSabde pfzWe tAnyu ktAni wa Ayuzkara ityapyatra tri striyAM NIp
Ayuzkfta Ayuzkfta Ayuzkfta tri AyuH karoti kf kvipar ta AyurvfdDikare rasarasAyanAdO AyurvfdDiSabde tAnyuktAni wa Ayuzkara ityapyatra tri striyAM NIp
BA BA BA dIptO adA para aka anit aniw BAti aBAsIt baBO prati budDiprAKyaryye budDiprAKaryye vi ati miToBAsane a A dIptiSca tEjasapadArTAvayavaBedaH prakASaSca sa ca jYAne vizayatayA prakASaH Dit zit BAve aN BA BA strI BA aN wAp dIptO amaraH BA BA fjIkaM pu BAsa fjIkaH BAsaH prArjake prasidDe f BA dIptO adA para aka aniw BAti aBAsIt baBO prati budDiprAKaryye vi ati miToBAsane A dIptiSca tEjasapadArTAvayavaBedaH prakASaSca sa ca jYAne vizayatayA prakASaH zit BAve aN BA BA strI BA aN wAp dIptO amaraH
BAfjIka BAfjIka BAfjIka pu BAsa fjIkaH BAsaH prArjake prasidDe f BA
BAgIyam BAgIyam BAgIyam tri atiSayena BAgI ISasun inolopaH atiSayaBAgayute harivaM a a
BAgIyas BAgIyas BAgIyas tri atiSayena BAgI riSatan inopopaH ati SayaBAgayute harivaM a a
BAgajAti BAgajAti BAgajAti strI BAgasya viBajanasya prAkAraBede sA ca catu rviDA BAgajAtiH praBAgajAtiH BAgAnubanDo BAgA pavAhaSca tatra aMSAnAM samaCedakaraRaM BAgajAtiH ityucyate yaTA anyo nyaharABihatO harAMSOrASyoH samacCedaviDAnamevam miToharAByAmapartti tAByAM yadvA harAMSO suDiyAtra guRyO lIlA BAgasya BAgaH praBAgo yaTA lavAlavaGnASca harAharaGnAH BAgapraBAgezu savarRanaM syAt lIlA BAgasyAnubanDo yojanaM BAgAnu banDo BAgAvAhaSca tadviyojanam yaTA CedaGnarUpezu lavA DanarRamekasya BAgA aDikonakAScet svAMSADikonAH Kalu yatra tatra BAgAnubanDe ca lavApavAhe talasTahAreRa haraM nihanyAt svAMSADikonena na tu tena BAgAn lIlA
BAgajAtistrI BAgajAtistrI BAgajAtistrI BAgasya viBajanasya prAkAraBede sA ca caturviDA BAgajAtiH praBAgajAtiH BAgAnubanDo BAgApavAhaSca tatra aMSAnAM samaCedakaraRAM BAgajAtiH ityucyate yaTA anyo nyaharABihatO harAMSOrASyoH samacCedaviDAnamevam miToharAByAmaparttitAByAM yadvA harAMSO suDiyAtra guRyO lIlA BAgasya BAgaH praBAgo yaTA lavaH lavaGnASca harAhanDAH BAgapraBAgezu savarRanaM syAt lIlA BAgasyAnubanDo yojanaM BAgAnubanDI BAgAvAhaSca tadviyojanam yaTA CedaDnarUpezu lavADanarRamekasya BAgA aDikonakAScet svraMSADikonAH Kalu yatra tatra BAgAnubanDe ca lavApavAhe trasTahAreRa haraM BihanyAt svAMSADikonena na tu tena BAgAn lIlA
BAladfS BAladfS BAladfS pu BAle dfgasya trinayane mahAdeve hemaca
BAladfSa BAladfSa BAladfSa pu BAle dfgasya trinayane mahAdeve hemaca
BArURqa BArURqa BArURqa pu uttarakuruvarzasTe KagaBede tadupakrame BArURqA nAma SakunAstIkzRatuRqA BayAnakAH tAnnirharantIha mftAn darIzu prakzipanti ca BA Bo a sAmaBede tatra BArUqeti pAWaBedaH tatsAmadrazwari fziBede BAruRqasAmagItABiraTarvaSirasoNgatEH BA A a tacca sAmArcike imaM stomarhateityAdimantre geyaM sAma matkfta tulAdAnAdipadDatO dfSyam AjyadohAni sAmAni SAntikaM BArUqAni ca paScime dvArapAlO tu paWetAm sAmamO taTA viDAnapA
BAravAha BAravAha BAravAha h tri BAraM vahati aR Rvi vA BAra vAhini Rvul BAravAhako pyatra amaraH striyAM NIp RvipratyayAntasya SasAdAvajAdO NIpi ca UW BArOhaH BArOhI
BAravAhra BAravAhra BAravAhra h tri BAraM vahati aR Riva vA BAravAhini Rvul BAravAhako pyatra amaraH striyAM NIp RvipratyayAntasya SasAdAvajAdO NIpi ca UW BArOhaH BArOhI
BArgya BArgya BArgya pu Bargasya gotrApatyaM gargA yaY muktalagotre nfpaBede BAga
BArmya BArmya BArmya pu Bargasya notrApatyaM gargA yaY mudgalagotre nfpaBede BAga
BAruRqa BAruRqa BAruRqa pu uttarakuruvarzasTe KagaBede tadupakrame BAruRqA Page b nAma SakunAstIkzRatuRqA BayAnakAH tAnnirharantIha mftAn darIzu prakzipanti ca BA BI a sAmaBede tatra BAruqeti pAWaBedaH tatsAmadrazwari fziBede BA ruRqasAmagItABiraTarvaSirasodgatEH BA A a tacca sAmArcike imaM stomarhate ityAdimantre geyaM sAma matkfta tulAdAnAdipadDatO pf dfSyam AjyadohAni sAmAni SAntikaM BAruqAni ca pa Scime dvArapAlO tu paWetAm sAmagO taTA viDAnapA
BAs BAs BAs strI BAsa sampa BAve kvip praBAyAm amaraH mayUKe medi icCAyAM DaraRiH
BAsa BAsa BAsa dIptO BvA Atma saka seka sew sAsate BAsate aBAsizwa caNi vA hrasvaH avoBasut abIBasat ta avaBAsat anaBAsat ta jYAnavizayatve ca prakArIBUya BAvate BAsa strI BAsa sampa BAve kvip praBAyAm amaraH mayUKe medi icCAyAM DaraRiH BAsa pu BAsa BAve GaY dIptO viSvaH ADAre GaY gozWe karttari ac kukkure Sukre ca Sakunte gfDraKage hemaca yajYArTamadadat vastu BAsaH kAko TavA Bavet smftiH kaviBede BAso hAsaH hAmaH kavikulaguruH kAlidAso vilAsaH prasantarA prasannarA BAsa dIptO BvA Atma seka sew BAsate aBAsizwa caNi vA hrasvaH abIBasat ta anaBAsat ta jYAnavizayatve ca prakArIBUya BAvate BAsa strI BAsa sampa BAve kvip praBAyAm amaraH mayUKe medi icCAyAM DaraRiH BAsa pu BAsa BAve GaY dIptO viSvaH ADAre GaY gozWe karttari ac kukkure Sukre ca Sakunte gfDraKage hemaca yajYArTamadadat vastu BAsaH kAko TavA Bavet smftiH kaviBede BAso hAmaH kavikulaguruH kAlidAso vilAsaH prasannarA
BAskArezwA BAskArezwA BAskArezwA strI ta AdityaBaktAlatAyAM rAjani
BAsvat BAsvat BAsvat pu BAs astyarTe matup masya vaH sUryye arka vakze vIre medi dIpte tri hemaca striyAM NIp Page b sA ca nadyAM ba va Uzasi ca strI niGaRwuH jyo tizanibanDaBede strI yatra sUryyagrahaRAdinirUpaRamasti
BAsvata BAsvata BAsvata pu BAs astyarTe matup masya vaH sUryye akavfkze vIre medi dIpte tri hemaca striyAM NIp sA ca nadyAM va va Uzasi ca strI niGaRwuH jyotizanibanDaBede strI yatra sUryyaprahaRAdinirUpaRamasti

BUmisatra BUmisatra BUmisatra na BUmidAnarUpaM satraM SA ta BUmidAnarUpe yAgaBedAtmake satre ikzuBiH sahitAM BUmiM yavagoDUmaSAlinIm go SvavAhanapUrRAM vA bAhuvIryyAdupArjitAm niDigarttAM dadadBUmiM sarvaratnaparicCadAm akzayAn laBateka lokAn BUmisatraM hi tasya tatBA anu a
BUmisattra BUmisattra BUmisattra na BUmidAnarUpaM sattraM SA ta BUmidAnarUpe yAga BedAtmake sattre ikzuBiH sahitAM BUmiM yavagoDUmaSAli nIm go SvavAhanapUrRAM vA bAhuvIryyAdupArjitAm niDigarttAM dadadBUmiM sarvaratnaparicCadAm akzayAn laBate lokAn BUmisattraM hi tasya tat BA anu a
BUnIpa BUnIpa BUnIpa pu Buvi sagno nIpaH SAka ta BUmikadambe rAjani
BUridyumna BUridyumna BUridyumna pu BUri dyumnaM yasya navamamanoH putraBede sudrita pustake harivaM a mArka pu BUdyurimRa iti pAWaH praTamAdikaH tadevavAkyatayA BUridyumna ityeva tatra pAWasyOcityAt
BUridyumra BUridyumra BUridyumra pu BUri dyumraM yasya navamamanoH putraBede mudritapustake harivaM a mArka pu BUdyurimfRa iti pAWaH praTamAdikaH tadevavAkyatavA BUridyumra ityeva tatra pAWasyOcityAt
BUruhfdaya BUruhfdaya BUruhfdaya na ba mfge trikA BayaSIlahfdaye tri
BUtapatrI BUtapatrI BUtapatrI strI BUta iva kfzRaM patraM yasyAH NIz kfzRatulasyAm rAjani
BUtapattnI BUtapattnI BUtapattnI strI BUtEva kfzRaM patraM yasyAH NIz kfzRa tulasyAm rAjani

Ba Ba Ba BakAraH pavargIyaScaturTovarRo vyaYjanavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRa sTAnamOzWO asyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH ozWAByAM saha jihvAgrasya sparSaH atastasya sparSavarRatA bAhyaprayatnASca saMvAranAdaGozAH mahAprARaSca tasya DyeyarUpaM yaTA BakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi svayaMparamakuRqalI mahA mokzapradaM varRaM taruRAdityasaMpraBam paYcaprARamayaM varRaM paYcadevamayaM sadA kAmaDenutantram asya aDizWAtf devatADyAnaM yaTA taqitpraBAM mahAdevIM nAgakaNkaRa SoBitAm zaqBujAM varadAM BImAM raktapaNkajaloca nAm raktavastraparIDAnAM raktapuzpopaSoBitAm catu Page a rvargapradAM devIM sADakABIzwasidDidAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya vAcakaSabdAH yaTA BaH klinnA Bramaro BImo viSvamUrttirniSA Bavam dviraRqo BUzaRomUlaM yajYasUtrapravAcakaH nakzatraM BramaRA dIprirvayoBUmiH payo naBaH nABirBadaM mahAbAhurviSvamUrttirvitARqavaH prARAtmA tApinI vajrA viSvarUpI ca candrikA BImasenaH suDAsenaH suKI mayApuraM haraH varRABiDAnam mAtfkAnyAse sya nABO nyAsyatA kAvyAdAvasya prayoge suKaBayamaraRakleSa duHKaM pavargaH vf wI ukteH kleSaH Palam Ba na BAti BA ka nakzatre amaraH grahe SabdaratnA rASO jyo ta SukrAcAryye pu medi tezAM dIptimattvAt taTAttvam BUDare ekAkzarakozaH BrAntO pa pu SabdaratnA vf ra ukte Adiguruke antyalaGudvaye antya laGudvaye varRatraye tasya kAvyAdO prayoge PalaM yaSaH devatAcandraH yaToktaM vf ra wIkAyAm BaScandro yaSaH ujjvalam Ba BakAraH pavargIyaScaturTovarRo vyaYjanavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRa sTAnamOzWO asyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH ozWAByAM saha jihvAgrasya sparSaH atastasya sparSavarRatA bAhyaprayatnASca saMvAranAdaGozAH mahAprARaSca tasya DyeyarUpaM yaTA BakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi svayaMparamakuRqalI mahA mokzapradaM varRaM taruRAdityasaMpraBam paYcaprARamayaM varRaM paYcadevamayaM sadA kAmaDenutantram asya aDizWAtf devatADyAnaM yaTA taqitpraBAM mahAdevIM nAgakaNkaRa SoBitAm zaqBujAM varadAM BImAM raktapaNkajaloca nAm raktavastraparIDAnAM raktapuzpopaSoBitAm catu Page a rvargapradAM devIM sADakABIzwasidDidAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya vAcakaSabdAH yaTA BaH klinnA Bramaro BImo viSvamUrttirniSA Bavam dviraRqo BUzaRomUlaM yajYasUtrapravAcakaH nakzatraM BramaRA dIprirvayoBUmiH payo naBaH nABirBadaM mahAbAhurviSvamUrttirvitARqavaH prARAtmA tApinI vajrA viSvarUpI ca candrikA BImasenaH suDAsenaH suKI mayApuraM haraH varRABiDAnam mAtfkAnyAse sya nABO nyAsyatA kAvyAdAvasya prayoge suKaBayamaraRakleSa duHKaM pavargaH vf wI ukteH kleSaH Palam Ba na BAti BA ka nakzatre amaraH grahe SabdaratnA rASO jyo ta SukrAcAryye pu medi tezAM dIptimattvAt taTAttvam BUDare ekAkzarakozaH BrAntO pu SabdaratnA vf ra ukte Adiguruke antya laGudvaye varRatraye tasya kAvyAdO prayoge PalaM yaSaH devatAcandraH yaToktaM vf ra wIkAyAm BaScandro yaSaH ujjvalam
BaRqu BaRqu BaRqu pu Baqi uR deSaBede tataH suvAstvA muvAstvA caturarTyAM aR BARqava tadadUradeSAdO tri BaRqu RqU ka pu Baqi uka Uka vA BANgana matsyaBede ratnamAlA dIrGamaDyaH SyonAkavfkze ratnamAlA BaRqu pu Baqi uR deSaBede tataH muvAstvA caturarTyAM aR BARqava tadadUradeSAdO tri
BaRquka BaRquka BaRqu RqU ka pu Baqi uka Uka vA BANgana matsyaBede ratnamAlA dIrGamaDyaH SyonAkavfkze ratnamAlA
BaRwu BaRwu BaRwu RwU pu Bawi uka Uka vA SyonAkavfkze ratnamA
BaRwuka BaRwuka BaRwu RwU ka pu Bawi uka Uka vA SyonAkavfkze ratna mA
BaYjaru BaYjaru BaYjaru pu BaYj bA uru devakulodBave vfkze trikA
BaYjaruM BaYjaruM BaYjaruM pu Banja bA uru devakulodBave vfkze trikA
BadraBuYja BadraBuYja BadraBuYja pu karma SaraBede BAvapra
BadradAntakA BadradAntakA BadradAntakA strI karma svArTe kan dantIvfkzaBede
BadradantikA BadradantikA BadradantikA strI karma svArTe kan dantIvfkzaBede
BadramuYja BadramuYja BadramuYja pu karma SaraBede BAvapra
BadrasImA BadrasImA BadrasImA strI BadraH soma iva dravo syAH gaNgAyAM SabdamA kuruvarzasTe nadIBede mArkapu a dfSyam
BadrasomA BadrasomA BadrasomA strI BadraH soma iva dravo syAH gaNgAyAM SabdamA kuruvarzasTe nadIBede mArkapu a
BadravirAj BadravirAj BadravirAj oje taparO jarO guruScen msO jgO BadUvirAq Bavedanoja vf ukte ardDasame vfttaBede
BadravirAja BadravirAja BadravirAja oje taparO jarO guruScen BsO jagO BadravirAq Bavedanoje vf ukte ardDasame vfttaBede
BagaRA BagaRA BagaRA pu ta dvAdaSarASInAM samUhe tadBogakAle ca yaToktaM sU si paScAdvrajanto tijavAnnakzatrEH satataM grahAH jIyamAnAstu sambanDe tulyameva KamArgagAH prAggatitvamatastezAM BagaREH pratyahaM gatiH pariRAha vaSAdBinnA tadvaSAdBAni BuYjate SIGragastAnyaTAlpena kAlena mahatAlpagaH tezAM tu parivarttena pOzRAnte BagaRAH smftaH vikalAnAM kalA zazWyA tat zazWyA BAga ucyate tantriMSatA BavedrASirBagaRo dvAdaSeva tesU si SIGragatirgrahastAni BAnyalpena kAlena Bunaktyalpagatirgraho bahukAlena Bunakti tulyarAgyAdiBogo mandaSIGragatigrahayostulyakAlena na BavatIti viSezArTaH tezAM rASInAM parivarttena BramaRena tukArAd grahAdigati Bogajanitena BagaRaH prAjYEruktaH krAntivftte dvAdaSarASInAM sattvAt tadBogena cakraBogasamApteryat sTAnamAraBya calito grahaH punastat sTAnamAyAti sa cakraBogaH parivarttasaYjYo pi dvAdaSarASiBogAdBagaRa ityarTaH nanu krAntivftte sarvapradeSeByaH parivarttasamBavAdatra kaH parivarttAdiBUtaH pradeSa ityata Aha pOzRAnta iti sfzwyAdO brahmaRA krAntivftte revatIyogatArAsaYcapradeSe sarvagrahARAM niveSatitvAt tadavaDito grahacalanAYca pOzRasya revatIyotArAyA anne nikawe pradeSe taTA ca revatIyogatArAsannAgrimasTAnamevAdyantAvaDiBUtamiti BAvaHraNganATaH
BagaRa BagaRa BagaRa pu ta dvAdaSarASInAM samUhe tadBogakAle ca yaToktaM sU si paScAdvrajanto tijavAnnakzatrEH satataM grahAH jIyamAnAstu lambante tulyameva svamArgagAH prAggatitvamatastezAM BagaREH pratyahaM gatiH pariRAha vaSAdBinnA tadvaSAdBAni BuYjate SIGragastAnyaTAlpena kAlena mahatAlpagaH tezAM tu parivarttena pOzRAnte BagaRaH smftaH vikalAnAM kalA zazWyA tat zazWyA BAga ucyate tattriMSatA BavedrASirBagaRo dvAdaSEva te sU si SIGragatirgrahastAni BAnyalpena kAlena Bunaktyalpagati rgraho bahukAlena Bunakti tulyarASyAdiBogo mandaSIGra gatigrahayostulyakAlena na BavatIti viSezArTaH tezAM rASInAM parivarttena BramaRena tukArAd grahAdigati Bogajanitena BagaRaH prAjYEruktaH krAntivftte dvAdaSa rASInAM sattvAt tadBogena cakraBogasamApteryat sTAna mAraBya calito grahaH punastat sTAnamAyAti sa cakra BogaH parivarttasaYjYI pi dvAdaSarASiBogAdBagaRa ityarTaH nanu krAntivftte sarvapradeSeByaH parivarttasamBavA datrakaH paribarttAdiBUtaH pradeSa ityata Aha pOzRAnta iti sfzwyAdO brahmaRA krAntivftte revatIyogatArA sannapradeSe sarvagrahARAM niveSatitvAt tadavaDitI graha calanAcca pOzRasya revatIyotArAyA ante nikawe pradeSe taTA ca revatIyogatArAsannAgrimasTAnamevAdyantAvaDiBUta miti BAvaH raNganATaH

CAtra CAtra CAtra pu CatraM gurorvEguRyAvaraRaM SIlamasya CatrA Ra antevAsini Sizye maDuBede na varawAH kapilAH pItAH prAyohimavatovane kurvanti CatrAkAraM tu tajjaM cCAtraM maDu smftam CAtraM kapilapItaM syAt picCilaM SItalaM guru svAdupAkaM kfBiGnaM ca raktapittapramehajit BramatfRmIhaviGahft tarpaRaYca guRAzikam BAvapra
CAtradarSana CAtradarSana CAtradarSana na CAtraM maDuBede iva dfSyate dfSa karmaRi lyuw maDutulyAsvAde hEyahgavIne Sabdaca ta Sizyasya darSane ca
CAtragaRqa CAtragaRqa CAtragaRqa pu CAtro gaRqa iva padyasya pAdamAtravettari alpajYe mande Sizye hArA
CAtravyaMsaka CAtravyaMsaka CAtravyaMsaka pu CAtro vyaMsakaH mayU parani mandaSizye
CAtri CAtri CAtri strI cu Cada ktin CAdane karttari ktic CAdake asya SAlASabde pare CAttryAdayaH SAlAyAm pA CAdyudAttatA CAttriSAlA yadApi SAlAntastatpuruze napuMsakaliNgoBavati tadApi tatpuruze SAlAyAM napuMsake pA ityetasmAn pUrvavipratizeDenAyameva svaraH CAttriSAlam si kO

CAttra CAttra CAttra pu CattraM gurorvEguRyAvaraRaM SIlamasya CattrA Ra antevAsini Sizye maDuBede na varawAH kapilAH pItAH prAyohimavatovane kurvanti CattrAkAraM tu tajjaM cCAttraM maGu smftam CAttraM kapilapItaM syAt picCilaM SItalaM guru svAdupAkaM kfmiGnaM ca rakta pittapramehajit BramatfRmIhavizahft tarpaRaYca guRA pikam BAvapra

CAttri CAttri CAttri strI cu Cada ktin CAdane karttari ktic CAdke asya SAlASabde pare CAttryAdayaH SAlAyAm pA AdyudAttatA CAttriSAlA yadApi SAlAnta statpuruze napuMsakaliNgoBavati tadApi tatpuruze SAlAyAM napuMsake pA ityetasmAn pUrvavipratizeDenAyameva KaraH CAttriSAlam si kO

Ca Ca Ca CakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH sparSasaMjYastasyoccAraRasTAnaM tAlu AByamnaraprayatnaH jihvAmaDyena tAlusmarSaH bAhya prayatnAH vivAraSvAsA TozA mahAprARaSca mAtfkA nyAse sya vAmakUrpare nyAsaH tantramate asya vAcaka SabdAH CaSCandanaM suzumRA ca paSuH paSupati rmftiH nirmalaM taralaM vahnirBUtamAtrA vilAsinI ekanetraSca vfzalI dviSirA vAmakUrparaH gokarRo lA NgalI rAmaH kAmamAtA sadASivaH mAtA niSAcaraH pAyurvikzataH sTitiSabdakaH varRABiDAnam mAtfkA varRAtmikAyAstasyA DyAnamuktaM varRodDAratantre DyAnamasyAH pravakzyAmi dviBujAM tu trilocanAm pItAmbaraDarAM nityaM varadAM BaktavatsalAm evaM DyAtvA CakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet kAvye sya praTamanirddeSaPalaM vf ra wI uktaM yaTA kaH Kogo GaSca lakzmIM vitarati viyaSoNastaTA caH suKaM CaH prIti jomitralABamityAdi Ca pu CakAravarRe Co GaYarTe BAve ka Cedane strI Page a karmmaRi DaYarTe GaYarTe ka nirmale nirmmale tri medi gfhe na SabdArTaci Cada vA bA BAve qa CAdane Ca CakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH sparSasaMjYastasyoccAraRasTAnaM tAlu AByamnaraprayatnaH jihvAmaDyena tAlusmarSaH bAhya prayatnAH vivAraSvAsA TozA mahAprARaSca mAtfkA nyAse sya vAmakUrpare nyAsaH tantramate asya vAcaka SabdAH CaSCandanaM suzumRA ca paSuH paSupati rmftiH nirmalaM taralaM vahnirBUtamAtrA vilAsinI ekanetraSca vfzalI dviSirA vAmakUrparaH gokarRo lA NgalI rAmaH kAmamAtA sadASivaH mAtA niSAcaraH pAyurvikzataH sTitiSabdakaH varRABiDAnam mAtfkA varRAtmikAyAstasyA DyAnamuktaM varRodDAratantre DyAnamasyAH pravakzyAmi dviBujAM tu trilocanAm pItAmbaraDarAM nityaM varadAM BaktavatsalAm evaM DyAtvA CakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet kAvye sya praTamanirddeSaPalaM vf ra wI uktaM yaTA kaH Kogo GaSca lakzmIM vitarati viyaSoNastaTA caH suKaM CaH prIti jomitralABamityAdi Ca pu CakAravarRe Co GaYarTe BAve ka Cedane strI Page a karmmaRi GaYarTe ka nirmmale tri medi gfhe na SabdArTaci Cada bA BAve qa CAdane
Cada Cada Cada saMvftO ada cu uBa saka sew Cadayati te acicCadat ta Cada saMvftO vA cu pakze BvA uBa saka sew CAdayati CAda yati te Cadati te acicCadat ta acCAdIt acCadIt acCadizwa Urjane Urjjane balADAne jIvane cAyaM mit Cadayati te iti BedaH CannaH CAditaH Ge hrasvaH CadaH agnimantaSCAdayasi aTa antaM CAdayedAjyena CAda yedAjyena kAtyA SrO CAdayannizujAlena BA A a upasargapUrvakasya tattadupasargadyotyArTayuktasaMvaraRe upasargapUrbbakasya tattadupasarga dyotyArTayuktasaMvaraRe AcCAdya cArcayitvA cArccayitvA ca manuH Cada saMvftO cu uBa saka sew idit pARi Candayati Canda yati te acicCandat ta CandaH Cada pu Cada puM si puMsi saMjYAyAM GaH hrasvaH vfkzAdipatre vfkzAdipattre Kagapakze amaraH granTiparRavfkzaSre granTiparRavfkze tamAlavfkze ca medi kftAM vindusaroratnErmayena sPAwikacCadAm nalinIm BA sa a nityapuzpaPalAstatra nityapuzpa PalAstatra pAdapAH haritacCadAH hari tacCadAH BA va a Cada saMvftO ada cu uBa saka sew Cadayati te acicCadat ta Cada saMvftO vA cu pakze BvA uBa saka sew CAda yati te Cadati te acicCadat ta acCAdIt acCadIt acCadizwa Urjjane balADAne jIvane cAyaM mit Cadayati te iti BedaH CannaH CAditaH Ge hrasvaH CadaH agnimantaSCAdayasi aTa antaM CAda yedAjyena kAtyA SrO CAdayannizujAlena BA A a upasargapUrbbakasya tattadupasarga dyotyArTayuktasaMvaraRe AcCAdya cArccayitvA ca manuH Cada saMvftO cu uBa saka sew idit pARi Canda yati te acicCandat ta CandaH Cada pu Cada puMsi saMjYAyAM GaH hrasvaH vfkzAdipattre Kagapakze amaraH granTiparRavfkze tamAlavfkze ca medi kftAM vindusaroratnErmayena sPAwikacCadAm nalinIm BA sa a nityapuzpa PalAstatra pAdapAH hari tacCadAH BA va a

Cala Cala Cala na Cala ac svarUpAcCAdane vyAje yaTArTagUhane kUwayudDAdinA tanmaryAdAyAScalane kawayudDAdinA tanmaryyAdAyAScalane SAWye kApawyemyAyamatasidDe kAryAntareRa kApawyeM nyAyamatasidDe kAryyAntareRa prayuktasya vAdyuktaSabdasyArTAntara kalpanayA prativAdinA datte dUzaRaBede tallakzaRaBedAdikaM tallakzaRaBedA dikaM gO sU sf vfttO darSitam yaTA viDAto rTavikalpopapattyA viGAto rTa vikalpopapattyA Calam tat triviDaM vAkCalaM sAmAnyacCalamupacAracCalaYceti sA mAnyacCalamupacAracCalaYceti aviSezABihite rTe vakturaBaprAyAdarTAntarakalpanA vAkCalam samBavato samBa vato rTasyAtisAmAnyayogAdasammatArTakalpanA sAmAnya cCalam DarmavikalpanirdeSo rTasamBAvapratizeDa udcAracCalam vAkCalamevopacarAcCalaM tadaviSezAt upacAracCalam vAkaCalamevopacAracCalaM tadavi Page b SezAt na tadarTAntaraBAvAt aviSeze apiSe ze vA kiYcitsADarmyAdekacCalaprasaNgaH gO sU kramaprAptaM CalaM lakzayati arTasya vAdyaBimatasya yo vikalpo virudDaH kalpo arTAntarakalpaneti yAvat tadupapattyA tadupa pattyA yuktiviSezeRa yo vacanasya vAdyuktasya viDAto viGAto dUzaRaM tacCalamityarTaH vaktftAtparyAvizayArTakalpanena dUzaRAniDAnamiti vaktftAtparyyAvizayArTakalpanena dUzaRABiDAnamiti PalitaM tAtparyAviyatvaM tAtparyyAvizayatvaM viSezye viSezaRe saMsarge vA yaTA nepAlAdAgato yaM navakambalavattvAdityatra navakambalava ttvAdityatra navasaNKyAparatvakalpanayA sidDyaBiDAnaM prameyaM DarmatvAdityatra puRyArTakalpanayA BAgAsidDyABiDAnam BAgAsidDyaBiDAnam vahnimAn DUmAdityatra DUmAvayave vyaBicArABiDAnam vf lakzitaM CalaM viBajate tatra vAkCalaM lakzayati yatra SakyArTadvaye samBavati ekArTanirRAyakaviSezABAvAdanaBipretaSakyArTakalpanena ekArTanirRAyakaviSezABAvA danaBipretaSakyArTakalpanena dUzaRABiDAnaM tadvAkCalaM lakzaRantu lakza Rantu SaktyA ekArTaSAbdaboDatAtparyakaSabdasya SakyArTAntaratAtparyakatvakalpanayA ekArTaSAbdaboDatAtparyyakaSabdasya SakyA rTAntaraMtAtparyyakatvakalpanayA dUzaRABiDAnaM yaTA nepAlAdAgato nepAlA dAgato yaM navakambalavattvAdityukte kuto sya navasaNKyAkAH navasaNKyakAH kambalA iti evaM gOrvizARItyukte kutogajasya SfNgaM SvetoDAvatIti SvetarUpavadaBiprAyeRokte SvetarUpavadaBipAyeRokte Sveto na DAvatItyaBiDAnamityAdikamuhyam DAva tItyaBiDAnamityAdikamuhyam vf sAmAnyaCalaM lakzayati sAmAnyaviSizwasamBavadarTAmiprAyeRoktasya atisAmAnyayogAdasamBavadarTakatvakalpanayA dUzaRABiDAnaM sAmAnyacCalam yaTA brAhmaRo brAhyaRo yaM vidyAcaraRasampanna ityukte brAhmaRatvena vidyAcaraRasampadaM sADayatIti kalpayitvA paro vadati kuto brAhmaRatvena vidyAcaraRasampadvAlye vidyAcaraRa sampadbAlye vyaBicArAt vf upacAracCalaM lakzayati lakza yati DarmaSabdasyArTena vikalpo viviDaH kalpaH SaktilakzaRAnyatararUpastayA SaktilakzaRayorekataravfttyA Sakti lakzaRAnyatararUpastayA SaktilakzaRayorekatararvfttyA prayukte Sabde tadaparavfttyA yaH pratizeDaH sa upacAracCalaM yaTA maYcAH kroSanti nIlo Gawa ityAdO maYcasTA eva kroSanti na tu maYcAH evaM Gawasya kayaM kaTaM nIlarUpABedaH evam ahaM nitya iti SaktyA SaktA prayukte amukasmAdutpannastvaM kaTaM nitya iti pratizeDo pyupacAracCalam vAdyaBipretArTasyAdUzaRena CalasyAsaduttaratvam na ca SlizwalAkzaRikaprayogAdvAdina evAparADaH SlizwalAkzaRikaprayogAdvA dinaevAparADaH syAditi vAcyaM tattadarTaboDakatayA prasidDasya Sabdasya prayoge prayoga vAdino naparADAt naparADAta anyaTA parvatIvahnimAnityukte parvato yaM kaTamavahnimAnityAdidUzaRenAnumAnAdyucCedaH kaTamavahnimAnityAdi dazaRenAnumAnAdyucCedaH syAt vf prasaNgAcCale prasaNgAcCalaM Page a parIkzituM pUrvapakzayati SabdasyArTAntarakalpanA viSezAdvAkCalamevopacAracCalaM viSezA dvAkCalamevopacAracCalaM syAditi dvitvameva na tu tritvamiti tritva miti SaNkArTaH vf samADatte upacAracCalasya vAkCalABedo na tayorarTAntaraBAvAt BinnatvAt BinnatayA Binna tayA pramARasidDatvAditi PalitArTaH pUrvoktaBedakaDarmeRa pUrvvoktaBedakaDarmmeRa BedasamBave pi yatkiYcidDarmeRABede sAmAnyaDarmeRABedasya sarvatra sarvvatra samBavAdviBAgaH kutrApi na syAditi vf vipakze bADakamaBipretyAha yatkiYcidDarmAdaviSeze kiYcitsADarmyAcCalatvAdirUpAcCalasyEkyaM ki YcitsADarmyAcCalatvAdirUpAcCalasyEkyaM syAnna tu tvadaBimataM tvad BimataM dvitvamapIti BAvaH vfttiH AkziptaketukaTasEnyagajacCalena mAGaH DarmeRa AkziptaketukuTasEnyagajacCalena mADaH DarmmeRa vyavahAreRa CalenAcaritena ca prayuktaM sADayedarTaM paYcamena paYca mena balena ca manuH BuvanahitacCalena yam BawwiH aDyAruroheva rajaSCalena raGuH CalaM nirasya BUtena vyavahArAnnayennfpaH yAjYa BUtaM tattvArTasambadDaM tattvArTa sambadDaM pramAdABihitaM Calam nAradokte pramAdABihite pramAdA Bihite ca CalakAriRi tri svArTe ka tatrArTe AvAByAM maDukEwaBAByAm CAdyate viSvaM rajasA tamasA taTA rajastamomayAvAvAM yatInAM duHKalakzaRO CalakO DarmASIlAnAM DarmmaSIlAnAM dustarO sarvadehinAm harivaM a nAwakapraBedavyITyaNkaBede na vITyAmeko BavedaNkaH ityupakrame asyAstrayodaSANgAni nirdiSanti manIziRaH udGAtyakAvalagitetyAdinA manI ziRaH udTAtyakAvalagitetyAdinA viBajya sA da lakzitaM yaTA priyABErapriyErvAkyErviloBya CalanA Calam yaTA veRyAM BImArjunO BImArjjunO karttA dyUtacCalAnAM jatumayaSaraRoddIpanaH dyUta cCalAnAM jatumayaSaraRoddIzanaH so BimAnI rAjA duHSAsanAdergururanujaSatasyANgarAjasya mitram kfzRAkeSottarIyavyapanayanapawuH pARqavA yasya dAsAH kAste duryoDano kvAste duryyoDano sO kaTayatu na ruzA drazwumaByAgatO druzwumaByA gatO svaH nABaDAtuH Cala nAmaDAtuH Cala kftO Ric saka sew Calayati Calayati vikramaRe adButa vAmanaH gItago dyUtaM CalayatAmaripra CalayatAmasmi gItA Cala na Cala ac svarUpAcCAdane vyAje yaTArTagUhane kawayudDAdinA tanmaryyAdAyAScalane SAWye kApawyeM nyAyamatasidDe kAryyAntareRa prayuktasya vAdyuktaSabdasyArTAntara kalpanayA prativAdinA datte dUzaRaBede tallakzaRaBedA dikaM gO sf vfttO darSitam yaTA viGAto rTa vikalpopapattyA Calam tat triviDaM vAkCalaM sA mAnyacCalamupacAracCalaYceti aviSezABihite rTe vakturaBaprAyAdarTAntarakalpanA vAkCalam samBa vato rTasyAtisAmAnyayogAdasammatArTakalpanA sAmAnya cCalam DarmavikalpanirdeSo rTasamBAvapratizeDa upacAracCalam vAkaCalamevopacAracCalaM tadavi Page b SezAt na tadarTAntaraBAvAt apiSe ze vA kiYcitsADarmyAdekacCalaprasaNgaH gO sU kramaprAptaM CalaM lakzayati arTasya vAdyaBimatasya yo vikalpo virudDaH kalpo arTAntarakalpaneti yAvat tadupa pattyA yuktiviSezeRa yo vacanasya vAdyuktasya viGAto dUzaRaM tacCalamityarTaH vaktftAtparyyAvizayArTakalpanena dUzaRABiDAnamiti PalitaM tAtparyyAvizayatvaM viSezye viSezaRe saMsarge vA yaTA nepAlAdAgato yaM navakambalava ttvAdityatra navasaNKyAparatvakalpanayA sidDyaBiDAnaM prameyaM DarmatvAdityatra puRyArTakalpanayA BAgAsidDyaBiDAnam vahnimAn DUmAdityatra DUmAvayave vyaBicArABiDAnam vf lakzitaM CalaM viBajate tatra vAkCalaM lakzayati yatra SakyArTadvaye samBavati ekArTanirRAyakaviSezABAvA danaBipretaSakyArTakalpanena dUzaRABiDAnaM tadvAkCalaM lakza Rantu SaktyA ekArTaSAbdaboDatAtparyyakaSabdasya SakyA rTAntaraMtAtparyyakatvakalpanayA dUzaRABiDAnaM yaTA nepAlA dAgato yaM navakambalavattvAdityukte kuto sya navasaNKyakAH kambalA iti evaM gOrvizARItyukte kutogajasya SfNgaM SvetoDAvatIti SvetarUpavadaBipAyeRokte Sveto na DAva tItyaBiDAnamityAdikamuhyam vf sAmAnyaCalaM lakzayati sAmAnyaviSizwasamBavadarTAmiprAyeRoktasya atisAmAnyayogAdasamBavadarTakatvakalpanayA dUzaRABiDAnaM sAmAnyacCalam yaTA brAhyaRo yaM vidyAcaraRasampanna ityukte brAhmaRatvena vidyAcaraRasampadaM sADayatIti kalpayitvA paro vadati kuto brAhmaRatvena vidyAcaraRa sampadbAlye vyaBicArAt vf upacAracCalaM lakza yati DarmaSabdasyArTena vikalpo viviDaH kalpaH Sakti lakzaRAnyatararUpastayA SaktilakzaRayorekatararvfttyA prayukte Sabde tadaparavfttyA yaH pratizeDaH sa upacAracCalaM yaTA maYcAH kroSanti nIlo Gawa ityAdO maYcasTA eva kroSanti na tu maYcAH evaM Gawasya kaTaM nIlarUpABedaH evam ahaM nitya iti SaktA prayukte amukasmAdutpannastvaM kaTaM nitya iti pratizeDo pyupacAracCalam dvitvameva na tu tritva miti SaNkArTaH vf samADatte upacAracCalasya vAkCalABedo na tayorarTAntaraBAvAt BinnatvAt Binna tayA pramARasidDatvAditi PalitArTaH pUrvvoktaBedakaDarmmeRa BedasamBave pi yatkiYcidDarmeRABede sAmAnyaDarmeRABedasya sarvvatra samBavAdviBAgaH kutrApi na syAditi vf vipakze bADakamaBipretyAha yatkiYcidDarmAdaviSeze ki YcitsADarmyAcCalatvAdirUpAcCalasyEkyaM syAnna tu tvad CandAparRa CandAparRa CandAparRa pu CandAMsi vedavihitakarmARi parRAnIva yasya mAyAmaye saMsAre CandAMsi yasya parRAni yastaM veda sa vedavit gItA CandAMsi CAdanAt tattvavastuprAvaraRAt saMsArabanDanAdIni karmARi fgyajuHsAmavedavihitAni parRAnIva yasya yaTA vfkzasya CAdanArTAni rakzaRArTAni ca parRAni evaM DarmADarmopArjanena karmaBiH saMsAra vfkzorakzyate iti tasya taTAtvam
CandaHparRRa CandaHparRRa CandaHparRRa pu CandAMsi vedavihitakarmmARi parRRAnIva yasya mAyAmaye saMsAre CandAMsi yasya parRRAni yastaM veda sa vedavit gItA CandAMsi CAdanAt tattvavastuprAvaraRAt saMsAravanDanAdIni karmmARi fgyajuHsAmavedavihitAni parRRAnIva yasya yaTA vfkzasya CAdanArTAni rakzaRArTAni ca parRAni evaM DarmmADarmmopArjjanena karmmaBiH saMsAra vfkzorakzyate iti tasya taTAtvam
Candoviciti Candoviciti Candoviciti strI ta CandasAM gAyatryAdInAM samudAye CandasAM vicitiryacayoyatra CandaHSAstre ca CandovicitirityevaM zaqaNgoveda izyate tataH fgayanA Bave vyAKyAne cArTe aR CAndovicita tadBave tadvyAKyAne ca
Candoviviti Candoviviti Candoviviti strI ta CandamAM gAyatryAdInAM samu dAye CandaMsAM vicitirvicayoyatra CandaHSAstre ca CandovicitirityetaM zaqaNgovedEzyate tataH fgayanA Bave vyAKyAne cArTe aRa CAndovicita tadBave tadvyAKyAne ca
CarddApanikA CarddApanikA CarddApanikA strI CardaM vamanamApayati Api lyu svArTe ka ata ittvam karkawyAm rAjati
CarddapanikA CarddapanikA CarddapanikA strI CardaM vamanamApayati Api lyu svArTe ka ata ittvam karkawyAm rAjani
CatrA CatrA CatrA strI Cada traR wAp mOri vfkze medi aticCatre sulpA kustumburO DaniyA SilInDre ca medi maYjizWAyAM rAjani
CatrADAnya CatrADAnya CatrADAnya na CatrA DAnyamiva kastumburO DanyAke rAjani
CatrAdi CatrAdi CatrAdi pu CatrAdiByoRaH pA SIlArTe Rapratyayanimitte pA ga sU ukte gaRaBede sa ca gaRo yaTA Catra SikzA praroha sTA buBukzA curA titikzA upasTAna kfzi karman viSvaDA tapas satya anfta viSiKA viSikA BakzA udasTAna puroqASa vikzA cukzA mantra CAtraH cOra ityAdi
CatrAka CatrAka CatrAka na CatrA aticCatreva kAyati kE ka SilInDre CatrAkaM viqvarAhaYceti manuH palARquM viqvArAhaYca CatrAkaM grAmakukkuwam yAjYa jAlavarvurakakze pu rAjani gOrA NIz rAsnAyAM strI amaraH
CatrAticCatra CatrAticCatra CatrAticCatra pu cCatramatikramya CatramAvaraRamastyasya ac CatrAkAre jalodBave suganDitfRaBede SabdaratnA
Catra Catra Catra pu Cada Ric zwran hrasvaH ardDarcA CatrAkArapatre CAtAriyA kzupaBede ratnamAlA Atapatre na medi aticCatrAyAM sulpA vfkze strI BUtfRe rAjani tatra AtapatraSabde uzRavAraRaSabde pfzWe ca vivftiH raTASvaM hastinaM CatraM DanaM DAnyaM paSUn striyaH aByaNgamaYjanaYcAkzRorupAnacCattraDAraRam manuH SaSipraBaM CattramuBe ca cAmare raGuH AvaraRamAtre ca CattraM gurorvEguRyAcCAdanaM SIlaM yasya CatrA Ra CAttra Sizye
CatraBaNga CatraBaNga CatraBaNga pu Catrasya BaNgo yatra nfpanASe vEDavye asvAtantrye ca medi
CatraDara CatraDara CatraDa DA ra pu CatraM Darati DArayati vA ac aR vA CAyAkaraRAya niyukte dAsaBede tatra aRAntasya aRiniyukte pA pUrvapadamAdyudAttam
CatragucCa CatragucCa CatragucCa pu Catramiva gucCo sya guRqatfRe rAjani
Catraka Catraka Catraka pu Catramiva kAyati kE ka rANgAkulesyAqA vfkze matsyaraNge pakziRi ca ratnamAlA svArTe ka Catre na IScaragfhaBede SabdArTaci
Catrapatra Catrapatra Catrapatra pu Catramiva patramasya sTalapadme ratnamAlA BUrjapatravfkze ca trikA
CatrikA CatrikA CatrikA strI CatraM tadAkAraM puzpaM vA styasya zWat SilInDre svedaje SAkaBede hArA tasyA utpattisTAnAdikaM BAvapra uktaM yaTA uktaM saMsvedajaM SAkaM BUmicCatraM SilInDrakam kziti gomayakAzWezu vfkzAdizu tadudBavet sarve saMsvedajAH SAkAdozalAH picCalASca te guravaSCardyatIsArajvaraSlezmAmayapradAH SvetaSuBrasTalIkAzWavaMSagomayasamBavAH nAtidozakarAste syuH SezAsteByovigarhitAH Catra viSizwe tri tataH purohitA BAve yak CAtrikya Catrayuktatve na
Catrin Catrin Catrin tri Catramastyasya Atapatrayukte CatriRo gacCanti sA da varzAtape ca CatrI daRqI rAtrya wavIzu ca BAvapra mOYjI yajYopavItI ca CatrI daRqAjinI taTA vAmanaH harivaM a nApite pu SabdaratnA
CattrA CattrA CattrA strI Cada traR wApa mOri vfkze medi aticCatre sulpA kustumburO DaniyA SilInDre ca medi maYjizWAyAM rAjani
CattrADAnya CattrADAnya CattrADAnya na CattrA DAnyamiva kustumburO DanyAke rAjani
CattrAdi CattrAdi CattrAdi pu CattrAdiByoRaH pA SIlArTe Rapratyayani mitte pA ga sU ukte gaRaBede sa ca gaRo yaTA Cattra SikzA praroha sTA buBukzA curA titikzA upa sTAna kfzi karman viSvaDA tapas satya anfta viSiKA viSikA BakzA udasTAna puroqa Sa vikzA cukzA mantra CAtraH cOra ityAdi
CattrAka CattrAka CattrAka na CattrA aticCattreva kAyAta kE ka SilInDre CattrAkaM viqvarAhaYceti manuH palARquM viq varAhaYca CattrAkaM grAmakukkuwam yAjYa jAla varvurakakze pu rAjani gOrA NIz rAsnAyAM strI amaraH
CattrAticCattra CattrAticCattra CattrAticCattra pu cCattramatikramya CatramAvaraRamastyasya ac CattrAkAre jalodBave suganDitfRaBede SabdaratnA
Cattra Cattra Cattra pu Cada Ric zwran hrasvaH ardDarcA CatrAkArapatre CAtAriyA kzupaBede ratnamAlA Atapatre na medi aticCatrAyAM sulpA vfkze strI BUtfRe rAjani tatra AtapatraSabde pf uzRavAraRa Sabde pfzWe ca vivftiH raTASvaM hastinaM CattraM DanaM DAnyaM paSUn striyaH aByaNgamaYjanaYcAkzRA rupAnacCattraDAraRam manuH SaSipraBaM CattramuBe ca cAmare raGuH AvaraRamAtre ca CattraM guro rvEgu RyAcCAdanaM SIlaM yasya CattrA Ra CAttrA Sizye
CattraBaNga CattraBaNga CattraBaNga pu Catrasya BaNgo yatra nfpanASe vEDavye asvAtantrye ca medi
CattraDara CattraDara CattraDa DA ra pu CattraM Darati DArayati vA ac aR vA CAyAkaraRAya niyukte dAmaBede tatra aRantasya aRi niyukte pA pUrvvapadamAdyudAttam
CattragucCa CattragucCa CattragucCa pu Cattramiva gucCo sya guRqatfRe rAjani
Cattraka Cattraka Cattraka pu Catramiva kAyati kEka rANgAkuleKAqA vfkze matsyaraNge pakziRi ca ratnamAlAH svArTe ka Catre na ISvaragfhaBede SabdArTaci
Cattrapatra Cattrapatra Cattrapatra pu Cattramiva patramasya sTalapadme ratnamAlA BUrjapatravfkze ca trikA
CattrikA CattrikA CattrikA strI CattraM tadAkAraM puzpaM vA styasya Wan SilInDre svedaje SAkaBede hArA tasyA utpatti sTAnAdikaM BAvapra uktaM yaTA uktaM saMsvedajaM SAkaM BUmicCatraM SilInDrakam kziti gomayakAzWezu vfkzAdizu tadudBavet sarve saMsvedajAH SAkAdozalAH picCalASca te guravaSCardyatIsArajvara SlezpAmayapradAH SvetaSuBrasTalIkAzWavaMSayomayasamBavAH nAtidozakarAste syuH SezAsteByovigarhitAH Cattra viSizwe tri tataH purohitA BAve yak CAttrikya Cattrayuktatve na
Cattrin Cattrin Cattrin tri Cattramastyasya Atapatrayukte CattriRo gacCanti sA da varzAtape ca CattrI daRqI rAtrya wavIzu ca BAvapra mOYjI yajYopavItI ca CattrI daRqAjinI taTA vAmanaH haribaM a nApite pu SabdaratnA
CawABA CawABA CawABA strI CawayA dIptyA BAti BA ka vidyuti hArA
Ceda Ceda Ceda Cedane ada cu uBa saka sew Cedayati te acicCedat aci cCedat ta Ceda pu Cida BAve GaY acvA aca vA Cedane aBijYASCedapAtAnAM aBi jYASCedapAtAnAM kriyante nandanadgumAH nandanadrumAH kumA karttari ac Cedake BAjake CedaM CedaMguRaM guRaM guRaM Cedamiti Ceda miti lIlAvatI karmaRi karmmaRi GaY KaRqe tri valAhakacCedaviBaktarAgAm kumA visakisalayacCedapAnDeyavantaH visakisalaya cCedapAnyeyavantaH meGaH KaRqArTasya tu triliNgatvena striyAM gOrA NIz tatonityamarhati WaY CEdika nityaCedArhe vetasAdO nityacCedArhe vetasA Ceda Cedane ada cu uBa saka sew Cedayati te aci cCedat ta Ceda pu Cida BAve GaY aca vA Cedane aBi jYASCedapAtAnAM kriyante nandanadrumAH kumA karttari ac Cedake BAjake CedaMguRaM guRaM Ceda miti lIlAvatI karmmaRi GaY KaRqe tri valAhakacCedaviBaktarAgAm kumA visakisalaya cCedapAnyeyavantaH meGaH KaRqArTasya tu triliNgatvena striyAM gOrA NIz tatonityamarhati WaY CEdika nityacCedArhe vetasA
Cfda Cfda Cfda sandIpane vA cu uBa pakze BvA para saka sew Cardayatite Cardayati te Cardati acicCfdat ta acacCardat ta acCardIt acCadIt Cfda devane dOptO ca aka vamane vasane saka ruDA uBa sew CuRatti CaRatti Cfnte irit acCa dat acCfdat acCardIt acCarddizwa acCa rddizwa Carddizyati Cartsyati udit CarditvA CfttvA CfnnaH Cfda sandIpane vA cu uBa pakze BvA para saka sew Cardayati te Cardati acicCfdat ta acacCardat ta acCadIt Cfda devane dOptO ca aka vasane saka ruDA uBa sew CaRatti Cfnte irit acCfdat acCardIt acCa rddizwa Carddizyati Cartsyati udit CarditvA CfttvA CfnnaH
CidrAntar CidrAntar CidrAntar pu CidramantarmaDye yasya nale rAjani
CidrAntara CidrAntara CidrAntara pu CidramantarmaDye yasya nale rAjani
Cidra Cidra Cidra Bedane ada curA uBa sala sew Cidrayati te acicCidrat ta CidritaH Cidram Cidra na Cida rak Cidra ac vA dUzaRe gartte avakASe ava kASe jyotizokte lagnato zwamasTAne CidrAKyamazwamaM sTAnam jyo ta CidraM Cidra nivArayet sarvaM SvaSUkaramuKAnugam SvaSUkara muKAnugam manuH CidrezvanarTA bahulIBavanti Saku nAsyacCidraM parovidyAt vidyAcCidraM parasya tu manuH dehe CidrasaMKyAmAha yAjYa mitAkzarayoH romRAM kowyastu paYcASaccatasraH kowya eva ca saptazazwistaTA sapta zazwistaTA lakzAH sArdDAH svedAyanEH saha vAyavIyErvigaRyante vAyavIyE rvigaRyante viBaktAH paramARavaH yAjYa pUrvoditasirAkeSAdisahitAnAM pUrvodita sirAkeSAdisahitAnAM romRAmparamARavaH sUkzmasUkzmatararUpA sUkzmasUkzma tararUpA BAgAH svedasravaRaSuzirEH saha catuHpaYcASatkowyaH catuHpaYcA SatkowyaH taTA saptottarazazwilakzAH sArdDAH paYcASatsahastrasahitAH vAyavIyErviBaktAH paYcASatsahasra sahitAH vAyavoyErviBaktAH pavanaparamARuBiH pfTak kftA vigaRyante mitA etA sUkzmacCidrasaNKyAH sTUlacCidrasaNKyA sUkzmacCidrasaMKyAH sTUlacCidrasaMKyA tu nava naba muKanetravarRanA sAdvayapAyUpasTa sTAnaBedAt tatsaNKyAH tatsaMKyAH tulyatvena nava saNKyAyAM saMKyAyAM ca Cidra Bedane ada curA uBa sala sew Cidrayati te acicCidrat ta CidritaH Cidram Cidra na Cida rak Cidra ac vA dUzaRe gartte ava kASe jyotizokte lagnato zwamasTAne CidrAKyamazwamaM sTAnam jyo ta Cidra nivArayet sarvaM SvaSUkara muKAnugam manuH CidrezvanarTA bahulIBavanti Saku nAsyacCidraM parovidyAt vidyAcCidraM parasya tu manuH dehe CidrasaMKyAmAha yAjYa mitAkzarayoH romRAM kowyastu paYcASaccatasraH kowya eva ca sapta zazwistaTA lakzAH sArdDAH svedAyanEH saha vAyavIyE rvigaRyante viBaktAH paramARavaH yAjYa pUrvodita sirAkeSAdisahitAnAM romRAmparamARavaH sUkzmasUkzma tararUpA BAgAH svedasravaRaSuzirEH saha catuHpaYcA SatkowyaH taTA saptottarazazwilakzAH sArdDAH paYcASatsahasra sahitAH vAyavoyErviBaktAH pavanaparamARuBiH pfTak kftA vigaRyante mitA etA sUkzmacCidrasaMKyAH sTUlacCidrasaMKyA tu naba muKanetravarRanA sAdvayapAyUpasTa sTAnaBedAt tatsaMKyAH tulyatvena nava saMKyAyAM ca
Cupa Cupa Cupa sparSe tu para saka anaw aniw Cupati acCOpsIt acCApasIt cucCopa Cupa pu Cupu Cupa karttari ka GaYarTe ka vA kzupe hrasvaSAKe hrasvaSAsve vfkze sparSane medi capale tri ADAre ka yudDe pu viSvaH Cupa sparSe tu para saka aniw Cupati acCApasIt cucCopa Cupa pu Cupa karttari ka GaYarTe ka vA kzupe hrasvaSAsve vfkze sparSane medi capale tri ADAre ka yudDe pu viSvaH
Cuqa Cuqa Cuqa CAdane tu ku para saka sew Cuqati acCuqIt cucCoqa Cuqa piDAne BvA pa saka sew Coqati acCoqIt cucCoqa cu cCoqa Cuqa CAdane tu ku para saka sew Cuqati acCuqIt cucCoqa Cuqa piDAne BvA pa saka sew Coqati acCoqIt cu cCoqa
Cura Cura Cura Cede BvA para saka sew mew Corati acCorIt cucCora Cura lepane tu ku para saka sew Curati Carati acCurIt cucCora CuritaH Curitamiva viyadGanErvicitrEH vf sa a kusumalAvacCuritaparyante paryaNkatale kusumalavacCuritaparyyante paryyaNkatale daSaku manaHSilAvicCuritA nizeduH kumA tizeduH kamA Cura Cede BvA para saka mew Corati acCorIt cucCora Cura lepane tu ku para saka sew Carati acCurIt cucCora CuritaH Curitamiva viyadGanErvicitrEH vf sa a kusumalavacCuritaparyyante paryyaNkatale daSaku manaHSilAvicCuritA tizeduH kamA
CurikApatrI CurikApatrI CurikApatrI strI Curikeva patramamyAH NIza SretAlatA yAm rAjani
CurikApatrO CurikApatrO CurikApatrO strI Curikeva patramasyAH NIz SvetAlatAyAm rAjani
DAmacCad DAmacCad DAmacCad pu DAmAni CAdayati CAdi kvip hrasvaH nyUnAnAM pUrake atiriktAnAM samIkArake DAmacCa dagnirindraH yaju vAg vA anuzwuv vAga DAmacCadvAcEvAsya tadApnoti Sata vrA
DAmacCada DAmacCada DAmacCada pu DAmAni CAdayati CAdi kvip hrasvaH nyUnAnAM pUrake atiriktAnAM samIkArake DAmacCadagnirindraH yaju vAg vA anuzwup vAga DAmacCadvAcEvAsya tadApnoti Sata brA
DAnvarAja DAnvarAja DAnvarAja pu DAnyAnAM rAjA wac samA yave rAjani

DAraRIyayantra DAraRIyayantra DAraRIyayantra na DAryyate DAri karmaRi anIyar karma DAryye devatABedAnAM yantraBede tacca pUjAyantrAdvilakzaRaM sAradAyAM pawale dfSyam talleKanadravyAdi tatroktaM yaTA kASmIrarocanAlAkzAmfgeBamadacandanEH vili KedDemaleKanyA yantrARyetAni deSikaH nizidDayantramuktam BUmispfzwaM SavaspfzwaM dagDaM nirmAlyasaNgatam viSIrRaM laNGitaM mantrI yantraM jAtu na DArayet mantramahIdaDO taraNge talleKanaprakAradravyAdikamuktaM tatrEva dfSyam vistaraBayAt na liKitaM karmaBede sAmAnyatoleKanadra vyAdikaM taraNge tatroktaM yaTA candanaM rAcanA rAtri rgfhaDUmaScitABavaH aNgAro zwavizARIti SAntyAdO yantraleKane pUrvoktaleKanadravyaM gfhRIyAttadapi Druvam Page a pippalaM maricaM SuRWI SyenavizWATa citrakaH gfha DUmonmattarasO lavaRaYca vizAzwakam SAntO vaSye liKedBUrje stamBane dvIpicarmaRi KaracarmaRi vidveze uccAwe DvajavAsasi narAsTani liKedyantraM mAraRa mantravittamaH ye tvADArAH smftA yantrataraNge te pi sammatAH
DAtuBft DAtuBft DAtuBft pu DAtuM gErikAdikamupaDAtuM biBartti Bf kvip tuk ta parvate trikA
DAtumft DAtumft DAtumft pu DAtuM gErikAdikamupaDAtuM viBartti Bf kvip tuk ta parvate trikA
DOnDumAra DOnDumAra DOnDumAra na DunDumAramaDikftya kfto granTaH aR BArata vanaparvAntargatopAKyAnaBede EndradyumnamupAKyAnaM DOnDu Page a mAraM taTEva ca BA A a tacca vanaparvaRi aDyA yAvaDO aDyAyAnte dfSyam
DUH DUH DUH pati pu DuraH patiH aharAditvAt patyAdO zatvaratvo pADmAnIyA vA BArapatO BArasahe pakze Duzpati rDUpati pati tatrArTe
DUHpati DUHpati DUHpati pu DuraH patiH aharAditvAt patyAdO zatvaratvopADmAnIyA vA BArapatO BArasahe pakze Duzpati rDUpati DUzpati tatrArTe
DakAraH DakAraH DakAraH tavargIyaH paYcamaH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRasTAnaM danta mUlaM dantyA latulasAH smftAH iti tavargasya dantyatvoktiH dantamUlaparatvena anyaTA Bagnadantasya tavargoccAraRAnupa patteH vyaYjanavarRatvAdardDamAtratvam tasya tasyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH spfzwatA jihvAgreRa dantamUlasya samyak sparSena tasToccAraRAt taTAtvam vAhyaprayatnASca saMvAra nAdavozA mahAprARaSca si kO mUlaM dfSyam asya vAcakaSabdA varRABiDAnatantroktA yaTA Do DanArTo ruciH sTARuH sAtvato yoginIpriyaH mIneSaH SaNKinI toyaM nAgeSo viSvapAvanI DizaRA DAraRA cintA netrayugmaM priyo matiH pItavAsAstrivarRA ca DAtrI DarmaH plavaNgamaH sandarSo mohano lajjA vajra tuRqaH sukanDarA vAmapAdANgulImUlaM jyezWA sura puraM BavaH sparSAtmA dIrGajaNGA ca DaneSo DanasaYcayaH asya mAtfkAnyAse vAmapAdANgulimUle nyAsyatA asyADizWAtfdevatAyA DyeyarUpam zaqBujAM mezavarRAYca raktrAmbaraDarAM parAm varadAM SoBanAM ramyAM caturvarga pradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA DakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya svarUpaYca DakAraM parameSAni kuRqalI mokzarUpiRI AtmAditattvasaMyuktaM paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARamayaM devi visinIsahitaM sadA trivindusahitaM varRaM DakAraM yadi BAvayet pIta vidyullatAkAraM caturvargapradAyakam kAmaDenu asya kAvyAdO praTamanyAsaPalaM vf ra wIkAyAmuktaM yaTA doDaH sOKyaM mfdaM naH
Danus Danus Danus na Dana Sabde usi cApe SaranikzepayantraBede amaraH jyAkarzaRotTaSabdayogAttasya taTAtvam tallakzaRam Danustu dviviDaM proktaM SArNgaM vAMSaM taTEva ca komalaM varRadfQatA tayorguRa udAhftaH suKa sampattikaraRaM samamuzwyAyataM DanuH vipado muzwivEzamye tadaNge BaNgamAvahet yuktikalpataruH DanurvedaSabde tallakzaRAdi dfSyam piyAlavfkze pu mezAvaDike navame rASO nA svarRaBAH SElasamodayo tiSabdodinaM prAk dfQasUkzmapItaH raktozRapitto DanuralpasUtisaNgo dvimUrttirdvipadognirugraH nI tA ayaYca rASiH kalAtmakasya rASicakrasya kalottaraM kalAtmakaH mUlapUrvAzAQottarAzAQA praTamacaraRAtmakaH mUlaM pUrvAzAQA praTamaScApyatArAM Sako DanvI jyo ta asya svarUpaM cApI naro Sva jaGanaH bfhajjA aSvatulyajaGanaH narastena catuzpAdityarTaH yaTAha yavaneSvaraH DanvI manuzyo hayapaScimArdDastamAhuH BawwotpalaH caturhastamAne kroSaSabde dfSyam DanurdDare tri SabdArTaci golakzetrasya vyAsArdDAt nyUne aMSaBede cApaSabde kzetraSabde ca dfSyam jyAM projJya SezaM tattvASvihataM tadvivarodDftam saNKyAtattvASvinaMvarge saMyojya Danurucyate sU si yasya DanuH karttumizwaM tasminna SudDapUrvaM jyApiRqaM nyUnIkftya SezaM paYcAkftiguRaM tadvivarodDftaM tayoH SudDASudDapiRqayorantareRa BaktaM PalaM SudDajyA yatamA tatamasaNKyAtattvASvinoH saMvarge GAte saMyojya sidDaM DanuH kaTyate atropapattiH jyA yatamA SudDyati tatamAyAScApakalAyAstatamasaNKyAguRitatattvASvinaH jyAntareRa tattvASvikalAstadA SezajyAyAH ketyanupAtAgataPalayutA iti vEparItyena sugamatarA raNga bahu anaN DftaDanvA ityAdi DanvanA SabdenEva tatprayogopapattO DftaDanurityAdiprayoganirAsArTamanaNviDAnam
Danusa Danusa Danusa na Dana Sabde usi cApe SaranikzepayantraBede amaraH jyAkarzaRotTaSabdayogAttasya taTAtvam tallakzaRam Danustu dviviDaM proktaM SArNgaM vAMSaM taTEva Page b ca komalaM varRadfQatA tayorguRa udAhftaH suKa sampattikaraRaM samamuzwyAyataM GanuH vipado muzwi vEzamye tadaNge BaNgamAvahet yuktikalpataruH Danurveda Sabde tallakzaRAdi dfSyam piyAlavfkze pu mezAva Dike navame rASO nA svarRaBAH SElasamodayo tiSabdo dinaM prAk dfQasUkzmapItaH raktozRapitto Danu ralpasUtisaNgo dvimUrttirdvipadognirugraH nI tA ayaYca rASiH kalAtmakasya rASicakrasya kalottaraM kalAtmakaH mUlapUrvAzAQottarAzAQA praTamacaraRAtmakaH mUlaM pUrvAzAQA praTamaScApyatArAM Sako DanvI jyo ta asya svarUpaM cApI naro Sva jaGanaH vfhajjA aSvatulyajaGanaH narastena catuzpA dityarTaH yaTAha yavaneSvaraH DanvI manuzyo haya paScimArdDastamAhuH BawwotpalaH caturhastamAne kroSaSabde pf dfSyam DanurdDare tri SabdArTaci golakzetrasya vyAsArdDAt nyUne aMSaBede cApaSabde kzetra Sabde ca dfSyam jyAM projJya SezaM tattvASvi hataM tadvivarodDftam saNKyAtattvASvisaMvarge saMyojya Danurucyate sU si yasya DanuH karttumizwaM tasminna SudDapUrvaM jyApiRqaM nyUnIkftya SezaM paYcAkftiguRaM tadvi varodDftaM tayoH SudDASudDapiRqayorantareRa BaktaM PalaM SudDajyA yatamA tatamasaNKyAtattvASvinoH saMvarge GAte saMyojya sidDaM DanuH kaTyate atropapattiH jyA yatamA SudDyati tatamAyAScApakalAyAstatamasaNKyAguRitatattvA SvinaH jyAntareRa tattvASvikalAstadA SezajyAyAH ketyanupAtAgataPalayutA iti vEparItyena sugamatarA raNga bahu anaN DftaDanvA ityAdi DanvanA SabdenEva tatprayo gopapattO DftaDanurityAdiprayoganirAsArTamanaNviDAnam

DaraRIyayantra DaraRIyayantra DaraRIyayantra na DAryyate DAri karmaRi anIyar karma DAryye devatABedAnAM yantraBede tacca pUjAyantrAdvilakzaRaM sAradAyAM pawale dfSyam talleKanadravyAdi tatroktaM yaTA kASmIrarocanAlAkzAmfgeBamadacandanEH viliKedDemaleKanyA yantrARyetAni deSikaH nizidDayantramuktam BUmispfzwaM SavaspfzwaM dagDaM nirmAlyasaNgatam viSIrRaM laNGitaM mantrI yantraM jAtu na DArayet mantramahodaDO taraNge talleKanaprakAradravyAdikamuktaM tatrEva dfSyam vistaraBayAt na liKitaM karmaBede sAmAnyatoleKanadravyAdikaM taraNge tatroktaM yaTA candanaM rocanA rAtrirgfhaDUmaScitABavaH aNgAro zwavizARIti SAntyAdO yantraleKane pUrvoktaleKanadravyaM gfhRIyAttadapi Druvam pippalaM maricaM SuRWI SyenavizWATa citrakaH gfha DUmonmattarasO lavaRaYca vizAzwakam SAntO vaSye liKedmUrje stamBane dvIpicarmaRi KaracarmaRi vidveze uccAwe DvajavAsasi narAsTani liKedyantraM mAraRe mantravittamaH ye tvADArAH smftA yantrataraNge te pi sammatAH

Darmya Darmya Darmya tri DarmAdanapetaH DarmapaTyarTazyAyAdanapete pA yat DarmeRa prApyaH nOvayoDarmetyAdinA pA yat vA Darma yukte DarmAdabarhimUte DarmeRa prApye ca na dravyARA mavijYAya viDiM DarmyaM pratigrahe manuH brAhmAdyazwavivAho Page b pakrame yo yasya Darmyo varRasya guRadozO ca yasya yO tadvaH sarvaM pravakzyAmi prasave ca guRAguRAn zaqAnu pUrvyA viprasya kzatrasya caturo varAn viwSUdrayostu tAneva vidyAdDarmyAnna rAkzasAn caturo brAhmaRasyA dyAn praSastAn kavayo viduH rAkzasaM kzatriyasyEka mAsuraM vESyaSUdrayoH paYcAnAntu trayoDarmyA dvAvaDarmyO smftAviha pESAcaScAsuraScEva na karttavyO kadAcana pfTak pfTagvA miSrO vA vivAhO pUrvacoditO ganDarvA rAkzasaScEva DarmyO kzatrasya tO smftO
DarmyaM DarmyaM DarmyaM tri DarmAdanapetaH DarmapaTyarTanyAyAdanapete pA yat DarmeRa prApyaH nOvayoDarmetyAdinA pA yat vA Darmayukte DarmAdabarhiBUte DarmeRa prApye ca na dravyARAmavijYAya viDiM DarmyaM pratigrahe manuH brAhmAdyazwavivAhopakrame yo yasya Darmyo varRasya guRadozO ca yasya yO tadvaH sarvaM pravakzyAmi prasave ca guRAguRAn zaqAnupUrvyA viprasya kzatrasya caturo varAn viwSUdrayostu tAneva vidyAdDarmyAnna rAkzasAn caturo brAhmaRasyAdyAn praSastAn kavayo viduH rAkzasaM kzatriyasyEkamAsuraM vESyaSUdrayoH paYcAnAntu trayoDarmyA dvAvaDarmyO smftAviha pESAcaScAsuraScEva na karttavyO kadAcana pfTak pfTagvA miSrO vA vivAhO pUrvacoditO ganDarvA rAkzasaScEva DarmyO kzatrasya tO smftO
DmANkzamAcI DmANkzamAcI DmA DvA NkzamAcI DmA DvA Nkzamacate maca aR kAkamA cIvat sADyam kAkamAcyAM rAjani
