Dvasman Dvasman Dvasman tri antarBUtaRyarTe Dvansa bA manin kicca DvaMsake na DvasmAnastanvI repa ADuH f DvasmAno DvaMsakAH BA BAve manin kit DvaMseDvasmanvat
Dvasmana Dvasmana Dvasmana tri antarBUtaRyarTe Dvansa bA manin kicca DvaMsake na DvasmAnastanvI repa ADuH f DvasmAno DvaMsakAH BA BAve manin kit DvaMse Dvasmanvat
E E E EkAraH svaravarRaBedaH edEtO kaRWatAlavyAvityukteH kaRWa tAlusTAnayoruccAryyaH sa ca dIrGaH dvimAtratvAt plutastu trimAtra iti BedaH dvimAtrasya udAttAnudAttasvarita BedEH pratyekamanunAsikAnanunAsikaBedAByAYca zaqviDaH evaM plutasyApIti dvAdaSaviDaH tantre tasya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA ErlajjA BOtikaH kAntA vAyavI mohinI viBuH dakzA dAmodaraH prajYo Daro vikftamuKyapi kzamAtmako jagadyoniH paraH paraniboDakft jYAnAmftA kaparddiSrIH pIWeSo gniH samAtfkaH tripurA lohitA rAjYI vAg Bavo BOtikAsanam maheSvarI dvAdaSI ca vimalaSca sara svatI kAmakowo vAmajAnuraMSumAn vijayo jawA EkAraH koWarAkzI ca mAlinyunmattaBEravI iti ca varRA BiDA mAtfkAnyAse DarozWe nyasyatvAt tacCabdA BiDeyatA tasya DyeyarUpaM kABaDenuta uktaM yaTA EkAraM paramaM divyaM mahAkuRqalinIM svayam kowi candrapratIkASaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA brahmavizRumayaM varRRaM taTA rudramayaM priye sadASivamayaM varRaM vindutraya samanvitam taparatve kAraparatve ca tatsvarUpaparaH E avya A iR iRa vic AhvAne smaraRe AmantraRe ca maheSvare pu tasya sarvagatvAttaTAtvam E EkAraH svaravarRaBedaH edEtO kaRWatAlavyAvityukteH kaRWa tAlusTAnayoruccAryyaH sa ca dIrGaH dvimAtratvAt plutastu trimAtra iti BedaH dvimAtrasya udAttAnudAttasvarita BedEH pratyekamanunAsikAnanunAsikaBedAByAYca zaqviDaH evaM plutasyApIti dvAdaSaviDaH tantre tasya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA ErlajjA BOtikaH kAntA vAyavI mohinI viBuH dakzA dAmodaraH prajYo Daro vikftamuKyapi kzamAtmako jagadyoniH paraH paraniboDakft jYAnAmftA kaparddiSrIH pIWeSo gniH samAtfkaH tripurA lohitA rAjYI vAg Bavo BOtikAsanam maheSvarI dvAdaSI ca vimalaSca sara svatI kAmakowo vAmajAnuraMSumAn vijayo jawA EkAraH koWarAkzI ca mAlinyunmattaBEravI iti ca varRA BiDA mAtfkAnyAse DarozWe nyasyatvAt tacCabdA BiDeyatA tasya DyeyarUpaM kABaDenuta uktaM yaTA EkAraM paramaM divyaM mahAkuRqalinIM svayam kowi candrapratIkASaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA brahmavizRumayaM varRRaM taTA rudramayaM priye sadASivamayaM varRaM vindutraya samanvitam taparatve kAraparatve ca tatsvarUpaparaH E avya A iRa vic AhvAne smaraRe AmantraRe ca maheSvare pu tasya sarvagatvAttaTAtvam
EnDa EnDa EnDa tri ine sUryye svAmini vA BavaH kurvvA Rya sUryyaBave svAmiBave ca
Enya Enya Enya tri ine sUryye svAmini vA BavaH kurvvA Rya sUryyaBave svAmiBave ca
F F F FkAraH svaravarRaviSezaH mUrdDanyaH sa ca dIrGaH udAttAnu dAttasvaritaBedAt triciDaH nunaH anunAsikAnunAsikaBedena pratyekaM dviDeti zaw mAtfkAnyAse vAmanAsAyAM tasya nyasya tayA vAmanAsASabdenApyaBiDeyatA tasya kAmaDenu tantre DyeyasvarUpamuktaM yaTA FkAraM parameSAni svayaM paramakuRqalIm pItavidyullatAkAraM paYcadevamayaM Page a sadA caturjYAnamayaM varRRaM paYcaprARayutaM sadA tri SaktisahitaM varRaM praRamAmi sadA priye asya pluta tvoktiScintyA dIrGasya dvimAtratvena trimAtroccAryyaplutA dBinnatvAt AkAraBedAcca F gatyAM kryadi BvAdi kryAdi pvAdi para saka sew pvAdi SnApratyaye hrasvaH fRAti fRItaH fRanti fRIyAt fRAtu fRIhi ArRIt ArRRAt ArRItAm ArRan ArIt Ara AratuH aritA IryyAt arizyati ari zyati Arizyat aritavyaH araRIyaH AryyaH aritA aRan IrRaH fRan IrRRaH araH F avya f kvip vA F kkip bA itvABAvaH vAkyAramBe rakzAyAM medi nindAyAM Baye ca SabdaratnA devamAtari dAnavamAtari smftO gatO ca strI vakzasi na medi BErave danuje pu medi iti vAcaspatye FkArAdiSabdArTasaNkalanam F FHkroDI tiTISovARIvAmano gomuKI DftiH UrdDva muKo niSAnATaH padmamAlA vinazwaDIH SaSinI mocikA SrezWA dEtyamAtA pratizWitA ekadantAhvayomAtA tvaritA miTunodayA komalA SyAmalA meDA tArakA patirazwamI brahmARyamarakIlAle pAvakoganDaka zaRA F FkAraM parameSAni svayaM paramakuRqalIm pItavi dyullatAkAraM paYcadevamayam sadA caturjYAnamayaM varRaM paYcaprARayutaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM praRamAmi sadA priye F FkAraH svaravarRaviSezaH mUrdDanyaH sa ca dIrGaH udAttAnu dAttasvaritaBedAt triciDaH nunaH anunAsikAnunAsikaBedena pratyekaM dviDeti zaw mAtfkAnyAse vAmanAsAyAM tasya nyasya tayA vAmanAsASabdenApyaBiDeyatA tasya kAmaDenu tantre DyeyasvarUpamuktaM yaTA FkAraM parameSAni svayaM paramakuRqalIm pItavidyullatAkAraM paYcadevamayaM Page a sadA caturjYAnamayaM varRRaM paYcaprARayutaM sadA tri SaktisahitaM varRaM praRamAmi sadA priye asya pluta tvoktiScintyA dIrGasya dvimAtratvena trimAtroccAryyaplutA dBinnatvAt AkAraBedAcca F gatyAM kryAdi pvAdi para saka sew pvAdi SnApratyaye hrasvaH fRAti fRItaH fRanti fRIyAt fRAtu fRIhi ArRRAt ArRItAm ArRan ArIt Ara AratuH aritA IryyAt ari zyati Arizyat aritavyaH araRIyaH AryyaH aritA fRan IrRRaH araH F avya F kkip bA itvABAvaH vAkyAramBe rakzAyAM medi nindAyAM Baye ca SabdaratnA devamAtari dAnavamAtari smftO gatO ca strI vakzasi na medi BErave danuje pu medi iti vAcaspatye FkArAdiSabdArTasaNkalanam F FHkroDI tiTISovARIvAmano gomuKI DftiH UrdDva muKo niSAnATaH padmamAlA vinazwaDIH SaSinI mocikA SrezWA dEtyamAtA pratizWitA ekadantAhvayomAtA tvaritA miTunodayA komalA SyAmalA meDA tArakA patirazwamI brahmARyamarakIlAle pAvakoganDaka zaRA F FkAraM parameSAni svayaM paramakuRqalIm pItavi dyullatAkAraM paYcadevamayam sadA caturjYAnamayaM varRaM paYcaprARayutaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM praRamAmi sadA priye
GARaja GARaja GARaja na GrARe jAyate karaRasyADAratvavivakzayA saptamyA janerqaH pA jana qa ta nAsikendriyajAte pratyakzaBede GrARajAdipraBedena pratyakza zaqviDaM matam BAzA tacca pratyakzaM ganGAderyaTAha tatrEva GrARasya gocaro ganDo ganDatvAdirapi smftaH GrARa grAhyoBavedganDo GrARasyEvopakArakaH iti ca
GUrRAyamAna GUrRAyamAna GUrRAyamAna tri GUrRaH BrAnta ivAcarati BfSA GcyarTe vA kyANkarttariSAnac BrAmyamARe indrAdyEraKilArTasADanaparEH saMstUyamAnaM muhuH pItonmattaPalA tulAlasatayA GUrRAyamAnekzaRam iti kalApaDAtuvyAKyAsAraH
GUrRRAyamAna GUrRRAyamAna GUrRRAyamAna tri GUrRaH BrAnta ivAcarati BfSA cvyarTe vA kyaNkarttari SAnac BrAmyamARe indrAdyEraKilArTa sADanaparEH saMstUyamAnaM muhuH pItonmattaPalA tulAlasatayA GUrRAyamAnekzaRam iti kalApaDAtuvyAKyAsAraH
GUrRRa GUrRRa GUrRRa BramaRe aka tu uBa sew GUrRati te acU rRIt aGUrRizwa juzUrRa juGUrRe guruBArasamAkrA Page b ntaScacAla ca juvUrRRa ca rAmA ki kecidA sizate stabDA BayAt kecidavUrRizu aGUrRizwAM kzatO kzmAYca tAvaSiSriyatAmuBO iti ca BawwiH GUrRitaH GUrRitavAn tatoraTo GUrRitabAn na rendra BA ka a kAdambarImadaviGUrRitalocanasya yuktaM hi lANgalaBftaH patanaM pfTivyAm udBawaH Bo vfkzAH parvatasTAH bahukusumayutA vAyunA GUrRa mAnA mahAnA vAyuneti hatO tftIyA sayakArapaWe RyantAv karmaRi SAnac karttari tftIyeti BedaH Rici GUrRayanni te ajuGUrRat ta nayanAnyaruRAni GUrRayan kumA GUrRayan madirAsvAdamadapAwalitadyutI mAGaH karmmaRi GUrRyate aGUrRi GUrRyamAnaH vAyunA GUrRyamAnAH mahAnA pAWAntaram GUrRRa pu GUrRayati ac gimA SAkaBede grIzmasundarake Sabdaca BrAnte tri BAve GaY BramaRe GUrRa Ric ac GUrRakArake rogaBede
GUrRRana GUrRRana GUrRRana na GUrRa BAve lyuw BramaRe cakrAkArAvartte hemaca yuc GUrRanApyatra strI GUrRanAgAtrapatana BramaRAdarSanAdikft sA da
GUrRRi GUrRRi GUrRRi pu GUrRa BAve in BramaRe hemaca
GUrRRikA GUrRRikA GUrRRikA strI SukrAcAryyakanyAdevayAnImaKIBede gate tu nAhuze tammin devayAnyapyaninditA upAca Soka santaptA GUrRikAmAgatAM puraH devayAnyuvAca tvaritaM GUrRike gacCa SIGramAcakzva me pituH nedAnIM sampra vekzyAmi nagaraM vfzaparvaRaH vESampAyana uvAca sA tatra tvaritaM gatvA GUrRikA suramandirAm dfzwvA kAvya muzAcedaM samBramAvizwacetanA BA kA a
GUrRRita GUrRRita GUrRRita tri GUrRa Ric karmaRi kta Bramite karttari kta BrAnte pracalAyite amaraH DUrRaDAtO udA
GUrRa GUrRa GUrRa BramaRe aka tu uBa sew GUrRati te aGUrRIt aGUrRizwa jUGUrRa juGUrRe guruBArasamAkrarantaSracAla ca juGUrRa ca rAmA ki kecidAsizata stabDA BayAt kecidaGUrRizu aGUrRizwAM kzatO kzmAcca tAvaSiSrivatAmunO iti ca BawwiH cUrRitaH GUrRitavAn tato raTo GUrRitavAn narendra BA ka a kAdambarImadaviGUrRitalocanasya yuktaM hi lANgalaBftaH patanaM pfTivyAm udBawaH Bo vfkzAH parvatasTAH bahukusumayutA vAyunA GUrRamAnA mahAnA vAyuneti ItO tftIyA sayakArapadeRyantAt karmaRi SAnac karttari tftIyeti BedaH Rici GUrRayati te ajuGurRat ta nayanAnyaruRAni GUrRayan kumA GUrRayan madirAsvAdamadapAwalitadyutI mAGaH karmaRi GUrRyate aGUrRi GUrRyamAnaH vAyunA GUrRyamAnAH mahAnA pAWAntaram GUrRa pu GUrRayati ac gimA SAkaBede grIzmasundarake Sabdaca BrAnte tri BAve GaY BramaRe GUrRa Ric ac cUrmakArake rogaBede
GUrRana GUrRana GUrRana na GUrRa BAve lyuw BramaRe cakrAkArAvartte hemaca yuc GUrRanApyatra strI GURanAgAtrapattanaBramaRAdarSanAdikft SA da
GUrRi GUrRi GUrRi pu GUrRa BAve in BramaRe hemaca
GUrRikA GUrRikA GUrRikA strI SukrAcAryakanyAdevayAnIyaKIBede gate ta nAhuze tasmin devayAnyapyaninditA uvAca Soka santaptA GUrRikABAgatAM puraH devayAnyuvAca tvaritaM GUrRike gacCa SIGramAcakzva me pituH nedAnIM sampravekzyAmi nagaraM vfzaparvaRaH vESampAyana uvAca sA tatra tvaritaM gatvA GUrRikA suramandiram dfzwvA kAvya muvAcedaM samBramAvizwacetanA BA kA a
GUrRita GUrRita GUrRita tri GUrRa Ric karmaRi kta Bramite karttari kta BrAnte pracalAyite amaraH GUrRayAtO udA
Ga Ga Ga GakArasyoccAraRaM sTAnaM jihvAmUlaM jihvAmUle tu kuH proktaH SikzokteH akuhavisarjanIyAnAM kaRWaH ityu ktistu jihvAmUlarUpakaRWaparA asyoccAraRe AByantaraH prayatnaH sparSaH jihvAmUlasparSanena taduccAraRAt ataevAsya sparSavarRatvam bAhyaprayatnAstu GozanAdasaMvAra mahAprARAH si kO mUlaM dfSyam tasya tantre vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA GaH KaqgI GurGurA maRqI muRqISastripurAntakaH vAyuH SivottamaH satyakiNkiRI GoranAdakaH marI cirvaruRo meDA kAlarUpI ca dAmBikaH lambodarI jvAlamAlA naMndeSo hananaM DvaniH trElIkyavidyA saMharttA kAmAKyA manaGA maGA varRRodDAratantram asya DyeyarUpaM yaTA mAlatIpuzpavarRRABAM zaqBujAM rakta locanAm SuklAmbaraparIDAnAM SuklamAlyaviBUzi tAm sadA smeramuKIM ramyAM locanatrayarAjitAm evaM DyAtvA GakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya mAtf kAnyAse dakziRakarANgulIzu nyasyatA Ga pu Gawa bA qa GawAyAM GarGaraSabde ca medi Ga GakArasyoccAraRaM sTAnaM jihvAmUlaM jihvAmUle tu kuH proktaH SikzokteH akuhavisarjanIyAnAM kaRWaH ityu ktistu jihvAmUlarUpakaRWaparA asyoccAraRe AByantaraH prayatnaH sparSaH jihvAmUlasparSanena taduccAraRAt ataevAsya sparSavarRatvam bAhyaprayatnAstu GozanAdasaMvAra mahAprARAH si kO mUlaM dfSyam tasya tantre vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA GaH KaqgI GurGurA maRqI muRqISastripurAntakaH vAyuH SivottamaH satyakiNkiRI GoranAdakaH marI cirvaruRo meDA kAlarUpI ca dAmBikaH lambodarI jvAlamAlA naMndeSo hananaM DvaniH trElIkyavidyA saMharttA kAmAKyA manaGA maGA varRRodDAratantram asya DyeyarUpaM yaTA mAlatIpuzpavarRRABAM zaqBujAM rakta locanAm SuklAmbaraparIDAnAM SuklamAlyaviBUzi tAm sadA smeramuKIM ramyAM locanatrayarAjitAm evaM DyAtvA GakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya mAtf kAnyAse dakziRakarANgulIzu nyasyatA Ga pu Gawa bA qa GawAyAM GarGaraSabde ca medi
GaRwAkarRRa GaRwAkarRRa GaRwAkarRRa pu SivAnucaraBede Ge wu KyAte GaRwAkarRo gaRaH SrImAn SivasyAtIva ballaBaH Sivapu mInasaMkrA ntO tasya pUjyatAmAha kftyacintAmaRO cEtre mAsi ca saMpUjyo GaRwAkarRo GawAtmakaH ArogyAya snuhImUle saMkrAntyAM tatra kArayet pUjAmantraH GaRwAkarRa mahAvIra sarvvavyADivinASana vi sPowakaBaye prApte rakza rakza mahAbala ti ta kASIsTe hradaBede iyaYca citraGaRweSI GaRwAkarRa stvayaM hradaH kASI a
GaRwAkarRa GaRwAkarRa GaRwAkarRa pu SivAnucaraBede Gezwu KyAte GaRwAkarRogaRaH SrImAn SivasyAtIva vallaBaH Sivapu mInasaMkrAntO tasya pUjyatAmAha kftyacintAmaRO cEtre mAsi ca saMpUjyo GaRwAkarRo GawAtmakaH ArogyAya snuhImUle saMkrAntyAM tatra kArayet pUjAmantraH GaRwAkarRa mahAvIra sarvavyADivinASana visPowakaBaye prApte rakza rakza rakza mahAbala ti ta kASIsTe hradaBede iyaYca citraGaRweSI GaRwAkarRastvayaM hradaH kASI a
GagDa GagDa GagDa hasane Bva para aka sew GagDati aGagGIt jaGagGa
GagGa GagGa GagGa hasane BvA para aka sew GagGati aGagGIt jaGagGa
Ganadruma Ganadruma Ganadruma pu karma vikaRwakavfkze rAjani
Ganaduma Ganaduma Ganaduma pu karma vikaRwakavfkze rAjani
GanajambAla GanajambAla GanajambAla pu karma sAndrajambAle culuke GanaseoyAlA trikA
GanajamvAla GanajamvAla GanajamvAla pu karma sAndrajambAle culuke GanaseoyAlA trikA
Ganatvac Ganatvac Ganatvac pu GanA niviqA tvak yasya SigrO SabdArTaci
Ganatvaca Ganatvaca Ganatvaca pu GanA niviqA tvak yasya SigrO SabdArTaci
GarmAnta GarmAnta GarmAnta pu Garmasya UzmaRo ntoyatra varzAkAle rAjani GarmAnte toyadormiBiH harivaM a
GarmAntakAmukI GarmAntakAmukI GarmAntakAmukI strI ta valAkAyAm rAjani varzAkAle eva tasyAH kAmayamAnatvAt taTAtvam
Garma Garma Garma pu Garati aNgAt Gf seke kzaraRe karttari mak ni guRaH aNganizpande svede SramajavAriRi GaratyaNgamanena karaRe mak Atape grIzmakAle tayoH aNgasveda sADanatvAttaTAtvam Atapayukte divase nica GarmaSca AtapAdiva smaravikArasatvAdapi Bavati yaTAha sA da vikArAH satvasamBUtA sAtvikAH parikIrttitAH satvamAtrodBavatvAtte BinnA apyanuBAvattaH stamBaH Kedo Ta romAYcaH svaraBaNgo Ta vepaTuH vEvarRyamaSu pralaya ityazwO sAtvikAH smftAH iti viBajya vapurjalodgamaH svedo ratiGarmA SramAdiBiriti sakAraRaM svedolakzitaH yajYe niGa pitfBirGarmasadBiH f DarmasaNBiH yajYasAdiBiH BA vE vf dIptO mak vEdikaprayoge dIpte tri GarmasvarasSabde udA rase maDunaH sArasasya DarmaM pAta vasavaH yaju GarmaM rasam vedadI gavAdi nizyande dugDe pu tasya goHrakzaRAttaTAtvam DarmAya dIzva yajU he vatsa DarmAya DarmArTaM dIzya dehi payaH Sezaya mA sarvaM pAsItyarTaH vedadI rajjusaMdAnamAdAya kAtyA SrO sandAnam DarmaDugbanDanArTAya pASavatI rajjuH karkaH upayamanyAmAsiYcati Darmmam kAtyA SrO GarmyaM DarmasaMbanDi tanmaDyasTitamAjyamupayamanyAM myuci AsiYcati karkaH parIkzAByAM DarmmamutpAdya srukupuzkarasyoparyaDomuKaM karotItyarTaH saM vyA GarmasambanDi GftamupayamanyAmAsiYcati pUrvaM sruksTam nItamaDunA DarmasTaM sruci nayatItyarTaH yaju vedadI tatra nidAGakAle niHSvAsahAryaM SukamAjagAma GarmaH priyAdeSamivopadezwum raGuH UzmaRi sa vaman ruzASru GanaGarBavigaladurugaRqamaRqalaH mAGaH
GarmacarcikA GarmacarcikA GarmacarcikA strI GarmakftA carcikeva GAsAci iti KyAte DarmavicarcikAyAm svedavAhIni duzyanti kroDaSokaSramEstaTA tataH svedaH pravartteta dOrganDyaM DarmacarcikA rAjikAkftiruzRetTA yato DarmavicarcikA iti prayogAmftam GarmavicarcikApyatra
GarmadIDiti GarmadIDiti GarmadIDiti pu GarmodIDitO yasya sUrye yaH sasoma iva GarmmadIDitiH raGuH Garmmadyuti GarmmaBAnu GarmmaraSmipraBftayo pyatra Garmmadyuteriha duhaH pawalena DAmnAm kirA yA GarmmaBAnostanayApi SItalEH mAGaH lokAlokavyAhato GarmmaraSmiH BAvaH
Garmadah Garmadah Garmadah strI GarmaM dugDaM dogDi duha kvip ta dugDaduhAyAM GenvAm GarmmaCugGvAle cAdohe ca kAtyA SrO GarmmaduGApyatra GarmmaduGAyA dohana pradeSe tatsUtre karkaH
GarmapAvan GarmapAvan GarmapAvan GarmamUzmARaM pibati pA vanip UzmapAKye pitfgaRaBede svAhA pitfBya UrdDvabarhiByo GarmmapAvaByaH yaju
Garmasad Garmasad Garmasad pu Garma yajYe sIdati sada kvip yajYasAdizu pitfzu pUrvEH pitfBirGarmmasadBiH f GarmmasadBiH yajYasAdiBiH BA
GarmastuB GarmastuB GarmastuB pu GarmaM stuBnAti stuBa kvip vAyO pracAreRa GarmmanASAttasya taTAtvam GarmastuBe mArutAya diva A pfzWe yajvane f
Garmasvaram Garmasvaram Garmasvaram pu jiGartti vE Gf kzaraRe dIptO mad ni GarmAH dIpyAH svf anun svaraso yezAm dIptaDvanO Garmmasvaraso nadyo apa bran f GarmmasvarasodIptaDvanayaH BA
Garmasveda Garmasveda Garmasveda pu Garmo dIptaH kzaran vA svedo Darme yajYe svedo gatirvA sya dIptagamane kzaratsvedajale yajYe galari ca brahmaRasmatirvfzeBirvarAherzameKedeBirdraviRaM vyAnaw f GarmasvedeBiH dIptAgamanEryadvA kzaradudakEH aTavA Garmo yajYaH taM prati gantfBiH BA
GarmmAnta GarmmAnta GarmmAnta pu Garmasya UzmaRo ntoyatra varzAkrAle rAjani GarmAnte toyadormmiBiH harivaM a
GarmmAntakAmukI GarmmAntakAmukI GarmmAntakAmukI strI ta valAkAyAm rAjani varzA kAle eva tasyAH kAmayamAnatvAt taTAtvam
Garmma Garmma Garmma pu Garati aNgAt Gf seke kzaraRe karttari mak ni guRaH aNganizyande svede SramajavAriRi GaratyaNga manena karaRe maka Atape grIzmakAle tayoH aNgasveda sADanatvAttaTAtvama Atapayukte divase niGa GarGaSca AtapAdiva smaravikArasatvAdapi Bavati yaTAha sA da vikArAH satvasamBUtA sAtvikAH parikIrttitAH satva mAtrodBavatvAtte BinnA apyanuBAvataH stamBaH svedo Ta romAYcaH svaraBaNgo Ta vepaTuH vEvarRyamaSru pralaya ityazwO sAtvikAH smftAH iti viBajya vapurjalodgamaH svedo ratiGarmmaSramAdiBiriti sakAraRaM svedolakzitaH yajYe niGa pitfBirGarmmasadBiH f DarmasadBiH yajYasAdiBiH BA vE vf dIptO mak vEdikaprayoge dIpte tri GarmasvarasSabde udA rase maDunaH sAraGasya GarmaM pAta vasavaH yaju GarmaM rasam vedadI gavAdi nizyande dugDe pu tasya goHkzaraRAttayAtvam GarmAya dIzva yajU he vatsa DarmAya DarmArTaM dIzya dehi payaH Sezaya mA sarvvaM pAsItparTaH vedadI rajjusaMdAnamAdAya kAtyA SrO sandAnam GarmaDugvanDanArTAya prASavatI rajjaH karkaH upayamanyAmAsiYcati Garmmam Page a kAtyA SrO GarmyaM DarmasaMvanDi tanmaDyasTi tamAjyamupayamatyAM sruci AsiYcati karkaH parIsAByAM GarmmamutpAdya srukpuzkarasyoparyyaDomuKaM karotItyarTaH saM vyA GarmasambanDi GftamupayamanyAmAsiYcati pUrvaM sruksTam nItamaDunA GarmasTaM sruci nayatItyarTaH yaju vedadI tatra nidAGakAle niHSvAsahAryyaMSukamAja gAma GarmaH priyAdeSamivopadezwum raGuH UzmaRi sa vaman ruzASru GanaGarmavigaladurugaRqamaRqalaH mAGaH
GarmmacarcikA GarmmacarcikA GarmmacarcikA strI GarmakftA carcikeva GAmAci iti KyAte GarmavicarcikAyAm svedavAhIni duzyanti kroDaSokaSramEstaTA tataH svedaH pravartteta dOrganDyaM GarmacarcikA rAjikAkftiruzRetTA yato Garmavi carcikA iti prayogAmftam GarmavicarcikApyatra
GarmmadIDiti GarmmadIDiti GarmmadIDiti pu GarmmodIDitO yasya sUryye yaH sa soma iva GarmmadIDitiH raGuH Garmmadyuti GarmmaBAnu GarmmaraSmipraBftayo pyatra Garmmadyuteriha duhaH pawalena DAmnAm kirA yA GarmmaBAnostanayApi SItalEH mAGaH lokAlokavyAhato GarmmaraSmiH BAvaH
Garmmaduh Garmmaduh Garmmaduh strI GarmmaM dugDaM dogDi duha kvip ta dugDaduhAyAM DenvAm GarmmaDugGvAle cAdohe ca kAtyA SrO GarmmaduGApyatra GarmmaduGAyA dohana pradeSe tatsUtre karkaH
GarmmapAvan GarmmapAvan GarmmapAvan GarmmamUzmARaM pibati pA vanip UzmapAKye pitfgaRaBede svAhA pitfBya UrdDvabarhiByo Garmma pAvaByaH yaju
Garmmasad Garmmasad Garmmasad pu Garmma yajYe sodati sada kvip yajYasAdizu pipfzu pUrvvEH pitfBirGarmmasadBiH f GarmmasadBiH yajYasAdiBiH BA
GarmmastuB GarmmastuB GarmmastuB pu GarmmaM stuBrAti stuBa kvip vAyO pracAreRa GarmmanASAttasya taTAtvam GarmastuBe mAru tAya diva A pfzWe yajvate f
Garmmasvaram Garmmasvaram Garmmasvaram pu jiGartti vE Gf kzaraRaM dIptO mak ni GarmmAH doptAH svf asun svarasoyezAm doptaDvanO Garmmasvarasonadyo apa vran f Garmma svarasodIptaDvanayaH BA
Garmmasveda Garmmasveda Garmmasveda pu GarmodoptaH kzaran vA svedo Garme yajYe svedo gatirvA sya dIptagamane kzaratsvedajale yajYe gantari ca brahmaRaspatirvfzeBirvarAhErGarmaKedeBirdraviRaM vyAnaw Page b f GarmasvedeBiH dIptAgamanEryadvA kzaradudakEH aTavA Garmo yajYaH taM prati gantfBiH BA
GawadAsI GawadAsI GawadAsI strI Gawayati nAyakO parasparaM yojayati Gawi ac hraKaH kuwwinyAM trikA
GawadAso GawadAso GawadAso strI Gawayati nAyakO parasparaM yojayati Gawiac hrasvaH kuwwinyAM trikA
Gawaparyasana Gawaparyasana Gawaparyasana na ta prAyaScitte parANmuKasya patitasya tyAgArTaM jIvata eva tasya pretakAryArTe ca jYAtiBiH kriyamARe dAsyAH pAdena kumBasya nirudakakaraRe tatadviDiH manunA darSito yaTA patitasyodakaM kAryaM sapiRqErbAnDavErbahiH nindite hani sAyAhne jYAtyftviggurusanniDO dAsI GawamapAMpUrRaM paryasyet pretavat padA ahorAtramupAsIrannaSOca bAnDavEH saha nivartteraSca tasmAttu samBAzaRasahAsane dAyAdyasya pradAnaYca yAtrA cEva hi lOkikI jyezWatA ca nivartteta jyezWAvApyaYca yadDanam jyezWAMSAM prApnuyAccAsya yavIyAn guRato DipaH patitasyeti mahApAtakino jIvata eva pretasyodakakriyA vakzyamARarItyA sapiRqEH samAnodakESca grAmAdbahirgatvA jYAtyftviggurusanniDAne riktAyAM navamyAdO tiTO dinAnte karttavyA dAsIti sapiRqasamAnodakaprayuktA dAsI udakapUrRaM GawaM pretavaditi dakziRABimuKIBUya pAdena kzipet yaTA sa nirudako Bavati tadanu te sapiRqAH samAnodakEH sahAhorAtramaSOcamAcareyuH nivartteranniti tasmAt pratitAt sapiRqAdInAM samBAzaRamekAsanopaveSanaM ca tasmE rikTadAnaM sAMvatsarikAdO nimantraRAdirUpo lokavyavahAraH etAni nivartteran jyezWateti jyezWasya yat stutyutTAnAdikaM kAryaM tattasya na kAryyaM jyezWalaByaM ca tasya viMSodDArAdikaM DanaM na deyaM yadyapi rikTapradAnapratizeDAdevApyudDArapratizeDaH sidDaH taTApi yavIyasastatprAptyarTamanUdyate tasyEva jyezWasya sambanDi DanaM sodDArASaM tadanujo guRADiko laBate kullU vistarastu mitAkzarAyAmukto yaTA yastvodDatyAdetanna cikIrzati tasya kiM kAryamityAha dAsIkumBaM bahirgrABAnninayeran svabAnDavAH patitasya bahiH kuryuH sarvakAryezu cEva tam yA jIvataeva patitasya svajYAtayo bAnDavAH mAtfpakzASca te sarve sannipatya dAsI prezyA tayA sapiRqAdiprezitayA nItaM kumBamapAmpUrRaM grAmAdbahirninayeyuH etaccaturTyAtiriktatiTizvahraH paYcame BAge gurvAdisanniDO kAryam patitasyodakaNkAryaM sapiRqErbAnDavEH saha nindite hani sAyAhne jYAtyftviggurusanniDAviti manusmaraRAt aTa vA dAsyeva sapiRqAdiprayuktA ninayet yaTAha manuH dAsI GawamapAmpUrRamparyasyet pretavattadA ahorAtramupAsIrannaSOrcabAnDavEH saheti pretavaditi dakziRA muKApasavyatvayoH prAptyarTam tacca ninayanamudakapiRqadAnAdipretakriyottarakAlaM drazwavyam tasya vidyAguruyonisambanDAMSca sannipAtya sarvARyu dakAdIni pretakarmARi kuryuH pAtraccAsya vipariziYceyurdAsaH karmakarovAvacArAtpAtramAnIya dAsI vawaM pUrayitvA dakziRAsaKI padA viparyasyedanudakamudakaNkaroti nAmagrAhAntaM sarve tvAlaBeran prAcInAvItinomuktaSiKA vidyAguravo yonisambanDASca vIkzerannapa upaspfSya grAmampraviSeyuriti gOtamasmaraRAt ayaYca tyAgo yadi banDuBiH preryamARo pi prAyaScittaM na karoti tadA drazwavyaH tasya gurorbAnDavAnAM rAjYaSca samakzandozAnaBiKyApyAnuBAvya punaH punarAcAraM laBasveti sa yadyevamapyanavasTitamatiH syAttato sya pAtraM viparyasyediti SaNKasmaraRAt tatastaM labDodakanmatitaM sarvakAryezu samBAzaRasahAsanAdizu bahiHkuryurbarjayeyu taTA ca manuH nirbartteraMstatastasya samBAzaRasahAsane dAyAdyasya pradAnaYca yAtrA cEva hi lOkikI yadi snehAdinA samBAzaRaNkaroti tadA prAyaScittaM kAryam ata UrdDantena saha samBAvya tizWedekarAtraM japan sAvitrImajYAnapUrvaM jYAnapUrvaM trirAtramiti GawaninayanAdayo pyatra
Gawaparyyasana Gawaparyyasana Gawaparyyasana na ta prAyaScitte parANmuKasya patitasya tyAgArTaM jIvataeva tasya pretakAryyArTaM ca jYAtiBiH kriyamARe dAsyAH pAdena kumBasya nirudakakaraRe tatadviDiH manunA darSito yaTA patisyodakaM kAryyaM sapiRqErbAnDavErbahiH nindi te hani sAyAhne jYAtya tviggurusanniDO dAsI GawamapAM Page b pUrRaM paryyasyet pretavat padA ahorAtramupAsIrannaSOcaM bAnDavEH saha nivartteraMSca tasmAttu samBApaRasahAsane dAyAdyasya pradAnaYca yAtrA cEva hi lOkikI jyezWatA ca nivartteta jyezWAbApyaYca yadDanam jyezWAMSaM prApnuyAccAsya yavIyAn guRato DikaH patitasyeti mahApAtakino jIvataeva pretasyodakakriyA vakzyamARarItyA sapiRqEH samAnodakESca grAmAdvahirgatvA jYAtyftviggurusanniDAne riktAyAM navamyAdO tiTO dinAnte karttavyA dAsIti sapiRqasamAnodakaprayuktA dAsI udakapUrRaM vawaM pretava diti dakziRABimuKIBUya pAdena kzipet yaTA sa niru dako Bavati tadanu te sapiRqAH samAnodakEH sahAho rAtramaSOcamAcareyuH nivartteranniti tasmAt pati tAt sapiRqAdInAM samBAzaRamekAsanopaveSanaM ca tasmE rikTadAnaM sAMvatsarikAdO nimantraRAdirUpo loka vyavahAraH etAni nivartteran jyezWateti jyezWasya yat stutyutTAnAdikaM kAryyaM tattasya na kAryyaM jyezWa laByaM ca tasya viMSodDArAdikaM GanaM na deyaM yadyapi rikTapradAnapratizeDAdevApyudDArapratizeDaH sidDaH taTApi yavIyasastatprAptyarTamanUdyate tasyEva jyezWasya sambanDi DanaM sodDvArAMSaM tadanujo guRADiko laBate kullU vistarastu mitAkzarAyAmuktoyaTA yastvOdDatyAdetanna cikIrzati tasya kiM kAryyamityAha dAsIkumBaM bahirgrAmAnninayeran svabAnDavAH patitasya vahiH kuryuH sarvakAryezu cEva tam yA jIvataeva patitasya svajYAtayobAnDavAH mAtfpakzASca te sarve sannipatya dAsI prezyA tayA sapiRqAdiprezitayA nItaM kumBamapA mpUrRaM grAmAdbahirninayeyuH etaccaturTyAdiriktatiTizvahraH paYcame BAge gurvAdisanniDO kAryam patitasyodakaNkAryaM sapiRqErvAnDavEHsaha nindite hani sAyAhne jYAtyf tviggurusanniDAviti manusmaraRAt aTa vA dAsyeva sapiRqAdiprayuktA ninayet yaTAha manuH dAsI Gawa mapAmpUrRamparyasyet pretavattadA ahorAtramupAsIrannaSOcaM vAnDavEH saheti pretavaditi dakziRAmuKApasavyatvayoH prAptyarTam tacca ninayanamudakapiRqadAnAdipretakriyo ttarakAlaM drazwavyam tasya vidyAguruyonisambanDAMSca sannipAtya sarvARyudakAdIni pretakarmmARi kuryuH pAtra YcAsya vipariziYceyurdAsaH karmmakarovAvacArAtpAtramA nIya dAsI GawaM pUrayitvA dakziRAmuKI padA viparTa Page a syedagudakamudakaNkaroti nAmagrAhAntaM sarve tvAlaBeran prAcInAvItinomuktaSiKA vidyAguravo yonisambanDASca vIkzerannapOpaspfSya grAmampraviSeyuriti gOtamasmaraRAt ayaYca tyAgoyadi banDumiH preryamARo pi prAyaScittaM na karoti tadA drazwavyaH tasya gurorbAnDavAnAM rAjYaSca samakzandozAnapriKyApyAnuBAyya punaH punarAcAraM laBa sveti sa yadyevamapyanavasTitamatiH syAttato sya pAtraM vi paryasyediti SaNKasmaraRAt tatastaM labDodakampatitaM sarvakAryezu samBAzaRasahAsanAdizu vahiHkuryurvarja yeyuH taTA ca manuH nirbartteraMstatastasya samBAzaRa sahAsane dAyAdyasya pradAnaYca yAtrA cEva hi lOkikI yadi snehAdinA samBAzaRaNkaroti tadA prAyaScittaM kAryam ata UrdDantena saha samBAzya tizWedekarAtraM japan sAvitrImajYAnapUrbbaM jYAnapUrbbaM trirAtramiti GawaninayanAdayo pyatra
GfRAvAsa GfRAvAsa GfRAvAsa pu ta kuzmARqe trikA kfpAyukte ca
GfRAyAsa GfRAyAsa GfRAyAsa pu ta kUzmARqe trikA kfpAyukte ca
GftArccim GftArccim GftArccim pu GftenArcciryasya GftaM dIptamacciryasya vA Page b vahnO GftArcciH prItimAMScApi prajajvAla diDakzayA BA A a
GftArcis GftArcis GftArcis pu GftenArcciryasya GftaM dIptamacciryasya vA vahnO GftArcciH prItimAMScApi prajajvAla diDakzayA BA A a
GftanirRRij GftanirRRij GftanirRRij tri GftaM dIptaM nirRik rUpaM yasya dIpta rUpe dIdAyAniDmo GftanirRRigapsu f nirRigiti rUpanAma dIptarUpaH BA juzwAso adya GftanirRijoguH f GftanirRijo miSra dravyeRa dIptarUpAH BA GftaM nirRenekti nir nija kvip ta tApanadvArAvilApanena GftaSoDake vahnO SocizkeSo GftanirRik pAvakaH Gfta nirRiku Gftasya tApanadvArA vilApanena SoDakaH BA
GftanirRij GftanirRij GftanirRij tri GftaM dIptaM nirRik rUpaM yasya dIptarUpe dIdAyAniDmo Ga tanirRigapsu f nirRigiti rUpanAma dIptarUpaH BA juzwAso adya GftanirRijoguH f GftanirRijo miSradravyeRa dIptarUpAH BA GftaM nirRenekti nir nijakvip ta tApanadvArAvilApanena GftaSoDake vahnO SocizkeSo GftanirRik pAvakaH GftanirRik GAtaKatfRatadvArA vilApanena SoDakaH BA

GiRRa GiRRa GiRRa grahaRe BvA A saka sew idit GiRRate aGiRRizwa jiviRRe
GiRa GiRa GiRa grahaRe BvA A saka sew idit GiRate aGiRizwa jiGiRe
GorarAmana GorarAmana GorarAmana puMstrI GoraM rAsanaM Sabdo sya SfgAle Sabdara striyAM jAtitvAt NIz GoraSabdayukte tri
GorarAmin GorarAmin GorarAmin puMstrI GoraM rasati rasa Rini SfgAle hemaca striyAM NIp GoraSabdakAriRi tri
GorarAsana GorarAsana GorarAsana puM strI GoraM rAsanaM Sabdo sya SfgAle Sabdara striyAM jAtitvAt NIz GoraSabdayukte tri
GorarAsin GorarAsin GorarAsin puM strI GoraM rasati rasa Rini SfgAle hemaca striyAM NIp GoraSabdakAriRi tri
GrARaSravam GrARaSravam GrARaSravam pa GrARamiva SravaH karRo sya kArttikeya sEnyaBede GrARaSravAH pratiskanDaH kAYcanAkzojalanDaraH BA Anu a kumArasEnikoktO
GrARaSravas GrARaSravas GrARaSravas pu GrARamiva SravaH karRo sya kArttikeya sEnyaBede GrARaSravAH pratiskanGaH kAYcanAkzojala nDaraH BA Anu a kumArasEnikoktO

Guwa Guwa Guwa Avarttane GAzwA GA wA BvA Atma saka sew Gowate lfdit xdit aGuwat juGuwe Guwa pratiGAte tu kuwA para saka sew Guwati aGuwIt juGowa puM Guwa pu ku Guwa ac caraRagranTO gulPe hema tataH svArTe ka Guwa Rvul vA Guwaka atrEvArTe pu Guwa Avarttane GA wA BvA Atma saka sew Gowate xdit aGuwat juGuwe Guwa pratiGAte tu kuwA para saka sew Guwati aGuwIt juGowa Guwa pu ku Guwa ac caraRagranTO gulPe hema tataH svArTe ka Guwa Rvul vA Guwaka atrEvArTe pu
Guza Guza Guza kAntO aka kaka kftO sa BvA Atma sew idit GuMvate dyaGuMvizwa aGuzizwa juGuMze sAnto yamitranye GfstfRam vaDe yamityanye GfsfRam Guza baDe BvA para saka sew Gozati irit aGuzat aGozIt juGoza GozaH GuzitaH stutO Guza KatO AvizkaraRe ca vA cu uga uBa pakze BvA para saka sew Goza yati GozaDati te Gozati ajaGuzat sajUGuGat ta irit Page a aGuzat aGozIt juGozAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre juGoza RijaBAve GuzitaH GuzwaH GozaH GozaRA Go zaRA GozaRam iti sa drupado rAjA svayaMvaramaGozayat svayaMvarama Gozayat BA A a suhfdAM priyamAKyAtuM Gozayantu ca te jayam BA vi a jayamaGozayadasya jayamaGoza yadasya tu kevalamraGuH kevalam raGuH AvizkaraRaYca sarvajanaSrutiyogyaSabdakaraRam sarvajanaSruti yogyaSabdakaraRam QeqarApewA A samyak GozaRe AGozayan BImipatiH BUmipatiH samastam BawwiH satatakrandane ityanye ud UrdDamAvizkaraRa udbuzwajayaSabdavirAvitASAH UrdDvamAvizkaraRe udGuzwajayaSabdavirAvitASAH vf sa a Guza kAntO kaka kftO sa BvA Atma sew idit GuMvate aGuzizwa juGuMze sAnto yamityanye GfsfRam Guza baDe BvA para saka sew Gozati irit aGuzat aGozIt juGoza GozaH GuzitaH Guza KatO AvizkaraRe ca vA cu uBa pakze BvA para saka sew GozaDati te Gozati sajUGuGat ta irit Page a aGuzat aGozIt juGozAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre juGoza RijaBAve GuzitaH GuzwaH GozaH Go zaRA GozaRam iti sa drupado rAjA svayaMvarama Gozayat BA A a suhfdAM priyamAKyAtuM Gozayantu ca te jayam BA vi a jayamaGoza yadasya tu kevalam raGuH AvizkaraRaYca sarvajanaSruti yogyaSabdakaraRam QeqarApewA A samyak GozaRe AGozayan BUmipatiH samastam BawwiH satatakrandane ityanye ud UrdDvamAvizkaraRe udGuzwajayaSabdavirAvitASAH vf sa a
I I I avya I kvip vizAde duHKaBAvanAyAm kroDe anukampAyAm pratyakze sanniDO saMboDane ca medinyAmayaM medi nyAmayaM sAntatayA paWitaH pfzo sADuH I strI asya vizRoH patnI patno NIz lakzmyAm I kAntO icCAyAm matO gatO vyAptO kzepe Bojane saka garBagrahaRe garBa grahaRe aka adAdi aniw para eti ItaH iyanti Et EzIt iyAya iyatuH etA ezyati Ezyat ItaH asyAtmanepaditvamapi na hi taraRirudIte taraRi rudIte dikparADInavfttiH kavika wI durgA I yAcane dvika dvikra Atmane adAdi aniw niru Ite iyIta ItAm Ete Eta Ezwa iye A vodevAsa Imahe vAmaM pratyaDvare yaju ajasraM DarmamImahe GarmamI mahe yaju I gatO divA saka aniw Atma Iyate EzwaH Ezwa ItaH padmEranvItavaDUmuKadyutaH padmEranvItabaDUmuKadyutaH mAGaH IN gatO malli I IrmUrttiH strI mahAmAyA lolAkzI vAmalocanam go vindaH SeKaraH puzwiH suBadrA ratnasaMjYakaH vizRurlakzmI rmaheSaSca vahniSudDvaHparAparaH kAlottarI BeruraRqA ratiSca pARquvardDanaH SivottamaH SivA tuzwiScaturTI vindumA linI vEzRavI vallavI jihvA kAmakalA sanAdikA pAvakaH kowaraH kIrttirmohinI kAlakArikA kucadvandvaM tarjjanISo SAttistripurasundarI I IkAraM parameSAni svayaM paramakuRqalIm brahmAvazRu mayaM varRaM taTA rudramayaMsadA paYcadevamayaMvarRaM pIta vidyullatAkftim caturjYAnamayaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA I avya I kvip vizAde duHKaBAvanAyAm kroDe anukampAyAm pratyakze sanniDO saMboDane ca medi nyAmayaM sAntatayA paWitaH pfzo sADuH I strI asya vizRoH patno NIz lakzmyAm I kAntO icCAyAm gatO vyAptO kzepe Bojane saka garBa grahaRe aka adAdi aniw para eti ItaH iyanti Et EzIt iyAya iyatuH etA ezyati Ezyat ItaH asyAtmanepaditvamapi na hi taraRi IS IS IS ESvaryye adA Atma saka sew Izwe ISize ISiDve ESizwa ISAm baBUva Asa cakre ISitA ISizozwa ISizyate ESizyata ISanam ISitA ISitaH ISA ISitvA DanAnAmISate yajYAH yadISize tvaM na mayi sTite ca BawwiH puruzovE paSUnAmEndrastasmAt paSUnA mIzwe Sata brA etadyoge karmmaRaH samba nDatvavivakzAyAM zazWI vede tu kvacit Rici na Amu sahasra ezAM pitaraSca neSire f tA cCIlye cAnaS ISAnaH IS tri ISa kvip ISare ISvare ISAvAsyamidaM sarvam yaju namo deveByo nama ISa ezAM kftaM cidenomanamA vivAse f sa devAnAmISAM paryyetu sa ISAno ISA no Bavat aTa saha eveSAmAraRyAnAM paSUnAmavarunDe Sata brA IS ESvaryye adA Atma saka sew Izwe ISize ISiDve ESizwa ISAm baBUva Asa cakre ISitA ISizozwa ISizyate ESizyata ISanam ISitA ISitaH ISA ISitvA DanAnAmISate yajYAH yadISize tvaM na mayi sTite ca BawwiH puruzovE paSUnAmEndrastasmAt paSUnA mIzwe Sata brA etadyoge karmmaRaH samba nDatvavivakzAyAM zazWI vede tu kvacit Rici na Amu sahasra ezAM pitaraSca neSire f tA cCIlye cAnaS ISAnaH IS tri ISa kvip ISvare ISAvAsyamidaM sarvam yaju namo deveByo nama ISa ezAM kftaM cidenomanamA vivAse f sa devAnAmISAM paryyetu sa ISA no Bavat aTa saha eveSAmAraRyAnAM paSUnAmavarunDe Sata brA
ISa ISa ISa ESvaryya adA Atma saka sew Izwe ISize ISiDye ESizwa ISAm baBUva Asa cakre ISitA ISizIzwa ISizyate ESizyata ISanam ISitA ISitaH ISA ISitvA DanAnAmISate yajYAH yadISize tvaM na mayisTite ca BawwiH puruzo vE paSUnAmEndrastasmAt paSUnAmIzwe Sata brA etadyoge karmmaRaH sambanDatvavivakzAyAM zazWI vede tu kvacit Rici na Amu sahasra ezAM pitaraSca neSire f tAcCIlye cAnaSa ISAnaH ISa pu ISa ka ISvare vAgISAM vAgISaM vAgBirarTyABiH praRipatyopatasTire praRipatyopa tasTire kumA vAgISAdyAH sumanasaH sarvvArTAnAmupakrame sunamanasaH sarvvArTAnAmupakra me mADavaH itTaM kzitISena vasizWaDenuH raGuH parameSvare parame Svare pu lokeSa cEtanyamayAdideva prAtaH kftye purA ISasyEza niveSitaH padayuge BfNgAyamARaM Bramat nyAyacarceyamISasya manavyapadeSaBAk kusumA mahAdeve brahmAcyuteSArkavanaspatInAm brahmAcyuteSArkavanaspa tInAm svamantrato homacatuzwapaM homacatuzwacaM syAt hemA matsyapu mala ta brahmAcyuteSAnavanaspatInAmiti brahmAcyu SAnavanaspa tInAmiti pAWaH rudrasaMKyAtulyasaMKyAkatvAt ekAdaSasaMKyAyAm rudrasaMKyAtulyasaM KyAkatvAt ekAdaSasaMKyAm tAromAyA varmmavIjamfdDirISasvarAnvitA varmmavIja mfdDirISasvarAnvitA tantrasAre tvaritAmantrodvAre ISasvara ekAdaSasvara ekAra iti kfzRA taddEvAtye ArdrAnakzatre ca neSejyAgniviSAsvavAyvahimaGAyAmyEH neSejyAgniviSAKavAyva himaGAyAmyEH rAjamA ISa pu ISa ka ISvare vAgISaM vAgBirarTyABiH praRipatyopa tasTire kumA vAgISAdyAH sunamanasaH sarvvArTAnAmupakra me mADavaH itTaM kzitISena vasizWaDenuH raGuH parame Svare pu lokeSa cEtanyamayAdideva prAtaH kftye purA ISasyEza niveSitaH padayuge BfNgAyamARaM Bramat nyAyacarceyamISasya manavyapadeSaBAk kusumA mahAdeve brahmAcyuteSArkavanaspa tInAm svamantrato homacatuzwacaM syAt hemA matsyapu mala ta brahmAcyu SAnavanaspa tInAmiti pAWaH rudrasaMKyAtulyasaM KyAkatvAt ekAdaSasaMKyAm tAromAyA varmmavIja mfdDirISasvarAnvitA tantrasAre tvaritAmantrodvAre ISasvara ekAdaSasvara ekAra iti kfzRA taddEvAtye ArdrAnakzatre ca neSejyAgniviSAKavAyva himaGAyAmyEH rAjamA
IrAmA IrAmA IrAmA strI IrlakzmostayA ramyate tra rama ADAre GaY ta nadIBede IrAmAYca mahaBadIm BA va a
IrAma IrAma IrAma strI IrlakzmostayA ramyate tra rama ADAre GaY ta nadIBede IrAmAYca mahanadIm BA va a
Ja Ja Ja JakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedo rdDamAtrAkAlocAryyastasyo ccAraRasTAnaM tAlu AByantaraprayatnaH jihvAmaDyena tA lunaH sparSaH bAhyaprayatnAH saMvAranAdaTozAmahAprA RaSca mAtfkAnyAse sya vAmakarANgalImUle nyasyatA asya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDenutantre uktaM yaTA JakAraM parameSAni kuRqalIM mokzarUpiRIm raktavidyu llatAkAraM sadA triguRasaMyutam paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA trivindusahitaM varRaM triSakti sahitaM taTA varRodDAratantre tadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM yaTA DyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRuzva kamalAnane santaptahemavarRABAM raktAmbaraviBUzitAm raktacandana liptANgIM raktamAlyaviBUzitAm caturddaSaBujAM devIM ratnahArojjvalAM parAm DyAtvA brahmasvarUpAM tAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet tasya vAcakaSabdAH varRABi DAnatantre uktA yaTA JoJaNkArI guho mArgIJarJaro vAyuH sasvanaH ajeSo drAviRI nAdaH pASI jihvA jalaM sTitiH virAjendro DanurhastaH karkaSaH nAdajaH kuhUH kujaH dIrTabAhUrasorUpaM hyAkampitasuca Ycalam durmuKo nazwa AtmavAn vikawA kuca maRqa Nga laH kalahaMsapriyA vAmA vAmANulasu parvakaH dakzahAso wwahAsaSca pARyAtmA vyaYjanasvaraH mAtrAvftte tasya praTamavinyAse PalamuktaM vf ra wo prItiM jo mitralABaM BayamaraRakarO JYO WaWO KedaduHKe Ja pu Jawa saMhatO qa JaYJAvAte nazwe jalavarzaRe Sabdara JiRwIse JiRwISe devagurO dEtyarAje DvaniBede uccavAte ca medi Ja JakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedo rdDamAtrAkAlocAryyastasyo ccAraRasTAnaM tAlu AByantaraprayatnaH jihvAmaDyena tA lunaH sparSaH bAhyaprayatnAH saMvAranAdaTozAmahAprA RaSca mAtfkAnyAse sya vAmakarANgalImUle nyasyatA asya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDenutantre uktaM yaTA JakAraM parameSAni kuRqalIM mokzarUpiRIm raktavidyu llatAkAraM sadA triguRasaMyutam paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA trivindusahitaM varRaM triSakti sahitaM taTA varRodDAratantre tadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM yaTA DyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRuzva kamalAnane santaptahemavarRABAM raktAmbaraviBUzitAm raktacandana liptANgIM raktamAlyaviBUzitAm caturddaSaBujAM devIM ratnahArojjvalAM parAm DyAtvA brahmasvarUpAM tAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet tasya vAcakaSabdAH varRABi DAnatantre uktA yaTA JoJaNkArI guho mArgIJarJaro vAyuH sasvanaH ajeSo drAviRI nAdaH pASI jihvA jalaM sTitiH virAjendro DanurhastaH karkaSaH nAdajaH kuhUH kujaH dIrTabAhUrasorUpaM hyAkampitasuca Ycalam durmuKo nazwa AtmavAn vikawA kuca maRqa Nga laH kalahaMsapriyA vAmA vAmANulasu parvakaH dakzahAso wwahAsaSca pARyAtmA vyaYjanasvaraH mAtrAvftte tasya praTamavinyAse PalamuktaM vf ra wo prItiM jo mitralABaM BayamaraRakarO JYO WaWO KedaduHKe Ja pu Jawa saMhatO qa JaYJAvAte nazwe jalavarzaRe Sabdara JiRwISe devagurO dEtyarAje DvaniBede uccavAte ca medi
JaRatkAra JaRatkAra JaRa na tkAra pu Jana Ra dityavyaktaSabdasya kAraH kf GaY kaNkaRAdiDvanO udveludBujavallikaNkaRaJaRa na tkAraH kzaRaM vAryyatAm kAlidAsaH udvejayati daridraM paramudrAgaRanaJaRatkAraH udBawaH
JaRatkara JaRatkara JaRa na tkara pu Jana Ra dityavyaktaSabdasya kAraH kf GaY kaNkaRAdiDvanO udvelladuBujavallikaNkaRaJaRa na tkAraH kzaRaM vAryyatAm kAlidAsaH udvejayati daridraM paramudrAgaRanaJaRatkAraH udBawaH
JallIla JallIla JallIla pu JarCa kvip taTA san lolaH pfzo tarkulAsake wekuyAra vAzwula hArA
Jallola Jallola Jallola pu JarCa kvip taTA san lolaH pfzo tarkulAsake wekuyAra vA wula hArA
KAdoarRRas KAdoarRRas KAdoarRRas strI KAda karmaRi asun KAdaH KAdyamarRaM jalaM yasyAH pfzo pUrvarUpEkAdaSABAvaH nadyAM niGa
KAdoarRasa KAdoarRasa KAdoarRasa strI KAda karmaRi asun KAdaH KAdyamarRaM jalaM yasyAH pfzo pUrvarUpEkAdeSABAvaH nadyAM niGa
Ka Ka Ka KakAraH jihvAmUle tu kuH proktaH SikzokteH kaRWamUlo ccAryyaH jihvAmUlapadasya kaRWamUlaparatvAt asyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH spfzwatA jihvAmUlasparSaH bAhyaprayatnASca KayAM yamaH KayaH ka pO visargaH Sara eva ca eve SvAsAnu pradAnA aGAzASca vivfRvate kaRWam iti SikzokteH SvAsA GAzabivArAH ayugmAvargayamagAyaRaScAlpAsavaH smftAH iti SikzokteH vargamaDye yugmavarRatvAt mahAprARaSca KAdiSabde pare pUrvasTa visargasya sTAne jihvAmUlIyaH yaTA maRe KaniH samAse tu vA satvaYca BA KaraH BAsKaraH BAHKara iti varRRABiDAne asya vAcakAH SabdAda rSitAH yaTA KaH pracaRqaH kAmarUpI SudDirvahniH sara svatI AkASEndriyaM durgA caRqI santApinI guruH SiKaRqI dantojAtISaH kaPoRirgaruqogadI SUnyaM kapAlI kalyARI sUrpakarRo jarAmaraH SuBAgneya caRqaliNge jano JaNkAraKaqgakO asya mAtfkA varRAntargatatvena DyeyarUpaM varRodDAratantre uktaM yaTA banDUkapuzpasaNkASAM ratnAlaNkAraBUzitAm varABayakarIM nityAmIzadDAsyamuKIM parAm evaM DyAtvA KasvarUpAM tanmantra daSaDA japet mAtfkAnyAse cAsya bAhO nyasyatA SlokaracanAyAM tasyAdyavarRatayopanyAse granTa karttuH lakzmIkaratA kaH KogoGaSca lakzmIM vitarati viyaSoNaHsuKaM caH suKaM CaH vfttara wIkAvftaDfvAkyAt Ka pu Karvva Kana vA bA qa sUryye hemaca indriye pure kzetre SUnye vindO AkASe saMvedane svarge karmaRi ca na medi lagnAt daSame sTAne jyo ta Are KasTe catuzpAdByoBayam nIlaka tanuniDanaKaBeSAH kendrakoRe trilABe jAtakapa suKe hemaca aBrake Ava upaDAtuBede rAjani tatrendriye UrdDaM nABeryAni KAni tAni meDyAni sarvaSaH manuH AkASe naSyatIzuryaTA vidDaH Ke vidDamanuviDyataH manuH KaM vAyurjvalanojalaM kzitiriti trElokyamunmIlati prabo etasmAjjAyate KaM vAyurjyotirApaSca SrutiH yAvat giraH Ke marutAM caranti kumA paramAnandasvarUpe brahmAkASe kaM brahma KaM brahmaH yadeva kaM tadeva Kam iti ca CA u Ka KakAraH jihvAmUle tu kuH proktaH SikzokteH kaRWamUlo ccAryyaH jihvAmUlapadasya kaRWamUlaparatvAt asyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH spfzwatA jihvAmUlasparSaH bAhyaprayatnASca KayAM yamaH KayaH ka pO visargaH Sara eva ca eve SvAsAnu pradAnA aGAzASca vivfRvate kaRWam iti SikzokteH SvAsA GAzabivArAH ayugmAvargayamagAyaRaScAlpAsavaH smftAH iti SikzokteH vargamaDye yugmavarRatvAt mahAprARaSca KAdiSabde pare pUrvasTa visargasya sTAne jihvAmUlIyaH yaTA maRe KaniH samAse tu vA satvaYca BA KaraH BAsKaraH BAHKara iti varRRABiDAne asya vAcakAH SabdAda rSitAH yaTA KaH pracaRqaH kAmarUpI SudDirvahniH sara svatI AkASEndriyaM durgA caRqI santApinI guruH SiKaRqI dantojAtISaH kaPoRirgaruqogadI SUnyaM kapAlI kalyARI sUrpakarRo jarAmaraH SuBAgneya caRqaliNge jano JaNkAraKaqgakO asya mAtfkA varRAntargatatvena DyeyarUpaM varRodDAratantre uktaM yaTA banDUkapuzpasaNkASAM ratnAlaNkAraBUzitAm varABayakarIM nityAmIzadDAsyamuKIM parAm evaM DyAtvA KasvarUpAM tanmantra daSaDA japet mAtfkAnyAse cAsya bAhO nyasyatA SlokaracanAyAM tasyAdyavarRatayopanyAse granTa karttuH lakzmIkaratA kaH KogoGaSca lakzmIM vitarati viyaSoNaHsuKaM caH suKaM CaH vfttara wIkAvftaDfvAkyAt Ka pu Karvva Kana bA qa sUryye hemaca indriye pure kzetre SUnye vindO AkASe saMvedane svarge karmaRi ca na medi lagnAt daSame sTAne jyo ta Are KasTe catuzpAdByoBayam nIlaka tanuniDanaKaBeSAH kendrakoRe trilABe jAtakapa suKe hemaca aBrake Ava upaDAtuBede rAjani tatrendriye UrdDaM nABeryAni KAni tAni meDyAni sarvaSaH manuH AkASe naSyatIzuryaTA vidDaH Ke vidDamanuviDyataH manuH KaM vAyurjvalanojalaM kzitiriti trElokyamunmIlati prabo etasmAjjAyate KaM vAyurjyotirApaSca SrutiH yAvat giraH Ke marutAM caranti kumA paramAnandasvarUpe brahmAkASe kaM brahma KaM brahmaH yadeva kaM tadeva Kam iti ca CA u
KaNgIka KaNgIka KaNgIka na Kaqgo tatkarmaRi kuSalaH bA Ika dAtre Sabda ratnA tasya KaNgakAryyakAritvAt taTAtvam
KaNgaDenu KaNgaDenu KaNgaDenu strI Kaqgo Denuriva yasyAH CurikAyAm tasyA a siputrikAtvAttaTAtvam KaqgA gaRqakI DenuH jAti Page b tvAt powetyAdinA pA karmmaDA pUrbbanipAtaH puMva dBAvaSca DenurUpagaRqakyAM medi
KaNgaparIkzA KaNgaparIkzA KaNgaparIkzA strI KaNgasya parIkzA Kaqagasya rUpaGawanAdinA SuBASuBajYAnopayoginyAM parIkzAyAm sA ca yuktikalpatarO uktA yaTA KaNgarUpaM taTA jAtirnetrArizwe ca BUBikA DvanirmAnamiti proktaM KaNgajYAnAtmakaM SuBam aBinne dfSyate yAdfk vicCidya Gawite taTA yadeva dfSyate cihna tadaNgaM sampracakzate nIlakfzRAdikaM KaNga rUpamitya BiDIyate tenEba yat pratIta syAt tat jAtiriti gadyate aNgAtirikta yajjAtistanmAhAtmyopasUca cam tannetramiti jAnIyAt KaNge KaNgaviSAradaH aNgAtiriktaM KaNgAderyacCudDatvAvasUcakam tadarizwa miti prAhurBUmiraNgAdiDAraRam yaH Kaqge jAyate SabdonaKadaRqAdinAhate sa DvanistulanA mAnam jYAnamazwaviDantvidam paYcAdyA nipuREH KaNge samBAvya nte pi kftrimAH antyAvakftrimO jYeyO tAveva sahajA viti SatamaNgAni catvAri rUpARi jAtayastaTA triMSannatrARi jAnIyAdarizwAni taTEva ca BUmiSca dviviDA jYeyA DvanirazwaviDo mataH mAnantu dviviDaM proktamityezAM saNgraho mataH aDikamasiSabde dfSyam
KaNgapatra KaNgapatra KaNgapatra pu KaNga iva tIkzRaM patramasya KaNgalatAKye latABede Sabda
KaNgapiDAna KaNgapiDAna KaNgapiDAna na KaNgo piDIyate AcCAdyate nena api DA karaRe lyuw aperallopaH KApa asikoze halAyu svArTe ka tatrArTe hema
KaNgaputrikA KaNgaputrikA KaNgaputrikA strI KaNgasya putrikeva CurikAyAM medi
KaNgawa KaNgawa KaNgawa pu aqage iva walati atra wala viklave bA ADAre qa vfhatkASe hArA tasyANgasparSe asivat pIqA karatvAttaTAtvam

KaNgin KaNgin KaNgin puMstrI KaNgaH tadAkAraM SfNgaMmastyasya ini gaRqake etat KaNgikulakrIqitam kAda sa ca suSrute AnUpavarge kUlacaratayoktaH yaTA tatra gajagavayamahiza rurucamarasfmara rohitavarAhaKaNgigokarRabAlapucCakondra nyaNkuraRyagavayapraBftayaH kUlacarAH paSavaH tanmAMsaguRA statroktA yaTA kaPaGnaM KaNgipiSitaM kazAyamanilA paham pitryaM pavitryamAyuzyaM badDvamUtraM virUkzaRam striyAM NIp asiDArake tri maYjuyoze pu Sabdaci mahAdeve pu aSanI SataGnI KaNgI pawviSI cAyuDI mahAn BA Anu Sivasahasra nAmoktO

Karba Karba Karba rva gatO BvA para saka sew Ka rba rvati aKabI aKa rbI rvI t caKa rba rva gatiratra nIcatagatiH KarbaSabdadarSanAt Karba SabdadarSanAt antyasTAntyastu garve iti BedaH Karva rba pu Karva garve ac kuveraniviSezi SabdaratnA kubjaka vfkze antyasTamaDyaH rAjani tasya ganDasyota Page a kawatayA garvahetutvAt taTAtvam Karba gatO ac vargya maDyaH hrasve vAmane tri amaraH Karbe garvasamUha pUritatano tArAstotram saMKyABede sahasrakowO arbudamabjaM KarbaniKarba miti lIlAvatI tatsaMKyAte ca Karba rva gatO BvA para saka sew Ka rba rvati aKa rbI rvI t caKa rba rva gatiratra nIcatagatiH Karba SabdadarSanAt antyasTAntyastu garve iti BedaH Karva rba pu Karva garve ac kuveraniviSezi SabdaratnA kubjaka vfkze antyasTamaDyaH rAjani tasya ganDasyota Page a kawatayA garvahetutvAt taTAtvam Karba gatO ac vargya maDyaH hrasve vAmane tri amaraH Karbe garvasamUha pUritatano tArAstotram saMKyABede sahasrakowO arbudamabjaM KarbaniKarba miti lIlAvatI tatsaMKyAte ca
KarjjUGna KarjjUGna Ka rjju rjjUGna pu KarjjuM rjjUm kaRqUyanaM hanti hana waka Page b cAkamardde dAdamarddana arkadrume ca rAjani
Karva Karva Karva rba pu Karva garve ac kuveraniviSeze SabdaratnA kubjaka vfkze antyasTamaDyaH rAjani tasya ganDasyotkawatayA garvahetutvAt taTAtvam Karva gatO ac vargyamaDyaH hrasve vAmane tri amaraH Karve garvasamUhapUritatano tArAstotram saMKyABede sahasrakowO arbudamabjaM KarbaniKarbamiti lIlAvatI tatsaMKyAte ca

KawinI KawinI KawinI strI Kawa bA ini NIp leKanadravye KaqI rAjani na patati Kawino sasamBramA yasya ityudBawaH

KawvANga KawvANga KawvANga na ta KAweraKura KawvASaBede tadAkAre SivasyAstraBede KawwANgavaraDArakaH SivastavaH KawwANgEH pawwiSEH SUlErlANgalErmuzalEralam kASIKa sUryyavaMSye nfpaBede pu sutaH paYcajanAdAnIdaMSumA niti viSrutaH dilIpastanayastasya KawwANga iti viSrutaH hariva a BAgavate tu Slo tato daSa raTastasmAt putra EqivilistataH rAjA viSvasaho yasya KawwANgaScakravarttyaBatam ityanena anyaputratA tasyABihitA kalpaBedAdaviroDaH prAyaScittIyaDAryye KawvANgAkftO pAtraBede na ekakAlaM tu BuYjIta caran BEkzyaM Kaka rmakft kapAlapARiH KazwvANgI brahvacArI sadodyataH BA SA a KawvANgI cIravAsASca manuH
KawvANka KawvANka KawvANka na ba KAweraKara KawvASaBede tadAkAre SivasyAstraBede KawwANgavaraDArakaH SivastavaH KawwANgEH pawwiSEH SUlErlANgalErmupalEralam kASIKa sUryavaMSe nfpaBede pu sutaH paYcajanAdAnIdaMSuBAniti viSrutaH dilIpastanayastasya KawwANga iti viSrutaH hariva a BAgavate tu Slo tato daSaraTastasmAt putra EqivilistataH rAjA viSvasaho yasya KawwANgacakravarttyaBUtam ityanena anyaputratA tasyABihitA kalpaBedAdaviroDaH prAyaScittIyaDAryye KawvANgAkftO pAtraBede na ekakAlaM tu BuYjIva caran BEkzyaM svakarmakft kapAlapARiH KawvANgI brahmacArI sadodyataH BA SA a KawvANgI cIravAsASca manuH
Ke'li Ke'li Ke li strI Ke AkASe alati ala in gAne vARe sUrye vihage ca pu AkASagAmimAtre tri
Ke'wa Ke'wa Ke wa pu Ke wati awa ac Kiwa ac vA sUryAdigrahe yasminvfkze sTitAH Ke wAH iti jyo ta sunindake tri viSvaH aDame tri amaraH karzakagrAme pu medi KewaKarvawavAwISca vanAnyu pavanAni BAga KewAH karzakagrAmAH SrIDaraH astraBede pu yazwirUpeRa Kewa tvamarisaMhArakArakaH devIhastasTitonityam tatpUjA mantraH svArTe ka tatrArTe pu na divyAmbaraDarAM devIM Kaqga KewakavAriRIm BA vi a anayoH striyO ca kArye KewakanistriMSaDAriRyO bfha saM anayoH SAmbapradyumnayoH KewakaM pUrRacApaYca durgADyAnam KewakAstrantu hastasTitamevArIn hanti yaTAha hastAGnoviSvAvayunAni yaju haste sTito hanti hastaGnaH KewakaH vedadI sa ca yazwirUpaH carmaRi medi Kiwa Baye karaRe GaY mfgayAyAm punaM AKewakam karttari ac tfRe na hemaca ku ka RapAstrasyADaH sTite PalakAkAre kAzWaBede na tanmAnamuktaM hemA pari Ka lakzaRasamuccaye tatra Kewakamapi ku ka Rapasya triviDamuttamaM dvAdaSANgulaM daSANgulaM maDyamanazWANgulaM nikfzwam bAlAnAmetat KawakamavAlAnAntu viMSatyaNgulamuttamamazwAdaSANgulaM maDyamaM zoqaSANgulaM nikfzWamiti OSanasanItiH GanavfdDijIvini tri hArA baladevagadAyAmityanye kaPe mediniH
Keli Keli Ke li strI Ke AkASe alati ala in gAne vARe sUryye vihage ca pu AkASagAmimAtre tri
Kewa Kewa Kewa Bojane ada cu uBa saka sew Kewayati te aciKewat a ciKewat ta Ke wa pu Ke wati awa ac Kiwa ac vA sUryyA digrahe yasminnfkze sTitAH Ke wAH iti jyo ta sunindake tri viSvaH aDame tri amaraH karzakagrAme pu medi KewaKarvawavAwISca vanAnyupavanAni BAga KewAH karzakagrAmAH SrIDaraH astraBede pu yazwirUpeRa Kewa tvamarisaMhArakArakaH devIhastasTitonityam tatpUjA mantraH svArke ka tatrArTe pu na divyAmbaraDarAM devIM KaNga KewakavAriRIm BA vi a anayoH striyO ca kArye Kewaka nistriMSaDAriRyO vfha saM anayoHSAmvapradyumnayoH KewakaM pUrRRacApaYca durgADyAnam KewakAstrantu hasta sTitamevArIn hanti yaTAha hastaGnoviSvAvayunAni yaju hastesTitohanti hastaGnaH KewakaH vedadI sa ca yazwirUpaH carmaRi medi Kiwa Baye karaRe GaY mfgayAyAm puMna AKewakam karttari ac vfRe na hemaca ku ka RapAstrasyADaHsTite PalakAkAre kAzWaBede na tanmAnamuktaM hemA pari Ka lakzaRasamuccaye tatra Kewakamapi ku ka Rapasya triviDamuttamaM dvAdaSANgulaM daSANgulaM maDyamamazWANgulaM nikfzwam bAlA nAmetat KawakamabAlAnAntu viMSatyaNgulamuttamamazwAdaSANgulaM maDyamaM zoqaSANgulaM nikfzwamiti OSanasanItiH DanavfdDijIvini tri hArA baladevagadAyAmi tyanye kaPe mediniH Kewa Bojane ada cu uBa saka sew Kewayati te a ciKewat ta Ke wa pu Ke wati awa ac Kiwa ac vA sUryyA digrahe yasminnfkze sTitAH Ke wAH iti jyo ta sunindake tri viSvaH aDame tri amaraH karzakagrAme pu medi KewaKarvawavAwISca vanAnyupavanAni BAga KewAH karzakagrAmAH SrIDaraH astraBede pu yazwirUpeRa Kewa tvamarisaMhArakArakaH devIhastasTitonityam tatpUjA mantraH svArke ka tatrArTe pu na divyAmbaraDarAM devIM KaNga KewakavAriRIm BA vi a anayoH striyO ca kArye Kewaka nistriMSaDAriRyO vfha saM anayoHSAmvapradyumnayoH KewakaM pUrRRacApaYca durgADyAnam KewakAstrantu hasta sTitamevArIn hanti yaTAha hastaGnoviSvAvayunAni yaju hastesTitohanti hastaGnaH KewakaH vedadI sa ca yazwirUpaH carmaRi medi Kiwa Baye karaRe GaY mfgayAyAm puMna AKewakam karttari ac vfRe na hemaca ku ka RapAstrasyADaHsTite PalakAkAre kAzWaBede na tanmAnamuktaM hemA pari Ka lakzaRasamuccaye tatra Kewakamapi ku ka Rapasya triviDamuttamaM dvAdaSANgulaM daSANgulaM maDyamamazWANgulaM nikfzwam bAlA nAmetat KawakamabAlAnAntu viMSatyaNgulamuttamamazwAdaSANgulaM maDyamaM zoqaSANgulaM nikfzwamiti OSanasanItiH DanavfdDijIvini tri hArA baladevagadAyAmi tyanye kaPe mediniH
Kolamuka Kolamuka Kolamuka pu Ke AkASe ulmuka iva raktavarRatvAt maNgalagrahe trikA
Kolmuka Kolmuka Kolmuka pu Ke AkASe ulmuka iva raktavarRRatvAt maNgalagrahe trikA
Na Na Na puM NakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH kavargapaYcamaH tasyoccAraRasTAna kaRWamUlaM nAsikA ca jihAmUle tu kuHproktaH iti amo nunAsikA narhO iti ca SikzokteH taduccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH kaRWamUle jihrAmUlasparSaH bAhyaprayatnA savAranAdaGozAlpaprARAH mAvfkAnyAse sya dakzakarA Ngulagrezu nyasyatA tasya tantre vAcakaSavdA varRodDA ratantre uktA yaTA NaH SaNKo BEravaScaRqo vindUttaM saH SiSuH priyaH ekorudrodakzanaKaH KarparovizayaspfhaH kAntiH KewAplayoDIrodvijAtmA jvAlinI viyat mantragaktiSca madano viGneSo cAtmanAyakaH ekane tro mAhAnando durdDaraScandramAM matiH SivaScalo nIla kaRWaH kAmeSI camasAMSukO kAmaDenutantre tasya Dyeya rUpamuktaM yaTA NakAraM parameSAni KayaM parama kuRqalIm sarvadevamayaM varRaM triguRaM lolalocane paYcaprARamayaM varRaM NakAraM praRamAmyaham nakAra Page a jAvanusvArapaYcamO JiliDAnuzu kAmaDenO Jalanta sarvaDAnuzu vargapaYcamavarRasya nakArajatvokteH NakArasya tatra nakArajatvam tena aNka kvipi an ityAdi rUpama tasya kAvyAdO praTamanirdeSaPalaM yaTA kaH KaH goGaSca lakzmIM vitarati viyaSo NastaTA caH suKaM CaH vf ra wI ityukterapayaSaH Na pu Nu BA bA qa vizaye vizayaspfhAyAM medi BErave ekAkzarakozaH Na NakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH kavargapaYcamaH tasyoccAraRasTAna kaRWamUlaM nAsikA ca jihAmUle tu kuHproktaH iti amo nunAsikA narhO iti ca SikzokteH taduccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH kaRWamUle jihrAmUlasparSaH bAhyaprayatnA savAranAdaGozAlpaprARAH mAvfkAnyAse sya dakzakarA Ngulagrezu nyasyatA tasya tantre vAcakaSavdA varRodDA ratantre uktA yaTA NaH SaNKo BEravaScaRqo vindUttaM saH SiSuH priyaH ekorudrodakzanaKaH KarparovizayaspfhaH kAntiH KewAplayoDIrodvijAtmA jvAlinI viyat mantragaktiSca madano viGneSo cAtmanAyakaH ekane tro mAhAnando durdDaraScandramAM matiH SivaScalo nIla kaRWaH kAmeSI camasAMSukO kAmaDenutantre tasya Dyeya rUpamuktaM yaTA NakAraM parameSAni KayaM parama kuRqalIm sarvadevamayaM varRaM triguRaM lolalocane paYcaprARamayaM varRaM NakAraM praRamAmyaham nakAra Page a jAvanusvArapaYcamO JiliDAnuzu kAmaDenO Jalanta sarvaDAnuzu vargapaYcamavarRasya nakArajatvokteH NakArasya tatra nakArajatvam tena aNka kvipi an ityAdi rUpama tasya kAvyAdO praTamanirdeSaPalaM yaTA kaH KaH goGaSca lakzmIM vitarati viyaSo NastaTA caH suKaM CaH vf ra wI ityukterapayaSaH Na pu Nu bA qa vizaye vizayaspfhAyAM medi BErave ekAkzarakozaH
O O O OkAraH svaravarRRaBedaH kaRWOzWasTAnayoruccAryyaH dIrGaH dvimAtratvAt plutastu trimAtraH sa ca udAttAnudAtta svaritaBedAt triviDo pi anunAsikAnanunAsikAByAM puna rdvEviDyAt zaqviDaH evaM pluto pi zaqviDaH tena dvAdaSa viDaH taparatve kAraparatve ca svarUpamAtraparaH tantretasya vAcakaSabdA varRRABiDAne uktA yaTA okAraH Sakti konAdastEjasovAmajaNGakaH manurUrdDagraheSaSca SaNkukarRRaH sadASivaH aDodantaSca kaRWOzWO saNkarzaRaH sarasvatI AjYA cordDamuKI SAntA vyApinI prakftiHparA anantA jvAlinI vyomA caturddaSI ratipriyaH netramAtrAkarziRI ca jvAlAmAlinikA BfguH tadaDizWAtfdevatA ca tatrEvoktA OkAre qAkinI siMhanAdinI caRqaBeravI tasya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDe ta uktaM yaTA raktavidyullatA kAramokAraM kuRqalIM svayam atra brahmAdayaH sarvve tizWanti satataM priye paYcaprARamayaM varRRaM sadASivamayaM sadA sadA ISvarasaMyuktaM caturvvargapradAyakam mAtfkA nyAse DodantapaNktOnyasyatvAttacCabdavAcyatA syeti boDyam O avya A ava kvip UW AhvAne saMboDane medi viroDe nirRaye nirRRaye SabdaratnA anante pu ekAkzarakozaH nisvane pu medi pfTivyAM strI medi sa ca caturddaSasvaroyo sO seturOkArasaMjYitaH sacAnusvAranAdAByAM sacA nusvAranAdAByAM SUdrARAM seturucyate tantrasAraDfta kAlikApu ukteH SUdrARAM japyamantraBedaH O OkAraH svaravarRRaBedaH kaRWOzWasTAnayoruccAryyaH dIrGaH dvimAtratvAt plutastu trimAtraH sa ca udAttAnudAtta svaritaBedAt triviDo pi anunAsikAnanunAsikAByAM puna rdvEviDyAt zaqviDaH evaM pluto pi zaqviDaH tena dvAdaSa viDaH taparatve kAraparatve ca svarUpamAtraparaH tantretasya vAcakaSabdA varRRABiDAne uktA yaTA okAraH Sakti konAdastEjasovAmajaNGakaH manurUrdDagraheSaSca SaNkukarRRaH sadASivaH aDodantaSca kaRWOzWO saNkarzaRaH sarasvatI AjYA cordDamuKI SAntA vyApinI prakftiHparA anantA jvAlinI vyomA caturddaSI ratipriyaH netramAtrAkarziRI ca jvAlAmAlinikA BfguH tadaDizWAtfdevatA ca tatrEvoktA OkAre qAkinI siMhanAdinI caRqaBeravI tasya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDe ta uktaM yaTA raktavidyullatA kAramokAraM kuRqalIM svayam atra brahmAdayaH sarvve tizWanti satataM priye paYcaprARamayaM varRRaM sadASivamayaM sadA sadA ISvarasaMyuktaM caturvvargapradAyakam mAtfkA nyAse DodantapaNktOnyasyatvAttacCabdavAcyatA syeti boDyam O avya A ava kvip UW AhvAne saMboDane medi viroDe nirRRaye SabdaratnA anante pu ekAkzarakozaH nisvane pu medi pfTivyAM strI medi sa ca caturddaSasvaroyo sO seturOkArasaMjYitaH sacA nusvAranAdAByAM SUdrARAM seturucyate tantrasAraDfta kAlikApu ukteH SUdrARAM japyamantraBedaH
OdDatya OdDatya OdDatya na udDatasya BAvaH avinItaBAve tacca asUyAnya guRardDInAmOdDatyAdyasahizRatA sA da uktalakzaRam
Oddatya Oddatya Oddatya na udDatasya BAvaH avinItaBAve tacca asUyAnya guRardDInAmOdDatyAdyasahizRutA sA da uktalakzaRam
OdgAtra OdgAtra OdgAtra na udgAturDarmmyam fdantatvAt aY udgAtuH ftvigBedasya Darmmye svarityOdgAtra AhavanIye kAtyA udgAtfvedavihite Breze svarityAha vanIye juhoti karkaH udgAtuH karmma mAvo vA u dgAtrA aR udgAtuH uccErgAnAtmake karmmaRi tadBAve ca
OdragAtra OdragAtra OdragAtra na udgAturDarmyAm fdantatvAt aY udgAtuH ftvigBedasya Darmmye svarityOdgAtra AhavanIye kAtyA udgAtfvedavihite Breze svarityAhavanIye juhoti karkaH udgAtuH karmma BAvo vA udgAtrA aR udgAtuH uccErgAnAtmake karmmaRi tadBAve ca

OpadrazwrA OpadrazwrA OpadrazwrA pu upadrazwf svArTe zyaY puruzameDIye devaBede viviktyE kzattAram OpadrazwyAyAnukzattAram yaju tatra taduddeSenAnukzattA dvArapAlasevakaH AlaByatvena vihitaH

Opavasra Opavasra Opavasra na upavastrameva prajYA aR upavastre upavastuH karma aR upavAse upavastA prApto syeti vigfhyA ftoraR pA sUtrapradarSanaM prAmAdikameva tatra ftuSabdasyEva grahaRaM na tu fdantasya taTAtve fto R ityeva syAt ArttavamityudAharaRaM cAsaNgatam iti boDyam mAzAn maDumasUrAMSca varjjavedOpavastrakft smftiH
Opavastra Opavastra Opavastra na upavastrameva prajYA aR upavastre upavastuH karma aR upavAse upavastA prApto syeti vigfhya ftoraR pA sUtrapradarSanaM prAmAdikameva tatra ftuSabdasyEva grahaRaM na tu fdantasya taTAtve fto R ityeva syAt ArttavamityudAharaRaM cAsaNgatam iti boDyam mAzAn maDumasUrAMSca varjjavedOpavastrakft smftiH
OrRAvata OrRAvata OrRAvata tri urRAvato yam aR fziBede tataH svArTe pyaY OrRAvatyo pyatra
OrRRAvata OrRRAvata OrRRAvata tri urRRAvato yam aR fziBede tataH svArTe pyaY OrRRAvatyo pyatra
OrRRa OrRRa OrRRa ka tri UrRRAyAH vikAraH aY pakze vuY mezalomavikAre kambalAdO
OrRRika OrRRika OrRRika tri UrRRAyAnimittaM saMyoga utpAto vA WaY tannimittAdO striyAM NIp
OrRa OrRa OrRa ka tri UrRAyAH vikAraH aY pakze vuY mezalomavikAre kambalAdO
OrRika OrRika OrRika tri UrRAyAnimittaM saMyoga utpAto vA WaY tannimittAdO striyAM NIp
OrdDadEhika OrdDadEhika OrdDadEhika tri UrdDadehAya sAzu WaY UrdDadehaprApake SAstrokte kriyAdO maraRottaraM hi manuzyARAM praTamamAtivAhikadehotpattistataH pUrakapiRqadAnena pretadehaprAptiH AdyAdisapiRqAntakriyABiH pretadehanivfttyA BogadehaprAptistatra ca pUrvvottaraBave kriye hetU tadetat SudDitattve nirRIta yaTA atredaM vIjaM pUrvvakriyAyAAtivAhikadehatyAgottaradehAntarajananaM maDyakriyAyA api pretatvaparihArottaradehAntarajananaM tataScEkayEva tatsidDO panastatkaraRaM vacanABAve narTakam taTAca vizRuDarmmottaram tatkzaRAdeva gfhRAti SarIramAtivAhikam UrdDvaM vrajanti BUtAni trIRyasmAttasya vigrahAt trARi BUtAni ta jovAyvAkASAni pfTivIjale tu aDogacCataH tatkzaRAt mftyukzaRAt taTA AtivAhikasaMjYo sOdehoBavati BArgavaH kevalaM tanmanuzyARAM nAnyezAM prARinAM kvacit taTA pretapiRqEstaTA dattErdehamApapnoti BArgavaH Bogadehamiti proktaM kramAdeva na saMSayaH pretapiRqA na dIyante yasya tasya vimokzaRam SmASAnikeByoBUteByaAkalpaM nEva vidyate tatrAsya yAtanA GorA SItavAtAtapokadBaH tataH sapiRqokaraRe bAnDavEstu kfte naraH pUrRe saMvatsare dehamato nyaM pratipadyate tataH sa narake yAti svarge vA svena karmmaRA taTA vAyupurARam purakeRa tu piRqena dehonizpAdyate yataH kftasya karaRAyogAt punarnAvarttayet kriyAm ataevAtivAhikadehaparitryAgAya tatkAlInakarmmasamarTaputrasattve pyanyena dAhAdi kriyate pitfmAtfsapiRqEstu samAnasalilErnUpa saMGAtAntargatErvvApi rAjYA vA DanahAriRA pUrvvA kriyAstu karttavyAH puttrAdyEreva cottarAHtatra kriyASca triviDAH vizRupurARe darSitA yaTA pUrvvAH kriyA maDyamASca taTA cEvottarAH kriyAH triprakArAH kriyA hyetAstAsAM BedAn SfRuzvame AdAhavAryyAyuDAdisparSAdyantASca yAH kriyAH tAH pUrvvAmaDyamA mAsimyasyekoddizwasaMjYitA preme pitftTamApanne sapiRqIkaraRAdanu kriyante yAH kriyAH pitryAH procyante tA nfpottarAH pitfmAsfsapiRqESca samAnasalilErnnfpa saMGAtAntargatErvvApi rAjYA vA DanahAriRA pUrvvAH kriyAstu karttavyAH putrAdyEreva cottarAH dOhitrErvA naraSrezWa kAryyAstattanayEstaTA mftAhAni tu karttavyAH strIRAmapyuttarAH kriyAH pratimavatsaraM rAjan ekoddizwaM viDAnataH AdAheti dAhAvaDeraSO cAntavihitavAryyAyuDAdisparSAdyantAstAH pUrvvAH mAsimAsItyEkAdaSAhAdisapiRqanAntapretakriyopalakzaRam sapiRqanottarAH pArvvaRAdikriyA uttarAH atra puttrAdisapiRqAdayaH pUrvvAH kriyA avaSyaM kuryyuH maDyamakriyAyAmaniyamaH uttarakriyAyAM puttrAdayo BrAtfsantatiparyyantAniyatAH SrAdDaviveke pyevam dOhitrErveti zASabdaH samuccayArTaH tena dOhitro pyuttarakriyAyAM niyatADikArI atrADikAriRaSca ekoddizwaSabde uktAH akarot sa tadOrdDadEhikam raGuH anuSItakAdvipadavfdDiriti malli anugatikAdigaRe tasya pAWABAve pi AkftigaRatvAt tatsidDariti tasyASayaH kintu bahuzu sTalezu ekapadavfdDiyuktaMdfSyate tena uBayamapi sADu iti tattvam BftyAnAmuparoDena yatkarotyOrdDadehikam tadBavatyasuKodarkaM jIvataSca mftasya ca manuH upAnahO ca vastraYca pratigfhyOrdDadehikam BArate anu parvvaRi Slo

OrdDvadEhika OrdDvadEhika OrdDvadEhika tri UrdDvadehAya sAzu WaY UrdDvadehaprApake SAstrokte kriyAdO maraRottara hi manuzyARAM praTa mamAtivAhikadehotpattistataH pUrakapiRqadAnena preta dehaprAptiH AdyAdisapiRqAntakriyABiH pretadehani vfttyA BogadehapAptistatra ca pUrbbottaraBave kriye hetU tadetat SudDitattve nirRRItaM yaTA atredaM vIjaM pUrbbakriyAyAAtivAhikadehatyAgottara dehAntarajananaM maDyakriyAyAapi pretatvaparihArottara dehAntarajananaM tataScEkayEva tatsidDO punastatkaraRaM vacanA BAve narTakam taTAca vizRuDarmmottaram tatkzaRA deva gfhRAti SarIramAtivAhikam UrdDvaM vrajanti BUtAni trIRyasmAttasya vigrahAt trIRi BUtAni ta jovAyvA kASAni pfTivIjale tu aDIgacCataH tatkzaRAt mftyukza RAt taTA AtivAhikasaMjYo sO dehoBavati BArgava kevalaM tanmanuzyARAM nAnyezAM prARinAM kvacit taTA pretapiRqEstaTA dattErdehamApnoti BArgavaH Bogadeha miti proktaM kramAdeva na saMSayaH pretapiRqA na dIyante Page b yasya tasya vimokzaRam SmASAnikeByoBUteByaAkalvaM nEva vidyate tatrAsya yAtanA GorA SItavAtAtapoqavAH tataH sapiRqIkaraRe bAnDavEstu kfte naraH pUrRe saMvat sare dehamato nyaM pratipadyate tataH sa narake yAti svarge vA svena karmmaRA taTA vAyupurARam pUrakeRa tu pi Rqena dehonizpAdyate yataH kftasya karaRAyogAt punarnAvarttayet kriyAm ataevAtivAhikadehapari tyAgAya tatkAlInakarmmAsamarTaputrasattve pyanyena dAhAdi kriyate pitfmAtfsapiRqEstu samAnasalilErnfpa saM GAtAntargatErvvApi rAjYA vA DanahAriRA pUrvvAH kri yAstu karttavyAH puttrAdyEreva cottarAH tatra kriyASca triviDAH vizRupurARe darSitA yaTA pUrvvAH kriyA maDyamASca taTA cEvottarAH kriyAH triprakArAH kriyA hyetAstAsAM BedAn SfRuzva me AdA havAryyAyuDAdisparSAdyantASca yAH kriyAH tAH pUrvvA maDyamA mAsimyasyekoddizwasaMjYitAH prete pitftvamApanne sapiRqIkaraRAdanu kriyante yAH kriyAH pitryAH pro cyante tA nfpottarAH pitfmAtfsapiRqESca samAna salilErnnfpa saMGAtAntargatErvvApi rAjYA vA DanahA riRA pUrvvAH kriyAstu karttavyAH putrAdyEreva cottarAH dOhitrErvA naraSrezWa kAryyAstattanayEstaTA mftAhAni tu karttavyAH strIRAmapyuttarAH kriyAH pratisaMvatsaraM rA jan ekoddizwaM viDAnataH AdAheti dAhAvaDraSO cAntavihitavAryyAyuDAdisparSAdyantAstAH pUrbbAH mAsimA sItyekAdaSAhAdisapiRqanAntapretakriyopalakzaRam sapi RqanottarAH pArbbaRAdikriyA uttarAH atra puttrAdi sapiRqAdayaH pUrbbAH kriyA avaSyaM kuryyuH maDyamakriyA yAmaniyamaH uttarakriyAyAM puttrAdayo BrAtfsantatiparyyantA niyatAH SrAdDaviveke pyevam dOhitrErveti vASabdaH samuccayArTaH tena dOhitro pyuttarakriyAyAM niyatADikArI atrADikAriRaSca ekoddizwaSabde pf uktAH aka rot sa tadOrdDvadEhikam raGuH anuSatikA dvipadavfdDi riti malli anugatikAdigaRe tasya pAWABAve pi Akfti gaRatvAt tatsidDiriti tasyASayaH kintu bahupu sTalezu ekapadavfdDiyuktaMdfSyate tena uBayamapi sADu iti tattvam BftyAnAmuparoDena yatkarotyOrdDadehikam tadBavatyasuKo darkaM jIvataSca mftasya ca manuH upAnahO ca vastraYca pratigfhyOrdDadehikam BArate anu parvvaRi Slo

OrvaSeya OrvaSeya OrvaSeya pu urvvaSyA apatyam Qak agastye munO hemaca tasya ca uvvaSIM dfzwvA mitrAvaraRayoH sKalitaretojA ta tayA taTAtvam tatpramARaYcAgastiSabde pf uktam ElaSabde darSitezu urvaSIgarBajAtezu purUravasaH sutezu AyurAdizu zawsu ca

OzaDa OzaDa OzaDa na ozaDeridam ozaDerajAtO pA aR ozaDijAte annAdO roganASake dravyaBede svArTe R ozaDO ca OzaDaSabdArTaSca suSrute darSitaH evametatpuruzovyADirOzaDam kriyAkAla iti catuzwayaM vyAKyAtam ityuktvA OzaDagrahaRAt dravyaguRarasavIryyavipAkapraBAvAnAdeSaH ityuktam tena dravyamAtrasADyasyOzaDatvam ataeva tElaGftajalavizaviSezARAmapyOzaDatvam rogamAdO parIkzeta tato nantaramOzaDam tataH karmma Bizak paScAt jYAnapUrvvaM samAcaret cakrada paripAwImuktvA rogaBedena OzaDaviSezA uktAstata eva te DigamyAH tadupayogiBUmyAdikaM suSrute darSitaM yaTA aTAto BUmipraviBAgavijYAnIyamaDyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH SvaBraSarkarASmavizamavalmIkaSmaSAnAdyAyatanadevatAyatanasika tABiranupahatAmanUzarAmaBaNgurAmadUrodakAM snigDAM prarohavatIMmfrdvI sTirAM samAM kfzRAM gOrIM lohitAM vA BUmimOzaDArTaM parIkzeta tasyAM jAtamapi kfmivizaSastrAtapapavanadahanatoyasambADamArgEranupahatamekarasaM puzwaM pfGvavagAQamUlamudIkzyAM cOzaDamAdadItetyOzaDaBUmiparIkzAviSezaH sAmAnyaH viSezatastu tatrASmavatI mftaM yatra na laByate tatra kAntena karmmARi BizakkuryyAdvicakzaRaH kAntABAve tOkzRalohaM yojayedvEdyasattamaH aBAve mOktikasyApi muktASukti prayojayet maDu yatra na laByeta tatra jIrRaguqo mataH matsyARqyaBAvato dadyurBizajaH sitaSarkkarAm asamBave sitAyAstu buDEH KaRqaM prayujyate kzIrABAve raso mOdgO mAsUro vA pradIyate atra poktAni vastUni yAni tezu ca tezu ca yojyamekatABAve paraM vEdyena jAnatA rasavorTyavipAkAdyEH samaM dravyaM vicintya ca yuYjyAdviviDamanyacca dravyARAntu rasAdivit yoge yadapraDAnaM syAttasya pratiniDirmmataH yattu praDAnaM tasyApi sadfSaM nEva gfhyate vyADerayuktaM yatdravyaM guRoktamapi tat tjet anuktamapi yuktaM yat yOjyet tadrasAdivit dravyagatapaYcapadArTakarmmARyAha dravye raso guRo vIryyavipAkaH Saktireva ca padArTAH paYca tizWanti svaMsvaM kurvvanti Ozwika Ozwika Ozwika tri uzwre BavaH Wak uzwraBave daDyAtadO vipAke kawu sakzAraM guru BedyOzwikaM daDi suSrutaH
Ozwrika Ozwrika Ozwrika tri uzwreBavaH Wak uzwraBave daDyAdO vipAke kawu sakzAraM guru BedyOzwrikaM daDi suSrutaH
Pa Pa Pa PakAraH paYcamavargasya dvitIyavarRaH sparSavarRezu dvAviMSatitamaH asyoccAraRasya sTAnamozWO tasyoccAraRe AByantaraH prayatnaH jihvAgrasya ozWAByAM saha sparSaH ataevAsya sparSa varRatA bAhyAH prayatnAH vivAraSvAsAGozAH mahA prARaSca asmin pare visargasya sTAne upADmAnIyaH tantre varRABiDAne asya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA PaH suKI durgiRI DUmrA vAmapArSvo janArdanaH jayA pAdaSiKA rOdrI PetkAraH SAKinI priyaH ilA vihaNgamaH kaRWaH kubjinI priyapAvakO pralayAgnirnIlapAdo kzaraH paSupatiH SaSI PutkAro yAminI JaYJApavano mohavardDanaH nizPaluvAgaha NkAraH prayARo grAmaRI Palam tadISadevatADyAnaM yaTA pralayAmbudavarRABAM lalajjihvAM caturBujAm BaktABayapradAM nityAM nAnAlaNkAraBUzitAm evaM DyAtvA PakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram asya DyeyasvarUpaM yaTA PakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi rakta vidyullatopamam caturvargapradaM varaRaM paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARamayaM varRaM sadA triguRasaMyutam AtmAditattva saMyuktaM trivindusahitaM sadA kAmaDenutantram mAtrakA nyAsye sya vAmapArSve nyAsaH kAvyAdAvasya praTama vinyAsaPalaM pakAraSabde uktaM dfSyam Pa na Pakka qa rUkzakaTane nizPalavAkye sPutkAre PutkAre ca medi JaYJAvAte bardDake jfmBAvizkAre PalaBAge Pala BAge ca pu viSvaH Pa PakAraH paYcamavargasya dvitIyavarRaH sparSavarRezu dvAviMSatitamaH asyoccAraRasya sTAnamozWO tasyoccAraRe AByantaraH prayatnaH jihvAgrasya ozWAByAM saha sparSaH ataevAsya sparSa varRatA bAhyAH prayatnAH vivAraSvAsAGozAH mahA prARaSca asmin pare visargasya sTAne upADmAnIyaH tantre varRABiDAne asya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA PaH suKI durgiRI DUmrA vAmapArSvo janArdanaH jayA pAdaSiKA rOdrI PetkAraH SAKinI priyaH ilA vihaNgamaH kaRWaH kubjinI priyapAvakO pralayAgnirnIlapAdo kzaraH paSupatiH SaSI PutkAro yAminI JaYJApavano mohavardDanaH nizPaluvAgaha NkAraH prayARo grAmaRI Palam tadISadevatADyAnaM yaTA pralayAmbudavarRABAM lalajjihvAM caturBujAm BaktABayapradAM nityAM nAnAlaNkAraBUzitAm evaM DyAtvA PakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram asya DyeyasvarUpaM yaTA PakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi rakta vidyullatopamam caturvargapradaM varaRaM paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARamayaM varRaM sadA triguRasaMyutam AtmAditattva saMyuktaM trivindusahitaM sadA kAmaDenutantram mAtrakA nyAsye sya vAmapArSve nyAsaH kAvyAdAvasya praTama vinyAsaPalaM pakAraSabde uktaM dfSyam Pa na Pakka qa rUkzakaTane nizPalavAkye PutkAre ca medi JaYJAvAte bardDake jfmBAvizkAre Pala BAge ca pu viSvaH
PaRila PaRila PeRi ni la tri Pe Ra atyarTe ilac Pena Ra viSizwe koliPale madanavfkzaPale ca na medi vadaravfkze rAjani arizwavfkze ca pu amaraH
Pala Pala Pala Bedane BvA mbA para saka sew Palati aPAlIt paPAla PelatuH Adit AramBe BAve kta vA iw PultaH PalitaH Pa litaH Pultam Palitam anyatra PalitaH itayaveva ityeva YIt vartamAne varttamAne kta PalitaH nizpatO Pala nizpattO BvA para aka sew Palati aPalIt aPAlIt paPAla PelatuH kta PalitaH kalitaH Pala gatO BvA para saka sew Palati aPAlIt jvalA karttari vA Ra PalaH PAlaH Palayati PAlayati Pala na Pala ac vfkzAdInAM Sasye lABe Palake QAla kArye karye uddeSye prayojane amaraH jAtIPale triPalAyAM triPa lAyAM kakkole medi bARAgre Arttave Sabdara PAle hema dAne Dara muzkecA muzke ca kuwajavfkze pu Sabdara DAtvarTanizpAdye praDAnoddeSe prayojane svaritaYita AtmanepadaM karrtrABiprAye karttraBiprAye kriyAPale pA yasyArTasiva prasidDayarTamAraByante yasyArTasya prasi dDyarTamAraByante pacAdayaH tat praDAnaM PalaM tezAM na lABAdi lA BAdi prayojanam hariH tena pAkAdijanyaM BojanaM yAgAdijanyaYca yA gAdijanyaYca puRyameva Palam na vetanAdilABarUpaM PalaM tena sUdakasya ftvigAdervA na DAtvarTajanyaPalaBAgitvam DAtvarTajanyaPaBAgitvam DAtvarTajanye saMyogAdO ca PalavyApArayorDaturASraye PalavyApArayorGAturASraye tu tiNaH smftAH Pale praDAnaM vyApArastiNarTastu viSezaRam viSeza Ram hariH DAtvaTdaSabde DAtvarTaSabde dfSyam gOtamokte prameyaBede prame yaBede tallakzaRaYca tatroktaM yaTA AtmaSarIrendriyArTabudDimanaH pravfttidozapretyaBAvaPaladuHKApavargAstu prameyam AtmaSarIrendriyArTabudDimanaHpravfttidozapretyaBAvaPaladuH KApavargAstu prameyama gO sU uddiSya pravfttidozajanito rTaH Palam gO sU suKaduHKasaMvedanaM suKaduHKasaMbedanaM Palam suKavipAkaM karma duHKavipAkaYca tat punardehendriyavizayabudDizu punardehendriyavizaya budDizu satIzu BavatIti saha dehAdiBiH PalamaBipretam taTA hi pravfttidozajanito rTaH Palametat sarvaM Bavati tadetat PalamupAttamupAttaM heyaM tyaktaM tyaktamupAdeyamiti nAsya hAnopAdAnayornizWA paryyavasAnaM vA sti sa KalvayaM Palasya hAnopAdAnasrotasohyate hAnopAdAnastrotasodvyate loka iti vAtsvA vAtsyA anizwamizwaM miSraYca triviDaM karmaRaH Palam BavatyatyABinAM mavatya tyAginAM pretya na tu sanyAsinAM santyAsinAM kvacit gItA lavaRAdisaMyoge PalasyAnnasamatvaM yaTA taRqulo mbvagnisaMyogAllavaRena taRqUlo mbagni saMyogACavaRena ca pizwakam PalaM tritayasaMyogAdannaM Bavati tatkzaRAt rAmArcanacandrikADftavacanam nizpanne tri Pala Bedane mbA para saka sew Palati aPAlIt paPAla PelatuH Adit AramBe BAve kta vA iw PultaH Pa litaH Pultam Palitam anyatra PalitaH ityeva YIt varttamAne kta PalitaH Pala nizpattO BvA para aka sew Palati aPAlIt paPAla PelatuH kta kalitaH Pala gatO BvA para saka sew Palati aPAlIt jvalA karttari vA Ra PalaH PAlaH Palayati PAlayati Pala na Pala ac vfkzAdInAM Sasye lABe Palake QAla karye uddeSye prayojane amaraH jAtIPale triPa lAyAM kakkole medi bARAgre Arttave Sabdara PAle hema dAne Dara muzke ca kuwajavfkze pu Sabdara DAtvarTanizpAdye praDAnoddeSe prayojane svaritaYita AtmanepadaM karttraBiprAye kriyAPale pA yasyArTasya prasi dDyarTamAraByante pacAdayaH tat praDAnaM PalaM tezAM na lA BAdi prayojanam hariH tena pAkAdijanyaM BojanaM yA gAdijanyaYca puRyameva Palam na vetanAdilABarUpaM PalaM tena sUdakasya ftvigAdervA na DAtvarTajanyaPaBAgitvam DAtvarTajanye saMyogAdO ca PalavyApArayorGAturASraye tu tiNaH smftAH Pale praDAnaM vyApArastiNarTastu viSeza Ram hariH DAtvarTaSabde dfSyam gOtamokte prame yaBede tallakzaRaYca tatroktaM yaTA AtmaSarIrendriyArTabudDimanaHpravfttidozapretyaBAvaPaladuH KApavargAstu prameyama gO sU uddiSya pravfttidozajanito rTaH Palam gO sU suKaduHKasaMbedanaM Palam suKavipAkaM karma duHKavipAkaYca tat punardehendriyavizaya budDizu satIzu BavatIti saha dehAdiBiH PalamaBipretam taTA hi pravfttidozajanito rTaH Palametat sarvaM Bavati tadetat PalamupAttamupAttaM heyaM tyaktaM tyaktamupAdeyamiti nAsya hAnopAdAnayornizWA paryyavasAnaM vA sti sa KalvayaM Palasya hAnopAdAnastrotasodvyate loka iti vAtsyA anizwamizwaM miSraYca triviDaM karmaRaH Palam mavatya tyAginAM pretya na tu santyAsinAM kvacit gItA lavaRAdisaMyoge PalasyAnnasamatvaM yaTA taRqUlo mbagni saMyogACavaRena ca pizwakam PalaM tritayasaMyogAdannaM Bavati tatkzaRAt rAmArcanacandrikADftavacanam nizpanne tri
PalamudgarikA PalamudgarikA PalamudgarikA strI mudaM girati gF in PalaM mudgari yasyAH kap piRqaKarjUryyAMm piRqIKejura SabdamA
PalamuharikA PalamuharikA PalamuharikA strI mudaM girati gf in PalaM pudgari Page a yasyAH kap piRqaKarjUryyAm piRqIKejura SabdamA
PeRila PeRila PeRi ni la tri Pe Ra atyarTe ilac Pena Ra vi Page b Sizwe kIdikale madanavfkzaPale ca na medi vadaravfkze rAjani arizwavfkze ca pu amaraH
PenikA PenikA Pe Ri nikA strI RAjA iti KyAte pakvAnnaBede kftAnna Dabde pf dfSyam
PiraNga PiraNga PiraNga pu svanAmaKyAte mlecCadeSe rogaviSeze BAvapra tatra PiraNgasya niruktimAha PiraNgasaMjYaka deSe bAhulyenEza yaduBavet tasmAt PiraNga ityukto vyADirvyADiviSAradEH tasya viprakfzwaM nidAnamAha ganDarogaH PiraNgo yaM jAyate dehinAM Druvam PiraNgiRo tisaMsargAt PiraNgiRyAH prasaNgataH vyADirAgantujo hyeza dozARAmanusaMkramaH BavettA lakzayettezAM lakzaRErBizajAM varaH PiraNgiRyAH prasaNgata iti viSezArTam rUpamAha PiraNgastriviDo jYeyo bAhyAByAntaratastaTA vahirantarBavaScApi tezAM liNgAni ca Druvam tatra bAhyaH PiraNgaH syAdvisPowasadfSo lparuk sPuwito vraRavadvedyaH suKasADyo pi sa smftaH sanDeScAByantaraH sa syAduBayorlakzaREryutaH kazwado ticirasTAyI kazwasADyatamaSca saH upadravAnAha kArSyabalakzayo nAsABaNgo vahneSca mandatA asTiSozo sTivakratvaM PiraNgopadravA amI sADyatvAdikamAha vahirBavo Bavet sADyo nUtano nirupadravaH AByantarastu kazwena sADyaH syAdayamAmazaH bahirantarBavo jIrRaH kzIRasyopadravEryutaH boDyo vyADirasADyo yamityUcurmunayaH purA tato styarTe ini PiraNgin taddeSasTajane tadrogayute ca tri striyAM NIp
PiraNka PiraNka PiraNka pu svanAmaKyAte mlecCadeSe rogaviSeze mAvapra Page b tatra PiraNgasya niruktimAha PiraNgasaMjYake deSe bAhulyenEza yadBavet tasmAt PiraNga ityukto vyADirvyADiviSAradEH tasya viprakfzwaM niwAnamAha ganDarogaH PiraNgo yaM jAyate dehinAM Druvam PiraNgi Ro tisaMsargAt PiraNgiRyAH prasaNgataH vyADirAga ntujo hyeza dozARAmanusaMkramaH BavettA lakzayettezAM lakzaRErBizajAM varaH PiraNgiRyAH prasaNgata iti viSezArTam rUpamAha PiraNgastrivivo jYeyo bAhyA ByAntaratastaTA vahirantarBavaScApi tezAM liNgAni ca Drvam tatra bAhyaH PiraNgaH syAdbisPowasadfSo lparuk sPuwito vraRavadvedyaH suKamADyo pi sa smftaH sanDe ScAByantaraH sa syAduBaTorlakzaREryutaH kazwado ticira sTAyI kazwasADyatamaSca saH upadravAnAha kArSyaM balakzayo nAsABaNgo vahneSca mandatA asTiSozo sTivakratvaM PiraNgopadravA amI sADyatvAdikamAha vahirBavo Bavet sADyo nUtamo nirupadravaH ABya ntarastu kazwena sADyaH syAdayamAmazaH bahirantarBavo jIrRaH kzIRasyopadravEryutaH boDyo vyARirasADyo ya mityUcurmunayaH purA tato styarTe ini PiraNgin taddeSasTajane tadrogayute ca tri striyAM NIp
PoRikA PoRikA PoRi ni kA strI KAjA iti KyAte pakvAnnaBede kftAnnaSabde dfSyam

PupPuma PupPuma PupPuma pu suSrutokte hfdayasya vAmapArSvasTite PulakA iti KyAte kozWaBede sTAnAnyAmAgnipakAnAM mUtrasya rucirazya ca hfdaRqukaH PupPusaSca kozWa ityamiGIyate vyAcAKpA cedam Asasya sTAnamAmASayaH nABerurdDvam agneH sTAnaM pacyamAnASayaH nABimaDyam pakasya sTAnaM pakASayaH nABeraDaH mUtrasya sTAnaM vastiH ruzirasya sTAnaM yakftplIdAnO tad dvadayam ikzurasapAkamalavad yaH Page a SoRitamalastajjaH uRqukaH sa cAntradeSe vyavasTitaH purIzADAnam PupPusaH hfdayasya vABapArSve sTitaH PulakA iti KyAtaH iti vijayarakzitaH
PupPusa PupPusa PupPusa pu suSrutokte hfdayasya vAmapArSvasTite PulakA iti KyAte kozWaBede sTAnAnyAmAgnipakvAnAM mUtrasya ruDirasya ca hfdaRqukaH PupPusaSca kozWa ityaBiDIyate vyAcaKyO cedam Amasya sTAnamAmASayaH nABerurdDvam agne sTAnaM paccamAnASayaH nABimaDyam pakvasya sTAnaM pakvASayaH nABeraDaH mUtrasya sTAnaM vastiH ruDirasya sTAnaM yakftplIhAnO hfdu hfdayam ikzurasapAkamalavad yaH SoRitamalastajjaH uRqukaH sa cAntradeSe vyavasTitaH purIzADAnam PupPusaH hfdayasya vAmapArSve sTitaH PulakA iti KyAtaH iti vijayarakzitaH
Qa Qa Qa QakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedo rdDa mAtrAkAlocAryyaH mUrddyanyaH wavargIyaH tasyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyaBAgena mUrdDnaH sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH savAranAdaGozA mahAprARaSca bAhyapra yatnAH mAtfkAnyAse sya dakzapAdANgulimUle nyasyatA varRABiDane asya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA Qo QakkA nirRayaH SUro yakzeSo DanadeSvaraH ardDanArISvarstoyamo SvarastriSiKonaraH dakzapAdANgulImUlaM sidDidaRqo vinA yakaH prahAsastripurA sanDirnirguRo niDano DanI viGneSaH pASinI taNkaDArIRI kroqapucCakaH elApuraM ca durgAtmA viSAKA BrAmaRoratiH etadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM varRo dDAratantre uktaM yaTA raktotpalaniBAM ramyAM rakta paNkajalocanAm azwAdaSaBujAM BImAM mahAmokza pradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya svarUpaM kAmaDenutantre uktaM yaTA QakAraH paramArADyo yA svayaM kuRqalI parA paYcadevAtmakaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA sadA triguRa saMyuktaM AtmAditattvasaMyutam taktavidyullatAkAraM QakAraM praRamAmyaham mAtrAvftte sya praTamopanyAse viSoBA Palam qaSabde pramARaM dfSyam Qa pu QakkAyAM Suni SvalANgUle ca medi tasya tadAkftitvAt tadA kftitvAt taTAtvam nirguRe DvanO ca ekAkzarako Qa QakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedo rdDa mAtrAkAlocAryyaH mUrddyanyaH wavargIyaH tasyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyaBAgena mUrdDnaH sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH savAranAdaGozA mahAprARaSca bAhyapra yatnAH mAtfkAnyAse sya dakzapAdANgulimUle nyasyatA varRABiDane asya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA Qo QakkA nirRayaH SUro yakzeSo DanadeSvaraH ardDanArISvarstoyamo SvarastriSiKonaraH dakzapAdANgulImUlaM sidDidaRqo vinA yakaH prahAsastripurA sanDirnirguRo niDano DanI viGneSaH pASinI taNkaDArIRI kroqapucCakaH elApuraM ca durgAtmA viSAKA BrAmaRoratiH etadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM varRo dDAratantre uktaM yaTA raktotpalaniBAM ramyAM rakta paNkajalocanAm azwAdaSaBujAM BImAM mahAmokza pradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya svarUpaM kAmaDenutantre uktaM yaTA QakAraH paramArADyo yA svayaM kuRqalI parA paYcadevAtmakaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA sadA triguRa saMyuktaM AtmAditattvasaMyutam taktavidyullatAkAraM QakAraM praRamAmyaham mAtrAvftte sya praTamopanyAse viSoBA Palam qaSabde pramARaM dfSyam Qa pu QakkAyAM Suni SvalANgUle ca medi tasya tadA kftitvAt taTAtvam nirguRe DvanO ca ekAkzarako
Ra Ra Ra RakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedo rdDa mAtrAkAlocAryyaH mUrdDanyaH wavargIyaH asyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyena mUrdDnaH sparSaH nAsikAyatnapramedaSca AByantaraprayatnaH saMvAranAdaGozAH alpaprARaSca vAhyaprayatnAH sAtfkAnyAse sya dakzapAdANgu lyagresyasyatA asya vAcakaSabdAvarRABiDAne uktA yaTA Ro nirmuRaM ratirjYAnaM jamBalaH pakzibAhanaH jayA jamBo narakajit nizkalo yoginIpriyaH dvimuKaM kowavI SrotraM samfdDirboDanI mata trinetro mAnuzI vyoma dakzapAdANgulImuKam mADavaH SaNGinI vIro nArAya Page b RaSca nirRayaH etadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM varRodDAratantroktaM yaTA DyAnamasya RakArasya pravakzyAmi ca tat SfRu dviBujAM varadAM ramyAM BaktABIzwapradAyinIm rAjIva locanAM nityAM DarmakAmArTamokzadAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet etatsvarUpaM kAma DenutantroktaM yaTA RakAraH parameSAni yA svayaM paraku RqalI pItavidyullatAkAraH paYcadevamayaH sadA paYca prARamayaM devi sadA triguRasaMyutam AtmAditattvasaM yuktaM mahAmohapradAyakam mAtrAGftte sya praTamopa nyAse maraRaM Palam mUlaM qaSabde dfSyam Ra pu RaKa gatO qa pfzo Ratvam bindudeve vindudeve BUzaRe guRavarjjite pAnIyanilaye pAnIyanilaMye medi nirRaye jYAne ca na ekAkzarako Ra RakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedo rdDa mAtrAkAlocAryyaH mUrdDanyaH wavargIyaH asyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyena mUrdDnaH sparSaH nAsikAyatnapramedaSca AByantaraprayatnaH saMvAranAdaGozAH alpaprARaSca vAhyaprayatnAH sAtfkAnyAse sya dakzapAdANgu lyagresyasyatA asya vAcakaSabdAvarRABiDAne uktA yaTA Ro nirmuRaM ratirjYAnaM jamBalaH pakzibAhanaH jayA jamBo narakajit nizkalo yoginIpriyaH dvimuKaM kowavI SrotraM samfdDirboDanI mata trinetro mAnuzI vyoma dakzapAdANgulImuKam mADavaH SaNGinI vIro nArAya Page b RaSca nirRayaH etadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM varRodDAratantroktaM yaTA DyAnamasya RakArasya pravakzyAmi ca tat SfRu dviBujAM varadAM ramyAM BaktABIzwapradAyinIm rAjIva locanAM nityAM DarmakAmArTamokzadAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet etatsvarUpaM kAma DenutantroktaM yaTA RakAraH parameSAni yA svayaM paraku RqalI pItavidyullatAkAraH paYcadevamayaH sadA paYca prARamayaM devi sadA triguRasaMyutam AtmAditattvasaM yuktaM mahAmohapradAyakam mAtrAGftte sya praTamopa nyAse maraRaM Palam mUlaM qaSabde dfSyam Ra pu RaKa gatO qa pfzo Ratvam vindudeve BUzaRe guRavarjjite pAnIyanilaMye medi nirRaye jYAne ca na ekAkzarako
SAlaniryAsa SAlaniryAsa SAlaniryAsa puM ta sarjarase DunA ratnamA
SAlaniryyAsa SAlaniryyAsa SAlaniryyAsa pu ta sarjarase DunA ratnamA

SOkaraba SOkaraba SOkaraba na tIrTaBede paraM SOkaravaM sTAnaM sarvasaMsAramokza Ram yatra saMsTA ca me devi hyudDftAsi rasAtalAt yatra mAgIraDI gaNgA nama SOkarave sTitA barAhapu
SOkarava SOkarava SOkarava na tIrTaBede paraM SOkaravaM sTAnaM sarvasaMsAramokzaRam yatra saMsTA ca me devi hyudvftAsi rasAtalAt yatra BAgIraTI gaNgA mama SOkarave sTitA varAha puM
