SaSorRa SaSorRa SaSorRa na ta SaSasya lomni amaraH
SakAraH SakAraH SakAraH UzmavarRaBedaH asyoccAraRasTAnaM tAlu tasyo ccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH vivftam bAhyaprayatnA vivAra SvAsAGozA mahAprARaSca asya DyeyasvarUpam Sa kAraM parameSAni SfRu varRaM Sucismite raktavarRa praBAkAraM svayaM paramakuRqalI caturvargapradaM devi SakAraM brahmavigraham paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM priye rajaHsattvatamoyuktaM trivindusahitaM sadA tri SaktisahitaM GarRamAtmAditattvasaMyutam kAsaDenutantram asya vAcakaSabdA yoginItantroktA yaTA SaH sa vyaSca kAmarUpI kAmarUpo mahAmatiH sOKyanAmA kumAro sTi SrIkaRWo vfzaketanaH vfzaGnaH SayanaM SAntA suBagA visPuliNginI mftyurdevo mahAlakzmIrmahendraH kulakOlinI bAhurhaMso viyadvaktraM hfdanaNgo NkuSaH KanaH vAmoruH puRqarIkAkzaH kAntiH kalyARavA cakaH mAtfkAnyAse sya hfdAdidakzakare nyAsyatA kAvyAdO praTamaprayoge suKaM Palam SaH suKaM zastu svedam vf tta wI
SakrASana SakrASana SakrASana puM na SakreRASyate aSa karmaRi lyuw BaNgAyAm SakrASanantu tIkzRozRaM mohakft kuzWanASanam bala meDAgnida SlezmadozahAri rasAyanam rAjava SakrASana pu SakraM tannAmaSfte vyApnoti tannAmaSnute zyApnoti aSa lyu kuwajavfkze Sabdaca kuwaja vfkze zabdaca SakrASana na SakreRASyate aSa karmaRi lyuw BaNgAyAm SakrASanantu tIkzRozRaM mohakft kuzWanASanam bala meDAgnida SlezmadozahAri rasAyanam rAjava SakrASana pu SakraM tannAmaSnute zyApnoti aSa lyu kuwaja vfkze zabdaca
SakraSana SakraSana SakraSana na SakreRASyate aSa karmaRi lyuw BaNgAyAm SakrASanantu tIkzRozRaM mohakft kuzWanASanam balameDAgnidaM SlezmadozahAri rasAyanam rAjava
SakrabIja SakrabIja SakrabIja na Sakrasya kuwajasya bIjam indrayave rAjani
SakraparyAya SakraparyAya SakraparyAya puM Sakrasya paryAyo nAma nAma yasya maDyapadalopaH kuwajavfkze ratnamAlA ta indrasya vAcakaSabde ca
SakraparyyAya SakraparyyAya SakraparyyAya pu Sakrasya paryyAyo nAma nAma yasya maDyapadalopaH kuwajavfkze ratnamAlA ta indrasya vAcakaSabde ca
SakravIja SakravIja SakravIja na Sakrasya kuwajasya vIjam indrayave rAjani
Sakvara Sakvara Sakvara puM Saka kvip kf ac karma Saka kvarap vA vfze medi caturdaSAkzarapAdake CAndoBede nadIBede meKalAyAYca strI NIp aNgulO si kO pfzo SarkarItyapi caturdaSAkzarapAdake Candasi

SalaNga SalaNga SalaNga puM Sala aNgac lokapAle lavaRaBede uRAdi
SarAli SarAli SarAli strI Saramanulakzya awati awa in pfzowasya qo lovA SarAla pakziBede amaraH
SarAqi SarAqi SarAqi strI Saramanulakzya awati awa in pfzowasya qo lovA SarAla pakziBede amaraH

SatahnadA SatahnadA SatahnadA strI SataM hrAdAH SabdAyasyAH pfzo hrasvaH vidyuti amaraH vajre medi dakzakanyABede vahnipu

SavaraloDra SavaraloDra SavaraloDra pu SavarapriyaH loDraH SyetaloDre ratnamA
Sevala Sevala Sevala na SI vic taTABUtaH san valate vala ac SEvAle SeolA Sabdaca
Sevalu Sevalu Sevalu na SI vic taTABUtaH san valate bala ac SEvAle SeAMlA Sabdaca
SfNKalaka SfNKalaka SfNKalaka puMstrI SfNKala iva kAyati kE ka uzwre rAjani striyAM jAtitvAt NIz svArTe ka SfNKalaSabdArTe

SiKaRWin SiKaRWin SiKaRWin puM SiKaRqo styasya ini mayUre drupadarAjasya putraBede medi mayUrapucCe kukkuwe vARe ca hemaca KuYjAyAM svarRayUTikAyAM rAjani vizRO vizRu sa yUTikAyAM strI NIp Bedi
SiKaRqin SiKaRqin SiKaRqin pu SiKaRqo styasya ini mayUre drupada rAjasya putraBede medi mayUrapucCe kukkawe vARe ca hemaca druYjAyAM svarRayaTikAyAM rAjani vizRO vizRu sa yUTikAyAM strI NIp medi
SiKarin SiKarin SiKarin pu SiKA styasya ini parvate vfkze apA mArme medi kowwe koyazwO hemaca vandAke ku nduruke yAvavAle karkawaSfNgyAM rAjani rasA lAyAM KAdyaBede strI saptadaSAkzarapAdake CandIBede strI rasErudrESCinnA yamananaBalA gaH SiKariRI vf ra mallikAyAM romAvalyAM nArIratne ca strI medi sarvatra NIp
SiKirin SiKirin SiKirin puM SiKA styasya ini parvate vfkze apAmArge medi kOwwe koyazwO hemaca vandAke kunduruke yAvanAle karkawaSfNgyAM rAjani rasAlAyAM KAdyaBede strI saptadaSAkzarapAdake CandoBede strI rasErudrESCinnA yamananaBalA gaH SiKariRO vf ra mallikAyAM romAvalyAM nArIratne ca strI medi sarvatra NIp
SiSupAlA SiSupAlA SiSupAlA puM cedideSIyarAjaBede damaGozAtmaje trikA
SiSupAla SiSupAla SiSupAla pu cedideSIyarAjaBede damaGozAtmaje trikA
SikzitAkzara SikzitAkzara SikzitAkzara puM SikzitAnyakzarARi yena CAtre SikzAdAtari gurO ca trikA
SikzitAkzasa SikzitAkzasa SikzitAkzasa pu SikzitAnyakzarARi yena CAtre SikzAdAtari gurO ca trikA
SilapaSAlA SilapaSAlA SilapaSAlA strI ta citrakarAdInAM citrakaraRagfhe amaraH
SiloYCa SiloYCa SiloYCa pu SilenoYCa uCi GaY upAttaSasyAt kzetrAt SezAvacayane
SilocCa SilocCa SilocCa puM SilenoYCaH uCi GaY upAttaSasyAt kzetrAt SezAvacayane
SilpaSAlA SilpaSAlA SilpaSAlA strI ta citrakarAdonAM citrakaraRagfhe amaraH
SimbA SimbA Si si mbA strI SAmyati samati vA Sama sama vA vA qambac pfzo CinI KyAte padArTe Sabdaca cakra marde pu Sabdaca
SimyA SimyA Si si myA strI SAmyati samati vA Sama sama vA bAqambac pfzo CimI KyAte padArTe Sabdaca cakramarde puM Sabdaca
SirAla SirAla SirAla na Siro styasya lac karmaraNge Sabdaca tat Palamya SirAyuktatvAttaTAtvam SirAyukte tri
Siromarman Siromarman Siromarman puM Sirasi marma yasya SUkare hemaca
Siromarmman Siromarmman Siromarmman pu Sirasi marma yasya SUkare hemaca
SivaDarma SivaDarma SivaDarma na Sivasya tadupAsanArTo Darmo yatra upapurARaBede caturTaM SivaDarmAKyaM sAkzAnnandoSaBAzitam kUrmapuM
SivaDarmma SivaDarmma SivaDarmma na Sivasya tadupAsanArTo Darmo yatra upapurARaBede caturTaM SivaDarmArayaM sAkzAnnandASaBAzitam kUrmapu
SivaGarmaja SivaGarmaja SivaGarmaja SivaGarmAjjAyate jana qa maNgalagrahe purA dakzivinASAya kupitasya triSUliniH apatat BImavaktrasya svedavindurlalAwajaH ityAdinA vIraBadrotpattimuktvA tasyEva maNgalagraharUpatAmAha SAntipradAnAt sarvezAM grahARAM praTamo Bava prekzizyanto janAH pUjAM karizyanti mataM mama aNgAraka iti KyAtiM gamizyati DarAtmaja matsyapuM a
SivaGarmmaja SivaGarmmaja SivaGarmmaja SivaGarmAjjAyate jana qa maNgalagrahe purA dakzavinASAya kupitasya triSUlinaH apatat mImavaktrasya svedavindurlalAwajaH ityAdinA vIraBadrot vattimuktvA tasyEva maNgalagraharUpatAmAha SAntipradAnAt sarvezAM grahARAM praTamo Bava prekzizyanto janAH pUjAM karizyanti mataM mama aNgAraka iti KyAtiM gamizyati DarAtmaja matsyapu a
SivabIja SivabIja SivabIja na ta pArade rAjani SivavIryAdayo pyatra Sivasya Sukre ca
SivavIja SivavIja SivavIja na ta pArade rAjani SivavIryyAdayo pyatra Sivasya Sukre ca
SlezmAta SlezmAta SlezmAta pu SlezmaRA atati ata ac SlezmAtakavfkze Sabdara
SlezmAtra SlezmAtra SlezmAtra puM lezmaRA atati ata ac SlezmAtakavfkze Sabdara
SoDanIbIja SoDanIbIja SoDanIbIja na ta jayapAle rAjani
SoDanIvIja SoDanIvIja SoDanIvIja na ta jayapAle rAjani

SowIrya SowIrya SowIrya na SuwIrasya BAvaH yat vIrye Sabdaca SOwIrya ityeva pAWaH sADuH
SowIryya SowIryya SowIryya na SuwIrasya BAvaH yat vIryye Sabdaca SOwIryya ityeva pAWaH sADuH
SrInivAma SrInivAma SrInivAma pu nivasAyasmin ni vasa GaY ta vizRO tri ta Sriya Alaye ca
SrInivAsa SrInivAsa SrInivAsa puM nivasatyasmin ni vasa GaY ta vizRO tri ta Sriya Alate ca
Sruda Sruda Sruda pu SrUyate ka yAge jadA SrutivihitatvAt tasya taTAtvam
SrutakIrtti SrutakIrtti SrutakIrtti strI kuSaDvajakanyAyAM SatruGnapatnyAm SrutA viKyAtA kIrttirasya viKyAtayaSaske tri

Sruttva Sruttva Sruda puM SrUyate ka yagne jawA sutivihitatvAt yasya taTAtvam
SuNgAkarman SuNgAkarman SuNgAkarman na SudgeH vawapallavEH A samyak karma yatra garBamAtrasaMskAraBede puMsavane candranAmA SuNgAkarmaRi SoBanaH ti ta
SuNgAkarmman SuNgAkarmman SuNgAkarmman na SuNgEH vawapallavEH A samyak karma yatra Page b garBamAtrasaMskAraBede puMsavane candranAmA SuNgAkarmaRi SIBanaH ti ta

Suklakarmman Suklakarmman Suklakarmman tri SuklaM SudDaM karma yasya pavitre SuBacaritre jawA

SvEtya SvEtya SvEtya na Svetasya BAvaH zyaY SuBravarRe

SvaSuryya SvaSuryya SvaSuryya pu SvaSurasyApatyam yat devare SyAle ca amaraH

SyAmAmlI SyAmAmlI SyAmAmlI strI karma nIlAmlIkupe rAjani
SyAmAmlo SyAmAmlo SyAmAmlo strI karma nIlAmlIkzupe rAjani
SyomAka SyomAka Syo RA mAka pu Sye onA RA ka SoRA kzupeBede SyonAko dIpanaH pAke kawukastuvaro himaH grAhI tikto nimalezmapittakAsAmanASanaH kawu tasya PalaM bAlaM rukzaM vAtakaPApaham hfdyaM kazAyaM maDuraM rocanaM laGu dIpanam gulmArSaHkfmihft proktaM guruvAtaprako paRam BAvapra
SyonAka SyonAka Syo RA nAka puM Sye onA RA ka SoRA kzupeBede SyonAko dIpanaH pAke kawukastuvaro himaH grAhI tikto nilaSlezmapittakAsAmanASanaH kawu tasya PalaM bAlaM rUkzaM vAtakaPApaham hfdyaM kazAyaM maDuraM rocanaM laGu dIpanam gulmArSaHkfmihft proktaM guruvAtaprakopaRam BAvapra
Ta Ta Ta TakAraH tavargIyadvitIyavarRRo vyaYjanavarRaviSezaH asyo ccAraRasTAnam dantamUlaM tasvIccAraRe dantamUlena saha jihvAgrasyasparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH ataevAsya sparSavarRatA bAhyaprayatnAstu vivAraSvAsAGIzAmahAprARaSca asya vAcakaSabdA varRABiDAne uktA yaTA TastrivAsI mahAgranTirgranTigrAho BayAnakaH SilI Sirasijo dantI BadrakAlI SiloccayaH kfzRo budDirvikarRA ca dakziRASADipo maraH varadA BogadA keSo vAmajaNGA laso nalaH nojjayinI pfTurguhyaH Saraccandro vidArakaH mAtfkAnyAse asya vAmajaNGAyAM nyAsaH asyADizWAtfdevIDye yarUpaM yaTA nIlavarRAM trinayanAM zaqBujAM varadAM parAm pItavastraparIDAnAM sadA sidDipradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA TakArantu tanmantra daSaDA japet paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA taruRAdityaSaNkASaM TakAraM praRamAmyaham asya svarUpaM yaTA TakAraM caYcalApANgi kuRqalI mokza rUpiRI triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM sadA paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA taruRAditya SaNkASaM jakAraM praRamAmyaham kAmaDenutantram kA vyAdO asyaM prAkprayoge yudDaM Palam Tastu yudDam vf ra wIko kteH Ta pu Tuqa Turva vA qa parvate BayatrAyake tri maNgale Baye rakzaRe na medi Ta TakAraH tavargIyadvitIyavarRRo vyaYjanavarRaviSezaH asyo ccAraRasTAnam dantamUlaM tasvIccAraRe dantamUlena saha jihvAgrasyasparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH ataevAsya sparSavarRatA bAhyaprayatnAstu vivAraSvAsAGIzAmahAprARaSca asya vAcakaSabdA varRABiDAne uktA yaTA TastrivAsI mahAgranTirgranTigrAho BayAnakaH SilI Sirasijo dantI BadrakAlI SiloccayaH kfzRo budDirvikarRA ca dakziRASADipo maraH varadA BogadA keSo vAmajaNGA laso nalaH nojjayinI pfTurguhyaH Saraccandro vidArakaH mAtfkAnyAse asya vAmajaNGAyAM nyAsaH asyADizWAtfdevIDye yarUpaM yaTA nIlavarRAM trinayanAM zaqBujAM varadAM parAm pItavastraparIDAnAM sadA sidDipradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA TakArantu tanmantra daSaDA japet paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA taruRAdityaSaNkASaM TakAraM praRamAmyaham asya svarUpaM yaTA TakAraM caYcalApANgi kuRqalI mokza rUpiRI triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM sadA paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA taruRAditya SaNkASaM jakAraM praRamAmyaham kAmaDenutantram kA vyAdO asyaM prAkprayoge yudDaM Palam Tastu yudDam vf ra wIko kteH Ta pu Tuqa Turva vA qa parvate BayatrAyake tri maNgale Baye rakzaRe na medi
U U U UkAraH svaravarRaBedaH ozWajAvupU ityukteH ozWasTA noccAraRIyaH sa ca udAttAnudAttasvaritaBedAt triviDaH dIrGaeva dvAByAM mAtrAkAlAByAmuccAryatvAt tasya plutatvo ktiScintyA trimAtrakAlasyEva plutatvAt vyaYjakAkAraBedAcca plutasya pArSvasTatryaNkacihnitahrasvAkAreREva leKanasamAcA rAt triviDo pi anunAsikAnanunAsikaBedAt dviDA tena zaqviDaH tasyoccAraRe vivAra AntaraprayatnaH svarA RAmUzRaRAYcEva vivftaM karaRaM smftam SikzokteH vivf taYca jihvAgrAdeH sparSABAvaH aco spfzwAyaRastvIzat nemaspfzwAH SalaH smftAH iti SikzokteH tasya tantre SuklAdyAkAratayA DyeyatoktA yaTA SuklakundasamAkAra UkAraH parakuRqalI kAmaDenutantram tasya vAmakarRe savindu katayA nirvandukatayA vA mAtfkAnyAse nyAsaH ataeva vAmakarRaSabdena tasyABiDeyatA ISAnaH sendu vAmaSravaRaparigato vIjamanyanmaheSi karpUrastave hUNkArama ntrodDAraH tataH svarUpe kArapratyayaH tapratyayaSca aDikaM svaravarRRasamAptO vakzyate U avya veY kvip samboDane vAkyAramBe dayAyAM rakzAyAYca medi uYaH sTAne itO pare anunAsika Uz U iti AdeSe tadarTe tasya pragfhyatvAditO na sanDiH U pu avatIti ava kvip UW mahAdeve candre ca pAlake tri SabdaratnA U UHkaRwakoratiH SAntiH kroDanomaDusUdanaH kAmaH rAjakujeSaSca maheSovAmakarRakaH arGoSIBEravaH sUkzmo dIrGazoRA sarasvatI vilAsinI viGnakarttA lakzaRo rUpakarziRI mahAvidyeSvarI zazWI zaRqoBUHkAnya kubjakaH U SaNKakundasamAkAramUkAraM parakuRqalIm paYcaprARa mayaM varRaM paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARayutaM varRaM pIta vidyullatAM yaTA DarmArTakAmamokzasya sadA suKapradA yakam U UkAraH svaravarRaBedaH ozWajAvupU ityukteH ozWasTA noccAraRIyaH sa ca udAttAnudAttasvaritaBedAt triviDaH dIrGaeva dvAByAM mAtrAkAlAByAmuccAryatvAt tasya plutatvo ktiScintyA trimAtrakAlasyEva plutatvAt vyaYjakAkAraBedAcca plutasya pArSvasTatryaNkacihnitahrasvAkAreREva leKanasamAcA rAt triviDo pi anunAsikAnanunAsikaBedAt dviDA tena zaqviDaH tasyoccAraRe vivAra AntaraprayatnaH svarA RAmUzRaRAYcEva vivftaM karaRaM smftam SikzokteH vivf taYca jihvAgrAdeH sparSABAvaH aco spfzwAyaRastvIzat nemaspfzwAH SalaH smftAH iti SikzokteH tasya tantre SuklAdyAkAratayA DyeyatoktA yaTA SuklakundasamAkAra UkAraH parakuRqalI kAmaDenutantram tasya vAmakarRe savindu katayA nirvandukatayA vA mAtfkAnyAse nyAsaH ataeva vAmakarRaSabdena tasyABiDeyatA ISAnaH sendu vAmaSravaRaparigato vIjamanyanmaheSi karpUrastave hUNkArama ntrodDAraH tataH svarUpe kArapratyayaH tapratyayaSca aDikaM svaravarRRasamAptO vakzyate U avya veY kvip samboDane vAkyAramBe dayAyAM rakzAyAYca medi uYaH sTAne itO pare anunAsika U iti AdeSe tadarTe tasya pragfhyatvAditO na sanDiH U pu avatIti ava kvip UW mahAdeve candre ca pAlake tri SabdaratnA U UHkaRwakoratiH SAntiH kroDanomaDusUdanaH kAmaH rAjakujeSaSca maheSovAmakarRakaH arGoSIBEravaH sUkzmo dIrGazoRA sarasvatI vilAsinI viGnakarttA lakzaRo rUpakarziRI mahAvidyeSvarI zazWI zaRqoBUHkAnya kubjakaH U SaNKakundasamAkAramUkAraM parakuRqalIm paYcaprARa mayaM varRaM paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARayutaM varRaM pIta vidyullatAM yaTA DarmArTakAmamokzasya sadA suKapradA yakam
UDar UDar UDar na UDas pf sasya raH strIgavyAdeH UGasi meQa UDarnalagnA jarante f
UDara UDara UDara na UDas pf sasyaraH strIgavyAdeH UGasi meQa UDarnalagnA jarante f
UrRAstuka UrRAstuka UrRAstuka tri astIti viBaktipratirUpavas avyayam UrRAstyatra vA Uka UrRAyukte UrRAyuke keSapakzayorbadDe BavataH ASva gf
UrRAvana UrRAvana UrRAvana tri UrRA astyarTe bA vanac urRAyukte aTAveH imamUrRAyumityUrRAvanaM ityetadvaruRasya nABim Sata brA
UrRAyu UrRAyu UrRAyu tri UrRA astyarTe yus sittvAt BatvABAvena na Ato lopaH UrRAviSizwe haMsamUrRAyuM varuRasya nABim yaju UrRAyumUrRAvantam vedadI ganDarvaBede UrRAyuScitrasenaSca hAhA huhUSca BArata harivaM a bahuBiH saha ganDarvEH prAgAsyata ca tumburuH mahASrutiScitraSirA UrRAyutanayastaTA BA a somadA nAma ganDarvI urRAyuduhitA Bavat rAmAya
UrRRAmaya UrRRAmaya UrRRAmaya UrRRA vikAre mayaw mezaloBavikAre sUtrAdO UrRAmayaM kOtukahastasUtram kumA
UrRRAstuka UrRRAstuka UrRRAstuka tri astIti viBaktipratirUpavas avyAvam UrRRAstyatra bA Uka UrRRAyukte UrRRAstuke keSapa kzayorbadDe BavataH ASva gf
UrRRAvana UrRRAvana UrRRAvana tri UrRRA astyarTe bA vanac urRRAyukte a TAveH imamUrRRAyumityUrRRAvanaM ityetadvaruRasya nABim Sata brA
UrRRAyu UrRRAyu UrRRAyu tri UrRRA astyarTe yus sittvAt BatvABAvena na Ato lopaH UrRRAviSizwe haMsamUrRRAyuM varuRasya nABim yaju UrRRAyumUrRAvantam vedadI ganDarvaBede UrRRAyuScitrasenaSca hAhA huhUSca BArata harivaM a bahuBiH saha ganDarvEH prAgAsvata ca tumbaruH mahASrutiScitraSirA UrRRAyutanayastaTA BA a somadA nAma ganDarvI urRRAyudu hatA Bavat rAmAya
UrRRa UrRRa UrRRa na UrRA astyasya kAraRatvena arSa ac mezalomara citavastrAdO UrRRaYca rANkavaM cEva kIwajaM pawwajaM taTA kuwIkftaM taTEvAtra kamalAnAM sahasraSaH SlakzRaM vastramakArpAsamAvikaM mfdu cAjinam BA sa a mezalomni strI mANgalyorRAvalayini puraH pAvakasyocCiKasya raGuH kArpAsakIwajorRAnAM dviSa PEkaSaPasya ca manuH lalAwasTacihnaBede urRRASabde udA sa ca cakravarttitvasUcakaH BrUdvayamaDyagata mfRAlatantusUkzmAMSuniBaH praSastAyataH naralakzaRaSabde vakzyate
UrRRamradas UrRRamradas UrRRamradas tri UrRRamiva UrRRAnirmmitavastramiva mradIyaH atiSayena mfdu vede mradIyas ni IyasorIyolopaH UrRatulyAtimfdO UrRRamradA yuvatirdakziRAvataH f UrRRamradasaM tvA stfRAmi yaju UrgasyA NgirasyUrRamradA UrjaM mayi Dehi atra mfdutve norRRAyA upamAnatokteH kASmIradeSajasya paSama prasi dDasya Avikalomamra eva UrRRatvaM tasyEvAtimfdutvAt
UrRRanABa UrRRanABa UrRRanABa pu urRRanABavat mAkaqaSA lUtAyAm yastUrRa nABa iva tantuBiH praDAnajEH CA u gotrapravarttake fziBede tataH apatye SivA aR OrRanABa tadapatye puMstrI striyAM NIp tasya pariSIlitodeSaH rAjanyA vuY OrRanABaka tacCIlitadeSe samAsAntaMviDeranitya tvAt kvacit ac na nAcAreRa vinA sfzwirUrRanA Page b BerapIzyate na ca niHsADanaH karttA kaScit sfjati kiYcana SabdA DftavAkyam yaTorRanABiH sfjate gfhRate ca yaTA pfTivyAmozaDayaH samBavanti muRqakopa
UrRRavABi UrRRavABi UrRRavABi pu UrRanABiH pf parokze vA nasya vaH mAkaqasA lUtAyAM yaTorRRavABistantunoccaret Sata brA
UrRRu UrRRu UrRRu AcCAdane adA uBa saka sew UrRROti UrRRoti UrRRutaH UrRuvanti UrRute UrRRuyAt UrRuvIta UrRRotu UrRROtu UrRuhi UrRRutAm OrRROt OrRRot O rRuta OrRRavIt OrRRAvIt OrRRuvIt OrRa rRA rRu vizwa urRRunAva urRRunuvatuH urRRunuvire UrRRu rRa vitA UrRUyAt UrRRu rRu vizIzwa UrRa rRRu vizyati te OrRRu rRa vizyat ta UrRRuvan UrRRuvAnaH UrRRutaH sa dyAmOrRRodantarikzam aTa urRunAva diSaH SastrEH dfzwvorRRavAnAn kakuBo balOGAn BawwiH UrRRanA Page a BiryaTorRute BA sani UrRRunUzati te UrRRunuvizati te UrRRunavizati te apa apasftAvaraRe apIvftA aporRRuvanto asTuH f aporRRuvantaH apagatanirasanavantaH BA aBi ABimuKyena AcCAdane aByUrRRoti yannagnaM Biza kti f A samagAcCAdane indraM somErorRRuta jUrRRavastrEH f pra pracCAdane prOrRRuvan SaravarzeRa tAnapOhInniSAcaraH prorRuvantaM diSovAREH BawwiH vi vigatApavaraRe prakASane savitarvyUrRuze nucInA f vyUrRuse prakASayasi BA
UrRa UrRa UrRa na UrRA astyasya kAraRatvena arSa ac mezalomaracitavastrAdO UrRaYca rANkavaM cEva kIwajaM pawwajaM taTA kuwIkftaM taTEvAtra kamalAnAM sahasraSaH SlakzRaM vastramakArpAsamAvikaM mfdu cAjinam BA sa a mezalonti strI mANgalyorRAvalayini puraH pAvakasyocCisvasya raGuH kArpAsakIwajIrRAnAM dviSaPEkaSaPasya ca manuH lalAwasTacihnaBede urRASabde udA sa ca cakravarttitvasUcakaH BrUdvayamaDyagata mfRAlatantusUkzmAMSuniBaH praSastAyataH naralakzaRaSabde vakzyate
UrRamAya UrRamAya UrRamAya UrRA vikAre mayaw mezalomavikAre sUtrAdO UrRAmayaM kOtukahastasUtram kumA
UrRamradas UrRamradas UrRamradas tri UrRamiva UrRanirmmitavastramiva mradIyaH atiSayena mfdu vede mradIyas ni IyasorIyolopaH UrRatulyAtimfdO UrRamradAyuvatirdakziRAvataH f UrRamradasaM tvA stfRAmi yaju UrgasyANgirasyUrRamradA UrjaM mayi Dehi atra mfdutvenorRAyA upamAnatokteH kASmIradeSajasya paSama prasidDasya Avikalomamra eva UrRatvaM tasyEvAtimfdutvAt
UrRanABa UrRanABa UrRanABa pu urRinABavat BAkaqaSA lUtAyAm yastUrRanAma iva tantuBiH praDAnajEH CA u gotrapravarttake fziBede tataH apatye SivA aR orRanABa tadapatye puMstrI striyAM NIp tasya pariSIlitodeSaH rAjanyA vuY OrRanABaka tacCIlitadeSe samAsAntaviDeranityatvAt kvacit ac na nAcAreRa vinA sfzwirUrRanABerapIzyate na ca niHsADanaH karttA kaScit sfjati kiYcana SabdA DftavAkyam yaTorRanABiH sfjate gfhRate ca yaTA pfTivyAmozaDayaH samBavanti muRqakopa
UrRavABi UrRavABi UrRavABi pu UrRanABiH pf parokze vA nasya vaH mAkaqasA lftAyAM yaTorRavABistantunoccaret Sata brA
UrRu UrRu UrRu AcCAdane adA uBa sew UrROti UrRRoti UrRutaH UrRuvanti UrRute UrRuyAt UrRuvIta UrRotu UrRotu UrRuhi UrRutAm OrROt OrRot OrRuta OrRavIt OrRavIt yOrRuvIt OrRa rRA rRu vizwa urRunAva urRunuvatuH urRunuvire UrRu rRa vitA UrRUyAt UrRu rRu vizIzwa UrRa rRu vizyati te OrRu rRa vizyat ta UrRuvan UrRuvAnaH UrRutaH sadyAmOrRodantarikzam aTa urRunAva diSaH SastrEH dfzworRavAnAn kakuBo balOGAn BawwiH UrRanABiryaTorRute BA sani UrRunUzati te UrRumuvizati te UrRunavizati te apa apasftAvaraRe apIvftA aporRuvanto asTuH f aporRuvantaH apagatanirasanavantaH BA aBi ABimuKyena AcCAdane aByurRoti yannagna Bizakti f A samyagAcCAdane indraM somErorRutaM jIrRavastrEH f pra pracCAdane prOrRuvan SaravarzeRa tAnapOhInniSAcaraH prorRuvantaM diSobAREH BawwiH vi vigatApavaraRe prakASane savitavyUrRuze nucInA f vyUrRuse prakASayasi BA
UrdDaBAga UrdDaBAga UrdDaBAga pu UrdDaH uparisTo BAga ekadeSaH karmma uparitanadeSe tAlvAdizu saBAgezu UrdDaBAge nizpanno judAttaH si kO
UrdDaBAj UrdDaBAj UrdDaBAj tri UrdDaM Bajate Baja Rvi upariBAgasTe UrdDadeSasTe vahniBedaje pu UrdDaBAgUrdDaBAN nAma kaviH prARASritastu yaH BA va a agninAma tatkarmmaBedakaTane
UrdDaTA UrdDaTA UrdDaTA avya udDa vA TAl UrdDaprakAre urdDa ityarTe ca pra SmaSru doDuvadUrDvaTA BUt f
UrdDacaraRa UrdDacaraRa UrdDacaraRa pu UrdDa UrdDasTaH ScaraRo sya tapasviBede UrdDvapAdAdayo pyatra azwapAde SaraBe ca tasyAzwAnAM pAdAnAM maDye caturRAmUrdDasTatvAt taTAtvam
UrdDadaMzwrakeSa UrdDadaMzwrakeSa UrdDadaMzwrakeSa pu urdDadazwrakARAmunnatadaMzwrARAM BUtAnAmISaH mahAdeve namordDadaMzwrakeSAya SuklAyAvatatAya ca vilohitAya DUmrAya nIlagrIvAya vE namaH BA SA a namordDetyatra sEzadASaraTI rAmaH iti vat pAdapUraRAya sanDiH
UrdDadeha UrdDadeha UrdDadeha pu UrdvaH maraRottaraM BAvI dehaH maraRottaraBAvini dehe UrdDadehanimittArTamahaM dAtuM jalAYjalIn rAmA UrdDadehAya sADu UrdDandamAcca dehAcca lokottarapadasya ca kA WaY OrdDadehika maraRottarakarttavye SrAdDAdO tacca karmma smftizu prasidDam OrdDadehikaSabde vivftiH
UrdDadeva UrdDadeva UrdDadeva pu UrdDa ucco devaH paYcameSvare vizRO SabdaratnA
UrdDadfzwi UrdDadfzwi UrdDadfzwi strI UrdDvA BruvormaDyasTA dfzwi upAsanANge yogArTaM BruvorantarAlasTadfzwO UrdDotkziptAdfzwO ca UrdDA dfzwirasya bahu tAdfSadfzwayute UdDotkziptadfzwi yukte ca UrdDvanetrordDadfgAdayo pyatra
UrdDaga UrdDaga UrdDaga tri UrdDvaM gacCati gama qa uparigate BuvA sahozmARamamuYcadUrdDvagam kumA SarAMScASIvizAkArAnUrdDvagAn dIptatejasaH BA va a UrdDagatadehasTavAyukfte rogaBede UrdDvage raktapitte ca SItamamBaH praSasyate suSru tasyordDago nilaH kArSyaM dOrbalyaM pARqagAtratA suSru sarvezAmuparigatatvAt parameSvare pu UrdDvagaH satpaTAcAraH vizRu saha sarvezAmuparitizwannUrdDvagaH SA BA UrdDagatiSAlini DArmmike tri DarmmeRa gamanamUrdDamaDastAdBavatyaDarmmeRa DArmmike tri DarmmeRa gamanamUrdDamaDastAdBavatyaDarmmeRa sAM kA DarmmeRordDvagatyaBiDAnAt DArmmikasya taTAtvam UrdDvagatAdayo pyatra UrdDagatiyukte utTAyini tri
UrdDagapura UrdDagapura UrdDagapura na karma ambarasTapure Kapure hariScandrapure trikA hariScandraSabde tatpuruSyordDatvaM vakzyate tripurAsurapure ca turasyAmbarasyatvamuktam harivaM a yaTA tripuraM puruzavyAGra bfhadDAtusamIritam vikrAmati naBo maDye meGavfndamivotTitam prAkAreRa pravfdDena kAYcanena virAjatA maRiBiSca prakASadBiH sarvaratnESca toraREH baBAse naBaso maDye SrIyA paramayA jvalat ganDarvARAmivodagraM karmmaRA sADitaM purum vAjinaH pakzasaMyuktA vahanti baladarpitAH puraM praBAkaraM SrezWa manoBiH kAmacAriRaH DAvanto hemazARASca vikramEH prARasaMBftEH Ahvayanta ivAkASaM KurEH SazpadalapraBEH vAyuvegasamErvegEH kampayanta ivAmbaram sarvataH samadfSyanta cakzuBirviditAtmaBiH fziBirjvalanapraKyEstapasA dagDakilvizEH gItavAditrabahulaM ganDarvanagaropamam citrAyuDasamAkIrREH prataptakanakapraBEH BavanErbahuvarRESca pAMSuBiH samalaNkftEH devendraBavanAkArEH SuSuBe tanmahAdyuti prAsAdAgrEH pravfdDESca kElAsaSiKarapraBEH SuSuBe dEtyanagaraM bahusUryyamivAmbaram cayAwwAlakasampannaM taptakAYcanasapraBam kzveqitotkuzwabahulaM siMhanAdavinAditam baBO valgujanakIrRaM vanaM cEtraraTaM yaTA samudDatapatAkaM tadasiBiSca virAjitam rarAja tripuraM rAjan mahAvidyudivAmbare
UrdDagati UrdDagati UrdDagati strI UrdDaM gatiH UrdDagamane yaTA jvalanAdeH yaToktaM suSru uzRatIkzmarUkzasvaralaGuviSadaM rUpaguRabahulamIzallavaRaM kawukarasaprAyam viSezataScordDagatisvaBAvamiti tEjasaM samUhanapacanadAraRatApaprakASanapraBAvarRakaramiti UrdDajvalanAdayo pyatra BramaRaM recanaM syandanordDvajvalanameva ca tiryaggamanamapyatra gamanAdeva laByate BAzA prasidDamUrdDajvalanaM havirBujaH mAGaH UrdDagatiSca lAGavAtiSavena Bavati satvasya ca laGutvAmUrdDvagatihetutvamuktam sA kA satvaM laGu prakASakamizwamupazwamBakaYcalaYca rajaH tatra kAryAdgamane heturlAGavaM gOravapratidvandvi yato nnerUrdDajvalanaM Bavati sA kO UrdDaloke svargAdO gamane ca tadDetuSca DarmaH DarmeRa gamanamUrdDamiti sA kA ukteH UrdDvaM gacCanti satvasyAH iti gItokteSca sAtvikaBAvamAtrasyApi taddetutvam UrdDam dehAt utkramaRe UrdDaM gatiryasya UrdDagAminiti
UrdDajAnu UrdDajAnu UrdDajAnu tri UrdDamuccam jAnu yasya uccajAnuke vA kap UrdDajAnuka tadarTe kabaBAvapakze vA jAnunojYuH UrdDajYu tadarTe kzaRamayamasuBUya svapnamUrdDajYureva mAGaH atrArTe UrdDajYaH iti dvirUpakozaH pfzo sADu
UrdDakAya UrdDakAya UrdDakAya puM na UrdDvaM kAyasya ekade ta dehasyordDaBAge
UrdDakeSa UrdDakeSa UrdDakeSa pu UrdDaH keSa iva kuSAgraM yasya UrdDakeSo Baved brahmA lambakeSastu vizwaraH smftyukte kuSamayabrAhmaRe unnatAgrakeSayukte tri striyAM vA NIz
UrdDaketu UrdDaketu UrdDaketu tri UrdDaH UcCritaH keturyasya yatra vA ucCritaDvaje rAjAdO taTABUtapuryyAM strI janakavaMSaje nfpaBede pu UrdDaketuHsanadvAjAdajo Ta purajitsutaH BAga
UrdDanaBas UrdDanaBas UrdDanaBas pu urdDaM naBo yasya naBomaDye varttamAne vAyO svAhAkfte UrdDvanaBasaM mArutaM gacCatam yaja
UrdDandama UrdDandama UrdDandama tri UrdDva dama ac UrdDvasTe trikA tato BavAdyarTe WaY OrdDvandamika tadBavAdO tri
UrdDapAtra UrdDapAtra UrdDapAtra na UrdDvaM netavyaM pAtram yajYapAtre ulUKalAdO sOvarRarajadInAmUrdDapAtragrahASmanAm yAjYa UrdDapAtram yajYiyoluKalAdi grahAdisAhacaryyAt mitA
UrdDapfSni UrdDapfSni UrdDapfSni pu UrdDvAH pfSnayo vindavo sya paSuBede aSvameDe tftIyayUpe banDanIyamArutapaSukIrttane pfSnistiraScInapfSnirUrdDvapfSniste mArutAH yaju
UrdDapuRqra UrdDapuRqra UrdDapuRqra pu UrdDva UrdDvamuKaH puRqraH ikzuyazwiriva lalAwasTe UrdDvamuKe puRqrekzavat reKAtmake tilakaBede tadDAraRe viDinizeDAdikaM nirUpyate UrdDapuRqra mfdA kfryAt tripuRqra BasmanA sadA tilakaM vE dvijaH kuryAccandanena yaddfcCayA SrA ta pu UrdDvapuRqraM dvijaH kuryAt kzatriyastu tripuRqrakam ardDacandrantu vESyaSca varttulaM SudrayonijaH A ta brahmA pu aSucirvApya nAcAro manasA pApamAcaran Sucireva BavennityamUrdDapuRqrANkitonaraH UrdDapuRqraDaro martyo mriyate yatra kutricit SvapAko pi vimAnasTo mama loke mahIyate iti brahmapu tadDAraRe vEdikadvijAtiriktasyEvADikAraH yaToktaM devIBAgavate SrInArAyaRena UrdDapuRqraM triSUlaYca varttulaM caturasrakam ardDacandrAdi vA liNgaM vedanizWo na DArayet janmanA labdajAtistu vedapanTAnamASritaH puRqrAntaraM BramAdvApi lalAwe nEva DArayet KyAti kAntyAdisidDyarTamapi vizRvAgamAdizu sTitaM puRqrAntaraM nEva DArayedvEdiko janaH ni si sUtasaM vizRvAgamAditantrezu dIkzitAnAM viDIyate dvijanmanaH SaNKamfdA yastu kuryyAt taptAyasena vA sa SUdrAdvahiH kAryyaH sarvvasamAddvijacarmmaRaH yaTA SmaSAnajaM kAzWamanarhaM sarvvakarmmasu dvijastu taptaSaNKAdiliNgANkitatanustaTA saMBAzya kOravaM yAti yAvadindrAScaturdaSa vfhannA SivakeSavayoraNgAn SrUlacakrAdikAn dvijaH na DArayeta matimAn vEdike vartmani sTitaH tataSca tripuRqrAdiDAraRaviDAyakavAkyaM vEdiketaradvijavizayam SUdravizayaYca yadapi brAhmaRasya tadDAraRaviDAnam agnihotraM yaTA nityaM vedasyADyayana yaTA brAhmaRasya taTEveha taptamudrAdiDAraRam padmapu brAhmaRaH kzatriyo vESyaH SUdro vA yadi vetaraH maDve ekaH SroRAM SlakzRAM gAM mfdaM gopIcandanAdirUpAM tIrTa nikawasTAM muKyakarmaBUtAM prati udakaM jalaM gORakarma avAjati avagamayati antarBAvitaRyarTo jatiH SroRAM gAma udakena miSrayatItyarTaH SroRAM gAM raktacandanAdirUpAM vA taTA ekaM sUnayA hiMsayA tatkartrA ABftaM AhftaM mAMsagerocanAKyaM piMSati pinazwi udakena saha iti SezaH nimrucaH nitarAmastaM gacCato dagDenDanasyAgneH sambanDi sakft gomayaM SuzkagomayotTaM Basmeti yAvat ApABarat apAhatavAn atrApyudakena saheti SezaH vyavahitASceti Candasi vyavahitenApyupasargeRa kriyAyAH sambanDa hfgrahorBaSCandasIti hasyaBa etAni cinadmIti Urje paSuByaH anumAjrmIti vyAKyAtam evamihApi vAsudevopanizadbrAhmaRatantrapurARoparabfMhaRAnusArAt UrdDapuRqrArTaM SlakzRAM mfdaM jalena miSrayediti vyAKyeyaM taTA kAlAgnirudravfhajjAbAlAdyupanizadbrAhmaRatantrapurARopabfMhaRAnusArAt tripuRqrakarttuH nimrucaH SakfdapABaraditi ca vyAKyeyam evamitarasyApi padasya brAhmaRamantraliNgAdyupabfMhaRe smftiByaScAzwakAprapAvidivadanumeyaM taTAca SoRAmiti padasya raktAmiti vyAKyAne sOraSAktagAReSAnAM raktameva pArTivaM dravyaM puRqrArTe tattattantre viDIyate vEzRavAnAM pItaM SEvAnAM Basmeti anena tattuRqraviSezopalakzitatattaddevatA BajanenApi devatABAvaM prApnuvantIti viDIyate kevala vEdikAnAM tu SroRAM SlakzRAmiti vyAKyAnena tritayasyApi samuccayaH snAtvA puRqa mfdA kuryAt DftvA cEva tu BasmanA devAn viprAn samaByarcya candanena samAcarediti smftiByaH atra gorocanAgrahaRaM candanAdyazwagandopalakzaRArTam etezAM vikalpasamuccayapakzARAM pitfpEtAha paraMparAkrameRa vyavasTAmAha kiM svit putreByaH pitarA vupAvaturiti putrahitArTe yatkiYcidvrataM pitarO mAtA pitarO pitfpitAmahO vA upetya svIkftya avatuH vrataM samyak paripAlayAmAsatuH tadeva tasya SreyaH sADanamityarTaH evaM sati tIrTAni yajYAdayastantramArgeRa sUryyAdyanyatamopAstiH kevalavEdikatA ceti devatABAvapraptisADanAni ityantena SrAdDakarmmaRi tu tripuRqrAdO viDinizeDayorvyavasTAni si uktA yaTA jape home taTA dAne svADyAye pitfkarmaRi tatsarvaM naSyati kzipramUrdDvapuRqravinAkftamiti hemAdrAvukteH yajYodAnaM japo homaH svADyAyaH pitfkarma ca vfTA Bavati viprendrA UrdDvapuRqravinAkftamiti vfhannAradIyAt UrdDvaYca tilakaM kuryyAddEve pitrye ca karmaRIti vfdDaparASarokteSca UrdDapuRqraDAraRaM pEtre vihitam anye tu UrdDvapuRqro dvijAtInAmagnihotrasamo viDiH SrAdDakAle ca saMprApte karttA BoktA ca varjayediti vAmahaste ca ye darBA gfhe raNgabalintaTA lalAwe tilakaM dfzwvA nirASAH pitaro gatAH iti saMgrahokteH UrdDapuRqraM tripuRqraM vA candrAkAramaTApi vA SrAdDakartA na kurvIta yAvat piRqAnna nirvapet iti viSvaprakASe vacanAcca na DAryyamityAhuH atra kulAcArAdeva vyavasTA ata eva bfhannAradIye UrdDvapuRqraYca tulasIM SrAdDe necCanti kecana ityatra kecanetyuktam UrdDvapuRqraviDiH SrAdDaBoktfparaH nizeDaH kartfparaH iti pfTvIcandraH yattu hemAdrO devalaH lalAwe dfRqrakaM vfzwvA skanDe mAlyaM taTEva ca nirASAH pitaro yAnti dfzwvA ca vfzalIpatimiti tadganDatripuRqravizayam prAkpiRqadAnAt ganDAdyErnAlaNkuryyAtsvavigraham ityASvalAyanokteH puRqraM varttulamityaparArke madanaratne ca pfTvIcandrastu puRqra tripuRqram UrdDvaYca tilakaM kuryyAnna kuryyAdvE tripuRqrakam nirASAH pitaro yAnti dfzwvA cEva tripuRqrakamiti vfdDaparASarokteH Boktustiryyaglopo Bavatyeva varjayettilakaM bAle SrAdDakAle ca sarvadA UrdDvapuRqraM tripuRqraM vA DArayettu prayatnataH iti vyAmokterityAha pfTvIcandrodaye brAhmo sahadarBeRa hastena yaH kuryyAttilakaM buDaH Acamya sa viSuDyeta darBatyAgena cEva hi
UrdDarvabarhis UrdDarvabarhis UrdDarvabarhis pu UrdDvaM prAgagraM barhiryezAm somapAKye pitfBede svAhA pitfBya UrdDvabarhirBayaH DarmmapAvaByaH yaju UrdDvabarhirByaH somapAByaH vedadI
UrdDvaBAga UrdDvaBAga UrdDvaBAga pu UrdDvaH uparisToBAga ekadeSaH karmma upa ritanadeSe tAlvAdizu saBAgezu UrdDaBAge nizpanno ju dAttaH si kO

UrdDvabarhis UrdDvabarhis UrdDvabarhis pu UrdDvaM prAgagraM barhiryezAm somapAKye pitf Bede svAhA pitfBya UrdDvabarhirByo DarmmapAvaByaH yaju UrdDvabarhirByaH somapAByaH vedadI
UrdDvabuDna UrdDvabuDna UrdDvabuDna pu UrdDvaM buDnaM Siro sya UrdDaSiraske camase arvAgvilaScamasa UrdDabuDnastasmin yaSo nihitaM viSvarUpam tasyAsataH sapta DIrAH vAgazwamI brahmaRA saMvidAneti arvAgvilaScamasa UrdvabuDna iti tacCiraH eza hyarvAgvilaScamasa UrdDabuDnastasmin yaSonihitaM viSvarUpamiti prARA vE yaSonihita viSvarUpaM prARAnetadAha tasyAsataH fzayaH sapta DIrA iti prARA vA fzayaH prARAnetadAha vf u dehasya camasarUpeRa rUpakamidam arvAgbilaScamasa UrdDabuDnaH idaM tacCiraH camasAkAraM hi tat kaTam eza hyarvAgbilaH muKasya vilarUpatvAt Siraso buDnAkAratvAt UrdDabuDnaH tasmin yaSonihitaM viSvarUpamiti yaTA somaScamase eva tasmin viSvarUpe nAnArUpaM nihitaM Bavati kiM punastadyaSaH prARA vE yaSo viSvarUpam prARAH SrotrAdayaH sapta fzayaH DIrAH Srotredve nAsike dve netre dve rasanA cEketi sapta tezAM parispandAtmakaSbdAdi jYAnahetutvAt fziDAtorgatyarTatayA parispandAtmakavfttimattvam jYAnahetutvena DIratvamiti boDyam
UrdDvabuGna UrdDvabuGna UrdDvabuGna pu UrdDvaM buDnaM Siro sya UrdDaSiraske camase arvAgvilaScamasa UrdDabuDnastasmin yaSonihitaM viSva rUpam tasyAsataH sapta DIrAH vAgazwamI brahmaRA saMvidAneti arvAgvilaScamasa UrdvabuDna iti tacCiraH eza hyarvAgbilaScamasa UrdDabuDnastasmin yaSonihitaM viSva rUpamiti prARA vE yaSonihitaM viSvarUpaM prARAnetadAha tasyAsataH fzaya sapta DorA iti prARA vA fzayaH prA RAnetadAha vf u dehasya casamarUpeRa rUpaka midam arvAgbilaScamasa UrdDabuDnaH ida tacCiraH camasAkAraM hi tat kaTam eza hyarvAgbilaH muKasya vilarUpatvAt SirasobuDnAkAratvAt UrdDabuDnaH tasmin Page b yaSonihitaM viSvarUpamiti yaTA somaScamase eva tasmin Sirasi viSvarUpaM nAnArUpaM nihitaM Bavati kiM punastadyaSaH pARA vE yaSoviSvarUpam prARAH SrotrAdayaH sapta fzayaH DIrAH Srotre dve nAsike dve netre dve rasanA cEketi sapta tezAM parispandAtmakaSabdAdi jYAnahetutvAt fziDAtorgatyarTatayA parispandAtmakavftti mattvam jYAnahetutvena DIratvamiti boDyam
UrdDvacaraRa UrdDvacaraRa UrdDvacaraRa pu UrdDva urdDasTaH ScaraRo sya tapasviBede UrdDvva pAdAdayo pyatra azwapAde SaraBe ca tasyAzwAnAM pAdAnAM maDye caturRRAmUrdDasTatvAt taTAtvam
UrdDvadaMzwrakeSa UrdDvadaMzwrakeSa UrdDvadaMzwrakeSa pu urdDadazwrakARAmunnatadaMzwrARAM BUtAnAmISaH mahA deve namordDadaMzwrakeSAya SuklAyAvatatAya ca vilohitAya DUmrAya nolagrIvAya vE namaH BA SA a namordDe tyatra sEzadASaraTI rAmaH iti vat pAdapUraRAya sanDiH
UrdDvadeha UrdDvadeha UrdDvadeha pu UrdDvaHmaraRottaraM BAvI dehaH maraRottaraBAvini dehe UrdDadehanimittArTamahaM dAtuM jalAYjalIn rAmA UrdDadehAya sADu UrdDandamAcca dehAcca lokottarapadasya ca kA WaY OrdDadehika maraRottarakarttavye SrAdDAdO tacca karmma smftizu prasidDam OrdDadehikaSabde vivftiH
UrdDvadeva UrdDvadeva UrdDvadeva pu UrdDva ucco devaH paYcameSvare vizRO SabdaratnA
UrdDvadfzwi UrdDvadfzwi UrdDvadfzwi strI UrdDvvA BrubormaDyasTA dfzwiH upAsanANge yogArTaM BruvorantarAlasTadfzwO UrdDotkziptadfzwO ca Page b UrdDA dfzwirasya bahu tAdfSadfzwiyute UrdDetkziptadfzwi yukte ca UrdDvanetrordDadfgAdayo pyatra
UrdDvaga UrdDvaga UrdDvaga tri UrdDvvaM gacCati gama qa uparigate BuvA saho dmARamamuYcadUrdDvagam kumA SarAMScASIvizAkArAnUrdDvagAn dIptatejasaH BA va a UrdDagatadehasTa vAyukfte rogaBede UrdDvage raktapitte ca SItamamBaH pra Sasyate suSru tasyordDago nilaH kArSyaM dOrbalyaM pARqu gAtratA suSru sarvezAmuparigatatvAt parameSvare pu UrdDvagaH satpaTAcAraH vizRusaha sarvezAmupari tizwannUrdDvagaH SA BA UrdDagatiSAlini DArmmike tri DarmmeRa gamanamUrdDamaDastAdBavatyaDarmmeRa sAM kA Da rmmeRordDagatyaBiDAnAt DArmmikasya taTAtvam UrdDva gatAdayo pyatra UrdDagatiyukte utTAyini tri
UrdDvagapura UrdDvagapura UrdDvagapura na karma ambarasTapure Kapure hariScandrapure trikA hariScandraSabde tatpurasyordDatvaM vakzyate tri purAsurapure ca tatpurasyAmbarasTatvamuktam harivaM a yaTA tripuraM puruzavyAGra vfhadDAtusamIritam vikrAmati naBomaDye meGavfndamivotTitam prAkAreRa pravfdDena kAYca nena virAjatA maRiBiSca prakASadBiH sarvaratnESca toraREH baBAse naBaso maDye SriyA paramayA jvalat ganDarbARA mivodagraM karmmaRA sADitaM puram vAjinaH pakzasaM yuktA vahanti baladarpitAH puraM praBAkaraM SrezWa ma noBiH kAmacAriRaH DAvanto hezamARASca vikramEH prARasaMBftEH Ahvayanta ivAkASaM KurEH SazpadalapraBEH vAyuvegasamErvegEH kampayanta ivAmbaram sarvataH samadfSyanta cakzurBirviditAtmaBiH fziBirjvalanapraKyEstapasA dagDa kilvizEH gItavAditrabahulaM ganDarvanagaropamam ci trAyuDasamAkIrREH prataptakanakapraBEH BavanErbahuvarRESca pAM SuBiH samalaNkftEH devendraBavanAkArEH SuSuBe tanmahAdyuti prAsAdAgrEH pravfdDESca kElAsaSiKarapraBEH SuSuBe dEtya nagaraM bahusUryyamivAmbaram cayAwwAlakasampannaM tapta kAYcanasapraBam kzveqitotkuzwabahulaM siMhanAdavinA ditam baBO valgujanAkIrRaM vanaM cEtraraTaM yaTA samudDatapatAkaM tadasiBiSca virAjitam rarAja tripuraM rAjan mahAvidyudivAmbare
UrdDvagati UrdDvagati UrdDvagati strI UrdDvaM gatiH UrdDvagamane yaTA jvalanAdeH yaToktaM suSru uzRatIkzRarUkzaKaralaGuviSadaM rUpaguRabahula mIzallavaRaM kawukarasaprAyam viSezataScordDagatisvaBAva miti tEjasaM sasUhanapacanadAraRatApaprakASanapraBAvarRRa karamiti UrdDajvalanAdayo pyatra BramaRaM recanaM syandanordDvajvalanameva ca tiryaggamanamapyatra gamanAdeva laByate BAzA prasidDamUrdDajvalanaM havirBujaH mAGaH UrdDagatiSca lAGavAtiSavena Bavati satvasya ca laGutvAmUrdDva gatihetutvamuktam sA kA satvaM laGu prakASakamizwamu pazwamBakaYcalaYca rajaH tatra kAryodgamane heturlAGavaM gOra vapratidvandvi yato gnerUrdDajvalanaM Bavati sA kO UrdDa loke KargAdO gamane ca tadDetuSca DarmaH DarmeRa gama namUrdDamiti sA kA ukteH UrdDvaM gacCanti satvasTAH iti gItokteSca sAtvikaBAvamAtrasyApi tadDetutvam UrdDam dehAt utkramaRe UrdDaM gatiryasya UrdDagAmiti tri
UrdDvajAnu UrdDvajAnu UrdDvajAnu tri urdDamuccam jAnu yasya uccajAnuke vA kap UrdDajAnuka nadarTe kavaBAvapakze vA jAnunojYuH UrdDajYu tadarTe kzaRamayamamuBUya svapnamUrdDajYureva mAGaH atrArTe UrdDvajYaH iti dvirUpakozaH pfzo sADu
UrdDvakAya UrdDvakAya UrdDvakAya puMna UrdDvvaM kAyasya ekade ta dehasyordDaBAge
UrdDvakeSa UrdDvakeSa UrdDvakeSa pu UrdDvaH keSa iva kuSAgraM yasya UrdDvakeSo Baved brahmA lambakeSastu vizwaraH smftyukte kuSamayabrAhmaRe unna tAgrakeSayukte tri striyAM vA NIz
UrdDvaketu UrdDvaketu UrdDvaketu tri UrdDvaH ucCritaH keturyasya yatra vA UcCrita Dvaje rAjAdO taTABUtapuryyAM strI janakavaMSaje nfpa Bede pu UrdDaketuHsanadvAjAdajo Ta purajitsutaH BAga
UrdDvanaBas UrdDvanaBas UrdDvanaBas pu urdDaM naBoyasya naBomaDye varttamAne vAyO svAhAkfte UrdDvanaBasaM mArutaM gacCatam yaja

UrdDvapuRqra UrdDvapuRqra UrdDvapuRqra pu UrdDva UrdDvamuKaH puRqraH ikzuyazwiriva lalA wasTe UrdDvamuKe puRqrekzavat reKAtmake tilakaBede tadDAraRe viDinizeDAdikaM nirUpyate UrdDapuRqraM mfdA kfryAt tripuRqraM BasmanA sadA tilakaM vE dvijaH kuryAccandanena yaddfcCayA SrA ta pu UrdDvapuRqraM dvijaH kuryAt kzatriyastu tripuRqrakam ardDacandrantu vESyaSca va rttulaM SudrayonijaH A ta brahmA pu aSucirvApya nAcAro manasA pApamAcaran Sucireva Bavennitya mUrdDapuRqrANkitonaraH UrdDapuRqraDaro martyomriyate yatra kutracit SvapAko pi vimAnasTo mama loke mahIyate iti brahmapu tadDAraRe puRqrAntaraM BramAdvApi lalAwe nEva DArayet KyAti kAntyAdisidDyarTamapi vizRvAvagamAdizu sTitaM puRqrA ntaraM nEva GArayedvEdikojanaH ni si sUtasaM vizRvA gamAditantrezu dIkzitAnAM viDIyate pfTvIcandrastu puRqraM tripuRqram UrdDvaYca tilakaM kuryyAnna kuryyAdvE tripuRqrakam nirASAH pitaro yAnti dfzwvA cEva tri puRqrakamiti vfdDaparASarokteH Boktustiryyaglapo Bava tyeva varjayettilakaM BAle SrAdDakAle ca sarvadA UrdDvapuRqraMtripuRqraM vA DArayettu prayatnataH iti vyAso kterityAha pfTvIcandrodaye brAhme sahadarBeRa hastena yaH kuryyAttilakaM buDaH Acamya sa viSuDyeta darBa tyAgena Urjj Urjj Urjj strI Urjja BAve kvip bale karaRe kvip anne na amftarasABiDeye nnasya atyantasAraBUte rasaBede strI viSvedevA yAmUrjjaM madanti f yAsta UrjjastanvaH sambaBUvuH aTa iha pfTivyAH samboDanena tasyAM vikArAnnasUkzmAMSatvamUrjAmuktam sa UrjamupajIvatIti vf u UrjjaM sUkzitiM sUmnam f urgasvANgirasyUrRamnadA urjjaM mayi Dehi yaju Urk annarasarUpA vedadI UrjjaM balaM Dehi ityarTaH annamUlaM balaM puMsAm ityuktoH annarasasya balADAya katvam tamaH samUhAkftimapyaSezAdUrjA jayantaM praTitaprakASAn BawwiH UrjjA balena balamUrjjaYca yacCati manuH atra balorjoBedodEhikamAnasikatvAByAM SArIrikaM balamUrka iti boDyam jale strI UrjjonapAtaM sa hi nAyamasmayuH yaju UrkSabdenApa ucyante adByovfkzAjAyante tato gniH ityagnerappOtratvam vedadI jarjjAMpate pAhi yaju
Urjja Urjja Urjja balADAne jIvane vA adantacu pakze BvA aka tatkaraRe tat karaRe saka sew urjjavat nABayo vAjinamUrjayanti f yo hyebAnnamatti sa prARiti tamUrjjayati tamUrjja yati Sata brA tAM vo Wa Wa Wa WakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH wavargIyaH mUrdDanyaH ardDamAtrA kAloccAryyaH tasyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyena mUrdDasTAnasya sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH vivAraSvAsADozA mahAprARaSca bAhyaprayatnAH mAtfnyAse sya dakzajAnuni nyasyatA varRA BiDAne sya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA WaH SUnyo maYjarI jIvaH pASinI lANgalaM kzamA vanajo nandano jihvA sunandATUrRakaH sadA varttulaH kuRqalo vahniramftaM candra maRqalaH dakzajAnUrUBAvaSca devaBakzo vfhadDvaniH ekapAdo viBUtiSca lalAwaM sarvamitrakaH vfzaGno nalinI vizRurmaheSo grAmaRIH SaSI etadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM yaTA DyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRuzva kamalAnane pUrRacandrapraBAM devIM vikasatpaNkajekzaRAm sundarIM zoqaSaBujAM DarmakAmArTamokzadAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram asya DyeyarUpaM yaTA WakAraM caYcalApANgi kuRqalI mokzarUpIRI pItavidyullatAkAraM sadA triguRa saMyutam paYcdevAtmakaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA trivindusahitaM varRaM triSaktisahitaM sadA iti kAma Denutantram mAtrAvftte sya praTamopanyAse duHKaM Palam JaSabde pramARaM dfSyam Wa pu wa pfzo Sive mahADvanO candramaRqale ekAkzarakozaH ekA kzarakozaH maRqale SUnye lokagocare ca medi SUnyaYcAtra bindurUpavarRaBedaH vindurUpavarRaBedaH smitamuKi tadaDazWadvayam yAjayitvA yojayitvA karpUrastavaH WadvayaM svAhA dviWameva cetyasya vyAKyAyAM dviWaM visargastasya bindudvayAtmakatvAt visargaSabde na vindudvayAtmaktvAt visarga Sabdena ca lakzitalakzaRayA svAhAkAro svAhAkArI lakzyate svAhASabdenEva svA hASabdenEva vahnO tyAgAt tyAgasya ca visargaparTyAyatvAt visargaparyyAya tvAt ityevaM raGunandanAdisampradAyavidaH Wa WakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH wavargIyaH mUrdDanyaH ardDamAtrA kAloccAryyaH tasyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyena mUrdDasTAnasya sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH vivAraSvAsADozA mahAprARaSca bAhyaprayatnAH mAtfnyAse sya dakzajAnuni nyasyatA varRA BiDAne sya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA WaH SUnyo maYjarI jIvaH pASinI lANgalaM kzamA vanajo nandano jihvA sunandATUrRakaH sadA varttulaH kuRqalo vahniramftaM candra maRqalaH dakzajAnUrUBAvaSca devaBakzo vfhadDvaniH ekapAdo viBUtiSca lalAwaM sarvamitrakaH vfzaGno nalinI vizRurmaheSo grAmaRIH SaSI etadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM yaTA DyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRuzva kamalAnane pUrRacandrapraBAM devIM vikasatpaNkajekzaRAm sundarIM zoqaSaBujAM DarmakAmArTamokzadAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram asya DyeyarUpaM yaTA WakAraM caYcalApANgi kuRqalI mokzarUpIRI pItavidyullatAkAraM sadA triguRa saMyutam paYcdevAtmakaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA trivindusahitaM varRaM triSaktisahitaM sadA iti kAma Denutantram mAtrAvftte sya praTamopanyAse duHKaM Palam JaSabde pramARaM dfSyam Wa pu wa pfzo Sive mahADvanO candramaRqale ekA kzarakozaH maRqale SUnye lokagocare ca medi SUnyaYcAtra vindurUpavarRaBedaH smitamuKi tadaDazWadvayam yojayitvA karpUrastavaH WadvayaM svAhA dviWameva cetyasya vyAKyAyAM dviWaM visargastasya vindudvayAtmaktvAt visarga Sabdena ca lakzitalakzaRayA svAhAkArI lakzyate svA hASabdenEva vahnO tyAgAt tyAgasya ca visargaparyyAya tvAt ityevaM raGunandanAdisampradAyavidaH
X X X XkAraH tantramate mugDaboDamate ca svaravarRRaBEdaH pA mate tasya dIrGatvaM nAsti tena udAttAnudAttasvarita BedAt anu nAsikAnunAsikaBedAcca zaqviDaH atredaM boDyam x varRRasya dIrGatvABAve pi xti XvA vArtti ukteH lakA radvayayuta xvarRRaeva tatra viDeyaH tatra lakAradvayarUpavya Yjanadvayasya ekA mAtrA acaScAparA iti dvimAtratvaM tena hoXkAraH ityAdO dIrGatvavyavahAraH mugDaboDe xtraya mityuktirapi ekamAtradvimAtratrimAtratvaBedApekzayA tena na viroDaH ataeva SikzAyAM duspuzwaSceti vijYeya xkAraH plutaeva veti fkAraxkArayoH duHspfzwatvoktiH duHspfzwatvaYca IzatspfzwatvaM tasya rakAralakArAditve eva samBavati aco spfzwAyaRastvIzannemaspfzwAHSalastaTA SikzARAM yavaralAnAmIzatspfzwatvokteH tena fkAra xkArayorIzatspfzwatvAt duHspfzwatvam evaM sarvasAmaYjasye xvarRasya na dIrGatvakalpanamiti sUkzmamIkzaRIyam asya ca lakAradvayaGawitatvAt dantyatA ante ca svaravarRayogAt aspfzwatvam tasya ca udAttAdiBedEH zaqviDatvamapi mAtfkAnyASe ca tasya vAmagaRqe nyasyatA tena tacCabdenA pyasyABiDAnam kAmaDenutantre tasya DyeyasvarUpamuktam yaTA XkAraM parameSAni pUrRacandrasamapraBam paYcadevA tmakaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM taTA fRatrayAtmakaM varRaM taTAvindutrayAtmakam caturvargapradaM devi DyAyet parama kuRqalIm X avya f rasya laH devanAryAm dEtyastriyAm danu jamAtari kAmaDenumAtari ca strI ekAkzarakozaH mahAdeve pu ekAkzarakozaH iti vAcaspatye XkArAdiSabdArTasaNkalagah X XkAraH kamalAkarzI hfzIkeSomaDuvrataH sUkzmA kAnti rvAmagaRqorudraHkAmodarI SuBA daSamI susTiromAtA nIlapItogajAnanaH kAminI viSvapaH kAlonityaSudDaH SuciH kftI sUryyoDEryyAkarziRI ca ekAkzI danujaprasUH ekArAdInAM vAcakA tattacCabde uktA ezAmaDizWAtfdeva tASca tatrEvoktA yaTA akAre BIzaRA kIrttirvidyujji hveti kIrttitA AkAre tAmasI kAlajihvAgrA kAla BEravI ikAre gajinI caRqA jYeyA rudraBayaNkarI IkAre sUcinI KyAtA caRqIgrA DUmraBEravI ukAre kAlaraktAKyA pracaRqA caRqavallaBA vidyA hyUkAragA proktA tAlajaNGA kapAlinI fkAre kAlikA devI pitfkAlo BayaNkaro fkAre syAnmahArIdrI jvAlinI yo ginItyapi saMhAriRI xkAre syAnmeGanAdogravAsinI rudracaRqA kAlarAtrI XkAre ca kapAlinI ekA rAdInamaDizWAtfdevatASca ekArAdiSabdAnAmAdO darSitAH akArAdInA DyeyarUpaYca kAmaDenutantre darSitaM yaTA X XkAraM parameSAni pUrRacandrasamapraBam paYcadevAtmakaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA guRatrayAtmakaM varRaM taTA vindu trayAtmakam caturbbargapradaM devi svayaM paramakuRqalIm ekArAdInAM DyeyarUpARyekArAdiSabdezu uktAni iti vAcaspatye svaraviBAgAdi vyaYjanavarRRaviBAgAdi vyaYjanavarRRAH triviDAH sparSAntasTozmaBadAt tatra kAdayo mAvasAnAH sparSAH yaralavA udAttAdisvaravattvAcca svarABiDeyatA acaH svayaM virAjante ityukteH udAttamanudAttaYca svaritaYca svarAstrayaH hrasvodIrGaH plutaSceti kAlato ni yamA aci iti cokteH tatra hrasvasya saMvftatA saMvftaM karaRaM smftam ityekavAkyatvAt ete ca sTAnaprayatnAH savarRasaMjYAyAmupayuktAH bAhyaprayatnAstu AntaratamyaparI kzAyAmevopayoginEti tulyAsyaprayatnaM savarRamiti pA sUtraBAzyAdO spazwam tena vargIyapraTamatftIyapaYcamavarRAH pUrvvoktAH praTama tftIyavargajAtayamASca yaRaH yaralavAH ete alpaprARA stadBikAH sarvve mahAprARAH iti vivekaH tadevaM parasparaviBAjakErbAhyAByantaraprayatnEH Ya Ya Ya YakArovyaYjanavarRRaBedaH ardDamAtrAkAlenoccAryyaH tasyo tpattisTAnaM nAsikAnugatatAlusTAnam tasyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyena tAlumaDyasya sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH saMvAranAdaGozA alpaprARaSca bAhyaprayatnAH mAtfkA nyAse sya vAmahastANgulyagre nyAsyatA varRABiDAne sya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA YakAro boDanI viSvAkuRqalI maKadoviyat kOmArI nAgavijYAnI savyANgalanaKo vakaH sarveSaScUrRito budDiH svargAtmA GarzaraDvaniH DarmEkapAdaH sumuKo virajA candaneSvarI gAyanaH puzpaDanvA ca vAgAtmA ca virakziRI etadaDizWAtfdevIDyeyarUpaM yaTA catu rBujAM DUmravarRAM kfzRAmbaraviBUzitAm nAnAlaNkAra saMyuktAM jawAmukuwarAjitAm IzadDAsyamuKIM nityAM varadAM BaktavatsalAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram asyasvarUpaM yaTA sadA ISvara saMyuktaM YakAraM SfRu sundari raktavidyullatAkAraM yA svayaM parakuRqalI paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM sadA kAmaDenu tantram tasya mAtrAvftte praTamopanyAse maraRaM Palam JaSabde pramARaM dfSyam Ya pu gAyane GarGaraDvanO DarDaraDvanO ekAkzarako vfze Sukre vAmamatO ca medi Ya YakArovyaYjanavarRRaBedaH ardDamAtrAkAlenoccAryyaH tasyo tpattisTAnaM nAsikAnugatatAlusTAnam tasyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyena tAlumaDyasya sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH saMvAranAdaGozA alpaprARaSca bAhyaprayatnAH mAtfkA nyAse sya vAmahastANgulyagre nyAsyatA varRABiDAne sya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA YakAro boDanI viSvAkuRqalI maKadoviyat kOmArI nAgavijYAnI savyANgalanaKo vakaH sarveSaScUrRito budDiH svargAtmA GarzaraDvaniH DarmEkapAdaH sumuKo virajA candaneSvarI gAyanaH puzpaDanvA ca vAgAtmA ca virakziRI etadaDizWAtfdevIDyeyarUpaM yaTA catu rBujAM DUmravarRAM kfzRAmbaraviBUzitAm nAnAlaNkAra saMyuktAM jawAmukuwarAjitAm IzadDAsyamuKIM nityAM varadAM BaktavatsalAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram asyasvarUpaM yaTA sadA ISvara saMyuktaM YakAraM SfRu sundari raktavidyullatAkAraM yA svayaM parakuRqalI paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM sadA kAmaDenu tantram tasya mAtrAvftte praTamopanyAse maraRaM Palam JaSabde pramARaM dfSyam Ya pu gAyane DarDaraDvanO ekAkzarako vfze Sukre vAmamatO ca medi
a a a pu avati rakzati atati sAtatyena sAtatyetra tizWatIti vA ava ata vA qa vizRO akAro vizRuruddizwa ukArastu akArovizRuruddizwOkArastu maheSvaraH makArastu smfto brahmA smftobrahmA praRavastu trayAtmaka iti asya vizRoH apatyam ata iY iH kAmaH asya vizRoH patnI NIp I lakzmI lakzmIH a avya ava prIRanAdO qa svarAdipAWAdavyayatvam aBAve pratizeDe pratizeGe svalpe rTe anukampAyAM samboDane a ananta aDikzepe a pacasi tvaM jAlma upasargasvaraviBaktipratirUpakASceti upasargasvaraviBakti pratirUpakASceti svarAdigaRasUtre a iti sidDAntakOmudyAmudAhftaM sidDAnta kOmudyAmudAhftaM manoramAyAYca a samboDane saMboDane aDikzepe nizeDe ceti vyAKyAtam aBAve nahyanona ityamarawIkAyAM ityamara wIkAyAM naYAdeSo yamityuktam sa ca AdeSaH naKanamucyAdiBinnaSabdaGawake naKanamucyA diBinnaSabdaGawake uttarapadasTe halAdO Sabde pare Bavati sa tu naYarTe eva sTAnitulyArTakatvAdAdeSasya naYarTASca tatsAdfSyamaBAvaSca tadanyatvaM tadalpatA aprASastyaM viroDaSca naYarTAH zaw prakIrttitAH ityukteH zaqviDAH tatra abrAhmaRaityAdO brAhmaRasAdfSyavattvena kzatriyAdInAM abrAhmaREtyAdO brAhmaRasAdfSya vattvena kzattriyAdInAM boDakatA aGawamityAdO GawABAvasya apawa ityAdO GawA BAvasya apawEtyAdO pawaBinnasya anudarA kanyetyAdO alpodaratvasya apaSavo vE anye go SveByaityAdO gavASvaBinnapaSUnAmaprASastyasya SveByEtyAdO gavASva BinnapaSUnAmaprASastyasya asuraH asita ityAdO asitEtyAdO ca surasitaviroDasya surasita viroDasya boDakatA tatrAyaM viSezaH naYaH sarvvatra aBAve Bede ca SaktiH sAdfSyAdO sAdfSyodO tu nirUQalakzaRA tatra aGawamityAdO aGawa mityAdO avyayIBAve aDana ityAdO bahuvrIhO BAvakfdantottarapadake BAva kfdantottarapadake aBedaH ajYAnamityAdO naYtatpuruze ca aBAvaboDakatA BAvakfdantaBinnottarapadanaYtatpuruze tu aGawa ityAdO BinnatvaboDakateti atredaM boDyam samAse halAdO haladO uttarapade naYaH sTAne a ityAdeSaviDAnena samAsa evAsya samAsaevAsya naYarTakasya a ityasya Etyasya prayogaH nAnyaTA samboDanAdyarTakasya sambo Page b DanAdyarTakasya tu pfTakprayogaH kintu naYo nalopastiNi naYonalopastiNi kzepe iti vArttikena tiNantapade pare pi naYAdeSasya viDAnAt viDA nAt tasyEva pfTakprayogaH aDikaM naYSabdArTAvasare vakzyate ajIvanirityAdO aDikzepArTakatA ajasramityAdO upa sa tasya ca kriyAyogAt pratizeDArTakatA pratiyeDArTakatA a aHSrIkaRWaH sureSaSca lalAwaM cEkamAtfkaH pUrRo darI sfzwimezO sAraKatapriyaMvadaH mahAbrAhmI vAsudevo DaneSaH keSavo mftam kIrttirnivfttirvAgISo narakA rirharomarut brahmA rAmAnujohrasva kAmaSca praRavAdyakaH brahmARI kAmarUpaSca kAmeSIvAsinI viyat viSveSaH SrIvizRukaRWO pratipattiTiraSvinI arkamaRqalaM varRAdyo brAhmaRaH kAmakarziRI a SfRu tattvamakArasya atigopyaMvarAnane Sarac candrapratIkASaM paYcakoSamayaM sadA paYcadevamayaM varRaM Saktitrayasamanvitam nirguRaM triguRopetaM svayaM kEva lyamUrttimat vindutattvamayaM varRaM svayaMprakftirUpakam a pu avati rakzati atati sAtatyetra tizWatIti vA ava ata vA qa vizRO akArovizRuruddizwOkArastu maheSvaraH makArastu smftobrahmA praRavastu trayAtmaka iti asya vizRoH apatyam ata iY iH kAmaH asya vizRoH patnI NIp I lakzmIH a avya ava prIRanAdO qa svarAdipAWAdavyayatvam aBAve pratizeGe svalpe rTe anukampAyAM samboDane a ananta aDikzepe a pacasi tvaM jAlma upasargasvaraviBakti pratirUpakASceti svarAdigaRasUtre a iti sidDAnta kOmudyAmudAhftaM manoramAyAYca a saMboDane aDikzepe nizeDe ceti vyAKyAtam aBAve nahyanona ityamara wIkAyAM naYAdeSo yamityuktam sa ca AdeSaH naKanamucyA diBinnaSabdaGawake uttarapadasTe halAdO Sabde pare Bavati sa tu naYarTe eva sTAnitulyArTakatvAdAdeSasya naYarTASca tatsAdfSyamaBAvaSca tadanyatvaM pfTakprayogaH kintu naYonalopastiNi kzepe iti vArttikena tiNantapade pare pi naYAdeSasya viDA nAt tasyEva pfTakprayogaH aDikaM naYSabdArTAvasare vakzyate ajIvanirityAdO aDikzepArTakatA ajasramityAdO upa sa tasya ca kriyAyogAt pratiyeDArTakatA a aHSrIkaRWaH sureSaSca lalAwaM cEkamAtfkaH pUrRo darI sfzwimezO sAraKatapriyaMvadaH mahAbrAhmI vAsudevo DaneSaH keSavo mftam kIrttirnivfttirvAgISo narakA rirharomarut brahmA rAmAnujohrasva kAmaSca praRavAdyakaH brahmARI kAmarUpaSca kAmeSIvAsinI viyat viSveSaH SrIvizRukaRWO pratipattiTiraSvinI arkamaRqalaM varRAdyo brAhmaRaH kAmakarziRI a SfRu aBIrupatrI aBIrupatrI aBIrupatrI strI na BIrURi asaMkucitatvAt patrARyasyAH jAtO NIp SatamUlyAm

aBiDAnI aBiDAnI aBiDAnI strI ABiDIyate ABimuKyena DIyate banDenAnayA aBi DA karaRe lyuw rajvO tayA hi banDanena baDyamABimuKyena sTApyate isAmagfBnraSanAmftasya ityaSvABiDAnImAdatte iti tE brA aBiDAnIM raSanAmiti BA tasyA indrovatsa AsIdgAyatryaBiDAnyaBramUDaH aTa BUmOYjIBiraBiDAnIBirhitA Bavanti kAtyA
aBiDAno aBiDAno aBiDAno strI ABiDIyate ABimuKyena DIyate banDenAnayA aBi DA karaRe lyuw rajvO tayA hi banDa nena baDyamABimuKyena sTApyate isAmagfBnraSanAmftasya ityaSvABiDAnImAdatte iti tE brA aBiDAnIM raSanAmiti BA tasyA indrovatsa AsIdgAyatryaBi DAnyaBramUDaH aTa BUmOYjIBiraBi DAnIBirhitA Bavanti kAtyA
aBihUti aBihUti aBihUti strI aBi hve ktin ABimuKyenAhvAne aBihUti strI aBi hvf ktic vede pf kuwilasvaBAve SataBujiBistamaBihvuteraGAte f aBi hvuteH kuwilasvaBAvAt BA aBihUti strI aBi hve ktin ABimuKyenAhvAne aBihUti strI aBi hvf ktic vede pf kuwilasvaBAve SataBujiBistamaBihvuteraGAte f aBi hvuteH kuwilasvaBAvAt BA
aBihvrati aBihvrati aBihvrati strI aBi hvf ktic vede pf kuwilasvaBAve SataBujiBistamaBihfteraGAte f aBihfteH kuwilasvaBAvAt BA
aBimarSana aBimarSana aBimarSana rzaRa na aBi mfSa za BAve lyuw sparSe nIvIstanaprAvaraRasakDikeSABimarSanam rzaRam yA yaH punaH paranArIpariDAnagranTipradeSakucaprAvaraRajaGana mUrdDakacAdisparSanaM sAmilAza ivAcarati mitA sado BimarSanam rzaRam kAtyA tUzRIM pinvanA dInAM karaRABimarSana rzaRa SlakzaRaDUpanapradahanodDaraRAva secanAni kAtyA DarzaRRe ca paradArABi ma rSa rzaRam smftiH

aBitImuKa aBitImuKa aBitImuKa tri aBitaH muKamasya sarvadiNmuKe
aBitam aBitam aBitam avya aBi tasil sAmIpye ABimuKye uBayato rTe SIGratAyAYca etadyoSe dvitIyA aBisarvatasoH kAryyA DikyuparyyAdizu trizu dvitIyAmreqitAntezu taTAnyatrApi dfSyate ityukteH aNgAnyayAkzIdaBitaH praDAnamiti BawviH aBitastaM pfTAsUnuH snehena paritastare kirA kAmakroDa viyuktAnAM yatInAM yatacetasAm aBitobrahmanirvARamiti gItA sAkalye ca paryyaBiByAYca pA sarvoBayArTAByAmeva bA ukteH sarvvoBayArTayorevAsya sADutA
aBitas aBitas aBitas avya aBi tasil sAmIzye ABimuKye uBayato rTe SIGratAyAYca etadyoSe dvitIyA aBisarva tasoHkAryyA DikyuparyyAdizu trizu dvitIyAmreqitAntezu taTA nyatrApi dfSyate ityukteH aNgAnyayAkzIdaBitaH praDAna miti BawviH aBitastaM pfTAsUnuH snehena paritastare kirA kAmakroDa viyuktAnAM yatInAM yatacetasAm aBi tobrahmanirvARamiti gItA sAkalye ca paryyaBiByAYca pA sarvoBayArTAByAmeva bA ukteH sarvvoBayArTa yorevAsya sADutA
aBitomuKa aBitomuKa aBitomuKa tri aBitaH muKamasya sarvadimmuKe
aBiyyanda aBiyyanda aBi sya yyanda pu aBi syanda BAve GaY aprARi karttari vA zatvam ativfttO sravaRe jalAdikzaraRe ca karttari GaY aDike svargABizyandava manamiti kumA BUtapUrvvamaBUtapUrvvaM vA janapadaM paradeSApavAhanena svadeSABizyandavamanena vA niveSayediti kOwi ADAre GaY netrarogahetO prAveRa sarvve nayanAmayAste BavantyaBizyandanimittamUlAH tasmAdaBizyandamudIryamARamupAcadedASu hitAya DImAn suSru uzRABitaptasya jalapraveSAddUrekzaRAt svapnaviparyyayAcca svedAdrajoDUmanizevaRAcca CarddorviGAtAdvamanAtiyogAt dravAttaTAnnAnniSi sevitAcca viRmUtravAtakramanigrahAcca prasaktasaMrodanaSokakopAcCiroBiGAtAdatimadyapAnAt taTA ftUnAYca viparyyayeRa kleSABiGAtAdatimETunAcca bAzpagrahAt sUkzmanirIkzaRAcca netre vikArAn janayanti dozAH sa ca caturviDaH yaTA vAtAt pittAt kaPAdraktAdaBizyandaScaturviDaH prAyeRa jAyate GoraH sarvanetrAmayAkaraH suSru
aBiyyandin aBiyyandin aBiyya sya ndin tri aBizyandate aBi syanda Rini aprARikarttari vA satvam sarvvataH srute payo Bizyandi gurvvAmaM prAyaSaH parikIrttitam suSru
aBizyanda aBizyanda aBi sya zyanda pu aBi syanda BAve GaY aprARi karttari vA zatvam ativfttO sravaRe jalAdikza raRe ca karttari GaY aDike KargABizyandava manamiti kumA BUtapUrbbamaBUtapUrbbaM vA janapadaM paradeSApavAhanena svadeSABizyandavamanena vA niveSayedi ti kOwi ADAre GaY netrarogahetO prAveRa sarbbe nayanAmayAste BavantyaBizyandanimittamUlAH tasmA daMBizyandamudIryAmARamupAcadedASu hitAya DImAn suSru uzRABitaptasya jalapraveSAddUrekzaRAt svapnaviparyyayAcca svedAdrajoDUmanizevaRAcca CardderviGAtAdvamanAtiyogAt dravAttaTAnnAnniSi sevitAcca viRmUtravAtakramanigrahAcca prasaktasaMrodanaSokakopAcCiroBiGAtAdatimadyapAnAt taTA ftUnAYca viparyyayeRa kleSABiGAtAdatimETunAcca vAzpagrahAt sUkzmanirIkzaRAcca netre vikArAn janayanti dozAH sa ca caturviDaH yaTA vAtAt pittAt kaPAdraktAdaBizyandaScaturviDaH prAyeRa jAyate GoraH sarva netrAmayAkaraH suSru
aBizyandin aBizyandin aBizya sya ndin tri aBizyandate aBi syanda Rini aprARikarttari vA satvam sarvvataH srute payo Bi zyandi gurvvAmaM prAyaSaH parikIrttitam suSru

aDamarRika aDamarRika aDamarRika tri aDamamfRamavaSyadeyaM dAtftvenAstyasya Wan aDamarRaSabdArTe grahItA ca kramAddApyo DaninAmaDama rRika iti yAjYa yEryErupAyErarTaM svaM prApnuyAduttama rRikaH tEstErupAyEH saMgfhya dApayedaDamarRikamiti manuH astyarTe ini aDamarRItyapyatrEva tri striyAM NIp
aDimarRika aDimarRika aDimarRika tri aDamamfRamavaSyadeyaM dAtftvenAstyasya Wan aDamarRaSabdArTe grahItA ca kramAddAmyo DaninAmaDamarRika iti yAjYa yEryErupAyErarTaM svaM prApnuyAduttamarRikaH tEstErupAyEH saMgfhya dApayedaDamarRikamiti manuH astyarTe ini aDamarRItyapyatrEva tri striyAM NIp sw
aDo'Das aDo'Das aDo Das aDas aDastAt sAmIpye dvitvam samIpADodeSe TavAnaDoDo vfhataH payoDarAniti mAGaH
aDo'SuMka aDo'SuMka aDo SuMka na aDaramaMSukam aDara praTamArTe asi aDarasya aDAdeSaSca pariDAnavastre
aDo'kza aDo'kza aDo kza na aDaramakzaM yatra mArge aDara praTamArTe asi ba ivirDAnAkzADomArge dakziRasyAkzaM prAYco nizkrAmatIti kA dakziRahavirDAnAkzADomArgeRa prANmuKA niHsarantIti vedadIpaH
aDo'kzaja aDo'kzaja aDo kzaja pu akzAt indriyAt jAyate jana qa ta akzajaM pratyakzajYAnam aDaraM grAhakatvABAvAdDInaM yasya aDara praTamArTe asi aDAdeSaSca indriyAyogye aDo na kzIMyate jAtu yasmAttasmAdaDo kzaja ityuktalakzaRe vA vizRO vyAppo vAyuraDo kzaja iti vizRusaha dyOrakzaM pfTivI cADastayoryasmAdajAyata maDye vErAjarUpeRa tato Dokzajaizyate iti BAzye taTA ca aRqakapAladvayamaDye virAqarUpeRa jAtatvAdasya taTAtvam aDoBUte svasvavizayeByo nivarttatena pratyakpravAMhite akzagaRe jAyate prakASate iti aDokzaja iti vA tatrEvArTe
aDoDas aDoDas aDo Das aDas aDastAt sAmIpye dvitvam samIpADodeSe navAnaDoDovfhataH payoDarAniti mAGaH
aDoMSuka aDoMSuka aDo MSuka na aDaramaMSukam aDara praTamArTe asi aDarasya aDAdeSaSca pariDAnavastre
aDokza aDokza aDo kza na aDaramakzaM yatra mArge aDara praTamArTe asi ba havirDAnAkzADomArge dakziRasyAkzaM prAYco nizkrAma tIti kA dakziRahavirDAnAkzADogArgeRa prANmuKA niHsarantIti vedadIpaH
aDokzaja aDokzaja aDo kzaja pu akzAt indriyAt jAyate jana qa ta akzajaM pratyakzajYAnam aDaraM grAhakatvABAvAdDInaM yasya aDara praTamArTe asi aDAdeSaSca indriyAyogye aDo na kzIMyate jAtu yasmAttasmAdaDo kzaja ityuktalakzaRe vA vizRO vyAptI vAyuraGo kzaja iti vizRusaha dyOrakzaM pfTivI cADastayoryasmAdajAyata maDye vErAja rUpeRa tato DokzajEzyate iti BAzye taTA ca aRqa kapAladvayamaDye virAqrUpeRa jAtatvAdasya taTAtvam aDoBUte svasvavizayeByo nivarttanena pratyakpravAMhite akzagaRe jAyate prakASate iti aDokzaja iti vA tatrEvArTe
aDvagaBogya aDvagaBogya aDvagaBogya pu aDvagena atisOlaByAt ayatnalaByaPalatvAcca BogyaH ta AmaqA iti prasidDe AmrAtakavfkze anAyAsena tatPalasya BogyatvAttasya taTAtvam
aDyagaBogya aDyagaBogya aDyagaBogya pu aDyagena atisOlaByAt ayatnalaByaPalatvAcca BogyaH ta AmaqA iti prasidDe AmrAtakavfkze anAyAsena tatPalasya BogyatvAttasya taTAtvam
aGaSaMsin aGaSaMsin aGaSaMsin tri aGaM SaMsati sUcayati SaMsa Rini ta vyasanasUcake vyasanASaMsAkarttari vacaH krUraM mayokta maGaSaMsineti striyAM NIp

aGneya aGneya aGneya tri na GrAtuM SakyaH arhaH vA GrA SakyAdyarTe yat naY tatpu GrARAnarhe durganDe vastumAtre madye na madirAGrARamAtreRa brAhmaRyAdeva hIyate iti smftO madyasya GrARanizeDAt tasya taTAtvam

aMSasavarRRana aMSasavarRRana aMSasavarRRana na samAnovarRRaH yogaviyogayogyatA savarRRaH tataH karaRArTe Rici BAve lyuw savarRanam aMSayoH atulya cCedayoH rASyoH samacCedakaraRam ta lIlAvatyukte atulyacCedarASyoH yogaviyogayogyatAsampAdake samacCeda sADane kriyAviSeze tatrAdAvaMSasavarRanamityuktamya anyonya hArABihatO harAMSO rASyoH samacCedaviDAnamevamiti lIlAvatyAmuktam
aMSasavarRana aMSasavarRana aMSasavarRana na samAnovarRaH yogaviyogayogyatA savarRaH tataH karaRArTe savarRaM karotItyarTe Rici BAve lyuw savarRanam aMSayoH atulyacCedayoH rASyoH samacCedakaraRam ta lIlAvatyukte atulyacCedarASyoH yogaviyogayogyatAsampAdake samacCedasADane kriyAviSeze tatrAdAvaMSasavarRanamityuktasya anyonyahArABihatO harAMSO rASyoH samacCedaviDAnamevamiti lIlAvatyAmuktam
aMsa aMsa aMsa viBAjane ada vyaM cu uBa aMsayati te AMsisat ta Apuki aMsApayatItyeke vi viSlezakaraRe pracyAvane ca vyaMsayAmAsa tat sEnyamiti BAratam ac aMsaH aMsa puM aMsa karmmaBAvAdO ac aMSaSabdArTe skanDe ca aMsanizaktabAhuH aMsAropicApeneti SAnto pi aMSa iti skanDe aMsa viBAjane ada cu uBa aMsayati te AMsisat ta Apuki aMsApayatItyeke vi viSlezakaraRe pracyAvane ca vyaMsayAmAsa tat sEnyamiti BAratam ac aMsaH aMsa puM aMsa karmmaBAvAdO ac aMSaSabdArTe skanDe ca aMsanizaktabAhuH aMsAropicApeneti SAnto pi skanDe
aNGriparRRikA aNGriparRRikA aNGriparRRikA strI aNGrO mUle tadAraBya vA parRamasyAH jAtO NIp svArTe kan siMhapucCAkArapuzpavati cAku liyA iti KyAte vfkze kABAve aNGriparRItyapi tatrEva
aNGriparRikA aNGriparRikA aNGriparRikA strI aNGrO mUle tadAraBya vA parRamasyAH jAtO NIp svArTe kan siMhapucCAkArapuzpavati cAkuliyA iti KyAte vfkze kABAve aNGriparRItyapi tatrEva
aNgAraparRRa aNgAraparRRa aNgAraparRRa na aNgAramiva parRamasya vanaBede astyarTe ac tatsvAmini citraraTaganDarvve pu BArate cEtraraTe pa citraraTaganDarvasya arjjunAdIn prati uktiH ArAttizWata mA mahyaM samIpamupasarpata kasmAnmAM nABijAnIta prAptaM BAgIraTIjalam aNgAraparRaM ganDarvvaM vitta mAM svavanASrayam ahaM mAnI taTerzuSca kuverasya priyaH saKA aNgAraparRamityevaM KyAtaM cedaM vanaM mameti
aNgAraparRa aNgAraparRa aNgAraparRa na aNgAramiva parRamasya vanaBede astyarTe ac tatsvAmini citraraTaganDarvve pu BArate cEtraraTe pa citraraTaganDarvasya arjjunAdIn prati uktiH ArAttizWata mA mahyaM samIpamupasarpata kasmAnmAM nABijAnIta prAptaM BAgIraTIjalam aNgAraparRaM ganDarvvaM vitta mAM svavanASrayam ahaM mAnI taTerzuSca kuberasya priyaH saKA aNgAraparRamityevaM KyAtaM cedaM vanaM mameti
aNga aNga aNga cihnayuktakaraRe adantacurAdi uBaya sakarmmakaH sew aNgaya ti te AYjiga t ta matAntare aNgApayati te aNga na ama gatyAdO asa gatyAdI vA gan citte aNgajaH kAmaH hiraRyagarBANgaBuvamitidehe iti mAGaH hastena sparSa hiraRyagarBANgaBuvamiti dehe hastenasparSa tadaNgamindra iti kumArasaM kumA aNgaSabdasya cezwAvadantyAvayavirUpAvayavivAcitve pi tadavayave pi udBedaH karaRaM BedaH etAnyaNgAni vE muKe iti suKasya muKasya vilAsaH parisarpaSca viDftaM tApasaM taTA narmma narmmadyutiScEva taTA praSamanaM punaH viroDaSca pratimuKe taTA syAt paryyupAsanam puzpaM vajramupanyAso varRasaMhAra varRRasaMhAra ityapi iti pratimuKasya aBUtAharaRaM mArgo rUpodAharaRaM kramaH saNgrahaScAnumAnaYca saMgrahaScAnumAnaYca prArTanAkziptireva ca trowakADibalodvegA trowakA DibalodvegA garBe syurvidravastaTA iti garBasya apavAdo apa vAdo Ta samPewo vyavasAyo dravo dyutiH SaktiH prasaNgaH KedaSca pratizeDo viroDanam prarocanA vimarze syAdAdAnaM CAdanaM taTA iti vimarzasya sanDirviboDo graTanaM nirRayaH nirRRayaH pariBAzaRam kftiH pramAda AnandaH samayo pyupagUhanam BAzaRaM pUrvvavAkyaYca pUrbbavAkyaYca kAvyasaMhAra eva ca praSastiriti saMhAre jYeyAnyaNgAni nAmataH upasahArasya upa Page a saMhArasya catuHzazwiviDaM hyetadaNgaM proktaM manIziBiH manI ziBiH kuryyAdaniyate tasya sanDAvapi niveSanam rasAnuguRatAM vIkzya rasasyEva hi muKyatA paricCede aNga cihnayuktakaraRe adantacurAdi uBaya sakarmmakaH sew aNgaya ti te AYjiga t ta matAntare aNgApayati te aNga na asa gatyAdI vA gan citte aNgajaH kAmaH hiraRyagarBANgaBuvamiti dehe hastenasparSa tadaNgamindra iti kumA aNgaSabdasya cezwAvadantyAvayavirUpAvayavivAcitve pi tadavayave pi hastapAdAdO vyavahAraH avayavatvasAmyAt tezAYca pratyaNgaSabdenApi vyavahAraH tatrANgaSabdasya dehArTatve tadIyasvarUpaM tadavayavaBedASca suSrute darSitAH yaTA SukraSoRitaM garBASayasTamAtmaprakftivikAra saMmUrcCitaM garBa ityucyate taYca cetanAvasTitaM vAyurviBa jati teja enaM pacati ApaH kledayanti pfTivI saMhantyAkASaM vivardDayati evaM vivardDitaH sa yadA hastapAdajihvAGrARakarRanitambAdiBiraNgErupetastadA SarIra miti saMjYAM laBate tacca zaqaNgaM SAKAScatasro maDyaM paYcamaM pazWaM Sira iti ataHparaM pratyaNgAni vakzyante mastakodarapfzWanABi lalAwanAsAcivukavastigrIvA ityetA ekEkAH karRa netranAsABrUSaNKAMsagaRqakakzastanavfzapArSva sPigajAnu bAhUru praBftayo dve dve viMSatiraNgulayaH srotAMsi ca vakzya mARAni eza pratyaNgaviBAga uktaH tasya punaHsaNKyA nam tvacaH kalA DAtavo malA dozA yakftplIhAnO PupPusa uRquko hfdayamASayA antrARi vukkO srotAMsi kaRqarA jAlAni kUrcA rajjavaH sevanyaHsaNGAtAH simantA asTIni sanDayaH snAyavaH peSyo marmmARi SirA Damanyo yogavahAni srotAMsi ca tvacaH sapta kalAH sapta ASayAH sapta DAtavaH sapta sapta SirASatAni paYca peSISatAni nava snAyuSatAni trIRyasTiSatAni dve daSottare sanDi Sate saptottaraM marmaSatam caturviMSatirDamanyaH trayo dIzA trayo malAH nava srotAMsIti samAsaH iti avayave SezANganirmmARaviDO viDAturiti kumA apANga iti upAye sarvvakAryyaSarIrezu muktvANgaskanDapaYcakamiti mantro yoDEvADIraH sarvvANgEH saMvftErapIti ca mAGaH praDAnopayogini upakaraRe PalavatsanniDAvaPalaM nadaNgamiti mImAMsA praDAnasyAkriyA yatra sANgaM tat kriyate punaH tadaNgasyAkriyAyAntviti smftiH hastyaSvaraTapAdAtaM senANgaM syAccatuzwayamiti samboDane avya tvamaNga yasyAH patiruYJi takrama iti nEzaDam aNgamastyasya ac aNgavati Page b yenANgavikAra iti pA aNgasyANgina ityarTaH antike ca tri janmAdilagne na aNgADISaH svagehe buDagurukaviBiH saMyuto vIkzito veti jAtakam deSaBede pu tasya vivaraRam aNgADipaSabde aNgezu vaNgezu Kasezu yojyA iti aNgavaNgaKasezveveti ca jyoti zam aNgAnAM rAjA ANgaH bahvarTe aNgAH aNgadeSe BavaH aR ANgaH bahvarTe aNgAH aNgena dehena nirvfttaH Wak ANgikaH aNgadeSastadrAjAno vA Baktirasya aR ANgaH aNgasyedam aNgIyaH yasmAt pratyayaviDi stadAdi pratyaye Ngamiti pARinipariBAzite pratyayAvaDi BUte SabdaBede iRaH zIDvaM luNliwAM Do NgAditi pA aNgAdAgatam aR ANgaH aNganimitte kAryye varRA dANgaM balIya iti pariBA upakAraRAni ca yaTA yaTamuhyAni diNmAtramatrocyate tatra svAmyamAtyasuhft kozo rAzwraM durgaM balAni ca rAjyANgAnItyuktAni svAmya mAtyO puraM rAzwraM kozadaRqO suhfttaTA sapta prakftayo hyetAH saptANgaM rAjyamucyate ityuktAni rAjyANgAni darSAdO ca prayAjAdIni vEdikakarmmaRAYca tattatkriyA kalApAH tattaddravyARi cANgAni sANgAdDi vEdikakarmaRaH PalAvaSyamBAva iti mImA vedasya vyAkaraRAdIni aNgAni SikzA kalpo vyAkaraRaM niruktaM CandasAYcitiH jyotizAmayanaYcEva vedANgAni zaqeva tu iti etezAYca lakzaRAdikamagre vakzyate etezAM vedArTajYAnopayogitvA daNgatvam ataeva SrutO brAhmaRena nizkAraRaH zaqaNgaH saraha syovedoDyetavya ityuktam SikzAyAM tezAM vedArTajYanopayo gitvA daNgatvaM darSitam yaTA CandaH pAdO tu vedasya hastO kalpo Ta paWyate jyotizAma yanaM cakzurniruktaM Srotramucyate SikzA GrARaM tu vedasyaM muKaM vyAkaraRaM smftaM tasmAd sANgamaDItyEva brahmaloke mahIyate iti ato vedArTajYAnopayogitayA etezAM granTAnAM vedANga tvam dve vidye veditavye zaquktAni manIziBiH catuHzazwi staTANgAni jyotizasya vidurbuDA ityupakramya gaRitajYAna pUrbbakaM tajjYAnamAvaSyakamityuktvA tadviBAgA darSitA yaTA tasmAt kftsnamaDItyAgre vedANgaM kAlasADanam jyoti nAmataH grahakoSo grahayudDaM grahaSfNgAwakaM taTA kftsnaM grahe SvarARAYca grahapAkAstaTEva ca vipaTAScAgnivarzASca senA vyUhastaTEva ca mayUracitropanizadupahArapraSAntayaH tatrAntike tulAkoSodBavantatropaDArayet sarvvaBUtahitAM cEva taTA puzpalatAM viduH upAnahostaTA cCedovastra cCedastaTEva ca kftsnoBuvanakoSaSca garBADAnAdikaM taTA nirGAto BUmikampaSca parivezAstaTEva ca ftusva BAvAH santyevaM taTolkAScopaDArayet sAMvasarastaTA yuktaH SAstrARAM deSakoBavet balAbalaM tu vijYeyaM bahu yatra balaM vadet catuHzazwyaNgametattu saMvatsaramudAhftamiti evaYca gaRitAditrayaM praDAnANgatvAt skanDasaMjYam anyAni tu apraDAnAnyaNgAnIti kvacit saMkzepata uktAni kvacicca vistarata iti viSezaH gargoktaviBAgABiprAyeREva mudrA rAkzase kftapariSramo smi catuHzazwyaNge jyotize iti sUtraDAravAkyam vfhatsaMhitAyAM tu gargoktAnyeva prAyaSo NgAni pradarSitAni tezAM svarUpAdikaM tattacCabdevakzyate dfSyakAvye muKapratigarBavimarzopasaMhftirUpasanDipaYcakasya catuHzazwiraNgAni taTA narmma narmmadyutiScEva taTA praSamanaM punaH viroDaSca pratimuKe taTA syAt paryyupAsanam puzpaM vajramupanyAso varRRasaMhAra ityapi iti pratimuKasya aBUtAharaRaM mArgo rUpodAharaRaM kramaH saMgrahaScAnumAnaYca prArTanAkziptireva ca trowakA DibalodvegA garBe syurvidravastaTA iti garBasya apa vAdo Ta samPewo vyavasAyo dravo dyutiH SaktiH prasaNgaH KedaSca pratizeDo viroDanam prarocanA vimarze syAdAdAnaM CAdanaM taTA iti vimarzasya sanDirviboDo graTanaM nirRRayaH pariBAzaRam kftiH pramAda AnandaH samayo pyupagUhanam BAzaRaM pUrbbavAkyaYca kAvyasaMhAra eva ca praSastiriti saMhAre aNka aNka aNka nka saNKyAkaraRe saMKyAkaraRe cihrayuktakaraRe adantacurAdiH uBaya adantacurAdi uBa saka sew aNkaya ti te AYcika t ta aNkApayati aNkA payati te iti kecit preyAMsamANkayadasO na viDO kalaNka ityudBawaH puka puk cetyaNkApayatyapIti kAmaDenuH kAma DenuH ac aNkaH kta aNkitaH lyuw aNkanam asun aNkaH aNka pu na aNka karaRe karttari vA ac cihne rativalayapadANke rativala yapadANke cApamAsajya kaRWe iti kumArasaM kumA kalaNke eko hi dozo guRasannipAte nimajjatIndroH kiraRezvivANka nimajjatIndoH kiraRezvi vANka iti kumArasaM kumA dfSyakAvyANgaBede tallakzaRaM yaTA pratyakzanetfcarito rasaBAvasamujjvalaH BavedagUQaSabdArTaH kzudracUrRakasaMyutaH vicCinnAvAntarEkArTaH kiYcitsaMlagnabindukaH kiYcitsaMlagna vindukaH yukto na bahuBiH kAryyErvIjasaMhftimAn na ca nAnAviDAnasaMyukto nAtipracurapadyavAn AvaSyakAnAM kAryyARAmaviroDAdvinirmmitaH nAnekadinanirvvartyakaTayA samprayojitaH AsannanAyakaH pAtrEryutastricaturastETA pAtrEryutastricaturEstaTA dUrAhvAnaM vaDo baDo yudDaM rAjyadeSAdiviplavaH vivAho BojanaM SApotmargO mftyU ratantaTA SApotsargO mftyUratantaTA dantacCedyaM naKaCedyamanyad vrIqAkaraYca vrIqA karaYca yat SayanADarapAnAdi nagarAdyuparoDanam antarnizkrAntaniKilapAtro antanizkAntaniKilapAtro Nka iti kIrttitaH iti sAhi dfSyakAvyarUpakaBede sA dfSyakAvya rUpakaBede ca pu yaTA nAwakamaTa prakaraRaM BARyavyAyogasamavakAraqimAH IhAmfgANkavITyaH BARavyAyogasamavakAraqimAH IhA mfgANkavITyaH prahasanamiti rUpakARi daSa iti viBajya utsfzwikA Nka ekANkonetAraH vyApftA narAH raso tra karuRaH sTAyI bahustrIparidevitam prAKyAtamitivfttaYca kavirbudDyA prapaYcayet BARavat sanDivfttANgAnyasmin jayaparAjayO yudDaYca vAcA karttavyaM nirvedavacanaM bahu iti lakzitam imaYca kecit nAwakAdyantaHpAtyaNkaparicCedArTam utmfzwikANkanAmAnam nAwakAdyantaHpAtyaNkaparicCe dArTam utsfzwikANkanAmAnam AhuH anye tu utkrAntA vilomarUpA sfzwiryatreti utsfzwikANkaH iti sA parvvate samIpe yudDaBUzaRe dehe aparADe sTAne citrayudDe paramparAsambadDe cihne ca pu kroqe pu na ananyanArIkanIyamaNkamiti kumArasaM ananya nArIkanIyamaNkamiti kumA aNke niDAya taM bAlaM punaH saMskAramarhatIti smftiH punaraNkASrayaRI BavAmi te iti kumArasaM kumA premRopakaRWaM muhuraNkaBAjo ratnAvalIrambuDirAbavanDeti ratnA valIrambuDirAbabanDeti mAGaH aNkaH samIpam utsaNgaSca iti mallinATaH ekatvAdisaNKyAboDakareKAsanniveSe ekatvAdisaMKyAboDakareKAsanniveSe aNkayutiH kila saNkalitAKyeti lIlA navasaNKyAyAYca nava saMKyAyAYca pu aNka cihnayuktakaraRe adantacurAdi uBaya sakarmmakaH sew aNgaya ti te AYjiga t ta matAntare aNgApayati te aNka nka saMKyAkaraRe cihrayuktakaraRe adantacurAdi uBa saka sew aNkaya ti te AYcika t ta aNkA payati te iti kecit preyAMsamANkayadasO na viDO kalaNka ityudBawaH puk cetyaNkApayatyapIti kAma DenuH ac aNkaH kta aNkitaH lyuw aNkanam asun aNkaH aNka pu na aNka karaRe karttari vA ac cihne rativala yapadANke cApamAsajya kaRWe iti kumA kalaNke eko hi dozo guRasannipAte nimajjatIndoH kiraRezvi vANka iti kumA dfSyakAvyANgaBede tallakzaRaM yaTA pratyakzanetfcarito rasaBAvasamujjvalaH BavedagUQaSabdArTaH kzudracUrRakasaMyutaH vicCinnAvAntarEkArTaH kiYcitsaMlagna vindukaH yukto na bahuBiH kAryyErvIjasaMhftimAn na ca BARavyAyogasamavakAraqimAH IhA mfgANkavITyaH prahasanamiti rUpakARi daSa iti viBajya utsfzwikA Nka ekANkonetAraH vyApftA narAH raso tra karuRaH sTAyI bahustrIparidevitam prAKyAtamitivfttaYca kavirbudDyA prapaYcayet BARavat sanDivfttANgAnyasmin jayaparAjayO yudDaYca vAcA karttavyaM nirvedavacanaM bahu iti lakzitam imaYca kecit nAwakAdyantaHpAtyaNkaparicCe dArTam utsfzwikANkanAmAnam AhuH anye tu utkrAntA vilomarUpA sfzwiryatreti utsfzwikANkaH iti sA parvvate samIpe yudDaBUzaRe dehe aparADe sTAne citrayudDe paramparAsambadDe cihne ca pu kroqe pu na ananya nArIkanIyamaNkamiti kumA aNke aRa aRa aRa Sabde BvAdi para aka sew aRati aRIt ARIt aRa jIvane divA Atma aka sew aRyate ARizwa aRa na ka tri aRati yaTecCam nadati aRa ac tataH kutsAyAm ka aDame nindite ca pApARake kutsitEriti pA aRaka kulAlaH si kO dantyamaDyaScAyamityanye aRa Sabde BvAdi para aka sew aRati ARIt aRa jIvane divA Atma aka sew aRyate ARizwa

aSokapUrRRimA aSokapUrRRimA aSokapUrRRimA strI nAsti Soko yasyAH karmma PAlguna pOrRRamAsAvaGivarzaparyyantAyAM hemA vra Ka vizRuDarmmo ktavratANge pOrRRamAsyAM tatra pratimAsaM karttavye vrate ca yaTA aSokapUrRRimAmetAM SfRuzvekamanA mama upozya na naraH SokaM prAptoti strI taTA pi vA PAlgu nAmalapakzasya pOrRRamAsyAM nfpottama ityupakramya viDA namuktvA anenEva prakAreRa catvAraH PAlgunAdayaH upozyA nfpate mAsAH ityuktvA ca AzAQAdizu mAsezu tadvat proktaM taTAmbunA caturzvanyezu ca proktaM taTA vE kArtikAdizu ityanena varzasADyatvamasyA uktam
aSokapUrRimA aSokapUrRimA aSokapUrRimA strI nAsti Soko yasyAHkarmma PAlgunapOrRamAsAvaDivarzaparyyantAyAM hemA vra Ka vizRuDarmmoktavratANge pOrRamAsyAM tatra pratimAsaM karttavye vrate ca yaTA aSokapUrRimAmetAM SfRuzvekamanA mama upozya na naraH SokaM prApnoti strI taTA pi vA PAlgunAmalapakzasya pOrRamAsyAM nfpottama ityupakramya viDAnamuktvA anenEva prakAreRa catvAraH PAlgunAdayaH upozyA nfpate mAsAH ityuktvA ca AzAQAdizu mAsezu tadvat proktaM taTAmbunA caturzvanyezu ca proktaM taTA vE kArtikAdizu ityanena varzasADyatvamasyA uktam
aSvakarRRa aSvakarRRa aSvakarRRa pu aSvasya karREva patramasya svanAmaKyAte sAla vfkze pUtikASvakarRRAguruRi kAleyakalke suSru svArTe kan aSvakarRako pyatra ta aSvasya karRRe

abdapa abdapa abdapa pu abdaM pAti pA ka varzADipe tadAnayanAprakAraSca tadAnayanaprakAraSca si Si darSitaH yaTA aDo DastriDA kalpayAtAbdavfndAt karAByAM kftEH pAvakEH saMguRAcca BujaNgEravAptaM PalaM syAddinAdyaM tadabdAnvitaM BAskarAdabdapaH syAt atropapattiH ekasmin ravivarze sAvanAhAH prAk pratipAditAH etadazwaBiH savarRitaM kAryyam tato nupAtaH yadyazwaBirvarzEretAvaddinAdyaM yadyazwaBirvarzEretAva ddinAdyaM tadA kalpagatEH kimiti PalaM dinAdyam tadanazwaM saMsTApyam tato gatAbdEryutaM sadabdapatiH syAditi yaduktaM tadyuktam tadyukam yataH paYcazazwyaDikaSatatraye saptaBirBakte maptaBirBakte eko vaSizyate ata ekaguRAbdasaNKyA ekaguRAbdasaMKyA tasmin dinAdye nikziptA tasmin saptatazwe rkAdyobdapatiH rkAdyo bdapatiH yato yasmin vAre bdAdiH so bdapatiH syAdityupapannam tAjikokte varzADipatO ca tadAnayanaprakAraSca janmalagnapativarzalagnADipatimunTahADipatitrirASipatInAM divAsUryyAkrAntarASipateH tadAnayanaprakaHraSca janmalagna pativarzalagnAzipatimunyahADipatitrirASipatInAM divA sUryyAkrAntarASipateH rAtrO candrAkrAntarASipateScEzAM paYcADikAriRAM paYcA DikaHriRAM maDye dvAdaSavargIbalena paYcavargIbalena vopetaH lagnadarSI vIpetaH lamnadarSI varzADipatiH balasAmye dfzwyatirekAt tatrApi sAmye dfzwyaBAve vfzwyaBAve ca muTaheSvaraH varzADipaH abdaprabalasya abdapabalasya vicAraRetTam no nI tA vn abdapatyAdayo pyatra abdapa pu abdapavat varzADipe abdapaSabde vivftiH abdapatyAdayo pyatra abdapa pu abdaM pAti pA ka varzADipe tadAnayanaprakAraSca si Si darSitaH yaTA aDo DastriDA kalpayAtAbdavfndAt karAByAM kftEH pAvakEH pativarzalagnAzipatimunyahADipatitrirASipatInAM divA sUryyAkrAntarASipateH rAtrO candrAkrAntarASipateScEzAM paYcA DikaHriRAM maDye dvAdaSavargIbalena paYcavargIbalena vIpetaH lamnadarSI varzADipatiH ada ada ada banDane BvA para idit saka sew andati AndIt ada BakzaRe ca adA para saka aniw atti aGasat ava sat jaGAsa attA atsyati sani jiGatsati kta odanArTe annam anyatra jagDam GaY GasaH AdaH ktin jagDiH yo nnamatti yatastata iti smftiH attA carAcaragrahaRAditi carAcara grahaRAditi SA sU kimadanti BfNgA iti ada banDane BvA para idit saka sew andati AndIt ada BakzaRe ca adA para saka aniw atti ava sat jaGAsa attA atsyati sani jiGatsati kta odanArTe annam anyatra jagDam GaY GasaH AdaH ktin jagDiH yo nnamatti yatastata iti smftiH attA carAcara grahaRAditi SA sU kimadanti BfNgA iti

agada agada agada pu nAsti gado rogo gadI rogI yasmAt ba OzaDe ba OzaDAnyagAdo vidyA OzaDAnyagadovidyA dEvI ca viviDA sTitiH tapasEva prasiDyantIti purARam rogaSUnye tri gada BAzaRe acna ac na ta akaTake tri agada nIrogatve kaRqvA para agadyati AgadyIt AgadIt agada pu nAsti gadI rogI yasmAt ba OzaDe ba OzaDAnyagadovidyA dEvI ca viviDA sTitiH tapasEva prasiDyantIti purARam rogaSUnye tri gada BAzaRe ac na ta akaTake tri agada nIrogatve kaRqvA para agadyati AgadyIt AgadIt

agnivarRa agnivarRa agnivarRa tri agnervarRa iva varRo rUpaM yasya agnitulyavarRe brAhmaRastu surAM pItvA agnivarRAM surAM pibediti smftiH sUryyavaMSye nfpatiBede pu tatkaTA raGO sa ta agneH rUpe pu

agrediDizu agrediDizu agrediDizu zU pu diDiM DEryyaM syati nirasyati so kU zatvam diDizUH dvirUQA punarBUyozit agre gaRanIyA diDi zUryasya aluk sa kabaBAvaH pf vA hrasvaH punarBUvivAhakA riRi prAganUQajyezWaBaginyAH prAgUQakanizWaBaginyAM strI jyezWAyAM yadyanUQAyAM kanyAyAmuhyate nujA sA cAgre diDizUrjYeyA pUrvvA tu diDizUH smfteti manuH etatpakze ca agre jyezWAvivAhAt pUrbbaM diDizUH jyezWAvivAhakAlA sahanarUpaDEryyalopakAriRIti vigrahaH dIrGAnta evAyam
