agrega agrega agrega tri agre gacCatIti gama qa aluk samA sa purogantari agrega tri agre gacCatIti gama qU aluk sa puro gAmini sevake agrega tri agre gacCatIti gama qa aluk sa purogantari agrega tri agre gacCatIti gama qU aluk sa puro gAmini sevake
agregra agregra agregra tri agre gacCatIti gama qU aluk samA purogAmini sevake
aha aha aha gatO Atma BvA saka idit sew aMhate AMhizwa AnaMhe AnaMhire driM prati citrakUwam AMhizAtAM AMhi zAtAM raGuvyAGrO SaraBaNgASramaM tataH BawwiH ri aMhriH pAdaH asun aMhaH pApam in bA na luk ahiH sarpaH naluk ahiHsarpaH kedAraSca evA ta indrocaTamahema f vede tu vA bA naluk lawaH paYcAnAM liwaH paYcakAdeSe bruvaScAhAdeSaH Aha AhatuH AhuH AtTa AhaTuH ityAha BagavAn manuH ityAdO tu cAdigaRapaWitaM viBaktipratirUpamAheti aha dIptO curA idit uBa aka sew aMhayati te AYjihat ta viBakti pratirUpamAheti aha dIptO curA idit uBa aka sew aMhayati te AYjihat ta aha vyAptO svA pa saka sew ahnoti AhIt Aha aha vyAptO svA pa saka sew ahnoti AhIt Aha aha avya ahi GaY pu pf nalopaH praSaMsAyAM kzepe viyoge nigrahe AcArAtiSaye arccane ca atyaha tadindro mucyata devo hi saH idamahedaM satvaM kfSapaSvalpAjyamaTAyam Sata brA vrA aha gatO Atma BvA saka idit sew aMhate AMhizwa AnaMhe AnaMhire driM prati citrakUwam AMhi zAtAM raGuvyAGrO SaraBaNgASramaM tataH BawwiH ri aMhriH pAdaH asun aMhaH pApam in bA naluk ahiHsarpaH kedAraSca evA ta indrocaTamahema f vede tu bA naluk lawaH paYcAnAM liwaH paYcakAdeSe bruvaScAhAdeSaH Aha AhatuH AhuH AtTa AhaTuH ityAha BagavAn manuH ityAdO tu cAdigaRapaWitaM viBakti pratirUpamAheti aha dIptO curA idit uBa aka sew aMhayati te AYjihat ta aha vyAptO svA pa saka sew ahnoti AhIt Aha aha avya ahi GaY pf nalopaH praSaMsAyAM kzepe viyoge nigrahe AcArAtiSaye arccane ca atyaha tadindro mucyata devo hi saH idamahedaM satvaM kfSapaSvalpAjyamaTAyam Sata vrA
ahaHSeza ahaHSeza ahaH haSSe Seza pu ahnaH SezaH vA satvam divAvasAne ahaHSezo yatra ba aSOcAdyantimadine
ahibuDna ahibuDna ahi vu buDna pu aheriva buDno grIvA yasya rudraBede taddeva tAke uttaraBAdrapadanakzatre muhUrttaBede ca pf ahirbu rvu Dno hi rvu rbuDnyo pyatra tatsvarUpaM DyAnaSabde vakzyate ajEkapAdahirbuDnaH virUpAkzaSca rEvataH vizRuDa muhUrttaBedaSca ahaHSabde pfzWe uktaH tannakzatrasya taddeva tAkatvaYca aSlezASabde pfzWe uktam
ahirbuDna ahirbuDna ahi vu rbuDna pu aheriva buDno grIvA yasya rudraBede taddevatAke uttaraBAdrapadanakzatre muhUrttaBede ca pf ahirbu rvu Dno hi rvu rbuDnyo pyatra tatsvarUpaM DyAnaSabde vakzyate ajEkapAdahirbuDnaH virUpAkzaSca rEvataH vizRu Da muhUrttaBedaSca ahaHSabde uktaH tannakzatrasya taddevatAkatvaYca aSlezASabde uktam
ahobata ahobata ahobata avya aho ca bata ca dva Kede samboDane anukampAyAYca ahobata mahat kazwam gaRaratna ahobata mahat pApam gItA ahobatAsi spfhaRIyavIryyaH kumA
ahovata ahovata ahovata avya aho ca vata ca dva Kede samboDane anu kampAyAYca ahovata mahat kazwam gaRaratna ahovata mahat pApam gItA ahovatAsi spfhaRIyavIryyaH kumA
ajIrRa ajIrRa ajIrRa na jF BAve kta na ta jaWarAnalamAndyena BuktAnnAderapAke na ba rogaBede BavedajIrRaM prati yasya SaNkA snigDasya jantorbalino nnakAle pUrvvaM saSuRWImaBayAmaSaNkaH saMprASya BuYjIta hitaM hi paTyamiti cakra ajIrRe BezajaM vAri jIrRe vAri balapradamiti vEdyakam karttari kta jIrRo vfdDaH tadBinne tri
ajIrla ajIrla ajIrla na jF BAve kta na ta jaWarAnalamAndyena BuktA nnAderapAke na ba rogaBede BavedajIrRaM prati yasya SaNkA snigDasya jantorbalino nnakAle pUrbbaM saSu RWImaBayAsaSaNkaH saMprASya BuYjIta hitaM hi paTyamiti Page b cakra ajIrRe BezajaM vAri jIrRe bAri balapradamiti vEdyakam karttari kta jIrRovfdDaH tadBinne tri
ajakaRa ajakaRa ajakaRa pu ajasya karRa iva parRRaM yasya CAgatulya lambAyamAnapatrayukte sAla iti KyAte vfkze maricavfkze ca ta CAgakarRe
ajakarRRaka ajakarRRaka ajakarRRaka pu ajakarRa iva kAyati patradvArA prakASate kE ka sAla iti KyAte vfkze
ajakarRa ajakarRa ajakarRa pu ajasya varRa iva parRaM yasya CAgatulyalambAyamAnapatrayukte sAla iti KyAte vfkze maricavfkze ca ta CAgakarRe
ajakarRaka ajakarRaka ajakarRaka pu ajakarRa iva kAyati patradvArA prakASate kE ka sAla iti KyAte vfkze
ajalIman ajalIman ajalIman pu ajasya lomeva loma maYjarI yasya ba SUkaSimbo iti KyAte ajalomavanmaYjarIviSizwe vfkzaBede vA qAp vA NIp ca ajalomA ajalomI cetyapyatra strI
ajaloman ajaloman ajaloman pu ajasya lomeva loma maYjarI yasya ba SUkaSimbo iti KyAte ajalomavanmaYjarIviSizwe vfkzaBede vA qAp vA NIp ca ajalomA ajalomI cetyapyatra strI
akarRRa akarRRa akarRRa tri nAsti karRRo sya SravaRendriyaSUnye paSyatya karRa iti SrutiH sarpe pu tasya cakzuzEva SravaRAttadi ndriyaSUnyatvam rADeyaH karRRaH taCUnye tri anarjuna makarRaM vA jagadadyeti niScitamiti BAratam
akarRa akarRa akarRa tri nAsti karRo sya SravaRendriyaSUnye paSyatyakarRa iti SrutiH sarpe pu tasya cakzuzEva SravaRAttadindriyaSUnyatvam rADeyaH karRaH taCUnye tri anarjunamakarRaM vA jagadadyeti niScitamiti BAratam
akzadfS akzadfS akzadfS pu akzAn vyavahArAn paSyati dfSa kvin kutvam akzadarSakaSabdArTe akzArTadrazwari tri
akzadfSa akzadfSa akzadfSa pu akzAn vyavahArAn paSyati dfSa kvin kutvam akzadarSakaSabdArTe akzArTadrazwari tri
alakanandA alakanandA alakanandA strI alati paryyAptoti kvun alakA nandayatIti ac nandA karmmaM gaNgAyAm vizRupadI vizRu padAt patitA merO caturdDAsmAt vizkamBA calasrastasaraHsaNgatA gatA viyatA sItAKyA BadrASvaM sAlakanandA ca BArataM varzam si Si taTEvAlaka nandA dakziRena brahmasadanAdvahUni girikUwAni atikramya hemakUwahimakUwAnyatiraBasaraMhasA luWantI BAratamaBi varzaM dakziRasyAM diSi lavaRajalaDimaBipraviSati BA ska alakErnandati ac kanyAyAm sA hi alakEstuzyati
alakandanA alakandanA alakandanA strI alati paryyApnoti kvun alakA nandayatIti ac nandA karmmaM gaNgAyAm vizRupadI vizRupadAt patitA merO caturdDAsmAt vizkamBAcalasrastasaraH saNgatA gatA viyatA sItAKyA BadrASvaM sAlakanandA ca BArataM varzam si Si taTEvAlakanandA dakziRena brahmasadanAdvahUni girikUwAni atikramya hemakUwahimakUwAnyatiraBasaraMhasA luWantI BAratamaBi varzaM dakziRasyAM diSi lavaRajalaDimaBipraviSati BA ska alakErnandati ac kanyAyAm sA hi alakEstuzyati
alamBUzRa alamBUzRa alamBUzRa tri alam sAmarTyeBU gsnu samarTe vinApyasmadalamBUzRurijyAyE tapasaH sutaH mAGaH
alamBUzRu alamBUzRu alamBUzRu tri alam sAmarTye BU gsnu samarTe vinApya smadalamBUzRurijyAyE tapasaH sutaH mAGaH
alipriTa alipriTa alipriTa na ta kokaRade ratnotpale Bramara priye tri pAwalAvfkze rAjani
alipriya alipriya alipriya na ta kokanade ratnotpale Bramarapriye tri pAwalAvfkze rAjani
alpAyus alpAyus alpAyus pu alpamAyuH jIvanakAlo yasya CAge paSuzu tasyEvAlpAyuzkatvAt taTAtvam alpajIvana kAle tri durAcArohi puruzo loke Bavati ninditaH duHKaBAgI ca satataM vyADito lpAyureva ca manuH vA kapa alpAyuzko pyatra karmma yasya yAvadAyurucitaM tato lpamite jIvanakAle AyuSca jIvanakAlaH SatAyurvE puruza iti SruteH Sata varzAvacCinnajIvanakAlonarARAmAduH evamanyezA mAyuHparimARamAyuHSabde vakzyate tatra viSezakAlatAyAM jyotizoktagrahayogasya sUcakatA yaTA jAtakAlaNkAre AyurmUlaM janminAM jIvanaM syAdAjIvAnAM nirjarARAM suDeva evamrAhuH pUrbbamAcAryyavaryyAstasmAdAyuryogajAKyaM pravakzye lagnADISo tivIryyo yadi SuBavihagErvIkzitaH kendrayAtErdatte hyAyuH sudIrGaM guRagaRahitaM SrIyutaM mAnavAnAm sOmyAH svIyAlayasTA januzi ca raja nInAyake svIyatuNge vIryyAQye lagnanATe vapuzi ca SaradAM zazwirAyurnarARAm sOmyAH kendrAlayasTAvapuzi sura gurO lambatovA suDAMSorAyuryuktaM na dfzwaM na ca gaganagatEH sapnatirvatsarARAm yAtA mUlatrikoRe SuBagaganacarAH KIyatuNge surejye lagnADISo tivIryyo gaganavasu samA saMKyamAyurnarARAm sOmye kendre tivIryye yadi niGanapadaM KewahInaM samAH syustriMSat sOmyekzitaM cedgagana himakarEH saMyuto Ta svaBe cet svalpAMSe cAmarejye muni nayana mitaM svarkzago lagnago vA candrodyUne SuBaSced Page a gaganarasaminaM koRagAH sOmyaKewAH kIwe lagne surejye yadi Bavati tadA KAzwa tulyaM laveSe DarmmANge vANganAye niDanaBavanage krUradfzwe mbuhastAH lagnADI SAzwanATO layaBavanagatO saptaviMSat vilagne krUrejyO candradfzwO yadi niDanagataH kaScanAste dvipakzAH lagnedU krUrahInO vapuzi suragurO ranDraBaM KewahInaM kendre sOmye KaSElAH sitavibuTapurU syAcCataM kendra gO cet vAgISe karkalagne Satamiha Bfguje kendrage TArka sUno DarmANgasTe suDAMSO vyayanavamagate hAyanAnAM SataM syAt DIkendrAyurnavasTA yadi KalaKacarA no gurorBe vilagne kendre kAvye gurO vA SatamaTa niDanaM sOmya dfzwaM SataM syAt lagnAdindorna KewA yadi niDana gatA vIryyaBAjO sitejyO pUrRAyuH svIyarASO SuBagagana carAH zazwiraNgoccagejye kodaRqAntyArdvamaNgaM yadi sakala KagAH svoccagA jYe nijAMSe gosTe pUrRaM ca kendre suraguruBfgujo lABage bje parAyuH Sukre nIce tanusTe niDanapadagate somyadfzwe suDAMSO jIvaH kendre SataM syAdaya tanugfhapaSCidragaH puzkare bje vAgISovIryyadukto navamaBavanagAH sarvaKewAHSatAyuH karke Nge candrajIvO sahajaripuBage syAt kavijYO ca kendre kendre sUryyAra parAyuH kendre lagneSajIvO navasutanilaye kaRwake no Ka lAKyAHsampUrRRaMpApaKewAyadi gurula bargAjIvaBAge ca sOmyAH yugnarkzAMSe gatA vA vyayaDanagfhagASce cCuBAH SItamAnuH sampUrRo lagnayAyI Satamiha hi nfRA mindirAmandiraM syAt lagneSaH sOmyayukto vapuzi ca layapo ranDaro nAnyadfzwo viMSat kendreM layeSe balaviyuji taTA lagnape triMSadAyuH indAvApoklimasTe tadanu tanupatO nirbale pApadfzwedantEstulyaM tato rko SuBasvagavivarelagnato bjAttrisaMKyam ripPekendre surejye gururipusahaje syAt sa vApo NganATo rAmAbdaM karkalagne kujatuhinakarO kendraranDne graho na rAmAbdaM syAllayeSo vapupi ca niDanaM sOmyahInaM KavedAH lagneSoranDrayAto vapuzi niDanapaH syAnnfRAM vARasaMKyam nakre timmAMSumandO sahajaripu tatO kaRWake ranDranATaH pArAvArAbDisaMKyaM Page b tadanu SuBaKagAH svAMSagAstriMSadAyuH aNgeSe sOmyadfzwe yadi SuBavihagAvIryyavantastadAnIm yAtaH sOmye gaRe bjI guRa munigaRitaM ranDragErmaDyamAyuH syAccandrAdahni pAdE raTa tapanasute dvyaNgalagnaM prayAte ripPeSovAyurIjyo yadi balarahitaM kaNkapatrAkzasaMKyam karkANge caRqaDAmA KalavihagayutaH puzkare jYo dvijendro vAgISo nastayAyI viSiKapavanayuk syAccaturTAspadasTaH sOmyaH pIyUza DAmAntimatanuvilaye saMsTitI sO kavIjyAvekarkze puzka rAkzaM vyayaripuniDane mUrttipaScandrayuktaH mandAMSe lagnanATo BujagaSaramitaM syAdaTo sOmyaKewA ranDre no dehanATo vyayaripuniDane pApayuk zazwi rAyuH rASISolagnanATo dinamaRisahito mftyugovAsavejyo no kendre zazwirAyurvvapuzi dinakaraH SatruBOmAnvitaScet vAgISohInavIryyo vyayatanujagate yAminISe KaSElA Garme sarvEH parAyuH svalaKagalabagEH drekkARAH pASaDAriRaH lagnADipajanmapatI zazWAzwamarip PagO prasavakAle astamitO maraRakarO rASipramitErvade dvarzEH janmapatirjanmarASyaDipaH lagnADipajanmADiparizwam sOmyAH zazWAzwamagAH pApErvakropagatErdfzwAH mAsena mftyu dAsteyadi na SuBEstatra saMdfzwAH sOmyagraharizwam ekaH pApo zwamagaH SatrugfhI SatruvIkzitovarzAt mAra Page b yati naraM prasUtaM suDArasoyena pIto pi pApagraharizwam horAyAH saptane sOrirhivukasTaSca BAskaraH asmin yoge tu yojAtaH so lpAyurBavati priye vasuzazWagate jIve samasaptagate SanO dvAdaSasToyadA BAnurvarzamekaM na jIvati pratipadyuttarAzAQA navamyAmeva kfttikA pUrvvaBAdrapadAzwa myAmekAdaSyAYca rohiRI dvAdaSyAYca yadASlezA trayodaSyAM yadA maGA emirjAtona jIveta yadi Sakra samoBavet evamanye pi alpAyuryogA Akare dfSyAH manunA tu anaByAsena vedAnAmAcArasya tu varjjanAt AlasyAdannadozAcca mftyurviprAn jiGAMsati iti anna dozAderapi alpAyurhetutoktA annadozaSca aBakzya BakzaRAdi taccABakzyaSabde uktam AcAraSca AcAraSabde vakzyate
alpAyusa alpAyusa alpAyusa pu alpamAyuH jIvanakAlo yasya CAre paSuzu tasyEvAlpAyuzkatvAt taTAtvam alpajIvanakAle tri durAcArI hi puruzo loke Bavati ninditaH duHKaBAgI ca satataM vyADito lpAyureva ca manuH vA kapa alpAyuzko pyatra karmma yasya yAvadAyurucitaM tato lpamite jIvanakAle AyuSca jIvanakAlaHSatAyurvE puruza iti SruteH SatavarzAvacCinnajIvanakAlo narARAmAyuH evamanyezAmAyuH parimARamAyuH lAKyAH sampUrRaM pApaKewA yadi gurulavargAjIvaBAge ca sOmyAH yummarkzAMSe gatA vA vyavaDanagfhagAScecCuBAH SItaBAnuH sampUrRo lagnayAyI Satamiha hi nfRAmindirAmandiraM syAt lagneSaH sOmyayuktO vapuzi ca layapo ranDo nAnyadfzwoviMSat kendre layeSe balaviyuji taTA lagnape triMSadAyuH indAvApoklimasTa tadanu tanupatO nirbale pApadfzwe dantEstulyaM tato rko SuBaKagavivare lagnato bjAttrisaNKyam ripPekendre surejye gururipusahaje syAt sa pApo NganATo rAmAbdaM karkalagne kujatuhinakarO kendraranDre graho na rAmabdaM syAllayeSo vapuzi ca niyanaM sOmyahInaM svavedAH lagneSoranDrayAto vapuzi niDanapaH syAnnfRAM vARasaNKyam nakre tinmAMSumandO sahajaripunato PaRWake ranDranATaH pArAvArAbDisaNKyaM tadanu SuBaKagAH svAMSagAstriMSadAyuH aNgeSe sOmyadfzwe yadi SuBavihagAvIryyavantastadAnIm yAtaH sOmye gaRe bjo guRa munigaRitaM ranDragErmaDyamAyuH syAccandrAdahni pAdEraTa tapanasute dvyaNgalagnaM prayAte ripPeSovAyurIjyo yadi balarahitaM kaNkapatrakzasaNKyam karkANge caRqaDAmA KalavihagayutaH puzkare jYo dvijendro vAgISo nastayAyI viSiKapavanayuka syAccaturTAspadasTaH sOmyaH pIyUza DAmAntimatanuvilaye saMsTito sO kavIjyAvekarkze puzkarAkzaM vyayaripuniDane mUrttipaScandrayuktaH mandAMSe lagnanATo BujagaSaramitaM syAdaTo sOmyaKewA ranDre no dehanATo vyayaripuniDane pApayuk zazwi rAyuH rASISo lagnanATo dinamaRisahito mftyugovAsavejyo no kendre zazwirAyurvvapuzi dinakaraH SatruBOmAnvitaScet vAgISo hInavIryyo vyayatanujagate yAminISe KaSElA Garme sarvEH parASuH KalaKagalaBagEH kendrayAtEraSItiH krUrEH krUrarkzayAtEH SuBaBavanagatEH sOmyaKewEH savIyya lagneSe syAt parAyuH sutaBaganagatEH zazwirAyurnarARAm sAraNgasyAntyaBAge yadi vapuzi gate cAdyamAne ca kendre somyAH KewAH SataM syAdvasu sahaja suKe syAccirAyuH samastAH lagnAt prAleyaDAmno niDanasadanaporipPakendre zwaviMSat kendre sOmyagrahone yadi mftiBavane kaScidAste KarAmAH kzIRe prAleyamAnO yadi KalaKacaro ranDrago ranDranetA kendrasTo lagnanATo nijabalarahitaH KASvi tulyaM tadAyuH somyErApoklimasTE rdinamaRijaviDUvEriranDrAlayasTO tulyaM kAmANkuSEH syAdaTa DanalayagO ripPagO pApaKewO hInO KarBAnunA vA yadi himamahasAkASabAhu pramARaM kendrasTO sUryyamando yadi vapuzi kujaH puzpavARANkuSaH syAt SukrejyAvaNgayAtO tanayaBavanagO BAnupApAvanAyurjanmeSaH sArkalagne KalaKagasahito vIkzitaH syAdanAyuH yat samproktaM yogajAtampurARErhorApArAvArapAraprayAtEH tasmAdAyuH prARAMstyajati jantuH sUryyarizwam zazWe zwame ca candraH sadyo maraRAya pApasandfzwaH azwABiSca SuBErdfzwo varzErmiSrEstadardDena candrarizwam suta madanavAntyalagnaranDrezvaSuBayutomaraRAya SItaraSmiH BfgusutaSaSiputradevapUjyEryyadi baliBirna yuto valokito vA pApayutacandrarizwam dyUnacaturasramaMsTe pApadvayamaDyage SaSini jAtaH vilayaM prayAti niyataM devErapi rakzito bAlaH pApamaDyagacandrarizwam kzIRe SaSini vilagne pApEH kendrezu mftyusaMsTErvA Bavati vipattiravaSyaM javanADipatermataYcEtat kzIRacandrarizwam nAga go sidDa jAtI zu kzmA bDi tryaSvi Dfti rnaKAH kzmAgni dik cetyajAdyaMSe tattulyAbdErviDO vyasuH mezAdInAM triMSAMSaviSezasTacandrarizwam BOme vilagne SuBadEradfzwaH zazWe zwame vArkasutena yuktaH sadyaH SiSuM hanti vadenmunIndraH smare yamArO na SuBekzitO ca triviDaBOmarizwam karkawaDAmani sOmyaH zazWAmarASigovilagnarkzAt candreRa dfzwamUrttirvarzacatuzwayena mArayati buDarizwam bfhaspatirBOmagfhe zwamasTaH sUryyenduBOmArkajadfzwamUrttiH varzEstriBirmArgavadfzwihIno lokAntaraM prApayati prasUtam bfhaspatirizwam raviSaSiBavane Sukro dvAdaSaripuranDrago SuBEH sarvvEH dfzwaH karoti maraRaM zaqBirvarzEH kimiha vicitram Sukrarizwam mArayati zoqaSAhAt SanEScaraH pApavIkzito lagne saMyukto mAsena varzAcCudDastu mArayati triviDaSanirizwam rAhuScatuzwayasTomarapagya vIkzito Bavati pApEH varzErvadantidaSaBiH zoqaSaBiH kecidAcAryyAH GawasiMhavfScikodayakftisTitirjIvitaM harati rAhuH pApErnirIkzyamARaH saptamitErniScitaM varzEH rAhurizwam keturyyasminnfkze Byuditastasmin prasUyate jantuH rOdre sarpamuhUrtte prAREH saMtyajyate cASu keturizwam lagne ye drekkARA nigaqAhivihaNgamapASaDarasaMjYAH maraRAya saptavarze krUrayutAH svapatidfzwAH drekkARarizwam mInakarkawayorantyO vfScikasyAdyamaDyamO sarpAScatvAra evEte drekkARa nigaqASca te tulAmaDyAntasiMhASca kumBAdyAH pakziRaH smftAH vfzAdyamakarAdyantyA drekkARAH pASaDAriRaH lagnADipajanmapatI zazWAzwamaripPagO prasavakAle astamitO maraRakarO rASipramitErvadedvarzEH janmapatirjanmarASyaDipaH lagnADipajanmADiparizwam sOmyAH zazWAzwamagAH pApErvakropagatErdfzwAH mAsena mftyudAste yadi na SuBEstatra sandfzwAH sOmyagraharizwam ekaH pApo zwamagaH Satru gfhI SatruvIkzito varzAt mArayati naraM prasUtaM suDAraso yena pIto pi pApagraharizwam horAyAH saptame sOrirhibukasTaSca BAskaraH asmin yoge tu yo jAtaH so lpAyurBavati priye vasuzazWagate jIve samasaptagate SanO dvAdaSasToyadA BAnurvarzamekaM na jIvati pratipadyuttarAzAQA BavamyAmeva kfttikA pUrvvaBAdrapadAzwamyAmekAdaSyAYca rohiRI dvAdaSyAYca yadASlezA trayodaSyAM yadA maGA eBirjAto na jIveta yadi Sakrasamo Bavet evamanye pi alpAyuryogA Akare dfSyAH manunA tu anaByAsena vedAnAmAcArasya tu varjjanAt AlasyAdannadozAcca mftyurviprAn jiGAMsati iti annadozAderapi alpAyurhetutoktA annadozaSca aBakzyaBakzaRAdi taccABakzyaSabde uktam AcAraSca AcAraSabde vakzyate
alpIyam alpIyam alpIyam tri atiSayena alpaHIyasun striyAM NIp ati SayitAlpe
alpIyas alpIyas alpIyas tri atiSayena alpaH Iyasun striyAM NIp atiSayitAlpe
alpaganDa alpaganDa alpaganDa na alpo ganDo yasya raktakErave svalpaganDayukta mAtre tri ekAntasambanDe ic samA alpaganDiH tatrEva tri
alpaganva alpaganva alpaganva na alpo ganDoyasya raktakErave svalpaganDayukta mAtre tri ekAntasambanDe ic samA alpaganDiH tatrEva tri
amanIhara amanIhara amanIhara tri viroDe na ta ramyaBinne kutsite
amanInIta amanInIta amanInIta tri na manasA nItaH gfhItaH Sra manovfttyA agfhIte anaBiprete ca
amanIyoga amanIyoga amanIyoga pu manaso yogaH vizayezu sAvaDAnatayA saMyojanam aBAve na ta avaDAnABAve tattvanirRAyakamanovfttyaBAve na ba tacCUnye tri
amanohara amanohara amanohara tri viroDe na ta ramyaBinne kutsite
amanonIta amanonIta amanonIta tri na manasA nItaH gfhItaH manovfttyA agfhIte anaBiprete ca
amanoyoga amanoyoga amanoyoga pu ganaso yogaH vizayezu sAvaDAnatayA saMyo janam aBAve na ta avaDAnABAve tattvanirRA yakamanovfttyaBAve na ba tacCUnye tri
amarakoz amarakoz amarakoz pu amareRa kftaH kozaH amarasiMhakfte liNgAnuSAsanAKye trikARqAtmake aBiDAnaBede
amarakoza amarakoza amarakoza pu amareRa kftaH kozaH amarasiMhakfte liNgAnuSAsanAKye trikARqAtmake aBiDAnaBede
amatAsaNga amatAsaNga amatAsaNga na amftasya vizasyevAsaNgo yatra nIlavarRe tutTaBede hema tasya vizatulyanIlavarRatvAt taTAtvam
ambU ambU ambU pu abi Sabde kla ni na iw amlarase tadvati tri
ambaprasAda ambaprasAda ambaprasAda pu ambUni prasAdayati pra sada Ric aR upa sa katakakavfkze nirmAlyi
ambla ambla ambla pu abi Sabdekla ni na iw amlarase tadvati tri
ambuprasAda ambuprasAda ambuprasAda pu ambUni prasAdayati pra sada Ric aR upa sa katakakavfkze nirmAlyi
amftAsaNga amftAsaNga amftAsaNga na amftasya vizasyevAsaNgo yatra nIlavarRe tutTa Bede hema tasya vizatulyanIlavarRatvAt taTAtvam
amftagaBa amftagaBa amftagaBa pu amftaM brahma garBe Byantare yasya jove tasya brahmAtmakatvAt brahmaRA cAntaryAmitayA tadantaHsTitatvAt taTAtvam yo na jIvo si na mfto devAnAmamftagarBo si svapna aTa svapsyan svena tadA sapanno BavatIti SruteH suzuptyavasTAyAM sakalAnarTAnavaBAsanena tacCUnyatayA jIvasya brahmarUpApattyA taTAtvam aDikaM suzuptiSabde dfSyam amftasya mokzasya gaBe ADAraH brEhmaRi
amftagarBa amftagarBa amftagarBa pu amftaM brahma garBe Byantare yasya jIve tasya brahAtmakatvAt brahmaRA cAntaryAmitayA tadantaH sTitatvAt taTAtvam yo na jIvo si na mfto devAnAmamftagarBo si svapna aTa svapsyan svena tadA saMpanno BavatIti SruteH suzuptyavasTAyAM sakalAnarTAnavaBAsanena tacCUnyatayA jIvasya brahmarUpApattyA taTAtvam aDikaM suzuptiSabde dfSyam amftasya mokzasya garBa ADAraH brahmaRi
amftasIdara amftasIdara amftasIdara amftasya sodara ekata utpannatvAt uccEHSravasi aSve tasyAmftamaTane samudrAdutpannatvAt taTAtvam surA devI samutpannA turagaH pARqarastaTA BA A pAa tajjAtIyatvAt GowakamAtre rAjani

amlabIja amlabIja amlabIja na amlasya bIjaM kAraRam tetula vfkzAmle
amlavIja amlavIja amlavIja na amlasya vIjaM kAraRam tetula vfkzAmle
amuyyakula amuyyakula amuyyakula na ta ni aluk prasidDakule manojYAvuY Amuzyakulakam tadBAve kOlInye na

anDa anDa anDa dfzwiviGAte ada cu uBa DAtvarTagfhItakarmmakatvAdakarmakaH DAtvarTagfhItakarmmakatvA dakarmakaH sew anDayati te AdiDat AndiDat ta anDayan anDitaH kanakamfgatfzRAnDitaDiyeti sA da dfzwiratra netrendriyajaM pratyakzaM vivekajYAnaYca tadDiGAtASrayasya tadviGAtASrayasya karttftvam anDa tri anDa ac netradvayaSUnye ekacakzurhIne tu nAsya prayogaH anupahatanetrAntareRa tasya darSanasamBavAt anDaSca dviviDaH janmAnDaH utpattO netradvayavAnapi rogAdinA upahatanetradvayaSca uBayatrEva tatprayogAt jaqamUkAnDabaDirAniti jaqamUkAnDa baDirAniti unmatto nDaSca varjyAH syuriti ca manuH ihEvAste tu sA loke gOranDevEkaveSmanIti anaMSO klIbapatitO klIvapatitO jAtyanDabaDirO taTeti smftyantaram anDogaganaM anDo gaganaM na paSyatIti vyu gadA vfdDo nDaH patireza maYcakagata iti sA da cakzuH sattve cakzuHsattve pi AlokAdi sahakArikAraRAntarABAvena dfzwirAhitye pi asya prayogaH yaTA divAnDAH prARinaH kecidrAtrAvanDAstaTA pare keciddivA taTA rAtrO prARinastulyadfzwaya iti devo devI tatra pecakAnAM darSane AlokABAvasyEva sahakAritayA tezAM divAnDatvam kapotAdInAM tu sUryyAlokABAve pi dIpAdyAlokAntarasadBAve rAtrAvanDatA manuzyARAntu divA sUryyAlokAt rAtrO dIpAdyAlokAt uBayatra dfzwimattvAnnAnDatvam vivekajYAnaSUnye kroDAnDastasya tasya svayamiha Baviteti veRI veRo nEvAnyatra madAnDasindUraGaweti madAnDasindUra Gaweti gaNgAstotram smarAnDA gAQatAruRyA samastaratakovideti samasta ratakovideti sA da ajYAnatimirAnDasyeti gurunatiH guru natiH parivrAjakaBede tasya sacakzuracakzuriva sakarRaH akarRa ivetyAdi sakarRRaH akarRRa ive tyAdi SrutyA bAhyavastudarSanaSUnyacakzuH SUnyatvokteranDatvam vAhyavastudarSanaSUnyacakzuHSUnya tvokteranDatvam ataeva tizWatovrajatovApi yasya cakzurna dUragam dUra gam catuzpadAM BuvaM muktvA parivrAqanDa ucyate ityanena tasyAnDatvaM pariBAzitam nazwadravalABAlABopayogitayA jyotizapariBAzite rASiBede ca mezA mezo vfzo mfgendracca mfgendraSca divAnDAH parikIrttitAH nfyukkarkawakanyASca rAtrAvanDAH prakIrttitA iti taTA ca mezAdizu divA nazwadravyasya lABaH tatra grahItuScorasya grahItuScOrasya divAnDatvAt miTunAdizu tu rAtrO nazwadravyasya lABaH tatra grahItuScOrasya rAtrAvanDatvAt Page a anyatra nazwasya na lABa ityetatparatayA tatrAnDatvam BAktam anDayatItyanDam anDa cu preraRe Ric ac anDa karaRe ac vA tamasi anDakAre anDaM tamaste praviSanti ye ke cAtmahanIjanA cAtmahanojanA iti SrutiH yaTArTajYAnAvarake yaTArTa jYAnAvarake vedAntimatasidDe ajYAne ca AsIdidaM tamoBUtamiti manO tamasAvftatattveneti tamasEvAvftaM tamasE vAvftaM tattvaM nAnyatpaSyati mUQaDIriti nAnupaSyati mUQaGIriti ca purARe tamaH Sabde nAjYAnasyEvABiDAnAttaTAtvam SabdenAjYAnasyEvABiDAnAttaTAtvam jale na medi tasya manuzyARAmanDakAritvAttaTAtvam tezAM hi jalamaDye unmIlitanetrARAmapi na darSanamityanuBavasidDam anDa pu anDa ran deSaBede sa ca deSaH jagannATAdUrdDa BAgAdarvAk SrIBramarAtmakAt tAvadanDrABiDodeSa ityuktaH vEdehena kArAvarasya striyAmutpAdite antyajaBede ca vyADaBede iti andIla andIla a A ndIla dolane ada cu uBa saka sew a A ndolayati te Andudolat ta lyuw a A ndolanam kintvAsAmaravindasundaradfSAM drAkcAmarAndolanAdityudBawaH a A ndolitaH curAderAkftigaRatvanAyamutprekzitaH sa ca dIrGAdiH Andolat ka dolane iti kavikalpadrumokteH hrasvAnta ityanye tanmUlaM mfgyam

anigIrRRa anigIrRRa anigIrRRa tri na nigIrRaH anapahnutaBede vizayasyAni gIrRasyAnyatAdAtmyapratItikft sAropA syAditi sA da anigIrRasya anapahnutaBedasya vizayasya Aropavizayasya AropyamARasya anyasya AropASrayasya tAdAtmyamaBeda statpratItikft tadboDasADanaM vfttiH sAropA lakzaReti tadarTaH yaTA aSvaH Sveto DAvatItyAdO SvetaguRavAnaSvo na pahnutaBedaH san svasamavetaSvetaguRatAdAtmyena pratIyate itya tastatra sAropA lakzaRA
anigIrRa anigIrRa anigIrRa tri na nigIrRaH anapahnutaBede vizayasyAnigIrRasyAnyatAdAtmyapratItikft sAropA syAditi sA da anigIrRasya anapahnutaBedasya vizayasya Aropavizayasya AropyamARasya anyasya AropASrayasya tAdAtmyamaBedastatpratItikft tadboDasADanaM vfttiH sAropA lakzaReti tadarTaH yaTA aSvaH Sveto DAvatItyAdO SvetaguRavAnaSvo napahnutaBedaH san svasamavetaSvetaguRatAdAtmyena pratIyate ityatastatra sAropA lakzaRA
anja anja anja gatO kAntO mrakzaRe vyaktO ca ruDA varttamAne kta Udit vew para anakti sici parasmEpade nityamiw AYjIt AnaYja aYjitA aNktA aYjizyati Nkzyati kta aktaH ktin aktiH ktvA aktvA aYjitvA vi prakA Sane vyanakti vyajyate vyanakti kAlatritaye pi yogyatA miti mAGaH GaY vyaNgaH Ryat vyaNgyaH savyaNgya muttamaM kAvyamiti Ric vyaYjayati lyuw vyaYja Page a nam anyArTaDIkft vyApftiraYjanam kA pra karttari lyu vyaYjanA ekatrArTe nyaDIheturvyaYjanA sABiDA Srayeti sA da
annAprASana annAprASana annAprASana na prakfzwaM viDAnena praTamamASanaM prASanaM ta zazWAzwamamAsAdO bAlakAderviDAnena praTamamannaBojane zazWe nnAprASanaM mAsi yadvezwaM maNgalaM kule iti manuH tato nnaprASanaM zazWe mAsi kAryyaM yaTAviDi azwame vAsya karttavyaM yadvezwaM maNgalaM kule iti smftyantaram zazWa iti muKyakalpa iti raGu tatrAyaM viSezaH kftyacintAmaRO annasya prASanaM kAryyaM mAsi zazWe zwame buDEH strIRAntu paYcame mAsi saptame prajagO muniH tatra vihitatiTyAdi yaTA zazWe mAsi niSAkare SuBakare riktetare vA tiTO sOmyAdityasitendujIvadivase pakze ca kfzRotare prAjeSAditi pOzRavEzRavayugErhastAdizawkottarErAgneyAppatipEtryaBESca nitarAmannAdiBakzaH SuBa iti Buja BI prAjeSAdayaSca rohiRyAdayaH taTAcEtanmitAni nakzatrARi tatra vihitAni tatra varjyAni dvAdaSIsaptamInandAriktAsu paYcaparvasu balamAyuryyaSosu hanyAt SiSUnAmannaBakzaRam kftyaci veDaM sarvatra varjjaye dityukternakzatraveDasyApi tatra varjyatA
annapUrRA annapUrRA annapUrRA annaM pUrRaM yayA devIBede annapUrRe sadApUrRe SaNkaraprARavallaBe jYAnavErAgyasidDyarTaM BikzAM me dehi pArvvatIti SaNkarAcAryyaH ezA ca kASISvaragfhiRI kASIKaRqe etasyA BUriSo varRanam
annapUrRRA annapUrRRA annapUrRRA annaM pUrRRaM yayA devIBede annapUrRe sadApUrRe Saqkara prARaballame jYAnavErAgyasirdDyaTaM BikzAM me dehi pArvvatIti SaNkarAcAryyaH ezA ca kASISvaragfhiRI kASIKaRqe etasyABUriSo varRRanam
annapUrRReSvarI annapUrRReSvarI annapUrRReSvarI strI BEravIBede tantrasAre syA vivaraRam anna pUrRRAyAmapi BikzAM dehi kfpAvalokanakarI mAtAnna pUrReSvarIti SaNkarAcAryyaH
annapUrReSvarI annapUrReSvarI annapUrReSvarI strI BEravIBede tantrasAre syA vivaraRam annapUrRAyAmapi BikzAM dehi kfpAvalokanakarI mAtAnnapUrReSvarIti SaNkarAcAryyaH
annaprASana annaprASana annaprASana na prakfzwaM viDAnena praTamamASanaM prASanaM ta zazWAzwamamAsAdO vAlakAderviDAnena praTamamannaBojane zazWe nnaprASanaM mAsi yadvezwaM maNgalaM kule iti manuH tato nnaprASanaM zazWe mAsi kAryyaM yaTAviDi azwame vAsya karttavyaM yadvezwaM maNgalaM kule iti smftyantaram zazWa iti muKyakalpa iti raGu tatrAyaM viSezaH kftya cintAmaRO annasya prASanaM kAryyaM mAsi zazWe zwame buDEH strIRAntu paYcame mAsi saptame prajagO muniH tatra vihitatiTyAdi yaTA pazWe mAsi niSAkare SuBakare riktetare vA tiTO sOmyA dityasitendujIvadivase pakze ca kfzRetare prAjeSAditi pOzRavEzRavayugErhastAdizawkottarErAgneyAppatipEtryaBESca ni tarAmannAdiBakzaH SuBa iti Buja BI prAjeSAdayaSca rohiRyAdayaH taTAcEtanmi tAni nakzatrARi tatra vihitAni tatra varjyAni dvAdaSIsaptamInandAriktAzu paYcaparvasu balamAyuryyaSoha nyAt SiSUnAmannaBakzaRam kftyaci veDaM sarvatra varjjaye dityukternakzatraveDasyApi tatra varjyatA
antarbAzpa antarbAzpa antarbAzpa tri antargataM bAzpam bAhyAprakASite kaRWapaTAprApte rodanajanyajalakaRe ba tadyuktapadArTe tri antarbAzpavilocane iti
antardDi antardDi antardDi pu antar DA ki AcCAdane vyavaDAne anta rDAne ca antardDO yenAdarSanamicCati pA
antardvi antardvi antardvi pu antar DA ki AcCAdane vyavaDAne antarDAne ca antardDO yenAdarSanamicCati pA

antaryAmivrAhmaRa antaryAmivrAhmaRa antaryAmivrAhmaRa na antaryAmina ISvarasya jYApakam Page b brAhmaRaM mantretaravedaBAgaH vfhadARyakAntargate antaryA minaH ISvarasya jYApake brAhmaRe tacca pfzwe darSitam
antyakamman antyakamman antyakamman na ante nASe BavaM karmma antyezwikriyAyAm jAyAyE pUrvvamAriRyE dattvAgnInantyakarBaRi vrAtyAnAM yAjanaM kftvA parezAmantyakarma ca aBicAramahIMnaYca triBiH kfcCrErvyapohati iti jAtakarmmAntyakarmARi navaSrAdDaM taTEva ceti ca manuH tamenaM mftamito smAdgrAmAt agnaye iti CA upa agnaye gnyarTamftvijoharanti puttrA vAntyakarmmaRi iti CA upa BA
antyakarmman antyakarmman antyakarmman na ante nASe BavaM karmma antyezwikriyAyAm jAyAyE pUrvvamAriRyE dattvAgnInantyakarmaRi vrAtyAnAM yAjanaM kftvA parezAmantyakarma ca aBicAramahIMnaYca triBiH kfcCrErvyapohati iti jAtakarmmAntyakarmARi navaSrAdDaM taTEva ceti ca manuH tamenaM mftamito smAdgrAmAt agnaye iti CA upa agnaye gnyarTamftvijoharanti putrA vAntyakarmmaRi iti CA upa BA

apIhya apIhya apIhya tri apa uha gatyAdO karmmaRi Ryat apagamanIye tyAjye etErvratErapohyaM syAdenohiMsAsamudBavam manuH apa vaha lyap dUrIkftyetyarTe avya
apaBraMSa apaBraMSa apaBraMSa pu apa BranSa GaY apakzaraRe aDaH patane atyArUQirBavati mahatAmapyapaBraMSanizWA Saku apaBraMSati svaBAvAt pracyavate apa BraMSa karttari ac sADuSabdasya SaktivEPalyaprayuktAnyaTAccAraRayukte apaSabde ta eva SaktivEkalyapramAdAlasatAdiBiH anyaToccAritAH SabdA apaSabdA itIritA iti hariRA sADuSabdAnAmevAnyaToccAraRe paSabdatokteH tasya svaBAvato BraMSAt taTAtvam anapaBraMSatAnAdiryadAByudayayogyateti hariH ABIrAdigiraH kAvyezvapaBraMSagiraH smftAH SAstrezu saMsmftAdanyadapaBraMSatayoditamiti daRqI
apaBraSa apaBraSa apaBraSa pu apa BranSa GaY apakzaraRe aDaHpatane atyA rUQirBavati mahatAmapyapaBraMSanizWA Saka apaBraMSati svaBAvAt pracyavate apa BranSa karttari ac sADu Sabdasya SaktivePalyapayuktAnyaTAccAraRayukte apaSabde ta eva SaktivEkalyapramAdAlasatAdiBiH anyaToccAritAH SabdA apaSabdA itIritA iti hariRA sADuSabdAnA mevAnyaToccAraRe paSabdatokteH tasya svaBAvato BraMSAt taTA tvam anapaBraMSatAnAdiryadAByudayayogyateti hariH ABIrAdigiraH kAvyezvapaBraMSagiraH smftAH SAstrezu saMsmftAdanyadapaBraMSataToditamiti daRqI
apagAram apagAram apagA go ram avya apa gurI udyamane Ramul eca Acca vA udyamyetyarTe asyapagAram asyavagoraM veti si kO
apagaram apagaram apaga go ram avya apa gurI udyamane Ramule eca Acca vA udyamyetyarTe asyapagAram asyavagoraM veti si kO
apamUrdDa apamUrdDa apamUrdDa tri apagato mUrdDA yasya SiraHSUnye kabanDe

aparRA aparRA aparRA strI nAsti parRAnyapi vfttisADanAni yasyAH SElarAjaduhitari umAyAM sA hi SivaprAptyarTaM vratakAle parRAnyapi tyaktavatI yaToktaM kumAre svayaM viSIrRadrumaparRavfttitA parA hi kAzWA tapasastayA punaH tadapyapAkIrRamataH priyaMvadAm vadantyaparRAmiti tAM purAvida iti caturTe tyaktaparRA ca aparRAKyAmavApa seti Si pu
aparRRA aparRRA aparRRA strI nAsti parRRAnyapi vfttisADanAni yasyAH SElarAjaduhitari umAyAM sA hi SivaprAptyarTaM vratakAle parRRAnyapi tyaktavatI yaToktaM kumAre svayaM viSIrRRadrumaparRRa vfttitA parA hi kAzWA tapasastayA punaH tadapyapAkIrRRa mataH priyaMvadAm vadantyaparRRAmiti tAM purAvida iti caturTe tyaktaparRRA ca aparRRAKyAmavApa seti Si pu
aparavakta aparavakta aparavakta na ayuji nanaralA guruH samenjamaparavaktamidaM tatojarO iti vfttaratnAkarokte ardDasame mAtrAvfttaBede vadantyaparavaktAKyaM vEtAlIyaM vipaScitaH puzpitAgrABiDaM kecidOpacCandasikaM taTeti vf ra aparavaktA striyAmiti kecidAhuH
aparavaktra aparavaktra aparavaktra na ayuji nanaralA guruH same njamaparavaktramidaM Page b tatojarO iti vfttaratnAkarokte ardDasame mAtrAvfttamede vadantyaparavaktrAKyaM vEtAlIyaM vipaScitaH puzpitAgrABiDaM kecidOpacCandasikaM taTeti vf ra aparavaktrA striyAmiti kecidAhuH
aparo'kza aparo'kza aparo kza avya na paro kzam indriyAsannikfzwam pratyakze vizayendriyasannikarzotpanne jYAne samBAvanAdinirAse tu vicAravipAkAttenEva pramARena janitaM jYAnaM pratibanDABAvAt PalaM janayadaparo kzamityucyate iti vfdDAH PalaM jYAtatAmiti BAwwAH citi budDeH prativimbamiti sAMKyAH budDO citaH prativimbamiti vedAntinaH saMskAraM vizayatAviSezaM veti tArkikAdayaH taTA hi praTamamindriyeRa vizayaH saMbaDyate tato vizayAlocanArUpaM vinirvikalpakasTAnIyaM sAmAnyAkAraM jYAnaM jAyate tataH vizayAvaraRarUpapratibanDanASAt citprativimbarUpaM PalaM janayajjYAnamaparokzamityucyate iti vedAntinaH nEyAyikAstu vizayendriyasannikarzAt praTamaM nirvikalpakarUpaM viSezyaviSezaRayoH saMsargAnavagAhi jYAnaM jAyate taduttaraM vizayapratyakzamityaNgIcakruH sAMKyAdayastu vizayendriyasannikarzAt budDestattadvizayakAreRa pariRAme jAte tataScetanASaktO budDeH prativimbarUpaM Palamutpadyate tatrEva jYAnatvavyavahAromuKyaH budDivfttO tu gORa iti manyante yuktito pi na bADyate diNmoharadaparokzAdfte sAM sU brahmaRastu ajYAnarUpAvaraRABAvAt sarvadA prakASamAnatvAt nendriyAdisannikarzApekzeti tasya sarvadA pratyakzarUpatvam yat sAkzAdaparokzAdbrahmeti SrutiH aparokzAdaparokzamityarTaH arSA astyarTe ac tadvizaye tri
aparokza aparokza aparo kza avya na paro kzam indriyAsannikfzwam pratyakze vizayendriyasannikarzotpanne jYAne samBAvanAdinirAse tu vicAravipAkAttenEva pramARena janitaM jYAnaM pratibanDA BAvAt PalaM janayadaparo kzamityucyate iti vfdDAH PalaM jYAtatAmiti BAwwAH citibudDeH prativimbamiti sAMKyAH budDO citaH prativimbamiti vedAntinaH saMskAram vizayatAviSezaM veti tArkikAdayaH taTA hi praTamamindriyeRa vizayaH saMbaDyate tato vizayAlocanArUpaM vinirvikalpakasTAnIyaM sAmAnyAkAraM jYAnaM jAyate tataH vizayAvaraRarUpapratibanDa Page b nASAt citprativimbarUpaM PalaM janayajjYAnamaparokzamityu cyate iti vedAntinaH nEyAyikAstu vizayendriyasanni karzAt praTamaM nirvikalpakarUpaM viSezyaviSezaRayoH saMsargAna vagAhi jYAnaM jAyate taduttaraM vizayapratyakzamityaNgIcakraH sAMKyAdayastu vizayendriyasannikarzAt budDestattadvizayakAreRa pariRAme jAte tataScetanASaktO budDeH prativimbarUpaM Pala mutpadyate tatrEva jYAnatvavyavahAromuKyaH budDivfttO tu gORa iti manyante yuktito pi na bADyate diNmoharadaparokzA dfte sAM sU brahmaRastu ajYAnarUpAvaraRABAvAt sarvadA prakASamAnatvAt nendriyAdisannikarzApekzeti tasya sarvadA pratyakzarUpatvam yat sAkzAdaparokzAdbrahmeti SrutiH apa rokzAdaparokzamityarTaH arSA astyarTe ac tadvizaye tri
apavyayamA apavyayamA apavyayamA tri apa vi aya SAnac apalApa karttAra arTe pavyayamAnantu kAraRena viBAvitam dApavedDanikasyArTaM daRqaleSaYca Saktita iti manuH apavyayamAnamapalapantamiti di ta raGu apavyayakarttari tri
apavyayamAna apavyayamAna apavyayamAna tri apa vi aya SAnac apalApa karttari arTe pavyayamAnantu kAraRena viBAvitam dApa yedDanikasyArTaM daRqaleSaYca Saktita iti manuH apavyaya mAnamapalapantamiti di ta raGu apavyayakarttari tri
apazWa apazWa apazWa na apa sTA ka amvA ambA zatvam aNkuSAgre hema apakramya sTAtari tri apazWa avya apa sTA suzAmAdi zatvam nirddoze SoBane viparIte ca apazWu paWataH pAWyamaDigozWi SaWasya te iti nEza pratikUle virudDArTe ca tri kAle pu apazWa na apa sTA ka ambA zatvam aNkuSAgre hema apakramya sTAtari tri apazWa avya apa sTA suzAmAdi zatvam nirddoze SoBane viparIte ca apazWu paWataH pAWyamaDigozWi SaWasya te iti nEza pratikUle virudDArTe ca tri kAle pu
apazWu apazWu apazWu avya apa sTA suzAmAdi zatvam nirddoze SoBane viparIte ca apazWu paWataH pAWyamaDigozWi SaWasya te iti nEza pratikUle virudDArTe ca tri kAle pu
apetarAkzasI apetarAkzasI apetarAkzasI strI apetaH rAkzasa iva pAtakaM yasyAH gO NIz tulasyAM rAjani tasyAH rAkzasatulyapApAdiharaRAttaTAtvam dUrvvA dahati pApAni DAtrI harati pAtakam haritakI haredrogaM tulasI harate trayam A ta skAndoktestasyAH pApAdihAritvam
apetarAsakzI apetarAsakzI apetarAsakzI strI apetaH rAkzasa iva pAtakaM yasyAH gO NIz tulasyAm rAjani tasyAH rAkzamatalyapApAdiharaRA ttaTAtvam dUrbbA dahati pApAni DAtrI harati pAtakam haritakI haredrogaM tulasI harate trayam A ta skAndoktestasyAH pApAdihAritvam
apigrAhya apigrAhya apigrAhya tri api graha vede kyap loke Ryat pratigrAhye
apohya apohya apohya tri apa uha gatyAdO karmmaRi Ryat apagamanIye tyAjye etErvratErapohyaM syAdenohiMsAsamudBavam manuH apa vaha lyap dUrIkftyetyarTe avya
aprAkfta aprAkfta aprAkfta tri prakfterAgatam aR prAkftam na ta prakftikAryyaBinne ISvaralIlAdO prakfteH svaBAvasya ayam aR na ta svaBAvasambanDiBinne asAmAnye manuzyAdO ca
aprAyus aprAyus aprAyus tri na prakfzwaM pragataM vA yuryasya prakfzwAyurBinne gatAyurBinne ca naktayaH sudarSatarodivAtarAdaprAyuzaH f
aprAyusa aprAyusa aprAyusa tri na prakfzwaM pragataM vA yuryasya prakfzwAyurBinne gatAyurBinne ca naktayaH sudarSataro divAtarAdaprAyuzaH f
apratItta apratItta apratItta ti prati dA kta pratIttaM pratidattaM na ta Page a pratidattaBinne apamityamapratIttaM yadasmi yamasya yena balinA carAmi iti aTarvavedaH
apratiBA apratiBA apratiBA strI aBAve na ta vAdiprativAdinorvAde pravftte vAdinodBAvitadozodDAraRopAyajYAne pi tatkAlaM prati vAdinaH sPUrttyaBAvarUpe nigrahasTAnaBede uttarasyA patipattirapratiBeti gO sU pragalBatABAve ca
apratimA apratimA apratimA strI aBAve na ta vAdiprativAdinorvAde pravftte vAdinodBAvitadozodDAraRopAyajYAne pi tatkAla prativAdinaH sPUrttyaBAvarUpe nigrahasTAnaBede uttarasyA pratipattirapratiBeti gO sU praglaBatABAve ca
apriyaMvada apriyaMvada apriyaMvada tri viroDe na ta kawuvAkyavAdini udvejakavAkyaprayoktari
apriyavada apriyavada apriyavada tri viroDe na ta kawuvAkyavAdini udvejakavAkyaprayoktari
apsaram apsaram apsaram strI ba va adByaH saranti udgacCanti sf amun samudrAnnissftAyAM svarveSyAyAm apsunirmaTanAdeva rasAtta smAdvarastriyaH utpeturmanujaSrezWa tasmAdapsaraso Bavan ityuktestAsAM taTAtvam ekApsaraHprArTitayorvivAdaH raGuH ArADito dDA manurapsaroBiScakre prajAH svAH sa nimezacihnAH iti mAGaH tAsAM ca nAwyakarmma vfttiH tASca praDAnatayA dvAdaSa vahnipurARe darSitAH urvvaSI menakA ramBA miSrakeSI hyalambuzA viSvAcI ca GftAcI ca paYcacUqA tilottamA BAnuvatyabalA ramyA dvAdaSApsarasaH SuBAH iti gaRaBedanAmADyAye atra SuBA iti viSezaRAt anyA api tASca urvaSI menakA ramBA GftAcI puYjikAsTalA sukeSI maYjuGozA ca mahAraNgavatIti ca iti mA pu aditirditirdanuH kAlA danAyuH siMhikA taTA kroDA praDA ca viSvA ca vinatA kapilA muniH kadruSca manujavyAGra dakzakanyAstrayodaSa iti kaSyapapatnIraBiDAya ityete devaganDarvvAH prADeyAH parikIrttitAH iti ganDarvavaMSamaBiDAya ca imaM tvapsarasAM vaMSaM viditaM puRyalakzaRam praDA sUta mahABAgAdeva devarzitaH purA alambuzA miSrakeSo vidyutparRA tilo ttamA aruRA rakzitA cEva ramBA tadvanmanoramA keSinI ca subAhuSca suratA surasA taTA supriyA cAtibAhuSca Page a ityuktam BA A pa etAsAYca caturddaSotpatti sTAnAni ka dambaryyAM varRRitAni yaTA vibuDasadmanyapasaraso nAma kanyakAH santIti tAsAM caturdaSa kulAni ekaM BagavataH kamalayonermanasaH samutpannam anyadvedeByaH samBUtam anya dagnerudBUtam anyat pavanAt prasUtam anyadamftAnmaTya mAnAduTitam anyajjalAjjAtam anyadarkakiraReByo nirgatam anyat somaraSmiByo nizpatitam anyadBUmeru dBUtam anyat sOdAmanIByaH pravfttam anyanmftyunA nirmi tam aparaM makaraketunA samutpAditam anyattu dakzasya prajApateratipraBUtAnAM sutAnAM maDye dvO sute munirarizwA ca baBUvatuH tAByAM ganDarvEH saha kuladvayaM jAtam evametAnyekatra caturdaSa kulAni etanmUlaM tu vistaraBayA nnoktam diSi upadiSi ca tayorjalahetutvAttaTA tvam puYjikAsTalA ca kratuScApsarasAviti ya puYjikAsTalA kratusTalA cApsarasO digu padigrUpe paricArike iti vedadI apsarasAviti dik ca upadik smAha SrutestaTAtvam menakA vE apsarArUpiRIti BAzyaprayogAt apsarasAviti Sruti nirdeSAcca nityabahuvacanAntatedyutsargaH kvacidekavacanAntatA pi
apsaras apsaras apsaras strI ba va adByaH saranti udgacCanti sf amun samudrAnnissftAyAM svarveSyAyAm apsunirmaTanAdeva rasAttasmAdvarastriyaH utpeturmanujaSrezWa tasmAdapsaraso Bavan ityuktestAsAM taTAtvam ekApsaraH prArTitayorvivAdaH raGuH ArADito dDA manurapsaroBiScakre prajAH svAH sanimezacihnAH iti mAGaH tAsAM ca nAwyakarmmavfttiH tASca praDAnatayA dvAdaSa vahnipurARe darSitAH urvvaSI menakA ramBA miSrakeSI hyalambuzA viSvAcI ca GftAcI ca paYcacUqA tilottamA BAnuvatyabalA ramyA dvAdaSApsarasaH SuBAH iti gaRaBedanAmADyAye atra SuBA iti viSezaRAt anyA api tASca urvaSI menakA ramBA GftAcI puYjikAsTalA sukeSI maYjuGozA ca mahAraNgavatIti ca iti mA pu aditirditirdanuH kAlA danAyuH siMhikA taTA kroDA praDA ca viSvA ca vinatA kapilA muniH kadruSca manujavyAGra dakzakanyAstrayodaSa iti kaSyapapatnIraBiDAya ityete devaganDarvvAH prADeyAH parikIrttitAH iti ganDarvavaMSamaBiDAya ca imaM tvapsarasAM vaMSaM viditaM puRyalakzaRaM praDA sUta mahABAgAdeva devarzitaH purA alambuzA miSrakeSI vidyutparRA tilottamA aruRA rakzitA cE ramBA tadvanmanoramA keSinI ca subAhuSca suratA surasA taTA apriyA cAtibAhuSca ityuktam BA A pa etAsAYca caturddaSotpattisTAnAni kAdambaryyAM varRitAni yaTA vibuDasadmanyapasaraso nAma kanyakAH santIti tAsAM caturdaSakulAni ekaM BagavataH kamalayonermanasaH samutpannam anyadvedeByaH samBUtam anyadagnerudBUtam anyat pavanAt prasUtam anyadamftAnmaTyamAnAdutTitam anyajjalAjjAtam anyadarkakiraReByo nirgatam anyat somaraSmiByo nizpatitam anyadBUmerudBUtam anyat sOdAmanIByaH pravfttam anyanmftyunA nirmitam aparaM makaraketunA samutpAditam anyattu dakzasya prajApateratipraBUtAnAM sutAnAM maDye dvO sutO munirarizwA ca baBUvatuH tAByAM ganDarvEH saha kuladvayaM jAtam evametAnyekatra caturdaSa kulAni etanmUlaM tu vistaraBayAnnoktam diSi upadiSi ca tayorjalahetutvAttaTAtvam puYjikAsTalA ca kratuScApsarasAviti ya puYjikAsTalA kratusTalA cApsarasO digupadigrUpe paricArike iti vedadI apsarasAviti dik ca upadik smAha SrutestaTAtvam menakA vE apsarArUpiRoti BAzyaprayogAt apsarasAviti SrutinirdeSAcca nityabahuvacanAntatedyutsargaH kvacidekavacanAntatA pi
arGa arGa arGa mUlye BvAdi para saka sew arGati ArGIt AnarGa arGaH arGyaH arGa pu arGa GaY kreyavastugrahaRArTaM kreyavastugrahaRAryaM deye tulyarUpe rajatAdidravyarUpe mUlye kurvvIta kurbDIrta cEzAM pratyakzamarGa pratyakzamarDa saMsTApanaM nfpaH kuryyurarGaM yaTApaRyamiti ca manuH arha karaRe GaY nyaNkvAditvAt kutvam pUjopacAre dUrvvAkzatAdO sAmagErayaM sayakAraH klIbaliNgaSca prayoktavyaH klIvaliNgaSca prayo ktavyaH anyEH puMliNgo niryakAraSca arGAya puMliNgoniryakAraSca aGAya deyam yat arGyam pUjArTe deve jalAdO jalAdo arGadravyARi ca ApaH kzIraM Page a kuSAgraYca daDi sarpiH sataRqulam yavaH sidDArTakaScEva azwANgo rGaH prakIrttitaH kASIKaRqam tamarGyamarGyAdikayAdipUrUzaH tamarvyamarvyAdi kayAdipUrUzaH mAGaH arGyamarGyamiti vAdinaM nfpaM so navekzya BaratAgrajo yataH arGAnupadamASizamiti arGAnupadamASiza miti ca raGuH arGa mUlye BvAdi para saka sew arGati ArGIt AnarGa arGaH arGyaH arGa pu arGa GaY kreyavastugrahaRAryaM deye tulyarUpe rajatAdidravyarUpe mUlye kurbDIrta cEzAM pratyakzamarDa saMsTApanaM nfpaH kuryyurarGaM yaTApaRyamiti ca manuH arha karaRe GaY nyaNkvAditvAt kutvam pUjopacAre dUrvvAkzatAdO sAmagErayaM sayakAraH klIvaliNgaSca prayo ktavyaH anyEH puMliNgoniryakAraSca aGAya deyam yat arGyam pUjArTe deve jalAdo arGadravyARi ca ApaH kzIraM Page a kuSAgraYca daDi sarpiH sataRqulam yavaH sidDArTakaScEva azwANgo rGaH prakIrttitaH kASIKaRqam tamarvyamarvyAdi kayAdipUrUzaH mAGaH arGyamarGyamiti vAdinaM nfpaM so navekzya BaratAgrajo yataH arGAnupadamASiza miti ca raGuH
arRRava arRRava arRRava pu arRA si santyasmin arRas va salopaH samudre yAdoratnErivArRRavaH raGuH kfzRArRRa vAByarRacarEkahaMsaH mAGaH udakayukte tri tataH samudrAdarRavAt sanDyAmantraH tiraH samudramarRavam f arRavamudaka Page b yuktam BA arRAMsi dAtfvenAstyasya matup salopaH jaladAtari sUryye indre ca AdityAjjAyate vfzwiH gItokteH sUryyasya parjanyAGipatvAcca Sakrasya jaladAtftvAttaTAtvam saBAnurarRRavo nfcakzAH f SatakratumarRRavaM SAkiyaM naram arRRavaM parjjanyAtmanodakavantam BA sajale ca ajaekapAdanamiturarRRavam f brahma loke etAdevatAH sfzwA asminmahatyarRRave E brA asya samudrAvAcitvena kzIrArRavaH jalArRavaH lavaRArRRavaH ityAdO ADAratAmAtraboDaH
arRRavaja arRRavaja arRRavaja pu arRRavAt jAyate jana qa ta samudraPene ratnamA samudrajAtamAtre tri arRRavajAtAdayo pyatra
arRRavodBava arRRavodBava arRRavodBava pu udBavatyasmAt uda BU apAdAne ap arRRava udBavo sya agnijAravfkze candre ca amfte na SriyAM strI
arRRoBava arRRoBava arRRoBava pu arRasi jale Bavati BU ac ta SaNKe jalodBavamAtre tri
arRRoda arRRoda arRRoda pu arRAMsi dadAti dA ka meGe mustake tta jaladAtari tri
arRavaM arRavaM arRavaM pu arRAMsi santyasmin arRas va salopaH samudre yAdoratnErivArRavaH raGuH kfzRArRavAByarRacarEkahaMsaH mAGaH udakayukte tri tataH samudrAdarRavAt sanDyAmantraH tiraH samudramarRavam f arRavamudakayuktam BA arRAMsi dAtftvenAstyasya matup salopaH jaladAtari sUryye indre ca AdityAjjAyate vfzwiH gItokteH sUryyasya parjanyADipatvAcca Sakrasya jaladAtftvAttaTAtvam saBAnurarRavo nfcakzAH f SatakratumarRavaM SAkiyaM naram arRavaM parjjanyAtmanodakavantam BA sajale ca ajaekapAdanamiturarRavam f brahmaloke etA devatAH sfzwA asminmahatyarRave E brA asya samudrAvAcitvena kzIrArRavaH jalArRavaH lavaRArRavaH ityAdO ADAratAmAtraboDaH
arRavaja arRavaja arRavaja pu arRavAt jAyate jana qa ta samudraPene ratnamA samudrajAtamAtre tri arRavajAtAdayo pyatra
arRavodBava arRavodBava arRavodBava pu udBavatyasmAt uda BU apAdAne ap arRava udBavo sya agnijAravfkze candre ca amfte na SriyAM strI
arRoBava arRoBava arRoBava pu arRasi jale Bavati BU ac ta SaNKe jalodBavamAtre tri
arRoda arRoda arRoda pu arRAMsi dadAti dA ka meGe mustake tta jaladAtari tri
arSas arSas arSa rsa s na f asun SuW suW dantAdirityanye balikAkAre guhyasTarogaBede yaTAha suSrutaH zaqa rSaMsi Bavanti vAtapittakaPaSoRitasannipAtEH sahajAni ceti tatrAnAtmavatAM yaToktEH gamya praduzya balIrmmAMsaprarohAn janayanti viSezatomandA gnestaTA tfRakAzWopalalozwravastrAdiBiH SItodakasaMsparSa nAdvA kandAH parivfdDimAsAdayanti tAnyarSAMsItyAcakzate tatra sTUlAndrapratibadDamardDa paYcANgulaM gudamAhustasmin balaya stisro DyardDANgulAntaraBUtAH pravAhaRI visarjjanI saMvaraRI ceti caturaNgulAyatAH sarvAstiryyagekANgulocCritAH SaNKA varttaniBAScApi uparyyupari saMsTitAH gajatAluniBAScApi varRataH samprakIrttitAH romAnteByo yavADyardDaM gudOzWaH parikIrttitaH praTamA tu gudOzWAdaNgulamAtre tezAntu BavizyatAM pUrvvarUpARi anne na SradDA kfcCrAtpaktiramlIkA sakTisadanamAwopaH kArSyamudgArabAhulyamakzRoSca SvayaTurandra kUjanaM gudaparikarttanamASaNkA pARqurogagrahaRI dozaSo zaRaM kAsaSvAsOBramastandrA nidrendriyadOrbbalyaYca jAte Page a zvetAni rUpARi pravyaktatarARi Bavanti tatra mArutAtpa riSuzkAruRavarRAni vizamamaDyAni kadambapuzpatuRqikerI nAqImuKasUcImuKAkftIni ca Bavanti tErupahataH saSUlaM saMhatamupaveSyate kawIpfzWapArSva meQragudanABipradeSezu cAsya vedanA gulmAzWolAplIhodarARi cAsya tannimittAnyeva Bavanti kfzRatvaNnaKanayanadaSanavadanamUtrapurIzaSca puruzo Bavati pittAnnIlAgrARi tanUni visaprpIRi pItAvaBAsAni yakftprakASAni SukajihvAsaMsTAnAni yavamaDyAni jalO kovaktrasadfSAni praklinnAni ca Bavanti tErupahataH saruDira matisAryyate jvaradAhapipAsAsUrcCAScopadravA Bavanti pItatvaNnaKanayanadaSanavadanamUtrapurIzaSca puruzo Bavati SlezmajAni SvetAni mahAmUlAni sTirARi vfttAni snigDAni pARqUni karIrapanasAsTigostanAkArARi na Bidyante na sravanti kaRqUbahulAni ca Bavanti tErupahataH saSlezmARamanalpaM mAMsaDAvanaprakASamatisAryyeta SoPaSIta jvarArocakAvipAkaSirogOravARi cAsya tannimittAnyeva Bavanti SuklatvaNnasvanayanadaSanavadanamUtrapurIzaSca puruzo Bavati raktajAni nyagroDaprarohavidrumakAkaRantikAPalasadf SAni pittalakzaRAni ca yadAvagAQapurIzaprapIqitAni Bavanti tadAtyarTaM duzwamanalpamasfk sahasA visfjanti tasyEvA tipravfttO SoRitAtiyogopadravA Bavanti sannipAtajAni sarvvadozalakzaRayuktAni sahajAni duzwaSoRitaSukranimi ttAni tezAM dozata eva prasADanaM karttavya viSezataScAtra durdarSanAni paruzARi pARqUni dAruRAnyantarmuKAni tErupadrutaH kfSo lpaBuk sirAsantatagAtro lpaprajaHkzIRa retAH kzAmasvaraH kroDano lpAgnirDrARaSiro kziSravaRa rogavAn satatamandrakUjAwopahfdayopalepArocakapraBftiBiH pIqyate arSa AdyA mahArogA atipApAdBavanti hi SAtA smf pfzo salopaH arSamapyatra na

jAtezvetAni rUpARi pravyaktatarARi Bavanti tatra mArutAtpariSuzkAruRavarRAni vizamamaDyAni kadambapuzpatuRqikeronAqImuKasUcImuKAkftIni ca Bavanti tErupahataH saSUlaM saMhatamupaveSyate tErupahataH saSlezmARamanalpaM mAMsaDAvanaprakASamatisAryyeta SoPaSIta jvarArocakAvipAkaSirogOravARi cAsya tannimittAnyeva Bavanti SuklatvaNnaKanayanadaSanavadanamUtrapurIzaSca puruzo Bavati raktajAni nyagroDaprarohavidrumakAkaRantikAPalasadfSAni pittalakzaRAni ca yadAvagAQapurIzaprapIqitAni Bavanti tadAtyarTaM duzwamanalpamasfk sahasA visfjanti tasyEvAtipravfttO SoRitAtiyogopadravA Bavanti sannipAtajAni sarvvadozalakzaRayuktAni sahajAni duzwaSoRitaSukranimittAni tezAM dozata eva prasADanaM karttavyaviSezataScAtra durdarSanAni paruzARi pARqUni dAruRAnyantarmuKAni tErupadrutaH kfSo lpaBuk sirAsantatagAtro lpaprajaH kzIRaretAH kzAmasvaraH kroDano lpAgnirGrARaSiro kziSravaRarogavAn satatamandrakUjAwopahfdayopalepArocakapraBftiBiH pIqyate arSa AdyA mahArogA atipApAdBavanti hi SAtA smf pfzo salopaH arSamapyatra na arSasa tri arSas astyarTe c balikAkAraguhyavyADiyukte hInakriyaM honakriyaM nizpuruzaM niSCandoromaSArSasam manuH arSasa tri arSas astyarTe c balikAkAraguhyavyADiyukte honakriyaM nizpuruzaM niSCandoromaSArSasam manuH
arTasaMgraha arTasaMgraha arTasaMgraha pu ta DanasaYcaye
arTasaNgraha arTasaNgraha arTasaNgraha pu ta DanasaYcaye
arTatam arTatam arTatam avya arTa tasil arTAdityarTe arTAnusAraRa tyarTe vastusvaBAvAdityarTe ca arTato pyadvayA nandAnatotadvEtaBAnataH ve sA
arTatas arTatas arTatas avya arTa tasil arTAdityarTe arTAnusAreRetyarTe vastusvaBAvAdityarTe ca arTato pyadvayAnandAtItadvEtaBAnataH ve sA
araRya araRya araRya pu na aryyate Seze vayasyatra f anya vane Page b ardDarccAdi mAtA yasya gfhe nAsti BAryyA cApriyavAdinI cApri yavAdinI araRyaM tena gantavyaM yaTAraRyaM taTA gfham cARakyaH sAvitrImapyaDIyIta gatvAraRyaM samAhitaH samA hitaH gfhe gurO vAraRye vA nivasannAtmavAn dvijaH manuH gfhasTastu yadA paSyedvalIpalitamAtmanaH paSyedbalIpalitamAtmanaH apatyasyEva cApatyaM tadAraRyaM samASrayet manunA antye vayasyeva araRyavAsaviDAnAttasya taTAtvam svArTe kan tatrEva ya enameva vindanti ye cAraRyakamASritAH yA smf kawPalavfkze pu utkarAdi caturarTyAM Ca araRyIyaH araRyasannikfzwadeSAdO tri araRye DyeyaH vuY buY AraRyakaM vanapAWye anuvAkBede AraRyakamaDItya ca manuH araRyamaDikftya kftaH granTaH AraRyam rAmAyaRAntargatAraRyakARqe araRya RyAnAm pati pu araRyAnAM tatrasTAnAM cOrARAM patiH vA aluk samA cOrADizWAtari rudre namonamonicerave paricarAyAraRyAnAM pataye namaH yaju rudro hi lIlayA cOrAdirUpaM Datte yadvA rudrasya jagadAtmakatvAccOrAdayo rudrA eva DyeyAH yadvA stenAdiSarIre jIveSvararUpeRa rudro dviDA tizWati tatra jIvarUpaM stenAdiSabdavAcyam tadISvararudrarUpaM lakzayati yaTA SAKAgraM candram ve dI tasya sarvaniyantftvena cOrARAmapi patitvaM yuktameva eza eva sADu karmma kArayati taM yamunninIyate eza evAsADu karmma kArayati taM yamaDoninIzate iti SrutyA tasya sADvasADukarmmaniyantftvasyokteH pUrvvakftakarmmasApekzatvena ca na vEzamyanErGfRye ityAkare vyaktam araRyacaravyADapatO ca araRya pu na aryyate Seze vayasyatra f anya vane Page b ardDarccAdi mAtA yasya gfhe nAsti BAryyA cApri yavAdinI araRyaM tena gantavyaM yaTAraRyaM taTA gfham cARakyaH sAvitrImapyaDIyIta gatvAraRyaM samA hitaH gfhe gurO vAraRye vA nivasannAtmavAn dvijaH manuH gfhasTastu yadA paSyedbalIpalitamAtmanaH apatyasyEva cApatyaM tadAraRyaM samASrayet manunA antye vayasyeva araRyavAsaviDAnAttasya taTAtvam svArTe kan tatrEva ya enameva vindanti ye cAraRyakamASritAH yA smf kawPalavfkze pu utkarAdi caturarTyAM Ca araRyIyaH araRyasannikfzwadeSAdO tri araRye DyeyaH buY AraRyakaM vanapAWye anuvAkBede AraRyakamaDItya ca manuH araRyamaDikftya kftaH granTaH AraRyam rAmAyaRAntargatAraRyakARqe
araRyaGolo araRyaGolo araRyaGolo strI araRyajA GolI vanaGolyAM patraSAkaBede rAjani
araRyagolI araRyagolI araRyagolI strI araRyajA golI vanaGolyAM patraSAkaBede rAjani
araRyamudga araRyamudga araRyamudga pu ta vanamudge
araRyapati araRyapati araRya RyAnAm pati pu araRyAnAM tatrasTAnAM cOrARAM patiH vA aluk samA cOrADizWAtari rudre namonamonicerave paricarAyAraRyAnAM pataye namaH yaju rudro hi lIlayA cOrAdirUpaM Datte yadvA rudrasya jagadAtmakatvA ccOrAdayo rudrA eva DyeyAH yadvA stenAdiSarIre jIveSvara rUpeRa rudrodviDA tizWati tatra jIvarUpaM stenAdiSabdavAcyam tadISvararudrarUpaM lakzayati yaTA SAKAgraM candram ve dI tasya sarvaniyantftvena cOrARAmapi patitvaM yuktameva eza eva sADu karmma kArayati taM yamunninIyate eza evAsADu karmma kArayati taM yamaDoninIzate iti SrutyA tasya sADvasADu karmmaniyantftvasyokteH pUrvvakftakarmmasApekzatvena ca na vEza myanErGfRye ityAkare vyaktam araRyacaravyADapatO ca
araRye'nUcya araRye'nUcya araRye nUcya tri araRye anUcyaH niyatapAWyo mantro yasya aluk samA araRyamAtrapaWyamantreRa saMskfte purAqASAdO paScAdaraRye nUcyam araRye nUcyA vaktavyAH paWanIyA mantrA yasyAsO araRye nUcya iti karka ta aluksa araRye nUcye pAwye mantraBede pu sa ca ugraSca BOmaScetyAdimantraH sahi niyatamaraRye paWyate iti karka vAgevAraRye nUcyAso raRyenUcyo Bavati tA brA araRye nUcyaH kaScidanuvAkaH tena hUyamAno pi puroqASo ruRye nUcyo Bavati BA ayameva pakzaH SreyAn karkamate bahuvrIhyASrayaRe saptamyA luk na syAt aluksamAsasya tatpuruzEkavizayatvAt ata upacArAt tatsambanDavAcakatvaM yuktam so syEzo vAN prARa etasya prajApateH so raRyenUcyo Bavati Sata brA
araRyenUcya araRyenUcya araRye nUcya tri araRye anUcyaH niyatapAWyomantro yasya aluka samA araRyamAtrapAwyamantreRa saMskfte purA qASAdO paScAdaraRye nUcyam araRye nUcyA baktavyAH paWanIyA mantrA yasyAsO araRye nUcya iti karka ta aluksa araRye nUcye pAWye mantraBede pu sa ca ugraSca BImaScetyAdimantraH sahi niyatamaraRye paWyate iti karka vAgevAraRye nUcyA so raRyenUcyo Bavati tA brA araRye nUcyaH kaSci Page b danuvAkaH tena hUyamAno pi puroqASo ruRye nUcyo Bavati BA ayameva pakzaH SreyAn karkamate bahuvrIhyA SrayaRe saptamyA luk na syAt aluksamAsasya tatpuruzE kavizayatvAt ata upacArAt tatsambanDavAcakatvaM yuktam so syEzo vAN prARa etasya prajApateH so raRyenUcyo Bavati Sata vrA

aragvaDa aragvaDa aragvaDa pu pf hrasvaH AragvaDavfkze SuM DAlo
aram aram aram avya aya am vA lasya ratvam vakzyamARe lamarTe SIGratAyAYca arahkftaSabde araNkftiSabde ca udA atyarTeca tasmA araM gamAvaH yA aramize stavAmahe mIlahuze araMgamAya jagmaye f
arama arama arama avya ala am vA lasya ratvam vakzyamARe lamarTe SIGratAyAYca araNkftaSabde araNkftiSabde ca udA atyarTe ca tasmA araM gamAvaH ya aramize stavAmahe mIlhuze araMgamAya jagmaye f arama tri na ramyate tra ADAre GaY aDame arama avya ala am vA lasya ratvam vakzyamARe lamarTe SIGratAyAYca araNkftaSabde araNkftiSabde ca udA atyarTe ca tasmA araM gamAvaH ya aramize stavAmahe mIlhuze araMgamAya jagmaye f arama tri na ramyate tra ADAre GaY aDame
arbada arbada arba rbu da na arba rba vic tasmE udeti ud iR qa Av iti KyAte mAMsapiRqAkAre rogaBede sa ca suSrutoktavartmASrayezu ekaviMSatirogezu maDye rogaBedaH pfTagdozA samastASca yadA vartmavyapASrayAH sirA vyApyAvatizWante vartmasvaDikamUrcCitAH vivardDya mAMsaM raktaYca tadA vartmavyapASrayAn vikArAn janayatyASu nAmatastAn niboData ityupakramya utsarddinopraBftIn ekaviMSatiBedAn uktvA tezAM pratyekalakzaRAnyuktAni tatra kartmAntarasTaM vizamaM granTiBUtamavedanam vijYeyamarbudaM puMsAM saraktamavalambitam ityarbudalakzmoktam arbudaYca nAnAviDaM mAMsArbudaSoRitArbudAdiBedAt kfzRasPowIsaraktESca piqakABiSca pIqitam yasya vastirujaScogrA jYeyaM tacCoRitArbudam mAMsadozeRa jAnIyAdarbudaM mAMsasamBavam evaM medo rbudAdayo pi jAnIyAdarbudaM mAMsasamBavam evaM medo rbudAdayo pi tatroktA rogaBedA jYeyAH daSakowisaNKyAyAM tatsaNKyAtezu ca ekAdikowisaNKyA daSaguRottarA uktvA arbudamavajaM KarvaniKarvamahApadmaSaNsavastasmAt lIlA imA me gna izwakA DenavaH santvekA ca daSa ca daSa ca SataM ca SataM cetyupakramya arbudaM canyarbudaYca iti yaju parvvataBede asuraBede ca pada mahAntaM cidarbudaM nikramI padA f kAdraveye sarpaBede pu paYcame hanItyupa kramya arbudaH kAdraveyo rAjetyAha tasya sarpAviSaH iti Sata brA ambUni dadAti dA ka vede masya raH meGe nyarbudaM vAvfDAno aguH f ambUni dadAtItyurbudo meGaH BA arbudAkAratvAt garBasya mAMsapiRqaBede yadi piRqaH pumAn strI cetpeSI napuMsake rbudamiti suSru dvitIyamAsikagarBamAtre na praTame mAsi saMkledaBUto DAtuvimUrcCitaH mAsyarbuDaM dvitIye tu tftIye NgendriyEryutaH yA smf dvitIye tu mAsi arbudamIzatkaWinaM mAMsapiRqamayaM Bavati mitA
arbuda arbuda arbu rvu da na arba rva vic tasmE udeti ud iR qa Av iti KyAte mAMsapiRqAkAre rogaBede sa ca suSrutoktavartmASrayezuekaviMSatirogezu maDyerogaBedaH pfTag dozA samastASca yadA vartma vyapASrayAH sirA vyApyAvatizWante vartmasvaDikamUrcCitAH vivardDya mAMsaM raktaYca tadA vartmavyApASrayAn vikArAn janayatyASu nAmatastAn niboData ityupakramya utsarddinopraBftIn ekaviMSati BedAn uktvA tezAM pratyekalakzaRAnyuktAni tatra vartmA ntarasTaM vizamaM granTiBUtamavedanam vijYeyamarbudaM puMsAM saraktamavalambitam ityarvudalakzmoktam arbudaYca nAnAviDaM mAMsArvudarSoRitArvudAdiBedAt kfzRa sPowIsaraktESca piqakABiSca pIqitam yasya vastiruja ScogrA jYeyaM tacCoRitArbudam mAMsadozeRa jAnIyA darbudaM mAMsasamBavam evaM medo rbudAdayo zi tatroktA rogaBedA jYeyAH daSakowisaMKyAyAM tatsaMKyAtezuma ekAdikowisaMKyA daSagfRottarA uktvA arbudamavajaM KarvaniKarvamahApadmaSaNkzavastasmAt lIlA imA me gna izwakA DenavaHsantvekA ca daSa ca daSa ca SataM Page a ca SataM cetyupakramya arbudaM canyarbudaYca iti yaju parvvataBede asuraBede ca pu mahAntaM cidarbudaM nikramI padA f kAdraveye sarpaBede pu paYca me hanItyupa kramya arbudaH kAdraveyo rAjetyAha tasya sarpAviSaH iti Sata brA ambUni dadAti dA ka vede masya raH meGe nyarbudaM vAvfDAno aguH f ambUni dadAtItyarbudo meGaH BA arbudAkAratvAt garBasya mAMsapiRqaBede yadi piRqaH pumAn strI cetpeSI napuMsake rbudamiti suSru dvitIyamAsikagarBamAtre na praTame mAsi saMkledaBUto DAtuvimUrcCitaH mAsyarbudaM dvitIye tu tftIye NgendriyEryutaH yA smf dvitIye tu mAsi arbudamIzatkaWinaM mAMsapiRqamayaM Bavati mitA
arca arca arca pUjAyAm uBa BvAdi saka sew arcati te ArcIt Arccizwa Anarca rce pitfScEvAzwakAsvarccet pitFScEvAzwakAsvarccet manuH evaM hi sarvaBUtAni brAhmaRo nityamarcati brAhmaRonityamarcati manuH ratnapuzpopahAreRa CAyAmAnarca pAdayoH raGuH vfndizwamArccIdvasuDADipAnAm vfndizWamArccIdvasuDADipAnAm samIhe marttumAnarce tena vAcA KilaM balam ArccIt dvijAtIn paramArTavindAn para mArTavindAn prAnarccurarcyaM jagadarcanIyam viprAnarcaMstaTA viprAnarcaM staTA stuvan iti ca BawwiH arciH arcakaH arcitaH arcitavAn arcitum arcitvA arca pUjAyAM curA uBa saka sew arcayati te Arcicat Arci cat ta arcayAmAsa dUrasTamArcayedenam manuH svargOkasAmarcitamarcayitvA kumA arca pUjAyAm uBa BvAdi saka sew arcati te ArcIt Arccizwa Anarca rce pitFScEvAzwakAsvarccet manuH evaM hi sarvaBUtAni brAhmaRonityamarcati manuH ratnapuzpopahAreRa CAyAmAnarca pAdayoH raGuH vfndizWamArccIdvasuDADipAnAm samIhe marttumAnarce tena vAcA KilaM balam ArccIt dvijAtIn para mArTavindAn prAnarccurarcyaM jagadarcanIyam viprAnarcaM staTA stuvan iti ca BawwiH arciH arcakaH arcitaH arcitavAn arcitum arcitvA arca pUjAyAM curA uBa saka sew arcayati te Arci cat ta arcayAmAsa dUrasTamArcayedenam manuH svargOkasAmarcitamarcayitvA kumA
arcatrya arcatrya arcatrya tri arca BAve atri arcatrimarcanamarhati yat pUjanIye arcatryo maGavA nfByaH f arcatryaH arcanIyaH BA

arcavat arcavat arcava ma t tri arcirastyasya matup vede maysa vaH dIptiyukte udyannakzatramarccivat f yatte pavitramarcivadagneH f loke tu arcimAn striyAM NIp
arcivat arcivat arciva ma t tri arcirastyasya matup vede masya vaH dIptiyukte udyannakzatramarccivat f yatte pavitramarcivadagneH f loke tu arcimAn striyAM NIp
ardDenda ardDenda ardDenda pu ardDumindoH ekade ta candratulyAMSe jawA jUwasamAyuktAmardDendukftaSeKarAm durgADyAnam tadAkAra tvAt naKakzate tarjanyaNguzWavistArarUpe galahastamudrA Bede ardDacandrAkAre vARe ca
ardDendu ardDendu ardDendu pu ardDumindoH ekade ta candratulyAMSe jawAjUwasamAyuktAmardDendukftaSeKarAm durgADyAnam tadAkAratvAt naKakzate tarjanyaNguzWavistArarUpe galahastamudrABede ardDacandrAkAre bARe ca
ardda ardda ardda pIqane BvAdi uBa saka sew arddati te ArddIt Arddizwa rakzaH sahasrARi rakzaHsahasrARi caturddaSArdIt raGuH Anardda arddakaH arddi arddI ardditvA ardditaH ati atipIqane atyarddikta atyardditaH aBi AnimuKena ABimuKena pIqane aBeSvAvidUryye pA ukteH sAmIpye ca anyarRaH aByarRRaH samIpavarttI kAloByarRa kAloByarRRa jalAgamaH sA da anyatra aByardvitaH aByadditaH nis nir Page b vA BfSapIqane so syAyaM parANeva prARo nirardati Sata vrA vi viSezeRa pIqane tad yA UrmmI vyarddataH paSO vA puruze yA vA Sata vrA sam samarRaH ninyarRaH samarRRaH ni nyarRRaH vi vyarRaH vyarRRaH ardda yAcane gatO saka pIqAyAM aka BvAdi para sew arddati ArddIt yAcane SaradDanaM SaradGanaM nArddati cAtako cAta ko pIti raGuH ardda baDe curA uBaya saka sew arddayati te Arddidat Arddi dat ta yonArddidat yenArddidat dEtyapuraM pinAkI BawwiH avyarRo girikUwABAnaByarRAnArddidat avyarRRo girikUwABAnaByarRRAnArddidat drutam BawwiH sam samyakpIqane yantAramasya sahasA triBirvAREH samArddayat samA rddayat BA va pa prati pratirUpapIqane yasya yatkarttfkaM pIqanaM tenEva punastasya pIqane pratyardDayata saMkrudDo rAGavaH punarAhave rAmA ardda pIqane BvAdi uBa saka sew arddati te ArddIt Arddizwa rakzaHsahasrARi caturddaSArdIt raGuH Anardda arddakaH arddI ardditvA ardditaH ati atipIqane atyardditaH aBi ABimuKena pIqane aBeSvAvidUryye pA ukteH sAmIpye ca aByarRRaH samIpavarttI kAloByarRRa jalAgamaH sA da anyatra aByadditaH nis nir Page b vA BfSapIqane so syAyaM parANeva prARo nirardati Sata vrA vi viSezeRa pIqane tad yA UrmmI vyarddataH paSO vA puruze vA Sata vrA sam samarRRaH ni nyarRRaH vi vyarRRaH ardda yAcane gatO saka pIqAyAM aka BvAdi para sew arddati ArddIt yAcane SaradGanaM nArddati cAta ko pIti raGuH ardda baDe curA uBaya saka sew arddayati te Arddi dat ta yenArddidat dEtyapuraM pinAkI BawwiH avyarRRo girikUwABAnaByarRRAnArddidat drutam BawwiH sam samyakpIqane yantAramasya sahasA triBirvAREH samA rddayat BA va pa prati pratirUpapIqane yasya yatkarttfkaM pIqanaM tenEva punastasya pIqane pratyardDayata saMkrudDo rAGavaH punarAhave rAmA

ariBeda ariBeda ariBeda pu arerviwsvadirasyeva medaH sAra syando sya guiyAvAvalA vfkzaBede aririva medyati rUkzakzatvAt alpaM snihyati mida ac viwKadire saMjYAyAM kan kfmiBede tadgaRanAyAm vAhyakA picciwaH kumBI varccakIwo rimedakaH suSru
ariDAyam ariDAyam ariDAyam tri ariBirISvareH DAryyate DA asun pf yuw ca ISvaraDAryye azwAvariDAyasogAH f ariDAyasaH ariBirISvarEH DAryyamARA BA
ariDAyas ariDAyas ariDAyas tri ariBirISvarEH DAryyate DA asun pf yuw ca ISvaraDAryye azwAvariDAyasogAH f ariDAyasaH ariBirISvarEH DAryyamARA mA
arimeda arimeda arimeda pu arerviwsvadirasyeva medaH sAraH syando sya guiyAvAvalA vfkzaBede aririva medyati rUkza kzatvAt alpaM snihyati mida ac viwKadire saMjYAyAM kan kfmiBede tadgaRanAyAm vAhyakA picciwaH kumBI varccakIwo rimedakaH suSru

arttuka arttuka arttuka tri fta bA ukaY spardDake samadvEnAnvinda tyartyukAha Bavatnyapi hatarmaDaM samadvindati Sata brA
aruRAtmaja aruRAtmaja aruRAtmaja pu ta jawAyO pakziRi sUryaputre mande sAvarRRe manO karRRe sugrIve yame ca aSvi nokumArayoH dvi va yamunayAM tapatyAM ca strI trIRyapatyAni kOravya saMjYAyAM tapatAMvaraH Adityo janayAmAsa kanyAM dvO ca prajApatI sa ca vEvasvataH pUrbbaM SrAdDa devaH prajApatiH yasaSca yamunA cEva yamajO saMBUvatuH saMjYAyAM dvO sutO sutA ceti trIRyapatyAni dvitIyAyAM tu saMjYAyAM saMjYeyamiti cintayan Adityo janayAmAsa putramAtmasamaM taTA pUrbbajasya manostAta sadfSo yamiti praBuH manurevABavannAmrA sAvarRRa iti cocyate dvitI yAyAM sutastasyAH sa vijYeyaH SanEScaraH iti sAvarRRaH SaniSca etO dvO sutO saMjYAyAH CAyAKyAyAM dvitIyAyAM savarRRAyAM jAtO harivaM vaqavArUpaDariRyAM saMjYAyAYca aSvinIkumArO jAtO yaTA tatrEva baqavArUpamAsTAya vane carati SAdvale sa taTArUpamAsTAya svAM BAryyAM SuBa lIlayA dadarSa yogamAsTAya svAM BAryyAM vaqavAM tataH aDfTAM sarvvaBUtAnAM tapasA niyamena ca baqavAvapuzA rAjaM ScarantImakutoBayAm so SvarUpeRa BagavAMstAM suKaM sama BAvayat mETunAya vicezwantIM parapuruzaSaNkayA sA tanniravamacCukraM nAsikAyAM vivasvataH devO tasyAmajA yetAmaSvino BizajAM varO nAsatyaScEva dasraSca smftO dvAbaSvi nAviti tapatISabde tadutpattiH karRRotprattiH yaTA evamuktA bahuviDaM sAntvapUrvvaM vivasvatA sA tu nEcCadvarArohA kanyA hamiti BArata banDupakzaBayAdBItA lajjayA ca yaSasvinI tAmarkaH punarevedamabravIdBaratarzaBa matprasAdAnna te rAjYi Bavi Page a tA doza ityuta evamuktvA sa BagavAn kuntirAjasutAM tadA prakASakarttA tapanaH sambaBUva tayA saha tatra vIraH samaBavat karRaH SastraBftAM varaH AmuktakavacaH SrImAnde vagarBaH SriyA nvitaH sahajaM kavacaM biBrat kuRqalI dyotitAnanaH ajAyata sutaH karRaH sarvvalokezuviSrutaH BA A pa sugrIvotpattiH sugrIvaSabde dfSyA
arvAksrItas arvAksrItas arvAksrItas pu arvAk aDogAmi srotoretoyasya UrdDarotoBinne indriyapralasakte
arvAksrotas arvAksrotas arvAksrotas pu arvAk aDogAmi srotoretoyasya UrdDvarotoBinne indriyaprasakte
arvaSeya arvaSeya arvaSeya pu urvaSyA apatyam Qak agastye munO hemaca tasya ca uvvaSIM dfzwvA mitrAvaraRayoH sKalitaretojA ta tayA taTAtvam tatpramARaYcAgastiSabde uktam ElaSabde darSitezu urvaSIgarBajAtezu purUravasaH sutezu AyurAdizu zawsu ca
asOpAnahma asOpAnahma asOpAnahma pu upAnahe ayam tadarTaM vikfteH prakftO pA ityaDikAre Yya upanadrUpavikArasADane tatprakftO muYje carmmaRi na
asTUri asTUri asTUri pu sTA bA kUri ekASvayuktaSakawaM sTUri na ta tadviparItam bahuBiraSvAdiBiryute Sakawe asTUri gArhapatyAni santu f
asTiri asTiri asTiri pu sTA bA kUri ekASvayuktaSakawaM sTUri na ta tadviparItam bahuBiraSvAdiBiryute Sakawe asTUri gArhapatyAni santu f
asa asa asa dIptO aka grahaRe gatO ca saka BvAdi uBa sew asati te AsIt Asizwa lAvaRya utpAdya ivAsa yatnaH kumA asa vidyamAnatAyAm adA aka para sew asti staH santi asi sTaH sTa sTaHsTa ammi svaH smaH syAt syuH astu stAm santu eDi asAni AsIt asya asArvvaDAtuke BvAdeSaH tena BUDAtuvadrUpam vidyamAnatA ca kAlasambanDadAraRaM kAla saMbanDaDAraRaM taduktaM hariRA AtmAnamAtmanA viBradastI biBradastI vyavadiSyate antarBAvAcca tenAsO karmaRA na sakarmmakaH astyuttarasyAM diSi devatAtmA kumA yaccAvahAsArTama satkfto si gItA prapanno smi svEraMtirasamahAnandaniratAm tmi svEraM ratirasamahAnandanira tAm SyAmAstavaH syAdvA saMKyAvato rTasya samudAyo BiDAyakaH PaRiBA syAtAmasitre mitre ca sahajaprAkftAvapi sahaja Page a prAkftAvapi mAGaH kAmatastu pravfttAnAmimAH syuH kramaSo varAH manuH dinedine tvaM tanureDi re Dikam nEza AsIdidaM AsI didaM tamoBUtamaprajYAtamalakzaRam manuH natvevAhaM jAtu nAsamiti gItA san santO santaH sadeva somyedamagra AsIt CA u yo nyaTA santamAtmAnamanyaTA pratipadyate prati padyate manuH nAsato vidyate nAsatovidyatate BAvonABAvo vidyate sataH gItA striyAM NIp satI satI yogavisfzwadehA kumA satI vA vidyamAnA vA prakftiH pariRAminI hariH vi ati vyatihAre parasparamekarUpeRa sTitO anyo vyatiste tu mamApi DarmmaH BawwiH asa kzepe divA para saka sew asyati asyet asyatu Asyat AsTat Asa asitA astA asizyati asyan asyat asyamAnaH astaH asitum astum asitvA astvA aByasya nirasya Are asmAddEvyaM asmaddEvyaM helo asyatu f dasya ve dasyave hetimasyAryyam f ati atidUrakzepaRe bahuBiScEkamatyasyannekena ca bahUn janAn BA atyastaH pA vi ati vEparItyena sTApane vyatyastapARinA kAryyamupasaNgrahaRaM kAryyamupasaMgrahaRaM guroH manuH vyatyAsaSCalayogataH vyatyA saSCalayogataH smftiH aDi Arope AropaSca atasmin tadbudDiH anyoparisTApanaYca tadbudDiHanyoparisTApanaYca AdyArTe apratyakze pi hyAkASe bAlAstalamalinatAdyaDyasyanti Aha ko yamaDyAso nAma yamaDyAsonAma ucyate smftirUpaH paratrapUrvvadfzwAvaBAsaH paratrapUrbbadfzwAvaBAsaH SA BA anu paScAt saha vA kzepaRe anvastaH muYjameKalAvalkalenAnvastA muYjameKalA valkalenAnvastA Bavati Sata brA apa dUrIkaraRe gatirapAstasaMsTA matiH mAlatImA kimityapAsyABaraRAni yOvane kumA aBi aByAvfttO aByasyanti tawAGAtaM nirjitErAvatA gajAH kumA aByAsena tu konteya vErAgyeRa ca gfhyate gItA SESave ByastavidyAnAm raGuH ava avakzepe tAmavAsyato gacCati ca sfjam Sata brA samantAtkzepe tAmavAsyatyAgacCati mudam Sata brA Ud UrDvotkzepaRe ud UrdDotkzepaRe pucCamudasyati si kO pari ud BinnatayA boDane boGane prADAnyaM hi viDeryatra pratizeDe praDAnatA pra DAnatA paryyudAsaH sa vijYeyo yatrottarapadena naY mImAM yaTA SrAdDAdO paryyudastakAlo rAtryAdiH paryyudastakAlorAtryAdiH amAvAsyAyAM pitfByo dadyAt pitfByodadyAt rAtrO SrAdDaM na kurvIte tyuBayorekavAkyatayA tyuBayorekavAkya tayA rAtrItarAmAvasyAyAM SrAdDaM kurvvIteti kunateti hi boDaH tatra rAtriH paryyudastA evamanyatrApi paritaH kzepaRe paritaHkzepaRe ca antyAH sarve paryyudastA mfzizWiraniveSane BA sa pa vi Page b ud nivAraRe cIrARIva vyudasyAni vyudastAni rejustatra mahAvane mahA vane rAmA tvantu hetUnatItyEtAn kAmakroDO vyudasya ca vyudasyaca BA sa pa upa samIpasTApanetasyADasta stadbahirupAsyati samIpasTApane tasyADasta stadbahiru pAsyati camasezu kAtyA niH ni arpaRe na madviDe nyasyati BAramagryam nikzeparUpeRArpaRe ca nyAsIkftA sTAnaBidA smareRa sTAnaBidAsmareRa kumA rAjyaM nyAsamivABunak raGuH uccAraRapUrvvakaM uccAraRapUrbbakaM tatra tatra sTAne arpaRItayA DyAne ca AdAvfzyAdikanyAsaH karaSudDistataH param aNgulivyApakanyAsO aNkuli vyApakanyAsO hfdAdinyAsa eva ca tantram upa ni vAcAramBaRe upAnyAsastu upanyAsastu vANmuKam amaraH praTamaprayoge praTamabrayoge ca BUtamapyanupanyastaM pUrvvamAveditaM pUrbbaMmAveditaM na cet hIyate vyavahAreRa smftiH sa tu tatra viSezadurlaBaH viSeza durlaBaH sadupanyasyati kftyavarma kftyavartma yaH kirA sam ni tyAge vrIqAdamuM devamudIkzya manye saMnyastadehaH svayameva kAmaH kumA vihitakarmmaRAM viDAnena tyAge ca daSalakzaRakaDarmmamanutizWan daSalakzaRakaM DarmmamanutizWan samAhitaH vedAntaM viDivacCrutvA sanyasyedanfRo viDivacCutvA sanyasye danfRo dvijaH manuH nana na hi saMnyasanAdeva sidDiM samaDigacCati mayi saMnyasya karmmARi gItA nis nir nizWIvane dUrIkaraRe ca nirasyati nizWIvati zWivu nirasane pA DAtupA nirastaH parAvasuH tfRanirasane tfRani rasane BavadevaH nirastagAmBIryyamapAstaDEryyam mAGaH nirAsaBfNgaM nirAsa BfNgaM kupiteva padminI BawwiH kfRadalikulanUpurA kvaRadalikulanUpurA nirAse kirA tvaritoccAraRe ca nirastaM tvaritoditam tvarito ditam amaraH parA nirAkAraRe etena KaRqanakAramatamapi parAstam cintA pari parAvarttanena sTApane muKena paryyastavilocanena kumA paryyasyanniha nicayaH sahasrasaMKyAm kirA arpaRe ca tAmrOzWaparyyastarucaH smitasya kumA vi pari vEparItye vEpa rItye parivarttane BrAntijYAne ca itaraTA pAtre viparyyasyete vi paryyasyete Sata brA saMSayaviparyyAsanivAraReneti cintA viparyyAsitadarSanEH bOdDakA pra prakzepe apsu prAsya vinazwAni gfhRItAnyAni mantravat manuH agnO prAstAhutiH samyagAdityamupatizWate gItA anu pra Anulomyena anugatatayA ekarUpeRa niveSane anuprAsaH prati pratirUpakzepaRe tadyaTA hinirlayaRI valmIke mftA pratyastA pra tyastA SayIta Sata brA vi viSezarUpeRa samyagavaboDanAya niveSane vyAsaH vigrahavAkyam tasya samastavAkyArTasya viSezeRAvaboDahetutayA niveSanAt Page a taTAtvam viBAge vivyAsa vivyAma vedAn yasmAt sa tasmAt vyAsa iti smftaH BA A pa pArAvAreti vyastaM pArAvAretivyastaM samastaM viparItaYca si kO vyastaH vyastarAtrindivasya te kumA pfTakkaraRe evEkaSaH prayoge prayIge vyastaH vyastasamastamahAvyAhftihome vyastasama stamahAvyAhftihome Bavadeva nivAraRe ca vyasyannudayAM vyasyannu danyAM SiSirEH payoBiH BawwiH vikzepe vyastAstArAgaRA iva vyastAstArA gaRAiva BA vi ni arpaRe vizRorvakzasi viSvanATakftinA sidDAntamuktAvalI vinyastA si mu viBAgavinyastamahArGaratnam BawwiH sam saMkzepe samAsena niboData purA samasyA saMkzipyanyasane yaTA pItam ambaramiti samudAyasya pItAmbara iti saMkzapeRa saMkzepeRa prayogaH samAsaH sarvvo pyekadeSo hnA saha samasyate sama syate vArtti samasyamAnapadArTAtiriktapadArTaboDakatvaM samasyamAnapadArTAtiriktapadArTaboDa katvaM bahuvrIhitvamiti sAramaYjarI samAsaH zaqviDo buDEH sasAsaH zaqibaDobDEH hariH sAkalye ca samastam jYAnamasti samastasya devIBA vyastasamastamahAvyAhftihome devImA vyastasamasta mahAvyAhfti home vini Bavade saMyojane ca samasya sampAdayata guRErimAm kirA asa dIptO aka grahaRe gatO ca saka BvAdi uBa sew asati te AsIt Asizwa lAvaRya utpAdya ivAsa yatnaH kumA asa vidyamAnatAyAm adA aka para sew asti staH santi asi sTaHsTa ammi svaH smaH syAt syuH astu stAm santu eDi asAni AsIt asya asArvvaDAtuke BvAdeSaH tena BUDAtuvadrUpam vidyamAnatA ca kAla saMbanDaDAraRaM taduktaM hariRA AtmAnamAtmanA biBradastI vyavadiSyate antarBAvAcca tenAsO karmaRA na sakarmmakaH astyuttarasyAM diSi devatAtmA kumA yaccAvahAsArTama satkfto si gItA prapanno tmi svEraM ratirasamahAnandanira tAm SyAmAstavaH syAdvA saMKyAvato rTasya samudAyo BiDAyakaH PaRiBA syAtAmasitre mitre ca sahaja Page a prAkftAvapi mAGaH kAmatastu pravfttAnAmimAH syuH kramaSo varAH manuH dinedine tvaM tanureDi re Dikam nEza AsI didaM tamoBUtamaprajYAtamalakzaRam manuH natvevAhaM jAtu nAsamiti gItA san santO santaH sadeva somyedamagra AsIt CA u yo nyaTA santamAtmAnamanyaTA prati padyate manuH nAsatovidyatate BAvonABAvo vidyate sataH gItA striyAM NIp satI satI yogavisfzwadehA kumA satI vA vidyamAnA vA prakftiH pariRAminI hariH vi ati vyatihAre parasparamekarUpeRa sTitO anyo vyatiste tu mamApi DarmmaH BawwiH asa kzepe divA para saka sew asyati asyet asyatu Asyat AsTat Asa asitA astA asizyati asyat asyamAnaH astaH asitum astum asitvA astvA aByasya nirasya Are asmaddEvyaM helo asyatu f dasyave hetimasyAryyam f ati atidUrakzepaRe bahuBiScEkamatyasyannekena ca bahUn janAn BA atyastaH pA vi ati vEparItyena sTApane vyatyastapARinA kAryyamupasaMgrahaRaM guroH manuH vyatyA saSCalayogataH smftiH aDi Arope AropaSca atasmin tadbudDiHanyoparisTApanaYca AdyArTe apratyakze pi hyAkASe bAlAstalamalinatAdyaDyasyanti Aha ko yamaDyAsonAma ucyate smftirUpaH paratrapUrbbadfzwAvaBAsaH SA BA anu paScAt saha vA kzepaRe anvastaH muYjameKalA valkalenAnvastA Bavati Sata brA apa dUrIkaraRe gatirapAstasaMsTA matiH mAlatImA kimityapAsyABaraRAni yOvane kumA aBi aByAvfttO aByasyanti tawAGAtaM nirjitErAvatA gajAH kumA aByAsena tu konteya vErAgyeRa ca gfhyate gItA SESave ByastavidyAnAm raGuH ava avakzepe tAmavAsyato gacCati ca sfjam Sata brA samantAtkzepe tAmavAsyatyAgacCati mudam Sata brA ud UrdDotkzepaRe pucCamudasyati si kO pari ud BinnatayA boGane prADAnyaM hi viDeryatra pratizeDe pra DAnatA paryyudAsaH sa vijYeyo yatrottarapadena naY mImAM yaTA SrAdDAdO paryyudastakAlorAtryAdiH amAvAsyAyAM ca daSalakzaRakaM DarmmamanutizWan samAhitaH vedAntaM viDivacCutvA sanyasye danfRo dvijaH manuH na hi saMnyasanAdeva sidDiM samaDigacCati mayi saMnyasya karmmARi gItA nis nir nizWIvane dUrIkaraRe ca viparyyAsitadarSanEH bOdDakA pra prakzepe apsu prAsya vinazwAni gfhRItAnyAni mantravat manuH agnO prAstAhutiH samyagAdityamupatizWate gItA anu pra Anulomyena anugatatayA ekarUpeRa niveSane anuprAsaH prati pratirUpakzepaRe tadyaTA hinirlayaRI valmIke mftA pra tyastA SayIta Sata brA vi viSezarUpeRa samyagavaboDanAya niveSane vyAsaH vigrahavAkyam tasya samastavAkyArTasya viSezeRAvaboDahetutayA niveSanAt Page a taTAtvam viBAge vivyAma vedAn yasmAt sa tasmAt vyAsa iti smftaH BA A pa pArAvAretivyastaM samastaM viparItaYca si kO vyastaH vyastarAtrindivasya te kumA pfTakkaraRe evEkaSaH prayIge vyastaH vyastasama stamahAvyAhftihome Bavadeva nivAraRe ca vyasyannu danyAM SiSirEH payoBiH BawwiH vikzepe vyastAstArA gaRAiva BA vi ni arpaRe vizRorvakzasi viSvanATakftinA sidDAntamuktAvalI vinyastA si mu viBAgavinyastamahArGaratnam BawwiH sam saMkzepe samAsena niboData purA samasyA saMkzipyanyasane yaTA pItam ambaramiti samudAyasya pItAmbara iti saMkzepeRa prayogaH samAsaH sarvvo pyekadeSo hnA saha sama syate vArtti samasyamAnapadArTAtiriktapadArTaboDa katvaM bahuvrIhitvamiti sAramaYjarI sasAsaH zaqibaDobDEH hariH sAkalye ca samastam jYAnamasti samastasya devImA vyastasamasta mahAvyAhfti home vini Bavade saMyojane ca samasya sampAdayata guRErimAm kirA
asaMhata asaMhata asaMhata tri na saMhanyate itareRa saMsfjyate sam hana kta na ta saNGAtamanApanne asaMlagne sarvvatastrivftaM paYcAvftaM vA bahulamayugmamasaMhataM prAgagraM mUlamAcCAdayan goBi asaMhatamasaMlagnam saM ta raGu sAMKyamatasidDe puruze pu tanmate hi prakftyAdeH SayyAgfhAdivat saMhatyEva itarasApekzatayEva puruzArTakAritvam puruzasya tu prakASarUpakriyAyAM netarApekzA stIti tasyAsaMhatatvam saMhataparArTavAt puruzasya sAM BA vivAdAspadaM prakftimahadAdikaM parArTaM svetarasya BogApavargaPalakaM saMhatatvAt SayyAsanAdivadityanumAnena prakfteH paro saMhata eva puruzaH sidyati tasyApi saMhatatve nasTApatteH pAtaYjale ca parArTaM saMhatya kAritvAditi sUtrakAreRAnumAnaM kftaM tat tu yaTASruta mevAntyAvayavasADAraRam itarasAhityenArTakriyAkAritvasyEva saMhatyakAritASabdArTatvAt puruzastu vizayaprakASanarUpAyAM svArTakriyAyAM nAnyadapekzate nityaprakASarUpatvAt puruzasyArTasambanDamAtre budDivfttyapekzaRAt sambanDastu nAsADAraRyarTakriyeti saMhataparArTatvAt sAM sU BA ato saMhataH saMhatadehAdiByaH paraH puruzaH siDyati
asaMhfta asaMhfta asaMhfta tri na saMhanyate itareRa saMsfjyate sam hana kta na ta saMGAtamanApanne asaMlagne sarvvatastrivftaM paYcAvftaM vA bahulamayugmamasaMhataM prAgagraM mUlamAcCAdayan goBi asaMhatamasaMlagnam saM ta raGu sAMKyamatasidDe puruze pu tanmate hi prakftyAdeH SayyAgfhAdivat saMhatyEva itarasApekzatayEva puruzArTakAritvam puruzasya tu prakASarUpakriyAyAM netarApekzA stIti tasyAsaMhatatvam saMhataparArTavAt puruzasya sAM BA vivAdAspadaM prakftimaha dAdikaM parArTaM svetarasya BogApabargaPalakaM saMhatatvAt SayyAsa nAdivadityanumAnena prakfteH paro saMhata eva puruzaH siddyati tasyApi saMhatatve navasTApatteH pAtaYjale ca parArTaM saMha tya kAritvAditi sUtrakAreRAnumAnaM kftaM tat tu yaTASruta mevAntyAvayavasADAraRam itarasAhityenArTakriyAkAritva syEva saMhatyakAritASabdArTatvAt puruzastu vizayaprakASanarU pAyAM svArTakriyAyAM nAnyadapekzate nityaMprakASarUpatvAt puruzasyArTasambanDamAtre budDivfttyapekzaRAt sambanDastu nAsADAraRyarTakriyeti saMhataparArTatvAt sAM sU BA ato saMhataH saMhatadehAdiByaHparaH puruzaH siDyati
asaNkamuka asaNkamuka asaNkamuka tri na ta sTiramatO
asaNkasuka asaNkasuka asaNkasuka tri na ta sTiramatO
asamBfta asamBfta asamBfta tri na ta ayatnasidDe asamBftaM maRqanamaNga yazweH kumA asamyakpuzwe ca
asammfta asammfta asammfta tri na ta ayatnasidDe asamBftaM maRqanamaNgayazweH kumA asamyakpuzwe ca
asampUrRRa asampUrRRa asampUrRRa tri yAvatparyyantAnusaraRe samAptistadvAn sampUrRRaH na ta tAdfSapUrttiSUnye yaTA asampUrRRaM candramaRqalam krUragrahaH saketuScandramasaMpUrRRa maRqala midAnIm mudrArA
asampUrRa asampUrRa asampUrRa tri yAvatparyyantAnusaraRe samAptistadvAn sampUrRaH na ta tAdfSapUrttiSUnye yaTA asampUrRaM candramaRqalam krUragrahaH saketuScandramasaMpUrRamaRqalamidAnIm mudrArA
asamparka asamparka asamparka pu aBAve na ta saMbanDABAve na ba saMbanDaSUnye tri
asamparke asamparke asamparke pu aBAve na ta saMbanDABAve na ba saMbanDaSUnye tri
asavarRRa asavarRRa asavarRRa tri na sanAno varRRo sya samAnasya sAdeSaH asajAtIye BinnavarRRe yaTA brAhmaRasya kzatriyAdiH dvijAnAmasavarRRAsu kanyAsUpayamastaTA vfhannA
asavarRa asavarRa asavarRa tri na samAno varRo sya samAnasya sAdeSaH asajAtIye BinnavarRe yaTA brAhmaRasya kzatriyAdiH dvijAnAmasavarRAsu kanyAsUpayamastaTA vfhannA
asfgvimIkzaRa asfgvimIkzaRa asfgvimIkzaRa na vfdDasya duzwasya asfjaH SoRitasya dehAd vimokzaRaM srAvaRam ta dehAt vfdDasya duzwasya vA raktaDAtoH srAvaRe nismAraRe tatprakArAdikamuktaM suSrute tasmAnna SIte nAtyuzRe nAsvinne nAtitApite yavAguM pratipItasya SoRitaM mokzayedBizak samyaggatvA yadA raktaM svayamevAvatizWate SudDaM tadA vijAnIyA tsamyagvisrAvitaYca tat lAGavaM vedanASAntivyAMDe rvvegaparikzayaH samyagvisrAvite liNgaM prasAdo manasastaTA tvagdozA granTayaH SoPA rogAH SoRitajASca ye raktamokzaRaSIlAnAM na Bavanti kadAcana aTa Kalva pravarttamAne rakte
