sAlasarjjArjjunArimedameza SfNgaDavaDanvanatvagBirvvA cUrRRitABiH kzOmeRa vA DmApi tena samudraPenalAkzAcUrRRErvvA yaToktErvraRabanDanadravyErgAQaM baDnIyAt SItAcCAdanaBojanAgArEH SItEH parizeka pradehEScopAcaret kzAreRAgninA vA dahedyaToktaM vyaDanAda nantaraM vA tAmevAtipravfttAM sirAM viDyet kAkolyAdi ktrATaM vA SarkarAmaDumaDuraM pAyayet eRahariRoraBra SaSamahizavarAhARAM vA ruDiraM kzIrayUzarasEH susnigDEScA SnIyAdapadravAMSca yaTAsvamupAcaret upadravAstatrEvoktA yaTA DAtukzayAcCrute rakte mandaH saYjAyate nalaH pavanaSca paraM kopaM yAti tasmAt prayatnataH tannAtiSItErla zuBiH snigDEH SoRitavardDanEH IzadamlEranamlErvA BojanEH samupAcaret caturviDaM yadetadDi ruDirasya nivAraRam sanDAnaM skandanaYcEva pAcanaM dahanaM taTA vraRaM kazAyaH Page a sanDatte raktaM skandayate himam taTA sampAcaye dBasma dAhaH saNkocayet sirAH askandamAne ruDire sanDA nAni prayojayet sanDAne BraSyamAne tu pAcanEH samu pAcaret kalpEretEstriBirvvEdyaH prayateta yaTAviDi asidDimatsu cEtezu dAhaH parama izyate saSezadoze ruDire na vyADirativarttate sAvaSeze tataH sTeyaM na tu kuryyAdatikramam dehasya ruDiraM mUlaM ruDireREva DAryyate tasmAdyatnena saMrakzyaM raktaM jIva iti sTitiH snutaraktasya sekAdyEH SItEH prakupite nile SoPaM satodaM kozReRa sarpizA parizecayet nfpAQyabAlasTaviraBIrudurvvalanArIsukumArARAmanugrahArTaM paramasukumAro yaM SoRitAvasecanopAyo Bihito jalO kasaH tatra vAtapittakaPaduzwaSoRitaM yaTAsaMKyaM SfNgajalOkAlAvuBiravasecayet snigDaSItarUkzatvAt sarvvARi sarvvErvA Bavanti cAtra uzRaM samaDuraM snigDaM gavAM SfNgaM prakIrttitam tasmAdvAtopasfzwe tu hitaM tadavasecane SItADivAsA maDurA jalOkA vArisamBavA tasmAtpitto pasfzwe tu hitA sA tvavasecane alAvu kawukaM rUkzaM tIkzRaYca parikIrttitam tasmAcClezmopasfzwe tu hitaM tada vasecane tatra pracCite tanuvastrapawalAvanadDena SfNgeRa SoRitamavasecayedAcUzaRAt sAntardIpayA lAvyA jalOkasAM vivaraRam asrapASabde vakzyate aTa jalOko vasekasADyavyADitamupaveSya saMveSya vA virukzya cAsya tamavakASaM mfdgomayacUrREryadyarujaH syAt gfhItASca tAH sarzaparajanIkalkodakapradigDagAtrIH salila sarakamaDye muhUrttasTitA vigataklamA jYAtvA tAmIrogaM grAhayet sUkzmaSuklArdrapiculpotAvacCannAM kftvA muKa mapAvfRuyAdagfhlantyE kzIravinduH SoRitavinduM vA dadyA cCastrapadAni vA kurvvIta yadyevamapi na gfhRIyAttadAnyAM grAhayet yadA ca niviSate SvaKuravadAnanaM kftvonnamya ca skanDaM tadA jAnIyAdgfhRAtIti gfhntIM cArdU vastrAvacCannAM DArayet secayecca daMSe todakaRqUprAdu rBAvErjAnIyAcCudDaniyamAdatta iti SudDamAdadAnAmapanayet aTa SoRitaganDena na muYcenmuKamasyAH sEnDavacUrRenAvakiret aya patitAM taRqulakaRqana pradigDagAtrIM tElalavaRAByakta muKIM vAmahastANguzWANguliByAM gfhItapucCAM dakziRahastA NguzWANguliByAM SanEH SanEranulomanumArjayedA muKAdvAmaye ttAvadyAvatsamyagvAntaliNgAnIti samyagAntA salila Page b sarakanyastA BoktukAmA satI caret yA sIdati na cezwate sA durvvAntA tAM punaH samyagvAmayet durvvAntAyA vyADirasADya indramado nAma Bavati aTa suvAntAM pUrbbavatsannidaDyAt SoRitasya ca yogAyogAnavekzya jalO kovraRAnmaDunAvaGawwayecCItABiradBiSca parizecayedbaDnIta vA vraRaM kazAyamaDurasnigDaSItESca pradehEH pradihyAditi Bavati cAtra kzetrARi grahaRaM jAtIH pozaRaM sAvacAra Ram jalOkasAYca yo vetti tatsADyAn sa jayedgadAn
asfgvimokzaRa asfgvimokzaRa asfgvimokzaRa na vfdDasya duzwasya asfjaH SoRitasya dehAd vimokzaRaM srAvaRam ta dehAt vfdDasya duzwasya vA raktaDAtoH srAvaRe nismAraRe tatprakArAdikamuktaM suSrute lakzaRam KarI kawurujA ye ca darSanIyASca te smftAH kAryye dakzASca kfzikA mfdavo kAryedakzASca kfzikAmfdavo guravastaTA tIkzRASCedasahA vaNgA dfQAH sUryyArako dravAH sUryyArakodravAH sudfQAScEva asAralaGavastIkzRAScedideSasamudravAH saha grAmodBavAH KaqgAH sutIkzRAlaGavastaTA nirbalA nirvalA nirmalA KaqgA vIradeSasamudBavAH kAlaYjarA BArasahAstezAM KaqgAvIradeSasamudravAH kAlaYjarABArasahAstezAM vakzyAmi lakzaRam SatArdDamaNgulAnAM tu SrezWaH SrezwaH KaqgaH prakIrttitaH tadaDomaDyasaMjYABAk tato hInaM tatohInaM na DArayet pramARAByaDikaM deva CinnavaMSantaTEva ca dIrGaH samaDuraH Sabdo yaSca sumaDuraH Sabdoyasya Kaqgasya BArgava kiNkiRIsadfSastasya DAraRam SrezWamucyate KaqgaH patrapalASAgromaRqalAsyaSca patnapalASAgromaRqalAsyaSca Sasyate karavIrapalASAgrasadfSaSca viSezataH mahIzwatasaganDaSca mahIGftasaganDaSca pradmotpalasuganDikaH varRataScotpalAkAraH savarRo gaganasya varRRataScItpralAkAraH savarRRo gananasya ca samANgulasTAH sPuwitaM KaRqitaM hrasvaM savraRaM sADitaM taTA mfdulohena cAraBya mfdulohe nacAraBya sanDito maraRaM Bavet savraRenApi hfdrogI reKAyAM pAtakI Bavet BAryyA mAtA taTA putro mriyate KaRqitena ca hrasvena lAGavaM loke dIrGatApi hyasidviDA hyasidvidA anyaSastrodBavenApi samBavenmaraRam saMBavenmaraRam Druvam paYcASadaNgulaM KaqgaM triSiKaYca sureSvari IdfSaNkArayetKaqgamASu IdfSaNkArayetKaqga mASu sidviPalapradam asyate kzipyate asa in SvAse tisraH patnyo sipaTAn kalpayantyaSvasya sUcIBiH kAtyA aseH SvAsasya paTaH mArgAn karka tri kzipte asagaRqaH asi avya asa dIptO in viBakti pratirUpakam tvami tyarTe kftavAnasi vipriyaM na me kumA DanyAsi vEdarBi guRErudArEH nEza SUro si kftavidyo si darSanIyo si putraka iti nItiH asi puMstrI asyati sevanena pApAni in vA NIp vAraRasI dakziRasTe nadIBede vArARasISabde vivftiH asyate kzipyate Page a asa in Kaqe pu asirviSasanaH KaqgastIkzRaDAro durAsadaH SrIgarBo vijayaScEva DarmapAlo namo stu te ityazwO tava nAmAni svayamuktAni veDasA SrIvfkzavarDa mAnAtapatraSivaliNgakuRqalAbjAnAm sadfSA vraRAH praSastA DvajAyuDasvastikAnAM ca kfkalAsakAkakaNka kravyAdakabanDavfScikAkftayaH Kaqge vraRA na SuBadA vaMSAnugAH praBUtASca sPuwito hrasvaH kuRWo vaMSacCinno na dfNmano nugataH asvana iti cAnizwaH proktavipa ryyasta izwaPalaH kvaRitaM maraRAyoktaM parAjayAya pravarttanaM koSAt KayamudgIrRe yudDaM jvalite vijayo Bavati Kaqge nAkAraRaM vivfRuyAnna viGawwayecca paSyenna tatra vadanam na vadecca mUlyam deSaM na cAsya kaTayet prati mAnayecca nEva spfSennfpatiraprayato siyazwim gojihvA saMsTAno nIlotpalavaMSapatrasadfSaSca karavIrapatraSUlAgra maRqalAgrAH praSastAH syuH nizpanno na cCedyo nikazEH kAryyaH pramARayuktaH saH mUle mriyate svAmI jananI tasyAgrataSCinne yasmin tsarupradeSe vraRo Bavettadvadeva Kaqgasya vanitAnAmiva tilako guhye vAcyo muKe dfzwvA aTa vA spfSati yadaNgaM prazwA nistriMSaBfttadava DArya koSasTasyAdeSyo vraRo sti SAstraM viditvedam Sirasi spfzwe praTame Ngule dvitIye lalAwasaMsparSe ganDa iti ganDataH paro kzaRayIm taTA kAMsyaGaRwAyA valAkAnAM SabdEva Sabdo visPuliNgAyAyasyeti SabdataH parIkzaRIyAvi jYAtavyAH upakulAdi vistaraBayAnnoktam yugmANgulAH praSastAH ayugmANgulA praSastA Page b kadAcana Kaqge na paSyedvadanaM vfTA na vfRuyAdamum na cAsya kaTayenmUlyaM jAtiM deSaM kaTaYcana utsfzwo na spfSet KaqgaM niSikuryAcca SIrzake divA ca pUjayadenaM ganDamAlyAdi sampadA mriyate KaRqitena ca hrasvena lAGavaM loke dIrGatApi hyasidvidA anyaSastrodBavenApi saMBavenmaraRam Druvam paYcASadaNgulaM KaqgaM triSiKaYca sureSvari IdfSaNkArayetKaqga mASu sidviPalapradam asyate kzipyate asa in SvAse tisraH patnyo sipaTAn kalpayantyaSvasya sUcIBiH kAtyA aseH SvAsasya paTaH mArgAn karka tri kzipte asagaRqaH
asmaya asmaya asmaya tri Atmana asmAn icCati kyac u bA vyatya yena ettvam haviHsvIkArArTam AtmanaH asmAn icCati uta tvamasmayurvvaso f
asmayu asmayu asmayu tri Atmana asmAn icCati kyac u bA vyatyayena ettvam haviH svIkArArTam AtmanaH asmAn icCati uta tvamasmayurvvaso f
astimat astimat astimat tri asti vidyamAnaM Danamasya matup Danini striyAM NIp
asu asu asu pu asyate kzipyate asa un citte karttari un Page a tApe karaRe un paYcavfttizuvAyuBedezu paYcavfttizu vAyuBedezu pu ba va Seze jAto BavedvyasuH BavedvyamuH jyoti AcamyodakparAvftya Acamyodak parAvftya trirAcamya SanErasUn manuH SarIreByo marArIRAmasUniva vicinvati devIBA marArIRAmasUtiva vici nvati devImA tyajantyasUn Sarmma ca Sarmmaca mAnino varaM tyajanti natvekamayAcitavratam nEzaDam prARavfttInAM BedavivakzAyAmeva bahutvam ekatvavivakzAyAM tu ekavacanAntatAmicCanti ataeva prARApAnO samO kftvA samOkftvA gItA prARo ha prARoha pitA prARo ha mAtetyAdO prARoha mAte tyAdO prARaSabdavat asuSabdo pyekavacanaH nAnadadasu asuSabdopyekavacanaH nAnadadasuM f udIrGvaM jIvo asurna AgAdapa f daSagurvvakzaroccAraRakAle palazazWaBAge palazazWa BAge ca gurvvakzarEH KendumitEramustEH zaqBiH KendumitErasustEH zadBiH palaM tErGawikA tErGa wikA KazaqBiH si Si prajYAyAm niru niro asu upatApe kaRwvA yak asUyati AsUyIt asUyAmAsa asUyA asUY asUYa ityeke asUyati te asu pu asyate kzipyate asa un citte karttari un Page a tApe karaRe un paYcavfttizu vAyuBedezu pu ba va Seze jAto BavedvyamuH jyoti Acamyodak parAvftya trirAcamya SanErasUn manuH SarIreByo marArIRAmasUtiva vici nvati devImA tyajantyasUn Sarmmaca mAnino varaM tyajanti natvekamayAcitavratam nEzaDam prARavfttInAM BedavivakzAyAmeva bahutvam ekatvavivakzAyAM tu ekavacanAntatAmicCanti ataeva prARApAnO samOkftvA gItA prARoha pitA prARoha mAte tyAdO prARaSabdavat asuSabdopyekavacanaH nAnadadasuM f udIrGvaM jIvo asurna AgAdapa f daSagurvvakzaroccAraRakAle palazazWa BAge ca gurvvakzarEH KendumitErasustEH zadBiH palaM tErGa wikA KazaqBiH si Si prajYAyAm niro asu upatApe kaRwvA yak asUyati AsUyIt asUyAmAsa asUyA asUYa ityeke asUyati te
atiSakkarI atiSakkarI atiSakkarI pu atikrAntA SakkarImekAkzarADikyAt paYca daSAkzarapAdake vfttaBede SakkarI sAtipUrbA syAditi vftta
atiSakvarI atiSakvarI atiSakvarI pu atikrAntA SakvarImekAkzarADikyAt paYcadaSAkzarapAdake vfttaBede SakvarI sAtipUrvA syAditi vftta
ativarRASramin ativarRASramin ativarRASramin pu atikrAnto varRAnASramiRaSca atyA sa brAhmaRAdivarRaBinne brahmacaryyAdyASramiBinne ca yo vedAntamahAvAkyaSravaRenEva kevalam AtmAnamISvaraM veda so tivarRASramI BavedityAdyuktalakzaRe ekyAtmajYAnini
ativarRRASramin ativarRRASramin ativarRRASramin pu atikrAnto varRAnASramiRaSca atyA sa brAhmaRAdivarRaBinne brahmacaryyAdyASramiBinne ca yo vedAntamahAvAkyaSravaRenEva kevalam AtmAnamISvaraM veda so tivarRASramI Bave dityAdyuktalakzaRe ekyAtmajYAnini
atyAhiMta atyAhiMta atyAhiMta na atyantamADIyate tannivAraRArTaM mano dIyate smin A DA ADAre kta atyantaBItO prARahAni SaNkAkare anarTe ca kimatrAtyAhitamiti nAwakam
atyAhita atyAhita atyAhita na atyantamADIyate tannivAraRArTaM mano dIyate smin A DA ADAre kta atyantaBItO Sra prARahAniSaNkAkare anarTe ca kimatrAtyAhitamiti nAwakam
atyamlaparRI atyamlaparRI atyamlaparRI strI atyamlaM parRaM yasyAH jAtitvAt NIp sw atyamlapatrayukte vanavIjapUre wAvAlevu iti KyAte vfkze
atyamlaparRRI atyamlaparRRI atyamlaparRRI strI atyaslaM parRaM yasyAH jAtitvAt NIp atyamlapatrayukte vanavIjapUre wAvAlevu iti KyAte vfkze

avaGUrRRana avaGUrRRana avaGUrRRana na ava GUrRRa BramaRe BAve lyu sarbDatoBramaRe
avaGUrRana avaGUrRana avaGUrRana na ava GUrRa BramaRe BAve lyu sarvvatoBramaRe
avaSIBUta avaSIBUta avaSIBUta tri na vaSIBUtaH anAyatte avaSIkfto pyatra
avaSoBUta avaSoBUta avaSoBUta tri naM vaSIBUtaH anAyatte avaSIkfto pyatra
avacUrRRana avacUrRRana avacUrRRana na suSrutokte vraRarogaBede tatra braRasya zazwiru pakramA Bavanti ityupakramya sarpistElaM rasakriyAvacUrRRana vraRaDUpanam ityuktvA tezu kazAyo varttiH kalkaH sarpi stElaM rasakriyAvacUrRRanamiti SoDanaropaRAnIti ava cUrRRa BAve lyuw pezaRe cUrRREraDvaMsate avacUrRRa yati ava cUrRRa avaDvaMsArTe Ric BAve lyuw cUrRRanenAvaDvaMse
avacUrRRita avacUrRRita avacUrRRita tri ava cUrRRa peze karmmaRi kta pizwe ava cUrRRayaternAmaDAtoH kta cUrRRanenAvaDvaste
avacUrRana avacUrRana avacUrRana na suSrutokte vraRarogaBede tatra vraRasya zazwirupakramA Bavanti ityupakramya sarpistElaM rasakriyAvacUrRanavraRaDUpanam ityuktvA tezu kazAyo varttiH kalkaH sarpistElaM rasakriyAvacUrRanamiti SoDanaropaRAnIti ava cUrRa BAve lyuw pezaRe cUrREraDvaMsate avacUrRayati ava cUrRa avaDvaMsArTe Ric BAve lyuw cUrRanenAvaDvaMse

avadIha avadIha avadIha pu avaduhyate ava duha karmmaRi GaY dugDe trikA BAve GaY dohane AkarzaRapUrvvakAntaH sTita dravadravyanismAraRarUpe vyApAre

avagIraRa avagIraRa avagIraRa na ava gura udyame lyuw vaDAyAstrAdyudyame daRqanipAtanaprAyaScittena nAntarIkatayA prasaNgena avagIraRanimittaprAyaScittasya sidDiH prA vi
avagoraRa avagoraRa avagoraRa na ava gura udyame lyuw baDAyAstrAdyudyame daRqanipAtanaprAyaScittena nAntarIkatayA prasaNgena avagora RanimittaprAyaScittasya sidDiH prA vi
avakIrRRin avakIrRRin avakIrRRin pu avakIrRamanena izwA ini Dvastavrate brahmacAriRoyadvratamuktaM strIsaNgamAdivarjanaM tasya BraMse vakIrRatA avakIrRRI tu kAlena gardDaBena catuzpaTe pAkayajYaviDAnena nErftaM niSi yAjayet aNgi kuSI lavo vakArRRI ca vfzalIpatireva ca manuH avakIrRi lakzaRaYca kAmatoretasaH sekaM bratasTasya dvijanmanaH atikramaM vratasyAhurDarmmajYA brahmavAdinaH avakIrRRI Baved gatvA brahmacArI tu yozitam gardDaBaM zaSumAlaBya nErftaM sa viSuDyati yA smf striyaM vinA pi retasaH srAve bratalopaH brahmacArI cet striyamupeyAt araRye catuzpaTe lOkike gnO rakzodEvataM garddaBaM paSumAlaBeta nErftaM vA caruM nirvapet tatra juhUyAt kAmAya svAhA kAmakAmAya svAhA nirftyE svAhA rakzodevatAByaH svAheti etadeva retasaH prayatnotsarge iti vasizWokteH tena kAmatoretasa utsarge pi avakIrRRitvam akAmatastu nAvakArRitvaM kintu prAyaScittAlpatvaM yaToktaM manunA svapne siktvA brahmacArI dvijaH SukramakAmataH snAtvArka marccayitvA triH punarvAnatfcaM japet
avakIrRin avakIrRin avakIrRin pu avakIrRamanena izwA ini Dvastavrate brahmacAriRo yadvratamuktaM strIsaNgamAdivarjanaM tasya BraMSe vakIrRatA avakIrRI tu kAlena gardDaBena catuzpaTe pAkayajYaviDAnena nErftaM niSi yAjayet aNgi kuSIlavo vakIrRI ca vfzalIpatireva ca manuH avakIrRilakzaRaYca kAmato retasaH sekaM vratasTasya dvijanmanaH atikramaM vratasyAhurDarmmajYA brahmavAdinaH avakIrRI BavedgatvA brahmacArI tu yozitam gardDaBaM paSumAlaBya nErftaM sa viSuDyati yA smf striyaM vinA pi retasaH srAve vratalopaH brahmacArI cet striyamupeyAt araRye catuzpaTe lOkike gnO rakzodEvataM garddaBaM paSumAlaBeta nErftaM vA caruM nirvapet tatra juhUyAt kAmAya svAhA kAmakAmAya svAhA nirftyE svAhA rakzodevatAByaH svAheti etadeva retasaH prayatnotsarge iti vasizWokteH tena kAmato retasa utsarge pi avakIrRitvam akAmatastu nAvakIrRitvaM kintu prAyaScittAlpatvaM yaToktaM manunA svapne siktvA brahmacArI dvijaH SukramakAmataH snAtvArkamarccayitvA triH punarvAnatfcaM japet
avanat avanat avanat tri ava nama kta aDoBUte Anate ca avanataSitikaRWakaRWalakzmIm mAGaH caturarTyAM kfSASvA CaR AvanatIyaH avanatasannikfzwadeSAdO tri

avasekin avasekin avasekin pu asekena nirvfttaH avaseka iman vawakaBede
avatIrRRa avatIrRRa avatIrRRa tri ava tF karttari kta kftAvagAhane kftAva rohaRe kOveradigBAgamapAsya mArgamAgastyamuzRAMSurivApa tIrRRaH mAGaH anyarUpeRa prAdurBAve ca tadarTamavatI rRRo sO manniyogAccaturBujaH BA va pa

avda avda avda pu abdavat vatsare
avfhat avfhat avfhat tri viroDe na ta vfhadBinne kzudre striyAM NIp

avyAja avyAja avyAja pu na aBAve na ta CalABAve idaM kilAvyAjamanoharaM vapuH Saku avyAjasundarIM tAM vijYAnena lalitena yojayatA mAlavi na ba tacCUnye tri vyAjaSca yaTArTaBUtasya vastunaH svarUpanihnavena itararUpeRa prakASArTaH vyApAraBedaH
avyAjaM avyAjaM avyAjaM pu na aBAve na ta CalAmAve idaM kilA vyAjamanoharaM vapuH Saku avyAjasundarIM tAM vijYA nena lalitena yojayatA mAlavi na ba tacCUnye tri vyAjaSca yaTArTaBUtasya vastunaH svarUpanihnavena itara rUpeRa prakASArTaH vyApAraBedaH
avyatikIrRRa avyatikIrRRa avyatikIrRRa tri vi ati kF kta na ta asaNkIrRRe DArAH prasAdayitumavyatikIrRRarUpAH mAGaH
avyatikIrRa avyatikIrRa avyatikIrRa tri vi ati kF kta na ta asaNkIrRe DArAH prasAdayitumavyatikIrRarUpAH mAGaH
aya aya aya gatO BvA A saka sew ayate Ayizwa ayAmbaBUva ayAmAsa ayAYcakre asya parasmEpaditvamapi aya mudayati mudrABaYjanaH padminInAmityudBawaH Sucodayan dIDitimukTaSAsaH yaju udayati vitato rdDaraSmiH mAGaH aya pu eti suKamanena iR karaRe ac prAktane SuBakarmmaRi SuBa karmmaRi SuBadAyake dEve sa guptamUlapratyantaH SudDapArzRirayAnvitaH SudDapArzRi rayAnvitaH raGuH tava DarmmaH sadayIdayojjvalaH nE viDAne ca ayate jayamanena kaparddakarUpe ekAdyaNkayukte dyUtasADane pASake ca aTAsmE paYcAkzAn pARAvAvapati aBiBUrasyetAste paYca diSaH kalpantAmityeza vA ayAnaBiBUryatkalireza ayAnaBi BUryatkalireRa hi sarvAnayAnaBiBavati iti Sata brA akzA nAma kaparddakAH suvarRanirmmitA viBItaPalAni sOvarRAni suvarRRanirmmitA viBItaPalAmi sOvarRRAni vA te cAkzA dyUtakAle nivapanIyAH tezAM caturRAmaNkAnAM caturRRAmaNkAnAM kftasaMjYA paYcAnAM kalisaMjYA taTA ca SAKAntare stomasaMsTAyAM kftAdivyavahAraH kftaH ye vE catvAraH stomAH kftaM tat aTa ye paYca kaliH iti yadA paYcApyakzA uttAnA Bavanti tadA deviturjayoBavati tado devi turjayoBavati paYcasu tvekarUpAsu jaya eva BavizyatItyanyatroktam BavizyatIvyatya troktam ayaSabdaH akzavAcI iti BA caturaNkAnvite caturaNkA nvite pASakaBAge ca yaTA kftAya vijitAyADareyAH vijitAyA DareyAH saMyanti CA u kfto nAma ayodyUtasamaye prasidDaScaturaNkaH ayodyUta samaye prasidBaScaturaNkaH sa yadA jayati dyUte pravfttAnAM tasmE vijitAya tadarTamitare tridvye kANkA tridvyekANkA aDareyAH tretAdvAparakalinAmAnaH saMyanti saNgacCante antarBavanti caturaNke kftANke tridvyekANkAnAM vidyamAnatvAdantarBavantIti BA dyUtasya samayaH saNketastadanuzWAnasamayo vA yena dyUtavidyAyAM jIyate so kzasya kaScidBAgo yaSabdavAcyaH sa Page a ca caturaNkoBAgaH catvAro NkAScihnAnyasminniti vyutpatteH tasmE kftanAmaBfte yadA dyUte pravfttAnAM maDye sa ko kI pi jayati tadA tasmE kftanAmaBfte vijitAya aDareyAH aDa reyAH saMyantIti sambanDaH tadarTaM vyAcazwe tadarTamiti aDareyAn vyAkaroti treteti akzasya yasmin BAge trayo NkAH sa tretAnAmAyaH yatra tu dvAvaNkO sa dvAparanAmAyaH dvApara nAmAyaH yatra eko NkaH sa kalinAmAya iti tAdarTyenetarANkAnAmantarBAvamuktaM vyakto karoti tAdarTye netarANkAnAmantarBAvamuktaM vyaktIkaroti caturaNka iti tadantarBavati tadanta rBavanti tasmin kftAye tretAdayaste antarBavanti mahAsaNKyAyAmavAntarasaNKyAntarBAvaH mahAsaMKyA yAmavAntarasaMKyAntarBAvaH prasidDa iti AnandagiriH yanti SArAH asmin iRa ADAre ac dyUte sarvaSAragantavye sarva SAragantavye sTalaBede ayAnayaSabde vivaraRam ayate ac gantari tri cidayA A nAma f aya gatO BvA A saka sew ayate Ayizwa ayAmbaBUva ayAmAsa ayAYcakre paYcApyakzA uttAnA Bavanti tado devi turjayoBavati paYcasu tvekarUpAsu jaya eva BavizyatIvyatya troktam ayaSabdaH akzavAcI iti BA caturaNkA nvite pASakaBAge ca yaTA kftAya vijitAyA DareyAH saMyanti CA kftANke tridvyekANkAnAM vidyamAnatvAdantarBavantIti BA dyUtasya samayaH saNketastadanuzWAnasamayo vA yena dyUtavidyAyAM jIyate so kzasya kaScidBAgo yaSabdavAcyaH sa Page a ca caturaNkoBAgaH catvAro ayaScUrRRa ayaScUrRRa ayaScUrRRa na ta SakfdrasaM turaNgasya suSuzakaM BAvayedati niHkvATena viqaNgAnAM cUrRRaM praDamanantu tat ayaScUrRRA nyanenEva viDinA yOjayedBizak suSrutokte lOhacUrRRa GawitOzaDaBede
ayaScUrRa ayaScUrRa ayaScUrRa na ta SakfdrasaM turaNgasya suSuzkaM BAvayedati niH kvATena vihaNgAnAM cUrRaM praDamanantu tat ayaScUrRAnyanenEva viDinA yOjayedBizak suSrutokte lOhacUrRaGawitOzaDaBede
ayanasaMkrAnti ayanasaMkrAnti ayanasaMkrAnti strI ayanena rASicakrasya paScAt prAgvA gatyA kftA saMkrAntirgrahARAM praBApuYjasya saYcAraH sam krama ktin calasaMkrAntO saMkrAntistriviDA maDyA calA acalA ceti BedAt maDyAnupadaM bakzyate mezAdi BirdvAdaSaBiH sTAnErviBaktasya nirADAratayA sTitasya rASi cakrasya dolAyamAnatayA prAk paScAdvA nirddizwamezAdi sTAnAt paScAt pUrbbaM vA rASyantare maRqalagatiM vinApi grahARAM praBApuYjamAtrasaMcAraH calasaMkrAntiH aniyatasTAnatayA calatvAt nirddizwarASisTAnezu grahARAM maRqalasaYcAraH acalasaMkrAntiH rASisaMkrAnti riti cocyate tasyA niyatamekasTAnaeva jAyamAnatvAda calatvam anayEva saMkrAntyA yaTA mAsAdivyavahAre na dozaH calasaMkrAntyA tu bahavoM dozAstaTA nirUpyate taTA hi grahARAmAkrAntarASito rASyantarakramaRa saMkrAntirityucyate sA ca dviDA maDyamA spazwA ca zawkarmmasaMskfto maDyagraho yadA rASyantaraM saMkrAM mati tadA maDyasaMkrAntirityucyate yadA tu spazwIkfta saMskAro graho rASyantaraM gacCati sA spazwasaMkrAntirityucyate tatra maDyasaMkramasya spazwIkaraRArTatvAdeva tajjanitasaMkrAnteH spazwIkAra evopayogAt lokaSAstrayorvyavahAre na tasya upayogaH kintu gurorBaDyamasaMkrAntihInoyaScAndravatsaraH aDisaMvatsarastasmin kArayenna savatrayam varjanIyA praya tnena pratizWA sarvanAkinAm sPuwasaMkrAntihInaScet ke pyAharaDimAsakam iti kAlamADavIyaDftasmfteH maDya saMkrAnterapi aDivatsaropayogitA tadanyatra tu tasyA Page a nopayogaH iti spazwasaMkrAntereva lokaSAstropayogaH spazwa saMkrAntirapi dviviDA sAyanAMSA nirayanAMSA ceti BedAt yadA sidvAntagaRanayAyanAMSasaMskfto grahorASyantaraM gacCati sA sAyanAMSA saMkrAntiH yadA tu ayanAMSasaMskAra rahitaH rASyantaraM gacCati sA nirayanAMSA saMkrAnti rucyate saMkrAntiSca truweH sahasraBAgoyaH sa kAlora visaMkrama ityuktasUkzmakAlarUpA etacca kriyEva kAla iti mate anyamatetu saMkrAntyupalakzitastAdfSasUkzmakAlEti BedaH tAdfSa sUkzmakAlasya saMkrAntiSabdArTatve saMkrAntiSabde vakzyamARadAnAdyaNgatvAsamBavena muKyABAve pratiniDiH SAstrArTaM iti nyAyena gORakAlasyApyadarttavyatA snAnA dyaNgatvAnyayAnupapattyA ca taTA kalpyatve smftyAdyuktaMkAla viSeza eva tadaNgatvena kalpAte yaToktaM kAlamADavIye snAnadAnAdyaNgaBUte saMkrAntikAle muKyakalpasyAsamBavAdanuka lpaevAdarttavyaH yaTAhaM devalaH saMkrAntisamayaH sUkzmodurjYeyaH piSitekzaREH tadyogAdapyaDaScordDaM triSaMnnAqyaH pavitritAH iti deSavyavaDAnarAhityenAtyantasaMSlizwayoH pUrbbottararASyo rmaDye sUryyaH pUrbarASiM parityajya yAvatA kAlenottararASiM praviSati sa kAlaH yogadfzwiM binA mAMsadfzwyA durllakzyaH ato nuzWAne muKyasaMkrAntikAlagrahaRAsaMBavAt saMkrAntisamba nDinO pUrbbottarakAlO grahItavyO saMkrAnteH pUrbottarayorekE kasmiMstriMSadvawikAH puRyA iti sAmAnyata uktamiti tatra acalasaMkrAnteriva calasaMkrAnterapi puRyakAlatAsti yaToktaM tatrEva mezAdisaMkrAntayo yasmindine Bavanti tasmAddinAt pUrveBya ekAdaSadineByaH prAcIne dine mezAyanamevaM vfzaBAya naBityeyaM tanAmANkitasyavati tatkAle tasminnayate snAnAdizu puRyakAlamAha jAvAliH saMkrAntizu yaTA kAlastadIye pyayane taTA ayane viMSatiH pUrvA makare viMSatiH pareti makaravyatiriktEkAdaSasaMkrAntisambanDizvayanezu tattatsaM kAntivat puRyakAlo vagantavyaH makarasaMkrAntisaMmbanDini tva yane saMkrAntivElakzaRyaM tadyaTA makaraminne prAcInA viMSati zawikAH puRyAH makarasaMkrAntO tu pAScAttyA viMSatiGawikAH puRyA iti na kevalamAdityasyEva saMkrAntizvayane puRyakAlaH kintu sarvezAmapi grahARAM nakzatrarASisaMkrame puRyakAlo Bavati iyAMstu viSezoravereva rASisaMkrame puRyakAlaH a yanasaMkrame tu candrAdInAmapi kAlaviSeze puRyatA yaTAha tatrEva lyotiHSAstre nakzatrarASyoravisaMkrame syurarvAk sarastAdrasavandranAdyaH puRyAstayendostriDarAlavEryutA ekEva Page b nAqI muniBiH SuBoktA nAqyaScatasraH sapalAH kujasya buTasya tisraH palaviSvayuktAH aDyardDanAqyaH palasapta yuktA guroScatasraH sapalASca Sukre dvinAganAqyaH palasapta yuktAH SanEScarasyABihitAH supuRyAH AdyantamaDye japahoma dAnaM kurvannavApnoti surendraDAmeti ayamarTaH Adityasya rASinakzatragamane arvAk parataSca zoqaSa GawikAH puRyakAlaH taTA candrasyApi GawikEkA palAni ca trayodaSArvAkparataSva puRyakAlaH evaM maNgalasya catasro GawikAH palamekaM ca puRyakAlaH taTA buDasya tisro GawikAScaturdaSa palAni ca puRyakAlaH vfhaspaterapi sArdDacatasro GawikAH sapna palAni ca puRyakAlaH Sukrasya catasro GawikAH palamekaYca puRyakAlaH SanEScarasya dvyaSItiGawikAH palAni ca sapna puRyakAlaH pIyUzaGArAyAM tu jEminivacanatvena etadvacanamupanyastam mezAyanAdizu saMkrAntisPuwIkaraRaYca muhUrttacintAmaRO taTA yanAMSAH KarasAhatASca spazwArkagatyA vihftAdinAdi mezA ditaH prAk calasaMkramAH syurdAne japAdO bahupuRyadAste yaTA rASisaMkramAH bahupuRya dAstaTA calasaMkramA apIti dyotanAya taTASabdaH ayanAMSAH zazWyA guRyA spazwayA sUryyagatyA vihftAH labDErdinAdyEH dinaGawIpalEH kalAM kftvA mezAdidvAdaSarASisaMkramaRakAlAt prAkcalasaMkramAScala saMkrAntayaH calasaMkramadAne brAhmaReByo dakziRAdAne japAdO japaSrAdvahomAdO bahupuRyadA Bavanti taduktaM vaSizWasidDAnte calasaMkramayuNmAse saMkramoyaH sa saMkramaH ajAgalastana iva rASisaMkrAntirucyate pulastyaH ayanAMSasaMskftoBAnurgole carati sarvadA amuKyA rASisaMkrAntistulyaH kAlaviDistayoH snAnadAnajapaSrAdDavratahomAdikarmmaRi yat kftaM calasaMkrA ntAvakzayaM puruzo Snute iti ratnamAlAyAm yAvadBiraMSEra yanacyutiH syAttadBogyakAlena divAkarasya cyutirBavedvizRupa dAdikAnAM rahasyametanmuniBiH pradizwamiti ayanoSA nayanaYca ayanaSabde darSitam tattadrASyAdimArgezu sUryyAdi tejaHpuYjasaYcAraScalasaMkramomaRqalamaDyasaMparkaSca rASisaMkrama itivizayaviyekaH tadyaTA raTyAyAM prAk paScAdvA nIyamAnasya dIpasyAgredIpapraBA yasminpradeSe gacCati tasminneva pradeSe kzaRAntareRa dIpo pi gacCati evaM sarvezAmapi grahARAM casasaMkramA drazwavyAH nanvevaM calasaMkramasya muKyatve tenEva mAnena paYcANgagaRanA syAt iti cet na aSvinyAdiBAnAM visaMvAdAt taTAhi sUryyAkrAntarASitaScaturddaSanatrasyEva sanDyAkAle praTamamudayojyotize prasidDaH sarvasammataSca tatra Page a yadi ayanAMSaSoDanamantareREva sUryyasya tattadrASiGawaka nakzatrasTitisvIkArastadA idAnImayanAMSAnusAreRa etadaM SAditaH pUrbaM ravermezAdO gatyAvaSyakatvAt tasya ca tadGawakanakzatrasTitestataScaturddaSanakzatrasya sanDyAyAM praTamodayApattirna ca taTA dfSyate taTA yasmin dine idAnImamApUrRimAdayo dfSyante tataH pUrvaM sUryyacandrayorekarASisTatvena amAvasyApattistataH paYca daSe hani pUrRimApattiSca nacEtat pratyakzasaMvAdIti ayanAMSaSoDatena nirayanAMSasaMkramAditastu sarvvaM pratyakza saMvAdi kiM ca sAyanasaMkramarahitasya cAndramAsasyA Di mAsatvavyavahAraprasaNgaH saMkrAntidvayayutasya tasya kzayasAsatvavyava hAraprasaNgaSca evaM ca bahuviplavAt calasaMkrAnteH muKyatve pi tenEva mAsavarzagaRanAdiSaNkA na kAryyA prAgpradarSitapulasTa vacanena ayanaSabde darSitena sOrAgamavAkyena dinarAtri pramARAnAM nirRayo na BasaMkramAt ataH sakalakarmmARi iti sidvAntaSiromaRivAkyena ca smArttakarmmaviSeze lagna jYAnAdikarmmasveva tasya muKyatvABiDAnAt na tena sarvavyavahAraH anyaTA tattadviSezopAdAnaM vyarTaM syAt ekAntena rASi saMkramAnaNgIkAre prAguktavacanajAte rASisaMkrAntivat puRya kAlatAmiGAnAnupattiH taTA ca yaTA mAsavatsarARAmaneka viDatve pi kriyAviSeze tezAM grAhyatA evaM calasTirasaM krAntyorapi vizayaviSeze pi grAhyatA kiYca sAyana saMkramamAtreRa sarvavyavahAre aneke visaMvAdA pIyUza DArAyAM darSitAH te pyatropadarSyante sAyanagaRanayA tvayogye pi kAle grahaHkadAcidekanakzatrAntare nakzatrayora ntare vopalaByeta sUryyacandrayostu tejobahutvAnnakzatratejaH pariBabAnna nakzatrasaMniDAvupalamBo yadyapi taTApi kadAcit kzIRacandrasyApyupalamBodfSyata eva gocarAdivizayaka duzwaPalAni ekarASisTitagrahayogaPalAni ca viruDyeran grahaRAdivisaMvAdaSca tasmAnnirayanagaRanayEva sarvo pi vyava hAro yuktaH yattu ajAgalastanEvetyAdi prAguktavacanam puRyatvaMrASisaMkrAnteH kecidAhurmanIziRaH nEtanmama mata mityAdivaSizWavAkyaYca tat calasaMkrAnteH stutiparam na nindAmindanIyaM nindati kintu viDeyaM stOtIti nyAyAt anyaTA saMkrAntiSabde darSayizyamARAnAM rASisaMkrAnti puRyakAlatAboDakavacanAnAM bahUrnA viplavApatteH dinapati saMkramAt prAk zoqaSa nAqyastu puRyakARaH saH parataH zoqaSa nAqyaH snAnadAnakAryyezviti vaSizWasyEva vaca Page b nAntareRa viroDaH syAt ayanasaMkrAntizu tu anTa viDasyEva tena puRyakAlatIktestato vilakzaRavizayatvO cityaM tAdfSavacanAnAm
ayanasaMkrama ayanasaMkrama ayanasaMkrama pu ayanAMSAnusAreRa saMkramaH mezAdizu rASizu ayanAMSAnusAreRa grahARAM praBApuYjasaYcAre ayanasaMkrAntiSabde vivaraRam
ayanasaNkrAnti ayanasaNkrAnti ayanasaNkrAnti strI ayanena rASicakrasya paScAt prAgvAgatyA kftA saNkrAntirgrahARAM praBApuYjasya saYcAraH sam krama ktin calasaNkrAntO saNkrAntistriviDA maDyAcalA avalA ceti BedAt maDyAnupadaM vakzyate mezAdiBirdvAdaSaBiH sTAnErviBaktasya nirADAratayA sTitasya rASicakrasya dolAyamAnatayA prAk paScAdvA nirddizwamezAdisTAnAt paScAt pUrvvaM vA rASyantare maRqalagatiM vinApi grahARAM praBApuYjamAtrasaMcAraH calasaNkrAntiH aniyatasTAnatayA calatvAt nirddizwarASisTAnezu grahARAM maRqalasaYcAraH acalasaNkrAntiH rASisaNkrAntiriti cocyate tasyA niyatamekasTAnaeva jAyamAnatvAdacalatvam anayEva saNkrAntyA yaTA mAsAdivyavahAre na dozaH calasaNkrAntyA tu bahavo dozAstaTA nirUpyate taTA hi grahARAmAkrAntarASito rASyantarakramaRaM saNkrAntirityucyate sA ca dviDA maDyamA spazwA ca zawkarmmasaMskfto maDyagraho yadA rASyantaraM saNkrAmati tadA maDyasaNkrAntirityucyate yadA tu spazwIkftasaMskAro graho rASyantaraM gacCati sA spazwasaNkrAntirityucyate tatra maDyasaNkramasya spazwIkaraRArTatvAdeva tajjanitasaNkrAnteH spazwIkAra evopayogAt lokaSAstrayorvyavahAre na tasya upayogaH kintu purorBaDyamasaNkrAntihInoyaScAndravatsaraH aDisaMvatsarastasmin kArayenna savatrayam varjanIyA prayatnena pratizWA sarvanAkinAm sPuwasaNkrAntihInaScet ke pyAhuraDimAsakam iti kAlamADavIyaDftasmfteH maDyasaNkrAnterapi aDivatsaropayogitA tadanyatra tu tasyA nopayogaH iti spazwasaNkrAntereva lokaSAstropayogaH spazwasaNkrAntirapi dviviDA sAyanAMSA nirayanAMSA ceti BedAt yadA sidDAntagaRanAyanAMSasaMskfto graho rASyantaraM gacCati sA sAyanAMSA saNkrAntiH yadA tu ayanAMSasaMskArarahitaH rASyantaraM gacCati sA nirayanAMSA saNkrAntirucyate saNkrAntiSca truweH sahasraBAgo yaH sa kAlo ravisaNkrama ityuktasUkzmakAlarUpA etacca kriyEva kAla iti mate anyamate tu saNkrAntyupalakzitastAdfSasUkzmakAlaiti BedaH tAdfSasUkzmakAlasya saNkrAntiSabdArTatve saNkrAntiSabde vakzyamARadAnAdyaNgatvAsamBavena muKyABAve pratiniDiH SAstrArTaM iti nyAyena gORakAlasyApyadarttavyatA snAnAdyaNgatvAnyaTAnupapattyA ca taTA kalpyatve smftyAdyuktakAlaviSeza eva tadaNgatvena kalpyate yaToktaM kAlamADavIye snAnadAnAdyaNgaBUte saNkrAntikAle muKyakalpasyAsamBavAdanukalpaevAdarttavyaH yaTAhaM devalaH saNkrAntisamayaH sUkzmo durjYeyaH piSitekzaREH tadyogAdapyaDaScordDaM triSaMnnAdyaH pavitritAH iti deSavyavaDAnarAhityenAtyantasaMSlizwayoH pUrvvottararASyormaDye sUryyaH pUrvarASiM parityajya yAvatA kAlenottararASiM praviSati sa kAlaH yogadfzwiM vinA mAsadfzwyA durllakzyaH ato nuzWAne muKyasaNkrAntikAlagrahaRAsaMBavAt saNkrAntisambanDinO pUrvvottarakAlO grahItavyO saNkrAnteH pUrvottarayorekEkasmiMstriMSadDawikAH puRyA iti sAmAnyata uktamiti tatra acalasaNkrAnteriva calasaNkrAnterapi puRyakAlatAsti yaToktaM tatrEva mezAdisaNkrAntayo yasmindine Bavanti tasmAddinAt pUrvveBya ekAdaSadineByaH prAcIne dine mezAyanamevaM vfzaBAyanamityevaM tannAmANkitamBavati tatkAle tasminnayane snAnAdizu puRyakAlamAha jAbAliH saNkrAntizu yaTA kAlastadIye pyayane taTA ayane viMSatiH pUrvA makare viMSatiH pareti makaravyatiriktEkAdaSasaNkrAntisambanDizvayanezu tattatsaNkrAntivat puRyakAlo vagantavyaH makarasaNkrAntisaMbanDini tvayane saNkrAntivElakzaRyaM tadyaTA makaraBinne prAcInA viMSatiGawikAH puRyAH makarasaNkrAntO tu pAScAttyA viMSatiGawikAH puRyA iti na kevalamAdityasyEva saNkrAntizvayane puRyakAlaH kintu sarvezAmapi grahARAM nakzatrarASisaNkrame puRyakAlo Bavati iyAMstu viSezoyoreva rASisaNkrame puRyakAlaH ayanasaNkrame tu candrAdInAmapi kAlaviSeze puRyatA yaTAha tatrEva jyotiHSAstre nakzatrarASyoraviMSakrame syurarvAk parastadrasacandranAdyaH puRyAstaTendostriDarAlavEryutA ekEva nAqI muniBiH SuBoktA nAdyaScatasraH sapalAH kujasya buDasya tisraH palaviSvayuktAH aDyardDanAdyaH palasaptayuktA guroScatasraH sapalASca Sukre dvinAganAdyaH palasaptayuktAH SanEScarasyABihitAH supuRyAH AdyantamaDye japahomadAnaM kurvannavApnoti surendraDAmeti ayamarTaH Adityasya rASinakzatragamane arvAk parataSca zoqaSaGawikAH puRyakAlaH taTA candrasyApi GawikEkA palAni ca trayodaSArvAkparataSca puRyakAlaH evaM maNgalasya catasro GawikAH palamekaM ca puRyakAlaH taTA buDasya tisro GawikAScaturdaSa PalAni ca puRyakAlaH bfhaspaterapi sArdDacatasro GawikAH sapta palAni ca puRyakAlaH Sukrasya catasro GawikAH PalamekaYca puRyakAlaH SanEScarasya dvyaSItiGawikAH palAni ca sapta puRyakAlaH pIyUzaDArAyAM tu jEminivacanatvena etadvacanamupanyastam mezAyanAdizu saNkrAntisPuwIkaraRaYca muhUrttacintAmaRO taTAyanAMSAH KarasAhatASca spazwArkagatyA vihftAM dinAdi mezAditaH prAk calasaNkramAH syurdAne japAdO bahupuRyadAste yaTA rASisaNkramAH bahupuRyadAstaTA calasaNkramA apIti dyotanAya taTASabdaH ayanAMSAH zazWyA guRyA spazwayA sUryyagatyA vihftAH labDErdinAdyEH dinaGawIpalEH kalAM kftvA mezAdidvAdaSarASisaNkramaRakAlAt prAkcalasaNkramAScala saNkrAntayaH calasaNkramadAne brAhmaReByo dakziRAdAne japAdO japaSrAdvahomAdO bahupuRyadA Bavanti taduktaM vaSizWasidDAnte calasaNkramayuNmAse saNkramo yaH sa saNkramaH ajAgalastana iva rASisaNkrAntirucyate pulastyaH ayanAMSasaMskfto BAnurgole carati sarvadA amuKyArASisaNkrAntistulyaH kAlaviDistayoH snAnadAnajapaSrAdDavratahomAdikarmmaRi yat kftaM calasaNkrAntAvakzayaM puruzo Snute iti ratnamAlAyAm yAvadBiraMSErayanacyutiH syAttadBogakAlena divAkarasya cyutirBavedvizRupadAdikAnAM rahasyametanmuniBiH pradizwamiti ayanAMSAnayanaYca ayanaSabde darSitam tattadrASyAdimArgezu sUryyAditejaH puYjasaYcAraScalasaNkramo maRqalamaDyasamparkaSca rASisaNkrama iti vizayavivekaH tadyaTA raTyAyAM prAk paScAdvA nIyamAnasya dIpasyAgrepradIpapraBA yasminpradeSe gacCati tasminneva pradeSe kzaRAntareRa dIpo pi gacCati evaM sarvezAmapi grahARAM calasaNkramA drazwavyAH nanvevaM calasaNkramasya muKyatve tenEva mAnena paYcANgagaRanA syAt iti cet na aSvinyAdiBAnAM visaMvAdAt taTAhi sUryyAkrAntarASitaScaturddaSanatrasyEva sanDyAkAle praTamamudayo jyotize prasidDaH sarvasammataSca tatra yadi ayanAMSaSoDanamantareREva sUryyasya tattadrASiGawakanakzatrasTitisvIkArastadA idAnImayanAMSAnusAreRa etadaMSAditaH pUrvaM ravermezAdO gatyAvaSyakatvAt tasya ca tadGawakanakzatrasTitestataScaturddaSanakzatrasya sanDyAyAM praTamodayApattirna ca taTA dfSyate taTA yasmin dine idAnImamApUrRimAdayo dfSyante tataH pUrvaM sUryyacandrayorekarASisTatvena amAvasyApattistataH paYcadaSe hani pUrRimApattiSca nacEtat pratyakzasaMvAdIti ayanAMSaSoDanena nirayanAMSasaNkramAditastu sarvvaM pratyakza saMvAdi kiM ca sAyanasaNkramarahitasya cAndramAsasyA DimAsatvavyavahAraprasaNgaH saNkrAntidvayayutasya tasya kzayamAsatvavyavahAraprasaNgaSca evaM ca bahuviplavAt calasaNkrAnteH muKyatve pi tenEva mAsavarzagaRanAdiSaNkA na kAryyA prAkpradarSitapulasTa vacanena ayanaSabde darSitena sOrAgamavAkyena dinarAtri pramARAnAM nirRayo na BasaNkramAt ataH sakalakarmmARi iti sidDAntaSiromaRivAkyena ca smArttakarmmaviSeze lagnajYAnAdikarmmasveva tasya muKyatvABiDAnAt na tena sarvavyavahAraH anyaTA tattadviSezopAdAnaM vyarTaM syAt ekAntena rASisaNkramAnaNgIkAre prAguktavacanajAte rASisaNkrAntivat puRyakAlatABiGAnAnupattiH taTA ca yaTA mAsavatsarARAmanekaviDatve pi kriyAviSeze tezAM grAhyatA evaM calasTirasaNkrAtyorapi vizayaviSeze pi grAhyatA kiYca sAyanasaNkramamAtreRa sarvavyavahAre aneke visaMvAdA pIyUzaDArAyAM darSitAH te pyatropadarSyante sAyanagaRanayA tvayogye pi kAle grahaH kadAcidekanakzatrAntare nakzatrayorantare vopalaByeta sUryyacandrayostu tejobahutvAnnakzatratejaHpariBavAnna nakzatrasaMniDAvupalamBo yadyapi taTApi kAdacit kzIRacandrasyApyupalamBo dfSyata eva gocarAdivizayaka duzwaPalAni ekarASisTitagrahayogaPalAni ca viruDyeran grahaRAdivisaMvAdaSca tasmAnnirayanagaRanayEva sarvo pi vyavahAro yuktaH yattu ajAgalastanaivetyAdi prAguktavacanam puRyatvaM rASisaNkrAnteH kecidAhurmanIziRaH nEtanmama matamityAdivaSizWavAkyaYca tat calasaNkrAnteH stutiparam na nindA nindanIyaM nindati kintu viDeyaM stOtIti nyAyAt anyaTA saNkrAntiSabde darSayizyamARAnAM rASisaNkrAntipuRyakAlatAboDakavacanAnAM bahUnAM viplavApatteH dinapatisaNkramAt prAk zoqaSa nAdyastu puRyakARaH saH parataH zoqaSa nAdyaH snAnadAnakAryezviti vaSizWasyEva vacanAntareRa viroDaH syAt ayanasaNkrAntizu tu anyaviDasyEva tena puRyakAlatoktestato vilakzaRavizayatvOcityaM tAdfSavacanAnAm
ayanasaNkrama ayanasaNkrama ayanasaNkrama pu ayanAMSAnusAreRa saNkramaH mezAdizu rASizu ayanAMSAnusAreRa grahARAM praBApuYjasaYcAre ayanasaNkrAntiSabde vivaraRam
ayaskarRI ayaskarRI ayaskarRI strI aya iva karRAvasya gO NIz lOhatulyakaWinakarRayuktAyAM striyAm
ayaskarRRI ayaskarRRI ayaskarRRI strI aya iva karRRAvasya gO NIz lOha tulyakaWinakarRRayuktAyAM striyAm
ayo'gra ayo'gra ayo gra na ayo gre muKe yasya muzale tasya muKe lOhAvasTityA taTAtvam
ayogava ayogava ayogava pu aya iva kaWinA gOrvARI yasya ni ac ayogaM duzwayogaM vAti vA ka vA SUdrAdayogavaH kzattA cARqAlaScADamo nfRAm vESyarAjanyaviprAsu jAyante varRasaNkarAH iti manUkte SUdrAt vESyAyAM jAte pratilomaje saNkIrRavarRe prasADanopacArajYamadAsaM dAsajIvanam sErinDraM vAgurAvfttiM sUte dasyurayogave manuH ayogavasyAyam aR AyogavaH tajjAtisambanDini tri striyAM NIp BavantyAyogavIzvete jAtihInAH pfTak trayaH manuH
ayogavaH ayogavaH ayogavaH pu aya iva kaWinA gOrvARI yasya ni ac ayogaM duzwayogaM vAti vA ka vA SUdrAdayogavaHkzattA cARqAlaScADamonfRAm vESyarAjanyaviprAsu jAyante varRRa saNkarAH iti manUkte SUdrAt vESyAyAM jAte pratilomaje saNkIrRavarRe prasADanopacArajYamadAsaM dAsajIvanam sErinDraM vAgurAvfttiM sUte dasyurayogave manuH ayo gavasyAyam aR AyogavaH tajjAtisambanDini tri striyAM NIp BavantyAyogavIzvete jAtihInAH pfTak trayaH manuH
ayogra ayogra ayo gra na ayo gre muKe yasya muzale tasya muKe lOhA vasTityA taTAtpam
ayukCada ayukCada ayukCada pu ayugmAH sapta sapta CadA asya saptaparRRe vfkze tasya hi pratyekapallave sapta sapta parRRAni vidyante vavurayukCadagucCasuganDayaH mAGaH ayukpatrAdayo pyatra
ayukuCada ayukuCada ayukuCada pu ayugmAH sapta sapta CadA asya saptaparRe vfkze tasya hi pratyekapallave sapta sapta parRAni vidyante vavurayukCadagucCasuganDayaH mAGaH ayukpatrAdayo pyatra
ayutaSam ayutaSam ayutaSam avya ayutamayutam vIpsArTe kArakAt Sasa ayutamayutamityarTe
ayutaSas ayutaSas ayutaSas avya ayutamayutam vIpsArTe kArakAt Sas ayutamayutamityarTe
azwAdaSopapurAR azwAdaSopapurAR azwAdaSopapurAR na ba va karmma saMjYAtvAnna dviguH sanatkumArAdizu azwAdaSasu upapurARezu anyAnyupapurARAni muniBiH kaTitAni tu AdyaM sanatkumAroktaM nArasiMhamataH param tftIyaM nAradaM proktaM kumAreRa tu BAzitam caturTaM SivaDarmmAKyaM sAkzAnnandISaBAzitam durvvAsasoktamAScaryyaM nAradoktamataH param kApilaM mAnavaM cEva taTEvoSanaseritam brahmARqaM vAruRaM cATa kAlikAhvayameva ca mAheSvaraM tayA SAmbaM sOraM sarvvArTasaYcayam parASaroktaM pravaraM taTA BAgavatadvayam idamazwAdaSaM proktaM purARaM kOrmmasaMjYitam caturdDA saMsTitaM puRyaM saMhitAnAM praBedataH hemA daeda Ka kUrmma pu
azwAdaSopapurARa azwAdaSopapurARa azwAdaSopapurARa na ba va karmma saMjYAtvAnna dviguH Page b sanatkumArAdizu azwAdaSasu upapurARezu anyAnyupa purARAni muniBiH kaTitAni tu AdyaM sanatkumAroktaM nArasiMhamataH param tftIyaM nAradaM proktaM kumAreRa tu BAzitam caturTaM SivaDarmmAKyaM sAkzAnnandISaBAzitam durvvAsasIktamAScaryyaM nAradoktamataH param kApilaM mAnavaM cEva taTEvoSanaseritam brahmARqaM vAruRaM cATa kAli kAhvayameva ca mAheSvaraM taTA SAmbaM sOraM sarvvArTasa Ycayam parASaroktaM pravaraM taTA BAgavatadvayam idamazwA daSaM proktaM purARaM kOrmmasaMjYitam caturdDA saMsTitaM puRyaM saMhitAnAM praBedataH hemA dA Ka kUrmmapu
azwadiS azwadiS azwadiS strI ba va karma saMjYatvAtra dviguH pUrbbAgneya dakziRanErftapaScimavAyavyottarESAnIrUpAsu azwasu dikzu indrAdIn lokapAlA Sca azwadikzu ca pUjayet tantram
azwadiSa azwadiSa azwadiSa strI ba va karma saMjYatvAtra dviguH pUrvvAgneyadakziRanErftapaScimavAyavyottarESAnIrUpAsu azwasu dikzu indrAdIn lokapAlAzSca azwadikzu ca pUjayet tantram
bARinI bARinI bARinI strI baRa Rini NIp vidagDAyAM striyAM narttakyAm uttamastriyAYca ajayapAlaH
bARino bARino bARino strI baRa Rini NIp vidagDAyAM striyAM narttakyAm uttamastriyAYca ajayapAlaH
bAlaBaMdraka bAlaBaMdraka bAlaBaMdraka pu bAle pi Badra iva kAyati kE ka vizaBede Sabdaca
bAlaBadraka bAlaBadraka bAlaBadraka pu bAle pi Badra iva kAyati kE ka vizaBede Sabdaca
bAlatanaTa bAlatanaTa bAlatanaTa pu bAlAstanayA iva pattrARyasya Kadire amaraH SiSusutake pu strI
bAlatanaya bAlatanaya bAlatanaya pu bAlAstanayA iva patrARyasya Kadire amaraH SiSusutake pu strI
ba ba ba bakAraH pavargasya tftIyavarRaH kAdizu trayoviMSatitamo vya YjanavarRaH jihvAgreRa ozWayoH sparSena uccAryyatvAt sparSavarRaH asyoccAraRasya sTAnamozWO uccAraRe ozWa jihvAgreRa sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH vAhyaprayatnAH saMvA ranAdaGozAH alpaprARaSca asya vAcakaSabdAH tantre varRA BiDAnoktA yaTA bo vanI BUDaro mArgo GarGarI locana priyaH pracetAH kalasaH pakzI sTalagaRqaH kapardinI pfzWavaMSo BayA mattaH SiKivAho yuganDaraH muKa vindurbalI GaRwA yodDA trilocanapriyaH kledinI tApinI BUmiH suganDistribalipriyaH suraBirmuKa vizRuSca saMhAro basuDADipaH zazWI puraM capewA ca modakA gaganaM patiH pUrvAzAdA maDyaliNgaH SagiH kxpta tftIyakO tasyADizWAtfdevatADyAnaM yaTA nIlavarRAM Page a trinayanAM nIlAmbaraDarAM parAma nAgahArojjvalAM devIM dviBujAM padmalocanAm evaM DyAtvA bakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram asya DyeyasvarUpaM yaTA vakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi caturvargapradAyakam Saraccandra pratIkASaM paYcadevamayaM sadA kAmaDenuta mAtfnyAse sya pfzWavaMSe nTasyatA kAvyAdO praTamaprayoge pakAra SabdoktaM Palam ba pu bala qa vaH baH pumAn varuRe sinDO Bage toye gate tu vA bA ganDane tantusantAne puMsyeva vapane smftaH medi kumBe Sabdara ga ba bakAraH pavargasya tftIyavarRaH kAdizu trayoviMSatitamo vya YjanavarRaH jihvAgreRa ozWayoH sparSena uccAryyatvAt sparSavarRaH asyoccAraRasya sTAnamozWO uccAraRe ozWa jihvAgreRa sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH vAhyaprayatnAH saMvA ranAdaGozAH alpaprARaSca asya vAcakaSabdAH tantre varRA BiDAnoktA yaTA bo vanI BUDaro mArgo GarGarI locana priyaH pracetAH kalasaH pakzI sTalagaRqaH kapardinI pfzWavaMSo BayA mattaH SiKivAho yuganDaraH muKa vindurbalI GaRwA yodDA trilocanapriyaH kledinI tApinI BUmiH suganDistribalipriyaH suraBirmuKa vizRuSca saMhAro basuDADipaH zazWI puraM capewA ca modakA gaganaM patiH pUrvAzAdA maDyaliNgaH SagiH kxpta tftIyakO tasyADizWAtfdevatADyAnaM yaTA nIlavarRAM Page a trinayanAM nIlAmbaraDarAM parAma nAgahArojjvalAM devIM dviBujAM padmalocanAm evaM DyAtvA bakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram asya DyeyasvarUpaM yaTA vakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi caturvargapradAyakam Saraccandra pratIkASaM paYcadevamayaM sadA kAmaDenuta mAtfnyAse sya pfzWavaMSe nTasyatA kAvyAdO praTamaprayoge pakAra SabdoktaM Palam ba pu bala qa baH pumAn varuRe sinDO Bage toye gate tu bA ganDane tantusantAne puMsyeva vapane smftaH medi kumBe Sabdara
baDU baDU ba va DU strI baDnAti mamatayA banDa qa galopaH udyate vaha ka GaScAnwAxeSe vA nAryvyAm pfkkAyAYca amaraH Page a snuzAyAM naboQiAyAm BAryyAyAM SArivozaDO SaAm ca medi
baDasTalI baDasTalI baDasTalI strI ta SmaSAne trikA vaDasTAnamapyatra nahArA
baDasyalI baDasyalI baDasyalI strI ta SmaSAne trikA baDasTAnamapyatra na hArA
baDu baDu ba va Du strI baDnAti mamatayA banDa u nalopaH uhyate baha a GaScAntAdeSe vA nAryvyAm pfkkAyAYca amaraH kzuDAyAM naboQAyAm BAryyAyAM SarAvozaDa SacyAm ca medi
baRa baRa baRa Sabde BvA para saka sew baRati abARIt abaRIt beRatuH baRa pu baRa ac Sabdas Sabde BarataH beRatuH baRa Sabde BvA para saka sew baRati abARIt abaRIt beRatuH baRa pu baRa ac Sabde BarataH
bada bada bada sTEryye niScalaBavane niScalaBabale BvA para saka sew badati abAdIt avAdIt abadIt babAda bedatuH bada BAzaRe vA cu uma uBa pakze BvA para saka sew vAdayati te abIvadat avIzadat ta pakze badatItyAdi bada sTEryye niScalaBabale BvA para saka sew badati avAdIt abadIt babAda bedatuH bada BAzaRe vA cu uBa pakze BvA para saka sew vAdayati te avIzadat ta pakze badatItyAdi
badarIPalA badarIPalA badarIPalA strI ba va daryyA iva PalamasyAH nIlaSekAlikAyAm SabdamA
badarIpatra badarIpatra ba va darIpatra pu ba va daryyAM iva patramasyAH naKInAmaganDadUvye jawA svArTe ka tatrEva
badaraballI badaraballI ba va daraballI strI ba va daraPalapraDAnA ballI DA ta BUmi ba va darItiKyAte latABede rAjani
badaravallI badaravallI ba va daravallI strI ba va daraPalapraDAnA vallI SA ta BUmi ba va darItiKyAte latABede rAjani
bahuSatra bahuSatra bahuSatra pu ba cawake Sabdaca anekaSatruyute tri bahuSatruH pawole syAt ti ta
bahuSatru bahuSatru bahuSatru pu ba cawake Sabdaca anekaSatruyute tri bahuSatruH pawole syAt ti ta
bahuSiram bahuSiram bahuSiram pu ba vizRO rudro bahuSirA baBruH vizRusa
bahuSiras bahuSiras bahuSiras pu ba vizRO rudro bahuSirA baBruH vizRusa
bahupAd bahupAd ba va hupAd da pu ba vA antyalopaH vawavfkze halantaH amaraH adantaH rAjani tasyAnekaSiPAvattvAttaTAtvam
bahupAda bahupAda ba va hupAda d pu ba vA antralozeH bawavfkze halanta Page b amaraH adantaH rAjani tasyAnekaSiPAvattvAttaTAtvam
bahupatra bahupatra ba va hupatra pu va palARqO anekaparRayukte tri liNginyAm GftakumAryyAM tulasyAM bfhatyAM gorakzadugDAyAM jatukAyAYca strI rAjani gOrA NIz taruRIpuzpe strI wAp tataH saMjYAyAM ka bahupatrikA BUmyAmalakyAM meTikAyAM mahASatAvaryyAYca rAjani
bahupattra bahupattra ba va hupattra pu ba palARqO anekaparRayukte tri liNginyAm vftakuBAryyAM tulasyAM bfhatyAM gorakza dugDAyAM jatukAyAYca strI rAjani gOrA NIz taruRIpuzpe strI wAp tataH saMjYAyAM ka bahupatrikA BUmyAmalakyAM meTikAyAM mahASatAvaryyAYca rAjani
bakvAra bakvAra bakvAra pu bukkaM BazaRamfcCati f aR siMhaDvanO hArA
balavat balavat balavat azya bala atiSaye matup masya vaH atiSaye amaraH baladapi SikzitAnAm SakuntalA bala biSizwe mosale tri amaraH striyAM NIp
balavata balavata balavata avya bala atiSaye matup masya vaH atiSaye amaraH baladapi SikzitAnAm SakuntalA balaviSizwe mAMsale tri amaraH striyAM NIp
balibinDya balibinDya balibinDya pu rEvatakamanoHputraBede BAga
balivinDya balivinDya balivinDya pu rEvatakamanoH putraBede BAga

banDula banDula banDula pu banDa ulac asatIputre amaraH banDuke Sabdara sundare ramye namre ca tri ajayapAlaH

bavadarIPalA bavadarIPalA bavadarIPalA strI ba va daryyAM iva PalamasyAH nIlaSePAbadDa tri banDa karmaRi kta banDanakarmaRi amaraH likAyAm SabdamA

bfhadabrahman bfhadabrahman bf vf hadabrahman pu ANgirase fziBede brahmaRo yastfto yaSca putraH kurukulodvaha tasyABavat sutA BAryyA prajAstasyAM ca me SfRu bfhatkIrttirbfhajjyotirbfhadbrahmA bfhanmanAH bfhanmantro buhadDAmasTA rAjan bfhaspatiH BA va a bfhajjyotirAdayastatputre
bfhadbrahman bfhadbrahman bf vf hadbrahman pu ANgirase fziBede brahmaRo yastftI yaScU putraH kurukulodvahaH tasyAmavat sutA BAryyA prajA stasyAM ca me SfRu vfhatkIrttirvfhajjyotirvfhad brahmA vfhanmanAH bfhanmantro bfhadBAsastaTA rAjan Page b bfhaspatiH BA va a vfhajjyotirAdayastatputre
bfhaspati bfhaspati bfhaspati pu bfhatyA vAcaH patiH pAraskarA guqAdibfhatIpatiSabde guqAdivfhatI patiSabde dfSyam ANgirase muniBede bfhadbrahmanSabde munimede bfhadbrahmanuSabde dfSyam devapurohite grahaBede ca tasya gatiBagaRAdikaM gatiBaga Page a RAdikaM KagolaSabde darSitam taccAracca taccAraSca guruvarzaSabde pf tasya grahatvaprAptikaTA guruSabde dfSyA bfhaspati pu bfhatyAH vAcaH patiH pfzo ni jIve devAcAryye amaraH grahaBede sU si KagolaSabde tatkakzAdimAnaM nadrUpAdi ca grahayajYaSabde dvaSyam bfhaspatinA ca vEdDaDarmaH pravarttito yaToktaM matsyapu a tato bfhaspatiH Sakramakarodbaladarpitam grahaSAntiviDAnena pOzwikena ca karmaRA gatvATa mohayAmAsa rajiputrAn bfhaspatiH jinaDarmaM samAsTAya vedavAhyaM sa vedavit vedatrayI parimrazwAMscakAra DizaRADipaH vedabAhyAn parijYAya hetuvAdasamanvitAn jaGAna Sakro vajreRa sarvaDarmavahizkftAn bfhaspatisavaH yakzaBedaH bfhaspati pu bfhatyA vAcaH patiH pAraskarA guqAdivfhatI patiSabde dfSyam ANgirase munimede bfhadbrahmanuSabde dfSyam devapurohite grahaBede ca tasya gatiBaga Page a RAdikaM KagolaSabde darSitam taccAraSca guruvarzaSabde pf tasya grahatvaprAptikaTA guruSabde dfSyA
bfhatkamrman bfhatkamrman bf vf hatkamrman tri ta mahAkarmayute bfhadaSvaputraBede pu harivaM a
bfhatkarmman bfhatkarmman bf vf hatkarmman tri ta mahAkarmayute bfhadaSvaputraBede pu harivaM a
bfhatsAman bfhatsAman bf vf hatsAman na nityaka sAmaBede tacca sAma tvAmidDi havAmahe ityasyAmfci geyaM tacca tulAdAnAdi padDatAvasmABiH pf darSitam vAmadevyaM bf vf hatsAma jyezWasAma raTantaram sAmagadvArapAlapAWyatayA viDAnapAri uktam bf vf hatsAma taTA sAmnAm gItA tacca sAma brahmapratipAdakamiti tadBAzyakAreRoktaM samarTitaYcAnandagiriRA indraH sarveSvaratvenAnena stUyate iti tasya SrEzWyamiti

bila bila bila Bedane vA curA qaBa uBa pakze tu para saka sew belayati te bilati abIbilat ta abelIt bila na tu bila ka ranDre Cime Cidre amaraH guhAyAm uccEH Sravasi pu medi vetase Sabdaca gartte martte ca tataH trfRA caturarTyAM tfRA kzaturarTyAM sa bilasa tadadUradeSAdO tri bila Bedane vA curA uBa pakze tu para saka sew belayati te bilati abIbilat ta abelIt bila na tu bila ka ranDre Cidre amaraH guhAyAm uccEH Sravasi pu medi vetase Sabdaca martte ca tataH tfRA kzaturarTyAM sa bilasa tadadUradeSAdO tri
bindusaras bindusaras bindusaras bindujAtaM saraH SA ta sarovaraBede yatra gaNgAvatAraRArTaM BagIraTena tapastepe tatkaTA aTottareRa kElAsAt mEnAkaM parvataM prati hiraRyaSfNgaH sumahAn mahAmaRimayo giriH ramyaM bindusaro nAma yatra rAjA BagIraTaH drazwuM BAgIraTIM gaNgAmuvAsa bahulAH samAH BA sa a mAtsye a tadutpattikaTA uktA yaTA tatra tripaTagA devI praTamantu pratizWitA somapAdAt prasUtA sA saptaDA praviBajyate yUpA maRimayAstatra citayaSca hiraRmayAH tatrezwvA kratuBiH sidDaH SakraH suragaREH saha divyaSCAyApaTastatra nakzatrARAntu maRqalam dfSyate BAsvarA rAtrO devI triTagA tu sA antarIkzaM divaYcEva BAvayitvA BuvaNgatA BavottamANge patitA saMrudDA yogamAyayA tasyA ye bindavaH kecit kzubDAyAH patitABuvi kftantu tErbindusarastato bindasaraH smftam binduhrado pyatra pu
bindusarasa bindusarasa bindusarasa na bindujAtaM saraH SA ta sarovaraBede yatra Page b gaNgAvatAraRArTaM BagIraTena tapastepe tatkaTA aTo ttareRa kElAsAt mEnAkaM parvataM prati hiraRyaSfNgaH sumahAn mahAmaRimayo giriH ramyaM bindusaro nAma yatra rAjA BagIraTaH drazwuM BAgIraTIM gaNgA muvAsa bahulAH samAH BA sa a mAtsye a tadutpattikaTA uktA yaTA tatra tripaTagA devI praTamantu pratizWitA somapAdAt prasUtA sA saptaDA praviBajyate yUpA maRimayAstatra citayaSca hiraRmayAH tatrezwvA kratuBiH sidDaH SakraH suragaREH saha divyaSCAyApaTastatra nakzatrARAntu ma Rqalam dfSyate BAsvarA rAtrO devI triTagA tu sA antarIkzaM divaYcEva BAvayitvA BuvaNgatA BavottamANge patitA saMrudDA yogamAyayA tasyA ye bindavaH kecit kzubDyAyAH patitABuvi kftantu tErvindrubarastato vinda saraH smftam binduhrado pyatra pu

brahmavEvarta brahmavEvarta brahmavEvarta na azwAdaSamahApurARamaDye azwAdaSasahasrasaMKyake mahApurARaBede tatpratipAdyavizayAdikaM vfhannAradIye pAde a uktaM yaTA brahmA uvAca SfRu vatsa pravakzyAmi purARaM daSamaM tava brahmavEvarttakaM nAma vedamArgAnudarSakam sAvarRiryatra BagavAn sAkzAddevarzaye rTitaH nAradAya purARArTaM prAha sarvamalOkikam DarmArTakAmamokzARAM sAraH prItirharO hare tayoraBedasidDyarTaM brahmavEvarttamuttamam raTantarasya kalpasya vfttAntaM yanmayoditam SatakowipurARaM tat saMkzipya prAha vedavit vyAsaScaturdDA saMvyasya brahmavEvarttasaMjYitam azwAdaSasahasrantat purARaM parikIrttitam brahma prakfti viGneSa kfzRaKaRqa samAcitam tatra sutarzisaMvAdaH purARopakramo mataH tatra praTame brahmaKaRqe sfzwiprakaraRaM tvAdyaM tato nAradaveDasoH vivAdaH sumahAn yatra dvayorAsIt parABavaH SivalokagatiH paScAjjYAnalABaH SivAnmuneH SivavAkyena tat paScAt marIcernAradasya tu mananaYcEva sAvarRirjYAnArTaM sidDasevite ASrame sumahApuRye trElokyAScaryyakAriRi etadDi brahmaKaRqaM hi SrutaM pApavinASanam dvitIye prakftiKaRqe tataH sAvarRisaMvAdA nAradasya samIritaH kfzRamAhAtmyasaMyukto nAnAKyAnakaTottaraH prakfteraSaBUtAnAM kalAnAYcApi varRitam mAhAtmyaM pUjanAdyaYca vistareRa yaTAsTitam etat prakftiKaRqaM hi SrutaM BUtiviDAyakam tftIye gaReSaKaRqe gaReSajanmasaMpraSnaH sapuRyakamahAvratam pArvatyAH kArttikeyena saha viGneSasamBavaH caritaM kArttavIryyasya jAmadagnasya cAdButam vivAdaH sumahAn paScAjjAmadagnyagaReSayoH etadviGneSaKaRqaM hi sarvaviGnavinASanam caturTe SrIkfzRajanmaKaRqe SrIkfzRajanamasampraSno janmAKyAnaM tato dButam gokule gamanaM paScAt pUtanAdivaDo dButaH bAlyakOmArajA lIlA viviDAstatra varRitAH rAsakrIqA ca gopIBiH SAradI samudAhftA rahasye rADayA krIqA varRitA bahuvistarA sahAkrUreRa tatpaScAnmaTurAgamanaM hareH kaMsAdInAM vaDe vftte sadasyAdvijasaMskftiH kASya sAndIpaneH paScAdvidyopAdanAmadButam yavanasya vaDaH paScAddvArakAgamanaM hareH narakAdivaDastatra kfzRena vihito dButaH kfzRaKaRqamidaM vipra nfRAM saMsAraKaRqanam tatPalaSrutiH paWitaYca SrutaM DyAtaM pUjitaM cABivarRitam ityetadbrahmavEvarttaM purARaM cAtyalOkikam vyAsoktaM cAdisamBUtaM paWan SfRvan vimucyate vijYAnajYAnaSamanAt vorAt saMsArasAgarAt liKitvedaYca yo dadyAnmAGyAM DenusamAcitam brahmalokamavApnoti sa mukto jYAnabanDanAt yaScAnukramaRIM vApi paWed vA SfRuyAdapi so pi kfzRaprasAdena laBate vAYCitaM Palam vivartta upAdAna vizamasattAkaM kAryyaM svArTe aR ta brahmaRo tulyasattAke kAryye ca
brahmavEvartta brahmavEvartta brahmavEvartta na azwAdaSasahApurARamaDye azwAdaSasahasrasaMKyake mahApurARaBede tatprativAdyavizayAdikaM vfhannAradIye pAde a uktaM yaTA brahmA uvAca SfRu vatsa pravakzyAmi purARaM daSamaM tava brahmavEvarttakaM nAma vedamArgAnudarSakam sAvarRiryatra BagavAn sAkzAddevarzaye rTitaH nAradAya purARArTaM prAha sarvamalOkikam DarmArTakAmamokzARAM sAraH prItirharO hare tayoraBedasidDyarTaM brahmavEvartta muttamam raTantarasya kalpasya vfttAntaM yanmayoditam SatakowipurARaM tat saMkzipya prAha vedavit vyAsaScaturdDA saMvyasya brahmavEvarttasajYitam azwAdaSasahasrantat purARaM parikorttitam brahma prakfti viGneSa kfzRaKaRqa samA citam tatra sutarzisaMvAdaH purARopaktamo mataH tatra praTame brahmaKaRqe sfzwiprakaraRaM tvAdyaM tato nArada beDaso vivAdaH sumahAn yatra dvayorAsIt parABavaH SivalokagatiH paScAjjYAnasABaH SivAnmuneH Siva vAkyena tat paScAt marIcernAradasya tu mananaYcEva sAvarRirjYAnArTaM sidDasevite ASrame sumahApuRye trElokyAScaryyakArtiRi etadDi brahmaKaRqaM hi SrutaM pApa vinASanam dvitIye prakftiKaRqe tataH sAvarRi savAdA nAradasya samIritaH kfzRamAhAtmyasaMyukto nAnAKyAnakaTottaraH prakftaraSaBUtAnAM kalAnAYcA pi Page a varRitam mAhAtmyaM pUjanAdyaYca vistareRa yaTAsTi tam etat prakftiKaRqaM hi SrutaM BUtiviDAyakam tftIye gaReSaKaRqe gaReSajanmasaMpraSnaH sapuRyaka mahAvratam pArvatyAH kArttikeyena saha viGneSasamBavaH caritaM kArttavIryyasya jAmadagnasya cAdButam vivAdaH sumahAn paScAjjAmadagnyagaReSayoH etadviGneSaKaRqaM hi sarvaviGnavinASanam caturTe SrIkfzRajanmaKaRqe SrIkfzRajanmasampraSno janmAKyAnaM tato dButam gokule gamanaM paScAt pUtanAdibaDo dButaH bAlyakOmArajA lIlA viviDAstatra varRitAH rAsakrIqA ca gopIBiH SAradI samudAhftA rahasye rADayA krIqA varRitA bahuvistarA sahAkrUreRa tatpaScAnmaTurAgamanaM hareH kasAdInAM baDe vftte sadasyadvijasaMskftiH kASya sAndIpaneH paScAvvidyopAdAnamadButam yavanasya baDaH paScAddvArakAgamanaM hareH narakAdibaDastatra kfzRena vihito dButaH kfzRaKaRqamidaM vipra nfRAM saMsAra ScaRqanam tatPalaSrutiH paWitaYca SrutaM DyAtaM pUjitaM cABivarRitam ityetadvrahmavEvarttaM purARaM cAtya lOkikam vyAsoktaM cAdisamBUtaM paWan SfRvan vimucyate vijYAnajYAnaSamanAt GorAt saMsArasAga rAt lisvitvedaYca yo dadyAnmAGyAM DenusamA citam vrahmalokamavApnoti sa mukto jYAnabanDanAt yaScAnukramaRIM vApi paWed vA SfRuyAdapi so pi kfzRaprasAdena laBate vAYCitaM Palam vivartta upAdAna vizamasattAkaM kAryyaM svArTe aR ta vrahmaRo tulya sattAke kAryye ca
brahmavarcas brahmavarcas bra vra hmavarcas na brahmaRA vedADyayanena varcaH ac samA vedADyAyanajanite tejasi tapaHsvADyAyajaM yacca tejastu brahmavarcasam jawA brahmavarcasakAmaH stuvIta tARqya brA brahmavarcasakAmasya kuryyAt viprasya paYcame manuH tadasyAsti ini brahmavarcasin tadyute tri brahmavarcasyannAdo Bavati CA u vfttasvADyAyajaM tejaH brahmavarcasam SANkaraBAzyam
brahmavarcasa brahmavarcasa bra vra hmavarcasa na brahmaRA vedADyayanena varcaH ac samA vedADyayanajanite tejasi tapaHsvADyAyajaM yacca tejastu brahmacarvasam jawA brahmavarcasakAmaH stuvIta tARqya vrA brahmavarcasakAmasya kuryyAt viprasya paYcame manuH tadasyAsti ini brahmavarcasin tadayute tri brahmabarcasya nnAdo Bavati CA u vfttasvADyAyajaM tejaH brahma varcasam SANgaraBAzyam
buDa buDa buDa jYApane BvA pa saka aniw boDati aBOtsIt SizyaM guruH bodDA budDaH buDa jYAne BvA uBa saka sew boDati te irit abuDataboDIt irita abuDat apoDIt aboDi aBoDizwa aboDizwa jvalA vA Ra pakze ka boDaH buDaH buDa jYAne di A saka aniw buDyate aboDi aboDizwa bubuDe uda ud buDa jAgaraRe vizayasPuraRABimuKIBAva pizayasPuraRABimuKIBAva rUpe saMskAranizWe saskAranizWe vyApAraBede udbudDasaMskarAdeva smftirBavatIti SAstre udnudDasaMskarAdeva smfti rBavatIti SAKe sTitam buDa pu buDa ka paRqite bfhaspatiBAryyAyAM tArAyAM candre ca candreRa janite putre tasya rohiRyA pratipAlanAt rOhiReyatvam grahaBede tasyotpattikaTA SivavareRa tasya graharUpatvaprAptikaTA ca kASIKa a vfhaspateH sa vE BAryyAmESvayyamadanohitaH bfhaspateH savE BAryyAmESvaryyamadamohitaH purohitasyApi guroBruturANgirasasya gurorBrAtu rANgirasasya vE jahAra tarasA tArAm ityupakrame dadAvANgirase tArAM svayameva pitAmahaH aTAntargarBamAlokya aTAnta rgarBamAlokya tArAM prAha bfhaspatiH madIyAyAM na te yonO garBo DAryyaH kaTaYcana IzikAstamBamAsAdya sAgarBaM sA garBaM cotsasarja ha jAtamAtraH sa BagavAn devAnAmAkzipadvapuH devAnAmAkzi padvapuH tataH saMSayamApannAstArAmUcuH surottamAH satyaM brUhi vrahi sutaH kasya somasyATa bfhaspateH pfcCyamAnA pfcCya mAnA yadA devErnAha tArA tisatrapA tadA tAM SaptumArabDaH Saptu mArabDaH kumAraH so titejasA tannivAryya yadA tadA brahmA tArAM papracCa saMSayam provAca prAYjaliH sA taM ta somasyeti pitAmaham tadA sa mUrdDnyupAGrAya mUrdDyUpADrAya tArAgarBaM prajApatiH prajA patiH buDa ityakaronnAma tasya bAlasya DImataH tataH sa sarvadeveByastejorUpabalADikaH buDaH somaM samApfcCya samA pfcCya tapase kftaniScayaH jagAma kASIM nirvARarASi nirvARarASiM viSveSapAlitAm tatra liNgaM liNga pratizWApya svanAmnA tu buDeSvaram buDacUram tapaScacAra cAtyugra mugraM cAtya gramugra saMSIlayan hfdi iti tattapa uktaM tattapasA ca tuzwena SivenoktaM yaTA rOhiReya mahABAga sOmya sOmyavaconiDe nakzatra lokAdupari nakzatralokAdupari tava loko Bavizyati maDye sarvaM grahARAYca saparyyAM lapsyate lapsyase parAm buDagrahasya kakzABagaRAcAdikaM kakzABagaRAdikaM KagolaSabde dfSyam buDa jYApane BvA pa saka aniw boDati aBOtsIt SizyaM jAtamAtraH sa BagavAn devAnAmAkzi padvapuH tataH saMSayamApannAstArAmUcuH surottamAH satyaM vrahi sutaH kasya somasyATa bfhaspateH pfcCya mAnA yadA devErnAha tArA tisatrapA tadA tAM Saptu mArabDaH kumAraH so titejasA tannivAryya tadA brahmA tArAM papracCa saMSayam provAca prAYjaliH sA ta somasyeti pitAmaham tadA sa mUrdDyUpADrAya tArAgarBaM prajA patiH buDa ityakaronnAma tasya bAlasya DImataH bukvAra bukvAra bukvAra pu bukkaM BazaRamfcCati f aR siMhaDvanO hArA
bunDa bunDa bunDa niSAmane BvA Bva uBa saka sew bunDati te irit abuDat abunDIt abunDizwa niSAmanamAlocanam udit katvA ktvA vew bunDa banDe cu uBa saka sew bunDayati te abubunDat abuvunDat ta bunDa niSAmane Bva uBa saka sew bunDati te irit abuDat abunDIt abunDizwa niSAmanamAlocanam udit ktvA vew bunDa banDe cu uBa saka sew bunDayati te abuvunDat ta
busta busta busta Adare anAdare atAdare ca cu uBa saka sew bustayati te abubustat ta busta na bustyate nAdriyate Adriyate vA busta GaY patasAdiPalasya pata sAdiPalasya tyAjye aMSe BuTi buTi mAMsapizwakaBede ca amaraBaratO busta Adare atAdare ca cu uBa saka sew bustayati te abubustat ta busta na bustyate nAdriyate Adriyate vA busta GaY pata sAdiPalasya tyAjye aMSe buTi mAMsapizwakaBede ca amaraBaratO

cAkravarmaRa cAkravarmaRa cAkravarmaRa pu cakravarmmaRo patyam aR na wilopaH cakravarmmaRo patye vyAkaraRAcAryaBede kapaScAkravarmaRasya uRA sU i cAkravarmaRasya pA sU

cAma cAma cAma pu caza hiMsAyAm Ric ac pfzo hastupraBede cAzasyage puMstrI medi striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
cArmaRa cArmaRa cArmaRa na carmaRAM samUhaH aR carmmasamudAye
cArmiRa cArmiRa cArmiRa na carmmiRAM samUhaH aR carmmiRAM samUhe

cAruyaSas cAruyaSas cAruyaSas pu SrIkfzRaputraBede tvayA dvAdaSa varzARi vratIBUtena SuzyatA ArADya paSuBarttAraM rukmiRyAM UnitAHsutAH cArudezRaH sucArUSca cAruveSI yaSovaraH cAruSravA ScAruyaSAH pradyumnaH SamBureva ca yaTA te janitAH putrA rukmiRyAM cAruvikramAH BA anu a cArugarBaSabdAnuktAH atroktASca cAruSravas ityAdayo pi tatputraBede
cAruyaSasa cAruyaSasa cAruyaSasa pu SrIkfzRazutraBede tvayA dvAdaSa varzARi vatI BUtena SuzyatA ArADya paSuBarttAraM rukmiRyAM UnitAH sutAH cArudezRaH sucAruSca cAruveSI yaSovaraH cAruSravA AruyaSAH pradyamnaH SamBureva ca yaTA te janitAH putrA rukmiRyAM cAruvikramAH BA anu a cArugarBaSabdAnuktAH atroktASca cAruSravas ityAdayo pi tatputraBede

kulasTitidAmBikAn smarAnDatvAviSeze pi taTA naramarakzataH paradAranivfttiryA so yaM svayamanAdftaH ahalyAkelilolena damBo damBolipARinA gurutalpagatO pApakalpanAM tyajata dvijAH yezAM vaH patyuratyuccErgurudAragrahe grahaH pApAttApA mudaH puRyAt parAsOH syuriti Sruti vEparItyaM DruvaM sAkzAttadAKyAta balAbale sandehe pyanyadehAptervivarjyaM vfjinaM yadi tyajata SrotriyAH satraM hiMsAdUzaRasaMSayAt yastrivedividAM vandyaH sa vyAso pi jajalpa vaH rAmAyA jAtakAmAyAH praSastA hastaDAraRA sukfte vaH kaTaM SradDA surate ca kaTaM na sA tarkarma puruzaH kuryAdyenAnte susvameDate balAtkuruta pApAni santu tAnyakftAni vaH sarvAn balakftAnarTAnakftAn manurabravIt svAgamArTe pi mA smiMsTastIrTikA vicikitsitavaH taM tamAcaratAnandaM svacCandaM yaM yamicCaTa SrutismftyarTaboDezu kvEkamatyaM mahADiyAm vyAKyA budDibalApekzA sA nopekzyA suKonmuKI tasminnastIti DIrdehe taddAhe vaH kimenasA kvApi kintat PalaM na syAdAtmeti parasAkzike mftaH smarati karmARi mfte karmaPalormayaH anyaBuktErmfte tfptirityalaM DUrttavArttayA ekaM sandigDayostAvat BAvi tatrezwajanmani hetumAhuH svamantrAdInasANgAnanyATA viwAH janena jAnatAsmIti kAyaM nAyaM tvamityasO tyAjyate grAhyate cAnyadaho SrutyA tiDUrttayA ekasya viSvapApena tApe nante nimajjataH kaH SrItasyAtmano BIro BaraH syAd duritena te kinte vfntAhftAt puzpAt tanmAtre hi PalatyadaH nyAsyaM tanmUrdDanyanyasya nyAsyamevASmano yadi tfRAnIva DfRAvAdAn viDUnaya baDUranu tavApi tAdfSasyEva kAciraM janavaYcanA kuruDvaM kAmadevAjYAM brahmAdyErapyalaNGitAm vedo pi devakIyAjYA tatrAjYA kADikArhaRA pralApamapi vedasya BAgaM manyaDvameva cet kanABAmyena duHKAnna viDInapi taTecCaTa SrutiM cadDatTa vikziptAH prakziptAM brUTa ca svayam mImAMsA mAMsalaprajYA stAM yUpadvipadAyinIm ko hi vedahyamuzmin vA loka ityAha yA SrutiH samprAmARyAdamuMlokaM lokaH pratyetu vA kaTam DarmmADarmmO manurjjalpannaSakyArjanavarjanO vyAjAnmaRqaladaRqArTI adaDAyi suDA vuDEH vyAsasyEva girA tasmin SradDAvadvA sTa tAntrikAH matsyasyApyupadeSyAn vaH komatsyAnapi BAzatAm paRqitaH pARqavAnAM sa vyAsaScAwupawuH kaviH nininda tezu nindatsu stuvatsu stutavAnna kim na BrAtuH kila devyAM sa vyAsaH kAmAt samAsajat dAsIratastadAsIdyanmAtrA tatrApyadeSi kim devErdvijEH kftA granTAH panTA yezAM tadAdftO gAM natEH kiM na tErvyaktaM tano pyAtmA DarIkftaH sADu kAsukatA muktA SAntasvAntErmaKonmuKEH sAraNgalocanAsArAM divaM pretyApi lipsuBiH uBayI prakftiHkAme sajjediti munermatam apavarge tftIyeti BaRataH pARinerapi biBratyupari yAnAya janA janitamajjanAH vigrahAyAgrataH paScAdgatvaroraBraviBramam kaH SamaH kriyatAM prAjYAH prIyAprItO pariSramaH BasmIBUtasya BUtasya punarAgamanaM BramaH enasAnena tiryyak syAdityAdiH kA viBIzikA rAjilo pi hi rAjeva svEH suKI suKahetuBiH hatASceddivi dIvyanti dEtyA dEtyAriRA raRe tatrApi tena yudDyantAM hatA api taTEva te svaYca brahma ca saMsAre muktO tu brahma kevalam iti svocCittimuktyuktirvEdagDI vedavAdinAm muktaye yaH SilAtvAya SAstramUce sacetasAm gotamaM tamavetEva yaTA vitya taTEva saH dArA hariharAdInAM tanmagnamanaso BfSam kiM na muktAH punaH santi kArAgAre manoBuvaH devaScedasti sarvajYaH karuRABAgabanDyavAk tatkiM vAgvyayamAtrAnnaH kftArTayati nArTitaH BavinAM BAvayan duHKaM svakarmajamapISvaraH syAdakAraRa vErI naH kAraRAdape pare tarkApratizWayA sAmyAdanyonyasya vyatiGnatAm nAprAmARyaM matAnAM syAt kezAM sattipakzavat akroDaM SikzayantyanyAn kroDanA ye tapoDanAH nirdDanAste DanAyEva DAtuvAdopadeSinaH kiM vittaM datTa tuzweyamadAtari haripriyA dattvA sarve DanaM mugDobanDanaM labDavAn baliH dogDA drogDA ca sarvo yaM DaninaScetasA janaH visfjya loBasaMkzoBamekadvA yadyudAsate dEnyasyAyuzyamastEnyamaBakzyaM kukzivaYcanA svAcCandyamfcCatAnandakandalIkandamekakam duryoDanasaKe rAkzasaBede cArvAkavaDaparvaSabde cArvo cArvo cArvo strI cAru guRavacanatvAt striyAM NIz cArutva yuktAyAM striyAM jyotsnAyAm budDO kuberapatnyAm ca medi dIptO Sabdara
cArvvAGAwa cArvvAGAwa cArvvAGAwa ta pu cAru Ahanti A han dArAvA hano R antasya ca waH sajYAyAm cArO vA vArtti aR vA wAnyAdaSaH sundarAGAtake KagaBede
cArvvAka cArvvAka cArvvAka pu cAruH lokasammatovAkovAkyaM yasya pfzo vfhaspatiSizye lokAyate nAstikaBede tanmatasidDa padArTAdi sarvvada sa darSitaM yaTA aTa kaTaM parameSvarasya niHSreyasapradatvamaBiDIyate vfha spatimatAnusAriRA nAstikaSiromaRinA cArvAkeRa dUrotsAritatvAt durucCedaM hi cArvAkasya cezwitam prAyeRa sarvvaprARinastAvat yAvajjIvaM suKaM jIvennAsti mftyoragocaraH BasmIBUtasya dehasya punarAgamanaM kutaH iti lokagATAmanurunDAnA nItikAmaSAstrAnusAreRA rTakAmAveva puruzArTO manyamAnAH pAralOkikamarTamapahnu vAnAScArvAkamatamanuvarttamAnA evAnuBUyante ata eka tasya cArvvAkamatasya lokAyatamityanvarTamaparaM nAmaDeyam tatra pfTivyAdIni BUtAni catvAri tattvAni teBya eka dehAkArapariRateByaH kiRvAdiByo madaSaktivat cEtanyamupa jAyate tezu vinazwezu satsu svayaM vinaSyati tadiha vijYAnaGana evEteByo BUteByaH samutTAya tAnyevAnuvina Syati na pretya saMjYAstIti tatra cEtanyaviSizwadeha evAtmA dehAtirikta Atmani pramARABAvAt pratyakzEka pramARabAditayA anumAnAderanaNgIkAreRa prAmARyABA vAt aNganAliNganAdijanyaM suKameva puruzArTaH na cAsya duHKasaMBinnatayA puruzArTatvameva nAstIti mantavyama avarjanIyatayA prAptasya duHKasya parihAreRa suKamAtrasyEva BoktavyatvAt tadyaTA matsyArTI saSalkAn sakaRwakAn matsyAnupAdatte sa yAvadAdeyaM tAvadAdAya nivarttate yaTA vA DAnyArTI sapalAlAni DAnyAnyAharati yAvadAdeyaM tAvadAdAya nivarttate tasmAdduHKaBayAnnAnu kUlavedanIyaM suKaM tyaktumucitam na hi mfgAH santIti SAlayo nopyante na hi BikzukAH santIti sTAlyo nADiSnIyante yadi kaScid BIrurdfzwaM suKaM tyajet tarhi sa paSuvanmUrKo Bavet kfzRo hamityAdisAsAnADikaraRyopapattiH mama Sarora miti vyavahAro rAhoH Sira ityAdivadOpacArikaH tadetat sarvvaM samagrAhi atra catvAri BUtAni BUmi vAryyanalAnilAH caturByaH Kalu BUteByaScEtanyamupa nadItIre pravfttiriti tade tanmanorAjyavijfmBaRam vyAptipakzaDarmmatASAli hi liNgaM gamakamaByupagatamanumAnaprAmARyavAdiBiH vyApti ScoBayaviDopADiviDuraH sambanDaH sa ca sattayA cakzurAdi BUtaBavizyatostadasammavena sarvvopasaMhAravatyA vyApterdurjYAnatvAt na ca vyAptijYAH sAmAnyagocaramiti mantavyaM vyaktyoravinABAvABAva prasaNgAt nApi caramaH antaHkaraRasya bahirindriya tantratvena bAhye rTe svAtantryeRa pravfttyanupapatteH taduktam cakzarAdyuktavizayaM paratantraM bahirmanaH iti nApyanumAnaM vyAptijYAnopAyaH tatra tatrApyevamiti anavasTAdOsTya prasaNgAt nApi SabdastadupAyaH yat KilIkftaH kenApi bo Disatvena jAtaM sattvena hetunA yadvedamarmaBedAya jagade jagadasTiram agnihotraM trayItantraM tridaRqaM Basma guRWanam prajYApOruzaniHKAnAM jIvo jalpati jIvikAH kulasTitidAmBikAn smarAnDatvAviSeze pi taTA naramarakzataH paradAranivfttiryA so yaM svayamanAdftaH ahalyAkelilolena damBo damBolipARinA gurutalpa matO pApakalpanAM tyajata dvijAH yezAM vaH patyuratyu ccErgurudAragrahe grahaH pApAttApA mudaH puRyAt parAsoH syuriti SrutiH vEparItyaM DruvaM sAkzAttadA KyAta balAbale sandehe pyanyadehAptervivarjyaM vfjinaM yadi tyajata SrotriyAH satraM hiMsAdUzaRasaMSayAt yastrivedividAM vandyaH sa vyAso pi jajalpa vaH rAmAyA jAtakAmAyAH praSastA hastaDAraRA sukfte vaH kaTaM SradDA surate ca kaTaM na sA tatkarma puruzaH kuryyAdyenAnte suKameDate balAt kuruta pApAni santu tAnyakftAni vaH sarvvAn balakftAnarTAnakftAn manura bravIt svAgamArTe pi mA smiMsTastIrTikA viciki tsitavaH taM tamAcaratAnandaM svacCandaM yaM yamicCaTa SrutismftyarTaboDezu cAnyadaho SrutyA tiDUrttayA ekasya viSvapApena tApe nante nima jjataH kaH SrOtasyAtmano BIro BaraH syAd duritena te kinte vfntAhftAt puzpAt tanmAtre hi PalatyadaH nyAsyaM tanmUrdDanyanyasya nyAsyamevASmano yadi tfRAnIva GfRAvAdAn viDUnaya baDUranu tavApi tAdfSasyEva kA ciraM janavaYcanA kuruDvaM kAmadevAjYAM brahmAdyErapya laNGitAm vedo pi devakIyAjYA tatrAjYA kADikA rhaRA pralApamapi vedasya BAgaM manyaDvameva cet kenABAmyena duHKAnna viDInapi taTecCaTa SrutiM SradDatTa vikziptAH prakziptAM brUTa ca svayam mImAMsA mAMsalaprajYA stAM yUpadvipadAyinIm ko hi veda hyamuzmin vA loka ityAha yA SrutiH samprAmARyAdamuM lokaM lokaH pratyetu vA kaTam DarmmADarmmO manurjjalpa nnaSakyArjanavarjanO vyAjAnmaRqaladaRqArTI SradaDAyi muDA buDEH vyAsasyEva nirA tasmin SradDAvadDA sTa tAntrikAH matsyasyApyupadeSyAn vaH komatsyAnapi BAzatAm paRqitaH pARqavAnAM sa vyAsaScAwupawuH kaviH nininda tezu nindatsu stuvatsu stutavAnna kim na BrAtuH kila devyAM sa vyAsaH kAmAt samAsajat dAsIratastadAsIdyanmAtrA tatrApyadeSi kim devErdvijEH kftA granTAH panTA yezAM tadAdftO gAM natEH kiM na tErvyaktaM tato pyAtmA DarIkftaH sADu kAsukatA muktA SAntasvAntErmaKonmuKEH sAraNgalocanAsArAM divaM pretyApi lipsuBiH uBayI prakftiH kAme sajjediti munermatam apavarge tftIyeti BaRataH pARinerapi biBratyupari yAnAya janA janitamajjanAH vigrahAyAgrataH paScAd gatvaroraBraviBramam kaH SamaH kriyatAM prAjYAH prIyAprItO pariSramaH BasmIBUtasya BUtasya punarAgamanaM BramaH ena sAnena tiryyak syAdityAdiH kA viBIzikA rAjilo pi hi rAjeva svEH suKI suKahetuBiH hatASceddivi dovyanti dEtyA dEtyAriRA raRe tatrApi tena yudDyantAM hatA api taTEva te svaYca brahma ca saMsAre muktO tu brahma kevalam iti svocCittimuktyuktirvEdagDI vedavAdinAm muktaye yaH SilAtvAya SAstramUce sacetasAm gotamaM tamavetEba yaTA vitTa taTEva saH dArA hariharAdInAM tanmagnamanaso BfSam kiM na muktAH punaH santi kArA Page a gAra manoBuvaH devaScedasti sarvajYaH karuRABAgabanDya vAk tatkiM vAgvyayamAtrAnnaH kftArTayati nArTinaH BavinAM BAvayan duHKaM svakarmajamapISvaraH syAdakAraRa vErI naH kAraRAdapare pare tarkApratizWayA sAmyAdanyo nyasya vyatiGnatAm nAprAmARyaM matAnAM syAt kezAM sattipakzavat akroDaM SikzayantyanyAn kroDanA ye tapoDanAH nirdDanAste DanAyEva DAtuvAdopadeSinaH kiM vittaM datTa tuzweyamadAtari haripriyA dattvA sarvaM DanaM mugDo banDanaM labDavAn baliH dogDA drogDA ca sarvo cArvvo cArvvo cArvvo strI cAru guRavacanatvAt striyAM NIz cArutva yuktAyAM striyAM jyotsnAyAm vudDO kuverapatnyAm ca medi dIptO Sabdara
cAsa cAsa cAsa pu caza hiMsAyAm Ric ac pfzo ikzupraBede cAzaKage puMstrI medi sTiyAM jAtitvAt NIp
cIrRRa cIrRRa cIrRRa tri cara nak pfzo ata ittvam kfte SIlite sampAdite cIrRRavratAnapi sadA kftaGnasaMhitAnimAn yAjYa vidArite ca
cIrRRaparRRa cIrRRaparRRa cIrRRaparRRa tri cIrRaM vidAritaM parRamasya KarjUravfkze nimbavfkze ca medi
cIrRa cIrRa cIrRa tri cara nak pfzo ata ittvam kfte SIlite sampAdite cIrRavratAnapi sadA kftaGnasaMhitAnimAn yAjYa vidArite ca
cIrRaparRa cIrRaparRa cIrRaparRa tri cIrRaM vidAritaM parRamasya KarjUravfkze nimbavfkze ca medi
cIva cIva cIva grahaRe saMvftO ca BvA uBa saka sew cIvati te acIvIt acIvizwa cicIva cicIye fdit acicIvat aci cIvat ta cIva dIptO curA uBa saka sew cIvayati te acIcivat ta cIva grahaRe saMvftO ca BvA uBa saka sew cIvati te acIvIt acIvizwa cicIva cicIye fdit aci cIvat ta cIva dIptO curA uBa saka sew cIvayati te acIcivat ta
cIvarin cIvarin cIvarin pu cIvaramastyasya ini Bikzuke budDaBikzuke trikA
cIvarina cIvarina cIvarina pu cIvaramastyasya ini Bikzuke budDaBikzuke trikA
cOdAyani cOdAyani cOdAyani pu gotrapravarttake pravarADyAyaprasidDe fziBede
cOdrAyani cOdrAyani cOdrAyani pu gotrapravarttake pravarADyAyaprasidDe fziBede
cUrRRa cUrRRa cUrRRa peze cu uBa saka sew cUrRayati te acu cUrRat ta cUrRaH cUrRitaH cUrRRa na cUrRa karmmaRi ac pezaRajAte kzode mayadA praBftO rAjani annAdazwaguRaM cUrRaM cUrRAdazwaguRaM payaH vEdya tallakzaRamuktaM BAvapra atyantaSuzkaM taddravyaM supizwaM vastragAlitam tat syAccUrRaM rajaH kzodastanmAtrA karzasammitA cUrRe guqaH samo deyaH SarkarA dviguRA matA cUrRe tu BarjitaM hiNgudeyaM no tkledakfdBavet liheccUrRaM dravEH sarvErGftAdyErdviguRo nmitEH pibeccaturguREreva cUrRamAloqitaM dravEH cUrRAvalehaguwikA kalkAnAmanupAnakam pittavAta kaPAtaNke trizvekapalamAharediti AvIra KyAte kzode alakezu camUreRuScUrRapratiniDIkftaH raGuH DUlO tambUlopakaraRe kzAre cURa medi cUrRa mAnIyatAM tUrRaM pUrRacandraniBAnane parRAni svarRavarRAni sIdantyAkarRalocane udBawaH BAve ac pezaRe pu
cUrRa cUrRa cUrRa peze cu uBa saka sew cUrRayati te acucUrRat ta cUrRaH cUrRitaH na cUrRa karmaRi ac pezaRajAte kzode mayadA praBftO rAjani annAdazwaguRaM cUrRaM cUrRAdazwaguRaM payaH vEdya tallakzaRamuktaM BAvapra atyantaSuzkAM taddravyaM supizwaM vastragAlitam tat syAccUrRaM rajaH kzodastanmAtrAkarzasammitA cUrRe guqaH samo deyaH SarkarA dviguRA matA cUrRe tu BarjitaM hiNgu deyaM notkledakfdBavet liheccUrRaM dravEH sarvErGftAdyErdviguRonmitEH pibeccaturguREreva cUrRamAloqitaM dravEH cUrRAvalehaguwikA kalkAnAmanupAnakam pittavAta kaPAtaNke trizvekapalamAharediti AvIra KyAte kzode alakezu camUreRuScUrRapratiniDIkftaH raGuH DUlO tambUlopakaraRe kzAre cURa medi cUrRamAnIyatAM tUrRaM pUrRacandraniBAnane parRAni svarRavarRAni sIdantyAkarRalocane udBawaH BAve ac pezaRe pu
ca ca ca cakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH cavargasyAdyaH asyoccAraRasTAnaM tAlu icuyaSAnAM tAlu si kO ukteH tasyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH tAlani jihvAmaDyasparSaH SvAsavivArA GozAlpaprARA bAhyaprayatnAH mAtfkAnyAse vAmabAhumUle sya nyasyatA asya vAcakaSabdAH varRodDAratantre uktA yaTA caH puzkalo halI vARI cAtmaSaktiH sudaSenaH carmmamuRqaDaro BOso mahizAcAralakzaRaH ekarUpo ruciH kUrmmaScAmuRqA dIrGabAhukaH vAmabAhumUlaM mAyA caturmUrttisvarUpiRI dayitaSca triRetraSca lakzmI strftIyalocanaH candanaM candramA dEvaScetano vfSciko buDaH devI kowamuKastvAtmA kumArI pUrvaPA lgunI anaNgameKalA vAyurBodinI ca sulAvaRI tasya DyeyarUpaM yaTA cavarRaM SfRu suSroRi caturvarga pradAyakam kuRqalIsahitaM devi svayaM paranaku RqalIm satataM kuRqalIyuktaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA paYca prARamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivinduehitaM priye kAmaDenutantram kAvya banDAdO prayoge suKadAyakatA NaSavade tanmUlamuktam ca avya ci caRa vA bA BA qa pAdapUraRe pakzAntaradyotane avaDAraRe medi hetO trikA pAdapUraRArDasya pAdapUraRArTasya Page b nirarTakatEva nirarTakaM cAdi pAdapUraREkaprayojanam candrAlokaH samuccaye anvAcaye itaretarayoge samAhAre samA hAre ca amaraH cArTe dvandvaH pA si kO vyAKyAtaM yaTA samuccayAnvAcayetaretarayogasamAhArAScArTAH saGuccayAnvAcayetaretarayogasamAhArAScArTAH paraspara nirapekzasyA nirapekzasvA nekasya ekasmin anvayaH samuccayaH anvatarasvAnuzaNgika tve nvAcayaH militAnA manvaya itaretarayogaH samUhaH samAhAraH tatreSvaraM garuYca guruYca Bajasveti samuccaye BikzAmawa gAYcAnayetyanvAcaye ca na samAso sAmarTyAt DavaKadirO saMjYApariBAzam vyAKyAtaM cEtadasmABiH saralAyAm parasparanirapekzasyeti zarasparanirapekzasyeti ekasya kriyAnvayottaramaparasyAvfttyA kriyAnvayottaramapa rasyAvfttyA tadanvaya iti na tayoH parasparAkANkzA anekasyeti tenEkasya sApekzatve pi na doza uBayostaTAtvABAvAt uBayostaTA tvABAvAt samuccaye ca Sabdena svasamaBivyAhftapadArTottarasApekzatvaM bADyate caSabdena svasamaBivyAhftapadA rTottarasApekzatvaM boDyate tadasamaBivyAhAre tu na ata evAtrEka eva caSabdaH prayujyate tena yacCabdottaraM caSabdastasyEva samaBivyAhftakriyAdAvanvaye itarasApekzatvaM natvanyasyeti boDyam ekasmin ekaDarmAvacCinne ityarTaH anvaya ityetasya yatretyAdistaTA ca yatrEvamanvayastatra samuccayaScaSabdArTaiti yatretyAdistaTAca yatrEvamanvaya statra samuccayaScaSabdArTEti BAvaH na tvanvaya eva tvanvayaeva samuccaya iti sramitavyam mramitavyam anvayaSca viSezyatayA viSezaRatayA vA tatrAdyaM cEtro gacCati pacati ceyAdO cetyAdO kriyAsamuccaye antyam ISvaraM guruYca BajasvetyAdO dravyasamuccaye AnuzaNgikatvamanuddeSyatvamanyatarasya prADAnyaYca tatsambanDikriyATAH tatsa mbanDikriyAyA avaSyakarttavyatvarUpaM taTAca samaBivyAhftakriyAdigatamAnuzaNgikatvavyApyatvamanvAcayavakArArTaH samamiMvyA hftakriyAdigatamAnupaNgikatvavyApyatvAnvAcayacakArArTaH militAnAmiti parasparApekzARAmudBUtAvayavaBedakasamUharUpARAmityarTaH parasparApekzARAmudBUtAvayavaBedaka samUharUpARAtityarTaH anvaya ityasyEkaDarmAvacCinnenAnvaya ityarTaH ityarsyEkavarmAvacCinnenA nvayEtyarTaH tena nIDAtoH saMyogajanakavyApArajanakavyApAraboDakatayA dvikarmakatvena saMyogajanaPavyAgrarajana kavyApAraboDakatayA dvikamakatvena ajAM grAmaM nayatItyAdO ajAgrAmayoruBayorapi DAtUpAttakriyAyAmanvayena DAtUpAttakriyAyAmanvavena tatra na cakArayogo nApi samAsaH tayorekasya tayorekasva saMyoge parasya saMyogAnukUlavyApAre nvayAdekatrAnvayABAvAt ataeva yatrAnekavakAraprayogaH yatrEvamanvayaSca tatretaretarayogastAdfSasamUhaSca cArTa ata eva yatrAtekacakAraprayogaH vyatrEvamanvayaSca tatretaretara yogastAddaSasamUhaSca cArTe ityarTaH anaNBUtAvayavaBedasamUhasya patItyA a nnUtAva yavaBedasamUhasya pratItyA pratyekAvayavavfttiDarma eva pravfttinimittaM pravf Page a ttinimittaM samAhAre tu dvitvatritvAdineva dvitvatritvAdineba samUhasya BAvAt BAnAt samUQatvameva pravfttinimittamiti pravfttinimitamiti viSezaH evaYca uBayatrEva samUhasya boDaH asAmaTyAditi ekArTIBAvABAvAdityarTaH ekA rTIBAvABAdityarTaH taTAhi bahuvrIhiGawakapadAnAM bahurbrAhuGawakapadAnAM karmAdyantarBAveREva dvandvaGawakapadAnAM cArTAntarBAveREva ekArTIBAva ekArrTIBAva AvaSyakaH samarTaH padaviDiriti pA prA pariBAzitatvAt cArTe dvandva ityukteSca nacetaretarAnvaye parasparanirapekzARAmekArTIBAvaH parasparanirapekzARAmekArTImAvaH samBavati yena samuccayAnvAcayAvekArTIBAve ntarBUtO samu YcayAnvaGayavikArTIBAve narBUtO syAtAm tataScetaretarayoge tataScetareta rayoge samAhAre ca sAhityasya sattvAdekArTIBAvastayostadaBAvAnna sattvAdekArTIBAvasta yAstadaBAvAnna taTeti boDyam iyAMstu viSeza itaretarayoge itaretara yoge sAhityaM viSezaRaM dravyaM viSezyaM samAhAre tu sAhityaM praDAnaM dravyaM davyaM viSezaRamiti yaTA cAnayorboDavElakzaRyaM cAnayorboDa vElakzaRyaM taTAkare dfSyam pakzAntaraM pakzantaraM cAtra punaraTakam yaTA mUrKo pi SoBate tAvat saBAyAM vastravezwitaH tAvacca SoBate mUrKo marKo yAvat kiYcit na BAzate hito tulyayogitve tulyayogitya viniyoge ca SabdArTaci SabdArTeci tatra tulyayogitAlaNkArasya cena dyotanAttasya tadarTakatA yaTA saNkucanti saNkacanti sarojAni svEriRI vadanAni ca candrA evaM dIpakAlaNkAradyotakatA pi pf dfSyA satI ca prayozit prakftiSca niScalA mAGaH cakAradvayaprayoge kvacidavilambayogitAyAH kvacittulya kvacitatulya prADAnyasya cAvaboDanam yaTA itIritA patraraTena tena hrIRA hrARA ca hfzwA ca vaBARa yaBARa BEmI nE kalA ca sA kAntimatI kAntamatA kalABftastvamasya lokasya ca netra kOmudI kumA lidanubanDaH caR caRa yadyarTe tasya prayoge Rittvam ca pu cIyate Suklapakza kiraREH aNgaM paraDanaM vA cinoti vA ci qa candre kacCape cOre caRqeSe carvaRe ca medi nirvIje durjane ca tri SabdaratnA SabadaratnA ca cakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH cavargasyAdyaH asyoccAraRasTAnaM tAlu icuyaSAnAM tAlu si kO ukteH tasyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH tAlani jihvAmaDyasparSaH SvAsavivArA GozAlpaprARA bAhyaprayatnAH mAtfkAnyAse vAmabAhumUle sya nyasyatA asya vAcakaSabdAH varRodDAratantre uktA yaTA caH puzkalo halI vARI cAtmaSaktiH sudaSenaH carmmamuRqaDaro BOso mahizAcAralakzaRaH ekarUpo ruciH kUrmmaScAmuRqA dIrGabAhukaH vAmabAhumUlaM mAyA caturmUrttisvarUpiRI dayitaSca triRetraSca lakzmI strftIyalocanaH candanaM candramA dEvaScetano vfSciko buDaH devI kowamuKastvAtmA kumArI pUrvaPA lgunI anaNgameKalA vAyurBodinI ca sulAvaRI tasya DyeyarUpaM yaTA cavarRaM SfRu suSroRi caturvarga pradAyakam kuRqalIsahitaM devi svayaM paranaku RqalIm satataM kuRqalIyuktaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA paYca prARamayaM varRaM paYcaprARAtmakaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivinduehitaM priye kAmaDenutantram kAvya banDAdO prayoge suKadAyakatA
