caRqarudriMkA caRqarudriMkA caRqarudriMkA strI caRqorudrovedyatvenAstyasyAH Wan vidyA Bede SabdaratnA
caRqarudrikA caRqarudrikA caRqarudrikA strI caRqorudrovedyatvenAstyasyAH Wan vidyABede SabdaratnA
cada cada cada yAcane BvA dvika uBa sew cadati te edit acadIt aca dIt acadizwAm cacAda cedatuH cede cada AhlAde dIptO ca BvA aka pa sew idit candati acandIt cacanda cacandatuH candraH cada yAcane BvA dvika uBa sew cadati te edit aca dIt acadizwAm cacAda cedatuH cede cada AhlAde dIptO ca BvA aka pa sew idit candati acandIt cacanda cacandatuH candraH
caha caha caha kalke pratAraRe BvA para saka sew cahati acahIt cacAha cehatuH caha kalke pratAraRe ada curA uBa saka sew Sew cahayati te acacahat sa acucahat ta cahayAM baBUva Asa cakAra cakre caha kalke pratAraRe curA uBa saka sew GawA cahayati te acIcahat ta caha kalke pratAraRe BvA para saka sew cahati acahIt cacAha cehatuH caha kalke pratAraRe ada curA uBa saka Sew cahayati te acucahat ta cahayAM baBUva Asa cakAra cakre caha kalke pratAraRe curA uBa saka sew GawA cahayati te acIcahat ta
caka caka caka BrAntO sO para aka sew idit vadit caNkati acaNkIt cacaNka caka pratiGAte tfptO ca BvA A aka sew cakate acakizwa cacake mite cakayati pratiGAtaH Bayahetuko pratiTAtaH Bayahetfko nizwaSaNkayA gamanAdipratiroDaH vyADAnusAracakitA hariRIva yAsi mfcCa pOlastyacakiteSvaraH raGuH ud apratiGAte yaM cekitAnamanucittaya uccakanti BAga uccakanti apratihatAni Bavanti caka BrAntO sO para aka sew vadit caNkati acaNkIt cacaNka caka pratiGAte tfptO ca BvA A aka sew cakate acakizwa cacake mite cakayati pratiTAtaH Bayahetfko nizwaSaNkayA gamanAdipratiroDaH vyADAnusAracakitA hariRIva yAsi mfcCa pOlastyacakiteSvaraH raGuH ud apratiGAte yaM cekitAnamanucittaya uccakanti BAga uccakanti apratihatAni Bavanti
cakraDarman cakraDarman cakraDarman pu vidyADaraBede vidyADarADipaScEva cakraDarmmA sahAnujEH upAcarati tatrasTaM DanAnAmISvaraM praBum BA sa a
cakraDarmman cakraDarmman cakraDarmman pu vidyADaraBede vidyADarADipaScEva cakra DarmmA sahAnujEH upAcarati tatrasTaM DanAnAmISvaraM praBum BA sa a
cakradantIbIja cakradantIbIja cakradantIbIja na ta jayapAlabIje rAjani
cakradantIvIja cakradantIvIja cakradantIvIja na ta jayapAlavIje rAjani
cakraparRI cakraparRI cakraparRI strI cakramiva parRamasyA NIp pfSniparRyAm Sabdaca
cakraparRRI cakraparRRI cakraparRRI strI cakramiva parRamasyA NIp pfSniparRyAm Sabdaca
cakravAta cakravAta cakravAta pu cakramiva vAtaH GurRI BramivAyO vAtyAyAm dEtyonAmnA tfRAvarttaH kaMsaBftyaH pracoditaH cakravAtasvarUpeRa jahArAsInamarBakam BAga Slo
cakravAte cakravAte cakravAte pu cakramiva vAtaH GurRIM BramivAyO vAtyA yAm dEtyonAmrA tfRAvarttaH kaMsaBftyaH pracoditaH cakravAtasvarUpeRa jahArAsInamarBakam BAga Slo
cakravfdDi cakravfdDi cakravfdDi strI cakramiva vfdDiH vfdDerapi punarvfdDiScakravfdDirudAhftA iti nAradokte vfdDiBede taddAnAdiprakAraH manunA darSito yaTA nAtisAMvatsarIM vfdDiM nacAdfzwAM punarharet cakravfdDiH kAlavfdDiH kAritA kAyikA ca yA fRaM dAtumaSaktoyaH karttumicCet punaH kriyAm sa dattvA nirjitAM vfdDiM karaRaM parivarttayet adarSayitvA tatrEva hiraRyaM parivarttayet yAvatI samBaved vfdDistAvatIM dAtumarhati mamEkasminmAsi mAsadvaye mAsatraye vA gate tasya vfdDiH vigaRayya ekadA dAtavyetyevaM viDi niyamapUrvakavfdDigrahaRamuttamarRaH saMvatsaraparyantaM kuryyAt nAtikrAnte saMvatsare vfdDiM gfhRIyAt na ca SAstroktaDarmyadvikatrikaSatAdyaDikAM gfhRIyAt aDarmyatvaboDanArTo nizeDaH cakravfdDyAdicatuzwayIM cASAstrIyAM na gfhRIyAt tasyAM svarUpamAha bfhaspatiH kAyikA kAyasaMyuktA mAsagrAhyA ca kAlikA vfdDervfdDiScakravfdDiH kAritA fRinA kftA tatra cakravfdDiH svarUpeREva garhitA kAlavfdDistu dviguRADikagrahaRena kAyikA cAtivAhadohAditA kAritA fRikena yA ApatkAla eva uttamarRapIqayA kftA catasno pi vfdDIraSA strIyA na gfhRIyAt taTA ca bfhaspatiH BAgo yaddviguRAdUrdDaM cakravfdDiSca gfhyate pUrRe ca sodayaM paScAt vArdDuzyaM tadvigarhitam kAtyAyanaH fRikena kftA vfdDiraDikA samprakalpitA ApatkAlakftA nityaM dAtavyA kAritA taTA anyaTA kAritA vfdDirnna dAtavyA kaTaYcana fRaM dAtumiti aDamarRoDanadAnAsAmarTyAt yadi punarleKyAdikriyAM kartumicCet sa nirjjitAM uktamArgeRa satyatayA AtmasAt kftAM vfdDiM dattvA karaRaM leKyaM punaH kuryyAt adarSayitveti yadi dEvagatyo vfdDihiraRyamapi samagraM dAtuM na Saknoti tadA tad gfhItvEva tatrEva punaH kriyamARe leKyAdO vfdDihiraRyAdiSezamAropayet yatpramARaM cakravfdDiDanaM tadAnIM samBavati taddAtumarhati kullU cakramastvasya ac cakraM cakravacCakawAditannimittA vfdDiH SakawAdiBAwakarUpalABe ca cakravfdDiM samArUQo deSakAlavyavasTitaH atikrAman deSakAlO na tatPalamavApnuyAt manuH cakradfdDimiti cakravfdDiSabdenAtra cakravacCakawAdiBAwakarUpA vfdDiraBimatA cakravfdDimASrita uttamarRo deSakAlavyavasTitaH yadi vArARasIparyantaM lavaRAdi Sakawena vahAmi tadA mameyadDanaM dAtavyamiti vetane deSavyavasTitiH yadi mAsaM yAvadvahAmi tadA mameyadDanaM dAtavyamiti kAlavyavasTitiH evamaByupagatadeSakAlO niyamasTO dEvAdapUrayan SakawAdinA vahan lABarUpaPalaM sakalaM na prApnoti kUllU
cakravfdvi cakravfdvi cakravfdvi strI cakramiva vfdDiH vfdDerapi punarvfdDiScakravfdDi rudAhftA iti nAradokte vfdDiBede taddAnAdiprakAMraH manunA darSito yaTA nAtisAMvatsarIM vfdDiM navAdfzwAM punarharet caktravfdDiH kAlavfdDiH kAritA kAyikA ca TA fRaM dAtumaSaktoyaH karttumicCet punaH kriyAm Page b sa dattvA nirjitAM vfdDiM karaRaM parivarttayet adarSayitvA tatrEva hiraRyaM parivarttayet yAvatI samBaved GfdDistA vatIM dAtumarhati mamEkasminmAsi mAsadDaye mAsatraye vA gate tasya vfdDiH vigaRayya ekadA dAtavyetyevaM viDi niyamapUrbbakavfdDigrahaRamuttamarRaH saMvatsaraparyyantaM kuryyAt nAtikrAnte saMvatsare vfdDiM gfhRIyAt na ca SAstrokta DarmyadvikatrikaSatAdyaDikAM gfhRIyAt aDarmyatvaboDa nArTo nizeDaH cakravfdDyAdicatuzwayIM cASAstrIyAM na gfhRIyAt tAsAM svarUpamAha vfhaspatiH kAyikA kAyasaMyuktA mAsagrAhyA ca kAlikA vfdDervfdDiScakravfdDiH kAritA fRinA kftA tatra cakravfdDiH svarUpeREva garhitA kAlavfdDistu dviguRADikagrahaRana kAyikA cAtivAhadohAdinA kAritA fRikena yA Apat kAla eva uttamarRapIqayA kftA catasro pi vfdDIraSA strIyA na gfhRIyAt taTA ca vfhaspatiH BAgo yaddviguRAdUrdDvaM cakravfdDiSca gfhyate pUrRe ca sodaya paScAt vArdDuzyaM tadvigarhitam kAtyAyanaH fRikena kftA vfdDiraDikA samprakalpitA ApatkAlakftA nitya dAtavyA kAritA taTA anyaTA kAritA vfdDirnna dAtavyA kaTaYcana fRaM dAtumiti aDamarRo DanadAnAsAmarTyAt yadi punarleKyAdikriyAM karttumicCet sa nirjjitAM uktamArgeRa satyatayA AtmasAt kftAM vfdDiM dattvA karaRaM leKyaM punaH kuryyAt adarSayitveti yadi devagatyA vfdDihiraRyamazi samagraM dAtuM na Saknoti tadA tad gfhItvEva tatrEva punaH kriyamARe leKyAdO vfdDihira RyAdiSezamAropayet yatpramARaM cakravfdDiDanaM tadAnIM samBavati taddAtumarhati kullU cakramastvasya ac cakraM cakravacCakawAdi tannimittA vfdDiH SakawAdiBAwakarUpalABe ca cakravfdDiM samArUQo deSakAlavyavasTitaH atikrAman deSakAlO na tatPala mavApnuyAt manuH cakradfdDimiti cakravfdDiSabde nAtra cakravacCakawAdiBAwakarUpA vfdDiraBimatA cakra vfdDimASrita uttamarRo deSakAlavyavasTitaH yadi vArA RasIparyyantaM lavaRAdi Sakawena vahAmi tadA mameya dDanaM dAtavyamiti vetane deSavyavasTitiH yadi mAsaM yAvadvahAmi tadA mameyadDanaM dAtavyamiti kAlavyavasTitiH evamaByupagatadeSakAlO niyamasTO dEvAdapUrayan Saka dAdinA vahan lABarUpaPalaM sakalaM na prApnoti kUllU

cala cala cala gatO vkrvBvA BvA para saka sew calati acAlIt cacAla celatuH calan calitaH jvalAdi cAlaH pacA calaH kfzRena nihate cEdye cacAla ca vasunDarA BA sA a calatyekena pAdena tizWatyekena budDimAn cARa tilamAtramapi calituM na Saknoti paYcata Arze Atma na DarmAccalate vudDirDarmarAjasya DImataH BA sa a Rici calayati cAlayati cAlayan vasunAM cenAM cAla yan vasuvAM cemAM balena caturaNgiRA BA A a kampane aka micca calayati te acIcalat calayan BfNgarucastavAlakAn raGuH tAM prAviSat kapivyAGrastarUnacalayan kapivyAGra starUnacalayan SanEH BawwiH yUnAM manaScalayati prasaBaM naBasvAn f sa gatyarTasya na mittvam miccale iti kavikalpadrume kampArTaeva tasya mittvokteH AcAlayeyuH SElAMste krudDABindyurmahItale hariva a parvatAnAYca SiKarARyAcAlayati vegavAn BA SA a ud UrdDagamane utkramya UrdDvagamane utkamya gatO puzpoccalitazawpadam raGuH utTAya gatO ca uccalitaH prayAtAm raGuH vi viSezeRa calane vyacAlIdamBasAM patiH BawwiH cala vilAse tu pa a sew calati acAlIt cacAla cala mftO pozaRe cu saka uBa sew cAlayati te acIcalat acicalat cala tri cala vA pacA ac tarale caYcale kampayukte amara kamba yukte amaraH parameSvare pu DUtASIracalaSaclaH DUtASIracalaScalaH vizRu sa na svarUpAnna sAmarTyAt naca jYAnAdi kAt guRAt calanaM vidyate yasmAdacalaH kIrttito cyutaH smfteH vAyurUpeRa calatIti calaH BA kampArTakacalateH svArTe Rici BAve ac kampane medi miccale kavikalpa calanaM ca rajasaH kAryaM kAryyaM yaTAha sA kA satvaM laGu prakASakamizwamupazwamBakaM prakASakamizwamupazwammakaM calaYca rajaH satvatamasI svayamakriyatayA svasvakAryapravfttiM pratyavasadantI KaKakAryyapravfttiM pratyavasI dantI rajasopazwaByete avasAdAt pracyAvya svakAryye syakAryye te utsAhaM prayatnaM kAryyete tadidamuktamupazwamBakam iti kasmAdityata uktaM calamiti tadanena rajasaH Page b pravfttyarTatvaM darSitam rajastu calat paritastrEguRyaM paritastrEguRyE cAlayadguruRA vfRvatA ca tamasA tatra tatra pravfttipratibanDena pravftti pratibanDena kvacideva pravarttyate sA ta kO mBOnajO mBOnjO BrO ceccalamidamuditaM yugErmuniBiH svarEH vf ra ukte azwAdaSAkzarapAdake varRavfttaBede ta na sa vfttacUlaScalakAkapakzakEH raGuH yaTAmBasA pracalatA praca latA taravo pi calA iva BAga na Kalu prema calaM suhfjjane prAyaScalaM gOravamASritezu kumA cala gatO BvA para saka sew calati acAlIt cacAla celatuH calan calitaH jvalAdi cAlaH pacA calaH kfzRena nihate cama cama cama adane BvA pa saka sew camati AcAmati vicamati vi camati AcamIt cacAma cematuH udit camitvA cAntvA AcAntaH Acamanam AcamanIyam AcAntaH A cAntaH punarAcAmet smftiH manAg magno pi nAcAmasi pravoDaca cacAma maDu mADvIkam Page a BawwiH Rici cAmayati imAM kimAcAmayase na cakzuzI nEza cama Bakze svAdi vEdikaH pa saka sew camnoti udit camitvA cAntvA kavikalpadrume kumBityAM gamlf kusmityAM gamx gatyAM cam nracam jam jimu Jama iti vAkye paro nubanDaH pUrvezAm pUrvvezAm iti tatrokteH sarvvezAmudittvaM tena Sabdakalpadrume Sabda kalpadrume svAdigaRIyasya udittvAnuktiH prAmAdikI cama adane BvA pa saka sew camati AcAmati vi camati AcamIt cacAma cematuH udit camitvA cAntvA AcAntaH Acamanam AcamanIyam A cAntaH punarAcAmet smftiH manAg magno pi nAcAmasi pravoDaca cacAma maDu mADvIkam Page a BawwiH Rici cAmayati imAM kimAcAmayase na cakzuzI nEza cama Bakze svAdi vEdikaH pa saka sew camnoti udit camitvA cAntvA kavikalpadrume kusmityAM gamx gatyAM cam nracam jam jimu Jama iti vAkye paro nubanDaH pUrvvezAm iti tatrokteH sarvvezAmudittvaM tena Sabda kalpadrume svAdigaRIyasya udittvAnuktiH prAmAdikI
candrahAma candrahAma candrahAma pu candrasyeva hAsaH praBA sya candraMhasati sitatvAt hasa aR vA Kaqga rAvaRaKaqage ca medi rOpye na rAjani guqUcyAM strI rAjani
candrahAsa candrahAsa candrahAsa pu candrasyeva hAsaH praBA sya candraM hasati sitatvAt hasa aR vA Kaqge rAvaRaKaqge ca medi rOpye na rAjani guqUcyAM guqUcyAM strIrAjani

capa capa capa cUrRIkaraRe cu uBa saka sew GawA capayayi te acIcapat ta ciDAtoreva svArTe Rici tadrUpamityanye capa sAntvane BvA para saka sew capati acApIta acapIt aca pIt Rici cApayati capa gatO pu uBa saka sew idit ampayati te acacampat ta capa cUrRIkaraRe cu uBa saka sew GawA capayayi te acIcapat ta ciDAtoreva svArTe Rici tadrUpamityanye capa sAntvane BvA para saka sew capati acApIta aca pIt Rici cApayati capa gatO pu uBa saka sew idit ampayati te acacampat ta

caraRaparvvan caraRaparvvan caraRaparvvan na ta gulPe trikA
caraRya caraRya caraRya pu caraRa iva iba SAKA yat caraRatulye pA caraRya caraRa gatO kaRqvA saka para sew caraRyati acaraRyIt varaRagatO iti pAWAntaram caraRya pu caraRa iba SAKA yat caraRatulye pA caraRya caraRa gatO kaRqvA saka para sew caraRyati acaraRyIt varaRagatO iti pAWAntaram
carca carca carca aDyayane curA uBa saka sew carcayati te acacarcat acaca rcat t carcitaH carcA carca uktO Bartsane ca tu pura para saka sew carcati arccIt acarccIt uktiratra vicArArTapariBAzaRam carca aDyayane curA uBa saka sew carcayati te acaca rcat t carcitaH carcA carca uktO Bartsane ca tu para saka sew carcati acarccIt uktiratra vicArArTapariBAzaRam
carmA carmA carmA pu carmmaRA parivfto raTaH aR carmmaRA sarvato vezwite raTe

carmaGawakA carmaGawakA carmaGawakA strI carmaRA cawakeva cAmacikA ajina patrAyAM hemaca
carmaRvatI carmaRvatI carmaRvatI strI carmman astyarTe matup masya vaH saMjYAyAM AsandIvadityAdinA ni nadIBede sA ca ranti devasya yajYopakalpitagorASicarmmata utpannA yaTAha mahAnadI carmma rASerutkledAt susuve yataH tataScarmasvatItyevaM viKyAtA sA mahAnadI BA SA a rantidevasya yajYe tA paSutvenopakalpitAH ataScarmaRvatI rAjan gocarmaByaH pravarttitA mA anu a narmadAPalaM dakziRasinDuPalaYcoktvA BA va a tanmAhAtmya yaTA carmmaRvatI samAsAdya niyato niyatASanaH rantidevAByanujYAto agnizwomaPalaM laBet atastasyA dakziRadeSasTatvam asaMjYAyAM tu carmmavat ityeva carmmayukte tri striyAM NIp

carmadaRqa carmadaRqa carmadaRqa pu carmmaRA kftodaRqaH kazAyAm koqA hema
carmadala carmadala carmadala na carmma dalayati dala aR svalpakuzWaBede syuryena kaRqUvyaTanOGaScozAstalezu taccarmmadalaM vadanti suSrutaH carmmadalAjagallImaSakADizWAnA suSrutaH

carmaja carmaja carmaja na carmmaRi jAyate jana qa romaRi ruDire ca rAjani

carmakAra carmakAra carmakAra tri carmma tannirmmitaM pAdukAdi karoti kf aKa upa sa pAdukAdikArake cARqAlyAM tIvasAtkAtacarmmakAra iti ataH parASarokte saNkIrRajAtiBede puM strI striyAM jAtitvAt NIz carmmakArasya dvO putrO gaRakovAdyapUrakaH manunA tu vEdehyAM nizAdAjjAtasya kArAvarAKyacarmmakArasaMjYoktA yaTA kArAvaro nizAdAttu carmmakAraH prasUyate uttaratra vEdehyAmevetyukteH atrApi tasyAmevetyanvayaH uSanasA tu sUtAdvipraprasUtAyAM sUtoveRuka ucyate nfpAyAmeva tasyEva jAtoyacarmmakArakaH ityuktam evaYca mumitrayaprAmARyAt triviDEva carmakArajAtiH DigvarRAnAM carmma kAryam manunA tezAM vfttiruktA carmmakaroti kvip carmmakfdapyatra Rvul carmmakAraka tatrArTe
carmakIla carmakIla carmakIla pu carmmaRi kIla iva guhyajAte rogaBede hAriSa KyAte roge vyAno gfhItvA SlezmARam karotyarSastvaco bahiH kIlopasaMsTirasvaraM carmmakIlantu tadviduH vAtena todapAruzyaM pittAdasitaraktatA SlezmaRA snigDatA tasya graTitatvamavarRatA mAGavaka tannidAnAdyuktam carmakIlaM jAtumaRiM masakAn tilakAlakAn utsftya SastreRa dahet kzArAgniByAmaSezataH BAvapra
carmakazA carmakazA carmakazA sA strI carmma kaza sa ti kaza ac paScimadeSaprasidDe ganDadravyaBede cAmarakazA saptalAlatAyAM carmmakasApyatra BarataH

carman carman carman na cara manin dehAvarikAyAM tvaci indriyaBede yena sparSa upalaByate tasmin Palake QAla ca tvagindriyantu vAyavIyaM yaTAha dehavyApi tvagindriyam BAzA tasya taTAtvaM si mu samarTitaM yaTA SarIra vyApakaM sparSagrAhakamindriyaM tacca vAyavIyaM rUpAdizu Bavye sparSasyEva vyaYjakatvAt aNgasaNgisalilaSEtyavyaYjaka vyajanavAtavat manasA tvagyogojYAnasAmAnye kAraRaM yaTAha tatrEva tvacoyogo manasA jYAnakAraRam tvaNmanaHsaMyogo jYAnasAmAnye kAraRamityarTaH kiM tatra pramARaM suzuptikAle tvacaM tyaktvA purItati varttamAnena manasA jYAnAjananamiti nanu suzuptikAle kiM jYAnaM Bavizyati anuBavarUpaM smaraRarUpaM vA nAdyaH anuBavasAmagryABAvAttaTAhi cAkzuzAdipratyakze cakzurAdinA saha manaHsaMyogasya hetutvAt tadaBAvAdeva na cAkzuzAdipratyakzaM jYAnAderaBAvAdeva na mAnasapratyakzaM jYAnAdyaBAve ca nAtmano pi pratyakzamiti vyAptijYAnABAvAt nAnumitiH sAdfSyajYAnABAvAt nopamitiH padajYAnABAvAt na SAbdaboDaH ityanuBavasAmagryaBAvAt nAnuBavaH udboDakABAvAcca na smaraRam mEvaM suzuptiprAkkAlotpannecCAdivyaktestatsambanDenAtmanaSca pratyakzaprasaNgAt tadatIndriyatve mAnABAvAt suzuptipAkkAle nirvikalpameka jIyata ityatrApi pramARABAvAt aTa jYAnamAtre tvaNmanaH saMyogasya yadi kAraRatvaM tadA rAsanacAkzuzAdipratyakzakAle spArSanapratyakzaM syAt vizayendriyasaMyogasya vizayatvakasaMyogasya ca tadA sattvAt parasparapratibanDAdekamapi vA na syAditi atra kecit pUrvoktayuktyA tvaNmanoyogasya hetutve sidDe cAkzuzAdisAmagryAH spArSanAdipratibanDakatvamanuBavAnuroDAt kalpyate iti anye tu suzuptyanuroDAt carmamanaHsaMyogasya jYAnahetutvaM kalpyaM vAkzuzAdipratyakzakAle tvaDi manaHsaMyogAtAvAnna syArSanapratyakzamiti vadanti carmmatvacorBeda iti tu rahasyam tvacaSca saptaviDA yaTAha suSrutaH tasya Kyalvevampravfttasya SukraSoRitasyABipacyamAnasya kzIrasyeva sAntAnikAH sapta tvaco Bavanti tAsAM praTamA vamAsinI nAma yA sarvvavarRAnavaBAsayati paYcaviDAYca CAyAM prakASayati sA vrIherazwAdaSaBAgapramARA siDmapadma kaRwakADizWAnA dvitIyA lohitA nAma zoqaSaBAgapramARA tilakAlakanyacCavyaNgADizWAnA tftIyA SvetA nAma dvAdaSaBAgapramARA carmmadalAjagallImaSakADizWAnA caturTI tAmrA nAmAzwaBAgapramARA viviDakilAsakuzWADizWAnA paYcamI vedinI nAma vrIhipaYcaBAgapramARA kuzWavisarpADizWAnA zazWI rohiRI nAma vrIhipramARA granTyapacyarvudaSlIpada galagaRqADizWAnA saptamI mAMsaDarA nAmavrIhidvayapramARA BagandaravidraDyarSo DizWAnA yadetatpramARaM nirdizwaM tanmAMsalezvavakASezu na lalAwasUkzmANgANGrAdizu yato vakzyatyudarezu vrIhimuKenANguzWo darapramARamavagAQaM viDyediti PalakavivftiyuktikalpatarO yaTA SarIrAvarakaM SastraM carma ityaBiDIyate tatpunardviviDaM kAzWacarmmasamBavaBedataH SarIrAvarakatvaYca laGutA dfQatA taTA durBedyateti kaTitaScarmaRAM guRasaMgrahaH sitoraktastaTA pItaH kfzRa ityaBiSabditaH brahmAdijAtiBedena carmmaRAM varRa nirRayaH citravarRastu sarvezAM sarvadEvopapadyate iti BojadevaH
carmanAlikA carmanAlikA carmanAlikA strI carmmanirmmitA nAlikeva kazAyAM tAqanyAM koqA SabdArTaci
carmapAdukA carmapAdukA carmapAdukA strI carmamayI pAdukA carmakftapAdatrARe tato brahmacArI anena mantreRa carmapAduke pAdayornidaDyAt BavadevaH
carmapatrA carmapatrA carmapatrA strI carmmeva patraM pakzo syAH cAmacikA ajinapatrAyAM jawA
carmapawwikA carmapawwikA carmapawwikA strI carmmanirmmitA pawwikA cAmAwI carmmamayapawwikAyAm SabdArTaci
carmapraBedikA carmapraBedikA carmapraBedikA strI carmma praBinatti pra Bida Rvul wApi ata ittvam ta carmaveDane straBede amaraH
carmaprasevikA carmaprasevikA carmaprasevikA strI carmaRA prasIvyate pra siva vA karmmaRivun wApi ata ittvam BastrAyAm agnisandIpanArTe carmamaye yantraBede amaraH
carmapuwa carmapuwa carmapuwa ka pu carmamayaM puwamatra vA kap dftisaMjYake carmamayapAtraBede kupA medi

carmaraNgA carmaraNgA carmaraNgA strI carmaRe raNgo syAH AvarttakIlatAyAM viBARqyAm rAjani deSaBede pu sa cadeSaH vf sa kUrmaviBAge a paScimottaradiSi uktaH diSi paScimottarasyAm ityupakrame guruhAmarukacCacarmaraNgAKyAH
carmaru carmaru carmaru pu carmma rAti rA bA ku carmmakAre trikA
carmasAra carmasAra carmasAra pu carmaRaH sAraH rase rAjani BuktAnnAdeH rasasva tvagmaDye jAyamAnatvAt tasya taTAtvam
carmasamBavA carmasamBavA carmasamBavA strI carmaRi tvaci samBavati sam BU ac sTUlElAyAM hArA tatPalasya tvaNmaDye samBavAttasyAstaTAtvam
carmataraNga carmataraNga carmataraNga pu carmmaRi taraNga iva jarayA palite balO
carmatila carmatila carmatila tri carmmaRi tilA asya carmmoparijAta kfzRatilake tila yuktadehAdO
carmavasana carmavasana carmavasana pu carma gajAsuracarma vasanamasya kfttivAsasi Sive kfttivAsasSabde dfSyam
carmavat carmavat carmavat tri carmman astyarTe matup masya vaH asaMjYAtvAt na ni carmmayukte striyAM NIp lohacarmmavatI cApi sAgniH saguqagfzwikA BA va a subalAtmajaBede pu gajogavAkzo vfzaBaScarmma vAnArjavaH SukaH zaqete balasampannA niyeyurmahato balAt ityupakrame amfzyamARAste sarve subalasyAtmajAraRe BA mI a ityuktam
carmavfkza carmavfkza carmavfkza pu carmapraDAnaH carmatulyavalkapraDAnovfkzaH BUrjavfkze svarjUrA nArikelASca carmavfkzo haritakI harivaM a
carmayazwi carmayazwi carmayazwi strI carmamayI yazwiriva aSvAdestAqanyAM koqA SabdArTaci
carmika carmika carmika tri carma carmamayaM PalakaM QAla yudDasADanatayA styasya brIhyA vA Wan carmamayaPalakena yodDari QAlI tasya BAvaH karma vA purohitA yak cArmikya tadBAve na
carmin carmin carmin tri carma dehAvarakaM QAla PalakaM vA astyasya vA ini wilopaH carmayukte QAli KyAte carmike nAge nAge daSa raTA SatamaSvA raTe raTe aSve Sve daSa DAnuzkA DAnuzke daSa carmiRaH BA BI a carmARi valkalAnyasyAM santi vA ini BUrjavfkze amaraH kadalyAM BfNgarIwe ca pu Sabdara
carmmAmBas carmmAmBas carmmAmBas pu carmaRo mBaH carmmAntarasTe rase rAjani BuktAnnAdirasasya carmAByantarasTatvAttasya taTAtvam
carmmAra carmmAra carmmAra pu carma SilpasADanatayA fcCati f aR upa sa carmakAre jawA
carmmAvakarttin carmmAvakarttin carmmAvakarttin pu carma avakfntanti svaSilpanirvAhAya ava kftI cCede Rini carmakAre tadannaBakzaRaM manunA nizidDaM yaTA AyuH suvarRakArARAM yaSaScarmAkavartti nAm
carmma carmma carmma na carmma sADanatayA astyasya ac wilopaH carmma nirmmite Palake QAla BarataH
carmmaRvatI carmmaRvatI carmmaRvatI strI carmman astyarTe matup masya vaH saMjYAyAM AsandIvadityAdinA ni nadIBede sA ca ranti devasya yajYopakalpitagorASicarmmata utpannA yaTAha mahAnadI carmmarASerutkledAt susuve yataH tataSca rmaRvatItyezaM viKyAtA sA mahAnadI BA SA a rantidevasya yajYe tAH paSutvenopakalpitAH ataScarma RvatI rAjan gocarmaByaH pravarttitA BA anu a Page b narmadAPalaM dakziRasinDuPalaYcoktvA BA va a tanmAhAtmyaM yaTA carmmaRvatIM samAsAdya niyato niyatASanaH rantidevAByanujYAto agni zwomaPalaM laBet atastasyA dakziRadeSasTatvam asaM jYAyAM tu carmmavat ityeva carmmayukte tri striyAM NIp
carmmaRya carmmaRya carmmaRya tri carmmaRi BavaH SarIrAvayavatvAt yat carma Bave SlezmaRA carmmaRyaM vAnyadvA viSlizwaM saMSleza yet Eta vrA
carmmacawI carmmacawI carmmacawI strI carmma cawati Binatti cawa Bede ac gOrA NIz cAmacikA ajinapatrAyAM SabdaratnA svArTe ka carmmacawikApyatra
carmmacawakA carmmacawakA carmmacawakA strI carmaRA cawakeva cAmacikA ajina patrAyAM hemaca
carmmacitraka carmmacitraka carmmacitraka na carmma citrayati citra Rvul SvetakuzWaroge rAjani
carmmadUzikA carmmadUzikA carmmadUzikA svI carmma dUzati dUzi Rvul koWaroge rAjani
carmmadaRqa carmmadaRqa carmmadaRqa pu carmmaRA kftodaRqaH kazAyAm koqA hema
carmmadala carmmadala carmmadala na carmmadalayati dala aR svalpakuzWaBede syuryyena kaRqUvyaTanOGacozAstalezu taccarmmadalaM vadanti suSrutaH carmmadalAjagallImaSakADizWAnA suSrutaH
carmmadruma carmmadruma carmmadruma pu carmma carmmAkAravalkalaM tatpraDAnodrumaH mUrja vfkze rAjani tasya carmmAkAravalkalatvAt taTAtvam
carmmaja carmmaja carmmaja na carmmaRi jAyate jana qa romaRi ruDire ca rAjani
carmmakArI carmmakArI carmmakArI strI carmma kirati kF aR carmmakazAyAmozaDO medi carmmakArajAtistriyAM ca
carmmakAra carmmakAra carmmakAra tri carmma tannirmmitaM pAdukAdi karoti kf aR upa sa pAdukAdikArake cARqAlyAM tIva Page a rAjjAtaScarmmakAra iti smataH parASarokte saNkIrRRa jAtiBede puMstrI striyAM jAtitvAt NIz carmma kArasya dvO putrO gaRakovAdyapUrakaH manunA tu vEdehyAM nizAdAjjAtasya kArAvarAKyacarmmakArasaMjYoktA yaTA kArAvaro nizAdAttu carmmakAraH prasUyate uttaratra vEdehyAmevetyukteH atrApi tasyAmevetyanvayaH uSa nasA tu sUtAdvipraprasUtAyAM sUtoveRuka ucyate nfpAyAmeva tasyEva jAtoyaScarmmakArakaH ityuktam evaYca munitrayaprAmARyAt triviDEva carmakArajAtiH DigvarRRAnAM carmma kAryyam manunA tezAM vfttiruktA carmmakaroti kvip carmmakfdapyatra Rvul carmmakAraka tatrArTe
carmmakIla carmmakIla carmmakIla pu carmmaRi kIla iva guhyajAte rogaBede hAriSa KyAte roge vyAno gfhItvA SlezmARam karotyarSastvaco bahiH kIlopasaMsTiraKaraM carmma kIlantu tadviduH vAtena todapAruzyaM pittAdasita raktatA SlezmaRA snigDatA tasya graTitatvamavarRatA mAGavaka tannidAnAdyuktam carmakIlaM jatumaRiM masakAn tilakAlakAn utkftya SastreRa dahet kzArAgniByAmaSezataH BAvapra
carmmakazA carmmakazA carmmakazA sA strI carmma kaza sa ti kaza ac paScima deSaprasidDe ganDadravyaBede cAmarakazA saptalAlatAyAM carmmakasApyatra BarataH
carmmamaRqala carmmamaRqala carmmamaRqala pu ba va deSaBede aparAntAH parAntASca pahnavAScarmamaRqalAH BA BI a deSoktO
carmmamaya carmmamaya carmmamaya tri carmaRovikAraH mayaw carmanirmite pAtrAdO striyAM NIp dvIpicarmAvanadDESca vyAGracarmamayErapi BA BI a yaTA kAzWamayo hastI yaTA carsamayo mfgaH manuH
carmmamnA carmmamnA carmmamnA tri carmamaye kavacAdO manati aByasyati mnA ka carmamayakavacAdO kftAByAse kfzwayaScarmamnA aBito janAH f sADyeByaScarmamnam yaja puruzameDe devaBedoddenAlaByapuruzaBedoktO
carmmamuRqA carmmamuRqA carmmamuRqA strI cAmuRqA pfzo durgAyAM hemaca
carmmamudrA carmmamudrA carmmamudrA strI vAmahastaM taTA tiryyak kftvA cEva prasAryya ca AkuYcitANgulIH kuryyAt carmamudreyamIritA tantrasArokte devapUjANge mudrABede
carmman carmman carmman na cara manin dehAvarikAyAM tvaci indriyaBede yena sparSa upalaByate tasmin Palake QAla ca tvagindriyantu vAyavIyaM yaTAha dehavyApi tvagindriyam BAzA tasya taTAtvaM si mu samarTitaM yaTA SarIra vyApakaM sparSagrAhakamindriyaM tacca vAyavIyaM rUpAdizu mavye sparSasyEva vyaYjakatvAt aNgasaNgisalilaSEtyavyaYjaka vyajanavAtavat manasA tvagyogojYAnasAmAnye kAraRaM yaTAha tatrEva tvacoyogo manasA jYAnakAraRam tvaNmanaHsaMyogo jYAnasAmAnye kAraRamityarTaH kiM tatra pramARe suzuptikAle tvacaM tyaktvA purItati varttamAnena manasA jYAnAjananamiti nanu suzuptikAle kiM jYAnaM Bavizyati anuBavarUpaM smaraRarUpaM vA nAdyaH anuBava sAmagryaBAvAttaTAhi cAkzuzAdipratyakze cakzurAdinA saha manaHsaMyogasya hetutvAt tadamAvAdeva na cAkzuzAdi pratyakza jYAnAderaBAvAdeva na mAnasapratyakzaM jYAnAdyaBAve ca nAtmano pi pratyakzamiti vyAptijYAnABAvAt nAnu mitiH sAdfSyajYAnABAvAt nopamitiH padajYAnABAvAt na SAbdaboDaH ityanuBavasAmagryaBAvAt nAnuBavaH udboDakABAvAcca na smaraRam mEvaM suzuptiprAkkAlot pannecCAdivyaktestatsambanDenAtmanaSca pratyakzaprasaNgAt tadatI ndiyatve mAnAmAvAt suzuptiprAkkAle nirvikalpameva jAyata Page a ityatrApi pramARABAvAt aTa jYAnamAtre tvaNmanaH saMyogasya yadi kAraRatvaM tadA rAsanacAkzuzAdipratyakza kAle spArSanapratyakzaM syAt vizayendriyasaMyogasya vizayatvaksaMyogasTa ca tadA sattvAt parasparapratibanDA dekamapi vA na syAditi atra kecit pUrvvoktayuktyA tvaNmanoyogasya hetutve sidDe cAkzuzAdisAmagryAH spArSanAdipratibanDakatvamanuBavAnuroDAt kalpyate iti anye tu suzuptyanuroDAt carmmamanaHsaMyogasya jYAna hetutvaM kalpyaM cAkzuzAdipratyakzakAle tvaci manaH saMyogABAvAnna spArSanapratyakzamiti vadanti carmmatva corBeda iti tu rahasyam tvacaSca saptaviDA yaTAha suSrutaH tasya Kyalvevaspravfttasya SukraSoRitasyABipacyamAnasya kzIrasyeva sAntAnikAH sapta tvaco Bavanti tAsAM praTamA vaBAsinI nAma yA sarvvavarRAnavaBAsayati paYcaviDAYca CAyAM prakASayati sA vrIherazwAdaSaBAgapramARA siDmapadma kaRwakADizWAnA dvitIyA lohitA nAma zodDaSaBAga pramARA tilakAlakanyacCavyaNgADizWAnA tftIyA SvetA nAma dvAdaSaBAgapramARA carmmadalAjagallImaSakADizWAnA caturTI tAmrA nAmAzwaBAgapramARA viviDakilAsakuzWADi zWAnA paYcamI vedinI nAma brIhipaYcaBAgapramARA kuzWavisarpADizWAnA zazWI rohiRI nAma vrIhipramARA granTyapacyarvudaSlIpada galagaRqADizWAnA saptamI mAMsaDarA nAma vrIhidvayapramARA BagandaravidraDyarSo DizWAnA yade tatpramARaM nirdizwaM tanmAMsalezvavakASezu na lalAwasUkzmA NgANGrAdizu yato vakzyatyudarezu vrIhimuKenANguzWo darapramARamavagAQaM viDyediti Palakavivfttiyu ktikalpatarO yaTA SarIrAvarakaM SastraM carmma ityaBiDIyate tatpuna rdviviDaM kAzWacarmmasamBavaBedataH SarIrAvarakatvaYca laGutA dfQatA taTA durBedyateti kaTitaScarmaRAM guRa saMgrahaH sitoraktastaTA pItaH kfzRa ityaBiSabditaH brahmAdijAtiBedena carmmaRAM varRa nirRayaH citravarRastu sarvezAM sarvvadEvopapadyate iti BojadevaH
carmmanAlikA carmmanAlikA carmmanAlikA strI carmmanirmmitA nAlikeva kazAyAM tAqanyAM koqA SabdArTaci
carmmapAdukA carmmapAdukA carmmapAdukA strI carmamayI pAdukA carmakftapAtrARe tato brahmacArI anena mantreRa carmapAduke pAdayornida DyAt BavadevaH
carmmapatrA carmmapatrA carmmapatrA strI carmmeva patraM pakzo syAH cAmacikA ajinapatrAyAM jawA
carmmapawwikA carmmapawwikA carmmapawwikA strI carmmanirmmitA pawwikA cAmAwI carmma mayapawwikAyAm SabdArTaci
carmmapraBedikA carmmapraBedikA carmmapraBedikA strI carmma praBinatti pra Bida Rvul wApi ata ittvam ta carmaveDane straBede amaraH
carmmaprasevikA carmmaprasevikA carmmaprasevikA strI carmaRA prasIvyate pra siva vA karmmaRi vun wApi ata ittvam BastrAyAm agnisandIpa nArTe carmamaye yantraBede amaraH
carmmapuwa carmmapuwa carmmapuwa ka pu carmamayaM puwamatra vA kap dftisaMjYake carmamayapAtraBede kupA medi
carmmarI carmmarI carmmarI strI carma rAti rA ka gOrAM NIz sTAvara vizAntargate Palavize latABede kumudvatIreRukAkaramBa karkowakareRukaKadyotakacarmarItyupakrame PalavizAH suSru
carmmaraNgA carmmaraNgA carmmaraNgA strI carBaRe raNgo syAH AvarttakIlatAyAM viBARqyAm rAjani deSaBede pu sa cadeSaH vf sa kUrmaviBAge a paScimottaradiSi uktaH diSi paSci mottarasyAm ityupakrame guruhAmarukacCacarmaraNgAKyAH
carmmaru carmmaru carmmaru pu carmma rAti rA vA ku carmmakAre trikA
carmmasAra carmmasAra carmmasAra pu carmaRaH sAraH rasaM rAjani BuktAnnAdeH rasasya tvagsaDye jAyamAnatvAt tasya taTAtvam
carmmasamBavA carmmasamBavA carmmasamBavA strI carmaRi tvaci samBavati sam BU ac sTUlElAyAM hArA tatPalasya tvaNmaDye samBavAttasyA staTAtvam
carmmataraNga carmmataraNga carmmataraNga pu carmmaRi taraNga iva jarayA palite balO rAjani
carmmatila carmmatila carmmatila tri carmmaRi tilA asya carmmoparijAta kfzRatilake tila yuktadehAdO
carmmavasana carmmavasana carmmavasana pu carma gajAsuracarma vasanamasya kfttivAsasi Sive kfttivAsasSabde pf dfSyam
carmmavat carmmavat carmmavat tri carmman astyarTe matup masya vaH asaMjYAtvAt na ni carmmayukte striyAM NIp lohacarmmavatI cApi sAgniH saguqagfzwikA BA va a subalAtmajaBede pu gajogayAkzo vfzaBaScarmavAnArjavaH SukaH zaqete balasampannA niryayurnahato balAt ityukta Page a krame amfzyamARAste sarve subalasyAtmajAraRe BA BI a ityuktam
carmmavfkza carmmavfkza carmmavfkza pu carmapraDAnaH carmatulyavalkapraDAnovfkzaH BUrjavfkze KarjUrA nArikelASca carmavfkzo haritakI harivaM a
carmmayazwi carmmayazwi carmmayazwi strI carmamayI yazwiriva aSvAdestAqanyAM koqA SabdArTaci

carmmin carmmin carmmin tri carma dehAvarakaM QAla PalakaM vA astyasya vA ini wilopaH carmayukte QAli KyAte carmike nAge nAge daSa raTA SatamaSvA raTe raTe aSve Sve daSa DAnuzkA DAnuzke daSa carmiRaH BA BI a carmARi balkalAnyasyAM santi vA ini BUrjavfkze amaraH kadalyAM BfNgarIwe ca pu Sabdara
carvA carvA carvA strI carva aN carvaRe talaprahAre SabdArTaci
carvaRa carvaRa carvaRa na carva BAve lyuw dantEScUrRane civAna rasAsvAdavyApAraBede ca sA da yuc carvaRApyatra strI pramARaM carvaREvAtra svABinne viduzAM matam carvaRA svAdanam tacca svAdaH kAvyArTasamBedAdAtmAnandasamudBavaH nizpatyA carvaRasyAsya nizpattirupacArataH yadyapi rasABinnatayA carvaRasyApi na kAryatvaM taTApi tasya kAdAcitkatayA upacaritena kAryyatvena kAryyatvamupacaryate iti ca sA da
carvitapAtra carvitapAtra carvitapAtra na ta carvitasya tAmbUlAdestyAgArTaM pAtram pikadAnI KyAte patadgrahe tAmbUlaM darpaRaM pAnapAtraM carvitapAtrakam padmapu pA a
carvvA carvvA carvvA strI carva aN carvaRe talaprahAre SabdArTaci
carvvaRa carvvaRa carvvaRa na carva BAve lyuw dantEScUrRRane civAna rasA svAdavyApAraBede ca sA da yuc carvaRApyatra strI pramARaM carvaREvAtra svABinne viduzAM matam carvaRA svAdanam tacca svAdaH kAvyArTasamBedAdAtmAnandasamudBavaH nizpattyA carvaRasyAsya nizpattirupacArataH yadyapi rasABinnatayA carvaRasyApi na kAryyatvaM taTApi tasya kA dAcitkatayA upacaritena kAryyatvena kAryyatvamupacaryyate iti ca sA da
carvvitapAtra carvvitapAtra carvvitapAtra na ta carvitasya tAmbUlAdestyAnArTam pAtram pikadAnI KyAte patadgrahe tAmbUlaM darpaRaM pAnapAtraM carvitapAtrakam padmapu pA Ka
caryA caryA caryA strI cara paricaryyAparisaryyetyAdi pA parItyasyAvivakzAtaH BAve kyap AcAramAtre vanavAsasya SUrasya mama caryA hi rocate rAmA a gatO caryyAyAM hayamutsfzwam BA A Slo IryyApaTasTitO parivrAjakAdInAM vratAnuzWAne niyamAparityAge gadamadacaretyAdi pA karmaRi yat anuzWeye AcaraRIye tri zawtriMSadAbdikaM caryyaM gurO trEvedikaM matam maNKaH BAve yat avaSyacaraRe na
caryyA caryyA caryyA strI cara paricayyAparisaryyetyAdi pA parItyasyA vivakzAtaH BAve kyap AcAramAtre vanavAsasya SUrasya mama caryyA hi rIcate rAmA a gatO caryyAyAM hayamutsfzwam BA A Slo IryyApaTasTitO paritrAjakAdInAM vratAnuzWAne niyamA parityAme gadamadacaretyAdi pA karmaRi yat anuzWeye AcaraRIye tri zawtriMSadAbdikaM caryyaM gurO yavAdikaM vratam manuH BAve yat avaSyacaraRe na
caturRRavati caturRRavati caturRRa na vati strI caturBiravikA navatiH pUrbbapadAd vA Ratvam cOrAnavvui caturaDikanavatisaMKyAyAM tatsaMKyeye ca caturRa na vatyaDikAni trIRi SatAni Page b kAtyA SrO pUraRe qaw caturRa na vata tatsaMKyApUraRe tri striyAM NIp
caturRavati caturRavati caturRa na vati strI caturBiraDikA navatiH pUrvapadAd vA Ratvam cOrAnavvui caturaDikanavatisaMKyAyAM tatsaMKyeye ca caturRa na vatyaDikAni trIRi SatAni kAtyA SrO pUraRe qaw caturRa na vata tatsaMKyApUraRe tri striyAM NIp
caturTIkarma caturTIkarma caturTIkarma pu vivAhAdanantaraM caturTyAM tiTO karttavye karmmaBede aTAtaScaturTIkarmma goBilaH vivAhanizpattyanantaraM caturTyAM tiTO vakzyamARaM karmma varttizyate saM ta raGunandanaH
caturTIkarmma caturTIkarmma caturTIkarmma pu vivAhAdanantaraM caturTyAM tiTO karttavye karmmaBede aTAtaScaturTIkarmma goBilaH vivAha nizpattyanantaraM caturTyAM tiTO vakzyamARaM karmma vartti zyate saM ta raGunandanaH
caturdaMzwra caturdaMzwra caturdaMzwra pu catasrodaMzwrA yasya skandasya sEnikaBede caturdaMzwro zwajihvaSca meGanAdaH pfTuSravAH BA Sa a skanda sEnikoktO balisEnyaBede azwadaMzwraScaturdaMzwro meTanAdo jalanDamaH hariva a valisEnyoktO paraMmeSvare ca Page b caturddaMzwraScaturBujaH vizRusa catasrodaMzwrA asya caturdaMzwronfsiMhavigrahaH sAdfSyAdvA SfNgaM daMzwrA ityu cyate catasrodaMzwrAH SfNgARi asya catvAri SfNgA dve SIrze ityAdiSruteH BA
caturdazwraM caturdazwraM caturdazwraM pu catasrodaMzwrA yasya skandasya sEnikaBede caturdaMzwro zwajihvaSca meGanAdaH pfTuSravAH BA Sa a skandasEnikoktO balisEnyaBede azwadaMzwraScaturdaMzwro meGanAdo jalanDamaH hariva a valisEnyoktO parameSvare ca caturddaMzwraScaturBujaH vizRusa catasrodaMzwrA asya caturdaMzwronfsiMhavigrahaH sAdfSyAdvA SfNgaM daMzwrA ityucyate catasrodaMzwrAH SfNgARi asya catvAri SfNgA dve SIrze ityAdiSruteHBA
caza caza caza Bakze BvA uBa saka sew cazati te acazIt acAzIt acazizwa cacAza cezatuH ceze vaDe caza baDe BvA pa saka sew cazati aca cA zIt caza Bakze BvA uBa saka sew cazati te acazIt acAzIt acazizwa cacAza cezatuH ceze caza baDe BvA pa saka sew cazati aca cA zIt
cela cela cela lOlye aka gatO saka BvA pa sew celati acelIt cicela fdit acicetyat ta cela na cila AcCAdane karmaRi karmmaRi GaY vastre cela lO lye ac aDame na amaraH celacarmmAvipAlaYca celacarmmAvipAla Yca trirAtraM syAdaBojanam manunA tasya haraRe trirAtropavAsovihitaH ma mA jYAticelaM Buvi kasyacid BUH BawwiH jYAticelamityatra kutsitAni kutsanEH pA samAse paranipAtaH celaKewakawukARqaM garhAyAm pA nindAyAM celAdInAm AdyudAttatA putraScelamivacelasAdfSyena putrasya nindA gamyate si kO DarUzacelaqbravetyAdi GarUpacelaqbravetyAdi pA celaqAdIni vfttivizaye kutsanavAcIni si kO tezu parezu Nyantasya hrasvaH pacAdizu witkaraRasAmarTyAt DacAdizu ditkaraRasAmarTyAt NIp brAhmaRicelI si kO cale cele knopeH pA asmin upapade knoperRamul knope rRamul celaknopam cela lOlye aka gatO saka BvA pa sew celati acelIt cicela fdit acicetyat ta cela na cila AcCAdane karmmaRi GaY vastre cela lO lye ac aDame na amaraH celacarmmAvipAla Yca trirAtraM syAdaBojanam manunA tasya haraRe trirAtropavAsovihitaH mA jYAticelaM Buvi kasyacid BUH BawwiH jYAticelamityatra kutsitAni kutsanEH pA samAse paranipAtaH celaKewakawukARqaM garhAyAm pA nindAyAM celAdInAm AdyudAttatA putraScelamivacelasAdfSyena putrasya nindA gamyate si kO GarUpacelaqbravetyAdi pA celaqAdIni vfttivizaye kutsanavAcIni si kO tezu parezu Nyantasya hrasvaH DacAdizu ditkaraRasAmarTyAt NIp brAhmaRicelI si kO cele knopeH pA asmin upapade knope rRamul celaknopam
cetoM'Su cetoM'Su cetoM Su pu cetasaScEtanyasyAMSuriva jIve raveriva cidAtmakasya puruzasya cetorUpA jalArkasamAH prAjYatEjasaviSvaBedena devatiryagAdidehaBedezu viBAvyamAnA iti vedAntaprakaraRoktestasya taTAtvam
cetoMSu cetoMSu cetoM Su pu cetasaScEtanyasyAMSuriva jIve raveriva cidAtma kasya puruzasya cetorUpA jalArkasamAH prAjYatEjasa viSvaBedena devatiryyagAdidehaBedezu viBAvyamAnA iti vedAntaprakaraRoktestasya taTAtvam
cezwAbala cezwAbala cezwAbala na jyotizokte grahARAM balaBede tacca vfhajjA uktaM yaTA udagayane raviSItamayUKO vakrasamAgamagAH pariSezAH vipulakarA yuDi cottarasaMsTAScezwitavIryayutAH parikalpyAH vf jA aDunA cezwAbalaM doDakenAha udagayane iti makarAdi rASizawkamuttaramayanaM karkawAdizawkaM dakziRamayanamiti udagayane uttarAyaRe raviSItamayUKO sUryacandramasO balinO BavataH pariSezAH BOmabuDagurusitasOrAH vakragAH viparItagatayo balino Bavanti taTA samAgamagAScandeRa sahitAH balina eva candreRa saMyogograhARAM samAgamaSabdavAcyaH raviRA sahAstamayo BOmAdInAM parasparaM yudDam uktaYcAcAryyavizRucandreRa divasakareRAstamayaH samAgamaH SItaraSmisahitAnAm kusutAdInAM yudDam nigadyate nyonyayuktAnAmiti vipulakarAiti vipulAH karA yezAM te vipulakarAH vistIrRaraSmayo balino Bavanti SIGrakendre dvitIyatftIyapadasTe grahasya vipulakaratvaM prAyaH saMBavati vakrAsannatvAt yuDi saMgrAme cottarasaMsTA balina eva kusutAdInAM yudDamityuktam tatra yaH uttaradigBAga saMsTito jayI sa ca balavAn uttarasaMsTatvamatropalakzaRArTam yastejasvI sa eva balavAn tatrEtajjaya lakzaRam dakziRadiksTaH paruzovepaTuraprApta sannikfzwatanuH aDirUQovikftoniHpraBo vivarRaSca yaH sa jitaH uktaviparItalakzaRasampanno jayagato vinirddizwaH vipulaH snigDodyutimAn dakziRadiksTo pi jayayuktaH iti etacCuktasya prAyaH samBavati yasmAtpuliSAcAryaH sarve jayina udaksTA dakziRadiksTo jayI SukraH iti etaccezwAbalam ezAmanyatamena saMyuktaScezwAbalasaMyukto Bavati BawwotpalaH
cezwAvala cezwAvala cezwAvala na jyotizokte grahARAM balaBede tacca vfhajjA uktaM yaTA udagayane raviSItamayUKO vakrasamAgamagAH pariSezAH vipulakarA yuGi cottarasaMsTAScezwitavIryayutAH pari kalpyAH vf jA aDunA cezwAbalaM doDakenAha udagayane iti makarAdi rASizawakamuttaramayanaM karkawAdizawkaM dakziRamayana miti udagayane uttarAyaRe raviSItamayUKO sUryya candramasO balinO BavataH pariSezAH BOmabuDaguru sitasOrAH vakragAH viparItagatayo balino Bavanti taTA samAgamagAScandreRa sahitAH balina eva candreRa saMyogograhARAM samAgamaSabdavAcyaH raviRA sahAstamayo BOmAdInAM parasparaM yudDam uktaYcAcAryyavizRucandreRa divasakareRAstamayaH samAgamaH SItaraSmisahitAnAm kusutAdInAM yudDam nigadyate nyonyayuktAnAmiti vipu lakarAiti vipulAH karA yezAM te vipulakarAH Page b vistIrRaraSmayo balino Bavanti SIGrakendre dvitIya tatIyapadasTe grahasya vipulakaratvaM prAyaH saMBavati vakrAsannatvAt yuDi saMgrAme cottarasaMsTA balina eka kusutAdInA yudDamityuktam tatra yaH uttaradigBAga saMsito jayI sa ca valavAn uttarasaMsTatvamatropalakza RArgram vastejasvI sa eva balavAn tatrEtajjaya lakzaRam dakziRadikasTaH paruzovepaTuraprApta sannikfzwa tanuH aDirUQovikftoniHpraBo vivarRaSca yaH sa jitaH uktaviparItalakzaRasampanno jayagato vinirddizwaH vipulaH svigDodyutimAn dakziRadiksTo pi jayayuktaH iti patacCuktasya prAyaH samBavati yasmAtpuliSAcAryaH sarve jayina udaksTA dakziRadiksTo jayI SukraH iti etaccezwAbalam ezAmanyatamena saMyuktaScezwAbalasaMyukto Bavati BawwotpalaH
ci ci ci AkarzaRenAdAne viBAgapUrvakAdAne vimAgapUrvvakAdAne ca uBa dvika svA KA Page b aniw cinoti cinute cinotu cinu acEzIt acezwa cikAya cicAya cikye cicye karmaRi cIyate acAyi cikIzati te cicIzatite cicIzati te cayanIyam cetazyam ceta zyam ceyam cinvan cinvAnaH citaH citiH kAyaH kATaH cAyaH cayanam agnicit citvA Acitya Rici cAyayati cApayati ci cayane viBAgapUrvakAdAne vimAgapUrvakAdAne BvA uBa anidf aniw cayati te svAdivat ci cayane viBAgapUrvakAdAne vimAgapUrvakAdAne vA cu uBa pakze BvA dvika aniw vA GawAdi cAyayatite cApayatite capayati ityeke acIcayat ta acIcapat duhiyAciruDipraCiBikziciYAmiti duhiyAciruDipraCiBikzici YAmiti BAzyokterasya dvikarmakatvam acEzurvAnarottamAH dvikarmmakatvam acEzurvA narottamAH BawwiH cicIzyantIDvarapAtrajAtam cicIzayantoDvarapAtrajAtam BawwiH antarIkze nAgniScetavya SrutiH rAjahaMsa tava sEva SuBratA SumratA cIyate na ca na cApacIyate kAvyapra kAGyapra aDi ADikyena cayane yaeva tapatyetasmAdevADyacIyatEtasminnaDyacIyata yaeza tapatyetasmAdevADyacIya tEtasminnaDyacIyata Sata vrA amu anu paScAccayane A mUlAt SAKABiranucitaH SAstrAmiranucitaH Etare vrA apa hInatAsampAdane saka yasyAyurapacIyate BA va karmakarttari karmmakarttari prayogaH ava aDaHsTitvA cayane PalAnyavAcinodvfkzAn mugDa ava A samyagAcayane puzpARyavAcivatIm BA puzpARyavAcinvatIm mA va A samyak cayane karmARyAcinute sakft BAga AcikyAte ca BUyo pi rAGavO tena pannageH BA va vyAptO ca kacAcitO vizyagivAgajO vivyagivAgajO gajO kirA anu A anvAcaye anvAcayaSabde dfSyam am sam A samAhyare yadA tu vAsasAM GAsasAM rASiH saBAmaDye samAcitaH BA sa ud UrdDataScayane uttoRyAdAne UrdDataScayame uttolyAdAne uccikyire puzpaPalaM vanAni BawwiH aBi ud samuccaye aByuccayaSabde dfSyam sam ud samuccaye samAhAre saka ekajAtIyakriyAtvaTAdO ekamAtIyakriyAmba yAdO apiH padArTasaMBAzyamarhAnujYAsamuccaye mugDa apiSabde na padArTasaMBAvyagarhAmujYAsamuccaye sugDa apiSabdena saMyogABAvAdiH samuccIyate kAvyapra upa vfdDO aka vardDane saka rAvi Darme kapAlAnyupacinvanti veDasaH Ani Garme kapAlAnyu pa cinvanti veTasaH tE tti aTa mOligatasyendorviSadErdaSanAMSuBiH mOligatasye ndorviSadErdaSanAMSuBiH upacinvan pramAM praBAM tanvIm kumA ni niSezeRa cayane samuccaye ca raTaH SarErme nicitaH BA svadeSe nicitA dozA anyasmin kopamAnatAH anyassmin kopa Page a mAnatAH suSrutaH trayaH parArTe kliSyanti sAkziRaH pratimU kulam pratiBUkulam catvArastUpacIyante vipra Adyo vaRiN nfpaH manuH pari paricaye punaH punaranuSIlane caraRAravindasya DyAnaparicitaBaktiyogaH DyAna paricitaBaktiyogaH BAga muktAjAlaM ciraparicitaM cira paricitaM tyAjito dEvagatyA meGaH hetuH paricayasTErye paricaya sTEryye vakturguRanikEva sA mAGaH pra prakarzeRa cayane samAhAre ca saka karRikArAn praciRvatI praci RvatI BA A vi viSezeRa cayane puzpaM puzpaM vicinvIta mUlacCedaM na kArayet mAlAkAra ivArAme na yaTANgArakArakaH BA u Slo sam samyak cayane samAhAre saMcinvanti sadA yuktA jAtarUpaYca jA tarUpaYca mOktikam hariva cihara cihara cihara pu cikura pfzo cikura SabdArTacintAmARaH
cihura cihura cihura pu cikura pfzo cikure SabdArTacintAmaRiH
cikIrzaka cikIrzaka cikIrzaka tri kf sana Rvul karttumicCO atra Rvulo littvAt liti pA pratyayAt pUrbbasyodAttatA atra na padAntadvirvacanavareyalopasvaretyAdi pA karoteH sanantAv Rvul atolopaH sa ca litIti svare karttavye na sTAnivat iti manoramokteH svare karttavye allopasya na sTAnibattvam
cikirzaka cikirzaka cikirzaka tri kf sana Rvul karttumicCO atra RvulolittvAt liti pA pratyayAt pUrvasyodAttatA atra na padAntadvirvacanavareyalopasvaretyAdi pA karoteH sanantAt Rvul atolopaH sa ca litIti svare karttavye na sTAnivat iti manoramokteH svare karttavye allopasya na sTAnivattvam
ciram ciram ciram avya ci bA ramuk bahukAlArTe hema ciraM cakorasya BavanmuKaspfSI nEza tataH prajAnAM ciramAtmanA DftAm vipakzaBAve ciramasya tasTumaH raGuH ezu kriyAviSezaRatvAt ciraSabdAt dvitIyetyapi Bavitumarhati cirantanaH ciraYjIvana ityAdyevAtra udA
cirama cirama cirama avya ci bA ramuka bahukAlArTe hema ciraM cakorasya BavanmuKaspaSI nEza tataH prajAnAM cira BAtmanA DftAma vipakzaBAve ciramasya tasTuzaH Page b raGuH ezu kriyAviSezaRatvAt ciraSabdAt dvitIyetyapi Bavitumarhati cirantanaH ciraYjIvana ityAdyevAtra udA
cit cit cit strI cita saMmpadA BAve kvip jYAne cetanAyAm amaraH cEtanye saccidAnandavigraham ve sA cittavfttiBede cidasi manAsi DIrasi yaju acetanadehAdisaMGAtasya cetanatvaM saMpAdayantI bAhyavastuzu nirvikalparUpaM sAmAnyajYAnaM janayantI vfttiScitte tadevAtra cidityucyate vedadI nirviSezasPuraRamAtre cetane svataeva prakASamAne brahmaRi nirvikalpakaM sarvAvaBAsakaM jYAnaM pratyagAtmasvarUpaM ciditi vyAKyAtAraH cidihAsvIti cinmAtramidaM cinmayameva ca cittvaM cidahamete ca lokASciditi BAvayet vedAntapra cidrasaH cidGanaH cinmayasyAdvitIyasya nizkalasyASarIriRaH upAsakAnAM sidDyarTaM brahmaRo rUpakalpanA tasmiSciddarpaRe sPAre samastA vastudfzwayaH imAstAH pratibimbanti sarasIva caladrumAH yogavAsizWaH cinoti ci karttari kvip cayanakakarttari tri agnicit karmaRi kvip agnO asAkalye avya amaraH kaccit kaTaYcit jAtucit avyaktAnukaraRe ca avya citkAraH nahi kariRi dfzwe citkAreRa tamanumimate numAtAraH vAcaspatimiSraH mugDaboDe viBaktyantAt kimaH ciccanO pratyayO vihitO itiBedaH taccintyaM canaSabde tadDeturuktaH jAtucit ityAdiprayogAsidDiSca tasya kimaH prakftikatvABAvAt
cita cita cita jYAne BvA para saka sew cetati acetIt ciceta Idit cittaH ya indra somapAtamomadaH SavizWa cetati f evaM te cetizuH sarve sarvve BawwiH kftAnIdasya karttvA cetante dasyutarhaRAm f a vede padavyatyayaH cetaH cetanaH cit klamarahitamacetannIrajIkAritakzmAm BawwiH cita jYAne cu Atma saka sew cetayati te acIcitat ta cetanA cetitaH pUrvaM pUrbbaM cetayate janturindriyErvizayAn pfTak BA SA kinnu supto smi jAgarmi cetayAmi na cetaye BA svargA a rAkzasyaScetayanti rAkzasyaSceta yanti na BawwiH asya adantatvamapi tasya citayatItyAdirUpam cita yatItyAdirUpam indra na yajYEScitayanta AyavaH f cita smftO cu uBa saka sew idit cintayati te acicintat ta cintitaH cintanam cintanAcintA yadyahaM nEzaDAdanyaM manasApi na cintaye BA va a tasmAdasya vaDaM baDaM rAjA manasA pi na cintayet manuH cita strI cita saMmpadA mAve kvip jYAne cetanAyAm amaraH cEtanye saccidAnandavigraham ve sA cittavfttiBede cidasi manAsi DIrasi yaju acetanadehAdisaMGAtasya cetanatvaM saMpAdayantI vAhyava stuzu nirvikalparUpaM sAmAnyajYAnaM janayantI vfttiScittaM tadevAtra cidityucyate vedadI nirviSezasPuraRamAtre cetane svataeva prakASamAne brahmaRi nirvikalpakaM sarvAvaBA sakaM jYAnaM pratyagAtmasvarUpaM ciditi vyAKyAtAraH cidihAsmIti cinmAtramidaM cinmayameva ca cittvaM cidahamete ca lokASciditi BAvayet vedAntapra cidrasaH Page a cidGayaH cinmayasyAdvitIyasya nizkalasyASarIriRaH upAsakAnAM sidDyarTaM brahmaRo rUpakalpanA tasmiM SciddarpaRe sPAre samastA vastudfzwayaH imAstAH prativi mbanti sarasIva caladrumAH yogavAsizWaH cinoti ci karttari kvip cayanakakarttari tri agnicit karmmaRi kvip agnO asAkalye avya amaraH kaccit kaTaYcit jAtucit avyaktAnukaraRe ca avya citkAraH nahi kariRi dfzwe citkAreRa tamanumimate numAtAraH vAcaspatimiSraH mugDaboDe viBaktyantAt kimaH ciccanO pratyayO vihitO iti BedaH taccintyaM canaSabde tadDeturuktaH jAtucit ityAdiprayogAsidDiSca tasya kimaH prakftikatvABAvAt cita tri ci karma karmma kta Canne medi kftacayane avacitabalipuzpA ava citabalipuzpA vedisammArgadakzA kumA saYcite sampAdite sampA dite ca tadyaTeha karmacito lokaH kzIyate evamamutrapuRyacitaH evamamutra puRyacitaH kzIyate SrutiH SavadAhADAracUllIBede strI amaraH praRipAtAYjaliyAcitAM citAm kumA vada vAmoru citADirohaRamraGuH citADirohaRam raGuH tvayA na paWitA caRqI mayA nApi cikitsitam akasmAnnagaropAnte kaTaM DUmAyate citA hAsyArRavaH citAgnerudvahannAjyam citAgnerudvaha nnAjyam BA va a sagotrajErgfhItvA tu citAmAropyate SavaH aDomuKo dakziRAdikcaraRastu pumAniti uttAnadehA nArI tu sapiRqErapi banDuBiH banDu BiH cARqAlAgnerameDyAgneH sUtikAgneSca karhicit karhi cit patitAgneScitAgneSca na SizwErgrahaRaM smftam Su ta aDikaM citiSabde dfSyam mantrasADanANgacitA lakzaRaM tantrasAre uktaM yaTA asaMskftA citA grAhyA na tu saMskArasaMskftA cARqAlAdizu saMprAptA kevalaM SIGrasidDidA citAsADanaprakAraH vIratantre azwamyAYca azwamyAYcaM caturddaSyAM pakzayoruBayorapi kfzRapakze viSezeRa sADayedvIrasADanam viSezeRaM sAGayedvIrasAGanam tatsArdDaprahare yAme gate ca surasundari surasubdari SavaM vApi citAM vApi nItvA gatvA yaTAsuKam sADayet svahitaM mantrI mantraDyAnaparAyaRaH mantraDyAnaparA yaRaH BayaM nEva tu karttavyaM hAsyantatra vivarjayet caturddiSaM na vIkzeta mantrameva samaByaset tatra pUjAdravyam pUjA dravyam sAmizAnnaM guqaM CAgaM surApAyasapizwakam nAnAPalaYca nEvedyaM svasvakalpoktasADitam citAsTAnaM samAnIya suhfdBiH SastrapARiBiH samAnaguRasampabnEH samAnaguRasampa Page b nnEH sADayet vItaBIH vItaBiH svayam cita jYAne BvA para saka sew cetati acetIt ciceta Idit cittaH ya indra somapAtamomadaH tasmAdasya baDaM rAjA manasA pi na cintayet manuH cita strI cita saMmpadA mAve kvip jYAne cetanAyAm amaraH cEtanye saccidAnandavigraham ve sA cittavfttiBede cidasi manAsi DIrasi yaju sADayet svahitaM mantrI mantraDyAnaparA yaRaH BayaM nEva tu karttavyaM hAsyantatra vivarjayet caturddiSaM na vIkzeta mantrameva samaByaset tatra pUjA dravyam sAmizAnnaM guqaM CAgaM surApAyasapizwakam nAnAPalaYca nEvedyaM svasvakalpoktasADitam citAsTAnaM samAnIya suhfdBiH SastrapARiBiH samAnaguRasampa Page b nnEH sADayet vItaBiH svayam
citrANgada citrANgada citrANgada pu SAntanoH satyavatyAM jAte putraBede BIzmaH Kalu pituH priyacikIrzayA satyavatIM mAtaramudavAhayat yAmAhurganDakAlImiti tasyAM pUrvaM pUrbbaM kAnIno garBaH parASarAd dvEpAyano Bavat tasyAmeva SAntanoranyO dvO putrO baBUvatuH vicitravIryaScitrANgadaSca tayoraprAptayOvana vicitravIryyaScitrANgadaSca tayo raprAptayOvana eva citrANgado ganDarveRa hataH vicitravIryyastu vicitra vIryyastu rAjAsIt BA A a brahmapAdajacitraguptAditritayAntargate aDolokavicArake kzatraBede ca kAyasTaBedaM citrANgadamupakramya kalerdaSa kale rdaSa sahasrARi nAgalokeSvaroBava tatastrilokanATastvamindratulyoBavizyasi tatastrilokanATa stvamindratulyoBavizyasi iti prati taM brAhmaRaSApamuktvA tata AnandamanasA gataScitrANgadastalam ityuktam AcAra nirRayatantre ganDarvaBede harivaM a dfSyam apsaroBede apsaroBeda strI alambUzA GftAcI ca citrA citrANgadA ruciH BA Anu maRipUreSvaracitravAhanasya maRipUreSvaraci travAhanasya kanyAyAm arjunakalatraBede ca strI aBigamya mahAbAhuraByagacCanmahIpatim maRipUreSvaraM rAjan DarmajYaM DarmmajYaM citravAhanam tasya citrANgadA nAma duhitA cArudarSanA tAM dadarSa pure tasmin vicarantIM vica Page b rantIM yadfcCayA dfzwA dfzwvA ca tAM varArohAM cakame cEtravAhinIm cEtra vAhinIm BA A a citrANgadA varArohAnaparADyati varA rohAnaparADyati kiYcana BA ASva a citrANgada sU strI citrANgadaM sUte sU kvip ta satyavatyAM satya vatyAM SAntanunfpakalatraBede rAjani citrANgada pu SAntanoH satyavatyAM jAte putraBede BIzmaH Kalu pituH priyacikIrzayA satyavatIM mAtaramudavAhayat yAmAhurganDakAlImiti tasyAM pUrbbaM kAnIno garBaH parASarAd dvEpAyano Bavat tasyAmeva SAntanoranyO dvO putrO baBUvatuH vicitravIryyaScitrANgadaSca tayo raprAptayOvana eva citrANgado ganDarveRa hataH vicitra vIryyastu rAjAsIt BA A a brahmapAdajacitraguptAditritayAntargate aDolokavicArake kzatraBede ca kAyasTaBedaM citrANgadamupakramya kale rdaSa sahasrARi nAgalokeSvaroBava tatastrilokanATa stvamindratulyoBavizyasi iti prati taM brAhmaRaSApamuktvA tata AnandamanasA gataScitrANgadastalam ityuktam AcAra nirRayatantre ganDarvaBede harivaM a dfSyam apsaroBeda strI alambUzA GftAcI ca citrA citrANgadA ruciH BA Anu maRipUreSvaraci travAhanasya kanyAyAm arjunakalatraBede ca strI aBigamya mahAbAhuraByagacCanmahIpatim maRipUreSvaraM rAjan DarmmajYaM citravAhanam tasya citrANgadA nAma duhitA cArudarSanA tAM dadarSa pure tasmin vica Page b rantIM yadfcCayA dfzwvA ca tAM varArohAM cakame cEtra vAhinIm BA A a citrANgadA varA rohAnaparADyati kiYcana BA ASva a citrANgada sU strI citrANgadaM sUte sU kvip ta satya vatyAM SAntanunfpakalatraBede rAjani
citraDarman citraDarman citraDarman pu BArataprasidDe nfpaBede virUpAkzastu dEteyaScitrayoDI mahAsuraH citraDarmmeti viKyAtaH kzitAvAsIt sa pArTivaH BA A a
citraDarmman citraDarmman citraDarmman pu BArataprasidDe nfpaBede virUpAkzastu dEteya Page b ScitrayoDI mahAsuraH citraDarmmeti viKyAtaH kzitA vAsIt sa pArTivaH BA A a
citraguwikA citraguwikA citraguwikA strI cakradattokte guwikABedeyaTA citrakaH pippalImUlaM dvO kzArO lavaRAni ca vyozahiNgvajamodASca cavyaYcEkatra cUrRayet guwikA mAtuluNgasya dAqimAmlarasena vA kftvA vipAcaye dyAmaM dIpavatyASu cAnalam sOvarcalaM sEnDavaYca viqamOdBidameva ca sAmudreRa samaM paYca lavaRAnyatra yojayet
citrakaguwikA citrakaguwikA citrakaguwikA strI cakradattokte guwikABede yaTA citrakaH pippalImUlaM dvO kzArO lavaRAni ca vyoza hiNgvajamodASca cavyaYcEkatra cUrRayet BuwikA mAtuluNgasya dAqimAmlarasena vA kftvA vipAcaye dyAmaM dIpavatyASu cAnalam sOvarcalaM sEnDavaYca viqa mOdBidameva ca sAmudreRa samaM paYca lavaRAnyatra yo jayet
citrakarman citrakarman citrakarman tri citraM karmmAsya citrakare AScaryakArake ca tiniSavfkze pu Sabdaca ta citraleKakriyArUpe Silpe na
citrakarmman citrakarmman citrakarmman tri citraM karmmasya citrakare ASvaryya kArake ca tiniSavfkze pu Sabdaca ta citra leKakriyArUpe Silpe na
citraparRI citraparRI citraparRI strI citrARi parRAnyasyAH cAkaliyA KyAte pfSriparRyAm amaraH jalapipalyAM droRapuzpyAM ca rAjani maYjizWAyAM ratnamAlA svArTe ka citraparRikA citraparRIBede ratnamAlA
citraparRRI citraparRRI citraparRRI strI citrARi parRRAnyasyAH cAkaliyA KyAte pfSniparRRyAm amaraH jalapipalyAM droRapuzpyAM ca rAjani maYjizWAyAM ratnamAlA svArTe ka citra parRRikA citraparRRIBede ratnamAlA
citrapuzpI citrapuzpI citrapuzpI strI citrARi puzpARyasyAH NIp ambazWA latAyAm rAjani
citrapuzpo citrapuzpo citrapuzpo strI citrARi puzpARyasyAH NIp ambazWAlatAyAm rAjani
citravIrya citravIrya citravIrya pu citramAScaryyaM vIryyamasya raktEraRqe rAjani
citravIryya citravIryya citravIryya pu citramAScaryyaM vIryyamasya raktEraRqe rAjani
citravarman citravarman citravarman pU DftarAzwaputraBede citrabAhuScitravarmmA mA A a citraM varmmAsya citrakavacayukte tri
citravarmman citravarmman citravarmman pu DftarAzwaputraBede citrabAhuScitravarmmA mA A a citraM varmmAsya citrakavacayukte tri
cittaBUmi cittaBUmi cittaBUmi strI cittasya BUmirivasyA pAtaYjalaprasidDe cittasyAvasTABede tadBUmayaSca nAnAviDAH tatra cittaSabde darSitA kziptamUQavikziptEkAgratAH catasraH uktAH maDumata jyotizmatI viSokA ftammarA ca samADiBUmayaScAnyAstAScacittavikzepaSabde tattacCabde tattacCabde ca dfSyAH sADanapAde ca sUtrarBAzyAdO saptAnyA apyuktAH yaTA saptaDA prAntaBUmiH prajYA sU tasyeti pratyuditaKyAteH pratyAmnAyaH saptaDeti aSudDyAvaraRamalApagamAccittasya pratyayAntarAnutpAde sati saptaprakArEva prajYA vivekino Bavati tad yaTA parijYAnaM heyaM nAsya punaH parijYeyamasti kzIRA heyahetavo na punaretezu kzetavyamasti sAkzAtkftaM niroDasamADinA hAnam BAvito vivekaKyAtirUpohAnopAyaityezA catuzwayI kAryAvimuktiH prajYAyAH cittavimuktistu trayI caritADikArA budDiguRA giriSiKarakUwacyutAiva grAvARoniravasTAnAH svakAraRe pralayABimuKAH saha tenAstaM gacCanti na cEzAM vilInAnAM punarastyutpAdaH prayojanABAvAditi etasyAmavasTAyAM guRasambanDAtItasvarUpamAtrajyotiramalaH kevalI puruza ityetAM saptaviDAM prAntaBUmiprajYAmanupaSyan puruzaH kuSalaityAKyAyate patiprasave pi cittasya muktaH kuSala ityeva Bavati guRAtItatvAditi sidDA Bavati vivekaKyAtirhAnopAyaH iti BA vivekaKyAtinizWAyAH svarUpamAha sUtreRa tasyetyAdi vyAcazwe tasyeti pratyuditaKyAtervarttamAnaKyAteryoginaH pratyAmnAyaH parAmarSaH aSudDirevAvaraRaM cittasatvasya tadeva malaM tasyApagamAt cittasya pratyayAntarAmutpAde tAmasarAjasavyutTAnapratyayAnutpAde nirviplavavivekaKyAtinizWAmApannasya saptaprakAreva prajYA vivekino Bavati vizayaBedAt prajYABedaH prakfzwo nto yAsAM BUmInAmavasTAnAM tAstaToktA yataH paraM nAsti saMprakarzaH prAntA BUmayaH yasyAprajYAyA vivekaKyAteH sA taToktA tA eva sapta prakArAH prajYABUmIrudAharati tadyaTeti tatra puruzaprayatnanizpAdyAsu catasfzu BUmizu praTamAmudAharati parijYAtaM heyaM yAvat kila pADAnikaM tatsarvaM pariRAmavApasaMskArErguRavfttiviroDAt duHKameveti heyaM tatparijYAtam prAntatAM darSayati nAsya punaH kiYcidaparijYeyamasti dvitIyAmAha kzIRA iti prAntatAmAha na punariti tftIyAmAha sAkzAtkftaM pratyakzeRa niScitaM yaTA saMprajYAtAvasTAyAmeva niroDasamADi sADyaM hAnaM na punarasmAtparaM niScetavyamastIti SezaH caturTImAha BAvito nizpAditaH vivekaKyAtirUpohAnopAyaH nAsyAH paraM BAvanIyamasti iti SezaH ezA catuzwayI kAryyAvimuktiH samAptikAryyatayA prayatnanizpAdyA darSitA kvacit pAWaH kAryyavimuktiriti kAryyAntareRa vimuktiH prajYAyA ityarTaH prayatnanizpAdyAmuktvA tadranizpAdanIyAmaprayatnasADyAM cittavimuktimAha cittavimuktistu trayI iti praTamAmAha caritADikArA budDikftaBogApavargakAryetyarTaH dvitIyAmAha guRA iti prAnvatAmAha na cEzAmiti tftIyAmAha etasyAmavasTAyAmiti etasyAmavasTAyAM jIvanneva puruzaH kuSalomukta ityucyate caramadehatvAdityAha etamiti anOpacArikaM muktamAha pratiprasave praDAnalaye pi cittasya muktaH kuSala ityeva Bavati guRAtItatvAditi vivaraRam cittameva BUmiH kzetram citrarUpakzetre tasmiMSca mEtrIkaruRAmuditopekzArUpEH saMskArEH saMskfte samADilABaH iti yogaSAstre prasidDam
cittamUmi cittamUmi cittamUmi strI cittasya BUmiravasTA pAtaYjalaprasidDe citasyAvasTABede tadBUmayaSca nAnAviDAH tatra cittaSabde darSitA kziptamUQavikziptEkAgratAH catasaH uktAH maDumata jyotizmatI viSokA ftammarA ca samADiBUmaya ScAnyAstAScacittapikzepaSabde tattacCabde ca dfSyAH sADanapAde ca sUtraBAzyAdO saptAmyA apyuktAH yaTA saptaDA prAntaBUmiH prajYA sU tasyeti pratyuditaKyAteH pratTAmnAyaH saptaDeti a SudDyAvaraRamalApagamAccittasya pratTayArAnutpAde sati saptaprakArEva prajYA vivekino Bavati tad yaTA parijYAtaM heyaM nAsya punaH parijYeyamasti kzIRA heyahetavo na puna retezukzetavyamasti sAkzAtkftaM niroDasamADinA hAnam BAvito vivekaKyAtirUpohAnopAyEvyeDA catuzWayI kAryyAvimuktiH prajYAyAH cittavimuktistu trayI caritA DikArA budDiguRA giriSiKarakfwacyutAiva grAvARo niravasTAnAH svakAraRe pralayABimuKAH saha tenAstaM gacCanti na cEzAM vilInAnAM punarastyutpAdaH prayo janABAvAditi etasyAmavasTAyAM guRasambanDAtItasva rUpamAtrajyItiramalaH kevalI puruza ityetAM saptaviDA prAntaBUmiprajYAmanupaSyan puruzaH kuSalEtyAKyAyate pati prasave pi cittasya muktaH kuSala ityeva Bavati guRAtItatvA diti sidDA Bavati vivekaKyAtirhAnopAyaH iti BA pivekaKyAtinizWAyAH svarUpamAha sUtreRa tasyetyAdi vyAcazwe tasyeti pratyuditaKyAtervarttamAnaKyAteryoBi naH pratyAmnAyaH parAmarSaH aSudDirevAvaraRaM cittasutvasya tadeva malaM tasyApagamAt cittasya pratyayAntarAnutpAde tAma sarAjasavyutTAnapratyayAnutpAde nirviplavavivekaKyAtini zWAmApannasya saptaprakAreva prajYA vivekino Bavati vipayaBe drAt prajYABedaH prakazwo nto yAsAM mUmInAmavasTAnAM tAsta ToktA yataH paraM nAsti saMprakarzaH prAntA BUmayaH yasyA prajYAyA vivekaKyAteH sA taToktA tA eva sapta prakArAH prajYABUmIrudAharati tadyaTeti tatra purupaprayatna nizpAdyAsu catasfzu BUmizu praTamAmudAharati parijYAtaM heyaM yAvat kila prADAnikaM tatsarvvaM pariRAmatApasaM Page a skArErguRavfttiviroDAt duHKameveti heyaM tatparijYA tam prAntatAM darSayati nAsya punaH kiYcidaparijYeya masti dvitIyAmAha kzIRA iti prAntatAmAha na punariti tftIyAmAha sAkzAtakftaM pratyakzeRa niScitaM yaTA saMprajYAtAvaravAyAmeva niroDasamADi sADyaM hAnaM va punarasmAt paraM niScetavyamastIti SezaH caturTImAha BAvito nizpAditaH vivekaKyAtirUpohA nopAyaH nAsyAH paraM BAvanIyamasti iti SezaH ezA catuzwayI kAryyAvimuktiH samAptikAryyatatA prayatranizpA dyA darSitA kvacit pAWaH kAryyavimuktiriti kAryyAnta reRa vimuktiH prajYAyA ityarTaH prayatnanizpAdyAmuktvA tadranizpAdanIyAmaprayatnasADyAM cittavimuktimAha citta vimuktistu trayI iti praTamAmAha caritADikArA budDikftamogApavargakAryevyarTaH dvitIyAmAha guRAiti prAvyatAmAha na cEzAmiti tftIyAmAha etasyA matasyAyAmiti etasyAmavasTAyAM jIvanneva puruzaH kuSalomukta ityucyate caramadehatvAdityAha etamiti anOpacArikaM muktamAha pratiprasave praDAnalaye pi cittasya muktaH kuSala ityeza Bavati guRAtItatvAditi vivaraRam cittameva BUmiH kzetram citrarUpakzetre tasmiMSca mEtrIkaruRAmuditopekzArUpEH saMskArEH saMskfte samADilABaH iti yogASAstre prasidDvam

civiwa civiwa civiwa pu cipiwa pfzo cipiwe trikA

cullI cullI cullI lli strI culla in vA NIp cula vA lik vA pAkArTamagnisTApanasTAne culA amaraH cullI cira roditi udBawaH paYca sUnA gfhasTasya cullI pezaRyupa skaraH manuH ac cullApyatra dIrGAntaH citAyAM medi
culli culli culli llI strI culla in vA NIp cula vA lik vA pAkArTamagnisTApanasTAne culA amaraH cullI ciraM roditi udBawaH paYcasUnA gfhasTasya cullIpezaRyupaskaraH manuH ac cullApyatra dIrGAntaH citAyAM medi
cuqa cuqa cuqa Cedane curA uBa uma saka sew idit sadit cuRqayati te acucuRqat ta cuqa alpIBAve BvA para aka sew idit cuRqati acuRqIt cuqa Cedane curA uma saka sew sadit cuRqayati te acucuRqat ta cuqa alpIBAve BvA para aka sew idit cuRqati acuRqIt
cura cura cura steye paradravyApaharaRe vA cu uBa pakze BvA para saka sew corayati te corati acUcurat ta acorIt yaScAgniM corayet gfhAt yAjYa acUcurat acU curat candrasamo BirAmatAm mAGaH cura tri cura ka cIryakarttari cIryyakarttari cura steye paradravyApaharaRe vA cu uBa pakze BvA para saka sew corayati te corati acUcurat ta acorIt yaScAgniM corayet gfhAt yAjYa acU curat candrasamo BirAmatAm mAGaH cura tri cura ka cIryyakarttari
cuwa cuwa cuwa alpIBAve BvA para aka sew cowati acowIt cucowa cuwa alpIBAve BvA para aka sew idit cuRwati acuRwIt cucuRwa cuwa Cedane curA uBa saka sew idit cuRwayati te acucuRwat ta cuwa Cedane vA cu uBa pakze tudA kuwA para saka sew mew cowayati te acUcuwat ta pakze cuwati acuwIt cucowa cuwa alpIBAve BvA para aka sew cowati acowIt cucowa cuwa alpIBAve BvA para aka sew idit cuRwati acuRwIt cucuRwa cuwa Cedane curA uBa saka sew idit cuRwayati te acucuRwat ta cuwa Cedane vA cu uBa pakze tudA kuwA para saka mew cowayati te acUcuwat ta pakze cuwati acuwIt cucowa
cyu cyu cyu gatO BvA Atma Atsa saka aniw cyavate acyozwa cucyuve cyutaH cyutiH yastu na cyavate nityam yaSasA varcasA SriyA BA va a adya te katicidrAtryaScyutasyAryakaveSmanaH katicidrAtryaScyutasyAryyakaveSmanaH rA ayo na cyaveyaM svaDarmAt svaDarmmAt BA va a acyozwa satvAnnfpatiScyutASaH cyutASanAyAH PalavadviBUtyA BawwiH upasargapUrvakasya tattadupasargadyotArTayuktagatO cyu sahane saka hasane aka cu uBa sew cyAvayati aci cu cyavat ta cu ci cyAvayizati cyu gatO BvA Atsa saka aniw cyavate acyozwa cucyuve cyutaH cyutiH yastu na cyavate nityam yaSasA varcasA SriyA BA va a adya te katicidrAtryaScyutasyAryyakaveSmanaH rA ayo na cyaveyaM svaDarmmAt BA va a acyozwa satvAnnfpatiScyutASaH cyutASanAyAH PalavadviBUtyA BawwiH upasargapUrvakasya tattadupasargadyotArTayuktagatO cyu sahane saka hasane aka cu uBa sew cyAvayati aci cu cyavat ta cu ci cyAvayizati
cyuta cyuta cyuta kzaraRe BvA para aka sew cyotati cyotAta irit acyuta a cyuta acyotIt cucyota cyutaH idaM SoRita maByagraM saMprahAre cyutattayoH idaM kavacamacyotIt iti ca BawwiH cyuta tri cyu kta cyuta ka vA gate kzarite ca acyutaH cyutopalaH cyuta kzaraRe BvA para aka sew cyotAta irit a cyuta acyotIt cucyota cyutaH idaM SoRita maByagraM saMprahAre cyutattayoH idaM kavacamacyotIt iti ca BawwiH cyuta tri cyu kta cyuta ka vA gate kzarite ca acyutaH cyutopalaH
dADitTa dADitTa dADitTa na dADitTasya vikAraH anudAttAditvAt aY daDitTasya kapitTasya vikAre tasya parimARam tat pratyayAt punaraY dADitTaparimARe na
dADitya dADitya dADitya na dADityasya vikAraH anudAttAditvAt aY daDityasya kapitTasya vikAre tasya parimARam tatpratyayAt punaraY dADityaparimARe na
dASa dASa dASa sa hiMsane svA para saka sew dASno sno ti adASI sI t ayaM vEdikaH yaste dASnoti namauktiBiH dASnIti nama uktiBiH f dASaddASuze hanti vftram f yasmE tvaM sudraviRo dadASo anAgAstvamadite anAgAstva madite f dASa dAne cu uBa saka sew dASati te fdit adidASat adidA Sat ta sa vA eteByastat puru puro dASayat tasmAt puroqASaH puro qASaH Sata brA dASa dAne BvA uBa saka sew dASati te adASIt adASizwa adA Sizwa fdit Ric adidASat ta yastuByaM dASAnna tamaM ho aSnavat f tuByaM dASataH syAmaH dASa sa puM strI puMstrI dASno sno ti matsyAn dasa Sa ti matsyAn bA vA GaY ni nalopaH dASa sya te dIyate matsyasya mUlyamasmE GaY mUlya masmE GaYa vA matsyopajIvini DIvare striyAM jAtitvAt NIz dASAnAM Bujavegena nadyAH srotojavena ca vAyunA cAnukUlena tUrRa tUrRaM pAramavApnuyAt BA A Slo snehAt saMmohamApanno nAvi dAso dASo yaTA taTA BA ASra Slo eza nOyAyinAmukto vyavahArasya vyava hArasya nirRayaH dASAparADatastoye dEvike nAsti nigrahaH yannAvi kiYciddASAnAM viSIryetAparADataH taddASEreva viSIryetAparAGataH taddASEreba dAtavyaM samAgamya svatoM SataH nizAdorgavaM svato MSataH nizAdo BArgavaM sUte dA SaM saM nOkarmajIvinam kEvarttamiti yaM Page b prAhurAryAvartanivAsinaH iti ca manuH svArTe ka tatrArTe tataH paraM putraSabda AdyudAttastatpuruze dASakaputraH dASaka putraH dASyate BftirasmE Bftye cAkara pu ramAnATaH dASa sa hiMsane svA para saka sew dASno sno ti adASI sI t ayaM vEdikaH yaste dASnIti nama uktiBiH f dASaddASuze hanti vftram f yasmE tvaM sudraviRo dadASo anAgAstva madite f dASa dAne cu uBa saka sew dASati te fdit adidA Sat ta sa vA eteByastat puro dASayat tasmAt puro qASaH Sata brA dASa dAne BvA uBa saka sew dASati te adASIt adA Sizwa fdit Ric adidASat ta yastuByaM dASAnna tamaM ho aSnavat f tuByaM dASataH syAmaH dASa sa puMstrI dASno sno ti matsyAn dasa Sa ti matsyAn vA GaY ni nalopaH dASa sya te dIyate matsyasya mUlya masmE GaYa vA matsyopajIvini DIvare striyAM jAtitvAt NIz dASAnAM Bujavegena nadyAH srotojavena ca vAyunA cAnukUlena tUrRaM pAramavApnuyAt BA A Slo snehAt saMmohamApanno nAvi dASo yaTA taTA BA ASra Slo eza nOyAyinAmukto vyava hArasya nirRayaH dASAparADatastoye dEvike nAsti nigrahaH yannAvi kiYciddASAnAM viSIryetAparAGataH taddASEreba dAtavyaM samAgamya svato MSataH nizAdo BArgavaM sUte dA SaM saM nOkarmajIvinam kEvarttamiti yaM Page b prAhurAryAvartanivAsinaH iti ca manuH svArTe ka tatrArTe tataH paraM putraSabda AdyudAttastatpuruze dASaka putraH dASyate BftirasmE Bftye cAkara pu ramAnATaH
dASameya dASameya dASa sa meya pu deSaBede sa ca deSaH vf sa a uttarataH kElAsa ityupakrame yODeya dASa sa meya SyAmAkAHkze maDUrttASca uttarasyAmuktaH
dASvam dASvam dASvam tri dASa dAne kvasu dASvAn sAhAnityAdinA pA ni dattavati dASa hiMSane kassu hiMsitavati dASa DAtO dASuze ityudAharaRam pIparo dASvAMsam f dASvAMsa havirdattavantam BA tasmE munirdoradaliNgadaSIM dASvAn suputrASizamityuvAcaraGuH puMsAMpunaH pAramahaMsya ASrame vyavasTitAnAmanumfgya dASuze BAga
dASvas dASvas dASvas tri dASa dAne kvasu dASvAn sAhAnityAdinA pA ni dattavati dASa hiMSane kvasu hiMsitavati dASa DAtO dASuze ityudAharaRam pIparo dASvAMsam f dASvAMsaM havirdattavantam BA tasmE munirdorada liNgadarSI dASvAn suputrASizamityuvAca raDuH puMsAM punaH pAramahaMsya ASrame vyavasTitAnAmanumfgya dASuze BAga
dAhin dAhin dAhin tri dahati daha Rini dAhake agAradAhI garadaHmanuH striyAM NIp
dAhina dAhina dAhina tri dahati daha Rini dAhake agAradAhI garadaH manuH striyAM NIp
dAqimIsAra dAqimIsAra dAqimIsAra pu dAqimIM tacCabdaM sarati gacCati aR dAqimavfkze rAjani
dArGasatra dArGasatra dArGasatra tri dIrGasatre BavaH aR devikASiMSapetyA pA Adyaca At dIrGasatre Bave
dArakarmman dArakarmman dArakarmman na dArARAM tadBAvasya pratipAdakaM karma BAryyatva sampAdake jYAnaviSezarUpe vivAhe trikA sA praSastA dvijAtInAM dArakarmaRi mETune savarRAgre dvijAtInAM praSastA dArakarmaRi manuH dArakriyA pyatra strI punardArakriyAM kuryyAt punarADAnameva ca manuH dArakriyA yogyadaSaYca putram raGuH klIbe dArakriyA yAdfk BA sa a
dArakarmmana dArakarmmana dArakarmmana na dArARAM tadBAvasya pratipAdakaM karma BAryyAtva sampAdake jYAnaviSezarUpe vivAhe trikA sA praSastA dvijAtInAM dArakarmaRi mETune savarRAgre dvijAtInAM praSastA dAradarmaRi manuH dArakriyA pyatra strI puna rdArakriyAM kuryyAt punarAGAnameva ca manuH dArakriyA Page b yogyadaSaYca putram raGuH klIve dArakriyA yAdfk BA sa a
dArvAwa dArvAwa dArvAwa na dAru iva niScalatayA nirUpaRIyavizayaniScAyArTamawantyatra awa GaYarTe ka cintAgfhe mantragfhe ca hArA
dArvawa dArvawa dArvawa na dAru iva niScalatayA nirUpaRIyavizayaniScayArTa mawantyatra awa GaYarTe ka cintAgfhe mantragfhe ca hArA
dAsa dAsa dAsa dAne BvA uBa saka sew dAsati te adAsIt adAzizwa adA sizwa fdit Ric adadAsat ta hanane ca yo naH kadAcidapi dAsati druhaH f dAsati hanti BA svadigaRIyo svAdigaRIyo pyeza dASaDAtO dfSyaH dAsa tri dansa daSane daMsezwawanO nasya At uRA jYAtAtmani SUdro SUdre DIvare ca pustrI puMstrI striyAM NIz dAsyate BftirasmE dAsati dadAtyaNgaM svAmine upacArAya upacA rAya vA dAsa ac vA Bftye cAkara dAsa dAne sampradAne GaY GaYa dAnapAtre sampradAne SUdrARAM nAmAntaprayojyopADiBede SarmmAntaM nAmAnta prayojyopADiBede SarmmAnta brAhmaRasya syAt varmmAntaM kzatriyasya kzakziyasya tu guptadAsAntakaM liNgasyoddeSyaviSezaRatvena grahADikaraRanyAyenAvivakzitatvAt evamutsarge sati yadBavati tadAha sa eva tataH praBfti vaktavyaH svAmyanugrahapAlitaH svA myanugrahapAlitaH BojyAnno pyapratigrAhyo dAsItvamApnuyAt yasmAdBarttA praBustasyAH svAmyaDInaH praBuryataH iti dAsaDanasyApi tatsvAmiDanatvamityAha sa eva dAsasya tu DanaM yatsyAt svAmI tasya praBuH smftaH iti brAhmaRyAdizu dAsIkAraRe brAhma RyAdizu dAsIkaraRe daRqamAha kAtyAyanaH AdadyAd brahmaRI brahmARIM yastu vikrIRIta taTEva ca rAjYA tadakftaM kAryaM daRqyAH syuHsarva syuH sarva eva te kAmAttu saMSritAM saSritAM yastu kuryyAddAsIM kulastriyam saNkrAmayan saMkrAmayan taTAnyatra daRqyAstaccAkftamBavet bAlaDAtrImadAsIYca dAsImiva Bunakti yaH paricArakapatnIM vA prApnuyAtpUrvasAhamiti prApnuyAtpUrvasAhasa miti tatkAryaM akftaM akfta nivartanIyamityarTaH tena rAjYA daRqyAH syurinvayaH vizRurapi yastUttamavarRaM dAsye niyojayati tasyottamasAhaso daRqa tasyottamasAhasodaRqa iti kvaciddAsIvikrayaRe kvaci ddAsIvikrayaRe daRqamAha kAtyAyanaH vikroSamAnAM yo BaktAM dAsIM vikretumicCati anApadisTaH SaktaH san prApnuyAt dviSataM damamiti dviSataM paRAnAmiti SezaH BaktAmityanena duzwAyA vikrayaRe daRqABAva iti darSitamiti cUqAdyA yadi saMskArA nijagotreRa vE kftAH dattAdyAstanayAste dattA Page a dyAstanayAste syuranyaTA dAsa ucyate kAlikApurARokte kAlikApurA Rokte nijagotreRa saMskAraM vinA gfhIte dattakAdO ca tezAM ca dAsavadBaraRIyatayA taTAtvam dattakaSabde mUlaM dfSyam striyAM NIp dAsa upakzepe ac upakzepake upa kzepake tri vftrAsure pu dAsapatnISabde dfSyam dasyO ca dAsaveSaSabde dfSyam dAsasvApatyaM naqA Pak dAsAyana dAsApatye puM strI puMstrI dAsa BfSA aBUtatadBAve kyaN dAsAyate adAso dAso BavatItyarTaH adAsaM dAsaM karotyarTe cvi kfYAdyanuprayogaH cvikfYAdyanu prayogaH adAso dAso Bavati dAsIBavati adAsaM dAsaM karoti dAsIkarotItyAdi dAsIkarotI tyAdi saMjYAyAM kan dAsaka gotrapravarttakarziBede tasya gotrApatyam go trApatyam aSvA Pak Paka dAsakAyana tadgotrApatye puMstrI dAsa dAne BvA uBa saka sew dAsati te adAsIt adA sizwa fdit Ric adadAsat ta hanane ca yo naH kadAcidapi dAsati druhaH f dAsati hanti BA svAdigaRIyo pyeza dASaDAtO dfSyaH dAsa tri dansa daSane daMsezwawanO nasya At uRA jYAtAtmani SUdre DIvare ca puMstrI striyAM NIz dAsyate BftirasmE dAsati dadAtyaNgaM svAmine upacA rAya vA dAsa ac vA Bftye cAkara dAsa dAne sampradAne GaYa dAnapAtre sampradAne SUdrARAM nAmAnta prayojyopADiBede SarmmAnta brAhmaRasya syAt varmmAntaM kzakziyasya tu guptadAsAntakaM nAma praSastaM bESyaSUdrayoH udvAha ta dAsaSabdaniruktiBedAdika vIramitrodaye darSitaM yaTA Page b taTAsvatantrasyAtmanaH parArTatvena dAnAddAsatvamiti BfgurAcAryomanyata ityarTaH anenAtyantapArArTyamAsAdya SuSrUzakA dAsAH pArA rTyamAtramAsAdya SuSrUzakAstu karmakarA iti Bedo pyukta ityavagantavyam anena dAsAnAM jAtito Beda uktaH vipretare zvapi dAsyamAnulomyenEva Bavati varRAnAmAnu lomyena dAsyanna pratilomataH rAjanyavESyaSrUdrARAntya jatAYca svatantratAmiti tenEvoktatvAt svatantratAM tyaja tAm atyantapArArTyamBajatAmityarTaH na pratilomata iti svaDarmaparityAgiByoyatiByo pyanyatra drazwavyam a taeva nAradaH varRAnAM prAtilomyena dAsatvanna viDI yate svaDarBatyAgino nyatra dAravaddAsatA dAsyamBajate tadA sAvaSuBaNkarma na kuryAdityAha sa eva SIlADyayanampanne tadUnaM karma kAmataH tatrApi nASuBaM karma prakurvIta dvijottamaH iti yasmAtparopakAraH karttavya iti viDiH tattasmAdUnaM daRqaH SUdra vizaya iti darSayati ata evAha SUdrantu kAraye ddAsyaM krItamakrItameva vA dAsyAyEva hi sfzwo sO brAhmaRasya svayamBuveti sa ca dAsaH paYcadaSaprakAra ityAha nAradaH gfhajAtastaTA krIto so pi dA syAnna mucyata iti atra prasAdAt svAmino nyatra ityanuzajyate tataScAyamarTaH AtmavikretApi gfha jAtAdivat svamiprasAdaM vinA dAsyAnna vimucyata iti evaYca gfhadAsAdayo pyAtmavikretfpaYcamAH dAsaSabdena dAsyA api grahaRam liNgasyoddeSyaviSezaRatvena grahADikaraRanyAyenAvivakzitatvAt evamutsarge sati yadBavati tadAha sa eva tataH praBfti vaktavyaH svA myanugrahapAlitaH BojyAnno daRqamAha kAtyAyanaH AdadyAd brahmARIM yastu vikrIRIta taTEva ca rAjYA tadakftaM kAryaM daRqyAH syuH sarva eva te kAmAttu saSritAM yastu kuryyAddAsIM kulastriyam saMkrAmayan taTAnyatra daRqyAstaccAkftamBavet bAlaDAtrImadAsIYca dAsImiva Bunakti yaH paricArakapatnIM vA prApnuyAtpUrvasAhasa miti tatkAryaM akfta nivartanIyamityarTaH tena rAjYA daRqyAH syurinvayaH vizRurapi dviSataM paRAnAmiti SezaH BaktAmityanena duzwAyA vikrayaRe daRqABAva iti darSitamiti cUqAdyA yadi saMskArA nijagotreRa vE kftAH dattA Page a dyAstanayAste syuranyaTA dAsa ucyate kAlikApurA Rokte dAvaka dAvaka dAvaka pu dravati candrakarasamparkAt dru Rvul candrakAntamaRO vidagDe mozake ca medi ziqage jAre SabdamAlA drAvayati dru Ric Rvul dravakArake hfdayagrAhiRi tri DaraRiH rasaBede waNkane pu SabdamAlA lAlAyAM strI wApi ata ittvam Sabdaratna plIhAdyOzadaBede pu SikTake na rAjani
dEtyAhorAtra dEtyAhorAtra dEtyAhorAtra pu ta mAnuze varze SabdArTakalpataruH tanmAnasya devamAnatulyatvAttaTAtvam
dEtyAhorAtraM dEtyAhorAtraM dEtyAhorAtraM pu ta mAnuze varze SabdArTakalpataruH tanmA nasya devamAnatulyatvAttaTAtvam
dEtyadeba dEtyadeba dEtyadeba pu ta varuRe trikA vAyO hema
dEtyadeva dEtyadeva dEtyadeva pu ta varuRe trikA vAyO hema
dEvakzatri dEvakzatri dEvakzatri pu krozwuvaMSye devakzatrasyAtmaje nfpaBede tasmAt karamBaH kAramBirdevarAto BavannfpaH devakzatraH sutastasya dEvakzatrirmahAyaSAH harivaM a
dEvara dEvara dEvara pu dIvyate nena diva karaRe arac Bartturanuje BrAtari patiSvaSuratA jyezWe patidevaratAnujeudBawaH pitfBirBrAtfBiScEtAH patiBirdevarEstaTAmanuH BarturBrAtfmAtre ca devarAdvA sapiRqAdvA striyA samyagniyuktayA manuH atra devaraSabdaH BartuH jyezWakanizWoBayaparaH uttaratra viDavAyAM niyogArTe nirvftte tu yaTAviDi guruvacca snuzAvacca vartteyAtAm parasparam kanizWasya pUrvaja patnItve na gurutulyatvasya jyezWasya ca kanizWapatnyAH snuzAtulyatvasyokteH svArTe ka tatrArTe devA devarakomataH ujjvalada DftakozaH
dF dF dF Baye BvA para saka sew darati adArIt vawA GawA Ric darayati dadAra darItA daritA dIrRaH dF vidAre divA para saka sew dIryati adArIt dadAra darItA daritA dIrRaH dF vidAre kyrA pA pvA para aka sew dfRAti adArIt darItA daritA dIrRaH BagandaraH dF Baye BvA para saka sew darati adArIt GawA Ric darayati dadAra darItA daritA dIrRaH dF vidAre divA para saka sew dIryati adArIt dadAra darItA daritA dIrRaH dF vidAre kyrA pvA para aka sew dfRAti adArIt darItA daritA dIrRaH BagandaraH
dIpa dIpa dIpa dIptO di Atma aka sew dIzyate dIpyate adIpi adIpizwa didIpe dIptaH Ric adIdipat ta adidIpat ta dIptiH dIpamaM dIpanaH dIptaH dIpanaM dIpakaH dIpraH dIpyamAnaH svatejasAmanuH svatejasA manuH punardidIpe madadurddinaSrIH raGuH devAhavezvadIpizwasaDUmadIptamAvarucIni devAhavezva dIpizwa saDUmadIptAgnirucIni rejuH BawwiH tataH Sakunayo dIptAH mfgA kUraBAziRaHharivaM mfgASca krUraBAziRaH harivaM a hiMsrezu dIpAstraDaraH dIprAstraDaraH kumAraH BawwiH yAvat karmARi dIpyante tAvat saMsAravAsanAH kulArTa kulArRa upasargapUrvakasya tatadpasargadyotyArTayukte tattadupasargadyotyArTayukte tadarTe AdikzadAdIptakfSAnukalpam AdikzadAdIptakfSA nukalpam BawwiH yasya yadretasaH praTamamudadImmata praTamamudadIpyata Eta brA krudyanti kruDyanti paridIpyanti
