svaparaprakASake svapara Page a prakASake tElAdisnehayogena vartikAdAhakaSiKAnvite pradIpe kArttike tadudAnapraSaMsA taddAnapraSaMsA pAdme uttaraKa yaTA SfRu dIpasya mAhAtmyaM kArtike ca haripriya yasya SravaRamAtreRa dIpadAne matirBavet sUryyagrahe kurukzetre narmadAyAM SaSigrahe tulAdAnasya yat puRyaM tadurje tadUrje dIpadAnataH Dftena Gftena dIpakaM yastu tilatElena vA punaH jvAlayenmuniSArdUla aSvameDena tasya kim tenezwaM kratuBiH sarvaM kftaM tIrTAvagAhanam dIpadAnaM kftaM yena kArttike keSavAgrataH tAvadGajanti tAvadgarjanti pApAni dehe sminmunisattama yAvat kArttikAmAse kArttikamAse na dIpadAnaM kftaM Bavet tAvadgarjanti puRyAni svarge martye rasAtale rasA tale yAvattu jvalate dIpaH kArtike keSavAgrataH SrUyate trApi pitfBirgATA gItA mahAmune Bavizyanti Bavi zyanti kule smAkaM kadAcitte sutA Buvi kArttike dIpadAnErya dIpadAnErye tozayizyanti keSavam api naste Bavizyanti kulesucaritA Bavi zyanti kule sucaritA guREH dIpadAnaM kArttike ye dIpyanti harituzwidam gayAyAM piRqadAnena kftaM naH prIRanaM suteH muteH yEScApi kArttike datto dIpastuzwikaro dIpastuzwi karo hareH dIpaM dAsyAnti dAsyanti ye putrAstuzwyarTaM cakrapARinaH cakrapA RinaH kArttike tErmuniSlezWa tErmuniSrezWa narakAdudDftA vayam mantrahInaM kriyAhInaM SudDihInaM janArdana vrataM sampUrRatAM sampUrRa tAM yAtu kArttike dIpadAnataH anenEva hi mantreRa dIpaM saNkalpayenmune maDusUdanatuzwyarTaM kArtike muni puNgya puNgava vAmanapurARe ca dAsyate devadevAya dIpapuzpAnulepanam dIpa puzpAnulepanam api naH sa kule BUyAdekAdaSyAM tiTO naraH karizyatyupavAsantu sarvapAtakahAnidam itTaM pitFRAM vacanaM SrutvA nfpatisattamaH dadO ca dIpAn viDivat vizRorAyatane vizRIrAyatane valiH suganDatElasampUrRAt suganDatEla saMpUrRAn dIpAn saGftatElakAn sarzapasya sutElena maDukAtasisamBavEH dIpapradAnAnnarakAnanDatAmisrasaMjYakAn dopapradAnAnnarakAnanDatAmisrasaMjYa kAn tIrtvA sa BAryayA brahman vizRulokamagAttataH varAhapurAmaRe varAhapurARe dIpaM spfzwvA vEDakarmakaraRe doza ukto yaTAdIpaM yaTA dIpaM spfzwvA tu yo devi mama karmARi kArayet tasyAparADAdvE BUme pApaM prApnoti mAnavaH tacCfRuzva mahABAge kaTyamAnaM mayAnaGe jAyate zazwivarzARi kuzWo gAtre pariplutaH kuzWI gAtrepariplutaH cARqAlasya gfhe tatra evameva na saMSayaH evaMBuktvA evaM BuktvA tu tatkarma mama kzetre mfto madi yawi madBaktaScEva jAyeta SudDe BAgavate gfhe prAyaScittaM prAya Page b ScittaM pravakzyAmi dIpasya sparSanAdBuvi taranti manujA yena kazwaM cARqAlayonizu yasya kasyApi mAsasya Suklapakze ca dvAdaSI caturTaBaktamAhAramAkASiSayane caturTaBaktamAhAramAkASaSayane svapet dIpaM dattvApAraDAdvE dattvAparADAdvE taranti manujA Buvi SucirBUtvA yaTAnyAyaM mama karmapaTe sTitaH etatte kaTitaM devi sparSanAt dIpakasya tu saMsAraSoDanaYcEva yat kftvA laBate SuBam varttisTajvaladagniSikzA hi dIpaH tadaNgasne hAdiniyamo tadaNgamnehAdiniyamo yaTA vahnipurARe GftaM tElaYca dIpArTe snehAnyanyAni varjayet dIpaBedAstadDaSABedASca dIpaBedAstasddaSABedASca kAlikA pu a uktA yaTA puraScarakaRakftyAYca puraScaraRakftyAYca dIpaM SfRviha BErava dIpena lokAn jayati dIpastejomayaH dIpastejo mayaH smftaH caturvargapradodIpastasmAddIpEryajet Sraye Sriye ityupakramya GftapradIpaH praTamastilatElodBavastataH sArzapaH PalaniryAsajAto vA rAjikodBavaH daDijaScARujaScEva daDija ScARujaScEva pradIpAH sapta kIrttitAH padmasUtraBavA darBagarBasUtraBavA darBa garBasUtraBavA Ta vA SaRajA vAdarI vApi PalakozodBavA Palakozo dBavA Ta vA vartikA dIpakftyezu sadA paYcaBidAH smftAH tEjasaM dAravaM lOhaM mArtikyaM mArttikyaM nArikelajam tfRaDvajodBavaM tfRa DvajodBavaM vApi dIpapAtraM praSasyate dIpavfkzASca kartavyA tEjasAdyESca mErava vfkzezu dIpoBEdAtavyo dIpodAtavyo na tu BUmO kadAcana sarvasahA sarvaMsahA vasumatI sahate na tvidaM dvayam akAryya pAdaGAtaYca akAryyapAdaGAtaYca dIpatApaM taTEva ca tasmAdu tasmAd yaTA tu pfTivI tAmapaM tApaM nApnoti vE taTA dIpaM dadyAnmahAdevyE anyeByo pi ca BErava kurvantaM pfTivItApaM yo dIpasutsfjennaraH dIpa sutsfjennaraH sa tAmratApaM narakamApnotyeva SataM samAH suvfttavarttisasnehApAtre suvfttavarttisasnehapAtre Bagne sudarSane mfRmaye vfkzakowO tu dIpaM dadyAt prayatnataH laByate yasya tApastu dIpasya caturaNgulAt na sa dIpa iti KyAto KyAtI hyoGavahnistu sa smftaH netrAhlAdakaraH sArcirdUratApa vivarjitaH suSiKaH Sabdarahito nirdUmI nirDUmI nAti hrasvakaH dakziRAvarttavartistu pradIpaH SrIvivfdDaye dIpavfkzasTite dIpa vfkzasTite pAtre SudDasnehaprapUrite dakziRAvartavarttyA tu cArudIptaH pradIpakaH uttamaH procyate putra sarvatuzwi pradAyakaH vfkzeRa varjito dIpo maDyamaH parikIrttitaH parikI rttitaH vihInaH pAtratElAByAmaDamaH parikIrttitaH SAmaM SArRa vA vAdaraM vAstraM jIrRaM malinameva vA upayuktavantu upa yuktantu no dadyAt vartikArTantu sADakaH upAdadyAn sUtrame nUtrameva satataM SrIvivfdDaye kozajaM romajaM vastraM vArtikArTaM Page a vartikArTaM na cAdadet na miSrIkftya dadyAttu dIpaM snohAn snehAn GftAdikAn kftvA miSrIkftaM snehaM tAmisraM tA misraM narakaM vrajet vasAmajjAsTiniryAsEH snehEH prARyaNgasamBavEH pradIpaM nEva kuryyAttu kftvA paNke vizIdati astipatre asTipAtre Ta vA gavye durganDAdyupavAsini nEva dIpaH pradAtavyo vibuDEH SrIvivfdDaye nEva nirvApayeddIpaM nirvA payeddIpaM kadAcidapi yatnataH satataM lakzaRopetaM devArTamupakalpitam na harejjagato harejjanato dIpaM taTA loBAdinA lo BAdinA naraH dIpaharttA BavedanDaH kARe kARo nirvApako Bavet ududIptadIpapratimaH kAzWakARqamamudBavaH bilveDmodBagavamevATa uddIptadIpapratimaH kAzWakARqasamudBavaH vilve DmodBavamevATa dIpAlABe nivedayet anmUkaM ulmUkaM nEva dIpArtekadAcidapi dIpArTe kadAcidapi cotsfjet prasannArTantu taM dadyAdupajArAdbahiH dadyA dupacArAdbahiH kftaH evaM vAM kaTito dIpo DUpaYca SfRutaM sutO SrAdDe vastravartiyuktadIpanizeDo yaTA dIpaM varjat vastravartti pratyakzaM vastravarttipratyakzaM tElameva ca yoginI ta ya BAge pawalaH puruzasya dIpanirvApaRe dozo yaTA dIpanirvApaRAt puMsaH kUzmARqacCedanAt pusaH kuzmARqacCedanAt striyaH acireREva kAlena vaMSanASo BaveduDruvamti BavedDruvam ti ta devadattadIpasya tu nirvApaRam nirvA paRam viDAnapArijAte uktaM yaTA svayaM nirvApitaM dIpamAjiGranti surArayaH tasmAnnirvApayeddIpaM devAnAM GrARatuzwaye kArttikakfzRacaturdaSyAM naranivfttaye narakanivfttaye dIpadAnaM yaTA narakakAya narakAya pradAtavyo dIpaH sampUjya saMpUjya devatAH tiTitattvaDftaliNgapurARam snAne DUme taTA dIpe nEvedye BUzaRe taTA GaRwAnAdaM prakurvIta taTA nIrAjane pi ca viDAnapArijAtoktaH dIpadAne GaRwAnAdaviDeyaH GaRwAnAdoviDeyaH SivAlaye dIpoddIpanamAhAtmyaM dIpoddIpanamA hAtmyaM kASIKa aDyAye dfSyA diNmAtramatrocyate sa dIpavAsanAyogAt bahUn dIpAn pradIpya vE alakAyAH patiraBUduratnadIpaSiKASrayaH dIpavarttiSca patiraBUdratnadIpaSiKASrayaH dIpavartiSca karpUragarBiRI kAryyA varttyA karpUra garBiRyA sarpizAtilajena vA Aropya darSayeddIpAnuccEH sOraBaSAlinaH SAradAti tantrasAre karpUrAdiyutA vartyA karpUra garBiRyA sarpizAtilajena vA Aropya darSayeddIpAnuccEH varttiH sA ca kArpAsa nirmitA saptAvfttA susaNkxpto susaMkxpto dIpaH syAccaturaNgulaH kArttavIryyapriyArTadIpaviSezastu kArtta vIryadIpaSabde kArttavIryadIpaSabde pf uktaH dIpanAPalAdikam dIpadAnaPalAdikam BA anu a uktaM yaTA dIpadAne pravakzyAmi Palayogamanuttamam yaTA yena yadA cEva pradeyA yAdfSASca te jyotistejaH prakASaM pra Page b kASaM vA pyUrdDvagaYcApi pyUrdDagaYcApi varRyate pradAnaM tejasAM tasmAttejo tasmA ttejo vardDayate nfRAm anDantamastamisraYca dakziRAyanameva dakzi RAyanameva ca uttarAyaRametasmAjjyotirdAnaM praSasyate yasmAdUrdDagametattu tamasaScEva praSa syate yasmAdUrdDvagametattu tamasaScEba BEzajam tasmAdUrdDagaterdAtA tasmA dUrdDvagaterdAtA Bavedatreti niScayaH devAstejasvino yasmAt ya smAt praBAvantaH prakASakAH tAmasA rAkzasAScEva tasmAddIpaH pradIyate AlokadAnAccakzuzmAn praBAyukto BavennaraH tAn dattvA nopahiMseta na harennopanASayet dIpahartA harennopanASa yet dIpaharttA cEtyasTAne catu zpaTe dIpadAtA BavennityaM ya icCedBUtimAtmanaH kulodyoto viSudDAtmA prakASatvaYca gacCati jyotizAYcEva sAlokyaM jyotizA YcEva sAlIkyaM dIpadAtA naraH sadA dIpasya SuBASuBalakzaRamvf ca uttarAyaRametasmAjjyotirdAnaM praSa syate yasmAdUrdDvagametattu tamasaScEba BEzajam tasmA dUrdDvagaterdAtA Bavedatreti niScayaH devAstejasvino ya smAt praBAvantaH prakASakAH tAmasA rAkzasAScEva tasmAddIpaH pradIyate AlokadAnAccakzuzmAn praBAyukto BavennaraH tAn dattvA nopahiMseta na harennopanASa yet dIpaharttA BavedanDastamogatirasupraBaH dIpapradaH svargaloke dIpamAleva rAjate havizA praTamaH kalpI dvitIyaScOzaDIrasEH vasAmedo sTiniryyAsErna kAryaH puzwimicCatA giriprapAte gahane cEtyasTAne catu zpaTe dIpadAtA BavennityaM ya icCedBUtimAtmanaH kulodyoto viSudDAtmA prakASatvaYca gacCati jyotizA YcEva sAlIkyaM dIpadAtA naraH sadA dIpasya SuBASuBa lakzaRam vf saM a uktaM yaTA vAmAvartto malinakiraRaH sasPuliNgo lpamUrttiH kzipraM nASaM vrajati vimalasnehavarttyanvito pi dIpaH dIrGAyum dIrGAyum dIrGAyum pu dIrGamAyurasya dIrGAyuzyayukte cirajIviSabdokatArTe ca dIrGAyuste ozaDe KanitA yaju
dIrGAyus dIrGAyus dIrGAyus pu dIrGamAyurasya dIrGAyuzyayukte cirajIviSa Page b bdoktArTe ca dIrGAyuste ozaDe KanitA yaju
dIrGapAd dIrGapAd dIrGapAd pu dIrGaH pAdo sya antyalopaH samA kaNkapa pakzi Sabdara samAsAntaviDeranityatvAt dIrGapAdI pyatra hemaca dIrGapAdayukte tri
dIrGapAda dIrGapAda dIrGapAda pu dIrGaH pAdo sya antyalopaH samA kaNkapapakzi Sabdara samAsAntaviDeranityatvAt dIrGapAdo pyatra hemaca dIrGapAdayukte tri
dIrGasatra dIrGasatra dIrGasatra tri dIrGasatre BavaH aR devaNkASiMSapetyA pA Adyaca At dIrGasatre Bave dIrGasatra na karma dIrGakAlike yajYaBede ba tatkartaritri va tatkartari tri havize dIrzasatrasya dIrGasatrasya sA cedAnIM pracetasaH raGuH dIrGARi satrARi kftAni yatra tIrTaBede tato gacCeta DarmajYa dIrGasatraM yaTAkramam tatra brahmAdayo devAH sidDaSca sidDASca paramarzayaH dIrGasatramupAsante dIkzitA niyatavratAH niyata vratAH gamanAdeva rAjendra dIrGasatramarindama rAjasUyASvameDAByAM rAja sUyApvameDAByAM PalaM prApnoti BArat BArata BA va a yAvajjIve kartavye yAvajjIvakartavye agnihotre na dIrGasatraM ha vA ta upayanti ye gnihotraM juhvayetadvE jarAmaryaM satraM yadagnihotraM jarayA vA hyevAsmAn mucyante hyevAsmAnmucyante mftyunA vA Sata brA vrA dIrGasatra na karma dIrGakAlike yajYaBede va tatkartari tri havize dIrGasatrasya sA cedAnIM pracetasaH raGuH dIrGARi satrARi kftAni yatra tIrTaBede tato gacCeta DarmajYa dIrGasatraM yaTAkramam tatra brahmAdayo devAH sidDASca paramarzayaH dIrGasatramupAsante dIkzitA niyata vratAH gamanAdeva rAjendra dIrGasatramarindama rAja sUyApvameDAByAM PalaM prApnoti BArata BA va a yAvajjIvakartavye agnihotre na dIrGasatraM ha vA ta upayanti ye gnihotraM juhvayetadvE jarAmaryaM satraM yadagnihotraM jarayA vA hyevAsmAnmucyante mftyunA vA Sata vrA
dOgarha dOgarha dOgarha pu aSve niru
dOrgaha dOrgaha dOrgaha pu aSve niru dOrgaha pu durgahasyApatyam SivA aR durgahasyarzerapatye purukutse fzO sapta fzayo dOrgahe vaDyamAne f purukutsasya mahizI dOrgahe banDane sTite patyAvarAjakaM patyA varAjakaM dfzwvA rAzwraM putrasya lipsayABA lipsayA BA DftavAkyam aSve niru dOrgahe dOgarha ityatra pAWAntaram dOrgaha pu durgahasyApatyam SivA aR durgahasyarzerapatye purukutse fzO sapta fzayo dOrgahe vaDyamAne f purukutsasya mahizI dOrgahe banDane sTite patyA varAjakaM dfzwvA rAzwraM putrasya lipsayA BA DftavAkyam aSve niru dOgarha ityatra pAWAntaram
dU dU dU Kede divA Atma aka sew dUyate adavizwa duduve odit o dit dUnaH kavikalpadrUmaH kavikalpadrumaH pA dunotereva tanatvadIrGO natvadIrGO iti BedaH tayA hInaM viDAtarmAM kaTaM paSyan na dUyame dUyase raGuH na dUye sAtvatIsUnuryanmahyamaparADyati mAGaH upattaptIkaraRe saka dUyate dInaM KalajanaH durgAdAsaH dU r strI dEp SudDO bA kU prARarUpe devatABede sA yA ezA devatA dUrnAma dUraM hyasyAmftyurdUraM ha vAsmAnmftyu rBavati ya evaM veda Sata brA upAsaka SarIrasTA prARarUpA devatA dUrnAma dUrityevaM KyAtA taH SudDA BA atra SudDeti viSezaRAt dEpaDAto rUpa miti sUcitam brAhmaRe tu dUrasambanDAt tatsidDiruktA taTA ca dUraM karoti mftyumupAsakasya dUra kftyarTe Ric bA na davAdeSaH kvip RilopaH rAnto yamiti tu yuktam dU Kede divA Atma aka sew dUyate adavizwa duduve o dit dUnaH kavikalpadrumaH pA dunotereva natvadIrGO iti BedaH tayA hInaM viDAtarmAM kaTaM paSyan na dUyase raGuH na dUye sAtvatIsUnuryanmahyamaparADyati mAGaH upattaptIkaraRe saka dUyate dInaM KalajanaH durgAdAsaH dU r strI dEp SudDO bA kU prARarUpe devatABede sA yA ezA devatA dUrnAma dUraM hyasyAmftyurdUraM ha vAsmAnmftyu rBavati ya evaM veda Sata brA upAsaka SarIrasTA prARarUpA devatA dUrnAma dUrityevaM KyAtA taH SudDA BA atra SudDeti viSezaRAt dEpaDAto rUpa miti sUcitam brAhmaRe tu dUrasambanDAt tatsidDiruktA taTA ca dUraM karoti mftyumupAsakasya dUra kftyarTe Ric bA na davAdeSaH kvip RilopaH rAnto yamiti tu yuktam
dUSya dUSya dUSya na dU Kede sampadA BAve kvip tAM SyAyate gamayati antarBUtaRyarTe SyE gatO ka vastranirmite gfhe tA vu sArasundarI
dUraNgama dUraNgama dUraNgama tri dUraM gacCati gama bA vede Ka mus ca dUragA mini dUraNgamaM jyotizAM jyotirekam yaju loke tu qa dUraga ityeva
dUratva dUratva dUratva na dUrasya BAvaH tva dESike paratve tacca BramaviSeze kAraRam yaToktaM dozo pramAyAjanakaM pramAyAstu guRo Bavet pittadUratvAdirUpo dozo nAnAviDaH smftaH BAzA kvaciccandrAdeH svalpaparimARaBrame dUratvaM dozaH si muktA
dUre'mitra dUre'mitra dUre mitra pu dUre amitraH Satruryasya vede saptamyAH aluk prakftiBAvaH ekonapaYcASanmarunmaDye marudBede te ca yaju a mantrAdO mantrAnte SukrajyotiScetyAdayo darSitAH agnimitraSca dUre amitraSca gaRaH ma
dUreamitra dUreamitra dUreamitra pu dUreamitraH Satruryasya vede saptamyAH aluk prakftiBAvaH ekonapaYcASanmarunmaDye marudBede te ca yaju a mantrAdO mantrAnte SukrajyotiScetyA dayodarSitAH agnimitraSca dUreamitraSca gaRaH ma
dUroha dUroha dUroha pu dUHKena ruhyate sO dur ruha karmaRi Kal rePe pare pUrvARo dIrGaH duHKena rohaRIye roQumaSakye Aditye loke tasya nizkAmajyotizwomAdiyajYaprayAsajAtajYAnena sADyarohaRatvAt dUrohatvam asO vE dUroho yo sO tapatIti Eta Srutestasya taTAtvam dUrArohamAtre tri
dUrohaM dUrohaM dUrohaM pu duHKena ruhyate sO dur ruha karmaRi Kal rePe pare pUrvARo dIrGaH duHKena rohaRIye roQumaSakye Aditye loke tasya nizkAmajyotizwomAdiyajYaprayAsa jAtajYAnena sADyarohaRatvAt dUrohatvam asO vE dUroho yo sO tapatIti Eta Srutestasya taTA tvam dUrArohamAtre tri
dUtaGnI dUtaGnI dUtaGnI strI dUtaM KedaM hanti hana wak NIp kadambapuzpyAM Sabdaca
dUzya dUzya dUzya tri dUzi karmaRi Ryat dUzaRIye dUzyaM vaco mama punarnipuRaM viBAvya anumAnadIDitiH rAjyopaGAtaM kurvARA ye pApAcAravallaBAH ekEkaSaH saMhatA vA dUzyAMstAn paricakzate kAmandakI ukte rAjyopa GAtake vastre vastragfhe na medi pUye na hemaca hastivanDarajjvAm strI hemaca
da da da dakAraH tavargIyatftIyavarRaH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH asyo ccAraRasTAnaM dantamUlam dantamUlena saha jihvA greRa sparSanAdasya uccAryyatvAt sparSavarRatA asyo ccAraRe yAhyaBayatnAH saMvAranAdaGozA alpaprARaSca tasya vAGakaSabdA varRABiDAnoktA yavA do drISoDAtaki rDAtA dAtA trAsaH kalatrakam dInaM jYAnaYca dAnaYca BaktirAvahanI DarA suzumRA yoginI sadyaHkuntalo vAmagulPakaH kAtyAyanI SivA durgA naNganAmA trikaRwakI svastikaH kuwilArUpaH kfzRaH SyAmA jitendriyaH DarmakfdvAmadevaSca BramarehaH sucaYcalA haridrApuravedI ca dakzapARistrireKakaH SrasyADizWAtfdevatA DyAnAdi yaTA DyAnamasya dakArasya vakzyate SfRu pArvati caturBujA pItavastrAM navayOvanasaMSritAma anekaratna GawitahAranupUraSoBitAm evaM DyAtva dakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet triSaktisahitaM devi trivi ndusahitaM taTA AtmAditattvasaMyuktaM dakAraM praRamA nTaham varRodDAratantram asya svarUpaM yaTA dakAraM SfRu cArvahi baturvargapradAyakam paYcadavamayaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM devi trivindu sahitaM yadA vyAtmAditattrasaMyaktaM svayaM paramakuRqalI raktavidyullatAkAra wakari hfdi BAvayet kAmaDenumantram tAvyAdO asva prayoge sOKyaM Palam doGaH sOKyaM mudaM naH vftta ra wI ukteH mAvfkAnvAse sya vAmagulPe nyAsyaH da pu drEp SuqvO dEp SudDo dA dAne wo KaRqane vA ka dada dAne vA bA qa vA parvate datte dAtari ca medi kalatre na ekAkzarakozaH do KaRqane sampa BAve kvip KaRqane rakzaRe ca strI medi dAdadodudfduddAdIdAdAdoddadudadIdadoH dAdadoduddaduddAdIdAdAdodUdadIdadoH duddAdaM dadade duddedadAdadadado dudde dadAdadadado dadaH mAGaH asya mallinATavAKyAyAmarTaviSezA mallinATavAKyAyAmarTa viSezA boDyAH smaraRapAvaDidAM smaraSApAvaDidAM sarasvatIm kumA kariRAM mude sanaladA naladAH kirA syAdasyAnaladaM syAdasyA naladaM vinA na dalane tApasya ko pi kzamaH de vaH patirviduzi nEzadarajagatyAH vaHpatirviduvi nEzaDarAjagatyAH nEzaDam he viduzide vidvajjane dAtri vo varuRaH iti varuRapakze cCedaH da dakAraH tavargIyatftIyavarRaH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH asyo ccAraRasTAnaM dantamUlam dantamUlena saha jihvA greRa sparSanAdasya uccAryyatvAt sparSavarRatA asyo ccAraRe yAhyaBayatnAH saMvAranAdaGozA alpaprARaSca tasya vAGakaSabdA varRABiDAnoktA yavA do drISoDAtaki rDAtA dAtA trAsaH kalatrakam dInaM jYAnaYca dAnaYca BaktirAvahanI DarA suzumRA yoginI sadyaHkuntalo vAmagulPakaH kAtyAyanI SivA durgA naNganAmA trikaRwakI svastikaH kuwilArUpaH kfzRaH SyAmA jitendriyaH DarmakfdvAmadevaSca BramarehaH sucaYcalA haridrApuravedI ca dakzapARistrireKakaH SrasyADizWAtfdevatA DyAnAdi yaTA DyAnamasya dakArasya vakzyate SfRu pArvati caturBujA pItavastrAM navayOvanasaMSritAma anekaratna GawitahAranupUraSoBitAm evaM DyAtva dakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet triSaktisahitaM devi trivi ndusahitaM taTA AtmAditattvasaMyuktaM dakAraM praRamA nTaham varRodDAratantram asya svarUpaM yaTA dakAraM SfRu cArvahi baturvargapradAyakam paYcadavamayaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM devi trivindu sahitaM yadA vyAtmAditattrasaMyaktaM svayaM paramakuRqalI raktavidyullatAkAra wakari hfdi BAvayet kAmaDenumantram tAvyAdO asva prayoge sOKyaM Palam doGaH sOKyaM mudaM naH vftta ra wI ukteH mAvfkAnvAse sya vAmagulPe nyAsyaH da pu dEp SudDo dA dAne wo KaRqane vA ka dada dAne bA qa vA parvate datte dAtari ca medi kalatre na ekAkzarakozaH do KaRqane sampa BAve kvip KaRqane rakzaRe ca strI medi dAdadoduddaduddAdIdAdAdodUdadIdadoH duddAdaM dadade dudde dadAdadadado dadaH mAGaH asya mallinATavAKyAyAmarTa viSezA boDyAH smaraSApAvaDidAM sarasvatIm kumA kariRAM mude sanaladA naladAH kirA syAdasyA naladaM vinA na dalane tApasya ko pi kzamaH de vaHpatirviduvi nEzaDarAjagatyAH nEzaDam he viduzide vidvajjane dAtri vo varuRaH iti varuRapakze cCedaH
daMSamASinI daMSamASinI daMSamASinI strI daMSaM nASayati nASi Rini NIp tElakIwaBede rajAni
daMSama daMSama daMSama na danSa BAve lyuw kAmaNAn halavasAna dantAdinA KaRqane dazwASca daMSanEH kAntaM dAsIkurvanti yozitaH sA da varmmaRi na DfzwadyumnamahatvA tu na vimokzyAmi daMSanam BA ka a
daMSanASinI daMSanASinI daMSanASinI strI daMSaM nASayati nASi Rini NIp tElakIwaBede rAjani
daMSana daMSana daMSana na danSa BAve lyuw kAmaqAn hulavamAna dantAdinA KaRqane dazwASca daMSanEH kAntaM dAsIkurvanti yozitaH sA da varmmaRi na DfzwadumramahatvA tu na vimokzyAmi daMSanam BA ka a
daRqamAna daRqamAna daRqamAna Ra va pu daRqapraDAno mAna Ra vaH SA ta daRqapraDAne jane bAlake ca tadarTaparatAyAM gotrapratyayAntaSabdAt daRqamAna Ra vAnte vAsizu pA na dAkzA daRqamAna Ra bAH SizyA vA si kO
daRqamAnava daRqamAnava daRqamAna Ra va pu daRqapraDAno mAna Ra vaH SA ta daRqapraDAne jane bAlake ca tadarTaparatAyAM gotrapratyayAnta SabdAt daRqamAna Ra vAntevAsizu pA na vuY dAkzA daRqamAna Ra bAH SizyA vA si kO
daRqimIsAra daRqimIsAra daRqimIsAra puM dAqimAM tacCabdaM sarati gacCati aR dAqimIvfkze rAjani
daSa daSa daSa dIptO cu uBa aka sew idit daMSayati te adadaMSat ta daSa daMSane curA AtmA Atma saka sew idit daMSayate adadaMSata Sat ta daSa dIptO cu uBa aka sew idit daMSayati te adadaMSat ta daSa daMSane curA Atma saka sew idit daMSayate adadaMSata
daSameya daSameya daSa sa meya pu deSaBede sa ca deSaH vf ta a uttarataH kElAsa ityupakrame yODeya dASa sa meya SyAmAkAH kzemaDUrttASca uttarasyAmuktaH
daScyavana daScyavana daScyavana pu duHsahaM cyavanaM cAlanamasya duHsahaScyavanaH Sivo yena vA prA ba dur cyu lyu Candasi gatyarTeByaH pA yuc vA indre amaraH yutkAreRa duScyavanena DfzRunA f duScyavanenAnyEravicAlyena BA bahukAlAnantara svasTAnAt patanAt tasya taTAtvam ekEkamanvantare hi caturdaSa indrA BavantIti ekasaptatimahAyugasya manvantarakAlasya caturdaSoBAgaH kiYci daDikapaYcasahasrayugAtmakastatkAlastato nantaraM tasya pata nAt taTAtvam caturdaSa indrASca kalpaBedena BinnanAmAnaH indraSabde pf darSitAH cyavanena SivenABiBUtatvAt Page b tasya taTAtvam asUyataSca Sakrasya vajreRa praharizyataH savajraM stamBayAmAsa taM bAhuM pariGopamam BA anu a bAhuM savajraM Sakrasya krudDasyAstamBayat praBuH mallinATaDftapurARam
daSvan daSvan daSvan tri dfSa kvanip darSake vivekadfSyatvamagAt surARAm BawwiH anAkfzwasya vizayErvidyAnAM pAradfSvanaH gurvarTamarTI SrutapAradfSvA raGuH
daSyAdaSya daSyAdaSya daSyAdaSya tri dfSyaYca adfSyaSca dvanda dfSye adfSye ca azwAdaSaSatAByastAdfSyAMSAH svodayAsuBiH viBajya labDAH kzetrAMSEstErardfSyAdfSyatATa vA sU si dfSyA cAsO adfSyA cakarma sA dfzwenduH sinIvAlI amarokteH kiYcidaMSena dfSyacandrAyAm kiYcidaMSena adfSyacandrAyAYca sinIvAlyAM strI tasyAM candrasya darSanAdarSanayoH sattvAt taTAtvam tadaBimAnidevatAyAYca sA ca aNgirasastftIyakanyA yaTAha BA va a yAM kapardisutAmAhudfSyadfSyeti dehinaH tanutvAt sA sinIvalA tftIyA NgirasaH sutA
daSya daSya daSya na dU Kede sampadA BAve kvip tAM SyAyate gamavati antarBataRyarTe SyE gatO ka vastranirmite gfhe tAvu sArasundarI daSya zwa jAti na lIlA ukte izwakarmarUpe gaRitaBede izwakarman Sabdode tatprakAro dfSyaH
dagaqa dagaqa dagaqa pu dreti gaqati gaqa ac vAdyaBede dagaqa kAqA trikA
daha daha daha dIptO aka dAhe saka cu uBa sew idit daMhayati te adadaMhat ta daha dAhe BasmIkaraSce saka BvA pa aniw dahati aDAkzIt dadAha dehatuH dagDAM dagDA dahyAt Dakzyati dagDaH dagDiH dagDvA dagDavyaH dahanIyaH dAhyaH dAhaH dahanam dAhayati adadIhat diDakzatiuzRo diDakzati uzRo dahati cANgAraH SItaH kfzRAyate karam hitoH hito krudDaM kula kulaM Dakzyati vizavrahniH viprabahniH BawwiH vfkzAnaNgArakArIva vfkzAna NgArakArIva mEnAn DAkzIH samUlakAn BA sa a dfSA dagDaM manasijaM jIvayanti dfSEva yAH sA da dehaM DAraRayAgneyyA dagDvA DAmAviSat svakam BAga dagDavyo sO kawAgninA manuH sanuH karmmaRi dahyate adAhi dehe dahyate ca kulaM sarvam cARakyaH dehe laNkA mateSvarA BawwiH dandahyate dandahyamAnA daMdahyate daMdahyamAnAM Sokena BawwiH daha dIptO aka dAhe saka cu uBa sew idit daMhayati te adadaMhat ta daha dAhe BasmIkaraSce saka BvA pa aniw dahati aDAkzIt dadAha dehatuH dagDA dahyAt Dakzyati dagDaH dagDiH dagDvA dagDavyaH dahanIyaH dAhyaH dAhaH dahanam dAhayati adadIhat diDakzati uzRo dahati cANgAraH SItaH kfzRAyate karam hito krudDaM kulaM Dakzyati viprabahniH BawwiH vfkzAna NgArakArIva mEnAn DAkzIH samUlakAn BA sa a dfSA dagDaM manasijaM jIvayanti dfSEva yAH sA da dehaM DAraRayAgneyyA dagDvA DAmAviSat svakam BAga dagDavyo sO kawAgninA sanuH karmmaRi dahyate adAhi dehe dahyate ca kulaM sarvam cARakyaH dehe laNkA mateSvarA BawwiH daMdahyate daMdahyamAnAM Sokena BawwiH
dakzeSvara dakzeSvara dakzeSvara na kASIsTe dakzaprajApatisTApite liNgaBede tatkaTA yattvayA sTApiMnaM liNgametadudakzeSvarABiDam asya saMsevanAt puMsAmaparADasahasrakam kzamizye haM na sandehastasmAt pUjyamidaM janEH kASIKa a
dakzeSvat dakzeSvat dakzeSvat na kASIsTe dakzaprajApatisTApite liNgaBede tatkaTA yattvayA sTApitaM liNgametaddakzeSvarABiDam asya saMsevanAt puMsAmaparADasahasrakam kzamivye haM sa sande hastasmAt pUjyamidaM janEH kASIKa a
dakziRapUrvA dakziRapUrvA dakziRapUrvA strI dakziRasTAH pUrvasyA diSo ntarAlA dik bahu puMvat agnikoRe taddigBAgasTe tri dakziRapUrve udDftAnta AhavanIyaM nidaDAti ASva gf
dakziRapUrvvA dakziRapUrvvA dakziRapUrvvA strI dakziRasvAH pUrvasyA diSo ntarAlA dik bahu puMvat agnikoRe taddigBAgasTe tri dakzi RapUrve udDftAnta AhavanIyaM nidaDAti ASva gf
daliduha daliduha daliduha pu dilIpanfpapitari anamitrasute anamitrasuto rAjA vidvAn duliduho Bavat dIlipastanayastasya rAmasya prapitAmahaH harivaM a
dallala dallala dallala tri du kvip dutaM lalati lala ac romaSe SabdArTaci
dampatI dampatI dampatI pu dvi ba jAyA ca patiSa dvanhe jAyASabdasya pakze damAdeSaH militayoH jAyApatyoH amaraH tO dampatI vaSizWasya gurorjagmaturASamam raGuH BuYjIyAtAM tataH paScAdavaSizwaM tu dampatI manuH dampatyormaDyagaM Danam dAyamA tayoridaM patyantAtvAt yak dAmpatya tatsambanDini tri
dampratI dampratI dampratI pu dvi ba jAyA ca patiSca dvanye jAyA Sabdasya pakze damAdeSaH militayoH jAyApatyoH amaraH tO dampatI vaSizWasya gurorjanmaturASramam raGuH Page a BuYjIyAtAM tataH paScAdavaSizwaM tu dampatI manuH dampatyormaDyaga Danam dAyaBA tayoridaM patyantatvAt yak dAmpatya tatsambanDini tri
danBa danBa danBa damBe svA para aka sew damnoti adamBIt damBitvA dabDvA dabDaH sani vew iqaBAvapakze nalope DIpsati Dipsati didamBizati saMcAte danBa saMGAte curA Atma aka sew damBayate adadammata adadamBata danBa damBe svA para aka sew damnoti adamBIt damBitvA dabDvA dabDaH sani vew iqaBAvapakze nalope DIpsati Dipsati didamBizati danBa saMGAte curA Atma aka sew damBayate adadamBata
dandaSUka dandaSUka dandaSUka puMstrI garhitaM daSati danSa garhArTe yaN Uka rAkzase dandaSUkAn jiGAMsO BawwiH sarIsfpe sarpe ca medi dandaSUkaH pataNgo vA Bavet kIwo TavA kfmiH yAjYa
dantArbuda dantArbuda dantArbuda pu dantasyArvudamiva dantarogaBede rAjani
dantaSUka dantaSUka dantaSUka puMstrI garhitaM daSati danSa garhArTe yaN Uka rAkzase dandaSUkAn jiGAMsO BawwiH sarIsfpe sarpe ca medi dandaSUkaH pataNgo vA Bavet kIwo TavA kfmiH yAjYa
dantarbada dantarbada dantarbada puM dantasyArbadamiva dantarogaBede rAjani
dantolUKalika dantolUKalika dantolUKalika pu dantA eva ulUKalaH kaRqanasADanaM vidyate sya Wan vAnaprasTaBede sa hi dantEreva vrIhyAdIn kaRqayitvA KAdati dantolUKalikaH kAlapakvASI vASmakfwwakaH yAjYa aSmakuwwo BavedvApi dantolUKaliko pi vA manuH ini dantolUKalItyapyatra
dantoluKalika dantoluKalika dantoluKalika pu dantA eva ulUKalaH kaRqanasADanaM vidyate sya Wan vAnaprasTaBede sa hi dantEreva vrIhyAdIn kaRqayitvA KAdati dantolUKalikaH kAlapakrASI Page a pASmakuwwakaH yAjYa aSmakuwwo BavedvApi dantolUKa liko pi vA manuH ini dantolUKalItyapyatra
darSavipad darSavipad darSavipad pu darSe mavAsyAyAM vipad nASo darSanamasya candre trikA
darSavipada darSavipada darSavipada pu darSe amAvAsyAyAM vipad nASo darSanamasya candre trikA
darduraka darduraka darduraka pu dardurAya kAyati dardura iva kAyati SabdAyate vA kE ka vAdyaBede Sabdena meGasUcake Beke svArTe ka darduraSabdArTe
dardurakaM dardurakaM dardurakaM pu dardurAya kAyati dardura iva kAyati SabdAyate vA kE ka vAdyaBede Sabdena meGasUcake Beke svArTe ka darduraSabdArTe
darvIsaMkramaRa darvIsaMkramaRa darvIsaMkramaRa na tIrTaBede darvIsaMkramaRaM prApya tIrTaM trElokyapUjitam aSvameDamavApnoti svargalokaYca gacCati BA va a
darvIsaNkramaRa darvIsaNkramaRa darvIsaNkramaRa na tIrTaBede darvIsaNkramaRaM prApya tIrTaM trElokyapUjitam aSvameGamavApnoti svargalokaYca gacCati BA va a
dava dava dava gatO BvA para saka sew idit danvati adanvIt dadanva kvipi dan dava pu dunoti du ac vane vanAnale ca amaraH BAve am ap upatApe atimAtraM davavaddahannazi davavaddahannami mAGaH dava gatO BvA para saka sew idit danvati adanvIt dadanva kvipi dan dava pu dunoti du ac vane vanAnale ca amaraH BAve ap upatApe atimAtraM davavaddahannami mAGaH
dazya dazya dazya tri dUzi karmaRi Ryat dUzaRIye dUzyaM vaco mama punarnipuRaM viBAvya anumAnadIDitiH rAjyopaGAtaM kurvARA ye pApAcAravallaBAH ekEkaSaH saMhatA vA dUzyAMstAn paricakzate kAmandakI ukte rAjyopaGAtake vastre vastragfhe na medi pUye na hemaca hastivanDarajjvAm strI hemaca
deSAKI deSAKI deSAKI stro rAgiRIBede sA ca hindolarAgasya dvitIya BAryyA saMgItaSAstram
deSAKo deSAKo deSAKo strI rAgiRIBede sA ca hindIlarAgasya dvitIya BAryyA saMgItaSAstram

dehadi dehadi dehadi pu dehoDIyate tra DA ADAre ki dehADAre KagAnAM dehAvarake pakze pAKA pakze pAKA SabdacandrikAkozaH
devADipa devADipa devADipa pu devAnAmapyaDipaH sarvaniyantari parameSvare dvA parayugIyanfpaBede sa ca nikumBAsurAMSAt dvApare BUmA vavatatAra yaTAha BA A a nikumBAdajitaH saMKye mahAmatirajAyata BUmO BUmipatiSrezWo devADipa iti skftaH indre ca valiM badDA mahAdEtyaM Sakro devADipaH kftaH BA u a
devAntaka devAntaka devAntaka pu ta rAkzasaBede dEtyaBede ca
devAntakaM devAntakaM devAntakaM pu ta rAkzasaBede dEtyaBede ca
devAyum devAyum devAyum na ta ac samA devAnAM jIvanakAle mantreRAhavanIye nirvapati hrasIyasA gArhapatye drADIyo hi devAyuzam Sata brA
devAyus devAyus devAyus na ta ac samA devAnAM jIvanakAle mantre RAhavanIye nirvapati hrasIyasA gArhapatye drAGIyo hi devAyuzam Sata brA
deva deva deva devane BvA Atma aka sew devate adevizwa adeviQam ade dDava a deviQvam adevi dDva Dvam didevi dideve fdit devayati te adi devat ta devanamiha rodanamiti BawwamallaH pari vilApe vilApaH paridevanam amaraH KaradUzaRayorBrAtroH Kara dUzaRayorBrAtroH paryyadevizwa sA puraH BawwiH deva pu diva ac amare sure nAwyoktO rAjani amaraH nfpe meGe pu indriye na medini pArade pu rAjani brAhmaRAnAmupADiBede vrAhmaRAnAmupADiBede tataSca nAma kurvIta pitEva daSame hani devapUrvaM narAKyaM hi SarmavarmAdi saMyutam iti Bavi pu naramAcazwe iti narAKyaM naranAma devAt pUrveM pUrvaM taccaviSizwaM Sarmayutam Sarma yutam SarmA devaSca viprasya varmA trAtA ca BUBujaH BUmujaH BUtiguptaSca vESyasya dAsaH SUdrasya kArayetiti yamavacane kArayet iti yama vacane samuccayopalabDeH SarmAntaM brAhmaRasya syAt iti SAtAtapIyena SarmAntatA ca devadAruRi SabdArTaci Sa bdArTaci pUjye dIpte ca tri parAtmani pu ekodevaH sarvaBUtezu gUQaSrutiH gUQaH SrutiH Bargodevasya gAyatrI dIvyate krIqate yasmAt rocate dyotate divi tasmAddeva tasmA ddeva iti proktaH stUyate sarvadEvatEHyogiyAjYa sarvadEvatEH yogiyAjYa udBavaH kzoBaRo devaH vizRusaM yataH krIqati sargAdiBirvijigIzate SatrUn sargAdiBirpijigIzate SatrUna vyavaharati sarvaBUtezu AtmatayA Atma tayA dyotate stUyate stulyEH stutyEH sarvatra gacCatIti tasmAt devaH BA surASca yadyapi bahavastaTApi prADAnyAt trayastriMSatsaMKyayA trayastriMSatpatiSabde pf dfSyAH tatra sure devA apyasya rUpyasya rUpasya nityaM darSanakANkziRaHgItA devAnfzIn manuzyASca darSana kANkziRaH gItA devAnfzIt manuzyAMSca pitFn gfhyASca devatAHmanuH gf hyASca devatAH manuH nfpe devAkarRaya suSrutena carakasyoktena caraka syoktena jAne KilamnEza Kilam nEza nAwyoktO nfpe yaTA jYApayati devaH BUrinAwakezu meGe meTe devo garjati devagarjanam deva garjanam deve varzati devASca AjAnadevAH karmadevASca karmadevaSabde pf dfSyam deva devane BvA Atma aka sew devate adevizwa a deviQvam adevi dDva Dvam dideve fdit devayati te adi devat ta devanamiha rodanamiti BawwamallaH pari vilApe vilApaH paridevanam amaraH Kara dUzaRayorBrAtroH paryyadevizwa sA puraH BawwiH deva pu diva ac amare sure nAwyoktO rAjani amaraH nfpe meGe pu indriye na medini pArade pu rAjani vrAhmaRAnAmupADiBede tataSca nAma kurvIta pitEva daSame hani devapUrvaM narAKyaM hi SarmavarmAdi saMyutam iti Bavi pu naramAcazwe iti narAKyaM naranAma devAt pUrvaM taccaviSizwaM Sarma yutam SarmA devaSca viprasya varmA trAtA ca BUmujaH BUtiguptaSca vESyasya dAsaH SUdrasya kArayet iti yama vacane samuccayopalabDeH SarmAntaM brAhmaRasya syAt iti SAtAtapIyena SarmAntatA ca devadAruRi Sa bdArTaci pUjye dIpte ca tri parAtmani pu ekodevaH sarvaBUtezu gUQaH SrutiH Bargodevasya gAyatrI dIvyate krIqate yasmAt rocate dyotate divi tasmA ddeva iti proktaH stUyate sarvadEvatEH yogiyAjYa udBavaH kzoBaRo devaH vizRusaM yataH krIqati sargAdiBirpijigIzate SatrUna vyavaharati sarvaBUtezu Atma tayA dyotate stUyate stutyEH sarvatra gacCatIti tasmAt devaH BA surASca yadyapi bahavastaTApi prADAnyAt trayastriMSatsaMKyayA trayastriMSatpatiSabde pf dfSyAH tatra sure devA apyasya rUpasya nityaM darSana kANkziRaH gItA devAnfzIt manuzyAMSca pitFn gf hyASca devatAH manuH nfpe devAkarRaya suSrutena caraka syoktena jAne Kilam nEza nAwyoktO nfpe yaTA jYApayati devaH BUrinAwakezu meTe devo garjati deva garjanam deve varzati devASca AjAnadevAH karmadevASca karmadevaSabde pf dfSyam
devaDipa devaDipa devaDipa pu devAnAmapyaDipaH sarvaniyantari parameSvare dvAparayugIyanfpaBede sa ca nikumBAsurAMSAt dvApare BUmAvavatatAra yaTAha BA a a nikumBAdajitaH saMKyo mahAmatirajAyata BUmO BUmipatiSrezWo devADipa iti skftaH indre ca baliM badDvA mahAdEtyaM Sakro devADipaH kftaH BA u a
devaSanI devaSanI devaSanI strI deva iva praBAvAnvitA SunI devatulyapraBAvAnvitAyAM SunyAM saramAyAm paRiBirasurErniguQAgA anvezwu saramAM devaSunIndreRa prahitAmayugmiH paRayo mitrIyantaH procuriti f BA DftA SrutiH tacCrutvA tasya mAtA saramA putraduHKArttA tatsatramupAgacCadyatra sa janamejayaH saha BrAtfBimirdIrGaM satramupAste sa tayA krudDayA tatrokto yaM me putrI na kiYcidaparADyati nAvekzate harvrIMzi nAvaleQiM kimarTakaBihata iti na kiYciduktavantaste sA tAnuvAcaya smAdayamABihato napakArI tasmAdadfzwantvA BayamAgamizyatIti BA A a
devaSunI devaSunI devaSunI strI deva iva praBAvAnvitA SunI devatulyapraBAvA nvitAyAM SunyAM saramAyAm paRiBirasurErnigUQAgA anvezwuM saramAM devaSunImindreRa prahitAmayugBiH paRayo mitrIyantaH procuriti f BA DftA SrutiH tacCrutvA tasya mAtA saramA putraduHKArttA tatsatramupAga Page b cCadyatra sa janamejayaH saha BrAtfBirdIrGaM satramupAste sa tayA krudDayA tatrokto yaM me putro na kiYcidaparADyati nAvekzate havIMzi nAvaleQi kimarTamaBihata iti na kiYciduktavantaste sA tAnuvAca yasmAdayamaBihato napa kArI tasmAdadfzwantvAM BayamAgamizyatIti BA A a
devadryaYc devadryaYc devadryaYc tri devamaYcati pUjayati anca kvin devasya weH adryAdeSaH devapUjake amaraH gatyarTAYcatestu nalopaH devadryac devagantari sarvanAmasTAne pare uBayatra devadryaN devadryaYcO anyatrAjAdO devadrIcaH devadryaYca ityAdirBedaH
devadryaYca devadryaYca devadryaYca tri devamaYjati pUjayati anca kvin devasya weH adryAdeSaH devapUjake amaraH gatyarTAYcatestu nalopaH devadryAc devagantari sarvanAmasTAne pare uBayatra devadryaN devadryaYcO anyatrAjAdO devadrIcaH devadryaYca ityAdirBedaH
devadyamna devadyamna devadyamna pu BaratavaMSye devAjito patye nfpaBede aTA sUryAM tattanayo devadyumnaH BAga
devadyumna devadyumna devadyumna pu BaratavaMSye devAjito patyo nfpaBede aTA sUryAM tattanayo devadyumnaHBAga
devahItra devahItra devahItra pu trayodaSe manvantare yogeSvararUpasya hareraMSasya pitari trayodaSamanupakrame devahotrasya tanaya upaharttA divaspateH yogeSvaro hareraMSe bfhatyAM saMBavizyati BAga
devahavim devahavim devahavim na ta paSO Apo devIH svadantu svAttaM citsaddevahaviH yaju
devahavis devahavis devahavis na ta paSO Apo devIH svadantu svAttaM citsaddevahaviH yaju
devahotra devahotra devahotra pu trayodaSe manvantare yogeSvararUpasya hareraMSasya pi tari trayodaSamanUpakrame devahotrasya tanaya upaharttA divaspateH yogeSvaro hareraMSo vfhatyAM saMBavizyati BAga
devakilbiza devakilbiza devakilbiza na devena kftaM kilvizamanizwakarma devakfte anizwe kArye yaTA varuRakftapASbanDanaM yamakftapAdabanDanamityAdi muYcantu mA SapaTyAdayo varuRyAduta aTo yamasya paqvISAt sarvasmAddevakilvizAt f
devakilviza devakilviza devakilviza na devena kftaM kilvizamanizwakarma devakfte anizwe kArye yaTA varuRakftapASabanGanaM yamakftapAdabanDa namityAdi muYcantu mA SapaTyAdaTo varuRyAduta aTo yamasya paqvISAt sarvasmAddevakilvizAt f
devakirI devakirI devakirI strI meGarAgasya BAryyABede rAgiRIBede tadrAgasya rAgiRIBedAH tatsvarUpaYca saNgItadA uktaM yaTA lalitA mAlatI gOrI nAwI devakirI taTA meGa rAgasya rAgiRyo BavantImAH sumaDyamAH asyA svarUpaM yaTA BramantI nandane SyAmA puzpapracayatatparA KyAtA devakirI hyezA karArpitasaKIkarA devagirIti vA pAWaH
devakirO devakirO devakirO strI meGarAgasya BAryyABede rAgiRIBede tadrAgasya rAgiRIBedAH tatsvarUpaYca saNgItadA uktaM yaTA lalitA mAlatI gOrI nAwI devakiro taTA meGarAgasya rAgiRyo BavantImAH sumaDyamAH asya svarUpaM yaTA BramantI nandane SyAmA puzpapracayatatparA KyAtA devakirI hyezA karArpitasaKIkarA devagirIti vA pAWaH
devakzatri devakzatri devakzatri pu krozwuvaMSye devakzatrasyAtmaje nfpaBede tasmAt karamBaH kAramBirdevarAto BavannfpaH devakzatraH sutastasya dEvakzatrirmahAyaSAH harivaM a
devara devara devara pu dIvyate nena diva karaRe arac Bartturanuje BrAtari patiSvaSuratA jyezWe patidevaratAnuje udBawaH pitfBirBrAtfBiScEtAH patiBirdevarEstaTA manuH BarturBrAtf mAtre ca devarAdvA sapiRqAdvA striyA samyagniyuktayA manuH atra devaraSabdaH BartuH jyezWakanizWoBayaparaH uttaratra viDavAyAM niyogArTe nirvftte tu yaTAviDi guruvacca snuzAvacca vartteyAtAm parasparam kanizWasya pUrvaja patnItvena gurutulyatvasya jyezWasya ca kanizWapatnyAH snuzA tulyatvasyokteH svArTe ka tatrArTe devA devarakomataH ujjvalada DftakozaH
devodyAna devodyAna devodyAna na ta devAnAmudyAne tadBedaSca bandanaM cEtraraTaM vEBrAjaM sarvatoBadraramiti catvAri trikARqe tu vEBrAjaM miSrakaM siDrakAvaRaM cEtraraTamiti uktAnIti BedaH
devodyAnaM devodyAnaM devodyAnaM na ta devAnAmudyAne tadBedaSca nandanaM cEtra raTaM vEBrAjaM sarvatoBadramiti catvAri trikARqe tu vE BrAjaM miSrakaM siDrakAvaRaM cEtraraTamiti uktAnIti BedaH
df df df Adare tu A saka aniw driyate adfta ayamANpUrva ayamAN pUrva eva prayujyate nipIya yasya kzitirakziRaH kaTAM taTA driyante na buDAH suDAmapi nEza AdftaH AdaraH darAdarAByAM darakampinI pape nEza na jAtahArddena na vidvizAdaraHkirA vidvizAdaraH kirA Adftyastena vftyena BawwiH df baDe svAdi para saka aniw dfRoti adArzIt dadAra svAdigaRe CandasItyaDikAre vikzijiri vikzi jiri dASa df hiMsAyAmpA hiM sAyAm pA ukteH CAndaso yam kziRotirBAzAyAmapItyeka kziRotirBAzA yAmapItyeke si kO ukteH anyasyApi kvacidBAzAyAM prayoga iti gamyate matsyaGAtini DIvare dASaSabdaprayogAt dASaSabdapra yogAt df Adare tu A saka aniw driyate adfta ayamAN pUrva eva prayujyate nipIya yasya kzitirakziRaH kaTAM taTA driyante na buDAH suDAmapi nEza AdftaH AdaraH darAdarAByAM darakampinI pape nEza na jAtahArddena na vidvizAdaraH kirA Adftyastena vftyena BawwiH df baDe svAdi para saka aniw dfRoti adArzIt dadAra svAdigaRe CandasItyaDikAre vikzi jiri dASa df hiM sAyAm pA ukteH CAndaso yam kziRotirBAzA yAmapItyeke si kO ukteH anyasyApi kvacidBAzAyAM prayoga iti gamyate matsyaGAtini DIvare dASaSabdapra yogAt
dfBa dfBa dfBa graTane vA curA uBa pakze tu para saka sew darBayati te dfBati dfmati adIdfBat ta taM adadarBat ta adarBIt Idit dfbDaH dfbDavAn darBaH dfBa Baye vA curA uBa pakze BvA para aka sew darBayati te darBati adIdfBat ta adadarBat ta adarBIt adarBIMt Idit dfbDaH dfbDavAn dfBa graTane vA curA uBa pakze tu para saka sew darBayati te dfmati adIdfBat taM adadarBat ta adarBIt Idit dfbDaH dfbDavAn darBaH dfBa Baye vA curA uBa pakze BvA para aka sew darBayati te darBati adIdfBat ta adadarBat ta adarBIMt Idit dfbDaH dfbDavAn

dfSyAdaSya dfSyAdaSya dfSyAdaSya tri dfSyaYca adfSyaSca dvandva dfSye adfSye ca azwAdaSaSatAByastAdfSyAMSAH svodayAsuBiH viBajya labDAH kzetrAMSEstErdfSyAdfSyatATa vA sU si dfSyA cAsO adfSyA ca karma sA dfzwenduH sinIvAlI amarokteH kiYcidaMSena dfSyacandrAyAm kiYcidaMSena adfSyacandrAyAYca sinIvAlyAM strI tasyAM candrasya darSa nAdarSanayoH sattvAt taTAtvam tadaBimAnidevatAyAYca sA ca aNgirasastftIyakanyA yaTAha BA va a yAM kapardisutAmAhurdfSyAdfSyeti dehinaH tanutvAt sA sinIvAlI tftIyA NgirasaH sutA

dfkkarmmAn dfkkarmmAn dfkkarmmAn na dfgarTaM dfzwyarTaM karma grahARAM darSanayogyatAjYAnArTe sU si ukteH karmaBede tacca grahanakzatadrayogAdyupayogi saMskAraBedarUpaM yaTAha tatra nakzatragrahayogezu grahAstodayasADane SfNgonnatO tu candrasya dfkkarmAdAvidaM smftamsU si atra nimittasapramI grahanakzatrARAM bahutvAduvahavacanam nakzatryahfyoryutyarTaM nakzatragrahayoridaM dvayaM dfkkarma smftaM prAguktam AdO praTamaM kAryam tAByAmanantaraM kriyA kAryetyarTaH atra nakzatraDu vakARAmAyanadfkkarmasaMskatAnAmevoktatvAdAyana dfkkarma na kAryamita Dyeyam grAhARAmastodayO nityAstodayO sUryasAnniDyajanitAstodayO ca grahARAmupalakzaRatvAnnakzatrARAmapi tayoH sADananimittaM grahasya nakzatrasya vA deyam atrAkzadfkkarmATaM kevalaH SaraH sADyaH na tu dinamAnarAtrimAnanatonnate sADye kzitijasambanDena dfggraharUpodayAstalagnasyAvasyakatvena kzitijAtiriktAyanapariRAmasya arTatvAt yutO tu samaprotacalavftte yugapaddarSanArTaM tatpariRAmasyAvaSyakatvAt SfNgonnatinimittaM candrasya tukAraH samuccayArTakaScakAraparaH atrApi Sloke pUrvArdDoktamAkzadfkkarma saMskAryamiti Dyeyam raNganA dfkkarma dviviDam AyanamakzajaYca tatrAyanadfkkarmAyanaSabde pf si Si uktaM darSitam akzajaM dfkkarmocyate idAnImakzajaM dfkkarmAhaM prami sPuwAsPuwakrAntijayoScarArDayoH samAnyadiktve ntarayogajAsavaH palodBavAKyA BanaBaH sadAM Sare mahatyaTAlpeyadi vA syu ranyaTA spazwezurakzavalanena hato viBakto lambajyayA havihfto kzaBayA hato vA labDaM hataM triBaguRena hftaM dyumOrvyA syurvA savaH palaBavA aTa tEHsa Sare tu yAmyottare kramavilomaviDAnalagnaM KewAt kftayanaPalAdudayAKyalagnam sOmye krameRa viparItamizO tu yAmye BArDADikAt svacarato stalivilagnamevam mU grahasya spuwakrAnterasPuwakrAnteScarArDe sADye yadi sPuwAsPuwakrAntI tulyadikke tadA carArGayorantaraM kAryam yadi Binnadikke tadA evaM ye savo Baveyuste palodBavA jYeyAH grahasya Basya vA yadA mahAMSCarastadEvam yadAlpastadAnyaTA vA palodBavAsavaH sADyAH grahasya spazwaH Saro kzavalanena guRyo lambajyayA BAjyaH aTa vA akzaBayA guRito dvAdaSamirBAjyaH yallabDaM tat trijyayA guoRyaM dyujyayA BAjyaM PalaM PalodDavA asavo BavantItyanukalpaH aTa kftAyanadfkkarmakaM grahaMraviM prakalpya tEH palodBavAsurBirlagnaM sADyam yadi grahasya yAmyaH SarastadA kramavilagnam yadi sOmyastadA vilomalagnam evaM kfte sati grahasyodayalagnaM Bavati aTa nameva grahaM saBArDaM raviM prakalpa tErevAsuBiruttare Sare yat kramalagnaM yAmye vilomaM kriyate tadguhasyAstalagnam yatropapattiH atra gole vizamaRqalaM svAkzASEryAvannAmitaM tAvadunmaRqalasuttaragole kzitajAdupari lagati yAmye DaH yatastatrasTo grahaH svacarArDAsuBirunnatiM nAtiM ca gataH ataScarArdDasya yA vAsanA sEva palodBavAsUnAm sPuwAsPuwakrAntijayoScarArDayorantare yAvanto savastAvantaH SaraBavA ityarTAjjAtam yatastayorantaraM Sara evaM tulyadiktve yadA jahatA SareRAnyadiktvaM nItA krAntisatdA SarasyEkaM KaRqamuttarato nyaddakziRataH tayoryoge yataH Saronavati atastajjanitayoScarArDayoryoge SarajanitAH palodDavAsavaH syuH evaM hi mati Sare aTAlpe grahaH kilottaragola uttaraSca tasya SarastadAkzavaSAcCareRa grahasya tadunnamanaM tat trErASikena sADyate yadi lambajyayA kowyA kzavalanatulyo BujastadA sPuwaSaratulyayA kimiti atra yat PalaM tadugrahadyujyAvftte jyArUpaM Bavati ata vA laGunA kzetreRAnupAtaH yadi dvAdaSANgulakowyA palaBA BujastadA sPuwaSarakowyA kimiti PalaM tulyameva aTa trijyAvftta pariRAmAyAnupAtaH yadi dyujyAvftta etAvatI jyA tadA trijyAvftte kiyatIti Palasya DanuH kartuM yujyate tacCarasyAlpatvAnnopapadyata iti na kftam AyamadfkkarmaRyasPuwavikzepAdasavaH sADitAH iha tu sPuwAt tatra kAraRamucyate tena dfkkarBaRA nirakzadeSakzitijasTo grahaH kftaH tat kzitijamanyadeSa unmaRqalam SaramUle yadudyujyAvfttaM SarAgre ca yat tayorvfttayorunmaRqale yAvadantaraM tAvAn sPuwaH SaraH sa tu kowirUpaH ato tra kowirUpeRa palapodBavA asavaH sADitAH kftAyanadfkkarmako graho kzavaSAt prAgudita udezyati vA yErasuBiste tra palodBavAKyAH ata yAmye Sare tErasuBiH kzitijADaHsTo graho yAvadupari kzitijaM nIyate tAvat kftAyanadfkkarmagrahAdagrataH krAntivfttaM kzitije lagati yadi sOmyaH SarastadA tErasuBiH kzitajAduparisTo grahaH kzitijaM yAvadaDo nIyate tAvat kftAyanadfkkarmakAdugrahAt pfzWataH krAntivfttaM kzitije lagati ata uktaM Sare yAmyottare kramava ilomaviDAnalagnamityAdi evaM kftaM udayalagnaM jAtam yallagnamudeti tadastalagnam ato BArDADikAt Kacarata ityuktam idaM sarvaM golopari samyagdfSyate
dfkkarmman dfkkarmman dfkkarmman na dfgarTaM dfzwyarTaM karma grahARAM darSanayogyatA jYAnArTe sU si ukteH karmaBede tacca grahanakzatrayogA dyupayogi saMskAraBedarUpaM yaTAha tatra tameva grahaM saBArDaM raviM prakalpa tErevA suBiruttare Sare yat kramalagnaM yAmye vilomaM kriyate tadgrahasyAstalagnam atropapattiH atra gole vizu Page a vanmaRqalaM svAkzAMSEryAvannAmitaM diSas diSas diSas strI diSa vA kasun diSi ramAnATaH
dinArdDa dinArdDa dinArdDa pu dinasya sUryakiraRaprakASAtmakakAlasyArdDam divABAgasyArdDe evaM vizuvati CAyA svadeSe yA dinArdDajAsU si

divAsapna divAsapna divAsapna pu divA divase svapnaH divAnidrAyAma taddozA diMkaM dinacaryyASabde BAvapra uktamuktam suSrute ca sarvarttuzu divAsvApaH pratizidDo nyatra grIzmAt pratizidDezyapi tu bAlavfdDastrIkarzitakzatakzIRamadyanityayAnavAhanADva karmapariSrAntAnAmaBuktavatAM medaHsvedakaParasaraktakzI RAnAmajIrRinAYca muhUrttaM divAsvapnamapratizidDaM rAtrA vapi jAgaritavatAM jAgaritakAlAdardDamizyate divA svapnaH vikftirhi divAKapno nAma tatra svapatAmaDarmaH sarvadozaprakopaSca tatprakopAcca kAsaScAsapratiSyAyasirA gOravANgamarddA rocakajvarAgnidOrbalyAni Bavanti mfgayAkzI divAsvapnaH parIvAdaH striyomadaH tOrya trikaM vfTAwyA ca kAmajo daSako gaRaH vyasanoktO manuH rasABiyuktamannaM vA divAsvapnaYca sevate apa kvAnnagate kAle svayaM dozAn prakopayet BA ASva a
divAsvapna divAsvapna divAsvapna pu divA divase svapnaH divAnidrAyAm taddozAdikaM dinacaryyAMSabde BAvapra uktamuktam suSrute ca sarvarttuzu divAsvApaH pratizidDo nyatra grIzmAt pratizidDezvapi tu bAlavfdDastrIkarzitakzatakzIRamadyanityayAnavAhanADva karmapariSrAntAnAmaBuktavatAM BedaH svedakaParasaraktakzIRAnAmajIrRinAYca muhUrttaM divAsvapnamapratizidDa rAtrAvapi jAgaritavatAM jAgaritakAlAdardDamizyate divAsvapnaH vikftirhi divAsvapno nAma tatra svapatAmaDarmaH sarvadozaprakopaSca tatprakopAcca kAsaSvAsapratiSyAyasirA gOravANgamarddA rocakajvarAgnidOrbalyAni Bavanti mfgayAkzo divAsvapnaH parIvAdaH striyomadaH tOryatrikaM vfTAwyA ca kAmajo daSako gaRAH vyasanoktO manuH rasABiyuktamanna vA divAsvapnaYca sevate apakvAntagate kAle svayaM dozAn prakopayet
divAvAsu divAvAsu divAvAsu pu divA vasuH kiraRo sya sUrye arkavfkze ca dIvyati diva kvip dyOH AvasuH havirasya diva mAvasati A vasa un vA dIptahavizke dyuloka vAsini vA indre divaM yaya divAvaso f

drAGiman drAGiman drAGiman pu dIrGasya BAvaH imanic drAGAdeSaH dIrGatve vAsAMsi ca dAGimavantyu dvaBawwiH dAGimavantyudUhuH BawwiH varzimA ca me drADimA drAGimA ca me yaju drAGiman pu drAGiman vede pfzo ikArasyAkAraH dIrGatve doGaM drAzamnA suraBi BUrasme f tftIyA Page b sTAne Ac ano llope rUpasidDiH drAGamnA drAGimnA ityarTaH drAGiman pu dIrGasya BAvaH imanic drAGAdeSaH dIrGatve vAsAMsi ca dAGimavantyudUhuH BawwiH varzimA ca me drAGimA ca me yaju drAGiman pu drAGiman vede pfzo ikArasyAkAraH dIrGatve doGaM drAzamnA suraBi BUrasme f tftIyA Page b sTAne Ac ano llope rUpasidDiH drAGamnA drAGimnA ityarTaH
drAvaka drAvaka drAvaka pu dravati candrakarasamparkAt dru Rvul candrakAnta maRO vidagDe mozake ca medi ziqge jAre Sabda mAlA drAvayati dru Ric Rvul wravakArake hfda yagrAhiRi tri DaraRiH rasaBede waNkane pu Sabda mAlA lAlAyAM strI wApi ata ittvam SabdaratnA plIhAdyOzaDaBede pu sikTake na rAjani
dragaqa dragaqa dragaqa pu dreti gaqati gaqa ac vAdyaBede dagaqa kAqA trikA
dravat dravat dravat upaBoge aka para sew dravas ityatra gaRaratne kaRqvA gaRe pAWAntaram dravtayati dravatyati adravatyIt dravat tri dru Satf kzaraRayukte SIGre na niru dravat upaBoge aka para sew dravas ityatra gaRaratne kaRqvA gaRe pAWAntaram dravatyati adravatyIt dravat tri dru Satf kzaraRayukte SIGre na niru
dru dru dru gatO BvA para saka aniw dravati svArTe caN adudravat adu dravat Rici caNi tu adi du dravat ta drudrave dudrave gatiSceha saMyogAnukUlavyApAraH dravadravyARAM dUraprasaraRarUpaM druRa druRa druRa kuwilIBavane tu para aka sew kuwAdi druRati adguRIt adruRIt dudroRa gatO kuwilIcaraRe hiMsAyAYca hiMsA yAYca saka pA druRa na druRati hinasti kuwilIBavati vA druRa ka Danuzi Kaqge ca hemaca vfScike BfNge ca pustrI puMstrI striyAM jAtitvAt NIz piSune tri SabdamAlA druRa kuwilIBavane tu para aka sew kuwAdi druRati adruRIt dudroRa gatO kuwilIcaraRe hiMsA yAYca saka pA druRa na druRati hinasti kuwilIBavati vA druRa ka Danuzi Kaqge ca hemaca vfScike BfNge ca puMstrI striyAM jAtitvAt NIz piSune tri SabdamAlA

druha druha druha anizwacintane divA para saka vew duhyati druhyati adrohIt aDraRat Page a aDrukzat drohitA drogDA droQA drohizyati Drokzyati Druk Druw kruDadraherzyAsUyArTAnAM kruDadruherzyAsUyArTAnAM yaM prati kopaH pA kopavizayasya sampradAnatA Satrave druhyati upasfzwasya upasf zwasya tasya sampradAnasya karmatA BftyamaBidruhyati na yajamAnAya druhyatiSata druhyati Sata brA mA drumeByo mahABAga dInoByo drAgDumarhasi drogDumarhasi BAga nABidruhyati BftyeByaHBAga nABi druhyati BftyeByaH BAga ArzatvAt na karmatA mAtaraYcABidruhyanti manasA karmaRA ca ye BA SA BavAMstAnaBidruhyetakAmandakI BavAMstAnaBidruhyeta kAmandakI atra taN asADuH druha tri druha kvip drohakArake mitraDrukw druha tri druha kartari ka drohakArake druhA tanvaM gUhamAnAf gUha mAnA f putre SabdArTakalpa putrasya vittASayA vittASa yA pituranizwacintanasya prAyaSaH sanBAvanAt samBAvanAt taTAtvam duhitari strI NIz SabdArTakalpa druha anizwacintane divA para saka vew druhyati adrohIt Page a aDrukzat drohitA drogDA droQA drohizyati Drokzyati Druk Druw kruDadruherzyAsUyArTAnAM yaM prati kopaH pA kopavizayasya sampradAnatA Satrave druhyati upasf zwasya tasya sampradAnasya karmatA BftyamaBidruhyati na yajamAnAya druhyati Sata brA mA drumeByo mahABAga dInoByo drogDumarhasi BAga nABi druhyati BftyeByaH BAga ArzatvAt na karmatA mAtaraYcABidruhyanti manasA karmaRA ca ye BA SA BavAMstAnaBidruhyeta kAmandakI atra taN asADuH druha tri druha kvip drohakArake mitraDrukw druha tri druha kartari ka drohakArake druhA tanvaM gUha mAnA f putre SabdArTakalpa putrasya vittASa yA pituranizwacintanasya prAyaSaH samBAvanAt taTAtvam duhitari strI NIz SabdArTakalpa

duzwaM Kanati Kana qa duHKa ac vA sAMKyAdimatasidDe pratikUlavedanIye rajaH kArye cittAdiDarmaBede nyAyamate AtmaDarmaBede budDyAdizawkaM saNKyAdipaYcakaM budDyA dizawkaM saMKyAdipaYcakaM BAvanA taTA DarmmADarmmO guRA ete AtmanaH syuScaturdaSa aDarmajanyaM duHKaM syAt pratikUlaM prati kUlaM sacetasAm BAzA aDarmatvena duHKatvena kAryyakAraRaBAvaH kAryya kAraRaBAvaH pratikUlaM duHKatvajYAnAdeva sarvezAM svABAvikavizayaH svABA vikavizayaH pratikUla ityarTaH siM su si mu icCAdvezaprayatna suKaduHKajYAnAnyAtmano liNgam gO sU yajjAtI yasyArTasya sannikarzAt suKamAtmopalabDavAn tajjAtIyamevArTaM tajjAtIya mevArTaM paSyannupAdAtumicCati seyamAdAtumicCA ekasyAnekArTadarSinanodarSapratisanDanAd ekasyA nekArTadarSinIdarSanapratisanDanAd Bavati liNgamAtmanaH niyatavizaye hi budDiBedamAtre na samBavati dehAntaravaditi evamekasyAnekArTadarSino darSinapratisanDAnAdduH KahetOrdvezaH dehAntara vaditi evamekasyAnekArTadarSinodarSanapratisanDAnAdduH KahetO dvezaH yajjAtIyo yasyArTaH suKahetuH prasidDastajjAtIyamarTaM prasidDasta jjAtIyamarTaM paSyannAdAtum prayatate so yam prayatna ekamanekArTadarSanaM eka manekArTadarSinaM darSanapratisanDAtAramantareRa na syAt niyatavizaye nivatavizaye budDiBedamAtre na samBavati dehAntaravaditi etena duHKahetO payatno prayatnI vyAKyAtaH suKaduHKasmftyA cAyaM tatsADanamAdadAnaH suKamupalamate tatsAGanamAdadAnaH suKamupalaBate duHKamupalaBate suKaduHKe suKaduHKa vedayate pUrvokta eva hetuH BA dvitIyasUtraBAzyeH mA dvitIyasUtra BAzye ca dozEH prayuktaH SarIreRa pravartamAno hiMsAsteyapratizidDaparaddrohaM hiMsA steyaprtizidDaparadrohaM paradravyABIpsA nAstikyaYceti seyaM pApAtmikA pravfttiraDarmmAya uktam kaRA sUtre upaskaravfttO ca suKaduHKayoH parasparaBedaH jYAnAdBedaSca sADito yaTAizwAnizwakAraRaviSezAdviroDAcca yaTA vyAKyAtA pratyakzaM jYAnamindrirya jam lENgikantu liNgajam suKAdikantu nEtAdfSamiti vyAcakruH upa vf aBUdityapi sU lENgikajYAnAd suKAdeH prakAraBedADInaM BedamAha iti SabdaH prakAre apiSabdo BavizyatItyAkArAntarasamuccaye taTAca parvate vahniraBUdBavizyati veti lENgike jYAne tItAdiH prakAro dfSyate na cEvaM prakAraM suKaM duHKaM vA utpadyamAnamupala labDam upa vf sati ca kAryadarSanAt sU caSabdaH BedakAntaraM samuccinoti sati indriyArTasannirkarze sati ca vyAptipakzaDarmBatAdipratisanDAne kAryyasya suKasya duH Kasya vA darSanAt na pratyakzamAtraM suKaM duHKaM vA na lENgi kamAtraM vA tadayamarTaH jYAnasAmAnyaM tAvat suKaduHKe na Bavata ityuktaM jYAnaviSezaH pratyakzajYAnaM vA BavedanumitirUpaM vA indriyArTasannikarze srakkandanAdipratyakze suKatvAnuBa vABAvAt na dvitIyaH candanAdyanumitO vahnyAdyanumitO vA suKatvaduHKatvAnyatarAnanuBavAt evaM pratyakzaviSeze nu mitiviSeze vA suKaduHKayorananuBavAnna tadviSezo pIti upa vf ekArTasamavAyikAraRAntarezu dfzwatvAt sU BedakAntaramAha suKaduHKayoriti SezaH suKaM prati ekArTasamavetAni asADAraRakAraRAni DarmmaH suKe rAgaH suKakAraRecCA tadupAdAnayatnaH srakcandanA dijYAnam duHKaM prati tu aDarmmaH anizwakaRwakAdi jYAnam ezu ekArTasamavAyizu kAraRezu dfzwatvAdityarTaH jYAnantu nirvikalpakamekArTasamavetamasADAraRakAraRaM nApe kzata eva savikalpakantvapekzate viSezaRajYAnaM tanna kAraRA nyaraM svavijAtIyaM Page b sAMKyAstu tasya rajaHkAryatvam cittasya vizayARAYca DarmatvaM tattrEviDyaYcorarIcakruH taTA hi duHKatrayABi GAtAdityAdi sA kA tattvakOmudyAmuktaM yaTA duHKAnAM trayaM duHKatrayaM tat Kalu nAyakagrahAveSanibanDanam tadetat pratyAtmavedanIyaM duHKaM rajaHpariRAmaBedo na Sakyate pratyAKyAtum tadanena duHKatrikeRAntaHkaraRavarttinA cetanASakteH pratikUlatayA BisambanDo BiGAtaH iti etAvatA tenAnayoranukUlanIyena pratikUlanIyena ca kenacidapyanyena BavitavyaM nacAnukUlanIyAH pratikUlanIyA vA budDyAdayastezAM suKaduHKAdyAtmakatvena svAtmani vftti viroDAt tasmAdyo suKAdyAtmA so nukUlanIyaH prati kUlanIyo vA sa cAtmeti sA pra BA sarvezAM triguRAtmatvAt vizayasyApi suKaduHKAtmakatvaM ta kO vyavasTApitaM yaTA atra ca suKaduHKamohAH parasparaviroDinaH svasvA nurUpARi suKaduHKamohAtmakAnyeva nimittAni kalpa yanti tezAYca parasparamaBimAvyABiBAvakaBAvAnnAnAtvam tadyaTA ekEva strI rUpayOvanakulaSIlasampannA svAminaM suKAkaroti tatkasya hetoH svAminaM prati tasyAH suKa rUpasamudBavAt sEva strI sapatnIrduHKAkaroti tatkasya hetoH tAH prati tasyA duHsvarUpasamudBavAt evaM puruzAntaraM tAmavindat sEva Bohayati tatkasya hetoH tat prati tasyA moharUpasamudBavAt anayA ca striyA sarve BAvA darSitam kavikalpalatAyAYca lokasidDAni katicit duHKakAra RAni darSitAni yaTA pAratantryaM ADiH vyADiH mAnacyutiH SatruH kuBAryyA nEHsvam kugrAmavAsaH kusvAmisevanam vahukanyAH vfdDatvaM paragfhavAsaH varzApravAsaH BAryyAdvayam kuBftyaH durhalakaraRakakfziH varAhapurARe duHKatarARi katiciduktAni yaTA duHKameva pravakzyAmi tacCfRuzva vasunDare ucite topacAreRa duHKaM mokzavinASanam ahaNkArakfto nityaM narA mohena cAvftAH ye mAM nEva prapadyante tato duHKa tarannu kim sarvASI sarvavikretA namaskAraviva rjitaH ye ca mAM na prapadyante tato duHKatarannu kim sarvAnnAni tu sidDAni pAkaBedantu kArayet avESva devaM yo SnAti tato duHKatarannukim prAptakAle vESva deve dfzwaM hyatiTimAgatam adattvA tasya yo BuNkte kato duHKatarannu kim asantuzwastu vEzamye paradArABi mardakaH paropatApI mandAtmA tato duHKatarannu kim akftvAyurbalaM karmma gfhe saMvasate naraH mftyukAlavaSaM prAptastato duHKatarannukim hastyaSvaraTayAnAni ga cCamAnAni paSyati na vE tasyAgrataH pfzWe tato duHKa tarannu kim aSnanti piSitaM kecit GftaSAlisama nvitam SuzkAnnaM kecidaSnanti tato dUHKatarannu kima Page b varavastrAvftAM SayyAM samAsevanti BUzitAH kecit tfRezu Serante tato duHKatarannukim vidvAn kftI guRajYaSca sarvaSAstraviSAradaH kecinmUkASca dfSyante tato duHKattarannu kim vidyamAne Dane kecit kfpaRA BogavarjitAH daridro jAyate dAtA tato duHKata rannu kim puruzasya tu dve BArye tayorekAM praSaMsa yet ekApi durBagA tatra tato duHKatarannu kim labDvA tu mAnarsI saMjYAM paYcaBUtasamanvitAm mAmeva na prapadyante tato duHKatarannu kim labDvA brAhmaRa BAvantu trayo varRAH sumaDyame pApakarmmaratA hyAsaM stato duHKatarannu kim etatte kaTitaM Badre duHKakarma viniScitam sarvaBUtahitArTAya yattvayA paripf cCyate avAcyavAdAMSca bahUt vadizyanti tavA hitAH nindantastava sAmarTyaM duPAnikutTa duPAnikutTa duPAnikutTa na nI tA ukte varzapraveSe yogaBede talla kzaRaM tatroktaM yaTA mandaH SuBoccAdipadasTitaScet padonaSIGreRa kftetTaSAlaH tatrApi kAryaM BavatIti vAcyaM vakrAdinirvIryapadena cet syAt
duPAnikutya duPAnikutya duPAnikutya na nI tA ukte varzapraveSe yogaBede tallakzaRaM tatroktaM yaTA mandaH SuBoccAdipadasTitaScet padonaSIGreRa kftetTaSAlaH tatrApi kAryaM BavatIti vAcyaM vakrAdinirvIryapadena cet syAt
duScyavana duScyavana duScyavana pu duHsahaM cyavanaM cAlanamasya duHsahaScyavanaH Sivo yena vA prA ba dur cyu lyu Candasi gatyarTeByaH pA yucvA indre amaraH yutkAreRa duScyAvanena DuzRunA f duScyavanenAnyEravicAlyenaBA bahukAlAnantaraM svasTAnAt patanAt tasya taTAtvam ekEkamanvantare hi caturdaSa indrA BavantIti ekasaptatimahAyugasya manvantarakAlasya caturdaSo BAgaH kiYcidaDikapaYcasahasrayugAtmakastatkAlastato nantaraM tasya patanAt taTAtvam caturdaSa indrASca kalpaBedena BinnanAmAnaH indraSabde darSitAH cyavanena SivenABiBUtatvAt tasya taTAtvam asUyataSca Sakrasya vajreRa praharizyataH savajraM stamBayAmAsa taM bAhuM pariGopamam BA anu a bAha savajraM Sakrasya krudDasyAstamBayat praBuHmallinATaDftapurARam
duliduha duliduha duliduha pu dilIpanfpapitari anamitrasute anamitra suto rAjA vidvAn duliduho Bavat dIlipastanayastasya rAmasya prapitAmahaH harivaM a

durRa durRa durRa rna pu duzwo nayaH prA sa Ratvam duzwAyAM nItO duHsTito nayo sya prA ba tadyuti tri kzantavyomama vfdDasya durRayasya PalodayaH harivaM a atrARatvameva nyAyyam pUrvapadAt saMjYAyAmeva RatvaviDAnAt dur nI aci tu aRatvameva RatvavidO duraH pratizeDAt
durRaya durRaya durRa rna ya pu duzwo nayaH prA sa Ratvam duzwAyAM nItO duHsTitI nayo sya prA ba tadyute tri kzantavyomama vfdDasya durRayasya PalodayaH harivaM a atrARatva meva nyAyyam pUrvapadAt saMjYAyAmeva RatvaviDAnAt dur nI aci tu aRatvameva RatvaviDO duraH pratizeDAt
duraNgama duraNgama duraNgama tri dUraM gacCati gama bA vede Ka mus ca dUragAmini dUraNgataM jyotizAM jyotirekam yaju loke tuqa dUraga ityeva
duratva duratva duratva na dUrasya BAvaH tva dESike paratve tacca BramaviSeze kAraRam yatoktaM dozo pramAyAjanakaM pramAyAstu guRo Bavet pittadUratvAdarUpo dozonAnAviDaH smftaH BAzA kvaciccandrAdeH svalparimARaBrame dUratvaM dozaH si muktA

durma durma durma llikA strI dfSyakAvyarUpe uparUpakaBede sa da yaTA nAwikA trIwakaM gozWI sawwakaM nAwyarAsakam prasTAnollApyakAvyAni preNkzaRaM rAsakaM taTA saMlApakaM SrIgaditaM SilpakaYca vilAsikA durmallikA prakaraRI hallISoBARiketi ca azwAdaSa prAhuruparupakARi manIziRaH vinA viSezaM sarvezAM lakzmanAwakavanmatam ityuddiSyaM tallakzaRamuktaM yaTA durmallI caturaNkA syAt kOSikI BAratI taTA agarBA nAgaranarA nyUnanAyakaBUzitA trinAliH praTamo NkosyAM viwakrIqASrayo Bavet paYcanAlirdvitIyo Nko vidUzakavilAsavAn zaRAlikastftIyastu pIWamardavilAsavAn caturTo daSanAliH syAdaNkaH krIqita nAyakaH yaTA vindumatI
durmallikA durmallikA durma llI llikA strI dfSyakAvyarUpe uparUpakaBede sA da yaTA nAwikA trowakaM gozWI sawwakaM nAwyarAsakam pra sTAnollApyakAvyAni preNkzaRaM rAsakaM taTA salA pakaM SrIgaditaM SilpakaYca vilAsikA durmallikA prakaraRI hallISoBARiketi ca azwAdaSa prAhu ruparUpakARi manIziRaH vinA viSezaM sarvezAM lakzma nAwakavanmatam ityuddiSya tallakzaRamuktaM yaTA durmallI caturaNkA syAt kOSikI BAratI taTA agarBA nAgaranarA nyUnanAyakaBUzitA trinAliH praTamo Nko syAM viwakrIqASrayo Bavet paYcanAlirdvitIyI Nko vidUzakavilAsavAn zaRRAlikastftIyastu pIWa mardavilAsavAn caturTo daSanAliH syAdaNkaH krIqita nAyakaH yaTA vindumatI
durvacam durvacam durvacam na duzwaM vacaH prA sa garhite vacane vacaso duzwatvamapriyAvedakatvena asahahyaM durvaco jYAtermeGAntaritarOdravat udBa nArIM jitvA virUtyante na ca jalpanti durvacaH BA dro a duHsTitaM vaco sya prA bA duzwavacanavaktari tri
durvacas durvacas durvacas na duzwaM vacaH prA sa garhite vacane vacalo duzwatvama priyAvedakatvena asahyaM durvaco jYAtermeGAntaritarOdravat udBa nArIM jitvA virUtTante na ca jalpanti durvacaH BA dro a duHsTitaM vaco sya prA ba duzwa vacanavaktari tri

duvas duvas duvas paricaraRe upatApe ca kaRqA kaRqvA nAma yak para saka sew duvasyati aduvasyIt anehasaH stuBa indro duvasyati duva syati f yABirvittajAni yABirvittajAniM duvasyaTaH f samidBiragniM namasA duvasyan f duvas na duvas paricaraRe kaRqA kaRqvA duvasya kvip allopayalopO havizi paricaraRe ca EBiragne duvogiroviSveBiH f duvaH paricaryyAm duva icCati kyac vA anaNi duvanyati sa tvA Barizo garizo duvanyasam f duvaH paricaraRamicCantaH duvanyAH tatra sIdati duvanyasamBA duvanyasam BA karmaRi lyuw anaNaBAve anaNamAve pakze allopayalopO duvasana paricaraRIye SyenAso na duvasanAsaHf duvasanAsaH paricaraRIyAHBA f duvasanAsaH paricaraRIyAH BA duvas paricaraRe upatApe ca kaRqvA nAma yak para saka sew duvasyati aduvasyIt anehasaH stuBa indro duva syati f yABirvittajAniM duvasyaTaH f samidBiragniM namasA duvasyan f duvas na duvas paricaraRe kaRqvA duvasya kvip allopayalopO havizi paricaraRe ca EBiragne duvogiroviSveBiH f duvaH paricaryyAm duva icCati kyac vA anaNi duvanyati sa tvA Barizo garizo duvanyasam f duvaH paricaraRamicCantaH duvanyAH tatra sIdati duvanyasam BA karmaRi lyuw anaNamAve pakze allopayalopO duvasana paricaraRIye SyenAso na duvasanAsaH f duvasanAsaH paricaraRIyAH BA
duzWara duzWara duzWa sta ra tri duHKena tIryate sO karmaRi Kal vede suzAmAderAkftigaRatvAt zatvam carkftyaM marutaH pattsu duzwaram f loke tu na zatvam titIrzurdustaraM mohAduqapenAsmi sAgaramraGuH
duzmanta duzmanta duzma zya nta pu pOrave Baratapitari rAjaBede upadAnavI sutAn leBe caturastvElikAtmajAn duzmantamaTa suzmantaM pravIramanaGaM taTA duzmantasya tu dAyAdo Barato nAma vIryyavAn sa saMrvadamano nAma nAgAyutabalo mahAn cakravarttI sutojajYe duzmantasya mahAtmanaH SakuntalAyAM Baratoyasya nAmnA sTa BAratAH duzmantaM prati rAjAnaM bAguvAcASarIriRI mAtA BastrA pituH putro yena jAtaH saeva saH Barasva putraM duzmanta mA vamaMsTAH Sa kuntalAm retoDAM putra unnayati naradeva yamakzayAt tvaYcAsya DAtA garBasya satyamAha SakuntalA hariva a asya SakuntalAparivedanakaTA SakuntalASabde dfSyA Page a turvasuvaMSyamaruttakanyAyAM sammatAyAM saMvattarzeH jAte nfpaBede tatkaTA harivaM a turvasuvaMSavarRane yaTA anvastvAvikzito rAjA maruttaH kaTitastava anapa tyo BavadrAjA yajvA vipuladakziRaH duhitA sammatA nAma tasyAsIt pfTivIpateH dakziRArTe tu sA dattA saMvarttAya mahAtmane duzmantaM pOravaYcApi leBe putramakalmazam evaM yayAteH SApena jarAsaMkra maRe tadA pOravaM turvasorvaMSaH praviveSa nfpottama duzmantasya tu dAyAdaH karutTAmaH prajeSvaraH tasyApatyam iY dOzmanti Barate karutTAme ca nfpaBede
duzpanta duzpanta duzpa zya nta pu pOrave Baratapitari rAjaBede upadAnavI sutAn leBe caturastvElikAtmajAn duzmantamaTa suzmantaM pravIramanaGaM taTA duzmantasya tu dAyAdo Barato nAma vIryyavAn sa sarvadamano nAma nAgAyutabalo mahAn cakravarttI suto jajYe duzmantasya mahAtmanaH SakuntalAyAM Barato yasya nAmnA sTa BAratAH duzmantaM prati rAjAnaM vAguvAcASarIriRI mAtA BastrA pituH putro yena jAtaH saeva saH Barasva putraM duzmanta mA vamaMsTAH SakuntalAm retoDAM putra unnayati naradeva yamakzayAt tvaYcAsya DAtA garBasya satyamAha SakuntalA harivaM a asya SakuntalAparivedanakaTA SakuntalASabde dfSyAturvasuvaM SyamaruttakanyAyAM sammatAyAM saMvattarzeH jAte nfpaBede tatkaTA harivaM a turvasuvaMSavarRane yaTA andastvAvikzito rAjA marutaH kaTitastava anapatyo BavadrAjA yajvA vipuladakziRaH duhitA sammatA nAma tasyAsIt pfTivIpateH dakziRArTe tu sA dattA saMvarttAya mahAtmane duzmantaM pOravaYcApi leBe putramakalmazam evaM yayAteH SApena jarAsaNkramaRe tadA pOravaM turvasorvaMSaH praviveSa nfpottama duzmantasya tu dAyAdaH karutTAmaH prajeSvaraH tasyApatyam iY dOzmanti Barate karutTAme ca nfpaBede
duzpraDarziRI duzpraDarziRI duzpraDarziRI strI duzpraDarzo styasyAH ini NIp kaRwa kAryAM rAjani vfhatyAm BAvapra
duzpraDarziRo duzpraDarziRo duzpraDarziRo strI duzpraGarzo styasyAH ini NIp kaRwakAryA rAjani bfhatyAm BAvapra
duzwara duzwara duzwa sta ra tri duHKena tIryate sO karmaRi Kal vede muzAmAderAkftigaRatvAt zatvam carkftyaM marutaH pat su duzwaram f loke tu na zatvam titIrzu rdustaraM mohAduqapenAsmi sAgaram raGuH
dvAtriMSallakzaRa dvAtriMSallakzaRa dvAtriMSallakzaRa pu dvAtriMSat lakzaRAni SuBalakzaRAni yasya SuBalakzaRAnvite mahApuruzalakzaRayute nare kASI sva a paYcadIrGaH paYcasUkzmaH saptaraktaH zaqunnataH tripfTulaGugamBIrodvAtriMSalakzaRAstviti paYca dIrGARi SasyAni yaTA dIrGARyaTAsya vE BUjO netre hanU nAsAvakzasI tanayasya te tvakkenvaSANgulidaSanAH parvARyaNgulijAmapi tasyAsya paYca sUkzmARi dikprAlapadaBAk yaTA pARyaNGritalanetrAntaM tAlujihvADarOzWakam saptAruRaYca sanaKamasmin rAjyamuKapradam kakzA kukzyalikaskanDakaravaktraM zaqunnatam taTAtra dfSyate bAle mahadESvaryyaBAg yaTA lalAwakawivakzoBi stIvisarRo yaTAhyasO sarvatejotirgeSvaryyaM taTA prApsyati nAnyaTA grIvAjaNyAmehanESca triBirhrasvo yamIqitaH svareRa katvanABiByAM trigamBIraH SiSuH SuBaH
dvAtriSallakzaRa dvAtriSallakzaRa dvAtriSallakzaRa pu dvAtriMSat lakzaRAni SuBalakzaRAni yasya SuBalakzaRAnvite mahApuruzalakzaRayute nare kASI sva a paYcadIrGaH paYcasUkzmaH saptaraktaH zaqunnataH tripfTulaGugamBIrodvAtriMSalakzaRastviti paYca dIrGARi SasyAni yaTA dIrGARyaTAsya vE BUjO netre hanU nAsA vakzasI tanayasya te tvakkeSANgulidaSanAH parvvARyaNguli jAnTapi tasyAsya paYca sUkzmARi dikpAlapadaBAk yaTA pARyaNGritalanetrAntaM tAlujihvADarOzWakam saptAruRaYca sanaKamasmin rAjyasuKapradam kakzA kukzyalikaskanDakaravaktraM zaqunnatam taTAtra dfSyate bAle mahadEScaryyaBAg yaTA lalAwakawivakzoBi strivistIrRo yaTAhyasO sarvatejotigESvaryyaM taTA prApsyati nAnyaTA grIvAjaNGAmehanESca triBirhrasvo yamIqitaH svareRa svatvanABiByAM trigamBIraH SiSuH SuBaH
dvIpinaKa dvIpinaKa dvIpinaKa pu dvIpino naKa iva vyAvranaKe
dvandvayudDa dvandvayudDa dvandvayudDa na dvayordvayoryudDam dvayordvayoryudDe kErAte dvandva yudDe ca yadidaM samabartata BA u a vahUni Buvi citrARi dvandvayudDAni saYjaya BA dro a
dvandvayudva dvandvayudva dvandvayudva na dvayordvayoryudvam dvayordvayoryudDe kErAte dvandvayudDe ca yadidaM samavarttataM BA u a bahUni Buvi citrARi dvandvayudDAni saYjaya BA dro a
dvikakud dvikakud dvikakud pu dve kakude yasya antyalopaH samA uzwre hemaca
dvikakudra dvikakudra dvikakudra pu dve kakude yasya antyalopaH samA uzwre hemaca
dvipinaKa dvipinaKa dvipinaKa pu dvIpino naKa iva vyAGranaKe

dvisAvatsarika dvisAvatsarika dvisAvatsarika tri dvivatsaraM BUtAdi WaY saNKyAyAM saMvatsarasaMKyasya capA uttarapadavfdDiH dvivarzaM vyApya BUtAdO
dvivinda dvivinda dvivinda pu dvO vindU leKanAkAre sya visarge varRaBede
dvivindu dvivindu dvivindu pu dvO vindU leKanAkAre sya visarge varRaBede
dviz dviz dviz tri dvezwi dviza kvip SatrO amaraH randrAnvezaRadakzARAM dvizAmAmizatAM yayO raGuH
dviza dviza dviza vEre adA uBa saka aniw dvezwi dvizwe advizan advizuH advikzat ta didveza didvize yaH sarvatrAnABisnehastattat sarvatrAnABi snehastattat prApya SuBASuBam nABinandati na dvezwi na dvezWyakuSalaM dvezwyakuSalaM karma kuSale nAnuzajjate gItA tato dvizurnirAloke dvizu rnirAloke sveByo nyeByaSca rAkzasAH BawwiH saMvatsaraM pratIkzeta dvizantIM yozitaM patimmanuH patim manuH ArzatvAt num dviza tri dvezwi dviza kvip SatrO amaraH ranDrAnvezaRa dakzARAM dvizAmAmizatAM yayO raGuH dviza tri dviza karttari ka dvezakArake SatrO tanmitrapUjA tadaridvizatvam vf saM a dviza vEre adA uBa saka aniw dvezwi dvizwe advizan advizuH advikzat ta didveza didvize yaH sarvatrAnABi snehastattat prApya SuBASuBam nABinandati na dvezwi na dvezwyakuSalaM karma kuSale nAnuzajjate gItA tato dvizu rnirAloke sveByo nyeByaSca rAkzasAH BawwiH saMvatsaraM pratIkzeta dvizantIM yozitaM patim manuH ArzatvAt num dviza tri dvezwi dviza kvip SatrO amaraH ranDrAnvezaRa dakzARAM dvizAmAmizatAM yayO raGuH dviza tri dviza karttari ka dvezakArake SatrO tanmitrapUjA tadaridvizatvam vf saM a
dyUtapratipad dyUtapratipad dyUtapratipad dA dyUtArTA pratipad vA wAp kArttika Suklapratipadi tatra dyUtaviDAnaM ti ta yaTA brahma pu SaNkaraSca purA dyUtaM sasarjja sumanoharam kArttike Suklapakze tu praTame hani BUpate jitaSca SaNkarastatra jayaM seBe ca pArvatI ato rTAcCaNkaro duHKI gOrI nityaM Page a suKozitA tasmAt dyUtaM prakarttavyaM praBAte tatra mA navEH dyUtapratipadA nAma tava BAvI mahotsavaH ti ta DftaM baliM prati BagavadvAkyam
dyUtapratipada dyUtapratipada dyUtapratipada dA dyUtArTA pratipad vA wAp kArttikaSuklapratipadi tatra dyUtaviDAnaM ti ta yaTA brahma pu SaNkaraSca purA dyUtaM sasarjja sumanoharam kArttike Suklapakze tu praTame hani BUpate jitaSca SaNkarastatra jayaM leBe ca pArvatI ato rTAcCaNkaro duHstrI gOrI nityaM suKozitA tasmAt dyUtaM prakarttavyaM praBAte tatra mAnavEH dyUtapratipadA nAma tava BAvI mahotsavaHti ta DftaM prati BagavadvAkyam
dyumadAna dyumadAna dyumadAna na sAmagAnaBede
dyumadgAna dyumadgAna dyumadgAna na sAmagAnaBede
dyumna dyumna dyumna na divaM dIptiM manati mnA ka Gane amaraH bale niGaRwuH pratyuMntaH
dyumra dyumra dyumra na diva dIptiM sanati mrA ka Dane amaraH bale niGaRwuH pradyumnaH
dyut dyut dyut pu dyuta kvip kiraRe hemaca dyotamAne tri sa hi dyutA vidyutA veti sAma f dyutAdyotamAnenaBA
dyuta dyuta dyuta dIptO BvA aka Atma sew dyotatetyudittvAt dyotate XdittvAt aNi pa adyutat adyotizwa didyute dyotanaH adyutaccandamABfSammawwiH upasarGapUrvakasya adyutaccanda mABfSam BawwiH upasargapUrvakasya tattadupasargadyotyArTayukte dyotane vyadyotizwa saBAvedyAmasO naraSiKitrayI mAGaH vidudyute vAqavAjAtavedasAmmAGaH bAqavajAtavedamAm mAGaH SoBAyAYca padmErananvItabaDUmuKadyutaH mAGaH Rici dyotayati prakASane vyaYjanAvfttyA boDane ca dyotyArTaH vyaNgyarTe dyuta pu dyuta kvip kiraRe hemaca dyotamAne tri sa hi dyutA vidyutA veti sAma f dyutA dyotamAnena BA dyuta tri dyuta ka dyotamAne sa iva carati sEvacarati kvip dyutati adyutIt dyutadyAmAnaM bfhatImftena vfhatImftena f dyuta dIptO BvA aka Atma sew dyotate XdittvAt aNi pa adyutat adyotizwa didyute dyotanaH adyutaccanda mABfSam BawwiH upasargapUrvakasya tattadupasargadyotyArTayukte dyotane vyadyotizwa saBAvedyAmasO naraSiKitrayI mAGaH vidudyute bAqavajAtavedamAm mAGaH SoBAyAYca padmErananvItabaDUmuKadyutaH mAGaH Rici dyotayati prakASane vyaYjanAvfttyA boDane ca dyotyArTaH vyaNgyarTe dyuta pu dyuta kvip kiraRe hemaca dyotamAne tri sa hi dyutA vidyutA veti sAma f dyutA dyotamAnena BA dyuta tri dyuta ka dyotamAne sEvacarati kvip dyutati adyutIt dyutadyAmAnaM vfhatImftena f
dyuzad dyuzad dyuza sa d pu divi sIdati sada kvip pUrvapadAt Candasi zatvam loke zatvam deve grahe ca manaHsu yezAM dyusadAM nyaDIyat mAGaH
dyuzada dyuzada dyuza sa da pu divi sIdati sada kvip pUrvapadAt Candasi zatvam loke zatvam deve grahe ca manaH su yezAM dyusadAM nyaDIyatamAGaH
e e e ekAraH svaravarRaBedaH ezaH edetO kaRWatAlavyAvityukteH kaRWatAlvoH sTAnayoruccAryyaH sa ca dIrGaH dvimAtratvAt udAttAnudAttasvaritaBerdaranunAsikAnanunAsikABedaByAYca zaqviDaH tasya mAtfkAnyAse UrdDvozWasTAne nyasyatayA tacCa bdenApyaBiDeyatA tasya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDenutantre ekAraM paramaM divyaM brahmavizRuSivAtmakam raYjinI kusumapraKyam paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARAtmakaM varRRaM taTA vindutrayAtmakam caturvargapradaM devi DyAyet parama kuRqalIm eSabdasya vAcakAH SabdAstantre uktA yaTA ekAro vAstavaM SaktirJiRWISOzWO BagaM marut sUkzmo BUto rdDakeSI ca jyotsnA SradDA pramarddanaH BayaM jYAnaM kfSA DIrA jaNGA sarvasamudBavaH vahnirvizRurBagavatI kuRqalI mohinI vasuH yozidADAraSaktiSca trikoRA ISasaMjYakaH sanDirekAdaSI BadrA padmanABaH kulAcalaH ekAro vAmagaRqAntaH SaktirJiRwI BagantaTA mAkzavI jaYca vijayA ozWaH ekAdaSasvaraH iti vIjavarRABiDAnam e avya I vic bA na hrasvaH smftO asUyAyAm anukampAyAm saMboDane AhvAne ca mediniH vizRO pu ekAkzarakozaH e ekAraH svaravarRaBedaH ezaH edetO kaRWatAlavyAvityukteH kaRWatAlvoH sTAnayoruccAryyaH sa ca dIrGaH dvimAtratvAt udAttAnudAttasvaritaBerdaranunAsikAnanunAsikABedaByAYca zaqviDaH tasya mAtfkAnyAse UrdDvozWasTAne nyasyatayA tacCa bdenApyaBiDeyatA tasya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDenutantre ekAraM paramaM divyaM brahmavizRuSivAtmakam raYjinI kusumapraKyam paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARAtmakaM varRRaM taTA vindutrayAtmakam caturvargapradaM devi DyAyet parama kuRqalIm eSabdasya vAcakAH SabdAstantre uktA yaTA ekAro vAstavaM SaktirJiRWISOzWO BagaM marut sUkzmo BUto rdDakeSI ca jyotsnA SradDA pramarddanaH BayaM jYAnaM kfSA DIrA jaNGA sarvasamudBavaH vahnirvizRurBagavatI kuRqalI mohinI vasuH yozidADAraSaktiSca trikoRA ISasaMjYakaH sanDirekAdaSI BadrA padmanABaH kulAcalaH ekAro vAmagaRqAntaH SaktirJiRwI BagantaTA mAkzavI jaYca vijayA ozWaH ekAdaSasvaraH iti vIjavarRABiDAnam e avya I vic bA na hrasvaH smftO asUyAyAm anukampAyAm saMboDane AhvAne ca mediniH vizRO pu ekAkzarakozaH
ekAntamuzamA ekAntamuzamA ekAntamuzamA suzWu samAvarzaH suzamA suzamAdi zatvam ta bOdDamatasidDe kAlaBede ekAntaduHzamASabde vivftiH

ekakArya ekakArya ekakArya tri ekaM samAnaM kAryaM yasya samAnakAryakare ekasya pAkartturdarSane anyasya pAkakarttuH smaraRaM BavatIti smArakagaRamaDye gO ta sU uktam yaTA praRiDAna nibanDAByAsaliNgalakzaRasAdfSyaparigrahASrayASritasaMbanDAnantaryaviyogEkakAryaviroDAtiSayaprAptivyavaDAnasuKaduHKeCAdvezarAgArTitvakriyADarmADarmanimitteByaH sU ekakAryAt ekakartturdarSanAt kartrantarasya smftiH vfttiH ekaM kAryaM yayoH tayorBAvaH ekakAryatvatulyakAryakaratvarUpe saNgatiBede taTA ca samAnakAryyakAritvaM svakartavyakAryakAritvaM saNgatiH saprasaNgaupodDAto hetutAvasarastaTA nirvAhakEkakAryatvaM zoQA saNgatirizyate anumAnajA karmaDAra ekasmin kArye ekakArye samudyantO kfzRO yudDe parAjitO BA sa a guRAguRamanAsaNgamekakAryayamanantaram etattu brahmaRo vfttamAhurekapadaM dvayam BA va a
ekakAryya ekakAryya ekakAryya tri ekaM samAnaM kAryyaM yasya samAnakAryyakare e kasya pAkartturdarSane anyasya pAkakarttuHsmaraRaM BavatIti smArakagaRamaDye gOta sU uktam yaTA praRiDA na nibanDAByAsaliNgalakzaRasAdfSyaparigrahASrayASritasaMba nDAnantaryyaviyogEkakAryyaviroDAtiSayaprAptivyavaDAnasuKaduH Ke CAdvezarAgArTitvakriyADarmmADarmmanimitte ByaH sU ekakAryyAt ekakartturdarSanAt karttrantarasya smftiH vfttiH ekaM kAryyaM yayoH tayorBAvaH ekakAryyatva tulyakAryyakaratvarUpe saNgatiBede taTA ca samAnakAryyakA ritvaM svakartavyakAryyakAritvaM saNgatiH saprasaNga upodGAto hetutAvasarastaTA nirvAhakEkakAryyatvaM zoQA saNgatirizyate anumAnajA karmmaDAra eka smin kAryye ekakAryye samudyantO kfzRO yudDe parA jitO BA sa a guRAguRamanAsaNgamekakAryya Page b manantaram etattu brahmaRI vfttamAhurekapadaM dvayam BA va a
ekaparRA ekaparRA ekaparRA strI ekaM parRaM tapaH sADanatayA AhAro yasyAH SEla rAjasya menAyAdutpannadfhitftrayamaDye duhitfBede tisraH katyAstu menAyAM janayAmAsa SElarAw aparRAmekaparRAYca tftIyAmekapAwalAm ityupakramya AhAramekaparRena ekaparRA samAcarat hari a svArTe kan bahu kap vA ata ittvam aparRikApyatra apyaparRA nirAhArA ekASA ekaparRikA devIpu a asya pUrvoktavAkyenEkavAkyatayA himavatkanyABedaparatvam na tu durgAparatvamiti boDyam ekamAtraM parRamasya ekapatrAvaSeze vfkzAdO tri
ekaparRRA ekaparRRA ekaparRRA strI ekaM parRRaM tapaHsADanatayA AhAro yasyAH SEla rAjasya menAyAdutpannadfhitftrayamaDye duhitfmede tisraH katyAstu menAyAM janayAmAsa SElarAw aparRRAmekaparRRAYca tftIyAmekapAwalAm ityupakramya AhAramekaparRRena ekaparRRA samAcarat hari a svArTe kan bahu kap vA ata ittvam aparRRikApyatra apyaparRRA nirAhArA ekASA ekaparRRikA devIpu a asya pUrvoktavA kyenEkavAkyatayA himavatka yABedaparatvam na tu durgApara tvamiti boDyam ekamAtraM parRRamasya ekapatrAvaSeze vfkzAdO tri
ekarama ekarama ekarama tri eko nanyavizayakorasaH rAgaH aBiprAyaH eko BinnaH KaBAvo vA sya ekarAge ekABiprAye a BinnasvamAve ca asTUlamanaRvahrasvamaderGamamanantamanaparama bAhyaM prajYAnaGanamekarasam iti SrutiH cidekarasavastuni vedA ekorasoyatra ekarAgavizaye tri tapasyeka rase ratam rAmA ekorasovarRyatvena yatra prADA nyena ekarasayukte nAwake na ekaeva BavedaNgI Sf NgAro vIraeva vA aNgAnyanyerasAstatra iti sA da ukteH nAwakasya prADAnyena SfNgAravIrarasAnyataravattvena varRanIyatvAttaTAtvam
ekarasa ekarasa ekarasa tri eko nanyavizayakorasaH rAgaH aBiprAyaH eko BinnaH KaBAvo vA sya ekarAge ekABiprAye aBinnasvaBAve ca asTUlamanaRvahrasvamadIrGamanantamanaparamabAhyaM prajYAnaGanamekarasam iti SrutiH cidekarasavastuni veda eko raso yatra ekarAgavizaye tri tapasyeka rase ratam rAmA eko raso varRyatvena yatra prADAnyena ekarasayukte nAwake na ekaeva BavedaNgI SfNgAro vIraeva vA aNgAnyanye rasAstatra iti sA da ukteH nAwakasya prADAnyena SfNgAravIrarasAnyataravattvena varRanIyatvAttaTAtvam
ekatIdat ekatIdat ekatIdat tri ekato dantA asya datrAdeSaH ekapArSve dantapaNktiyukte paSuBede gavAdO anuzwrAMScekatodataH manuH
ekatodat ekatodat ekatodat tri ekatodantA asya datrAdeSaH ekapArSve danta paNktiyukte paSuBede gavAdO anuzwrAMScekatodataH manuH
ekavarRI ekavarRI ekavarRI strI ekamasahAyaM yaTA taTA varRyate Sabdyate nayA varRaH karaRe ac ta gOrA NIz karatAlIrUpe vAdye SabdaratnA karAByAmitarakAraRAnapekzayA tadvAdyavAdanAt taTAtvam

ez ez ez gatO BvA Atma saka sew ezate Ezizwa ezAm baBUva Asa cakre ezaRIyaH ezitavyaH ezitaH ezitA ezitum ezwiH ezaRam ezA ezamARaH parANmitra eza tvarvAcI gOrupEzata aTa vede gaRavyatyAsAt para upezatu eNipararUpam sa vE vata BrazwamatistavE zate yaH karmmaRAM pAramapArakarmmaRaH BAga DAtUnAmanekAryyAta avalokayatItyarTaH tasmAddivA nazwEza eti Sata vrA pari anvezaRe paryyezate paryyezwiH loke pi kvacit gaRavyAtyAsaH jagmuH saMsidDvasa kalpAH paryyezanto viBAvasum BA anu ez strI eza BAve kvip gatO tAvAmeze raTAnAmurvvIm f eze gantum BA rAya eze vase daDIta eze gantum BA rAya eze vase daDIta eze prAptum BA karAya eze vase daDIta da DIta eze prAptum BA teByaH svEzameva cakAra Sata brA iza vic icCAyAm icCO na kzodo vfRItameze f eze sOKyamicCate sOKyami cCate BA ez gatO BvA Atma saka sew ezate Ezizwa ezAm baBUva Asa cakre ezaRIyaH ezitavyaH ezitaH ezitA ezitum ezwiH ezaRam ezA ezamARaH parANmitra eza tvarvAcI gOrupEzata aTa vede gaRavyatyAsAt para upezatu eNipararUpam sa vE vata BrazwamatistavE zate yaH karmmaRAM pAramapArakarmmaRaH BAga DAtUnAmanekAryyAta avalokayatItyarTaH tasmAddivA nazwEza eti Sata vrA pari anvezaRe paryyezate paryyezwiH loke pi kvacit gaRavyAtyAsaH jagmuH saMsidDvasa kalpAH paryyezanto viBAvasum BA anu ez strI eza BAve kvip gatO tAvAmeze raTAnAmurvvIm f eze gantum BA rAya eze vase da DIta eze prAptum BA teByaH svEzameva cakAra Sata brA iza vic icCO na kzodo vfRItameze f eze sOKyami cCate BA
eza eza eza gatO BvA Atma saka sew ezate Ezizwi ezAm baBUva Asa cakre ezaRIyaH ezitavyaH ezitaH ezitA ezitum ezwiH ezaRam ezA evamARaH parANmitra eza tvarvAcI gOrupEzatu aTa vede gaRavyatyAsAt para upezatu eNi pararUpam sa vE vata BrazwamatistavEzate yaH karmmaRAM pAramapArakarmmaRaH BAga DAtUnAmanekArTyAt avalokayatItyarTaH kasmAddivA nazwEva eti Sata vrA pari anvezaRe paryyezate paryyezwiH loke pi kaScit gaRavyAtyAsaH janmuHsaMsidDasaMkalpAH paryyezanto viBAvasum BA anu
