sadASivamayaM varRaM sadA ISvarasaMyutam paYcavarRamaya varRaMcaturjYAnamayaM taTA rakta vidyullatAkAramUkAraM praRamAmyaham f fkAraH svaravarRRaBedaH mUrdDanyaH fwurazARAM murdDA ityukteH sa tu udAttAnudAttasvaritaBedAt triviDaH anu nAsikAnanunAsikaBedAt pratyekaM dviDeti zaqviDaH sa ca hrasvaH ekamAtrAkAlenocAryyatvAt tasya ca ruktavidyulla tArUpeRa DyeyatoktA raktavidyullatAkAramfkAraM praRamAmya ham kAma ta tasya ca mAtfkAnyAse vAmanAsi kAyAM nyasyatA uktA tena aBedopacArAt vAmanAsAdi SabdavAcyatA svarUpaparatve tataH takArakArapratyayO ft fkAraH tatkAlocAryye taparastatkAlasyEva pA ukteH vyakaraRaSAstre ananubanDaH f ityetat azwA daSaviDasya fvarRRasya dvAdaSaviDasya xkArasya saMjYA Bavati tena f iti triMSatAM saMjYA iti si kO aDikaM svaravarRAdiSabdasamAptO vakzyate samAnavarRRagrahaRadyotanA rTam varRaSabdottaraH prayujyate fvarRaH triMSatAM saMjYA f gatO BvA para saka aniwa Siti fcCAdeSaH fcCati ArcCat Arat ArzIt Ara AriTa arttA aryyAt arizyati Arizyan fcCan ftaH ftiH arttavyaH araRIyaH aryyaH yat vESyasvAminoH anyatra Ryat AryyaH arttA ArI ArivAn arttum saNgamA rTatvenAkarmmakAt sampUrbbakAt tataH Atma samfcCate samArata samArtta sAramAnavarArohA vanamAra sA udBawaH f Ric arpayati te san aririzati samaririzate gatyarTatve pi kOwilye yaN arAryyate kimaBIrurarA ryyase BawwiH karmaRi aryyate Ari f gatO prApaRe ca juho para saka aniw laqAdO Sapo luktvena SitparatvABAvAt na fcCAdeSaH SatfSAna costutadAdeSaH iyartti iyftaH iyrati iyfyAt iyarttu iyfhi iyarARi EyaH EyftAm EyaruH Arat ArzIt sfsAhacaryyAt aNviDO BvAdereva grahaRa mityanye tanmate ArzIdityeva samArata samArtta ityanye Ara ityAdi BvAdivat SittvAt iyfcCan samfcCA na iti BedaH ayaM vEdika eveti bahavaH bahulaM Canda sIti pA sidDeH arttipipArttyoSca pA itIttvaviDA nasAmarTyAdayaM BAzAyAmapi si kO Suzma iyartti praBfto me adri f iyartti vAcamariteva Page b nAvam anayorgatyarTatvAt upasargaBedenArTaBedastu iRaDAtuvat sa ca tacCabde uktaH aBEzuH kapayo nvArat kumBakarRaM marutsutaH sItAM jiGAMsU sOmitre rAkzasAvAratAM Druvam BawwiH A fta ArttaH vfdDiH taTArtto pi kriyAM DarmyAm BawwiH udayarzi BAnunA f samudrAdUrmimudiyartti venaH yadA SasA niHSasA BiSasopArima jAgrato yat svapantaH f evaM yaTAyaTamupasargapUrvasya udAharaRaM dfSyam f hiMsAyAM svA para saka aniw fRoti fRuyAta fRotu fRu ArRat ArzIt liqAdO BvAdivat Satf fRvan kta fRam itiBedaH tvezasteDUma fRvati f fRaM deyamadeyaYca yena yatra yaTA ca yat yAjYa smftiH apadvArA matInAM pratnA fRvanti kA ravaH f fRorakzaM na SacIBiH f asya rikArAditvamityanye riRoti ityAdi f avya f kvip bA na tuk samboDane garhale vAkye ca tedi parihAse vAkyavikAre SabdaratnA devamAtari strI f fHsudIrGamuKI rudrodevamAtA trivikramaH BAraBUtiH kriyA hArorecikA nAsikA DftiH ekapAdaH Siro mAlA maRqanA SAntinI jalam karRaH kAmalatA meGo nivfttirgaRanAyakaH rohiRI SivadUvI ca pUrRRA giriSca saptamI f fkAraM parameSAni kuRqalImUrttiDArakam atra vrahmA ca vizRuSca rudraScEva varAnane sadASivamayaM varRaM sadA ISvarasaMyutam paYcavarRamaya varRaMcaturjYAnamayaM taTA rakta vidyullatAkAramUkAraM praRamAmyaham
fSijANgalikI fSijANgalikI fSijANgalikI strI fzipriyA jANgalikI fkzaganDAvfkze ratnamA
fc fc fc stutO tudA para saka sew fcati ArcIt Anarca karmaRi fcyate Arci yAByAM gAyatramfcyate f brahmARyfcyante yuvaByAm fc strI fcyate stUyate nayA fca karaRe karaRa kvip vedamantra Bede yatrArTavaSena pAdavyavasTitiH sA fk jE fco yajUzisAmAni yajUzi sAmAni nigadAmantrAH kAtyA fgAdayo nigadAntAScatvAro mantrAH nigadAntAScatvAromantrAH tatrArTavaSena vfttavaSena vftta vaSena bA yatra pAdavyavasTA sA fk tatra samiDAgniM duvaspata ityAdO ityAdI yatra pratyakzeRa samApto rTodfSyate tatrArTavaSena tatrArTa vaSena pAdavyavasTA yatra ca kriyApadAnupAdAnAt susasidDAya susa sidDAya Socize taM tvA samidBiraNgiraH ityAdO aparyavasito aparya basito rTastatra vfttanavaSe na vfttavaSena pAdavyavasTA Bavati ataSya ataSca yatra niyatAkzarARi niyatASca pAdAniyatAni vAvasAnAni sA fgityucyate aniyatAkzarapAdAvasAnaM yajuH yadyapi pragItaM vragItaM mantravAkyaM sAmetyaBiyuktaprayogaH taTApi tatra viSezaRaM viSezyARyfprayogaH taTApi tatra viSezaRaM gItiH viSe zaRaM gotiH viSezyARyfgakzarARi nAgfhItaviSezaRA viSezye vudDiriti praTamaM pratIyamAnatvAt gItireva sAmetyucyate sAme tyucyate taTA ca kavatIzu raTantaraM gAyati yadyonyAM taduttarayorgAyati fcyaDyUQa sAma gAyati prajApaterhfdayamanfcaM prajApaterhf dayamanfca gAyatItyAdyupapannaM Bavati ata fgakzarAtirikta yadgItiSabdAvAcyaM fgakzarAtiriktaM yadgItiSabdavAcyaM tat sAmaSabdenocyate sAmaSabde nocyate nanu yadi raTantarAdiSabdA raTa ntarAdiSabdA gItereva vAcakAH tadA raTantareRa stuvIteti kaTaM stutisADanatvam guRaguRisambanDakIrttanaM hi stutiH sA ca gItirUpeRa sAmnA na samBavati ucyate gIteH svayaMstutivAcakatvABAvadfgakzaraprakawanadvArA svayaMstutivAcakatvABAvAdfgakzaraprakawanadvArA stutisADanatvaM BavatIti noktadozaH nigadAH prEzAH parasamboDanArTAH prokzaRIrAsAdaya agnIdagnInvihara ityevamAdayaH nanu nisadA nigadA api yajUMzveva yajUMzyeva tataH kimarTaM pfTaguktAH ucyate upAMSu upASu yajuzA UccErnigadeneti DarmmaBedena Kalu anantarBAvaSaNkayA yajuHzvananta Page b rBAvaSaNkayA pfTagvacanam vastutastu nigadAnAM yajuzwvameva parasamboDanArTatvAttu uccErnigadeneti DarmmaBedaH na ca DarmmaBedAdBedaH fkasAmayorApa Darmma BedAdBedaH fkasAmayorapi kvacidupAMSuprayogaviDAnAt atastEviDyameva a tastrEviDyameva mantrARAm taTAcoktam aherbuDnyamantraM me gopAya yamfzayastrEvidA viduH fcaH sAmAni yajuMzIti yajUM zIti trInvedAnvidantIti trividaH trividAM sambanDino sambanDi no DyetArastrEvidAH te ca yaM mantraBAgamfgAdirUpeRa triviDamAhustaM gopAyeti yojanA fgyajaH sAmAtmako fgyajaHsAmA tmako mantraBedo BihitaH tadavAntaraBedAkANkzAyAmfcAM tadabAntaraBedAkANkzAyAmfcAM ca tadetadfcAByanUktam CA u viSa uttare niru samAse tadantAt ac ardDarcaH ekarcam dvyfcaM zaqfcam ityAdi bahu aDyetaryyeva ac anfcaH bahvfcaH ityAdi granTe tu na ac anfk sAma prAcuryye mayaw fNmaya fcIzam fcIzam fcIzam pu fcA stutyA samaH vede ni IttvaM zatvacca fgvaSezeRa samAnaguRe iha Sruta indro asme adya stave vajryucIzamaH f fcIzamaH yadvyAva indra te SataM SataM BUmIruta syuH na tvA vajrin ityAdikayA f stutyA samAnaguRakaH BA paromAtramfcIzamamindramugram f fcOzamam fcA stutyA samam yadyapyaparicCinnastaTApi stutiryAvanmAtraM vizayIkaroti tatsamam ityarTaH BA avacazwafcIzamaH f vftrahA paramajyA fcIzamaH dIptyA same ca ahan vfttamfcIzamaH fcA dIptyA samaH BA
fcIzama fcIzama fcIzama pu fcA stutyA samaH vede ni IttvaM zatvaYca fgvaSezeRa samAnaguRe iha Sruta indro asme adya stave vajryfcIzamaH f fcIzamaH ya dvyAva indra te SataM BUmIruta syuH na tvA vajrin ityAdikayA f stutyA samAnaguRakaH BA paromAtramfcIzamamindramugram f fcI zamam fcA stutyA samam yadyapyaparicCinnastaTApi stuti ryAvanmAtraM vizayIkaroti tatsamam ityarTaH BA ava cazwa fcIzamaH f vftrahA paramajyA fcIzamaH dIptyA same ca ahan vftta mfcIzamaH fcA dIptyA samaH BA
fca fca fca stutO tudA para saka sew acati ArcIt Anarca karmaRi fcyate Arci yAByAM gAyatramfcyate f brahmARyfcyante yuvaByAm
ftIdya ftIdya ftIdya na fta vada BAve kyap satyakaTane ftaM vadantA vftodyezu aTa
ftaparRRa ftaparRRa ftaparRRa sUryyavaMSye nfpaBede BagIraTasuto rAjA ityupa kramya ayutAjitsutasyAsIdftaparRRo mahAyaSAH di vyAkzahfdayajYo yaM rAjA nalasaKo balI ftaparRRasuta ScAsIdArtta parRRirbahIpatiH harivaM a tasya ca nalena saKyamakzahfdayajYatvaYca BA va a darSitaM yaTA evamukto nalenATa tadA BANgAsurirnfpaH AsasAda vane rAjan PalavantaM viBItakam taM dfzwvA vAhukaM rAjA tvaramARo ByaBAzata mamAmi sUta paSya tvaM saNKyAne paramaM balam sarvaH sarvaM na jAnAti sarvajYo nAsti kaScana nEkatra parinizWAsti jYAnasya puruze kvacit vfkze smin yAni parRAni PalAnyapi ca vAhuka patitAnyapi yAnyatra tatrEkamaDikaM Satam ekamatrADikaM patraM Pala mekaYca vAhuka paYcakowyo Ta patrARAM dvayorapi ca SA KayoH pracinuhyasya SAsve dve yAScAyanyAH praSAKivAH AByAM Palasahasre dve paYconaM Satameva ca tato raTamava sTApya rAjAna vAhuko bravIt parokzamiva me rAjan katTase SatrukarzaRa pratyakzametat karttAsmi SAtayitvA viBItakam aTatra gaRite rAjan vidyate na parokzatA pratyakzaM te mahArAja SAtayizye viBItakam ahaM hi nABijAnAmi BavedevaM na veti vA saNKyAsyAmi PalAnyasya paSyataste janADipa muhUrttamapi vArzReyo raSmIn yacCatu vAjinAm tamabravInnfpaH sUtaM nAyaM kAlo vilambitum vAhukastvabravIdenaM paraM yatnaM samA sTitaH pratIkzasva muhUrttaM tvamaTa vA tvarate BavAn eza yAti SivaH panTA yAhi vAzRarye sAraTiH abra vIdftuparRastu sAntvayan kurunandana tvameva yantA nAnyo sti pfTivyAmapi vAhuka tvatkfte yAtumicCAmi bdirBA hayakovida SaraRaM tvAM prapanno smi na viGnaM karttumarhasi kAmaYca te karizyAmi yanmAM vakzyasi vAhuka vidarBAM yadi yAtvAdya sUryyaM darSayitAsi me aTAbravIdvAhukastaM saMKyAya ca viBItakam tato vi darBAM yAsyAmi kuruzvEvaM vaco mama akAma iva taM rAjA gaRayasvetyuvAca ha so vatIryya raTAttUrRRaM SAta Page b yAmAsa taM drumam tataH sa vismayAvizwo rAjAnamida mabravIt gaRayitvA yayoktAni tAvantyeva PalAni ca atyadButamidaM rAjan dfzwavAnasmi te balam Srotumi cCAmi te vidyAM yayEtaj jYAyate nfpa tamuvAca tato rAjA tvarito gamane nfpaH vidDyakzahfdayajYaM mAM saNKyAne ca viSAradam vAhukastamuvAcATa dehi vidyAmimAM mama matto pi cASvahfdayaM gfhARa puruzarzaBa ftupa rRRastato rAjA vAhukaM kAryyagOravAt hayajYAnasya loBAcca taM taTetyabravIdvacaH yaToktaM tvaM gfhARedamakzARAM hfdayaM param nikzepo me SvahfdayaM tvayi tizWatu vAhu ka nalasya vAhukacCadmarUpatAmupavarRya anta uktaM yaTA ftuparRRo pi SuSrAva vAhukacCadminaM nalam damayantyA samAyuktaM jahfze ca narADipaH tamAnAyya nalaM rAjA kzamayAmAsa pArTivam sa ca ta kzamayAmAsa hetuBirbu dDisammataH sa satkfto mahIpAlo nEzaDaM vismitA nanaH uvAca vAkyaM tattvajYo nEzaDaM vadatAM varaH dizwyA sameto dArEH svErBavAnityaByanandata kaccittu nApa rADaM te kftavAnasminEzaDa ajYAtavAsaM vasato mad gfhe vasuDADipa yadi vA budDipUrvARi yadyabudDyApi kAnicit mayA kftAnyakAryyAki tAni tvaM kzantumama rhasi nala uvAca na me parADaM kftavAMstvaM svalpamapi pArTiva kfte pi ca na me kopaH kzantavyaM hi mayA tava pUrvaM hyapi saKA me si sambanDI ca janADipa ata UrdDantu BUyastvaM prItimAharttumarhasi sarvakAmEH suvi hitEH suKamasmyuzitastvayi na taTA svagfhe rAjan yaTA tava gfhe sadA idaYcEva hayajYAnaM tvadIyaM mayi tizWati tadupAharttumicCAmi manyase yadi pArTiva evamuktvA dadO vidyAmftaparRRAya nEzaDaH sa ca tAM pratijagrAha viDidfzwena karmmaRA gfhItvA cASvahfdayaM rAjan BANgAsurirnfpaH nizaDADipateScApi dattvAkzahfdayaM nfpa BA va a karkowasya nAgasya dama yantyA nalasya ca ftaparRasya rAjarzeH kIrttanaM kali nASanam BA ftaparRRamAdftam nEza
ftaparRa ftaparRa ftaparRa sUryavaMSye nfpaBede BagIraTasuto rAjA ityupakramya ayutAjitsutasyAsIdftaparRo mahAyaSAH divyAkzadahfyajYo yaM rAjA nalasaKo balI ftaparRasutaScAsIdArttaparRirmahIpatiH harivaM a tasya ca nalena saKyamakzahfdayajYatvaYca BA va a darSitaM yaTA evamukto nalenATa tadA BANgAsurirnfpaH AsasAda vane rAjan PalavantaM vibItakam taM dfzwvA bAhukaM rAjA tvaramARo ByaBAzata mamAmi sUta paSya tvaM saNKyAne paramaM balam sarvaH sarvaM na jAnAti sarvajYo nAsti kaScana nEkatra parinizWAsti jYAnasya puruze kvacit vfkze smin yAni parRAni PalAnyapi ca bAhuka patitAnyapi yAnyatra tatrEkamaDikaM Satam ekamatrADikaM patraM PalamekaSca bAhuka paYcakowyo Ta patrARAM dvayorapi ca SAKayoH pracinuhyasya SAKe dve yAScApyanyAH praSAKikAH AByAM Palasahasre dve paYconaM Satameva ca tato raTamavasTApya rAjAnaM bAhuko bravIt parokzamiva me rAjan katTase SatrukarzaRa pratyakzametat karttAsmi SAtayitvA viBItakam aTAtra gaRite rAjan vidyate na parokzatA pratyakzaM te mahArAja SAtayizye viBItakam ahaM hi nABijAnAmi BavedevaM na vetti vA saNKyAsyAmi PalAnyasya paSyataste janAmaDipa mUhUrttamapi vArzReyo raSmIn yacCatu vAjinAm tamabravInnfpaH sUtaM nAyaM kAlo vilambitum vAhukastvabravIdenaM paraM yatnaM samAsTitaH pratIkzasva muhUrttaM tvamaTa vA tvarate BavAn eva yAti SivaH panyA yAhi vArzReya sAraTiH abravIdftuparRastu sAntvayan kurunandana tvameva yantA nAnyo sti pfTivyAmapi bAhvaka tvatkfte yAtumicCAmi vidarBAM bAhayakovida SaraRaM tvAM prapanno smi na viGnaM karttumarhasi kAmaYca te karizyAmi yanmAM vakzyami bAhuka vidarBAM yadi yAtvAdya sUryaM darSayitAsi me aTAbravIdbAhukastaM saMKyAya ca viBItakam tato vidarBAM yAsyAmi kuruzvEvaM vaco mama akAma iva taM rAjA gaRayasvetyuvAca ha so vatIrya raTAttUrRaM SatayAmAsa taM drumam tataH sa vismayAvizwo rAjAnamidamabravIt gaRayitvA yayoktAni tAvantyeva PalAni ca atyadButamidaM rAjan dfzwavAnasmi te balam SrotumiccAmite vidyAM yayEtajjYAyate nfpa tamuvAca tato rAjA tvarito gamane nfpaH vidDyakzahfdayajYaM mAM saNKyAne ca viSAradam bAhukastamuvAcATa dehi vidyAmimAM mama matto pi cASvahfdayaM gfhARapuruzarzaBa ftuparRastato rAjA bAhukaM kAryagOravAt hayajYAnasya loBAcca taM taTetyabravIdvacaH yaToktaM tvaM gfhARedamakzARAM hfdayaM param nikzepo me SvahfdayaM tvi tizWatu bAhuka nalasya bAhukacCadmarUpatAmupavarRya anta uktaM yaTA ftuparRo pi SuSrAva bAhukacCadminaM nalam damayanyA samAyuktaM jahfze ca narADipaH tamAnAyya nalaM rAjA kzamayAmAsa pArTivam sa ca taM kzamayAmAsa hetuBirbuddisammataH sa satkfto mahIpAlo nEzaDaM vismitAnanaH uvAca vAkyaM tattvajYo nEzaDaM vismitAnanaH uvAca vAkyaM tattvajYo nEzaDaM vadatAM varaH dizwyA sameto dArEH svErBavAnityaByanandata kaccittu nAmarADaM te kftavAnasmi nEzaDa ajYAtavAsaM vasato madgfhe vasuDADipa yadi vA budDipUrvARi yadyabudDyApi kAnicit mayA kftAnyakAMryyAki tAni tvaM kzantumarhasi nala uvAca na me paraDaM kftavAMstvaM svalpamapi pArTiva kfte pi cana me kopaH kzantavyaM hi mayA tava pUrvaM hyapi saKA me si sambanDI ca janADipa ata UrdDantu BUyastvaM prItimAharttumarhasi sarvakAmEH suvihitEH suKamasmayuzitastvayi na taTA Kagfhe rAjan yaTA tava gfhe sadA idaYcEva hayajYAnaM tvadIyaM mayi tizWati tadupAharttumicCAmi manyase yadi pArTiva evamuktA dadO vidyAmftaparRAya nEzaDaH sa ca tAM pratijagrAha viDidfzwena karmmaRA gfhItvA cASvahfdayaM rAjan BANgAsurirnfpaH nizaDADipateScApi dattvAkzahfdayaM nfpa BA va a karkowasya nAgasya damayantyA nalasya ca ftaparRasya rAjarzeH kIrttanaM kalinASanam BA ftaparRamAdftam nEza
fterakzam fterakzam fterakzam pu fte uddeSyatayA varjjitaM rakzoyataH yajYe fterakzA vE yajYaH Eta vrA yajYasya rakzoByo rakzaRIyatvAt taTAtvam
fterakzas fterakzas fterakzas pu fte uddeSyatayA varjjitaM rakzoyataH yajYe fterakzA vE yajYaH Eta brA yajYasya rakzoByo rakzaRIyatvAt taTAtvam
ftodya ftodya ftodya na fta vada BAve kyap satyakaTane ftaM vadantA vftodyezu aTa
fzijANgalikI fzijANgalikI fzijANgalikI strI fzipriyA jANgalikI fkzaganDAvfkze ratnamA
gA gA gA gato gatO saka BvA A aniw gAte agAsta jage gA stutO saka janmani aka juho vEdiko yaM DAtuH sArvaDAtuke aByAsasyettvaYca jigAti agAsIt jagO somojigAti somo jigAti gAtuvid f jarituH sacA yajYo jigAti cetanaH svezu kzayezu praTamojigAti praTamo jigAti iNAdeSasya iRAdeSasya ca gAte rUpaM tattadDAtO uktam gA gatO saka BvA A aniw gAte agAsta jage gA stutO saka janmani aka juho vEdiko yaM DAtuH sArvaDAtuke aByAsasyettvaYca jigAti agAsIt jagO somo jigAti gAtuvid f jarituH sacA yajYo jigAti cetanaH svezu kzayezu praTamo jigAti iNAdeSasya iRAdeSasya ca gAte rUpaM tattadDAtO uktam
gANgazWI gANgazWI gANgazWI strI gANge nadItawe tizWati sTA ka amba zatvam aluk sa gOrA NIz nawA kawaSarkarAlatAyAm hArA
gANgezWI gANgezWI gANgezWI strI gANge nadItawe tizWati sTA ka amba za tvam aluk sa gOrA NIz nawA kawaSarkarA latAyAm hArA
gARakArya gARakArya gARakArya tri gARakArO BavaH kurvAdi Rya guRakAriBavAdO
gARakAryya gARakAryya gARakAryya tri gARakArO BavaH kurvAdi Rya gaRakAriBavAdO
gAmBIrya gAmBIrya gAmBIrya na gamBIrasya BAvaH zyaY agADatve talasparSanAyogyatve avikAritve ca nirastagAmBIryamapAstapuzpakam mAGaH gAmBIryamavikAritvam agADatvaYca mali sA da ukte pOruzasAtvikaguRaBede yaTA SoBA vilAsomADuryaM gAmBIryaM DEryatejasI lalitOdAryamityazwO satyajAH pOruzA guRAH iti puruzaguRAnazwaDA viBajya BISokakroDaharzAdyErgAmBIryaM nirvikAratA iti lakzitam vikArAH sahajA yasya harzakroDaBayAdizu BAvezu nopalaByante tat gAmBIryamiti smftam SAku yaTA AhUtasyABizekAya visfzwasya vanAya ca na mayA lakzitastasya svalpo pyAkAraviBramaH acApalye ca gAmBIryamanoharaM vapuHraGuHgAnDIryeRa acApalyenamali
gAmBIryya gAmBIryya gAmBIryya na gamBIrasya BAvaH zyaY agADatve talasparSanA yogyatve avikAritve ca nirastagAmBIryya mapAstapuzpakam mADaH gAmBIryya mavikAritvam agADatvaYca malli sA da ukte pOruzasAtvi kaguRaBede yaTA SoBA vilAsomADuryyaM gAmBIryyaM DEryyatejasI lalitOdAryyamityazwO satvajAH pOruzA guRAH iti puruzaguRAnazwaDA viBajya BISokakroDa harzAdyErgAmBIryyaM nirvikAratA iti lakzitam vikArAH sahajA yasya harzakrADaBayAdizu BAvezu nopalaByante tat gAmBIryyamiti smftam SAku yaTA AhUtasyABizekAya visfzwasya vanAya ca na mayA lakzi tastasya svalpo pyAkAraviBramaH acApalye ca gAmBI ryyamanoharaM vapuH raGuH gAnDIryyeRa acApalyena malli
gArDravAsam gArDravAsam gArDravAsam pu gArDraH pakzaH vAsa iva yasya gfDrapakzayukte bARe nahi gARqIvamuktAnAM SarARAM gArDravAsasAm mA va a
gArDravAsas gArDravAsas gArDravAsas pu gArDraH pakzaH vAsa iva yasya gfDrapakzayukte bARe nahi gARqIvamuktAnAM SarARAM gArDravAsasAma mA va a
gArdDya gArdDya gArdDya na gfDa gardDa vA BAve GaY gardDa eva catu rvarRRA svArTe zyaY loBe pItvA jalAnAM niDinAtirgArdDyAt mAGaH laBye gArdDyeN valaja saMBaktO kavika
gArddya gArddya gArddya na gfDa gardDa vA BAve GaY gardDa eva caturvarRA svArTe zyaY loBe pItvA jalAnAM niDinAtirgArdvyAt mAGaH laByo gArdDyeN valaja saMBaktOkavika

gOqAvAstuka gOqAvAstuka gOqAvAstuka puM na tadeva ca bfhatpatraM raktaM cet gOqavAstukam ityuktalakzaRe vAstukaBede cilISAka rAjani
gOqavAstuka gOqavAstuka gOqavAstuka puMna tadeva ca vfhatpatraM raktaM cet gOqavA stukam ityuktalakzaRe vAstukaBede cillISAka rAjani
gOrAvaskandin gOrAvaskandin gOrAvaskandin pu guroridaM gOravaM gurupatnIrUpaM kalatraM tadAskandati A skanda Rini vede pfzo varRavipa ryayaH ahalyAjAre Sakre indrAgacCetyupakrame gOra vAskandinnahalyAyE jAreti Sata vrA
gOrasuvarRRa gOrasuvarRRa gOrasuvarRRa pu gOraH SvetaH suzWuvarRo sya citrakUwa prasidDe patraSAkaBede gOrasuvarRaM SiSiraM kaPapitta jvarapraRut dAhAruciBrAntiraktaSramahft paTyameva ca rAjani tadguRA uktAH

gU gU gU vizWAtyAge tudA kuwA para aka sew guvati aguvIt jugAva odit gUnaH gUTam gU strI gacCatyapAnena dehAt gama kU wilopaSca vizWAyAM male ca gU DAtoH gUDAtoH kvippratyayAntatAkaTanaM puMliNgatAkaTanaYca puMliNgatA kaTanaYca prAmAdikam gU vizWAtyAge tudA kuwA para aka sew guvati aguvIt jugAva odit gUnaH gUTam gU strI gacCatyapAnena dehAt gama kU wilopaSca vizWAyAM male ca gUDAtoH kvippratyayAntatAkaTanaM puMliNgatA kaTanaYca prAmAdikam

gUra gUra gUra udyame curA Atma aka sew gUrayate ajuguratagUraRam vaDe ajugurata gUraRam gUra baDe gatO ca divA dibA Atma saka sew gUryate agUrizwa gUryyate agU rizwa jugUre Idit gUrRaH gUra udyame curA Atma aka sew gUrayate ajugurata gUraRam gUra baDe gatO ca dibA Atma saka sew gUryyate agU rizwa jugUre Idit gUrRaH
ga ga ga gakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRasTAnaM jihvAmUlarU pakaRWadeSaH AByantaraprayatnaH jihvAmUlasparSaH bAhyaprayatnAH saMvAranAdaGozAH alpaprARaSca mAtfkAnyAse sya dakziRama RibanDe nyAsaH asya DyeyarUpadevatAdikaM kAmaDenutantre uktaM yaTA gakAraM parameSAni paYcadevAtmakaM sadA nirguRaM triguRAtItaM nirIhaM nirmalaM sadA paYcaprARamayaM varRaM sarvaSaktyAtmakaM priye aruRAdityasaNkASaM kuRqalIM praRamAmyaham hfdayasTadvAdaSadalakamalasya kAdiWAntadvAda SavarRayutatayA asya tanmaDyagatvam asya vAcakaSabdA varRA BiDAne uktA yaTA go gOrI gOravaM gaNgA gaReSo go kuleSvaraH SArNgI paYcAtmako gATA ganDarvaH sarvagaH smftiH sarvasidDiH praBA DUmrA dvijAKyaH SivadarSanaH viSvAtmA gOH pfTagrUpA BaRibanDastrilocanaH gItaM sarasvatI vidyA BoginI nakuloDarA tejasvatI ca hfdayaM jYAna jAlanGaro layaH kAvyAdiracanAyAmasyAsaMyukta tayA praTamavinyAse lakzmIH Palam kaH KogoGaSca lakzmIm saMyuktaM ceha na syAt muKaBaraRapawurvargavi nyAsayomaH padyAdO gadyavaktre vacasi ca sakale prA kftAdO samo yamiti vf ra wI sarvaSezatayokteH ga na gE ka gIte guReSe gaReSe ganDarve pu ekAkzarako guruvarRe myarasta jaBnagErlAntEreBirdaSaBirakzarEH guru varRe myarastajaBragErlAntEreBirdaSaBirakzarEH vfttara gurureko gakArastu lakAro laGurekakaH Candoma yarAmantagalO sanO satO gO strIvfttara strI vfttara supyupapade gameMrqaH game rqa hfdga hfdayagAmini kaRWaga kaRWagAmini ityAdyarTe ityA dyarTe tri hfdgAmiH hfdgABiH pUyate vipraH kaRWagAmistu kaRWagABistu BUmipaH manuH supyupapade sfpyupapade gE ka sAmaga sAmagAtari Candoga Cando gAtari CandegAtari tri ga gakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRasTAnaM jihvAmUlarU pakaRWadeSaH AByantaraprayatnaH jihvAmUlasparSaH bAhyaprayatnAH saMvAranAdaGozAH alpaprARaSca mAtfkAnyAse sya dakziRama RibanDe nyAsaH asya DyeyarUpadevatAdikaM kAmaDenutantre uktaM yaTA gakAraM parameSAni paYcadevAtmakaM sadA nirguRaM triguRAtItaM nirIhaM nirmalaM sadA paYcaprARamayaM varRaM sarvaSaktyAtmakaM priye aruRAdityasaNkASaM kuRqalIM praRamAmyaham hfdayasTadvAdaSadalakamalasya kAdiWAntadvAda SavarRayutatayA asya tanmaDyagatvam asya vAcakaSabdA varRA BiDAne uktA yaTA go gOrI gOravaM gaNgA gaReSo go kuleSvaraH SArNgI paYcAtmako gATA ganDarvaH sarvagaH smftiH sarvasidDiH praBA DUmrA dvijAKyaH SivadarSanaH viSvAtmA gOH pfTagrUpA BaRibanDastrilocanaH gItaM sarasvatI vidyA BoginI nakuloDarA tejasvatI ca hfdayaM jYAna jAlanGaro layaH kAvyAdiracanAyAmasyAsaMyukta tayA praTamavinyAse lakzmIH Palam kaH KogoGaSca lakzmIm saMyuktaM ceha na syAt muKaBaraRapawurvargavi nyAsayomaH padyAdO gadyavaktre laGurekakaH Candoma yarAmantagalO satO gO strI vfttara supyupapade game rqa hfdga hfdayagAmini kaRWaga kaRWagAmini ityA dyarTe tri hfdgABiH pUyate vipraH kaRWagABistu BUmipaH manuH sfpyupapade gE ka sAmaga sAmagAtari Candoga CandegAtari tri

gaRakAri gaRakAri gaRakAri pu gaRaM DAtvAdigaRaM karoti kf bA iY DAtvarTapratipAdakagranTakarttari ta gaRakasyArOca tasyApatyaM kurvA Rya gARakAryya tadapatye puMstrI

gaRarAjya gaRarAjya gaRarAjya na vf sa ukte dakziRasyAmukte deSaBede gaRarAjyakfzRavellUretyAdi tadvAkyaM kUrmmaviBAgaSabde pf uktam

gaRqApaDAna gaRqApaDAna gaRqApaDAna na gaRqa upaDIyate tra upa DA ADAre lyuw ta gAlavAliSa gaRqasTApanArhe upaDAne mfdugaRqopaDAnAni SayanAni suKAni ca suSru
gaRqadUrvA gaRqadUrvA gaRqadUrvA strI gaRqayuktA granTimatI dUrvA gAzwadUrvA dUrvABede rAjani gaRqadUrvA himA lOhadrAviRI grAhiRI laGuH tiktA kazAyA maDurA vAtakft kawupAkinI dAhatfzRAvalAsAsrakuzWapittajvarApahA BAva pra
gaRqadUrvvA gaRqadUrvvA gaRqadUrvvA strI gaRqayuktA granTimatI dUrvA gA wadUrvA dUrvABede rAjani gaRqadUrvA higA lOhadrAviRI grAhiRI laGuH tiktA kazAyA maDurA vAtakft kawu pAkinI dAhatfzRAvalAsAsrakuzWapittajvarApahA BAvapra
gaRqakIputra gaRqakIputra gaRqakIputra pu ta SAlagrAme SilABede gaRqakISabde tasya tatputratvakaTA dfSyA

gagDa gagDa gagDa hAse BvA para aka sew gagDati agagDIt jagagDa
gagGa gagGa gagGa hAse BvA para aka sew gagGati agagzIt jagagDa
gaganasinDa gaganasinDa gaganasinDa strI ta mandAkinyAm gaganasinDuPena pawalajAlAntarasya kAda gagananadyAdayo pyatra

gajArIha gajArIha gajArIha pu gajamArohati A ruha aR hastipAle mAhuta amaraH
gajAroha gajAroha gajAroha pu gajamArohati A ruha aR hastipAle mAhuta amaraH
gaja gaja gaja made svane ca BvA para aka sew gajati Bajati agAjIt ajagIt jagAja gajaH gaja svane BvA idit para aka sew gaYjati agaYjIt jagaYja jamaYja gaYjyate gaYjA gaja svane Kane curA uBa aka sew gajayati te ajaga jat ta gaja puM strI puMstrI gaja Bede made aca hastini nagajA na gajA dayitA dayitAH BawwiH iBaSabde vivftiH striyAM jAtitvAt NIz azwasaMKyAyAm gajAnAmerAvatAdInamazwatvAt gajAnAmErAvatA dInamazwatvAt taTAtvam kftvA triGnaM gajerhftvAjyo garjarhftvA jyo ta gajamuktaSezam gajaBuktaSezam tantrasA aratnInAM SatAnyazwAvekazwyAnvitAni SatAnyazwA Page b vekazazwyAnvitAni ca gajapramARamAKyAtaM muniBirmAnavediBiH muniBirmAna vediBiH SabdArTaci ukte mAnaBede sADAraRanarANgulyA sADAraRanarA NgulyA triMSadaNgulako gajaH ityukte mAnaBede mAnamAtre mAna mAtre vAstumAnaBede ca medi sa ca jyo ta uktaH yaTA prastAradErDyamAnaM prastAradErGyamAnaM tu svahastena taTA narEH kftvA triGnaM gajErhftvA vAstumAnanirUpaRam Dvajo DUmaSca siMhaSca SvA vfzaH svara Kara eva ca gajaH kAkapadaM cEva jAnAnyazwO mAnAnyazwO ca vAstunaH jyo ta puzwirgaje kAkapade vinASaH tatPalam tat Palam OzaDapAkArTe garttaBede vEdyakam gajapuwaSabde dfSyam gajAnAM samUhaH tal gajatA tatsamUhe strI tataHUrdDamAne tataH UrdDvamAne daGnac gajadaGna dvayasatt dvayasac gajadvayasa gajatulyArdDaparimARe gaja tulyordDaparimARe tri striyAM NIp dvitIyaSca tftIyaSca UrdDamAne mato UrdDvamAne satI mama vyA kA ukteH UrdDamAna UrdDvamAna eva tayoH prayogaH parimARamAtre tu mAtrac gajamAtra ityeva tri gaja made svane ca BvA para aka sew Bajati agAjIt ajagIt jagAja gajaH gaja svane BvA idit para aka sew gaYjati agaYjIt jamaYja gaYjyate gaYjA gaja Kane curA uBa aka sew gajayati te ajaga jat ta gaja puMstrI gaja made aca hastini nagajA na gajA dayitA dayitAH BawwiH iBaSabde vivftiH striyAM jAtitvAt NIz azwasaMKyAyAm gajAnAmErAvatA dInamazwatvAt taTAtvam kftvA triGnaM garjarhftvA jyo ta gajaBuktaSezam tantrasA aratnInAM SatAnyazwA Page b vekazazwyAnvitAni ca gajapramARamAKyAtaM muniBirmAna vediBiH SabdArTaci ukte mAnaBede sADAraRanarA NgulyA triMSadaNgulako gajaH ityukte mAnaBede mAna mAtre vAstumAnaBede ca medi sa ca jyo ta uktaH yaTA prastAradErGyamAnaM tu svahastena taTA narEH kftvA triGnaM gajErhftvA vAstumAnanirUpaRam Dvajo DUmaSca siMhaSca SvA vfzaH Kara eva ca gajaH kAkapadaM cEva mAnAnyazwO ca vAstunaH jyo ta puzwirgaje kAkapade vinASaH tat Palam OzaDapAkArTe garttaBede vEdyakam gajapuwaSabde dfSyam gajAnAM samUhaH tal gajatA tatsamUhe strI tataH UrdDvamAne daGnac gajadaGna dvayasac gajadvayasa gaja tulyordDaparimARe tri striyAM NIp dvitIyaSca tftIyaSca UrdDvamAne satI mama vyA kA ukteH UrdDvamAna eva tayoH prayogaH parimARamAtre tu mAtrac gajamAtra ityeva tri
gajakUrmASin gajakUrmASin gajakUrmASin pu gajaSca kUrmaSca tO aSnAti aSa Bojane RiniH garuqe SabdaratnA gajakacCapaBojotyAdayo nyatra tO ca viBAvasupratIkamutI anDonyaSApAdugajakUrmatAM prAptO garuqena BakzitO yaTAha BA A a AsIdviBAvasurnAma maharziH kopano BfSam BrAtA tasyAnujaScAsIt supratIko mahAtapAH sa necCati DanaM BrAtrA sahEkasTaM mahAmuniH viBAgaM korttayatyeva supatIko hi nityaSaH aTAbravISca taM BrAtA supratIkaM viBAvasuH viBAgaM bahavo mohAt karttumicCanti nityaSaH tato viBaktAsvanyo nyaM viruDyatte ryamohitAH tataH svArTaparAm mUQAn pfTagBUtAn svakErDanEH viditvA BedayantyatAnamitrA mitrarUpiRaH viditvA cApare BinnAnantarezu patantyaTa BinnAnAmatuto nASaH kziprameva pravarttate tasmAdviBAgaM BrAMtFRAM na praSaMsanti sADavaH guruSAstre nibadDAnAmanyo nyenABiSaNkinAm niyantuM nahi SakyastvaM Bedato DanamicCasi yasmAttasmAt supratIka hastitvaM samavAtsyasi SaptastvevaM supratIko viBAvasumaTAbravIt tvamapyantarjalacaraH kacCapaH samBavizyasi evamanyo nyaSApAttO supratIkaviBAvasU gajakacCapatAM prAptAvarTArTaM mUQacetasO rozadozAnuzaNgeRa tiryagyonigatAvuBO parasparadvezaratO pramARabaladarzitO sarasyasminmahAkAyO parvavErAnusAriRO tayoranyataraH SrImAn samupEti mahAgajaH yasya bfMhitaSabdena kUrmo pyantarjaleSayaH utTito sO mahAkAyaH kftsnaM vikzoBayan saraH yaM dfzwvA vezwitakaraH patatyeza gajo jalam dantahastAgralANgUlapAdavegena vIryavAn vikzoBayaMstato nAgaH saro bahuBAzAkulam kUrmo pyaByudyataSirA yudDAyAmyeti vIryavAn zaqucCrito yojanAni gajastaddviguRAyataH kUrma striyojanotseDo daSayojanamaRqalaH tAvuBO yudDasammattO parasparavaDEziRO upayujyASu karmedaM sADayehitamAtmanaH mahABraGanasaNkASO tO BuktvA mftamAnaya ityevaM pitrAnuSizwo garuqastAvaBakzayat yaTAha tatrEva a BakzayAmAsa garuqastAvuBO gajakacCapO
gajakUrmmASin gajakUrmmASin gajakUrmmASin pu gajaSca kUrmmaSca tO aSnAti aSa Bo jane Rini garuqe SabdaratnA gajakacCapaBojItyA dayo pyatra tO ca viBAvasupratIkamunI anyonyaSApAd gajaMkUrnmatAM prAptO garuqena BakzitO yaTAha BA A a AsIdviBAvasurnAma BaharviH kopano BfSam BrAtA taKAnujaScAsIt supatOko mahAvapAH sa necCati DanaM BrAtnA sahEkasTaM mahAmuniH viBAgaM kIrttaya tyeva suptatIkI hi nivyaSaH aTAbravIcca taM BrAtA supratIkaM viBAvasuH viBAgaM bahavo mohAt karttu micCanti nivyaSaH tato viBaktAstvasyo nyaM viru Dyaste rTamohitAH tataH svArTaparAn mUQAn pfTa dBUtAn svakErDanEH viditvA BedayantyetAnamitrA mitra rUpiRaH viditvA cApare BinnAnantarezu patantyaTa BinnAnAmatulo nASaH kzipameva pravarttate tasmAdvimAya Page a BrAtFRAM na praSaMsanti sADavaH guruSAstre nivadDAnA manyo nyenABiSaNkinAm niyantuM nahi SakyastvaM Bedato DanamicCasi yasmAttasmAt supratIka hastitvaM samavApsyasi SaptastvevaM supratIko viBAvasumaTAvravIt tvamapyantarjalacaraH kacCapaH samBavizyasi evamanyI nya SApAttO supratIkaviBAvasU gajakacCapatAM prAptAvarTArTaM mUQacetasO rozadozAnuzaNgeRa tiryyagyonigatAvuBO parasparadvezaratO pramARabaladarpitO sarasyasminmahA kAyO pUrvavErAnusAriRO tayoranyataraH SrImAn samu pEti mahAgajaH yasya vfMhitaSabdena kUrmmo pyanta rjjaleSayaH utTito sO mahAkAyaH kftsnaM vikzo Bayan saraH yaM dfzwvA vezwitakaraH patatyeza gajo jalam dantahastAgralANgUlapAdavegena vIryyavAn vikzoBayaMstato nAgaH saro bahuJazAkulam kUrmmo pya ByudyataSirA yudDAyAByeti vIryyavAn zaqucCrito yojanAni gajastaddviguRAyataH kUrmmastriyojanot seDo daSayojanamaRqalaH tAvuBO yudDasammattO para sparabaDEziRO upayujyASu karmedaM sADayehitamAtmanaH mahABraGanasaNkASO tO BuktvA mftamAnaya ityevaM pitrAnuSizwo garuqastAvaBakzayat yaTAha tatrEva a makzayAmAsa garuqastAvuBO gajakacCapO
gajamowana gajamowana gajamowana puMstrI gajaM mowayati cu muwa kzode lyu siMhe SabdamA striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
gajavalaBA gajavalaBA gajavalaBA strI ta bahuvIjAyAM girikadalyAM SalakyAYca rAjani
gajavallaBA gajavallaBA gajavallaBA strI ta bahuvIjAyAM girikadalyAM Salla kyAYca rAjani
galAri galAri galAri pu ta marakatamaRO rAjani
gamBArikA gamBArikA gamBArikA strI gama vic gamaM nimnagatiM bimartti Bf Rvul kApi ata ittvam gAmBAra vfkzaBede rAjani
gama gama gama gatO BvA para aniw gacCati lfdit xdit agamat jagAma ja gAma jagmatuH gantA gamyAt gamizyati gantA gamI gamyaH gantavyaH gamanIyaH gacCan gataM gataH gatiH gantum gatvA Agatya hfdayaNgamaH jagmivAn karmaRi gamyate agami gamyamAnaH Ric gamayati te ajIgamat te san jigamizati saMjigAMsate yaN jaNgamyate yaNluk jaNgamIti jaNganti jaNgamam kzodIyAnapi gacCatimAGaH kzIdIyAnapi gacCati mAGaH gacCati puraH SarIramSaku SarIram Saku tena gacCan na rizyati manuH na guRasyAgrato gaRasyAgrato gacCet hito jagAma gahanaM vanam devImA tatra niScitya kandarpamagamat pAkaSAsanaH kumA gataM tiraScInamanUrusAraTeH mAGaH kroSAdDe kroSArdDaM prakftipuraHsareRa gatvA raGuH agamyAM ca sriyaM striyaM gatvA smftiH acCa ABimuKye gacCagatya aBimuKaM gatvA ati atikramya utkfzya vA gamane tato daSAhe tigate ti gate kftaSOco nfpAtmajaH rAmA ayo cintAmatijagAma ha BA Salya a atikramArTe ati kramArTe nAsya gatitvam atigatvA vi ati viSezeRAtikramya gatO kaTamarjuna kaTamarjjuna kAloyam svarge vyatigamastava BA va a aDi prAptO aDigatya jagatyaDISvarAt nEza yaTA Kanan KanitreRa naro vAryaDigacCati vAryyaDigacCati manuH viSezaM nADigacCAmi nirdDanasyAvarasya ca BA SA Slo vedArTAnaDigacCecca SAstrARi viviDAni vivi DAni ca yAjYa Page b sam aDi samyak prAptO yatte samaDigacCanti yasyEte tasya tadDanam manuH anu prAptO paScAdgamane paScAdvamane anukaraRe ca tat pApaM SataDA BUtvA tadvaktfnanugacCati smftiH SruterivArTaM smftiranvagacCat smftiranva gacCat raGuH anugatanayamArgAmargalAM durnayasya mAGaH antara vyavaDAne antar vyabaDAne gatO maDyagatO ca BAnO yajYAdantargataH Sata brA antargatA madanavahniSiKAvalI yA udBawaH apa apAye viSlezajanakakriyAyAm sA kanyApajagAmATa samIpAttasya DImataH BA dro a api svakAraRAdO praveSe asuM vAgapigacCatu asuMvAgapigacCatu aTa aBi ABimuKyena AmimuKyena gatO anurAgAdvane rAmaM dizwyA tvamamigacCasi tvama BigacCasi rAmA ayo a samyaggatO ca aBigantAsmi BaginIM mAtaraM ca taveti ca yAjYa ava boDe yadAvagacCedAyatyAmanizwaM DruvamAtmanaH manuH prAptO ca kuto yudDaM jAtu naro vagacCet BA u Slo A paScAddeSaviBAgaparvakagatO paScAddeSaviBAgapUrvakagatO Agatya bilvaSAKAyAM vilvaSAKAyAM caRqike kuru sanniDim durgAvAhanamantraH Danuzo ByAsamAgatya ByA samAgatya BA A a AgatA bata vata jareva himAnI hi mAnI sevyatAM surataraNgiRI udBawaH boDe Agamo nizPalastatra BuktistokApi yatra no A gamaRic gama Ric kzamAyAM pratIkzAyAYca Atma yAvadAgamayate yAvadAgama yate Ta narendrAn nEza Agamayate kAlam karmAdizu karmmA dizu sarvezu aDvaryuH aDyaryyuH saMprezamAgamayeta lAwyA SrO aDi A prAptO nADyAgamacca mfgayaMstAM mAM munirudAraDIH gAM muni rudAraDIH BA A a anu A anukftO samyaggatO paScAdgatO pratyAgatO ca anvAgato yajYapatirvo aBramata yaju anvAgato karmasaNgizumAptO karmmasamAptO BavataH pratyAgamizyati vedadI sambanDe ca kiYcit paSyatyananvAgataH Sata brA ananvAgataH ananubadDaH BA aBi A ABimuKyenAgatO sarvatrAByAgato guruH manuH samyagAgatO kramAdaByAgataM kramAdaByAgata dravyam yAjYa prAptO ca upa A samIpAgatO vanAdArAdupAgataH rAmA taponiDiM vetsi na mAmupagAtam Saku upasTitO aka kaTamApadupAgatA BA sa a prati A parAvftyAgamane yato gatistatra punarAgatO raRAt ra Page a RAt pratyAgataM SUraM BAryAYca BAryyAYca gatayOvanAm cARa pratyAgataSceva punastaTEva prA ta ud UrdDvagatO UrdDagatO utTAne aka ityudgatAH pOravaDUmuKeByaH pOrabaDUmu KeByaH SfRvan kaTAH raGuH udgamaH utkramya gatO caUrdDva ca UrdDvaM prARA hyudgacCanti yUnaH sTavira AyatimanuH Ayati manuH aBi A ABimuKyenAgamane aByudgatAstvA vayamadya sarve BA A a prati ud pratilakzyIkftya utTAne aka tamAgatamaBiprekzya tamAgataBaBiprekzya pratyudgamya parantapAH BA A a AgavAqA gatiBede saka pratyujagAmAtiTimAtiTeyaH pratyudgatamivAmuzREH pratyujjagAmAtiTimAtiTeyaH pratyu dgatamivAmuzREH pratyudgatA pArTivaDarmapatnyA raGuH pratyujjagAmAgamanapratItaH kumA upa samIpagamane grahAstamupagacCanti grahAstamupacCanti sArameyA ivAmizam ivA mizam sadanamupagato haM parvamamBojayone pUrvamamBojayoneH praboDaca suptAM mattAM pramattAM vA raho yatropagacCati rahoyatropagacCati manuH pratijYAyAm upagamaH aBi upa pratijYAyAm svIkAre ca vayamaByupagacCAma kfzReRa tvAM praDarzitam harivaM a aByupagamaH ABimuKyena samIpagatO ca gurUnaByupagacCanti garUmaByupagacCanti yaSase rTAya BAvini BA a ni niyamena prAptO hite mitre nigatAn hanti vIrAn vI rAn f da nigatAn hananAya niyamena prAptAnBA prAptAn BA Ric niScayena boDane boDene ca nigamo vedaH nigamakalpatarorgalitaM Palam BAga uktasyArTasyopasaMhAre ukta syArTasyopasahAre ca nigamanaSabde nigamanaSabda vivftiH nir nizkramaRe aDivinnA tu yA nArI nirgacCedruzitA nirgacCe druzitA gfhAt manuH viSezeRa prAptO ca puruzAH prezyatAmeke nirgacCanti DanArTinaH BA va a parA parAvftya gamane parigatO ca yadvE manaH parAgataM yadbadDamiha veha vA aTa vidyayA tatrArohanti tatrA rohanti yatra kAmAH parAgatAH Sata brA vyAptO ca sPuwaparAgaparAgatapaNkajam mAGaH mAGa pari parito gatO yaTA hi merurBagavatA sUryeRa sUryyeRa nityaSaH parigamyate BA va a vezwane caaTa ca aTa sa valkadukUlakuTAdiBiH parigatojvaladudDatabAlaDiH valka dukUlakuTAdiBiH parigatojjvaladudDatabAlaDiH BawwiH prati vEparItyena gatO yata AnatistatrEva AgatistatrEva gamane Bavatu pratigamizyAmastAvat Saku aDItAM yogahInasya vidyAM pratigatAmiva rAmA sunda a Page b vi viSezeRa gatO vicCede vigame ca avanitalavigatESca BUtasaMGEH BA dro a tato niSA sAvyagamanmahAtmanAm sAvyagama nmahAtmanAm BA ASva a SradDA ca no mAvigamat mA vigamat manuH ruciBartturasya virahADigamAditisanDyayApi virahADigamA diti sanDyayApi sapadi vyagami mAGaH sam saNge aka A yatra devAH samagacCanta viSve f saNgacCasva maNgacCasva mayA sArdDanekenEkanarASana sArdDamekenEkanarASana BA ayo a jale sTale cAntarIkze gaNgAsAgarasaNgame gaNgAsAgara saNgame prA ta turaNgamaH hfdayaNgamaH BujaNgamaH ityAdi uraAdizu upapadezu qa uragaH BujagaH turagaH hfdgaH antaga ityAdi gama pu gama yaTAyaTaM BAvAdO ap jigIzoryAtrAyAm jigozoryAtrA yAm paTi amaraH dyUtaBede saNgacCa poMsni stERaM mAm BawwiH gameH karmmaviSeze upapade karttari Ka turaNgamaH hfdayaNgamaH BujaNgamaH ityAdi uraAdizu upapadezu qa uragaH BujagaH turagaH hfdgaH antaga ityAdi gama pu gama yaTAyaTaM BAvAdO ap jigozoryAtrA yAm paTi amaraH dyUtaBede gamane ca apa ryyAlocite aDvani medi sadfkpAWe hema gamyate karRRaRi ap na vfdDiH gamyamAne mArgAdO aSvasyEkAhagamaH pA tatra gamane ganDa ganDa ganDa arddane hiMsAyAm gatyAM BUzaRe ca curA A saka sewe sew ganDayate ajiganData ganDanam ganDanakzepaRasevanasAhasikyapratiyatnakaTanopayogezu ganDanakzepaRasevana sAhasikyapratiyatnakaTanopayogezu kfYaH pA ganDanaM ganDagaM hiMsanam ganDanANge upayame tu iti ca si kO ganDanANge sUcanArTe ityarTaH tena sUcanArTe pi ganDa pu ganDa pacAdyac GrARendriyagrAhye vrARendriyagrAhye pfTivIvfttO viSezaguRaBede amaraH prativeSini tri leSe sambanDe ganDake ca medi garva hemaca SoBAYjane SabdaratnA Dfzwo Gfzwo malayajo ganDaH iti smftyukte Gfzwacandane ca ganDaSca pfTivImAtrasya guRaH rUpaganDasparSavatI pfTivI pf TivI kaRA sU nuca na ca pAzARAdO ganDarasayoranupalamBAt ganDarasayo ranupalamBAt tatrAvyApakamiti vAcyam tatrApAtato tatrApA tato ganDarasayoranupalamBe pi tadIyaBasmasu tadupalamBasya tadupalaM mBasya sattvAt ya evAvayavAH pAzARAramBakAsta eva tadBasmAramBakA tadBa smAramBakA api yat dravyaM taddravyaDvaMsajanyaM pAzARopAdAnopAMdeyatvaM siDyati yad dravyaM yaddravya DvaMsajanyaM tattadupAdAnopAdeyamiti vyApteH dfzwaYcEtat KaRqapawe mahApawaDvaMsajanye itTaYca pAzARaparamARoH pfTivItvAt tajjanyasya pAzARasyApi pfTivItvaM taTA ca tasyApi ganDavattve bADakABAvaH guRagranTe ca tasya GrARa grAhyatvaMdvEviDyaYcoktaM yaTA GrARagrAhyo BavedganDo GrARasyE vopakArakaH sOraBaYcAsOraBaYca sa dviDA parikIrttitaH ganDasya pfTivyAM svABAvikatvamOpAGikatvaM veti sandihya svABAvisyEva tallakzaRatvaM kaRA sU vfttyoH sanarTitaM yaTA puzpavastrayoH sati sannikarze guRAntarAprAdrBAvo vastre ganDAnAvaliNgam vyavasTitaH pfTivyAM ganDaH sU idAnIM BUtAnAM lakzaRAni ganDAdIni parIcikzizu rganDAdInAM svABAvikatvamOpADikatvaYca vyavasTApayannAha rUparasaganDasparSA yatra kAraRaguRaprakrameRotpadyante tatra mprABAvikAH santo lakzaRavAmupayanti nAnyaTA nahi samIraRe uzalaByamAnaM sOraBaM SilAtale upalaByamAnaM SEtyaM jale upalaByamAnamOzRyaM vA lakzaRaM Bavati tadetadAha puzpavastrayoriti nahi kanakaketakIkusuma sannikfzwe vAsasi kanakaketakIsOraBamupalaByamAnaM vA sasaH nahi vAsasaH kAraRaguRaprakrameRa tadutpannam kintarhi kanakaketakIsanniDAnAdOpADikaM nahi vastre ganDABAve ketakIganDABAvo liNgam kiM liNgamata uktaM guRAntarAprAdurBAva iti guRAntarAt kAraRaguRAt aprAdurBAvo nutpattiH yadi hi vastre yo ganDa upalamyate ma tasya KABAvikaH syAttadA tadavayavezu tantuzu lakzaRamAha pfTivyAM vyavasTito Page b yogAnyAyegAByAM paricCinnaH samAnAsamAnajAtIya vyAvarttakatayA ganDolakzaRamityarTaH Bavati hi pfTivI ganDavatyeva pfTivyeva ganDavatIti tadevaM samAnajAtIyaMByo vyavahArasADyake pi tatra yadyapi vyavahAraH pfTivI padavAcyatvaM tacca pfTivItvajAtAvapyasti tatra ca pfTivItvaM heturnAstItyasADAraRyaM taTApi pfTivItvapravfttinimi ttakapfTivIpadavAcyatvaM cUrRRIkfto vA Gfzwo vA dAhakarzita eva vA rasaH sammardajo vApi prARyaNgodBava eva vA ganDaH paYcaviDaH prokto devAnAM prItidAyakaH ganDa cUrRaM ganDapatracUrRaM sumanasAM taTA praSasta ganDabuktAnAM parikIrttitaH devadArvagurubrahmasAlasArAntacandanAH piyAdInAYca yo dagDvA gfhyate dAhajo rasaH sa dAhA karzito ganDastftoyaH parikIrttitaH sa ganDaH karavI vilvaganDinItilakaM taTA praBftInAM raso yo ganDamAlinI ganDamAlinI ganDamAlinI strI ganDamAlA styasyA ini NIp mala saMSleze Rini vA ta murAnAmaganDadravye jawADaraH

viBajya hfzwAtmA pulinavanAntaropasevI svAcAraH priyaparigItaganDamAlyaH nftyan vA prahasati cAru cAlpaSabdaM ganDarvagrahaparipIqito manizyaH iti tadgrahAvizwalakzaRamuktam te pataYjalasya kApyasya ganDarva itTA padamasya rakzati ganDarvaH udakyanAM stutInAM vA DAraka AdityaH BA Satakraturatsarat ganDarvamastutam f ganDarvaH gavAM raSmInAM DarttAraM sUryam BA divyo ganDarvaH ketapUH yaju gAM vAcaM stutirUpAm DArayatIti ganDarvaH savitA vedadI gAyane viSvAvasurasi tannogfRAtu divyo ganDarvaH f divya iti viSezaRAt gAyanamAtraparatvam ata eva SabdArTaci asmin kalpe manuzyaH san puRyapAkaviSezataH ganDAtvaM samApanno martyaganDarva ucyate parvakalpakftAt puRyAt kalpAdAvasya cedBavet ganDarvatvaM tAdfSo tra divyaganDarva ucyate iti gAyanarUpaganDarvABiprAyeRa dvEviDyamuktam devayoniganDarvASca vahnipurARe ekAdaSaviDA uktA yaTA aBrAjo NGArivamBArI sUryavarcAstaTA kfDuH hastaH suhastaH svAmyeva mUrdDavAMSca mahAmanAH viSvAvasuH kfSAnuSca ganDarvEkAdaSoguRaH jawADareRa tannAmAnyanyaToktAni yaTA hAhA hUhUScitraraTo haMso viSvAvasustaTA gomAyustumbururnandirevamAdyASca te smftAH devaganDarvASca dviviDAH kecit mOneyAH kecit prADeyASca tatra mOneyAH kaSyapapatnyAM dakzasutAyAM muninAmikAyAM jAtAH zoqaSa prADeyASca prADAyAM tatpatnyAM jAtA daSa ityevaM BA A a uktA yaTA BImasenograsenO ca suparRo varuRastaTA gopatirDftarAzwraSca sUryavarcASca saptamaH satyavAgarkaparRaSca prayutaScABiviSrutaH BImaScitraraTaScEva viKyAtaH sarvavidvaSI taTA SAliSirA rAjan parjanyaSca caturdaSaH kaliH paYcadaSastezAM nAradaScEva zoqaSaH ityete devaganDarvA mOneyAH parikIrttitAH aTa praBUtAnyanyAni kIrttimizyAmi BArata anavadyAM manuM vaMSAmasurAM mArguRapriyAm anUpAM suBagAM BAsImiti prADA vyajAyata sidDaH pUrRaSca varhI ca pUrRAyuSca mahAyaSAH brahmacArI ratiguRaH suparRaScEva sattamaH viSvAvasuSca BAnuSca sucandro daSamastaTA ityete devaganDarvAH prADeyAH parikIrttitAH svArocizamanvantare tu ganDarvA arizwAyAH putrAH yaTA harivaM a arizwA tu mahAsatvAn ganDarvAnamitOjasaH ityuktvA eza manvantare tAta sargaH svArocize smftaH jAtiparatve striyAM NIp nEva devI na ganDarvI na yakzI nuca kinnarI rAmA Ara a patnyAmapi NIz ganDarvA guhyakA yakzA vibuDAna carASca ye taTEvApsarasaH sarvA rakzasezUttamA gatiH dEtyadAnavayakzARAM ganDarvoragarakzasAm manuH dvIpaBede pu BAratasyAsya varzasya nava BedAnniSAmaya indradvIpakaSerumAMstAmravarRo gaBastimAn nAgadvIpastaTA sOmyaH ganDarvastvaTa vAruRaH ayantu navamastezAM dvIpaH sAgarasaMvftaH ganDarvo devatA sya aR gAnDarva astraBede saMmohanaM nAma saKe mamAstraM prayogasaMhAraviBaktamantram gAnDarvamAdatsva yataH prayokturna cArihiMsA vijayaSca hasteraGuH vivAhaBede ca gAnDarvaH samayAnmiTaH manuH
ganDarvva ganDarvva ganDarvva pu ganDamAmodamarvati arva ac ta Saka gAH stutirUpA gItirUpA vA vAcaH raSmIn vA DAra yati Df va gorgamAdeSo vA Gowake mfgaBede kastUrI mfge antarABavasattve ca amaraH antarABavasatvastu janmamaraRayormaDyaBavaH yAtanASarIravAn guptaprARI vA ganDarvAH patayomama BA vi a sErinDrIrUpadrO padIvAkyam antarABavasattaH satvAntaramaDye AveSa kArI satvaBeda ityeva yuktam sa ca suSrute darSito yaTA aTAto mAnuzapratizeDIyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH ityupakrame devAstaTA SatrugaRASca tezAM ganDarvayakzAH pitaro BujaNgAH rakzAMsi yA cApi piSAcajAtirezo zwaDA devagaRo grahAKyaH ityazwaDA viBajya hfzwAtmA pulinavanAntaro pasevI svAcAraH priyaparigItaganDamAlyaH nftyan vA prahasati cAru cAlpaSabdaM ganDarvagrahaparipIqito manuzyaH iti tadgrahAvizwalakzaRamuktam te pataYjalasya kApyasya gfhAnEma tasyAsIdduhitA ganDarvagfhItA Sata brA ganDarveRAmAnuzeRa gfhItAM AvizwA BA eraRqe BAvapra ganDarvatElasidDAM haritakIM go mbunA pibet asya vyAKyAyAM ganDarvatElameraRqatElam tadukteH tasya ca ganDarvarUpamfgaBedapAdatulyapatnakatvAtta TAtvam gAyanamAtre tri medi devagAyane devayoni Bede pu amaraH tatrASve raTaM saMyojayAmAsurganDarvErhema mAliBiH BA va a gAvaH raSmayaH vfzwyudakAni vA DArayati gavi upapade Df va gergamAdeSaH iti tA brA BAzye mADovokteH raSmiDArake somA dityAdO ganDarvo sya rasanAmagfBnAt f ganDarvaH somaH BA UrdDve ganDarvo aDinAke asTAt f ganDarvo raSmInAM DArakaH BA ganDarva itTA padamasya rakzati ganDarvaH udakAnAM Page a stutInAM vA DAraka AdityaH BA Satakraturatsarat ganDarvamastutam f ganDarvaH gavAM raSmInAM DarttAraM sUryyam BA divyo ganDarvaH ketapUH yaju gAM vAcaM stutirUpAm DArayatIti ganDarvaH savitA vedadI gAyane viSvAvasurasi tannogfRAtu divyo ganDarvaH f divya iti viSezaRAt gAyana mAtraparatvam ata eva SabdArTaci asmin kalpe manuzyaH san puRyapAkaviSezataH ganDarvatvaM samApanno martyaganDarva ucyate pUrvakalpakftAt puRyAt kalpAdAvasya cedBavet ganDarvatvaM tAdfSo tra divyaganDarva ucyate iti gAyanarUpaganDarvABiprAyeRa dvEviDyamuktam devayoni ganDarvASca vahnipurARe ekAdaSaviDA uktA yaTA aBrAjo NGArivamBArI sUryyavarcAstaTA kfDuH hastaH suhastaH svAmyeva mUrdDavAMSca mahAmanAH viSvAvasuH kfSAnuSca ganDarvEkAdaSogaRaH jawADareRa tannAmAnyanyaToktAni yaTA hAhA hUhU ScitraraTo haMso viSvAvasustaTA gomAyustumburu rnandirevamAdyAScate smftAH devaganDarvvASca dviviDAH kecit mOneyAH kecit prADeyASca tatra mOneyAH kaSya papatnyAM dakzasutAyAM muninAmikAyAM jAtAH zoqaSa prADe yASca prADAyAM tatpatnyAM jAtA daSa ityevaM BA A a uktA yaTA BImasenograsenO ca suparRo varuRastaTA gopatirDftarAzwraSca sUryyavarccASca saptamaH satyavAgarkaparRaSca prayutaScABiviSrutaH BImaScitraraTaScEva viKyAtaH sarva vidvaSI taTA SAliSirA rAjan parjanyaSca caturdaSaH kaliH paYcAdaSastezAM nAradaScEva zoqaSaH ityete deva ganDarvA mOneyAH parikIrttitAH aTa praBUtAnyanyAni kIrttamizyAmi BArata anavadyAM manuM vaMSAmasurAM mArgaRapriyAm anUpAM suBagAM BAsImiti prADA vya jAyata sidDaH pUrRaSca varhI ca pUrRAyuSca mahAyaSAH brahmacArI ratiguRaH suparRaScEva sattamaH viSvAvasuSca BA nuSca sucandro daSamastaTA ityete devaganDarvAH prADeyAH parikIrttitAH svArocizamanvantare tu gabDarvA ari zWAyAH putrAH yaTA harivaM a arizwA tu mahA satvAn ganDarvAnamitOjasaH ityuktvA eza manvantare tAta sargaH svArocize smftaH jAtiparatve striyAM NIp nEva devI na ganDarvI na yakzI na ca kinnarI rAmA Ara a patnyAmapi NIz ganDarvA guhyakA Page b yakzA vibuDAnucarASca ve taTEvApsarasaH sarvA rAkzasezU ttamA gatiH dEtyadAnavayakzARAM ganDarvoragarakzasAm manuH dvIpaBede pu BAratasyAsya varzasya nava BedAnni SAmaya indradvIpakaSerumA stAmravarRo gaBastrimAn nAgadvIpastaTA sOmyaH ganDarvastvaTa vAruRaH ayantu nava mastezAM dvIpaH sAgarasaMvftaH ganDarvo devatA sya aR gAnDarva astraBede saMmohanaM nAma saKe mamAstraM prayogasaMhAraviBaktamantram gAnDarvamAdatsva yataH prayo kturna cArihiMsA vijayaSca haste raGuH vivAhaBede ca gAnDarvaH samayAnmiTaH manuH
ganDatUrya ganDatUrya ganDatUrya na ganDe hiMsAsTAne raRe tUryam raRavAdyaBede Sabdara
ganDatUryya ganDatUryya ganDatUryya na ganDe hiMsAsTAne raRe tUryyam raRavAdyaBede Sabdara
ganDatvac ganDatvac ganDatvac na ganDapraDAnA tvak yasya elavAluke rAjani
ganDatvaca ganDatvaca ganDatvaca na ganDapraDAnA tvak yasya elavAluke rAjani
ganDikA ganDikA ganDikA strI purIBede sA Bijano sya sinDvA aR gAndika pitrAdikrameRa tatra vAsini
ganDiparRRa ganDiparRRa ganDiparRRa pu ganDi ganDayuktaM parRRamasya saptacCade rAjani ganDipatrAdayo pyatra
ganDiparRa ganDiparRa ganDiparRa pu ganDi ganDayuktaM parRamasya saptacCade rAjani ganDipatrAdayo pyatra
ganDo ganDo ganDo nDO tu pu ganDapraDAna otuH vA vfdDiH KawwAse jantuBede trikA

gandikA gandikA gandikA strI purIBede sA Bijano sya sinDvA aR gAdika pitrAdikrameRa tatravAsini
gaqa gaqa gaqa seke BvA para saka sew gaqati agAqIt agaqIt jagAqa GawA gaqayati te gaqa vadanEkadeSe gaRqavyApAre idit BvA para aka sew gaRqati agaRqIt jagaRqaH gaRqaH gaRqUzaH gaqa pu gaqa seke ac gaqui garaDnInAmake matsyaBede garaGnonAmake matsya Bede garaGnI maDurA tiktA tuvarA vAtapittahft kaPaGnI rucikflaDvI dopanI balavIryakft BAva pra rucikfllavvI dIpanI balavIryyakft BAvapra tasya pAkaviSeze guRA uktA vEdyake pucCaSIrzeRa pucCa SIrzeRa rahitAH kAsamarddavimardditAH hiNgutEle ca saMtaptA gaqamasyasya KaRqakAH gaqo vataharI vAtaharI balyo vfzyaH paTyo gnivardDanaH surucyaH Sukrado tyaryaM tyarTaM kiYcit kaPakaraH saraH antarAye medi pariKAyAM vyavaDAne vya vaDAne Sabdara deSaBede SAmbare rAjani gaqasaMjYAyAM gaqa saMjYAyAM kvun gaqaka gaqui matsyaBede amaraH gaqa seke BvA para saka sew gaqati agAqIt agaqIt jagAqa GawA gaqayati te gaqa vadanEkadeSe gaRqavyApAre idit BvA para aka sew gaRqati agaRqIt jagaRqaH gaRqaH gaRqUzaH gaqa pu gaqa seke ac gaqui garaGnonAmake matsya Bede garaGnI maDurA tiktA tuvarA vAtapittahft kaPaGnI rucikfllavvI dIpanI balavIryyakft BAvapra tasya pAkaviSeze guRA uktA vEdyake pucCa SIrzeRa rahitAH kAsamarddavimardditAH hiNgutEle ca saMtaptA gaqamasyasya KaRqakAH gaqo vAtaharI balyo vfzyaH paTyo gnivardDanaH surucyaH Sukrado tyarTaM kiYcit kaPakaraH saraH antarAye medi pariKAyAM vya vaDAne Sabdara deSaBede SAmbare rAjani gaqa saMjYAyAM kvun gaqaka gaqui matsyaBede amaraH
gaqaqara gaqaqara gaqaqara la pu gaqa bA qara qala vA qasya nettvam meze
gaqqaka gaqqaka gaqqaka pu gaquka pfzo BfNgAre jalapAtraBede Sabdara pfzo dIrGamaDyo pi tatrArTe

garBANga garBANga ga rBe rBANga pu garBe aNkamaDye NkaH vA aluksa aNkodarapravizwo yo raNgadvArA muKAdimAn aNko paraH sa garBe rBA NkaH sabIjaH PalavAnapi sA da ukte nAwakANgANkamaDyapravizwANke yaTA bAlarAmAyaRe sItAsvayaMvaranAmA ga rBe rBANkaH

garBaBarman garBaBarman garBaBarman na garBasya SiSoH Barma BaraRaM Bf BAve manin kumAraBftyAkarmaRi tadviDAnAdi suSrutoktaM kumAraBftyASabde darSitam kumAraBftyAkuSalEranuzWite BizagBirAptEraTa garBaBarmaRi raGuH

garBiRIdohada garBiRIdohada garBiRIdohada na ta garBiRyAkANkzite dravyaBede tasya dAnAvaSyakatA suSrute uktA tacca caturTe yABi prAyamindriyArTezu karotItyAdi vAkyaM pf uktaM indrivArTAMstu yAn yAn sA BoktumicCati garBiRI suSrutaH

garba garba garba gatO BvA para saka sew garbati agarbIt jagarba garba darpe ada curA Atma aka sew garbayate ajagarbata garbaH garbitaH tadagrasAragarbitakfzRasAramraGuH tadagrasAragarbitakfzRasAram raGuH garba pu garba darpe BAve ac ahaNkAre amaraH garba gatO BvA para saka sew garbati agarbIt jagarba garba darpe ada curA Atma aka sew garbayate ajagarbata garbaH garbitaH tadagrasAragarbitakfzRasAram raGuH garba pu garba darpe BAve ac ahaNkAre amaraH
gardDa gardDa gardDa lipsAyAM lipsAyA curA uBa saka sew gardDayati te ajagardDat ta ajaga Page b rdDat ta gardDayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre gardDaH gardDA gardDanaH gardDa pu gfDa GaY ac vA atiSayaspfhAyAM hemaca gardDaBARqadra me ca Sabdaca gardDa lipsAyA curA uBa saka sew gardDayati ta ajaga Page b rdDat ta gardDayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre gardDaH gardDA gardDanaH gardDa pu gfDa GaY ac vA atiSayaspfhAyAM hemaca gardDaBARqadra me ca Sabdaca
gardaBI gardaBI gardaBI strI garda aBac gOrA NIz agniprakftike kIwaBede suSru kIwaSabde vivftiH svArTe ka gardaBikAroge saMjYAyAM kan aparAjitAyAm SvetakaRwakAryAM kawaByAYca rAjani garddaBa jAtO striyAM NIz gardaBajAtistriyAYcatatkzIrAdiguRAH balyaM vAtaSvAsaharaM maDurAmlaM ca gArdaBam payo rUkzaM dIpanaYca supaTyaM parikIrttitam gArdaBaM daDi rUkzozRaM laGu dIpanamucyate pAcanaM maDurAmlaYca rucikft vAtadozahft gArdaBaM navanItaM ca kazAyaM kaPavAtahft balyaYca dIpanaM pAke laGUzRaM mUtradozakft rAjani
gardaBo gardaBo gardaBo strI garda aBac gOrA NIz agniprakftike kIwa Bede suSru kIwaSabde pf vivftiH svArTe ka gardaBi kAroge saMjYAyAM kan aparAjitAyAm SvetakaRwakAryyAM kawaByAYca rAjani garddaBa jAtO striyAM NIz gardaBajAtistriyAYca tatkzIrAdiguRAH balyaM vAtaSvAsa haraM maDurAmlaM ca gArdaBam payo rUkzaM dIpanaYca supaTyaM parikIrttitam gArdaBaM daDi rUkzozRaM laGu dIpananu cyate pAcanaM maDurAmlaYca rucikft vAtadozahft gArdaBaM navanItaM ca kazAyaM kaPavAtahft balyaYca dIpanaM pAke laGUzRaM mUtradozakft rAjani
gargasrItam gargasrItam gargasrItam na bA va prasidDe sarasvatItIrTasTetIrTaBede tasmAdgAnDarvatIrTAcca mahAbAhurarindamaH gargasroto mahAtIrTamAjagAmEkakuRqalI balaBadraH yatra gargeRa vfdDena tapasA BAvitAtmanA kAlajYAnagatiScEva jyotizAYca vyatikramaH utpAtA dAruRAScEva SuBASca janamejaya sarasvatyAH SuBe tIrTe viditA vE mahAtmanA tasya nAmnA ca tattIrTaM gargasrota iti smftam tatra garga mahABAgamfzayaH suvratA nfpa upAsAYcakrire nityaM kAlajYAnaM prati praBo BA Sa a
gargasrotas gargasrotas gargasrotas na BA va prasidDe sarasvatIrTasTetIrTaBede ta smAdgAnDarvatIrTAcca mahAbAhurarindamaH gargasroto mahAtIrTamAjagAmEkakuRqalI balaBadraH yatra gargeRa vfdDena tapasA BAvitAtmanA kAlajYAnagatiScEva jyo tizAYca vyatikramaH utpAtA dAruRAScEva SuBASca janamejaya sarasvatyAH SuBe tIrTe viditA vE mahA tmanA tasya nAmnA ca tattIrTaM gargasrota iti smftam tatra garga mahABAgamfzayaH suvratA nfpa upAsAYca krire nityaM kAlajYAnaM prati praBo BA Sa a
garha garha garha nindAyAM vA curA pakze BvA AtmA Atma saka sew garhayate garhate ajagarhata agarhizwa garhayAYcakre jagarheH garhahaRA jagarheHgarhahaRA na garhayeyurasmAn vE pARqavArTAya karhicit BA A Slo garhayanto sya sAhasam BA va a padavyatyayayaH padavyatyaya ArzaH upasargaparvakastu upasargapUrvakastu taddyotyArTayukte nindane vigarhitaM DarmaDanErnivarhaRam DarmmaDanErnivarhaRam nEza garha kutsAyAM BvA A saka sew garhate agarhizwajagarha agarhizwa jagarha garhaRam garhitaH garhA sa eva Darmo Darmmo rAjYAM tu tadvitaM kinnu garhaRam BA A a kecidBIzmaM keci dBIzmaM jagarhira BA sa a na kutsayAmyahaM kiYcinna garhe balavattaram ra a vizamAM ca daSAM prApto devAn garhati vE BfSam a ArzaH padavyanyayaH padavya yayaH garhitAnnasya jagviHmanuH jagviH manuH garha nindAyAM vA curA pakze BvA Atma saka sew garhayate garhate ajagarhata agarhizwa garhayAYcakre jagarheHgarhahaRA na garhayeyurasmAn vE pARqavArTAya karhicit BA A Slo garhayanto sya sAhasam BA va a padavyatyaya ArzaH upasargapUrvakastu taddyotyArTayukte nindane vigarhitaM DarmmaDanErnivarhaRam nEza garha kutsAyAM BvA A saka sew garhate agarhizwa jagarha garhaRam garhitaH garhA sa eva Darmmo rAjYAM tu tadvitaM kinnu garhaRam BA A a keci dBIzmaM jagarhira BA sa a na kutsayAmyahaM kiYcinna garhe balavattaram ra a vizamAM ca daSAM prApto devAn garhati vE BfSam a ArzaH padavya yayaH garhitAnnasya jagviH manuH
garjAPala garjAPala garjAPala pu garjayA Palati Pala ac ta vikaNkawa vfkze rAjani
garja garja garja pu garja BAve GaY hastiSabde meGAdiSabde ca gurumattvAt sewktatvAcca BAve a striyAm garjA meGAriDvanO strI gaRqUzagarjajAgaraBujakIlajvAla varttakavrIqAH utkaRWasaWabarAwakaraBasAH strItve tu wAbantAH trikA

garji garji garji pu garja BAve in meGaSabde hema
garjita garjita garjita na garja BAve kta meGAdiDvanO karttari ktaH Page a mattagaje amaraH garjanakarttari meGAdO tri sa nDyAyAM garjite meGe SAstracintAM karoti yaH smftiH garjo jAto sya tAra itac jAtagarjane tri
garjjAPala garjjAPala garjjAPala pu garjayA Palati Pala ac ta vikaNkadavfkze rAjani
garjja garjja garjja UrjAhetukaSabde UrjjAhetukaSabde BvA para zara aka sew garjati garjjati agarjIt jagarja garjitam garjanaM garjaH garjan garjA garjjA garja garjakzaRaM mUQeti devImAhAtmyam Saradi garjati na varzati varzati varzAsu niHsvano meGaH udBawaH kumBakarRastato kumBakarRa stato garjIt garjan garjjan hariH sAmBasi SElakuYje BawwiH yoDAnAM cEva garjatAm BA Page b BI Slo nAma saMSrAvayAmAsa jagarja ca nanAda ca rAmA su SIlArTe cAnaS garjamAnaH taTAtra garjamAne tu meGadunduBinisvanam BA A a sanDyayAM garjite meGe SAstracintAM karoti yaH catvAri tasya naSyanti AyurvidyAyaSobalam AyurvidyAyaSo balam smftiH mAGAdicaturo mADAdicaturo mAsAn garjamAtraM vivarjayet smftiH anu garganapratirUpagarjane anugarjitasandigDAH karaRErmurajasvanA karaRE rmurajasvanA kumA anurUpagarjane ca so nugarjan DanuzpARiH BA dro a aBi aBilakzya garjane saka duHSAsanastAmaBigarjamAnaH duHSAsanastAmaBigarja mAnaH BA sa a tAcCIlye cAnaS SArdUlAviva cAnanyonyamAmizArTe ByagarjatAm BA dro a samyaggarjane samya ggarjane aka SUrARAYcABigarjatAm BA ka a prati pratirUpagarjane aka balavaccApi valavaccApi saMkrudDAvanyonyaM pratigarjatAm BA vi a ArzaH padavyatyayaH pratIpaM patato mattAn kuYjarAn pratigarjataH BA u a suhfdayohfdayaH pratigarjatAm raGuH pratilakzyIkftya garjane saka fzIRAM kadanaM kftvA nAmApi nAmapi pratigarjati harivaM a garjja rave curA uBa aka sew garjayati garjjayati te ajagarjat ajaga rjat ta garjayAM baBUva baBUba Asa cakAra cakre garjayat garjayamAnaH pu garja BAve GaY hastiSabde meGAdiSabde ca gurumattvAt sewktatvAcca BAve a striyAm garjA meGAriDvanO strI guRqUzagarjajAgaraBujakIlajvAlavarttakavrIqAH utkaRWasaWavarAwakaraBasAH strItve tu wAbantAH trikA garjja UrjjAhetukaSabde BvA zara aka sew garjjati agarjIt jagarja garjitam garjanaM garjaH garjan garjjA garja garjakzaRaM mUQeti devImAhAtmyam Saradi garjati na varzati varzati varzAsu niHsvano meGaH udBawaH kumBakarRa stato garjIt garjjan hariH sAmBasi SElakuYje BawwiH yoDAnAM cEva garjatAm BA Page b BI Slo nAma saMSrAvayAmAsa jagarja ca nanAda ca rAmA su SIlArTe cAnaS garjamAnaH taTAtra garjamAne tu meGadunduBinisvanam BA A a sanDyayAM garjite meGe SAstracintAM karoti yaH catvAri tasya naSyanti AyurvidyAyaSo balam smftiH mADAdicaturo mAsAn garjamAtraM vivarjayet smftiH anu garganapratirUpagarjane anugarjitasandigDAH karaRE rmurajasvanA kumA anurUpagarjane ca so nugarjan DanuzpARiH BA dro a aBi aBilakzya garjane saka duHSAsanastAmaBigarja mAnaH BA sa a tAcCIlye cAnaS SArdUlAviva cAnanyonyamAmizArTe ByagarjatAm BA dro a samya ggarjane aka SUrARAYcABigarjatAm BA ka a prati pratirUpagarjane aka valavaccApi saMkrudDAvanyonyaM pratigarjatAm BA vi a ArzaH padavyatyayaH pratIpaM patato mattAn kuYjarAn pratigarjataH BA u a suhfdayohfdayaH pratigarjatAm raGuH pratilakzyIkftya garjane saka fzIRAM kadanaM kftvA nAmapi pratigarjati harivaM a garjja rave curA uBa aka sew garjjayati te ajaga rjat ta garjayAM baBUba Asa cakAra cakre garjayat garjayamAnaH
garjji garjji garjji pu garja BAve in meGaSabde hema
garjjita garjjita garjjita na garja BAve kta meGAdiDvanO kartari ktaH mattagaje amaraH garjanakarttari meGAdO tri sanDyAyAM garjite meDe SAstracintAM karoti yaH smftiH garjo jAto sya tAra itac jAtagarjane tri
garmmut garmmut garmmut strI gF bA uti muw caM mequyA DAnyaBede amaraH naqe tfRaBeda svarRe ca medi
garmut garmut garmut strI gF bA uti suw ca mequyA DAnyaBede amaraH naqe tfRaBede KarRe ca medi
garuqottIrRRa garuqottIrRRa garuqottIrRRa pu garuqo varRRenottIrRaH atikrAnto yena marakatamaRO rAjani
garuqottIrRa garuqottIrRa garuqottIrRa pu garuqo varRenottIrRaH atikrAnto yena marakatamaRO rAjani
gatADvan gatADvan gatADvan tri gataH aDvA yena gatamArge jYAtatattve ca gatADvA cCinnasaMSayaH BA SA a striyAM qAbuBAByAmatyatarasyAm pA vA qAp sA ca caturdaSIyuktAmAvAsyAyAM KarvitASabde karmapradIpavAkyaM dfSyam amAvAsyAM kurvIta candre dfSyamAne pyekadA gatADvA BavatIti gopaTabrA
gatADvat gatADvat gatADvat tri gataH aDvA yena gatamArge jYAtatattve ca gatADvA cCinnasaMSayaH BA SA a striyAM qAbuBA ByAmatyatarasyAm pA vA qAp sA ca caturdaSIyuktA mAvAsyAyAM KarvitASabde pf karmmapradIpavAkyaM dfSyam amAvAsyAM kurvvIta candre dfSyamAne pyekadA gatADvA BavatIti gopaTabrA
gatAyus gatAyus gatAyus tri gataM gataprAyamAyurjIvanakAlo sya prAptacaramakAle gatAyurlakzaRaM suSrutenoktaM yaTA SarIraSIlayoryasya prakftervikftirBavet tasyArizwaM samAsena vyAsatastu niboDa me SfRoti viviDAn SabdAn yo divyAnAmaBAvataH samudrapUrameGAnAmasampattO ca niHsvanAn tAn svanAnnAvagfhRAti manyate cAnyaSabdavat grAmyAraRyasvanAMScApi viparItAn SfRotyapi dvizacCabdezu ramate suhfcCabdezu kupyati na SIRoti ca yo kasmAttaM bruvanti gatAyuzam yastUzRamiva gfhRAti SItamuzRaYca SItavat saYjAtaSItapiqako yaSca dAhena pIqyate uzRagAtro timAtraYca yaH SItena pravepate prahArAnnABijAnAti yo NgacCedamaTApi vA pAMSunevAvakIrRAni yaSca gAtrARi manyate varRAnyaBAvarAjyo vA yasya gAtre Bavanti hi snAtAnuliptaM yaYcApi Bajante nIlamakzikAH suganDirvAti yo kasmAttaM bruvanti gatAyuzam viparItena gfhRAti rasAn yaScopayojitAn upayuktAH kramAdyasya rasAdozABivfdDaye yasya dozAgnisAmyaYca kuryurmiTyopayojitAH yo vA rasAnna saMvetti gatAsuM taM pracakzate suganDiM vetti durganDaM durganDasya suganDitAm gfhRIte yo nyaTA ganDaM SAnte dIpe ca nIrujaH yo vA ganDAnna jAnAti gatAsuM taM vinirdiSet dvandvAnyuzRahimAdIni kAlAvasTA diSastaTA viparItena gfhRAti BAvAnanyAMSca yo naraH divAjyotIMzi yaScApi jvalitAnIya paSyati rAtrO sUryaM jvalantaM vA divA vA candravarcasam ameGopaplave yaSca SakracApataqidguRAn taqitvato sitAn yo vA nirmale gagane GanAn vimAnayAnaprAsAdEryaSca saNkulamambaram yaScAnilaM mUrttimantamantarIkzaYca paSyati DUmanIhAravAsoBirAvftAmiva medinIm pradIptamiva lokaYca yo vA plutamivAmBasA BUmimazwApadAkArAM leKABiryaSca paSyati na paSyati sanakzatrAM yaSca devImarunDatIm DruvamAkASagaNgAM vA taM vadanti gatAyuzam jyotsnAdarpaRatoyezu CAyAM yaSca na paSyati paSyatyekANgahInAM vA vikftAM vA nyasatvajAm SvakAkakaNkagfDrARAM pretAnAM yakzarakzasAm piSAcoraganAgAnAM BUtAnAM vikftAmapi yo vA mayUrakaRWABaM viDUmaM vahnimIkzate Aturasya BavenmftyuH svasTo vyADimavApnuyAt aDikaM kAlacihnaSabde uktam
gatAyusa gatAyusa gatAyusa tri gataM gataprAyamAyurjIvanakAlo sya prApta caramakAle gatAyurlakzaRaM suSrutenoktaM yaTA SarIraSIlayoryasya prakftervvikftirBavet tasyArizwaM sa mAsena vyAsatastu niboDa me SfRoti viviDAn SabdAn yo divyAnAmaBAvataH samudrapUrameGAnAma sampattO ca niHsvanAn tAn svanAnnAvagfhRAti manyate cAnyaSabdavat grAmyAraRyasvanAMScApi viparItAn SfRotyapi dvizacCabdezu ramate suhfcCabdezu kupyati na SfRoti ca yo kasmAttaM bruvanti gatAyuzam yastUzRa miva gfhlAti SIta muzRaYca SItavat saYjAtaSItapiqako yaSca dAhena pIqyate uzRagAtro timAtraYca yaH SItena pravepate prahArAnnABijAnAti yo NgacCedamaTApi vA pAMSunevAvakIrRAni yaSca gAtrARi manyate varRRAnya BAvarAjyo vA yasya gAtre Bavanti hi snAtAnu liptaM yaYcApi Bajante nIlamakzikAH suganDirvAti yo kasmAttaM bruvanti gatAyuzam viparItena gfhRAti rasAn yaScopayojitAn upayuktAH kramAdyasya rasA Page b dozABivfdDaye yasya dozAgnisAmyaYca kurTyurmmiTyopa yojitAH yo vA rasAnna saMvetti gatAsuM taM praca kzate suganDiM vetti durganDaM durganDasya suganDitAm gfhRIte yo nyaTA ganDaM SAnte dIpe ca nIrujaH yo vA ganDAnna jAnAti gatAsuM taM vinirdiSet dvandvA nyuzRahimAdIni kAlAvasTA diSastaTA viparItena gfhRAti BAvAnanyAMSca yo naraH divAjyotIMzi yaScApi jvalitAnIva paSyati rAtrO sUryyaM jvalantaM vA divA vA candravarcasam ameGopaplave yaSca SakracApa taqidguRAn taqitvato sitAn yo vA nirmale gagane GanAn vimAnayAnaprAsAdEryaSca saNkulamambaram yaScA nilaM mUrttimantamantarIkzaYca paSyati DUmanIhAravAso BirAvftAmiva medinIm pradIptamiba lokaYca yo vA plutamivAmBasA BUmiBazwApadAkArAM leKABiryyaSca paSyati na paSyati sanakzatrAM yaSca devImarunDatIm DruvamAkASagaNgAM vA taM vadanti gatAyuzam jyotsnA darpaRatoyezu CAyAM yaSca na paSyati paSyatyekANga hInAM vA vikftAM vA nyasatvajAm SvakAkakaNkagfDrARAM pretAnAM yakzarakzasAm piSAcoraganAgAnAM BUtAnAM vikftAmapi yo vA mayUrakaRWABaM viDUmaM vahnimI kzate Aturasya BavenmftyuH svasTo vyADimavApnuyAt aDikaM kAlacihnaSabde pf uktam
gataspfha gataspfha gataspfha tri gatA spfhA asya nivfttatarze gataspfho pyAgamanaprayojanam mAGaH
gataspfhf gataspfhf gataspfhf tri gatA spfhA asya nivfttatarze gataspfho pyAgamanaprayojanam mAGaH
gavAhnikA gavAhnikA gavAhnikA na ahni BavaM dinaBakzaRAya paryAptam ahan zWak Ahnikam ta gordinaBakzaRaparyAptaGAsAdOniruddegastu yo dadyAt mAsamekaM gavAhnikam ekaBaktaM taTASnIyAt SrUyatAM tasya yat Palam imAgAvo mahABAgAH pavitraM paramaM smftAH trIn lokAn DArayanti sma sa devAsuramAnuzAn tAsu cEva mahApuRyaM SuSrUzA ca mahAPalA ahanyahani DarmeRa yujyate vE gavAhnike BA Anu a gavAhnikaM devapUjA vedAByAsaH saritplavaH nASayantyASu pApAni mahApAtakajAnyapi A ta yamaH gavAhnikaM gordinaBakzyam A ta raGunandanaH
gavAhnika gavAhnika gavAhnika na ahni BavaM dinaBakzaRAya paryyAptam ahan Wak Ahnikam ta gordinaBakzaRaparyyAptaGAsAdO nirudvegastu yo dadyAt mAsamekaM gavAhnikam ekaBaktaM taTASnIyAt SrUyatAM tasya yat Palam igA pApI mahABAgAH pavitraM Page b paramaM smftAH trIn lokAn DArayanti sma sadevAsura mAnuzAn tAsu cEva mahApuRyaM SuSrUzA ca mahAPalA ahanyahani DarmeRa yujyate vE gavAhnike BA Anu a gavAhnikaM devapUjA vedAByAsaH saritplavaH nASayantyASu pApAni mahApAtakajAnyapi A ta yamaH gavAhnikaM gordinaBakzyam A ta raGunandanaH
gavISvara gavISvara gavI ve Svara ta vA avaN gosvAmini amaraH
gavOsvara gavOsvara gavO ve svara ta vA avaN gosvAmini amaraH
gavya gavya gavya Atmano gAmicCati kyac vAnto yi pratyaye pA av AtmasambanDitvena goricCAyAm aka BvA para sew gavyati agavyIt agavIt gavyA vA m cakAragOrasi cakAra gOrasi vIra gavyate f gavya tri gorvikAraH gavi BavaM gorhitaM goridaM vA sarvatra yat yAdO av gosambanDini gavyasatrake jE aDikara mA saratramarDya BA saratnamarGyaM maDumacca gavyam kumA saMvatsaraM tu gavyena payasA pAyasena vA SeluM gavyaYca peyUzaM prayatnena vivarjayet praya tnena vivarjjayet manuH gorhitAdO ca gavi izO netre vA sADu yat jyAyAM rAgadravye ca na medi jyAyAH SarakzepaRasADanatvAt SarakzepaRasADanatvAn rAgadravyasya ca netrarAgajanakatvAttaTAtvam gorvikAre netrarAgajana katvAttaTAtvam gervikAre gorocanAdravye strI rAjani tasya gorvikAratvAttaTAtvam tatra jyAyAm Page a SravaRopAntikanIyamAnagavyam mAGaH samUhe pASA yat gosamUhe gavyUtO kroSayuge ca strI hemaca gavya Atmano gAmicCati kyac vAnto yi pratyaye pA av AtmasambanDitvena goricCAyAm aka BvA para sew gavyati agavyIt agavIt gavyA vA m cakAra gOrasi vIra gavyate f gavya tri gorvikAraH gavi BavaM gorhitaM goridaM vA sarvatra yat yAdO av gosambanDini gavyasatrake jE aDikara BA saratnamarGyaM maDumacca gavyam kumA saMvatsaraM tu gavyena payasA pAyasena vA SeluM gavyaYca peyUzaM praya tnena vivarjjayet manuH gorhitAdO ca gavi izO netre vA sADu yat jyAyAM rAgadravye ca na medi jyAyAH SarakzepaRasADanatvAn rAgadravyasya ca netrarAgajana katvAttaTAtvam gervikAre gorocanAdravye strI rAjani tasya gorvikAratvAttaTAtvam tatra jyAyAm Page a SravaRopAntikanIyamAnagavyam mAGaH samUhe pASA yat gosamUhe gavyUtO kroSayuge ca strI hemaca
gfhAmlA gfhAmlA gfhAmlA na gfhasTitamamlam kAYjike AmAni trikA
gfhAmla gfhAmla gfhAmla na gfhasTitamamlam kAYjike AmAni trikA
gfhaBartta gfhaBartta gfhaBartta tri ta gfhasvAmini gfhaBartustattulye vde pIqAmaNge prayacCanti vf sa a striyAM NIp
gfhaBarttf gfhaBarttf gfhaBarttf tri ta gfhasvAmini gfhaBartustattulye bde pIqAmaNge prayacCanti bf sa a striyAM NIp
gfhacUlI gfhacUlI gfhacUlI strI parvApare tu SAle gfhacUlI dakziRottare kAcam bf sa ukte dviSAle gfhaBede
gfhacUllI gfhacUllI gfhacUllI strI pUrvApare tu SAle gfhacUllI dakziRIttare kA cam vf sa ukte dviSAle gfhaBede
gfhenarddin gfhenarddin gfhenarddin pu gfhe eva narddati na yudDe narda ini pAtre samitAdisa kApuruze raRaBIrO gfhe AsPAlayitari
gfhenirddin gfhenirddin gfhenirddin pu gfhe eva narddati na yudDe narda ini pAtresamitAdisa kApuruze raRaBIrO gfhe AsPAlayitari
gfherudva gfherudva gfherudva pu gfhe rohati ruha ka aluk ta gfhajAtavfkze sa cApraSastaH yaTAha BA Anu a BinnaBARqaYca KawwAYca kukkuwaM SunakaM taTA apraSastAni sarvARi yaSca vfkzo gfheruhaH
gfheruha gfheruha gfheruha pu gfhe rohati ruha ka aluk ta gfhajAta vfkze sa cApraSastaH yaTAha BA Anu a Binna BARqaYca KawwAYca kukkuwaM SunakaM taTA apaSastAni sarvARi yaSca vfkzo gfheruhaH
gfja gfja gfja DvanO BvA para aka sew garjati agarjIt jagarja garja garjakzaRaM mUQa devomA devImA garjan hariH sAmBasi SElakuYje BawwiH BAve gfjyate agarji gfja DvanO BvA para aka sew idit gfYjati agfYjIt jagfYja jaBfYja gfYjanam BAve gfYjyate agfYji gfja DvanO BvA para aka sew garjati agarjIt jagarja garja garjakzaRaM mUQa devImA garjan hariH sAmBasi SElakuYje BawwiH BAve gfjyate agarji gfja DvanO BvA para aka sew idit gfYjati agfYjIt jaBfYja gfYjanam BAve gfYjyate agfYji
gftmamada gftmamada gftmamada pu SOnakaSotrapravare sunahotrasya putraBede sunahotrasya dAyAdAstrayaH paramaDArmikAH kASaH SAlmaSca dvAvetO taTA gftsamadaH praBuH hariva a SunakAnAM gftsamadeti tripravaraM vA BArgavasOnahotragArtsamadeti ASva SrO fzwirdatsamadonAma Sakrasya dayitaH saKA BA Anu a sa ca fgvedinAM ratapoRIyarziBedaH aTarvizayaH Satarcino maDyamA gftsamado viSvAmitro vAmadevo trirBaradvAjovaSizWaH iti ASva gfhya sU vItahavyo mahArAja brahmavAditvameva ca tasya gftsamadaH putro rUpeRendra ivAparaH Sakrastvamiti yo dEtyErnigfhItaH kilABavat fgvede varttate cAgryA Srutiryasya mahAtmanaH yatra gftsamado brahman brAhmaREH sa mahIyate sa brahmacArI viprarziH SrImAn gftsamado Bavat Anu a ukte vItahavyaputre fziBede ca
gftsamada gftsamada gftsamada pu SOnakagotrapravare sunahotrasya putraBede sunahotrasya dAyAdAstrayaH paramaDArmikAH kASaH SAl maSca dvAvetO taTA gftsamadaH praBuH hariva a SunakAnAM gftsamadeti tripravaraM vA BArgavasOnahotra gArtsamadeti ASva SrO kfzirgftsama Page a donAma Sakrasya dayitaH saKA BA Anu a sa ca fgvedinAM tarpaRIyarziBedaH aTarzizayaH Sata rcino maDyamA gftsamado viSvAmitro vAmadevo trirBa radvAjovaSizWaH iti ASva gfhya sU vItahavyo mahArAja brahmavAditvameva ca tasya gftsamadaH putro rUpeRendra ivAparaH Sakrastvamiti yo dEtyErnigfhItaH kilABavat fgvede varttate cAgryA Srutiryasya mahA tmanaH yatra gftsamado brahman brAhmaREH sa mahIyate sa brahmacArI viprarziH SrImAn gftsamado Bavat Anu a ukte vItahavyaputre fziBede ca
gijarI gijarI gija rja rI strI rAgiRIBede tatsvarUpaM saNgItadA uktaM yaTA SyAmA sukeSI malayadrumARAM mfdUlasatpallavatalpayAtA SruteH svarARAM daDatI viBAgaM tantromuKAt dakziRagurja jja rIMyam kAlaBede tasyA gAnaM nizidDaM tatrEva nAwI gOqI varAwI ca gujja rja rI deSireva ca parvAhRe gAnametezAM nizidDamiti tadvidaH rAgaBede ca gujja rjarIrAgEkatAlItAlena gIyate gItago
girikarRI girikarRI girikarRI strI girerbAlamUzikAyAH karRa iva karRaH patramasyAH NIp aparAjitAlatAyAm amaraH triPalA girikarRI ca haMsapAdI ca citrakam BAva pra yavAse Sabdaca
girikarRRI girikarRRI girikarRRI strI girerbAlamUzikAyAH karRa iva karRaH patramasyAH NIp aparAjitAlatAyAm amaraH triPalA girikarRI ca haMsapAdI ca citrakam BAvapra yavAse Sabdaca
girikarRRikA girikarRRikA girikarRRikA strI giriH karRa iva yasyAH kap kApi ata ittvam pfTivyAM trikA girerbAlamUzikAyAH karRaH astyasyAH tadAkArapattratvAt Wan aparAjitA latAyAM SvetakiRihIvfkze ca rAjani
girikarRikA girikarRikA girikarRikA strI giriH karRa iva yasyAHkap kApi ata ittvam pfTivyAM trikA girervAlamUzikAyAH karRaH astyasyAH tadAkArapattratvAt Wan aparAjitA latAyAM SvetakiRihIvfkze ca rAjani
