go'mBas go'mBas go mBas na ta gomUtre rAjani
goDA goDA goDA gOwilye kaRqavAderAkftiguRaH kOwilye kaRqvAderAkftigaRaH nAmaDAtuH para aka sew goDAyati agoDAyIt goDA strI guDyate vezwyate bAhuranayA karaRe GaY DanurguRA GanurguRA GAtavAraRAya prakozWe baDyamAne carmaRi badDagoDANgulitrayAn badDa goDANgulitravAn BA va a goDASlizwaBujA SAKEraBUdBImA SAKEraBUdBomA raRAwavI mAGaH tataScawacawASabdo goDAGAtAdaBUttayoH BA dro a karttari ac gosApa iti KyAte sarpaBede strI amaraH SvAviDaM SalakaM SallakaM goDAM KaqgakUrmaSaSAMstaTA BakzyAn paYcanaKezvetAnanuzwrAMScEkatodataH paYcanaKe zvetAnanuzwrAMScEkatodataH manunA tanmAMsaM paYcanaKezu BakzyatayA Bakzya tayA Bihitam tanmAMsapAkaguRAdi BAva pra BAvapra uktaM yaTA goDAYcozRajalErBUyaH kzAlitAM KaRqaSaH kftAm svinnAYca takratoyAByAM kzAlitAM sUkzmaKaRqitAm talayed tala yed vesavArAmlEH praleho vA viDAnataH vipAke maDurA maGurA goDA vAtapittapraRASinI kazAyA kawukA proktA kaPaGnI balavardDinI sA tu sTalajajalaBedAddviDA svArTe ka atrEyArTe atrEvArTe goDAyAH apatyam vA Qrak nODera gODera pakze SuBrA Qak gODeya udIcA mate Arak goDAra gODAra tadapatye puM strI puMstrI Qaki strItve NIp iti BedaH goDA kOwilye kaRqvAderAkftigaRaH nAmaDAtuH para aka sew goDAyati agoDAyIt goDA strI guDyate vezwyate bAhuranayA karaRe GaY GanurguRA GAtavAraRAya prakozWe baDyamAne carmaRi badDa goDANgulitravAn BA va a goDASlizwaBujA SAKEraBUdBomA raRAwavI mAGaH tataScawacawASabdo goDAGAtAdaBUttayoH BA dro a karttari ac gosApa iti KyAte sarpaBede strI amaraH SvAviDaM SallakaM goDAM KaqgakUrmaSaSAMstaTA BakzyAn paYcanaKe zvetAnanuzwrAMScEkatodataH manunA tanmAMsaM paYcanaKezu Bakzya tayA Bihitam tanmAMsapAkaguRAdi BAvapra uktaM yaTA goDAYcozRajalErBUyaH kzAlitAM KaRqaSaH kftAm svinnAYca takratoyAByAM kzAlitAM sUkzmaKaRqitAm tala yed vesavArAmlEH praleho vA viDAnataH vipAke maGurA goDA vAtapittapraRASinI kazAyA kawukA proktA kaPaGnI balavardDinI sA tu sTalajajalaBedAddviDA svArTe ka atrEvArTe goDAyAH apatyam vA Qrak gODera pakze SuBrA Qak gODeya udIcA mate Arak gODAra tadapatye puMstrI Qaki strItve NIp iti BedaH
goDarma goDarma goDarma pu goriva DarmaH mETune vicArarUpe gosadfSe Darme goDarmaM sOraBeyAcca so DItya niKilaM muniH bfhaspatiH BA A a utaTyaSabde dfSyam
goDarmma goDarmma goDarmma pu goriva DarmaH mETune vicArarUpe gosadfSe Darme goDarmaM sOraBeyAcca so DItya niKilaM muniH vfha spatiH BA A a utaTyaSabde pf dfSyam
goRqa goRqa go Rqa pu goraRqa iva nIcajAtiBede go qa vfdDanABO ca tadvati tri mediniH
goSarya goSarya goSarya tri SF karttari vA yat gOH SaryA SIrRA yasya SIrRagO SayO yABirgoSaryamAvatam f goSaryaH SayuH BA
goSaryya goSaryya goSaryya tri SF karttari bA yat gOH SaryyA SIrRRA yasya SIrRagO SayO yABirgoSaryyamAvatam f goSaryyaH SayuH BA
gocarman gocarman gocarman na ta gavAM carmaRi gocarma ca stamBane AsanatayA vihitam yaTAha samayAcAratantre pawale gezAsanaM tu vaSyArTamAkfzwO vyAGracarma ca SAntO mfgAjinaM SastaM mokzArRaM vyAGracarma ca gocarma stamBane devi mohane vAjicarma ca saptahastena daRqena triMSaddaRqErnivarttanam daSa tAnyeva gocarmabrAhmaReByo dadAti yaH iti bfhaspatyukte daSahasten vaMSena daSavaMSAn samantataH paYca cAByaDikAn dadyAdetadgocarma cocyate iti vaSizWokte ca BUmAnaBede api gocarmamAtreRa BUmidAnena pUyate BA Anu a
gocarmman gocarmman gocarmman na ta gavAM carmaRi gocarma ca stamBane AsanatayA vihitam yaTAha samayAcAratantre pawale mezAsanaM tu vaSyArTamAkfzwO vyAGracarma ca SAntO mfgAjinaM SastaM mokzArRaM vyAGracarma ca gocarma stamBane devi mohane vAjicarma ca saptahastena daRqena triMSaddaRqErnivarttanam daSa tAnyeva gocarma brAhmaReByo dadAti yaH iti vfhaspatyukte daSa hastena vaMSena daSavaMSAn samantataH paYca cAByaDikAn dadyAdetadgIcarma cocyate iti vaSizWokte ca BUmAna Bede api gocarmmamAtreRa BUmidAnena pUyate BA Anu a
gojihvA gojihvA gojihvA strI gorjihveva gojivA latABede svArTe ka tatrEvArTe amaraH gojihvA gojikA gojI dArvikA KaraparRinI gojihvA vAtalA SItA grA hiRI kaPapittanut hfdyA pramehakAsAsravraRajva raharI laGuH komalA tuvarI tiktA svAdupAkarasA smftA BAvapra tadguRA uktAH
gojihva gojihva gojihva strI gorjihveva gojivA latABede svArTe ka tatrEvArTe amaraH gojihvA gojikA gojI dArvikA KaraparRinI vAtalA SItA grAhiRI kaPapittanut hfdyA pramehakAsAsravraRajvaraharI laGuH komalA tuvarI tiktA svAdupAkarasA smftA BAva pra tadguRA uktAH
gokakzya gokakzya gokakzya puM strI gokakzarzergotrApatyaM gargA yaY gokakzarzigotrApatye tasya CAtraH kaRvA aR yalopaH gOkakza tacCAtre gOkakzyasyApatyaM tikA PiY gOkakzyAyani tadapatye puMstrI striyAM krOqyAdi zyaY gOkakzyA gokakzagotrastriyAm bahutve yaYaYoSca pA yaYo luk gokakzAstadgotrApatyezu
gokarRI gokarRI gokarRI strI goH karRa iva patramasyAH gOrA NIz mUrvA latAyAm amaraH
gokarRo gokarRo gokarRo strI goH karRa iva patramasyAH gOrA NIz mUrvAlatAyAm amaraH
goki goki goki kIla pu goH pfTivyAH kIla iva mUsale hale ca hArA pfzo hrasvamaDyaH tatrArTe hemaca
gokila gokila goki kI la pu goH pfTivyAH kIla iva mUsale hale ca hArA pfzo hrasvamaDyaH tatrArTe hemaca
golAma golAma golAma pu gAM BUmiM lAsayati prakASayati lama Ric aR upa sa SilInDre hArA
golAsa golAsa golAsa pu gAM BUmiM lAsayati prakASayati lasa Ric aR upa sa SilInDre hArA
gomAya gomAya gomAya pu strI gAM vikftAM vAcaM ninoti mA uR SfgAle amaraH anu huNkurute GanaDvaniM nahi gomAyurutAni keSarI kirA pAMSuvarze diSAM dAhe gomAyuvirute taTA manuH tanmUtrAdiBakzaRanizeDamAha manuH viqavarAhanarozwrASvagomAyoH kapikAkayoH prAhya mUtrapurIzARi dvijaScAndrAyaRaM caret tadratAdiSuBASuBaPalaM vf sa uktaM yaTA SvaBiH SfgAlAH sadfSAH Palena viSeza ezAM SiSire madAptiH hUharutAnte parataSca wAwA pUrRaH Karo nye kaTitAH pradIptAH lopASikAyAH Kalu karkaSabdaH pUrRaH svaBAvapraBavaH sa tasyAH ye nye svarAste prakfterapetAH sarve ca dIptA iti sampradizwAH parvodIcyoH SivA SastA SAntA sarvatra pUjitA DUmitABimuKI hanti svaradIptA digISvarAn sarvadikzuSuBA dIptA viSezeRAhnyaSoBanA pure sEnye pasavyA ca kazwA sUryonmuKI SivA yAhItyagniBayaM SAsti wAweti mftavedikA DigDig duzkftamAcazwe sajvAlA deSanASinI nEva dAruRatAmeke sajvAlAyAH pracakzate arkAdyanalavattasyA vakraM lAlAsvaBAvataH anyapratirutA yAmyA sodvanDamftaSaMsinI vAruRyanurutA sEva SaMsate salile mftim akzoBaH SravaRaM cezwaM GanaprAptiH priyAgamaH kzoBapraDAnaBedaSca vAhanAnAM ca sampadAm PalamAsaptamAdetadagrAhyaM parato rutam yAmyAyAM tadviparyastaM PalaM zawapaYcamAdfte yA romAYcaM manuzyARAM SakftsUtraM ca vAjinAm rAvAt trAsaM ca janayetsA SivA na SivapradA mOnaM gatA pratirute naradviradavAjinAm yA SivA sA SivaM sEnye pure yA samprayacCati BeBe iti SivA BayaNkarI Bo Bo vyApadamAdiSecca sA mftabanDa nivedanI PiPI huhu cAtmahitA SivA svare SAntA tvavarRAt paramaM ruvantI wAwAmudIrRamiti vASyamAnA we we ca pUrvaM parataSca Te Te tasyAH svatuzwipraBavaM rutaM tat ucErGoraM varRamuccArya pUrvaM paScAt kroSat krozwukasyAnurUpam yA sA kzemaM prAha vittasya cAptiM saMyogaM vA prozitena priyeRa SvarutAdiPalaM SvaSabde vakzyamARaM tattulyaPalametasyetyatidizwam ganDarvaBede jawADaraH bahuBiH saha ganDarvEH prAgAyata ca tumburuH ityupakrame gomAyuH sUryavarcASca somavarcASca saptamaH harivaM a
gomAyu gomAyu gomAyu pu strI gAM vikftAM vAcaM minoti mA uR SfgAle amaraH anu huNgurute GanaDvaniM nahi gomA yurutAni keSarI kirA pAMSuvarze diSAM dAhe gomA yuvirute taTA manuH tanmUtrAdiBakzaRanizeDamAha manuH viqavarAhanarozwrASvagomAyoH kapikAkayoH prASya mUtrapurIzARi dvijaScAndrAyaRaM caret tadrutAdiSuBASuBaPalaM vf sa uktaM yaTA SvaBiH SfgAlAH sadfSAH Palena viSeza ezAM SiSire madAptiH hUharutAste parataSca wAwA pUrRaH Karo nye kaTitAH pradIptAH lomASikAyAH Kalu kakkaSabdaH pUrRaH svaBAvapraBavaH sa tasyAH ye nye svarAste prakfte rapetAH sarve ca dIptA iti sampradizwAH pUrvodIcyoH SibA SastA SAntA sarvatra pUjitA DUmitABimuKI hanti svaradIptA digISvarAn sarvadikzvaSuBA dIptA viSezeRAhnyaSoBanA pure sEnye pasavyA ca kazwA sUryyonmuKI SivA yAhItyagniBayaM SAsti wAweti mftavedikA DigDig duzkftamAcazwe sajvAlA deSa nASinI nEva dAruRatAmeke najvAlAyAH pracakzate arkAdyanalavattasyA vaktraM lAlAsvayAvataH anyapratirutA yAmyA sodbanDamftaSaMsinI vAruRyanurutA msava SaMsate salile mftim akzoBaH SravaRaM cezwaM GanaprAptiH priyA gamaH kzoBapraDAnaBedaSca vAhanAnAM ca sampadAm PalamA saptamAdetadagrAhyaM parato rutam yAmyAyAM tadviparyastaM PalaM zawapaYcamAdfte yA romAYcaM manuzyARAM SakfnmUtraM ca vAjinAm rAvAt trAsaM ca janayetsA SivA na Siva pradA mOnaM gatA pratirute naradviradavAjinAm yA SibA sA SivaM sEnye pure vA samprayacCati BeBe iti SibA BayaNkarI Bo Bo vyApadamAdiSecca sA mftabanDa nivedanI PiPI huhu cAtmahitA SivA svare SAntA tvavarRAt paramaM ruvantI wAwAmudIrRamiti vASyamAnA we we ca pUrvaM parataSca Te Te tasyAH svatuzwipraBavaM Page b rutaM tat uccerGoraM varRamuccAryya pUrvaM paScAt kroSat krozwukasyAnurUpam yA sA kzemaM prAha vittasya cAptiM saMyogaM vA prozitena priyeRa SvarutAdiPalaM SvaSabde vakzyaMmARaM tattulyaPalametasyetyatidizwam ganDarvaBede jawADaraH bahuBiH saha ganDarvEH prAgAyata ca tumburuH ityupakrame gomAyuH sUryyavarcASca somavarcASca saptamaH harivaM a
gomBas gomBas go mBas na ta gomUtre rAjani
gonardIya gonardIya gonardIya pu tri gonardedeSe BavaH eNAditvena vfdDasaMjYatvAt Ca pataYjalimunO hemaca tasya gonardadeSodBavakaTA bfhat kaTAyAM dfSyA saralopodGAte smABi diNmAtramuktA
gonarda gonarda gonarda pu gavi jale narddati nardda ac sArasaKage medi gavA jalena nardati kEvattIMmustake na medi gavA vAcA nardate ac deSaBede pu sa ca kUrmaviBAge tu sa a dakziRasyAmuktaH aTa dakziRena laNkA ityupakrame daSapuragonardakeralAH so Bijano sya aR gOnarda taddeSavAsini bahuzu aRo luk taddeSavAsizu ba va gonardanIcaSUdrAn vEdehAMScAnayaH spfSati bf sa a tadrAje pi aR gOnarda tannfpe kASmIrarAjo gonardodaradADipatirnfpaH kASmIra rAjo gonardaH karUzADipatistaTA hari a bahuzu tasya lup gavi vfze nardate narda ac mahAdeve pu gonardo gopraBAvaSca govfzeSvaravAhanaH BA SA a dakzakfta SivastutO gonarde deSe BavaH eN prAcAM deSe pA vfdDasaMjYatvAt CaH gonardIya taddeSaBave tri prAco nyamate aR gOnarda tatrArTe tri
gonarddIya gonarddIya gonarddIya pu gonardde deSe BavaH eNAditvena vfdDasaMjYatvAt Ca pataYjalimunO hemaca tasya gonardadeSodBavakaTA vfhat kaTAyAM dfSyA saralopodGAte smABi diNmAtramuktA
gonardda gonardda gonardda pu gavi jale narddati nardda ac sArasaKage medi gavA jalena nardati kEvarttImustake na medi gavA vAcA nardate ac deSaBede pu sa ca kUrmaviBAge vf sa a dakziRasyAmuktaH aTa dakziRena laNkA ityupakrame daSapuragonardakeralAH so Bijano sya aR gOnarda taddeSavAsini bahuzu aRo luk taddeSavAsizu ba va gonardanIcaSUdrAn vEdehAM ScAnayaH spfSati vf sa a tadrAje pi aR gOnarda tannfpe kASmIrarAjo gonardodaradADipatirnfpaH kASmIra rAjo gonardaH karUzADipatistaTA hari a bahuzu tasya lup gavi vfze nardate narda ac mahAdeve pu gonardo gopraBAvaSca govfzeSvaravAhanaH BA SA a dakzakfta SivastutO gonarde deSe BavaH eN prAcAM deSe pA vfdDasaMjYatvAt CaH gonardIya taddeSaBave tri prAco nyamate aR gOnarda tatrArTe tri
gopAlaDAnI gopAlaDAnI gopAlaDAnI tri gopAloDIyate tra DA ADAre lyuw NIp ta gozWe tasya pUlAsena samAse rAjada pUrvani samAhArEkatvaM ca gopAlaDAnIpUlAsam
gopAlaDAno gopAlaDAno gopAlaDAno tri gopAloDIyate tra DA ADAre lyuw NIp ta gozWe tasya pUlAsena samAse rAjada parvani samAhArEkatvaM ca gopAlaDAnIpUlAsam
gopIjanavalaBa gopIjanavalaBa gopIjanavalaBa pu gopyeva janastasya valaBaH SrIkfzRe gopIjanavalaBAya svAhAtantrasAre tanmantraH gopIBarttrAdayo pyatra gopIBartturvirahaviDurA kAcidindIvarAkzI padANkadUtam
gopIjanavallaBa gopIjanavallaBa gopIjanavallaBa pu gopyeva janastasya ballaBaH SrIkfzRe gopojanavallaBAya svAhA tantrasAre tanmantraH gopI BarttrAdayo pyatra gopIBartturvirahaviDurA kAcidindI varAkzI padANkadUtam
gopada gopada gopa zpa da na goH padaM padasTAnayogyasTAnam go zpadaM sevitAsevitapramARezu pA uktArTe suwzatve gavAmasevite vanAdO gosevite gorgatigocare sTAne gopadamAtrapramARe kzetre na tadBinnArTe na suw goScaraRe
gopapada gopapada gopa zpa pada na goH padaM padasTAnayogyasTAnam gozpadaM sevitAsevitapramARezu pA uktArTe suwzatve gavAmasevite vanAdO gosevite gorgatigocare sTAne gopadamAtrapramARe kzetre na tadBinnArTe na suw goScaraRe
goparama goparama goparama pu gAM jalaM pibati pA ka gopaH raso sya vOle SabdaratnA
goparasa goparasa goparasa pu gAM jalaM pibati pA ka gopaH raso sya vOle SabdaratnA
goparicaryA goparicaryA goparicaryA strI ta gosevAyAM tat prakAro hemA dA uktastatrAdO brahmapurARe vandanIyASca pUjyASca gAvaH sevyAstu nityaSaH taTA gavANgozWe sTitAnAntu yaH karoti pradakziRam pradakziRIkftaM tena jagat sadasadAtmakam vizRuH gAvaM pavitrA mANgalyA gavi lokAH pratizWitAH gAvo vitanvate yajYAn gAvaH sarvArDasUdanAH gomUtraM gomayaM darpaH kzIraM daDi ca rocanA zaqaNgametatparamaM mANgalyaM sarvadA gavAm SfNgodakaM gavAM puRyaM sarvADavinisUdanam gavAM kaRqUyanaYcEva sarvakalmazanASanam gavAM grAsapradAnena svargaloke mahIyate padmapurARe sadA gAvaH praRamyAstu mantreRAnena pArTiva namo goByaH SrImatIByaH sOraBeyIByaH eva ca namo brahmasutAByaSca BUyo BUyo namo namaH mantrasya smaraRAdeva godAnaPalamApnuyAt AdityapurARe lavaRaM ca yaTASaktyA gavAM ye vE dadatyuta tezAM puRyakftAM lokA gavAM lokaM vrajanti te yo graM BaktyA kiYcidaprASya dadyAdgoByo nityaM govratI satyavAdI SAnto budDo gosahasrasya puRyaM saMvatsareRApnuyAdDarmaSIlaH devIpurARe gopAlako gavAM gozWe yastu DUmaM na kArayet makzikAlInanarake makzikABiH sa Bakzyate mftavatsAntu gAM yastu damitvA pibate naraH vAhitA syASciraM tizWet kzuDArtto vE narADamaH mahABArate gokulasya tfzArttasya jalAnte vasuDADipa utpAdayati yo viGnaM tamAhurbrahmaGAtakam kftvA gavArTe SaraRaM SIta vAta kzemaM mahat AsaptamantArayati kulaM Baratasattama brahmapurARe sadozA gOrgfhe jAtA paripAlyA sadA svayam duHSIlo pi dvijaH pUjyo na tu SUdraH susaMyataH anATAnAM gavAM yatnAtkAryastu SiSire maWaH puRyArTaM yatra dIyante tfRa toye nDanAni ca hArItaH dvO mAsO pAyayedvatsaM tftIye dvistanaM duhet caturTe tristanaYcEva yaTAnyAyaM yaTA balam brahmapurARe AzAdyAmASvayujyAYca pOzyAM mADyAM ca sarvadA na gfhRIyAdgavAM kzIraM sarvaM vatsAya nikzipet na zaRqAnvAhayeccEva na gAM BAreRa pIqayet yugAdizu yugAntezu zaqaSItimuKezu ca dakziRottarage sUrye taTA vizuvatordvayoH saMkrAntizu ca sarvAnu grahaRe candrasUryayoH paYcadaSyAYcaturdaSyAM dvAdaSyAmazwamIzu ca upacAro gavAM kAryo mAsi mAsi yaTAkramam lavaRasya tu catvAri palAnyazwO Gftasya ca parakIyasya dugDasya taTA deyAni zoqaSa dvAtriMSat SItalasyApi jalasya ca palAni ca AdO vicArya payasaH parimARaM balaM ruci Akasmikantu dAtavyaM puRyArTantu gavAhnikam praBAte lavaRaM yatra dIyate ca tato jalam tatastfRAni BojyaYca pozaRaM mAMsavarjitam niSi dIpaH satantrIko divyA pOrARikI kaTA evaM kfte mahIM pUrRA ratnErdattvA Bavet Palam gopradAnAttu yatpuRyaM gavAMsaMrakzaRAdBavet manuzyEstfRatoyAdyErgAvaH pAlyAH prayatnataH deyAH pUjyASca pozyASca pratipAlyASca sarvadA taTA tfRodakAdyezu vanezu mattAH krIqantu gAvaH savfzAH savatsAH kzIraM pramuYcantu suKaM svapantu SItAtapavyADiBayErvimuktAH imaM mantraM sa SudDAtmA japennityaM samAhitaH gacCan tizwan japan jiGran BuYjan krIqan samutsfjan mahABayezu sarvezu samezu vizamezu ca prayARakAle ca taTA SrotavyamaBayapradam taTA GAsagrAsAdikaM deyaM niSi dIpaH suBAsvaraH itihAsapurARAnAM vyAKyAnaM sopavIRanam antastuzwEryaTASaktyA paricaryA yaTAkramam tAqanAkroSaKedASca svapne pi na kadAcana tAsAM mUtrapurIze tu nodvegaH kriyate kvacit SoDanIyaSca govAwaH SuzkakzArAdikEH sadA grIzme vfkzAkulaM veSma SIte taptaM vikardamam varzAsu cATa SiSire suKozRaM vAtavarjitam ucCizwaM mUtraviw SlezmamalaM jahyAnna tatra ca rajasvalA na praveSyA nAntyajAtirna puMScalI na laNGayedvatsatarIM na krIqedgozWasanniDO na gantavyaM gavAM maDye sopAnatkEH sapAdukEH hastyaSvaraTayAnESca savitAnEH kadAcana dakziRottaragEH prahvErgantavyaYca padAtiBiH gAvaH kfSAturAH palyAH SradDayA pitfmAtfvat giriprapAtasiMharkzaSItAtapaBayAturAH mahAkolAhale Gore durdine deSaviplave gavAM tfRAni deyAni SItalaM ca taTA jalam vizRuDarmottare puzkara uvAca gavAM hi pAlanaM rAjYA karttavyaM Bfgunandana gAvaH pavitrA mANgalyA gozu lokAH pratizWitAH gAvo vitanvate yajYaM gAvo viSvasya mAtaraH SakfnmUtraM paraM tAsAmalakzmItApanaM param tadDi meDyaM prayatnena tatra lakzmIH pratizWitA udvegaSca na gantavyaH SakfnmUtre vijAnatA gavAM mUtrapurIze tu zWIvanAdyaM na satyajet gopajaH paramaM puRyamalakzmIviGnanASanam gavAM kaRqUyanaYcEva sarvakalmazanASanam gavAM SfNgodakaM rAma jAhnavIjalasanniBam gomUtraM gomayaM kzIraM daDi sarpiH kuSodakam pavitraM paramaM jYeyaM snAne pAne ca BArgava rakzoGnametanmANgalyaM kaliduHKapranASanam rocanA ca taTA DanyA rakzogadagarApahA yastu kalyaM samutTAya muKamAjye nirIkzate tasyA lakzmIH kzayaM yAti vardDate nuca kilbizam gavAM grAsapradAnena puzyaM sumahadaSnute yAvatIH SaknuyAdgAstu suKaM DArayituM gfhe DArayettAvatIrnityaM kzuDArttAstA na DArayet duHKitA Denavo yatra vasanti dvijamandire narakaM samavApnoti nAtra kAryA vicAraRA dattvA paragave grAsaM puRyaM sumahadaSnute SiSiraM sakalaM kAlaM grAsaM paragave taTA dattvA svargamavApnoti saMvatsaraSatAni zaw agraBaktaM naro dattvA nityameva taTA gavAm samAzwakena laBate nAkalokaM samAyutam sAyaM prAtarmanuzyARAmaSanaM vedanirmitam taTEkamaSanaM dattvA gavAM nityamatantritaH dvitIyaM yaH samaSnAti tena saMvatsarAnnaraH gavAM lokamavApnoti yAvanmanvantaraM dvija SItatrARaM gavAM kftvA gfhe puruzasattama gavAM prapARe pAnIyaM kftvA puruzasattama vAruRaM lokamApnoti krIqatyapsarasAM guREH gavAM pAnapravfttAnAM yastu viGnaM samAcaret brahmahatyA kftA tena GorA Bavati BArgava parAM tfptiM nacApnoti yatra tatrABijAyate gavAM pracAraBUmintu vAhayitvA halAdinA naraka mahadApnoti yAvadindrAScaturdaSa siMhavyAGraBayatrastAM paNkalagnAM jale gatAm gAmudDftya naraH svarge kalpaBogAnupaSnute gavAM lavaRadAnena rUpavAnaBijAyate sOBAgyaM mahAdApnoti lAvaRyaYca dvijottama OzaDaYca taTA dattvA virogastvaBijAyate OzaDaM lavaRaM toyamAhAraYca prayacCati tAsAYcedavarudDAnAYcarantInAM miTo vane yAmutplutya vfko hanyAnna pAlastatra kilvizI gobaDena naro yAti narakAnekaviMSatim tasmAtsarvaprayatnena kAryaM tAsAntu pAlanam vikrayAcca gavAM rAma narakaM pratipadyate tAsAntu kIrttanAdeva naraH pApAt pramucyate tAsAM saMsparSanaM DanyaM sarvakalmazanASanam dAnena ca taTA tAsAM kulyAnyapi samudDaret udakyAsmftikAdozo nEva tatra gfhe Bavet BUmidozastaTAnyo pi yatrEkA vasate ca gOH gavAM niHSvAsavAtena parA SAntirgfhe Bavet nIrAjanaM tatparamaM sarvasTAnezu kIrttyate gavAM saMsparSanAdrAma kalmazaM kzIyate nfRAm gomUtraM gomayaM kzIraM daDi sarpiH kuSodakam ekarAtropavAsaSca SvapAkamapi SoDayet pfTak ca pratyayAByastamiti sAntapanaM smftam sarvakAmapradaM rAma sarvASuBavinASanam kftvAtikfcCraM payasA divasAnekaviMSatim nirmalAstena cIrRena Bavanti puruzottamAH tryahamuzRaM pibenmUtraM tryahamuzRaM GftaM pibet tryahamuzRaM payaH pItvA vAyuBakzaH paraM tryaham taptakfcCramidaM proktaM sarvASuBavinASanam SItakfcCrastaTEvEza kramAcCItEH prakIrttitaH sarvASuBavinASAya nirmito brahmaRA svayam gomUtreRAcaret snAnaM vfttiM kuryAcca gorasEH utTitAsUtTitastizWedupavizwAsu ca sTitaH aBuktavatyAM nASnIyAdapItAsu ca no pibet trARaM cEvAtmanA kAryaM BayArttASca samudDaret AtmAnamapi santyajya govrataM tat prakIrttitam sarvapApapraSamanaM mAsenEkena BArgava vratenAnena pUrRena golokaM puruzovrajet aBIzwamaTavA rAma yAvadindrAScaturdaSa gavAmAhAranirmuktAnaSnan pratidinaM yavAn mAsena tadavApnoti yatkiYcinmanasecCati gomatIYca taTA vidyAM sAya prAtastaTA jape golokamApnoti naronAtra kAryA vicAraRA uparyupari sarvezAM gavAM lokaH prakIrttitaH nivasanti sadA yatra gAvastvAkASagA divi vimAnezu vicitrezu vftezvapsarasANgaREH kiNkiRIjAlacitrezu vIRAsu racanAdizu sadA kAmaPalA nadyaH kzIrapAyasakardaBAH SItalAmalapAnIyAH suvarRasikatAstaTA puzkariRyaH SuBAstatra vEdUryakamalotpalAH mAnasI ca taTA sidDistatra loke BfgUttama tantu lokaM narA yAnti gavAM BaktyA na saMSayaH gomatIM kIrttayizyAmi sarvapApraRASinIm tAntu me gadato vipra SfRuzva susamAhitaH gAvaH suraBayo nityaM gAvo guNguluganDikAH gAvaH pratizWA BUtAnAM gAvaH svastyayanaM param annameva paraM gAvo devAnAM haviruttamam pAvanaM sarvadevAnAM rakzanti ca vahanti ca havitA mantrapUtena tarpayanatyamarAn divi fzIRAmagnihotrezu gAvo homaniyojitAH sarvezAmeva BUtAnAM gAvaH SaraRamuttamam gAvaH pavitraM paramaM gAvo maNgalamuttamam gAvaH svargasya sopAnaM gAvoDanyAH sanAtanAH namo goByaH SrImatIByaH sOraBeyIBya eva ca namo brahmasutAByaSca pavitrAByo namo namaH brAhmaRAScEva gAvaSca kulamekaM dviDA kftam ekatra mantrAstizWanti havirekatra tizWati devabrAhmaRagosADusADvIBiH sakalaM jagat DAryate vE sadA tasmAt sarve pUjyatamA mataH yatra tIrTe sadA gAvaH pibanti tfzitA jalam uttarantyaTa vA yena sTitA tatra sarasvatI gavAM hi tIrTe vasatIha gaNgA puzwistaTAsAM rajasi pravfdDA lakzmIH karIze praRatO ca DarmastAsAM praRAmaM satataYca kuryAt BavizyatpurARe brahmovAca gAmAlaBya namaskftya kuryAdyastu pradakziRam pradakziRI kftA tena saptadvIpA vasunDarA gavAM huNkAraSabdena dfzwipAtena sattama pApaM praRaSyate yasmAttasmAtpaSyet spfSecca tAH kutastasya BavetpApaM gfhaM yasya viBUzitam satataM bAlavatsABirarjunIBiralaNkftam yAvattIrTAni BedinyAmAsamudraM sarAMsi ca gavAM SfNgodakasnAnakalAM nArhanti zoqaSIm gavAmasTi na laNGeta mfte ganDaM na varjayet yAvadAGrAti tadganDaM tAvat puRyena yujyate gavAM kaRqUyanaM DanyaM gopradAnaPalapradam tulyaM goSatadAnasya BayarogAdipAlanam tfRodakAdisaMyuktaM yaH pradadyAdgavAhnikam kapilASatadAnasya PalaM vidyAnna saMSayaH paYcaBUte Sive puRye pavitre sUryasamBave pratIcCedaM mayA dattaM sOraBeyi namo stu te bahunA ca kimuktena gAvaH pAlyAH prayatnataH gAvodeyAstaTA rakzyAH pUjyA grAhASca sarvaSaH gAM vE ye tAqayantIha sarvalokasya mAtaram te yAnti rOravaM nAma narakaM nAtra saMSayaH tAqayedyastu vEmohAt yo vA kaScinnarADamaH sa gacCennarakaM GoraM sampIqakamiti SrutiH AyAntIM hantukAmAM yaH sOraBeyIM viBAvarIm kzama mAtariti brUyAt sa yAti paramaM padam varAhapurARe yama uvAca gAvaH pavitraM maNgalyA devAnAmapi devatA yastAH SuSrUzate BaktyA sa pApeByaH pramucyate yAvajIvaM kftaM pApaM tatkzaRAdeva naSyati lANgUlenodDftaM toyaM mUrDnA gfhRAti yo naraH Saratsu hyupajAteByaH sa pApeByaH pramucyate prasnave yo gavAM snAyAt rohiRyAM mAnavo Buvi sarvapApakftAn dozAn dahatyASu na saMSayaH DenostanAdvinizkrAntAM DArAM kzIrasya yo naraH SirasA pratigfhRIyAtsa pApeByaH pramucyate ADikaM kfziSabde darSite bfhatparASaravAkye dfSyam
goparicaryyA goparicaryyA goparicaryyA strI ta gosevAyAM tat prakAro hemA dA uktastatrAdO brahmapurARe vandanIyASca pUjyASca gAvaH sevyAstu nityaSaH taTA gavANgozWe sTitAnAntu yaH karoti pradakziRam pradakziRIkftaM tena jagat sadasadAtmakam vizRuH gAvaH pavitrA mANgalyA gavi lokAH pratizWitAH gAvo vitanvate yajYAn gAvaH sarvAGasUdanAH gomUtraM gomayaM sarpiH kzIraM daDi ca rocanA zaqaNgametatparamaM mANgalyaM sarvadA gavAm SfNgodakaM gavAM puRyaM sarvAGavini sUdanam gavAM kaRqUyanaYcEva sarvakalmazanASanam gavAM grAsapradAnena svargaloke mahIyate padmaparARe sadA gAvaH praRamyAstu mantreRAnena pArTiva namo goByaH SrImatIByaH sOraBeyIBya eva ca namo brahma sutAByaSca BUyo BUyo namo namaH mantrasya smaraRAdeva godAnaPalamApnuyAt AdityapurARe lavaRaM ca yaTASaktyA gavAM yeMvE dadatyuta tezAM puRyakftAM lokA gavAM lokaM vrajanti te yo graM BaktyA kiYci daprASya dadyAdgoByo nityaM govratI satyavAdo SAnto budDo gosahasrasya puRyaM saMvatsareRApnuyAdDarmaSIlaH devIpurARe gopAlako gavAM gozWe yastu DUmaM na kArayet makzikAlInanarake makzikABiH sa Bakzyate mftavatamAnta gAM yastu damitvA pibate naraH vAhi Page b tA syASciraM tizWet kzuDArtto vE narADamaH mahABArate gokulasya tfzArttasya jalAnte vasuDADipa utpAda yati yo viGnaM tamAhurvrahmaGAtakam kftvA gavArTe SaraRaM SIta vAta kzamaM mahat AsaptamantArayati kulaM Baratasattama brahmapurARe sadozA gOrgfhe jAtA paripAlyA sadA svayam duHSIlo pi dvijaH pUjyo na tu SUdraH susaMyataH anATAnAM gavAM yatnAtkAryastu SiSire maWaH puRyArTaM yatra dIyante tfRa toye nDanAni ca hArItaH dvO mAsO pAyayedvatsaM tftIye dvistanaM duhet caturTe tristanaYcEva yaTAnyAyaM yaTA balam brahmapurARe AzAdyAmASvayujyAYca pOzyAM mADyAM ca sarvadA na gfhlIyAdgavAM kzIraM sarvaM vatsAya nikzipet na zaRqAnvAhayeccEva na gAM BAreRa pIqayet yugAdizu yugAntezu zaqaSItimuKezu ca dakziRottarage sUrye taTA vizuvatordvayoH saMkrAntizu ca sarvAsu grahaRe candrasUryayoH paYcadaSyAYcaturdaSyAM dvAdaSyAmazwamIzu ca upacAro gavAM kAryo mAsi mAsi yaTAkramam lavaRasya tu catvAri palAnyazwO Gftasya ca parakIyasya dugDasya taTA deyAni zoqaSa dvAtriMSat SItalasyApi jalasya ca palAni ca AdO vicArya payasaH parimARaM balaM ruci Akasmikantu dAtavyaM puRyArTantu gavAhnikam praBAte lavaRaM yatra dIyate ca tato jalam tatastfRAni BojyaYca po zaRaM mAMsavarjitam niSi dIpaH satantrIko divyA pOrARikI antastuzWEryayA SaktyA paricaryA yaTAkramam tAqanAkroSaKedASca svapne pi na kadAcana tAsAM mUtrapurIze tu nodvegaH Page a kriyate kvacit SoDanIyaSca govAwaH SuzkakzArA dikEH sadA grIzme vfkzAkulaM veSma SIte taptaM vikardamam barzAsu cATa SiSire suKozRaM vAtavarjitam ucCizwaM mUtraviwSlezmamalaM jahyAnna tatra ca rajasvalA na praveSyA nAntyajAtirna puMScalI na laNGayedvatsatarIM na giriprapAtasiMha rkzaSItAtapaBayAturAH mahAkolAhale Gore durdine deSaviplave gavAM tfRAni deyAni SItalaM ca taTA jalam vizRuDarmottare puzkara uvAca gavAM hi pAlanaM rAjYA karttavyaM Bfgunandana gAvaH SakfzmUtre vijAnatA gavAM mUtrapurIze tu zWIvanAdyaM na saMtyajet gorajaH paramaM puRyamalakzmIviGnanASanam gavAM kaRqUyanaYcEva sarvakalmazanASanam gavAM SfNgodakaM rAma jAhnavIja lasanniBam gomUtraM nirIkzate tasyA lakzmIH kzayaM yAti vardDate na ca kilvizam gavAM grAsapradAnena puRyaM sumahadaSnute yAvatIH SaknuyAdgAstu suKaM DArayituM gfhe DArayettAvatIrnityaM kzuDArttAstA na DArayet duHKitA Denave yatra vasanti dvijamandire narakaM samavApnoti nAtra kAryA vicAraRA dattvA para gave grAsaM puRyaM sumahadaSnute SiSiraM sakalaM kAlaM grAsaM paragave taTA dattvA svargamavApnoti saMvat saraSatAni zaw agraBaktaM naro dattvA nityameva taTA gavAm samAzwakena laBate nAkalokaM samAyutam sAyaM prAtarmanuzyARAmaSanaM vedanirmitam taTEkamaSanaM dattvA gavAM nityamatantritaH dvitIyaM yaH samaSnAti tena saMvatsarAnnaraH gavAM lokamavApnoti yAvanmanvantara dvija SItatrARaM gavAM kftvA gfhe puruzasattama Page b gavAM prapARe pAnIyaM kftvA puruzasattama vAruRaM loka mApnoti krIqatyapsarasAM gaREH gavAM pAnapravfttAnAM yastu viGnaM samAcaret brahmahatyA kftA tena GorA Bavati BArgava parAM tfptiM nacApnoti yatra tatrABijA yate gavAM pracAraBUmintu vAhayitvA halAdinA narakaM mahadApnoti yAvadindrAScaturdaSa siMhavyADra mayatrastAM paNkalagnAM jale gatAm gAmudDftya naraH svarge kalpamogAnupASnute gavAM lavaRadAnena rUpavAnaBi jAyate sOBAgyaM mahadApnoti lAvaRyaYca dvijo ttama OzaDaYca taTA dattvA virogastvaBijAyate OzaDaM lavaRaM toyamAhAraYca prayacCati tAsAYcedavaru dDAnAYcarantInAM miTo vane yAmutplutya vfko hanyA nna pAlastatra kilvizI gobaDena naro yAti narakAne kaviMSatim tasmAtsarvaprayatnena kAryaM tAsAntu pAla nam vikrayAcca gavAM rAma narakaM pratipadyate tAsAntu kIrttanAdeva naraH pApAg pramucyate tAsAM saMsparSanaM DanyaM sarvakalamazanASanam dAnena ca taTA tAsAM ku lyAnyapi samudDaret udakyAsUtikAdozo nEva tatra gfhe Bavet BUmidozastaTAnyo pi yatrEkA vasate ca gOH gavAM niHSvAsavAtena parA SAntirgfhe Bavet nIrAjanaM tatparamaM sarvasTAnezu kIrttyate gavAM saMspa rSanAdrAma kalmazaM kzoyate nfRAm gomUtraM gomayaM kzIra daDi sarpiH kuSodakam ekarAtropavAsaSca SvapAkamapi SoDayet pfTak ca pratyayAByastamiti sAnta panaM smftam vAyuBakzaH paraM tryaham taptakfcCramidaM proktaM sarvASuBavinASanam SItakfcCrastaTEvEza kramA cCItEH prakIrttitaH sarvASuBavinASAya nirmito brahmaRA svayam gomUtreRAcaret snAnaM vfttiM kuryAcca gorasEH utTitAsUtTitastizWedupavizwAsu ca sTitaH aBuktavatyAM nASnoyAdapItAsu ca no pibet trArRaM cEvAtmanA kAryaM BayArttASca samudDaret AtmAnamapi santyajya govrataM tat prakIrttitam sarvapApapraSamana mAsenEkena BArgava vratenAnena pUrRena golokaM puruzo vrajet aBIzwamaTa vA rAma yAvadindrAScaturdaSa SavA Page a mAhAranirmuktAnaSnan pratidinaM yavAn mAsena tada vApnoti yatkiYcinmanasecCati gomatIYca taTA vidyAM sAyaM prAtastaTA japet golokamApnoti naronAtra kAryA vicAraRA uparyupari sarvezAM gavAM lokaH prakI rttitaH nivasanti sadA yatra gAvastvAkASagA divi vimAnezu vicitrezu vftezvapsarasANgaREH kiNkiRI jAlacitrezu vIRAsu racanAdizu sadA kAmaPalA nadyaH kzIrapAyasakardamAH SItalAmalapAnIyAH suva rRasikatAstaTA puMzkariRyaH SuBAstatra vEdUryakamalo tpalAH mAnasI ca taTA sidDistatra loke BfgUttama tantu lokaM narA yAnti gavAM BaktyA na saMSayaH go matIM kIrttayizyAmi sarvapApapraRASinIm tAntu me gadato vipra SfRuzva susamAhitaH gAvaH suraBayo nityaM gAvo gumguluganDikAH gAvaH pratizWA BUtAnAM gAvaH svastyayanaM param annameva paraM gAvo devAnAM ha viruttamam pAvanaM sarvadevAnAM rakzanti ca vahanti ca havizA mantrapUtena tarpayantyamarAn divi fzIRAma gnihotrezu gAvo homaniyojitAH sarvezAmeva BU tAnAM gAvaH SaraRamuttamam gAvaH pavitraM paramaM gAvo maNgalamuttamam gAvaH svargasya sopAnaM gAvoDanyAH sanAtanAH namo goByaH SrImatIByaH sOraBeyIBya eva ca namo vrahmasutAByaSca pavitrAByo namo namaH brAhmaRAScEva gAvaSca kulamekaM dviDA kftam ekatra mantrAstizWanti habirekatra tizWati devabrAhmaRago sADusADvIBiH sakalaM jagat DAryate vE sadA tasmAt sarve pUjyatamA matAH yatra tIrTe sadA gAvaH pivanti tfzitA jalam uttarantyaTa vA yena sTitA tatra sara svatI gavAM hi tIrTe vasatIha gaNgA puzwistaTAsAM rajasi pravfdDA lakzmIH karIze praRatO ca praRaSyate yasmAttasmAtpaSyet spfSecca tAH kutastasya BavetpApaM gfhaM yasya viBUzi tam satataM bAlavatsABirarjunIBiralaNkftam yA vattIrTAni medinyAmAsamudraM sarAMsi ca gavAM SfNgo dakasnAnakalAM nArhanti zoqaSIm gavAmasTi na laNgeta mfte ganDaM na varjayet yAvadAGrAti tadganDaM Page b tAvat puRyena yajyate gavAM kaRqUyanaM DanyaM gopradA naPalapradam tulyaM goSatadAnasya BayarogAdipAla nam tfRodakAdisaMyuktaM yaH pradadyAdgavAhnikam kapi lASatadAnasya PalaM vidyAnna saMSayaH paYcaBUte Sive puRye pavitre sUryasamBave pratIcCedaM mayA dattaM sOraBeyi namo stu te bahunA ca kimuktena gAvaH pAlyAH prayatnataH gAvodeyAstaTA rakzyAH pUjyA grA hyASca sarvaSaH gAM vE ye tAqayantIha sarvalokasya mAtaram te yAnti rOravaM nAma narakaM nAtra saMSayaH tAqaye dyastu vE mohAt yo vA kaScinnarADamaH sa gacCenna rakaM GoraM sampIqakamiti SrutiH AyAntIM hantu kAmAM yaH sOraBeyIM viBAvarIm kzama mAtariti brUyAt sa yAti paramaM padam varAhapurARe yama uvAca gAvaH pavitraM maNgalyA devAnAmapi devatA yastAH SuSrUzate BaktyA sa pApeByaH pramucyate yAva jjIvaM kftaM pApaM tatkzaRAdeva naSyati lANgUleno dDftaM toyaM mUrDnA gfhRAti yo naraH Saratsu hyupa jAteByaH sa pApeByaH pramucyate prasnave yo gopavalI gopavalI gopavalI strI gAM pAti pA ka karma mUrvAlatAyAM rAjani SyAmAlatAyAM SyAmAGAsa Sabdara
gopavallI gopavallI gopavallI strI gAM pAti pA ka karma mUrvAlatAyAM rAjani SyAmAlatAyAM SyAmAGAsa Sabdara
goqumbA goqumbA goqumbA strI gAM BUmiM tumbati arddati tuvi ka pf go muka gavAdanyAM taramuja SIrRavfnte pu medi svArTe ka goqumbikA gavAdanyAm ratnamAlA
goqumvA goqumvA goqumvA strI gAM BUmiM tumbati arddati tuvi ka pf gomuka gavAdanyAM taramuja SIrRavfnte pu medi svArTe ka goqumbikA gavAdanyAm ratnamAlA
gorAvaskandin gorAvaskandin gorAvaskandin pu guroridaM gOravaM gurupatnIrUpaM kalatraM tadAskandati A skanda Rini vede pfzo varRaviparyayaH ahalyAjAre Sakre indrAgacCetyupakrame gOravAskandinnahalyAyE jAreti Sata vrA
govIrya govIrya govIrya na ta gavAM vIrye BftAvaniScitAyAM tu daSamaM BAgamApnuyuH lABagovIryaSasyAnAM baRig gopakfzIvalAH nArada sa
govIryya govIryya govIryya na ta gavAM vIryye BftAvaniScitAyAM tu daSamaM BAgamApnuyuH lABagovIryyaSasyAnAM baRig gopakfzIvalAH nArada sa
govatasa govatasa govatasa pu ta gavAM vatse tannAmadvAdaSIvratam vrata Sabde dfSyam
govatsa govatsa govatsa pu ta gavAM vatse tannAmadvAdaSIvratam vrataSabde dfSyam
gozWI gozWI gozWI strI gAvo nekAvAcastizWanti atra sTA GaYarTe ka ta ambAmbeti zatvam gOrA NIz saBAyAM parizadi tatra gozWIzu raTyAsu sidDapravrajitezu ca BA vi parasparAlApe gozWIsuKamanuBavanta stizWanti hito pozyavarge ca vizaM gozWI daridrasya cARakyaH samUhe gozWaSabde udA saBAyAm asya puMstvamapi samucCrayAn parvatasanni rADAn gozWAn harIRAM girisetumAlAH BA va a
gozWIM gozWIM gozWIM strI gAvo nekAvAcastizWanti atra sTA GaYarTe ka ta ambAmbeti zatvam gOrA NIz saBAyAM parizadi tatra gozWIzu raTyAsu sidDapravrajitezu ca BA vi parasparAlApe gozWIsuKamanuBavantastizWanti hito pozyavarge ca vizaM gozWI daridrasya cARakyaH samUhe gozWaSabde udA saBAyAm asya puMstvamapi samucCrayAn parvatasanniroDAn gozWAn harIRAM girisetumAlAH BA va a
grAmaDarma grAmaDarma grAmaDarma pu grAme BavaH aRa grAmo DarmaH grAmyaDarme mETune SabdArTaci tasya strIpuMDarmatvAttaTAtvam
grAmaDarmma grAmaDarmma grAmaDarmma pu grAme BavaH aR grAmo DarmmaH grAmyaDarmme mETune SabdArTaci tasya strIpuMDarmmatvAttaTAtvam
grAmacaryA grAmacaryA grAmacaryA strI ta grAmyArme strIsamBoge sarvaSo varjayedgrAmacaryAm ASva SrO satriDarmokrO grAmacaryA strIsamBogaH nArA vf
grAmacaryyA grAmacaryyA grAmacaryyA strI ta grAmyaDarmme strIsamBoge sarvvaSo varjayedgrAmacaryyAm ASva SrO satriDarmmoktO grAmacaryyA strIsamBogaH nArA vf
grAmyaDarma grAmyaDarma grAmyaDarma pu grAmyasya prAkftasya hAlikAdeH DarmaH vyavAye mETune amaraH pramattogrAmyaDarmezu BA va a pramattaM grAmyaDarmezu a sa astyasya ini grAmyaDarmin mETunarate tri SUdrAdAyogayaScApi vESyAyAM grAmyaDarmiRaH Ba Ana a
grAmyaDarmma grAmyaDarmma grAmyaDarmma pu grAmyasya prAkftasya hAlikAdeH DarmaH vyavAye mETune amaraH pramattogrAmyaDarmezu BA va a pramattaM grAmyaDarmezu a sa astyasya ini grAmyaDarmmin mETunarate tri SUdrAdAyogavaScApi vESyAyAM grAmyaDarmiRaH BA Anu a
grAmyakarman grAmyakarman grAmyakarman na grAmyasya prAkftasya hAlikAdeH karma mETune vyavAye grAmyakarmaREva vismftakAlAvaDiH BAga
grAmyakarmman grAmyakarmman grAmyakarmman na grAmyasya prAkftasya hAlikAdeH karma mETune vyavAye grAmyakarmmaREva vismftakAlAbaDiH BAga
grAmyavalaBA grAmyavalaBA grAmyavalaBA strI ta pAlaNgyaSAke pAlaNga rAjani hAlikAdigrAmyapriyatvAttasya taTAtvam veSyAyAYca
grAmyavallaBA grAmyavallaBA grAmyavallaBA strI ta pAlaNgyaSAke pAlaNga rAjani hAlikAdigrAmyapriyatvAttasya taTAtvam veSyAyAYca
grAvarIhaka grAvarIhaka grAvarIhaka pu grAvaRi rohati ruha Rvul ta aSvaganDAvfkze ratnamA
grAvarohaka grAvarohaka grAvarohaka pu grAvaRi rohati ruha Rvul ta aSva ganDAvfkze ratnamA
grIvAbila grIvAbila grIvAbila na ta grIvAntargate garttaBede trikA
grIvAvila grIvAvila grIvAvila na ta grIvAntargate garttaBede trikA
grIzmahAma grIzmahAma grIzmahAma na grIzme hAlovikASo sya indratUle vuqirasutA tasya viyati grIzme uqqIyamAnatvAt indratUlatulyatvAttaTAtvam
grIzmahAsa grIzmahAsa grIzmahAsa na grIzme hAsovikASo sya indratUle vuqirasutA tasya viyati grIzme uqqIyamAnatvAt indratUlatulyatvAttaTAtvam
grahAvamardana grahAvamardana grahAvamardana pu grahO candrasUryO avamfdgAti ava mfdalyu rAhO candrasUryAvamarddanamiti tadDyAnaliNgAttasya taTAtvam BAve lyuw ta grahayoH paraspara yudDe ca grahAvamarddane cEva puzyasnAnaM samAcaret vf saM a
grahAvamarddana grahAvamarddana grahAvamarddana pu grahO candrasUryyO avamfdnAti ava mfda lyu rAhO candrasUryyAvamarddanamiti tadvyAnaliNgA ttasya taTAtvam BAve lyuw ta grahacoH paraspara yudDe ca grahAvamarddane cEva puzyasnAnaM samAcaret vf saM a
grahakallAla grahakallAla grahakallAla pu grahezu kallola iva rAhO trikA
grahakallola grahakallola grahakallola pu grahezu kalala iva rAhO bikA
granTakUwI granTakUwI granTakUwI strI granTasya kuwIva leKyasTAne trikA
granTakuwI granTakuwI granTakuwI strI granTasya kuwIva leKyasTAne trikA
granTiBada granTiBada granTiBada pu granTiM vastrAdigranTiM Binatti Bida aR upa sa gAwakAwA cOraBede aNguliM granTiBedasya Cedayet praTame grahe dvitIye hastacaraRI tftIye baDa marhati manuH utkzepakagranTiBedO karasaMdaMSahInakO kAryO dvitIyAparADe karapAdEkahInakO yAjYa
granTiBeda granTiBeda granTiBeda pu granTiM vastrAdigranTiM Binatti Bida aR upa sa gAwakAwA cOraBede aNguliM granTiBedasya Cedayet praTame grahe dvitIye hastacaraRO tftIye baDa marhatimanuH utkzepakagranTiBIdO karasaMdaMSahInakO kAryO dvitIyAparADe karapAdEkahInakO yAjYa
grasa grasa grasa BakzaRe BvA Atma saka sew grasate agrasizwa jagrase udit grasitvA grastvA grastaH himAMSumASu himAM SumASu grasate tanmfdimnaH sPuwaM Palam mAGaH sumahAntamapi sumahA ntamapi grAsaM grase labDaM yadfcCayA BA SA a ya imAM pfTivIM kftsnAM saMkzipya grasate punaH BA va Slo rAhugraste niSAkare BA va Slo grAsaH grasanam kvip DAtutvAnna dIrGaH grat grasO grasa iti grasa BakzaRe vA curA uBa pakze BvA para saka sew grAsayati grAsa yati te grasati ajigrasat ta agrAhIt agrAsIt agrasIt grAsayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre cakra grasitaH nuca na ca prApitamanyena grasedarTaM kaTaYcana manuH grasa BakzaRe BvA Atma saka sew grasate agrasizwa jagrase udit grasitvA grastvA grastaH himAM SumASu grasate tanmfdimnaH sPuwaM Palam mAGaH sumahA ntamapi grAsaM grase labDaM yadfcCayA BA SA a ya imAM pfTivIM kftsnAM saMkzipya grasate punaH BA va Slo rAhugraste niSAkare BA va Slo grAsaH grasanam kvip DAtutvAnna dIrGaH grat grasO grasa iti grasa BakzaRe vA curA uBa pakze BvA para saka sew grAsa yati te grasati ajigrasat ta agrAsIt agrasIt grAsayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakra grasitaH na ca prApitamanyena grasedarTaM kaTaYcana manuH
guDa guDa guDa rozaRe kyrA para saka sew guDnAti agoDIt jugoDa sewkatve pi na guRaH guDitvA gutsaH guDa krIqe BvA Atma aka sew goDate agoDizwa juguDe guDa vezwane divA para saka sew guDyati agoDIt jugoDa guDitvA guDa rozaRe kyrA para saka sew guDnAti agoDIt jugoDa sewkatve pi na guRaH guDitvA gutsaH guDa krIqe BvA Atma aka sew goDate agoDizwa juguDe guDa vezwane divA para saka sew guDyati agoDIt jugoDa guDitvA

guja guja guja DvanO tudA kuwA para aka sew gujati agujizwa jugoja pranigujati guja kUjane BvA para aka sew jojati agojIt jugeja guja kUjane BvA para saka sew idit guYjati aguYjIt juguYja guYjitam guYjaH gYjan guYjan gunaguna iti Dvanitamiha kUjanam na juguYja yaH kalamiti kala miti na guYjitaM tanna jahAra yanmanaH reRUn pupUrire guYjA juguYjuH karaGawwitAH BawwiH latAkuYjaM guYjanmadavadalipuYjaM capalayan guYjan mattamaDuvrataH sA da guja DvanO tudA kuwA para aka sew gujati agujizwa jugoja pranigujati guja kUjane BvA para aka sew jojati agojIt jugeja guja kUjane BvA para saka sew idit guYjati aguYjIt juguYja guYjitam guYjaH guYjan gunaguna iti Dvanitamiha kUjanam na juguYja yaH kala miti na guYjitaM tanna jahAra yanmanaH reRUn pupUrire guYjA juguYjuH karaGawwitAH BawwiH latAkuYjaM guYjanmadavadalipuYjaM capalayan guYjan mattamaDuvrataH sA da
gujjarI gujjarI gujja rja rI strI rAgiRIBede tatsvarUpaM saNgItadA uktaM yaTA SyAmA sukeSI malayadrumARAM mfdUllasatpallava talpayAtA SruteH svarARAM daDatI viBAgaM tantrImuKAt dakziRagurjja jja rIMyam kAlaBade tasyA gAnaM nizidDaM tatrEva nAwI gOqI varAwI ca gujja rjja rI de Sireva ca pUrvAhRe gAnametezA nizidDamiti ta dvidaH rAgaBede ca gujja rjarIrAgEkatAlItAlena gIyate gItago

gupa gupa gupa gopane saka Atma sew set kutsane svArTe san aniw kutsanamiha kutsAparvakanivfttistatra kutsApUrvakanivfttistatra aka nindanaYca tatra saka pApAt jugupsate jugupsasate agupsIzwa jugupsAM jugupasAM Page b baBUva Asa cakre jugupsitaH gopane gopate agopizwa ago pizwa jugupe AdviDAnErgupito vArhatEH mokzarakzitaH f taTA rAzwraM gupitaM kzatriyasya tatra nindArTatve jugupserannucApyenam jugupseranna cApye nam saMvaseyuSca sarvaSaH manuH yadA buDyati bodDavyaM lokavfttaM jugupsate BA va a gupa rakzaRe BvA saka para vew svArTe sArvaDAtuke nityasamAsaH nitya mAyaH ArdDaDAtuke vA gopAyati agopAyIt agopIt agopsIt agOpsIt gopAyAm baBUva Asa cakAra jugopa gopAyitaH guptaH guptiH gopAyanam gopanam jugopAtmAnamatrasnuH ju gopAtmAnamatrasnuH raGuH AtmAnaM satataM gopAyIta SrutiH jugopa gorUpaDarAmivorvImraGuH gorUpaDarAmivorvIm rapuH nEnaM gopsyati durbudDimadya bARahataM mayA BA BI Slo agopizwAM purolaNkAmagOptAM rakzasAM balam BawwiH yasya vANmanasI SudDe samyaggupte ca sarvadAmanuH sarvadA manuH gupa vyAkulatve divA aka para sew irit gupyati agupat agopot agopIt jugopa gupitaH gupa BAsane curA uBa aka sew gopayati te ajugupat aju gupat ta gopayAm baBUva Asu Asa cakAra cakre caturRAM gupaDAtunAmudAharaRaM caturRRA gupaDAtUnAmudAharaRa kavirahasye yaTAgopAyati kzitimimAM yaTA gopAyati kziti mimAM caturabDisImAM pApAjugupsata pApAjjugupsata udAramatiH sadEva sa dEva vittaM na gopayati yastu baRIyakeByo DIrona gupyati DIro na gu pyati mahatyapi kAryajAte kAryyajAte gupa gopane saka Atma set kutsane svArTe san aniw kutsanamiha kutsApUrvakanivfttistatra aka nindanaYca tatra saka pApAt jugupsasate agupsIzwa jugupasAM Page b baBUva Asa cakre jugupsitaH gopane gopate ago pizwa jugupe AdviDAnErgupito vArhatEH mokzarakzitaH f taTA rAzwraM gupitaM kzatriyasya nEnaM gopsyati durbudDimadya bARahataM mayA BA BI Slo agopizwAM purolaNkAmagOptAM rakzasAM balam BawwiH yasya vANmanasI SudDe samyaggupte ca sarvadA manuH gupa vyAkulatve divA aka para sew irit guqucI guqucI guqu qU cI strI guqa rakzaRe bA u U caw NIp svanAmaKyAtAyAM latAyAm tasyA utpattiguRAdikaM BAvapra uktaM yaTA hate tasmit surArAtO rAvaRe balagarvite devarAjaH sahasrAkzaH parituzwo ti rAGave tatra ye vAnarAH kecidrAkzasErnihitA raRe tAnindro jIvayAmAsa saMsicyAmftavfzwiBiH tato yezu pradeSezu kapigAtrAt paricyutAH pIyUMzavindavaH petusteByo jAtA guqU cikA guqUcI maDuparRI syAdamftA mftaballarI CinnA CinnaruhA CinnodBavA vatsAdanIti ca jIvantI tantrikA somA somavallI ca kuRqalI cakralakzaRikA DIrA viSalyA ca rasAyanI candrahAsI vayasTA ca maRqalI devanirmitA guqUcI kawukA tiktA svAdu pAkA rasAyanI saMgrAhiRI kazAyozRA laGvI balyA gnidIpanI dozatrayAmavfqdAhamehakAsAMSca pARqu tAm kAmalAkuzWavAtAsrajvarakrimivamIn haret prame haSvAsakAsorSaHkfcCrahfdrogvAtanut tatkalkaguRAH amftAyAH kftaM cUrRaM vAsasA pariSoDitam pfTak zoqaSa BAgA syurguqamAkzikasarpizAm yaTAgni Bakzavedetannaro hitamitASanaH nAsya kaScit BavedDyADirna jarA palita na ca na jvarA Page b vizamA nEva mehonAnilaraktakam na ca netragatA rogAH parametadrasAyanam meDAkaraM tridozaGnaM prayogA dasya budDimAn jIvedvarzaSataM sAgraM yaTEvAditijA staTeti tat patraguRAH guqUcIpatramAgneyaM sarvajvaraharaM laGu kazAyaM kawutiktaYca svAdupAkaM rasAyanam balyamuzRaYca saNgrAhi hanyAd dozatrayaM tfzAm dAhaprameha vAtAsrakAmalAkuzWapARqutAH guqUcI kawukA laGvo svAdupAkA rasAyanI saMgrA hiRI kazAyAzRA balyA tiktAgnidopinI kAmalA kuzWavAtAsrajvarapittakrimIn jayet Gftena vAtaM sahasA vivanDaM pittaM sitAQyA maDunA kaPaYca vAtAsrameraRqaka tElamiSrA SuRWyAmavAtaM SamayedguqUcI vEdyakam
guquco guquco guqu qU co strI guqa rakzaRe bA u U Gaw NIp svanAmaKyAtAyAM latAyAm tasyA utpattiguRAdikaM BAva pra uktaM yaTA hate tasmin surArAtO rAvaRe balagarvite devarAjaH sahasrAkzaH parituzwo ti rAGave tatra ye vAnarAH kecidrAkzasErnihitA raRe tAnindro jIvayAmAsa saMsivyAmftavfzwiBiH tato yezu pradeSezu kapigAtrAt paricyutAH pIyUzabindavaH petusteByo jAtA guqUcikA guqUcI maDuparRI syAdamftA mftabalarI CinnA CinnaruhA CinnodBavA vatsAdanIti ca jIvantI tantrikA somA somavalI ca kuRqalI cakralakzaRikA DIrA viSalyA ca rasAyanI candrahAsI vayasTA ca maRqalI devanirmitA guqUcI kawukA tiktA svAdupAkA rasAyanI saMgrAhaRI kazAyozRA laGvI valyA gnidIpanI dozatrayAmavfqdAhamehakAsAMScapARqutAm kAmalAkuzWavAtAsrajvarakrimivamIn haret pramehaSvAsakAsorSaHkfcCrahfdrogvAtanut tatkalkaguRAH amftAyAH kftaM cUrRaM vAsasA pariSoDitam pfTak zoqaSa BAgAH syu rguqamAkzikasarpizAm yaTAgni Bakzodetannaro hitamitASanaH nAsya kaScitBavedvyADirna jarA palitaM nuca na jvarA vizamA nEva mehonAnilaraktakam na ca netragatA rogAH parametadrasAyUtam meDAkaraM tridozaGnaM prayogAdasya budDimAn jIvedvarzaSataM sAgraM yaTEvAditijAstaTeti tat patraguRAH guqUcIpatramAgneyaM sarvajvaraharaM laGu kazAyaM kawutiktaYca svAdupAkaM rasAyanam valyamuzRaYca saNgrAhi hanyAd dozatrayaM tfzAm dAhapramehavAtAsrakAmalAkuzWapARqutAH guqUcI kawukA laGvo svAdupAkA rasAyanI saMgrAhiRo kazAyozRA balyA tiktAgnidIpino kAmalA kuzWavAtAsrajvarapittakrimIn jayet Gftena vAtaM sahasAvibanDaM pittaM sitAQyAmaDunA kaPaYca vAtAsrameraRqaka tElamiSrA SuRWyAmavAtaM SamayedguqUcI vEdyakam
gura gura gura vaDe gaTAYca baDe gatyAYca divA Atma saka sew gUryate agorizwa gUryyate ago rizwa jugora Idit gUrRaH gUrRRaH goraRam gura udyame tudA kuwA Atma aka sew gurate agurizwajugora agurizwa jugora guraRam Idit gUrRaH vede tu ni gUrtta ityeva izo havo gUrttatamAH f garvIM rUzasaH gUrvI ruzasaH SaradaSca gUrttAH f avagUrya avagUryya caret kfcCramatikfcCraM kfcCra matikfcCraM nipAtane smftiH yo bAhyaRAyAvaguret brAhmaRAyAva guret taM Satena yAtAyAt SrutiH CAndasaH padavyatyayaH evaM na kadAcid dvije tasmAdvidvAnavaguredapi manuH gura baDe gatyAYca divA Atma saka sew gUryyate ago rizwa jugora Idit gUrRRaH goraRam gura udyame tudA kuwA Atma aka sew gurate agurizwa jugora guraRam Idit gUrRaH vede tu ni gUrtta ityeva izo havo gUrttatamAH f gUrvI ruzasaH SaradaSca gUrttAH f avagUryya caret kfcCra matikfcCraM nipAtane smftiH yo brAhmaRAyAva guret taM Satena yAtAyAt SrutiH CAndasaH padavyatyayaH evaM na kadAcid dvije tasmAdvidvAnavaguredapi manuH
gurdda gurdda gu gU rdda kUrdane BvA Atma aka sew gUrdate agUrddizwa jUgUrde agU rddizwa jugUrde laGuyuktasya kvipi gUH gurO guraH dIrGAnvitasya gUH gUrO gUra iti BedaH gu gU rdda nivAse kUrdane ca curA uBa aka sew gu gU rdayati te ajugu gU rdat ta gu gU rdda kUrdane BvA Atma aka sew gUrdate agU rddizwa jugUrde laGuyuktasya kvipi gUH gurO guraH dIrGAnvitasya gUH gUrO gUra iti BedaH gu gU rdda nivAse kUrdane ca curA uBa aka sew gu gU rdayati te ajugu gU rdat ta

gurvI gurvI gurvI strI guru NIz garBavatyAm na hi vanDyA vijAnAti gurvIprasavavedanAm hito gOravayuktastrIliNgArTakapadArTe ca gurvIrajasraM dfzadaH samantAt mAGaH yattu ananyagurvAstava kena kevalam purARamUrtteH padye anyagurvyA iti pAWaM kalpayitvA Sabdaka udAjahAra tat prAmAdikaM na vidyate nyA gururyasyAstasyA anyagyagurvA ityanIkArAntaH pAWaH eva sADuH samAsAt prAN NIzi nadyftaScetipA kappratyayaH syAt paScAttu anupasarjanADikArAt voto guRavacanAditi na prApnotIti tadrUpasidDistu NIti hrasvaScetipA vA nadIsaMjYatvAyAm ARnadyAH pA ityAqAgamAt mali samAsAntasya viDeranityakalpanena kabaBAvakalpanasyAgatikavizaya eva svIkArAt atra taTA kalpane pi CandodozAprasaNgAt iti viBAvyam gurustriyAYca
gurvvAditya gurvvAditya gurvvAditya pu guruRA saha Adityo yatra jyoti zokte kAlASudDihetO ekarASyekanakzatrasTayorjIvAdi tyayoryogaBede gurvAditye daSAhikam jyo ta ekarASO gatO syAtAmekarkzavizaye yadi gurvAdityO tadA tyAjyA yajYodvAhAdikAkriyAH rAjamA gurvAditye daSAhe tviti nakzatraBedavizayam atyantA vaSyakatve BujabalaBImaH jIvo rkeRa yutaH karoti maraRaM bAlAMSuko BAguriH nakzatrEkagato vadanti maraRaM pAdasTito devalaH taTA ca ekarASisTatve kAlaH atya ntAvaSyakatve ekanakzatrapAdasTitO daSAhaM tyaktvA yajYAdi karttuM Sakyate iti vyabasTA
gurvvI gurvvI gurvvI strI guru NIz garBavatyAm na hi banDyA vijA nAti gurvIprasavavedanAm hito gOravayuktastrIliNgA rTakapadArTe ca gurvIrajasaM dfzadaH samantAt mAGaH Page b yattu ananyagurvAstava kena kevalam purARamUrtteH Ga pado anyagurvyA iti pAWaM kalpayitvA Sabdaka udAja hAra tat prAmAdikaM na vidyate nyA gururyasyAstasyA anyagyagurvA ityanIkArAntaH pAWaH eva sADuH samAsAt prAN NIzi nadyftaSceti pA kappratyayaH syAt paScAttu anupasarjanADikArAt voto guRavacanAditi na prApno tIti tadrUpasidDistu Niti hrasvaSceti pA vA nadI saMjYatkAyAm ARnadyAH pA ityAqAgamAt malli samAsAntasya viDeranityakalpanena kabaBAvakalpanasyAgatika vizayaeva svIkArAt atra taTA kalpane pi CandodozApra saNgAt iti viBAvyam gurustriyAYca

hakAraH hakAraH hakAraH zyaYjanezu UzmavarRaBedaH kaRWasTAnoccaryyaH hakAraM paYcamEryuktasantaHsTABiSca saMyutama OrasyaM taM vijAmIyAt kaRWyamAhurasaMyutam SikzokteH paYca mAdivarRamaMyoge urasoccAryyaSca tasyoccAraRe AByantara pravatnaH jihvAgreRa kaRWasTAnasya ardDasparSaH aco spfzwAyaRastIzannemaspfzwAH SalastazWeti SikzokteH bAhyaprayatnAstu GozasaMvAranAdA mahAprARaSca asya Dye yarUpaM kAmaDenutantrAktaM yaTA hakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi catuvargapadAyakam kuRqalIdvayasaMyuktaM raktavidyallato pam rajaHsattvatamoyuktaM paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcapARA tmakaM varRaM triSaktisahitaM sadA trivindasahitaM varRaM hfdi BAvaya pArvati asyADizWAtfdevatADyAnamuktaM varRodvAratantre yaTA karavIraBUzitAYca sAdfhAmAM diga mbarAm asTimAlyAmazwaBujAM varadAmamujekzaRAm na gendrahAraBUzAQyAM jawAmukuwamaRqitAm sarvasidDi prayAM nityAM DarmakAmArTamokzadAm evaM DyAtvA hakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet mAtfkanyAse pya dakzapAdenyamyatA kAzya zwO paTamaprayoge KedaHPalaM vf ra wIkAyAmuktaM yaTA maH mOKya hastu Kedama vinayamapi ca laM kzaH samfdDiM karoti akArAdivarRAnAM prayoge PalAdikaM yatra BavatIta tatrEvoktaM yaTA padyAdO gadyavaktre vacasi ca yakale prAkftAdO samo yam iti etezAM PalADAra nirUpaRamapyAkAre nAyako varRyate yatra PalaM tasya samA daSet anyaTA tu kfte kAvye kaverdozAvahaM Palam tasya pratiprasavo yaTA devatA varRyate yatra kvApi kAvye kavISvarEH mitrAmitravicAro vA na tatra Pala kalpanA devatAvAcakAH SabdA ye ca BadrAdivAcakAH te sarve nEva nindyAH syurlipito gaRatopi vA asya vAcakaSabdAstantrAktA yaTA haH Sivo gaganaM haso nAgaloko mbikApatiH nakulISo jagatprARaH prAReSaH kapilAmalaH paramAtma tmajo jIvaH varAkaH SAntido kulaH mfgo Bayo ruRaHsTARuH kUwakUpanivA rakAH lakzmIrhariharaH SamBuH prARasanDirlalAwajaH svakopavAraRa SUlI cEtanyaM pAdapUraRam mahAmakzmIH paraM nAdo maGanAdo vimardanaH vindurdurgA priya devI mecaSyAmaH maheSvaraH dakzapAdaH sadA SamBuH SyAmo yaH Page b sAmamaRqalam varRAMBizAnam SukraScATa hakAro MSuH prARaH SAntaH Sivo viyata akulo nakulISaSca haMsaH SUnyaYca hAkinI ananto nakulI jIvaH para mAtmA lalAwajaH iti vIjavarRABiDAtama hakArA nakulISo pi haMsaH prARo NkuSaH priye maheSo nakulI cEva varAko gaganaM raviH liNgaM gUvA mahASUnyaH prARaSca parameSvari rudrayAmale pazwale
haqiqaka haqiqaka haqiqaka pu haqika svArTe ka hAqi jAtiBede striyAM jAtitvAt Noz sa ca varReH sadyaScARqAlakanyAyAM newavIryeRa SOnaka baBUvatustO dvO putrO haqqikaH SORqikastaTA brahmavE vra Ka a
haqqika haqqika haqqika pu haqika svArTe ka hAqi jAtiBede striyAM jAtitvAt NIz sa ca vaRaH sadyaScARqAlakanyAyAM newavIryyeRa SOnaka baBUvatustO dvO putrO haqqikaH SORqikastaTA brahmavE vra Ka a
harAvalI harAvalI harAvalI strI hAra ivAvalI muktAvalyAM SfNgArahArAvalI iti gaNgAstavaH puruzottamakfte kozaBede ca
haragIrI haragIrI haragIrI strI haradehArdDaharA gOrI SA ta ardDanArI SvararUpe SivapArvatyormUrttiBede tallakzaRam pf dfSyam dvandva SivapArvatyoH dvi va
haragOrI haragOrI haragOrI strI haradehArdDaharA gOrI SA ta ardDanArISvararUpe SivapArvatyormUrttiBede tallakzaRam dfSyam dvandva SivapArvatyoH dvi va
harinetra harinetra harinetra na harernetramiva Svetapadme rAjani ta vizRorlocane hareH siMhasyeva netramasya dIrzatvAt pecake puMstrI trikA striyAM NIz
harineva harineva harineva na harernatramiva Svetapadme rAjani ta vizRorlocane hareH siMhasyeva netramasya dIrGatvAt pecake puM strI da trikA striyAM NIz
harya harya harya klame aka gatO saka BvA para sew haryati aharyIt
haryaSva haryaSva haryaSva pu harinAmA harivarRo vA Svo sya indre
haryakza haryakza haryakza puM strI hari piNgalamakzi yasya zacsamA siMhe amaraH striyAM NIz kubere ca jawA
haryya haryya haryya klame aka gatO saka BvA para sew haryati aha ryyIt
haryyaSva haryyaSva haryyaSva pu harinAmA harivarRo vA Svo sya indre
haryyakza haryyakza haryyakza puMstrI hari piNgalamakzi yasya zacsamA siMhe amaraH striyAM NIz kuvere ca jawA
hastabimba hastabimba hastabimba na hastasya bimbaM yatra sTAsake candanAdinA dehavilepanaviSeze hemaca
hastasUca hastasUca hastasUca na hastasya sUcamiva valaye hemaca
hastasUtra hastasUtra hastasUtra na hastasya sUtramiva valaye hemaca
hastavinya hastavinya hastavinya na hastasya vimbaM yatra strAsake candanAdinA dehavisepanaviSeze hemaca
hayaNgaza hayaNgaza hayaNgaza pu hayamuccEHSravasaM kazati kaza Kac mAtalO indrasAraTO trikA aSvacAlake ca
hayaNkaza hayaNkaza hayaNkaza pu hayamuccEHSravasaM kazati kaza Kac mAtalO indrasAraTO trikA aSvacAlake ca
hayaSIrza hayaSIrza hayaSIrza pu hayasyeva SIrzamasya vizRumUrttiBede hayaSIrza paYcarAtre tatpUjAdikaM dfSyam SAlagrABUrttiBede SAlagrAmaSabde pf dfSyam
hayagIrza hayagIrza hayagIrza pu hayasyeva SIrzamasya vizRu mUrttiBede hayaSIrza paYcarAtre tatpUjAdikaM dfSyam SAlagrABUrttiBede SAlagrAmaSabde dfSyam
hayavAhanasaNkara hayavAhanasaNkara hayavAhanasaNkara pu hayasya vAhanaM cAlanaM saNkirati sam kF ac raktakAYcane Sabdaca
hayavAhanasadBara hayavAhanasadBara hayavAhanasadBara pu hayasya vAhanaM cAlanaM saNkirati sam kF ac raktakAYcane Sabdaca
helaYcI helaYcI helaYcI strI hila GaY helaM cinoti ci qa pfzo gOrA NIz hilamocikAyAm Sabdaca
helaYco helaYco helaYco strI hila GaY helaM cinoti ci qa pfzo gArA NIz hilamocikAyAm Sabdaca
hemaSaNKa hemaSaNKa hemaSaNKa pu hemeva SuciH SaNKo sya vizRO trikA
hemaSaNkza hemaSaNkza hemaSaNkza pu hemeva SuciH SaNKo sya vizRO trikA
hematAra hematAra hematAra na hemaM tArayati utkfzwaM karoti tF Ric aR tutye hemaca
hematAraM hematAraM hematAraM na hena tArayati utkfzwaM karoti tF Ric aRa tutTe hemaca
hiRqIpriyatama hiRqIpriyatama hiRqIpriyatama pu ta Sive Sabdara hiRqIpatyAdayo pyatra
hiRqIpriyatrama hiRqIpriyatrama hiRqIpriyatrama pu ta Sive Sabdara hiRqIpatyA dayo pyatra
himabAlukA himabAlukA himabAlukA strI himasya bAlukeva karpUre amaraH
himabAluka himabAluka himabAluka pu himamayI bAlukeva aMSo yasya karpUre rAjani
himadurdin himadurdin himadurdin na himahetukaM durdinam SAka himapAtena duHKakare dine kujJawikAyuktadine trikA
himadurdina himadurdina himadurdina na himahetukaM durdinam SAka himapAtena duHKakare dine kujJawikAyuktadine trikA
himavAlukA himavAlukA himavAlukA strI himasya bAlukeva karpUre amaraH
himavAluka himavAluka himavAluka pu himamayI bAlukeva karpUre aMSo yasya karpUre rAjani
hiraRyabAha hiraRyabAha hiraRyabAha hu hiraRyaM vAhayati prApayati BaktAn hiraRyavarRo bAhuriva vA yasya mahAdeve SoRe nawaBede ca amaraH
hiraRyavAha hiraRyavAha hiraRyavAha bAhu hiraRyaM vAhayati prApayati BaktAn hiraRyavarRo vAhuriva vA yasya mahAdeve SoRe nawaBede ca amaraH
hlaga hlaga hlaga saMvaraRe BvA pa saka sew GawA edit sici na dDadDi hlagati ahlagIt
hramiman hramiman hramiman pu hrasvasya BAvaH imanic hrasAdeSaH hrasvatAyAm
hramimana hramimana hramimana pu hrasvasya BAvaH imanic hrasAdeSEH hrasvatAyAm
hu hu hu hIme adane ca ju pa saka aniw juhoti ahOzIt jahAva prIRane ca juhuDIha pAvakam kirA
huNkAra huNkAra hu hU NkAra pu hu hU mityavyaktaSabdasya kAraH kf GaY humityavyaktasya pratizeDasUcakaSabdasyoccAraRe mOnavrataM mahAkazwaM hu hU NkAreRApi naSyati iti purARam dIrTamaDyo pi
huhUNkAra huhUNkAra huhUNkAra pu hu hU mityavyaktaSabdasya kAraH kf GaY humityavyaktasya pratizeDasUcakaSabdasyoccAraRe mOnavrataM mahAkazwa hu hU NkAreRApi naSyati iti purARam dIrGamaDyo pi
i i i pu asya vizRorapatyam a iY kAmadeve sa hi rukmiRyAM vizRoraMSAt kfzRAt jAtaH tatkaTA yaTA rukmiRyAM rUkmiRyAM vAsudevAcca lakzmyAM kAmoDftavrataH SambarAntakaro SambarAnta karo jajYe pradyumnaH kAmadarSana kAmadarSanaH hari a evaM vyutpattimattvena kAmadevasyEva iSabdArTatA nABiRAzasyeti nABi RAzasyeti bahavaH kAmadevadEvatyAcca aBilAze OpacArika ityanye naYarTakasya a isyedam a iY Bede rozoktO rozo ktO nirAkaraRe anukampAyAm gade vismaye nindAyAm ni ndAyAm samboDane ca avya cAdi nipAtEkAckatvAt asya pragfhyasaMjYA tena i indra ityAdO na sanDiH i gatO BvAdi BbAdi para saka aniw ayati EzIt iyAya IyatuH iyatuH iyuH iyayiTa iyeTa ayan itaH itiH ayanam aya nam AyaH itvA udayati sma tadadBu tamAliBiH tadadButamAliBiH nEza ayamudayati mudrABaYjanaH padminInAm udBawaH udayati vitatordDvaraSmirajvO vitatordDaraSmirajvO mAGaH ayaYca DAtuH DAtaH Page a kawI gatO ityatra i I iti praSlezAt labDaH si kO i iHsU kzmA SAlmalI vidyA candraH pUzA suguhyakaH sumitraH sundaroDIraH kowarI kowaraHpayaH BrumaDyomADavastuzwi rdakzanetraYca nAsikA SAntaH kAntiH kAminI ca kA moviGnavinAyakaH nepAlo BaraRIrudronityaklinnA ca povakaH i ikAraM paramAnandaM suganDakusumacCavim haribrahmamayaM varRaM sadArudrayutaM priye sadA SaktimayaM devi gurubrahma mayaM taTA sadASivamayaM varRaM paraM brahmasamanvitam haribrahmAtmakaM varRaM guRatrayasamanvitam ikAraM parame SAni svayaM kuRqalImUrttikam i pu asya vizRorapatyam a iY kAmadeve sa hi rukmiRyAM vizRoraMSAt kfzRAt jAtaH tatkaTA yaTA rUkmiRyAM vAsudevAcca lakzmyAM kAmoDftavrataH SambarAnta karo jajYe pradyumnaH kAmadarSanaH hari a evaM vyutpattimattvena kAmadevasyEva iSabdArTatA nABi RAzasyeti bahavaH kAmadevadEvatyAcca aBilAze OpacArika ityanye naYarTakasya a isyedam a iY Bede rozo ktO nirAkaraRe anukampAyAm gade vismaye ni ndAyAm samboDane ca avya cAdi nipAtEkAckatvAt asya pragfhyasaMjYA tena i indra ityAdO na sanDiH i gatO BbAdi para saka aniw ayati EzIt iyAya iyatuH iyuH iyayiTa iyeTa ayan itaH itiH aya nam AyaH itvA udayati sma tadadButamAliBiH nEza ayamudayati mudrABaYjanaH padminInAm udBawaH udayati vitatordDaraSmirajvO mAGaH ayaYca DAtaH Page a kawI gatO ityatra i I iti praSlezAt labDaH si kO i iHsU kzmA SAlmalI vidyA candraH pUzA suguhyakaH sumitraH sundaroDIraH kowarI kowaraHpayaH BrumaDyomADavastuzwi rdakzanetraYca nAsikA SAntaH kAntiH kAminI ca kA moviGnavinAyakaH nepAlo BaraRIrudronityaklinnA ca povakaH i ikAraM paramAnandaM suganDakusumacCavim haribrahmamayaM varRaM sadArudrayutaM priye sadA SaktimayaM devi gurubrahma mayaM taTA sadASivamayaM varRaM paraM brahmasamanvitam haribrahmAtmakaM varRaM guRatrayasamanvitam ikAraM parame SAni svayaM kuRqalImUrttikam
iBAnana iBAnana iBAnana pu iBasyAmanamevAnanaM yasya gajAnane gaReSe tasya yaTA tadAnanatvaM taToktaM svayaM golakanATaSca puRyakasya praBAvataH pArvatIgarBajAtaSca tava putro Bavizyati svayaM devagaRAnAYca yasmAdISaH kfpAniDiH gaReSa iti viKyAto Bavizyati jagatraye SanidfzwyA SiracCedAt gajavaktreRa yojita gajAnanaH SiSustena niyatiH kena bADyate brahmavE pu a SanidfzwyA tacCiracCedakaTA tatrEva a pArvvatIvacanaM SrutvA so numena hfdA svayam paSyAmi kiM na paSyAmi pArvvatIsutamityaho yadi bAlo mayA vfzwastasya niGno Baved Druvam anyaTA me pralApastatparataH svAtmAmaraRam ityAlocya ca DarmizWo DarmaM kftvA svasAkziRam bAlaM drazwaM manaScakre na bAlamAtaraM SaniH vizaRamAnasaH pUrvaM SuzkakaRWIzWatAlukaH savyalocanakoRena dadarSa ca SiSormuKam SaniSca dfzwimAtreRa cicCeda mastakaM mune cakzurnivArayAmAsa tasTO namrAnanaH SaniH evaM SiraSCedamuktvA tAn sarvvAn mUrcCitAn dfzwvA cAruhya garuqaM hariH jagAma puzpaBadrAM sa uttarasyAM diSi sTitAm puzpaBadrAnadItIre dadarSa kAnanasTitam gajendraM nidritaM tatra SayAnaM hastinoyutam diSyuttarasyAM SirasaM mUrcCitaM surataSramAt paritaH SAvakAn kftvA paramAnandmAnasam SIGraM sudarSanenEva cicCeda tacCiro mudA sTApayAmAsa garuqe ruGirAktaM manoharam gajaSiraSCedamuktvA tatpatnayA stutena hariRA tasya kalpAntajIvanaM varodatta ityupavarRya Agatya bAlakasyAnaM bAlaM kftvA Ta vakzasi ruciraM tacCiraH kftvA yojayAmAsa bAlake brahmasvarUyI BagavAn brahmajYAnena lIlayA jIvanaM yojayABAsa huNkAroccAraRena ca pArvvatIM boDayitvA tu dattvA kroqe ca taM SiSum boDayAmAsa tAM nATa ADyAtmikaviboDanEH senAcarIBavadiBAnanadAnavArivAsena yasya janitAsuraBIraRaSrIH nEza iBavaktreBamuKagajAnanAdayo pyatra taM namAmi gajAnanam mADavaH
iBAnuna iBAnuna iBAnuna pu iBasyAnanamevAnanaM yasya gajAnane gaReSe tasya yaTA tadAnanatvaM taToktaM svayaM golakanATaSca puRyakasya praBAvataH pArvvatIgarBajAtaSca tava putro Bavizyati svayaM devagaRAnAYca yasmAdISaH kfpAniDiH gaReSa iti viKyA to Bavizyati jagattraye SanidfzwyA SiracCedAt gaja Page b vaktreRa yojitaH gajAnanaH SiSustena niyatiH kena bADyate brahmavE pu a SanidfzwyA tacCiraSCeda kaTA tatrEva a pArvvatIvacanaM SrutvA so nu mene hfdA svayam paSyAmi kiM na paSyAmi pArvvatIsuta mityaho yadi balo mayA dfzwastasya viGno maved Druvam anyaTA me pralApastatparataH KAtmaraRam ityA locya ca DarmizWo DarmaM kftvA svasAkziRam bAlaM drazwaM manaScakre na bAlamAtaraM SaniH vizaRRamAnasaH pUrvaM Suzka kaRWIzWatAlakaH savyalocanakoRena dadarSa ca SiSormu Kam SaniSca vfzwimAtreRa cicCeda mastakaM mune cakzurnivArayAmAsa tasTO namrAnanaH SaniH evaM SiraSCe damuktvA tAn sarvvAn mUrcCitAn dfzwvA cAruhya garuqaM hariH jagAma puzpaBadrAM sa uttarasyAM diSi sTitAm puzpaBadrAnadItIre dadarSa kAnanasTitam gajendraM nidritaM tatra SayAnaM hastinIyutam diSyuttarasyAM SirasaM mU rcCitaM surataSramAt paritaH SAvakAn kftvA paramAna ndamAnasam SIGraM sudarSanenEva cicCeda tacCiro mudA sTApayAmAsa garuqe ruGirAktaM manoharam gaja SiraSCedamuktvA tatpatnyA stutena hariRA tasya kalpAnta jIvanaM varodatta ityupavarRya Agatya bAlakasyAnaM bAlaM kftvA Ta vakzasi ruciraM tacCiraH kftvA yojayAmAsa bAlake brahmasvarUpI BagavAn brahmajYAnena lIlayA jIvanaM yojayABAsa huNkAroccAraRena ca pArvvatIM boDa yitvA tu dattvA kroqe ca taM SiSum boDayAmAsa tAM nATa ADyAtmikaviboDanEH senAcarIBavadiBAnanadAnavA rivAsena yasya janitAsuraBIraRaSrIH nEza iBavaktreBamuKa gamAnanAdayo pyatra taM namAmi gajAnanam mADavaH
idaNkAryA idaNkAryA idaNkAryA strI idaM kAryaM yasyAH durABAyAM Sabdaca etadrUpakAryAnvite tri
idaNkAryyA idaNkAryyA idaNkAryyA strI idaM kAryyaM yasyAH durAlaBAyAM Sabdaca etadrUpakAryyAnvite tri
ikzumUla ikzumUla ikzumUla pu ikzormUlaM granTiriva mUlaM granTiryasya vaMSavfkze ta ikzumUle tadgranTO na ikzumUla pu ikzurasatulyomehaH suSrutokte pramehaBede tadBedA viMSatirnidAnasahitAstatroktA yaTA divAsvapnavyAyAmA lasyaprasaktaM SItasnigDamaDuramadyadravAnnapAnasevinaM puruzaM jAnIyAtpramehI BavizyatIti tasya cEvaM pravfttasyAparipakvA eva vAtapittaSlezmARo yadA medasA sahEkatvamupetya mUtra vAhisrotAMsyanusftyADo gatvA vastermuKamASritya nirBidyante tadA pramehAn janayanti tezAntu pUrbbarUpARi hasta pAdataladAhaH snigDapicCilagurutA gAtrARAM maDura SuklamUtratA tandrA sAdaH pipAsA durganDaSca SvAsastAlu galajihvAdantezu malotpattirjawilIBAvaH keSAnAM vfdDiSca naKAnAm tatrAvilapraBUtamUtralakzaRAH sarvva eva sarvvaM Page a dozasamutTAH saha piqakABiH tatra kaPAdudakekzusurA sikatASanErlavaRapizwasAndraSukraPenamehAH daSa sADyA doza dUzyARAM samakriyatvAt pittAnnIlaharidrAmlakzAramaYji zWASoRitamehAH zaw yApyA dozadUzyARAM vizamakriya tvAt vAtAtsarpirvasAkzOdrahastimehAScatvAro sADyatamA mahAtyayikatvAt tatra vAtapittamedoBiranvitaH SlezmA SlezmapramehAn janayati vAtakaPaSoRitamedoBiranvitaM pittaM pittapramehAn kaPapittavasAmajjamedoBiranvito vAyurvvAtapramehAn tatra SvetamavedanamudakamehI mehati ikzurasatulyamikzumehI surAmehI surAtulyaM saru jam sikatAnuvidDaM sikatAmehI SanEH sakaPa mftsnaM SanErmehI saPenamacCaM nIlaM nIlamehI mehati sadAhaM haridrABaM haridrAmehI amlarasaganDamamlamehI sruta kzArapratiBaM kzAramehI maYjizWodakaprakASaM maYjizWAmehI SoRitaprakASaM SoRitamehI mehati ata jardDaM vasAmedoByAmaBipannaSarIrasya triBirdozEScAnugataDAtoH pramehiRo daSa piqakA jAyante tadyaTA SarAvikA sarzapikA kacCapikA jAlinI vinatA puttriRI masUrikA alajI vidArikA vidraDikA ceti SarAvamAtrA mahatyalpAcitA jYeyA piqakA sA tu puttriRI masUrasamasaMsTAnA jYeyA sA tu masUrikA raktAsitA Page b sPowavatI dAruRA tvalajI Bavet vidArI kandavadvfttA kaWinA ca vidArikA vidraDerllakzaREryuktA jYeyA vidraDikA buDEH ye yanmayAH smftA mehAstezAmetAstu tatkftAH gude hfdi SirasyaMse pfzWe marmmaRi cotTitAH sopa dravA durbbalasya piqakAH parivarjjayet kftsnaM SarIraM nizpIqya medomajjavasAyutaH aDaH prakramate vAyustenA sADyAstu vAtajAH pramehapUrbbarUpARAmAkftiryatra dfSyate kiYciccApyaDikaM BUtraM taM pramehiRamAdiSet kftsnAnya rqAni vA yasmin pUrbbarUpARi mAnave pravfttaBUtramatyarTaM taM pramehiRamAdiSet piqakApIqitaM gAQamupasfzwa mupadravEH maDumehinamAcazwe sa cAsADyaH prakIrttitaH sa cApi gamanAt sTAnaM sTAnAdAsanamicCati AsanAdvf Rute SayyAM SayanAt svapnamicCati yaTAhi varRRAnAM paYcA nAmutkarzApakarzakftena saMyogaviSezeRa SavalabaBrukapilakapo tamecakAdInAm varRAnAmanekezAmutpattirBavati evameva do zaDAtumalAhAraviSezeRotkarzApakarzakftena saMyogaviSezeRa Bavati cAtra sarvaeva pramehAstu kAlenApratikAriRaH maDumehatvamAyAnti tadA sADyA Bavanti hi tatrEva cikit sAsTAne sarvapramehasya prakArAntareRa dvEviDyamuktam yaTA dvO pramehO sahajo paTyanimittaSca BavataH tatra sahajomAtfpitfvIjadozakftaH ahitAhArajo paTyani mittaH tayoH pUrvveRopadrutaH kfSorUkzo lpASI pipAsurBfSaM parisaraRaSIlaSca Bavati uttareRa sTUlobahvASI snigDaH SayyAsanasvapnaprAyeReti tatrodakamehinaM pArijAta kazAyaM pAyayet ikzumehinaM vEjayantI kazAyam ca suSru ikzumUla pu ikzormUlaM granTiriva mUlaM granTiryasya vaMSavfkze ta ikzumUle tadgranTO na ikzumUla pu ikzurasatulyomehaH suSrutokte pramehaBede tadBedA viMSatirnidAnasahitAstatroktA yaTA divAsvapnavyAyAmA lasyaprasaktaM SItasnigDamaDuramadyadravAnnapAnasevinaM puruzaM jAnIyAtpramehI BavizyatIti tasya cEvaM pravfttasyAparipakvA eva vAtapittaSlezmARo yadA medasA sahEkatvamupetya mUtra vAhisrotAMsyanusftyADo gatvA vastermuKamASritya nirBidyante tadA pramehAn janayanti tezAntu pUrbbarUpARi hasta pAdataladAhaH snigDapicCilagurutA gAtrARAM maDura SuklamUtratA tandrA sAdaH pipAsA durganDaSca SvAsastAlu galajihvAdantezu malotpattirjawilIBAvaH keSAnAM vfdDiSca naKAnAm tatrAvilapraBUtamUtralakzaRAH sarvva eva sarvvaM Page a dozasamutTAH saha piqakABiH tatra kaPAdudakekzusurA sikatASanErlavaRapizwasAndraSukraPenamehAH daSa sADyA doza dUzyARAM samakriyatvAt pittAnnIlaharidrAmlakzAramaYji zWASoRitamehAH zaw yApyA dozadUzyARAM vizamakriya tvAt vAtAtsarpirvasAkzOdrahastimehAScatvAro sADyatamA mahAtyayikatvAt tatra vAtapittamedoBiranvitaH SlezmA SlezmapramehAn janayati vAtakaPaSoRitamedoBiranvitaM pittaM pittapramehAn kaPapittavasAmajjamedoBiranvito vAyurvvAtapramehAn tatra SvetamavedanamudakamehI mehati ikzurasatulyamikzumehI surAmehI surAtulyaM saru jam sikatAnuvidDaM sikatAmehI SanEH sakaPa mftsnaM SanErmehI viSadaM lavaRatulyaM lavaRamehI hfzwaromA pizwa rasatulyaM pizwamehI AvilaM sAndraM sAndramehI SukratulyaM SukramehI stokaM stokaM saPenaM PenamehI mehati ata UrdDaM pittanimittAnvakzyAmaH saPenamacCaM nIlaM nIlamehI mehati sadAhaM haridrABaM haridrAmehI amlarasaganDamamlamehI sruta kzArapratiBaM kzAramehI maYjizWodakaprakASaM maYjizWAmehI SoRitaprakASaM SoRitamehI mehati ata jardDaM vAta nimittAnvakzyAmaH sarpiH prakASaM sarpirmehI mehati vasAprakASaM vasAmehI kzOdrarasavarRaM kzOdramehI mattamAtaNga vadanupravfdDaM hastimehI mehati makzikopasarpaRamAlasyaM mAMsopacayaH pratiSyAyaH SETilyArocakAvipAkAH kaPapra sekacCarddinidrAkAsaSvAsASceti SlezmajAnAmupadravAH vfza RayoravadaraRaM vastiBedo meQratodo hfdiSUlamamlIkAjvarA tIsArArocakA vamaTuH pariDUmAyanaM dAho mUrcCA pipAsA nidrAnASaH pARqurogaH pItaviRmutranetratvaYceti pEtti kAnAm hfdgraho lOlyamanidrA stamBaH kampaH SUlaM badDa purozatvaYceti vAtajAnAm evamete viMSatiH pramehAH sopadravA vyAKyAtAH tatra vasAmedoByAmaBipannaSarIrasya triBirdozEScAnugataDAtoH pramehiRo daSa piqakA jAyante tadyaTA SarAvikA sarzapikA kacCapikA jAlinI vinatA puttriRI masUrikA alajI vidArikA vidraDikA ceti SarAvamAtrA tadrUpA nimnamaDyA SarAvikA gOrasarzapa saMsTAnA tatpramARA ca sarzapI sadAhA kUrmmasaMsTAnA jYeyA kacCapikA buDEH jAlinI tIvradAhA tu mAMsa jAlasamAvftA mahatI piqakA nIlA piqakA vinatA smftA mahatyalpAcitA jYeyA piqakA sA tu puttriRI masUrasamasaMsTAnA jYeyA sA tu masUrikA raktAsitA Page b sPowavatI dAruRA tvalajI Bavet vidArI kandavadvfttA kaWinA ca vidArikA vidraDerllakzaREryuktA jYeyA vidraDikA buDEH ye yanmayAH smftA mehAstezAmetAstu tatkftAH gude hfdi SirasyaMse pfzWe marmmaRi cotTitAH sopa dravA durbbalasya piqakAH parivarjjayet kftsnaM SarIraM nizpIqya medomajjavasAyutaH aDaH prakramate vAyustenA sADyAstu vAtajAH pramehapUrbbarUpARAmAkftiryatra dfSyate kiYciccApyaDikaM BUtraM taM pramehiRamAdiSet kftsnAnya rqAni vA yasmin pUrbbarUpARi mAnave pravfttaBUtramatyarTaM taM pramehiRamAdiSet piqakApIqitaM gAQamupasfzwa mupadravEH maDumehinamAcazwe sa cAsADyaH prakIrttitaH sa cApi gamanAt sTAnaM sTAnAdAsanamicCati AsanAdvf Rute SayyAM SayanAt svapnamicCati yaTAhi varRRAnAM paYcA nAmutkarzApakarzakftena saMyogaviSezeRa SavalabaBrukapilakapo tamecakAdInAm varRAnAmanekezAmutpattirBavati evameva do zaDAtumalAhAraviSezeRotkarzApakarzakftena saMyogaviSezeRa Bavati cAtra sarvaeva pramehAstu kAlenApratikAriRaH maDumehatvamAyAnti tadA sADyA Bavanti hi tatrEva cikit sAsTAne sarvapramehasya prakArAntareRa dvEviDyamuktam yaTA dvO pramehO sahajo paTyanimittaSca BavataH tatra sahajomAtfpitfvIjadozakftaH ahitAhArajo paTyani mittaH tayoH pUrvveRopadrutaH kfSorUkzo lpASI pipAsurBfSaM parisaraRaSIlaSca Bavati uttareRa sTUlobahvASI snigDaH SayyAsanasvapnaprAyeReti tatrodakamehinaM pArijAta kazAyaM pAyayet ikzumehinaM vEjayantI kazAyam ca suSru
ikzumeha ikzumeha ikzumeha pu ikzurasatulyo mehaH suSrutokte pramehaBedeH tadBedA viMSatirnidAnasahitAstatroktAH yaTA divAsvapnavyAyAmAlasyaprasaktaM SItasnigDamaDuramadyadravAnnapAnasevinaM puruzaM jAnIyAtpramehI BavizyatIti tasya cEvaM pravfttasyAparipakkA eva vAtapittaSlezmARo yadA medasA sahEkatvamupetya mUtravAhisrotAMsyanusftyADo gatvA vastermuKamASritya nirBidyante tadA pramehAn janayanti SlezmajAnAmupadravA vfzaRayoravadaraRaM vastiBedo meQratodo hfdiSUlamamlIkAjvarAtIsArArocakA vamuTu pariDUmAyanaM dAho mUrcCA pipAsA niwrAnASaH pARquromaH pItavizRutranetratvaYceti pEttikAnAm hfdgraho lOlyamaniwrA stamBaH kamyaH SUlaM badDapurIzatvaYceti vAtajAnAm evamete viMSatiH pramehAH sopadravA vyAKyAtAH tatra vasAmedoByAmaBipannaSarIrasya triBirdozEScAnugataDAtoH pramehiRo daSa piqakA jAyante tadyaTA SarAvikA sarzapikA kacCapikA jAlino vinatA puttriRI marUrikA alajI vidArikA vidraDikA ceti SarAvamAtrA tadrUpA nimnamaDyA SarAvikA gOrasarzapasaMsTAnA tatpramARAM ca sarzapI sadAhA kUrmmasaMsTAnA jYeyA kacCapikA buDEH jAlinI tIvradAhA tu mAMsajAlasamAvftA mahatI piqakA nIlA piqakA vinatA smftA sahatvalyAvitA jYeyA piqakA sA tu puttriRI masUrasamataMsTAnA jYeyA sa tu masUrikA raktAsitA sPowavatI dAruRA tvalajI Bavet vidArI kandavadvfttA kaWinA ca vidArikA vidraDerllakzaREryuktA jYeyA vidraDikA buDEH ye yanmayAH smftA mehAstezAmetAstu tatkftAH gude hfdi SirasyaMse pfzWe marmmaRi cItTitAH sopadravA durbbalasya piqakAH parivarjjayet kftasnaM SarIraM nizpIdya medomajjavasAyutaH aDaH pakramate vAyustenAsADyAstu vAtajAH pramehapUrbbarUpARAmAkftiryatra dfSyate kiYciccApyaDikaM mUtraM taM pramehiRamAdiSet kftasnAnyardDAni vA yasmin pUrbbarUpARi mAnave pravfttamUtramatyarTaM taM pramihiRamAdiSet piqakApIqitaM gAQamupasfzwasupadravEH maDumehinamAcazwe sa cAsADyaH prakIrttitaH sa cApi gamanAt sTAnaM sTAnAdAsanamicCati AsanAdvfRute SayyAM SayanAt svapramicCati yaTAhi varRAnAM paYcAnAmutkarzApakarzakftena saMyogaviSezeRa SavalabaBrukapilakapotamecakAdInAm varRAnAmanekezAmutpattirBavati evameva dovaDAtumalAhAraviSezeRotkarzApakarzakftena saMyogaviSezeRa Bavati cAtra sarvaeva pramehAstu kAlenApratikAriRaH maDumehatvamAyAnti tadA sADyA Bavanti hi tatrEva cikitsAsTAne sarvapramehasya prakArAntareRa dvEviDyamuktam yaTA dvO pramehO sahajo paTyanimittaSca BavataH tatra sahajomAtfpitfvIjadozakftaH
