ikzupatra ikzupatra ikzupatra pu ikzoH patramiva patramasya janAra DAnyaBede
iliSa iliSa iliSa pu ilISa pf ilISamatsye iliSa
illiSa illiSa illiSa pu ilISa pf ilISamatsye iliSa
indrAdfSa indrAdfSa indrAdfSa pu indrasyevAdarSanamasya A dfSa wak ta indragope kIwe tataH tAlA vikAre aY EndrAdfSa stadvikAre tri
indrAwwaSa indrAwwaSa indrAwwaSa pu indrasyavAdarSanamasya A dfSa wak ta indragope kowe tataH tAlA vikAre aY EndrAdfSa stadvikAre tri
indraBahakAmuka indraBahakAmuka indraBahakAmuka pu indramahe varzAdikAle kAmukaH kAmayitA kukvure varzAdAveva tezAM vyavAya Darmmo lokaprasidDaH
indramahakAmuka indramahakAmuka indramahakAmuka pu indramahe varzAdikAle kAmukaH kAma yitA kukvure varzAdAbeva tezAM vyavAyaDarmmolokaprasidDaH
indraparRI indraparRI indraparRI strI indra iva lIlaM parRamasyAH jAtitvAt NIy ozaDiBede kAlAnusAryyagurukocamuYjArAmnASIta SivendraparRyaH suSru
indraparRRI indraparRRI indraparRRI strI indra iva lIlaM parRRamasyAH jAtitvAt NIy ozaDiBede kAlAnusAryyagurukocamuYjArAsnASIta SivendraparRRyaH suSru
indrapuzpI indrapuzpI indrapuzpI strI indra iva nIlaM puzpamasyAH jAtitvAt NIp vizalANgalA jANgalIvfkze arkAlarkakaraYjadvayanAgadantI mayUrakaBArgIrAsnendrapuzpIkzudraSvetetyAdi suSrutaH vA kapi atEttve indrapuzpikApyatra
indrapuzpO indrapuzpO indrapuzpO strI indra iva nIlaM puzpamasyAH jAtitvAt NIp vizalANgalA jANgalIvfkze arkAlarkakaraYjadvayanAgadantImayUrakaBArgIrAsnendrapuzpIkzudraSvetetyAdi suSrutaH vA kapi ata ittve indrapuzpakApyatra
indrasenAnI indrasenAnI indrasenAnI pu indrasenAM nayati nI kvip ta Sakrasya senApatO kArttikeye tatkaTA kArtiyena parAjitenendreRa kArttikAya indratvapadaM dAtumIhamAnena saha tasya uktipratyukti varRanena tena tatsenApatyamamaNgIkftametat BA va a varRRita yaTA SakrOvAca Bavasvendro mahAvAho sarvvezAM naH suKAvahaH aBizicyasvacEvAdya prAptarUpo si sattama SADi tvameva trElokyamavyagrovijaye rataH ahante kiNkaraH Sakrona mamendratvamIpsitam balaM tavAdButaM vIra tvaM devA nAmarIn jahi avajYAsyanti mAM lokA vIryyeRa tava vismitAH indratvaM tu sTitaM vIre balahInaM parAjitam AvayoSca miToBedaM prayayizyantyatandritAH Bedite ca tvayi Page b viBo lokodvEDamupEzyati dviDABUtezu lokezu niScitezvA vayostadA vigrahaH maMpravartteta BUtaBedAnmahAvala tatra tvaM mAM raRe tAta yaTASradDaMvijezyasi tasmAdindro BavAneva BavitA mA vicAraya skanda uvAca tvameva rAjA Badrante trElokyasya mamEva ca karomi kiYcate Sakra SAsanaM tadbravIhi me indra uvAca ahamindro BavizyAmi tava vAkyAnmahAbala yadi satyamidaM vAkyaM niScayAdBAzitaM tvayA yadi vA SAsanaM skanda karttumi cCasi me SfRu aBizicyasva devAnAM senApatye mahAbala skanda uvAca dAnavAnAM vinASAya senApatye BiziYca mAm BA va a SakrasenApatiSakrasenADi pAdayo pyatra SakrasenApatiH skandaH pu
indrasenAnO indrasenAnO indrasenAnO pu indrasenAM nayati nI kvip ta Sakrasya senApatO kArttikeye tatkaTA kArttikeyena parAjitenendreRa kArttikAya indratvapadaM dAtumIhamAnena saha tasya uktipratyukti varRanena tena tatsenApatyamanaNgIkftametat BA va a varRitaM yaTA SakrauvAca Bavasvendro mahAbAho sarvvezAM naH suKAvahaH aBizicyasva cEvAdya prAptarUpo si sattama SADi tvameva trElokyamavyagro vijaye rataH ahante kiNkaraH Sakro na mamendratvamIpsitam balaM tavAdButaM vIra tvaM devA nAmarIn jahi avajYAsyanti mAM lokA vAryyeRa tava vismitAH indratvaM tu sTitaM vIre balahInaM parAjitam AvayoSca miTo BedaM praTayizyantyEndritAH Bedite ca tvayi viBo loko dvEDamupEzyati dviDABUtezu lokezu niScitezvAvayostadA vigrahaH saMpravartteta BUtaBedAnmahAbala tatra tvaM mAM raRe tAta yaTASradDaM vijezyasi tasmAdindro BavAneva BavitA mA vicAraya skanda uvAca tvameva rAjA Badrante trElokyasya mamEva ca karomi kiYca te Sakra SAsanaM tadbravIhi me indra uvAca ahamindro BavizyAmi tava vAkyAnmahAbala yadi satyamidaM vAkyaM niScayAdBAzitaM tvayA yadi vA SAsanaM skanda karttumicCasi me SfRu aBizicyasva devAnAM senApatye mahAbala skanda uvAca dAnavAnAM vinASAya senApatye BiziYca mAm BA va a SakrasenApatiSakrasenADipAdayo pyatra SakrasenApatiH skandaH pu
indrastut indrastut indrastut pu indraHstUyate tra indrastutyaDikaraRe ukTya yajYe dvitIyAhe indrastudukTyo dvitIyamaharBavati indrovE sarvvedevAH sarvvezAM devAnAmAptyO tasyEndrAgrahA BabantyOndryaH purorucaH sarvvamEndramasaditi Sata ayamukTyasADyaH tadupakramaeva kAtyA traya ukTyA agnizwutindrastut sUryyastut ityaBiDAnAt
indrastuta indrastuta indrastuta pu indraHstUyate tra indrastutyaDikaraRe ukTya yajYe dvitIyAhe indrastudukTyo dvitIyamaharBavati indro vE sarvve devAH sarvvozAM devAnAmAptyO tasyEndrAgrahA BavantyOndryaH purorucaH sarvamEndramasaditi Sata ayamukTyasADyaH tadupakramaeva kAtyA traya ukTyA agnizwut indrastut sUryyastut ityaBiDAnAt
indriyabaDa indriyabaDa indriyabaDa pu indriyARAM baDaH svasvakAryyezu SaktiviDAtaH indriyARAM svasvakAryyAnukUlaSaktipratiGAte te ca ekAdaSaDA yaTAha sAM kA kOmudyoH ekAdaSendriyabaDAH saha budDibaDEraktiruddizwA kA ekAdaSendriyabaDAH svasva kAryye vEkalyarUpAH tacca bADiryyamityAdi kO vAkyam aSaktiSabde pfzWe udAhftam
indriyavaDa indriyavaDa indriyavaDa pu indriyARAM vaDaH svasvakAryyezu SaktiviDAtaH indriyARAM svasvakAryAnukUlaSaktipratiGAte te ca ekAdaSaDA yaTAha sAM kA kOmudyoH ekAdaSendriyavaDAH saha budDivaDESaktiruddizwA kA ekAdaSendriyavaDAH svasvakAryye vEkalyarUpAH tacca bADiryyamityAdi kO vAkyam aSaktiSabde udAhftam
irya irya irya tri ira kaRqvA ac vede ni na yalopadIrGO prerake yUyaM rAjAnamiryya janAya viBvatizWam f
iryya iryya iryya tri ira kaRqvA ac vede ni na yalopadIrGO prerake yUyaM rAjAnamiryyaM janAya viBvatizWam f
iva iva iva vyAptO prIRane ca idit BvA para saka sew invati EnvIt invakAH iva avya inva niru ka sAdfSye utprekzAyAm utprekza yAm IzadarTe vAkyAlaNkAradyotakatA cAsya tatra upamAyAm ivena nityasamAso viBaktyalopaSceti nitya samAsoviBaktyalopaSceti vArtti ukternityasamAsaH viBakterlopABAvaSca viBa kterlopABAvaSca sa ca samAsasvarArTa eva vAgarTAvivasaMpfktO vAgarTAviva saMpfktO vAgarTapratipattaye raGuH haMsIva kfzRa te kArttiH svargaNgAmavagAhate candrAlokaH etat prayoge etatprayoge SrOtI upamA SrOtI yaTeva yaTevavASabdA ivArye vA SabdA ivArTe vA vAtiryadi vatiryadi sA da ukteH utprekzAyAm guRA guRAnubanDitvAt tasya saprasavA iva raGuH gaNgAmBasi suratrARa kfpARastava niHsvanaH snAtIvArivaDUvargagarBapAtanapAtakI muKameRIdfSoBAti pUrRacandraivAparaH pUrRacandrEvAparaH sA da ivAdiSabdaprayoge utprekzAyA vAcyatvam vAcyevAdiprayoge syAdaprayoge parA punaH sA da ukteH vAkyAlaNgAre vAkyAlaNkAre sarvadA ka iva vA sahizyatekirA sahi zyate kirA kimiva hi maDurARAM maRqanaM nAkftInAm Saku sfjati sA kiyatImiva na vyaTAm nEza IzadarTe tadastiparyuzitamiva Sata brA AvarjitA kiYcidiva stanAByAm kumA avaDAraRArTe ca Sriye pUzannizukftevadevAH pUzunnizu kfte vadevAH f izkfteva ivaSabda evArTe BA SlakzReva tu vA ISvarA Sata brA iva Sabdo ivaSabdo vaDAraRArTe BA iva vyAptO prIRane ca idit BvA para saka sew invati EnvIt invakAH iva avya inva niru ka sAdfSye utprekza yAm IzadarTe vAkyAlaNkAradyotakatA cAsya tatra upamAyAm ivena nitya samAsoviBaktyalopaSceti vArtti ukternityasamAsaH viBa kterlopABAvaSca sa ca samAsasvarArTa eva vAgarTAviva saMpfktO vAgarTapratipattaye raGuH haMsIva kfzRa te kArttiH svargaNgAmavagAhate candrAlokaH etatprayoge SrOtI upamA SrOtI yaTevavASabdA ivArye vA vatiryadi sA da ukteH utprekzAyAm guRA guRAnubanDitvAt tasya saprasavA iva raGuH gaNgAmBasi suratrARa kfpARastava niHsvanaH snAtIvArivaDUvargagarBapAtanapAtakI muKameRIdfSoBAti pUrRacandrEvAparaH sA da ivAdiSabdaprayoge utprekzAyA vAcyatvam vAcyevAdiprayoge syAdaprayoge parA punaH sA da ukteH vAkyAlaNkAre sarvadA ka iva vA sahi zyate kirA kimiva hi maDurARAM maRqanaM nAkftInAm Saku sfjati sA kiyatImiva na vyaTAm nEza IzadarTe tadastiparyuzitamiva Sata brA AvarjitA kiYcidiva stanAByAm kumA avaDAraRArTe ca Sriye pUzunnizu kfte vadevAH f izkfteva ivaSabda evArTe BA SlakzReva tu vA ISvarA Sata brA ivaSabdo vaDAraRArTe BA
izwAKa izwAKa izwAKa tri izwo Sroyasya priyahaye rAjaBede pu kimizwASva izwaraSmiretaH f izwASva etannAmako rAjA BA
izwASva izwASva izwASva tri izwo Svoyasya priyahaye rAjaBede pu kimizwASva izwaraSmiretaH f izwASva etannAmako rAjA BA
izwin izwin izwin tri izwamanena izwA ini kftayAge aDvarezvi zwinAM pAtA BawwiH
jAJAla jAJAla jAJA wa la pu ja Ja wa saMDAte DaY taM lAti lAbA qi vfkzaBede amaraH
jAJAli jAJAli jAJA wa li pu ja Ja wa saMDAte GaY ta lAti lA bA qi vfkzaBede amaraH
jAWarya jAWarya jAWarya tri jaWare BavaH bA Yya jaWaraBave rogAdO etannavAyasametena jAWaryaM na Bavati sanno gnirApyAyate suSru
jAWaryya jAWaryya jAWaryya tri jaWare BavaH bA Yya jaWaraBave rogAdO etannavAyasametena jAWaryyaM na Bavati sanno gnirApyA yate suSru
jAgaryA jAgaryA jAgaryA strI jAgf BAve kyap guRaH jAgaraRe a jAgarApyatra strI amaraH
jAgaryyA jAgaryyA jAgaryyA strI jAgf BAve kyap guRaH jAgaraRe a jAga rApyatra strI amaraH
jAlApra jAlApra jAlApra na BezajaBede jAlAzeRABiziYcata jAlAzeRopasi Ycata jAlAzamugraM BezajaM tena no mfqa jIvaTa aTa
jAlAza jAlAza jAlAza na BezajaBede jAlAzeRABiziYcata jAlAzeRopasiYcata jAlAzamugraM BezajaM tena no mfqa jIvaTa aTa
jAlagarddaBa jAlagarddaBa jAlagarddaBa pu kzudarogaBede kzudrarIgaSabde pf dfSyam
jAlagoRikA jAlagoRikA jAlagoRikA jAlamiva goRI yatra kap hrasvaH daDima nTanaBARqe trikA
jAlagopikA jAlagopikA jAlagopikA jAlamiva goRI yatra kap hrasvaH daDimaH nyanaBARqa trikA
jAlahnada jAlahnada jAlahnada tri jalapracuro hradaH tatra BavaH tasyedaM vA SivA aR jala cuhradaBave tatsasvanDini ca striyAM NIp
jAlahrada jAlahrada jAlahrada tri jalapracuro hradaH tatra BavaH tasyedaM vA SivA am jalAcurahradaBave tatsambanDini ca striyAM NIp
jAlakzIrya jAlakzIrya jAlakzIrya na jAle jAlake kzoraM tatra sADu yat kzIravize vfkzaBede sTAvaravizopakrame kusudaGnI snuhI jAlakzIryARi trIRi kzIravizaRi suSrutaH
jAlakzIryya jAlakzIryya jAlakzIryya na jAle jAlake kzIraM tatra sADu yat kzIra vize vfkzanede sTAvaravizopakrame kumudavnI snuhI jAlakzIryyARi troRi kzIrapiza Ri suSrutaH
jAlamardaBa jAlamardaBa jAlamardaBa pu ludUrogaBede kzudrarogaSabde dfSyam
jAlavarDuraka jAlavarDuraka jAlavarDuraka pu jAlAkAro DarvurakaH kAzwAvAvalA vfkzaBede jAlavarDurako rUkzo vAtarogakaPApahaH pittadAhakaraScozRaH kazAyaSca prakIrttitaH rAjani
jAtakarman jAtakarman jAtakarman na jAte karma putrajanmanimitte pitfkarttavyeputrasaMskAraBede tacca ASva gf darSite yaTA kumAraM jAtaM purA nyErAlamBAt sarpirmaDunI hiraRyanikAzaM hiraRyena prASayet prate dadAmi maDunI Gftasya vedaM savitrA prasUtaM mavonAm AyuzmAn guptodevatABiH SataM jIva Sarado loke asminniti sU idaM jAtakarma kumAragrahaRaM kumArInivfttyarTam nanu kumAryA api Bavatyeva jAtakarma kutaH vakzyati AvftEva kumAryAH iti ucyate pravAsAdAgatasya vihitaM karmAvftA Bavati na jAtakarma anantaratvAt evameke anye puranarAvftEva kumAryA ityetaduBayArTamiti vadanti tena kumAryA api jAtakarma Bavati manunApyuktam amantrikA tu kAryeyaMstrIRAmAvfdaSezataH iti tarhi kumAragrahaRaM kimarTam aDikArArTam azwame varze brAhmaRamupanayedityupanayanaM kumArasyEva yaTA syAt na kumAryA iti nanu brAhmaRamiti puMliNganirdeSAdeva na Bavizyati na jAtinirdeSe liNgamavivakzitam yaTA brAhmaRo na hantavya iti brAhmaRyapi na hanyate avamatrApi stirayAH prasajyate tannivfttyarTaM kumAragrahaRamiti jAtagrahaRamapyaDikArArTam godAnaM zoqaSe varze iti janmataH praBftizoqaSo yaTA syAt upanayanapraBfti mA BUditi purA purvamityarTaH anyagrahaRamanaDikftAlamBanAt prAk karma karttavyamityevamarTam sarpirmaDunI hiraRyena nikASayati te hiraRyasaMsfzwe hiraRyena prASayet mAturupasTa AsInaM pra te dadAmIti mantreRa nArA vf karRayorupaniDAya meDAjananaM japati maDAnte devaH savitA meDAM devI sarasvatI maDAnte aSvinO devAvADattAM puzkarasrajO sU asya karRayoH hiraRyaM viDAya meDAjananaM japati meDAnta iti upagrahaRaM tasya muKasamIpe AtmanomuKaM niDAya japArTaM meDA jananamityasya mantrasyAKyA sakfnmantraH paryAyeRopaniDAnamityeke anye mantrAvfttimicCanti nArA gArBErhomErjAtakarma cOqamOYjInivanDanEH prANnABivardDanAt puMso jAtakarma viDIyate manuH nABivardDanAt nABisambanDAt nIqIcCedanAt vEjavApiH janmano nantaraM kAryaM jAtakarma yaTAviDi dEvAdatItaH kAlaScet atIte sutake Bavet evaYca mfduDruvacarakzipraBezvezAmudaye pi vA gurO Sukre Ta vA kendre jAtakarma ca nAma ca iti jyotiHSAstrokte rdEvAt kAlotkarze veditavyam anutkarze pi vA gurO Sukre Ta vA kendre jAtakarma ca nAma ca iti jyotiHSAstrokte rdEvAt kAlotkarze veditavyam anutkarze pi nakzatrAdiniyamo na nEmittikasya nimittAntaraBAvitvena niravakASatvAt jyo ta
jAtakarmman jAtakarmman jAtakarmman na jAte karma putrajanmanimitte pitfkarttavye putrasaskAraBede tacca ASva gf darSitaM yaTA kumAraM jAtaM purA nyErAlamBAt sarpirmaDunI hiraRyanikAzaM hiraRyena prASayet pra te dadAmi maDunI Gftasya vedaM savitrA prasUtaM maGonAm AyuzmAn gupto devatABiH SataM jIva Sarado loke asmi nniti sU idaM jAtakarma kumAragrahaRaM kumArI nivfttyarTama nanu kumAryyA api Bavatyeva jAtakarma kutaH vakzyati AvftEva kumAryAH iti ucyate pravA sAdAgatasya vihitaM karmAvftA Bavati na jAtakarma anantaratvAt evameke anye puranarAvftEva kumAryA ityetaduBayArTamiti vadanti tena kumAryA api jAtakarma Bavati manunApyuktam amantrikA tu kAryyeyaM strIRAmAvfdaSezataH iti tahi kumAragrahaRaM kimarTam aDikArArTam azwame varze brAhmaRamupanayedityupanayanaM kumArasyeva yaTA syAt na kumAryA iti nanu brAhmaRamiti puMliNganirdeSA deva na Bavizyati na jAtinirdeSe liNgamaviva kzitam yaTA brAhmaRo na hantavya iti brAhmaRyapi Page b na hanyate evamatrApi striyAH prasajyate tannivfttyarTaM kumAragrahaRamiti jAtagrahaRamapyaDikArArTam go dAnaM zoqaSe varze iti janmataH praBftizoqaSoyaTA syAt upanayanapraBfti mA BUditi purA pUrvamityarTaH anya grahaRamanaDikftAlamBanAt prAk karma karttavyamityeva marTam sarpirmaDunI hiraRyena nikASayati te hiraRya saMsfzwe hiraRyena prASayet mAturupasTa AsInaM pra te dadAmIti mantreRa nArA vf karRayorupaniDAya meDAjananaM japati meDAnte devaH savitA meDAM devI sarasvatI meDAnte aSvinO devAvADattAM puzkarasrajO sU asya karRayoH hiraRyaM niDAya meDAjananaM japati meDAnta iti upagrahaRaM tasya muKasamIpe AtmanomuKaM niDAya japArTaM meDA jananamityasya mantrasyAKyA sakfnmantraH paryAyeRopa niDAnamityeke anye mantrAvfttimicCanti nArA gArBErhomErjAtakarmmacOqamOYjInivanDanEH prAN nABivardDanAt puMso jAtakarmma viDIyate manuH nABivardDanAt nABisambanDAt nAqIcCedanAt vEja vApiH janmano nantaraM kAryyaM jAtakarma yaTAviDi dEvAdatItaH kAlaScet atIte sutake Bavet evaYca mfduDruvacarakzipraBezvezAmudaye pi vA gurO Sukre Ta vA kendre jAtakarmma ca nAma ca iti jyotiHSAstrokte rdEvAt kAlotkarze veditavyam anutkarze pi nakzatrAdi niyamo na nEmittikasya nimittAntaraBAvitvena nirava kASatvAt jyo ta
jAtiDarma jAtiDarma jAtiDarma pu ta brAhmaRAdInAM DarmaBede sa ca BA SA a darSito yaTA brAhmaRasya tu yo Darmastante vakzyAmi kevalam imameva mahArAja DarmamAhuH purAtanam svADyAyAByasanaYcEva tatra karmasamApyate taYcedvittamupAgacCedvarttamAnaM svasvakarmaRi akurvARaM vikarmARi SAntaM prajYAnatarpitam kurvItApatyasantAnamaTo dadyAdyajeta ca saMviBajya hi BoktavyaM DanaM sadBiritIryate parinizWitakAryastu svADyAyenEva brAhmaRaH kuryAdanyanna vA kuryAnmEtro brAhmaRa ucyate kzatriyasyApi yo Darmastante vakzyAmi BArata dadyAdrAjanna yAceta yajeta na ca yAjayet nADyApayedaDIyIta prajASca paripAlayet nityodyukto dasyubaDe raRe kuryAt parAkramam ye tu kratuBirIjAnAH SrutavantaSca BUmipAH ya evAhavajetArasta ezAM lokajittamAH avikzatena dehena samarAdyo nivarttate kzatriyo nAsya tat karma praSaMsanti purAvidaH evaM hi kzattrabanDUnAM mArgamAhuH praDAnataH nAsya kftyatamaM kiYcidanyaddasyunibarhaRAt dAnamaDyayanaM yajYo rAjYAM kzemaM viDIyate tasmAdrAjYA viSezeRa yodDavyaM DarmamIpsatA svezu DarmezvavasTApya prajAH sarvA mahIpatiH DarmeRa sarvakftyAni SamanizWAni kArayet parinizWitakAryastu nfpatiH paripAlanAt kuryAdanyanna vA kuryAdEndro rAjanya ucyate vESyasyApi hi yo Darmastante vakzyAmi SASvatam dAnamaDyayanaM yajYaH SOcena DanasaYcayaH pitfvat pAlayedvESyo yuktaH sarvAn paSUniha vikarma tadBavedanyat karma yat sa samAcaret rakzayA sa hi tezAM vE mahat suKamavApnuyAt prajApatirhivESyAya sfzwvA paridadO paSUn brAhmaRAya ca rAjYe ca sarvAH paridade prajAH tasya vfttiM pravakzyAmi yacca tasyopajIvanam zaRRAmekAM pibedDenuM SatAcca miTunaM haret labDAcca saptamaM BAgaM taTA SfNge kalA Kure sasyAni sarvabIjAnAmezA sAMvatsarI BftiH na ca vESyasya kAmaH syAnna rakzayaM paSUniti vESye cecCati nAnyena rakzitavyAH kaTaYcana SUdrasyApi hi yo Darmastante vakzyAmi BArata prajApatirhi varRAnAM dAsaM SUdramakalpayat tasmAcCUdrasyavarRAnAM paricaryA viDIyate tezAM SuSrUzaRAccEva mahat suKamavApnuyAt SUdra etAn paricarettrIn varRAnanupUrvaSaH saYcayAMSca na kurvIta jAtu SUdraH kaTaYcana pApIyAn hi DanaM labDvA vaSe kuryAdgarIyasaH rAjYA vA samanujYAtaH kAmaM kurvIta DArmikaH tasya vfttiM pravakzyAmi yacca tasyopajIvanam avaSyaBaraRIyo hi varRAnAM SUdra ucyate CatraM vezwanamOSoramupAnadvyajanAni ca yAtayAmAni deyAni SUdrAya paricAriRe aDAryARi viSIrRAni vasanAni dvijAtiBiH SUdrAyEva pradeyAni tasya DarmaDanaM hi tat yacca kiYciddvijAtInAM SUdraH SuSrUzurAvrajet kalpyAM tasya tu tenAhurvfttiM Darmavido janAH deyaH piRqo napatyAya BarttavyO vfdDadurbalO SUdreRa tu na hAtavyo BarttA kasyAYcidApadi atirekeRa Barttavyo BarttA dravyaparikzaye na hi svamasti SUdrasya BartfhAryaDano hi saH uktastrayARAM varRAnAM yajYastasya ca BArata svAhAkAravazawkArO mantraH SUdre na vidyate tasmAcCUdraH pAkayajYEryajetAvratavAn svayam pUrRapAtramayImAhuH pAkayajYasya dakziRAm SUdraH pEjavano nAma sahasrARAM SataM dadO EndrAgnyena viDAnena dakziRAmiti naH Srutam yaTA hi sarvavarRAnAM yajYastasyEva BArata agryaH sarvezu yajYezu SradDAyajYo viDIyate dEvataM hi mahacCradDA pavitraM yajatAYca yat dEvataM hi paraM viprAH svena svena parasparam ayajanniha satrEste tEstEH kAmEH samAhitEH saMsfzwA brAhmaREreva trizu varRezu sfzwayaH devAnAmapi ye devA yadbruyuste paraM hitam tasmAdvarREH sarvayajYAH saMsfjyante na kAmyayA fgyajuHsAmavitpUjyo nityaM syAddevavadvijaH saNkIrRajAtiDarmastu manvAdyukto jAtiSabde darSitaH utsAdyante jAtiDarmAH kulaDarmASca SASvatAH gItA
jAtiDarmma jAtiDarmma jAtiDarmma pu ta brAhmaRAdInAM DarmaBede sa ca BA SA a darSito yaTA vrAhmaRasya tu yo Darmastante vakzyAmi kevalam imameva mahArAja DarmamAhuH purAtanam svADyAyABya sanaYcEva tatra karma samApyate taYcedvittamupAgacCedvarttamAnaM svasvakarmaRi akurvvARaM vikarmmARi SAntaM prajYAnatarpi tAma kurvvItApatyasantAnamaTo dadyAdyajeta ca saMviBajya hi BoktavyaM DanaM sadBiritIryyate parinizWitakAryyastu Page a svADyAvenEva brAhmaRaH kuryyAdanyanna vA kuryyAnmEtro brAhmaRa ucyate kzattriyasyApi yo Darmastante vakzyAmi BArata dadyAdrAjanna yAceta yajeta na ca yAjayet nADyApayedaDIyIta prajASca paripAlayet nityodyukto dasyubaDe raRe kuryyAt parAkramam ye tu kratuBirIjAnAH SrutavantaSca BUmipAH ya evAhavajetArasta ezAM loka jittamAH avikzatena dehena samarAdyo nivarttate kzattriyo nAsya tat karma praSaMsanti purAvidaH evaM hi kzattrabanDUnAM mArgamAhuH praDAnataH nAsya kftyatamaM kiYcidanyaddasyunivarhaRAt dAnamaDyayanaM yajYo rAjYAM kzemaM viDIyate tasmAdrAjYA viSezeRa yodDavyaM Darma mIpsatA svezu DarmezvavasTApya prajAH sarvvA mahIpatiH DarmeRa sarvakftyAni SamanizWAni kArayet parinizWita kAryyastu nfpatiH paripAlanAt kuryyAdanyanna vA kuryyAdEndro rAjanya ucyate vESyasyApi hi yo Darma stante vakzyAmi SASvatam dAnamaDyayanaM yajYaH SOcena DanasaYcayaH pitfvat pAlayedvESyo yuktaH sarvvAn paSU niha vikarma tadBavedanyat karma yat sa samAcaret rakzayA sa hi tezAM vE mahat suKamavApnuyAt prajA patirhi vESyAya sfzwvA paridadO paSUn brAhmaRAya ca rAjYe ca sarvAH paridadade prajAH tasya vfttiM pravakzyAmi yacca tasyopajIvanam zaRRAmekAM pibedDenuM SatAcca miTunaM haret labDAcca saptamaM BAgaM taTA SfNge kalA Kure SasyAni sarvavIjAnAmezA sAMvatsarI BftiH na ca vESyasya kAmaH syAnna rakzeyaM paSUniti vESyo cecCati nAnyena rakzitavyAH kaTaYcana SUdrasyApi hi yo Darma stante vakzyAmi BArata prajApatirhi varRAnAM dAsaM SUdramakalpayat tasmAcCUdrasya varRAnAM paricaryyA viDI yate tezAM SuSrUzaRAccEva mahat suKamavApnuyAt SUdra etAn paricarettrIn varRAnanupUrvaSaH saYcayASca na kurvvIta jAtu SUdraH kaTaYcana pApIyAn hi DanaM labDvA vaSe kuryyAdgarIyasaH rAjYA vA samanujYAtaH kAmaM kurvIta DArmikaH tasya vfttiM pravakzyAmi yacca tasyopa jIvanama avaSyaBaraRIyo hi varRAnAM SUdra ucyate CatraM vezwanamOSIramupAnadvyajanAni ca yAtayAmAni deyAni SUdrAya paricAriRe aDAryARi viSIrRAni vasanAni dvijAtiBiH SUdrAyEva pradeyAni tasya DarmaDanaM hi tat yacca kiYcidudvijAtInAM SUdraH SuSrUzurAvrajet Page b kalpyAM tasya tu tenAhurvfttiM Darmavido janAH deyaH piRqo napatyAya BattevyO vfdDadurbalO SUdreRa tu na hAtavyo BarttA kasyAYcidApadi atirekeRa Barttavyo BarttA dravyaparikzaye na hi svamasti SUdrasya BartfhAryya Dano hi saH uktastrayARAM varRAnAM yajYastasya ca BArata svAhAkAravazawkArO mantraH SUdre na vidyate tasmAcCUdraH pAkayajYEryajetAvratavAn svayam pUrRapAtra mayImAhuH pAkayajYasya dakziRAm SUdraH pEjavano nAma sahasrARAM SataM dadO EndrAgnyena viDAnena dakziRA miti naH Srutam yaTA hi sarvavarRAnAM yajYastasyEva BArata agryaH sarvezu yajYezu SradDAyajYo viDIyate dEvataM hi mahacCradDA pavitraM yajatAYca yat dEvataM hi paraM viprAH svena svena parasparam ayajanniha satrEste tEstEH kAmEH samAhitEH saMsfzwA brAhmaREreva trizu varRezu sfzwayaH devAnAmapi ye devA yadbruyuste paraM hitam tasmAdvarREH sarvayajYAH saMsfjyante na kAmyayA fgyajuHsAmavitpUjyo nityaM syAddevavadDijaH saNkIrRajAtiDarmmastu manvAdyukto jAtiSabde darSitaH utsAdyante jAtiDarmmAH kulaDarmmASca SASvatAH gItA
jAyAGa jAyAGa jAyAGa pu jAyAM hanti lakzaRe jAyApayozwak pA lakzaRavati hana wak jAyAhananasUcakalakzaRayukte Barttari amanuzyakartfke ca pA wak tilakAlake si kO tasya jAyAhananasUcakatvAt taTAtvam evaM jyotizokte yogaBede ca yAvantaH yApaKewAmadanasadanagAstAvakInAM virAmaH ityuktayogasya jAyAnASasUcakatvAt taTAtvam
jAyAGna jAyAGna jAyAGna pu jAyAM hanti lakzaRe jAyApatyozwak pA lakzaRa vani hana wak jAyAhananasUcakalakzaRayukte Barttari amanuzyakarttfke ca pA wak tilakAlake si kO tasya jAyAhananasUcakatvAt taTAtvam evaM jyatizokte yogaBede ca yAvantaH yApasvewAmadanasadanagAstAvakonAM virAmaH ityuktayogasya jAyAnASasUcakatvAt taTAtvam
jAyAnajIvin jAyAnajIvin jAyAnajIvin pu jAyayA anujIvati anu jIva Rini nawe vakaKage ca medi
jAyAnujIvin jAyAnujIvin jAyAnujIvin pu jAyayA anujIvati anu kIva Rini nawe vakasyage ca medi
jF jF jF jarAyAM divA para aka sew jIryati jIryyati irit ajarat ajArIt jIrRaH pit zit jarA GawAdi jarayati yana jIryati jIryataH nItimA jIryate yA na jIryyati jIryyataH nItaBA jIryyate ratfn jaran jajAra jarItA jIrRaH jaritFRAM jari tFRAM satAM BuvaH BuvAM sUtaye vAmadevyagAnamantraH bAmadevyagAnamantraH jF jarAyAM vA curA uBa pakze kyrAdi pvAdi aka sew GawA jarayati te ajIjarat ta jfRAti irit irat ajarat ajArIt jF jarAyAM divA para aka sew jIryyati irit ajarat ajArIt jIrRaH zit jarA GawAdi jarayati yA na jIryyati jIryyataH nItaBA jIryyate ratfn jaran jajAra jarItA jIrRaH jari tFRAM satAM BuvAM sUtaye bAmadevyagAnamantraH jF jarAyAM vA curA uBa pakze kyrAdi pvAdi aka sew GawA jarayati te ajIjarat ta jfRAti irat ajarat ajArIt
jIrRAsTimfttikA jIrRAsTimfttikA jIrRAsTimfttikA strI kftrimamfttikABede aTa vakzye tu jIrRAsTimfttikAkaraRaM priye SilAjatusTale kuryAd dIrGaM garttaM manoharam niHkzipet tatra nAnAsTisaYcayaMdvicatuzpadAm sarjikzAraM mahAkzAraM mftkzAraM lavaRAni ca ganDakozRajalaM kzepyaM nAnAmUtrARi tatra ca evaM kftvA mAsazawkaM dadyAt pAzARamfttikAm kaNkAsTyUrdDvaM tadUrdDvantu kuryAdvahnIzwakAM SuBAm trivarzAjjAyate sarvamekIBUtaM dfzatsamam tato nizkAsya taccUrRaM kftvA pAtrARi nirmamet praSastaM BojanaM tatra sUcayedannadUzaRam mahAvizasya saMyogAt tasya BaNgaH prajAyate dUzivizAdisaMyogAt pAtre sPowA Bavanti hi tatra kziptaM kzudravizaM pAtraM kfzRaM prajAyate evaM jYAtvA tatra dadyAnna kadAcidvizAdikamiti rAvaRaH SabdArTacintAmaRiH
jIrRRAsTimfttikA jIrRRAsTimfttikA jIrRRAsTimfttikA strI kftrimamfttikABede aTa vakzye tu jIrRAsTimfttikAkaraRaM priye SilAjatusTale kuryyAd dIrGaM garttaM manoharam niH kzipet tatra nAnAsTisaYcayaM dvicatuzpadAm sarjikzAraM mahAkzAraM mftkzAraM lavaRAni ca ganDakozRajalaM kzepyaM nAnAmUtrARitatra ca evaM kftvA mAsazawkaM dadyAt pAzARamfttikAm kaNkAsTyUrdDvaM tadUrdDvantu kuryyAdvahnI zwakAM SuBAm trivarzAjjAyate sarvamekIBUtaM dfzat samam tato nizkAsya taccUrRaM kftvA pAtrARi nirma met praSastaM BojanaM tatra sUcayedannadUzaRam mahA vizasyaMsaMyogAt tasya BaNgaH prajAyate dUzIvizAdi saMyogAt pAtre sPowA Bavanti hi tatra kziptaM kzudra vizaM pAtraM kfzRaM prajAyate evaM jYAtvA tatra dadyAnna Page b kadAcidvipAdikamiti rAvaRaH SabdAryacintAmaRiH
jIrRodDAra jIrRodDAra jIrRodDAra pu jIrRasya pUrvapratizWApitaliNgAderudDAraH pUrvapratizWApitaliNgAdeH BagnatAdO svasTAnAdudDAre tadviDAnam agnipu a uktaM yaTA BagavAn uvAca jIrRodDArabiDiM vakzye BUzitAM snapayed guruH acalAM binyased gehe atijIrRAM pari tyajet vyaNgAM BagnAM ca SElAQyAM nyasedanyAM ca pUrva vat saMhAraviDinA tatra tattvAn saMhftya deSikaH sahasraM narasihena hutvA tAmudDared guruH dArabIM dAhaye dvahnO SElajAM prakzipejjale DAtujAM ratnajAM vApi agataDe vA jale mbuDO yAnamAropya jIrRANgaM CAdya vastrA dinA nayet vAditrEH prakzipettoye gurave dakziRAM dadet yatpramARA ca yaddravyA tanmAnAM sTApayet punaH kUpa vApItaqAgAderjIrRodDAre mahAPalam ni si viSezo yaTA aTa jIrRodDAraH sa ca liNgAdO dagDe Bagne calite vA kAryyaH ayaM cAnAdisidDapratizWitaliNgAdO BaNgA diduzwe pi na kAryaH tatra tu mahABizekaM kuryyAditi trivikramaH karttA mukadevasya jIrRodDAraM karizye ityuktvA puRyAhaM vAcayitvA AcAryyamftvijaSca vftvA liNge oM vyApakeSvarahfdayAya namaH oM vyApakeSvaraSirase svAhetyevaM zaqaNgaM kftvA GoramantraM SataM japtvA gniM pratizWApyADoreRa GftasarzapEH sahasraM hutvA indrAdiByo nAmnA valiM dattvA jIrRadevaM praRavena saMpUjya brahmAdi maRqaladevatAnAM homaM pUrvoktaM kftvA devaM prArTayeta jIrRaBagnamidaM cEva sarvadozAvahaM nfRAm asyodDAre kfte SAntiH SAstre smin kaTitA tvayA jIrRodDAra viDAnaYca nfparAzwrahitAvaham tadaDastizWatAM deva praha rAmi tavAjYayeti tataH kzIrAjyamaDudUrvABiH samidBiScA zwottarasahasraM SataM vA devamantreRa hutvA NgAnAM daSAMSena liNgacAlanArTaM sahasraM SataM vA pAyasena hutvA liNgaM prArTayeta liNgarUpaM samAtatya yenedaM samaDizWitam yAyAstvaM saMmitaM sTAnaM santyajyEva SivAjYayA atra sTAne ca yA vidyA sarvavidyESvarEryutA Sivena saha saMtizWeti mantritajalenABizicya visarjayet tato stra mantritena svanitreRa KAtvA liNgamAnIya nadyAdO vAma devena liNgaM praRavena mUrttiM kzipet dArujantu maDunA ByajyADoreRa dahet hemaratnAdimayantu dagDaM calitaM Page a vA punastatrEva sTApayeta tataH SAntyE aGoreRa tilEH sahasraM hutvA prArTayeta BagaMvAn BUtaBavyeSa loka nATa jagatpate jIrRaliNgasamudDAraH kftastavAjYayA mayA agninA dArujaM dagDaM kziptaM SElAdikaM jale prAyaScittAya deveSa aGorAstreRa tarpitam jYAna to jYAnato vApi yaToktaM na kftaM yadi tatsarvaM pUrRamevAstu tvatprasAdAnmaheSvareti tato yajamAnaH pArTayeta govipraSilpiBUtAnAmAcAryyasya ca yajvanaH SAntirBavatu deveSa acCidraM jAyatAmidam mUrttO tu viSezaH tvatprasAdena nirviDnaM dehaM nirmApa yatyasO vAsaM kuru suraSrezWa tAvattvaM cAlpake gfhe vasan kleSaM sahitveha murttiM vE tava pUrbavat yAvat kArayet BaktaH kuru tasya ca vAYCitamiti tato navAM mUrttiM liNgaM vA kftvoktaviDinA sTAzayet BagnamandirAdeH saMskAre ca sa ca vizRuDarmottare tftIya kARqe ukto yaTA yasya rAjYastu vizaye devaveSma viSI ryyate tasya sIdati tadrAjyaM devaveSma yaTA taTA kftvA jIrRasya saMskAraM taTA deveSaveSmani dviguRaM PalamApnoti nAtraM kArTyA vicAraRA vizRurahasye patitasya ca yaH karttA patamAnasya rakzitA vizRorA yatanasyeha sa naro vizRulokaBAk agnipurARe patitaM patamAnantu tadArdDasPuwitaM naraH samudDftya harerDAma dviguRaM PalamApnuyAt devIpurARe mUlA cCataguRaM puRyaM prApnuyAjjorRakArakaH tasmAt sarva prayatnena jIrRasyodDAramAcaret hayaSIrzapaYcarAtre vApIkUpataqAgAnAM suraDAmnAM taTAnaGa pratimAnAM samAnAYca saMskarttA yo naro Buvi puRyaM SataguRaM tasya BavenmUlAnna saMSayaH pratizWAyA viDiH kAryya staTA mandiranirmite prAyaH SrIhayaSIrzokteranusAreRa vEzRavEH devAlayapratizWA ca KyAtA talliKanena kim SrImUrttisTApanenEvaM saMpUrRA sA viSezataH devagfhaM devatAyAH pratizWAviDinA sadA saMskAyyaM manujA nAntu samudAyo sya karmmaRA hariBakti vilAsaH
jIrRodvAra jIrRodvAra jIrRodvAra pu jIrRasya pUrvapratizWApitaliNgAderudDAraH pUrvapratizWApitaliNgAdeH BagnatAdO svasTAnAdudDAre tadviDAnam agnipu a uktaM yaTA BagavAn uvAca jIrRodDArabiDiM vakzye BUzitAM snapayed guruH ahalAM vinyased gehe atijIrRAM parityajet vyaNgAM BagnAM ca SElAQyAM nyasedanyAM ca pUrvavat saMhAraviDinA tatra tattvAn saMhftya deSikaH sahasraM narasiMhena hutvAtAmudDared guru dAravIM dAhayedvahnO SElajAM prakzipejjale DAtujAM ratnajAM vApi agADe vA jale mbuDO yAnamAropya jIrRANgaM CAdya vastrAdinA nayet vAditrEH prakzipettoye gurave dakziRAM dadet yatpramARA ca yaddravyA tanmAnAM sTApayet punaH kUpavApItaqAgAderjIrRodDAre mahAPalam ni si viSezo yaTA aTa jIrRodDAraH sa ca liNgAdO dagDe Bagne calite vA kAryaH ayaM cAnAdisidDapratizWitaliNgAdO BaNgAdiduzwe pi na kAryaH tatra tu mahABizekaM kuryAditi trivikramaH karttA mukadevasya jIrRodDAraM karizye ityuktvA puRyAhaM vAcayitvA AcAryamftvijaSca vftvA liNge oM vyApakeSvarahfdayAya namaH oM vyApakeSvaraSirase svAhetyevaM zaqaNgaM kftvA GoramantraM SataM japravA gni pratizWApyAGoreRa GftasarzapaH sahastraM hutvA indrAdiByo nAmnA baliM dattvA jIrRadevaM praRavena saMpUjya brahmAdimaRqaladevatAnAM homaM pUrvoktaM kftvA devaM prArTayeta jIrRaBagnamidaM cEva sarvadozAvahaM nfRAm asyodDAre kfte SAntiH SAstre smin kaTitA tvayA jIrRodDAraviDAnaYca nfparAzwrahitAvaham tadaDastizWatAM deva praharAmi tavAjYayeti tataH kzIrAjyamaDudUrvABiH samidBiScAzwottarasahasraM SataM vA devamantreRa hutvA NgAnAM daSAMSena liNgacAlanArTaM sahasraM SataM vA pAyasena hutvA liNgaM prArTayeta liNgarUpaM samAgatya yenedaM samaDizWitam yAyAstvaM saMmitaM sTAnaM santyajyEva SivAjYayA atra syAne ca yA vidyA sarvavidyESvarEryutA Sivena saha saMtizWeti mantritajalenABizicya visarjayet tato stramantritena svanitreRa KAtvA liNgamAnIya nadyAdO vAmadevena liNgaM praRavena mUrttiM kzipet dArujantu maDunA ByajyAGoreRa dahet hemaratnAdimayantu dagDaM calitaM vA punastatrEva sTApayeta tataH SAntyE aDoreRa tilEH sahasraM hutvA prArTayet BagavAn BUtaBavyeSa lokanATa jagatpate jIrRaliNgasamudDAraH kftastavAjYayA mayA agninA dArujaM dagDaM kziptaM SElAdikaM jale prAyaScittAya deveSa aGorAstreRa tarpitam jYAnato jYAnato vApi yaToktaM na kftaM yadi tatsarvaM pUrRamevAstu tvatprasAdAnmaheSvareti tato yajamAnaH prArTayeta gopipraSilpiBUtAnAmAcAryasya ca yajvanaH SAntirBavatu deveSa acCidraM jAyatAmidam mUrttO tu viSezaH tvatprasAdena nirviGnaM dehaM nirmApayatyamO vAsaM kuru suraSrezWa tAvatyaM cAlpake gfhe vasan kleSaM sahitveha mUrtti vE tava pUrvavat yAvat kArayet BaktaH kuru tasya ca vAYCitamiti tato navAM mUrttiM liNgaM vA kftvoktaviDinA sTApayet BagnamandirAdeH saMskAre ca yaca vizRuDarmottare tftIyakARqe ukto yaTA yasya rAkzastu vizaye devaveSma viSIryate tasya sIdati tadrAjyaM devaveSma yaTA taTA kftvAjIrRasya saMskAraM taTA deveSaveSmani dviguRaM PalamAprAti nAtra kArTyA vicAraRa vizRurahasye patitasva ca Ta kartA patamAvasya rasitA vizRorAyatanasveha sa narI vizRulokaBAk agnipurARe patitaM patamAnantu tadArTa sakuwitaM naraH samuhata hareTami dviguRaM PalamApnuyAt devIpurARe mUlAcCataguRaM puRyaM prApnuyAjjIrRakArakaH tasmAt sarvaprayatnena jIrRasyodDAramAcaret hayaSIrzapaYcarAtre vApIkUpataqAgAnAM suraDAmnAM taTAnaGa pratimAnAM samAnAYca saMskarttA yo naro Buvi puRyaM SataguRaM tasya BavenmUlAnna saMSayaH pratizWAyA viDiH kAryastaTA mandiranirmite prAyaH SrIhayaSIrzokteranusAreRa vEzRavEH devAlayapratizWA ca KyAtA talliKanena kim SrImUrttisTApane saMpUrRA sA viSezataH devagfhaM devatAyAH pratizWAviDinA sadA saMskArya manujAnAntu samudAyo syakarmaRA hariBakti vilAsaH
jIva jIva jIva prARane asuDAraRe BvA aka pa sew jIvati ajIvIt jijIva fdit ajijIvat ta jIvitaM jIvanam jIvaH jIvikA saMSayaM punarAruhya yadi jIvati paSyati hito yAtaH paramapi jIvejjIvitanATo asuDAraRe amaraH karaRe GaY vfttO AjIvikAyAM medi manuyAdikIrawaparyante manuzyAdikIwaparyante prARimAtre kAryakAraRasaNGAte kAryyakAraRa saNGAte anekAntavAdinAM jIvAstikAyasaMjYA pariBAzite jIvAstikAyasaMjYayA pari BAzite padArTaBede triviDaScAsO anAdimidvamuktabadDaBedAt anAdisidDamukta badDaBedAt atrAnAdisidDo haM jIvAstikAyaSaKyaH rhan jIvAstikAyAKyaH vyapetamohAdibanDo muktaH DArayitari prARAn kzetrajYarUpeRa DArayan DAra yan jIva ucyate ityaBiyuktokteH liNgadehe liMNgadehe evaM paYcaviDaM liNgaM trivft zoqaSa vistftam eza cetanayA ceta nayA yukto jIva ityaBiDIyate iti SrIBAgavatam SrIBAnavatam paYcaviDaM paYcatanmAtrAtmakam trivft triguRam zoqaSa vikArAtmanA vistftamityanAdyaBimAnitvena ihaloka Page a paralokagAmI vyavahAriko jIva ucyate bAlAgraSata yAlAgraSata BAgasya SataDA kalpitasya ca BAgo jIvaH sa vijYeyaH sa cAnantyAya kalpate SrutiH bAlAgraSataSo BAgaH bAlAgraSataSoBAgaH kalpitastu sahasraDA sahasraTA tasyApi SataSo BAgo SataSoBAgo jIvaH sUkzma udAhftaH SaNKaH jIvo nAma dehAdivyatiriktastatsAkzI tvampadArToyo dehAdivyatiri ktastatsAkzI tvampadArTo yo yaM vijYAnamayaH yo yaM saMsarati yo yaM saMsArI natu dehAdIrjIvaH dehAdirjIvaH tasya dfSyasya drazwftvAnupapatteH drazwf tvAnupapatteH asti devi paraM brahmasvarUpI nizkalaH SivaH sarvajYaH sarvakarttA ca sarveSo nirmalo vyayaH svayaMjyotiranAdyanto svayaM jyotiranAdyanto nirvikAraH parAtparaH nirguRaH saccidAnandastadaMSA saccidAndastadaMSA jIvasaMjYakAH anAdyavidyopahitA yaTAgnO visPuliNgakAH devAdyupADisamBinnAste karmaBiranAdiBiH suKaduHKapradEH puRyapAparUperniyantritAH puRyapAparUpErniya ntritAH tattajjAtiyutaM dehamAyurBogaYca karmajam pratijanma prapadyante tezAmapyaparaM punaH sUkzmaM liNgaSarIraM tadA mokzAdakzayaM liNga SarIraM tadAmokzAdakzayaM priye kulArRa vizRO jIvo vinayitA sAkzI mukundo mitavikramaH vizRu saha tatrabfhaspatO tatra vfhaspatO jIvaH saptanavadvipaYcamagataH jIvArkiBAnujyejyAnAM kzetrARi syurajAdayaH jyoti puzyanakzatre ca tasya pf dfSyAH sa ca jIvo viBuriti sANKyanEyAyikavESezikapAtaYjalavedAntinaH aRuparimARa aRuprarimARa iti rAmAnujAdayaH maDyamaparimARaH iti mADyamikA AtmanSabde pf dfSyam hantAhamimAstistro hantA pratiBAti te sattvEH sattvAni jIvanti bahuDA dvijasattama dvija Page b sattama prARino nyonyaBakzASca tatra kiM pratiBAti te caMkramyamARA jIvAMSca DaraRIsaMSritAt bahUn padByAM Gnanti narA vipra tatra kiM pratiBAti te upavizwAH upa vizwAH SayAnASca Gnanti jIvAnanekaSaH jYAnavijYAnavantaSca tatra kiM pratiBAti te jIvErgrastamidaM sarvamAkASaM pfTivI taTA avijYAnAcca hiMsanti tatra kiM patiBAti te ahiMseti yaduktaM hi puruzErvismitEH purA ke na hiMsanti jIvAn vE loke smin dvijasattama BA va a atra jIvasya hiMsA dehaviyojanam jIva prARane asuDAraRe BvA aka pa sew jIvati ajIvIt jijIva fdit ajijIvat ta jIvitaM jIvanam jIvaH jIvikA saMSayaM punarAruhya yadi jIvati paSyati hito yAtaH paramapi jIvejjIvitanATo BavetasyAH Page b sA da jyog jIvati CA u SataM jIvantu SaradaH f prARaDAraRaYca jYAnavijYAnavantaSca tatra kiM pratiBAti te jIvErgrastamidaM sarvamAkASaM pfTivI taTA avijYAnAcca hiMsanti tatra kiM patiBAti te ahiMseti yaduktaM hi puruzErvismitEH purA ke na hiMsanti jIvAn vE loke jIvaRa jIvaRa jIvaRa pu jIva aTa kUrme prARe mayUre meze ca cirAyuzke DArmike ca jIvanavati tri uRAdiko
jIvaTa jIvaTa jIvaTa pu jIva aTa kUrme prARe mayUre meDe ca cirAyuzke DArmike ca jIvanaviti tri uRAdiko
jIvaYjIva jIvaYjIva jIvaYjIva puMstrI jIvaM jIvayati vizagASakatvAt jIva zA Kac cakorapakziRi amaraH striyAM jAtitvAt NIz jIvaYjIvikasaNGAScApyanugacCanti paRqitAn BA u
jIvajjIva jIvajjIva jIvajjIva puM strI jIvaM jIvayati vizanASakatvAt jIva bA Kac cakorapakziRi amaraH striyAM jAtitvAt NIz jIvaYjIvikasaNGAScApyanugacCanti paRqitAn BA u
jIvanIzaDa jIvanIzaDa jIvanIzaDa na jIvanasya mriyamARaprARasya rakzaRArTamOzaDam jIvAtO mariyamARasya prARarakzake OzaDe amaraH
jIvanOzaDa jIvanOzaDa jIvanOzaDa na jIvanasya jiyamARaprARasya rakzaRArTamO zaGam jIvAtO mriyamARasya prARarakzake OzaGe amaraH
jIvanetrI jIvanetrI jIvanetrI strI jIvaM nayati nI vfc NIp sEMhalyAm rAjani
jIvanetro jIvanetro jIvanetro strI jIvaM nayati nI tfc NIp sEhalyAm rAjani
jIvantyAdyaDfta jIvantyAdyaDfta jIvantyAdyaDfta na cakradattokte pakaGftaBede jIvantIM maDukaM drAkzAM PalAni kuwajasya ca SaWIM puzParamUlaYca vyAGrIM gokzurakaM balAm nIlotpalaM cAmalakIM trAyamARAM durAlaBAm pippalIYca samaM pizwvA GftaM vEdyo vipAcayet etadvyADisamUhasya roge SasyasamutTitam rUpamekAdaSaviDaM sarpiragryaM vyapohati
jIvantyAdyaGfta jIvantyAdyaGfta jIvantyAdyaGfta na cakradattokte pakvaGftaBede jIvantIM maDukaM drAkzAM PalAni kuwajasya ca SaWIM pugParamUlaYca vyAGrIM gokzurakaM valAm nIlotpalaM cAmalakIM trAyamARAM durA laBAm pippalIYca samaM pizwvA GftaM vEdyo vipAcayet etadvyAGisamUhasya roge Sasyasamutvitam rUpamekAdaSa viDaM sarpiragryaM vyapohati
jU jU jU gatO sOtra saka pa sew javati ajAvIt jujAva jUtaH jU strI sO jU atO gatO yaTAyaTaM karttf BAvAdO kvip gakASe AkASe sarasvatyAM piSAcyAM ca jayane javane SabdaratnA javayukte jabayukte tri viSvaH tvarAgamane gamane ca strI medi jU gatO sOtra saka pa sew javati ajAvIt jujAva jUtaH jU strI sO jU gatO yaTAyaTaM karttf BAvAdO kvip AkASe sarasvatyAM piSAcyAM ca javane SabdaratnA jabayukte tri viSvaH tvarAgamane gamane ca strI medi
jUrya jUrya jUrya tri jUra karttari vA Ryat jIrRe raRvaH purIva jUryaH f jUryaH jIrRaH BA vfdDe ca
jUryya jUryya jUryya tri jUra karttari bA Ryat jIrRe raRvaH purIva jUryyaH f jUryyaH jIrRaH BA vfdDe ca
jUza jUza jUza baDe BvA uBa saka sew jUzati te ajUzIt ajUzizwa jujUza jUjUza ze jUzaH puM na jUza puMna yUza pfzo mudgAdikATe mudGAdikrATe BarataH jUza baDe BvA uBa saka sew jUzati te ajUzIt ajUzizwa jUjUza ze jUzaH jUza puMna yUza pfzo mudGAdikrATe BarataH
jYA jYA jYA boDe kyrA para pra saka aniw jAnAti ajYAsIt jajYO jYAtA jYAnaM jYAtiH jYAtaH jajYivAn anu anumatO anumatiSca svayaMpravfttasya svaTaMpravfttasya nizeDanABAvena svABimatatvajYApanena pravarttanam taM devAso anujAlantu anujAnantu kAlam tEtti vrA anupraveSe brA anupaveSe yadvIra kftavAMstvaM kfta vAMstvaM mamApriyam sarvaM tadanujAnAmi BA A a apa nihnave Atma AtmAnamapajAnAnaH SaSamAtro nayaddinam naya ddinam BawwiH aBi samyagjYAne BaktyA mAmaBijAnAti yAvAn yaScAsmi mAgaBijAnAti yAvAnyaScAsmi Page b tattvataH gItA aBijYASCedapAtAnAm kumA aBijYA ca AdyajYAnam anuBavAtmakam prati aBi pUrvadfzwasya vastunaH cakzurAdisannikarzaje pUrvasaMskArotpanne pUrvasaM skArotpanne smftiBinne jYAnaBede yaTA so yaM devadattaH ityAdi jYAnam taM tvaM pratyaBijAnIhi svapne yaM dfzwavatyasi harivaM a sam aBi pratyaBijYAne indrasenAM igdrasenAM saha BrAtrA samaBijYAya bAhukaH vAhukaH BA va a ava anAdare hInatvena jYAne ca avajAnAsimAM avajAnAsi mAM yasmAt tataste na Bavizyati raGuH adeSakAle yaddAnmyapAtraByeSca yaddAnamaprAtraByeSca dIyate asatkftamavajYAtaM tattAmasamudAhftam gItA vasUni deSAMSca virttayizvan virttayizyan rAmaM nfpaH saMgiramARa eva tayAvajajYe BawwiH A samyagjYAne niyoge ca na hi manasA DyAyataH kaScanAjAnAti Sata brA niyogaSca niTogaSca nikfzwasya BftyAdeH pravarttanam zravarttanam svArTe Rica tatrArTe AjYApaya jYApaviSeza puMsAm jYAtaviSeza puMsAma kumA jYA preraRe cOrAdikasyedaM rUpamityanye upa AdyajYAne upa tajjAnIta yaTAvayamihApyasAmeti tajYjAnIta yaTA vayamihApyasAmeti Sata brA upajYA jYAnamAdyaM syAt amaraH nis nir niScayAtmake jYAne vudyudvE vidyudvE vidyutya vfzwimanupraviSati vfzwimanu praviSati sAntarDIyate tAM na nirjAnanti Eta brA pari parito jYAne indro dakzaM parijAnAdahInam f anubanDaM parijYAya deSakAlO ca tattvataH manuH pra prakfzwajYAne yayA DarmamaDarmaYca kAryaYcAkAryameva yaTA DarmaDarmaYca kAryya YcAkAryyameva ca ayaTAvat prajAnAti tasya prajYA pratizWitA gItA prati pratijYAyAM sADyatvena pakzanirdeSe Atmakarttavyatvena Atmakarttavya tvena kaTanaBede ca Atma sADyanirdeSaH pratijYA gOta sU sADyavattvena pakzanirdeSaH pratijYeti tadarTaH pratijajYe baDaM cApi sarvakzatrasya BArata BA va a pratijYAya vanavAsamimaM guroH rAmA a tasmE niSAcarESvaryaM niSAcareSvaryyaM pratijajYe raGUttamaH raGuH kaccinna pAne dyUte dyute vA krIqAtu krAqAsu pramadAsu ca pratijAnanti pUrvAhlevyaye prati jAnanti pUrvAhlevyayaM vyasanajaM tava mA sa sa a ArzatvAt para vi viSezaRa jYAne jyotirvfRIta tamaso vijAnan sU f f AtmAnaM cedvijAnIyAdayamasmIti pUruzaH ceTijAnIyAdayamastIti puruzaH Sata brA kaTametad kaTaBetad vijAnIyAM tvamAdO tva Page a mAdO proktavAniti gItA SilpaSAstravizayake jYAne ca mokze DIrjYAnamanyatra vijYAnaM SilpaSAstrayoH amaraH jYAnamAtre kzaRikavijYAnamiti bOdDAH sam samyag jYAne saMjYAyAM cEtanye ca Atma saMjAnAnAn pariharan rAvaRAnucarAn bahUn BawwiH ravistu saMjYApayate lokAn raSmiBirulvaREH BA SA pratijYAyAm Atma saMjAnIzva svamISA ca mugDaboDam mugDa boDam jYA jYapaDAtvarTe curA uBa saka sew GawA jYapayati te ajijYapat ta jYA preraRe curA uBa saka sew jYApayati te ajijYapat ta asyEva rUpam AjYApayatItyAdi AjYApaya jYApaviSeza jYAta viSeza puMsAm kumA jakza jakza jakza Bakze saka maka hAse aka jakzA svapAdi pa sew svapAdiSca rudAdyantargaRastena PalAdeH JalAdeH sArvaDAtukasya iw jakziti jakzitaH aByastasaMjYaH tena jakzati ajakzIt uteva strIBiH saha BodamAno modamAno jakzadute vApi BayAni paSyan Sata brA aSratyAM kaScidaSrAti vrA aSnatyAM kaScidaSnAti jakzatyAM saha jakziti BAga Page b havirjakziti niHSaNkomaKezu maGavAnasO jakzimo naparADe pi BawwiH asyAntaHsTAditAM kecit manyante yakzyatAmiti ye pyuktAste vE yakzAstu yakzAsva yakzaRAt vizRupu yakzanAmaniruktO taTAdarSanAt jakza dAne BvA idit A saka sew iditkaraRasAmarTyAt iditkaraRasAmaTyAsa anupaDasyApi num jaNkzate ajaNkzizwa mit ajaNkzi ajANkzi jA jaNkzam iditkaraRAt jaNkzyate jaNkzayate jakza Bakze maka hAse aka jakzA svapAdi pa sew svapAdiSca rudAdyantargaRastena JalAdeH sArvaDAtukasya iw jakziti jakzitaH aByastasaMjYaH tena jakzati ajakzIt uteva strIBiH saha modamAno jakzadute vApi BayAni paSyan Sata vrA aSnatyAM kaScidaSnAti jakzatyAM saha jakziti BAga Page b havirjakziti niHSaNkomaKezu maGavAnasO jakzimo naparADe pi BawwiH asyAntaHsTAditAM kecit manyante yakzyatAmiti ye pyuktAste vE yakzAsva yakzaRAt vizRupu yakzanAmaniruktO taTAdarSanAt jakza dAne BvA idit A saka sew iditkaraRasAmaTyAsa anupaDasyApi num jaNkzate ajaNkzizwa mit ajaNkzi ajANkzi jA jaNkzam iditkaraRAt jaNkzayate

jalpa jalpa jalpa vAgviSeze uktO ca BvA para saka sew jalpati ajalpIt jajalpa tatra kaTABede mayi jalpati kalpanADinATe raGunATe raGu nATe manutAM tadanyaTEva iti anumAnaSiromaRiH kaTAmAtre anAgasaH prajAnAYcapramAdAdiva kaTA mAtre anAgamaH prajAnAYca pramAdAdiva jalpataH BA sa a hasate jalpate vErI ekapAtre ca BuYjate harivaM a atra ArzatvAt padavyatyayaH BuYjate ityatra gaRavyatyayaSca anu kaTanottarakaTane paScAt kaTane tulyarUpakaTane ca jalpantyAmanujalpati mAGa jalpa ntyAmanujalpati BAga aBi ABimuKyena AmimuKyena kaTane anyonyamaBijalpantaH rAmA Ara a prati pratyuttarakaTane pratirUpakaTane ca na cEvoktA navA nuktA hInataH paruzA giraH BArata pratijalpanti sadA tUttamapuruzAH BA sa a vi ati anyonyakaTane SabdakarmakatvAt SabdakarmmakatvAt vyatihAre na taN taq vyatijalpati si ko kO jalpa pu jalpa BAve GaY kaTane iti priyAM valguvicitrajalpEH valgu vicitrajalpEH BAga Arze sya klIvatApi tuzRIMBava klIva tApi tUzRIMBava na te jalpamidaM kAryaM kAryyaM kaTaYcana BA A a kEkeyIM saMSritaM jalpaM nedAnIM pratiBAti me rAmA ayo a uBayatra jalpyamiti pAWastu samyak paramatanirAkaraRapUrvakasvamatasTApanarUpe vijigIzoH kaTABede ca tallakzaRaM gOtamenoktaM yaTA yaToktopapannaSCalajAtinigrahasTAnasADanopAlamBo Page b jalpaH gOta sU vyAKyAtaYcEtat viSvanATena yaToktezu yadupapannaM tenopapanna ityarTaH maDyapadalopI maDyapada lopI samAsaH taTA ca pramARatarkasADanopAlamBaH pakzapratipakzaparigraha ityasya yogyatayA parAmarSaH anyaTA jalpasya vAdaviSezatvApattiH pramARatarkAByAM tadrUpeRa jYAtAByAM na tu jYAne nAhAryatvaM nAhAryyatvaM vivakzitam AropitapramARaBAvenABAse Aro pitapramARaBAvenABAse pi jalpanirvAhAt yadyapi CalAdiBirupAlamBa eva na tu sADanaM taTApi sADanasya parakIyAnumAnasyopAlamBo yatretyarTAnna dozaH parapakzadUzaRe sati svapakzasidDirityataH sADane tadupayoga ityanye uBayapakzasTApanAvattvena uBaya pakzasTApanAvattvena ca viSezaRIyamato vitaRqAyAnnAtitvAptiH vitaRqAyAnnAti tyAptiH sa pratipakzasTApanAhInaH ityuttarasUtrAt prakfte uBayapakzasTApanAvattvAdeva ca paYcAvayavaniyamo pi laByata iti vadanti atra caCalAdiBiH sarvErupAlamBona viSezeRa ca CalAdiBiH sarvErupAlamBo na viSe zeRa vyAptirapi tu tadyogyatayEva yogyatAvacCedakantu vAdaBinnakaTAtvameva tatra coktavAdatvAvacCinnaBedastattadvAdanedo coktavAdatvAvacCinnaBedastattadvA danedo vA viSezaRamiti CaletyAdinA vijitIzukaTAtvaM vijigIzukaTAtvaM boDyate vijigIzurhi CalAdikaM karoti taTAcoBayapakzasTApanAvatI taTAcoBaya pakzasTApanAvatI vijigIzukaTA jalpa ityarTaH ityapi vadanti atracAyaM atra cAyaM kramaH vAdinA svapakzasADanaM prayujya nAyaM prayujyanAyaM hetvABAsastallakzaRAyogAditi sAmAnyato nyAyasidDa ityAdiviSezato ityAdi viSezato vA prativAdinA svasyAjYAnAdinirAsAya paroktasamBavAdeva lABe ucyamAnagrAhyARAmaprAptakAlArTAntaranirarTakAnAmalABe ucyamAnagrAhyARAmaprAptakAlArTA ntaranirarTakAnAmalABe uktagrAhyARAM pratijYAhAnipratijYAntarapratijYAviroDapratijYAsaMnyAsahetvantarAvijYAtArTavijYeyamatAnujYAnyUnADikapunaruktaniranuyajyAnuyogApasidDAntAnAmalABe paryanuyojyapekzaRasya pratijYAhAniprati jYAntarapratijYAviroDapratijYAsaMnyAsahetvantarAvijYAtArTavi jYeyamatAnujYAnyUnADikapunaruktaniranuyojyAnuyogApasi dDAntAnAmalABe paryyanuyojyopekzaRasya maDyasTodBAvyatvA devAnupanyAsArhatayA yaTAsamBavahetvABAsena paroktaM dUzayitvA svapakza upanyasanIyaH tato vAdinA tftIyakakzASritena tftIya kakzASritena paroktamanUdya svapakzadUzaRamudDftyAnuktagrAhyocyamAnagrAhyahetvABAsAtiriktoktagrAhyARAmalABe hetvABAsena svapakzadUzaRamudDftyAnuktagrAhyo cyamAnagrAhyahetvABAsAtiriktoktagrAhyARAmalABe hetvA BAsena yaTAsamBavaM pratipakzavAdinaH sTApanA dUzaRIyA anyaTA kramaviparyAse kramaviparyyAse prAptakAlaM cAnavasare dUzaRIyena ca niranuyojyAnuyogaH yaTA tyakzyasi cet pratijYAhAnirviSezayasi arTadozatvenApraDAnatvAccaramasanDAnamiti arTadozatvenApraDAnatvAccara masanDAnamiti uYCAdi asyAntodAttatA jalpa vAgviSeze uktO ca BvA para saka sew jalpati ajalpIt jajalpa tatra kaTABede mayi jalpati kalpanADinATe raGu nATe manutAM tadanyaTEva iti anumAnaSiromaRiH kaTA mAtre anAgamaH prajAnAYca pramAdAdiva jalpataH BA sa a hasate jalpate vErI ekapAtre ca BuYjate harivaM a atra ArzatvAt padavyatyayaH BuYjate ityatra gaRavyatyayaSca anu kaTanottarakaTane paScAt kaTane tulyarUpakaTane ca jalpa ntyAmanujalpati BAga aBi AmimuKyena kaTane anyonyamaBijalpantaH rAmA Ara a prati pratyuttarakaTane pratirUpakaTane ca na cEvoktA navA nuktA hInataH paruzA giraH BArata pratijalpanti sadA tUttamapuruzAH BA sa a vi ati anyonyakaTane SabdakarmmakatvAt vyatihAre na taq vyatijalpati si kO jalpa pu jalpa BAve GaY kaTane iti priyAM valgu vicitrajalpEH BAga Arze sya klIva tApi tUzRIMBava na te jalpamidaM kAryyaM kaTaYcana BA A a kEkeyIM saMSritaM jalpaM nedAnIM pratiBAti me rAmA ayo a jambuKaRqavinirmARa jambuKaRqavinirmARa jambu mbU KaRqavinirmARa na jambuKaRqasya vinirmARaM nirUpaRaM yatra BA BIzmaparvAntargate avAnatraparvaBede jambUKaRqavinirmARaM parvoktaM tadanantaram BA A a avAntaraparvoktO
jambuKaRqavinirmmARa jambuKaRqavinirmmARa jambu mbU KaRqavinirmmARa na jambuKaRqasya vinirmmARaM nirUpaRaM yatra BA BIzmaparvAntargate avAntaraparvaBede jambUKaRqavinirmmARaM parvoktaM tadanantaram BA A a avAntaraparvoktO

janASane janASane janASane pu janAnaSnAti aSa mojane lyu vfke rAjani lokaBojini tri BAve lyuw ta lokamakzaRe na
janArdana janArdana janArdana pu janEdrdyate yAcyeta puruzArTa lABAya ArdayAcane karmaRi lyuw janaM jananamardati hinasti tAqayati janAn samudravAsino suraBedAn ardayati vA karttari lyu vizRO parameSvare sarvagaH sarvavidDAnurvizvakseno janArdanaH vizRu sa janapoqake tri janAvanAyodyamimaM janArdanam kzaye jagajjInapivaM vadan Sivam nEza gayAtIrTasTe vizRumUrttiBede tadDaste jIvatpuruzeRa svapiRqasya dAnaviDiH vAyu pu gayAmAhAtmye yaTA janArdano BasmakUwe tasyahaste tu piRqadaH Atmano pyaTa vAnyezAM savyenApi tilErvinA jIvatA daDisaMmiSraM sarve te vizRulokagAH yastu piRqo mayA dattastava haste janArdana mAmuddiSyatvayA deva tasminpiRqe mfte praBo ezapiRqo mayA dattastava haste janArdana antakAle gate mahA tvayA deyo gayASire janArddana namastuByaM mamaste pitfmokzada pitfmAtre namastuByaM namaste pitfrUpiRe gayAyAM pitfrUpeRa svayameva janArdanaH tvAM dfzwvA puRqarIkAkzaM mucyate ca fRatrayAt SAlagrAmaBede SAlagrAmaSabde dfSyam tannAmbA BojanakAle hareH smaraRIyatA Bojane ca janArdanam ityukteH AsattimAsAdya janArdanasya mAGaH
janArddana janArddana janArddana pu janErarddyate yAcyate puruzArTalABAya ardda yAcane karmmaRi lyuw janaM jananamarddati hinasti tAqayati janAn samudravAsino suraBedAn arddayati vA karttari lyu vizRO parameSvare sarvagaH sarva vidBAnurvizvakseno janArddanaH vizRu sa janapIqake tri janAvanAyodyaminaM janArddanam kzaye jagajjInapivaM vadan Sivam mEza gayAtIrTasTe vizRumUrttiBede tadDaste jIvatpuruzeRa svapiRqasya dAnaviDiH vAyu pu gayA mAhAtmye yaTA janArddano BasmakUwe tasya haste tu piRqadaH Atmano pyaTa vAnyezAM savyenApi tilErvinA jIvatA daDisaM miSraM sarve te vizRulokagAH yastu piRqo mayA datta stava haste janArddana mAmuddiSya tvayA deva tasminpiRqe mfte praBo eza piRqo mayA dattastava haste janArddana antakAle gate mahA tvayA deyo gayASire janArddana namastuByaM mamaste pitfmokzada pitfmAtre mamastuByaM namaste pitfrUpiRe gayAyAM pitfrUpeRa svayameva janArddanaH tvAM dfzwvA puRqarIkAkzaM mucyate ca fRa trayAt SAlagrAmaBede SAlagrAmaSabde dfSyam tannAmnA BojanakAlE hareH smaraRIyatA Bojane ca janA rddanam ityukteH AsattimAsAdya janArddanasya mAGaH
jana jana jana janane juho para aka sew GawA jajanti ajanIt ajAnIt GawA janayati janitaH vi ati parasparajanena parasparajanane Atma vyatijajante sArvaDAtukasaDoriw vyatijajYize sArvaDAtu kasaDoriw vyatijajYipe vyatijajYiDve jana janane di A aka sew jAyeta jAyate ajani ajanizwa jajAna jajYatuH Idit jAtaH GawA janayati uBayorapi upasargAt parayostattadupasargadyotyArTayuktajanane parayostattadupasargadyotyArTayukta janane tatra ati atikramya janane saka aDi ADikyena janane ADipatyena janane ca tejasa eva tadaDyApojAyante brAhmaRojAyamAno vrAhmaRojAyamAno pi pfTivyAmaDijAyate pfTi vyAmaDijAyate manuH anu paScAjjanane aka putrikAyAM kftAyAM ca yadi putro nujAyate manuH paScAdutpattyA sAdfSya karaRe saka asO kumarAstato kumArastamato nujAtastrivizwapasyeva patiM jayantaH raGu sam anu samyaganujanane samyaganujaname saka putFn pitFn samanujAyante narA mAtaramaNganAH rAmA ayo aBi aBilakzyIkftya janane saka Bavanti sampadaM dEvImaBijAtasya dEvImaBi jAtasya BArata ajYAnaYcABijAtasya pArTa sampada mAsurIm gItA samyagjanane ABimuKyena janane aka SUcInAM SucInAM SrImatAM gehe yogaBrazwo BijAyate si jAyate kAmAt kroDo BijAyate gItA prati pratirUpajanane aka prajApatiScarasi garBe tvameva pratijAyase praSno vi viSezeRa janane virudDajanane vikAre ca patinA rahitA tasmAt putraM devI vyajAyata rAmA Adi a garBamocane saka yUnAM mattA praTamaM vijajYatuH f paSustizWan garBaM DftvAnupa viSya vijAyate Sata brA kAmamAvijanitIH kAmamAvija nitIH samBavema tE sa tasmAt vyajAyata rAmA bA yakzI putraM vyajAyata bA jana pu jana ac loke janastuzArAYjanaparvatAviva mAGaH Page b mAvaH maharlokAdUrdDaloke asuraBede ca janArdanaH janArddanaH tallokaprAptihetukaTanaM BUmeruccatoktiSca itTaM kaTAM kaTayatorBagavadgaRayoH priye kzaRArdDena mekakowipramARataH kowidvaye tu saMKyAto jano mUlokatojanEH mUlo katojanEH kASI Ka jana janane juho para aka sew GawA jajanti ajanIt ajAnIt GawA janayati janitaH vi ati parasparajanane Atma rahitA tasmAt putraM devI vyajAyata rAmA Adi a garBamocane saka yUnAM mattA praTamaM vijajYatuH f paSustizWan garBaM DftvAnupa viSya vijAyate Sata brA kAmamAvija nitIH samBavema tE sa tasmAt vyajAyata tarjanImaDyamAnAmA kanizWA ceti tAH kramAt tisro NgulyastriparvARo maDyamA cEkaparvivA parvadvayaM maDyamAyA merutvenopakalpayet anAmAmaDyamAraBya kanizWAdita eva ca tarjanIBUlaparyantaM etadvacanantu azwottaraSatAdivizayam azwottaraSatAdibizayam Saktivizaye punaH anAmikAtrayaM anA mikAtrayaM parva kanizWAditriparvikA maDyamAyASca maDyamA yASca tritayaM tarjanImUlaparvaRi tarjanyagre taTA maDye yo japet sa tu pApakft anAmAmUlamAraBya prAdakziRyakrameRa ca madyAdimUlaparyantamazwaparvasu maDyAdimUlaparyyantamazwaparvasu saMjapet rSrIvidyAvizaye SrIvidyAvizaye tu anAmAmaDyamayoSca mUlAgraYca dvayaM dvayam kanizWAyAYca tarjanyAstrayaM tarjjanyAstrayaM parva sureSvari anAsAmaDyamayoSca anAmAmaDyamayoSca meruH syAn dvitayaM syAta dvitaya SuBam pradakziRakramAddevi japet tripurasundarIm kanizWAmUlamAraBya prAdakziRyakrameRa ca tarjanImUlaparyantamazwaparvasu tarjanImUla paryyantamazwaparvasu saMjapet idamapi azwottaraSatAdivizayam aNgulI rnaviyuYjIta azwottaraSatAdi vizayam aNgulIrna viyuYjIta kiYcidANguYcite tale aNgulInAM viyogAcca Cidre ca sravate japaH aNgulyagre aNgu lyagre ca yajjaptaM yajjaptaM merulaNGane merulaNGave parvasanDizu yajjAptaM yajjaptaM tatsarvaM nizPalaM nizPa Bavet gaRanAviDimullaNGya yojapettajjapaM yataH yatnaH gfhRanti rAkzasAstena gaRayet sarvaTA buDaH hfdayehastamAropya tiryak hfdaye hastamAropya tiryyak kftvA karANgulIH AcCAdya vAsasA hastO dakziRena sadA japet japasaMKyAsADane japasaMKyAsAGane dravyaBedanizeDo yaTA nAkzatErhastaparvErvA na DAnyErna GAnyErna ca puzpakEH na candanErmfttikayA candanErmftti kayA japasaMKyAYca kArayet tatra vihitadravyARi lAkzA kuzIdasinadUraM kuzIdasindUraM gomayaYca karIzakam eBirnirmAya eBirni rmAya vawikAM japasaMKyAntu kArayet varRamAlA japaniyamo yaTA savinduM varRamuccArya varRamuccAryya paScAnmantraM japedvaDaH akvArAdilakArAntaM binduyuktaM japehva DaH akvArAdilakArAnta vindu yuktaM viBAvya ca varRamAlA samAKyAtA anulomavilomataH paYcaSallipiBirmAlA paYcASallipiBirmmAlA vihitA sarvakarmasu akArAdilakArAntA akA Page a rAdilakArAntA varRamAlA prakIrttitA kzArRaM merumuKaM meru muKaM tatra kalpayenmunisattana kalpayenmunisattama anayA sarvagantrARAM sarvamantrARAM japaH sarpasamfdDidaH sarvasamfdDidaH japaPalaYca japanizWo dvija SrezWo svilayajYaPalaM KilayajYaPalaM laBet sarvezAmeva yajYAnAM jAyate sO mahAPalaH japena devatA nityaM stUyamAnA keSAdimuKadOrganDya saMyutaH yo japettaM dahatyASu devatA guptisaMsTitA AlasyaM jfmBaRaM nidrAM kzubaM nizWIbanaM mayam nIcANgasparSanaM kopaM japakAle viva rjayet devatABede karamAlAviSezaniyamo yaTA tarjanImaDyamAnAmA kanizWA ceti tAH kramAt tisro NgulyastriparvARo maDyamA cEkaparvivA parvadvayaM maDyamAyA merutvenopakalpayet anAmAmaDyamAraBya kanizWAdita eva ca tarjjanImUlaparyyantaM daSa parvasu saMjapet anAmAmUlamAraBya kanizWAdita eva ca tarjanImaDyaparyyantamazwaparvasu saMjapet etadvacanantu azwottaraSatAdibizayam Saktivizaye punaH anA mikAtrayaM parva kanizWAditriparvikA maDyamA yASca tritayaM tarjanImUlaparvaRi tarjanyagre taTA maDye yo japet sa tu pApakft anAmAmUlamAraBya prAdakziRyakrameRa ca maDyAdimUlaparyyantamazwaparvasu saMjapet SrIvidyAvizaye tu anAmAmaDyamayoSca mUlAgraYca dvayaM dvayam kanizWAyAYca tarjjanyAstrayaM parva sureSvari anAmAmaDyamayoSca meruH syAta dvitaya SuBam pradakziRakramAddevi japet tripurasundarIm kanizWAmUlamAraBya prAdakziRyakrameRa ca tarjanImUla paryyantamazwaparvasu saMjapet idamapi azwottaraSatAdi vizayam aNgulIrna viyuYjIta kiYcidANguYcite tale aNgulInAM viyogAcca Cidre ca sravate japaH aNgu lyagre ca yajjaptaM yajjaptaM merulaNGave parvasanDizu yajjaptaM tatsarvaM nizPa Bavet gaRanAviDimullaNGya yojapettajjapaM yatnaH gfhRanti rAkzasAstena gaRayet sarvaTA buDaH hfdaye hastamAropya tiryyak kftvA karANgulIH AcCAdya vAsasA hastO dakziRena sadA japet japasaMKyAsAGane dravyaBedanizeDo yaTA nAkzatErhastaparvErvA na GAnyErna ca puzpakEH na candanErmftti kayA japasaMKyAYca kArayet tatra vihitadravyARi lAkzA kuzIdasindUraM gomayaYca karIzakam eBirni rmAya vawikAM japasaMKyAntu kArayet varRamAlA japaniyamo yaTA savinduM varRamuccAryya paScAnmantraM japehva DaH akvArAdilakArAnta vindu yuktaM viBAvya ca varRamAlA samAKyAtA anulomavilomataH paYcASallipiBirmmAlA vihitA sarvakarmasu akA Page a rAdilakArAntA varRamAlA prakIrttitA kzArRaM meru muKaM tatra kalpayenmunisattama anayA sarvamantrARAM japaH sarvasamfdDidaH japaPalaYca japanizWo dvija SrezWo KilayajYaPalaM laBet sarvezAmeva yajYAnAM jAyate sO mahAPalaH japena devatA nityaM stUya mAnA prasIdati prasannA vipulAn BogAn dadyAnmuktiYca vAcikasyEtat japayajYasya kIrttitam tasmAcCata guRopAMSuH sAhasro mAnasaH smftaH tantrasA noccErjapaYca saMkuryAt rahaH kuryyAdatantritaH samAhitamanA stUzRIM manasA vApi cintayet viDiyajYAt japayajYo viSizwo daSaBirguREH upAMSuH syAcCataSuRaH sAhasro mAnasaH smftaH vinA darBEstu yatsnAnaM yacca dAnaM vino dakam asaMKyAtantu yajjaptaM sarvaM tadaPalaM smftam muktAPalErvidruBeRa rudrAkzEH sPawikena parisaMKyA na vidyate daSaBirjanma janitaM Satena ca purAkftam niyutaM tu sahasreRa gAyatryA hanti duzkftam prANmuKo varttayet mAlAM sahasraM Satameva vA agnipu japANgamantracEtanyAdikajYAnamAvaSyakaM tatra mantracEtanyaM yaTA kubjikAtantre paYcakapawale SrIpArvatyuvAca Bagavan sarvadeveSa lokAnAM hitakAraka caturvargapradaM deva cEtanyaM me prakASaya SaNkara uvAca SfRu devi pravakzyAmi cEtanyaM paramAdButam rahasyaM paramaM puRyaM gopanIyaM tvayA punaH cicCaktyADvanitaM devi pariRAmakrameRa tu varRaBAvaM samAsajya nirmalaM vimalAtmakam zawcakraYca taTA BittvA SabdarUpaM sanAtanam nAdavindusamAyuktaM cEtanyaM parikIrttitam aTa vAnyaprakAreRa SrUyatAM padmalocane vinA yena na siDyettu japapUjAdikiYcana anAhatasya maDye tu graTitaM varRamuttamam suzumRA vartmanA devi kaRWadeSAdvinirgatam cEtanyaYca maheSAni yoginAM yogarUpakam sahasrAre varRarUpaM pariRAma Page b krameRa tu karRikAmaDyasaMsTe tu nAdavindusamanvitam evaM saMcintayeddevIM cEtanyaYca punaH punaH mantrAkzarARi cicCaktO graTitAni maheSvari tAni saYcintayeddevi sahasrAradale taTA cEtanyamantrarUpA ca cEtanyAnanda dAyinI cEtanyanAdaSaktiSca cEtanyavarRarUpakam maRi pUre sadA cintyaM mantrARAM prARarUpakam aTavAnyaprakAreRa SrUyatAM varavarRini kAmavIjaM klIM ramAvIjaM SrIM SaktivIjaM hrIM sureSvari etAni pUrvamuccAryya mAtfkAM tadanantaram puwitaM mUlamantraYca SatamazwottaraM japet kowikowiguRaYcEva laBate nAtra saMSayaH aTavAnya prakAreRa cEtanyaM SfRu pArvati yena vijYAtamAtreRa paramaM paSyati Druvam sUryyamaRqalamaDyasTaM cintayen mUlamantrakam azwottaraSataM japyaM mUlavidyAsvarUpakam guruM saYcintayettatra SivarUpaM sanAtanam SaktiYca cintaye ttatra brahmarUpAM sanAtanIm evaM saYcintayedyastu japedvA surasundari nAsADyaM tasya loke sminmukti rdevi kare sTitA taTA praTamapawale mantrArTaM mantra cEtanyaM yonimudrAM na vetti yaH na sidDyati varArohe kalpakowiSatErapi SatakowijapenApi tasya vidyA na sidDyatIti sarasvatItantre kaTayAmi mahA mantraM mantrArTaYca maheSvari yena vijYAtamAtreRa sarvasidDISvaro Bavet kevalaM BAvavudDyA ca mantrArTaM prARavallaBe kevalaM jYAnayogena jIvanmukto Baved Druvam kAlI tArA mahAvidyA zoqaSI BuvaneSvarI BEravI varadAtantre zazWapawale Siva uvAca mantrArTaM kaTayAmyadya SfRuzva parameSvari vinA yena na si Dyettu sADanEH kowiBiH Sive AdO prasAdavIjasya mantrArTaM SfRu pArvati SivavAcI hakArastu OkAraH syAt sadASivaH SUnyaM duHKaharantu syAt tasmAttena SivaM yajet hO daM durgAvAcakaM devi UkAraScApi rakzaRe viSvamAtA nAdarUpA sarvArTo vindurUpakaH tasmAttenEva vIjena durgAmArADayet Sive dU ka kAlI vrahma ra proktaM mahAmAyArTakaSca I viSvamAtA rTakonAdo vindurduHKaharArTamaH tenEva kAlikA Page a devIM pUjayedduHKaSAntaye krIm hakAraH SivavAcI syAt rePaH prakftirucyate mahAmAyArTa ISabdo nAdo viSvaprasUH smftaH duHKaharArTakovindu rBuvanAM tena pUjayet hrIm mahAlakzmyarTakaH SaH syAdDanArTo rePa ucyate I tuzwyarTo paro nAdo vindurduHKaharA rTakaH lakzmIdevyA vIjametattena devIM prapajayet SrI sarasvatyarTa ESabdo vindurduHKaharArTakaH sarasvatyAvIjametattena vARIM prapUjayet E kaH kAma deva uddizwo pyaTavA kfzRa ucyate lEndraI tuzwivAcI suKaduHKapradaYca am kAmavIjArTa uktaste tava snehAn maheSvari klI haH SivaH kaTito devi UrBerava iho cyate parArTo nAdaSabdastu vindurduHKaharArTakaH varmavIjamayohyatra kaTitastava yatnataH hU gaReSArTe gOktaste vindurduHKaharArTakaH gaMvIjArTastu kaTitastava snehAn maheSvari ga ga gaReSo vyApakArTo lakAraste ja OrmataH duHKaharArTakovindu rgaReSaM tena pUjayet glO kzOMnfsiMho brahma raSca UrdDvadantArTakaSca OH duHKa harArTako vindurnfsiMhaM tena pUjayet kzrO nA mAdivarRaH sarvezAM nAmOktaM svayamBuvA tenEvArTantu jAnIyAdarTalaByantu cintayet yaTAyaTaM viBaktyantaM mantrArTo cintayecCive tattadvarRAdiyogena saMkzepAt kaTitaM tvayi durgottAraRabAcIstArakArTastakArakaH muktyarTorePOkto tra mahAmAyArTakaSca I viSvamAtArTa konAdo vindurduHKaharArTakaH baDUvIjArTa ukto tra tava snehAn maheSvari strI yatra vindudvayaM mantre ekaM duHKaharArTakam anyat suKapradaM devi jYAtvA cArTaM vicintayet yatra vindudvayaM mantre anyat pUrRArTakaM matam svAhAmAtrArTakA devI parArTA vA prakI rttitA SakramAtA vazawproktA haripriyArTakA girA surArTA PaWayagrIve vivriM vIjaM vinirdiSet yaM vIjaM vAyuvAci syAt lamEndraM parikIrttitam ane kAkzaravIje ca svasvavIjaM svanAmakam evaM jYAtvA maheSAni mantrArTaM paricintayet ekavIjadvayaM yatra pfTagarTaM prakalpayet vIpsArTaM vA maheSAni jYAtvA mantraM japedDiyA iti te kaTito devi mantrArTaH parameSvari IMvIjenEva puwitaM mUlamantraM japedyadi tadeva mantracEtanyaM
