BAvayedizwa devatAm vanDUkAruRasaNkASAM javAsindUrasanniBAm viBAvya akzaraSrIRIM padmamaDyagatAM parAm tato jIvaH prasannAtmA pakziRA saha sundari maRipUraM tato gatvA BAvayedizwadevatAm viBAvya akzaraSreRIM padmamaDyagatAM parAm SudDvasPawikasaNkASAM SirApadmoparisTitAm tatojIvo maheSAni pakziRA saha pArvati hftpadmaM prayayO SIGraM nIrajAyatalocane izwavidyAM maheSAni mAvayet kamalopari viBAvya akzaraSreRIM mahAmarakata praBAm tatojIvo varArohe viSudDaM prayayO priye tatpadmagahanaM gatvA pakziRA saha pArvati izwavidyAM maheSAni AjYAMSe paricintayet pakziRA saha deveSi KaYjanAkzi Sucismite izwavidyAM maheSAni sAkzA dbrahmasvarUpiRIm viBAvya akzaraSreRIM haridvarRAM varAnane AjYAcakre maheSAni zawcakre DyAnamA caret zawcakre parameSAni DyAnaM kftvA Sucismite DyAnena parameSAni yadrUpaM samupasTitam tadeva para meSAni mantrArTaM vidDi pArvati aTa kullukAdi sarasvatItantre tftIyapawale tArAyAH kullUkA devi mahAnIlasaraKatI paYcAkzarI kAlikAyoH kullukA parikIrttitA kAlIkUrccaM vaDUmAyA PawkArAntA maheSvari cCinnAvAstu maheSAni kullukAzwAkzarI Bavet vajravErocanIye ca ante varma ca pUrayet sampat pradAyAH praTamaM BEravyAH kullukA Bavet SrImattripura sundaryyAH kullUkA dvAdaSAkzarI vAgBavaM praTamaM vIjaM kAmavIjamanantaram lajjAvIjaM tataH paScAt tripureti tataHparam BagavatIti tataH paScAdante WadvayamudDaret aTa kAmavIjaYca kullukA parikIrttitA prAsAda vIjaM SamBoSca maYjuGoze zaqakzaram ekArRA BuvaneSvaryyA vizRoH syAdazwavarRakam namonArAyaRAyeti praRa vAdyaYca kullukA mAtaNgyAH praTamaM bIjaM mAyA DUmA vatIM prati vAlAyASca vaDUvIjaM lakzmyASca nijavIjakam sarasvatyA vAgBavaYca annadAyA anaNgaka aparezAYca Page a devAnAM mantramAtraM prakIrttitam iyante kaTitA devi saMkzepAt kullukA mayA ajYAtvA kullukAmetAM yojapedaDarmaH priye paYcatvamASu laBate sidDvihAnistu jAyate taTA japAdikaM sarvaM nizPalaM nAtra saMSayaH tasmAt sarvaprayatnena DArayenmUrdDni kullukAm taTA viprARAM praRavaH setuH kzatriyARAM taTEva ca vESyAnA YcEva PawkAro mAyA SUdrasya kaTyate ajaptvA hfdi deveSi yo vE mantraM samuccaret sarvezAmeva mantrARA maDikArona tasya hi mahAsetuSca deviSi sundaryyA BuvaneSvarI kAlikAyAH svabIjaYca tArAyAH kUrcca vIjakam anyAsAntu vaDUvIjaM mahAseturvarAnane AdO japtvA mahAsetuM japenmantramananyaDIH Dane vaneSatulyo sO vApyAvARISvaropamaH yudDe kftAnta sadfSo nArIRAM madanopamaH japakAlo Bavettasya sarvaH kAlo na saMSayaH aTa vakzyAmi nirvARaM SfRuzvAvahitAnaGe praRavaM pUrvamuccAryya mAtfkAdyaM samudDaret tatI mUlaM maheSAni tatovAgBavamudDaret mAtfkAstu samastAstu punaH praRavamudDaret evaM puwitamUlantu prajapen maRipUrake evaM nirvARamiSAni yo naM jAnAti prAmaraH kalpakowisahasreRa tasya sidDirna jAyate zaTa muKaSoDanam paYcamapawale ISvara uvAca apa rEkaM pravakzyAmi muKaSoDanamuttamam yanna kftvA mahAdevi japapUjA vfTA mavet aSudDajihvayA devi yojapet sa tu pApakft tasmAtsarvaprayatnena jihvASoGanamAcaret mahAtripurasundaryyA muKasya SoDanaM SuBe SrIvIjaM praRavo lakzmIstAraH SrIH praRavastaTA imaM zaqakzaraM mantraM sundaryyA daSaDA japet SfRu sundari SyAmAyA muKa SoDanamuttamam nijavIjatrayaM devi praRavatritayaM punaH kAmatrayaM vahnivinduraticandrayutaM pfTak ezA navA kzarI vidyA muKaSoDanakAriRI tArAyAH SfRu cArvaNgi apUrvamuKaSoDanam jIvanaM maDyamaM lajjAM muvaneSIM tataH priye tryakzarIyaM mahAvidyA vijYeyA mftavarziRI durgAyAM SfRu cArvaNgi muKaSoDana muttamam dvAdaSasvaramudDftya vinduyuktaM trayaM taTA aparEkaM pravakzyAmi vagalAmuKaSoDanam vAgBavaM BuvaneSIYca vAgvIjasuravandite mAtaNgyAH SoDanaM devi aNkuSaM vAgBavantaTA vIjaYcANkuSametadDi vijYeyaM tryakzarI yakam lakzmyASca SoDanaM devi SrIvIjaM kamalAnane Page b durgAyAH SoDanaM mAyA vAg vIjapuwitA Bavet durge svAhA punarmmAyA vAgvIjaYca punaSca vAk praRavaM dAntamudDftya vAmakarRaviBUzitam punaH praRavamudDftya DanadAmuKaSoDanam evaMmantraM maheSAni DUmA vatyABavedapi praRavo vindumAn devi paYcAntakogaRe SituH vedAdigaganaM vihnimanuyunmantu candravat dvyakzaraH parameSAni vizRoSca muKaSoDanam anyAsAM praRavaM devi vAlAdInAM prakIrttitam strIRAYca SUdra tulyaM hi muKaSIDanamIritam muKaSoDanamAtreRa jihvA mftamayo Bavet anyaTA muKaviqyuktA jihvA Bavati sarvvadA BakzaRErdUzitA jihvA miTyAvAkyena dUzitA kalahErdUzitA jihvA tatkaTaM prajapenmanum tacCoDana manAcaryya na japet pAmaraH kvacit SEvaSAktavEzRavAdeH sarvasyAvaSyameva vA anyaTA prajapenmantraM mohena yadi BAvini sarvaM tasya vfTA devi mantrasidDirna jAyate ante narakagAmI ca Bavet so pi na cAnyaTA devo yadi japen mantraM akftvA muKaSoDanam tapanaM tasya deveSi kiM punarmmartyavAsinAm zazWapawale ISvara uvAca aTa vakzyAmi deveSi prARayogaM SfRuzva me vinA prARaM yaTA dehaH sarvakarmasu na kzamaH vinA prARaM taTA mantraH puraScaryyASatErapi mAyayA puwitomantraH saptaDA japataH punaH saprARo jAyate devi sarvatrAyaM viDiHsmftaH taTEva dIpanIM vakzye sarvamantre ca BAvini anDakAre gfhe yadvanna kiYcit pratiBAmate dIpanIrahito mantra staTEva parikIrttitaH vedAdipuwitaM mantraM saptavAraM japetpunaH dIpanIyaM samAKyAtA sarvatra parameSvari vedAdipuwitaM kftvA prayatnena sureSvari daSaDA praja penmantraM sUtakadvayamuktaye aTocyate japasyAtra krama Sca paramAdBataH yaM kftvA sidDisaMGAnAmaDipojAvate maraH natirgurvAdinAmAdO namo mantraSiKAM Bajet tato pi mantracEtanyaM mantrArTaBAvanA tataH guruDyAnaM SiraHpadme hfdIzwaDyAnamAcaret kullukAYca tataH setuM mahAsetumanantarama nirvARaYca tato devi yoni mudrAviBAyanA aNganyAsaM prARAyAmaM jihvASoDana meva ca prARayogaM dIpanIYca aSOcaBaNgameva ca mrUmaDye vA nasoragre dfzwO setuM japet punaH setumaSOca BaNgaYca prARAyAmamiti kramaH caturTapawale kullukAM mUrdDnisaMjapya hfdi setuM vicintayet mahAsetuM viSudDO Page a ca kaRWadeSa samudDaret maRipUre tu nirvARaM mahAkuRqa linImaDaH svADizWAne kAmavIjaM rAkiRImUrdDni saMsTi tam vicintya viDivaddevi mUlADArAntike Sive viSudDAntaM smoddevi visatantutanIyasIm vedisTAnaM hi jIvAntaM mUlamantrAvftaM muhuH
japana japana japana na japa BAve lyuw jape sannyAsa eva vedAnte varttate japanaM prati BA SA a
japata japata japata na japa BAve lyuw jape sannyAsa eva vedAnte varttate japanaM prati BA SA a
jasa jasa jasa mokzaRe diTA divA para saka sew jawyati irita ajasat ajADIta jasyati irit aja sat ajAsIt ajasIt jajAsa jesatuH ajasrama uditi ajasram udit jasitvA jastvA jastaH jasa baDe anAdare ca curA uBa saka sew jAsayati te ajIjasat na va ud hiMsane etadyoge karmaRi karmmaRi zazWI nijOjasojjAsamituM nijOjaso jjAsamituM jagaddruhAm mAGaH mATaH DftyA nATasya vEdehi manyorujjAsayAtmanaH BawwiH jasa gatO niGaRwuH BvA para saka sew jasati ajA ja sIt jasistAqane upakzayeca maDyavaH upakzaye ca mADavaH jasuriH jasa rakzaRe cu uBa saka sew idit jaMsayati te ajA aja jaMsat ta jasa mokzaRe divA para saka sew jasyati irit aja sat ajAsIt ajasIt jajAsa jesatuH ajasram udit jasitvA jastvA jastaH jasa baDe anAdare ca curA uBa saka sew jAsayati te ajIjasat va ud hiMsane etadyoge karmmaRi zazWI nijOjaso jjAsamituM jagaddruhAm mATaH DftyA nATasya vEdehi manyorujjAsayAtmanaH BawwiH jasa gatO niGaRwuH BvA para saka sew jasati ajA ja sIt jasistAqane upakzaye ca mADavaH jasuriH jasa rakzaRe cu uBa saka sew idit jaMsayati te aja jaMsat ta
jatU jatU jatU strI jatuH carmmacawikA prARijAtitve pi vede ni Uq pakziBedastriyAm fkzo jatUH muzIlakA te traya itarajanAnAm yaju jatUH muzIlakA etO pakziviSezO vedadI
jatUkarRRa jatUkarRRa jatUkarRRa pu fpiBede tasya gotrApatyam gargA yaY jAtUkarRya tadgotrApatye tasya CAttraH kaRvA aR ya lopaSca jAtUkarRa tacCAtre jAtUkarRyaSca upasmftikarttA yaTAha hemA dA aNgirAH jAvAlirnAciketaSca ska ndolOgAkzikaSyapO vyAsaH sanatkumAraSca Satadrurja nakastaTA vyAGraH kAtyAyanaScEva jAtUkarRyaH kapi YjalaH bODAyanaH kaRAdaSca viSvAmitrastaTEva ca upa smftikftaetAn pravadanti manIziRaH jAtukarRya ityatra jAtUkarRa iti pAWaH lipikarapamAdAt tacCAttrasya upa smfti karttftvamaBipretya vA taTA pAWa ityanye
jatUkarRa jatUkarRa jatUkarRa pu fziBede tasya gotrApatyam gargA yaY jAtUkarRya tadgotrApatye tasya CAttraH kaRvA aR yalopaSca jAtUkraRatacCAtre jAtUkarRyaSca upasmftikarttA yaTAha hemA dA aNgirAH jAvAlinIcaketaSca skandIlOgAkzikaSyapO vyAsaH sanat kumAraSca SatadrurjanakastaTA vyAGraH kAtyAyanaScEva jAtUkarRyaH kapiYjalaH bODAyanaH kaRAdaSca viSvAmitrastaTEva ca upasmftikftEtAn pravadanti manIziRaH jAtukarRya ityatra jAtUkarRa itipAWaH lipikarapramAdAt tacCAtrasya upasmfti karttftvamaBipretya vA taTA pAWa ityanye
jatUstrI jatUstrI jatUstrI jatuH carmacawikA prARijAtitve pi vede ni Uq pakziBedastriyAm fkzo jatUH muzIlakA te traya itarajanAnAm yaju jatUH suzolakA etO pakziviSezO vedadI
jawAsuKaDa jawAsuKaDa jawAsuKaDa pu jAwAsurasya vaDamaDikutya kftAM granTaH aR AKyATikAyAM lup lupi vyaktivacanatvAt puM svam BAratavanaparvatargate vantara parvaBede jawAsura vaDaH parva yakzayudDamataH param BA A a vanaparvaRi avAntaraparvoktO
jawAsurabaDa jawAsurabaDa jawAsurabaDa pu jawAsurasya baDamaDikftya kfto granTaH aR AKyAyikAyAM lup lapi vyaktivacanatvAt puMstvam BAratatanaparvAttargate vAntaraparvaBede jawAsurabaDaH parva yakzayudDamataH param BA A a vanaparvaRi avAnta raparvoktO
jawAtIra jawAtIra jawAtIra pu jawAmawati awa Iran mahAdeve trikA
jawAwIra jawAwIra jawAwIra pu jawAmawati awa Iran mahAdeve trikA
jayaDarman jayaDarman jayaDarman pu kurusenAnIBede kamalAkzaH parakrATI jayaDarmAsudarSanaH ete tvAmanuyAsyanti pattInAmayutAni zaw BA dro a
jayaDarmman jayaDarmman jayaDarmman pu kurusenAnIBede kamalAkzaH parakrATI jaya DarmmA sudarSanaH ete tvAmanuyAsyanti pattInAmayutAni zaw BA dro a
jfBa jfBa jfBa jfmBe hAitolA gAtraSETilye ca BvA Atma aka sew Idit idit jfmBate ajfmBizwa jajfmBe AtmAnamADAya AtmAna mADAya maDurjajfmBe kumA jfmBA jfmBaH jfmBitaH jfmBate muhurAsInA bAlA garBaBarAlasA sA da jfBa jfmBaRe BvA A aka sew jfBate ajfBizwa jajfBe Idit jfbDaH jfBa jfmBe hAitolA gAtraSETilye ca BvA Atma aka sew idit jfmBate ajfmBizwa jajfmBe AtmAna mADAya maDurjajfmBe kumA jfmBA jfmBaH jfmBitaH jfmBate muhurAsInA bAlA garBaBarAlasA sA da jfBa jfmBaRe BvA A aka sew jfBate ajfBizwa jajfBe Idit jfbDaH
jigartti jigartti jigartti pu gF bA ti dvitvaYca AcCAdake jigartti mindro apajargurARaH f vf jigarttiM garanta mAcCAdayantam BA
jigatti jigatti jigatti pu gF bA ti dvitvaYca AcCAdake jigarttimindro apajargurARaH f vf jigarttiH garanvamAcCAdayantam BA
jit jit jit tri ji kvip jetari sArajit lokajijjinaH amaraH svarjitA yajeta viSvajitA yajeta SrutiH yajeta vASvameDena svarjitA gozavena vA manuH
jita jita jita tri ji karmaRi kvip jetari mArajit lokaji jjinaH amaraH svarjitA yajeta viSvajitA yajeta Sruti yajeta vASvameDena svarjitA gozavena vA manuH jita tri ji karmmaRi kta parAjite erAjite parABUte BAve kta jaye na tadasyAsti ac arhadupAsakaBede pu hemaca jita tri ji kvip jetari mArajit lokaji jjinaH amaraH svarjitA yajeta viSvajitA yajeta Sruti yajeta vASvameDena svarjitA gozavena vA manuH jita tri ji karmmaRi kta erAjite parABUte BAve kta jaye na tadasyAsti ac arhadupAsakaBede pu hemaca
jitakrIDa jitakrIDa jitakrIDa tri jitaH kroDo yena kroDaSUnye vizRO pu manoharo jitakroDo vIrabAhurvidAraRaH vizRusaM vedamaryyAdAM sTApayan asurAn hanti na tu kopavaSAt BAzyokteH tasyAsyAsurahananAya na kopaH kintu vedamaryyA dArakzArTa eveti na tasya kopaSAliteti boDyam jitamanyurayuBayatra anantarUpo nantaSrIrjitamanyu rBayApahaH vizRusa
jitakroDa jitakroDa jitakroDa tri jitaH kroDo yena kroDaSUnye vizRO pu manoharo jitakroDo vIrabAhurvidAraRaH vizRusaM vedamaryAdAM sTApayan asurAn hanti na tu kopavaSAt BAzyokteH tasyAsurahananAya na kopaH kintu vedamaryAdArakzArTa eveti na tasya kopaSAliteti boDyam jitamanyurapyuBayatra anantarUpo nantaSrIrjitamanyurBayApahaH vizRusa
jrI jrI jrI vayohAnO vA curA uBa pakze kyrA pvA pa aka aniw jrAyayati te jriRAti ajijrayat ta ajrEzIt
ju ju ju raMhasi BvA para aka aniw javati ajOzIt jujAva javaH javanaH Rici jAvayati te ajI javat ta tataH sani jijAvayizati asya parasmEpaditvaM gatikarmmatvaYcaniGaRwUktam jayati javati ityupa krame ityete gatikarmARa ityukteH vede gaRavyatyAsaH vfzwiM ye viSve maruto junanti f yena na pAtamapAM junAma ayaM DAtuH f BAzye sOtra iti mADavaH dIrGAnto pi vAto na jUtaH stanayadBi raBvEH f ju gatO sO Atma saka aniw javate ajozwa jujuve yadvi manasA javate tadvAcA vadati tEtti sa
jugatO jugatO jugatO sO Atma saka aniw javate ajozwa jujuve yadvimanasA javate tadvAttA vadati tEtti sa
juqa juqa juqa preraRe cu uBa saka sew joqayati jIqayati te ajUjuqat ta juqa banDe joqAdeoyA joqAdeaoyA tudA kuwA para sew juqati Page a ajuqIt jujoqa GaYi juqaH juqa gatO tu para saka sew juqati ajoqIt atoqIt jujowa DaYi joqaH juqa preraRe cu uBa saka sew jIqayati te ajUjuqat ta juqa banDe joqAdeaoyA tudA kuwA para sew juqati Page a ajuqIt jujoqa GaYi juqaH juqa gatO tu para saka sew juqati atoqIt jujowa DaYi joqaH
juraMhasi juraMhasi juraMhasi BvA para aka aniw javati ajOzIt jujAva javaH javanaH RicijAvayati te ajIjavat te tataH sani jijAvayizati asya parasmEpaditvaM gatikarmatvaYcaniGaRwUktam jayatijavati ityupakrame ityete gatikarmARa ityukteH vede gaRavyatyAsaH vfzwiM ye viSve maruto junanti f yena na pAtamapAM junAma ayaM DAtuH f BAzye sOtra iti mADavaH dIrGAnto pi vAto na jUtaH stanayadDi raBrEH f
juza juza juza tfptO tftO aka tarke saka vA cu uBa pakze zakze BvA para sew jozayati te jozati ajUjuzat ta dyajozIt ajozIt juza harze aka sevAyAM saka tudA A sew jupate juzate ajozizwa jujuze juzamARaH juzamARAH Idit juzwaH YIt varttamAne kta juzwaH pOlastyo juzataSucaM vipannabanDuH vipanna banDuH BawwiH yatra devAso ajuzanta viSve yaju indra juzasva pravaha aTa ajAmekAm ajA mekAm ajohyetyeko juzamARo nuSete SvetASvataropa SvetASvataMropa ezEva budDirjuzatAM sadAtmanAm BA va Slo satvaM juzARAya BavAya dehinAm dehinAt BAga parajuzwanayAnnivarttamAnaH dIDitiH Arze gaRavya tyasAt adAditvam adaditvam devA nASraddaDAnAdDihavirjuzanti nASraddaDAnAddihavirjuzanti BA va ArzatvAt padavyatyayaH pArijAtaguRAn martyAjuzanti martyA juzanti yadi nArada devAnAM mAnuzARAM ca na viSezo Bavizyati harivaM lewi jojizat supeSasaskarati jojizadDi f juzI prItisevanayoH lewyaqAgamaH vikaraRaH sip iqAgamaSca iqA gamaSca BA prAdyaprasargapUrvakasya prAdidyotyartattadarTayukte prAdya pasargapUrvakasya prAdidyotyatattadarTayukte sevanAdO juza tftO aka tarke saka vA cu uBa zakze BvA para sew jozayati te jozati ajUjuzat ta ajozIt juza harze aka sevAyAM saka tudA A sew juzate ajozizwa jujuze juzamARAH Idit juzwaH YIt varttamAne kta juzwaH pOlastyo juzataSucaM vipanna banDuH BawwiH yatra devAso ajuzanta viSve yaju indra juzasva pravaha aTa ajA mekAm ajohyetyeko juzamARo nuSete SvetASvataMropa ezEva budDirjuzatAM sadAtmanAm BA va Slo satvaM juzARAya BavAya dehinAt BAga parajuzwanayAnnivarttamAnaH dIDitiH Arze gaRavya tyasAt adaditvam devA nASraddaDAnAddihavirjuzanti BA va ArzatvAt padavyatyayaH pArijAtaguRAn martyA juzanti yadi nArada devAnAM mAnuzARAM ca na viSezo Bavizyati harivaM lewi jojizat supeSasaskarati jojizadDi f juzI prItisevanayoH lewyaqAgamaH vikaraRaH sip iqA gamaSca BA prAdya pasargapUrvakasya prAdidyotyatattadarTayukte sevanAdO
jvI jvI jvI vayohAnI vA curA uBa pakze kyrA pvA pa aka aniw jrAyayati te jriRAti ajijrayat ta ajrEzIt
jvala jvala jvala dIptO calane ca BvA para aka sew jvalati ajvAlIt GawA jvalayati jvalA jvala jvalaH jvAlaH jajvAla lokasTitaye sa rAjA BawwiH jAgartti loko jvalati pradIpaH saKIgaRaH paSyati kOtukena muhUrttamAtraM kurU kus nATa DEryaM DaryyaM buBukzitaH kiM ki dvikareRa BuNkte udBawaH Page a udAdipUrvakasya tattadupasargadyotyArTayuktadIptO tattadupasargadyotyArTyuktadIptO ujjvalaH jvala tri jvala dIptO vA ac dIptiviSizwe jvala dIptO calane ca BvA para aka sew jvalati ajvAlIt GawA jvalayati jvalA jvalaH jvAlaH jajvAla lokasTitaye sa rAjA BawwiH jAgartti loko jvalati pradIpaH saKIgaRaH paSyati kOtukena muhUrttamAtraM kus nATa DaryyaM buBukzitaH ki dvikareRa BuNkte udBawaH Page a udAdipUrvakasya tattadupasargadyotyArTyuktadIptO ujjvalaH jvala tri jvala dIptO vA ac dIptiviSizwe
jvarANguSarasa jvarANguSarasa jvarANguSarasa pu jvarsaya jvarasyagajarUpasya aNkuSa iva pratiroDakatvAt karma BEzajyara ukte OzaDaBede sa ca nAnAviDo yaTA SudDaM sUtaM vizaM ganDaM DUrttabIjaM triBiH samam caturRAM dviguRaM vyozaM cUrRaM guYjAdvayaM hitam jambIrasya ca majjABirArdrakasya rasEryutam jvarANkuSo raso nAmnA jvarAn sarvAn nihanti vE vyozaM milityA dvigum ayaM Bedi jvarANkuSo nAmnA KyAtaH anyo pi tatrEva ukto yaTA rasasya dviguRaM ganDaM ganDatulyaYca waNkanam rasatulyaM vizaM yojyaM maricaM paYcaDA vizAt kawPalaM dantibIjaYca pratyekaM mariconmitam jvarANkuSo rasohyez cUrRayedaticikkaRam mAzEkena nihantyASu jvaraM jIrRaM tridozajam atrAnurapamAtrAM SarkarAdInAM nipIya gilitvA kiYcijjalaM pibet anyaviDo pi tatrEvokto yaTA tAmrakAd dviguRaM tAlaM mardayet suzavIdravEH prapuwed BUDare SIte vajrIkzIreRa mardayet prapuwet BUDare paScAt paYcaguYcAmitaM Bavet Ardrakasya rasenEva sarvajvaranikfntanaH EkAhikam dravyAhikaYca tryAhikaM cAturAhikam vizamaYcApi SItAdyaM jvaraM hanti jvarANkuSaH anyaviDo pi tatrEva SudDasUtaM taTA ganDaM karzamAnaM nayedbuDaH mahOzaDaM waNkanaYca haritAlaM taTA vizam rasArdDaM mardayet Kalle BfNgarAjarasena tu tridinaM BAvanAM dattvA caturTe vawikAM tataH kuryAccaRakamAtrAYca pizmalImaDusaMyutAm eza jvarANkuSo nAma vizamajvaranASanaH mahOzaDAdInAM caturRAM pratyekaM rasArdDam anyaviDo pi maricaM waNkanaM SaNkacUrRaM pAradaganDakam SoDitaM brahmaputraYca BAgamekaM viniHkzipet guYjAmAtrA pradAtavyA nAgavallIdalEH maha jvarANkuSo rasohyeza jvaramazwaviDaM jayet anyaviDo pi triBAgatAlena hataYca tAmraM rasaYca ganDaYca samonamAyuH vizaM samaM taddviguRaYca tAmraM trisaptavAraYca divAkarAtape saMmardya nimbusvarasena cUrRaM guYjApramARaM sitayA sametam jvarANkuSo yaM viviDapramAvo jvaraM nihantyazwaviDaM samagram BInamAyuH matsyapittam
jvarANkuSarasa jvarANkuSarasa jvarANkuSarasa pu jvarasya gajarUpasya aNkuSa iva prati roDakatvAt karmma BEzajyara ukte OzaDaBede sa ca nAnAviDo yaTA SudDaM sUtaM vizaM ganDaM DUrttavIjaM triBiH samam caturRAM dviguRaM byozaM cUrRaM guYjAdvayaM hitam jambIrasya ca majjABirArdrakasya rasEryutam jvarANkuSo rasI nAmnA jvarAn sarvAn nihanti vE vyozaM militvA dviguRam ayaM Bedi jvarANku So nAmnA KyAtaH anyo pi tatrEva ukto yaTA rasasya dviguRaM ganDaM ganDa tulyaYca waNkanam rasatulyaM vizaM yojyaM maricaM paYcaDA vizAt kawPalaM dantivIjaYca pratyekaM mariconmitam jvarANkuSo rasohyeza cUrRayedaticikkaRam mAzEkena nihantyASu jvaraM jIrRaM tridozajam atrAnurUpamAtrAM SarkarAdInAM nipIya gilitvA kiYcijjalaM pivet anyaviDo pi tatrEvokto yaTA tAmrakAd dviguRaM tAlaM mardayet suzavIdravEH prapuwed BUDare SIte vajrIkzIreRa mardayet prapuwet BUDare paScAt praYcaguYjAmitaM Bavet Ardrakasya rasenEva sarvajvaranikf ntanaH EkAhikam dvyAhikaYca tryAhikaM cAturA hikam vizamaYcApi SItAdyaM jvaraM hanti jvarANkuSaH anyaviDo pi tatrEva SudDasUtaM taTA ganDaM karzamAnaM nayed buGaH mahOzaDaM waNkanaYca haritAlaM taTA vizam rasArdDaM mardayet Kalle BfNgarAjarasena tu tridinaM BA vanAM dattvA caturTe vawikAM tataH kuryyAccaRakamAtrAYca pippalImaDusamyutAm eza jvarANkuSo nAma vizama Page a jvaranASanaH mahOzaDAdInAm caturRAM pratyekaM rasA rdDam anyaviDo pi maricaM waNkanaM SaNGacUrRaM pAradaga nDakam SoDitaM brahmaputraYca BAgamekaM viniHkzipet guYjAmAtrA pradAtavyA nAgavallIdalEH saha jvarANkuSo rasohyeza jvaramazwaviDaM jayet anyaviDo pi tri BAgatAlena hataYca tAmraM rasaYca ganDaYca samonamAyuH vizaM samaM tadudviguRaYca tAmraM trisaptavAraYca divAkarAtape saMmardya nimbusvarasena cUrRaM guYjApramARaM sitayA same tam jvarANkuSo yaM vibiDapraBAvo jvaraM nihantyazwaviDaM samagram mInamAyuH matsyapittam
jvarASanirasa jvarASanirasa jvarASanirasa pu jvarasTASanirivanASakatvAt karma rasaM ganDaM sEnDavaYca vizaM tAmraM samaM Bajet sarva cUrRasamaM lOhaM tatsamaM cUrRamaBrakam lOhe ca lOha daRqe ca nirguRqyAH svarasena ca mardayet yatnataH paScAnmaricaM sUtatulyakam parRena saha dAtavyo raso rattikasanmitaH kAsaM SvAsaM mahADoraM viBramAKyaM jvaraM vamim DAtusTaM pravalaM dAhaM jvaradozaM cirodBavam yakfdgulmodaraplIhaSvayaTuYca vinASayet BEzajyara ukte OzaDaBede
jvarASatirasa jvarASatirasa jvarASatirasa pu jvarasyASaniriva nASakatvAt karma rasaM ganDaM sEnDavaYca vizaM tAmraM samaM Bajet sarvacUrRasamaM lOhaM tatsamaM cUrRasaBrakam lOhe ca lOhadaRqe ca nirguRqyAH svarasena ca sardayet yatnataH paScAnmaricaM sUtatulyakam parRena saha dAtavyo ramo rattikasanmitaH kAsaM SvAsaM mahAGoraM viBramAKyaM jvaraM vamim DAtusTaM pravalaM dAhaM jvaradozaM cirodBavam yakfdgulmodaraplIhaSvayaTuYca vinASayet BEzajyara ukte OzaDaBede
jvarAryaBra jvarAryaBra jvarAryaBra pu jvarasyAriH karma aBraM tAmraM rasaM ganDaM vizaYceti samaMsamam dviguRaM DUrttavIjaYcaDyozaM paYcaguRaM matam jalena vawikAM kuryAd yaTA dozAnusArataH aBraM jvarArinAmedaM sarvajvaravinASanam vArtikAn pEttikAMScEva SlEzmikAn sAnnipAtikAn vizamAKyAn dvandvajAMSca GAtusTAn vizamajvarAt nASayeNgAtra sandeho vfkzamindrASaniryaTA plIhAnaM yakftaM gulmasagnimAndyaM saSoTakam kAsaM SvAsaM tfzAM kampaM dAhaM SItaM vamiM Bramiz BEzajyara ukte OzaDaBede
jvarAryyaBra jvarAryyaBra jvarAryyaBra pu jvarasvAriH karmma aBraM tAmraM rasaM ganDaM vizaYceti samaM samam dviguRaM DUrttavIjaYca vyozaM paYcaguRaM matam jalena vawikAM kuryyAd yaTA dozAnusArataH aBraM jvarArinAmedaM sarvajvaravinASanam vAtikAn pEtti kAMScEva SlEzmikAn sAnnipAtikAn vizamAKyAn dvandva jAMSca DAtusTAn vizamajvarAn nASayennAtra sandeho vfkzamindrASaniryaTA plIhAnaM yakftaM gulmamagnimAndyaM saSoTakam kAsaM SnAsaM tfzAM kampaM dAhaM SItaM vamiM Bramim BEzajyara ukte OzaDaBede

jyA jyA jyA jarAyAM kyrA pvA para aka aniw jinAti ajyAsIt a jyAsIt jijyO jijyatuH jinaH jyA strI jyA aGnyA yak ni DanurguRe GanurguRe amaraH tasya nirantarAkarzaRena Danuzo jarAkaraRAttaTAtvam vasuDAyAM tasyAH pratikzaRaM kzIyamARatvAt kzIyamAnatvAt taTAtvaM mAtari svapasavena svaprasavena tasyAH vayohAnestaTAtvam medi golakzetrAntargate DanurAkArakzetrasTakendrasTAnAt uBayapArSvasaMlagne saralareKABede kramajyASabde pf jIvASabde pf dfSyam tASca caturviMSatisaMKyikAstatra caturviM SatisaMKyi kAstatra kramajyASabde uktAvaSizwA utkramajyAmAnasaMKyANkASca utkramajyAmAnasaMKyA NkASca sU si uktA yaTA munayoranDrayamalArasazaw kA munayoranDrayamalArasazawkA munISvarAH dvyazwEkArUpazaqdasrAH sAgarArTahutASanAH svartuvedAnavAdryarTAdiNnagAstryarTakuYjarAH nagAmbaraviyaccanadrArUpaDaraRiSaNkarAH KartuvedAnavAdryarTAdiNnagAstryarTakuYjarAH nagAmbaravi yaccandrArUpaDaraRiSaNkarAH SarArRavahutASEkABujaNgAkzi SarendavaH navarUpamahIDrEkAgajEkANkaniSAkarAH guRASvirUpanetrARi pAvakAgnigaRASvinaH vasvarRavArTayamalAsturaNgartunagASvinaH navarUjpamahIrDrEkAgajEkANkaniSAkarAH gu RASvirUpanetrARi pAvakAgniguRASvinaH vasvarRavArDaya Page a malAsturaNgartunagASvinaH navAzwanavanetrARi pAvakEkayamAgnayaH pAvakEkaya mAgnayaH gajAgnisAgaraguRA utkramajyArdDapiRqakAH jyA jarAyAM kyrA pvA para aka aniw jinAti a jyAsIt jijyO jijyatuH jinaH jyA strI jyA aGnyA yak ni GanurguRe amaraH tasya nirantarAkarzaRena Danuzo jarAkaraRAttaTAtvam vasuDAyAM tasyAH pratikzaRaM kzIyamAnatvAt taTAtvaM mAtari svaprasavena tasyAH vayohAnestaTAtvam medi golakzetrAntargate DanurAkArakzetrasTakendrasTAnAt uBayapArSvasaMlagne saralareKABede kramajyASabde pf jIvASabde pf dfSyam tASca caturviM SatisaMKyi kAstatra kramajyASabde uktAvaSizwA utkramajyAmAnasaMKyA NkASca sU si uktA yaTA munayoranDrayamalArasazawkA munISvarAH dvyazwEkArUpazaqdasrAH sAgarArTahutASanAH KartuvedAnavAdryarTAdiNnagAstryarTakuYjarAH nagAmbaravi yaccandrArUpaDaraRiSaNkarAH SarArRavahutASEkABujaNgAkzi SarendavaH navarUjpamahIrDrEkAgajEkANkaniSAkarAH gu RASvirUpanetrARi pAvakAgniguRASvinaH vasvarRavArDaya Page a malAsturaNgartunagASvinaH navAzwanavanetrARi pAvakEkaya mAgnayaH gajAgnisAgaraguRA utkramajyArdDapiRqakAH
jyEzWI jyEzWI jyEzWI strI jyezWAnakzatreRa tatsamIpasTamUlAnakzatreRa vA yuktA pOrRamAsI aR NIp jyezWAmUlAnakzatrAnya Page a taranakzatrayuktapOrRamAsyAm jyezWeva svArTe aR NIp gfhagoDikAyAYca vallISabde dfSyam

jyEzWeneya jyEzWeneya jyEzWeneya puM strI jyezWAyAH striyAH apatyam Qak inaN jyezWAyA apatye jyezWo jyEzWineyaH stuvIta tA brA kfte kAnizWineyasya jyEzWineyo vivAsitaH BawwiH
jyEzWineya jyEzWineya jyEzWineya puMstrI jyezWAyAH striyAH apatyam Qak inaN jyezWAyA apatye jyozWo jyEzWineyaH stuvIta tA brA kfte kAnizWineyasya jyEzWineyo vivA sitaH BawwiH
jyotIraTa jyotIraTa jyotIraTa pu jyotizAM sUryAdInAM raTa ivADAratvAt Druvanakzatre trikA tadADAratayEva jyotiScakrasya samavasTAnAt tasya tadraTatvam
jyotirbIja jyotirbIja jyotirbIja na jyotizo gagane prakASasyaM bIjamiva svadyote trikA
jyotirvIja jyotirvIja jyotirvIja na jyotizo gagane prakASasya vIjamiva svadyote trikA
jyotoraTa jyotoraTa jyotoraTa pu jyotizAM sUryyAdInAM raTa ivADAratvAt Druvanakzatre trikA tadADAratayEva jyotiScakrasTa sama vasTAnAt tasya tadraTatvam
jyuta jyuta jyuta dIptO BvA para saka sew jyotati irit ajyutat ajyotIt jujyota dIptO jyuta dIpttO BvA Atma aka sew jyotate ajyotizwa jujyute fdut fdit ajujyotat ta jyotiH jyuta dIptO BvA para saka sew jyotati irit ajyutat ajyotIt jujyota jyuta dIpttO BvA Atma aka sew jyotate ajyotizwa jujyute fdit ajujyotat ta jyotiH
kARqavIRA kARqavIRA kARqavIRA strI kARqa iva sTUlA vIRA sTUlavIRAyAM cARqAlavIRAyAm kARqasya Sarasya vikAraH vilvA aR kARqI vIRA karma SaramayyAM vIRAyAm goDAvoRaH kARqavIRASca patanayovAdayantyupagAyanti kAtyA SarakARqamayyovIRAH kARqavIRAH karkaH
kARqavoRA kARqavoRA kARqavoRA strI kARqa iva sTUlA vIRA sTUlavIRAyAM cARqAlavIRAyAm kARqasya Sarasya vikAraH vilvA aR kARqI vIRA karma SaramayyAM vIRAyAm goDAvI RAH kARqavIRASca patnyovAdayantyupagAyanti kAtyA SarakARqamayyovIRAH kARqavIRAH karkaH
kASa kASa kASa dIptO BvA Atma aka sew kASate akASizwa kASAmbaBUva kASAmAsa kASAYcakre cakASe Ric acakASat ta fdittvAt caNi nopaDAhrasyaH kAlI kapAlABaraRA cakASe tayA duhitrA sutarAM savitrI prakASete pravfdDO vfzamAviva vazamAviva BA vi Slo SlI prati pratirUpaprakASe sArUpye ca pratIkASaH yamasya tvA gfhe rasampraticAkaSAna rasaM praticAkaSAna aTa vi mukulIBAvApanodanena prakASe puzpaM rAhoH SuBASuBaPalABiDAnamasti nanu varAheRa rAhoH PalaM kutrApi noktamiti cenna sopa plave SaSANke sakrUre lagnage kuje zwamage mAtrA sArdDaM mriyate candravadarkeRa SastreReti varAhapadye pi rAhu ketvoranyatarABiDAnamasti taTA hi kimidaM candragrahaRaM rAhusAhityakftamuta ketusAhityakftamiti tatra grahaRIyaM candre lagnage sakrUre krUrasAhitya maBihitam krUrAstu sUryaBOmaSanaya eva vivakzitA iti cet sUryasya tAvadyogABAvaScandragrahaRe hi sapta marASisTatvAt BOmasyApi yogaH kuje zwamaga ityu kternAsti pAriSezyAcCanereva yogovAcyaH tatra spa zwatvArTaM SanigrahaRameva kasmAnnAkAri ataH sAmAnya vAcinaH krUraSabdasya prayogAdrAhuketvoranyatarayogo pi vivakzito parasya sUryyasya saptamarASisTatvAt yoga ekarASisTatve syAnna tu BinnarASisTatve iti evaM grahaRasambanDilagnasTasUryArizwe pi rAhuketvoranyatara yogo vyAKyeyaH ataeva rAhustamo gurasuraSca SiKIti keturiti paryAyABiDAnaM kftam vivAhapawale pi maraRaM lattA rAhoH kAryavinASaM mfgorvadantIti kaRWato rAhulattA pyuktA nAstIti cet BrAnto si SfRu samBave vyaBicAre ca syAdviSezaRa marTavaditi nyAyAdastaNgatatvaviSezeRaM BOmasya krUra yuktabuDasya Sanerveti trayARAmeva samBavati na samBavati ca sUryastu nityodita eva satyastagatatvaviSezaRavEyarTyaM prAguktanyAyAt rA hostu nAradAdivAkyAcCirorUpamaRqalAvagateH indva rkamaRqalAkftirasitatvAt kila na dfSyate gagane iti varAhoktestamorUpatvAttAdfksvarUpAnupalabDeragocaratvapa ram sTAnamapyasya candravilamaRqakrAntimaRqalasvasti ke yadAha keSavAkeH veSma cAsya SaSaBfdvimaRqalakrA ntimaRqalamilaccatuHpaTaH iti ataeva na vidyante gAvaH kiraRAyasyetyaguranvarTatApyavasIyate aTa yadi sUryasanniDikftamityucyeteti cet na itaragrahavadrAho rapyudayAstaprasidDyaBAvAt kiYca kAlAMSAnaBiDAnAt kadoditaH kadAstamitaSceti nirRetumaSakyatvAt evaM ketorapyetat drazwavyam manu ketUdayohyutpAtAdO pratyakza todfSyata iti cenna tasyAniyatadikpraBavatvAt ani yatanakzatrapraBavatvAcca kiYca ketUtpAto hi loke duradf zwasUcakaH aniyatenaM bahunA svalpenApi vA kAlena Ba vet sUryasAnniDyakftodayAstO tu niyatakAlAveveti tayoH ketvorBedaH svIkarttavyaH ketukzetrAdikaM jyo ta uktam siMhastrikoRaM Danu ruccasaMjYaM mInIgfhaM SukraSanI vipakzO sUryyAracandrAH suhfdaH samAnO jIvendujO zaw SiKinaH parAMSAH tadvyAnavarRRagotradeSAdi grahayajYaSabde vakzyate viMSottarIya daSAyAM taddaSAmAnaM varzAH tacca daSASabde vakzyate tasya rASiBogakAlaSca mAsAH ketUpaplavaBOmandagatayaH zazWe tftIye SuBAH jyo ta dAnavaBede pu ketuvIryya Sabde udA dfSyam
kAWya kAWya kAWya tri kAwe vizamamArge kUpe vA BavaH yat vizamamArgaBave kUpaBave ca rudraBede pu namaH kAWyAya ca nIpyAya ca yaju namaH kAWyAya ca gahvarezWAya ca kAwe kUpe vizamamArge vA BavaH vedadI
kAYcanAkAriRI kAYcanAkAriRI kAYcanAkAriRI strI kAYcanaM banDanaM karoti kf Rini ta SaMtamUlyAM Sabdaca tasyA bahumUlatvena banDanakAritvAt taTAtvam
kAYcanagIri kAYcanagIri kAYcanagIri pu kAYcanamayastatpraDAno vA giriH SAka ta sumeruparvate hemaca dAnArTakalpitasvarRAcale ca kAYcanAcalasvarRAcalAdayo pyatra
kAYcanagiri kAYcanagiri kAYcanagiri pu kAYcanamayastatpraDAno vA giriH SAka ta sumeruparvate hemaca dAnArTakalpitasvarRRAcale ca kAYcanAcalasvarRAcalAdayo pyatra
kAYcanakAriRI kAYcanakAriRI kAYcanakAriRI strI kAYcanaM banDanaM karoti kf Rini ta SatamUlyAM Sabdaca tasyA bahumUlatvena banDana kAritvAt taTAtvam
kAdambarIbIja kAdambarIbIja kAdambarIbIja na ta madyasADane kitvAdidravyaBede ratnamA
kAdambarIvIja kAdambarIvIja kAdambarIvIja na ta madyasADane kitvAdidravyaBede ratnamA
kAkaSimbI kAkaSimbI kAkaSimbI strI kAkapriyA SimbI kAkatuRqyAm rAjani
kAkaSimyI kAkaSimyI kAkaSimyI strI kAkapriyA SimbI kAkatuRqyAm rAjani
kAkaparRI kAkaparRI kAkaparRI strI kAka iva kfzRaM parRamasyAH kAkamIzajjalaM parRe syA vA gOrA NIz mudgaparRyAM BAvapra tasyAH kAkakfzRaparRatvAt IzajjalayuktapatratvAcca taTAtvam
kAkaparRRI kAkaparRRI kAkaparRRI strI kAka iva kfzRaM parRRamasyAH kAkamIzajjalaM parRRe syA vA gOrA NIz mudgaparRRyAM BAvapra tasyAH kAkakfzRaparRRatvAt IzajjalayuktapatratvAcca taTAtvam
kAlAnalacakra kAlAnalacakra kAlAnalacakra na kAlAnala iva hiMsakaM cakram narapatijayacaryyokte nizwAdijYApake cakraBede tadBedAdikaYca cakraSabde vakzyate
kAlaYcara kAlaYcara kAlaYcara pu kAlaM jarayati jf Ric ac bA mum parvataBede sapta vyADA daSArRezu mfgAH kAlaYjare girO BAra pitfkalpagATA tanmAhAtmyaM BA va a tatra kAlaYjaro nAma parvato lokaviSrutAH tatra devahrade snAtvA gosahasraPalaM laBet yaH snAtastApayettatra girO kAlaYjare nfpaH svargaloke mahIyeta narInAstyatra saMSayaH tato girivaraSnezWe citrakUwe viSAmpate tenAsya citrakUwaparvatasAnniDyaM gamyate tatra mAsaM kftasnAne daSASvameDaPalaM yaToktam BA anu a gaNgAyamunayostIrTe taTA kAlaYjare girO daSASvameDAnApnoti tatra mAsaM kftodakaH ayaYca BUmimaDyasTareKAtaH prAcyAM diSi varttate yaTA BA za a pUrvaM prAcIM diSaM rAjan rAjarzigaRasevitAm ityupakramya pUrvadiksTatIrTakaTane prayAgamiti viKyAtaM taspAdBaratasattama agastyasya tu rAjendra tatrASramavaro nfpa tattaTA tApasAraRyaM tApasErupaSoBitam hiraRyavinduH kaTito girO kAlaYjare mahAn ityukteH tIrTaparatve asya klIvatvamapi kAlaYjaraM praBAsaYca taTA vadarikASramaH iti kASI BOmatIrTakaTane a taTA prayogAt yogicakramelake BEravaBede medi deSaBede Dara sa ca kAlaYjaragirirUpajanapadAvaDiBUtaH tato BavAdO ropaDatvAt prAgvarttitvAcca buY kAlaYjaka tadBave ropaDatvAt prAgvarttitvAcca vuY kAlaraYjaka tadBave tri kAlaM mftyuM jayati jf bA Kac kAlasya mfyorjArake tri indriyARAM hi sarvezAM vaSyAtmA calitasmftiH AtmanaH sampradAnena marttyopmftyumupASnute Ahatya sarvasaNkalpAn satve cittaM niveSayet satve cittaM samAveSya tataH kAlaYjaro Bavet BA SA a kAlaM mftyuM jarayati mftyuYjaye Sive tasya patnI NIp kAlaYjarI caRqikAyAM strI Dara svayaM tajjArakatve tu wAbeveti BedaH
kAlaYjara kAlaYjara kAlaYjara pu kAlaM jarayati jf Ric ac bA mum parvata Bede sapta vyADA daSArRezu mfgAH kAlaYjare girO BAra pitfkalpagATA tanmAhAtmyaM BA va a tatra kAlaYjaro nAma parbbato lokaviSrutaH tatra devahrade snAtvA gosahasraPalaM laBet yaH snAtastApayettatra girO kAlaYjare nfpaH svargaloke mahIyeta naronAstyatra saMSayaH tato girivaraSrezWe citrakUwe viSAmpate tenAsyaM citrakUwaparvvatasAnniDyaM gamyate tatra mAsaM kftastAne daSASvameDaPalaM yaToktam BA anu a gaNgA yamunayostIrTe taTA kAlaYjare girO daSASvameDAnA pnoti tatra mAsaM kftodakaH ayaYca BUmimaDyasTareKAtaH prAcyAM diSi varttata yaTA BA va a pUrvvaM prAcIM diSa rAjan rAjarzigaRa sevitAm ityupakramya pUrvvadiksTatIrTakaTane prayAgamiti viKyAtaM tasmAdBaratasattama agastyasya tu rAjendra tatrASramavaro nfpa tattaTA tApasAraRyaM tApasErupaSoBi tam hiraRyavinduH kaTito girO kAlaYjare mahAn ityukteH tIrTaparatve asya klIvatvamapi kAlaYjaraM praBAsaYca taTA vadarikASramaH iti kASI BOmatIrTakaTane a taTAprayogAt yogicakramelake BEraDaBedemedi deSaBede Dara sa ca kAlaYjaragirirUpajanapadA vaDiBUtaH tato BavAdO ropaDatvAt prAgvarttitvAcca vuY kAlaraYjaka tadBave tri kAlaM mftyuM jarayati jf bA Kac kAlasya mftyorjArake tri indri yARAM hi sarvvezAM vaSyAtmA calitasmftiH AtmanaH sampradAnena marttyomftyumuvASnute Ahatya sarvasaNkalpAn satve cittaM niveSayet satve cittaM samAveSya tataH kAlaYjaro Bavet BA SA a kAlaM mftyuM jarayati mftyuYjaye Sive tasya patnI NIp kAlaYjarI caRqikAyAM strI Dara svayaM tajjArakatve tu wAbeveti BedaH
kAlakarRI kAlakarRI kAlakarRI strI kAlaH karRo syAH NIp alakzmIBede alakzmIH kAlakarRI ca purA svArTe ka hrasvaH kAlakarRikA tatrArTe hema alakzmISabde nuktastadutpattyAdiratrABiDIyate pAdme uttaraKaRqe devIM prati SivavAkyam mAM praRamya punardevA mamanTuH kzIrasAgaram tasmin pramaTyamAne tu mayA devESca BAvini jyezWA devI samutpannA raktasragvAsasAvftA utpannA sA bravIddevAn kiMkarttavyaM mayeti vE tAmabruvaMstadA devIM sarvedevagaRA stadA yezAM gfhAntare nityaM kalahaM saMpravarttate tattesTAnaM prayacCAmo vAsastatra SuBAnane yasya gehaM kapAlAsTiBasmakeSAdicihnitam paruzaM BAzate nityaM vasantyanftavAdinaH sanDyAkAle ca ye pApAH svapanti malacetasaH tezAM veSmani saMtizWa duHKadAridryadAyinI kapAlakeSaBasmAsTituzANgArARi yatra tu tatra te satataM sTAnaM Bavizyati na saMSayaH akftvA pAdayoH SOcaM yastvAcamati durmmatiH taM Bajasva sadA devi kaluzeRAvftA BfSam tfRANgArakapAlASmabAlukAyasacarmmaBiH dantaDAvana karttAro Bavizyanti narADamAH ramasva kalinA devi tezAM veSmasu nityaSaH tilapizwaYca naktaYca kAliNgaSigrugfYjanam CatrAkaM viqvarAhaYca vilvakozAtakIPalam alAbUM varttulAm SrIPalaM ye vE svAdayanti narADamAH tezAM gfhe tava sTAnaM devi dAridryade sadA ityAdiSya surAH sarve te jyezWAM kalivallaBAm tasyA uddAlakamuninA saha vivAhAdikaTA ca pAdme a samudramaTanAdyAni ratnAnyApuH surottamAH SrezWaYca kOstuBaM tezu vizRave pradaduH surAH yAvadaNgIcakArAsO lakzmIM BAryyArTamAtmanaH tAvadvijYApayAmAsa lakzmIstaM cakrapARinam lakzmIruvAca asaMskftya kaTaM jyezWAM kanizWA pariRIyate tasmAnmAgrajAmetAmalakzmIM maDusUdana vivAhyodvaha mAM paScAtDarmmaH sanAtanaH tasmAt DarmmavyatikrAmaM na kuryyAM maDusUdana iti tadvacanaM SrutvA sa vizRurlokaBAvanaH uddAlakAya munaye sudIrTa tapase tadA AptavAkyAnuroDena tAmalakzmIM dadO kila sTUlozWIM SuzkavadanAM virUpAM biBratIM tanum sravadAraktanayanAM rUkzapakvaSiroruhAm sa munirvizRuvAkyAttAmaNgIkftya svamASramam vedaDvanisamAyuktamAnayAmAsa Darmmavit homaDUpasuganDAdyaM vedaGozeRa nAditam ASramaM taM vilokyATa vyaTitA sA vravIdidam jyezWovAca na hi vAsonurUpo yaM vedaDvaniyuto mama nAtrAgamizye Bo brahman nayasvAnyatra mAM Druvam uddAlaka uvAca kaTaM nAyAsi kiYcAtra varttate svamata tava tava yogyA ca vasatiH kA Bavettadvadasva mAm jyezWovAca vedaDvanirBavedyasminnatiTInAYca pUjanam yajYadAnAdikaM yatra nEva tatra vasAmyaham parasparAnurAgeRa dAmpatyaM yatra vidyate pitfdevArccanaM yatra tatra nEva vasAmyaham dAnaSOce na vidyete paradravyApahAriRaH paradAraratA yatra tatra sTAne ratirmama vfdDasajjanaviprARAM yatra syAdavamAnanam nizWuraM BAzaRaM yatra tatra samyagvasAmyaham sUta uvAca iti tadvacanaM SrutvA vizRavadano Bavat uddAlakastatovAkyaM tAmalakzmImuvAca ha uddAlaka uvAca aSvatTavfkzamUle smin alakzmi SramyatAM kzaRam ASramasTAnamAlokya yAvadAyArmyahaM punaH sUta uvAca iti tAM tatra saMsTApya jagAmoddAlako muniH pratIkzantI ciraM tatra yadA na taM dadarSa sA tadA ruroda karuRaM BarttustyAgena duHKitA tattasyAH kranditaM lakzmIrvEkuRWaBavane SfRot tadA vijYApayAmAsavizRumudvignamAnasA lakzmIruvAca svAmin madBaginI jyezWA svAmityAgena duHKitA tAmASvAsayituM yAhi kfpAlo yadyahaM priyA sUta uvAca lakzmayA sahatato vizRustatrAgAt kfpayAnvitaH ASvAsayanna lakzmIM tAmidaM vAkyamaTAbravIt vizRuruvAca aSvatTa vfkzamAsAdya sadA lakzmi sTirABAva mamAMSasamBavo hyeza AvAsaste mayA kftaH mandavAre sadA nUnaM lakzmIratrAgamizyati aspfSyo sO BavettasmAt mandavAraM vinA kila dIpAnvitAmAvasyAyAM tatpUjAviDAnaM mantraliNgAt yaTA alakzmIstvaM kurUpAsi kutsitasTAnavAsini suKarAtrO mayA dattAM gfhRa pUjAYca SASvatIm dAridrya kalahapriye devi tvaM DananASinI yAhi SatrorgfhaM nityaM sTirA tatra Bavizyasi yadi tvaM me mahABAge prItA Bavasi sarvadA putrabanDukalatrezu kadAcinnA gamizyasi gacCatvaM mandiraM SatrorgfhItvA cASuBaM mama madASrayaM parityajya sTitA tatra Bavizyasi kiYca evaM gate niSITe tu nArIBiH svagfhANganAt alakzmISca vahizkAryyA amantraYca yaTAviDi iti kftyatattvArRavaDfta brahmapurARam evaMgate niSITe tu jane nidrArdvalocane tAvannagaranArIBiH SUrpaqiRqimavAdanEH nizkAsyate prahfzwABiralakzmIH svagfhANganAt iti madanaratnaDftaYca grahakuzmARqaKewAdyAH kAlakArRISiSugrahAH kASI
kAlakarRRI kAlakarRRI kAlakarRRI strI kAlaH karRRo syAH NIp alakzmIBede alakzmIH kAlakarRRI ca purA svArTeka hrasvaH kAla karRikA tatrArTe hema alakzmISabde nuktastadutpattyAdi ratrABiDIyate pAdme uttaraKaRqe devIM prati SivavAkyam mAM praRamya punardevA mamanTuH kzIrasAgaram tasmin pramaTyamAne tu mayA devESca BAvini jyezWA devI samut pannA raktasragvAsasAvftA utpannA sA bravIddevAn kiM tAmalakzmIM dadO kila sTUlozWIM SuzkavadanAM virUpAM biBratIM tanum srava dAraktanayanAM rUkzapakvaSiroruhAm sa munirvizRu vAkyAttAmaNgIkftya svamASramam vedaDvanisamAyuktamA nayAmAsa Darmmavit homaDUpasuganDAdyaM vedaDozeRa nA ditam ASramaM taM vilokyATa vyaTitA sA bravodidam jyEzWovAca na hi vAsonurUpo yaM vedaDvaniyuto mama nAtrAgamizye Bo brahman nayasvAnyatra mAM Druvam uddA laka uvAca duHKitA tattasyAH kranditaM lakzmIrvEkuRWaBavane SfRot tadA vijYApayAmAsa vizRumudvignamAnasA lakzmIsvavAca svAmin madBa ginI jyezWA svAmityAgena duHKitA tAmASvAsayituM yAhikfpAlo yadyahaM priyA sUta uvAca lakzmyA saha tato vizRustatrAgAt kfpayAnvitaH ASvAsayanna lakzmIM tAmidaM vAkyamaTAbravIt vizRuruvAca aSvatTa vfkzamAsAdya sadA lakzmi sTirA Bava mamAMSasamBavo hyeza AvAsaste sayA kftaH mandavAre sadA nUnaM lakzmI ratrAgamizyati aspfSyo sO BavettasmAt mandavAraM vinA kila dIpAnvitAmAvasyAyAM tatpUjAviDAnaM mantraliNgAt yaTA alakzmIstvaM kurUpAsi kutsitasTAnavAsini Page a suKarAtrO kAlakeSI kAlakeSI kAlakeSI strI kAlaH keSa iva patrAdiryasyAH gOrA NIz nIlyAmozaDO Sabdaci kfzRakeSayuktastriyAYca

kAlaketuH kAlaketuH kAlaketuH aTadakzayajYe rudrakroDodBavaH kAlaketu strIRi varza SatAni nava ca mAsAn prozya udayate pUrvveRa vE SvAnaramArge ityamftamayasya maRiketoScArAnte SyAvarUkzaM tAmrAruRAM SUlAkArasadfSIM SiKAM kftvA naBasastriBA gacArI sa SastraBayarogadurBikzAvfzwimarakEH yAvanmAsAn dfSyate tAvadvarzARi triBAgaSezAM prajAM kftvA SAradaDA nyasyAQakamardDeM kftvA cAstaM brajati parA taTA ca vfdDa gargaH jyezWA mUlamanurADA yA vITI saMprakIrttitA tAYca vITIM samAruhya ketuScet krIqate BfSam dakzi RABinatAM kftvA SiKAM GorAM BayaNkarAm SUlAgrasa dfSIM tIkzRAM SyAvatAmrAruRapraBAm pUrvveRa udita ScEva nakzatrARyupaDUpayet GoraM prajAsUtsfjati PalaM mAse trayodaSe triBAgaM naBaso natvA tato gacCatyada rSanam yAvato divasAMstizWet tAvadgarzARi tadBayam SastrAgniBayarogESca durBikzamarakErhatAH zUrRamAnAH prajAH sarvvA vidravanti diSo daSa calaketuH aTa pEtAmahaScalaketuH paYcadaSavarzaSataM prozya uditaH paScimenANguliparvvamAtrAM SiKAM dakziRABinatAM kftvA kAlaketoScArAnte naBasastriBAgamanucaran yaTA yaTo ttarAM vrajati taTA taTA SUlAgrAkArAM SiKAM darSayan brAhmaM nakzatramupasftya manAk DruvaM vrajan rASiM saptazIMn saMspfSya naBaso rdDamAtraM dakziRamanu parikramya astaM brajati sa svarge dAruRakarmmA svargaprAptitvAdeva vakrAstamaBinihanti lokamapi ca BUmiM kampayitvA daSa mAsAn maDyadeSe BUyizWaM janapadamavaSepaM kurute tezvapi ca kvacit kvacit SastradurBikzamarakavyADiBayEH klizRAtyazwAdaSamAsAniti parA taTA gargaH kzucCastramarakavyADiBayEH saMpIqayet prajAH mAsAn daSa taTAzwO ca calaketuH sudAruRaH uddAlakaSvetaketuH gfhaketuSca aToddAlakaH SvetaketurddaSI ttaraM varzaSataM prozya BadraketoScArAnte pUrvvasyAM dakziRA BinataSiKo rdDarAtrakAle dfSyastenEva saha dvitIyaH kaH prajApatiputtraH paScimakena gfhaketuryUpasaMsTAyI yugapaddfSyeta tatastAvuBO saptarAtradfSyO daSavarzARi prajAH pIqayete kaH prajApatiputtro yadyaDikaM dfSyate tadA dAruRataraM prajAnAM SastrakopaM Page a kuryyAt taTEva snehavarRayuktO kzemArogyasuBikzadO BavataH parA
kAlanalacakra kAlanalacakra kAlanalacakra na kAlAnala iva hiMsakaM cakram narapatijayacaryyokte nizwAdijYApake cakraBede tadBedAdikaYca cakraSabde vakzyate
kAlaparRRa kAlaparRRa kAlaparRRa pu kAlaM kfzRaM parRamasya tagaravfkze SabdaratnA
kAlaparRa kAlaparRa kAlaparRa pu kAlaM kfzRaM parRamasya tagaravfkze SabdaratnA
kAlaparvata kAlaparvata kAlaparvata pu ni ka trikUwaparvatanikawasTaparvataBede sa rAvaRaH niScitya tataH kftya svasAram SUrpanalAm upasAntvya ca UrdDamAcakrame rAjana viDAya nagare laNkAyAm viDim trikUwaM samatikramya kAlaparvata meva ca dadarSa makarAvAsaM gamBIrodaM mahodaDim BA va a
kAlaparvvata kAlaparvvata kAlaparvvata pu ni ka trikUwaparvatanikawasTaparvvataBede sa rAvaRaH niScimya tataH kftyaM smfsAram SUrpanasyAm upasAntvya ca UrdDamAcakrame rAjan viDAya nagare Page a laNkAyAm viDim trikUwaM samatikramya kAlaparvata meva ca dadarSa makarAvAsaM gamBIrodaM mahodaDim BA va a
kAlayogin kAlayogin kAlayogin pu tri kAlaeva yogo styasya ini Sive kAlayogI mahAnAdaH sarvvakAmaScatuzapaTaH BA Anu a SivasahasranAmoktO kAlasambadDe tri
kAliyahnada kAliyahnada kAliyahnada pu ta kAliyanAgADizWite vfndAvanasTa yamunAntargate hradaBede kAliyadamanaSabde vivftiH tasya kAliyasya tapradASrayaRakaTABAga a yaTA nAgAlayaM ramaRakaM kaTaM tatyAja kAliyaH kftaM vA kiM suparRasya tenEkenAsamaYjasam vAdarAyaRiruvA ca upa hAryyaH sarpajanErmmAsimAsIha yobaliH vAnaspatyo ma hAvAho nAgAnAM prANnirUpitaH svaM svaM BAgaM praya cCanti nAgAH parvaRi parvaRi gopITAyAtmanaH sarvve suparRRAya mahAtmane vizavIryyamadAvizwaH kAdraveyastu kA liyaH kadarTIkftya garuqaM svayaM taM buBuje balim tat SrutvA kupitorAjan BagavAn BagavatpriyaH vijiGAMsu rmmahAvegaH kAliyaM samupAdravat tamApatantaM tarasA vizA yuDaH pratyaByayAdutTitanEkamastakaH dadBiH suparRaM vyadaSadda SAyuDaH karAlajihvocCvasitogralocanaH taM tArkzaputraH sa nirasya manyumAn pracaRqavegomaDusUdanAsanam pakzeRa savyena hiraRyarocizA jaGAna kadrAH sutamugravikramaH suparRapakzABihataH kAliyo tIvavihvalaH hradaM viveSa kA lindyAstadagamyaM durAsadam tatrEkadA jalacaraM garuqoBa kzyamIpsitam nivAritaH sOBariRA prasahya kzuDito harat mInAn suduHKitAn dfzwvA dInAn mInapatO hfte kfpayA sOBariH prAha tatratyakzemamAcaran atra praviSya garuqo yadi matsyAn sa KAdati sadyaH prARErviyujyeta satyametadbravImyaham tat kAliyaH paraM veda nAnyaH kaScana lelihaH avAtsIdgaruqAdBItaH kfzRena ca vivAsitaH
kAliyahrada kAliyahrada kAliyahrada pu ta kAliyanAgADizWite vfndAvanasTa yamunAntargate hradaBede kAliyadamanaSabde vivftiH tasya kAliyasya tapradASrayaRakaTABAga a yaTA nAgAlayaM ramaRakaM kaTaM tatyAja kAliyaH kftaM vA kiM suparRasya tenEkenAsamaYjasam vAdarAyaRiruvAca upahAryyaH sarpajanErmmAsimAsIha yobaliH vAcaspatyomahAbAho nAgAnAM prANanirUpitaH svaM svaM BAgaM prayacCanti nAgAH parvaRi parvaRi gopITAyAtmanaH sarve suparRAya mahAtmane vizavIryyamadAvizwaH kAdraveyastu kAliyaH kadarTIkftya garuqaM svayaM taM buBuje balim tat SrutvA kupitorAjan BagavAn BagavatpriyaH vijiGAMsurmmahAvegaH kAliyaM samupAdravat tamApatantaM tarasA vizAyuzaH pratyaByayAdutTitanEkamastakaH dadBiH suparRaM vyadaSaddaSAyuDaH karAlajihvocCavasitogralocanaH taM tArkzaputraH sa nirasya manyumAn pracaRqavegomaDusUdanAsanam pakzeRa savyena hiraRyarocizA jaGAna kadrAH sutamugravikramaH suparRapakzABihataH kAliyo tIvavihvalaH hradaM viveSa kAlindyAstadagamyaM durAsadam tatrEkadA jalacaraM garuqoBakzyamIpsitam nivAritaH sOBariRA prasahya kzuDito harat mInAn suduHKitAn dfzwvA dInAn mInapatOhfte kapfyA sOBariH prAha tatratyakzemamAcaran atra praviSya garuqo yadi matsyAn sa KAdati sadyaH prARErviyujyeta satyametadbravImyaham tat kAliyaH paraM veda nAnyaH kaScana lelihaH avAtsIdgaruqAdBItaH kfzRena ca vivAsitaH
kAlogin kAlogin kAlogin pu tri kAla eva yogo styasya ini Sive kAlayogI mahAnAdaH sarvakAmaScatuzpaTaH BA Anu a SivasahasranAmoktO kAlasambadDe tri
kAmAksAyitA kAmAksAyitA kAmAksAyitA strI kAmena svecCayA vasyati padArTAn ava so Rini tasya BAvaH tal satyasaNkalpatvarUpe yoginAmESvaryyaBede aRimA laGimA prAptiH prakAmyaYca taTeSitA vyApitvaYca vaSitvaYca taTA kAmAvasAyitA yaTAsya saNkalpo Bavati BUtezu taTEva BUtAni Bavanti anyezAM niScayA niScetavyamanuviDIyante iti sAM kO
kAmAnDA kAmAnDA kAmAnDA strI kAmaM yaTezwamanDayati anDa ac kastUryyAM rAjani tasyAH kfzRarUpatvena yaTezwAnDakAratulyatvAt taTAtvam
kAmAtman kAmAtman kAmAtman pu kAmapraDAnaH rAgapraDAna AtmA manoyasya rAgapraDAnacitte kAmAtmatA na praSastA na cEvehAstya kAmatA manuH kAmaH tadAyattaH AtmA svarUpaM yasya kAmAyattasvarUpe kAmaprasakte kAmamaye ca kAmA tmAnaM tadAtmAnaM na SaSAka niyacCitum BA A Slo kAmAtmAnaM kAmamayamAtmAnamantaHkaraRam niyacCitumityArzaH niyantumityarTe
kAmAvaSAyitA kAmAvaSAyitA kAmAvaSAyitA strI kAmena icCayA avaSAyayati padArTAn svacitte ava SI Ric Rini tasya BAvaH tal satyasaNka lpatve yoginAmESvaryaBede Sabdaci yaTecCaM padArTAnAM svacitte samAveSanAt yoginastaTAtvam anyezAM niScetavyAnu sAreRa padArTaniScayAnna tayAtvam
kAmAvasAyitA kAmAvasAyitA kAmAvasAyitA strI kAmena svecCayA vasyati padArTAn ava so Rini tasya BAvaH tal satyasaNkalpatvarUpe yogi nAmESvaryyaBede aRimA laGimA prAptiH prAkAmyaYca taTeSitA vyApitvaYca vaSitvaYca taTA kAmAvasAyitA yaTAsya saNkalpo Bavati BUtezutaTEva BUtAni Bavanti anyezAM niScayA niScetavyamanuviDIyante iti sAM kO

kAmatman kAmatman kAmatman pu kAmapraDAnaH rAgapraDAna AtmA mano yasya rAgapraDAnacitte kAmAtmatA na praSastA na cEvehAstyakAmatA manuH kAmaH tadAyattaH AtmA svarUpaM yasya kAmAyattasvarUpe kAmaprasakte kAmamaye ca kAmAtmAnaM tadAtmAnaM na SaSAka niyacCitum BA A Slo kAmAtmAnaM kAmamayamAtmAnamantaH karaRam niyacCitumityArzaH niyantumityarTe
kAmavaSAyitA kAmavaSAyitA kAmavaSAyitA strI kAmena icCayA avaSAyayati padArTAn svacitte ava SI Ric Rini tasya BAvaH tal satyasaNkalpatve yoginAmESvaryaBede Sabdaci yaTecCaM padArTAnAM svacitte samAveSanAt yoginastaTAtvam anTezAM niScetavyAnusAreRa padArTaniScayAnna taTAtvam
kAndigBUt kAndigBUt kAndigBUt tri kAM diSaM yAmItyAkulatAM BUtaH prAptaH BU prAptO karttari kta ta pfzo kAM diSaM yAmItyAkulataM prApte sa kaTaYcidBayAttasmAdvimukto brAhmaRastadA kAMdigBUto jIvitArTI pradudrAvottarAM diSam BA SA pa a kAM diSaM yAmItyAkulaH kAndigBUtaH nIlaka kAndigBUtaM CinnagAtraM visaMjYaM duryyoDano drakzyati sarvvasEnyam BA udyo a
kAndigBUta kAndigBUta kAndigBUta tri kAM diSaM yAmItyAkulatAM BUtaH prAptaH BU prAptO karttari kta ta pfzo kAM diSaM yAmItyAkulataM prApte sa kaTaYcidBayAttasmAdvimukto brAhmaRastadA kAM digBUto jIvitArTI pradudrAvottarAM diSam BA SA pa a kAM diSaM yAmItyAkulaH kAndigBUtaH nIlaka kAndigBUtaM CinnagAtraM visaMjYaM duryyoDano drakzyati sarvvasEnyam BA udyo a

kAntANGrilohada kAntANGrilohada kAntANGrilohada pu kAntANGristattAqanaM dohadamasya puzpo dgame aSokavfkze trikA yaTA ca tasya taTAtvaM taTA SokaSabde pf uktam kAntApAdadohadAdayo pyatra
kArRAyani kArRAyani kArRAyani tri karRena nirvfttAdi karRa karRA caturarTyAM PiY karRena nirvfttAdO sutaNgamAdipAWAt pakze iY kArRirapyatra tri
kArRRAyani kArRRAyani kArRRAyani tri karRena nirvfttAdi karRRa karRRA caturarTyAM PiY karRRena nirvfttAdO sutaNgamAdipAWAt pakze iY kArRRirapyatra tri

kArmmukAsana kArmmukAsana kArmmukAsana na rudrAyAmalokte AsanaBede tallakzaRaM yaTA kArmukAsanamAkuryyAdudare pUrayenmuKam tadA vAyuraDoyAti kAlena sUkzmavAyunA kftvA padmAsanaM mantrI vezwayitvA ca DArayet kareRa dakziRenEva vAma pAdANgulI taTA savyApasavyadviguRaM kArmukAsanameva ca kArmukadvayayogena SavavadvAyumAnayet rudrayAmale
kArpAsaparvata kArpAsaparvata kArpAsaparvata pu dAnArTaM kalpite DAnyaSElAdizu daSasu acalezu karpAsavastranirmmite parvataBede tadviDAnAdi hemA dAnaKa brahmARqapurARe yaTA BagavAnuvAca ataH paraM pravakzyAmi kArpAsAcalamuMttamam paramaM sarvadAnAnAM priyaM sarvadivOkasAm deSakAlO samAsAdya DanaM SradDAYca yatnataH deyametanmahAdAnaM tAraRArTaM kulasya ca parvataM kalpayettatra kArpAsena viDAnataH pUrvoktena viDAnena kftvA sarvaM viDAnataH viMSadBArastu karttavya uttamaH parvato buDEH maDyamo daSaBiH kuryyAjjaGanyaH paYcaBistaTA sarvaDAnyasamUhasya maDye hyozaDiBirvftaH rasEratnESca saMyukto lokapAlAvftastaTA brahmAdayastaTA SfNge kAYcanena vinirmitAH kulAcalAMSca caturaScaturBAgena kalpayet sOvarRaSiKarAn sarvAn sarvaratnopa SoBitAn nAnADAtuvicitrANgAn BakzyaBojyasamAvftAn kuRqe vA sTaRqile vApi tatra homo viDIyate ftvijaSca taTA cAzwO kArayedvedavittamAn homovyAhftiBiScEva agnO taddEvatErapi ganDena sarpizA tatra taTA kfzRatilErapi ayutaM homasaMKyA ca pAlASasamiDastaTA SaNKatUryya ninAdESca taTA maNgalapAWakEH utsavaM kArayettatra dinamekamatandritaH parvakAle tato dadyAt pUjayitvA viDAnataH namaH sarvAmarAvAsA BUtasaNGEraBizwutAH brahvAdayo me varadA Bavantu vibuDAH sadA ityuccAryya naro dadyAnnArI vA viDipUrvakam pUjayitvA dvijAn samyak vAsoBirBUzaREstaTA anena viDinA yastu dAnametat prayacCati sa gacCettridaSAvAsaM vimAnopari saMsTitaH apsarogaRasaMvIto ganDarvOraBisaMsutaH tatra manvantaraM yAvaduzitvA vibuDAlaye puRyakzayAdihAByetya mahImBuNkte samAgarAm rUpavAn suBagovAgmI SrImAnatulavikramaH paYca janmAni nArI vA jAyate nAtra saSayaH BUyaSca SfRu rAjendra divyaM kArpAsaparvatam taYca BAraSatenEva kuryyAdardDena vA punaH SezaM pUrvaviDAnena sarvaM kuryyAdyaTAkramam PalaM pUrvoditaYcEva jAyate nfpasattama kArpAsAcalakArpAsaSElAdayo pyatra
kArpAsaparvvata kArpAsaparvvata kArpAsaparvvata pu dAnArTaM kalpite DAnyaSElAdizu daSasu acalezu karpAsavastranirmmite parvvataBede tadviDAnAdi hemA dAnaKa brahmARqapurARe yaTA BagavAnuvAca ataHparaM pravakzyAmi kArpAsAcalamuttasam Page a paramaM sarvvadAnAnAM priyaM sarvadivOkasAm deSakAlO samAsAdya DanaM SradDAYca yatnataH deyametanmahAdAnaM tAra RArTaM kulasya ca parvataM kalpayettatra kArpArsena viDAnataH pUrvoktena viDAnena kftvA sarvvaM viDAnataH viMSadBArastu karttavya uttamaH parvato buDEH maDyamo daSaBiHkuryyAjjaGanyaH paYcaBistaTA sarvvaDAnyasamUhasya maDye hyozaDiBirvftaH rasEratnESca saMyukto lokapAlAvftastaTA brahmAdayastaTA SfNge kAYcanena vinirmitAH kulAcalAMSca caturaScaturBA gena kalpayet sOvarRaSiKarAn sarvvAn sarvvaratnopa SoBitAn nAnADAtuvicitrANgAn BakzyaBojyasamAvftAn kaRqe vA sTaRqile vApi tatra homo viDIyate f tvijaSca taTA cAzwO kArayedvedavittamAn homovyA hftiBiScEva agnO taddEvatErapi ganDena sarpizA tatra taTA kfzRatilErapi ayutaM homasaMKyA ca pAlASa samiDastaTA SaNKatUryyaninAdESca taTA maNgalapAWakEH utsavaM kArayettatra dinamekamatandritaH parvvakAle tato dadyAt pUjayitvA viDAnataH namaH sarvAmarAvAsA BUtasaNGEraBizwutAH brahvAdayo me varadA Bavantu vibuDAH sadA ityuccAryya naro dadyAnnArI vA viDipUrvvakam pUjayitvA dvijAn samyak vAsoBirBUzaREstaTA anena viDinA yastu dAnametat prayacCati sa gacCettridaSA vAsaM vimAnopari saMsTitaH apsarogaRasaMvIto ganDa rvvEraBisaMstutaH tatra manvantaraM yAvaduzitvA vibuDA laye puRyakzayAdihAByetya mahImBuNakte sasAgarAm rUpavAn suBagovAgmI SrImAnatulavikramaH paYca janmAni nArI vA jAyate nAtra saMSayaH BUyaSca SfRu rAjendra divyaM kArpAsaparvvatam taYca BAraSatenEva kuryyA dardDena vA punaH SezaM pUrvvaviDAnena sarvvaM kuryyAdya TAkramam PalaM pUrvoditaYcEva jAyate nfpasattama kArpAsAcalakArpAsaSElAdayo pyatra
kArttakIjapAdi kArttakIjapAdi kArttakIjapAdi pu pARinyukte dvandve pUrvapade prakftisvaranimitte SabdagaRaBede sa ca gaRaH kArttakOjapO sAvarRimARqUkeyO avantyaSmakAH pElaSyAparReyAH kapiSyAparReyAH SEtikAkzapAYcAleyAH kawUkavADUleyAH SAkalaSunakAH SAkalaSaRakAH SaRakabABruvAH ArccABimOdgalAH kuntisurAzwrAH cintisurAzwrAH taRqavataRqAH avimattakAmavidDAH vABravaSAlaNkAyAnAH bABravadAnacyutAH kaWakAlApAH kaWakOTumAH kOTumalOkAkzAH strI kumAram mOdapEppalAdAH vatsajarantaH sOSrutapArTivAH jarAmftyU yAjyAnuvAkye
kArttakOjapAdi kArttakOjapAdi kArttakOjapAdi pu pARinyukte dvandve pUrvapade prakftisvarani mitte SabdagaRaBede sa ca gaRaH kArttakOjapO sAvarRi mARqUkeyO avantyaSmakAH pElaSyAparReyAH kapiSyAparRe yAH SEtikAkzapAYcAleyAH kawUkavADUleyAH SAkalaSunakAH SAkalaSaRakAH SaRakabABruvAH ArccABimOdgalaH kunti surAzwrAH cintisurAzwrAH taRqavataRqAH avimattakAmavidDAH bABravaSAlaNkAyanAH bABravadAnacyatAH kaWakAlApAH kaWa kOTumAH kOTumalOkAkzAH strIkumAram mOdapEppalAdAH vatsajarantaH sOSrutapArTivAH jarAmftyU yAjyAnuvAkye

kEMSuka kEMSuka kEMSuka na kiMSukasyedam puzpaPale bahulam pA bahula grahaRAt tasya naluk kiMSukapuzpe yozit stanyaM SAta kummaM viGfzwaM kzOdropetaM kEMSukaYcApi puzpam suSru lupi tu kiMSukamityeva tatrArTe na
kESIra kESIra kESIra na kiSorasya BAvaH karmmavA prARaBfdvaye vAcitvAt aYa kOmAraM paYcamAvdAntaM pOgaRqaM daSamAvaDi Page a kESoramA paYcadaSAt yOvanaM tu tataH paramiti SrIDa radarSite ekAdaSAvaDipaYcadaSaparyyantavarzapayami mantaM vayasi kESore BfyAnugrahakArakam BAga svArTe ka tatrArTe kESorakaM mAnayan vE saha tABirmu moda ha harivaM

kEvarttimustaka kEvarttimustaka kEvarttimustaka na kEvartyAH kEvarttapatnyAH priyaM mustakaM saMjYAyAM NyApoH pA vA hrasvaH kEvarttamustake hrasvABAve kEvarttImustakamapyatra kesuruyA KyAte musta kaBede BarataH
kF kF kF vikzepe tudA para saka sew kirati akArIt AkArizwAm Page a akArizwAm cakAra cakaratuH cakariva karItA ka ri rIzyati karI ri tavyaH kAryyaH karmmARi karmmaRi kIryyate akAri akArizAtAm akAri ka ri rI sAtrAm kiran kIryyamARaH kIrRaH kIrRiH kIrRRaHkIrRRiH karI ri tumanu tuB anu paScAt kzepe anukirati anukIrRaHapa harzavAsaBakzaRArTatayA anukIrRRaH apa harpavAsaBakzaRArTatayA Kanane tatra catuzpAjantu pakzi karttfke A suw ca apaskirate hfzwo vfzaH BakzArTI kukuwaH kukkuwaH vAsArTI SvA vA harzABAve tu na sfw na vA taN taNa apakirati kusumam ava aDaH kzepaRe dUrataH prakzepe aDaHkzepaRe dUrataHprakzepe ca saka avakirati malArTe suw avaskaraH vratAt patane aka avakIrRIMA avakIRRIM A samantAt kzepaRe vistAre ca saka AkIrRamfzipatnInA AkIrRRamfzipatnInA muwajadvAraroDiBiH raGuHud raGuH ud utKanane gAqA ut kIrRaSabde utkIrRRaSabde udA sam ud CedanevidAraRe Cedane vidAraRe hiMsAyAM ca saka maRO vajrasamutkIrRe raGuHupa raGuH upa Cedane suw ca upazkiratiparA samyak upazkirati parA samyaka kzepe vyAptO ca saka parAkIrRaHpra parAkIrRRaH pra prakzepe saka nAnAjAtIyErmelane prakIrRamprati prakIrRRam prati hiMsAyAm suw ca urovidAraM praticaskare naKEH mAGaHvi mAGaH vi vikzepe saka vyavIryyata tryambakapAdaBUleH tryambakapAdamUleH kumA sam miSraRe saNkaraH saNkIrRaH ghiMsane vrayadi saNkIrRRaH kF hiMsane kyrAdi uBa saka sew kfRAti prakArIt akArIt cakAra cakare karItA katarI karo ri zyati te kIrRaH kIrRiH gvijYAne kF vijYAne curA atma Atma saka sew kArayate acIkarata kF vikzepe tudA para saka sew kirati akArIt Page a akArizwAm cakAra cakaratuH cakariva karItA ka ri rIzyati karI ri tavyaH kAryyaH karmmaRi kIryyate akAri akArizAtAm akAri ka ri rI sAtrAm kiran kIryyamARaH kIrRRaHkIrRRiH karI ri tuB anu paScAt kzepe anukirati anukIrRRaH apa harpavAsaBakzaRArTatayA Kanane tatra catuzpAjantu pakzi karttfke A suw ca apaskirate hfzwo vfzaH BakzArTI kukkuwaH vAsArTI SvA vA harzABAve tu na sfw na vA taNa apakirati kusumam ava aDaHkzepaRe dUrataHprakzepe ca saka avakirati malArTe suw avaskaraH vratAt patane aka avakIRRIM A samantAt kzepaRe vistAre ca saka AkIrRRamfzipatnInA muwajadvAraroDiBiH raGuH ud utKanane gAqA utkIrRRaSabde udA sam ud Cedane vidAraRe hiMsAyAM ca saka maRO vajrasamutkIrRe raGuH upa Cedane suw ca upazkirati parA samyaka kzepe vyAptO ca saka parAkIrRRaH pra prakzepe saka nAnAjAtIyErmelane prakIrRRam prati hiMsAyAm suw ca urovidAraM praticaskare naKEH mAGaH vi vikzepe saka vyavIryyata tryambakapAdamUleH kumA sam miSraRe saNkaraH saNkIrRRaH kF hiMsane kyrAdi uBa saka sew kfRAti akArIt cakAra cakare karItA karo ri zyati te kIrRaH kIrRiH kF vijYAne curA Atma saka sew kArayate acIkarata
kISaparRRa kISaparRRa kISaparRRa pu kISaH tallomeva parRamasya apAmArge Sabdara jAtitvena NIz kISaparRItyapyatra amaraH
kISaparRa kISaparRa kISaparRa pu kISaH tallomeva parRamasya apAmArge Sabdara jAtitvena NIz kISaparRI tyapyatra amaraH
kIrRRa kIrRRa kIrRRa tri kvf kta AcCanne nihite vikzipte hiM site ca medi SramavivftanuKaBvaMSiBiH kIrRRavartmA Saku kIrRRaM SanEranukapolamanekapAnAm mAGaH
kIrRRi kIrRRi kIrRRi strI kF BAve ktin ni niBAvaH vikzepe hiM sane AcCAdane ca
kIrRa kIrRa kIrRa tri kF kta AcCanne nihite vikzipte hiMsite ca medi SramavivftamuKaBraMSiBiH kIrRa vartmA Saku kIrRaM SanEranukapolamanekapAnAm mAGaH
kIrRi kIrRi kIrRi strI kF BAve ktin ni niBAvaH vikzepe hisane AcCAdane ca
kIravarRRaka kIravarRRaka kIravarRRaka na kIrasyeva varRRo sya kap sTOReyaka nAma suganDidravye rAjani
kIravarRaka kIravarRaka kIravarRaka na kIrasyeva varRo sya kap sTOReyaka nAma suganDidravye rAjani
kONgiRa kONgiRa kONgiRa na va va koNkaRa pfpo koNkaRadeSe Sabdara
kONkiRa kONkiRa kONkiRa na ba va koNkaRa pfzo koNkaRadeSe Sabdara
kORqapAyina kORqapAyina kORqapAyina na kuRqapAyinAmidam aR ni prakfti BAbaH kuRqapAyinAM kuRqena somapAyinAm sambanDi ni ayanarUpe satraBede kuRqapAyinAmayanaSabde vivftiH
kORqapAyinaM kORqapAyinaM kORqapAyinaM na kuRqapAyinAmidam aR ni prakftiBAvaH kuRqapAyinAM kuRqena somapAyinAm sambanDini ayanarUpe satraBede kuRqapAyinAmayanaSabde vivftiH
kOSAmbeya kOSAmbeya kOSAmbeya puMstrI kuSAmbasya gotrApatyam SuBrA Qak ku SAmbanfpavaSye
kOSIDAnya kOSIDAnya kOSI zI DAnya na koSe ze BavA kOSI zI karmmaDA koSa za jAte DAnye tilAdO sarvvamevEtadahaH koSI zI DAnyaM vivarjjayet kA yA SrO
kOSambeya kOSambeya kOSambeya puM strI kuSAmbasya gotrApatyam suBrAbdak kuSAmbanfpavaMSye
kOSiDAnya kOSiDAnya kOSi zI DAnya na koSe za BavA kOSI zI karmmADA koSa za jAte DAnye tilAdO sarvvamevEtadahaH koSI zI DAnyaM vivarjjayet kA tyA SrO
kOkilI kOkilI kOkilI strI kokilena dfzwA aR kokilarzidfzwAyAM sOtrAmaRyAm dve sOtrAmaRyO kokilI carakasOtrA maRI ca lAgyA SrO sU

kOleSaBaravI kOleSaBaravI kOleSaBaravI strI tripurABEravIBede sampatpradABE ravIvat vidDi kOleSaBEravIm hasAdyAH sEva deveSi trizu vIjezu pArvati jYAnArRRavaH trikUwe hasA dyAScet tadA kOleSaBeravI Bavati tantrasAraH

kURa kURa kURa ABAze mantraRe ca ada curA uBa saka sew kURayati kURa yati te acukURat ta kURayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre kURa saNkoce curA Atma aka sew kURayate acUkuRata kURitam kURiHyanakI kURiH pranikURayati kURa ABAze mantraRe ca ada curA uBa saka sew kURa yati te acukURat ta kURayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre kURa saNkoce curA Atma aka sew kURayate acUkuRata kURitam kURiH pranikURayati

kanIyas kanIyas kanIyas tri ayamanayoratiSayena yuvA alpo vA Iyasun kanAdeSaH dvayorBaDye alpatare annaM kanIyo Bavi zyati CA upa yuvatare anuje BrAtari pu kaTaM kanIyAnahamutsaheyam BawwiH kanIyAn vfzamutsfjet smftiH kalatravAnahaM bAle kanIyAM saM Bajasva me raGuH striyAM NIp
kandaSAlA kandaSAlA kandaSAlA strI kandupAkArTA SAlA SA ta kAnaSAlA kandupAkArTaM SAlAyAm gokule kandaSAlAyAM tElayantrekzu yantrayoH amImAMsyAni SOcAni strIzu bAlAturezu ca smftiH
kandalIkusuma kandalIkusuma kandalIkusuma na ta mocA kadalIpuzpe kada lyAH kusumaM snigDaM maDuraM tuvaraM guru vAtapittaharaM SItaM raktapittakzayapraRut BAvapra tadguRA uktAH kadalopuzpa ramBApuzpAdayopyatra na kandalIkusuma na kandalyA iva Sava kusumamasya SilInDre SulInaDre ta BUmikadalIpuzpe sUmikadalIpuzpe ca kandalIkusuma na ta mocA kadalIpuzpe kada lyAH kusumaM snigDaM maDuraM tuvaraM guru vAtapittaharaM SItaM raktapittakzayapraRut BAvapra tadguRA uktAH kadalopuzpa ramBApuzpAdayopyatra na kandalIkusuma na kandalyA Sava kusumamasya SulInaDre ta sUmikadalIpuzpe ca
kandarpamaTana kandarpamaTana kandarpamaTana pu karndapaM maTnAti maTa lyu mahAdeve kandarpaSatrukAmahAdayo pyatra pu
kandarpamayana kandarpamayana kandarpamayana pu kandarpaM maTnAti maTa lyu mahAdeve kandarpaSatrukAmahAdayo pyatra pu
kanduSAlA kanduSAlA kanduSAlA strI kandupAkArTA SAlA SA ta kAnaSAlA kandupAkArTaM SAlAyAm gokule kandaSAlAyAM tElayantrekzu yantrayoH amImAMsyAni SOcAni strozu bAlAturezu ca smftiH
kaniyas kaniyas kaniyas tri ayamanayoratiSayena yuvA alpo vA Iyasun kanAdeSaH dvayorBaDye alpatare annaM kanIyo Bavizyati CA upa yuvatare anuje BrAtari pu kaTaM kanIyAnahamutsaheyam BawwiH kanIyAn vfzamutsfjet smftiH kalatravAnahaM bAle kanIyAMsaM Bajasva me raGuH striyAM NIp
kanizWa kanizWa kanizWa tri atiSayena yuvA alpo vA izWan kanAdeSaH atitaruRe atyalpe anuje pu strI durvalANgalO Page a alpANgulO kaqeANgala strI medi kanizWasya BA ryyAyAM alpavayaskAyAM striyAm strI tatra puMyogalakzaRaM NIzaM vayovAcilakzaRaM NIyaM ca bADitvA ajAdi pAWAt wAp nAyikABede sA ca ramasaYjaryyAM DIrA DIrADIrADIrABedena triviDeti viBajya pariRItatve sati BatfMnyUnasnehA kanizWeti lakzayitvA DIrADI rAdijyazWakanizWayorudAharaRamuktam tatra DIre jyezWA kanizWe yaTA ekasmin Sayane saroruhadfSorvijYAya nidrArttayorekAM palvavitAvaguRWanavatImutkanDarIM dfzwa vAn anyasyAH saviDaM sametya niBftaM vyAlolahastA NgulivyApArErvasanAYcalaM capalayan svApacyutiM kxpta vAn aDIre jyezWAkanizWe yaTA antaH kopakazAyite priyatama paSyan Gane kAnane puzpasyAvacayAya namravadanA mekAM samAyojayan ardDonmIlitalocanAYcalacamatkA rABirAmAnanAM smerABADarapallavAM navabaDUmanyAM samAli Ngati GIrADIre jyezWAkanizWe yaTA DEryyADEryyapari grahagrahilayoreRIdfSoH prItaye ratnadvandvamanantakAnti ruciraM muzwidvaye nyastavAn ekasyAH kalayan kare praTama toratnaM parasyAHpriyo hastAhastimizAt smfSan kucatawI mAnandamAvindati atyalpaparimite tri gAyatrI CandasAM kanizWA tEtti vEdika CandasAM gAyatryAH praTamatvena uzRigAditI lpAkzaratvAt kanizWatvam tadvE kanizWa CandaH yad gAyatrI praTamA Canda sAM yujyate Sata uttarakAlajAte tri garddaBaH kanizWaM paSUnA prajAyate tEtti aTa yadajAH kanizWAni pAtrARi Kalu prajAyante tasmAdetAstriH saMvatsarasya vijAyamAnA dvO tron vijanayantyaH kanizWAH kanizWAni hi pAtrARi Kalu prajAyante Sata brA aDaHpade aDare ca tri CAyayevAyaM puruzaH pApmanAnuzaktaH so sya eva kanizwo BavatyaDaHpadamiveyasyate tatkanizWamiti Sata vrA parajAtamAtre anvaYco mAtyA aDo nivItAH prakfttaSiKAH jyozWapraTamAH kanizWajaGanyAH A yo yaH kanizWaH sa pfzWato gacCet nArA putraH kanizWaH jyezWAyAM kanizWAyAYca pUrvajaH manuH sarvaM jyezWaH kanizWaSca saMharetAM yaToditam ye nye jyezWakanizWAByAM tezAM syAt savyayaM Danamiti manuH saratriH syAdaratnistu nizkanizwena suzwinA amaraH Page b kanizWAyAH apatyaM QakaY inuk kAnizWineya kanizWAyA apatye kfte kAnizWineyasya Baratasya vivAsitam BawwiH mahAdeve pu namo jyezWAya kanizWAya ca yaju tasya ca aRoraRIyAn mahatomahIyAn iti SrutyA aRutaratvaktokteH kanizwatvam
kanizWakA kanizWakA kanizWakA strI kanizWEva svArTe kan kaqe ANgula kzudrANgulO dviH kanizWikayA kAtyA paYcame zazWe ca mAne anAmikAmutsfjyEtayA kanizWikayA dvirvAram karkaH parivarttyaparivarttyANgulakanizWikAByAmAdAya palASapUwe prAsyati kAtyA
kanizWikA kanizWikA kanizWikA strI kanizWEva svArTekan kaqe ANgula kzudrA NgulO dviH kanizWikayA kAtyA paYcame zazWeca mAne anAmikAmutsfjyOtayA kanizWikayA dvirvA ram karkaH parivarttyaparivarttyANgulakanizWikAByAmAdAya palASapUwe prAsyati kAtyA
kanizwa kanizwa kanizwa tri atiSayena yuvA alpo vA izWan kanAdeSaH atitaruRe atyalpe anuje puM strI durvalANgalO kaqeANgala strI medi kanizWasya BAryyAyAM alpavayaskAyAM striyAm strI tatra puMyogalakzaRaM NIz vayovAcilakzaRaM NIyaM ca bADitvA ajAdipAWAt wAp nAyikABede sA ca rasamaYjaryyAM DIrA DIrADIrADIrABedena triviDeti viBajya pariRItatve sati BatfMnyUnasnehA kanizWeti lakzayitvA DorADIrAdijyezWakanizWayorudAharaRamuktam tatra DIre jyezWAkanizWe yaTA ekasmin Sayane saroruhadfSorvijYAya nidrArttayorekAM palvavitAvaguRWanavatImutkanDarIM dfzwavAn anyasyAH saviDaM sametya niBftaM vyAlAlahastANgulivyApArErvasanAYcalaM capalayan svApacyutiM kxptavon aDore jyezWAkanizWe yaTA annaH kopakAzAyite privatame paSyan Dana kAnane puvyasyAvacayAya nimbavadanAmekAM samAyojayan arNvonmIlitalocanAYcalacamatkArABirAmAnanAM smerABADarapalluvAM navayUmanyAM samAliNgati GIrADIre jyezWAkanizWe yaTA DEryyADEryyaparigrahaprahiWayoreRIdfSoH prItaye ratradvandvamanannakAnti ruciraM muzwidvaye nyastavAn ekasyAH kalayan kare praTamatoratnaM parasyAH priyo hastAhastimizAt spfSan kucatawIM mAnandamAvindati atyalpaparimite tri gAyatrI CandasAM kanizWA tetti vEdikaCandasAM gAyatryAH praTamatvena uzRigAdito lpAkzaratvAt kanizWatvam tadvE kanizWaM CandaH yad gAyatrI praTamA Canda sA yujyate Sata uttarakAlajAte tri garddaBaH kanizWaM paSUnAM prajAyate tEtti aTa yadajAH kanizWAni pAtrARi Kalu prajAyante tasmAdetAstriH saMvatsarasya vijAyamAnA dvO trIn vijanayantyaH kanizWAH kanizWAni hi pAtrARi Kalu prajAyante Sata brA aDaH pade aDare ca tri CAyayevAyaM puruzaH pApmanAnuzaktaH so sya eva kanizwo BavatyaDaH padamiveyasyAte tatkanizWamiti Sata vrA parajAtamAtre anvaYco mAtryA aDonivItA prakfttaSiKAH jyezWapraTamAH kanizWajaGanyAH A yo ya kanizWaH sa pfzWato gacCet nArA putraH kanizWaH jyezWAyAM kanizWAyAYca pUrvajaH manuH sarvaM jyezWaH kanizWaSca saMharetAM yaToditam ye nye jyezWakanizWAByAM tezAM svAt savyayaM Danamiti manuH suratriH syAdaratristu vizkanizwena suzwinA amaraH kanizWAyAH apatyaM QakaY inuk kAnizWineya kanizWAyA apatye kfte kAnizWineyasya Baratasya vivAsitam BawwiH mahAdeve pu namo jyezWAya kanizWAya ca yaju tasya ca aRoraRIyAn mahatomahIyAn iti SrutyA aRutaratvaktokteH kanizwatvam
kanyAhrada kanyAhrada kanyAhrada pu tIrTaBede yasya kanyAhrade vAso devalokaM sa gacCati BA anu a
kanyAhuda kanyAhuda kanyAhuda pu tIrTagede yasya kanyAhrade vAsA devalokaM sa gacCati BA anu a
kapAlaSiras kapAlaSiras kapAlaSiras pu kapAlaM Sirasi yasya mahAdeve fzayastatra bahavovihftya SaradAM Satam tapasA divamArUQAH kapAlaSirasA saha
kapAlaSirasa kapAlaSirasa kapAlaSirasa pu kapAlaM Sirasi yasya mahAdeve fzaya Page a statra bahavovihftya SaradAM Satam tapasA divamArUQAH kapAlaSirasA saha
kapikacCUPalopamA kapikacCUPalopamA kapikacCUPalopamA strI kapikacCUPalasya upamA yatra tulya Page a PalatvAt jatukAlatayAM rAjani tasyAstattulyaPala tvAttaTAtvam
kapikacCaPalopamA kapikacCaPalopamA kapikacCaPalopamA strI kapikacCUPalasya upamA yatra tulya PalatvAt jatukAlatayAM rAjani tasyAstattulyaPalatvAttaTAtvam
kapotacaraRA kapotacaraRA kapotacaraRA strI kapotasya caraRaScaraRAkAro styasyAH arSa ac nalInAmaganDadravyasADane vfkze jawADaraH kapItANGrirapyatra amaraH ta kapotapAde pu
kapotacaraRa kapotacaraRa kapotacaraRa strI kapotasya caraRaScaraRAkAro styasyAH arSa ac nalInAmaganDadravyasADane vfkze jawADaraH kapotANGrirapyatra amaraH ta kapotapAde pu
kapotalubDakIya kapotalubDakIya kapotalubDakIya na kapotaM lubDakaYcADikftya kfto granTaH dvandvAcCaH pA Ca BAratAntargate gfhasTasya prARadAne nApyAtiTyAvaSyakarttavyatAsUcake AKyAyikABede tatkaTA BA SA a sa patnyA vacanaM SrutvA DarmmaM yuktisamanvitam harzeRa mahatA yukto bAkyavyAkulalocanaH taM vE SAkunikaM dfzwvA viDidfzwena karmaRA sa pakzI pUjayAmAsa yatnAttaM pakzijIvinam uvAca svAgataM te dya brUhi kiM kara vARi te santApaSca na karttavyaH svagfhe varttate BavAn tadvratItu BavAn kzipraM kiM karomi kimicCasi praRa yena bravImi KAM tvaM hi naH SaraRAgataH arAvapyuci taM kAryyamAtiTyaM gfhamAgate CettumapyAgate CAyAM nopasaMharate drumaH SaraRAgatasya karttavyamAtiTyaM hi prayatnataH paYcayajYapravfttena gfhasyena viSezataH paYca yajYAMstu yo mIhAnna karoti gfhASraye tasya nAyaM na ca paro loko Bavati DarmmataH tadbrUhi mAM suvi SrabDo TattvaM vAcA yadizyasi tat karizyAmyahaM sarvaM Page b mA tvaM Soke manaH kfTAH tasya tadvacanaM SrutvA Sakune rlubDako bravIt bADate Kalu me SItaM santrARaM hi viDIyatAm evamuktastataH pakzI parRAnyAstIryya BUtale yaTASaktyA hi parRena jvalanArTaM drutaM yayO gatvA NgArakakarmAntaM gfhItvA gnimaTAgamat tataH Suzkezu parRezu pAvakaM so pyadIpayat sa saMdIptaM mahat kftvA tamAha SaraRAgatam pratApaya suviSrabDaH svagAtrARyakuto BayaH sa taToktastaTetyuktvA lubDo gAtrARyatApayat agnipratyAgataprARastataHprAha vihaNgamam harzeRa mahatA vizwo vAkyaM vyAkulalocanaH taTemaM SakuniM dfzwvA viDi dfzwena karmmaRA dattamAhAramicCAmi tvayA kzudbADate hi mAm sa tadvacaH pratiSrutya vAkyamAha vihaNgamaH na me sti viBavo yena nASayeyaM kzuDAntava utpannena hi jIvAmo vayaM nityaM vanOkasaH saYcayo nAsti cAsmAkaM munInAmiva Bojane ityuktvA taM tadA tatra vivarRavadano Bavat kaTaM nu Kalu karttavyamiti cintA parastadA vaBUva BarataSrezWa garhayan vfttimAtmanaH mUhUrttAllabDasaMjYastu sa pakzI pakziGAtinam ubAca tarpayizye tvAM muhUrttaM pratipAlaya ityuktvA SuzkaparREstu samujjvAlya hutASanam harzeRa mahatA vizwaH sa pakzI vAkyamabravIt fzIRAM devatAnAYca pitFRAYca mahA tmanAm SrutaH pUrbbaM mayA Darmmo mahAnatiTipUjane kuruzvAnugrahaM sOmya satyametabradvImi te niScitA Kalu me budDiratiTipratipUjane tataH kftapratijYo vE pakzI prahasanniva tamagniM triH parikramya praviveSa mahAmatiH agnimaDye pravizwantu lubDo dfzwvA tu pakziRam cintayA mAsa manasA kimidaM vE kftaM mayA aho mama nfSaMsasya garhitasya svakarmaRA aDarmmaH sumahAn Doro Bavi zyati na saMSayaH evaM bahuviDaM sUri vilalApa sa luvDakaH garhayan svAni karmARi dvijaM dfzwvA taTAgatam
kapotalubDakoya kapotalubDakoya kapotalubDakoya na kapotaM lubDakaYcADikftya kfto granDaH dvandvAcCaH pA Ca BAratAntargate gfhasTasya prARadAnenApyAtiTyAvaSyakarttavyatAsUcake AKyAyikABede tatkaTA BA SA a sa patnyA vacanaM SrutvA Darmma yuktisamanvitam harzeRa mahatA yukto vAkyavyAkulalocanaH taM vE SAkunikaM dfzwvA viDidfzwena karmaRA sa pakzI pUjayAmAsa yatnAttaM pakzijIvinam uvAca svAgataM te dya brUhi kiM karavARi te santApaSca na karttavyaH svagfhe varttate BavAn tadvratItu BavAn kzipraM kiM karomi kimicCasi praRayena bravImi tvAM tvaM hi naH SaraRAgataH arAvapyucitaM kAryyamAtiTyaM gfhamAgate CettumapyAgate CAyAM nopasaMharate drumaH SaraRAgatasya kartavyamAtiTyaM hi prayatnataH paYcayajYapravfttena gfhasTena viSezataH paYcayajYAMstu yo mohAnna karoti gfhASrame tasya nAyaM na ca paro loko Bavati DarmmataH tadbrUhi mAM suviSrabDo yattvaM vAcA vadizyasi tat karizyAmyahaM sarvaM mA tvaM Soke manaH kfTAH tasya tadvacanaM SrutvA SakunerlubDako bravIt bADate Kalu me SItaM santrARaM hi viDIyatAm evamuktastataH pakzI parRAnyAstIryya BUtale yaTASaktyA hi parRena jvalanArTaM drutaM yayO gatvA NgArakakarmAntaM gfhItvA gnimaTAgamat tataH Suzkezu parRezu pAvakaM so pyadIpayat sa saMdIptaM mahat kftvA tamAha SaraRAgatam pratApaya suviSravbaH svagAtrARyakuto BayaH sa taToktastaTetyuktvA lubDo gAtrARyatApayat agnipratyAgataprARastataH prAha vihaNgamam harzeRa mahatA vizwo vAkyaM vyAkulalocanaH taTemaM SakuniM dfzwvA viDidfzwena karmmaRA dattamAhAramicCAmi tvayA kzudbADate hi mAm sa tadvacaH pratiSrutya vAkyamAha vihaNgamaH na me sti viBavo yena nASayeyaM kzuDAntava utpannena hi jIvAmo vayaM nityaM vanOkasaH saYcayo nAsti cAsmAkaM munInAmiva Bojane ityuktvA taM tadA tatra vivarRavadano Bavat kaTaM nu Kalu karttavyamiti cintAparastadA vaBUva BarataSrezWa garhayan vfttimAtmanaH mUhUrttAllabDasaMjYastu sa pakzI pakziGAtinam uvAca tarpayizye tvAM muhUrttaM pratipAlaya ityuktvA SuzkaparREstu samujjvAlya hutASanam harzeRa mahatA vizwaH sa pakzIvAkyamabravIt fzIRAM devatAnAYca pitFRAYca mahASranAm SrutaH pUrvvaM mayA Darmmo mahAnatiTipUjane kuruzvAnugrahaM sOmya satyametadbravImi te niScitA Kalu me budDiratiTipratipUjane tataH kftapratijYo vE sa pakzI prahasanniva tamagniM triH parikramya praviveSa mahAmatiH agnimaDye pravizwantu lubDo dfzwvA tu pakziRam cintayAmAsa manasA kimidaM vE kftaM mayA aho mama nfSaMsasya garhitasya svakarmaRA aDarmmaH sumahAn Goro Bavizyati na saMSayaH evaM bahuviDaM BUri vilalAya sa lubDakaH garhayan svAni karmARi dvijaM dfzwvA taTAgatam
kapotavarRI kapotavarRI kapotavarRI strI kapotasya varRa iva varRo syAH gOrA NIz sUkzmElAyAM rAjani tat Palasya kapotatulyaSUBratvAttaTAtvam
kapotavarRRI kapotavarRRI kapotavarRRI strI kapotasya varRRa iva varRRo syAH gOrA NIp sUkzmElAyAM rAjani tatPalasya kapotatulyaSuBratvAttaTAtvam
kapurAla kapurAla kapurAla pu karpara ivAlati aR ac parvatapIluBede AKarow kandarAle ramAnATaH
kaqaca kaqaca kaqa la ca na gaqa secane atran gaqerAdeSca kaH uRA gasya kaH qalayorekatvAt vA laH SroRO BAryyAyAYca ujjvaladattAH kalatraSabde udA
kaqatra kaqatra kaqa la tra na gaqa secane atran gaqerAdeSca kaH uRA gasya kaH qalayorekatvAt vA laH SroRO BAryyAyAYca ujjvaladattaH kalatraSabde udA
karRAww karRAww karRAww na karRaH tiryagreKAkAravAn ivAwwam gfhaBede tanniruktilakzaRam biBiduste maRistamBAn karRAwwaSiKa rARi ca BA va a SlokavyAKyAyAM nIlakaRWenoktaM yaTA karRastiryagyAnaM tena prakA reRa yatpAzARAdivistareRa kriyate tattadgfhaviSezaM ka rRAwwamiti vadantitadDi dikkoRasya caturasrasyopari vidikkoRa caturasraM taduparidikkoRaM tadupari punarvidikvoRamityevaM kra meRottarottaramalpapramAREScaturasrEH samApyam iti prasi dDam tatra karRAweti pAWaH prAmAdikaH nIlakaRWena ka rRAwwapadasyEva vyAKyAnAt
karRAwwa karRAwwa karRAwwa na karRaH tiryagreKAkAravAn ivAwwam gfhaBede tanniruktilakzaRam viBiduste maRistamBAn karRAwwaSiKarARi ca BA va a SlokavyAKyAyAM nIlakaRWenoktaM yaTA karRastiryagyAnaM tena prakAreRa yatpAzARAdivistareRa kriyate tattadgfhaviSezaM karRAwwamiti vadanti tadvidikkoRasya caturasrasyopari vidikkoRa caturasraM taduparidikkoRaM tadupari punarvidikoRamityevaM krameRottarottaramalpapramARE ScaturasrEH samApyam iti prasidDam tatra karRAweti pAWaH prAmAdikaH nIlakaRWena karRAwwapadasyEva vyAKyAnAt
karRImat karRImat karRImat pu karRirvARaviSezAkAraH Pale styasya matup saMjYAyAM dIrGaH AragyaDe sodAla Sabdaci
karRIraTa karRIraTa karRIraTa pu karRaH sAmIpyenAstyasya karRI skanDaH tena I SoBA yasya na samAsAntaH kap sa cAsO raTo raTatulyaM vAhanaM karmma skanDavAhye yAne pAlaMkI ityAdO Sabdaci tu anyA vyutpattirdarSitA yaTA karRasADyakriyA upacArAt GarRaH karRo syAsti ini karRI cAsO raTaSca SabdamAtreRa raTo na vastuto raTaH yadvA sAmIpyAt karRaSabdena skanDo lakzyate so syAsti vAhanatvena ini karRI cAsO raTaSca uBayatra anyezAmapIti pA dIrGaH iti karRIraTasTAM raGuvIrapatnIm raGuH
karRIsuta karRIsuta karRIsuta pu ta mUladeve trikA hArA ca sa ca kaMsAsuraH iti SabdakalpadrumaH tanmUlaM mfgyaM kaMsasya karRImAtfkacABAvAt kAda wIkAyAmuktasteyaSAstrapravarttakamUladevasyEva tannAma na tu ugrasenajasya nAma ataeva karRIsutakaTeva sannihitavipulAcalA kAda a karRIsutaH karawakaH steyaSAstrapravarttakaH tasya ravyAtO saKAyO dvO vipulAcalasaMjYakO wI uktam karRIsutaprahite ca paTi matimakavaram daSaku
karRRImat karRRImat karRRImat pu karRirvARaviSezAkAraH Pale styasya matup saM jYAyAM dIGaH AragyaDe sodAla Sabdaci
karRRIraTa karRRIraTa karRRIraTa pu karRaH sAmIpyenAstyasya karRI skanDaH tena I SoBA yasya na samAsAntaH kap sa cAsO raTo raTatalyaM vAhanaM karmma skanDavAhye yAne pAlakI ityAdO Sabdaci tu anyA vyutpattirdarSitA yaTA karRRasADyakriyA upacArAt GarRaHkarRo syAsti ini karRI cAsO ra TaSca SabdamAtreRa raTo na vastuto raTaH yadvA sAmI pyAt karRaSabdena skanyo lakzyate so syAsti vAhanatvena ini karRI cAsO raTaSca uBayatra anyezAmapIti pA dIrGaH iti karRIraTasTAM raGuvIrapatnIm raGuH
karRRIsuta karRRIsuta karRRIsuta pu ta mUladeve trikA hArA ca sa ca kaMsAsuraH iti SabdakalpadrumaH tanmUlaM mfgyaM kaMsasya ka rRImAtfkatvABAvAt kAda wIkAyAmuktasteyaSAstrapra Page b varttakamUladevasyEva tannAma na tu ugrasenajasya nAma ataeva karRRIsutakaTeva sannihitavipulAcalA kAda vyA karRIsutaH karawakaH steyaSAstrapravarttakvaH tasya KyAtI saKAyO dvO vipulAcalasaMjYakO wI uktam karRIsutaprahite ca paTi matimakavaram daSaku
karRRa karRRa karRRa Bedane adantacurAdi uBa saka sew karRRayati te acakarRat ta karRRayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre karRRayitA karRRayizyati karRanam karRRaH karRRitaH karRRayitum karRRayan karRayamAnaH karRayitvA AkarRya karRRI karRyate akarRRi akarRRizAtAm akarRayizAtAm A karRRa SravaRe AkarRayannutsukahaMsanAdAn BawwiH miTastadAkarRanasajjakarRayA devAkarRaya suSrutena caraka syoktena jAne svilam adastadA karRRiPalAQyajIvi Page b lam iti ca nEza AkarRya samprati rutaM caraRAyuDA nAm sA da
karRRaBUzaRa karRRaBUzaRa karRRaBUzaRa na karRRaM BUzayati BUza lyu karRRABaraRe amaraH
karRRaDAra karRRaDAra karRRaDAra pu karRRamaritraM DArayati f aR upa sa nAvike mAjI amaraH akarRRaDArA jalaDO vipla veteha nOriva hito sAhityArRRavakarRRaDAreti sA da duHsvAdinivArake tri akarRRaDArA Page a pfTivI SUnyeva pratiBAti me gate daSaraTe svargaM rAme ca raRyamASrite rAmA
karRRaPala karRRaPala karRRaPala karRRaH PalamivAsya matsyaBede kARalimACa rAjani
karRRaSUla karRRaSUla karRRaSUla na ta karRRarogaBede karRRagatarogaSabde vivftiH
karRRaSazkulI karRRaSazkulI karRRaSazkulI strI karRasya SazkulIva karRagolake ava lambitakarRaSazkulIkalasIkaM racayannavocata nEza ka rRRaSazkatyavacCinnaM naBaH Srotram muktA tanmaDyAkASe ca
karRRaSoBana karRRaSoBana karRRaSoBana tri karRRaM SoBayati SuBa Ric lyu karRRABa raRe uta naH karRRaSoBanA purURi f
karRRaSrava karRRaSrava karRRaSrava tri SrUyate SravaH SabdaH karRRena SravaH SravaRayomyaH Sabdoyatra SravaRayogyaSabdaDAre vayvAdO karRRaSrave nile rAtrO divA pAMSusamUhane manuH
karRRadarpaRa karRRadarpaRa karRRadarpaRa pu karRRedarpaRa iva karRRaBUzaRaBede kAnataqkA trikA
karRRadunduBi karRRadunduBi karRRadunduBi pu karRRedunduBiriva tattulyaDvanihetutvAt SatapadyAm kARqAi SabdamA tasyAH karRRapraveSe hi dunduBivadDvAnajananAttasyAstaTAtvam
karRRagataroga karRRagataroga karRRagataroga pu karRRe gatIrogaH suSrutokte karRRagate ro gaBede tadBedanidAnAdi tatrEvoktaM yaTA aTAtaH karRagatarogavijYAnIyamaDyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH karRaSUlaM praRAdaSca bADiryyaM kzpeqa eva ca karRasrAvaH karRakaRqUH karRagUTa staTEva ca kfmi karRapratInAhO vidraDi dviviDa staTA karRapAkaH pUtikarRa staTEvArSaScaturvviGam taTArvvudaM saptavaDaM SoTaScApi caturviDaH ete karRagatArogA azwAviMSatirIritAH samIraRaH Srotragato nyaTAcaraH samantataH SUlamatIva karRayoH karoti dozESca yaDAsvamAvftaH sa karRaSUlaH kaTito durAcaraH yadA tu nAqIz vimArgamAgataH sa eva SabdABivahAsu tizWati SfRoti SabdAn viviDAMstadA naraH praRAda BenaM kaTavanti cAmavam sa eva SabdA BivahA yadA sirAH kaPAnuyAto pyanusfvya ti zWati tadA narasyApratikArasevino Bavettu bADiryya masaMSayaM Kalu SramAtkzatAdrUkzakazAyanojanAt samI raRaH SabdapaTe vyavasTitaH viriktaSIrzasya ca SIta sebinaH karoti hi kzveqa matIva karRayoH Siro BiGAtAdaya vA nimajjato jale prapAkAdaTavApi vi draDeH sravettu pUyaM SravaRo nilAvftaH sakarRasaMsrAva iti prakIrttitaH kaPena kaRqUH pracite Ta karRayo rBfSaM Bavet srotasi karRa saMjYite viSozite SlezmaRi pittatejasA nfRAM Bavet srotasi karRagUTakaH sa ka rRagUTo dravatAM yadAgato vilAyito GrARamuKaM prapadyate tadA sa karRapratinAhasaMjYito BavedvikAraH Siraso ti tApanaH yadA tu mUrcCantyaTa vApi jantavaH sfjantya patyAnyaTavApi makzikAH tadaYjanatvAcCravaRo nirucyate BizagnirAdyEH kfmikarRakastu saH kzatABizAtapraBavastu vidraDi rBavettaTA dozakfto TavA punaH sa raktapItA ruRamasramAsvanetpratodaDUmAyanadAhapsozavAna BavetpapAkaH Kalu pittakopato vikozavikladakaraSca kaREyoH Page b sTite kaPe snotasi pittatejasA vilApyamAne BfSasa mpratApanAt avedano vApyaTavA savedano GanaM sravetpUti sapUtikarRakaH pradizwaliNgAnyarSAMsi tattvatastaTEva SoTA rbbuda liNga mIri tam mayA purastAtprasamIkzya yojayedihEva tAni prayato BizagvaraH
karRRahIna karRRahIna karRRahIna tri ta vaDire bADiryyaprAptiSca pApavi SezajanyA yaTAha SAtA sa kAkaGAtI karRahIno dadyAdgAmasitapraBAm sarpe ca puMstrI cakzuHSravastrAttasya taTAtvam striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
karRRajAha karRRajAha karRRajAha na karRRasya sUlam karRRa jAha karRRamUle ka rRRajAhavilocaneti BawwiH

karRRalatA karRRalatA karRRalatA strI karRRasya lateva karRRapAlyAm kARerapAtA svArTe kan ata ittvam karRalatikApi taTArTe hema
karRRamala karRRamala karRRamala na ta karRRasTe malAkAre padArTe kARera Kala hArA karRamalotpattiprakAraH BAvapra ukto yaTA tato mAMsAgninA punaH pacyamAnaH paYcAhorAtrAt sA rdDadaRqAMSca yAvanmAMsezveva tizWati tataH pacyamAnAttasmAn malaM nirgacCati tadvyAnavAyunA kzipraM karRAvAgatya karRaviqBavati karRRaviWAdayo pyatra
