karRRapAli karRRapAli karRRapAli lI strI ta karRRapAlake karRAMSaBede kARe Page b rapAtA tadavayavaSca mAMsapeSIBedaH yaTAha mAvapra mAMsapeSIsaMKyAviBAge yaTArTamUzmaRAM yuktovAyuH srotAMsi dArayet anupraviSya piSitaM peSIrviBajate taTA mAMsapeSyaH samAKyAtAnfRAM paYca SatAni ca ityupa kramya gaRqayoScatastaH karRRayordve ityuktam karRRe SoToBavet pAlyAm kurvvanti pIqikAM pAlyAm lihyAt sa SazkulIm pAleH karRRaroge BAvapra lihyAt nirmAMsIkuryyAt BAvapra karRRaM pAla yati pAla aR upa sa gOrA NIz kARa vAlA karRAlaNkAraBede hArA
karRRapAlyAmaya karRRapAlyAmaya karRRapAlyAmaya pu ta karRRaMvyaDadozaje suSrutokte karRa pAlirogaBede sa ca suSrute sopadravo darSitaH yaTA karRapAlyAmayAnnFRAM punarvvakzyAmi suSruta karRapA lyAM prakupitA vAtapittakaPAstrayaH dviDA vApyaTa saM sfzwAH kurvvanti viviDA rujaH visPowaH stabDatA SoTaH pAlyAM doze tu vAtike dAhavisPowajananaM SoTaH pAkaSca pEttike kaRqUH saSvayaTustamBo gurutvaYca kaPAtmake yaTAdozaYca saMSoDya kuryyAttezAM cikitsitam sve dAByaNgaparIzekEH pralepAsfgvimokzaREH mfdvIM kriyAM vfMhaRIyEryaTAsvaM BojanEstaTA ya evaM betti dozARAM cikitsAM karttumarhati ata UrdDvaM nAmaliNgErvvakzye pAlyAmupadravAn utpAwakaScotpuwaka SyAnaH kaRqUyuto BfSam avamanTaH sakaRqUko granTiko jambulastaTA srAvI ca dAhavAMScEva SfRvazAM kramaSaH kriyAm
karRRapUra karRRapUra karRRapUra pu karRaM pUrayati pUra aR karRABaraRe nIlo tpale SirIzavfkze mediniH aSokavfkze rAjani etezAM puzpEH strIkarRasya BUzA BavatIti tezAM taTAtvam yasyAScOraScikuranikuraH karRRapUromayUraH prasannarA praBlA navIjANkurakarRRapUraH vilambinIlotpalakarRRapUrA raGuH
karRRapUraRa karRRapUraRa karRRapUraRa na ta suSrutokteH tElAdinA karRRasya pUraRa Page a snehasAro yaM puruzaH prARASca snehaBUyizWAH snehasADyASca Bavanti snehohi pAnAnuvAsanamastizkaSirovastyUttara vastinasyakarRapUraRagAtrAByaNgaBojane zUpayojyaH suSru

karRRaparvan karRRaparvan karRRaparvan na BAratAntargate azwame parvvaRi tatparvvaRi kaTAsaMgrahaSca BA A a yaTA ataH paraM karRaparva procyate paramAdButam sAraTye viniyogaSca madrarAjasya DImataH AKyAnaM yatra pOrARAM tripurasya nipAtanam prayARe paruzaScAtra saMvAdaH karRa Salya yoH haMsakAkIyamAKyAnaM taTEvAkzepasaMBftam baDaH pA Rqasya ca taTA aSvatTAmnA mahAtmanA daRqasenasya ca tato daRqasya ca baDastaTA dvEraTe yatra karRena DarmarAjo yuDi zWiraH saMSayaM gamito yudDe mizatAM sarvaDanvinAm anyo nyaM prati ca kroDaM yuDizWirakirIwinoH tatrEvAnunayaH proktomADavenArjjunasya hi pratijYApUrvakaYcApi vakzoduH SAsanasya ca BittvA vfkodaro raktaM pItavAnatra saMyuge dvEraTe yatra pArTena hataH karRo mahAraTaH azwamaM parva nirdizwametadBAratacintakEH ekonasaptatiH proktA aDyA yAH karRaparvaRi catvAryyeva sahasrARi navaSlokaSatAni ca catuHzazwistaTA SlokAH parvaRyasmin prakIttitAH karRaparvaRyapi taTA BojanaM sArvvakAmikam vipreByaH saMskftaM samyagdadyAt saMyatamAnasaH BA svargA a

dinacCidravyatIpAtavizwivEDftivarjite SiSorajAta dantasya mAturutsaNgasarpiRaH sOcikoveDayet karRO sUcya dviguRasUtrayA SAtakumBamayI sUcirveDane tu SuBapra dA rAjatI vAyasI vApi yaTA viBavataH SuBA suBU mO prANgaRe ramye Suco deSe mvare raveH sanniDO veDayet karRRO strIpuM sorvAmadakziRO krameRa pUrvaM veDyO dvO Si SorAyuzyavardDanO arRRave pyuktam SuklasUtrasamAyuktatAmra sUcyATa veDayet veDAt tftIye nakzatre kzAlayeduzRavAri RA ropaRArTasuSuDyarTaM bAlasaMpattimApnuyAt evaM Cinne ca Binne ca hitvA yojyAni yojayet vizRu Darmottare puzkaraH SiSorevATa kartavyaM karRaveDaM yaTA SfRu pUrvAhRe pUja naM kftvA keSavasya harasya ca brahmaRaScandrasUryAByAM digI SAnAntaTEva ca nAsatyayoH sarasvatyA brAhmaRAnAM gavAM tayA gurURAM maRqalaM kftvA tatra dattvA varAsanam taTopaveSayettatra DAtrI SuklAmbarAM taTA alaNkftaM tadut saNge bAlanDftvA tu sAntvanEH Dftasya niScalaH samyak karRa yugmaM rasANkitam viDyedalaNkfte Cidre sakfdevAtra lAGavAt prAgdakziRe kumArasya BizagvAme tu yozitaH SiSorvi varDanaM kAryaM yAvadABaraRakzamam karRaveDadine viprAH sAMvatsaracikitsakO pujyASca viviDA nAryyaH suhfdaSca taTA dvijeti atra puruzakarRaranDravfdDivizaye piSezamA ha hemAdrO devalaH karRaranDre raveSCAyA na viSedagraja nmanaH taM dfzwvA vilayaM yAnti puRyOGASva purAtanAH tatpramARaM prasaNgAntareRAha SaNKa aNguzWamAnaSuzirO karRO na Bavatoyadi tasmE SrAdDaM na dAtavya yadi ceda mura Bavet tasya SrAdDe pAtratAmAha SAlaNkAyanaH avidvakarRE ryadBuktaM lambavarRestaTA ca yat dagDakarRESca yadBukta ta dvE rakzAMsi gacCati viDA pA taTA ca karRabeDaH Page a saMskAraH kintu SrAdDAdO pAtratAsampAdako dfzwaviSeza janakaH kriyABedaH ityAkare sTitam SalAkAmAnaM ka rRaveDanISabde vakzyate atra kAlAdipratiprasavaH jyo ta mARqavyavfhadrAjamArttaRqakftyacintAmaRizu yadApatyadvayaM tizWet samBavo pyaparasya ca zawkarRaM taM vijAnIyAt garhitaYcatrayasya ca ityASaNkya dvayormaDye SudDiryasyATa vatsare karRaveDo hitastasya nAtra jyezWavicAraRA zawakarRotpattimASaNkya BAnoH SudDyA same pi ca karRO veDyO na dozaH syAdanyaTA maraRaM Bavet
karRRavezwa karRRavezwa karRRavezwa pu karRI vezwyete anena kuRqale kroDavaSA surAMSe dvAparayugIyanfpaBede ca gaRaH kroDavaSonAma yaste rAjan prakIrttitaH tataH saMjajYire vIrAH kzitAviha narADipAH mardakaH karRRavezwaSca sidDArTaH kIcakastaTA BA A a Rvul karRavezwako trEva karRRavezwakAya hitam Ca yat vA karRRavezwakIya karRRavezwakya tadDite suvarRRAdO tri BAve lyuzw karRa vezwana karRaBUzaRe na karaRe lyuw kuRqale amaraH tataH tAByAM sampAdI Wak kArRRavezwakika kArRRavezwanika karRa vazwana ke na SoBamAne tri kArRavezwanikaM muKam BawwiH
karRRaviz karRRaviz karRRaviz strI karRRasya viw karRRamale kAReraKala vasA SukramasfNmajjAmUtraviqDrARakarRRaviw SlezmASrudUzi kAsvedo dvAdarSate nfRAM malAH manuH SoDayet karRRaviwkantu Bizak samyak SalAkayA suSru
karRRayoni karRRayoni karRRayoni tri karRRaH yoniH sTAnamasya karRRagrAhye vizaye nfcakzaso dfSaye karRRayonayaH f karRRayo nayaH SrotrendriyagrAhyAH BA
karRRecuracurA karRRecuracurA karRRecuracurA strI pAtresamitA samAsaH kARPusalAna karRejapane yuktArohyA asyAdyudAttatA evaM karRe wirawirA api tatrArTe taTA dyudAttatA ca
karRRendu karRRendu karRRendu pu karRe induriva ardDacandrAkftikarRAlaNkAraBede Sabdara
karRRikA karRRikA karRRikA strI karRa Rvul karRe BavaH alaNkAraH ikan ata ittvam karRABaraRaBede kAR kariSuRqAgrava rttinyaNgulAkAre padArye padmavIjakoze ca amaraH yasyAmavasTitaH sarvvataH sOvarRaH kulagirirAjomerurdvIpA yAmasamunnAhaH karRikABUtaH BAga kramu kAdivfntaparamparAyAm CaqA karamaDyANgulO ca medi leKanyAM hArA agnimanTavfkze a jaSfNgIvfkze ca rAjani karRRo vfdDo styasya Wan vfdDa karRe tri
karRRikAcala karRRikAcala karRRikAcala pu karRikAyAM sTito cala sumeruparvate hemaca yaTA cAsya tayArUpeRa sTiti taTA karRikA Sabde BAga Slo uktaM tacca karRikASabde uktam karRikAparvatAdayo nyatra
karRRikAra karRRikAra karRRikAra pu karRiM BedanaM karoti kf aR upa sa gaRiyArI vfkzaBede AragbaDavfkzaBede ca Cowa sondAla SoDanarUpamalaBedakatvAt tayoH taTAtvam karRikAraH parivyADaH zAdapotpalaH ityapi karRikAraH kawustiktastuvaraH SoDano laGuH raYjanaH suKadaH So TaSlezmAsravraRakuzWanut BAvapra guRAdi uktam zarRaprakarze sati karRikAraM dunoti nirganDatayA sma cetaH kumA anantaraYca kaScit karRika ragOraH daSaku
karRRopakarRRikA karRRopakarRRikA karRRopakarRRikA strI karRAdupakarRo styasyAH Wan ata i ttvam kARAkARi parasyaraSravaRarUpe pravAde prAgeva karRopakarRikayA SrutApavAdakzuBitahradayaH paYcata
karRRorRRa karRRorRRa karRRorRRa pu karRe urRADikaM loma yasya mfgamede karRorRE kapadaSvAsyErnirjuzwaM vfkanABiBiH BAga
karRa karRa karRa Bedane adantacurAdi uBa saka sew karRayati te acakarRat ta karRayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre karRayitA karRayizyati karRanam karRaH karRitaH karRayitum karRayan karRayamAnaH karRayitvA AkarRya karRI karRyate akarRi akarRizAtAm akarRayizAtAm A karRa SravaRe AkarRayannutsukahaMsanAdAn BawwiH miTastadAkarRanasajjakarRayA devAkarRaya suSrutena carakasyoktena jAne Kilam karRaBUzaRa karRaBUzaRa karRaBUzaRa na karRaM BUzayati BUza lyu karRABaraRe amaraH
karRaDAra karRaDAra karRaDAra pu karRamaritraM DArayati f aR upa sa nAvike mAjI amaraH akarRaDArA jalaDO viplaveteha nOriva hito sAhityArRavakarRaDAreti sA da duHKAdinivArake tri akarRaDArA pfTivI SUnyeva pratiBAti me gate daSaraTe svargaM rAme ca raRyamASrite rAmA
karRaPala karRaPala karRaPala karRaH PalamivAsya matsyaBede kARalimACa rAjani
karRaSUla karRaSUla karRaSUla na ta karRarogaBede karRagatarogaSabde vivftiH
karRaSazkulI karRaSazkulI karRaSazkulI strI karRasya SazkulIva karRagolake avalambitakarRaSazkulIkalasIkaM racayannavocata nEza karRaSazkatyavacCinnaM naBaH Srotram muktA tanmaDyAkASe ca
karRaSoBana karRaSoBana karRaSoBana tri karRaM SoBayati SuBa Ric lyu karRABaraRe uta naH karRaSoBanA purURi f
karRaSrava karRaSrava karRaSrava tri SrUyate SravaH SabdaH karRena SravaH SravaRayogyaH Sabdoyatra SravaRayogyaSabdaDAre vayvAdO karRaSrave nile rAtrO divA pAMSusamUhane manuH
karRadarpaRa karRadarpaRa karRadarpaRa pu karRe darpaRa iva karRaBUzaRaBede kAnataqkA trikA
karRadunduBi karRadunduBi karRadunduBi pu karRe dunduBiriva tattulyaDvanihetutvAt SatapadyAm kARqAi SabdamA tasyAH karRapraveSe hi dunduBivadDvAnajananAttasyAstaTAtvam
karRagataroga karRagataroga karRagataroga pu karRe gatorogaH suSrutokte karRa gate rogaBede tadBedanidAnAdi tatrEvoktaM yaTA aTAtaH karRagatarogavijYAnoyamaDyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH karRaSUlaM praRAdaSca bADiryyaM kzveqa eva ca karRasrAvaH karRakaRqUH karRagUTa staTEva ca kfmi karRapratInAhO vidraDi rdviviDa staTA karRapAkaH pUtikarRa staTEvArSaScaturvviDam taTArvvudaM saptaviDaM SoTaScApi caturvviDaH ete karRagatArogA azwAviMSatirIritAH samIraRaH Srotragato nyaTAcaraH samantataH SUlamatIva karRayoH karoti dozESca yaTAsvamAvftaH sa karRaSUlaH kaTito durAcaraH yadA tu nAqIz vimArgamAgataH sa eva SabdABivahAsu tizWati SfRoti SabdAn viviDAMstadA naraH praRAda menaM kaTayanti cAmayam sa eva SabdABivahA yadA sirAH kaPAnuyAto pyanusftya tizWati tadA narasyApratikArasevino Bavettu bADiryyamasaMSayaM Kalu SramAtkzatAdrUkzakazAyaBojanAt samIraRaH SabdapaTe vyavasTitaH viriktaSIrzasya ca SItasevinaH karoti hi kzveqazpamatIva karRayoH Siro BiGAtAdaTa vA nimajjato jale prapAkAdaTavApi vidraDeH sravettu pUyaM SravaRo nilAvftaH sakarRasaMsrAva iti prakIrttitaH kaPena kaRqUH pracite Ta karRayorBfSaM Bavet Srotasi karRa saMjYite viSozite SlezmaRi pittatejasA nfRAM Bavet Srotasi karRa gUTakaH sa karRagUTo dravatAM yadAgato vilAyito GrARamuKaM prapadyate tadA sa karRa pratinAhasaMjYito BavedvikAraH Siraso titApanaH yadA tu mUrcCantyaTa vApi jantavaH sfjantyapatyAnyaTavApi makzikAH tadaYjanatvAcCravaRo nirucyateBizagnirAdyEH kfmikarRakastu saH kzatABiGAtapraBavastu vidraDi rBavettaTA dozakfto TavA punaH sa raktapItAruRamasramAsvanetpratodaDUmAyanadAha SvozavAn BavetprapAkaH KaluM pittakopano vikozavikladakaraSca karRayoH sTite kaPe srotasi pittatejasA vilApyamAne BfSasampratApanAt avedano vApyaTavA savedano GanaM sravetpUti sapUtikarRa kaH pradizwaliNgArnyaSAMsi tattvatastaTEva SoTA rbbuda liNga mIritam mayA purastAtprasamIkzya yojayedihEva tAni prayato BizagvaraH

dfzwvA vilayaM yAnti puRyOGASva purAtanAH tatpramARaM prasaNgAntareRAha SaNKa aNguzWamAnaSuzirO karRO na Bavato yadi tasmE SrAdDaM na dAtavya yadi cedasuraM Bavet tasya SrAdDe pAtratAmAha SAlaNkAyanaH avidvakarRErTudBuktaM lambavarRestaTA ca yat dagDakarRESca yadBukta tadvE rakzAMsi gacCati viDA pA taTA ca karRaveDaH saMskAraH kintu SrAdvAdO pAtratAsampAdako dfzwaviSezajanakaH kriyABedaH ityAkare sTitam SalAkAmAnaM karRaveDanISabde vakzyate atra kAlAdipratiprasavaH jyo ta mARqavyavfhadrAjamArttaRqakftyacintAmaRizu yadApatyadvayaM tizWet samBavo pyaparasya ca zawkarRaM taM vijAnIyAt garhitaYca karRavezwa karRavezwa karRavezwa pu karRO vezwyete anena kuRqale kroDavaSAsurAMSe dvAparayugIyanfpaBede ca gaRaH kroDavaSonAma yaste rAjan prakIrttitaH tataH saMjajYire vIrAH kzitAviha narADipAH mardakaH karRavezwaSca sidDArTaH kIcakastaTA BA A a Rvul karRavezwako trEva karRavezwakAya hitam Ca yat vA karRavezwakIya karRavezwakya tadDite suvarRAdO tri BAve lyuw karRavezwana karRaBUzaRe na karaRe lyuw kuRqale amaraH tataH tAByAM sampAdI Wak kArRavezwakika kArRavezwanika karRavazwana ke na SoBamAne tri kArRavezwanikaM muKam BawwiH

karRikA karRikA karRikA strI karRa Rvul karRe BavaH alaNkAraH ikan ata ittvam karRABaraRaBede kAR kariSuRqAgravarttinyaNgulAkAre padArTe padmabIjakoze ca amaraH yasyAmavasTitaH sarvvataH sOvarRaH kulagirirAjomerudvIMpAyAmasamunnAhaH karRikABUtaH BAga kramukAdivfntaparamparAyAm CaqA karamaDyANgulO ca medi leKanyAM hArA agnimanTavfkze ajaSfNgIvfkze ca rAjani karRo vfdDo styasya Wan vfdDakarRe tri
karRikAcala karRikAcala karRikAcala pu karRikAyAM sTito calaH sumeruparvate hemaca yaTA cAsya taTArUpeRa sTiti taTA karRikASabde BAga Slo uktaM tacca karRikASabde uktam karRikAparvatAdayo pyatra
karRikAra karRikAra karRikAra pu karRiM BedanaM karoti kf aR upa sa gaRiyArI vfkzaBede AragbaDavfkzaBede ca Cowa sondAla SoDanarUpamalaBedakatvAt tayoH taTAtvam karRikAraH parivyADaH pAdapotpalaH ityapi karRikAraH kawustiktastuvaraH SoDano laGuH raYjanaH suKadaH SoTaSlezmAsravraRakuzWanut BAvapra guRAdi uktam varRaprakarze sati karRikAraM dunoti nirganDatayA sma cetaH kumA anantaraYca kaScit karRikA ragOraH daSaku
karRopakarRikA karRopakarRikA karRopakarRikA strI karRAdupakarRo styasyAH Wan ata ittvam kARAkARi parasyaraSravaRarUpe pravAde prAgeva karRopakarRikayA SrutApavAdakzuBitahradayaH paYca
karRorRa karRorRa karRorRa pu karRe urRADikaM loma yasya mfgaBede karRorREkapadaSvAsyErnirjuzwaM vfkanABiBiH BAga

karaparRRa karaparRRa karaparRRa pu karaH hasta iva parRRaM yasya Byewa BiRqAtaka Page b vfkze raktEraRqe ca lAlaBeraRqA rAjaniGaRwuH

karapatra karapatra karapatra na karAt patati pata zwran karAta krakace dAruBedake astraBede amaraH sPuwaYca patrEH karapatramUrttiBirviyogahfddAruRi dAruRAyase nEza ketakavarRane tacca suSrutoktaSastraBedaH tatra hi viMSatiH SastrARi ityuddiSya maRqalAgrakarapatretyAdinA viBajya tatra maRqalAgrakarapatre syAtAM Cedane Bedane ceti tasyopayoga uktaH karAveva patraM vAhanaM yatra jalakrIqAyAm jawADaraH tatra hi hastAByAM jalamuttolya parasparaM krIqyate
karapattra karapattra karapattra na karAt patati pata zwran karAta krakace dAru Bedake astraBede amaraH sPuwaYca patrEH karapatramUrttiBi rviyogahfddAruRi dAruRAyase neza ketakavarRRane tacca suSrutoktaSastraBedaH tatra hi viMSatiH SastrARi ityu ddiSya maRqalAgrakarapatretyAdinA viBajya tatra maRqa lAgrakarapatre syAtAM Cedane Bedane ceti tasyopayoga uktaH karAveva patraM vAhanaM yatra jalakrIqAyAma jawADaraH tatra hi hastAByAM jalamuttolya parasparaM kroqyate
karasna karasna karasna pu karaRaM karaH kf bA ap taM srAti karoti DAtU nAyanekArTatvAt srA ka karmakare bAhO niru revat sfprA karasnA daDize vapUMzi f karasnA karmARi prasnAtArO bAhU BA pfTUkarasnA bahulA gaBastI f etAmfvamaDikftya karasnA bAhU Page b karmaRAM prasnAtArO niru niruktirdaSitA

karmANga karmANga karmANga na ta vihitasya yAgAdikarmaRo Nge yaTA darSAdeH prayAjAdi deSakAlAdayo pi karmANgAni yaTAha gargaH tiTinakzatravArAdi sADanaM puRyapApayoH praDAna guRaBAvena svAtantryeRa na te kzamAH praDAnasya viDeyasya karmaRo guRaBAvenANgatvena taduktaM karmAsannihitaM nEva budDO viparivarttate SabdAttu tadupasTAnamupAdeye guRoBavet BawwakA pramARAntarAsannihitaM karmma budDO praTamaM na vizayIBavati prATamikaSabdAdeva tasya karmaRa upasTitiriti upAdeye svaviDeye karmmaRi pUjAdO candrAdikriyAtvena tadavacCinnakAlatvena vA SucitatkAlajIvinaH karmADikArAt pramARAntaralaByatvenAviDeyatvAttiTyAdirguRaH ti ta raGu PalavatsanniDAvaPalaM tadaNgamiti nyAyena PalavatpakaraRe paWitAnAmaPalAnAM sarvezAM tadaNgatvamavaDeyam

karmadeva karmadeva karmadeva pu karmaRA devaH prAptadevaBAvaH trayastriMSaddevaBede sa ekaH karmadevAnAmAnandaH ye karmaRA devAnapi yanti Srotriyasya cAkAmahatasya te ye Sata karmadevAnAmAnandAH tE u karmadevA ye vEdikenAgnihotrAdinA kevalena devAnapi yanti devA iti trayastriMSadDavirBujaH indrastezAM svAmI tasyAcAryyo bfhaspatiH prajApatirvirAwtrElokya SarIro brahmA samazwivyazwisvarUpaH saMsAramaraRAnalavyApI SANkara BA trayastriMSacca devAH AnandagiriRA darSitAH azwO vasavaH ekAdaSa rudrAH dvAdaSAdityAH indraH prajApatiSceti karmaRA devalokaM gate ca sa ekaH karmadevAnAmAnando ye karmaRA devatvamaBisampadyante aTa ye SataM karmadevAnAmAnandAH Sata brA ye agnihotrAdiSrOtrakarmaRA devalokaM prAptuvanti te karmadevAH BA karmadevatA pyatra strI jyotizwomAdinA svargaM prAptAH syuH karmadevatAH Sabdaci asmin kalpe SvameDAdikarma kftvA mahatpadam avApyAjAnadevEryAH pUjyAstAH karmadevatA iti Sabdaci pu
karmaja karmaja karmaja tri karmaRo karmajanyAdfzwAt jAyate jana qa karmahetuke rogAdO rogAdivyADayo hi nAnAviDAH yaToktaM BAvapra tezu svABAvikAH kecitkecidAgantavaH smftAH mAnasAH kecidAKyAtAH kaTitAH ke pi kAyikAH tatra svABAvikAH SarIrasvaBAvAdeva jAtAH kzutpipAsAsuzuptyA ca jarAmftyupravfttayaH aTavA svasvaBAvAdutpatterjAtA svABAvikAH sahajA iti yAvat te ca janmAnDatvAdayaH Agantavo hetavo dozAste svasvaBezajEH kzayaM yAntItyarTaH kAyikavAcikamAnasakarmaBave sTAvarAdijanmani SuBASuBaPalaM karmma manovAgdehasamBavam karmajAgatayo nFRAmuttamADamamaDyamAH karmmajAtamAtre pApAdidoze ca taTA dahati vedajYaH karmmajaM dozamAtmanaH manuH kriyAjanye saMyoge viBAge ca aprAptayostu yA prAptiH sEva saMyoga IritaH kIrttitastriviDastveza Adyo nyatarakarmajaH taToBayakriyAjanyo Bavet saMyogajo paraH AdimaH SyenaSElAdisaMyogaH parikIrttitaH mezayoH sannipAto yaH sa dvitIya udAhftaH kapAlatarusaMyogAt saMyogastarukumBayoH tftIyaH syAt karmajo pi dviDEva parikIrttitaH aBiGAto nodanaYca SabdaheturihAdimaH SabdAheturdvitIyaH syAdviBAgo pi triDA Bavet ekakarmovastvAdyo dvayakarmodBavo paraH viBAgajastftIyaH syAt tftIyo pi dviDA Bavet BAzA vegAKyasaMskAre ca mUrttamAtre tu karmapAli karmapAli karmapAli lI strI ta karRapAlake karRAMSaBede kARerapAtA tadavayavaSca mAMsapeSIBedaH yaTAha BAvapra mAMsapeSIsaMKyAviBAge yaTArTaBUzmaRAM yuktovAyuH srotAMsi dArayet anupraviSya piSitaM peSIrviBajate taTA mAMsapeSyaH samAKyAtAnfRAM paYca SatAni ca ityupakramya gaRqayoScatastaH karRayordve ityuktam karReSoToBavet pAlyAm kurvvanti pIqikAM pAlyAm lihyAt sa SazkflIn pAleH karRaroge BAvapra lihyAt nirmAMsIkuryyAt BAvapra karRaM pAlayati pAla aR upa sa gOrA NIz kARavAlA karRAlaNkAraBede hArA
karmayoga karmayoga karmayoga pu karmasu yogaH kOSalam PalasADanasyApi karmaRo PalasADanatvApAdAnarUpe kOSalaBede PalasidDyasidDyoH samatvaBAvane ca yaTA ca tatkOSalaM taTA BAvanaM ca karttavyaM taTA mahatoBayAt vyavasAyAtmikA budDirekeha kurunandana bahuSAKAhyanantASca budDayo vyavasAyinAm yAmimAM puzpitAM vAcaM pravadantyavipaScitaH vedavAdaratAH pArTa nAnyadastItivAdinaH kAmAtmAnaH nirdvandvonityasatvasToniryogakzema AtmavAn yAvAnarTa udapAne sarvataH saMplutodake tAvAn sarvvezu vedezu brAhmaRasya vijAnataH karmmaRyevADikAraste mA Palezu kadAcana mA karmma PalaheturBUrmA te saNgo stvakarmmaRi yogasTaH kuru karmARi saNgaM tyaktvA DanaYjaya sidDyasidDyoH samoBUtvA samatvaM yoga ucyate dUreRa hyavaraM karmmabudDiyogAdDanaYjayaH budDO SaraRamanvicCa kfpaRAH PalahetavaH budDiyuktojahAtIha uBe sukftaduzkfte tasmAd yogAya yujyasva yogaH karmasu kOSalam karmaRo budDiyuktA hi PalaM tyaktvA manIziRaH janmabanDavinirmuktAH padaM gacCantyanAmayam aDikAriBedena karmmayogasyAnuzWAnaprakAramAha gItA loke smin dviviDA nizWA purA proktA mayA naGa jYAnayogena sAMKyAnAM karmmayogena yoginAm na karmmaRAmanAramBAnnEzkarmyaM puruzo Snute na ca sannayasanAdeva sidDiM samaDigacCati na hi kaScit kzaRamapi jAtu tizWatyakarmakft kAryyate hyavaSaH karma sarvvaH prakftijErguREH karmendriyARi saMyamya ya Aste manasA smaran indriyArTAn vimUQAtmA miTyAcAraH sa ucyate yastvindriyARi manasA niyamyAraBate rjuna karmendriyEH karmayogamasaktaH sa viSizyate niyataM kuru karmatvaM karma jyAyohyakarmaRaH SarIrayAtrApi ca te na prasidDyedakarmaRaH yajYArTAt karmaRo nyatra loko yaM karmabanDanaH tadarTaM karma kOnteya muktasaNgaH samAcAra saha yajYAH prajAH sfzwvA purovAca prajApatiH anena prasavizyaDvameza vo stvizwakAmaDuk devAn BAvayatAnena te devA BAvayantu vaH parasparaM BAvayantaH SreyaH paramavAsyaTa izwAn BogAn hi vodevA dAsyante yajYaBAvitAH tErdattAnapradAyEByo yoBuNkte stena eva saH yajYaSizwASinaH santomucyante sarvvakilvizEH BuYjate te tvaGaM pApA ye pacantyAtmakAraRAt annAdBavanti BUtAni parjjanyAdannasamBavaH yajYAdBavati parjjanyoyajYaH karmasamudBavaH karma brahmodBavaM vidDi brahmAkzarasamudBavam tasmAt sarvagataM brahma nityaM yajYe pratizWitam evaM pravartitaM cakraM nAnuvarttayatIha yaH aTAyurindriyArAmomoGaM pArTa sa jIvati yastvAtma ratireva syAdAtmatfptaSca mAnavaH Atmanyeva ca saMtuzwastasya kAryya na vidyate nEva tasya kftenArTonAkfteneha kaScana na cAsya sarvvaBUtezu kaScidarTavyapASrayaH tasmAdasaktaH satataM kAryyaM karma samAcara asakto hyAcaran karma paramApnoti pUrUzam karmaREva hi saMsidDimAsTitAjanakAdayaH lokasaMgrahamevApi saMpaSyan karttumarhasi yadyadAcarati SrezWastattadevetarojanaH sa yat pramARaM kurute lokastadanuvarttate na me pArTAsti karttavyaM trizu lokezu kiYcana nAnavAptamavAptavyaM vartta eva ca karmaRi yadi hyahaM na vartteyaM jAtu karmaRyatandritaH mama vartmAnuvarttante manuzyAH pArTa sarvvaSaH utsIdeyurime lokA na kuryyAM karma cedaham saNkarasya ca karttA syAmupahanyAmimAH prajAH saktAH karmaRyavidvAMso yaTA kurvvanti BArata kuryyAdvidvAMstaTA saktaScikIrzurlokasaMgraham na budDiBedaM janayedajYAnAM karmasaNginAm jozayet sarvakarmARi vidvAn yuktaH samAcaran prakfteH kriyamARAni guREH karmARi sarvvaSaH ahaNkAravimUQAtmA karttAhamiti manyate tattvavittu mahAbAho guRakarmaviBAgayoH guRA guRezu varttanta iti matvA na sajjate prakfterguRasaMmUQAH sajjante guRakarmasu tAnakftsnavidomandAn kftsnavinnavicAlayet mayi sarvvARi karmARi sannyasyADyAtmacetasA nirASIrnirmamoBUtvA yuDyasva vigatajvaraH evaM jYAtvA kftaM karma pUrvErapi mumukzuBiH kuru karmEva tasmAttvaM pUrvEH pUrvatarEH kftam kiM karma kimakarmeti kavayo pyatra mohitAH tatte karma pravakzyAmi yajjYAtvA mokzyase SuBAt karmaRohyapi bodDavyaM bodDavyaYca vikarmaRaH akarmaRaSca bodDavyaM gahanA karmaRo svADyAyeSvarapraRiDAnAdirUpe kriyAtmake yogasADane yaTA ca tapa AdInAM yogasADanatvaM taTA sADanapAde pAtaYjala sUtraBAzyavivaraRezUktaM yaTA tapaH svADyAyeSvarapraRiDAnAni kriyAyogaH sU uddizwaH uddizwa iti aByAsavErAgye hi yogopAyO praTame pAde uktO na ca tO vyutTitacittasya drAgityeva samBavata iti dvitIyapAdopadeSyAnupAyAnapekzate satvaSudDyarTaM tato hi viSudDasatvaH kftarakzAsaMviDAno prajYA samAptADikArA pratiprasavAya kalpizyate iti BA tasya prayojanABiDAnAya sUtramavatArayati sa hIti nanu kriyAyoga eva cet kleSAn pratanUkaroti kftaM tarhi prasaNKyAnenetyata Aha pratanUkftAniti kriyAyogasya pratanUkaraRamAtre vyApAro na tu banDyatye kleSAnAM prasaNKyAnasya tu tadbanDyatve dagDabIjakalpAniti banDyatvena dagDakalamavIjasArUpyamuktam syAdetatprasaNKyAnameva cet kleSAn karmmacodanA karmmacodanA karmmacodanA strI karmaRi karmAvaboDane codanA viDiH karmavizaye preraRArUpe viDO karmAvaroDanaM codanA kriyAyAH pravarttakaM vacanamiti mImA BA codyate pravarttyate nayA bA karaRe a ta karmapravf ttihetO jYAnajYeyajYAtfrUpe rTe ca jYAnaM jYeyaM pari jYAtA triviDA karmacodanA gotA jYAnamizwasADana mitiboDaH jYeyamizwasADanaM karma parijYAtA tajjYAnA SrayaH triviDA karmacodanA codyate pravarttyate nayeti codanA jYAnAditritayaM karmapravfttiheturityarTaH yadvA codaneti viDirucyate tadukta BawwEH codanA copadeSaSca viSizwEkArTavAcinaH iti tataScAyamarTaH uktalakzaRaM triguRAtmakaM jYAnAditrayamavalambya karmaviDiH pravarttate iti SrIDaraH
karmmadeva karmmadeva karmmadeva pu karmaRA devaH prAptadevaBAvaH trayastriMSaddevaBede sa ekaH karmadevAnAmAnandaH ye karmaRA devAnapi yanti Srotriyasya cAkAmahatasya te ye SataM karmadevAnAmAnandAH tE u karmadevA ye vEdikenAgnihotrAdinA keva lena devAnapi yanti devA iti trayastriSadDavirBujaH indra stezAM svAmI tasyAcAryyo bfhaspatiH prajApati rvirAwtrElokya SarIro brahmA samazwivyazwisvarUpaH saMsAramaraRAnalavyApI SANkara BA trayastriMSacca devAH AnandagiriRA darSitAH azwO vasavaH ekAdaSa rudrAH dvAdaSAdityAH indraH prajApatiSceti karmaRA devalokaM gate ca sa ekaH karmadevAnAmAnando ye karmaRA devatvamaBisampadyante aTa ye SataM karmadevAnAmAnandAH Sata brA ye agnihotrAdiSrOtrakarmaRA devalokaM prApnuvanti te karmadevAH BA karmadevatA pyatra strI jyotizwomAdinA svargaM prAptAH syuH karmadebatAH Sabdaci asmin kalpe SvameDAdi karma kftvA mahatpadam avApyAjAnadevEryAH pUjyAstAH karmadevatAH iti Sabdaci pu
karmmagrAnTa karmmagrAnTa karmmagrAnTa pu karmaRAM granTirbanDanamasmAt ajYAnajanya vAsanArUpe doze tasyEva sakalapravfttihetutvAttasya karma banDanahetutvAttaTAtvam
karmmagranTi karmmagranTi karmmagranTi pu karmaRAM granTirbanDanamasmAt ajYAnajanya vAsanArUpe doze tasyEva sakalapravfttihetutvAttasya karmabanDanahetutvAttaTAtvam
karmmaja karmmaja karmmaja tri karmaRo karmajanyAdfzwAt jAyate jana qa karmahetuke rogAdO rogAdivyADayo hi nAnAviDAH yaToktaM BAvapra teza svABAvikAH kecitkecidAgantavaH smftAH mAnasAH kecidAKyAtAH kaTitAH ke pi kAyikAH tatra svABAvikAH SarIrasvaBAbAdeva jAtAH kzutpipAsA suzuptyA ca jarAmftyupravfttayaH aTavA svasvaBAvAdutpatte rjAtA svABAvikAH sahajA iti yAvat te ca janmA nDatvAdayaH Agantavo ca taTA dahati vedajYaH karmmajaM dozamAtmanaH manuH kriyAjanye saMyoge viBAge ca aprAptayostu yA prAptiH sEva saMyoga IritaH kIrttitastriviDastveza Adyo nyatarakarmajaH taToBayakriyAjanyo Bavet saMyogajo paraH AdimaH SyenaSElAdisaMyogaH parikIrttitaH nezayoH sannipAto yaH sa dvitIya udAhftaH kapAlata rusaMyogAt saMyogastarukumBayoH tftIyaH syAt karmajo pi dviDEva parikIrttitaH aBiGAto nodanaYca Sabda heturihAdimaH SabdAheturdvitIyaH syAdviBAgo pi triDA BaGet ekakarmodBavastvAdyo dvayakarmodBavo paraH viBAgajastftIyaH syAt tftIyo pi dviDA Bavet BAzA vegAKyasaMskAre ca mUrttamAtre tu karmmayoga karmmayoga karmmayoga pu karmasu yogaH kOSalam PalasADanasyApi karmaRo PalasADanatvApAdAnarUpe kOSaMlaBede PalasidDya sidDyoH samatvaBAvane ca yaTA ca tatkOSalaM taTA BAvanaM ca kattavyaM taTA gItAyAM nAnAsTAnezu darSitaM yaTA ezA te BihitA sAMKye budDiryoge tvimAM SfRu budDyA yuktoyayA pArTa karmabanDaM prahAsyasi nehABi kramanASo sti pratyavAyo na vidyate svalpamapyasya Darmasya trAyate mahatoBayAt vyavasAyAtmikA budDirekeha kuru nandana bahuSAKAhyanantASca budDayo vyavasAyinAm yAmimAM puzpitAM vAcaM pravadantyavipaScitaH vedavA daratAH pArTa nAnyadastItivAdinaH kAmAtmAnaH svarga parAjanmakarmmaPalapradAm kriyAviSezavahulAM BogeSva ryyagatiM prati BogESvaryyaprasaktAnAM tayApahftacetasAm vyavasAyAtmikA budDiH samADO na viDIyate trEguRya vizayAvedA nistrEguRyo BavArjuna nirdvandvonityasatvasTo niryogakzema AtmavAn yAvAnarTa udapAne sarvataH saM plutodake tAvAn sarvvezu vedezu brAhmaRasya vijA nataH karmmaRyevADikAraste mA Palezu kadAcana mA karmma PalaheturBUrmA te saNgo stvakarmmaRi yogasTaH kuru karmARi saNgaM tyaktvA DanaYjaya sidDyasidDyoH samoBUtvA samatvaM yoma ucyate dUreRa hyavaraM karmma budDiyogAdDanaYjayaH budDO SaraRamanvicCa kfpaRAH PalahetavaH budDiyuktojahAtIha uBe sukftaduzkfte tasmAd yogAya yujyasva yogaH karmasu kOSalam karmaRo budDiyuktA hi PalaM tyaktvA manIziRaH janmabanDavi nirmuktAH padaM gacCantyanAmayam aDikAriBedena karmmayogasyAnuzWAnaprakAramAha gotA loke smin dviviDA nizWA purA proktAM mayA naGa jYAnayogena sAMKyAnAM karmmayogena yoginAm na karmmaRAmanAramBAnnEzkarmyaM puruzo Snute na ca sannyasa nAdeva sidDiM samaDigacCati na hi kaScit kzaRamapi jAtu tizWatyakarmakft kAryyate hyavaSaH kamE sarvvaH prakftijE rguREH karmendriyARi saMyamya ya Aste manasA Page a smaran i ndriyArTAn visUQAtmA miTyAcAraH sa ucyate yastvindriyARi manasA niyamyAraBate rjuna karmendriyEH karmayogamasaktaH sa viSizyate niyataM kuru karma tvaM karma jyAyohyakarmaRaH SarIrayAtrApi ca te na prasidDyedakarmaRaH yajYArTAt karmaRo nyatra loko yaM karmabanDanaH tadarTaM karma kOnteya muktasaNgaH samAcAra saha yajYAH prajAH sfzwvA purovAca prajA patiH anena prasavizyaDvameza vo stvizwakAmaDuk devAn BAvayatAnena te devA BAvayantu vaH parasparaM BAvayantaH SreyaH paramavApsyaTa izwAn BogAn hi vodevA dAsyante yajYaBAvitAH tErdattAnapradAyEByoyoBuNkte stena eva saH yajYaSizwASinaH santomucyante sarvvakilvizEH BuYjate te tvaGaM pApA ye pacantyAtmakAraRAt annA dBavanti BUtAni parjjanyAdannasamBavaH yajYAdBavati parjja nyoyajYaH karmasamudBavaH kama brahmodBavaM vidDi brahmA kzarasamudBavam tasmAt sarvagataM brahma nityaM yajYe pratizWitam evaM pravarttitaM cakraM nAnuvarttayatoha yaH aGAyurindriyArAmomoGaM pArTa sa jIvati yastvAtma ratireva syAdAtmatfptaSca mAnavaH Atmanyeva ca saMtu zwastasya kAryyaM na vidyate nEva tasya kftenArTonA kfteneha kaScana na cAsya sarvvaBUtezu kaScidarTavyapASrayaH tasmAdasaktaH satataM kAryyaM karma samAcara asakto hyAcaran karma paramApnoti pUruzam karmaREva hi nAnavAptamavAptavyaM vartta eva ca karmaRi yadi hyahaM na vartteyaM jAtu karmaRya tandritaH mama vartmAnuvarttante manuzyAH pArTa sarvvaSaH utsIdeyurime lokA na kuryyAM karma cedaham saNkarasya ca karttA syAmupahanyAmimAH prajAH saktAH karmaRyavidvAMso yaTA kurvvanti BArata kuryyAdvidvAMsta GA saktaScikIrzurlokasaMgraham na budDiBedaM janayeda jYAnAM karmasaNginAm jozayet sarbakarmARi vidvAn saMnyasyAste suKaM vaSI navadvAre pure dehI nEva kurvvannakArayan na kartftvaM na karmARi lokasya sfjati praBuH na karmaPalasaMyogaM svaBAvastu pravarttate evaM gItAyAM nAnAsTAneza karmma kriyEva yogo yogasADanam tapaHsvADyAyeSvara praRiDAnAdirUpe kriyAtmake yogasADane yaTA ca tapa AdInAM yogasADanatvaM taTA sADanapAde pAtaYjala sUtraBAzyavivaraRezUktaM yaTA tapaHsvADyAyeSvarapraRiDAnAni kriyAyogaH sU uddizwaH samAhitacittasya yogaH kaTaM vyutTitaci tto pi yogayuktaH syAdityetadAraByate nAtapasvino yogaH sidDyati anAdikarmakleSavAsanAcitrA pratyupa sTitavizayajAlA cASudDirnAntareRa tapaHsamBedamapodyate iti tapasa upAdAnaM tacca cittaprasAdanamabADamAnamane nAsevyamiti manyate svADyAyaH praRavAdipavitrARAM japomokzaSAstrADyayanaM vA ISvarapraRiDAnaM sarva kriyARAM paramagurAvarpaRaM tatPalasannyAso vA BA uddizwa iti aByAsavErAgye hi yogopAyO praTa me pAde uktO na ca tO vyatTitacittasya drAgityeva samBavata iti dvitIyapAdopadeSyAnupAyAnapekzate satvaSudDyarTaM tato hi viSudDasatvaH kftarakzAsaMviDAno ByAsavErAgye pratyahaM BAvayati samAhitatvamavikziptatvaM kaTaM vyutTA nacitto pyupadekzyamAREruzAyEryuktaH vizRupurARe KARqikyakeSi DvajasaMvAde yogayuk praTamaM yogI yuYjamAno Bi DIyata ityupakramya tapaH svADyAyAdayo darSitAH vyatirekamuKena tapasa upAyatvamAha nAtapasvina iti tapaso saNgostvakarmaRi gItA viva sa hi kriyAyogaH BA samADiBAvanArTaH kleSatanU karaRArTaSca sU sa hi AsevyamAnaH samADi BAva yati kleSAMSca pratanUkaroti pratanUkftAn kleSAn prasaMKyA nAgninA dagDavIjakalpAnaprasavaDarmiRaH karizyatIti tezAM tanUkaraRAt punaH kleSEraparAmfzwA satvapuruzAnyatAmAtraKyA tiH sUkzmA prajYA samAptADikArA pratiprasavAya kalpizyate iti BA tasya prayojanABiDAnAya sUtramavatArayati sa hIti nanu kriyAyoga eva cet kleSAn pratanUkaroti kftaM tarhi prasaNKyAnenetyata Aha pratanUkftAniti kriyAyogasya pratanUkaraRamAtre vyApAro na tu banDyatve kleSAnAM prasaNKyAnasya tu tadbanDyatve dagDavIjakalpAniti banDyatvena dagDakalamavIjasArUpyamuktam syAdetatprasaNKyAnameva cet kleSAn aprasavaDarmiRaH karizyati kftamezAM pratanUkaraRe netyata Aha tezAmiti kleSAnAmatAnave karttarI karttarI karttarI strI kfta GaY karttaM rAti rA ka gOrA NIz kfpA RyAm patrIkftahiraRyAdeH CedanasADane kAtArI astraBede dadarSaM karttarIyantramamftoparisaMsTitam manaHpavanavegena BramamARaM mahArayam api spfSantaM maSakaM yat KaRqayati kowiSaH kASI keSAdikarttanasADane kA ci astre krUramaDyagataScandrI lagnaM vA krUramaDyagan kartaro nAma yogo yam iti jyotizokte yogaBede ca karttaroyoga upayamaSabde tatprati prasaviSezo pi uktaH kfta ari karttarirityapyatra strI kzarakarttarisaMdaSEstasya romARi nirharet suSru pApo karttarikArakO mUhu ci atra Nyaporiti pA hrasvaH pIyU vastutaH kzurakarttarisadaMSErityatra dvandve hrasvAprasakteH hrasvAnto pi karttariSabdo stIti gamyate svArTe kan karttarikApyatra strI
katryAdi katryAdi katryAdi pu pARinyukte jAtAdyarTe QakaYpratyayanimitte SabdasamUhe sa ca gaRaH kattri umBi puzkara puzkala modava kumBI kuRqina nagarI mAhizmatI varmatI uKyA grAma kuqyAyA yalopaSca gaRasUtram
kattarI kattarI kattarI strI kfta GaY karttaM rAti rA ka gorA NIz kfpARyAm patrIkftahiraRyAdeH CedanasADane kAtArI astraBede dadarSa karttarIyantramamftoparisaMsTitam sanaH pavanavegena BramamARaM mahArayam api spfSantaM maSakaM yat KaRqayati kowiSaH kASI keSAdikarttanasADane kAzci astre krUramaDyagataScandro lagnaM vA krUramaDyagan kartarI nAma yogo yam iti jyotizokte yogaBede ca karttarIyoga upayamaSabde tatpratiprasavaviSezo pi uktaH kfta ari karttarirityapyatra strI kzurakarttarisaMdaSEstasya romARi nirharet suSru pApo karttarikArakO mUhu ci atra Nyaporiti pA hasvaH pIyU vastutaH kzurakarttarisadaMSErityatra dvandve hrasvAprasakteH hrasvAnto pi karttariSabdo stIti gamyate svArTe kan karttarikApyatra strI

keSAkeSi keSAkeSi keSAkeSi Savya keSezu keSezu gfhItvA pravfttaM yudDaM tatra tenedamiti sarUpe pA sa karmmavyatihAre ic samA pUrvadIrGaH tizWadgupraBftitvAdavyayatvam anyonyakeSagrahaRapUrvakapravfttayudDe evaM kacAkacyAdayo pyatra avya asarUpe tu nedaM pravarttate ArCatAM bahusaMramBAt keSAkeSi raTAraTi BA vi a keSAkeSyaBavadyudDaM rakzasAM vAnarEH saha BA va a
keSAkiSi keSAkiSi keSAkiSi avya keSezu keSezu gfhItvA pravfttaM yudDaM tatra tenedamiti sarUpe pA sa karmmavyatihAre ic samA pUrbbadIrGaH tizWadgupraBftitvAdavyayatvam anyo nyakeSagrahaRapUrbbakapravfttayudDe evaM kacAkacyAdayo pyatra avya asarUpe tu nedaM pravarttate ArCatAM bahusaMramBAt keSAkeSi raTAraTi BA vi a keSA keSyaBavadyudDaM rakzasAM vAnarEH saha BA va a

keta keta keta mantraRe niHSrAvaRe yaTocitaBAzaRe ca ada cu u saka sew ketayati te aciketat ta ketayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre ketitaH saNketaH kzatraDarmmARa mapyAjO ketayet kulajaM dvijam BA Anu ketitastu yaTAnyAyaM havyakavye dvijottamaH nanuH sam icCABede SabdasyArTaboDakavyApAre saNketo gfhyate jAtO guRadravyakriyAsu ca kAvyapra sAkzAt saNketitaM yo rTam sA da aBiprAyasUcake cezwABede isArA saka nAmagfhItaM kftasaNketam jaya kAntArTinI tu yA yAti saNketaM sA BisArikA amaraH keta pu kita ADAre GaY nivAse abjakuliSANkuSaketuketEH abjakuliSANkuSa ketuketEH BAga BAve GaY vAse ca avANmuKAH avAN muKAH pakzigaRAH viSanti ketArTamivASu vfkzam BA ka prajYAyAM nirukta saMkalpe devAso anu ketamAyan f kenaM ketaM saMkalpam BA mantraRe ca AvizwanA pEjavanasya ketam f ketaM gmantraRam mantraRam BA jYAtari tri praketo pi si rudreByaH tARqya brA praketaH prakfzwaM jYAtAsi BA Dvaje pu keta mantraRe niHSrAvaRe yaTocitaBAzaRe ca ada cu u saka sew ketayati te aciketat ta ketayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre ketitaH saNketaH kzatraDarmmARa mapyAjO ketayet kulajaM dvijam BA Anu ketitastu yaTAnyAyaM havyakavye dvijottamaH nanuH sam icCABede SabdasyArTaboDakavyApAre saNketo gfhyate jAtO guRadravyakriyAsu ca kAvyapra sAkzAt saNketitaM yo rTam sA da aBiprAyasUcake cezwABede isArA saka nAmagfhItaM kftasaNketam jaya kAntArTinI tu yA yAti saNketaM sA BisArikA amaraH keta pu kita ADAre GaY nivAse abjakuliSANkuSa ketuketEH BAga BAve GaY vAse ca avAN muKAH pakzigaRAH viSanti ketArTamivASu vfkzam BA ka prajYAyAM nirukta saMkalpe devAso anu ketamAyan f ketaM saMkalpam BA mantraRe ca AvizwanA pEjavanasya ketam f ketaM mantraRam BA jYAtari tri praketo si rudreByaH tARqya brA praketaH prakfzwaM jYAtAsi BA Dvaje pu

kiMyattadbahuzu kfYo jviDAnamiti vArttikam kiNkarA kiNka rA tatkarA hetvAdO wambADitvA paratvAdac puM yoge puMyoge NIp kiNkarI karmmaRi BftO pA karmmaSabde upapade karotezwaH syAt BftO karmmakaro akArzIt akfta cakAra BOvAdikasyAsyApARinIyatA kf kftO tanA uBa saka aniw karoti kurute kuryyAt karotu kuru akarot akArzIt akfta cakAra karttA karizyatite kriyAt kfzIzwa karmmaRi kriyate akAriakArizAtAmkArayizAtAm kAraka karttA kArI kurvan kurzvARaH cakrivAn cakrARaH qu kftrimaH kftaH kftavAn karaRaM kftiH kriyA kftyA kftvA prakftya kftyaM kAryyaH karttavyaH karaRIyaH Rici kArayati te acIkarattasani cikIrzati te yaNi cekriyate yaN luki cari rI karIti cari rI kartti carkarIti carkartti kfYo hetutAcCIlyAnulomyezu pA ezu dyotyezu karotezwaH syAt ataH kUkamIti saH yaSaskarI vidyA upakftaM bahu tatra kimucyate sA da saMskAre saka suw ca upaskaroti upa A AramBe upAkaroti upAkftya SrAvaRyAM prozWa pardyA vA upAkftya yaTAviDi manuH paSvAdisaMskAre ca upAkarmmaSabde udA dur duzwAcaraRe duzkftaM duzkftiH ni parABave saka nikaroti parABavati nIkaraH nis nir SudDO aka nizkaroti nizkftiH SudDiH nir A nivAraRe saka nirAkaroti nirAkarizRU vardDizRU varttizRU paritoraRam BawwiH viprakftAH kAle kumA kamaparamavaSaM na viprakuryyuH kumA sam saMskAre satoguRAntarADAne saka suw ca saMskaroti pAtram sam pari upa BUzaRe arTe suw saMskaroti parizkaroti upaskaroti alaNkarotItyarTaH yatnAnuBavaprasaNgA diti cet na DAtvarTaviSezeRa pAkAdinA yatnAkzepAt tasya yatnaM vinAnupapatteH aTa pacatItyatra pAkayatnavA niti vivaraRAt yatnArTateti cet tarhi karttrarTatApi syAt na hi yatnasyEva SakyatvAt nanu yatnonAKyAtArTaH pAkatvena pAkasya yatnasADyatvAnumityA yatnalABAdityuktamiti cenna cEtro yatnaM katItyataH pAkAnukUlavartamAnayatnavAn pratIyate naca pAkasya kfSa kfSa kfSa tanUkaraRe divA para saka sew kfSyati irit akfSat akarSIt Rici karSayati te acIkfSatta acakarSatta acIkfSat ta acakarSa tta karSayAm vaBUva baBUva Asa cakAra cakre kfSaH kfSa tri kfSa kta ni alpe sUkzme ca AkASeSAstu AkASe SAstu vijYeyA bAlavfdDakfSAturAH upavAsakfSaM zWapavAsakfSaM tantu kzatriyaYcEva sarpaYca brAhmaRaM sarpaYcabrAhmaRaM vA bahuSrutam nAvamanyeta vE BUyaH kfSAnapi kadAcana manuH brAhmaRasya suraSrezWa kfSavftteH kfSa vftteH kadAcana BA Anu a sUkzme kfSodarI kfSo darI kfSasya BAvaH imanic kraSiman kraSimat tadBAve pu zyaY kArSya na tal kfSatA strI tva kfSatva na tadBAve tvayyevaM kfSatA kutaH sA da atiSayena kfSaH izWan kraSizWa Iyasun kraSIyas atiSayakfSe tri IyasO striyAM NIp kfSa tanUkaraRe divA para saka sew kfSyati irit akfSat akarSIt Rici karSayati te acIkfSat ta acakarSa tta karSayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre kfSaH kfSa tri kfSa kta ni alpe sUkzme ca AkASe SAstu vijYeyA bAlavfdDakfSAturAH zWapavAsakfSaM tantu kzatriyaYcEva sarpaYcabrAhmaRaM vA bahuSrutam nAvamanyeta vE BUyaH kfSAnapi kadAcana manuH brAhmaRasya suraSrezWa kfSa vftteH kadAcana BA Anu a sUkzme kfSo darI kfSasya BAvaH imanic kraSimat tadBAve pu zyaY kArSya na tal kfSatA strI tva kfSatva na tadBAve tvayyevaM kfSatA kutaH sA da atiSayena kfSaH izWan kraSizWa Iyasun kraSIyas atiSayakfSe tri IyasO striyAM NIp
kfmikarRRa kfmikarRRa kfmikarRRa ka pu kfmiyuktaH karRRoyatra vA kap suSrutokte karRRarogaBede yadA tu mUrcCantyaTavApi jantavaH sfjantyapatyAnyaTavApi makzikAH tadaYjanatvAt SravaRo nirucyate BizagBirAdyEH kfmikarRRakastu saH kfmi karRRapratInAhO vidraDirdviviDastaTA kfmikarRRaka nASArTaM kfmiGnaM yojayedviDim iti ca suSru
kfmikarRa kfmikarRa kfmikarRa ka pu kfmiyuktaH karRoyatra vA kap suSrutokte karRarogaBede yadA tu mUrcCantyaTavApi jantavaH sfjantyapatyAnyaTavApi makzikAH tadaYjanatvAt SravaRo nirucyate BizagBirAdyEH kfmikarRakastu saH kfmikarRapratInAhO vidraDirdviviDastaTA kfmikarRakanASArTaM kfmiGnaM yojayedviDim iti ca suSru

kfpa kfpa kfpa kalpane sampattO samprattO BvA Atma luNi luwi lfwi lfNi xwi xNi ca uBa vftAdi aka vew asya ftaH rakArasTAne laH kalpate kalpa te akalpat akalpizwa akxpta kalptAsi kalpitAse kalpsyati kalpsyate kalpizyate kalpitavyaH kalptvyaHkalpanam kalptvyaH kalpanam kalpaH kxptaH kxptiH Rici kalpayati te acakalpat ta acIkxpatta acIkxpat ta kalpitaH kalpanA kalpayitA kxpi sampadyamAne vArtti etadyoge sampadyamAne karttari caturTI BaktirjYAnAya kalpate kalpavit kalpayAmAsa kalpa yAmAsa vanyAmevAsya saMviDAm kxptena sopAnapaTena raGuH rucisaMprakxptam BawwawiH prajApatikalpitayajYaBAgam kumA BawwiH prajApatikalpitayajYa BAgam kumAM Cedane ca saka kxptakeSanaKaSmaSruH manuH kalpanaM Cedanam kullU anu praTamaviDAnapratiniDIkaraRe saka SaktaH praTamakalpasya praTamakalpa sya yo nukalpe pravarttate smftiH ava avaDAraRe anavakxptAvevaH si kO A BUzaRe saka AkalpaH BUzAvi BUzA vi kalpi saMSaye vikalpayati saMSete ityurTaHsam ityarTaH sam kalpi idaM karizyAmItyevaMrUpe karizyAmItyebaMrUpe mAnasavyApAraBede kAmaH saMkalpovicitsetyAdi sakalpovicitsetyAdi SrutiH manasA saMkalpayati saMkalpa yati vAcA Bilapati smftiH mAnasakarmmABilApane saMkalpena vinA rAjan yatkiYcit kurute karute naraH ti ta kfpa dOrbalye ada curA uBa aka sew kfpayati te acikfpatta aci kfpatta kfpa yutO citrIkaraRe vA curA pakze BvA para sew ka lpayati kalpayati te kalpati acakalpaacIkxpta acakalpaacIkxpat ta akalpIt kfpa pu cu kfpa ac rAjarziBede yaTA ruSamaM SyAvakaM kfpamindra grAvaH prAvaH f ruSamaM SyAvakaM kfpaM cEtannAmakAMstrIn rAjarzIn yaTA prAvaH BA kfpA astyasya pAlanasADanatvena arSa ac Saradvato gOtamasya gAtamasya putre tatsutAyAM strI NIp yaTA ca tayorutpattistannAmatA ta yorutpattistannAmatA ca taTA BA A a uktaM yaTA kftasyApi kfpasyApi mama brahman samBavaM vaktumarhasi SarastambAt kaTaM jajYe kaTaM kaTa jajYa kaTa vA strARyavAptavAn vESampAyana Page a uvAca maharzergotamasyAsocCaradvAnnAma gOtamaH putraH kila mahArAja jAtaH saha SarErviBo na tasya vedADyayane vedADya yane taTA budDirajAyata vudDirajAyata yaTA sya budDiraBabadDanurvede parantapa aDijagmuryaTA para ntapa aDijammuryaTA vedAMstapasA brahmacAriRaH taTA sa tapasopetaH sarvARyastrARyavApa sarvvARyastrARyavApa ha DanurvedaparatvAcca tapasA vipulena ca BfSaM santApayAmAsa devarAjaM devarAja sa gOtamaH tato jAnapadIM nAma devakanyAM sureSvaraH prAhiRottapaso prA hiRottapaso viGnaM kuru tasyeti kOrava sA hi gatvASramaM ga tvASramaM tasya ramaRIyaM SaradvataH DanurbARaDaraM DanurvARaDaraM bAlA loBayAmAsa gOtamam tAmekavasanAM dfzwvA gOtamo psarasaM dfzwvAgOtamo psa rasaM vane loke pratimasaMsTAnAM protPullanayano Bavat saDanuSca Sarastasya karAByAmapatadBuvi vepaTuScApi tAM dfzwvA SarIre samajAyata sa tu jYAnagarIyastvAttapasaSca samarTanAt avatasTe mahAprAjYo DEryyeRa parameRa ha yastasya sahasA rAjan vikAraH samadfSyata tena susrAva reto sya sa ca tannAvabuDyata DanuSca saSaraM tyaktvA taTA kfzRAjinAni ca sa vihAyASramantaYca tAYcEvApsarasaM muniH jagAma retastattasya Sarastambe papAta ca Sarastambe Sara stambe ca patitaM dviDA tadaBavannfpa tasyATa miTunaM jajYe gOtamasya SaradvataH SaradvajaH mfgayAYcarato rAjYaH SAntanostu SAnta nostu yadfcCayA kaScit senAcaro raRyo raRye miTunaM tadapaSyata tadapa Syata DanuSca saSaraM dfzwvA taTA kfzRAjinAni ca jYAtvA dvijasya cApatye DanurvedAntagasya ha sa rAjYe darSayAmAsa miTunaM saSaraM DanuH sa tadAdAya miTunaM rAjA ca kfpayAnvitaH AjagAma gfhAneva mama puttrAviti vruvan puttrA viti bruvan tataH saMvardDayAmAsa saMskArEScApyayojayat saMskArEScApyayoja yat prAtIpeyo naraSrezWo miTunaM gOtamasya tat gOtamo pi tato ByetyaDanurvedaparo Byetya Danurvedaparo Bavat kfpayA yanmayA bAlAvimO saM vardDitAviti tasmAttayornAna saMvardDitAviti tasmAttayornAma cakre tadeva sa mahIpatiH mahopatiH gopitO gOtamastatra tapasA samavindata Agatya tasmE gotrAdi sarvamAKyAtavAMstadA sarvamAKyAtavAstadA caturviDaM DanurvedaM SAstrARi viviDAni ca niKilenAsya tatsarvaM guhyamAKyAtavAMstadA puhyamAKyAtavAMstadA so cireREva cireReva kAlena paramAcAryyatAM paramAcA ryyatAM gataH tato DijagmuH sarve te DanurvedaM mahAraTAH mahAra TAH DftarAzwrAtmajAScEva pARqavAH saha pAdavEH yAdavEH vfzRayaSca nfpAScAnye nAnAdeSasamAgatAH ahalyA kanyakA yasyAM SatAnandastu gotamAt gotamAta tasya sftyaDftiH nftyaDftiH putro DanurvedaviSAradaH SaradvAMstatsuto SaradvAMstatasuto Page b yasya svarveSyAdarSanAt kila Sarastambe patadreto miTuna miTunaM tadaBUt Srutam taddfzwvA kfpayA gfhRAcCAntanurmfgayAM caran kfpaH kumAraH kanyA ca droRapatnyaBavat kfpI BAga sa ca rudrAMSasamBUtaH yaTAha yastu rAjan kfponAma brahmarziraBavat kzitO rudrARAntu gaRAdvidDi saMBUtamatipOruzam BA A a sa ma ca cirajIvI aSvatTAmA balirvyAso hanUmAMSca viBIzaRaH kfpaH paraSurAmaSca saptEte cirajIvinaH purA tato dIrGAyuyaM DyAsaM rAmaMdrORiM kfpebalim vyAsaM rAmaM drORiM kfpaM balim prahlAdaYca hanUmantaM viBIzaRamaTArcayet ti ta gargaH karmmaRi ca yamAsA kfpanIqaM BAsA ketum vardDayanti f kfpanIqaM karmmasTAnam BA kfpa kalpane samprattO BvA Atma luNi luwi xwi xNi ca uBa vftAdi aka vew asya ftaH rakArasTAne laH kalpa te akalpat akalpizwa akxpta kalptAsi kalpitAse kalpsyati kalpsyate kalpizyate kalpitavyaH kalptvyaH kalpanam kalpaH kxptaH kxptiH Rici kalpayati te acakalpat ta acIkxpat ta kalpitaH kalpanA kalpayitA kxpi sampadyamAne vArtti etadyoge sampadyamAne karttari caturTI BaktirjYAnAya kalpate kalpavit kalpa yAmAsa vanyAmevAsya saMviDAm kxptena sopAnapaTena raGuH rucisaMprakxptam BawwiH prajApatikalpitayajYa BAgam kumAM Cedane ca saka kxptakeSanaKaSmaSruH manuH kalpanaM Cedanam kullU anu praTamaviDAnapratiniDIkaraRe saka SaktaH praTamakalpa sya yo nukalpe pravarttate smftiH ava avaDAraRe anavakxptAvevaH si kO A BUzaRe saka AkalpaH BUzA vi kalpi saMSaye vikalpayati saMSete ityarTaH sam kalpi idaM karizyAmItyebaMrUpe mAnasavyApAraBede kAmaH sakalpovicitsetyAdi SrutiH manasA saMkalpa yati vAcA Bilapati smftiH mAnasakarmmABilApane saMkalpena vinA rAjan yatkiYcit karute kftAvadAna kftAvadAna kftAvadAna tri kftamavadAnaM KyAtakarmma yena viKyAta karmmayukte Sabdaci
kftaGnApAKyAna kftaGnApAKyAna kftaGnApAKyAna na kftaGnaviSezasyopAKyAnam BArataSAnti parvAntargate aDyAyamAraBya aDyAyaparyyante granTe nAqIjaNGaSabde vivftiH kutaH kftaGnasya yaSaH kutaH sTAnaM kutaH suKam aSradDeyaH kftaGnohi kftaGne nAsti nizkftiH mitradroho na karttavyaH puruzeRa viSezataH mitraDruk narakaM GoramanantaM pratipadyate kftajYena sadA BAvyaM mitrakAryyeRa cEvaha mitrAcca laBate sarvaM mitrAt pUjAM laBeta ca mitrAdBogAMSca BuYjIta mitreRApatsu mucyate satkArEruttamErmittaM pUjayeta vicakzaRaH parityAjyo buDEH pApaH kftaGnonirapatrapaH mitradrohI kulANgAraH pApakarmmA narADamaH eza DarmmaBftAM SrezWa proktaH pApo mayA tava mitradrohI kftaGnovE kiMBUyaH SrotumicCasi BA A a
kftaGnopAKyAna kftaGnopAKyAna kftaGnopAKyAna na kftaGnaviSezasyopAKyAnam BArataSAnti parvvAntargate aDyAyamAraBya aDyAyaparyyante granTe nAqIjaNGaSabde vivftiH kutaH kftaGnasya yaSaH kutaH sTAnaM kutaH suKam aSradDeyaH kftaGnohi kf taGne nAsti nizkftiH mitradroho na karttavyaH puruzeRa viSezataH mitraDruk narakaM GoramanantaM patipadyate kftajYena sadA BAvyaM mitrakAryyeRa cEvaha mitrAcca laBate sarvvaM mitrAt pUjAM laBeta ca mitrAdBogAMSca BuYjIta mitreRApatsu mucyate satkArEruttamErmitraM pUjayeta vicakzaRaH parityAjyo buDEH pApaH kftaGno nirapa trapaH mitradrohI kulANgAraH pApakarmmA narADamaH eza DarmmaBftAM SrezWa proktaH pApo mayA tava mitradro hI kftaGnovE kiMBUyaH SrotumicCasi BA A a
kftapUrvI kftapUrvI kftapUrvI tri kftaM pUrvamanena sapUrbbAcca pA ini kftapUrvakarmmake tadvoDaprakAraH saralAyAmasmABirnirrUpato yaTA kftapUrbI kawaM BuktapUrvI odanamityAdimahABAzyakAraprayogA dfSyante tatra ca kftaM pUrbamaneneti vigrahe saha supA iti pA samAse pUrvAdiniritIneranuvfttimatA sapUrzAcceti pA sUtreRa inirvihitaH tatra yadi kftamiti karmaRi ktaH syAt tadA tasya kawAdikarmmarUpaviSezaRatayA sApekzatvena pUrvAdipadena samAso na syAt ekatra viSezaRatayopasTitasyAnyatra viSezaRatayAnvayAyogAt na vfttisamBavaH BAzyaprAmARyAcca tatra vfttO satyAmezArItirAkalanIyA taTAhi praTamaM karmAvivakzayA karmakatvena BAve ktapratyaye vihite tadantena pUrvasya saha supeti pA samAse kfte tatpUrvakAt pUrbaSabdAdinipratyayo Bavati paScAcca karttfkftakriyAyAH karmAkANkzAyAM kawAdikarmaRo nvayaH etadeva hariRA darSitaM yaTA akarmakatve satyeva ktAnte BAvABiDAyini paScAt kriyAvatA karttrA yogo Bavati karmaRA avigrahA gatAdisTA yaTA grAmAdikarmmaBiH kriyA sambaDyate tadvat kftapUrvyAdizu sTiteti gamanakartfvAcakagatAdimaDyapAtinI gamanakriyA karttfviSezaRatvenopasTitA yaTA avigrahA asuboDA taTA kftapUrvakarttfvoDakakftapUrvimaDyapAtinyapIti tadarTaH
kftapUrvvI kftapUrvvI kftapUrvvI tri kftaM pUrvvamanena sapUrbbAcca pA ini kftapU rvvakarmmake tadboDaprakAraH saralAyAmasmABinirrUpato yaTA kftapUrbI kawaM BuktapUrbI odanamityAdimahABAzya kAraprayogA dfSyante tatra ca kftaM pUrbamaneneti vigrahe saha supA iti pA samAse pUrvvAdiniritIneranuvfttimatA sapUrbAcceti pA sUtreRa inirvihitaH tatra yadi kfta miti karmaRi ktaH syAt tadA tasya kawAdikarmmarUpavi SezaRatayA sApekzatvena pUrvAdipadena samAso na syAt ekatra viSezaRatayopasTitasyAnyatra viSezaRatayAnvayAyogAt na vfttisamBavaH BAzyaprAmARyAcca tatra vfttO satyAmezA rItirAkalanIyA tayAhi praTamaM karmAvivakzayA karmakatvena BAve ktapratyaye vihite tadantena pUrvasya saha supeti pA samAse kfta tatpUrvakAt pUrbaSabdAdinipratyayo Bavati paScAcca karttfkftakriyAyAH karmAkANkzAyAM kawAdi karmaRo nvayaH etadeva hariRA darSita yaTA akarmakatve satyeva ktAnte BAvABiDAyini paScAt kriyAvatA karttrA yogo Bavati karmaRA avigrahA gatAdisTA Page b yaTA grAmAdikarmmaBiH kriyA sambaDyate tadvat kfta pUrvyAdizu sTiteti gamanakartfvAcakagatAdimaDyapAtinI gamanakriyA karttfviSezaRatvenopasTitA yaTA avigrahA asuboDA taTA kftapUrvakarttfvoDakakftapUrvimaDyapAtinya pIti tadarTaH
kftaraTa kftaraTa kftaraTa pu nimivaMSyaM nfpaBede meroH pratIpastasmAcca jAtaH kftaraTo yataH BAga Slo sampAditaraTe raTakAre tri
kftaraya kftaraya kftaraya pu nimivaMSye nfpaBede meroH pratIpastasmAcca jAtaH kftaraTo yataH mAga Slo sampA ditaraTe raTakAre tri
kftatAvadAna kftatAvadAna kftatAvadAna tri kftamavadAnaM KyAtakarmma yena viKyAta karmmayukte Sabdaci
kftattrimaDUpa kftattrimaDUpa kftattrimaDUpa pu karmma nAnAsuganDidravyasaMyogajAte daSANgazoqaSANgAdO DUpe amaraH
kftma kftma kftma na kfntati kfRatti vA kfta Cedane vezwane vA saH kiYca jale samudAye pApe pu si kO
kftsa kftsa kftsa na kfntati kfRatti vA kfta Cedane vezwane vA saH kicca jale samudAye pApe pu si kO
kfttrimaDUpa kfttrimaDUpa kfttrimaDUpa pu karmma nAnAsuganDidravyasaMyogajAte daSA NgazoqaSANgAdO DUpe amaraH
kftyavid kftyavid kftyavid tri kftyaM karttavyaM vetti vidaH kvip kAryyajYe viDijYe kftyavididyuvAceti raGuH
kftyavida kftyavida kftyavida tri kftyaM karttavyaM vetti vida kvip kAryyajYe viDijYe kftyavidityuvAceti raGuH
kfzRAnadI kfzRAnadI kfzRAnadI strI karmma bA na puMvadBAvaH kfzRagaNgAyAM rAjani
kfzRAvrIhi kfzRAvrIhi kfzRAvrIhi pu nityakarmma keleDAna vrIhiBede kfzRavrIhiSAlAmuKetyAdinA vrIhIn viBajya suSrute tadguRA uktA yaTA kfzRavrIhirvarastezAM kazAyAnuraso laGuH nErftaH parivfttyE kfzRavrIhIRAM naKanirBinnAnAm kAlyA
kfzRacUrRRa kfzRacUrRRa kfzRacUrRRa na kfzRaM tadvarRRaM cUrRam lOhamale lohAra gu rAjani
kfzRacUrRa kfzRacUrRa kfzRacUrRa na kfzRaM tadvarRaM cUrRam lOhamale lohAra gu rAjani
kfzRagarBa kfzRagarBa kfzRagarBa pu kfzRavarRogarBo sya kawPale rAjani
kfzRanadI kfzRanadI kfzRanadI strI karmma bA na puMvadBAvaH kfzRagaNgAyAM rAjani
kfzRapiRqItaka kfzRapiRqItaka kfzRapiRqItaka pu nityakamma kfzRapiRqIraBede ratna mAlA kfzRapiRqIro pyatra
kfzRapiRqotaka kfzRapiRqotaka kfzRapiRqotaka pu nityakarmma kfzRapiRqIraBede ratnamAlA kfzRapiRqIro pyatra
kfzRavarRRa kfzRavarRRa kfzRavarRRa pu kfzRo varRo sya rAhO grahe rAhoH CAyArUpatvena tamorUpatyAt taTAtvAropAt taTAtvam kfzRaH aSudDI varRaH SUdre pu karmma kAle varRRe pu kfzRavarRavati tri kfzRavarRRaM tvipA kfzRam BAgava ska
kfzRavarRa kfzRavarRa kfzRavarRa pu kfzRo varRo sya rAhO grahe rAhoH CAyArUpatvena tamorUpatvAt taTAtvaropAt taTAtvam kfzRaH aSudDo varRaH SUdre pu karmma kAle varRe pu kfzRavarRavati tri kfzRavarRaM tvizA kfzRam BAgava ska
kfzRavrIhi kfzRavrIhi kfzRavrIhi pu nityakarmma keleDAna vrIhiBede kfzRabrIhiSAlAmuKetyAdinA vrIhIn viBajya suSrute tadguRA uktA yaTA kfzRavrIhirvarastezAM kazAyA nuraso laGuH nErftaH parivfttyE kfzRavrIhIRAM naKanirBinnAnAm kAtyA
kfza kfza kfza vileKane AkarzaRe ca tudA A saka aniw kfpate akfjYata kfzate akfkzata akfzwa cakfze cakfzize krazwA krakzIzwa krakzyate karzaRam pranikfzate gvileKane kfza vileKane AkarzaRe ca BvA parA para saka aniw karpati karzati akrAkzIt akArkzIt akfkzat cakarza cakArziTa cakfziva cakarziTa cakf ziva krazwA kfvyAt kfzvAt krakzyati karmmaRi kfzyate akarpi akarzi akfkzAtAm akfpAtAm akfzAtAm kfzyaH karzaRIyaH kraGavyaH kraGA krazwavyaH krazwA karzakaH karzI karzan kfzyamARaH krakzyan krakzyamARaH kfzwaH kfzwiH kfzwvA anukfzya karzaH karzaRam ganu anu pUrvasTitasya padAdeH uttaravAkye yojanArTe anusanDAne anuzaNge saka anukarzati anukarzaSabde vivftiHgapi vivftiH apa hInatAkaraRe svakAlAt pUrbbatra kAle karaRe ca saka apakarzati apakarzasapiRqanam apakfzwaH apakarzaSabde apa karzaSabde vivftiH gapa apa A nivarttane saka tamaSakyamapAkrazwuM nideSAt svargiRaH pituH raGuH gaBi razuH aBi ABimuKyena karzaRe saka aBikarzatigava aDaH sTatayA aBikarzati ava aDaHsTatayA karzaRe saka avakarzatigA avakarzati A vizayAntaratonayane saka Akarzatigud Akarzati ud atiSAyane prADAnyaprApaRe svakAlAt uttarakAlakaraRe AkarzaRe ca saka utkarzantyAM ca raSanAM krudDAyAM mayi pakziRe rAmA la utkarzaSabde vivftiHgnis vivftiH nis nir nissAraRe nismAraRe niScaye ca saka nizkarzati nikrazwumarTaM ni krazwumarTaM cakame kuverAt kuberAt raGuH tadayaM nizvarzaH gpra pra atiSayena karzaRe uttamatADAne uttamatAvAne saka prakarzati prakfzwaH Page a prakarzaH pADAnDaBavane pADAnTaBavane aka idaM tu mama dInasya manoBUyaH prakarzati rAmA su sam samyakarzaRe samyakrzaRe saka saNkarzaRam sam A samyaktayA dUraparyyantanayane saka samAkarzati samAkarzI kfzaDAturnyAdipAWAt dvikarmmakaH karzaRaYca BUmisaMyojanena BUmisaMyo janena balena deSAntarasaMyogAnukUlavyApArAnukUlavyApAraH tenAsya dvivyApAraboDakatayA dvikarmmakatvam grAmamajAM grAma majAM karzati ityAdO akaTitaYcetyAdi pA ajAdeH karmmatvam atra praDAne karmmaRyeva vAcye lakArAdayaH praDAne nIkfzvahAm BarttfharyyukteH ajA grAmaM kfzyate kfzya te vileKanaYca vidAraRaM tatrArTe na dvikarmmakateti BedaH samAkarzI kfza vileKane AkarzaRe ca tudA A saka aniw kfzate akfkzata akfzwa cakfze cakfzize krazwA krakzIzwa krakzyate karzaRam pranikfzate kfza vileKane AkarzaRe ca BvA para saka aniw karzati akrAkzIt akArkzIt akfkzat cakarza cakarziTa cakf ziva krazwA kfzvAt krakzyati karmmaRi kfzyate akarzi akfkzAtAm akfzAtAm kfzyaH karzaRIyaH krazwavyaH krazwA karzakaH karzI karzan kfzyamARaH krakzyan krakzyamARaH kfzwaH kfzwiH kfzwvA anukfzya karzaH karzaRam anu pUrvasTitasya padAdeH uttaravAkye yojanArTe anusanDAne anuzaNge saka anukarzati anukarzaSabde vivftiH apa hInatAkaraRe svakAlAt pUrbbatra kAle karaRe ca saka apakarzati apakarzasapiRqanam apakfzwaH apa karzaSabde vivftiH apa A nivarttane saka tamaSakyamapAkrazwuM nideSAt svargiRaH pituH razuH aBi ABimuKyena karzaRe saka aBikarzati ava aDaHsTatayA karzaRe saka avakarzati A vizayAntaratonayane saka Akarzati ud atiSAyane prADAnyaprApaRe svakAlAt uttarakAlakaraRe AkarzaRe ca saka utkarzantyAM ca raSanAM krudDAyAM mayi pakziRe rAmA la utkarzaSabde vivftiH nis nir nismAraRe niScaye ca saka nizkarzati ni krazwumarTaM cakame kuberAt raGuH tadayaM nizvarzaH pra atiSayena karzaRe uttamatAvAne saka prakarzati prakfzwaH Page a prakarzaH pADAnTaBavane aka idaM tu mama dInasya manoBUyaH prakarzati rAmA su sam samyakrzaRe saka saNkarzaRam sam A samyaktayA dUraparyyantanayane saka samAkarzati samAkarzI kfzaDAturnyAdipAWAt dvikarmmakaH karzaRaYca BUmisaMyo janena balena deSAntarasaMyogAnukUlavyApArAnukUlavyApAraH tenAsya dvivyApAraboDakatayA dvikarmmakatvam grAma majAM karzati ityAdO akaTitaYcetyAdi pA ajAdeH karmmatvam atra praDAne karmmaRyeva vAcye lakArAdayaH praDAne nIkfzvahAm BarttfharyyukteH ajA grAmaM kfzya te vileKanaYca vidAraRaM tatrArTe na dvikarmmakateti BedaH
kiYcaluka kiYcaluka kiYcaluka pu kiYcit culumpati sOtraH culumpa qu saMjYAyAM kan keMco mahIlatAKye kIwaBede ama pfzo kiYciliko pyatra amarawI
kiYcilika kiYcilika kiYcilika pu kiYcit culumpati sOtraH culumpa qu saMjYAyAM kan keMco mahIlatAKye kIwamede ama pfzo kiYciliko pyatra amarawI
kizkuparvan kizkuparvan kizkuparvan na kizkumitaM vitastimitaM hastamitaM vA parvAsya vaMSe vAzSa ikzO powagale naqA ca medi
kizkuparvvan kizkuparvvan kizkuparvvan na kizkumitaM vitastimitaM hastamitaM vA parvAsya vaMSe vA Sa ikzO powagale naqA ca medi
klib klib klib pu klapa kvip pfzo loke oM krato smara klivesmara kftaM smara yaju klibe kxptAya lokAya smara kftaM smara yaju klibe krfptAya lokAya smara mADavaH kalpate BogAya klap lokaH tasmE smara jaSAdeSa ArzaH CandasyuBayaTeti pA padAntatvAt vedadI
kliba kliba kliba pu klap kvip pfzo loke oM krato smara klive smara kftaM smara yaju klave kxptAya lokAya smara mADavaH kalpate BogAya klap lokaH tasmE smara jaSAdeSa ArzaH CandasyuBayaTeti pA padAntatvAt vedadI
klokila klokila klokia puM strI kuka ilac svanAmaKyAte pakziRi amaraH puskokilo yanmaDuraM cukUja kuma striyAm jAtitve pi ajA wAp kokilAkalaravo vanevane nUnamala nigaqo Bavizyati udBawaH avakruzwaH kokiti si ko ratidratipadezu kokilAm kumA kokilAYjuvAdinIm raGuH aNgAre pu trikA saMjYAyAM kan hayadaSaBirnajO BajajalA guru narddawakam muniguhakArRavEH kftayati vada kokilam vf ra ukte CandoBede na

koNkza koNkza koNkza pu ba va deSaBede caMkramARaM koNkaveNkawakAn deSAn BAga

kojAgara kojAgara kojAgara pu koUgirtti iti lakzmyAuktiratra kAle pfzo ASvinapOrRamAsyAm tatkftyavyavasTAdi ti ta kalpatarO brahmapurARam ASvayujyAM pOrRamAsyAM nikumBovAlukArRavAt AyAti menayA sArdDaM kftvA yudDaM sudAruRam tasmAttatra narErmArgAH svagehasya samIpataH SoDitavyAH prayatnena BUzitavyASca maRqanEH puzpArGyaPalamUlAnnasarzapaprakarEstaTA veSmAni BUzitavyAni nAnAvarRErviSezataH susnAtEranuliptESca narErBAvyaM sabAnDavEH divA tatra na BoktavyaM manuzyESca vivekeBiH strIvAlamUrKavfdDESca BoktavyaM pUjitEH surEH pUjitEH surEH pUjitasurErityarTaH pUjyASca saPalEH puzpEstaTAdvArordDaBittayaH dvAropAnte sudIptastu saMpUjyohavyavAhanaH yavAkzataGftopetEstaRqulESca sutarpitaH saMpUjitavyaH pUrRenduH payasA pAyamena ca skandaH saBAryyarudraSca taTA nandISvaromuniH gomadBiH suraBiH pUjyA CAgavadBirhutASanaH uraBravadBirvaruRogajavadBirvinAyakaH pUjyaH sASvESca revanto yaTAviBavavistarEH tataH pUjyonikumBo pi samAMsEstilataRqulEH suganDiBirvftopetEH kfSarAKyESca BUriBiH brAhmaRAn BojayitvA tu BoktavyaM mAMsavarjitam vahnipArSvagatErneyA dfzwvA krIqAH pfTagviDAH tataSca dvArodDaBittihavyavAhapUrRendusaBAryyarudraskandanandISvaramunayaH sarvapUjyAH dvArordDaBittiSabdo tra bahuvacanAntaH nandISvaromunirekaH gomatA suraBiH CAgavatA hutASanaH mezavatA varuRaH hastimatA vinAyakaH aSvavatA revantaH sarvErava nikumBaH pUjyaH mahArRave liNgapurARam ASvine pOrRamAsyAntu carejjAgaraRaM niSi kOmudI sA samAKyAtA kAryyA lokaviBUtaye kOmadyAM pUjayellakzmImindramErAvate sTitam suganDirniSi sadveSo akzErjjAgaraRaM caret taTA niSITe varadA lakzmIH kojAgarttIta BAziRI tasmE vittaM prayacCAmi akzEH krIqAM karoti yaH nArikelEScipiwakEH pitFn devAn samarccayet banDUMSca prIRayettena svayaM tadaSanoBavet atra niSIti niSITa iti cABiDAnAt rAtrikftyamidam tataSca pradozavyApinI grAhyA tiTirnaktavrate sadA pradozo stamayAdUrdDa GawikAdvayamizyate iti vatsavacanAt yaddine pradozaniSIToBayavyApinI pOrRAsI taddine kojAgarakftyam aBayavyAptyanuroDAt yadA tu pUrvadine niSITavyAptiH paradine pradozavyAptistadA paredyustatkftyam praDAnapUjAkAlavyAptyanuroDAt yadA tu pUrvvadine niSITavyAptiH paradine na pradozavyAptistadA sutarA pUrvvo dyustatkftyam ahaH sutiTayaH puRyA karmmAnuzWAnatodivA naktAdivratayoge tu rAtriyogoviSizyate iti vacanAt nArikelodakaM pItvA akzErjAgaraRaM niSi tasmE vittaM prayacCAmi kojAgartti mahItale kftyakOmudI tatrAkzakrIqA kAryyA akzakrIqAviSezaSca caturaNgaSabde vakzye yA tu kojAgare yAte ti ta rAjamArttaRqaH
kojAnara kojAnara kojAnara pu kojAgartti iti lakzmyAuktiratra kAle pfzo ASvinapOrRRapAsyAm tatkftyavyavasTAdi ti ta kalpatarO brahmapurARam ASvayujyAM pOrRamAsyAM Biku mBovAlukArRavAt AyAti senayA sArdDaM kftvA yudDaM sudAruRam tasmAttatra narErmArgAH svagehasya samIpataH SoDitavyAH prayatnena BUzitavyASca maRqanEH puzpArGya PalamUlAnnasarzapaprakarEstaTA veSmAni BUzitavyAni nA nAvarRErviSezataH susnAtEranuliptESca narErBAvyaM savA nDavEH divA tatra na BIktavyaM manuzyESca vivekeBiH strI vAlamUrKavfdDESca BoktavyaM pUjitEH surEH pUjitEH su rEH pUjitasurErityarTaH pUjyASca saPalEH puzpEstaTAdvAro rdDaBittayaH dvAropAnte sudIptastu saMpajyohavyavAhanaH yavAkzataGatopetEstaRqulESca sutarpitaH saMpUjitavyaH pUrRRenduH payasA pAyasena ca skandaH saBAryyarudraSca taTA nandISvaromuniH gomadBiH suraBiH pUjyA CAga vadBirhutASanaH uraBravadBirvvaruRogajavadBirvinAyakaH pUjyaH sASvESca revanto yaTAviBavavistarEH tataH pUjyo nikumBo pi samAMsEstilataRqulEH suganDiBirGfto petEH kfSarAKyESca BUriBiH brAhmaRAn BojayitvA tu BoktavyaM mAMsavarjitam vahnipArSvagatErneyA dfzwvA krIqAH pfTagviDAH tataSca dvArordDvaBittiha vyavAhapUrRendusaBAryyarudraskandanandISvaramunayaH sarvva pUjyAH dvArordDvaBittiSabdo tra bahuvacanAntaH nandISvaromunirekaH gomatA suraBiH CAga vatA hutASanaH mezavatA varuRaH hastimatA vinAyakaH aSvavatA revantaH sarvvErava nikumBaH pUjyaH mahArRave mi NgapurARam ASvine pOrRRamAsyAntu carejjAgaraRaM niSi kOmudI sA samAKyAtA kAryyA lokaviBUtaye kOmadyAM pUjayellakzmImindramErAvate sTitam suganDi rniSi sadveSo akzErjjAgaraRaM caret taTA niSITe varadA lakzmIH kojAgarttIta BAziRI tasmE vittaM prayacCAmi akzEH krIqAM karoti yaH nArikelEScipiwakEH pitan devAn samarccayet banDUMSca prIRayettena svayaM tada SanoBavet atra niSIti niSITa iti cABiDAnAt rAtrikftyamidam tataSca pradIzavyApinI grAhyA tiTi rnaktavrate sadA pradozo stamayAdUrdDvaM GawikAdvayamiDyate iti vatsavacanAt yaddine pradozaniSIToBayavyApinI pOrRamAsI taddine kojAgarakftyam uBayavmAptyanuro Page b DAt yadA tu pUrbadine niSITavyAptiH paradine pradoza vyAptistadA paredyustatkftyam praDAnapUjAkAlavyAptya nuroDAt yadA tu pUrbbadine niSITavyAptiH paradine na pradozavyAptistadA sutarA pUrbbedyustatkftyam ahaHsu tiTayaH puRyAH karmmAnuzWAnatodivA naktAdivratayoge tu rAtriyogoviSizyate iti vacanAt nArikelodakaM pItvA akzErjAgaraRaM niSi tasmE vittaM prayacCAmi kojAgartti mahItale kftyakOmudI tatrAkza krIqA kAryyA akzakrIqAviSezaSca caturaNgaSabde vakzyate yA tu kojAgare yAte ti ta rAjamArttaRqaH
kokila kokila kokila puMstrI kuka ilac svanAmaKyAte pakziRi amaraH puskokilo yanmaDuraM cukUja kuma striyAm jAti tva pi ajA wAp kokilAkalaravo vanevane nUna mala nigaqo Bavizyati udBawaH avakruzwaH koki ti si kI ra tadUtipadepu kokilAm kumA kokilAmaYjuvAdinIm raGuH aNgAre pu trikA Page b saMjYAyAM kan hayadaSaBirnajO BajajalA guru nadda wakam muniguhakArRavEH kftayati vada kokilakam vf ra ukte CandoBede na
kolisarpa kolisarpa kolisarpa pu sagareRa mlecCatAM prApite kzatriyaBede udA keralaSabde harivaM vAkyamuktam kolisarpAmAhizakAstAstAH kzatriyajAtayaH vfzalatvaM parigatA brAhmaRAnAmadarSanAt BA Anu a

komalAmana komalAmana komalAmana na AsanaSabdadarSitamfgAdicarmmanirmmite AsanaBede idAnIM SfRu deveSa rahasyaM komalAsanam yogasidDiprAcArAya sidDyE carmmAsanaM tu tat rudrayA

kowaSa kowaSa kowa wI Sa pu kowyA agreRa Syati So ka lozwaBedane rstva mai mugara iti vA KyAte padArTe ratnako hrasvamaDyaH vAsukivaMSye nAgaBede pu kowiSomAnasaH pUrRaH SalaH pAlohalImakaH BA A a kAsukivaMSyoktO
kowiSa kowiSa kowi wI Sa pu kowyA agreRa Syati So ka lozwaBeda ne stra mE nugara iti vA KyAte padArTe ratnako hrasva maDyaH vAsukivaMSye nAgaBede pu kowiSomAnasaH purRRaH SalaH pAlohalImakaH BA A a kAsukivaMSyoktO
kowitIrTa kowitIrTa kowitIrTa na kowiH torTAnyatra avantikeSamahAkAlasanniDisTe tIrTaBede mahAkAlaM tatogacCet niyato nitayASanaH kowitIrTamupaspfSya hayameDaPalaM laBet BA va a paYcanadAntargate tIrTaBede ca tataH paYcanade gatvA niyatoniyatASanaH kowitIrTamupaspfSya hayameDaPalaM laBet BA a
kowitIrya kowitIrya kowitIrya na kowiH tIrTAnyatra avantikeSamahAkAlasa nniDiraye tIrTaBede mahAkAlaM tatogacCet niyato nitayASanaH kowitIrTamupaspfSya hayameDaPalaM laBet BA va a paYcanadAtargate tIrTaBede ca tataH paYcatadaM gatvA niyatoniyatASanaH kowitIrTamupa spfSya hayameDaPalaM laBet BA a
krAntisAmya krAntisAmya krAntisAmya na ta grahARAM tulyakrAntO yadyapi sarva grahARAM krAntisAmyamasti taTApi candrArkayoH krAnti sAmyasya maNgalakAryye varjjanIyatA pf upayamaSabde vistareRa darSitA krAntisAmye ca grahARAmavanatyaBAvaH sU si darSitoyaTA akzodagmaDyaBakrAnteH sAmye nAvanaterapi sU si akzAMSA uttarA ye maDyaBasya maDyalagnasya krAntyaM SAH atra maDyalagnaSabdena daSamaBAvastriBonalagnaM vA grAhyamuBayapakze pyadozaH anayostulyatve vanaternateH apiSabdAd samBavo na aBAva ityarTaH raNganATaH
krAtisAmya krAtisAmya krAtisAmya na ta grahARAM tulyakrAntO yadyapi sarvagrahARAM kAntisAmyamasti taTApi candrArkayoH krAntisAmyasya maNgalakAryye varjjanIyatA pf upayasaSabde vistareRa darSitA krAntisAmye ca grahARAmazanatyaBAvaH sU mi darSitoyaTA akzodagmaDyaBakrAnteH sAmye nAvanaterapi sU si akzAMSA uttarA ye maDyaBasya maDyalagnasya krAntyaMSAH atra maDyalagnaSabdena daSamaBAvastriBonalagnaM vA grAhyamuBayapakze pyadozaH anayostulyatve vanaternateH apiSabdAd samBavo na aBAva ityarTaH raNganATaH
krada krada krada rodane vEkalye aka AhvAne saka BvA para idit sew krandati akrandIt cakranda BAve krandyate kranditam krandi tam avyaktaSabdakaraRe akrandadagniH akrandadAgnaH stanayanniva dyOH yaju akrandat krandati visPUrjati vedadI yadakrandaH praTamaM jAyamAnaH yaju anu krandanenAnugamane saka anukrandati putram krandanenAnu yAti krandanenAnuyAti Page b aBi ABimuKyena SatrupraBfterAhvAne saka aBikrandan vfzAyase f aBikrandan ABimuKyena yudDArTaM SatrUnAhvan BA ABimuKyena SabdakaraRe aka aBikranda stanaya garBam f aBikranda BUmyaBimuKaM kranda SabdAya BA mA A AhvAnapUrvDakarodane AhvAnapUrbDakarodane saka Akrandat BImasenaM vE bA BA va a samyakakrandane samyakkrandane ca AkrandizuH saKInahvan BawwiH tadIyamAkranditamArttasADoH raGuH sam A samyagAhvAnapUrbbakakrandane hA tAta DarmmarAjeti DarmmarA jeti samAkrandanmahABaye BA mA ASra Sloya Slo ni yaTAnAmaSabdoccArame yaTAnAmaSabdoccAraRe nyakandIjjanma prabruvARo yaTAsya SabdastaTA nAmerayati vAcam niru pra stavane pra vaH spaqakrant suvitA yaH f akran stOti BA vede gaRavyatyayAt SapIluk vi viSezeRa krandane sam samyak krandane krada vEkalye BvA mvA Atma aka sew sewa GawAdi kradate akradizwa cakrade Ric kradayati yaN vede kanikradyate yaNluki yaNa luki kanikratti kanikradIti upasTe vfzaBaH kanikradat kani kradat f kanikradat SabdaM kurvan mA anu anugamane saka saMnaSeyaM kzORIranucakrade f anucakrade anacakrade anugacCati BA krada nirantaraSabdakaraRe curA aka uBa sew prAyeRANpUrbbaH Akrandayati te Acakrandat ta AkrandayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cake krada rodane vEkalye aka AhvAne saka BvA para idit sew krandati akrandIt cakranda BAve krandyate krandi tam avyaktaSabdakaraRe akrandadAgnaH stanayanniva dyOH yaju akrandat krandati visPUrjati vedadI yadakrandaH praTamaM jAyamAnaH yaju anu krandanenAnugamane saka anukrandati putram krandanenAnuyAti Page b aBi ABimuKyena SatrupraBfterAhvAne saka aBikrandan vfzAyase f aBikrandan ABimuKyena yudDArTaM SatrUnAhvan BA ABimuKyena SabdakaraRe aka aBikranda stanaya garBam f aBikranda BUmyaBimuKaM kranda SabdAya mA A AhvAnapUrbDakarodane saka Akrandat BImasenaM vE BA va a samyakkrandane ca AkrandizuH saKInahvan BawwiH tadIyamAkranditamArttasADoH raGuH sam A samyagAhvAnapUrbbakakrandane hA tAta DarmmarA jeti samAkrandanmahABaye mA ASra Slo ni yaTAnAmaSabdoccAraRe nyakandIjjanma prabruvARo yaTAsya SabdastaTA nAmerayati vAcam niru pra stavane pra vaH spaqakrant suvitA yaH f akran stOti BA vede gaRavyatyayAt SapIluk vi viSezeRa krandane sam samyak krandane krada vEkalye mvA Atma aka sewa GawAdi kradate akradizwa cakrade Ric kradayati yaN vede
