krakacavyavahAra krakacavyavahAra krakacavyavahAra pu lIlAvatyukte krakacacCedyavastunovetana jYAnArTe tatpalajYApake gaRitaBede yaTA krakacavyavahAre karaRasUtraM vfttam piRqayogadalamagramUlayordErGyasaNguRitamaNgulAtmakam dArudAraRapaTEH samAhataM zawsvarezuvihftaM karAtpmakam udAharaRam mUle naKA Ngulamito Ta nfpA Ngulo gre piRqaH SatANgulamitaM kila yasya dErGyam taddArudAraRapaTezu caturzu kiM syAdvastAtmakaM vada saKe gaRitaM drutaM me tadAkAradarSanacitram krAkaaMdAruvizamam nyAsaH piRqayoga dalaM dErGyeRa saNguRitaM dArudAraRapaTEScaturBiguRitaM zawsvarezu vihftaM jAtaM karAtmakaM gaRikzaM krakacantire karaRasUtraM sArdDavfttam Cidyate tu yadi tiryaguktavatpiRqavistftihateH PalaM tadA izwikAcitidfzaccitiKAtakrAkacavyavahftO Kalu mUlyam karmmakArajanasampratizattyA tanmfdutvakawinatvavaSena udAharaRam yadvistftirddanta BitANgulAni piRqistaTA zoqaSa yatra kAzWe Cedezu tiryyaNgavasu pracakzva kiM syAt PalaM tatra karAtmakaM me nyAsaH vistAraH piRqaH piRqavistftihatiH tadAkAracitram kA ka vyaM kA sa na n dArudAraRamArgErmavaBirhatA zawsvarezu vihftA jAtaM PalaM hastAH
krakacavyayadvAra krakacavyayadvAra krakacavyayadvAra pu lIlAvatyukte krakacacCedyavastunovetana jYAnArTe tatPalajYApake gaRitaBede yaTA krakacavyavahAre karaRasUtraM vfttam piRqayogadala magramUlayordErGyasaNguRitagaNgulAplakam dArudAraRapaTEH Page a samAhataM zawsvarezuvihftaM karAtmakam udAharaRam mUle naKA Ngulamito Ta nfpA Ngulo gre piRqaH SatANgulamitaM kila yasya dErGyam taddArudAraRapaTezu caturzu kiM syAdvastAtmakaM vada saKe gaRitaM drutaM me tadAkAradarSanacitram krAkaaMdAruvizamam nyAsaH piRqayoga dalaM dErGyeRa saNgu RitaM dArudAraRapaTEScaturBiguRitaM zawasvarezu vihfta jAtaM karAtmakaMgaRitaM krakacAntare karaRasUtraM sArdDavfttam Cidyate tu yadi tiyyapuktavatpiRqavistftihateH PalaM tadA izwikAciti dfzaccitiKAtakrAkacavyavahftO Kalu mUlyam karmmakAra janasampratipattyA tanmfdutvakaWinatvavaSena udAharaRam yadvistftirddanta mitANgulAni piRqistaTA zoqaSa yatra kAzWe Cedezu tiryyaNgavasu pracakzvakiM syAt PalaM tatra karAtmakaM me nyAsaH vistAraH piRqaH piRqavistftihatiH tadAkAracitram kA ka vyaM kA zWi sa na n dArudAraRamArgErnavaBirhatA zaw svarezu vihftA jAtaM PalaM hastAH
kranda kranda kranda nirantaraSabdakaraRe curA aka uBa sew prAyeRAN pUrbbaH Akrandayati te Acakrandat ta AkrandayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cake
kratu kratu kratu pu kf katu yUpasahite somasADye yajYe saMka lpe brahmaRomAnase putre fziBede DESvadevaBede indri yezu ca vizRO tasya sarvvayajYamayatvena sayUpayajYa rUpatvamapIzwaM yaTAha yajYaIjyo mahejyaSca kratuH satraM satAM gatiH vizRusa sarvvayajYasvarUpatvAt yajYaH yUpasahi toyajYaH kraturiti BAzyam tena kratuSabdasya yUpasa hitayajYaboDakatA ataeva tattadyAge yUpaviSezAH Sata paTavrAhmaRAdO uktAH tatra somasADyayAgASca traya kratavaH trIn kratUnanvAhAgneyamuzasyamASvinam SrutO i tya gneyaH kratuH aTozasyaH aTASvinaH ASva sO sUtrezu darSitAH anye pi kratadI vedezu darSitAstataevA vagamyAH saMkalpaSca kAmanADInaH cittavfttiBedaH yaToktam kAmaH kratuH karmma janmetyevamezAM kramoBavet puMsoyA vizayApekzA sa kAma iti BaRyate saeva vardDamAnaScet kratutvaM pratipadyate saceratiSayaH kAmye vizaye kraturIryyate ityukte rucerADikye ca prajYAyAM niGa stavanAdikarmmaRi ca puruzwuta kratvA naH sasti f kratvA karmmaRA stutyAdihetunA BA kratunAmA muniSca bra hmaRomAnasAH putrA viditAH zaRmaharzayaH marIcira tryaNgirArasO pulastyaH pulahaH kratuH BA A a uktaH kratorapi kriyABAryyA vAliKilyAnasUyata fzIn zazwisahasrARi jvalato brahmatejasA BAga tadvaMSAdyuktam sasarja sfzwiM tadrUpAM srazwumicCan prajA patIn marIcimatryaNgirasO pulasvyaM pulahaM kratum vasizWaYca mahAtejAH so sfjat sapta mAnasAn harivaM a viSvedevASca trayodaSa yaTA AtmArTe cAsfjat puttrAn lokakartFn pitAmahaH viSve prajAnAM patayo yeByo lokA viniHsftAH viSveSaM praTamaM nAma mahAtapasamAtmajam sarvvASramapadaM puRya nAmnA Page a DarmmaMsa sfzwavAn dakzaM marIcimatriYca pulastyaM pulahaM kratum vaSizWaM gOtamaYcEba BfgumaNgirasaM manum aTa rtaBUtA ityete KyAtAScEva maharzayaH trayodaSa sutA yezAM vaMSA vE saMpratizWitAH harivaM a jawADareRa tu viSvedevA daSa smftA ityuktam gaRade vatA Sabde tanmUlaM vakzyate kalpaBedAdavirudDam tatra prajYA niScayaH aDyavasAyaH yaTAha aTa Kalu kratumayaH puruzo yaTAkraturasmi lloke puruzo Bavati taTetaH pretya Bavati sa kratuM kurvIta CA u kaTamupAsIta sa kratuM kurvIta kraturniScayo DyavasAyaSca evameva nAnyaTeti avicalaH pratyayastaM kratuM kurvItopAsI tetyanena vyavahitena sambanDaH kiM punaH kratukaraRena karttavyaM prayojanam kaTaM vA kratuH karttavyaH kratukaraRaM DABipretArTasADanaM kaTam ityasyArTasya pratipAdanArTamaTe tyAdigranTaH aTa Kalviti hetvarTaH yasmAt kratumayaH kratupAyo DyavasAyAtmakaH puruzo jIvaH yaTAkraturyA dfSaH kraturasya so yaM yaTAkraturyaTADyavasAyo yAdfNni Scayo smi lloke jIvanniha puruzo Bavati taTeto smAdde hAt pretya mftvA Bavati kratvanurUpaPalAtmako BavatItyarTaH evaM hyetacCAstrato dfzwam yaM yaM vApi smaran BAvaM tyajatyante kalevaramityAdi yata evaM vyavasTA SAstradf zwA taH sa evaM jAnan kratuM kurvvIta yAdfSaM kratuM vakzyA mastam yata evaM SAstraprAmARyAdupapadyate kratvanurUpaM PalamataH sa kattevyaH kratuH BA AzAQamAse cAturmAsyAdiyAgAramBakatvAt tasya taTAtvam vAjAya svAhA prasavAya svAhA pijAya svAhA kratape svAhA vasave svAhA harpataye svAhAhne mugDAya svAhA mugDAya vEnaMSinAya svAhA vinaMSina AntyAyanAya svA hAntyAya BOvanAya svAhA Buvanasya pataye svAhAGipataye svAhA prajApataye svAhA yaju vAjAdIni cEtrA dimAsAnAM nAmAni tannAma gfhItvA hotavyamityarTaH annaprAcurdyAccEtro nnarUpaH prasavAyAnujYArUpAya jalakrI qAdO aByanujYAdAnAt prasavo vESAKaH apijAya apsu jAyata ityapijaH saptaByA aluk jalakrIqArata tvAdapijo jyEzWaH kratave yAgarUpAya cAturmAsyAdi yAgaprAcuryyAt kraturazAQaH vedado
kratvIKara kratvIKara kratvIKara na kratunA sTApitamISvaraliNgam kASyAm kratunA muninA sTApite SivaliNgaBede varaRAyAstawe ramye kratvISvaramanuttamam vASizWamISvaraYcEva laBate vasatiMtviha kASI a
kratvISvara kratvISvara kratvISvara na kratutA sTApitamISvaraliNgam kASyAm kratunA muninA sTApite SivaliNgamede varaRAyAstawe ramye kratvISvaramanuttamam vASizWamISvaraYcEva laBate vasa tiMtviha kASI a
kraviRa kraviRa kraviRa tri kru vA izRuc kravyAde rAkzasAdO kravyAt kravizRurviyinotu vfkRam f
kravizRa kravizRa kravizRa tri kru bA izRuc kravyAde rAkzasAdO kravyAt kravizRurvivinotu vfkRam f
krayaSIrza krayaSIrza krayaSIrza na kapiSIrza pfzo kapiSIrze trikA
krayaSorza krayaSorza krayaSorza na kapiSIrza pfzo kapiSIrze trikA
krimiGa krimiGa krimiGa pu krimiM hanti hana wak viqaNge ramAnATaH kraminASake tri striyAM NIp sA ca somarAjyAM strI Sabdaca
krimiGna krimiGna krimiGna pu krimi hanti hana Wak viqaNgeg mAnATaH kriminASake tri striyAM NIp sA ca momarAjyAM strI Sabdaca
kroqaparRI kroqaparRI kroqaparRI kroqe kaRwakamaDye parRaM yasyAH gOrA NIz kaRwAkArikAyAm Sabdaca
kroqaparRRI kroqaparRRI kroqaparRRI kroqe kaRwakamaDye parRRaM yasyAH gOrA NIz kaRwakArikAyAm Sabdaca
krozwakameKalA krozwakameKalA krozwakameKalA strI krozwukasya meKalevAstyasyAH ac pfSniparRyAM cAkuliyA ratnamA
krozwakarRRa krozwakarRRa krozwakarRRa pu grAmaBede so Bijano sya takzaSilA aY krOzWukarRRa pitrAdikrameRa tadgrAmavAsini striyAM NIp
krozwakarRa krozwakarRa krozwakarRa pu grAmaBede so Bijano sya takzaSilA aY krOzwukarRa pitrAdikrameRa tadgrAmavAsini striyAM NIp
krozwukameKalA krozwukameKalA krozwukameKalA strI krozwukasya meKalevAstyasyAH ac pfSniparRyAM cAkuliyA ratnamA
krutu krutu krutu pu kf katu yUpasahite somasADye yajYe saNkalpe brahmaRomAnase putre fziBede vESvadevaBede indriyezu ca vizRO tasya sarvvayajYamayatvena sayUpayajYarUpatvamapIzwaM yaTAha yajYaijyo mahejyaSca kratuH satraM satAM gatiH vizRu sa sarvvayajYasvarUpatvAt yajYaH yUpasahitoyajYaH kraturiti BAzyam tena kratuSabdasya yUpasahitayajYaboDakatA ataeva tattadyAge yUpaviSezAH SatapaTabrAhmaRAdO uktAH tatra somasADyayAgASca traya kratavaH trIn kratUnanvAhAgneyamuzasyamASvinamSrutO ityagneyaH kratuH aTozasyaH aTASvinaH ASva SrO sUtrezu darSitAH anye pi kratavovedezu darSitAstataevA vagamyAH saMkalpaSca kAmanADInaH cittavfttiBedaH yaToktam kAmaH kratuH karmma janmetyevamezAM kramoBavet puMsoyA vizayApekzA sa kAma iti maRyate sa eva vardDamAnaScet kratutvaM pratipadyate ruceratiSayaH kAmye vizaye kraturIryyate ityukte rucerADikye ca prajYAyAM niGa stavanAdikarmmaRi ca puruzwuta kratvA naH sa sti f kratvA karmmaRA stutyAdihetunA BA kratunAmA muniSca brahmaRomAnasAH putrA viditAH zaRmaharzayaH marIciratryaNgirArasO pulastyaH pulahaH kratuH BA A a uktaH kartorapi kriyABAryyA vAliKilyAnasUyata fzin zazwihasrARi jvalato brahmatejasA BAga tadvaMSAdyuktam sasarja sfzwiM tadrUpAM srazwumicCan prajApatIn marIcimatryaNgirasO pulastryaM pulahaM kratum vasizWaYca mahAtejAH so sfjat sapta mAnasAnasAnharivaM a viSvedavASca trayodaSa yaTA AtmArTecAsfjat puttrAn lokakartFn pitAmahaH viSve prajAnAM patayo yeByo lokA viniH sftAH viSveSaM praTamaM nAma mahAtapasamAtmajam sarvvASramapadaM puRyaM nAmnA DarmmasaM sfzwavAn dakzaM marIcimatriYca pulastyaM pulahaM kratum vaSizWaM gOtamaYcEva BfguNgirasaM manum aTarvaBUtA ityete KyAtAScEva maharzayaH trayodaSa yezAM vaMSA vE saMpratizWitAH harivaM a jawADareRa tu viSvedevA daSa smftAM ityuktam gaRadevatA Sabde tanmUlaM vakzyate kalpaBedAdavirudDamtatra prakzA niScayaH aDyavasAyaH yaTAha aTa Kalu kratumayaH puruzo yaTAkraturasmilloke puruzo Bavati taTetaH protya Bavati sa kratu kurvIta CA u kaTamupAsIta sa kratuM kurvIta kraturniScayo DyavasAyaSca evameva nAnyaTeti avicalaH pratyayastaM kratuM kurvItopAsItetyanena vyavahitena sambanDaH kiM punaH kratukaraRena karttavyaM prayojanam kaTaM vA kratuH karttavyaH kratukaraRaM vABipretArTasADanaM kaTam ityaRyarTasya pratipAdanArTamaTetyAdigranTaH aTa KalvitirahetvarTaH yasmAt krumayaH kratupAyo DyavasAyAtmakaH puRzo jIvaH yaTAkraturyAdfSaH kraturasya so yaM yaTAkraturyayADyavasAyo yAdfNniScayo smizlloke jIvanniha puruzo Bavati taTeto smAddehAt pretya mftvA Bavati kratvadurUpaPalAtmako BavatItyarTaH evaM hyetacCAstrato dfzwam yaM yaM vApi smaran BAvaM tyajatyante kalevaramityAdi yata evaM vyavarayA SAstradfzwA taH sa evaM jAnan kratuM kurvvIta yAdfSaM kratuM vakzyAmastam yata evaM SAstraprAmARsyAdupapadyate kratvanurUpa PalamataH sa karttavyaH kratuH BA AzAQamAse cAturmAsyAdiyAgAramBakatvAt tasya taTAtvam DAjAya svAhA prasavAya svAhA pijAya svAhA kratave svAhA vasave svAhA harpataye svAhAhne mugDAya svAhA mugDAya vEnaMSinAya svAhA vinaMSina AtyAyAnAya svAhAntyAya BOvanAya svAhA Buvanasya pataye svAhADipataye svAhA prajApartaye svAhA yaju vAjAdIni cEtAdimAsAnAM nAmAni tavAm gfhItvA hotavyaBityarTaH annaprAcuryyAccEtro nnarUpaH prasavAyAgnujYArUpAya jalakrIqAdO aByanujYAdAnAt prasavo vESAKaH apijAya apsu jAyataH ityapijaH saptamyA aluk jalakrIqAratatvAdapijo jyEzWaH kratave yAgarUpAyA cAturmAsyAdi yAgapAcarvyAt kraturazAQaH vedadI
kuRa kuRa kuRa ABAzaRe mantraRe ca ada cu uBa saka sew kuRayati te acukuRat ta pranikuRayati kuRa upakaraRe Sabde ca tudA para saka sew kuRati akoRIt ako RIt pranikuRati upakaraRaM dAnAdinA pozaRam kuRa ABAzaRe mantraRe ca ada cu uBa saka sew kuRayati te acukuRat ta pranikuRayati kuRa upakaraRe Sabde ca tudA para saka sew kuRati ako RIt pranikuRati upakaraRaM dAnAdinA pozaRam
kuRqAda kuRqAda kuRqAda pu BArataprasidDe parbbataBede kuRqodaH parbbatoramyo bahumUlaPalodakaH nEzaDastfzitoyatra jalaM Sarmma ca labDavAn BA va a
kuRqoda kuRqoda kuRqoda pu BArataprasidDe parbbataBede kuRqodaHparbbatoramyo bahumUlaPalodakaH nEzaDastfzitoyatra jalaM Sarmma ca labDa vAn BA va a
kuSAmana kuSAmana kuSAmana na kuSErnirmmitamAsanam kuSanirmmite Asane kuSAsanamanantaram SrAdDakramaH tatsvarUpAdi SrA ta aTa kuSAsanam tatra goBilaH pitrye dviguRAMstu darBAn pavitrapARirdadyAdAsInaH sarvatra praSnezu paNktimUrdDanyaM pfcCati sarvAn vA sarvatrAsanezu davrBAnAstakIryyeti pitrye pitrarTadAne tatrAdO jalagaRqUzaprakzepaH tatodvi guRaBugnakuSapatratrayaM pitFRAmAsanArTaM dadyAt etacca AdO viSvadevapakze kftvA pitfpakze karttavyaM taTA ca yAjYavalkyaH pARiprakzAlanaM dattvA uzantastvetyfcA pitFn prakzAlyate neneti prakzAlanaM jalaM tena tURIM brAhmaRapARO jalaM dattvA vizwarArTamAsanArTamiti dIpakalikA kuSAn fjUna dadyAt vyaktamAhASvalAyanaH apaH pradAya darBAg dviguRaBugnAnAsanaM pradAya iti AsanamityanenopaveSanIyatvapratIte rhaste tadadAnaM pratIyate taTAca kArzRAjiniH darBAMScEvAsane dadyAnna tu pARO kadAcana pitfdevamanuzyARAmevaM tfptirhi SASvatI atra pitfdevamanuzyeByo pi kuSAsanadAnaM pratIyate atra dEvikatvena kuSAnAM fjutvamiti viSezaH devapitfviprayordakziRAvAmayoH kuSAsanasTApanamAha SrAdDasUtraBAzyaDftavacanam pitFRAmAsanaM dadyAdvAmapASve kuSAn suDIH dakziRe cEva devAnAM sarvatra SrardDakarmmasu koH pfTivyA SAsane ca abrAhmaRo pi kuSAsanasahitaH
kuSAsana kuSAsana kuSAsana na kuSErnirmmitamAsanam kuSanirmmite Asane kuSAsanamanantaram SrAdDakramaH tatsvarUpAdi SrA ta aTa kuSAsanam tatra goBilaH pitrye dviguRAMstu darBAn pavitrapARirdadyAdAsInaH sarvatra praSnezu paNktimUrdDa nyaM pfcCati sarvAn vA sarvatrAsanezu darvBAnAstIryyeti pitrye pitrarTadAne tatrAdO jalagaRqUzaprakzepaH tatodvi guRaBugnakuSapatratrayaM pitFRAmAsanArTaM dadyAt etacca AdO viSvadevapakze kftvA pitfpakze karttavyaM taTA ca yAjYavalkyaH pARiprakzAlanaM dattvA uzantastvetyfcA pitFn prakzAlyate neneti prakzAlanaM jalaM tena tUzRIM brAhmaRa pARO jalaMdattvA vizwarArTamAsanArTamiti dIpaka likA kuSAn fjUna dadyAt vyaktamAhASvalAyanaH apaH pradAya darBAn dviguRaBugnAnAsanaM pradAya iti AsanamityanenopaveSanIyatvapratIte rhastaM tadadAnaM pratI yate taTAca kArzRAjiniH darBAMScEvAsane dadyAnna tu pARO kadA cana pitfdevamanuzyARAmevaM tfptirhi SASvatI atra pitfdevamanuzyeByo pi kuSAsanadAnaM pra tIyate atra dEvikatvena kuSAnAM fjutvamiti viSezaH devapitfvipravordakziRavAmayoH kuSAsanasyApanamAha SrA dDasUtraBAzyaDftavacanam pitFRAmAsanaM dadyAdvAma pArSve kuSAn suDIH dakziRe cEva devAnAM sarvatra SrAdDa karmmasu koH pfTivyA SAsane ca abrAhmaRo pi kuSAsanasahitaH
kuSalata kuSalata kuSalata pu dvi puzpavatoriva ekaSaktyA rAmasutayoH hemaca
kuSalava kuSalava kuSalava pu dvi puzpavatoriva ekaSaktyA rAmasutayoH hemaca
kuTa kuTa kuTa kleSe kozTapAqA ko TapAqA idit BvAdi Bvodi aka sew kunDati kunyati akunTIt cukunTa kunTyAt kuTa pUtiganDe divA para aka pa sew kuyyati kuTyati akoTIt pranikuTyati Rici koTayati pozyA po TA niKanane tasya Page a pUtiBAvasADanatvAttaTAtvam aprakASe deSe koTayet suSrutaH puM strI kuTa puMstrI kuTa pUtIBAve ka kunTa nizkarze ka nalopovA kuTA kanTA samAKyAtA kuTaH syAt karikambalam kuTaH kugaH kuTaH kIwaH prAtaH snAyI prAtaHsnAyI dvijaH kuTaH ityuktepvarTaBedezu ityukte zvarTaBedezu liNgaBedastu rUpaBedAdunnevaH kuTena nAmendramivendravAhanam nAgendra mivendravAhanam AkziptaketukuTasEnyagajacCalena mAGaH SataSaSca kuTAMstatra siMhalAH samupAharan BA sa a hastikambale puM strI puMstrI amaraH mahatyA kuTayAstIrRAM kuTa yAstIrRRAM pfTivIlakzaRANkayA rAmA tatra kuSe SAdvalezu yadASiSye vanAnte vanagocarA kuTAstaraRatalpezu kuTAstaraRa talpezu kiM syAt suKataraM tataH rAmA kuTa kleSe ko TapAqA idit Bvodi aka sew kunyati akunTIt cukunTa kunTyAt kuTa pUtiganDe divA para aka pa sew kuTyati akoTIt pranikuTyati Rici koTayati po TA niKanane tasya Page a pUtiBAvasADanatvAttaTAtvam aprakASe deSe koTayet suSrutaH kuTa puMstrI kuTa pUtIBAve ka kunTa nizkarze ka nalopovA kuTA kanTA samAKyAtA kuTaH syAt karikambalam kuTaH kugaH kuTaH kIwaH prAtaHsnAyI dvijaH kuTaH ityukte zvarTaBedezu liNgaBedastu rUpaBedAdunnevaH kuTena nAgendra mivendravAhanam AkziptaketukuTasEnyagajacCalena mAGaH SataSaSca kuTAMstatra siMhalAH samupAharan BA sa a hastikambale puMstrI amaraH mahatyA kuTa yAstIrRRAM pfTivIlakzaRANkayA rAmA tatra kuSe SAdvalezu yadASiSye vanAnte vanagocarA kuTAstaraRa talpezu kiM syAt suKataraM tataH rAmA
kuWAwaNga kuWAwaNga kuWAwaNga puMstrI kaWArarUpaHwaNgaH pfzo kuWAre astre jawA
kuWAwaNkf kuWAwaNkf kuWAwaNkf puM strI kaWArarUpaH waNgaH pfzo kuWAre asta jawA
kuWa kuWa kuWa Cedane sOtraH para saka sew koWati akowIt pranikoWati kuWa vEkalye gatipratiGAte Alasye aka mocane saka idit BvA mbA pa sew kuRWati akuRWIt pranikuRWati kuRWanam kuRWA kuWa pu kuWa Cedane vaYarTe karmmaRi ka vfkze amaraH kuWa Cedane sOtraH para saka sew koWati akowIt pranikoWati kuWa vEkalye gatipratiGAte Alasye aka mocane saka idit mbA pa sew kuRWati akuRWIt pranikuRWati kuRWanam kuRWA kuWa pu kuWa Cedane vaYarTe karmmaRi ka vfkze amaraH
kuYjarapiplI kuYjarapiplI kuYjarapiplI strI kuYja ropapadA pippalI SA ta gajapippalyAm rAjani gajapippalyAdayo pyatra strI
kuYjarapippalI kuYjarapippalI kuYjarapippalI strI kuYja ropapadA pippalI SA ta gaja pippalyAm rAjani gajapippalyAdayo pyatra strI
kubAhula kubAhula kubAhula puMstrI vahati ku vaha vA ulaY uzwre Sabdacandra striyAM NIz
kujap kujap kujap puM tri kutsitaM japati japa ac kutsitajapakArake tasyedam aR kOjapa tatsambanDini tri kArttena saha dvandve tasya prakftisvaraH pA
kujapa kujapa kujapa puMtri kutsitaM japati japa ac kutsitajapakArake tasyedam aR kOjapa tatsambanDini tri kArttena saha dvandve tasya prakftisvaraH pA
kukUwI kukUwI kukUwI strI koH pfTivyAH kUwo styasyAH ac gOrA NIz SAlmalIvfkze rAjani tasyA dIrGatayA BUmikUwatulya tvAttaTAtvam
kukkaravAc kukkaravAc kukkaravAc pu kukkurasyeva vAgasya sAraNgamfge rAjani
kukkuravAc kukkuravAc kukkuravAc pu kukkurasyeva vAgasya sAraNgamfge rAjani
kukkuwABa kukkuwABa kukkuwABa puMstrI kukkuwa ivABAti A BA ka kakkuwa caraRatulye sarpaBede hemaca striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
kukkuwARqa kukkuwARqa kukkuwARqa pu kukkuwyA aRqaH puMvadBAvaH kukkuwyAaRqe
kukkuwAma kukkuwAma kukkuwAma puM strI kukkuwa ivABAti A BA ka kakkuwacaraRatulye sarpaBede hemaca striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
kukkuwamastaka kukkuwamastaka kukkuwamastaka pu kukkuwasyeva mastakaM SiKA yasya cavye cE rAjani
kukkuwavrata kukkuwavrata kukkuwa wI vrata na BAdraSulkasaptamyAM karttavyavrataBede BAdre mAsi site pakze saptamyAM niyamena yA snAtvA SivaM leKayitvA maRqale ca sahAmbikam pUjayecca tadA tasyA duzprApaM nEva vidyate ti ta Bavi pu idaM kukkuwIvratamiti ti ta raGunandanaH
kukuwI kukuwI kukuwI strI koH pfTivyAH kUwo styasyAH ac gOrA NIz SAlmalIvfkze rAjani tasyA dIrGatayA BUmikUwatulyatvAttaTAtvam
kukuwamastaka kukuwamastaka kukuwamastaka pu kukkuwasyeva mastakaM SiKA yasya cavye cai rAjani
kukuwavrata kukuwavrata kukuwa wI vrata na BAdraSuklasaptamyAM karttavyavrataBede BAdre mAsi site pakze saptamyAM niyamena yA snAtvA SivaM leKayitvA maRqale ca sahAmbikam pUjayecca tadA tasyA duzprApaM nEva vidyate ti ta Bavi pu idaM kukuwIvratamiti ti ta raGunandanaH
kukwARqa kukwARqa kukwARqa pu kukkuwyA aRqaH puMvadBAvaH kukkuwyA aRqe
kulaparvata kulaparvata kulaparvata pu mAhendromalayaH sahyaH SaktimAnfkzaparvataH vinDyaSca pAriyAtraSca saptAtra kulaparvatAH vizRupu uktezu jambudvIpasTavarzasImAkArakezu mAhendrAdizu saptatu varzAcalezu parvatezu etezAM yaTA varzamaryyAdAkAritvaM taTA ilAvftaSabde Si si vAkyenoktam plakzAdidvIpezu kulAcalASca vizRupu darSitA yaTA tatra plakzadvIpe maryyAdAkArakAstezAM taTAnye varzaparvatAH saptEva tezAM nAmAni SfRuzva munisattama gomedaScEva candraSca nArado dunduBistaTA somakaH sumanAH SElo vEBrAjaScEva saptamaH SAlmale varzAcalezu ramyezu sarvezvetezu cAnaGa tatrApi parvatAH sapta vijYeyA ratnayonayaH rasABivyaYjakAstezu taTA saptEva nimnagAH kumudaSconnataScEva tftIyaSca valAhakaH droRoyatra mahOzaDyaH sa caturTo mahIDaraH kaNgaSca paYcamaH zazWo mahizaH saptamastaTA kusudvAn parvatavaraH kuSadvIpe vidrumAhvayaSElaSca dyutimAn puzpavAMstaTA kuSeSayo hariScEva saptamo mandarAcalaH varzAcalAstu saptEva tatra dvIpe mahAmune krOYcadvIpe tatrApi devaganDarvasevitAH sumanoharAH varzAcalA mahA budDo tezAM nAmAni me SfRa krOYcaSca vAmanaScEva tftIyaScAnDakArakaH caturTo haraSElaSca svaBABirBAsavannaBaH devAvft paYcamaScEva taTASvaH puRqarIkaBAj SAkadvIpe tatrApi parvatAH sapta varzavicCedakArakAH pUrbbastatrodayagirirjalADArastastaTA paraH taTA rEvatakaH SyAmastaTEvAstagirirdvijaH AmbikeyastaTAraByaH keSarI parvatottamaH tattaddvIpasTezu uktezvapi saptasu varzAcalezu puzkaradvIpe tu ekaeva mAnasottaraSElastAdfk yaToktaM BA taddvIpamaDye eka evArvAcInavarzayormaryyAdAkArako yutayojanocCrAyAyAmaH vizRu pu BAgavatayostezAM nAmaBedaH kalpaBedAdavirudDaH kulagirikulAcalavarzAcalAdayo pyatra mAhendraSuktimalayarkzakapAriyAtrAH sahyaH savinDya iha sapta kulAcalAKyAH Si si iha jambudvIpe
kulaparvvata kulaparvvata kulaparvvata pu mAhendromalayaH sahyaH SaktimAnfkzaparvataH vinDyaSca pAriyAtraSca saptAtra kulaparvvatAH vizRupu ukte zu jambudvIpasTavarzasImAkArakezu mAhendrAdizu saptasu va rzAcalezu parvatezu etezAM yaTA varzamaryyAdAkAritvaM taTA Page b ilAvftaSabde pf Si si vAkyenoktam plakzAdi dvIpezu kulAcalASca vizRupu darSitA yaTA tatra plakzadvIpe maryyAdAkArakAstezAM taTAnye varzaparvatAH saptEva tezAM nAmAni SfRuzva munisattama gomedaScEva candraSca nArado dundumistaTA somakaH sumanAH SElo vEBrAjaScEva saptamaH SAlmale varzAcalezu ramyezu sarvezvetezu cAna Ga tatrApi parvatAHsapta vijYeyA ratnayonayaH rasABi vyaYjakAstezu taTA saptEka nimnagAH kumudaSconnataScEva tftIyaSca valAhakaH droRoyatra mahOzaDyaH sa caturTo mahIDaraH kaNgaSca paYcamaH zazWo mahizaH saptamastaTA kusudvAn parvatavaraH kuSadvIpe vidrumAhvayaSElaSca dyutimAn puzpavAMstaTA kuSeSayo hariScEva saptamo mandarAcalaH varzAcalAstu saptEva tatra dvIpe mahAmune krOYcadvIpe tatrApi devaganDarvasevitAH sumanoharAH varzAcalA mahA budDe tezAM nAmAni me SfRu krOYcaSca vAmanaScEva tf tIyaScAnDakArakaH caturTo haraSElaSca svaBABirBAsava nnaBaH devAvft paYcamaScEva taTASvaH puRqarIkaBAj SAkadvIpe tatrApi parvatAH sapta varzavicCedakArakAH pUrbbastatrodayagirirjalADArastastaTA paraH taTA rEvatakaH SyAmastaTEvAstagirirdvijaH AmbikeyastaTA ramyaH ke SarI parvatottamaH tattaddvIpasTezu uktezvapi saptasu varzA calezu puzkaradvIpe tu ekaeva mAnasottaraSElastAdfk yaTAktaM BA taddvIpamaDye eka evArvA cInavarzayormaryyAdAkArako yutayojanocCrAyAyAmaH vizRupu BAgavatayostezAM nAmaBedaH kalpaBedAdavirudDaH kulagirikulAcalavarzAcalAdayo pyatra mAhendraSuktima layarkzakapAriyAtrAH sahyaH savinDya iha sapta kulAca lAKyAH Si si iha jambudvIpe
kulavarRA kulavarRA kulavarRA strI kulEH vEdyakulEH varRo guRotkIrttanaM yasyAH varRa BAve GaY ta raktatrivfti lAlateoqi rAjani
kulavarRRA kulavarRRA kulavarRRA strI kulEH vEdyakulEH varRRo guRotkIrttanaM yasyAH varRRa BAve GaY ta raktatrivfti lAlateoqi rAjani
kumBabila kumBabila kumBabi ba la na ta kumBasTe gartte antodAnto yam
kumBabita kumBabita kumBabi ba ta ta ta kumBasTe gartte antodAnto yam
kumabyA kumabyA kumabyA strI kubi yat ekArTapratipAdake viDyarTavAdAtmake vedEkadeSabrAhmaRavAkya Bede mADavaH tasmAdfcaM vA yajurvA sAma vA gATAM vA kumbyAM vA BivyAhAred vratasvADyAyAvyavacCedAya Sata brA
kumbyA kumbyA kumbyA strI kubi yat ekArTapratipAdake viDyarTavAdA tmake vedEkadeSabrAhmaRavAkya Bede mADavaH tasmAdfttaM vA yajurvA sAma vA gATAM vA kumbyAM vA BivyAhAred vratasvADyAyAvyavacCedAya Sata brA
kunAman kunAman kunAman tri kutsitaM prAtarammaRIyaM nAmAsya atikfpaRe striyAM bA qAp NIp tasyApatyaM bAhvA iY kOnAmi tadapatye puM strI tasyedam kASyA zWaYYiWO kOnAmika tatsambanDini tri zWaYi striyAM NIz YiWi wAp iduccAraRArTaH iti BedaH
kunAmat kunAmat kunAmat tri kutsitaM prAtarasmaraRIyaM nAmAsya ati kfpaRe striyAM vA qAp NIp tasyApatyaM bAhvA iY kOnAmi tadapatye puMstrI tasyedam kASyA zWaYYiWO kOnAmika tatsambanDini tri zWaYi striyAM NIz YiWi wAp iduccAraRArTaH iti BedaH
kunalin kunalin kunalin pu Izat nalo styasya ini vakavfkze trikA tasya Palezu IzannalAkAratvAttaTAtvam
kunalina kunalina kunalina pu Izat nalo stasya ini vakavfkze trikA tasya Palezu IzannalAkAratvAttaTAtvam
kuntalISIra kuntalISIra kuntalISIra na kuntala ivoSIram vAlA nAmozaDO rAjani
kuntaloSIra kuntaloSIra kuntaloSIra na kuntala ivoSIram vAlA nAmozaDO rAjani
kupa kupa kupa AcCAdane idit vA curA uBa pakze BvAdi para saka sew kumpayati te kumpati acukumpat ta akumpIt kumpayAm kumpa yAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre cukumpa prani kumpyAt kupa dyutO curA uBa aka sew kopayati te acUkupat ta kopayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre kupitaH kopaH kopanam kupitvA prakupya procuH prAYjalayo viprAH prahfzwAH kupitatvacaH BAga kupa roze divA saka pa sew kupyati irit akupat akopIt cukopa yasmin yasmin ftO ye ye dozAH kupyanti dehinAm suSru tasya tadva naM tadvavanaM SrutvA rUkzaM rUkzAkzaraM rU kzAkzaraM bahu cukopa balinAM SrezWaH BA sa a kupitakapikapolakroqatAmrastamAMsi kupitakapikapolakrAqatAmrastamAMsi udBawaH druhya kupyasi yAcake BA A a asya Arze padavyatyayo padavya tyayo pi dfSyate nandate kupyate cApi taTA huNgArayatyapi huNgAra yatyapi BA Anu a na ca kupye mahAsarpa na cAtmAnaM vigarhaye BA ba a upasargapUrbbakasya upasargapU rbbakasya tattadupasargadyotyArTaparatvam yaTA prakopaH saMkopaH atikozaH ityAdi kruDadruherzyAsUyArTAnAM yaM prati kopaH pA karmmaRaH sampradAnatA kupa AcCAdane idit vA curA uBa pakze BvAdi para saka sew kumpayati te kumpati acukumpat ta akumpIt kumpa yAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre cukumpa prani kumpyAt kupa dyutO curA uBa aka sew kopayati te acUkupat ta kopayAm baBUva Asa cakAra cakre kupitaH kopaH kopanam kupitvA prakupya procuH prAYjalayo viprAH prahfzwAH kupitatvacaH BAga kupa roze divA saka pa sew kupyati irit akupat akopIt cukopa yasmin yasmin ftO ye ye dozAH kupyanti dehinAm suSru tasya tadvavanaM SrutvA rUkzaM rU kzAkzaraM bahu cukopa balinAM SrezWaH BA sa a kupitakapikapolakrAqatAmrastamAMsi udBawaH druhya kupyasi yAcake BA A a asya Arze padavya tyayo pi dfSyate nandate kupyate cApi taTA huNgAra yatyapi BA Anu a na ca kupye mahAsarpa na cAtmAnaM vigarhaye BA ba a upasargapU rbbakasya tattadupasargadyotyArTaparatvam yaTA prakopaH saMkopaH atikozaH ityAdi kruDadruherzyAsUyArTAnAM yaM prati kopaH pA karmmaRaH sampradAnatA
kuqa kuqa kuqa vEkalye BvA mbA idit para aka sew kuRqati akuRqIt pranikuRqati kuRqaH kuqa dAhe BvA idit Atma saka sew kuRqate akuRqizwa pranikuRqate kuRqam kuqa rakzaRe curA idit uBa saka sew kuRqayati te acukuRqat ta pranikuRqayati te kuqa adane saka bAlye aka tudA para sew kuwAdi kuqati akuqIt cukoqa pranikuqati kuqapaH kuqavaH kuqa vEkalye mbA idit para aka sew kuRqati akuRqIt pranikuRqati kuRqaH kuqa dAhe BvA idit Atma saka sew kuRqate akuRqizwa pranikuRqate kuRqam kuqa rakzaRe curA idit uBa saka sew kuRqayati te acukuRqat ta pranikuRqayati te kuqa adane saka bAlye aka tudA para sew kuwAdi kuqati akuqIt cukoqa pranikuqati kuqapaH kuqavaH
kurRRaja kurRRaja kurRRaja pu kulaYjanavfkze ganDamUle rAjani
kurRaja kurRaja kurRaja pu kulaYjanavfkze ganDamUle rAjani
kurama kurama kurama pu kutsitoraso tra madyaBede bahu kutsitarasayukte tri gojihvAlatAyAM strI wAp kugatisa kutsite rase pu
kurarIrutA kurarIrutA kurarIrutA strI kurarIrutA najaBajErlagayuk ityukta lakzaRe caturddaSAkzarapAdake varRavfttaBede anaticirojJitasya jaladena cira sTitabahubudbudasya payaso nukftim mAGaH
kurarorutA kurarorutA kurarorutA strI kurarorutA najaBajErlagayuk ityukta lakzaRe caturddaSAkzarapAdake varRRavfttaBede anaticiro jJitasya jaladena cira sTitabahubudbudasya payaso nu kftim mAvaH
kurasa kurasa kurasa pu kutsitoraso tra madyaBede bahu kutsitarasa yukte tri gojihvAlatAyAM strI wAp kugatisa kutsite rame pu
kurvARa kurvARa kurvARa tri kf SAnac Bftye kArake ca Sabdaci
kurvAdi kurvAdi kurvAdi pu apatye Ryapratyayanimitte pARinyukte SabdagaRaBede sa ca gaRaH kuru gargara maNguza ajamAra raTakAra vAvadUka samrAjaH kzatriye kavi vimati kApiYjalAdi vAk vAmaraTa pitfmat indralAjI eji vAtaki dAmozRIzi gaRakAri kESori kuwa SalAkA mura puru erakA SuBra aBra darmakeSinI veRA Candasi SUrpaRAya SyAvanAya SyAvaraTa SyAvaputra satyaNkAra vaqaBIkAra mUQa SakanDu SaNku SAkam SAkin SAlIn karttf harttf ina piRqI vAmaraTasya kaRvAdivat Karavarjam kOravya
kurvadrUpa kurvadrUpa kurvadrUpa pu kurvat PalonmuKaM rUpaM yasya bOdDamatasidDe PalajananAya yogye DAnyAdO vIje sa ca vOdDamate atiSayAtnA sahakAriBirADIyate iti sTitam yaTA aTa BAvAdaBinno tiSayaH sahakAriBirADIyate ityuByupagamyate tarhi prAcInaBAvo natiSayAtmA nivfttaH anyaScAtiSayAtmA kurvadrUpAdipAdavedanIyo jAyata iti sarvadarSanasa kzaRikaSabde bOdDaSabde ca vivftiH
kurvat kurvat kurvat puM strI ku Satf carmmakAre Bftye tri viSvaH karttari tri striyAM NIp
kurvvARa kurvvARa kurvvARa tri kf SAnac Bftye kArake ca Sabdaci
kurvvAdi kurvvAdi kurvvAdi pu apatye Ryapratyayanimitte pARinyukte SabdagaRaBede saca gaRaH kuru gargara maNguza ajamAra raTakAra vAvadUka samrAjaH kzatriye kavi vimati kApiYjalAdi vAk vAma raTa pitfmat indralAjI eji vAtaki dABozRIzi gaRa kAri kESori kuwa SalAkA mura pura erakA SuBra aBra darBa keSinI veRA Candasi SUrpa RAya SyAvanAya SyAvaraTa SyAvaputra satyaNkAra vaqaBIkAra paTikAra mUQa SakanDu SaNu SAkam SAkin SAlIna karttf harttf ina piRqI vAmaraTasya kaRvAdivat Karavarjam kOravya
kurvvadrUpa kurvvadrUpa kurvvadrUpa pu kurvat PalonmuKaM rUpaM yasya bOdDamatasidDe PalajananAya yogye DAnyAdO vIje sa ca vOdDamate atiSayAtnA sahakAriBirADIyate iti sTitam yaTA aTa BAvAdaBinno tiSayaH sahakAriBirADIyate ityu Byupagamyate tarhi prAcInaBAvo natiSayAtmA nivfttaH a myaScAtiSayAtmA kurvvadrUpAdipadavedanIyo jAyata iti sarvvadarSanasaM kzaRikaSabde bOdDaSabde ca vivftiH
kurvvat kurvvat kurvvat puMstrI ku Satf carmmakAre Bftye tri viSvaH karttari tri striyAM NIp
kuvAhula kuvAhula kuvAhula puM strI vahati ku vaha vA ulaY uzwre Sabdacandra striyAM NIz
kuvEdya kuvEdya kuvEdya pu kugatisa suSrutAdyuktakriyollaNGanena svecCayA viparItAcAriRi vEdyetallakzaRadozAdikaM suSrute uktaM yaTA yastu kevalaSAstrajYaH karmma svaparinizWitaH sa muhya tyAturamprApya prApyaM BIrurivAhavam yastu karmmasu nizRAto DArzwyAcCAstrabahizkftaH sa satsu pUjAM nA pnoti baDaM cArhati rAjataH uBAvetAvanipuRAvasamarTO svakarmmaRi ardDavedaDarAvetAvekapakzAviva dvijO ozaDyo mftakalpAste SastrASanivizopamAH BavantyajYE rupahatAstasmAdetO vivarjayet CedyAdizvanaBijYo yaH snehAdizu ca karmmasu sa nihanti janaM loBAt ku vEdyo nfpadozataH yastUBayajYo matimAn sa samarTo rTa sADane Ahave karmma nirvoQuM dvicakraH syandano yaTA kuvEdye kitave SaWe cAwacAraRadAsezu dattaM Bavati nizPalam smftiH
kuvedya kuvedya kuvedya pu kugatisa suSrutAdyuktakriyollaNGanena svecCayA viparItAcAriRI vEdyetallakzaRAdozAdikaM suSrute uktaM yaTA yastu kevalaSAstrajYaH karmmasvaparinizWitaH sa muhyatyAturamprApya prApya BIrurivAhavam yastu karmmasu nizRAto baDaM DArzWyAcCAstrabahizkftaH sa satsu pUjAM nApnoti cArhati rAjataH uBAvetAvanipuRAvasamarTO svakarmmaRi ardDavedaDarAvetAvekapakzAviva dvijO ozaDyo mftakalpAste SastrASanivizopamAH BavantyajYErupahatAstasmAdetO vivarjayet CedyAdizvanaBijYo yaH snehAdizu ca karmmasu sa nihanti janaM loBAt kuvEdyo nfpadozataH yastUBayajYo matimAn sa samarTo rTasADane Ahave karmma nirvoQuM dvicakraH syandano yaTA kuvEdye kitave SaWe cAwacAraRadAsezu dattaM Bavati nizPalam smftiH
kuwwAra kuwwAra kuwwAra pu kuwwa karmmaBAvAdO bA Aran parvvate kevale ramaRe na medi kambale na viSvaH
kuwwa kuwwa kuwwa Cedane nindane ca ada curA carA uBa saka sew kuwwayati kuwwa ti te acukuwwat ta pranikuwwayati kAzWakuwwaH SilAkuwwaH kuwwa pratApane ada curA Atma saka sew kuwwayate acukuwwata kuwwa Cedane nindane ca ada carA uBa saka sew kuwwa ti te acukuwwat ta pranikuwwayati kAzWakuwwaH SilAkuwwaH kuwwa pratApane ada curA Atma saka sew kuwwayate acukuwwata
kuzWita kuzWita kuzWita tri kuzWaM jAtamasya tAra itac jAtakuzWe strI puMsayoH kuzWadozAdduzwaSoRitaSukrayoH yadapatyaM tayo rjAtaM jYeyaM tadapi kuzWitam suSrutaH
kxpta kxpta kxpta tri kfpa kta racite niyate kxptena sopAnaparTa neti raGuH Cinne ca kxptakeSanaKaSmaSruH manuH kxpta tri kfpa kta racite kalpite vihite nirmmite ca Sabdaca patiMvarA kxptavivAhavezA kxptena sopAna paTane paTena maYcam raGuH vApite ca kxptakeSanaKaSmaSrurdAntaH SuklAmbaraH SuciH manuH kxpta tri kfpa kta racite niyate kxptena sopAnaparTa neti raGuH Cinne ca kxptakeSanaKaSmaSruH manuH kxpta tri kfpa kta racite kalpite vihite nirmmite ca Sabdaca patiMvarA kxptavivAhavezA kxptena sopAna paTena maYcam raGuH vApite ca kxptakeSanaKaSmaSrurdAntaH SuklAmbaraH SuciH manuH
kzAraSraya kzAraSraya kzAraSraya na ta sArjjikaSca yavakzAraH waNkaRAkzAra eva ca kzAratrayaYca trikzAram kzAratritayameva ca rAjani ukte kzaradravyatraye
kzAratraya kzAratraya kzAratraya na ta sArjjikaSca yavakzAraH waNkaRakzAraeva ca kzAratrayaYca trikzAram kzAratritayameva ca rAjani ukte SAradravyatraye
kzIrAbDija kzIrAbDija kzIrAbDija pu kzIrAbDO jAyate jana qa candre la kzmyAM strI amftAdO yaTAyogyaliNgatA mOktike sAmu dralavaRe na medi yaTA BagavatA vrahman maTitaH kzIra sAgaraH ityupakrame BAga a tezAmumpattirdarSitA yaTA tannAgA jagfhuH sarve tacCezaM SaNkaro grahIt nArA yaRAjYayA tena nAlakaRWatvamApnuvAn ErAvataSca nA gendro hayaScoYcEHSravAH punaH dvitIyAvarttanAdrAjannut pannAviti naH Srutam tftIyAvarttane psarogaRo jAtaH suSoBanaH caturTAt pArijAtaSca utpannaH sa mahA taruH paYcamAt himagustasmAt utTitaH kzIrasAgarAt taM BavaH SirasA Datte nArIva svastikaM nfpa nAnA Page a nAviDAni ratnAni divyAnyABaraRAni ca kzIrodaDestU tTitAni ganDarvASca sahasraSaH etAn dfzwvA tadotpannA natyAScaryyasamanvitAH aBavan jAtaharzAste tatra sarve surAsurAH dEvapakze tato meGAH samyagvarzanti saMsTitAH kfzRAjYayA tu vAyustu suKaM vAti surAn prati viza niHSvAsavAtena vAsukeScArkatApanAt nistejaso Ba van dEtyAnirvIryASca mahAmate tataHSrIrutyitA tasmAt kzIrodAdDftapaNkajA viBrAjamAnA rAjendra diSaH sarvAH svatejasA tatastIrTodakEHsnAtA divyava trEralaNkftA divyagagDAnulepEstu sumanoBiH supajitA devapakzaM samA sAdya sTitA kzaRamarindama harivakza TalaM prAptAtataH sA kamalAlayA tato mftaDawaM pUrRaM gfhItvA payaso niDeH DanvantariH samuttasTO
kzIrAbDitanayA kzIrAbDitanayA kzIrAbDitanayA strI ta lakzmyAM tasyAstajjAtatvAttaTAtvam candre pu kzIrAbDijaSabde dfSyam
kzIrAbDitanaya kzIrAbDitanaya kzIrAbDitanaya strI ta lakzmyAM tasyAstajjAtatvA ttaTAtvam candre pu kzIrAbDijaSabde dfSyam
kzIrabDija kzIrabDija kzIrabDija pu kzIrAbDO jAyate jana qa candre lakzmyAM strI amftAdO yaTAyogyaliNgatA mOktike sAmudralavaRe na medi yaTA BagavatA brahman maTitaH kzIrasAgaraH ityupakrame BAga a tezAmutpattirdarSitA yaTA tannAgA jagfhuH sarve tacCezaM SaNkaro grahIt nArAyaRAjYayA tena nIlakaRWaptamAptavAn ErAvataSca nAgendro hayaScoccEH SravAH punaH dvitIyAvarttanAdrAjannutpannAviti naH Srutam tftIyAvarttane psarogaRo jAtaH suSoBanaH caturTAt pArijAtaSca utpannaH sa mahAtaruH paYcamAt himagustasmAt utTitaH kzIrasAgarAt taM BavaH SirasA Datte nArIva svastikaM nfpa nAnAnAviDAni ratnAni divyAnyABaraRAni ca kzIrodaDestUtTitAni ganDarvASca sahasraSaH etAn dfzwvA tadotpannA natyAScaryyasamanvitAH aBavan jAtaharzAste tatra sarve surAsurAH dEvapakze tato meGAH samyagvarzanti saMsTitAH kfzRAjYayA tu vAyustu suKaM vAti surAn prati vizaniHSvAsavAtena vAsukeScArkatApanAt nistejaso Bavan dEtyAnirvIryASca mahAmate tataH SrIrutTitA tasmAt kzIrodAdDftapaNkajA viBrAjAnAnA rAjendra diSaH sarvAH svatejasA tatastIrTodakEH snAtA divyavattrEralaNkftA divyagagDAnulepEstu sumanoBiH supUjitA devapakzaM samAsAdya sTitA kzaRamarindama harivakza sTalaM prAptA tataH sA kamalAlayA tato mftaGawaM pUrRaM gfhItvA payasoniDeH DanvantariH samuttasTO
kzIrakaYcukI kzIrakaYcukI kzIrakaYcukI strI kzIraM kaYcuka miva tvagasya kzIrISa vfkze ratnamA
kzIrakaYcukO kzIrakaYcukO kzIrakaYcukO strI kzIraM kaYcuka miva tvagasya kzIrISa vfkze ratnamA
kzIraparRRin kzIraparRRin kzIraparRRin pu kzIrayuktaM parRRamastyasya ini arkavfkze rAjani
kzIraparRin kzIraparRin kzIraparRin pu kzIrayuktaM parRamastyasya ini arkavfkze rAjani
kzIratEla kzIratEla kzIratEla na kzIrapakvaM tElam suSrutokte tElaBede drIRenakvATya pAdAMSaSizwamavatAryya parisrAvya tElenonmiSrya punaragnAvaDiSrezyet tatastElaM kzIrAnugatamavatAryya SItIBUtamaBimaTnIyAttatra yaH sneha uttizWottamAdAya maDurOzaDasahAkzIrayuktaM vipacedetat kzIratElamarditAturARAM pAnAByaNgAdizUpayojyam tElahInaM vA kzIrasapiraM kzatarpaRamiti
kzIratela kzIratela kzIratela na kzIrapakvaM tElam suSrutokte tElaBede droRenakvATya pAdAMSaSizwamavatAryya parisrAvya tElenonmiSrya punaragnAvaDi Srayet tatastElaM kzIrAnugatamavatAyya SItIBUtamaBimaTanI yAttatra yaH mneha uttizWettamAdAya maDurOzaDasahAkzIrayu ktaM vipacedetat kzIratElamarditAturAgAM pAnAByaNgAdizUpa yojyam tElahInaM vA kzIrasapira kzatarpaRamiti
kzaRArAmin kzaRArAmin kzaRArAmin puM strI kzaRekzaRe ramate rama Rini pArAvate SabdamA
kzaRarAmina kzaRarAmina kzaRarAmina puMstrI kzaRekzaRe ramate rama Rini pArAvate SabdamA
kzataviDvaMsin kzataviDvaMsin kzataviDvaMsin pu kzavaM viDvaMsayati vi Dvansa Ric Ri ni ta vfdDadArakavfkze Sabda ca
kzataviDvasin kzataviDvasin kzataviDvasin pu kzataM viDvaMsayati vi Dvansa Ric Rini ta vfdDadArakavfkze Sabdaca
kzattrabakanDu kzattrabakanDu kzattrabakanDu pu kzattruM rAzwraM banDurivAsya kzatriye brahAmaRaM kuSalaM pfcCet kzattrabanDumanAmayam A dvAviMSAt kzattrabanDorA catuviMSaterviSaH manuH kzattrasya banDuriva kzattriyatulye apakfzwakzattriye kzattrabanDuH sacAnAryyo rAmaH paramadurmmatiH rAmA la a
kzattrabanDu kzattrabanDu kzattrabanDu pu kzattraM rAzwraM banDurivAsya kzatriye brAhmaRaM ku SalaM pfCet kzattrabanDumanAmayam A dvAviMSAt kza ttrabanDoRa catuviMSaterviSaH manuH kzattrasya banDuriva kzattriyatulye apakfzwakzattriye kzattrabanDuH sacAnAryyo rAmaH paramadurmmatiH rAmA la a

kzitiBft kzitiBft kzitiBft pu kzitiM biBartti DArayati pAlayati Bf DAraRa pozaRayoH kvip BUDare parvate kzitiBfdiva kzitikampakIrRaNkaNgaH BawwiH mahIpAle rAjani aDunA DanEH kzitiBfto tiBftAH kirA BUBfdAdayo pyatra pramaTitaBUBftaH pratipadaM maTitasya BfgaM mahIBftA mAGaH
kzitiDardDana kzitiDardDana kzitiDardDana tri kzitiM vardDayati vfDa Ric lyu mfte Save trikA karomi kzitivardDanaB BawwiH

kzuBa kzuBa kzuBa saNkocane BvA Atma saka hew lfdit xdit kzoBate akzuBat cukzuBekzoByam kzoBaH kzoBaRam kzoBI tAnasO nApicAkzuBat nApi Page b cAkzuBat nAkzuBadrAkzasoBrAtuH BawwiH kzubDaH kzuBitaH kzubDatoyA mahAvegAH SvamamAnA ivASugAH SvamamAnAivASugAH BA va a kzuBitAH sAgarAH sarvve rAmA bA sa cukzuBe dvizatAM manaH raGuH yadetadAdityasya maDye kzoBata iva CA u kzoBamARaH aNgacAlane kzuBa aNga cAlane vA divA kyrA aka sew kzuByati kzuBnAti kzu BrAti akzoBIt kzuBitaH kzuByanti prasaBamahovi nApi hetoH mAGaH kzuBnAtItyatra kzuBAna kzuBrAtItyatra kzuBrA na Ratvam prAdyupasargapUrvvakastattaGotyArTayukte prAdyupasargapUrvvakastattadvotyArTayukte kzoBe kzuBa tri kzuBa ka kzoBake pravarttake ca maWarAruRadaRqAdyAMstAMstAn maWarAruRada RqAdyAMstAMstAn vande SanikzuBAn Sanikzu BAn BA va a aSanikzuBAn aSa nikzuBAn tatpravarttakAn nIlaka sUryyapArizadaBede strI kzuBayA sahitA mEtrI yAScAnyABUtamAtaraH tatrEva kzuBAnigrahAnuprakarttrI kzuBA nigrahAnuprakarttrI devatA lIlaka kzuBa saNkocane BvA Atma saka hew xdit kzoBate akzuBat cukzuBekzoByam kzoBaH kzoBaRam kzoBI tAnasO nApi Page b cAkzuBat nAkzuBadrAkzasoBrAtuH BawwiH kzubDaH kzuBitaH kzubDatoyA mahAvegAH SvamamAnAivASugAH BA va a kzuBitAH sAgarAH sarvve rAmA bA sa cukzuBe dvizatAM manaH raGuH yadetadAdityasya maDye kzoBata iva CA u kzoBamARaH kzuBa aNga cAlane vA divA kyrA aka sew kzuByati kzu BrAti akzoBIt kzuBitaH kzuByanti prasaBamahovi nApi hetoH mAGaH kzuBrAtItyatra kzuBrA na Ratvam prAdyupasargapUrvvakastattadvotyArTayukte kzoBe kzuBa tri kzuBa ka kzoBake pravarttake ca maWarAruRada RqAdyAMstAMstAn vande Sanikzu BAn BA va a aSa nikzuBAn tatpravarttakAn nIlaka sUryyapArizadaBede strI kzuBayA sahitA mEtrI yAScAnyABUtamAtaraH tatrEva kzuBA nigrahAnuprakarttrI devatA lIlaka
kzuD kzuD kzuD buBukzAyAM divA para saka aniw xdit kzuDyati akzuDat cukzoDa kzut kzuDA kzuDitaH kzuDitvA kzuDyadByovaya AsutidAH f mA kzuDanmA ruzat aTa kzuDyanto pyaGasan vyAlA kzuDitvA patriBirvanam halantatvAt vA wAp wAz kzuDApyatra strI kzuDArttaH yA devo devI sarvaBUtezu kzuDArUpeRa kzuDA rUpeRa saMsTitA devImA kzuDA ca prARinAM svABAvikaduH KaheturyaToktaM svABA vikaduHKaheturyaToktaM suSrute svABAvikAH kzutpipAsAjarAmftyunirdrA KABAvikAH kzut pipAsAjarAmftyunidrA praBftayaH iyaYca prARaDarmmaH pARaDarmmaH yaTAha SA ti buBukzA ca pipAsA ca prARasya manasaH spftO smftO SokamohO SarIrasya jarAmftyU zaqUrmmayaH kzuDA kzuDa kAryyARi yaTA vyADayo nirjitAH sarve kzuDayA nfpasattama kuRqalI mukuwI sragvI taTEvAlaNkfto naraH kzuDArtto na virAjeta virA jeta pretavattfzito nfRAm strIratnaM viviDAn BogAn vastrARyABaraRAni ca na cecCati naraH kiYcit kzuDayA kaluzIkftaH yaTA BUmigataM toyaM raviraSmiBiH Suzyati SarIrasTastaTA DAtuH Suzyate jAWarAgninA na SfRoti na cAGrAti cakzuzA na ca kzuDa kzuDa kzuDa buBukzAyAM divA para saka aniw lfdita kzuDyati akzuDat cukzoDa kzut kzuDA kzuDitaH kzuDitvA kzuDyadByovaya AsutidAH f mA kzuDanmAruzat aTa kzuDyanto pyaGasan vyAlA kzuDitvA patriBirvanam BawwiH kzuDAjAtAsya tArakA itac kzuDita saMjAtakzuDe tri

kzuRa kzuRa kzuRa kzu vak arizwavfkze Sabdaca kzuRa pu kzuda kta aByaste vihate cUrRIkfte ca jawA aBIkzRamakzuRatayA tidurgamam kzuRAM yadantaH karaRena vfkzAH kzuRaM kzaRaM yadubalErdivamAtitAMsuH iti ca mAGaH reKAmAtramapi kzuRAt raGuH kzuRaBinnavipannakEH BawwiH kzu nak arizwavfkze Sabdaca kzuRa pu kzu nak arizwavfkze Sabdaca

kzupa kzupa kzupa made sO pa aka sew kzopati akzopIt cukzopa sa savfkzakzupalataH BA A a kzupa pu kzupa ka kzu pak vA hrasvaSAKASiPe vfkze amaraH vAsudevasya satyaBAmAyAM satyaBAmAyA garBajAtaputraBede jajYire matyaBAmAyAM BAnurBIparaTaH satyaBAmAyAM BAnurBImaraTaH kzupaH hariva hariba a ikzvAkupitari rAjaBede ca pu AsIt kftayuge tAta manurdaRqaDaraH praBuH tasya putro mahAbAhuH prasanDiriti prasa nDiriti viSrutaH prasanDeraBavat putraH kzupa ityeva saMjYitaH kzupasya putra ikzvAkuH BA ASva a dvArakApaScimasTe dvAra kApaScimasTe parvataBede baBO rEvatakaH SElo ramyasAnuguhAjiraH pUrvasyAM diSi lakzmIvAn maRikAYcanatoraRaH dakziRasyAM latAvezwaH la tAvezwaH paYcavarRo virAjate indraketupratIkASaH paScimasyAM paSci masyAM taTA kzupaH hari a kzupa made sO pa aka sew kzopati akzopIt cukzopa sa savfkzakzupalataH BA A a kzupa pu kzupa ka kzu pak vA hrasvaSAKASiPe vfkze amaraH vAsudevasya satyaBAmAyA garBajAtaputraBede jajYire satyaBAmAyAM BAnurBImaraTaH kzupaH hariba a ikzvAkupitari rAjaBede ca pu AsIt kftayuge tAta manurdaRqaDaraH praBuH tasya putro mahAbAhuH prasa nDiriti viSrutaH prasanDeraBavat putraH kzupa ityeva saMjYitaH kzupasya putra ikzvAkuH BA ASva a dvAra kApaScimasTe parvataBede baBO rEvatakaH SElo ramyasAnuguhAjiraH pUrvasyAM diSi lakzmIvAn maRikAYcanatoraRaH dakziRasyAM la tAvezwaH paYcavarRo virAjate indraketupratIkASaH paSci masyAM taTA kzupaH hari a
kzura kzura kzura vileKane tudA para saka sew kzurati akzorIt cukzora cu kzora kzuraH kzura pu kzura ka kzu rak vA nApitAstre paSvAdInAM SaPe Kura amarawIkAyAM svAmI kokilAkze amaraH gokzure go kzure medi mahApiRqItake bARe vARe ca rAjani KawwAdipAdukayAm KawwA dipAdukayAm DaraRiH CedayellavaSaH kzureH kzuraH manuH saMDAya Danuzi kzuram rA A sa kzureRa SitaDAreRa cakarttAsya SarAsanam rAmA la a kzura vileKane tudA para saka sew kzurati akzorIt cu kzora kzuraH kzura pu kzura ka kzu rak vA nApitAstre paSvAdInAM SaPe Kura amarawIkAyAM svAmI kokilAkze amaraH go kzure medi mahApiRqItake vARe ca rAjani KawwA dipAdukayAm DaraRiH CedayellavaSaH kzuraH manuH saMDAya Danuzi kzuram rA A sa kzureRa SitaDAreRa cakarttAsya SarAsanam rAmA la a
kzvida kzvida kzvida mocane saka sahe snehe aka BvA A sew kzvedate lfdit xdit akzvidat YIdit kzviRaH kzviRRaH Adit kzvisAM kzvaditaM kzveditaM tena kzvida kUjane divA para aka sew kzvidyati irit akzvedIt akznedIt akzvidat Adit kzviRaM AditkzviRRaM kzveditaM tena kzvida mocane saka snehe aka BvA A sew kzvedate xdit akzvidat YIdit kzviRRaH Adit kzvisAM kzveditaM tena kzvida kUjane divA para aka sew kzvidyati irit akznedIt akzvidat AditkzviRRaM kzveditaM tena

laRqra laRqra laRqra pu laqi ran laRqana iti KyAte deSaBede
laSana laSana laSa Su na na aSa umam Unan vA DAtorAwerlaSca raSuna rasone BAvapra tasyotpattiguRAdi BAvapra uktaM yaTA laSunantu rasona syAdugraganDo mahOzaDam arizwo mleCakanDaH syAt vavanezwo rasonala yadAmftaM vEnateyo jahAra surasadmanaH tadA tato patadvindu sa raso no patadu Buvi paYcaBiSca rasEryuktorasenAmlena varjitaH tasmAdrasona ityukto dravyARAM guRavediBiH kawukaScApi mUlezu tiktaH patrezu saMsTitaH nAle kazAya uddizwo nAlAgre lavaRaH sTitaH bIje tu maDuraH prokto ramastaduguRavediBiH rasono vfMhaRo vfzaH snigDozRaH pAcamaH saraH rase pAke ca kawukastIkzRo maDurako mataH BaGnasanDAnakft kaRWyo gurupittAstadavidaH balavarmakaro meDAhito netryo rasAyanaH hfdrogajIrRajvarakukziSUla vivanDagulmArucikAsaSoPAn durRAmakuzWAnalasAdajantusamIraRaSvAsakaPAMSca hanti madyaM mAMsaM taTAnfpa hitaM laSunasevinAm dIrGamaDyaH Sabdara
laSuna laSuna laSu SU na na aSa unan Unan vA DAtorAderlaSca raSuna rasone BAvapra tasyotpattiguRAdi BAvapra uktaM yaTA laSunantu rasonaH syAdugraganDo maSlOzaDam arizwo Page b mlecCakandaH syAt pavanezwo rasonakaH yadAmftaM vEnateyo jahAra surasadmanaH tadA tato patadvindu sa raso no patad Buvi paYcaBiSca rasEryuktorasenAmlena varjitaH tasmAdrasona ityukto dravyARAM guRavediBiH kawuka ScApi mUlezu tiktaH patrezu saMsTitaH nAle kazAya uddizwo nAlAgre lavaRaH sTitaH vIje tu maDuraH prokto rasa stadguRavediBiH rasono vfMhaRo vfzyaH snigDozRaH pAcanaH saraH rase pAke ca kawukastIkzRo maDuraso mataH BagnasanDAnakft kaRWyo gurupittAsvavfdDidaH balArRakaro meDAhito netryo rasAyanaH hfdroga jIrRajvarakukziSUla vibanDagulmArucikAsaSoPAn du rRAmakuzWAnalasAdajantusamIraRaSvAsakaPAMSca hanti madyaM BAMsaM taTAmlaYca hitaM laSunasevinAm dIrGamaDyaH Sabdara
lagula lagula lagula pu laga ulac lasya qarO vA daRqAkAre kAzWanirmite padArTe lAwI amaraH
lagura lagura lagura pu laga ulac lasya qarO vA daRqAkAre kAzWanirmite padArTe lAwI amaraH
lajjirI lajjirI lajjirI strI lajjA astyarTe irac gOrA NIz lajjAlu latABede rAjani
lajjiro lajjiro lajjiro strI lajjA astyarTe irac gOrA NIz lajjAlu latABede rAjani
lakAro lakAro lakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRasTAnaM dantamUlam sparSozmavarRayormaDyasTatvAdayamantaHsTavarRaH asyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH jihvAgreRa dantamUlasya IzatsparSaste nAsya IzatspazwatA bAhyaprayatnASca saMvAranAdaGozAH alpaprARaSca mAtfkAgyAse sya kakudi nyasyatA kAvyAdO praTamaprayoge vyasanaM Palam vyasanamaTa lavO vf ra wI tasva svarUpaM yaTA akAraM caYcalApANgi kuRqalI trayasaMyutam pItavidyullatAkAraM sarvaratnapradAyakam paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM sadA AtmAdisahitaM varRaM hfdi Page b BAvaya pArvati kAmarDanutantram tatparyyAyA varRABiDAne uktA yaTA laScandraH pUtanA pfTvI mADavI SakravAcakaH balAnujaH pinAkISo vyApako mAMsasaMjYakaH parAyaRA kakudvaktraH KaqgI nAdo mftaM divi lavaRaM vAruRI pItaSiKA vARI kriyA jitA jvAlinI veginI nAdaH pradyumnaH SozaRo hariH viSAtandrAyaKI ceto merurgiri kalorasaH tasyADizWAtfDyeyarUpaM yaTA caturBujAM pItavastrAM raktapaNkajalocanAm sarvadA varadAM BImAM sarvAlaNkAraBUzitAm yogIndrasevitAM nityaM yogimIM yogarUpiRIm caturvargapradAM devIM nAga hAropaSoBitAm evaM DyAtvA lakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram
lakzyAsana lakzyAsana lakzyAsana na rudrajA ukte AsanaBede aTa lakzyAsanaM vakzye liNgAgre NDritaladvayam guhyadeSe hastayugmaM talAByAmbanDayet Buvi
lakzyasana lakzyasana lakzyasana na rudrajA ukte AlanaBede aTa lakzyAsanaM vakzye liNgAgre NGritaladvayam guhyadeSe hastayugmaM talA ByAmbanDayet Buvi

lambozwa lambozwa lambo mbO zwa puM strI lambO ozWO yasya uzwre trikA striyAM NIz
lasa lasa lasa Silpa yoge cu uBa aka sew lASa za sa yati te alIlaSa za sa t ta lasa Sleze krIqAyAM dIptO ca aka BvA para sew lasati alAsIt alasIt lasa Sleze krIqAyAM dIptO ca aka BvA para sew lasati alAsIt alasIt

lavaRabDija lavaRabDija lavaRabDija na lavaRAbDerjAyate jana qa sAmudralavaRe karaka ca lavaRa rAjani
laza laza laza Silpa yoge cu uBa aka sew lASa za sa yati te alIlaSa za sa t ta laza spfhAyAM divA BvA ca uBa uma saka sew lazyati saw lavyati te lazati te alazIt alAzIt alazizwa lalAza leze laza spfhAyAM divA BvA ca uma saka saw lavyati te lazati te alazIt alAzIt alazizwa lalAza leze

mAtra mAtra mAtra na mA tran sAkalye avaDAraRe ca amaraH Page b paricCade alpe parimARe strI amaraH karRaBUzAyAm vitte varRAvayavaBede ca strI medi kAlena yAvatA pARiH paryyeti jAnumaRqam sA mAtrA kaviBiH proktA ityukte hrasvavarRoccAraRakAle ca strI eka mAtro Baved hrasvaH mIyaste nayA vizayAH mA karaRe cCran indriyavfttO mAtrAsparSAstu kOnteya gItA

maRqIdaka maRqIdaka maRqIdaka na maRqa ivodakaM yatra AtarpaRe AliyonA citrarAge citravarRe medi suSrutokte surAkalpAntargatakvATaBede vErecanikamUlAnAM kvATe mAzAn suBAvitAn suDOtAMstatkazAyeRa SAlInAYcApi taRqUlAn avakzudyEkataH piRqAn kftvA SuzkAn sucUrRitAn SAlitaRqUlacUrRaYca tatkazAyoRasADitam tasya pizwasya BAgAMstrIn kiRvaBAgavimiSritAn maRqodakArTe kvATaYca dadyAttat sarvamekataH nidaDyAt kalase tAntu surAM jAtarasAM pibet eza eva surAkalpo vasanezvapi kIrttitaH
maRqodaka maRqodaka maRqodaka na maRqa ivodakaM yatra AtarpaRe AliponA citrarAge citravarRe medi suSrutokte surAkalpAnta rgatakvATaBede vErecanikamUlAnAM kvATe mAzAn suBAvi tAn suDOtAMstatkazAyeRa SAlInAYcApi taRqUlAn avakzudyEkataH piRqAn kftvA SuzkAn sucUrRitAn SAlitaRqulacUrRaYca tatkazAyozRasADitam tasya pizwasya BAgAMstrIn kiRvaBAgavimiSritAn maRqodakArTe kvATaYca dadyAttat sarvamekataH nidaDyAt kalase tAntu surAM jAtarasAM pibet eza eva surAkalpo vasanezvapi kIrttitaH

majjan majjan majjan pu masja kanin asTijAte asTimaDyasTe srehAkAre padArTe vfkzAdeH sArAMSe ca amaraH PalamajjamuRAH yasya yasya Palasyeha vIryyaM Bavati yAdfSam tasya tasyEva vIryyeRa majjAnamapi nirdiSet rAjavallaBaH asTi yatsvAgninA pakvaM tasya sAro dravo GanaH yaH svedavat pfTagBUtaH sa majjetyaBiDIyate majjasTAnamAha sTUlAdizu viSezeRa majjA tvaByantare sTitaH BAvapra
majjat majjat majjat pu masja kanin asTijAte asTimaDyasTe snehA kAre padArTe vfkzAdeH sArAMSe ca amaraH Palamajja Page b guRAH yasya yasya PalasTeha vIryyaM Bavati yAdfSam tasya tasyEva vIryyeRa majjAnamapi nirdiSet rAjavallaBaH asTi yatsvAgninA pakvaM tasya sAro dravo GanaH yaH svedavat pfTagBUtaH sa majjetyaBiDIyate majja sTAnamAha sTUlAdizu viSezeRa majjA tvaByantare sTitaH BAvapra
makAraH makAraH makAraH pavargasya paYcamavarRaH asyoccAraRasyAnamozWO nAsikA ca jihvAgreRa ozWayoH syarSenoccAraRam AByantaraH prayatnaH ataevAsya sparSavarRatA aSunAsikatA ca bAhya prayatnASca saMvAranAdaGozAH astraprARaSca asya Dyeva svarUpasuktaM kAmaDenuta makAraM SfRu cArvaNgi svayaM paramakuRqalI taruRAdityasaNkASaM caturvargapradAGakam paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA varRABiDAne sya paryyAvA uktrA yaTA maH kAsI kleSitaH kAlo mahAkAlo mahAntakaH vEkuRWo basuDA candro raviH puruzarAjakaH kAsaBadro jayA meDA viSvadA dIptasaMjYakaH jaWaraYca Bramo mAnaM sakzmIrmAtograbanDanI vizaM Sivo mahAvIraH SaSipraBA janeSvaraH pramataH priyasf rudraH sarvANgo vahnimaRqalam mAtaNgamAlinI vinduH SravaRA Barayo viyat tadaDizWAnfdevatADyAnaM yaTA kfzRAM daSaBujAM BImAM pItalohimasocanAm Page a kfzRAmbaraDarAM nityAM DarmakAmArTamokzadAm evaM DyAtvA makArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet mAtfkA nyAse sya jaWare nyAsyatA kAvyAdO praTamaM prayoge duHKaM PalaM suKaBayamaraRaM kleSaduHKaM pavargaH vf ra wI ukteH
malAnadI malAnadI malAnadI strI oqradeSasTe nadIBede samudragAminyAM nadyAYca
malli malli malli llI strI malla in vA NIp mallikAyAm SabdamA saMjYAyAM kan mallikA kfzRavarRadehe AlohitacaYcu caraRe haMsaBede puMstrI mallikAkzo pyatra
mallillI mallillI mallillI strI malla in vA NIp mallikAyAm SabdamA saMjYAyAM kan mallikA kfzRavarRadehe AlohitacaYcucaraRe haMsaBede puM strI mallikAkzo pyatra
manTA manTA manTA strI sew sana kyap grIvAyAH paScAddeSasTAyAM sirAyAm amaraH
mana mana mana pUjAyAM saka garve aka BvA para sew manati amAnIt amanIt menatuH mana garve aka ca cu A sew mAnayate amImanat mana boDe tanA A saka sew manute amanizwa mene mana boDe di A saka aniw manyate amaMsta mene mana DftO ada cu u saka sew manayati te amamanat ta mana pu mana ac jawAmAMsyAm Sabdaca mana Apa tri mana Apnoti Apa aRa aR upa sa manojYe trikA mana Ra pu nIla tA ukte varzakAlIne grahayogaBede vakraHSanirvA yadi SIGraKewAt paScAt purastizWati tUryyadzyA ekarkzasaptarkzaBuvA dfSA vA paSyannarTASEraDikonakaScit tejo haret kAryyapadetTaSAlI sTito pi nAsO mana Ra u SuBo na mana pUjAyAM saka garve aka BvA para sew manati amAnIt amanIt menatuH mana garve aka cu A sew mAnayate amImanat mana boDe tanA A saka sew manute amanizwa mene mana boDe di A saka aniw manyate amaMsta mene mana DftO ada cu u saka sew manayati te amamanat ta mana pu mana ac jawAmAMsyAm Sabdaca mana Apa tri mana Apnoti Apa aR upa sa manojYe trikA
manaqa manaqa mana Ra qa pu nIsa tA ukte varzakAlIne grahayogaBede vakraHSanirvA yadi SIGraScewAt paScAt purastizWati tUryyadfzwyA ekarkzasaptarkzaBuvA dfSA vA paSyannarTASEraDi konakaScet tejo haret kAryyapadetTaSAmI sTito pi nAsO mana Ra qaH SuBO na
manyA manyA manyA strI sew mana kyap grIvAyAH paScAddeSasTAyAM sirAyAm amaraH
marI marI marI capatraka pu maricasyeva pattramasya kap saralavfkze rAjani
mari mari mari ca pu mf ica pf vA dIrGaH svanAmaKyAte vfkze amaraH kakkolake rAjani
marica marica mari rI ca pu mf ica pf vA dIrGaH svanAmaKyAte vfkze amaraH kakkolake rAjani

mfRa mfRa mfRa hiMse tu pa saka sew mfRati amarRIt
mfd mfd mfd dA strI mfdyate mfda karmaRi kvip mfttikAyAm mAwI amaraH halantatvAt vA wAp mfdApyatra
mfdu mfdu mfdu dA strI mfdyate mfda karmaRi kvip mfttikAyAm mAwI amaraH halantatvAt vA wAp mfdApyatra mfdu tri mfda ku komale amaraH striyAM vA NIp NIz mfdvI maduH sA ca gfhakanyAyAm citrAnurADAmfgarevatInakzatrarUpe citrAnurADA mfgarevatInakzatrarUpe nakzatragaRaBede ca tri jyo ta mfdu tri mfda ku komale amaraH striyAM vA NIz mfdvI maduH sA ca gfhakanyAyAm citrAnurADA mfgarevatInakzatrarUpe nakzatragaRaBede ca tri jyo ta
mfgAviD mfgAviD mfgAviD pu mfgaM viDyati vyaDa kvip pUrvadIrGaH vyADe jawADaraH
mfgAviDa mfgAviDa mfgAviDa pu mfgaM viDyati vyaDa kvip pUrvadIrGaH vyADe jawADaraH

mftyuvIja mftyuvIja mftyuvIja pu mftyustadDeturdAha eva vIjaM kAraRamasya vaMSe trikA
miSnitA miSnitA miSnitA strIM miSnitA cEva vijYemA miSnita kzEstu saMkuma ityukte kuttikA viSAKAnakzatrakAle ravisaMkramaRe gOravite na jatA umilite tri
miSritA miSritA miSritA strI miSritA cEva vijYeyA miSritarkzEstu saMkrama ityukte kfttikAviSAsvAnakzatrakAle ravisaMkramaRe gOravite na jawA milite tri
mitaMpaca mitaMpaca mitaMpaca pu mitaM pacati paca Kac sum ca kfpaRe amaraH parimitapAcake tri
mitampaca mitampaca mitampaca pu mitaM pacati paca Kac mum ca kfpaRe anaraH parimitapAcake tri
mitrayu mitrayu mitrayu pu mittraM yAti yA ku mitravatsale hemaca
mittrayu mittrayu mittrayu pu mittraM yAti yA ku mittravatsale hemaca

muKavyAdAna muKavyAdAna muKavyAdAna na vi A dA lyuw ta muKaprasAraRe
muKavyAdAnaM muKavyAdAnaM muKavyAdAnaM na vi A dA lyuw ta muKaprasAraRe
muSalin muSalin muSalin musa za Sa la astyarTe ini baladeve amaraH
muSalya muSalya muSalya tri murA za Sa lenaveDyaH yat muzala beDye amaraH
mudgaparRI mudgaparRI mudgaparRI strI mudrasyeva parRamasyAH mudgAnI vanamudge amaraH
mudgaparRo mudgaparRo mudgaparRo strI mudgasyeva paRamasyAH mugAnI vanamudge amaraH
muktApAlamba muktApAlamba muktApAlamba pu muktayA muktAviSizwatayA prAlambate ac muktAhAre hemaca
muktAprAlamba muktAprAlamba muktAprAlamba pu muktayA muktAviSizwatayA prAlambate ac muktAhAre hemaca
mukum mukum mukum avya maki umuc pfzo nirvARamokze Baktiprema rase ca mukundaSabde dfSyam
mukuma mukuma mukuma avya maki umuc pfzo nirvARamokze Baktipremarase ca mukundaSabde dfSyam
muzala muzala muza sa Sa la pu muza kalan pfzo ayogre svanAmaKyAte DAnyAdikaRqanasADane padArTe amaraH
muzalin muzalin muzalin musa za Sa la astyarTe ini baladeve amaraH
muzalya muzalya muzalya tri murA za Sa lenaveDyaH yat muzala beDye amaraH
muzasa muzasa muza sa Sa sa pu muza kalan pfzo ayogre svanAmaKyAte DAnyAdikaRqanasADane padArTe amaraH
muzkaSunya muzkaSunya muzkaSunya pu ta vfzaRarahite rAjYAmantaHpurarakzake KojA hemaca
nAgAYcalA nAgAYcalA nAgAYcalA strI nAgasyAYcalamivAtra nAgayazwO jawADaraH
nAgAYcanA nAgAYcanA nAgAYcanA strI nAgasyAYcalamivAtra nAgayazwO jawADaraH

nAgArjunIya nAgArjunIya nAgArjunIya pu nAgaSca arjunaSca tO aDikftya kftogranTaH dvandvAcCaH pA Ca nAgArjunADikAreRa kfte kAvyaBede CasyAKyAyikAtvAt vA luk nAgArjuna tatrArTe

nAgavi nAgavi nAgavi bila na tIrTaBede nAgaraKaRqaSabde dfSyam
nAgavila nAgavila nAgavi bi la na tIrTaBede nAgaraKaRqaSabde dfSyam
nAgodBeda nAgodBeda nAgodBeda na sarasvatInadIprakASasTAnaBedarUpe tIrTaBede gacCatyantarhitA yatra merupfzWe sarasvatI camase ca SivodBede nAgodBede ca dfSyate nAgodBede naraH snAtvA nAgalokamavApnuyAt BA va a
nAgodreda nAgodreda nAgodreda na sarasvatInadIprakASasTAnaBedarUpe tIrTaBede gacCa tyantarhitA yatra merupfzWe sarasvatI camase ca SivodBode nAgodBede ca dfSyate nAgodBede naraH srAtvA nAgalo kamavApnuyAt BA va a
nAmayajYA nAmayajYA nAmayajYA pu nAmasatiRa yajYaH nAmaprasidDaye vA yajYaH damBakfte AtmaKyAtilABAya vA kfte yajYe yaToktaM A tmamamBAvitAstabDA DanamAnamadAnvitAH yajante nAmaya jYEste damBenAviDipUrvakam gItA nAmamAtreRa ye yajYAste nAmayajYA yadvA dIkzitaH somayAjItye vamAdi nAmamAtraprasidDaye ye yajYAste nAmayajYAstEH SrIDaraH
nAmayajYa nAmayajYa nAmayajYa pu nAmamAtreRa yajYaH nAmaprasidDaye vA yajYaH damBakfte AtmaKyAtilABAya vA kfte yajYe yaToktaM AtmasamBAvitAstabDA DanamAnamadAnvitAH yajante nAmayajYEste damBenAviDipUrvakam gItA nAmamAtreRa ye yajYAste nAmayajYA yadvA dIkzitaH somayAjItyevamAdinAmamAtraprasidDaye ye yajYAste nAmayajYAstEH SrIDaraH
nESSreyasa nESSreyasa nESSreyasa tri niSSreyasAya hitamaR niHSreyasasA Dane SuSrUzEva tu SUdrasya Darmo nESSreyasaH paraH manuH pakze visargaH nEHSreyasa tatrArTe
nESaSreyasa nESaSreyasa nESaSreyasa tri niSSreyasAya hitam aR niHSreyasasADane SuSrUzEva tu SUdrasya Darmo nESSreyasaH paraH manuH pakze visargaH nEHSreyasa tatrArTe
nEtISa nEtISa nEtISa puM strI nitoSayatIti nitoSatirvaDakarmA niGaRwuH tataH ac nitoSaH hiMsakaH tasyApatyam aR hanturapatye nEtoSeva turParI parParIkA f
nEtoSa nEtoSa nEtoSa puMstrI nitoSayatIti nitoSatirbaDakarmA niGaRwuH tataH ac nitoSaH hiMsakaH tasyApatyam aR hantu rapatye nEtoSeba turParI parParIkA f

nEzazRihya nEzazRihya nEzazRihya na nissnehasya BAvaH zyaY Arze zatvam rAgABAve yaH kAmayeta nEzzRihyaM pApasana iyAmiti sa ftapeyena yajeta ASva SrO nissnehasya BAvo nEzzRihyam pApmano nEzzRihyaM gacCeyamiti yaH kAmayeta sa ftapeyanAmakena ekAhena yajeta nArA loke tu nEssnihya ityeva pakze visargaH nEHsnihya tatrArTe
nEzzRihya nEzzRihya nEzzRihya na nissnehasya BAvaH zyaYa Arze pratvam rAgA Page b BAve yaH kAmayeta nEzzRihyaM pApsana iyAmiti sa ftapeyena yajeta ASva SrO nissnehasya BAvo nEzzRihyam pApmano nEzzRihyaM gacCeyamiti yaH kAma yeta sa ftapeyanAmakena ekAhena yajeta nArA loke tu nEssnihya ityeva pakze visargaH nEHsnihya tatrArTe
nIlaNgu nIlaNgu nIla lA Ngu ni lagi ku upasargadIrGaH DAtorapi dIrGa iti kecit kfmijAtO BramarAdO kusume ca uj jvalada devaBede pu kzipraSyenAya varttikA nIlANgoH kfmiH yaju
nIlaNguM nIlaNguM nIla lA NguM ni lagi ku upasargadIrGaH DAtorapi dIrGa iti kecit kfmijAtO BramarAdO kusume ca ujjvalada devaBede pu kzipraSyenAya varttikA nIlANgoH kfmiH yaju

nagOkam nagOkam nagOkam pu nago vfkzaH parvato vA okaH nivAsasTAnamasya KagamAtre amaraH saraBe siMhe ca medi kAke Sabdaca vfkzaparvatayorvAsini tri

nakAraH nakAraH nakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH tavargIyapaYcamavarRaH asyoccAraRa sTAnaM dantamUlaM nAsikA ca dantyAxtulasAH smftAH amo nunAsikA nahrO iti ca SikzokteH tasyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH jihvAgreRa dantamUlasya samyaksparSaH ata eva vyaYjanAnAM sparSavarRatvavyavahAraH bAhyaprayatnASca saMvAra nAdaGozA alpaprARaSca KayAM yamAH KayaH ka pO visargaH svara eva ca ete SvAsAnupradAnA aGozASca vivfRvate kaRWam anye tu GozAH syuH saMvArA nAdaBAginaH ayugmA vargayamagA yaRaScAlpAsavaH smftAH SikzA asya vAcakaSabdA varRAmiDanAtantre uktA yaTA no garjinI kzamA sOrirvAruRI viSvapAvanI mezaSca savitA netraM danturo nArado YjanaH UrdDvagAmI dvi raRqaSca vAmapAdANgulernaKaH vEnateyaH stutirvatmaBavA narvA nirAgamaH vAmano jvAlinI dIrGo nirIhaH sugati rviyat SabdAtmA dIrGaGoRA ca hastinApuramecakO girinAyakanIlO ca Sivo nAdirmahAmatiH asya DyAnaM yaTA DyAnamasya nakArasya vakzyate SfRu BAvini dalitAYjanavarRABAM lalajjihvAM sulo canAm caturBujAM kowarAkzIM cArucandanacarcitAm kfzRAmbaraparIDAnAmIzadDAsyamuKIM sadA evaM DyAtvA nakArantu tanmantra daSaDA japet tatsvarUpaM yaTA nakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi kowividyullatAkftim paYca devamayaM varRaM svayaM paramakuRqalI paYcaprARAtmakaM varRaM hfdi BAvaya pArvati kAmaDenutantram mAtfkAvarRanyAse asya vAmapAdANgulinaKe nyAsyatA kAvyAdO praTamaprayoge PalaM yaTA doDaH sOKyaM mudaM naH vf va QIkoktam DAtupAWe ye RAditayA paWitAste prayogakAle nAdi pUrvakA Bavanti sati nimitte punarRatvamApadyante ye ca nAditayA paWitAste na RatvamApadyante iti vivekaH
namrAj namrAj namrAj pu na mrAjati mrAja kvip namrAqnapAt ityAdinA pA naYaH prakftiBAvaH meGe hemaca padatve zatvaqatve
napAMSa napAMSa napAMSa ta nfpAya deye kare zazWAMSAdO rAjaputre pu
narasiMhapurARam narasiMhapurARam narasiMhapurARam na narasiMhopavarRanAtmakaM purARam upapurARaBede pAdme purARe yatproktaM narasiMhopavarRanam taccAzwAdaSasAhasraM nArasiMhamihocyate matsyapu narasiMhamaDikftya kfto granTaH aR nArasiMhamityarTaH AdyaM sanatkumAroktaM nArasiMhamataHparamkUrmapurA upapurARoktO
narasiMhapurARama narasiMhapurARama narasiMhapurARama na narasiMhopravarRanAtmakaM purARam Page b upapurARaBede pAdme purARe yatproktaM narasiMhopavarRa nam taccAzwAdaSasAhasraM nArasiMhamihocyate matsyapu narasiMhamaDikftya kfto granTaH aR nArasiMhamityarTaH AdyaM sanatkumAroktaM nArasiMhamataHparam kUrmapurA upapurARoktO
navabaDU navabaDU navava ba DU strI karma nUtanapariRItAyAM striyAM tasyAH pitfgfhAt BarttfgfhagamanaM naGavaDvAgamanaM tatra vihita nakzatrAdi jyo ta uktaM yaTA dIpikAyAM strISudDyAliGawAjasaMyugaravO kAle viSudDe BfguM saMtyajya pratilomagaM SuBadine yAtrApraveSo cite tyaktvAhastu niraMSakaM navavaDUyAtrApraveSO patiH kuryyAdekapurAdizu pratiBfgornecCanti dozaM buDAH pEtrAgAre kucakusumayoH samBavo vA yadi syAt kAlaH SudDo na Bavati yadA sammuKo bApi SukraH meze kumBe lini ca na Bavet BAskaraScettaTApi svAmI Badre hani navavaDUM veSayenmandiraM svam BartturgocaraSoBane dinapatO nAstaMgate BArgave sUrye kIwaGawAjage SuBadine pakze ca kfzRetare hitvA ca pratilomagO buDasitO jIvasya SudDO taTA cAnItA guRaSAlinI navavaDUrnityotsavA modate ekagrAme catuHSAle durBikze rAzwraviplave patinA nIyamA nAyAH puraH Sukro na duzyati taTA kASyapezu vaSi zWezu BfgvAdityANgiraHsuca BaradvAjezu vAtsyezu prati Sukro na doza mAk dvirAgamanaSabde DikaM dfSyam atra viSezaH muhU pI DA ukto yaTA samAdripaYcANkadine vivAhAdvaDUpraveSo zwidinAntarAle SumaH parastAdvizamAbdamAsadine kza varzAtparato yaTezwam DruvakzipramfduSrotravasumUlamaGAnile vaDUpaveSaH sannezwo riktArArke buDe parEH mu ci tatra baDUpraveSonAma nUtanapariRItAyAH kanyAyAH praTa mataH karipyamARo BartfgfhapraveSo vaDUpraveSaSabdavAcyaH samAdrIti vivAhAdvivAhadivasAdAraByAzwidinAni zoqaSadinAni tezAmantarAle samAdripaYcANkadine samadi nAni dvitIyacaturTazazWAzwamadaSamadvAdaSacaturdaSazoqaSasaMKya kAni vizamamaDye saptamapaYcamanavamadinAni tezu vaDUpraveSaH baDvA nUtanapariRItAyAH kanyAyA BartfgfhapraveSaH SuBaH SuBaPalapradaH yadAha nAradaH AraByodvAhadivagAt zazWe vApyazwame dine vaDUpraveSaH sampattyE daSame Ta same dine zazWAdInAM samatvAdeva grahaRe punastaduktiratiprASastyasUca nArTam jyotirnibanDe tu viSezaH vaDUpraveSanaM kArmyaM Page a paYcame saptame dine navame ca SuBe vAre sulagne SaSi novale iti parastAt pratibanDakavaSAt zoqaSadinA Byantare yadi vaDUpraveSI na jAtastadA tadanantaraM vizamAvda mAsadine vizamavarze praTamatftIyapaYcamavarze vizama mAse vivAhamAsAt praTamatftIyapaYcamasaptamanavamEkAdaSa mAsezu vizamadinAni saptadaSAdIni tezu vaDUpraveSaH SuBaH tatrApi yadi pratibanDakavaSAtkAlAtikramaH paYcavarzAtmako jAtastadA paYcavarzAdanantaraM yaTezwaM varzAdiniyamo nAsti kintu dozarahite kAle vaDUpraveSo viDeyaH taduktaM saMgrahe vivAhamAraBya vaDUpraveSo yugme dine zoqaSa vAsarAntaH UrdDvaM tato vade yuji paYcamAntaM punaH parastAnniyamo na cAsti atrAvde yujIti padacCedo drazwavyaH taduktaM vivAhapawale vaDUpraveSaH praTame tra varze taTA tftIye pyaTa paYcame vA sUryyendudevejyabalena kuryyAt puMso munirgOtama Aha satyamiti samavarze dozasmaraRAcca yadAha DarmaSAstre nAradaH same varze same mAse yadi nArIgfhaM vrajet AyuzyaM harate BartuH sA nArI maraRaM vrajediti yugmavatsaranizeDaH paYca varzAt prAgjYeyo na paScAttadvAkyasya prAgaBiDAnAt aTa vaDUpraveSe nakzatrAdi Druveti DruvARi rohiRyuttarA trayaM ca kziprARi aSvinIpuzyahastAH mfdUni citrA nurADArevatI mfgaH SrotraM SravaRaH vasurDanizWA mUlaM prasidDam anilaH svAtI ezu Bezu vaDUpraveSaH san SuBaPaladaH riktAdizu nezwaH na SuBaH arTAt riktA nyAsu tiTizu arkArAByAmanyavArezu ca vaDUpraveSaH praSasta ityarTaH uktaYca tyavahAratattve pOzRAt kaBAcca SravaRAcca yugme hastatraye mUlamaGottarAsu puzye ca mEtre ca vaDUpraveSo riktetare vyarkakuje ca SastaH iti kaBaM rohiRI buDe parEriti anyEH SizwE rbuDavAre vaDUpraveSo nezyate kasmiMSciddeSe SizwAcAro yadbuDavAre vaDUpraveSo na viTIyate iti kecidatra hetu mapi varRayanti yadbuDo napuMsaka iti taccintyaM Sanerazi napuMsakatvAttasyApi nizeDo vAcyaH syAt pI DA vivAhAnantaraM kezu cinmAsezu praTamaM BarttrAdigfhe nivAse Palam tatrEvoktaM yaTA jyEzWe patijyezWamaTADike patiM hantyAdime Bartfgfhe baDUH SucO SvaSrUM sahasye SvaSuraM kzaye tanuM tAtaM maDO tAtagfhe vivAhataH mu ci Page b vivAhato vivAhAdanantaraM Bartfgfhe sTitA Adime praTame jyEzWe mAsi tizWantI baDUH patijyezWaM Bartf jyezWaBrAtaraM hanti evamAdime Dike mAsi sTitA vaDUH patiM BarttAraM hanti Adime SucAvAzAQe SvaSrU BartuH jananIM hanti Adime pOze SvaSuraM BartfH pitaraM hanti Adime kzaye kzayamAse Bartfgfhe tizWantI tanuM nijaSarIraM hanti mriyaga ityarTaH taTAdime maDO cEtre tAtagfhe pitfgfhe tizWantI tAtaM pitaraM hantI tyarTaH yadi kanyAyAH pitrAdyaBAvastadA tattanmAse tattadgehAvasTitO satyAmapi na kopi doza ityarTaH uktaYca muhUrttamArttaRqe udvAhAt praTame SucO yadi vaset Barturgfhe kanTakA hanyAttajjananIM kzaye nijatanuM jyEzWe patijyezWakam pOze ca SvaSuraM patiM ca maliBe cEtre svapitrAlaye tizWantI pitaraM nihanti na BayaM tezA naBAve Bavediti Baline DikamAse tasmAnnavabaDyA vivA hAnantaraM jyEzWAzAQapOzADikamAsakzayamAsezu Barttfgfhe na sTAtavyam cEtre mAsi pitugfhe na sTAtavyaM kintu Bartfgfhe eva sTAtavyamiti Palito rTaH taduktaM jyotirnibanDe vivAhAt praTame pOze AzAQe nADi mAsake na sA Bartfgfhe tizWeccEtre pitfgfhe taTA AzAQo jyEzWopalakzakaH aDimAsaH kzayamAsopalakzakaH atra pramARaM prAguktamiti pI DA
navavaDU navavaDU navava ba DU strI karma nUtanapariRItAyAM striyAM tasyAH pitfgfhAt BarttfgfhagamanaM navavaDvAgamanaM tatra vihita nakzatrAdi jyo ta uktaM yaTA dIpikAyAM strISudDyAliGawAjasaMyutaravO kAle viSudDe BfguM santyajya pratilomagaM SuBadine yAtrApraveSocite tyaktvAhastu niraMSakaM navavaDUyAtrApraveSO patiH kuryyAdekapurAdizu pritiBfgornecCanti dozaM buDAH pEtrAgAre kucakusumayoH samBavo vA yadi syAt kAlaH SudDo na Bavati yadA sammuKo vApi SukraH meze kumBe lini ca na Bavet BAskaraScettaTApi svAmI Badre hani navavaDUM veSayenmandiraM svam catuHSAle durBikze rAzwraviplave patinA nIyamAnAyAH puraH Sukro na duzyati taTA kASyapezu vaSizWezu BfgvAdityANkiraHsuca BaradvAjezu vAtsyezu pratiSukro na doza BAk dvirAgamanaSabde DikaM dfSyam atra viSezaH muhU pI DA ukto yaTA samAdripaYcANkadine vivAhAdvaDUpraveSo zwidinAntarAle SuBaH parastAdvizamAvdamAsadine kza varzAtparato yaTezwam DruvakzipramfduSrotravasumUlamaGAnile vaDUpraveSaH sannezwo riktArArke buDe parEH mu ci tatra vaDUpraveSonAma nUtanapariRItAyAH kanyAyAH praTamataH karizyamARo BartfgfhapraveSo baDUpraveSaSabdavAcyaH samAdrIti vivAhAdvivAhadivasAdAraByAzwadinAni zoqaSadinAni tezAmantarAle samAdripaYcANkadine samadinAni dvitIyacaturTazazWAzwamadaSamadvAdaSacaturdaSazoqaSasaMKyakAni vizamamaDye saptamapaYcamanavamadinAni tezu vaDUpraveSaH baDvA nUtanapariRItAyAH kanyAyA BartfgfhapraveSaH SuBaH SuBaPalapradaH yadAha nAradaH AraByodvAhadivasAt zazWe vApyazwame dine vaDUpraveSaH sampattyE daSame Ta same dine zazWAdInAM samatvAdeva grahaRe punastaduktiratiprASastyasUcanArTam jyotirnibanDe tu viSezaH vaDUpraveSanaM kArmyaM paYcame saptame dine navame ca SuBe vAre sulagne SaSinobale iti parastAt pratibanDakavaSAt zoqaSadinAByantare yadi vaDUpraveSo na jAtastadA tadanantaraM vizamAvdamAsadine vizamavarze praTamatftIyapaYcamavarze vizamamAse vivAhamAsAt praTamatftIyapaYcamasaptamanavamEkAdaSamAsezu vizamadinAni saptadaSAdIni tezu vaDUpraveSaH SuBaH tatrApi yadi pratibanDakavaSAtkAlAtikramaH paYcavarzAtmako jAtastadA paYcavarzAdanantaraM yaTezwaM varzAdiniyamo nAsti kintu dozarahite kAle vaDUpraveSo viDeyaH taduktaM saMgrahe vivAhamAraBya vaDUpraveSo yugme dine zoqaSavAsarAntaH UrdDvaM tato vde yuji paYcamAntaM punaH parastAnniyamo na cAsti atrAvde yujIti padacCedo drazwavyaH taduktaM vivAhapawale vaDUpraveSaH praTame tra varze taTA tftIye pyaTa paYcame vA sUryyendudevejyabalena kuryyAt puMso munirgOtama Aha satyamiti samavarze dozasmaraRAcca yadAha DarmaSAstre nAradaH same varze same mAse yadi nArIgfhaM vrajet AyuzyaM harate BartuH sA nArI maraRaM vrajediti yugmavatsaranizeDaH paYcavarzAt prAgjYeyo na paScAttadvAkyasya prAgaBiDAnAt aTa vaDUpraveSe nakzatrAdi Druveti DruvARi rohiRyuttarAtrayaM ca kziprARi aSvinIpuzyahastAH mfdUni citrAnurADArevatI mfgaH SrotraM SravaRaH vasurDanizWA mUlaM prasidDam anilaH svAtI ezu Bezu vaDUpraveSaH san SuBaPaladaH riktAdizu nezwaH na SuBaH arTAt riktAnyAsu tiTizu arkArAByAmanyavArezu ca vaDUpraveSaH praSasta ityarTaH uktaYca vyavahAratattve pOzRAt kaBAcca SravaRAcca yugme hastatraye mUlamaTottarAsu puzye ca mEtre ca vaDUpraveSo riktetare vyarkakuje ca SastaHiti kamaM rohiRI buDe parEriti anyEH SizwErbuDavAre vaDUpraveSo nezyate kasmiMSciddeSe SizwAcAro yadbuDavAre vaDUpraveSo na viDIyate iti kecidatra hetumapi varRayanti yadbuDo napuMsaka iti taccintyaM Sanerapi napuMsakatvAttasyApi nizeDo vAcyaH syAt pI DA vivAhAnantaraM kezu cinmAsezu praTamaM BarttrAdigfhe nivAse Palam tatrEvoktaM yaTAjyEzWe patijyezWamaTADike patiM hantyAdime Bartfgfhe vaDUH SucO SvaSrUM sahasye SvaSuraM kzaye tanuM tAtaM maDOtAtagfhe vivAhataHsu ci vivAhato vivAhAdanantaraM Bartfgfhe sTitA Adime praTame jyEzWe mAsi tizWantI vaDUH patijyezWaM BartfjyezWaBrAtaraM hanti evamAdime Dike mAsi sTitA vaDUH patiM BartAraM hanti Adime SucAvAzAQe SvaSrUMBartuH jananIM hanti Adime pOze SvaSuraM BartfH pitaraM hanti Adime kzaye kzayamAse Bartfgfhe tizWantI tanuM nijaSarIraM hanti mriyata ityarTaH taTAdime maDO cEtre tAtagfhe pitfgfhe tizWantI tAtaM pitaraM hantItyarTaH yadi kanyAyAH pitrAdyaBAvastadA tattanmAse tattadgehAvasTitO satyAmapi na kopi doza ityarTaH uktaYca muhUrttamArttaRqe udvAhAt praTame SucO yadi vaset Barturgfhe kanyakA hanyAttajjananIM kzaye nijatanuM jyEzWe patijyezWakam pOze ca SvaSuraM patiM ca maline cEtre svapitrAlaye tizWantI pitaraM nihanti na BayaM tezAmaBAve Bavediti maline DikamAse tasmAnnavavaDvA vivAhAnantaraM jyEzWAzAQapOzADikamAsakzayamAsezu Barttfgfhe na sTAtavyam cEtre mAsi pitugfhe na sTAtavyaM kintu Bartfgfhe eva sTAtavyamiti Palito rTaH taduktaM jyotirnibanDe vivAhAt praTame pOze AzAQe nADimAsake na sA Bartfgfhe tizWeccEtre pitfgfhe taTA AzAQo jyEzWopalakzakaH aDimAsaH kzayamAsopalakzakaH atra pramARaM prAguktamiti pI DA
nawasaMjYaka nawasaMjYaka nawasaMjYaka na nawasya saMjYA samyak jYAnaM yasmAt kap ke RaH pA hrasvaH godantAKyaharitAle trikA nawetiSabda saMjYA yasya kap nawe
nawasajYaka nawasajYaka nawasajYaka na nawasya naMjYA samyak jYAnaM yasmAt kap ke RaH pA hrasvaH godantAKyaharitAle trikA nawetiSabdaH saMjYA yasya kap nawe
net net net da avya nI vic bA tuk neda vic vA cAdi SaNkAyAM pratizeDe samuccaye ca manoramA na it nEvetyarTe anyo net sUrirohate f nettvadapacetayAtE yaju
neta neta neta da avya nI vic bA tuk neda vic vA cAdi SaNkAyAM pratizeDe samuccaye ca manoramA na it nEvetyarTe anyo net sUrirohate f nettvadapacetayAtE yaju
nfpAMSa nfpAMSa nfpAMSa ta nfpAya deye kare zazWAMSAdO rAjaputre pu
nfpatnI nfpatnI nfpatnI strI nFRAM patiH pAlayitrI viBAzA sapUrvasya pA nAntAdeSaH nAntatvAt striyAM NIp nFRAM pAlayitryAM striyAM aBi no devoravasA mahaH SarmaRA nfpatnIH f nfpatnIH manuzyARAM pAlayitryaH BA Candasi jasaH sTAne Sam
nfpatrI nfpatrI nfpatrI strI nFRAM patiH pAlayitrI viBAzA sapUrvasya pA nAntAdeSaH nAntatvAt striyAM NIp nFRAM pAla yitryAM striyAM aBi no devIravasA mahaH SarmaRA nfpatnIH f nfpatnIH manuzyARAM pAlayi tryaH BA Candasi jasaH syAne Sas
nfvajYa nfvajYa nfvajYa pu nurnarArTo yajYaH pratyahaM gfhasTakarttavyavaYcayajYA ntargate atiTipUjanarUpe yajYe aDyApanaM brahmayajYaH pivfyajYastu tarpaRam homo dEvo balirBoto nfyajYo tiTipUjanam paYcEtAn yo mahAyajYAn na hApa yati SaktitaH fziyajYaM devayajYaM BUtayajYaYca sarvadA nfyajYaM pitfyajYaYca yaTASakti na hApayet iti ca manuH
nfyajYa nfyajYa nfyajYa pu nurnarArTo yajYaH pratyahaM gfhasTakarttavyapaYcayajYAntargate atiTipUjanarUpe yajYe aDyApanaM brahmayajYaH pitfyajYastu tarpaRam homo dEvo balirBoto nfyajYo tiTipUjanam paYcEtAn yo mahAyajYAn na hApayati SaktitaH fziyajYaM devayajYaM BUtayajYaYca sarvadA nfyajYaM pitfyajYaYca yaTASakti na hApayet iti ca manuH
