nicumpraRa nicumpraRa nicumpraRa pu nicamanena pUryate nIcErasmin kvaRanti daDatIti yA pfzo samudre avaBfTe ca samudro pi nicumpuRa Page b ucyate nicamena pUryyate avaBfTo pi nicumpuRa ucyate nIcErasmin kvaRanti nIcErdaDatIti vA nIcaM kuRo tIti vA niru avaBfTo nicumpuRo Bavati tadvftA SrutiH avaBfTa nicumpuRa nicerurasi nicu mpuRaH yaju nicumpuRa cupa mandAyAM gatO nitarAM copati mandaM gacCati nicumpuRaH uRapratyayo mumAgamaSca yadvA nIcErasmin kvaRanti nIcaSabdena karma kurvantyavaBfTo nicumpuRaH voRasTURavraRaBruRe tyAdinA nIcEH SabdopapadAt kvaRateH kapratyayAnto gipAtaH DAtoH pumBAva upapadasya nicumBAvaSca nipA titaH taTA viDAvaBfTa yadyapi tvaM nicerurasi ni tarAM caratIti niceruH nitarAM gamanaSIlo si taTA pyatra nicumpuRo Bava mandagamano Bava vedadI
nicumpuRa nicumpuRa nicumpuRa pu nicamanena pUryate nIcErasmin kvaRanti daDatIti vA pfzo samudre avaBfTe ca samudro pi nicumpuRa ucyate nicamena pUryyate avaBfTo pi nicumpuRa ucyate tIcErasmin kvaRanti nIcErdaDatIti vA nIcaM kuRotIti vA niru avaBfTo nicumpuRo Bavati tadDftA SrutiH avaBfTa nicumpuRa nicerurasi nicampuRaH yaju nicumpuRa cupa mandAyAM gatO nitarAM copati mandaM gacCati nicumpuRaH uRapratyayo mumAgamaSca yadvA nIcErasmin kvaRanti nIcaSabdena karma kurvantyavaBfTo nicumpuRaH voRasTURavraRaBruRetyAdinA nIcEH SabdopapadAt kvaRateH kvapratyayAnto nipAtaH DAtoH pumBAva upapadasya nicumBAvaSca nipAtitaH taTA viDAvaBfTa yadyapi tvaM nicerurasi nitarAM caratIti niceruH nitarAM gamanaSIlo si taTApyatra nicumpuRo Bava mandagamano Bava vedadI
nidrAsaMjanana nidrAsaMjanana nidrAsaMjanana na nidrAM saMjanayati sam jana Ric lyu SlezmaRi GAtO SabdamAlA kaPaDAtornidrAjanakatvaM vEdyake prasidDam
nidrAsaYjanana nidrAsaYjanana nidrAsaYjanana na nidrAM saYjanayati sam jana Ric lyu SlezmaRi DAtO SabdamAlA kaPaDAtornidrAjanakatvaM vEdyake prasidDam
nikava nikava nikava sa pu ni kama sa ac nikaza sa tyanena karaRe Go vA kazaRe kazapAzARe ca kazawIpAtara amaraH nikaze demareKeva SrIrAsIdanapAyinI raGuH karmaRi ca parIkzArTaM kazaRakarmahemAdO tri yadA nirguRa Page b mApnoti DyAnaM manasi pUrvajam tadA prajYAyate brahma nikazaM nikaze yaTA mA SA a SARe astrA ditIkzRatAsADanAstre amaraH
nikaza nikaza nikaza sa pu ni kaza sa ac nikaza sa tyanena karaRe GovA kazaRe kazapAzARe ca kazawIpAtara amaraH nikaze hemareKeva SrIrAsIdanapAyinI raGuH karRami Ga parIkzArTaM kazaRakarmahemAdO tri yadA nirguRa mApnoti DyAnaM manasi pUrvajam tadA prajYAyate brahma nikazaM nikaze yaTA BA SA a SARe astrAditIkzRatAsADanAstre amaraH
nikuYjikAmnA nikuYjikAmnA nikuYjikAmnA strI nikuYjamutpattisTAnatvenAstyasyA Wan karma kuYjavallaryyAM SrIPalatulyaguRAyAM latAyAm rAjani
nikuYjikAmrA nikuYjikAmrA nikuYjikAmrA strI nikuYjamutpattisTAnatvenAstvasyA Wan karma kuYjaballaryyAM SrIPalatulyaguRAyAM latAyAm rAjani
nimittabaDa nimittabaDa nimittabaDa pu nimittena roDAdihetunA baDaH roDAdi nimitte gavAdervaDe tatra prAyaScittAdi prA ta uktaM yaTA roDAdinimittakaprAyaScittam tatrANgirAH roDane banDane cApi yojane ca gavAM rujaH utpAdya maraRaM vApi nimittI tatra lipyate pAdaYcaredroDabaDe dvO pAdO banDane caret yojane pAdahInaM syAccaret sarvaM nipAtane nimittI lipyata iti yaTAkaTaYcit maraRa nimittatAratamyena yo BUya AraBate tAsman Pale viSezaH ityApastambavacanAt pApaviSezeRaM lipyate tadviSezAt prAyaScittaviSezamAha pAdaYcaredityAdi roDaH SIRAyAH gorAhArapracAranirgamaviroDaH banDana mayaTAbanDanamakAlabanDanaYca yojanaM halaSakawAdO Page a yojanaM tatrAtivAhAdineti SezaH atrEva vizaye vya vanaH prAjApatyadvayaM gohatyAprAyaScittaM roDanabanDanayoktra baDe pAdavfdDyA nasrAni lomAni SiKAvarjaM saSiKaM vapanaM trizavaRaM gavAnugamanaM sahaSayanaM sumahattfRAni raTyAsu cArayet vratAnte brAhmaRaBojanamiti roDana banDanayoktrabaDa ityAderayamarTaH roDanimittakavaDe prAjA patyasya pAdaH prAyaScittaM naKacCedanamAtram banDana nimittabaDe prAjApatyasya dvO pAdO naKAnAM lImnAYca Cedanam yoktranimitte ca baDe prAjApatyapAdatrayaM naKalomaSiKAvarjakeSacCedanaYca daRqAdiprahArabaDe sampUrRa prAjApatyam naKalomakeSaSiKAcCedanaYca iti etadvizaya eva mitAkzarADftaM saMvarttavacanaM tadekavAkya tvAt tadyayA pAde NgalomavapanaM dvipAde SmaSruRo pi ca tripAde ca SimnAvarjaM vaSiKantu nipAtane atra prAjApatyasya pAdAditve kiM mAnamiti cat parASara vacanam roDane tu caret pAdaM banDane cArdDameva hi yojane pAdahInaM syAt prAjApatyaM nipAtane kfcCramajYAnatAqane iti vArhasvatyAt daRqo tra hasta pramARo grAhyaH tadaDike tu dviguRapAyaScittaviDAnAt yaTA aNgirAH aNguzWamAtraH sTOlyena bAhumAtraH pramARataH sArdraSca sapalASaSca daRqa ityaBiDIyate asyAdUrdDvaprahAreRa yadi gAM vinipAtayet dviguRantu Bavettatra prAyaScittamiti sTitiH sapalAsaH sapatraH etadvacanavizaya eva cyavanIktaprAjApatyadvayamiti etaccA jYAnataH yaTA vfhaspatiH pAdaYcaret roDavaDe kfcCrArdDaM banDaDAtane ativAhe ca pAdonaM kfcCramajYAnatAqane annAnaYca kzIRAyAmakzIRatvaBramaH kzERyajYAne tu pAyikamaraRaM jYAtvA pravfttasya cAndrAyaRapAdAdikam yaTA hArItaH nAsAcCedanadAhezu karRacCedanabanDane atidohAtivAhAByAM kfcCraM cAndrAyaRaM caret hatveti SezaH kfcCraM vrataM tena cAndrAyaRavratamityarTaH iti SUlapARimahAmahopADyAyAH BavadevaBawwEstu nipAtane kUpAvadAdizu iti vyAKyAtaM tadapi yuktaM anyaTA tatra pAtajanakaBayAdidarSakasya prAyaScittasyAnaDya tadDAyApatteH SastrAdinA tu hatvA gAM mAnavaM tatapAkzaret roDAdinA tvANgiranamApastamboktameva ceti bfhaspatyuktaM tatra prayamAdipadAmuzwilozwralaguqavizAgnyA dInAM prAyikamftyuPalAnAM grahaRam roDAdineti yaTA Page b kaTaYcinnimitamAtrasya banDAderiti SUlapARivyAKyA ntarAcca tasmAnnipAtanaparam uBayaparam etacca rAtrO rakzaRArTaM roDabanDanavyatiriktavizayam sAyaM saMyama sanArTantu na duzyedroDabanDayoH iti aNgirovacanAt vanDane mitAkzarAyAM viSezamAha vyAsaH na nAri kelErnaca SARatAlErnacApi mOYjErnaca banDaSfNKalEH etEstu gAvo na hi banDanIyA badDvA tu tizWet paraSuM gfhItvA kuSEH kASESca baDnIyAt sTAne dozavivArjate nimittinSabde vakzyamARe manyUtpAdanadArA hanane ca
nimittavaDa nimittavaDa nimittavaDa pu nimittena roDAdihetunA vaDaH roDAdinimitte gavAderbaDe tatra prAyaScittAdi prA ta uktaM yaTA roDAdinimittakaprAyaScittam tatrANgirAH roDane banDane cApi yojane ca gavAM rujaH utpAdya maraRaM vApi nimittI tatra lipyate pAdaYcaredroDavaDe dvO pAdO banDane caret yojane pAdahInaM syAccaret sarvaM nipAtane nimittI lipyata iti yaTAkaTaYcit maraRanimittatAratamyena yo BUya AraBate tasmin Pale viSezaH ityApastambavacanAt pApaviSezeRa lipyate tadviSezAt prAyaScittaviSezamAha pAdaYcaredityAdi roDaH kzIRAyAH gorAhArapracAranirgamaviroDaH banDanamayaTAvanDanamakAlabanDanaYca yojanaM halaSakawAdO yojanaM tatrAtivAhAdineti SezaH atrEva vizaye cyavanaH prAjApatyadvayaM gohatyAprAyaScittaM roDanabanDanayoktravaDe pAdavfdDyA naKAni lomAni SiKAvarjaM saSiKaM vapanaM trizavaRaM gavAnugamanaM sahaSayanaM sumahattfRAni raTyAsu cArayet vratAnve brAhmaRaBojanamiti roDanabanDanayoktravaDa ityAderayamarTaH roDanimittakavaDe prAjApatyasya pAdaH prAyaScittaM naKacCedanamAtram banDananimittavaDe prAjApatyasya dvO pAdO naKAnAM lomnAYca Cedanam yoktranimitte ca vaDe prAjApatyapAdatrayaM naKalomaSiKAvarjakeSacCedanaYca daRqAdiprahAravaDe sampUrRa prAjApatyam naKalomakeSaSiKAcCedanaYca iti etadvizaya eva mitAkzarADftaM saMvarttavacanaM tadekavAkyatvAt tadyaTA pAde NgalomavapanaM dvipAde SmaSruRo pi ca tripAde ca SiKAvarjaM saSiKantu nipAtane atra prAjApatyasya pAdAditve kiM mAnamiti cet parASaravacanam roDane tu caret pAdaM banDane cArdDameza hi yojane pAdahInaM syAt prAjApatyaM nipAtane kfcCramajYAnatAqane iti vArhaspatyAt daRqo tra hastapramARo grAhyaH tadaDike tu dviguRaprAyaScittaviDAnAt yaTA aNgirAH aNguzWamAtraH sTOlyena bAhumAtraH pramARataH sArdraSca sapalASaSca daRqa ityaBiDIyate asmAdUrdDaprahAreRa yadi gAM vinipAtayet dviguRantu Bavettatra prAyaScittamiti sTitiH sapalAsaH saputraH etadvacanavizaya eva cyavanoktaprAjApatyadvayamiti etaccAjYAnataH yaTA bfhaspatiH pAdaYcaret roDabaDe kfcCrArdDaM banDaGAtane ativAhe ca pAdonaM kfcCramajYAnatAqane ajYAnaYca kzIRAyAmakzIRatvaBramaH kzERyajYAne tu prAyikamaraRaM jYAtvA pravfttasya cAndrAyaRapAdAdikam yaTA hArItaH nAsAcCedanadAhezu karRacCedanabanDane atidohAtivAhAByAM kfcCraM cAndrAyaRaM caret hatveti SezaH kfcCraM vrataM tena cAndrAyaRavratamityarTaH iti SUlapARimahAmahopADyAyAH BavadevaBawwEstu nipAtane kUpAvawAdizu iti vyAKyAtaM tadapi yuktaM anyaTA tatra pAtajanakaBayAdidarSakasya prAyaScittasyAnaDyavasAyApatteH SastrAdinA tu hatvA gAM mAnavaM vratamAcaret roDAdinA tvANgirasamApastamboktameva ceti bfhaspatyuktaM tatra praTamAdipadAnmuzwilozwralaguqavizAgnyAdInAM prAyikamftyuPalAnAM grahaRam roDAdineti yaTA kaTaYcinnimittamAtrasya banDAderiti SUlapARivyAKyAntarAcca tasmAnnipAtanaparam uBayaparam etacca rAtrO nimittavid nimittavid nimittavid tri nimittaM SakunaM SuBASuBasUcakaM lakzaRaM vetti vida kvip nimittajYe dEvajYe hemaca nimittajYAdayo pyatra nimittajYastapoDanaH raGuH
nimittavida nimittavida nimittavida tri nimittaM SakunaM SuBASuBasUcakaM lakzaRaM vetti vida kvip nimittajYe dEvajYe hemaca nimi ttajYAdayo pyatra nimittajYastapoDanaH raGuH
nimnetukA nimnetukA nimnetukA strI nir mlA tun saMjYAyAM kan pfzo mlAniSUnye ozaDiBede nimnetukAstatra Bavanti paYca BI brA
nirAmAlu nirAmAlu nirAmAlu pu nitarAM ramate tra rama Alu kapityavfkze Sabdaca
nirRAma nirRAma nirRAma pu nitarAM nAmo namanam prA sa Ratvam nitarAM namane aTa nirRAmO pakzayoH karoti nirRAmO hi vayasaH pakzayorBavato vitftIye vitftIye hi vayasaH pakzayornirRAmO Bavato ntare vitftIye ntare vayasaH pakzayornirRAmo BavataH ta caturaNgulameva purastAddUhati caturaNgulaM paScAdupasamUhati tadyAvadevodUhati tAvadupasamUhati tannAhEvAtirecayati no kanIyaH karoti sa tasminnirRAme ekAmizwakAmupadaDAti tarhyevaM vayasaH patato nirRAmAdekA nAqyupaSete tAM tatkaroti Sata brA
nirRAyana nirRAyana nirRAyana na nir nI Ric lyuw nirRayakaraRe gajApANgadeSe niryARaM SabdaratnA
nirRRAma nirRRAma nirRRAma pu nitarAM nAmo namanam prA sa Ratvam nitarAM namate aTa nirRAmO pakzayoH karoti nirRAmO hi vayasaH pakzayorBavato vivftIye vitftIye hi vayasaH pakzayornirRAmO Bavato ntare vitftIye ntare vayasaH pakza yornirRAmO BavataH sa caturaNgulameva purastAdudUhati caturaNgulaM paScAdupasamUhati tadyAvadevodUhati tAvadupa samUhati tannAhEvAtirecayati no kanIyaH karoti sa tasminnirRAme ekAmizwakAmupadaDAti tarhyevaM vayasaH patato nirRAmAdekA nAqyupaSete tAM tatkaroti Sata brA

niramAlu niramAlu niramAlu pu nitarAM ramate tra rama Alu kapitTavfkze Sabdaca
nirbuza nirbuza nirbuza tri nirgataM vuzaM yasmAt vuza AgaqA rahite pUte DAnye hemaca nirudakAdi antodAttatA sya
nirganDapuzpI nirganDapuzpI nirganDapuzpI stri nirganDaM ganDaSUnyaM puzpaM yasyAH NIp SAlmalivfkze Sabdaca
nirganDapuzpO nirganDapuzpO nirganDapuzpO strI nirganDaM ganDaSUnyaM puzpaM yasyAH NIp SAlmalivfkza Sabdaca
nirjara nirjara nirjara pu nirgatA jarA yasmAt deve jarASUnye tri ba amfte na jarASabdasya gORatve pi ajAdO pratyaye pare vA jarasAdeSaH nirjarasO nirjarO ArhatamatasidDe jIvAjIvAdizu saptasu padArTezu padArTaBede ArhataSabde dfSyam guqUcyAM tAlaparRyAM ca strI medi
nirjaraM nirjaraM nirjaraM pu nirgatA jarA yasmAt deve jarASUnye tri ba amfte na jarASabdasya gORatve pi ajAdO pratyaye pare vA jarasAdeSaH nirjarasO nirjarO Arhata matasidDe jIvAjIvAdizu saptasu padArzezu padArTaBede ArhataSabde pf dfSyam guqUcyAM tAlaparRyAM ca strI medi
nirmretukA nirmretukA nirmretukA strI nir mlA tun saMjYAyAM kan pfzo mlAni SUnye ozaDiBede niBretukAstatra Bavanti paYca BI brA
nirvAYc nirvAYc nirvAYc tri nir ava anca kvip avopasargasya allopaH nirgate tasmAdime prARA vizvaYco vAYco nu nirvAYci sAM brA
nirvAYca nirvAYca nirvAYca tri nir ava anca kvip avopasargasya allopaH nirgate tasmAdime prARA vizvaYco vAYco nunirvAYci sAM brA
nirviRRa nirviRRa nirviRRa tri nira vida kta nirviRRasyopasaMKyAtvAt dasya natve Ratvazwutve nirvedayukte Kinne prAptavE rAgye virakte ca nirviRRo haM dakziRena mArgeRa gatAgatalakzaRena ISopa BA
nirviRa nirviRa nirviRa tri nir vida kta nirviRasyopasaNKyAtvAt dasyanatve Ratvazwutve nirvedayukte Kinne prAptavErAgye virakte ca nirviRo haM dakziRena mArgeRa gatAgatalakzaRena ISopa BA
nirvuza nirvuza nirvuza tri nirgataM yuzaM yasmAt vuza AgaqA rahite pUte DAnye hemaca nirudakAdi antodAttatA sya
nivaha nivaha nivaha pu nitarAmuhyate vaha Ga samUhe amaraH BAgye fkze SavarapulindapraDvaMsakaro mbunivahamokzAya vf sa a ni vaha ac saptavAyumaDye vAyuBede anilaSabde dfSyam nivaho yatra vA vAti kezAYcinna suKapradaH na pracaRqo na ca mfduH pramAdI ca praBaYjanaH jyo ta
nivahf nivahf nivahf pu nitarAmuhyate vaha Ga samUhe amaraH BAgye fkze SavarapulindapraDvaMsakaro mbunivahamokzAya vf sa a ni vaha ac saptavAyumaDye vAyuBede anilaSabde pf dfSyam nivaho yatra vA vAti kezAYcinna muKapradaH na pracaRqI na ca mfduH pramAdI ca praBaYjanaH jyo ta
nivid nivid nivid strI ni vida karaRe kvip vAci niGaRwuH vESvadevasya Sastre SaMsanIye mantrapadaBede ca kati devA yAjYavalkyeti sa hEtayEva nividA pratipede yAvanto vESva devasya nividyucyante trayaSca trI ca SatA trayaSca trI ca sahasrA vf upa sa yAjYavalkyo pi etayEva vakzya mARayA nividA pratipede yAM saMKyAM pfzwavAn SAkalyo yAvanto yAvatsaNKyAkA devA vESvadevasya Sastrasya nividi nivinnAma devatAsaMKyAvAcakAni mantrapadAni kAni cidvESvadeve Sastre Sasyante tAni nivitsaMjYakAni tasyAM nividi yAvanto devAH SrUyante tAvanto devA iti kA punaH sA nividiti tAni nivitpadAni Page b pradarSyante trayaSca trI ca SatA trayaSca devA devAnAM trIRi ca SatAni punarapyevaM trayaSca trI ca sahasrARye tAvanto devAH BA vakzyamARanyUNKaSabdArTe padErA pnoti nividaH yaju padEH nibidaH nyUNKAnA pnoti vedadI sAvitryaM SastvEkAhike nividaM daDAti caturTakaM dyAvApfTivIyaM SastvEkAhike nividaM daDAti acCetyArBavaM SastvEkAhike nividaM daDAti vESvadevaM SastvEkAhike nividaM daDAti ityAdIni Sata brA paWitAni
nivida nivida nivida strI ni vida karaRe kvip vAci niGaRwuH vESvadevasya Sastre SaMsanIye mantrapadaBede ca kati devA yAjYabalkyeti sa hEtayEva nividA pratipede yAvanto vESvadevasya nividyucyante trayaSca trI ca SatA trayaSca trI ca sahasrA vf upa sa yAjYavalkyo pi etayEva vakzyamARayA nividA pratipede yAM saNKyAM pfzwavAn SAkalyo yAvanto yAvatsaNKyAkA devA vESvadevasya Sastrasya nividi nivinnAma devatAsaNKyAvAcakAni mantrapadAni kAnicidvESvadeve Sastre Sasyante tAni nivitsaMjYakAni tasyAM nividi yAvanto devAH SrUyante tAvanto devA iti kA punaH sA nividiti tAni nivitpadAni pradarSyante trayaSca trI ca SatA trayaSca devA devAnAM trIRi ca SatAni punarapyevaM trayaSca trI ca sahasrARye tAvanto devAH BA vakzyamARanyUdKaSabdArTe padErApnoti nividaH yaju padEH nividaH nyUNKAnApnoti vedadI sAvitryaM SastvEkAhike nividaM daDAti caturTekaM dyAvApfTivIyaM SastvEkAhike nividaM nyuNKAnApnoti vedadI sAvitryaM SAstvEkAhike nividaM daDAti acCetyArBavaM SastvEkAhike nividaM daDAti vESvadevaM SastvEkAhike nividaM daDAti ityAdIni Sata brA paWitAni
nizAdavat nizAdavat nizAdavat pu nizAdo styasya matup masya vaH nizAda Page b svare zaqja fzaBagAnDArO maDyamo DEvatastaTA paYca maScApi vijYeyastaTA cApi nizAdavAn BA SA a nizAdasvarayukte gAnAdO tri striyAM NIp
nizRAta nizRAta nizRAta tri ni snA karttari kta ninadIByAM snAteH kOSale pA zatve wutvam kuSale nipuRe amaraH nizRAtEraTa sarasA priyAsamUhEH mAGaH pAraNgate ca vESampAyana evEko nazRAtoyajuzAmuta BAga a
nizRRAta nizRRAta nizRRAta tri ni snA karttari kta ninadIByAM snAteH kOSale pA zatve wutvam kuSale nipuRe amaraH nizRAtEraTa sarasA priyAsamUhEH mAGaH pAraNgate ca vESampAyanaevEko nizRAtoyajuzAmuta BAga a
nizaRRa nizaRRa nizaRRa tri ni sada karttari kta upavizwe saMnizaRRA sitAbje sarasvatIDyAnam nizaRRA paNkaje pUjyA namo devyE SriyA iti ti ta svArTe ka tatrArTe tri saMjYAyAM kan sunizaRRake SAkaBede SabdaratnA
nizaRa nizaRa nizaRa tri ni sada karttari kta upavizwe saMnizaRA sitAbje sarasvatIDyAnam nizaRA paNkaje pUjyA namo devyE SriyA iti ti ta svArTe ka tatrArTe tri saMjYAyAM kan sunizaRake SAkaBede SabdaratnA
nizad nizad nizad strI nizIdatyasyAm ni sada ADAre GaY yajYadI kzAyAm yA vE dIkzA sA nizat tatsatraM tadayanaM tatsa trAyaRam Sata brA nizIdati vedyatvena devatA atra ADAre kvip vedavAkyaviSeze yaM vAkezvanuvAkezu nizatsUpanizatsu ca gfRanti satyakarmARam BA SA a vAkezu mantrezu sAmAnyataH karmaprakASakezu anuvAkezu mantrArTavivaraRaBUtezu brAhmaRavAkyezu nizatsu karmANgAvabadDadevatAvijYAnavAkyezu upanizatsu kevalAtma jYApakezu gfRanti DyAyanti nIlaka sampa BAve kvip upasadane strI aBisvarA nizadA gA ava syavaH f nizadA upasadanena BA ni sada karttari kvipa upavezwari nizadvaraSabde dfSyam
nizada nizada nizada strI nizIdatyasyAm ni sada ADAre GaY yajYadIkzAyAm yA vE dIkzA sA nizat tatsatraM tadayanaM tatsatrAyaRam Sata brA nizIdati vedyatvena devatA atra ADAre kvip vedavAkyaviSeze yaM vAkezvanuvAkezu nizatsUpanizatsu ca gfRanti satyakarmARam BA SA a vAkezu mantrezu sAmAnyataH karmaprakASakezu anuvAkezu mantrArTavivaraRaBUtezu brAhmaRavAkyezu nizatsu karmANgAvabadDadevatAvijYAnavAkyezu upanizatsu kevalAtmajYApakezu gfRanti DyAyanti nIlaka sampa BAve kvip upasadane strI aBiKarA nizadA gA avasyavaH f nizadA upasadanena BA ni sada karttari kvip upavezwari nizadvaraSabde dfSyam
nizkamBu nizkamBu nizkamBu pu devasenADipaBede balinA vfzaparvA tu saha nizkamBunA raRe harivaM a devAsurayudDoktO
nizkammu nizkammu nizkammu pu devasenADipaBede balinA vfzaparvA tu saha nizkamBunA raRe harivaM a devAsurayudDoktO
nizpanda nizpanda nizpanda tri nirgataH spando yasya prA va visargalopABAve idudupaDasya cApratyayasya pA zatvazwutve spandanarahite jyAvanDanizpandaBujena yasya mETilItanayodgI tanizpandamfgamASramam raGuH visargalope na zatvam
nizpulAka nizpulAka nizpulAka tri nirgataH pulAko yataH prA ba zatvam pulAkarahite DAnyAdO AgqA tucCa DAnyarahite utsargiRyAM jEnaBede pu hema
nizpustAka nizpustAka nizpustAka tri nirgataH pulAko yataH prA ba zatvam pulAkarahite DAnTAdO AgqA tucCa DAnyarahite utsargiRyAM jEnaBede pu hema
nizyadavat nizyadavat nizyadavat pu nizAdo styasya matup masya vaH nizAdasvare zaqja fzaBagAnDArO maDyamo DEvatastaTA paYcamaScApi vijYeyastaTA cApi nizAdavAn BA SA a nizAdasvarayukte gAnAdO tri striyAM NIp
nizzpanda nizzpanda nizzpanda tri nirgataH spando yasya prA ba visargalopABAve idudupaDasya cApratyayasya pA zatvazwutve spandanarahite jyAvanDanizpandaBujena yasya mETilItanayodgItanizpandamfgamASramam raGuH visargalope na zatvam
o o o okAraH svaravarRRaBedaH kaRWOzWasTAnayoruccAryyaH dIrGaH dimAtratvAt plutastu tri mAtraH sacodAttAnudAtta svaritaBedEH pratyekamanunAsikAnanunAsikAByAM dvEviDyAt zaqviDaH taTA pluto pi zaqviTaH evaM dvAdaSaviDaH taparatve kAraparatve ca svarUpaparaH tantre tasya vAcakaSabdA varRA BiDAne uktA yaTA okAraH latyapIyUzO paScimAsyaH SrutiH sTirA sadyojAto vAsudevo gAyatrI dArGaja NGakaH ApyAyanI cordDvadanto lakzmIrvARImuKI dvijaH uddeSya darSakastIvraH kElAso vasuGAkzaraH praRavAMSo brahmasUtramajeyaH sarvamaNgalA trayodaSI dIrGanAsArati nATo digambaraH trElokyavijayA prajYA prItivIjAdi karziRI iti tadaDizWAtfdevatA ca tatrEvoktA jvAlAsyOkAragA jYeyA BImA ca mattamAlinI tasya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDe ta uktaM yaTA okAraM caYcalA pANgi paYcadebamayaM sadA raktavidyullatAkAraM triguRAtmA namISvaram paYcaprARamayaMvarRaM namAmi devamAtaram etadvarRaM maheSAni svayaM paramakuRqalIm o avya u vic samboDane AhvAne smaraRe anukalpane a nukalpane ca medi brahmaRi pu eka kzarakozaH ekAkzarakozaH o okAraH svaravarRRaBedaH kaRWOzWasTAnayoruccAryyaH dIrGaH dimAtratvAt plutastu tri mAtraH sacodAttAnudAtta svaritaBedEH pratyekamanunAsikAnanunAsikAByAM dvEviDyAt zaqviDaH taTA pluto pi zaqviTaH evaM dvAdaSaviDaH taparatve kAraparatve ca svarUpaparaH tantre tasya vAcakaSabdA varRA BiDAne uktA yaTA okAraH latyapIyUzO paScimAsyaH SrutiH sTirA sadyojAto vAsudevo gAyatrI dArGaja NGakaH ApyAyanI cordDvadanto lakzmIrvARImuKI dvijaH uddeSya darSakastIvraH kElAso vasuGAkzaraH praRavAMSo brahmasUtramajeyaH sarvamaNgalA trayodaSI dIrGanAsArati nATo digambaraH trElokyavijayA prajYA prItivIjAdi karziRI iti tadaDizWAtfdevatA ca tatrEvoktA jvAlAsyOkAragA jYeyA BImA ca mattamAlinI tasya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDe ta uktaM yaTA okAraM caYcalA pANgi paYcadebamayaM sadA raktavidyullatAkAraM triguRAtmA namISvaram paYcaprARamayaMvarRaM namAmi devamAtaram etadvarRaM maheSAni svayaM paramakuRqalIm o avya u vic samboDane AhvAne smaraRe a nukalpane ca medi brahmaRi pu ekAkzarakozaH

pA pA pA pAne BvA para saka aniw Siti pibAdeSaH pibati pivAdeSaH pivati apAt papO peyAt pIyate pItvA pItaH pAyaH peyaM prapA Ric pAyayati RO Ni ROcaNi apIpyat pipAsati pepoyate pipA sati pepIyate pA rakzaRe adA para saka sew pAti apAsIt papO pAyAt Ric pAlayati apIpalat palanam pAlanam pAlakaH pA pAne BvA para saka aniw Siti pivAdeSaH pivati apAt papO peyAt pIyate pItvA pItaH pAyaH peyaM prapA Ric pAyayati ROcaNi apIpyat pipA sati pepIyate pA rakzaRe adA para saka sew pAti apAsIt papO pAyAt Ric pAlayati apIpalat pAlanam pAlakaH
pARItaka pARItaka pARItaka pu kumArAnucaramAtfBede BA Sa a
pARiDarma pARiDarma pARiDarma pu pARigrahaRAKyo DarmaH SA ta pARigrahaRarUpe Darme pARiDarmo nAhuzAyaM napuMBiH sevitaH purABA a A
pARiDarmma pARiDarmma pARiDarmma pu pARigrahaRAKyo DarmmaH SA ta zARi grahaRarUpe Darmme pARiDarmo nAhuzAyaM napuMBiH sevitaH zurA BA a A
pARihoma pARihoma pARihoma pu ta pAtravrahmaRAnAM pARO karttavyehome udDftya GftAktamannamanujYAzayatyagnO karizye karavE kara vARIti ityupakrame aByanujYAyAM pARizveva vA ASva gf sU aByanujYAyAmiti yadi brAhmaRAH pARizu homamaByanujAnanti agnikAryakaraRaM yadi pA Rizu svezAmaByupagacCantItyarTaH taTA sati pARizu ju hoti tAByAmeva mantrAByAM pARizu juhuyAt brA hmaRAH pitrAditrayArTam upavizwAstezAM sarvezAM pARizu juhotIti vacanAt mantrO ca dvO tatrArTAdekEkAm A hutiM vigfhya vigfhya sarvezAM dakziRapARizu juhoti nArA kuSabrAhmaRapakze jale eva sa homo viDeyaH agnyaBAve tu viprasya pARAveva jale pi vA matsyapu vAkyAt etayoH pakzayorapi anUhenEva agnO karizye karuzva ityevAnujYApaSrO SrA ta raGu

pARikUrccA pARikUrccA pARikUrccA strI kumArAnucaramAtfBede BA Sa a

pARikarmman pARikarmman pARikarmman pu pARiByAM vAdanarUpaM karmmAsya mahAdeve BA SA pARiByAM vAdake tri
pARimarda pARimarda pARimarda pu pARiM mfdnAti mfda aR upa sa karamarda rAjani karamardakamAtre tri Sabdaca
pARimardda pARimardda pARimardda pu pARiM mfdnAti mfda aR upa sa kara mardde rAjani karamardakamAtre tri
pARisargyA pARisargyA pARisargyA strI pARiByAM sfjyate sO sfja karmaRi Ryat kutvam rajjvAm si kO
pARisvAnaka pARisvAnaka pARisvAnaka tri pARisvanaH prayojanamasya Wak hasta tAladAyake pARivAdake BA dro a
pARivAda pARivAda pARivAda pu pARiM pARinA mfdaNgAdikaM vA vAdayati vada Ric ac hastatAqake hastena mfdaNgAdi vAdake ca amaraH Rvul pARivAdaka tatrArTe tri hemaca
pARqakapuzpikA pARqakapuzpikA pARqakapuzpikA strI pARqaraM puzpamasyAH kap kApi ata ittvam SItalAvfkze Sabdaca

pARqukarman pARqukarman pARqukarman na ta SuklavarRasampAdane suSrutokte vraRasya upakramaRe cikitsABede pARqu karaRamapyatra kfzRakarmaSuklakarmaRI tu saprakAre tatrokte yaTA BallAtakAn vAsayettu kzIre prANmUtraBAvitAn tato dviDA CedayitvA lOhe kumBe niDApayet kumBe nyasminniKAnyeta taM kumBamaTa yojayet muKaM muKena sanDAya gomayErdAhayettataH yaHsnehaScyavate tasmAdgrAhayettaM SanErBizak grAmyAnUpaSaPAndagDAn sUkzmacUrRAni kArayet tElenAnena sasfzwaM SuklamAlepayedvraRam BallAtakaviDAnena sArasnehAMstu kArayet ye ca kecitPalasnehaviDAnaM tezu kIrttitam durUQatvAttu kfzRAnAM pARqukarma hitaM Bavet saprarAtraM sTitaM kzire CAgale rohiRIPalam tenEva pizwaM suSlakzRaM savarRakaraRaM hitam
pARqukarmman pARqukarmman pARqukarmman na ta SuklavarRasampAdane suSrutokte vra Rasya upakramaRe cikitsABede pARqukaraRamapyatra kfzRa karmaSuklakarmaRI tu saprakAre tatrokte yaTA BallAtakAn vAsayettu kzIre prANmUtraBAvitAn tato dviDA Ceda yitvA lOhe kumBe niDApayet kumBe nyasminniKAnyeta taM kumBamaTa yojayet muKaM muKena sanDAya gomayE rdAhayettataH yaH snehaScyavate tasmAdgrAhayettaM SanE rBizak grAmyAnUpaSaPAndagDAn sUkzmacUrRAni kAra yet telenAnena sasfzwaM SuklamAlepayedvraRam BallA takaviDAnena sArasnehAMstu kArayet ye ca kecitPala snehaviDAnaM tezu kIrttitam durUQatvAttu kfzRAnAM pARqukarma hitaM Bavet saptarAtraM sTitaM kzire CAgale rohiRIPalam tenEva pizwaM suSlakzRaM savarRakaraRaM hitam
pAWAdyacUrRa pAWAdyacUrRa pAWAdyacUrRa na pAWA bilvAnalavyozajambUdAqimaDAtakI kawukAtivizAmustadArvIBUnimbavatsakEH sarvEretEH samaM cUrRaM kOwajataRqulAmbunA sakzOdraYca pibecCarddi jvarAtIsAraSUlavAn tfqdAhagrahaRIdozArocakAnalasAdajitcakra ukte cUrRaBede
pAWAqyacUrRa pAWAqyacUrRa pAWAqyacUrRa na pAwA vilvAnalavyozajambUdAqimaDAtakI kawukAtivizAmustadArvIBUnimbavatsakEH sarvEretEH saBaM cUrRaM kOwajataRqulAmbunA sakzOdraYca pibecCarddi jvarAtIsAraSUlavAn tfqdAhagrahaRIdozArocakA nalasAdajit cakra ukte cUrRaBede
pAd pAd pAd pu pada Ric kvip caraRe pAde jawA
pAdData pAdData pAdData na padDatInAM samUhaH BikzA aRa padDatisamUhe
pAdarajjvu pAdarajjvu pAdarajjvu strI pAdabanDanArTA rajjvuH SA ta hastyAdeH pAda banDanArTe dAmAni jawADa
pAdarajjyu pAdarajjyu pAdarajjyu strI pAdabanDanArTA rajjyaH pA ta hastagade pOdabanDanArTe dAmani jawADa
pAdvata pAdvata pAdvata na padvatInAM samUhaH BikzA aR padvatisamUhe
pAjaps pAjaps pAjaps na pAti rakzatyanena pA asun juw ca bale ni GaRwuH pfzo pasya baH bAjas anne niGaRwuH pAjase hitam yat pAjasya balakare tri yaju
pAjas pAjas pAjas na pAti rakzatyanena pA asun juw ca bale niGaRwuH pfzo pasya vaH vAjas anne niGaRwuH pAjase hitam yat pAjasya balakare tri yaju
pAla pAla pAla rakzaRe cu uBa saka sew pAlayati te apIpalat ta pAla tri pAlayati pAla ac rakzake pAladozavinASe ca pAle daRqo viDIyate iti smftiH BAve ac rakzaRe pu pAla rakzaRe cu uBa saka sew pAlayati te apIpalat ta pAla tri pAlayati pAla ac rakzake pAladozavinASe ca pAle daRqo viDIyate iti smftiH BAve ac rakzaRe pu
pAliMhira pAliMhira pAliMhira strI maRqalisarpaBede suSrutaH ahiSabde dfSyam
pAlihira pAlihira pAlihira strI maRqalisarpaBede suSrutaH ahiSabde dfSyam
pApardDi pApardDi pApardDi strI pApAnAmfdDiratra mfgayAyAM hemaca ta pApavfdDO ca
pApardvi pApardvi pApardvi strI pApanAmfdDiratra mfgayAyAM hemaca ta pApavfdDO ca
pArSvEkAdaSI pArSvEkAdaSI pArSvEkAdaSI strI pArSvasya hareH pArSvevarttanasya nimittamekAdaSI pArSvevarttanEkAdaSyAm BAdraSuklEkAdaSyAm pArSvavarttanaSabde dfSyam
pArSvekAdaSI pArSvekAdaSI pArSvekAdaSI strI pArSvasya hareH pArSvavarttanasya nimittame kAdaSI pArSvavarttanEkAdaSyAm BAdraSuklEkAdaSyAm pArSvavatta naSabde dfSyam
pArSvodarApraya pArSvodarApraya pArSvodarApraya pASva mudaraYca tAByAM prIRAti BojinaM prIka karkawe hemaca
pArSvodarapriya pArSvodarapriya pArSvodarapriya pArSvamudaraYca tAByAM prIRAti BojinaM prI ka karkawe hemaca
pAra pAra pAra karmasamAptO ada cu uBa saka sew pArayati te apapArat apa pArat ta pAra na paraM tIraM parameva aR pf GaY vA nadIlaNGanena prApye pare tIre amaraH prAntaBAge SazAvaDO SezAvaDO medi pAra karmasamAptO ada cu uBa saka sew pArayati te apa pArat ta pAra na paraM tIraM parameva aR pf GaY vA nadIlaNGanena prApye pare tIre amaraH prAntaBAge SezAvaDO medi
pAradArya pAradArya pAradArya na parasya dArA asya tasya karma zyaY paradAragamane taccopapAtakam yAjYa Slo
pAradAryya pAradAryya pAradAryya na parasya dArA dArA asya tasya karmma zyaY paradAragamane taccopapAtakam yAjYa Slo
pAramparya pAramparya pAramparya na paramparEva svArTe zyaY kulAdiparamparAyAm pAramparyakramAgataH iti manuH
pAramparyopadeSa pAramparyopadeSa pAramparyopadeSa pu pAramparyeRa pitrAdiparamparayA upadeSaH na tu sAkzAtkArAdijYAnam Etihye amaraH yaTA iha vawe yakzaH ityAdirUpadiSyate eva sarvEH na tu tatra yakzaH kenacit dfSyate
pAramparyya pAramparyya pAramparyya na paramparEva svArTe zyaY kulAdiparamparayAm pAramparyyakramAgataH iti manu
pAramparyyopadeSa pAramparyyopadeSa pAramparyyopadeSa pu pAramparyyeRa pitrAdiparamparayA upa deSaH na tu sAkzAtkArAdijYAnam Etihye amaraH yaTA iha vawe yakzaH ityAdirupadiSyate eva sarvEH na tu tatra yakzaH kenacit dfSyate
pArihArya pArihArya pArihArya pu parihriyate sO pari hf karmaRi GaY svArTe zyaY valaye amaraH
pArihAryya pArihAryya pArihAryya pu parihriyate sO pari hf karmaRi GaY svArTe zyaY valaya amaraH
pArikarmika pArikarmika pArikarmika tri parikarmaRi niyuktaH WaY parikarmakaraRe niyukte
pArikarmmika pArikarmmika pArikarmmika tri parikarmaRi niyuktaH WaY parikarmaka raRe niyukte
pAritIzika pAritIzika pAritIzika tri paritozaH prayojanamasya WaY pari tozArTaM dIyamAne DanAdO
pAritozika pAritozika pAritozika tri paritozaH prayojanamasya WaY paritozArTaM dIyamAne DanAdO
pAruRa pAruRa pAruRa strI paSuBede yaju striyAM NIp
pAruzRa pAruzRa pAruzRa strI paSuBede yaju striyAM NIz
pAryAptika pAryAptika pAryAptika tri paryAptireva svArTe ka sA astyasya prajYA aR sampUrRe mfgaBede puM strI Sabda striyAM NIz paryAptimAha Wak paryAptirjAteti vAdini
pArya pArya pArya pu pAre BavaH zyaY rudraBede yaju
pAryyAptika pAryyAptika pAryyAptika tri paryyAptireva svArTe ka sA astyasya prajYA aR sampUrRe mfgaBede puMstrI Sabda striyAM NIz paryyAptimAha Wak paryyAptirjAteti vAdini
pAryya pAryya pAryya pu pAre BavaH zyaY rudraBede yaju
pArzRI pArzRI pArzRI puM strI pfza ni ni vfdDi pAdagranTergalpasyADoBAge amaraH goqAri pfzWe medi sEnyapfzWe halA jigIzAyAYca pu ratnakozaH unmadastriyAM strI medi kuntyAM strI DaraRiH
pArzRi pArzRi pArzRi puMstrI pfza ni ni vfdDiH pAdagranTergulPasyADo BAge amaraH goqAri pfzWe medi sEnyapfzWe halA jigIzAyAYca pu ratnakozaH unmadastriyAM strI medi kuntyAM strI DaraRiH
pArzad pArzad pArzad strI pari d pfzo saBAyAM trikA
pAtrebahala pAtrebahala pAtrebahala pu ba va pAtre Bojanasamaye eva bahulA na tu kAryye pAtresamitA Akzepe gamye aluksa Bojanasamaya eva bahulIBUtezu kAryyAkzamezu yuktarAhyA asyAdyudAttatA
pAtrebahula pAtrebahula pAtrebahula pu ba va pAtre Bojanasamaye eva bahulA na tu kArye pAtresamitA Akzepe gamye aluksa Bojanasamaya eva bahulIBUtezu kAryAkzamezu yuktarAhyA asyAdyudAttatA
pEnadDaka pEnadDaka pEnadDaka tri pinadDa caturarTyAM varAhA kak pinadDasamI pAdO
pEnadvaka pEnadvaka pEnadvaka tri pinadva caturarTyA varAhA kak pinadvasamIpAdO
pF pF pF pAlane pUrttO ca kyA kyrA BvA para saka sew SnApratyaye pare Page a hrasvaH pfRAti apArIt papAra paparatuH papratuH pF pUrttO cu uBa cra uma saka sew pArayati te apIparat ta pF pAlane pUrttO ca kyrA BvA para saka sew SnApratyaye pare Page a hrasvaH pfRAti apArIt papAra paparatuH papratuH pF pUrttO cra uma saka sew pArayati te apIparat ta
pIWasaMrpa pIWasaMrpa pIWasaMrpa tri pIWe sarpati sfpa ac KaYje BA va a Rini pIWasarpin tatrArTe hArA
pIWasarpa pIWasarpa pIWasarpa tri pIWe sarpati sfpa ac KaYje BA va a Rini pIWasarpin tatrArTe hArA
pIhan pIhan pI plI han pu pli kanin pfzo vA dIGeH pilA vAmakukzipArSvasTe mAMsaKaRqetaduvfdDihetuke rogaBede ca tannidAnAdi BAvapra uktaM yaTA vidAhyaBizyandirasya jantoH praduzwamatyarTamasfkkaPanna plohABivfdDiM kurutaH pravfdDO taMplohasaYjYa gadamAmamanti vAme sa pArSve parivfdDimeti viSezataH sodati cAturo tra mandajvarAgniH kaPazittaliNgEruzadrataH kzIRabalo tipARqu vidAhi kulatTamAzasarzapaSAkAdi aBizandi mAhizaM daDyAdi kaPapittalihgErupadruta ityarTaH praduzwamatyarTamasfkkaPacCeti samprAptiH asfjaH pittasya ca samAnaDarmatvAt raktajamAha klamo Bramo viwAhaScava vEvarRyaM gAtragOravam moho raktodaratvaYca jYeyaM raktajalakzaRam pEttikasya lakzaRamAha sajvaraH sapipAsaSca sadAho mohasaMyutaH pItagAtrO viSezeRa plIhA pEttika ucyate ScEzRikalakzaRamAha plohA mandavyaTAsTUlaH kaWino gOravAnvitaH arocakena saMyuktaH plIhA kaPaja ucyate vAtikamAha nityamAnadvakozWaH syAnnityodAvarttapIqitaH vedanABiH parItaSca plIhA vAtika ucyate tamasADyamAha dozatritayarUpo nyaH prIhA sADyo Bavatyapi BAvapra tatrEvAnyatratatasTAnamuktaM yaTA aTa SarIrAvayavaviSezasya yakftplo hasvarUpamAha aDo dakziRataScApi hfdayAduyakftaH sTitiH tattu raYjakapittasya sTAnaM SoRitajaM matam
pItabIjA pItabIjA pItabI vI jA strI pItaM vI vI jamasyAH meTikAyAM rAjani
pItalIha pItalIha pItalIha na nityakarma pittale rAjani
pItaloha pItaloha pItaloha na nityakarma pitale rAjani
pItavAsam pItavAsam pItavAsam pu pItaM vAso lasya SrIkfzRe halA haridrABavastrayute tri
pItavAsas pItavAsas pItavAsas pu pItaM vAso yasya SrIkfzRe halA haridrABavastrayute tri
pItavIjA pItavIjA pItavI bI jA strI pItaM vI bI jamasyAH meTikAyAM rAjani
pIvIpavasana pIvIpavasana pIvIpavasana tri pIvasaH upavasanaM samIpasTitirasya pfzo salopaH sUkzme yaju vedadIpaH
pIvopavasana pIvopavasana pIvopavasana tri pIvasaH upavasanaM samIpasTitirasya pfzo salopaH sUkzme yaju vedadIpaH
pORqamAtsyaka pORqamAtsyaka pORqamAtsyaka pu rAjaBede BA A a
pORqarya pORqarya pORqarya na puRqaryameva aR puRqarye BarataH
pORqaryya pORqaryya pORqaryya na puRqaryyameva aR puRqaryye BarataH
pORqramAtsyaka pORqramAtsyaka pORqramAtsyaka pu rAjaBede BA A a
pOrAgIva pOrAgIva pOrAgIva tri purAga kfSASvA caturarTyAM CaR pUrvakAla gatasyAdUradeSAdO
pOrAgIya pOrAgIya pOrAgIya tri purAga kfSASvA caturarTyAM CaR pUrvakAlagatasyAdUradeSAdO
pOrvAparya pOrvAparya pOrvAparya na pUrvAparayorBAvaH zyaY pUrvAparatve
pOrvAparyya pOrvAparyya pOrvAparyya na pUrvAparayorBAvaH zyaY pUrvAparatve
pOrvArdDa pOrvArdDa pOrvArdDa rdDika rdDya tri pUrvArdDe BavaH yat aY WaY vA pUrvArdDaBave
pOrvArdDya pOrvArdDya pOrvArdDya rdvika tri pUrvArdDe BavaH yat aY WaY vA pUrvArdDaBave
pU pU pU SoDe di Atma saka sew pUyate apavizwa pupuve pUta pU SoDe BvA A saka sew pavate apavizwa pupuve pUtaH pUta pavitraH pU SoDe krayAdi kyrAdi pvA uBa saka sew punAti punIte apAvIt apavizwa pupAva pupuve Arze kvacit SnApatyayasya hasvaH SnApratyayasya hrasvaH smaraRAt punate pApaM DAraRAt pUrvasaYcitam pU SoDe di Atma saka sew pUyate apavizwa pupuve pUta pU SoDe BvA A saka sew pavate apavizwa pupuve pUta pavitraH pU SoDe kyrAdi pvA uBa saka sew punAti punIte apAvIt apavizwa pupAva pupuve Arze kvacit SnApratyayasya hrasvaH smaraRAt punate pApaM DAraRAt pUrvasaYcitam
pUrRAvabAta pUrRAvabAta pUrRAvabAta pu karma nfsiMhe rAme SrIkfzRe ca tezAM BagavataH saMpUrRAvatAratvAt taTAtvaM anyezAntu kalAvatAra tvam pUrRo nfsiMho rAmaSca SvetadvIpavirAq viBuH paripUrRatamaH kfzRo vEkuRWe gokule svayam vEkuRWe kamalAkAnto rUpaBedAccaturBujaH goloke gokule rADAkAnto yaM dviBujaH svayam brahmavE janmaKa a uktestezAM taTAtvam
pUrRAvatAra pUrRAvatAra pUrRAvatAra pu karma nfsiMhe rAme SrIkfzRe ca tezAM BagavataH sampUrRAvatAratvAt taTAtvaM anyezAntu kalAvatAratvam kUrmo nfsiMho rAmaSca SvetadvIpavirAq viBuH paripUrRatamaH kfzRo vEkuRWe gOkule svayam vEkuRWe kamalAkAnto rUpaBedAccaturBujaH goloke gokule rADAkAnto yaM dviBujaH svayam brahmavE janmaKa a uktestezAM taTAtvam
pUrRakakud pUrRakakud pUrRakakud pu pUrRaM kakudamasya avasTAyAm antyalopaH samA tAruRyAvasTe vfze anavasTAyAM tu nAntyalopaH
pUrRakakuda pUrRakakuda pUrRakakuda pu pUrRaM kakudamasya avasTAyAm antyalopaH samA tAruRyAvasTe vfze anavasTAyAM tu nAntyalopaH
pUra pUra pUra pUrttO prIRane ca divA Atma saka sew pUryate pUryyate apUri apUrizwa pupUre Idit pUrRaH pUra pUrttO prIRane cu uBa saka sew pUrayati apUpurat ta pUritaH pUra pu pUra ka jalasamUhe KAdyaBede vraRaSudDO ca medi dAhAguruRi na rAjani pUra pUrttO prIRane ca divA Atma saka sew pUryyate apUri apUrizwa pupUre Idit pUrRaH pUra pUrttO prIRane cu uBa saka sew pUrayati apUpurat ta pUritaH pUra pu pUra ka jalasamUhe KAdyaBede vraRaSudDO ca medi dAhAguruRi na rAjani
pUrba pUrba pUrba nimantraRe saka nivAse aka cu uBa sew pUrvayati te apupUrvat ta ozWyAnto yam
pUrbaBAva pUrbaBAva pUrba rva BAva pu pUrbo BAvaH pUrbavarttitve kAraRatve yena saha pUrbaBAyaH kAraRamAdAya vA yasyaBAzA kurma pUrvavarttini BAve padArTaDarmaBede SfNgArarasasya pUrvarAgAparaparyAye BAvaBede
pUrbaBAvin pUrbaBAvin pUrba rva BAvin tri pUrvaM Bavati BU Rini kAraRe pUrbavartini padArTamAtre ca sAM sU
pUrbaBadrapadA pUrbaBadrapadA pUrba rva Ba BA drapadA Badrasya vfzasyeva padaM caraRamasya tasyedamaR vA karma aSvinyAdizu paYcaviMSatitamanakzatre tatsvarUpAdikaM aSlezASabde uktam
pUrbaPalgunI pUrbaPalgunI pUrba rva PalgunI strI aSvinyAdizu ekAdaSe nakzatre aSlezASabde ekAdaSe nakzatre tadISAdi dfSyam
pUrbaPalgunIBava pUrbaPalgunIBava pUrba rva PalgunIBava pu pUrva rva PalgunyAM Bavati BU ac bfhaspatO SabdamAlA
pUrbacitti pUrbacitti pUrba rva citti tri cita BAve ktin pUrbaM rvaM cittiH smaraRaM yasya pUrbAnuBavavizaye yaju apsAroBede strI harivaM a
pUrbadakziRA pUrbadakziRA pUrba rva dakziRA strI pUrba rva syA dakzimasyAScAntarAlA dik diNnAmAnyantarAle pA sa pUrbadakziRayordiSorantarAlAyAM diSi agnikoRe taddiksTe deSe ca mArka pu a
pUrbadeSa pUrbadeSa pUrba rva deSa pu pUrba rva varttI deSaH jambudvIpasTe deSaBede sa ca deSaH vf saM a kUrmaviBAge darSitaH
pUrbadeva pUrbadeva pUrba rva deva pu pUrbe rve devAH asure amaraH tezAM praTamaM devatvena jAyamAnatve pi anyAyAcaraRAt tato BrazwAnAM dEtyaBAvaM prAptiriti pOrARikI kaTAnusanDeyA karma pUrbatanayoH devayoH naranArAyaRayoH dvi va BA u a
pUrbadevatA pUrbadevatA pUrba rva devatA strI karma anAdidevaBAvezu pitfzu akroDanAH SOcaparAH satataM brahmacAriRaH nyastaSaStrA mahABAgAH pitaraH pUrba rva devatAHmanuH tadaDikaM pitfSabde dfSyam
pUrbadiS pUrbadiS pUrba rva diS strI karma prAcyAM diSi yasyAM diSi yezAM sUryasya praTamadfzwiHtezAM sA dikprAcI tajjajYAnopAyaSca digjYAnaSabde dfSyaH
pUrbadigbala pUrbadigbala pUrba rva digbala na digbalaSabde ukte sUryAdigrahARAM kAlaBede pUrvasyAM diSiBave balaBede
pUrbadigvadana pUrbadigvadana pUrba rva digvadana na pUrvadiSi vadanasya digbadanaSabde ukte mezasahaDanUrUparASitrike
pUrbadikpati pUrbadikpati pUrba rva dikpati pu karma ta indre hema pUrba rva digISAdayo pyatra mezasiMhAdirASizu prAgAdikakuBAM nATA yaTAsaNKyAM pradakziRam mezAdyA rASayo jYeyA strirAvfttipariBramAt jyo ta
pUrbadizwa pUrbadizwa pUrba rva dizwa tri pUrbaM rvaM dizwaM BAgyaM sADanatvEnAstyasya ac pUrbabAgyAnurUpeRa jAte duHKAdO dEvErmatyasya yatprokta pUrba rva dizwaM hi tat smftam BAga Slo pUrvaM rvaM dizwaMm pUrbavihite tri
pUrbagaNgA pUrbagaNgA pUrba rva gaNgA strI nityaka narmadAnadyAM hema
pUrbaja pUrbaja pUrba rva ja pu pUrvasmin kAle jAyate jana qa jyezWaBrAtari raGuH jyezWaBaginyAM strI amaraH pUrbakAlajAtamAtre tri jyezWAmUlIyamicCanti mAsamAzAQa pUrba rva jam candralokasTe divyapitfgaRe aTa pUrba rva jAH pitaraScandragolasTA nyastaSastrAH svaDABujaH kavyabAlAdayaste ca trikA pitAmahAdO sa pUrba rva jAnAM kapilena rozAt raGuH
pUrbajina pUrbajina pUrba rva jina pu karma prAcIne jinaBede maYjuGozapraBftO trikA
pUrbakAlika pUrbakAlika pUrba rva kAlika tri pUrba rvaH kAlaH sADanatayA styasya Wan pUrba rva kAlasADye darSanaM pUrba rva kAlikamBA sa sO a pUrba rva kAle BavaH WaYi vfdDiH pOrvya rba kAlika ityeva tatrArTe tri striyAM NIp iti BedaH
pUrbakAya pUrbakAya pUrba rva kAya pu pUrba rva kAyasya ekadeSita kAyasya pUrvaBAge
pUrbakarman pUrbakarman pUrba rva karman na karma praTame karmaRi karma triviDaM pUrbakarmapraDAnakarma paScAtkarmeti suSrutaH pUrvaBAge
pUrbakft pUrbakft pUrba rva kft pu pUrvA rbA karoti kf kvip vfttO puMvat pUrba rva diksUcake Aditye tadaDipe indre ca yaju pUrba rva kArakamAtre tri
pUrbakowi pUrbakowi pUrba rva kowi strI vipratipattO pUrbopAtte vizaye pUrvapakze
pUrbanadI pUrbanadI pUrba rva nadI strI karma kUrmaviBAge uktAyAM pUrvadiksTAyAM nadyAM tato nadyantatvAt Qak uttarapadavfdDiH pUrvanAdeya tatra Bave tri
pUrbapAYcAlaka pUrbapAYcAlaka pUrba rva pAYcAlaka tri pUrvasmin paYcAle BavaH vuY uttarapadavfdDiH pUrbapaYcAlaBave pUrbaM paYcAlAnAm ekadeSisa tatra BavaH aRi tu nottarapadavfdDiH pOrbapaYcAla ityeva si kO
pUrbapAda pUrbapAda pUrba rva pAda pu pUrbaM pAdasya ekadeSisa agracaraRe kAtyA
pUrbapAlin pUrbapAlin pUrba rva pAlin pu pUrbaM deSaM diSaM vA pAlayati pAli Rini pOrastyadeSapatinfpaBede pUrbadigISe indre ca
pUrbapAwaliputraka pUrbapAwaliputraka pUrba rva pAwaliputraka tri pUrbapAwaliputre BavaH vuY na pUrbapadavfdDiH pUrbapAwaliputranagaraBave
pUrbapIWikA pUrbapIWikA pUrba rva pIWikA strI karma kaTAgranTAvataraRikABede
pUrbapUrba pUrbapUrba pUrba rva pUrba rva tri pUrva vIpsAyAM dvitvam vIpsArTaka pUrbaSabdArTe
pUrbapada pUrbapada pUrba rva pada na karma pUrvavarttini viBaktyante pade pUrbapadAt saYjYAyAmagaH pA pUrvavattisTAne ca pUrvapadamaDIte pUrbottarapadAt vArtti ikan pUrbapadika tadvettaritadaDyAyini ca
pUrbapakza pUrbapakza pUrba rva pakza pu karma Suklapakze amaraH SAstrIyasaMSayanirAsArTapraSne PakikAyAm sidDAntavirudDakowO vizayo vizayaScEva pUrvapakzastaTottaram ityukta aDikaraRAvayavaBede vyavahAre pratijYAparaparyAye BAzApatrarUpe praTamavAyavaBede tallakzaRAdikaM vIrami uktaM yaTA pUrvapakzaH smftaH pAdo dvitIyaScottarastaTA kriyApAdastftIyastu caturTo nirRayastaTAiti bfhaspativacanasTaM nirRayaPalakaparAmarSarUpapratyAkalitaparameva nirRayapadamupacArAdityAha itaraTA pUrvAdAhftatadvanacanaviroDaH syAt tatra pratijYAvAdIM kaH syAdityapekzite nAradaH rAjYe kuryAt pUrvamAvedanaM yastasya jYeyaH pUrvavAdo viDijYEHiti pUrbavAdaH pratijYA pUrvavAdakasyEva pratijYAvAditetyasyApavAdamAha sa eva yasya vAByaDikA pIqA kAryaM vAByadikasamBavet tasyArTivAdo dAtavyo na yaH pUrbaM nivedayet arTivAdaH pratijYA bfhaspatiH ahaMpUrvirva kayA yAtAvarTipratyarTinO yadA vAdo varRAnupUrveRa grAhyaH pIqAmavekzya ceti manurapi arTAnarTAvuBO budDa DarmADarmO ca kevalO varRakrameRa sarvARi paSyet kAryARi kAryiRAm brAhmaRAdInAM yugapadDarmADikaraRaM prAptAnAM varRAnukrameRa brAhmaRasyAdO tataHkzatriyasyetyevamAdikrameRa catuzpAdvyavahAraH pravarttanIyo rAjYA pIqADikyakAryagOravaM cedarTipratyarTinoranyatarasya tadA na pUrvAvedanakramo nApi varRakramaH yadA tu sarve savarRAstadA AvedanakramaH yugapadAvedane samAnavarRatve samAnapIqatve ca sasamaByasamApatIcCayeti nirgalito rTaH pratijYAlakzaRamAha yAjYavalkyaH pratyarTino grato leKyaM yaTAveditamarTanA samAmAsatadardAharnnAmajAtyAdicihnitam arTyAta ityarTaH sADyaH so syAstItyarTI tadviparItaH pratyarTI tasyAgrataH purato leKyaM leKanIyaM sasaByena saBApatinA yaTAveditaM pUrvAvedanamanatikramya yena prakAreRAvedanasamaye svavacanaM leKitaM taTEva pratyarTisamakzamapi na punaranyaTA taTA satyanyavAditvena BaNgaprasaNgAt anyavAdItyAdi hInalakzaRe vakzyate prAgevArTinA svapratijYAtArTasya liKitatvAdaDunA leKanamarTakamityASaNkAnirAsAyAha samAmAseti saMvatsaramAsapakzatiTivArAdipratyarTinAmatadIyajAtiBirAdiSabdopAtteSca dravyasaNKyAtajjAti fRagrahaRAdisTAnavelAkzaRAliNgAdiBiryaTopayogaM cihnitamiti kAryamAtramAvedanakAle liKitamaDunopayuktasahitaM liKyata iti nAnarTakyamiti BAvaH AdiSabdagrAhyARi ca kAtyAyana Aha niveSya kAlaM varzaM ca mAsaM pakzaM tiTi taTA velAM pradeSaM vizayaM sTAnaM jAtyAkftI vayaH sADyaM pramARaM dravyaYca saNKyA nAma taTAtmanaH rAjYAM ca kramaSo nAma nivAsaM sADyanAma ca kramAt pitFRAM nAmAni pIqAmAhartfdAyakO kzamAliNgAni cAnyAni pakzaM saNkalpya kIrttayet kAloDanaprayogAdikAlaH varzaMpatraliKanakAlInam evaM mAsapakza tiTayo pi sanDyAvandanAdikriyopalakzitaH kAlo velA pradeSaH kzetrAdisTalaviSezaH vizayo ntarvedyAdivizayaH syAnaM vivAdAspadIBUtagfhAdigrAmAdi pratiBUpaBftInAM DanikAdikftA AharttA pratigrahAdivizayavastUni AnetA dAyako dAtfvikretrAdiH kzaRAliNgAnyAtmIyaDanAdeH paropaBogAdyaparADasahanacihnAni anyat suvoDam saMNgrahakAro pi arTavadDarmasaMyuktaM paripUrRamanAkulam sADyavadvAcakapadaM prakftArTAnuvanDi ca prasidDamavirudDaYca niScitaM sADanakzamam saMkziptanniKilArTaM ca deSakAlAviroDi ca varzartumAsapakzAharvelAdeSapradeSavat sTAnAvasaTasADyAKyAjAtyAkAravayoyutam sADyapramARaM saNkyAvadAtmapratyarTinAma ca parAtmapUrvajAnekarAjanAmaBiraNkitam kzamAliNgAtmapIqAvat kaTitAhartfdAyakam yadAvedayate rAjYe tadBAzetyabiDIyate iti arTavat prayojanavat DarmasaMyuktam alpAkzarapraBUtArTatvAdiguRayuktam paripUrRamaDyAhArAdyanapekzam anAkulamasandigDAkzaram sADyavat sADanIyArTayutam vAcakapadam gORalAkzaRikapadarahitam prakftArTAviroDi prAgAveditArTena saha saMvAdi prasidDaM lokaprasidDyanatikrAntam avirudDaM purarAzwraprAqvivAkarAjAdyavirudDam purvAparAvirudDaM vyavahArikaDarmAviravudDaYca niScitaM saMSayarahitam sADanakzamam sADanArham saMkziptaM SabdAqambaraSUnyam niKilArTaM niravaSezavaktavyArTapratipAdakam deSalokAviroDi maDAdeSIyamukakzetram deSakAlaviroDitvamarTipratyarTinAmASUnyatvaM ceti sarvatra BAzAyAmavaSyamBAvI ni tErvinA sADyanirdeSAsidDeH varzAdIni tu yatra yAvantyupayujyante tatra tAvantyeva niveSanIyAni sarvARi na sarvatra adfzwArTatvaprasaNgAt tatra varzAdInAM kAlAnAM vfdDiDanadvEguRyAdivivAdena pratigrahakrayAdipOrvAparyavAde vopayogaH deSapradeSasTAnAnAmAhartfdAyakayorAtmAdipUrbajarAjAdinAmnAM ca sTAvarakzetrAdivivAdezu sADyAKyAjAtyAkAravayasAM cOryyAdisvAmyavikrayAdivivAdezu pramARasaMKyayormeyatulitAdidravyavivAde cOryyAdivivAde ca kzamAliNgAnAmupekzitaparokzaBujyamAnaBUmyAdivivAde AtmapIqAyA fRikapratiBvAdivivAde evamanyadapyunneyam ataevASayAdAha kAtyAyanaH deSaYcEva taTA sTAnaMsanniveSastaTEva ca jAtiH saYjYADivAsaSca pramARaM kzetranAma ca pitfpEtAmahaYcEva pUrvarAjAnukIrttitam sTAvarezu vivAdezu deSEtAni niveSayetiti etezAM tatropayogitvAt hArIto pi AsanaM SayanaM yAnantAmraM kAMsyamayomayam DAnyamaSmamayaM yacca dvipadaYca catuzpadam maRimuktAprabAlAni hIrakA rUpyakAYcanam yadi dravyasamUhaH syAt saNKyA kAryA tadEva tu yasmin deSe ca yaddravyaM yena mAnena mIyate tena tasmiMstadA saNKyA karttavyA vyavahAriBiHiti mAnasaNKyASabdAvatrAnyopalakzaRam atrEtAvadvivakzitaM yatra yAvadupayujyate tatra tAvanniveSyaM BAzApatre anyaTA sADyanirdeSasyApUrRatvAt pakzABAsatApatteraDikaniveSe dfzwArTatApatteriti kAtyAyano rTata evAha deSakAlavihInaSca dravyasaNKyAvivarjitaH kriyAmAnavihInaSca pakzo nAdeya izyate kriyA pramARam mAnaM sADyaparimARam yadyapi pUrvoktapakzalakzaRarahitAnAM pakzABAsatvamarTasidDaM taTApi nAradAdiBiH spazwArTaM prapaYcitam tatra nAradaH anyArTamarTahInaYca pramARAgamavarjitam leKyahInADikaM BrazwaM BAzAdozA udAhftAH etAn sa eva vivftavAn arTe sADAraRe pyeko sambanDo TAniyuktakaH leKayed yattu BAzArTamanyArTaM taM vidurbuDAH gaRakAryameko vA yadyasambanDI tadaniyukto vA leKayed yasyAM BAzAyAmityarTaH brahmahAyamiti dvezAt kroDAdvApi vadettu yaH sADyaM ca mocayet paScAdarTahInAntu tAM viduH uktaM sADyaM vAdinA yasyAntyajyate sA BAzA rTahInetyarTaH gaRite liKite meye taTA kzetragfhAdizu yatra saNKyA na nirdizwA sA pramARavivarjitA saNKyAnaM saNKyeti pyutpattyA saNKyASabdena gaRanatolanamAnAnAM parigrahaH vidyayA prAptamarTArTaM labDaM krItaM kramAgamat natvevaM liKyate yatra sA BAzA syAdanAgamA samAmAsastaTA pakzastiTirvArastaTEva ca yatrEtAni na liKyante leKyahInAntu tAM viduH avaSyaM yadyatra pUrvoktarItyA leKyaM tadrahitA leKyahInetyarTaH leKayitvA tu tAM BAzAmanirdizwe taTottare nirdiSet sAkziRaH pUrvamaDikAM tAM vinirdiSet sAkziRa iti pramARopalakzaRam vyutkramAdatrADikyantenAprAptakAlatA PalitA yatra syAttu yaTApUrba nirdizwaM pUrbavAdinA sandigDameva leKyena BrazwAM BAzAntu tAM viduH uBayaM pUrbamiti pAWe pakzadvayamapi pratijYAvAdinEva nirdizwaM syAdityarTaH prasaNgAt pakzABAso pi tatra nirRIto tra pradarSyate tatra kAtyAyanaH aprasidDaM nirAbADaM nirarTaM nizprayojanam asADyaM vA virudDaM vA pakzABAsaM vivarjayet aprasidDamAha bfhaspatiHna kenacit kfto yastu so prasidDa udAhftaH yaTA Palasahasrakfzwakzetramapahftamiti madIyaM SaSavizARaM gfhItvA na prayacCatItyAdyaprasidDamityAha vijYAneSvaraH bfhaspatinA tvidamasADyodAharaRamuktaM tacca vakzyate nirAbADannirupadrava mama mandire dIzpamAnadIpakaprakASenAyaM svamandire vyavaharatItipraBfti nirarTa maBiDeyahInaM madIyaM kacawatapaYjabagaqadaSaM vA gfhItvA na dadAtItyAdi vijYAnayogI bfhaspativacanAt tvanyaTA nirarTakapadArTaH pratIyate yaTAhasvalpApaparADaH svalpArTo nirarTaka iti smftaHiti etasyodAharaRaM smfticandrikAyAm ahamanena sasmitamIkzitaH mAmakI SikzA nenApahftetyAdi nizprayojanaM yaTAyaM devadatto smadgfhasanniDO suKaramaDIte ityAdi mitAkzarAsmfticandrikayorudAhftam bfhaspatinA taTEva lakzitam kAryabADAvihInastu vijYeyo nizprayojanaHiti sa eva prakArAntareRApi nirarTanizprayojanO lakzitavAn kusIdAdyEH padErhIno vyavahAro nirarTakaH vAkpAruzyAdiBiScEva vijYeyo nizprayojanaH kusIdamfRadAnaM tatpraBftiBiScaturdaSaBirarTavizayavyavahArErhIno nirarTakaH vAkapAruzyAdiBihiMsAtmakEScaturBirhInI nizprayojanaH ityarTaH azwAdaSapadAvizayaH pakzo duzwa ityASayaH asADyavirudDAvAha eva mamAnena pradAtavyaM SaSaSfNgakftaM DanuH asamBAvyamasADyantaM pakzamAhurmanIziRaH yasminnAvedite pakze prANvivAke Ta rAjani pururAzwre viroDaHsyAdvirudDaH so BiDIyateiti mitAkzarAyAmasADyavirudDAvanyaToktO devadattenAhaM saBrU BaNgamupahasiti ityAdyasADyasADanAsamBavAt alpakAlatvAnna sAkzyAdisamBavo liKitaM dUrato lpatvAnna divyamiti mUkenAhaM Sapta ityAdi virudDamiti purarAzwrAdivirudDamapi virudDapradena vyAKyAya rAjYAvivarjita ityAdismftyantaraYca tadraTatayodAhftantacca pUrvamasmABiranAdeyavyavahAranirUpaRe liKitam anye pi pakzABAsAH smfticandrikodAhftavacanoktA jYeyAH yaTA Binnikramo vyutkramArTaH prakIrRArTo nirarTakaH atItakAlo vidvizwaH pakzo nAdeya izyate yaTAsTAnAniveSena nEva pakzArTakalpanA Sasyate tena pakzaH sa Binnakrama udAhftaH vyatyastAkzarasanniveSo Binnakrama iti yAvat vyupatkramArTo vyavahitAtvayenArTAboDakaH prakIrRArTo saNkalitArTaH mUlamarTaM parityajya tadguRo yatra liKyate nirarTakaH sa vE pakzo BUtasADanavarjitaH BUtakAlamatikrAntaM dravyaM yatra hi liKyate atItakAlaH pakzo sO pramARe satyapi smftaH yasmin pakze dviDA sADyaM BinnakAlavimarSanam vimfzyate kriyA BedaH sa pakzodvizwa ucyate BUtasADanaM mUlaBUtaM sADanaM tena varjitaH BUtakAlaH sADyakAlaH anyAnapi pakzABAsAnAha sa eva anyAkzaraniveSena anyArTagamanena ca Akulantu BavelleKyaM kriyA cEvAkulA Bavet sADanaM saha sADyena nirdizwaM yatra leKayet uktakramavihInatvAt so pi pakzo na siDyatIti virudDaScAvirudDaSca dvAvapyarTo niveSitO ekasmin yatra dfSyete taM pakzaM dUratastyajet parasparavirudDAni yaH padAni niyeSayet virudDapadasaNkIrRA BAzA tasya na siDyatIti yattu purarAzwravirudDaSca yaSca rAjYAvivarjitaH anekapadasaNkIrRaH pUrvapakzo na siDyatItismaraRAt tasyAyamarTaH rAjYA vivarjito rAjatyakta SulkAdivizayakarRAdAnAdi padamiSritastu kriyABedena yugapanna siDyatIti madIyA rUpakA iyanto nayA vfdDyA nena gfhItAH suvarRaYca mayA nikzepIkftamayamidaM madIyakzetramaramapaharatItyanekapadavizayasyApi pakzasya krameRApyanupAdeyatve tattvanirRayABAvaprasaNgena yuktiviroDAt bahupratijYaM yatkAryaM vyavahArezu niScitam kAmaM tadapi gfhRIyAdrAjA tattvabuBUtasyet kAtyAyanavacanaviroDAcca tasmAdyumapat pakzABAsatetyeva ramaRIyam anekavastusaNkIrRasyApakzatvantvatatatpadasambadDam hiraRyarupakavAsAMsi vAnena matto vfDyA gfhItAnyasya haste mayA nikziptAnyanenApahftAni vetyekasminnapi pade yugapadapIdfSapakzopanyAsasyAduzwtvAt sADyaYca viDimuKena pratizeDamuKena vA pakzanikzepaRIyamityAha kAtyAyanaH nyAyaM saMyacCate kartumanyAyaM vA karotyayam na seKayati yastvevaM tasya pakzo na sidDyati nyAyaM samityanena mamEtAvadDanamAdAya na dadAtItyAdi pratibanDamuKatA pi lakzitA anyAyaM vetyanena mamedamapaharatItyAdi viDimuKatA pradarSitA bfhaspatirapi pratijYAdozanirmuktaM sADyaM satkAraRAnvitam niScitaM lokasidDaYca pakzaM pakzavido viduHiti pratijYAdozEH pratijYAsADyAsAdiBirmuktaM rahitam te ca darSitAH prAk sADyaM sADanArham satkAraRAnvitaM sPuwadozarahitahetusahitam niScitaM sandehAjanakavAkyaracanAyuktaM na tu svayameva niScitaM vipratipattAvarTaniScayABAvAt lokasidDaM vyavahArikaDarmAvirudDam ataeva manuHsatyA na BAzA Bavati yadyapi syAt pratizWitA vahiScedBAzyate DarmAnniyatAdvyavahArikAt pratizWitA prasidDatvAdidozanirmukta BAzA pratijYA vyAvahArikaDarmAdvirudDA ca satyA grAhyA na Bavati rAjAdInAmityarTaH Bavadevastu yatra SrutamAtra eva sati lokAnAM sampratyayastallokasidDaM tena nirDanakfto lakzAdisaNKyaDanAkzepo na pakza iti vyAcakzO tadvADarUpapratijYAdozavattvenEva tAdfSapakzasya nirAkaraRAt pratijYAdozanirmuktamityanenEva gatArTam tataH gahA BavArTe Ca pUrvapakzIya tadBave tri
pUrbaparvata pUrbaparvata pUrba rva parvata pu nityaka udayAcale amaraH
pUrbapitAmaha pUrbapitAmaha pUrba rva pitAmaha pu pUrbaH pratAmahAt prapitAmahe BA vi a
pUrbapuruza pUrbapuruza pUrba rva puruza pu karma pitrAditrike puruze
pUrbarAga pUrbarAga pUrba rva rAga puM pUrborAgaH nAyakayormelanAt pUrbajAte anurAgaBede SrAvaRAddarSanAd vApi miTaH saMrUQa rAgayoH daSAviSezo yo prAptO pUrbarAgaH sa ucyate SravaRAntu Bavettatra dUtavandisaKermuKAt indrajAle ca citre ca sAkzAt svapne ca darSanam aBilAzaScintA smftiguRakaTanodvegasampralApASca unmAdo Ta vyADirjaqatA mftiriti daSAtra kAmadaSAH aBilAzaH spfhA cintA prAptyupAyAdicintanam nmAdaScAparicCedaScetanAcetanezvapi alakzyavAk pralApaH syAt cetaso BramaRadBfSam vyADistu dIrGaniHSvAsaH pARqutAkfSatAdayaH jaqatA hInacezwatvamaNgAnAM manasastaTA rasavicCedahetutvAnmaraRaM nEva varRyate jAtaprAyantu tadvAcyaM cetasA cApi kANkzitam varRyate pi yadi pratyujjIvanaM syAdadUrataH AdO vAcyaH striyA rAgaH puMsaH vaScAttadiNgitEH nIlIkasumBamaYjizWAHpUrbarAgo pi ca triDA na cAtiSoBate yannApEti preme manomatam tannIlIrAgamAKyAnti yaTA kzIrAmasItayoH kusumBarAgaM taM prAhuryadapEti ca SoBate maYjizWirAgamAhustaM yannApEtyatiSoBatesA da
pUrbayakza pUrbayakza pUrba rva yakza pu nityaka maRiBadrAdO jinottame trikA
pUrvAdi pUrvAdi pUrvA rbA di pu pUrvaH Adiryasya vyavasTAyAmasaMjYAyAM sarva nAmakarmanimitte SabdagaRe sa ca gaRaH pUrva para avara da kziRa uttara apara sva antara pUrvAdiByo navaByo vA pA pUrve pUrvA ityAdi pUrvA AdiryaKyAH pUrvAdikakumi strI
pUrvAhRa pUrvAhRa pUrvA rbA hRa pu pUrvamahnaH ekadeSisa wacsamA ahnAdeSaH rAtrAhAhnAntAH puMsi pA puMstvam dinasya pUrvaBAge pUrvAhRaSca triDA viBaktadinasya praTamaBAgaH pUrvAhRo vE devAnAM maDyAhno manuzyARAmiti SrutiH ahnaH praTama praharadvayakAlaSca AvarttanAttu pUrvAhRo hyaparAhRastataH param skandapu AvarttanAt paScimadigvartticCAyAyAH parivarttanam ataeva aSvatTaM vandayennityaM pUrvAhRe praharadveye mala ta
pUrvAhRatana pUrvAhRatana pUrvA rbA hRa hRe tana tri pUrvAhne kAle BavaH wyu tuw ca kAlataneti saptaGamyAnaluk pUrvAhRaBave striyAM NIp pUrvAhRaH soQo sya iti vigrahe tu pUrvAhRatana ityeva pUrvAhRasahanakarttari tri
pUrvAhRika pUrvAhRika pUrvA rbA hRika tri pUrvAhRaH sADanatayA stasya wan pUrvAhRa sADye karmaRiM dEvaM pUrvAhRikaM kuryyAdaparAhRe tu pEtfkam BA A a
pUrvAnilaH pUrvAnilaH pUrvA rbA nilaH pu karma pUrvadiksTavAyO tadguRASca pUrvastu maDuro vAtaH snigDaH kawarasAnvitaH gururbidAha Samano vAtadaH pittanASanaH rAjani prAgvAto maDuraH kzAro vahnimAndyakaro guruH vErasyagOravO zRyAni karotyapsvozaDIzu ca BagnotpizwakzatAdyezu rAgaSvayaTudAhakft sannipAtajvaraSvAsatvagdozArSo Page b vizakrimIn kopayedAmavAtaYca GanasaMTAtakAraRam rAjavallaBaH
pUrvAnuyoga pUrvAnuyoga pUrvA rbA nuyoga pu dfzwivAdaBede pratikarmasUtrapUrvAnuyota pUrvagatacUlikAH paYca syurdfzwiHvAdaBedAH hema
pUrvApahAnA pUrvApahAnA pUrvA rbA pahAnA strI pUrvamapahIyate apa hA karmaRi lyuw ajA wAp pUrvApahAnakarmaRi ajAdigaRaH
pUrvApara pUrvApara pUrvA rbA para tri dvandva pUrbasmin aparasmin ca deSe tayo rBAvaH zyaY pOrvAparvya tadBAve na kvacinna pUrvapada vfdDiH pUrvAparyya tatrArTe na
pUrvArdDya pUrvArdDya pUrvA rbA rdDya tri pUrvArdDe BavaH pakze yat pUrvArdDaBave pakze WaY pOrvA rbA rdDika tatrArTe tri
pUrvAtiTi pUrvAtiTi pUrvA rbA tiTi pu gotrapravararziBede
pUrvAzAQA pUrvAzAQA pUrvA rbA zAQA strI karma aSvinyAdizu viMSe nakzatre tat svarUpAdikamaSlezASabde uktam
pUrva pUrva pUrva nimantraRe saka nivAse aka cu uBa sew pUrbayati te apupUrbat ta ozWyAnto yam pUrva nivAse aka nimantraRe saka BvA pa sew antyasTAnto sewa antya sTAnto yam pUrvati apUrvIt pUrva rva rba tri pUrva pUrba rva ac praTame Adye yasyAM diSi yezAM sUryasya praTamaM dfzwiH tezAM tasyAM diSi strI tadupalakzite deSe yasya yadapekzayA praTamaM janmAdi tasya tAdfSakAle tadulakzite tadupalakzite ca tasya digdeSakAlavyavasTAvAcitve sarvanAmakAryaM sarvanAmakAryyaM pUrvasmE ityAdi jasi NiNasyostu vA pUrve pUrvAH pUrvasmAt pUrbe pUrbAH pUrba smAt pUrvAt pUrve pUrvasmin pUrba pUrbasmin striyAM tu na viBAzA pUrvasyE pUrvasyAm pUrbasyE zUrbasyAm ityAdi sarvanAmatvena vfttimAtre rU puMvadBAvaH pUrvasyAM sTita pUrvasTitam pUrvasyA sya puMvad BAvaH pUrbasyAM sTitaM pUrbasTitam pUrbasyA rUpaM pUrvarUpam pUrbarUpam ityAdi pUrva nimantraRe saka nivAse aka cu uBa sew pUrbayati te apupUrbat ta ozWyAnto yam pUrva nivAse aka nimantraRe saka BvA pa sewa antya sTAnto yam pUrvati apUrvIt pUrva rba tri pUrba rva ac praTame Adye yasyAM diSi yezAM sUryasya praTamaM dfzwiH tezAM tasyAM diSi strI tadupalakzite deSe yasya yadapekzayA praTamaM janmAdi tasya tAdfSakAle tadupalakzite ca tasya digdeSakAlavyavasTAvAcitve sarvanAmakAryyaM pUrvasmE ityAdi jasi NiNasyostu vA pUrbe pUrbAH pUrba smAt pUrvAt pUrba pUrbasmin striyAM tu na viBAzA pUrbasyE zUrbasyAm ityAdi sarvanAmatvena vfttimAtre sya puMvad BAvaH pUrbasyAM sTitaM pUrbasTitam pUrbasyA rUpaM pUrbarUpam ityAdi
pUrvaBAva pUrvaBAva pUrva rba BAva pu pUrbo BAvaH pUrvavarttitve kAraRatve yena saha pUrbaBAvaH kAraRamAdrAya vA yasya BAzA kurma Page a pUrbavarttini BAve padArTaDarmaBede SfNgArarasaMsya pUrba rAgAparaparyyoya BAvaBede
pUrvaBAvin pUrvaBAvin pUrva rba BAvin tri pUbaM Bavati BU Rini kAraRe pUrvavartini padArTamAtre ca sAM sU
pUrvaBadrapadA pUrvaBadrapadA pUrva rba Ba BA drapadA strI Badrasya vfzasyeva padaM caraRamasya tasyedamaR vA karma aSvinyAdizu paYcaviMSatitamanakzatre tatsvarUpAdikaM aSlezASabde uktam
pUrvaPalgunI pUrvaPalgunI pUrva rba PalgunI strI aSvinyAdizu ekAdaSe nakzatre aSlezASabde tadISAdi dfSyam
pUrvaPalgunIBava pUrvaPalgunIBava pUrva rba PalgunIBava pu pUrva rba PalagunyAM Bavati BU ac vfhaspatO SabdamAlA
pUrvacitti pUrvacitti pUrva rba citti tri cita BAve ktin pUrvaM rbaM cittiH smaraRaM yasya pUrbAnuBavavizaye yaju ap saro Bede strI harivaM a
pUrvadakziRA pUrvadakziRA pUrva rba dakziRA strI pUrva rba syA dakziRasyAScAntarAlA dik diNnAmAnyantarAle pA sa pUrbadakziRayordiSoranta rAlAyAM diSi agnikoRe taddiksTe deSe ca mArka pu a
pUrvadeSa pUrvadeSa pUrva rba deSa pu pUrva rba varttI deSaH jambudvIpasTe deSaBede sa ca deSaH vf saM a kUrmaviBAge darSitaH
pUrvadeva pUrvadeva pUrva rba deva pu pUrbe rva devAH asure amaraH tezAM praTamaM Page b devatvena jAyamAnatve pi anyAyAcaraRAt tato BrazwAnAM dEtyaBAvaM prAptiriti pOrARikI kaTAnusanDeyA karma pUrbatanayoH devayoH naranArAyaRayoH dvi va BA u a
pUrvadevatA pUrvadevatA pUrva rba devatA strI karma anAdidevaBAvezu pitfzu akro GanAH SOcaparAH satataM brahmacAriRaH nyastaSastrA mahABAgAH pitaraH pUrba rva devatAH manuH tadaDikaM pitfSabde dfSyam
pUrvadi pUrvadi pUrva rbA di pu pUrvaH Adiryasya vyavasTAyAmasaYjYAyAM sarvaMnAmakarmanimitte SabdagaRe sa ca gaRaHpUrvaM para avara dakziRa uttara apara sva antara pUrvAdiByo navaByo vApA pUrve pUrvA ityAdi pUrvA AdiryasyAH pUrvAdikakuBi strI
pUrvadiS pUrvadiS pUrva rba diS strI karma prAcyAM diSi yasyAM diSi yezAM sUryyasya praTamadfzwiH tezAM sA dikprAcI tajjYAno pAyaSca digjYAnaSabde pf dfSyaH
pUrvadigbala pUrvadigbala pUrva rba digbala na digbalaSabde pf ukte sUryyA digrahARAM kAlaBede pUrbasyAM diSiBave balaBede
pUrvadigvadana pUrvadigvadana pUrva rba digvadana na pUrvadiSi vadanamasya digvadanaSabde pf ukte mezasiMhaDanUrUparASitrike
pUrvadikpati pUrvadikpati pUrva rba dikpati pu karma ta indre hema pUrva rba digI SAdayo pyatra mezasiMhAdirASizu prAgAdikakuBAM nATA yaTAsaMKyaM pradakziRam mezAdyA rASayo jYeyA strirAvfttipariBramAt jyo ta
pUrvadizwa pUrvadizwa pUrva rba dizwa tri pUrvaM rvaM dizwaM BAgyaM sADanatvenAstyasya ac pUrbaBAgyAnurUpeRa jAte duHKAdO dEvErmartyasya yatproktaM pUrba rva dizwaM hi tat smftam BAga Slo pUrbaM rvaM dizwam pUrbavihite tri
pUrvagaNgA pUrvagaNgA pUrva rba gaNgA strI nityaka narmadAnadyAM hema
pUrvahRa pUrvahRa pUrva rbA hRa pu pUrvamahnaH ekadeSisa wacsamA ahnAdeSaH rAtrAhAhnAntAH puMsi pA puMstvam dinasya pUrvaBAge pUrvAhRaSca triDA viBaktadinasyapraTamaBAgaH pUrvAhRo vE devAnAM maDyAhno manuzyARAmiti SrutiH ahnaH praTama praharadvayakAlaSca AvarttanAttu pUrvAhRo hyaparAhRastataH param skandapu AvarttanAt paScimadigvartticCAyAyAH parivarttanam ataeva aSvatTaM vandayennityaM pUrvAhRe praharadvayemala ta
pUrvahRatana pUrvahRatana pUrva rbA hRa hRe tana tri pUrvAhRe kAle BavaH wyu tuw ca kAlataneti saptaGamyAnaluk pUrvAhRaBave striyAM NIp pUrvAhaRaH soQo sya iti vigrahe tu pUrvAhRatana ityeva pUrvAhRasahanakarttari tri
pUrvahRika pUrvahRika pUrva rbA hRika tri pUrvAhRaH sADanatayA stasya wan pUrvAhRasADye karmaRi dEvaM pUrvAhRikaM kuryAdaparAhRe tu pEtfkam BA A a
pUrvaja pUrvaja pUrva rba ja pu pUrvasmin kAle jAyate jana qa jyezWaBrAtari raGuH jyezWaBaginyAM strI amaraH pUrbakAla jAtamAtre tri jyezWABUlIyamicCanti mAsamAzAQa pUrba rva jam candralokasTe divyapitfgaRe aTa pUrba rva jAH pitaraScandragolasTA nyastaSastrAH svaDABujaH kavyabAlAdayaste ca trikA pitAmahAdO sa pUrba rva jAnAM kapilena rozAt raGuH
pUrvajina pUrvajina pUrva rba jina pu karma prAcIne jinaBede maYju GozapraBftO trikA
pUrvakAlika pUrvakAlika pUrva rba kAlika tri pUrvaH rvaH kAlaH sADanatayA styasya Wan pUrba rva kAlasADye darSanaM pUrba rva kAlikam Page a mA sO a pUrba rva kAle BavaH WaYi vfdDiH pOrvya rba kAlika ityeva tatrArTe tri striyAM NIp iti BedaH
pUrvakAya pUrvakAya pUrva rba kAya pu pUrvaM rvaM kAyasya ekadeSita kAyasya
pUrvakarmman pUrvakarmman pUrva rba karmman na karma praTame karmaRi karma triviDaM pUrbakarmapraDAnakarma paScAtkarmeti suSrutaH pUrbaBAge
pUrvakft pUrvakft pUrva rba kft pu pUrvAM rbAM karoti kf kvip vfttO puMvat pUrba rva digasUcake Aditye tadaDipe indre ca yaju pUrba rva kArakamAtre tri
pUrvakowi pUrvakowi pUrva rba kowi strI vipratipattO pUrbopAtte vizaye pUrvapakze
pUrvanadI pUrvanadI pUrva rba nadI strI karma kUrmaviBAge uktAyAM pUrvadiksTAyAM nadyAm tato nadyantatvAt Qak uttarapadavfdDiH pUrvanAdeya tatra Bave tri
pUrvanilaH pUrvanilaH pUrva rbA nilaH pu karma pUrvadiksTavAyO taduguRASca pUrvastu maDuro vAtaHsnigDaH kawurasAnvitaH gururvidAha Samano vAtadaHpittanASanaHrAjani prAgvAto maDuraH kzAro vahnimAndyakaro guruH vErasyagoravOzRyAni karotyapsvozaDIzu ca BagnotpizwakzatAdyezu rAgaSvayaTudAhakft SannipAtajvaraSvAsatvagdozArSo vizakrimIn kopayedAmavAtaYca GanasaMGAtakAraRamrAjavallaBaH
pUrvanuyoga pUrvanuyoga pUrva rbA nuyoga pu dfzwivAdaBede pratikarmasUtrapUrvAnuyoga pUrvagatacUlikAH paYca syurdfzwiH vAdaBedAHhema
pUrvapAYcAlaka pUrvapAYcAlaka pUrva rba pAYcAlaka tri pUrvasmin paYcAle mavaH buY uttara padavfdDiH pUrbapaYcAlaBave pUrbaM paYcAlAnAm ekadeSisa tatra BavaH aRi tu nottarapadavfdDiH pOrbapaYcAla ityeva si kO
pUrvapAda pUrvapAda pUrva rba pAda pu pUrvaM pAdasya ekadeSisa agracaraRe kAtyA SrO
pUrvapAlin pUrvapAlin pUrva rba pAlin pu pUrvaM deSaM diSaM vA pAlayati pAli Rini pOrastyadeSapatinfpaBede pUrbadigISe indre ca
pUrvapAwaliputraka pUrvapAwaliputraka pUrva rba pAwaliputraka tri pUrvapAwaliputre BavaH vuY na pUrbapadavfdDiH pUrbapAwaliputranagaraBave
pUrvapIWikA pUrvapIWikA pUrva rba pIWikA strI karma kaTAgranTAvataraRikABede
pUrvapUrva pUrvapUrva pUrva rba pUrva rba tri pUrva vIpsAyAM dvitvam vIpsArTaka pUrbaSabdArTe
pUrvapada pUrvapada pUrva rba pada na karma pUrvavarttini viBaktyante pade pUrva padAt saMjYAyAmagaH pA pUrbavarttisTAne ca pUrbapadamaDIte pUrbottarapadAt vArtti ikan pUrbapadika tadvettari tadaDyAyini ca
pUrvapahAnA pUrvapahAnA pUrva rbA pahAnA strI pUrvamapahIyate apa hA karmaRi lyuw ajA wAp pUrvApahAnakarmaRi ajAdigaRaH
pUrvapakza pUrvapakza pUrva rba pakza pu karma Suklapakze amaraH SAstrIyasaMSaya nirAsArTapraSne PakikAyAm sidDAntavirudDakowO vi zayo vizayaScEva pUrvapakzastaTottaram ityuktADikaraRA vayavaBede vyavahAre pratijYAparaparyyAye BAzApatrarUpe praTamAvayavaBede tallakzaRAdikaM vIrami uktaM yaTA pUrvapakzaH smftaH pAdo dvitIyaScottarastaTA kriyA pAdastftIyastu caturTo nirRayastaTA iti vfhaspativaca nasTaM nirRayaPalakaparAmarSarUpapratyAkalitaparameva nirRaya padamupacArAdityAha itaraTA pUrvodAhftatadvacanaviroDaH syAt tatra pratijYAvAdI kaH syAdityapekzite nAradaH rAjYe kuryyAt pUrbamAvedanaM yastasya jYeyaH pUrvavAdo viDi jYEH iti pUrbavAdaH pratijYA pUrvavAdakasyEva pratijYAvAdi tetyasyApavAdamAha sa eva yasya vAByaDikA pIqA kAryyaM vAByaDikasamBavet tasyArTivAdo dAtavyo na yaH pUrbaM nivedayet arTivAdaH pratijYA vfhaspatiH ahaMpUrvi rva kayA yAtAvarTipratyarTinO yadA vAdo varRA nupUrveRa grAhyaH pIqAmavekzya ceti manurapi arTA narTAvuBO budDA DarmADarmO ca kevalO varRakrameRa sarvARi paSyet kAryyARi kAryyiRAm brAhmaRAdInAM yuga padDarmADikaraRaM prAptAnAM varRAnukrameRa brAhmaRasyAdO tataH kzatriyasyetyevamAdikrameRa catuzpAdvyavahAraH prava rttanIyo rAjYA pIqADikyakAryyagOravaM cedarTipratyarTino ranyatarasya tadA na pUrvAvedanakramo nApi varRakramaH yadA tu sarve savarRAstadA AvedanakramaH yugapadAvedane sa mAnavarRatve samAnapIqatve ca sasaByasaBApatIcCayeti Page a nirgalito rTaH pratijYAlakzaRamAha yAjYavalkyaH pratya rTino grato leKyaM yaTAveditaBarTinA samAmAsatada rdDAhannomajAtyAdicihnitam arTyata ityaTaH sADyaH so syAstItyarTI tadviparItaH pratyarTI tasyAgrataH purato leKyaM leKanIyaM sasaByena saBApatinA yaTA veditaM pUrbAvedanamanatikramya yena prakAreRAvedanasamaye sva vacanaM leKitaM taTEva pratyarTisamakzamapi na sahitaM liKyata iti nAnarTakyamiti BAvaH Adi SabdagrAhyARi ca kAtyAyana Aha niveSya kAlaM varzaM ca mAsaM pakzaM tiTiM taTA belAM pradeSaM vizayaM sTAnaM jAtyAkftI vayaH sATyaM pramARaM dravyaYca saNKyA nAma taTAtmanaH rAjYAM ca kramaSI nAma nivAsaM sADyanAma ca kramAt pitFRAM nAmAni pIqAmAhartfdAyakO kzamAliNgAni cAnyAni pakzaM saNkalpya kIrttayet kAlo DanaprayogAdikAlaH varzaM pratiBUpraBftInAM DanikAdikftA AharttA pratigrahAdivizayavastUni A netA dAyako dAtfvikretrAdiH kzamAliNgAnyAtmIya DanAdeH paropaBogAdyaparADasahanacihnAni anyat su boDam sagrahakAro pi rAjYe tadBAzetyaBi DIyate iti arTavat prayojanavat DarmasaMyuktam alpAkzarapraBUtArTatvAdiguRayuktam paripUrRamaDyAhArA dyanapekzam anAkulamasandigDAkzaram sADyavat sADa nIyArTayutam vAcakapadam gORalAkzaRikapadarahitam prakfvArTAviroDi pAgAveditArTena saha saMvAdi prasidDaM lokaprasidDyanatikrAntam abirudDaM purarAzwraprAqvivAkarA jAdyavirudDam pUrvAparAvirudDaM vyavahArikaDarmAvirudDaYca niScitaM saMSayarahitam sADanakzamam sADanArham saMkziptaM SabdAqambaraSUnyam niKilArTaM niravaSeza vaktavyArTapratipAdakam deSalokAviroDi maDyadeSIyama mukakzatram SaratkAlInaSasyAQyaM madoyamapahftamityA dideSakAlaviroDaviDuram parAtmanoH prativAdivAdi norye pUrbajAH pitrAdayastrayaH aneke rAjAnaH kzetrAdi BuktikAlInAstrezAnnAmaBiraNgitaM yuktam atrArTavattvA dIni deSakAlaviroDimyamarTipratyarTinAmASUnyatvaM ceti sarvatra BAzAyAmavaSyamBAvIni tErvinA sADyanirdeSA sidDeH varzAdIni tu yatra yAvantyupayujyante tatra tAva ntyeva niveSanIyAni sarvARina sarvatra adfzwArTatvapamaNgAt tatra varzAdInAM kAlAnAM vfdDiDanadvEguRyAdiGivAdena pratigrahakrayAdipOrvAparyyavAde vopayogaH deSapradeSa sTAnAnAmAhartfdAyakayorAtmAdipUrbajarAjAdinAmnA ca qAyA fRikapratiBvAdivivAde evamanyadapyunneyam ataevASayAdAha kAtyAyanaH deSaYcEva taTA sTAna sanniveSastaTEva ca jAtiH saMjYADivAsaSca pramARaM kzetra nAma ca pitfpEtAmahaYcEva pUrbarAjAnukIrttatam sTAvarezu vivAdezu daSEtAni niveSayet iti etezAM tatrIpayogitvAt hArIto pi AsanaM SayanaM yAnantAmraM kAMsyamayomayam DAnyamaSmamayaM yacca dvi padaYca catuzpadam maRimuktAprabAlAni hIrakA rUpya kAYcanam yadi dravyasamUhaH syAt saMKyA kAryyA tadEka tu yasmin deSe ca yaddravyaM yena mAnena mIyate tvena tasmiMstadA saNKyA karttavyA vyavahAriBiH iti Page a mAnasaMKyASabdAvatrAnyo nyopalakzaRam atrEtAvadviva kzita yatra yAvadupayujyata tatra tAvanniveSyaM BAzApatre anyaTA sADyanirdeSasyApUrRatvAt pakzABAsatApatteraDika niveSe dfzwArTatApatteriti kAtyAyano rTata evAha deSakAlavihInaSca dravyasaNKyAvivarjitaH kriyAmAnavi hInaSca pakzo nAdeya izyate kriyA pramARam mAna sADyaparimARam yadyapi pUrvoktapakzalakzaRarahitAnAM pakzABAsatvamarTasidDaM taTApi nAradAdiBiH spazwArTaM prapa Ycitam tatra nAradaH anyArTamarTahInaYca pramARAgama varjitam leKyahInADikaM BrazwaM BAzAdIzA udAhftAH etAn sa eva vivftavAn arTe sADAraRe pyeko sambanDo TAniyuktakaH leKayed yattu BAzArTamanyArTaM taM vidurbuDAH gaRakAryyamekI vA yadyasambanDI gada niyukto vA leKayed yasyAM BAzAyAmityarTaH brahma hAyamiti dvezAt kroDAdvApi vadettu yaH sADyaM ca mocayet paScAdarTahInAntu tAM viduH uktaM sADyaM vAdinA yasyAntyajyate sA BAzA rTahInetyarTaH gaRite liKite meye taTA kzetragfhAdizu yatra saNKyA na nirdizwA sA pramARavivarjitA saNKyAnaM saNKyeti vyutapattyA saNKyASabdena gaRanatolanamAnAnAM pari grahaH vidyayA prAptamarTArTaM labDaM krItaM kramAgatam natvevaM liKyate yatra sA BAzA syAdanAgamA samA mAsastaTA pakzastiTirvArastaTEva ca yatrEtAni ca li Kyante leKyahInAntu tAM viduH avaSyaM yad yatra pUrvoktarItyA leKyaM tadrahitA leKyahInetyarTaH leKa yitvA tu tAM BAzAmanirdizwe taTottare nirdiSet sAkziRaH pUrvamaDikAM tAM vinirdiSet sAkziRa iti pramARopalakzaRam vyutkramAdatrADikyantenAprAptakA latA PalitA yatra syAttu yaTApUrbaM nirdizwaM pUrbavA dinA mandigDameva leKyena BrazwAM BAzAntu tAM ziduH uBayaM pUrbamiti pAWe pakzadvayamapi pratijYAvAdinEva nirdizwaM syAdityarTaH prasaNgAt pakzABAso pi tatra nirRIto tra pradarSyate tatra kAtyAyanaH aprasidDaM nirAbADaM nirarTaM nizprayojanam asADyaM vA virudDaM vA pakzA BAsaM vivarjayet aprasidDamAha vfhasmatiH na kena cit kfto yastu so prasidDa udAhftaH yaTA Pala sahamrakfzwakzetramapahftamiti madIyaM SaSavizARaM gfhItvA na prayacCatItyAdyaprasidDamityAha vijYAneSvaraH vfha Page b spatinA tvidamasADyodAharaRamuktaM tacca vakzyate nirA bADannirupadrava mama mandire dIpyamAnadIpakaprakASenAyaM Kamandira vyavaharatItipraBfti nirarTamamiDeyahInaM ma dIyaM kacawatapaYjavagaqadaSaM vA gfhItvA na dadAtItyAdi vijYAnayogI vfhaspativacanAt tvanyaTA nirarTaka padArTaH pratIyate yaTAha KalpAparADaH svalpArzo ni rarTaka iti smftaH iti etasyodAharaRaM smfti candrikAyAm ahamanena sasmitamIkzitaH mAmakI SikzA nenApahftetyAdi nizprayojanaM yaGAyaM deva datto smadgfhamanniDO susvaramaDIte ityAdi mitAkzarA smfticandrikayorudAhftam vfhaspatinA taTEva lakzitam kAryyabADAvihInastu vijYeyo nizprayojanaH iti sa eva prakArAntareRApi nirarTanizaprayojanO lakzita vAn kusIdAdyEH zadErhIno vyavahAro nirarTakaH vAkpAruzyAdiBiScEva vijYeyo nizprayojanaH kumIda mfRadAnaM tatpraBUtiBiScaturdaSaBirarTavizayavyavahArE rhIno nirarTakaH vAkapAruzyAdiBihiMsAtmakEScatu rBirhInI nizprayojanaH ityarTaH azwAdaSapadAvizayaH pakzo duzwa ityASayaH asADyavirudDAvAha sa eva mamAnena pradAtavyaM SaSaSfNgakftaM DanuH asamBAvya masADyantaM pakzamAhurmanIziRaH yasminnAvedite pakze prAqvivAke Ta rAjani purarAzwre viroDaH syAdvirudDaH so BiDIyate iti mitAkzarATAmasADyavirudDAvanya ToktO devadattenAhaM saBrUBaNgamupahasita ityAdyasABya sADanAsamBavAt alpakAlatvAnna sAkzyAdisamBavI liKitaM dUrato lpatvAnna divyamiti BUkenAhaM Sapta ityAdi virudDa miti purarAzwrAdivirudDamapi virudDapadena vyAKyAya rAjYA vivarjita ityAdismftyantaraYca tadarTatayodAhftantacca pUrba masmABiranAdeyavyavahAranirUpaRe liKitam anye pi pakzABAsAH smfticandrikodAhftavacanoktA jYeyAH yaTA Binnakramo vyutkramArTaH prakIrRArTo nirarTakaH a tItkAlo vidvizwaH pakzo nAdeya izyate yaTAsTAnA niveSena nEva pakzArTakalpanA Sasyate tena pakzaH sa Binna krama udAhftaH vyatyastAkzarasanniveSo Binnakrama iti yAvat vyutkramArTo vyavahitAsyayenArTAboDakaH prakIrRArTo saNkalitArTaH mUlamarTaM parityajya tadguRo yatra liKyate nirarTakaH sa vE vakzo BUtasADanavarjitaH BatakAlamatikrAntaM dravyaM yatra hi liKyate atIta Page a vAlaH pakzo sO pramARe satyapi smftaH yasmin pakze dviDA sADyaM BinnakAlavimarSanam vimfzyate kriyA BedaH sa pakzodvizwa ucyate BUtasADanaM mUlaBUtaM sADanaM tena varjitaH BUtakAlaH sADyakAlaH anyAnapi pakzABAsAnAha sa eva anyAkzaraniveSena anyArTa gamanena ca Akulantu BavelleKyaM kriyA cEvAkulA Bavet sADanaM saha sADyena nirdizwaM yatra leKayet uktakramavihInatvAt so pi pakzo na siDyatIti vi rudDaScAvirudDaSca dvAvapyarTO niveSitO ekasmin yatra dfSyete taM pakzaM dUratastyajet parasparavirudDAni yaH padAni niveSayet virudDapadasaNkIrRA BAzA tasya na siDyatIti yattu purarAzwravirudDaSca yaSca rAjYA vivajitaH anekapadasaNkIrRaH pUrbapakzo na sidDyatIti smaraRAt tasyAyamarTaH rAjYA vivarjito rAjatyakta SulkAdivizayakarRAdAnAdipadamiSritastu kriyABedena yugapanna sidDyatIti madIyA rUpakA iyanto nayA vfwyA nena gfhItAH suvarRaYca mayA nikzepIkftamayamidaM madIyakzetramapaharatItyanekapadavizayasyApi pakzasya krame RApyanupAdeyatve tattvanirRayABAvaprasaNgena yuktiviroDAt bahupratijYaM yatkAryyaM vyavahArezu niScitam kAmaM tadapi gfhRIyAdrAjA tattvabuBUtsayeti kAtyAyanavacana viroDAcca tasmAdyugapat pakzABAmatetyeva ramaRIyam anekavastusaNkIrRasyApakzatvantvatatpadasambadDam hiraRya rUpakavAsAMsi vAnena matto vfdDyA gfhItAnyasya haste mayA likziptAnyananApahftAni vetyekasminnapi pade yuga padapIdfSapakzopanyAsasyAduzwatvAt sADyaYca viDimuKena pratizeDamuKena vA pakzanipaRIyamityAha kAtyAyanaH nyAyaM saMyacCate kartumanyAyaM vA karotyayam na leKayati yaKyevaM tasya pakzo na sidDyati nyAyaM samityanena mamEtAvadDanasAdAya na dadAtItyAdi pratibanDa muKatA pi lakzitA anyAyaM vetyanena mamedamapahara tItyAdi viDimuKatA pradarSitA vfhaspatirapi pra tijYAdozanimuMktaM sADyaM satkAraRAnvitam niScitaM lokasidDaYca pakza pakzavido viduH iti pratijYAdozEH pratijYAsannyAsAdiBirmuktaM rahitam te ca darSitAH prAka sADyaM sADanArham satkAraRAnvitaM sPuwa wozarahitahetusahitam niScitaM sandehAjanakavAkya raScanAyuSuM na tf svavameva niScitaM vipratipattAvarTani Page b ScayABAvAt lokasidDaM vyavahArikaDarmAvirudDam ataeva manuH satyA na BAzA Bavati yadyapi syAt prati zWitA bahiScedBAzyate DarmAnniyatAdvyavahArikAt pratizWitA prasidDatvAdidozanirmukta BAzA pratijYA vyAva hArikaDarmAdvirudDA ca satyA grAhyA na Bavati rAjA dInAmityarTaH mavadevastu yatra SrutamAtra eva sati lokAnAM sampratyayastallokasidDaM tena nirDanakfto lakzAdi saNKyaDanAkzepo na pakza iti vyAcakzO tadbADarUpapratijYA dIzavattvenEva tAdfSapakzasya nirAkaraRAt pratijYAdoza nirmuktamityanenEva gatArTam tataH gahA BAvArTe Ca pUrbapakzIya tadBave tri
pUrvapara pUrvapara pUrva rbA para tri dvandva pUrvasmin aparasmin ca deSe tayorBAvaH zyaY pOrvAparvya tadBAve na kvacinna pUrvapadavfdDiH pUrvAparvya tatrArTe na
pUrvaparvata pUrvaparvata pUrva rba parvata pu nityaka udayAcale amaraH
pUrvapitAmaha pUrvapitAmaha pUrva rba pitAmaha pu pUrvaH pitAmahAt prapitAmahe BA vi a
pUrvapuruza pUrvapuruza pUrva rba puruza pu karma pitrAditrike puruze
pUrvarAga pUrvarAga pUrva rba rAga pu pUrbo rAgaH nAyakayormelanAt pUrvajAte anurAgaBede SravaRAddarSanAd vApi miTaHsaMrUQa rAgayoH daSAviSezo yo prAptO pUrbarAgaH sa ucyate SravaRantu Bavettatra dUtavandisaKImuKAt indrajAle ca citre ca sAkzAt svapne ca darSanam aBilAzaScintA smftiguRakaTanodvegasaMpralApASca unmAdo Ta vyADi rjaqatA mftiriti daSAtra kAmadaSAH aBilAzaH spfhA cintA prAptyupAryAdicintanam unmAdaScAparicCeda ScetanAcetanezvapi alakzyavAk pralApaH syAt cetaso BramaRAdBfSam vyADistu dIrGaniHSvAsaH pARqutAkfSa tAdayaH jaqatA hInacezwatvamaNgAnAM manasastaTA rasa vicCedahetutvAnmaraRaM nEva varRyate jAtaprAyantu tadvAcyaM cetasA cApi kANkzitam varRyate pi yadi pratyujjI vanaM syAdadUrataH AdO vAcyaH striyA rAgaH puMsaH paScAttadiNgitEH nIlIkusumBamaYcizWAH pUrbarAgo pi ca triDA na cAtiSoBate yannApEti prema manogatam tannIlIrAgamAKyAnti yaTA SrIrAmasItayoH kusumBa rAgaM taM prAhuryadapEti ca SoBate maYjizWArAgamAhustaM yannApEtyatiSoBate sA da
pUrvardvya pUrvardvya pUrva rbA rdvya tri pUrvArdDe BavaH pakze yat pUrvArdDaBave pakze WaY pOrvA rbA rdDika tatrArTa tri
pUrvatiTi pUrvatiTi pUrva rbA tiTi pu gotrapravarziBede
pUrvattarA pUrvattarA pUrva rbo ttarA strI pUrvasyAH uttarasyAScAntarAlA dik ba va ISAnakoRe vidiSi
pUrvayakza pUrvayakza pUrva rba yakza pu nityaka maRiBadrAdO jinottame trikA
pUrvazAQA pUrvazAQA pUrva rbA zAQA strI karma aSvinyAdizu viMSe nakzatre tatsvarUpAdikamaSlezASabde uktam
pUrvottarA pUrvottarA pUrvo rbo ttarA strI pUrvasyAH uttarasyAScAntarAlA dika ba va ISAnakoRe vidiSi
pUrya pUrya pUrya tri pF kyap pUra Ryat vA pUraRIye paripAlye ca
pUryya pUryya pUryya tri pF kyap pUra Ryat vA pUraRIye paripAlyeca
pUya pUya pUya durganDe aka Bedane viSaraRe ca saka divA Atma sew pUyyate apUyizwa apUyiQvaM apUyiQraM Dvam pupUye pUya na pUya ac vraRAdiniHsfte raktavikAraBede pUMja pU ja hemaca BAve lyuw pUyana tatrArTe na Sabdaca pUya durganDe aka Bedane viSaraRe ca saka divA Atma sew pUyyate apUyizwa apUyiQraM Dvam pupUye pUya na pUya ac vraRAdiniHsfte raktavikAraBede pU ja hemaca BAve lyuw pUyana tatrArTe na Sabdaca
pUza pUza pUza vfdDO aka BvA para sew pUzati apUzIt pupUza pUza pu pUza vfdDO ka brahmadAruvfkze tuta amaraH pUza vfdDO aka BvA para sew pUzati apUzIt pupUza pUza pu pUza vfdDO ka brahmadAruvfkze tuta amaraH
pUzaDra pUzaDra pUzaDra pu vEvaSvatamanoH putraBede mArkapu a
pUzaGra pUzaGra pUzaGra pu vEvasvatamanoH putraBede mArkapu a
paH paH paH paYcamavargasya praTaBovarRaH spaSavarRezu ekaviMSatitamaH tasyoccAraRasTAnaBozWaH tasyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatnaH ozWena saha jihvAgrasya sparSaH bAhyAH prayatnAH vivA raSvAsaGozAH alpaprARaSca asmin pare visargasya sTAne upADmAnIyaH varRABiDAne asya vAcakaSabdAuktA yaTA paH surapriyatA tIkzRA lohitaH paYcamo ramA guhya karttA niDiH SezaH kAlarAtriH surArihA tapanaH pAlanaH pAtA devadevo niraYjanaH sAvitrI pAtinI pAnaM vIratantro DanurdDaraH dakzapArSvaSca senAnIrmarIciH pavanaH SaniH uqqISaM jayinI kumBo nalareKA ca mIhakaH mUlaM dvitIyamindrARI lolAkzI manaAtmakaH tadaDISadevatADyAnaM yaTA dvicitravasanAM devIM dviBujAM paNkajekzaRAm raktacandanaliptANgIM padmamAlAviBUzi tAm maRiratnAdikeyUrahAraBUzitavigrahAm caturvarga pradAM nityAM nityAnandamayIM parAm evaM DyAtvA pakA rantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya svarUpaM yaTA ataH paraM pravakzyAmi pakArAkzaramavyayam catuvargapradaM varRaM Sa raccandrasamapraBam paYcadevamayaM varRaM svayaM paramakuRqalI paYcaprARamayaM varRaM triSaktisahitaM taTA triguRAva sTitaM varRamAtmAditattvasaMyutam mahAmokzapradaM varRaM hfdi BAvaya pArvati iyi kAmaDenutantre pawale asya mAtfkanyAse dakzapArSve nyAsyatA kAvyAdO asya praTamaprayoge suKaM Palam suKaBayamaraRakleSaduHKaM pravargaH vf wI pavargasTAnAM paYcAnAM varRAnAM krameRa PalapaYcakokteH
paNga paNga paNga tri Kaji ku pavAdeSaH nuk ca gatihIne striyAM UN mandagatO Sanigrahe Sabdara tatkakzAyA atyuccatayA bahukAlena rASiBAgAdikasya tena BogAt tasya mandamatiyam aSvaharaRakramavipAkeRa paNgutA jAyate ityuktaM manuH
paNgu paNgu paNgu tri Kaji ku panAdeSaH nuk ca gatihIne striyAM UN mandagatO Sanigrahe Sabdara tatkakzAyA atyu ccatayA vahukAlena rASiBAgAdikasya tena BogAt tasya Bandagatitvam aSvaharaRakarmavipAkeRa paNgutA jAyate ityuktaM manuH

paRItaka paRItaka paRItaka pu kumArAnucaramAtfBede BA Sa a
paRa paRa paRa vyavahAre krayavikrayAdO stutO ca BvA A saka sew devane aka arcane niGaRwuH nizaRwuH smArTe Aya vA stutO para paRAyati te paRate vyavahAre tuM paRAyati ityeva tu zaRAyati ityeka ArdDaDAtuke asmAt vA Aya apaRAyIt apaRAyizwa apaRA yizwa apaRizwa krayavikrayArTe ca asya karmaRi Sezatvena divakzite zazWI vivakzite zazWo tasyASca na samAsaH Satasya paRAyate zaRAyate vyavahfpaRoH samarTayoHpA samarTayoH pA dyUte krayavikrayavyavahAre krayavi krayavyavahAre cAnayostulyAtrarTatA Satasya paRanam stutO tu samAsaH brAhmaRapaRanam bAhmaRapaRam si kO pratyayAntatvAt pratyayAnta tvAt BAve a paRAyA paRa pu paRa karmaRi nityaM paRaHparimARe paRaH parimARe pA ap karzamitatAmare karzamitatAmre tAmrikaH kArzikaH paRaH yAjYa fSItiBirvarAwakEH a SItiBirvarAwakEH paRa ityaBiDIyate Bavizyat pu uktezu aSItivarAwakezu Bavizyatpu uktevu aSItivaRawakezu varAwakAnAM daSakadvayaM yat sA kAkiRI tASca tyaSca paRaScatasraH lIlA BAve ap nirveSe BftO BfvO dyUte glahe vAji mUlye Dane ca kArmApaRe krayaSAlAyAm kArzApaRe krayyaSAlAyAm vyavahAre medi karttari ac krayavikrayAdikArake tri SORqike SO Rqike pu jawA ADAre ap gfhe SabdamAlA vizRO pu prARadaH praRavaH paRaH vizRusa paRatirvyavahArArTaH paRa tirvyavahArArTaH tatkurvan paRaH sarvARi rUpARi vicintya vi cintya DIronAmAni kftvABivadan ya Aste iti SruteH puRyAni karmARi saMgfhyADikAriByastatPalaM prayacCan sagfhyADikAriByastatPalaM praya cCan lakzaRayA vA paRaH BA paRa vyavahAre krayavikrayAdO stutO ca BvA A saka sew devane aka arcane nizaRwuH smArTe Aya vA stutO para paRAyati te paRate vyavahAre tu zaRAyati ityeka ArdDaDAtuke asmAt vA Aya apaRAyIt apaRA yizwa apaRizwa krayavikrayArTe ca asya karmaRi Sezatvena vivakzite zazWo tasyASca na samAsaH Satasya zaRAyate vyavahfpaRoH samarTayoH pA dyUte krayavi krayavyavahAre cAnayostulyAtrarTatA Satasya paRanam stutO tu samAsaH bAhmaRapaRam si kO pratyayAnta tvAt BAve a paRAyA paRa pu paRa karmaRi nityaM paRaH parimARe pA ap karzamitatAmre tAmrikaH kArzikaH paRaH yAjYa a SItiBirvarAwakEH paRa ityaBiDIyate Bavizyatpu uktevu aSItivaRawakezu varAwakAnAM daSakadvayaM yat sA kAkiRI tyaSca paRaScatasraH lIlA BAve ap nirveSe BfvO dyUte glahe vAji mUlye
