paRaH sarvARi rUpARi vi cintya DIronAmAni kftvABivadan ya Aste iti SruteH puRyAni karmARi sagfhyADikAriByastatPalaM praya cCan lakzaRayA vA paRaH BA
paRihoma paRihoma paRihoma pu ta pAtrabrAhmaRAnAM pARO karttavye home udDftya GftAktamannamanujYApayatyagnO karizye karavE karavARIti ityupakrame aByanujYAyAM pARizveva vA ASva gf sU aByanujYAyAmiti yadi brAhmaRAH pARizu homamaByanujAnanti agnikAryakaraRaM yadi pARizu svezAmaByupagacCantItyarTaH taTA satiM pARizu juhoti tAByAmeva mantrAByAM pARizu juhuyAt brAhmaRAH pitrAditrayArTam upavizwAstezAM sarvezAM pARizu juhotIti vacanAt mantrO ca dvO tatrArTAdekEkAm Ahuti vigfhya vigfhya sarvezAM dakziRapARizu juhoti nArA kuSabrAhmaRapakze jale eva sa home viDeyaH agnyaBAve tu viprasya pARAveva jale pi vA matsyapu vAkyAt etayoH pakzayorapi anuhenEva agnO karizye kuruzva ityevAnujYApraSnO A ta raGu

pada pada pada sTErye BvA para saka sew padati apAdIt apadIt apAdIt papAda pedatuH pada gatO di A saka aniw padyate apAdi pede pannaH A vipattO ApattO ca Ric ApAdana vyApakABAvena vyApyABAvakalpane prAptO ca ud utpattO udBave janane aka prati ud JawityudBave aka vi ud SabdasyAvayavArTaboDane vyutpattiH upa yuktiyoge upapadyate upapattiH aBi upasAntvane kumA SlokaH nis nizpattO avasTAntaraprAptO aka pa pra prAptO saka prapannaH prati svIkAre KIkAre aNgIkAre saka pratipattiH pratipannaH vi prati saMSaye saka vipratipannaH vi maraRe marane nASe aka vipadyate vipannaH vipad sam samyag vfdDO aka sampadyate sampad pada gatO ada cu Atma saka sew padayate apapadata pada pu padyate gacCatyanena karaRe kvip pAde padAdayaH pfTak SabdA ityeke padaNGriScaraRo striyAmamaraH striyAm amaraH pada na pada ac vyavasAye trARe sTAne cihne pAde vastuni ca amaraH viBaktyantaSabdaBede suptiNntaM suptiNantaM padam pA vAkyEkadeSe ca varRAH padaM prayogArhAnanvitEkArTaboDakAHsA prayogArhAnanvitEkArTaboDakAH sA da SlokacaraRe Slosa caraRe kiraRe pu medi arTaboDakaSaktiviSizwe nEyAyikAH vfttimattvaM padatvamiti tallakzaRAt pada sTErye BvA para saka sew padati apAdIt apadIt apAdIt papAda pedatuH pada gatO di A saka aniw padyate apAdi pede pannaH A vipattO ApattO ca Ric ApAdana vyApakABAvena vyApyABAvakalpane prAptO ca ud utpattO udBave janane aka prati ud JawityudBave aka vi ud SabdasyAvayavArTaboDane vyutpattiH upa yuktiyoge upapadyate upapattiH aBi upasAntvane kumA SlokaH nis nizpattO avasTAntaraprAptO aka pra prAptO saka prapannaH prati KIkAre aNgIkAre saka pratipattiH pratipannaH vi prati saMSaye saka vipratipannaH vi marane nASe aka vipadyate vipannaH vipad sam samyag vfdDO aka sampadyate sampad pada gatO ada cu Atma saka sew padayate apapadata pada pu padyate gacCatyanena karaRe kvip pAde padAdayaH pfTak SabdA ityeke padaNGriScaraRo striyAm amaraH pada na pada ac vyavasAye trARe sTAne cihne pAde vastuni ca amaraH viBaktyantaSabdaBede suptiNantaM padam pA vAkyEkadeSe ca varRAH padaM prayogArhAnanvitEkArTaboDakAH sA da Slosa caraRe kiraRe pu medi arTaboDakaSaktiviSizwe nEyAyikAH vfttimattvaM padatvamiti tallakzaRAt

pakzADAta pakzADAta pakzADAta pu vAtarogaBede tallakzaRAdi suSrutoktaM yaTA ayogamaH satiryaggA DamanIrUrdDvadehagAH yadA praku pito tyarTaM mAtariSvA prapadyate tadanyatarapakzasya sanDivanDAn vimokzayan hanti pakzaM tamAhurhi pakzA DAyaM BizagvarAH yasya kf snM SarIrArdDamakarmaRya Page b macetanam tataH patatyasUn vApi jahAtyanilapIqitaH SudDavAtahataM pakzaM kfcCrasADyatamaM viduH sADyamanyena saMsfzwamasADyaM kzayahetukam vAyurUrdDaM vrajetsTAnAt kupito hfdayaM SiraH SaNKO ca pIqayatyaNgAnyAkzipenna mayecca saH pakzavaDo pyatra
pakzAGAta pakzAGAta pakzAGAta pu vAtarogaBede tallakzaRAdi suSrutoktaM yaTA aDogamAH satiryagagA DamanIrUrdDadehagAH yadA prakfpito tyarTaM mAtariSvA prapadyate tadanyatarapakzasya sanDibanDAn vimokzayan hanti pakzaM tamAhurhi pakzAGAtaM BizagvarAH yasya kftsnaM SarIrArdDamakarmaRyamacetanam tataH patyasUn vApi jahAtyanilapIqitaH SudDavAtahataM pakzaM kfcCrasADyatamaM viduH sADyamanyena saMsfzwamasADyaM kzayahetukam vAyurUrdDa vrajetsTAnAt kupito hfdayaM SiraH SaNKO ca pIqayatyaNgAnyAkzipennamayecca saH pakzavaDo pyatra
pakza pakza pakza parigrahe ada cu uBa saka sew vakzayati pakzayati te apapakzat va ta pakza parigrahe cu uBa saka sew ayaM BvAdiSca parapakzati ByAdiSca para pakzati pakzayati te apapakzat ta apakzIt pakza pu pakza akza SuklakfzRapratipAdAdipaYcadaSyantapaYcadaSatiTyAtmake ac SuklakfzRapratipadAdipaYcadaSyantapaYca daSatiTyAtmake kAle KAgAnAM patatre KagAnAM patattre pAkA Sarasya puNgasTe patre puNKasTe pattre keSAt paraH samUhArTe pakzapratyayAntaH keSasamUhArTe yaTA keSapakza ityAdi pArSve gfhe nyAyokte sandigDasADyavati pAdArTe padArTe pakzatASabde dfSyam yaTA parvato parvatI vahnimAn viroDe sahAve bale sahAye vale saKyO cullIranDre rAjakuYjare Kage valaye samUhe picCe dehArdDe ca amaramedinyO amarame dinyO vihage SudDe SabdaratnA varRe varge dehe dehANgaBede vAdiprativAdiByAM darsitavipratipattO darSitavipratipattO kowiBede ca pakza parigrahe ada cu uBa saka sew pakzayati te apapakzat ta pakza parigrahe cu uBa saka sew ayaM ByAdiSca para pakzati pakzayati te apapakzat ta apakzIt pakza pu pakza ac SuklakfzRapratipadAdipaYcadaSyantapaYca daSatiTyAtmake kAle KagAnAM patattre pAkA Sarasya puNKasTe pattre keSAt paraH samUhArTe pakzapratyayAntaH keSasamUhArTe yaTA keSapakza ityAdi pArSve gfhe nyAyokte sandigDasADyavati padArTe pakzatASabde dfSyam yaTA parvatI vahnimAn viroDe sahAye vale saKyO cullIranDre rAjakuYjare Kage valaye samUhe picCe dehArdDe ca amarame dinyO vihage SudDe SabdaratnA varge dehe dehANgaBede vAdiprativAdiByAM darSitavipratipattO kowiBede ca
palla palla palla gatO BvA para saka sew pallati apallIt papalla apalla palla pu padaM lAti lA ka pAdasTAne pat pAlui marAi KyAte DAnyADAraBede DAmyADAraBede medi palla gatO BvA para saka sew pallati apallIt apalla palla pu padaM lAti lA ka pAdasTAne pat pAlui marAi KyAte DAmyADAraBede medi
pallavANkara pallavANkara pallavANkara pu pallavasyANkuro yatra SAKAyAm halADa
pallavANkura pallavANkura pallavANkura pu pallavasyANkuro yatra SAKAyAm halADa
pannadDA pannadDA pannadDA strI padi nadDA carmapAdukAyAM hemaca
pannadDrI pannadDrI pannadDrI strI padaH nadDrIva naha zwran NIz vA ta carmamaya pAdukAyAM trikA
pannadvA pannadvA pannadvA strI padi nadvA carmapAdukAyAM hemaca
pannadvrI pannadvrI pannadvrI strI padaH nadBrIva naha zwran NIz vA ta carmamayapAdukAyAM trikA
paqa paqa paqa gatO BvA A saka sew idit paRqate apaRqizwa papaRqe paRqA paRqitaH saMhatO paqa saMhatI rASIkaraRe cu uBa saka sew paRqayati te apipaRqat ta idit paRqyate paqa gatO BvA A saka sew idit paRqate apaRqizwa papaRqe paRqA paRqitaH paqa saMhatI rASIkaraRe cu uBa saka sew paRqayati te apipaRqat ta idit paRqyate
parApur parApur parApur strI parA sTUlAH pUH samAsAntaviDeranityatvAt na samAntaH sTUladehe yaju
parApura parApura parApura strI parA sTUlAH pUH samAsAntaviDeranityatvAt na samAntaH sTUladehe yaju
parRRamuc parRRamuc parRRamuc tri parRRAni muYcatyatra muca ADAre kvip ta vfkzARAM patramocanADAre SiSirakAle
parRakfcCa parRakfcCa parRakfcCa pu paYcAhasADye vrataBede parRodumbararAjIva bilvapatrakuSodakEH pratyekaM pratyahaM pItEH parRakfcCa udAhftaHyAjYa palASodumbarArivandaSrIvfkzaparRAnAmekEkena kvATitamudakaM pratyahe pibet kuSodakaYcEka sminnahanIti paYcAhasADyaHSaparRakfcCaH mitA
parRakfcCra parRakfcCra parRakfcCra pu paYcAhasADye vrataBede parRodumbararAjIva vilvapatrakuSodakEH pratyekaM pratyahaM pItEH parRakfcCra udAhftaH yAjYa palASodumbarAravindaSrIvfkzaparRAnA mekEkena kATitasudakaM pratyahaM pibet kuSodakaYcEka spinnahanIti paYcAhasADyaH parRakfcCraH mitA
parRamuc parRamuc parRamuc tri parRAni muccatyatra muca ADAre kvip ta vfkzARAM patramocanADAre SiSirakAle
paraDarma paraDarma paraDarma pu ta svocitavarRASramAdiDarmaBinne Darme gItA a manuH karma utkfzwaDarme ca
paraDarmma paraDarmma paraDarmma pu ta svocitavarRASramAdiDarmaBinne Darme gItA a manuH karma utkfzwaDarme ca

parasaYjYaka parasaYjYaka parasaYjYaka pu paraH saYjYA sya kap dehAdiByaH parasmin Atmani Sabdaca
paratogrAhma paratogrAhma paratogrAhma avya parasyAt grAhmaH svaBillasAmagrIto borDye Page a pramARasyApramARatvAdO tayoH kasya svatogrAhyatA kasya vA parato grAhyatA tadetanmataBedena sarvadarSanasaMgrahe darSitam pramARatvApramARatve svataH sANKyAH samASritAH nEyAyikAste parataH sOgatAScaramaM svataH praTamaM parataH prAhuH pramARyaM vedavAdinaH pramARatvaM svataH prAhuH parataScApramARatAm iti vAdivivAdadarSanAt kaKa NkAraM vedAnAM Darme svataHprAmARyamiti sidDavatkftya svIkri yate kiYca kimidaM svataH prAmARyaM nAma kiM svata eva prAmARyasya janma Ahosvit svASrayajYAgajanya tvam kimuta svASrayajYAnasAmagrIjanyatvam utAho jYAnasAmagrIjanyajYAnaviSezASritatvam kiM vA jYAnasA magrImAtrajanyajYAnaviSezASritatvam tatrAdyaH sAvadyaH kArpyakAraRaBAvasya BewasamAnADikaraRatvenEkasminnasa mBavAt nApi dvitIyaH guRasya suto jYAnasya prAmARyaM prati samavAyikAraRatayA dravyatvApAtAt nApi tfvIyaH prAmARyasyovADitve jAtitve vA janmAyogAt smfti tvAnaDikaraRasyajYAnasya bADAtyantABAvaH prAmARyIpADiH na ca tasvotpattisamBavaH atyantABAvasya nityatvAByupa gamAdata eva na jAterapi janiryujyate nApi caturTaH jYAnaviSezo hyapramA viSezasAmagryAYca sAmAnyasAmagrI anupaviSati SaMSapAsAmagryAmiva vfkzasAmagrI aparaTA tasyAkasmikatvaM pasajet tasmAt paratastvena svIkftaM pAmARyaM vijYAnasAmagrIjanyASritamityativyAptirApadyeta paYcamavikalpaM vikalpayAmaH kiM dozABAvasahakftajYAna ScAmapIjanyatvameva jYAnasAmagrImAtrajanyatvaM kiM dozA BAvAsahakftajYAnasAmagrIjanyatvaM nAdyaH dozABAvasaha kftajYAnasAmagrIjanyatvameva parataH prAmARyamiti parataH pAmARyavAdi BarurarIkaraRAt nApi dvitIyaH dozA BAvamahakftatvena sAmagryAM sahakftatve sidDe ananyaTA sidDAnvayavyatirekasidDatayA dozABAvasya kAraRatAyA vajralepAyamAnatvAt aBAvaH kAraRameva na BavatIti cet tadA vaktavyam aBAvatve kAryyatvamasti na vA yadi nAsti tadA pawapraDvaMsAnupapattyA nityatAprasaNgaH aTAsti ki graparAdDaM kAraRatveneti seyamuBayataHpASA rajjvuH tadu ditamudayanena BAvo yaTA taTA BAvaH kAraRaM kAryya vanmatam iti taTAca prayogaH vimatA pramA jYAna hetvatiriktahetvaDInA kAryyatve sati tadviSezatvAt apramAvat prAmARyaM ca parato jYAyate anaByAsadaSAyAM Page b sAMSayikatvAt aprAmARyavat tasmAdutpattO jYaptO ca paratastve pramARasamBavAt svataH sidDaM prAmARyamityetat pUtikuzmARqAyata iti cet tadetadAkASamuzwihananAyate vijYAnasAmagrIjanyatve sati tadatiriktahetvajanyatvaM pra mAyAH svatastvamiti niruktisamBavAt asti cAtrAnu mAnaM vimatA pramA vijYAnasAmagrIjanyatve sati tadati riktajanyA na Bavati apramAtvAnaDikaraRatvAt TawAdi vat na cOdayanamanumAnaM paratastvasADakamiti SaNkanIyaM pramA dozavyatiriktajYAnahetvatiriktajanyA na Bayati jYAna tvAdapramAvaditi pratisADanagrahagrastatvAt jYAnasAmagrI mAtrAdeva pramotpattisamBave tadatiriktasya guRasya dozA BAvasya vA kAraRatvakalpanAyAM kalpanAgO ravaprasaNgAcca nanu dozasyApramAhetutvena tadaBAvasya pramAM prati hetutva durnivAramiti cet na dozABAvasyApramApratibanDakatvenA nyaTAsidDatvAt tasmAdguReByo dozARAmaBAva stadaBAvataH apramARyadvayAsattvaM tenotsargo nayo ditaH iti taTA pramAjYaptirapi jYAnajYApakasAmagrIta eva jAyate na ca saMSayAnudayaprasaNgo bADaka iti yuktaM vaktuM satya pa pratiBAsapuzkalakAraRe pratibanDakadozAdi samavaDAnAt tadupapatteH kiYca tAvakamanumAnaM svataH pramARaM na vA Adye anEkAntikatA dvitIye tasyApi parataH prAmARyamevaM tasya tasyApItyanavasTA duravasTA syAt yadatra kusumAYjalAvudayanena Jawiti pracura pravftteH prAmARyaniScayADInatvABAvamApAdayatA praRya yAdi pravfttirhIScAmapekzate tatprAcuryye cecCAprAcuryyam icCA cezwasADanatAjYAnaM taccezwajAtIyatvaliNgAnuBavaM so pIndriyArTasannikarzaM prAmARyagrahastu na kvacidupa yujyata iti tadapi taskarasya purastAt kakze suvarRamupetya sarvANgodGAwanamiva patiBAti ataH samIhitasADanajYA nameva pramARatayAvagamyamAnamicCAM janayatItyatrEva sPuwa eva prAmARyagrahaRasyopayogaH kiYca kvacidapi cenni rvicikitsA pravfttiH saMSayAdupapadyeta tarhi sarvatra taTAmA vasamBavAt prAmARyaniScayo nirarTakaH syAt aniScitasya sattvameva durlaBamiti prAmARyaM dattajalAYjalikaM Bavet
paratogrAhya paratogrAhya paratogrAhya avya parasmAt grAhyaH svaBinnasAmagrIto boDye pramARatvApramARatvAdO tayoH kasya svatogrAhyatA kasya vA parato grAhyatA tadetanmataBedena sarvadarSanasaNgrahe darSitam pramARatvApramARatve svataH sANKyAH samASritAH nEyAyikAste parataH sOgatAScaramaM svataH praTamaM parataH prAhuH pramARyaM vedavAdinaH pramARatvaM svataH prAhuH parataScApramARatAmiti vAdivivAdadarSanAt kaKaNkAraM vedAnAM Darme svataH prAmARyamiti sidDavatkftyasvIkriyate kiYca kimidaM svataHprAmARyaM nAma kiM svata eva prAmARyasya janma Ahosvit svASrayajYAnajanyatvam kimuta svASrayajYAnasAmagrIjanyatvam utAho jYAnasAmagrIjanyajYAnaviSezASritatvam kiM vA jYAnasAmagrImAtrajanyajYAnaviSezASritatvam tatrAdyaH sAvadyaH kAryakAraRaBAvasya BedasamAnADikaraRatvenEkasminnasamBavAt nApi dvitIyaH guRasya sato jYAnasya prAmARyaM pratisamavAyikAraRatayA dravyatvApAtAt nApi tftIyaH prAmARyasyopADitve jAtitve vAjanmAyogAt smftitvAnaDikaraRasyajYAnasya bADAtyantABAvaH prAmARyopADiH na ca tasyotpattisamBavaH atyantABAvasya nityatvAByupagamAdata eva jAterapi janiryujyate nApi caturTaH jYAnaviSezo hyapramA visezasAmagryAYca sAmAnyasAmagrI anupaviSati SiMSapAsAmagryAmiva vfkzasAmagrI aparaTA tasyAkasmikatvaM prasajet tasmAt paratastvena svIkftaM prAmARyaM vijYAnasAmagrIjanyASritamityativyAptirApadyeta paYcamavikalpaM vikalpayAmaH kiM dozABAvasahakftajYAnasAmagrIjanayatvameva jYAnasAmagrImAtrajanyatvaM prAmARyamevaM tasya tasyApItyanavasyA duravasTA syAt yadatra kusumAYjalAvudayanena gawiti pracura pravftteH kiM dozABAvAsahakftajYAnasAmagrIjanyatvaM nAdyaH dozAbAvasahakftajYAnasAmagrIjanyatvameva parataH prAmARyamiti parataH prAmARyavAdiBirurarIkaraRAt nApi dvitIyaH dozABAvasahakftatvena sAmagryAM sahakftatve sidDe ananyaTAsidDAnvayavyatirekasidDatayA dozABAvasya kAraRatAyA vajralepAyamAnatvAt aBAvaH kAraRameva na BavatIti cet tadA vaktavyam aBAvatve kAryatvamasti na vA yadi nAsti tadA pawapraDvaMsAnupapattyA nityatAprasaNgaH aTAsti kimaparAdDaM kAraRatveneti seyamuBayataHpASA rajjuH taduditamudayanena BAvo yaTA taTA BAvaH kAraRaM kArya yanmatamiti taTA ca prayogaH vimatA pramA jYAnahetvatiriktahetvaDInA kAryatve sati tadviSezatvAt apramAvat prAmARyaM ca parato jYAyate anaByAsadaSAyAM sAMSayikatvAt aprAmARyavat tasmAdutpattO jYaptO ca paratastve pramARasamBavAt svataH sidDaM prAmARyamityetat pUtikuzmARqAyata iti cet tadetadAkASamuzwihananAyate vijYAnasAmagrIjanyatve sati tadatiriktahetvajanyatvaM pramAyAH svatastvamiti niruktisamBavAt asti cAtrAnumAnaM vimatA pramA vijYAnasAmagrIjanyatve sati tadatiriktajanyA na Bavati apramAtvAnaDikaraRatvAt GawAdivat na cOdayanamanumAnaM paratastvasADakamiti SaNkanIyaM pramA dozavyatiriktajYAnahetvatiriktajanyA na Bavati jYAnatvAdapramAvaditi pratisADanagrahagrastatvAt jYAnasAmagrImAtrAdeva pramotpattisamBave tadatiriktasya guRasyadozABAvasya vA kAraRatvakalpanAyAM kalpanAgOravaprasaNgAcca nanu dozasyApramAhetutve natadaBAvasya prAmaM prati hetutvaM durnivAramiti cet na dozABAvasyApramApratibanDakatvenAnyaTAsidDatvAt tasmAdguReByo dozARAmaBAvastadaBAvataH apramARyadvayAsattvaM tenotsargo nayoditaHiti taTA pramAjYaptirapi jYAnajYApakasAmagrIta eva jAyate na casaMSayAnudayaprasaNgo bADaka iti yuktaM vaktuM satyapi pratiBAsapuzkalakAraRe pratibanDakadozAdisamavAMDAnAt tadupapatteH kiYca tAvakamanumAnaM svataH pramARaM na vA Adye anEkAntikatA dvitIye tasyApi parataH prAmARyamevaM tasya tasyApItyanavasTA duravasTA syAt yadatra kusumAYjalAvudayanena Jawiti pracura pravftteH prAmARyaniScayADInatvABAvamApAdayatA praRyamAdi pravfttirhIcCAmapekzate tatprAcuryaye cecCApAcuryyam icCA cezwasADanatAjYAnaM taccezwajAtIyatvaliNgAnuBavaM so pIndriyArTasannikarzaM prAmARyagrahastu na kvacidupayujyata iti tadapi taskarasya purastAt kakze suvarRamupetyasarvANgodDAwanamiva pratiBAti ataH samIhitasADanajYAnameva pramARatayAvagamyamAnamicCAM janayatItyatrEva sPuwaeva prAmARyagrahaRasyopayonaH kiYca kvacidapi cennarvicikitsA pravfttiH saMSayAdupapadyetaM tarhi sarvatra taTABAvasamBavAt prAmARyaniScayo nirarTakaH syAt aniScitasya sattvameva durlaBamiti prAmARyaM pardda pardda pardda apAnavAyukriyAyAM BvA Atma aka sew parddate apa rddizwa aparddizwa papardde pardda pu pf bA da keSasamUhe uRA pardda BAve GaY apAnavAyuSabde pAda prAda lyuw pardana tatrArTe na hemaca pardda apAnavAyukriyAyAM BvA Atma aka sew parddate aparddizwa papardde pardda pu pf bA da keSasamUhe uRA pardda BAve GaY apAnavAyuSabde prAda lyuw pardana tatrArTe na hemaca
paredyas paredyas paredyas avya parasmin ahni para edyus paradine ityarTe
paredyus paredyus paredyus avya paraspin ahi para edyus paradine ityarTe
pariRAmadaSin pariRAmadaSin pariRAmadaSin tri pariRAma SezaM paSyati dfSa Rini ta Sezadrazwari yatkarmakaraRe patkalaM tasya drazwari
pariRAmadarSin pariRAmadarSin pariRAmadarSin tri pariRAmaM SezaM paSyati dfSa Rini ta Sezadrazwari yatkarmakaraRe yatPalaM tasya drazwari
paricaryA paricaryA paricaryA strI pari cara kyap sevAyAm amaraH
paricaryyA paricaryyA paricaryyA strI pari cara kyap sevAyAm amaraH
parihArya parihArya parihArya tri pari hf karmaRi Ryat pariharttavye tyaklavye dviropa kozaH udDAryye ca
parihAryya parihAryya parihAryya tri pari ha karmaRi Ryat pariharttavye tyaktavye dvirUpakozaH udgAvye ca
parijaya parijaya parijaya tri pari ji SakyArTe yat ni yAntAdeSaH parito jetuM Sakye
parijayya parijayya parijayya tri pari ji SakyArTe vat ni yAntAdeSaH parito jetuMSakye
parimiti parimiti parimiti strI pari mA ktin parimARe BAzAparicCedaH
parisaMKyA parisaMKyA parisaMKyA strI pari sam KyA BAve aN parigaRite viDiBede niyamaSabde pf ftukAlaSabde ca pf dfSyam
parisaMKyAta parisaMKyAta parisaMKyAta tri pari sam KyA karmaRi kta parigaRite
parisaNKyA parisaNKyA parisaNKyA strI pari sama KyA BAve aN parigaRite viDiBede niyamaSabde ftukAlaSabde ca dfSyam
parisaNKyAta parisaNKyAta parisaNKyAta tri pari sam KyA karmaRi kta parigaRite
parisaryA parisaryA parisaryA strI pari sf BAve kyap sarvato gamane amaraH
parisaryyA parisaryyA parisaryyA strI pari sf BAve kyap sarvato gamane amaraH
parisrAva parisrAva parisrAva pu pari sru Ric ac suSrutokte parisravajanake upadravaBede krUrakozWasyAtipraBUtadozasyAmfdvOzaDamavacAritaM samutkliSyadozAnnaniHSezAnapaharati tataste dozAH parisrAvamAzAdayanti tatra dOrbalyodaravizwamBArucigAtrasadanAni Bavanti savedanO cAsya pittaSlezmARO parisravatastaM parisrAvamityAcakzate pari sru BAve bA GaY parikzaraRe ca
parisrava parisrava parisrava pari sru snu BAve ap paritaH kzaraRe parisrava pu pati sru Ric ac suSrutokte parisnava janake upadravaBede krUrakozWasyAtipraBUtadozasyAmfdvOza DamavacAritaM mamudkliSya dozAnnamiHSezAnapaharati tataste dozAH parisnAvamAzAdayanti tatra dOrbalyodaravizwamBAruci gAtasadanAni Bavanti savedanO cAsya pittaSlezmARO parisavatastaM parisnAvamityAsakzate pari su mAve bA GaY parikzaraRe ca parisrava pari snu BAve ap paritaH kzaraRe parisrava pu pati sru Ric ac suSrutokte parisnava janake upadravaBede krUrakozWasyAtipraBUtadozasyAmfdvOza DamavacAritaM mamudkliSya dozAnnamiHSezAnapaharati tataste dozAH parisnAvamAzAdayanti tatra dOrbalyodaravizwamBAruci gAtasadanAni Bavanti savedanO cAsya pittaSlezmARO parisavatastaM parisnAvamityAsakzate pari su mAve bA GaY parikzaraRe ca

parizadya parizadya parizadya tri parizadamarhati yat saBArhe dvirUpa stotuM sametAnAmftvijAM saBAyogye pavamAne agniBede yaju vedadIpaH
parizkaRRa parizkaRRa parizkaRRa tri pari skanda kta tasya dasya ca na vA zatve Ratvam parapuzwe zatvABAve RatvABAvAt pariskanna tatrArTe
parizkaRa parizkaRa parizkaRa tri pari skanda kta tasya dasya ca na vA zatve Ratvam paripuzwe zatvABAve RatvABAvAt pariskanna tatrArTe
parizkata parizkata parizkata tri pari kf kta suw zatvam BUzite cezwite kftamArjanAdisaMskAre ca amaraH yajYArTaM paSu banDanAya yajYapAtrAsadanAya ca kftasaMskArAyAM BUmO strI amaraH
parizkfta parizkfta parizkfta ta tri pari kf kta suw zatvam BUzite cezwite kftamArjanAdisaMskAre ca amaraH yajYArTaM paSubanDanAya yajYApAtrAsadanAya ca kftasaMskArAyAM BUmO strI amaraH
parjanyapatnI parjanyapatnI parjanyapatnI strI parjanyaH patirivAsyAH sapUrvakatvAt patyurnaNIp vaSAyAM vaSA parjanyapatnI devA apyeti brAhmaRA UDaste Badre parjanyo vidyutaste stanA vaSe aTa ta indrapatnyAM SacyAYca
parjjanyapatnI parjjanyapatnI parjjanyapatnI strI parjanyaH patirivAsvAH sapUrvakatvAd patyurna NIp vaSAyAM vaSA parjanyapatnI devA apyeti jAhmaRA UDastre Badre parjanyo vidyutaste svanA vaSe aTa ta indrapatnyAM SapyAYca
parolaGa parolaGa parolaGa na lajAt paraH suw ni lalasaMKyAto Dika saMKyAyAm tadanvite ca
parolakza parolakza parolakza na lakzAt paraH suw ni lakzasaNKyAto Dika saNKyAyAm tadanvite ca
parpa parpa parpa gatO BvA svA para saka sew parpati aparpI apapIt paparpa parpa na pF pf pa gfhe navatfRe uRAdikozaH KaYjavAhanasADane KaYjavAha nasADane pIWAdO si kO tena carati parpA zWan pArpika parpeRa gatiyukte gatiyakte KaYje striyAM zittvAt NIz parpa gatO svA para saka sew parpati apapIt paparpa parpa na pf pa gfhe navatfRe uRAdikozaH KaYjavAha nasADane pIWAdO si kO tena carati parpA zWan pArpika parpeRa gatiyakte KaYje striyAM zittvAt NIz
parvatavAsin parvatavAsin parvatavAsin tri parvate vasati vasa Rini ta girivAsini striyAM NIp sA ca AkASamAsyAM rAjani
parvatavAsina parvatavAsina parvatavAsina tri parvate vasati vasa Rini ta giri vAsini striyAM NIp sA ca AkASamAMAMsyAM rAjani
paryARa paryARa paryARa na pari yA lyuw pfzo aSvasajjAyAM palyayane jin iRa lyuw paryayaRamapyatra
paryARahana paryARahana paryARahana na somo nasi sTitaH saMmantAdAnahyate nena pari A naha karaRe lyuw somaSaKawoparimata pawakuwIrUpe tadbanDanopAye padArTe kAtyA SrO
paryAcAnta paryAcAnta paryAcAnta na parita AcAntam ekapaNktisTAn BuYjAnAnanyAnavamatya yatranyenAnne BujyamAne anyenAcamanaM kftaM tAdfSe anne taccAnnamaBakzyamugrAnnaM sUtikAnnaYca paryAcAntamanirdaSam manuvyAKyAyAM kullUkaBawwaH udakyAspfzwasaMGuzwaM paryAcAntaYca varjayetyAjYa mudritapustake paryAyAnnamiti pAWaH prAmAdikaH manunEkavAkyatvAt taTA pAWasya yuktatvAt
paryAcita paryAcita paryAcita tri pari A ci kta Acite AcitA nAsyAntodAttatA
paryAlI paryAlI paryAlI avya pari A ala I UryAdi hiMsAyAm gaRaratnawI paryAlIkftya hisitvetyarTaH
paryAlocana paryAlocana paryAlocana na pari A loca BAve lyuw samyagvivecane
paryAplAva paryAplAva paryAplAva pu pari A plu GaY aBiplavaSabdArTe tEtti sa parita AplAve CayalApi
paryApta paryApta paryApta na pari Apa BAve kta yaTezwe tfptO sAmarTye nivAraRe yogyatve ca karttari kta samarTe prApte ca tri medi paryAptisambanDayukte tri
paryApti paryApti paryApti strI pari Apa BAve ktin samyak prAptO nyAyamatasidDe svarUpasambanDaBede taTAhi dvitvAdikaM paryyAptisambanDena dvitrAdizveva varttate na pratyekam samavAyena tu pratyekavftti pratyekAvftteH samudAyAvfttitvaniyamamastu samavAyAdinEva na paryAptisambanDeneti BedaH sa ca sarvezAmeva padArTAnAM viSizwabudDiniyAmakaH padArTaBedena nAnA yaTA paryAptiScAyameko Gawa imO dva ityAdi pratItisAkzikaH svarUpasambanDaviSezaH iti dIDitiH samavAyena guRe guRasyAsattve pi catvAro guRA ityAdipratItyA guRAdizu saNKyAdisattvaniyAmako pi tAdfSaH sambanDaH iti sAmAnyaBAve jagadISaH dvitIyavutpattivAde gadADaraBawwAcAryaSca paryAptirdviviDA arDaparyAptiHpUrRaparyAptiSca tatra praTamA yatrADikasya nirAsArTA yA paryAptirniveSyate sArDaparyAptiH yaTA parvato vahnimAn DUmAdityAdO sADyatAvacCedakavahnitvanizWA paryAptiH dvitIyA yatra nyUnavAraRAya yA paryAptirniveSyate sa pUrRaparyAptiH yaTA parvato na mahAnasIyavahnimAnityAdO sADyatAvacCedakIBUtamahAnasIyatvaviSizwavahnitvanizWA paryAptiH
paryAriRI paryAriRI paryAriRI strI pari rf Rini NIp parita ArttimatyAM vyADigrasTAyAM gavi tasya dakziRA kfzRA gOH parimUrRI paryAriRI Sata brA parita Arttiyukte tri
paryAsa paryAsa paryAsa pu pari asa kzepe GaY parivartte paryAsaM ca parimARaYca gatiM candrArkayorapi mArkaRqapu patane hanane ca vahizpavamAnagatAnAM trayARAM tfcAnAM maDye antime tfce strotrIyAnurUpO tfcO Bavato vfzaRvantastfcA Bavanti uttamaH paryAsaHsA saM BA DftA SrutiH
paryAvarttana paryAvarttana paryAvarttana na pari A vfta lyuw sUryasya paScimavarttinyAH CAyAyAH pUrvadigvarttitvena parivfttO sanDiScet saNkavAdUrdDaM prAk paryAvarttanAdraveH karmapradIpaH
paryAyaSayana paryAyaSayana paryAyaSayana na paryAyeRa krameRa Sayanam yAmikaBawAnAM krameRa Sayane amaraH
paryAyokta paryAyokta paryAyokta na arTAlaNkAraBede alaNkAraSabde dfSyam
paryaNka paryaNka parya lya Nka pu parigato Nkam prA samA pareSca cANkayoH vA rasya laH KawvAyAm pAlaNka amaraH vIrAsanANke aNgasTApitakaratale yaTAha yogasAre vasizWaH ekaM pAdamaTEkasmin vinyasyorO tu saMsTitam itarasmin taTEvordDaM vIrAsanamidaM smftam uttAnite karatale karamuttAnitaM param ADAyANkagataM kftvA DyAyedyastasya so ntaram avasikkaTakAyAm hemaca yogapawwe ca
paryaNkabanDa paryaNkabanDa paryaNkabanDa pu paryaNkasya yogapawwasya banDaH banDa GaY yogapawwavastrAdinA pfzWajAnujaNGAbanDane paryaNkabanDaM niviqaM biBedeti kumAraH lyuw paryaNkabanDana atrEva na
paryaNkapAdikA paryaNkapAdikA paryaNkapAdikA strI paryaNkasyeva pAdo styasyAH Wan bahu kap vA kApi ataittvam kolaSimbyAm rAjani
paryaNkya paryaNkya paryaNkya pu aSvameDIye praTamayUpe banDanIyezu paYcadaSasaNKyAkezu paSuBedezu te ca yaju mantre uktAH te vAtra te paYcadaSa paryaNkyAH paSavo Bavanti Sata vrA paryaNkyAnaSve kAtyA SrO kfzRagrIvAdayaH vAmanAntAH paYcadasa paryaNkyasaYjYA ityarTaHkarkaH
paryagnikfta paryagnikfta paryagnikfta tri agneH paritaH kftaH samantAdagnivezwanena kftasaMskAre tAn parvya gnikftAnutsfjatitARqyA brA
paryanta paryanta paryanta pu parigato ntam prA sa SezasImAprApte
paryantaBU paryantaBU paryantaBU strI paryantasya SezasImAyAH BUH grAmAdeH SezasImAsTAne parisare amaraH
paryantikA paryantikA paryantikA strI parito ntikA guRanASe hArA
paryanuyoga paryanuyoga paryanuyoga pu parito nuyogaH praSnaH dUzaRArTaM jijYAsAyAm halAyu etenAsyApi paryanuyogasyAnavakASaH iti dAyaBAgaH
paryanuyojya paryanuyojya paryanuyojya tri pari anu yuja karmaRi Ryat nigrahopapattyA codanIye nigrahasTAnaM prApto si ityevamanuyojye nyAyaBAzyam
paryanuyojyopekzaRa paryanuyojyopekzaRa paryanuyojyopekzaRa na gOtamokte nigrahasTAnaBede nigrahasTAnaprAptasyopekzaRe anigrahaH paryanuyojyopekzaRam gO sU paryanuyojyopekzaRaM lakzayati nigrahasTAnaM prAptavato nigrahaH nigrahsaTAnAnudBAvanamityarTaH yatra tvanekanigrahasTAnapAte ekatarodBAvanaM tatra na paryanuyojyopekzaRam avasare nigrahasTAnodBAvAnatvAvacCinnABAvasyEva tattvAt nanu vAdinA kaTamidamudBAvyaM svakOlInavivaraRasyAyuktatvAditi cet satyaM maDyasTenEvamudBAvyaM vAde ca svayamudBAvane pyadozaHvfttiH
paryanya paryanya paryanya pu parjanyaH pfzo parjanyaSabdArTe uRA
paryasana paryasana paryasana na pari asa kzepe BAve lyuw apasAraRe dUrIkaraRe paritaH kzepaRe ca
paryasta paryasta paryasta tri pari asa kzepe karmaRi kta paritaH kzipte patite ca medi
paryasti paryasti paryasti strI paryasyate SarIraM yatra pari asa kzepe ADAre BAve vA ktin palyaNke pAlaNga trikA tatrArTe dUrIkaraRe ca svArTe ka paryastikA hemaca
paryavasAna paryavasAna paryavasAna na pari ava so BAve lyuw tattadarTAvaDAraRe SezAvaDO ca
paryavasTA paryavasTA paryavasTA strI pari ava sTA aN viroDe pratipakzavAde ca lyuw paryavasTAna tatrEva na tfc paryavasTAtf tatkarttari tri paritaH viSvaM vyApya sTitaH paryavasTita vizRO pu jIvanaH paryavasTitaHvizRusa
paryavasita paryavasita paryavasita tri pari ava so karmaRi kta pUrvAparAlocanena avaDArite rTe nizkfzwArTe ca

paryaya paryaya paryaya pu parityajya SaAstralOkikamaryyAdAm ayaH iRa BAve ac SAstralokavyavahArAtikrAnte AcAre amaraH

paryezaRA paryezaRA paryezaRA strI paritastarkAdinA ezaRA parIkzA tarkAdinA padArTaparIkzAyAm anvezaRAyAYca amaraH pari ezi BAve lyuw paryyezaRa na tatrArTe ktin paryezwi strI tatrArTe
paryyARa paryyARa paryyARa na pari yA lyuw pfzo aSvasajjAyAM palya yane jin iRa lyuw paryAyaRamapyatra
paryyARahana paryyARahana paryyARahana na somo nasi sTitaH samantAdAnahyate nega pari A naha karaRe lyuw somaSakawoparigata pawakuwIrUpe tadbanDanopAye padArTe kAtyA SrO
paryyAcAnta paryyAcAnta paryyAcAnta na parita AcAntam ekapaNktisTAn BuYjA nAnanyAnavamatya yatrAnyenAnne BujyamAne anyenAcamanaM kftaM tAdfSe anne taccAnnamaBakzyam ugrAnnaM sUtikAnnaYca paryAcAntamanirdaSam manuvyAKyAyAM kullUkaBawwaH udakyAspfzwasaMGuzwaM paryyAcAntaYca varjayet yAjYa mudritapustake paryyAyAnnamiti pAWaH prAmAdikaH manu nEkavAkyatvAt taTA pAWasya yuktatvAt
paryyAcita paryyAcita paryyAcita tri pari A ci kta Acite AcitA nAsyAntodAttatA
paryyAlI paryyAlI paryyAlI avya pari A ala I UryyAdi hiMsAyAm gaRaratnawI paryyAlIkftya hiMsitvetyarTaH
paryyAlocana paryyAlocana paryyAlocana na pari A loca BAve lyuw samyagvivecane
paryyAplAva paryyAplAva paryyAplAva pu pari A plu TaY aBiplavaSabda rTe tEtti sra parita AplAva CayalApi

paryyApti paryyApti paryyApti strI pari Apa BAve ktin samyak prAptO nyA yamatasidDe svarUpasamvanDaBede taTAhi dvitvAdikaM paryAptisambanDena ditrAdizveva varttate na pratyekama Page a samavAyena tu pratyekavftti pratyekAvftteH samudAyAvf ttitvaniyamamastu samavAyAdinEva na paryyAptisambanDe neti BedaH sa ca savezAmeva padArTAnA viSizwabudDi niyAmakaH padArTaBedena nAnA yaTA paryyAptiScAya meko Gawa imO dvO ityAdi pratItisAkzikaH svarUpa sambanDaviSezaH iti dIGitiH samavAyena guRe guRa syAsattve pi catvAro guRA ityAdipratItyA guRAdizu saMKyAdisattvaniyAmako pi tAdfSaH sambanDaH iti sAmAnyaBAve jagadISaH dvitIyavutpativAde gadA DaraBawwAcAryaSca paryAptirdviviDA arDaparyyAptiH pUrRa paryyAptiSca tatra praTamA yatrADikasya nirAsArTA yA paryyAptirniveSyate sArDaparyyApniH yaTA parvato vahnimAn DUmAdityAdO sADyatAvacCedakakahnitvanizwA paryyAptiH dvitIyA yatra nyUnavAraRAya yA paryyAptirniveSyate sA pUrRaparyyAptiH yaTA parvato na mahAnasIyavahnimA nityAdO sADyatAvacCedakIBUtamahAnasIvatvaviSizwavahni tvanizWA paryAptiH

paryyanuyojyopekzaRa paryyanuyojyopekzaRa paryyanuyojyopekzaRa na gOtamokte nigrahasTAnaBede nigra hasTAnaprapptasyopekzaRe anigrahaH paryyanuyojyopekza Ram gO sU paryyanuyojyopekzaRaM lakzayati nigra hasTAnaM prAptavato nigrahaH nigrahasTAnAnudBAvanamityarTaH yatra tvanekanigrahasTAnapAte ekatarodBAvanaM tatra na paryya nuyojyopekzaRam avamare nigrahasTAnodBAvanatvAvacCinnA BAvasyeva tattvAt nanu vAdinA kaTamidamudBAvyaM svakO lInavivaraRasyAyuktatvAditi cet satyaM maDyasTenEva sadBAvyaM vAde ca svayamudBAvane pyadozaH vfttiH

patidebatA patidebatA patidebatA strI patireva devatA yasyAH pativratAyAm patidEvatA pyatra
patidevatA patidevatA patidevatA strI patireva devatA yasyAH pativratAyAm patidEvatA pyatra
pattrAli pattrAli pattrAli na pattrARAmAvalayo yasmAt gerike SabdAca ta patrapaNktO ca
pattrAvali pattrAvali pattrAvali na pattrARAmAvalayo yasmAt gErike SabdAca ta pattrapaNktO ca
pattralabaRa pattralabaRa pattralabaRa na patraviSezeRa pakvaM labaRam SA ta suSru tokte labaRaBede ganDarvahastakamuzkakanaktamAlAwarUza kapUtIkAragbaDacitrakAdInAM patrARyArdrARi lavarRena sahodraKale vakzudya snehaGawe prakzipyAvalipya goSakfdBirddA hayedetat patralabaRamupadiSanti vAtarogezu
pattralavaRa pattralavaRa pattralavaRa na patraviSezeRa pakvaM lavaRam SA ta suSrutokte lavaRaBede ganDarvahastakasuzkakanaktamAlAwarUpakapUtIkAragbaDacitrakAdInAM patrARyArdrARi lavaRena sahodUKale vakzudya snehaGawe prakzipyAvalipya goSakfdBirddAhayedetat patralavaRamupadiSanti vAtarogezu
pattrya pattrya pattrya tri pattrasya hitaM yat SyonAke vfkze pu amaraH
pattya pattya pattya tri pattrasya hitaM yat SyonAke vfkze pu amaraH
pawa pawa pawa gatO BvA para saka sew pawati apAwIt apawIt papAwa pewatuH ud Ric unmUlane utpAwayati pawa dIptO cu uBa aka sew pAwayati te apIpawat ta ava Cedane saka avapAwayati CinattItyarTaH pawa vezwane ada cu uBa saka sew pawayati te apapawat ta pawa pu pawa vezwane karaRe GaYarTe ka vastre amaraH strItvamapi apawIkzepeRetyudAharaRadarSanAt citrapawe medicitraleKanapawasvarUpAdi devI pu medi citraleKanapawasvarUpAdi devIpu uktaM yaTA pawasya lakzaRaM vakzye yaTA siDyanti sADakAH granTikeSavihIne tu ajIrRe samatantuke asPuwite cAcCidre sTalenEva samAliKet yoginIrUpiRI kAryA jayAdyEparivAritA vfdDena ca kAryyA jayAdyE parivAritA vfdDenaca BavedvfdDovyADite vyADito Bavet kurUpeRa kurupastu sUkzmeRa sUkzmatAmiyAt leKakasya tu yadrUpaM citre Bavati tAdfSam pawasyaMSaBedacCedanAdizu zawasyAMSaBedacCedanAdizu PalaM tadDAraRanakzatrAdiPalaM ca vf saM a uktaM yaTA vastvasya koRezu vastrasya koReza vasanti devA narASca pArSvAnvadaprAntamaDye SezAstrayaScAtra pArSvAnvada SAntamaDye SezAstreyaScAtra niSAcarAMSAstaTEva SayyAsanapAwukAsu SayyA sanapAdukAsu lipte masIgomayakardamAdyESCinne pradagDe sPuwite masIgomayakadamAdyESCinne pra dagGe skuwite ca vidyAt puzwaM nave lpAlpataraM ca Bukte pApaM SuBaM vA DikamuttarIye ruDrAkzasAMSezvaTa yAni rugrAkzasASezvaTa vAsi mftyuH puYjanma tejaSca manuzyaBAme BAme maraRAmaya BogavfdDiH prAntezu manuzyaBAge BAge maraRAmaTa Bo gavfdDiH prAlpezu sarvatra vadantyanizwam kaNkalpavolUkakapotakAkakravyAdagomAyuKarozwrasarpEH CedAkftirdEvataBAmagApi pusAM vawantyanizwam kaNkaplavolU kakapotakAkakravyAdagomAyuKarozwrasarpEH CedAkftirdEGata BAgagApi puMsAM BayaM mftyu samaM mftyusarma karoti CatraDvajasvastikavardDamAnaSrIvfkzakumBAmbujatoraRAdyEH CedAkftinErrftaBAgagApi CatraDvajasva stikavardDamAnaSrIvfkzakumBAmbujatoraRAdyEH CedAkfti rnErftaBAgagApi puMsAM viDatte nacireRa lakzmIm praBUtavastradA pra BUtavastradA SvinI BaraRyaTApahAriRI pradahyate gnidEvate gni dEvate prajeSvare rTasidDayAH mfme rTasidDayaH mfge tu mUzakAdBayaM vyasutvameva vyasu tvameva SANkare punarvasO SuBAgamastadagraBe DanEryutiH DanEryu tiH BujaNgame vilupyate maGAsu mftyumAdiSet BagAhvaye nfpAdBayaM DanAgamAya cottarA kareRa karmasidDayaH SuBAgamastu citrayA SuBaM ca BojyamAnile BojyamA nile dvidEvate janapriyaH suhfdyutiSca mitreBe suhfvAtiSca mitraBe purandare mvarakzayaH mbarakzayaH jalaplutiSca nEfte rujojalADidEvate nErfte rujo jalADidEvate mizwamannamaTa viSvadEvate vEzRave Bavati netrarogitA DAnyalabDimapi vAsave vidurvAruRe netraSemitA cAnyalabDimapi vAtave vidu Page a rvAruRe vizakftaM mahadDavam BAdrapadrAsu mahadBayam BAdrapadAsu BayaM salitotTaM sali lotTaM tatparatra ca BavetsutalabDiH ratrayutiM ratnayutiM kaTayanti ca pOzRe yo BinavAmbaramicCati Boktum vipramatAdraTa BUzatidattaM vi pramatAdaTa BUpatidattaM yacca vivAhaviDAvapi labDam tezu guREH rahitezvapi BoktuM nUtanamambaramizwaPalaM syAt BoktuM navAmbaraM Sastramfkze Sastamfkze pi guRavarjite vivAhe rAjasammAne brAhmARAnAM brAhmaRAnAM ca santrate sammate piyAlavfkze pu medi puraskfte tri viSvaH Cadizi cAla BarataH pawa gatO BvA para saka sew pawati apAwIt apawIt papAwa pewatuH ud Ric unmUlane utpAwayati pawa dIptO cu uBa aka sew pAwayati te apIpawat ta ava Cedane saka avapAwayati CinattItyarTaH pawa vezwane ada cu uBa saka sew pawayati te apapawat ta pawa pu pawa vezwane karaRe GaYarTe ka vastre amaraH strItvamapi apawIkzepeRetyudAharaRadarSanAt citrapawe medi citraleKanapawasvarUpAdi devIpu uktaM yaTA pawasya lakzaRaM vakzye yaTA siDyanti sADakAH granTikeSavihIne tu ajIrRe samatantuke asPuwite cAcCidre sTalenEva samAliKet yoginIrUpiRI kAryyA jayAdyE parivAritA vfdDenaca BavedvfdDovyADite vyADito Bavet kurUpeRa kurupastu sUkzmeRa sUkzmatAmiyAt leKakasya tu yadrUpaM citre Bavati tAdfSam zawasyAMSaBedacCedanAdizu PalaM tadDAraRanakzatrAdiPalaM ca vf saM a uktaM yaTA vastrasya koReza vasanti devA narASca pArSvAnvada SAntamaDye SezAstreyaScAtra niSAcarAMSAstaTEva SayyA sanapAdukAsu lipte masIgomayakadamAdyESCinne pra dagGe skuwite ca vidyAt puzwaM nave lpAlpataraM ca Bukte pApaM SuBaM vA DikamuttarIye rugrAkzasASezvaTa vAsi mftyuH puYjanma tejaSca manuzyaBAge BAge maraRAmaTa Bo gavfdDiH prAlpezu sarvatra vawantyanizwam kaNkaplavolU kakapotakAkakravyAdagomAyuKarozwrasarpEH CedAkftirdEGata BAgagApi puMsAM BayaM mftyusarma karoti CatraDvajasva stikavardDamAnaSrIvfkzakumBAmbujatoraRAdyEH CedAkfti rnErftaBAgagApi puMsAM viDatte nacireRa lakzmIm pra BUtavastradA SvinI BaraRyaTApahAriRI pradahyate gni dEvate prajeSvare rTasidDayaH mfge tu mUzakAdBayaM vyasu tvameva SANkare punarvasO SuBAgamastadagraBe DanEryu tiH BujaNgame vilupyate maGAsu mftyumAdiSet BagAhvaye nfpAdBayaM DanAgamAya cottarA kareRa karmasidDayaH SuBAgamastu citrayA SuBaM ca BojyamA nile dvidEvate janapriyaH suhfvAtiSca mitraBe purandare mbarakzayaH jalaplutiSca nErfte rujo jalADidEvate mizwamannamaTa viSvadEvate vEzRave Bavati netraSemitA cAnyalabDimapi vAtave vidu Page a rvAruRe vizakftaM mahadBayam BAdrapadAsu BayaM sali lotTaM tatparatra ca BavetsutalabDiH ratnayutiM kaTayanti ca pOzRe yo BinavAmbaramicCati Boktum vi pramatAdaTa BUpatidattaM yacca vivAhaviDAvapi labDam tezu guREH rahitezvapi BoktuM nUtanamambaramizwaPalaM syAt BoktuM navAmbaraM Sastamfkze pi guRavarjite vivAhe rAjasammAne brAhmaRAnAM ca sammate piyAlavfkze pu medi puraskfte tri viSvaH Cadizi cAla BarataH
pawaveSman pawaveSman pawaveSman na pawanirmitaM veSma pawamaRqape tAzvu
pawawiSa pawawiSa pawawiSa sa pu astraBede amaraH tallakzaRaM hemA pari uSanatoktaM yaTA uktaM nAlasUryakaM pawwisaviDirvakzyate vatsa niboDa trihastaH sArdDatrihastaScaturhastaSceti SrezWamaDyamADamAnAM daRqastriviDaH kartfyogyasuKo grAhyanAho Bavet daRqaScAzwArviSatipalo nikfzwo maDyamaScatustriMSatpalaH SrezWaScatvAriMSatpalaH yaTA kuntapamARenopayoga staTAsyApi drazwavyaH taTA sUryacandrasadfSAkAraM zoqaSANgulavistAraM tIkzRaDArAnvitaM dvAtriMSatpalaMpatraMBavati tasyArA zaqaNgulAH koSaH saptANgulaH tasya paYcapalaM tasyAnuyogataH sampraSlizyakIlAByAmeva koSo Bavet tadArayA dfQasamanvitayA agrakalpaH sudfQaH savEdfSyamatsyAdArAmUlamAnAduhyagulonnataH daRqaH kAryaH ekANgulAsyA syAdArA zaqaNgulAnAhA daRqamUle cArpitA saPalAKyAsamucCrayAt PalavistAromaDye Bavet samaScaBavet pASaDAraRastripalagOravo dvyaNgulaSca koSo mUlapASvO dfQArAsyAt DArAyA vitAnArTaM munerapi valArTaM ca mUlaM rakzecca sudfQArTamArAvalena yuktaM koSa maDye suvidDamArAyAM yaTA dfzwaM kuRqalAgraM yaTAyogaM ca nAgapASaDArakaM munideSAdupari banDADAnamuKasamanvitaM Bavet ArAgataM samyakapaYcANgulayataM sumfzwaM dfQApANgaM ca syAt taTEva cAzwapalasamanvitaM CedANgakalpakaraRamUlaM kalpaM vidyAt Bavati cAtra SlokAH prADAnyaM pawwisAsAM syAcCedyayogaviDAnataH maDyamaM cEva lakzyezu vIcaM cEvADamezu ca miSrayogena miSraM syAddaRqaScoktAyataH smftaH vijYAyEva yaTezwAni SastrARIha prayojayet
pawazeSman pawazeSman pawazeSman na pawanirmitaM veSma pawamaRqape tA vu
pawupatrikA pawupatrikA pawupatrikA strI pawu patramasyAH kap ata ittvam kzudracaYcukzupe rAjani
pawutrikA pawutrikA pawutrikA strI pawu patramasyAH kap atEttvam kzudra caYcukzupe rAjani
pawwiSa pawwiSa pawwiSa sa pu astraBede amaraH tallakzaRaM hemA pari uSanamoktaM yaTA Page a uktaM nAlasUryakaM pawwisaviDirvakzyate vatsa niboDa trihastaH sArdDatrihastaScaturhastaSceti SrezWamaDyamADamAnAM daRqastriviDaH kartfyogyamuKo grAhyAnAho Ba vet daRqaScAzwAviMSatipalo nikfzwo maDyamaScatustriMSa tpalaH SrezWaScatvAriMSatpalaH yaTA kuntapramARenopayoga staTAsyApi drazwavyaH taTA sUryacandrasadfSAkAraM zo qaSANgulavistAraM tIkzRaDArAnvitaM dvAtriMSatpalaM patraM Bavati tasyArA vaqaNgulAH koSaH saptANgulaH tasya paYcapalaM tasyAnuyogataH saMpraSlizyakIlAByAmeva koSo Bavet tadArayA dfQasamanvitayA agrakalpaH sudfQaH satEdf SyamatsyAdArAmUlamAnAddvyagulonnataH daRqaH kAryaH ekANgulAsyA syAdArA zaqaNgulAnAhA daRqamUle cArpitA saPalAsyAsamucCrayAt PalavistAromaDye Bayet samaSca Bavet pASaDAraRastripalagOravo dvyaNgulaSca koSo mUla pArSvo dfQArAsyAt DArAyA vitAnArTaM munerapi ba lArTaM ca mUlaM rakzecca sudfQArTamArAbalena yuktaM koSa maDye suvidDajArAyAM yaTA dfzwaM kuRqalAgraM yaTAyogaM gra nAgapASaDArakaM munideSAdupari vanDADAnamuKasamanvitaM Bavet ArAgataM samyakpaYcANgulAyataM sumfzwaM dfqApANgaM ca syAt taTEva cAzwapalasamanvitaM CedANgakalpakaraRamUla kalpaM vidyAt Bavati cAtra SlokAH prADAnyaM pawwisAnAM syAcCedyayogaviDAnataH maDyamaM cEva lakzyezu nIcaM cEvADamezu ca miSrayogena miSraM myAddaRqaScoktAyataH smftaH vijYAyEva yaTezwAni SastrARIha prayojayet
payasya payasya payasya prasftO parimARaviSeze kaRqvA aka sew payasyati apayasyIt payasya tri payaso dugDasya vikAraH tatra hitaM vA yat dugDavikAre daDyAdO amaraH dugDahite tri viqAle pu Sabdaca dugDikAyAM kzIrakAkolyAM svarRakzIrikAyAM svarRa kzIrikAyAM ca strI medi arkapuzpikAyAM ratnamAlA kuwumbinIkzupe rAjani AmikzAyAm hemaca payasya prasftO parimARaviSeze kaRqvA aka sew payasyati apayasyIt payasya tri payaso dugDasya vikAraH tatra hitaM vA yat dugDavikAre daDyAdO amaraH dugDahite tri viqAle pu Sabdaca dugDikAyAM kzIrakAkolyAM svarRa kzIrikAyAM ca strI medi arkapuzpikAyAM ratnamAlA kuwumbinIkzupe rAjani AmikzAyAm hemaca
pecakim pecakim pecakim pu pecakaH pucCamUlopAnto styasya ini gaje SabdaratnA striyAM NIp
pecakin pecakin pecakin pu pecakaH pucCamUlopAnto styasya ini gaje SabdaratnA striyAM NIz
pela pela pela kampe aka gatO saka BvA BvA para sew pelati apelIt fdit caqi caNi na hrasvaH apipelat ta niGaRwE niGaRwO ayaM gatikarmatayA curAditvena paWitaH tena pelayati te pela na pela ac puScihne puMScihne aNgaBede aRqakoza hemaca pela kampe aka gatO saka BvA para sew pelati apelIt fdit caNi na hrasvaH apipelat ta niGaRwO ayaM gatikarmatayA curAditvena paWitaH tena pelayati te pela na pela ac puMScihne aNgaBede aRqakoza hemaca
pesala pesala pesala tri piSa za sa alac sundare dakze komale ca amaraH mUrdDanyadantyamaDyo pyuktArTezu BarataH DUrtte Sabdara peSorUpamastyasya siDmA lac vizRO pu akrUraH peSalo dakzaHvizRusa
pezala pezala pezala tri piSa za sa alac sundare dakze komale ca amaraH mUrdDanyadantyamaDyo pyuktArTezu BarataH DUrtte Sabdara peSorUpamastyasya siDmA lac vizRO pu akrUraH peSalo dakzaHvizRusa
pf pf pf vyApAre tu AtmA Atma aka aniw prAyeRAyam vyANpUrvaH vyApriyate vyApfta vyApupriye vyApapriye vyApriyate vyApftaH vyApAraH pf prItO aka prIRane saka svA para zara aniw pfRoti apArzIt papAra pf pAlane pUraRe ca juho para saka aniw vA dIrGe dIrDe sew pipartti pipftaH pipUrttaH apArzIta azArzIt apArIt papAra papratuH paparatuH pUrRaH zarttO pf parttO cu uBa saka sew pArayati te azIparat apIparat ta pf vyApAre tu Atma aka aniw prAyeRAyam vyANpUrvaH vyApriyate vyApfta vyApapriye vyApriyate vyApftaH vyApAraH pf prItO aka prIRane saka svA zara aniw pfRoti apArzIt papAra pf pAlane pUraRe ca juho para saka aniw vA dIrDe sew pipartti pipftaH pipUrttaH azArzIt apArIt papAra papratuH paparatuH pUrRaH pf parttO cu uBa saka sew pArayati te apIparat ta
pfTavi pfTavi pfTavi strI praTate vistArameti praTa zivan zavan vA ni samprasAraRaM zittvAt NIz pfzo vA hrasvaH DarAyAm kzitO tadguRAdikaM yaTA rUpadravatvapratyakzayogi syAt praTamatrikam guruRI dve rasavatI dvayornEmittikodravaH sparSAdayo zwO vegaSca dravyatvaYca gurutvakam rUpaM rasastaTA sneho vAriRyete caturdaSa snehahInA ganDayutA kzitAvete caturdaSa tatra kzitirganDaheturnAnArUpavatI matA zaqviDastu rasastaya ganDo pi dviviDo mataH sparSastu tasyA vijYeyo hyanuzRASItapAkajaH nityA nityA ca sA dveDA nityA syAdaRulakzaRA anityA tu tadanyA syAt sEvAvayavayoginI sA ca triDA Baveddeha indriyaM vizayastaTA yonijAdirBaveddehamindriyaM GrARalakzaRam vizaye dvyaRukAdistu brahmARqAnta udAhftaHBAzApA tasyA aDyAtmAdiBedA yaTA pfTivI paYcamaM BUtaM GrARaYcADyAtmamucyate aDiBUtaM taTA ganDo vAyustatrADidEvatamBA ASva tasyA utpattikAraRaM yaTA SrUyatAM vasuDAjanma sarvamaNgalakAraRam viGnaviGnakaraM pApanASanaM puRyavardDanam aho kecidvadantIti maDukEwaBamedasA baBUva vasuDA janma tadvirudDamataM SfRu UcatustO purA vizRuM tuzwO yudDena tejasA AvAM jahi na yatrorvI pATasA saMvfteti ca tayorjIvanakAle ca pratyakzA sA Bavat sPuwam tato baBUva medaSca maraRasyAntarantayoH medinIti ca viKyAtetyuktAM yEstanmataM SfRu jalOtA kfSA pUrvaM vardDitA medasA yataH kaTayAmi ca tajjanma sArTakaM sarvasammatam purA SrutaM yad SrutyuktaM DarmavaktrAcca puzkare mahAvirAw SarIrasya jalasTasya ciraM sPuwam malo baBUva kAlena sarvANgavyApako Druvam sa ca pravizwaH sarvezAM tallomnAM vivarezu ca kAlena mahatA tasmAdbaBUva vasuDA mune pratyekaM pratilomnAYca kUpezu sA sTirA sTitA AvirBUtA tiroBUtA sA jale ca punaH punaH AvirBUtA sfzwikAle tajjaloparyavasTitA pralaye ca tidiroBUtA jalAByantaravasTitA prativiSvezu vasuDA SElakA nanu saMyutA saptasAgarasaMyuktA saptadvIpayutA satI hi mAdrimerusaMyuktA grahacandrArkasaMyutA brahmavizRuSivAdyESca surErlokEstadAlaye puRyatIrTasamAyuktA puRyaBAratasaMyutA pAtAlasapta tadaDastadUrdDa brahmalokakaH brahmalokaSca tatrEva sarvaviSvaYca tatra vE evaM sarvARi viSvAni pfTivyAM nirmitAni ca UrdDO golokavEkuRWO nityO viSvaparO ca tO naSvarARi ca viSvAni sarvARi kftrimARi ca pralaye prAkfte brahman brahmaRaSca nipAtane mahAvirAqAdisfzwO sfzweH kfzRena cAtmanA nityEH sTitA ca pralaye kAzWAkASeSvarEH saha kzityADizWAtfdevI sA vArAhe pUjitA surEH muniBirmuniBirviprErganDarvAdiBireva ca vizRorvarAharUpasya patnI sA SrutisammatA tatputro maNgalo jYeyo GaRweSo sA SrutisammatA tatputro maNgalo seyo GaRweSo maNgalAtmajaH BavanaM yatra sarvezAM BUrBUmistena kIrttitA vasuratnaM yA daDAti vasuDA sA vasunDarA harerUrO ca yA jAtA sA corvI parikIrttitA parA DaritrI DaraRI sarvezAM DAraRAttu yA ijyATa yAgADArAcca kzIRAlaye ca yA mahAlaye kzayaM yAti kzitistena prakIrttitA kASyapI kaSyapasyeyamacalA sTirarUpataH viSvamBarA tadDaraRAccAnantAnantarUpataH pfTivI pfTukanyAtvAdvistftatvAn mahAmune brahmavE pra Ka a tasyAH sarvaMsahatvepi kezAYcit BArAsahanakaTA yaTA kfzRaBaktivihInA ye ye ca tadBaktanindakAH tezAM mahApAtakinAmaSaktA BAravAhane svaDarmAcArahInA ye nityakftyavivarjitAH SradDAhInASca vedezu tezAM BAreRa pIqitA pitfmAtfgurustrIRAM pozaRaM putrapozyoH ye na kurvanti tezAYca na SaktA BAravAhane ye miTyAvAdinastAta dayAsatyavihInakAH nindakA gurudArARAM tezAM BAreRa pIqitA mitradrohI kftaGnaSca miTyAsAkzyapradAyakaH viSvAsaGnaH sTApyahArI tezAM BAreRa pIqitA kalyARayuktanAmAni harernAmEkamaNgalam kurvanti vikrayaM ye vE tezAM BAreRa pIqitA jIvaGAtI gurudrohI grAmayAjI ca lubDakaH SavadAhI SUdraBojI tezAM BAreRa pIqitA pUjAyajYopavAsAdi vratAni niyamAni ca ye ye mUQA vihantArastezAM BAreRa pIqitA sadA dvizanti ye pApA goviprasuravEzRavAn hari harikaTAM Bakti tezAM BAreRa pIqitA SaNKAdInAYca BAreRa pIqitA haM yaTA viDe tato Dikena dEtyAnAM tezAM BAreRa pIqitA brahmavE pu janmaKa a
pfTivI pfTivI pfTivI strI praTate vistArameti praTa zivan zavan vA ni samprasAraRaM zittvAt NIz pfzo vA hrasvaH DarAyAm kzitO tadguRAdikaM yaTA rUpadravatvapratyakzayogi syAt praTamatrikam guruRI dve rasavatI dvayornEmittikodravaH sparSAdayo zwO vegaSca dravyatvaYca gurutvakam rUpaM rasastaTA sneho vAriRyete caturdaSa snehahInA ganDayutA kzitAvete caturdaSa tatra kzitirganDaheturnAnArUpavatI matA zaqviDastu rasastaya ganDo pi dviviDo mataH sparSastu tasyA vijYeyo hyanuzRASItapAkajaH nityA nityA ca sA dveDA nityA syAdaRulakzaRA anityA tu tadanyA syAt sEvAvayavayoginI sA ca triDA Baveddeha tadvirudDamataM SfRu UcatustO purA vizRuM tuzwO yudDena tejasA AvAM jahi na yatrorvI pATasA saMvfteti ca tayorjIvanakAle ca pratyakzA sA Bavat sPuwam tato baBUva medaSca maraRasyAntarantayoH medinIti maNgalo jYeyo GaRweSo sA SrutisammatA tatputro maNgalo seyo GaRweSo maNgalAtmajaH BavanaM yatra sarvezAM BUrBUmistena kIrttitA vasuratnaM yA daDAti vasuDA sA vasunDarA harerUrO ca yA jAtA sA corvI parikIrttitA parA DaritrI DaraRI sarvezAM DAraRAttu yA ijyATa yAgADArAcca kzIRAlaye ca yA mahAlaye kzayaM yAti kzitistena prakIrttitA kASyapI kaSyapasyeyamacalA sTirarUpataH viSvamBarA tadDaraRAccAnantAnantarUpataH pfTivI pfTukanyAtvAdvistftatvAn mahAmune brahmavE pra Ka a tasyAH sarvaMsahatvepi kezAYcit BArAsahanakaTA yaTA kfzRaBaktivihInA ye ye ca tadBaktanindakAH tezAM mahApAtakinAmaSaktA BAravAhane svaDarmAcArahInA ye nityakftyavivarjitAH SradDAhInASca vedezu tezAM BAreRa pIqitA pitfmAtfgurustrIRAM pozaRaM putrapozyoH ye na kurvanti tezAYca na SaktA BAravAhane ye miTyAvAdinastAta dayAsatyavihInakAH nindakA gurudArARAM tezAM BAreRa pIqitA mitradrohI kftaGnaSca miTyAsAkzyapradAyakaH viSvAsaGnaH sTApyahArI tezAM BAreRa pIqitA kalyARayuktanAmAni harernAmEkamaNgalam kurvanti vikrayaM ye vE tezAM BAreRa pIqitA jIvaGAtI gurudrohI grAmayAjI ca lubDakaH SavadAhI SUdraBojI tezAM BAreRa pIqitA pUjAyajYopavAsAdi vratAni niyamAni ca ye ye mUQA vihantArastezAM BAreRa pIqitA sadA dvizanti ye pApA goviprasuravEzRavAn hari harikaTAM Bakti tezAM BAreRa pIqitA SaNKAdInAYca BAreRa pIqitA haM yaTA viDe tato Dikena dEtyAnAM tezAM BAreRa pIqitA brahmavE pu janmaKa a
pfTuskanDa pfTuskanDa pfTuskanDa puM strI pfTuH skanDo sya SUkare rAjani striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
pfTuskanda pfTuskanda pfTuskanda pu strI pfTu skanDo sya Sukare rAjani striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
pfca pfca pfca samparke adA AtmA Atma aka sew pfkte aparcizwa papuce Idit pfkRaH pfca saMyamane saka samparke aka cu uBa pakze BvA para sew parcayati pacaMyati te parcati apIpfcat ta apaparcat ta aparcIt apa rcIt pfca samparke adA Atma aka sew pfkte aparcizwa papuce Idit pfkRaH pfca saMyamane saka samparke aka cu uBa pakze BvA para sew pacaMyati te parcati apIpfcat ta apaparcat ta apa rcIt
pfkti pfkti pfkti strI pfca BAve ktin samparke sparSe ca amaraH
pfzWagIpa pfzWagIpa pfzWagIpa pu pfzWaM gopAyati gupa vA ayABAve Rvul pfzWadeSarakzake yoDaBede BA A a

piNgacakzus piNgacakzus piNgacakzus pu piNgaM cakzurasya kUmBIre hemaca piNganetre tri
piNgekzaRa piNgekzaRa piNgekzaRa pu piNgamIkzaRamasya Sive hemaca piNga netrayukte tri
piNgokzaRa piNgokzaRa piNgokzaRa pu piNgamIkzaRamasya Siye hemaca piNganetrayukte tri
piRqAnvAhAryaka piRqAnvAhAryaka piRqAnvAhAryaka na piRqAnAM piRqapitfyajYAnAM paScAdAhriyate anu A hf Ryat svArTe ka pArvaRaSrAdDe pimqAnvAharyyakaM SrAdDaM kuryanmAsAnumAsikam manuH
piRqAnvAhAryyaka piRqAnvAhAryyaka piRqAnvAhAryyaka na piRqAnAM piRqapitfyajYAnAM pa ScAdAhriyate anu A hf Ryat svArTe ka pArvaRaSrAdDe piRqAnvAharyyakaM SrAdDaM kuryyAnmAsAnumAsikam manuH
piRqIpuzpa piRqIpuzpa piRqIpuzpa pu piRqyA upalakzitaM puzpamasya saMhatastavakapuzpe aSokavfkze rAjani
piRqapAda piRqapAda piRqapAda puMstrI piRqa iva pAdo sya gaje trikA striyAM jAtitvAt NIz
piRqatarku piRqatarku piRqatarku pu piRqaM tarkayati tarka bA uka piRqalepaBAgizu vfdDaprapatitAmahAdizu trizu prApitAmahAH dakziRataH pfzWataH piRqatarkukAH gfhyasAma
piRqatarkuka piRqatarkuka piRqatarkuka pu piRqaM tarkayati tarka bA uka piRqa lepaBAgizu vfdDaprapitAmahAdizu trizu prapitAmahAH da kziRataH pfzWataH piRqatarkukAH gfhyasAma
piRqopuzpa piRqopuzpa piRqopuzpa pu piRqyA upalakzitaM puzpamasya saMhatastavakapuzpe aSokavfkze rAjani

piWonas piWonas piWonas pu fziBede f BA tasyApatyam iY pEWInasi tadapatye upasmftikArake rfziBede

pinadva pinadva pinadva tri api naha kta allopaH parihite vastrAdO hemaca

plakza plakza plakza BakzaRe BvA uBa saka sew prukzati plakzati te aplakzIt praplakzizwa apla kzizwa paplakza kze plakzaH plakzaye plakza pu plakzyate kIwEH plakza karmaRi GaY pAkuqa vfkze amaraH prakzlasamIpasTAnAt niHsftAyAM sarasvatyAM DarasvatyAM ca BA va a tasyAH plakzaprasnavaRAt jAtatvAt plakzaprasravaRAt jAtaRAt taTAtvam praBavaSca sarasvatyAH plakzaprasravaRaM matam BA bA Sa a plakzadvIpacihnite dvIpaBede paDaplakzo pu plakzo jambUpramARo dvIpaH KyAtikaro hiraRmaya utTito yatrAgnirupAste saptajihvaH tasyADipatiH priyavratAtmaja priyavratA tmaja iDvajihvaH svaM dvIpaM dvIpraM sapta varzARi viBajya saptavarza nAmaBya AtmajeBya Akalayya AkalaTya svayamAtmayogenopararAma SivaM yavasaM yavasa suBadraM SAntaM kzemamftamaBayamiti varzARi kzemamamftamaBayamiti varzA Ri tezu girayo nadyaSca saptEvABijYAtAH maRiBUwo saptEvAmijYAtAH maRikUwo Page a vajrakUwaH SataSfNga indraseno jyotizmAn suvarRo hiraRyazWIvo hira RyazWIvo meGamAla iti setuSElAH aruRA mfmaRA nfmRA NgirasI sAvitrI supraBAtA ftamBarA satyamBareti mahAnadyaH yAsAM jalopasparSanaviDUtarajastamasohaMsapataNgorDvAyanasatyANgasaYjYAScatvAro jalopasparSanaviDUtaMrajastamasohaMsa pataNgorDvAyanasatyANgasaMjYAScatvAro varRAH sahastrayuzo sahasrAyuzo vibuDopamasandarSanaprajananAH svargadvAraM trayyA vidyayA BagavantaM trayImayaM sUryamAtmAnaM sUryyamAtmAnaM yajante BAga kzArodena yaTA dvIpo jambusaYjYo dvIpI jambusaMjYo BivezwitaH saMvezwyakzAramudaDiM saMvezwya kzAramudaDiM plakzadvIpastaTA sTitaH jambUdvIpasya jambudvIpasya vistAraH SatasAhasrasasmitaH sa eva dviguRo brahman vrahman plakzadvIpo pyudAhftaH sapta meDAtiTeH putrAH plakzadvIpeSvarasya vE jyezWaH SAntamayo SAntaBayo nAma SESirastadanantaraH muKodayantaTAnandaH suKodaya ntaTAnandaH SivaH kzemaka eva ca DruvaSca saptamastezAM plakzadvIpeSvarA ime pUrvaM SAntaBayaM varzaM SiSiraM suKadaM taTA AndaSca SivaYcEva AnandaSca SivarYcEva kzemakaH Druva eva Druvaeva ca maryAdA maryyAdA kArakAstezAM taTAnye varzaparbatA saptEva tezAM nAmAni SfRuzva munisattama gomedaScEva candraSya candraSca nArado dunduBistaTA du nduBistaTA somakaH sumanAH SElo vEBrAjaScEva saptamaH varzAcalezu ramyezu sarvezvetezu cAnaTAH cAnaGAH vasanti devaganDarvasahitAH devaga nDarvasahitAH satataM prajAH tezu puRyAH janapadAScirAcca mriyate janaH nADayo vyADayo vApi sarvakAlasuKaM hi tat tezAM nadyaSca saptEva varzARAntu samudragAH nAmatastAH pravakzyAmi SrutAH pApaM haranti yAH anutaptA SiKA cEva vipApA divigA kramuH amftA sukftA cEva saptEtAstatra nimnagAH ete SElAstaTA nadyaH praDAnAH pra DAnAH kaTitAstava kzudranadyastaTA SElAstatra santi sahasraSaH saha sraSaH tAH pibanti pivanti sadA hfzwA nadIrjanapadAstu te apasarpiRI na tezAM vE na cEvotsarpiRI prajA na tatrAsti yugAvasTA tezu sTAnezu saptasu tretadAyugasamaH tretAyugasamaH kAlaH sarvadEva mahAmune vizRupu kalpaBedAnnAmaBedaH taduttaraM vanasya Ratvam plakzavaRam plakzasyAdUradeSAdi CanaqA Ca naqA kukuc plakzakIya tatsamIpAdO tri dviguRo vrahman plakzadvIpo pyudAhftaH sapta meDAtiTeH putrAH plakzadvIpeSvarasya vE jyezWaH SAntaBayo nAma SESirastadanantaraH suKodaya ntaTAnandaH SivaH kzemaka eva ca DruvaSca saptamastezAM gomedaScEva candraSca nArado du nduBistaTA somakaH sumanAH SElo vEBrAjaScEva saptamaH varzAcalezu ramyezu sarvezvetezu cAnaGAH vasanti devaga nDarvasahitAH satataM prajAH tezu puRyAH janapadAScirAcca pliha pliha pliha gatO BvA para saka sew plehati aplehIt pipleha
plihan plihan pli plI han pu pli kanin pfzo vA dIrGaH pilA vAmakukzipArSvasTe mAMsaKaRqe tadvfdDihetuke rogaBede ca tannidAnAdi BAvapra uktaM yaTA vidAhyaBizyandirasasya jantoH praduzwamatyarTamasfkkaPaSca plohABivfdDiM kurutaH pravfdDO ta plIhasaMjYaM gadamAmananti vAme sa pArSve parivfdDimeti viSezataH sIdati cAturo tra mandajvarAgniH kaPapittaliNgErupadrutaH kzIRa balo tipARqu vidAhi kulatTamAzasarzapaSAkAdi aBizandi mAhizaM daDyAdi kaPapittaliNgErupadruta i tyarTaH praduzwamatyarTamasfkkaPaSceti saMprAptiH asfjaH pi ttasya ca samAnaDarmatvAt raktajamAha klamo Bramo bidAhaSca vEvaSrRyaM gAtragOravam moho raktodaratvaYca jYeyaM raktajalakzaRam pEtikasya lakzaRamAha sajvaraH Page b sapipAsaSca sadAho mohasaMyutaH pItagAtro viSe zeRa plohA pEttika ucyate SlEzmikalakzaRamAha plIhA mandavyaTAsTUla kaWino gOravAnvitaH aro cakena saMyuktaH plIhA kaPaja ucyate vAtikamAha nityamAnadDakozWaH syA nnityodAvarttapIqitaH veda nABiH parItaSca plIhA vAtika ucyate tamasADyamAha dozatritayarUpo nyaH plIhA sADyo Bavatyapi BAvapra tatrEvAnyatra tatsTAnamuktaM yaTA aTa SarIrAvayavaviSezasTa yakftplIhasvarUpamAha aDo dakziRataScApi hfdayAdyakftaH sTitiH tattu raYjakapittasya sTAnaM SoRitajaM matam
pluza pluza pluza dAhe BvA para saka sewa sew plozati aplozIt pluploza puploza udit ktvA vewa plezitvA vew pluzitvA pluzwvA pluza dAhe divA para saka sew pluzyati fdit xdit apluzat pluza seke pUrttO ca saka snehe aka kryA para sew pluzRAti aplozIt puploza pluza dAhe BvA para saka sew plozati aplozIt puploza udit ktvA vew pluzitvA pluzwvA pluza dAhe divA para saka sew pluzyati xdit apluzat pluza seke pUrttO ca saka snehe aka kryA para sew pluzRAti aplozIt puploza

potavaRij potavaRij potavaRij pu pote vaRik nOkayA vARijyakArake amaraH

prABAYjana prABAYjana prABAYjana na prasaYjane devatA sya aR svAtinakzatre tasya taddevatAkatvAt taTAtvam tasyApatyam iY prABaYjani hanUmati AyUMzi tpakzu nirBidya prABaYjaniramocayat BawwiH
prABaYjana prABaYjana prABaYjana na praBaYjano devatA sya aR svAtinakzatre tasya taddevatAkatvAt taTAtvam tasyApatyam iY prABa Yjani hanUmati AyUMzi tvakzu nirBidya prABaYjaniramoca yat BawwiH
prANganyAya prANganyAya prANganyAya pu AcAreRAvasanno pi punarleKayate yadi so BiDeyo jitaH pUrvaM prANnyASca sa ucyate ityukte vyavahAravizaye uttaraBede dfSyam
prANnyAya prANnyAya prANnyAya pu AcAreRAvasanno pi punarseKayate yadi so BiDeyo jitaH pUrvaM prANnyAyaSca sa ucyate ityukte vyavahAravizaye uttaraBede pf dfSyam
prASitrAharaRa prASitrAharaRa prASitrAharaRa prASitraM hriyate nena hf karaRe lyuw prASitrarUpaBAgaharaRasADane gokarRAkftipAtraBede Sata brA BAzyam
prAYjali prAYjali prAYjali tri prabadDo Yjaliryena prA va badDAYjalipuwe prA sa badDAYjalO pu
prAc prAc prAc avya prAci saptamyarTe asi tasya luk prAcItyarTe prAc tri pra anca kvip pUrve deSe kAle ca diSe diSi strI NIp pUjyapUjayorantarAladiSi strI yatrEva BAnustu viyatyudeti prAcIti tAM vedavido vadanti taTApuraH taTA puraH pUjakapUjyayoSca sadAgamajYA pravadanti tantre ti ta DftavAkyam Dfta vAkyam etacca SivapUjAvyatiriktavizayam ti ta DftavAkyam etacca SivapUjAvyatiriktavizam vAcaspatimiSrAH SivapUjavyatiriktavizayam bAcaspati miSrAH halantatvAt vA wAp prAcAjihvamf prAcAjihvam f prAcAmanyuH f prAcI vE dEvI dik purastAdvE devAH pratyaYco manuzyAstAlupAvfttAH tasmAtteByaH prAgtizWan manuzyAstAnupAvfttAH tasmA tteByaH prANtizWan juhoti Sata prAc avya prAci saptamyarTe asi tasya luk prAcItyarTe prAc tri pra anca kvip pUrve deSe kAle ca diSi strI NIp pUjyapUjayorantarAladiSi strI yatrEva BAnustu viyatyudeti prAcIti tAM vedavido vadanti taTA puraH pUjakapUjyayoSca sadAgamajYA pravadanti tantre ti ta Dfta vAkyam etacca SivapUjavyatiriktavizayam bAcaspati miSrAH halantatvAt vA wAp prAcAjihvam f prAcAmanyuH f prAcI vE dEvI dik purastAdvE devAH pratyaYco manuzyAstAnupAvfttAH tasmA tteByaH prANtizWan juhoti Sata
prAcInabarhim prAcInabarhim prAcInabarhim pu indre nfpaBede ca hemaca atri vaMSe samutpanno brahmayoniH sanAtanaH prAcInabarhirBagavAMstasmAt pracotaso daSaBA SA a prAcInabarhirBagavAn mahAnAsIt prajApatiH havirdAnAt dvijaSrezWa yena saMvirdDitAH prajAH prAcInagrAH kuSAstasya pfTivyAM viSrutA mune prAcInabarhirBagavAn KyAto Buvi mahAbalaH agnipu ukte havirDAmnaH putre BA anu a
prAcInabarhis prAcInabarhis prAcInabarhis pu indre nfpaBede ca hemaca atri baMSe samutpanno brahmavoniH sanAtanaH prAcInabarhirBagavAM stasmAt pracetaso daSa BA SA a prAcInabarhi rBagavAn mahAnAsIt prajApatiH havirDAnAt dvija SrezWa yena saMvardDitAH prajAH prAcInAgrAH kuSAstasya pfTivyAM viSrutA mune prAcInabarhirBagavAn KyAto Buvi mahAbalaH agnipu ukte havirDamnaH putre BA anu a
prAgBakta prAgBakta prAgBakta na suSrutokte BaktaBakzaRAt prAkkAsarUpe OzaDa sevanakAsaBede ata UrdDaM daSOzaDakAlAnvakzyAmaH tatra nirBaktaM prAgBakta maDoBaktaM maDyeBakta BantarABaktaM saBaktaM sAmudgaM muhurmuhurgrAsaM saBaktamaBaktaM vA grAsAntara ceti daSOzaDakAlAH ityupakrame prAgBaktaM nAma yattu prAgBaktasyopayujyate SIGraM vipAkamupayAti balaM na hiMsyAdannAvftaM na ca muhu rbadanAnnireti prAgBaktasevitamaTo balamAdaDAti dadyAcca vfdDaSiSuBIruvarANganAByaH
prAgaBakta prAgaBakta prAgaBakta na suSrutokte BaktaBakzaRAt prAkAlarUpe ozaDasevanakAlaBede ata UrdDaM daSOzaDakAlAnvakzyAmaH tatra nirBakta prAgBakta maDoBaktaM maDyeBakta mantarABaktaM saBaktaM sAsudugaM suhurmuhugrAsaM saBaktamaBaktaM vA grAsAntara Yceti daSOzaDaKAlAH iTyupakrame prAgBaktaM nAma yattu prAgBaktasyopayucyate SIGraM vipAkamupayAti balaM na hisyAdannAvftaM na ca muhurvadanAnnireti prAgBaktasevitamaTo vasamAdaDAti dadyAcca vfdDaSiSuBIruvANganAByaH
prAgvaMSa prAgvaMSa prAgvaMSa pu prAk vaMSaH sapatrIkayajamanAdisamudAyo tra Page b havirmfhAt pUrvaBAgasTe yajamAnAdisTityarTe gfhe a maraH vizRO ca prAgvaMSo vaMSavardDanaH vizRusaM anTasya vaMSaH pAScAttyaH asya tu vaMSaH prapaYcaH prAgeva na pAScAttyaH BA
prAgvaSa prAgvaSa prAgvaSa pu prAk vaMSaH sapatnIka jayamAnAdisamudAyo tra havirgfhAt pUrvaBAgasTe yajamAnAdisTityarTe amaraH vizRO ca prAgvaMSo vaMSavardDanaHvizRusaM anayasya vaMSaH pAScAttyaH asya tu vaMSaH prapaYcaH prAgeva na pAScAttyaH BA
prAjjali prAjjali prAjjali tri prabadDo Yjaliryena prA ba badDAYjalipuwe prA sa badDAYjalO pu
prAkftaSatru prAkftaSatru prAkftaSatru pu karBa vizayAnantaravarttini nfpe
prAkftajvara prAkftajvara prAkftajvara pu varzASaradvasantezu vAtAdyEH prAkftaH kramAt jvarADikAre mADavokte jvaraBede
prAkftamitra prAkftamitra prAkftamitra na karma svaBAvasidDe mitre vizayAnantarasTa nfparUpAt prAkftaSatroH avyavahitottaravizayasTe nfpe
prAkftapralaya prAkftapralaya prAkftapralaya karma pralayaBede pralayaSabde dfSyam
prAkftika prAkftika prAkftika tri prakftyA nirvfttaH WaY prakftisADye svaBAvasidDe
prAtaHsavana prAtaHsavana prAtaHsavana na savanaM yajYANgakarmaBedeH somABizavAdi prAtaH karttavyam savanam prAtaH karttavye yajYANgakarmaBede apa prAtaH sava tatrArTe pu
prAtaHsavena prAtaHsavena prAtaHsavena na savanaM yajYANgakarmaBedaH somABizavAdi prAtaH karttavyam savanam prAtaHkarttavye yajYANgakarmaBede apa prAtaHsava tatrArTe pu
prAtihartra prAtihartra prAtihartra na pratiharturBAvaH karma vA udgAtrA aY pratihartfrUpasya ftvigBedasya karmaRi pratiharaRe taduBAve ca
prAtiharttra prAtiharttra prAtiharttra na pratiharturBAvaH karma vA udgAtrA aY pratihartfrUpasya ftvigmedasya karmaRi pratiharaRe tadBAve ca
prAtijanIna prAtijanIna prAtijanIna tri pratijanaM sADu pratijanA KaY prati janaM sADO
prAtijatIna prAtijatIna prAtijatIna tri pratijanaM sADu pratijanA KaY pratijanaM sADO
prAtiniDika prAtiniDika prAtiniDika pu pratiDi svArTe Wak pratiniDO kAtyA SrO
prAyudDezin prAyudDezin prAyudDezin pu prAyuDiprakfzwayudDArTaM hezate heza Rini aSve Sabdaca
prAyudvezin prAyudvezin prAyudvezin pu prAyuDi prakfzWayudDArTa hezate heza Rini aSve Sabdaca
prI prI prI tarpaRe BvA uBa saka aniw prayati te aprEzIt aptEpIt aprEzwa priyAya pripriye piprAya pipriye prI prItO kAntO icCAyAm saka divA Atma aniw prIyate apEzwa pipriye prI tarpaRe saka kAntO tfprO tfptO aka kryA uBa aniw proRAti prI RAti prIRIte apEzIt aprEzWa aprEzIt aprEzwa piprAya pipriye prIta Ricnuk prItaH Ricbuk prIRayati te prI tarpaRe saka cu uBa aniw prAyayati te apiprayat te atrApi nukprIRayatItyeke abApi nuk prIRayatItyeke prI tarpaRe BvA uBa saka aniw prayati te aptEpIt aprEzwa piprAya pipriye prI prItO kAntO icCAyAm saka divA Atma aniw prIyate apEzwa pipriye prI tarpaRe saka kAntO tfptO aka kryA uBa aniw prI RAti prIRIte aprEzIt aprEzwa piprAya pipriye prItaH Ricbuk prIRayati te prI tarpaRe saka cu uBa aniw prAyayati te apiprayat te abApi nuk prIRayatItyeke
prItivardDana prItivardDana prItivardDana tri prIti vardDayati vfDa Rit lyu santoza Page a vardDake vizRO pu priyakft prItivardDanaH vizRusa
prItivardvana prItivardvana prItivardvana tri prItaM vardDayati vfDa Ric lyu santozavardDake vizRO pu priyakft prItivardDanaH vizRuca
praButvAkzepa praButvAkzepa praButvAkzepa pu arTAlaNkAraBede DanaYca bahu laByaM te suKaM kzemaYca vartmani na ca me prARasandehastaTApi priya mA sma gAH ityAcakzARayA hetUn privayAtrAnubanDinaH pramutvenEva rudDastat praButvAkzepa ucyate he priya te videSagamane iti aDyAhAryyaM bahuDanaM suKaYca taTA bartmani paTi kzemaM kuSalaYca laByam atra ca me prARa sandehaH na tava SIGraMpratyAgamanasya bahuDanalABasya ca samBavAditi BAvaH taTApi mAsma gAH mA gacCa atra priyayAtrAyAH priyasya videSagamanasya anubanDinaH poza kAn hetUn AcakzaRayA kIrttayantyA kayAcit svADIna patikayeti SezaH praButvena svADInatayA eva patiH rudDaH videSagamanAt nivarttitaH tasmAt ezaH puButvAkzepa u cyate prema wIkA
praButvokzepa praButvokzepa praButvokzepa pu arTAlaNkAraBede DanaYca bahu laByaM te suKaM kzemaYca vartmani na ca me prARasandehastaTApi priya mA sra gAH ityAcakzARayA hetUn priyayAtrAnubanDinaH praButvenEva rudDastat praButvAkzepa ucyate he priya te videSagamane iti aDyAhAryaM bahuDanaM muKaYca taTA vartmani paTi kzemaM kuSalaYca laByam atra ca me prARasandehaH na tava SIGrapratyAgamanasya bahuDanalABasya ca samBavAditi BAvaH taTApi mAsma gAH mA gacCa atra priyayAtrAyAH priyasya videSagamanasya anubanDinaH pozakAn hetUn AcakzaRayA kIrttayantyA kayAcit svATIna patikayeti SezaH praButvena svADInatayA eva patiH rudDaH videSagamanAta nivarttitaH tasmAt ezaH praButvAkzepa ucyateprema wIkA
praGawAvid praGawAvid praGawAvid pu prakfzwA GawA AqambaraH tAM vetti vida kvip SAstragaRqe SAstrABijYe trikA
praGawAvida praGawAvida praGawAvida pu prakfzwA GawA AqmbaraH tAM vetti vida kvip SAstragaRqe SAstrABijYe trikA
praRIna praRIna praRIna tri pra nI karmaRi kta pAkena rUparasAnyaTABAvApA vEWe padArTe kzipte niveSite vihite ca hemaca yajYe saMskftAgnO pu amaraH yajYapAtraBede strI medi agnipadasAnniDye mantrasaMskftamAtre yaTADvare vahnira BipraRItaH BawwiH mantrasaMskftAsu apsu strI ba va tadADArapAtrI tu upacArAt praRItASabdavAcyA praRItAnAma Apo mantrasaMskftA AhavanIyasyottarato nihitAH ASva SrO nArA tadApaH prARa yaMstasmAdApaH praRItAstatpraRItAnAM praRItAtvam Sata brA
praRIta praRIta praRIta tri pra nI karmaRi kta pAkena rUparasAnyaTAmAvApAdite padArTe kzipe niveSite vihite ca hemaca yajYe saMskftAgnO pu amaraH yajYapAtraBede strI medi agnipadasAnniDye mantrasaMskftamAtre yaTADvare vahniraBipraRItaHBawwiH mantrasaMskftAsu apsu strI ba va tadADArapAtnI tu upacArAt praRItASabdavAcyA praRItAnAma Apo mantrasaMskftA AhavanIyasyottarato nihitAHASva SrO nArA tadApaH prARayaMstasmAdApaH praRItAstatpraRItAnAM praRItAtvam Sata brA

praSAMsopamA praSAMsopamA praSAMsopamA strI kAvyAdarSokte arTAlaNkAraBede yaTAbrahmaRo pyuqmuKaH padmaScandraH SamBuSiroDftaH tO tulyO tvanmuKeneti sA praSaMsopamocyate tO padmacandrO SvamBUyena tulyO iti padmacandrayoH praSaMsitayorapi tvanmuKasAKyena praSasAtiSayAt muKasya ca samaDikotkarzavyaYcanAt praSaMsopamA ucyate
praSaMsopamA praSaMsopamA praSaMsopamA strI kAvyAdarSokte arTAlaNkAraBede yaTA brahmaRo pyudBavaH padmaScandaH SamBuSiroDftaH tO tulyO tvanmuKeneti sA praSaMsopamocyate tO padmacandrO tvanmuKena tulyO iti padmacandrayoH praSaMsitayorapi tvanmu Page b KasASyena prarSasAtiSayAt muKasya ca saBaDikot karza vyaYjanAt praSaMsopamA ucyate

praSivya praSivya praSivya pu pragataH SizyamaDyApakatvena atyA sa Sizyasya Sizye SizyapraSizyErupagIyamAnamave hi tanmaRqanami SraDAma SaNkaradigvijayaH

prabalahikA prabalahikA prabalahikA strI prabalha AcCAdane Rvul prahelikAyAm ama ayamozWyAdiH in prabalhi vA NIp prabalhI ca tatrArTe

pratibanDakA pratibanDakA pratibanDakA tri pratibaDnAti prati banDa Rvul pratiroDake striyAM wAp kApi ata ittvam balavaddvizawhetutvamitiH syAt pratibanDikA BAzA viwape Sabdaca pratibanDakatvaYca kAraRIBUtABAvapratiyogitvam tacca BARAdyaBAvatvena na tu pratibanDakABAvatveneti nAnyonyASrayaH evaM pratibanDakABAvakUwa eka kAraRaM tena maRisadBAve maRyAdyaBAve pi na kAryamiti anumA ci atiriktaSaktinirAse tacca paYcaDA Bavati yaTA tadvattAbudDiM prati tadaBAvapakzAniScayatvena pratibanDakatvam tadaBAavyApyavattAniScayatvena tadaBAvAvacCedaka tayA gfhIta DarmavattAniScayatvena tadasamAnADikaraRaDarmavattAniSyatvena taduvyApakatAvacCedakatayA gfhIta DarmAvacCinnABAvavattAniScayatve na ceti tatrAdyaM yaTA hrado vahnimAniti budDiM prati hrado na vahnimAniti niScayasya pratibanDakatvam dvitIyaM hrado vahnyaBAvavyApyavAniti niScayasya tftIyaM jalavAnvahnyaBAvavAniti niScayaviSizwasya jalavAn hradaH iti niScayasya caturTaM vahnyasamAnADikaraRajalavAn hrada iti niScayasya paYcamaM hrado DUmavAniti budDiM prati DUmavyApakatAvacCedakatayA gfhIta yadvahnitvaM tAdfSavahnitvAvacCinnABAvavAn hrada iti niScayasyeti kArya mAtra prati tu kAminI jijYAsAyAH svAtantryeRa pratibanDakatvam kvacit maRimantrAdinyAyena pratibanDakatvam yaTA dAhaM prati maReH pratibanDakatvam iti
pratibanDaka pratibanDaka pratibanDaka tri pratibanDAti prati banDa Rvul pratiro Dake striyAM wAp kApi ata ittvam balavaddvizwahe tutvamatiH syAt pratibanDikA BAzA viwape Sabdaca pratibanDakatvaYca kAraRoBUtABAvapratiyogitvam tacca maRAdyaBAvatvena na tu pratibanDakABAvatveneti nAnyo nyASrayaH evaM pratibanDakABAvakUwa eva kAraRaM tena maRisadBAve maRyAdyaBAve pi na kAryyamiti anumA ci atiriktaSaktinirAse tacca paYcaDA Bavati yaTA tadvattAbudDiM prati tadaBAvavattAniScayatvena pratibanDaka tvas tadaBAvavyApyavattAniScayatvena tadaBAvAvacCedaka tayA gfhItaDarmavattAniScayatvena tadasamAnADikaraRa DarmavattAniScayatvana tadvyApakatAvacCedakatayA gfhIta DarmAvacCinnABAvavattAniScayatvena ceti tatrAdya yaTA hrado vahnimAniti budDiM prati hrado na vahnimAniti niScayasya pratibanDakatvam dvitIyaM hrado vahnyaBAvavyA pyavAniti niScayasya tftIyaM jalavAnvahnyaBAvavAniti niScayaviSizwasya jalavAn hvadaH iti niScayasya caturTaM vahnyasamAnADikaraRajalavAn hrada iti niScayasya pa YcasaM hrado DUmavAniti budDiM prati DUmavyApakatAvacCedaka tayA gfhItaM yadvahnitvaM tAdfSavahnitvAvacCinnABAvavAn hrada iti niScayasyeti kAryyamAtraM prati tu kAminI jijYAsAyAH svAtantryeRa pratibanDakatvam kvacit maRi mantrAdinyAyena pratibanDakatvam yaTA dAhaM prati maReH pratibanDakatvam iti
pratibimbana pratibimbana pratibimbana na pratibimba nAmaDAtuH BAve lyuw anukaraRe dfzwAntastu saDarmasya vastuH pratibimbanamsA da
pratibimbavAda pratibimbavAda pratibimbavAda pu ta jIvasya ISvapratibimbatA sTApanArTe vAde dviDA hi vedAntimate jIveSvarayorviBAgakalpanA pratibimbaBAvena tattadavacCinnaBAvena ca tatrAdyaH pakzaH vivaraRAnusAriBirmanyate dvitIyaH pakzo nyErmanyate tadetat sidDAntaleSe pradarSitaM yaTA vivaraRAnusAriRastvAhuH viBedajanake jYAne nASamAtyamantikaM gate Atmano brahmanoBedamasantaM kaH karizyatIti smftyA ekasyEvAjYAnasya jIveSvaraviBAgopADitvapratipAdanAdbimbapratibimbaBAvena jIveSvarayorviBAgaH noBayorapi pratibimbaBAvena upADidvayamantareRoBayowaH pratibimbatvAyogAt tatrApi pratibimbo jIvaH bimbasTAnIya ISvaraH taTA satyeva lOkikabimbapratibimbadfzwAntena svAtantryamISvarasya tatpAratantryaM jIvasya ca yujyate pratibimbagatAH paSyannfjuvakrAdivikriyAH pumAn krIqet yaTA brahma taTA jIvasTavikriyAH iti kalpatarUktarItyA lokavattulIlAkEvalyamiti sUtramapi saNgcCate ajYAnapratibimbe tasya jIvasyAnataH karaRarUpo jYAnapariRAmaBedoviSezABivyaktisTAnam sarvataH prasftasya savitfprakASasya darpaRa iva atastasya tadupADikatvavyavahAro pi na tAvatA jYAnopADiparityAgaH antaH karaRopADiparicCinnasyEva cEtanyasya jIvatve yoginaH kAyavyUhADizWAnAnupapatteH na ca yogapraBAvAdyogimo ntaH karaRaM kAyavyUhABivyaktiyomyaM vEpulyaM prAprotIti tadavacCinnasya kAyavyUhADizWAnatvaM yujyata iti vAcyam pradIpavadAveSastaTA hi darSayatIti SaSatvopAntyADikaraRaBAzyAdizu kAvyavyUhe pratidehamantaH karaRasya cakzurAdivardBinnasyEva yogapraBAvAt sfzwerUpavarRanAt pratibimbe bimbABedamAtrasyADyastatvena svarUpeRa tasyasatyatvAt pratibimbarUparjAvasya muktyAnvayAsamBava pratibimbita pratibimbita pratibimbita tri pratibimba tAra itac jAtapratibimbe darpaRAdO pratiPalite praticCAyApanne muKAdO
pratibudDa pratibudDa pratibudDa tri prati buDa karttari kta jAgarite ka rmaRi kta jYAte ca
pratibudva pratibudva pratibudva tri prati buDa karttari kta jAgarite karmaRi kta jYAne ca
pratikarman pratikarman pratikarman na prati kf manin vidyamAnasya guRAntarADAne kftrimaBUzAyAM prasADane amaraH
pratikarmman pratikarmman pratikarmman na prati kf manin vidyamAnasya guRAntarA DAne kftrimaBUzAyAM prasADane amaraH
pratipatturya pratipatturya pratipatturya na dragaqavAdye dagaqakAqA trikA
pratipatturyya pratipatturyya pratipatturyya na dragaqavAdye dagaqakAqA trikA
pratisUrya pratisUrya pratisUrya puM strI pratirUpaH sUryaH prA sa kfkalAse trikAH dvitIyasUryaprAdurBAvarUpe AntarIkzItpAtaBede ca svArTe ka tatrArTe tacCuBASuBalakzaRaM vf saM a yaTA pratisUryakaH praSasto dvivasakfdftuvarRasapraBaH snigDaH vEdUryyaniBaH svacCaH SuklaSca kzemasOBikzaH pIto vyADiM janayatyaSokarUpaSca SastrakopAya pratisUryARAM mAlAdasyu BayAtaNkanfpahantrI divasakftaH pratisUryo jalakfddigdakziRe sTito nilakft uBayasTaH salilaBayaM nfpasupari nihantyaDo janahA
pratisUryya pratisUryya pratisUryya puMstrI pratirUpaH sUryyaH prA sa kfkalAse trikA dvitIyasUryaprAdurBAvarUpe AntarIkzItpAtaBede ca svArTe ka tatrArTe tacCuBASuBalakzaRaM vf sa a yaTA pratisUryyakaH praSasto divasakfdftuvarRasapraBaH snigDaH vEdUryyaniBaH svacCaH SuklaSca kzemasOBikzaH pIto vyArDiM janayatyaSokarUpaSca SastrakopAya pratisUryyARAM mAlA dasyuBayAtaNkanfpahantrI divasakftaH pratisUryyo jalakf dudagdakziRe sTito nilakft uBayasTaH salilaBayaM nfpamupari nihantyaDo janahA
pratisaMKyA pratisaMKyA pratisaMKyA strI prati sam KyA BAve aN prasaKyAne sAMKyAdisidDe jYAnaBede ca tasya paYcaviMSatisaMKyAnvitata ttvanirUpaRAt tadIyajYAnasya saMKyAniyatatvena taTAtvam
pratisaMKyAniroDa pratisaMKyAniroDa pratisaMKyAniroDa pu pratisaNKyApUrvakoniroDaH SA ta budDipUrvake BAvAnAM nASe bOdDamatasidDe padArTaBede aprati saMKyAniroDaSabde pf dfSyam
pratisaNKyA pratisaNKyA pratisaNKyA strI prati sam KyA BAve aN prasaKyAne sAMKyAdisidDe jYAnaBede ca tasya paYcaviMSatisaNKyAnvitatattvanirUpaRAt tadIyajYAnasya saNKyAniyatatvena taTAtvam
pratisaNKyAniroDa pratisaNKyAniroDa pratisaNKyAniroDa pu pratisaNKyApUrvako niroDaH SA ta budDipUrvake BAvAnAM nASe bOdDamatasidDe padArTaBede apratisaNKyAniroDaSabde dfSyam
pratisarga pratisarga pratisarga pu pratirUpaH pratikUlo vA sargaH brahmaRaH sfzwitulyAyAM marIcyAdisfzwO pralaye ca Adisargastu yaH sUta kaTito vistareRa ca pratisargaSca ye yezAmaDipAstAn vadasva naH iti praSne pratisarga uktAH kAlikApu pratisarge tu mftpiRqaM hemapiRqaM vA GawakuRqalamukuwAdayo viSanto vyaktIBavanti tatkAraRarUpamevABivyaktaM kAryamapekzyAvyaktam Bavati evaM pfTivyAdayastanmAtrARi viSantaH svApekzayA tanmAtrARyavyaktayanti evaM tanmAtrARyahaNkAraM viSanti ahaNkAramavyaktayanti evamahaNkAro mahAntamAviSanmahAntamavyaktayati mahAn prakftaM svakAraRaM viSan prakftimavyaktayati prakftestu na kvacinniveSa iti sA sarvakAryaRAmavyaktameva sA ta kO
pratisarma pratisarma pratisarma pu pratirUpaH pratikUlI vA sargaH brahmaRaH sfzwi tulyAyAM marIcyAdisfzwO pralaye ca Adisargastu yaH sUta kaTito vistarERa ca pratisargaSca ye yezAmaDipA stAn vadasva naH iti praSne pratisarga uktaH kAlikApu Page a pratisarge tu mftpiRqaM hemapiRqaM vA DawakuRqalamuku wAdayo viSanto vyaktIBavanti tatkAraRarUpamevABi vyaktaM kAryyamapekzyAvyaktam Bavati evaM pfTivyAdayasta nmAtrARi viSantaH svApekzayA tanmAtrARyavyaktayanti evaM tanmAtrARyahaNkAraM viSanti ahaNkAramavyaktayanti eva mahaNkAro mahAntamAviSanmahAntamavyaktayati mahAn pra kftiM svakAraRaM viSan prakftimavyaktayati prakftestu na kvacinniveSa iti sA sarvakAryyARAmavyaktameva sA ta kO

pratitantrasidDAnta pratitantrasidDAnta pratitantrasidDAnta pu samAnanantrasidDaH paratantrasidDaH prati tantrasidDAntaH gO sU ukte sidDAntaBede vivftaM cedaM vfttO pratitantramidDAntaM lakzayati mamAnaSabda ekArTastenE katantrasidDa ityarTaH svatantramidDa iti paryyavasito rTaH taTA ca vAdiprativAdyekataramAtrAByupagatastadekatarasya pratitantrasidDAnta iti PalitAryaH yaTA mImAMsakAnAM Sabdanityatvam udAhftaM ca BAzye yaTA nAsata Atma lABaH nasata AtprahAnaM niratiSayA cetanAH dehendri Page b yamanaH su vizayezu tattatkAraRezu ca viSeza iti sAMKyA nAm puruzakarmanimitto BUtasargaH karmahetavo dozAH pravfttiSca svaguRaviSizwAScetanAH asadutpadyate utpanna niruDyate iti yogAnAm
pratitantrasidvAnta pratitantrasidvAnta pratitantrasidvAnta pu samAnatantrasidDaH paratantrasidDaHpratitantrasidDAntaH gO sU ukte siddAntaBede vivftaM cedaM vfttO pratitantrasidDAntaM lakzayati samAnaSabda ekArTastenEkatantrasidDa ityarTaH svatantrasidDa iti paryavasito rTaH taTA ca vAdiprativAdyekataramAtrAByupagatastadekatarasya pratitantrasidDAnta iti PalitArTaH yaTA mImAMsakAnAM Sabdanityatvam udAhftaM ca BAzye yaTA nAsata AtmamABaH nasata AtmahAnaM niratiSayA cetanAH dehindriyamanaHsu vizayezu tattatkAraRezu ca viSeza iti sAMKyAnAm puruzakarmanimitto BUtasargaH karmahetayo dozaH pravfttiSca svaguRaviSizwAScetanAH asadutpadyate utpannaM niruDyate iti yoganAm
prativimbana prativimbana prativimbana na prativimba nAmaDAtuH BAve lyuw anu Page b karaRe dfzwAntastu saDarmasya vastunaH prativimbanam sA da
prativimbavAda prativimbavAda prativimbavAda pu jIvasya ISvaraprativimyatAsTApa nArTe vAde dviDA hi vedAntimate jIvaSvarayorviBAga kalpanA prativimbaBAvena tattadavacCinnamAvena ca tatrAdyaH pakzaH vivaraRAnusAriBirmanyate dvitIyaH pakzI nyErmanyate tadetat sidDAntaleSe pradarSitaM yaTA vivaraRAnusAriRastvAhuH viBedajanake jYAne nASamA tyantikaM gate Atmano brahmaRoBedamasantaM kaH karizya tIti smftyA ekasyEvAjYAnasya jIveSvaraviBAgozADitva pratipAdanAdvimbaprativimbaBAvena jIveSvarayorviBAgaH nI BayIrapi prativimbaBAbena upADidvayamantareRoBayoH prati vimbatvAyogAt tatrApi prativimbo jIvaH vimbasTAnIya ISvaraH taTA satyeva lOkikavimbaprativimbadfzwAntena svAtantyamISvarasya tatpAratantryaM jIvasya ca gujyate pra tivimbagatAH paSyannfjuvakrAdivikriyAH pumAn krIqet yaTA brahma taTA jIvasTavikriyAH iti kalpatarUktarItyA lokavattulIlAkEvalyamiti sUtramapi saMgacCate a jYAnaprativimbe tasya jIvasyAntaHkaraRarUpo jYAnapariRA maBedoviSezABivyaktisTAnam sarvataH prasftasya savitfprakA SaraRIkaraRoyatvena tannyAyAdantaHkaraRopADi pakze pi vastutaScEtanyEkyasya tadavacCedakopADyEkyasya ca tatrAByupagamena dozanirAkaraRasamBavAt naM cAva cCodapakze yaTAhyayaM jyotirAtmA vivasvAnapo sUryyasya rUpavataH prativimbodayayogyatA tato viprakfzwadeSaM rUpavajjalaM gf hyate nEvaM sarvagatasyAtmanaH prativimbodayayogyaM kiYci dasti tato viprakfzwamiti prativimbAsamBavasaktvA vfdDihrAsa pratizidva pratizidva pratizidva tri prati siDa karmaRi kta nizidDe

pratyADmAna pratyADmAna pratyADmAna pu vAtavyADiBede tasya lakzaRamAha vimuktapArSvahfdayaM tadevAmASayotTitam pratyAdmAnaM vijAnIyAt kaPavyAkulitAnilam vimuktapArSvahfdayaM vApArve hfdayaM ca vihAya jAtaM tadevADmAnam kaPavyAkulitAnilaM kaPenAvaradDavAtam BAvapra
pratyADyAna pratyADyAna pratyADyAna pu vAtavyADimede tasya lakzaRamAha vi suktapASva hfwayaM tadavAmASayotTinam pratyADma naM viM jAnIyAt kaPavyAkulitAnilam vimuktapAScahfdayaM pArSve hfdayaM ca vihAya jAtaM tadevADmAnam kaPavyAku litAnilaM kaPenAvakaRavAtama BAvapra
pratyASrAva pratyASrAva pratyASrAva pu prati A Sru Ric ac uddiSya SrAvaRe karmaRi ac astuSrOzaqiti Sabde yaju vedadI

pratyaSman pratyaSman pratyaSman pu pratirUpaH aSmA prA sa gErike hema
pratyakacetana pratyakacetana pratyakacetana pu pratIpaM viparItamaYcati jAnAti prati anca kvip karma sAMKyamatasidDe puruze tataH pratyak cetanADigamaH antarAyABAvaSca yogasU BAzyam pratyekam aYcati aSnute karma sarvajYe antarAtmani para meSvare tadaBinne jIve ca pratyacSabde dfSyam
pratyakaparRI pratyakaparRI pratyakaparRI strI pratyaYci parRAnyasyAH NIp apAmArge amaraH

pratyaksrotam pratyaksrotam pratyaksrotam pu pratyak pratIcIgAmi sroto yasya paScimadigvAhini nade prAksrotaso nadyaH pratyaksrotaso nadA narmadAM vinA mAGa Slo vyAKyAyAM mallinATakftavAkyam narmadAyAM strI BA va a gpratIci pratyagAtmani svotaScittapravAho sya pratyagAtmEkapravaRacittavfttiyute yatiBede pu
pratyaksrotas pratyaksrotas pratyaksrotas pu pratyak pratIcIgAmi sroto yasya paSci madigvAhini nade prAksrotaso nadyaH pratyaksrotaso nadA narmadAM vinA mADa Slo vyAKyAyAM malli nATaDftavAkyam narmmadAyAM strI BA va a pratIci pratyagAtmani srotaScittapravAho sya pratyagA tmEkapravaRacittavfttiyute yatiBede pu

preNKA preNKA preNKA strI pra iKi bA ADAre aN dolAyAm amaraH BAve aN pariBramaRe svArTakagatO aSvagatO iti pAWAntaram gfhaBede medi nftye ca DaraRiH
preNKaRa preNKaRa preNKaRa na pra iKi lyuw Ratvam prakarzeRa calane azwA daSarUpakAntargate rUpakaBede tallakzaRaM sA da uktaM yaTA garBAvamarzarahitaM preNkzaRaM hInanAyakam asUtra DAramekANkamavizkamBa praveSakam niyudDasamPowayutaM sarva vfttisamASritam nepaTye gIyate nAndI taTA tatra prarocanA
preNKita preNKita preNKita tri pra iKi kta kampite amaraH

pretakarman pretakarman pretakarman na ta mftoddeSena karttavye dAhAdi sapiRqanAntakarmaRi BA dro a pretakAryAdayo pyatra prAptapitflokoddeSyakakArye SrAdDAdO ca akftvA pretakAryaRi pretaSva DanahArakaH varRAnAM yadubaDe proktaM taduvrataM niyataScaret dAya ta vacanam

priyAla priyAla priyAla pu priyAya alati paryyApnoti aR ac priya sAle piyAsAla drAkzAyAM strI rAjani BAvapra piyAla ityena pAWaH priyAlastu KaraskanDaScAro ba hulavalkalaH rAjAdanastAprasezwaH sannakardrUrdDvatazpawaH cAraH pittakaPAsraGnastat PalaM saDuraM guru KagDaM saraM marutpittadAhajvaratfzApaham piyAlamajjA maDuro vfzyaH pittAnilApahaH hfdyo tidurjaraH snigDo vi zwamBI cAmavardDanaH BAvapra
