proTa proTa proTa paripUrRatAyAm sAmarTye ca BvA uBa aka sew proTati mew pro Tati te aproTIt aproTizwa puproTa Te fdit caNi na hrasvaH apuproTat ta proTa pu na pru Tak prasTite vfkzAntamudakAntaYca vfkzAntasudakAntaYca priyaM proTamanuvrajet aSvanAsikAyAm amaraH kazyAM kawyAM pu medi SAwake pu trikA strIgarBe pu viSvaH gartte BIzaRe sPigdeSe aSvamuKe ca saMkziptasAraH paTike tri praTite tri trikA sTApite tri si kO proTa paripUrRatAyAm sAmarTye ca BvA uBa aka mew pro Tati te aproTIt aproTizwa puproTa Te fdit caNi na hrasvaH apuproTat ta proTa pu na pru Tak prasTite vfkzAntasudakAntaYca priyaM proTamanuvrajet aSvanAsikAyAm amaraH kawyAM pu medi SAwake pu trikA strIgarBe pu viSvaH gartte BIzaRe sPigdeSe aSvamuKe ca saMkziptasAraH paTike tri praTite tri trikA sTApite tri si kO

pruza pruza pruza BasmIkaraRe BvA para saka sew prozati aprozIt puproza udita ktA udit ktvA vew pruzitvA pruzwvA puzwvA pruzwaH pruza seke pUrttO ca saka snehe aka kryA para sew puzRAti pru zRAti aprozIt puproza puzroza pruza BasmIkaraRe BvA para saka sew prozati aprozIt puproza udit ktvA vew pruzitvA puzwvA pruzwaH pruza seke pUrttO ca saka snehe aka kryA para sew pru zRAti aprozIt puzroza

puTa puTa puTa hiMse di para saka sew puTyati apoTIt pupoTa puTa vaDe saka kleSe aka BvA para sew idit punTaTi apunTIt punTati a punTIt pupunTa punTyate puTa dIptO cu uBa uma saka sew pOTayati poTayati te apUpuTat ta puTa hiMse di para saka sew puTyati apoTIt pupoTa puTa vaDe saka kleSe aka BvA para sew idit punTati a punTIt pupunTa punTyate puTa dIptO cu uma saka sew poTayati te apUpuTat ta
pucCa pucCa pucCa prasAde BvA para aka sew puCCati apucCIta pucCati apucCIt pupucCa rAyamukuwaH pucCa pu na ardDarccA pucCa ac lANgUle amaraH paScAdBAge paScA dBAge na medi lomavallANgUle kalApe lomavakkANgUle kalAze ca pu uRAdi bahuvrIhO etadantAt NIz kavarapucCI pucCa prasAde BvA para aka sew pucCati apucCIt pupucCa rAyamukuwaH pucCa pu na ardDarccA pucCa ac lANgUle amaraH paScA dBAge na medi lomavakkANgUle kalAze ca pu uRAdi bahuvrIhO etadantAt NIz kavarapucCI
pula pula pula mahattve BvA pa saka sew polati te apolIt pupola ayaM jvalAdirapi tena pulayati polayatIti BedaH pula udDftO cu uBa saka sew polayati te apUpulat ta pula pu pula ka pulake vipule tri medi pula mahattve BvA pa saka sew polati te apolIt pupola ayaM jvalAdirapi tena pulayati polayatIti BedaH pula udDftO cu uBa saka sew polayati te apUpulat ta pula pu pula ka pulake vipule tri medi

purohitAdi purohitAdi purohitAdi pu purohitAdiByo yak pA yakpratyayanimitte SabdagaRe sa ca gaRaH pA ga sU ukto yaTA purohita rAjA se grAmika piRqika Ycuhita vAla manda KaRqina varmika karmika Darsika Silila sutika mUlika tilaka Page a aYjalika fzika putrika avika Catrika parzika paTika carmika pratika sAraTi Astika sUcika saMrakza sUcaka nAstika ajAnika SAkkara nAgara cUqika purohitasya BAvaH karma vA yak pOrahitya tadBAve tatkarmaRi ca na
purohitAhi purohitAhi purohitAhi pu purohotAdiByo yakpA yakpratyayanimitte SabdagaRe sa ca gaRaHpA ga sU ukto yaTA purohita rAjA se grAmika piRqika suhita vAlamanda KaRqika varmika karmika Darmika Silika sUtika mUlika tilakaM aYjalika rfzika putrika avika Catrika parzika paTika carmika pratika sAraTi Astika sUcika saMrakza sUcaka nAstika ajAnika SAkkara nAgara cUqika purohitasya BAvaH karma vA yak pOrahitya tadBAve tatkarmaRi ca na

puruvargaBa puruvargaBa puruvargaBa tri puruvargo sya bahumAne f
puruvargas puruvargas puruvargas tri pururvargo sya bahumAne f
puruzAda puruzAda puruzAda pu purazamatti puruzamatti ada kvip rAkzase puruzAda pu strI paruzamatti puruzamatti ada aR upa sa rAkzase striyAM jAtitvAt NIz maDyadeSaBede maDyadeSamede vf saM a dfSyam puruzAda pu puruzamatti ada kvip rAkzase puruzAda pu strI puruzamatti ada aR upa sa rAkzase striyAM jAtitvAt NIz maDyadeSamede vf saM a dfSyam
purva purva purva nivAse BvA pa saka sew pUrvati apUrvIt ozWyopaDo yamityanye pUraRe purva pUrvaRe BvA pa saka sew sewa pUrvati apUrvIt antaH sTopaDo antaHsTo paDo yam purva nivAse BvA pa saka sew pUrvati apUrvIt ozWyopaDo yamityanye purva pUrvaRe BvA pa saka sewa pUrvati apUrvIt antaHsTo paDo yam
pusta pusta pusta banDe anAdare ca pu cu uBa saka sew pustayati te apu pustat apupustat ta pusta na pusta ac mfdA vA dAruRA vApi vastreRApyaTa carmaRA lOharatnEH kftaM vApipustamityaBIDIyate vApi pustamityaBiDIyate ityukte lipyAdiSilpakarmaRi svArTe ka lipyADAre lipyA DAre granTe puM strI puMstrI strItve gOrA NIz pustakamAnaleKanaprakArAdikaM yoginItantre uktaM yaTA mAnaM vakzye pustakasya SfRu devi samAsataH mAnenAsya mAne nAsya PalaM vindyAdamAne SrIrhatA Bavet hastamAtraM muzwimAtramAvAhu muzwimAtramAbAhu dvAdaSANgulam daSANgulaM taTAzwO ca tato hInaM na kArayet tasya vedo veDo yaTA veDadvayaM muzwihaste bAhumAtre triranDrakam samaBAge maheSAni hastAdO Page a hastAdo rUpa ranDrakam azwANgulaM parityajya maDye veDaM tu kArayet prAdeSAdO mavedranDraM dvyaNgule vA samAcaret pustakasya ca Adyante yantrabeDaM yantraveDaM vikalpayet BAryAhAnirBavedASu BAryyAhAnirBavedASu DanAnAM vA kzayo Bavet dagDaranDre Bavet pIqA vartulaM SuBadaM Bavet catuzkoRe viplavastu trikoRo maraRaM vipla vastu trikoRe maraRa Bavet pustakaleKanapatraM yaTA BUrje vA tejapatre vA tAle vA tAqipatrake agatvacApi agatva cApi deveSi pustakaM kArayet priye samBave svarRapatre svarRa patre ca tAmrapAtre ca SaNkari anyavfkzatvaci devi taTA ketakIpatrake mArttaRqapatre rOpye vA bA vawapatre varAnane anyapatre vasudale liKitvA yaH samaByaset sa durgatimavApnoti DanahAnirBavedDruvam pustake pAWyavedalisaKananizeDo pAWyavedaliKananizeDo yaTA vedasya liKanaM kftvA yaHpaWed yaH paWed brahmahA Bavet pustakaM vA gfhe sTApyaM vajrapAto Baved Dravam Druvam yugaBede pustakAkzarasTa devA yaTA satye kzare sTitaH SamBuH SUlapARistrilocanaH prajApatirdvApare pajApatirdvApare ca tretAyAM sUrya sUryya eva ca kfte yuge pinAkI ca kalO lipyakzare hariH talleKakapUjAPalaM talleKakapUjA PalaM yaTA AramBe ca samAptO ca leKakaM pratipUjayet hariYca ganDapuzpAdErvastrESca ganDapuzpAdyErvastrESca sumanoharEH yAvadakzarasaNKyAnaM yAvadakzara saMKyAnaM pratipatraM ca sundari tAvadyugasahasrARi brahmaloke vasecciram leKakasya vetanagrahaRe dozo yaTA vetanaM yastu gfhRIyAt liKitvA pustakaM sa tu yAvadakzarasaNKyAnaM yAvadakzarasaMKyAnaM tAvacca narakaM vaset BUmO pustakaleKanasTApananizeDo pustaka leKanasTApananizeDo yaTA na BUmO viliKedvarRaM yantraM na pustakaM pustakam liKet na BUmO pustakaM pustakam sTApyaM na muktamAharettu mukta mAharettu tat BUpfzWagrahaRe cEva akzaraM vA Tapustakam Ta pustakam BUmO tizWati deveSi janmajanmasu mUrKatA tadA Bavati deveSi tasmAttat parivarjayet tasya dAnaPalaM dAna PalaM yaTA viprAya pustakaM dattvADarmaSAstrasya dattvA DarmaSAstrasya ca dvija purARasya ca yo dadyAt sa devatvamavApnuyAt SAstradfzwyA jagatsarvaM suSrutaYca SuBASuBam tasmAt SAstraM prayatnena dadyAdviprAya kArttike vedavidyAYca yo dadyAt svargaM svarge kalpatrayaM vaset AtmavidyAYca yo dadyAttasya saMKyA dadyA ttasya KaMKyA na vidyate trIRi tulyapradAnAni trIRi tulyaPalAni ca SAstraM kAmaduGA DenuH pfTivI cEva SASvatI iti pAdmottaraKaRqe a vedaSAstrAdidAnaPalaM veda SAstrAdidAnaPalaM yaTA vedArTayajYaSAstrARi Darma Page b SAstrARi cEva hi mUlyena leKayitvA yo dadyAd yAti sa vEdikam itihAsapurARAni liKitvA yaH pravacCati prayacCati brahmadAnasamaM puRyaM prApnoti dviguRIkftam dviguRI kftam iti gAruqe a purARAdipustakadAna viDiH hemA dA caRqISabde DikaM dfSyam pusta banDe anAdare ca cu uBa saka sew pustayati te apupustat ta pusta na pusta ac mfdA vA dAruRA vApi putrAcArya putrAcArya putrAcArya pu putra AcAryo DyApako yasya putratoDyAyini manuH
putrAcAryya putrAcAryya putrAcAryya pu putra AcAryyo DyApako yasva putratoDyA yini manuH
puwa puwa puwa dIptO aka cUrRane saka curA uBa sew pIwayati saw powayati te pupowa puzowa puwa Sleze tu ku para saka sew puwati puwAta apuwIt pupowa puwa saMsarge ada cu uBa saka sew puwayati te apupuwat ta puwa na puwa ka jAtIPale rAjani uparya GoBAvApannena mfdAdikapAladvayena nimitte ozaDapAkapAtraBede uparyyaGoBAvApannena mfdAdikapAsadvayena girmite ozaDapAkazAtraBede ca pu pa Page a aSvakzure pu na Sabdara miTaH sambanDe AcCAdane ca puwaBedanamityamaravyAKyAyAM mukuwaH miTaHsamyanTe AcCAdage caMpuwaBedanamityamaravyAKyAyAM sukuwaH pattrAdiracite dugDAdipAnapAtre tri donA striyAM NIz OzaDapAkapAtraprakAraH BAvapra ukto yaTA DAtvAdimAraRopayuktAn puwaprakArAnAha rasapradIpe rasapra dIpe lohAderapunarBAvastadguRatvaM guRAQyatA salile sa lile taraRaYcApi tatsidDiH tatsinniH puwanAdBavet gamBIre vistfte vi stfte kuRqe dvihaste caturasrake vanopalasahasreRa caturasmake vanopaRasahasneRa pUritaM punarOzaDam kozWe kIzWe rudDe prayatnena govizWopariDArayet vanopalasahasrArdDa govizWopari DArayet vanopalasahasrArdDaM kozWikopari niHkzipet niHkzi pet vahniM viniHkzepettatra mahApuwamiti smftam kozWaM mfRmUzA govizWA goiwA mahApuwam sapAda hastamAnena kuRqe nimne taTAyate vanopalasahasreRa vanopalasahasneRa pUrRe maDye viDArayet puwanadravyasaMyuktAM kozWikAM mudritAM muKe aTArdDAni karaRqAni ardDAnyupari niHkzepet ardDAnDupari niHkzipet etadgajapuwaM proktaM KyAtaM sarvapuwottamam hastaScaturBi SatyaNgulapramARa hastaScaturBiMSatyaNgulapraBAKaH sa sapAdaH tena triMSadaNgula pramARenetyarTaH triMSadaNgala pramAlenetyarTaH ataevoktam sADAraRanarANgulyA triMSadaNgulako sAGAraKanarANgulyA triMSa daNgalako gajaH iti gajapuwam aratnimAtrake kuRqe puwaM vArAhamucyate vitastimAtrake KAte kaTitaM kOkkuwaM kOkvuwaM puwam aratnistu aratristu nizkanizWena kzivAgmiM kziptvAgniM mudrayet BARqaM tadBARqaM puwamucyate vasuyugaviratirnO myO ByO puwo yamvf yam vf ra ukte dvAdaSAkzarapAdake udvAdaRAkzarapAdake CandoBede pu puwa dIptO aka cUrRane saka curA uBa puza puza puza puzwO divA para aka aniw puzyati lfdit xdit apuzat puzoza ste Page a pupoza sve puzaH pA Ramul Kamul kasAdizu yaTAviDyanuprayogAt svapoza yaTAviDya supayogAt KapozaM puzyati AtmAnaM puzyatItyarTa puza puzwO aka pozaRe saka kyrA pa sew puzRAti apozIt puza puzwO BvA para aka sew pozati apozIt puza DftO cu uBa saka sew pozayati te apUpuzat ta puza puzwO divA para aka aniw puzyati xdit apuzat Page a pupoza sve puzaH pA Kamul kasAdizu yaTAviDya supayogAt KapozaM puzyati AtmAnaM puzyatItyarTa puza puzwO aka pozaRe saka kyrA pa sew puzRAti apozIt puza puzwO BvA para aka sew pozati apozIt puza DftO cu uBa saka sew pozayati te apUpuzat ta
puzkaraprAdurBAva puzkaraprAdurBAva puzkaraprAdurBAva pu puzkarAkAraH prAdurBAvaH BagavataH padmA kAreRa prAdurBAve tadvivaraRam aTa yogavidAM SrezWaM sarvaBUtamanomayam srazwAraM sarva BUtAnAM brahmARaM sarvatomuKam tasmin hiraRmaye padme bahuyojanavistfte sarvatejoguRamaye pArTivErlakzaREryute tacca padme purARajYAH pfTivIruhamuttamam nArAyaRAt samutpannaM pravadanti maharzaH yA tu padmAsanA devI tAM pfTvIM paricakzate ye tu garBANkurAHsArAstAn divyAn parvatAn viduH hivantaYca meruYca nIlaM nizaDameva ca kElAsaM krOYcavantaYca taTA driM ganDamAdanam puRyaM triSiKaraM cEva kAntaM mandarameva ca udayaYca giriSrezWaM vindyamastaYca parvatam ete devagaRAnAYca sidDAnAYca mahAtmanAm ASrayAH sarvaBUtAnAM puRyAH kAmayujo drayaH etezAmantaro deSo jambUdvIpa iti smftaH jambudvIpasya saNKyAnaM yAjYikA yatra kurvate garBAdyataH sravet toyaM devAmftarasopamam divyatIrTaSatApANgyastA divyAH saritaHsmftAH yAnyetAni tu padmasya kesarARi samantataH asaNKyAtA pfTivyAntu sarve te DAtuparvatAH yAni padmasya patrARi BUrIRyUrdDvaM narADipa te durgamAH SElacitA mlecCadeSA vikalpitAH yAnyaDaH padmapatrARi nivAsArTaM viBAgaSaH dEtyAnAsuragARAYca pAtAlaM tanmahAtmanAm tezAmaDogataM yattadudaketyaBisaYjYitam mahApAtakakarmARo majjante yatra mAnavAH padmasyAnte kuSaM yattadekArRavajalaM mahat proktAste dikzu saNGAtAScatvAro jalasAgarAH eza nArAyaRasyAdyo mahApuzkarasamBavaH prAdurBAvo vyayastastrAnnAmnA puzkarasaYjYitaH etasmAt kAraRAt tajjYEH purAREH paramarziBiH yAjYikErvedadfzwArTEryajYe padmaviDiH smftaH evaM BagavatA padmaviDayA parayA viDiH parvatAnAM nadInAYca deSAnAYca vinirmitaH viBustaTA cApratimapraBAvaH praBAkaroyogivaro mitadyutiH svayaM svayamBUH Sayane sfjattadA jaganmayaM padmaniDiM mahArRave harivaM a
puzkaraprAdurBAvaH puzkaraprAdurBAvaH puzkaraprAdurBAvaH pu puzkarAkAraH prAdurBAvaH BagavataH padmA kAreRa prAdurBAve tadbivaraKam aTa yogavidAM SrezWaM sarvaBUtamanomayam svazwAraM sarvaBUtAnAM brahmARaM sarvatomuKam tasmin hiraR maye padme bahuyojanavistfte sarvatejoguRAmaye pArTivErlakzaREryute tacca padmaM purARajYAH pfTivIruha muttamam nArAyaRAt samutpaSnaM pravadanti maharzayaH Page a ya tu padmAsanA devI tAM pf saricakzate ye tu garBANkurAH sArAstAn divyAn parvatAn vidaH hima vantaYca meruYca nIlaM nizaDameva ca kElAsaM krOYcavantaYca taTA dri ganDamAdanam puRyaM triSiKaraM cEva kAntaM mandarameva ca udayaYca giriSrezWaM vinDyamastaYca parva tam ete devagaRAnAYca sidDAnAYca mahAtmanAm ASrayAH sarvaBUtAnAM puRyA kAmayujo drayaH etezA mantaro deSo jambUdvIpa iti smftaH jambudvIpasya saMKyAnaM yAjYikA yatra kurvate garBAdyataH snavet toyaM devAmftarasopamam divyatIrTaSatApANgyastA divyAH saritaH smftAH yAnyetAni tu padmasya kesarARi sama ntataH asaMKyAtA pfTivyAntu sarve te DAtuparvatAH yAni padmasya patrARi BUrIRyUrdDvaM narADipa te durgamAH SElacitA mlecCadeSA vikalpitAH yAnyaDaH padmapatrARi nivAsArTaM viBAgaSaH dEtyAnAsuragA zRAYca pAtAlaM tanmahAtmanAm tezAmaTogataM yattaduda ketyaBisaMjYitam mahApAtakakarmARo majjante yatra mA BavAH padmasyAnte kuSaM yattadekArRavajalaM mahat proktAste dikzu saNGAtAScatvAro jalasAgarAH eza nArAyaRasyAdyo mahApuzkarasamBavaH prAdurBAvo vyaya staRAnnAmnA puzkarasaMjYitaH etasmAt kAraRAt tajjYEH purAREH paramarziBiH BAjYikErpedadfzwArTEryajYe padmaviDiH sTftaH evaM magavatA padmaviDayA parayA viDiH parvatAnAM nadInASca deSAnAYca vinirmitaH vimustaTA cApratimapraBAvaH praBAkaro yogivaro mitadyutiH svayaM svayamBUH Sayane sfjattadA jaganmayaM padmaniDiM mahArRave harivaM a
puzkarasad puzkarasad puzkarasad tri puzkare sIdati sada kvip padmavAsini gotrapravarttakarziBede pu tasya gotrApatyam bAhvA iY anuSatikA dvipadavfdDiH pOzkarasAdi tadapatye puM strI tato yUni PaY pOzkarasAdAyana tadIye yUninyapatye bahutve tu yaYo yaskA luk
puzkarasada puzkarasada puzkarasada tri puzkare sIdati sada kvip padmavAsini gotrapravarttakarziBede pu tasya gotrApatyam bAhvA iY Page b anuSatiKA dvipadavfdDiH pOzkarasAdi tadapasTe puMstrI tato yUni PaY pOzkarasAdAyaga yadIpe yUninyapatye bahutve tu yajo yaskA luk
puzpa puzpa puzpa vikASe di para aka sew puzpyati apuzpIt pupuzpa Saradi puzpyanti saptacCadAH kaRqvA apuzpIt apuzpyIt puzpa na puzpyati puzpa vikASe ac Pula KyAte kusume strIrajasi BAve GaY vikASe pu medi kuberavimAne kuveravimAne na netrarogaBede hemaca puzpaYca patraM ca PalaM taTEva yaTottaraM te laGavaH pradizwAH tezAM tu puzpa puzpaM kaPapittahantf PalaM nihanyAt kaPamArutO ca suSrute sAmAnyatastasya guRA uktAH viSezataH puzpavarge anyezAM guRA tatroktAH strIrajasi SukraM duzwaM SoRitaM cANganAnAM puzpodrekaM tasya nASaYca kazwam puzpakAle SucistasmAdapatyArTI striyaM vrajetiti vrajet iti suSrutaH puzpaSabdaniruktistadgataviSezAdikaM nAnAtantre uktaM yaTA tatra puzpaSabdavyutpattiH kulArRave puRyasaMvardDanAccApi kulArRaye puRyasaMbardDanAccAzi pApOGaparihArataH puzkalArTapradAnAcca puzpamityaBiDIyate puzkalArTapradAnAcCa puzpamitya BiDIyate prapaYcasAre tulasyO paNkaje jAtyO ketakyO karavIrake SastAni daSa puzpARi taTA raktotpalAni ca utpalAni ca nIlAni kahlArakumudAni kahnArakumudAni ca viSvasAratantre bahUni kusumAni caiti ca iti pAWaH mAlatIM kundamandAraM nandyAvarttAdikAni ca palASapAwalApadmajayantyAvarttakAni ca campakAni sanAgAni raktamandArakARi ca aSokodBavavabilvAKya aSokodBavavilvAKya karRikArodBavAni ca viSvasAratantre Saktivizaye Saktivimaye viSeza ukto yaTA aTa devyarcane vakzye puzpARi SfRu pArvati ityupakrame kiM kawEH kiM GawEH pawEH kiM kAkacaYcuBiH zoqAnyAsEH kiM DarmasADanEH yenArccitA mahAdevI karavIrErjavAdiBiH kfzRApurA jitApuzpEH karavIrErmanoharEH droREstu ketakIpuzpE rjavAmAlUrapatrakEH pUjitA yErBagavatI tezAM kiM karma sADanEH nityAtantre ekAdaSapawale ma tulasyA yajet kAlIM nAkzatErvizRusarcayet aparAjitAyA dAnena sAkzAttuzwA BavecCivA kAlikAyASca tArAyA karavIramatipriyam javApuzpaM maheSAni dadyAnna DArayet kacit raktotpalena deveSi kAlikAM pUjayet sakft SatavarzasahaKARAM pUjAyAH PalamA pnuyAt taTA durvApi garBasaMyuktA devI tuzwikarI Bavet purasaraRarasollAse maYjarIM sahakArasya keSavAya nivedayet rudrajawAM SirozaYca dAqimaM kAYcanaM taTA nIlakaRWaM mayUraYca yonyAkAraYca varjayet puzpadAne kAmyaPalaM nityAtantre ISvara uvAca brahmahatyAdipApAnAM prAyasitaM sureSvari raktapuzpE rmahAdevi cakrarAjaM prapUjayet kulAcArakrameREva karpUrakzodamaRqitam mahApAtakakowisa janmAntara kftA api mAsamAtreRa hanyante satyaM satyaM na saMSayaH lakzmIstasya Bavedgehe susTirA pIravandite javApuzpErmaheSAni pUrvavad yAda pUjayet mAsamAtreRa naSyanti saptajanmakftAmbapi brahmahatyAdiprApAni DanavAn jAyate kaviH pUrvavat ketakIpuzpE patrErvA yadi pUjayet sAsamAtreRa deveSi upasAtakako wayaH naSyantIti pUrvoktenAnvayaH laBate rAja sOBAgyaM sADako nAtra saMSayaH SatapatrErmaheSAni pUrvavat pUjavecCivAm mAsamAtreRa deveSi sarvapApaM vinASayet campakEH pUjayeddevIM pUrvavammAsamAtrakam nihatya parameSAni pAtakaM Satajanmajam sOBAgyaM laBate BantrI trizu lokezu pArvati SvetapadmErmahe nihatya parameSAni mAsamAtraM papUjayet triMSajjanmakftaM pApaM nASayennAtra saMSayaH banDUkEH pUrvavaddevi mAsamAtraM prapU jayet nihatya sarvapApAni rAjAnaM vaSamAnayet mAla tImaYcikAjAtIkundEH SvetovpalEH saha susiSrEH pUrva Page b vaddevi BAgamAtraM prapUjayet brahmahatyAdipAzAni SatajanmakftAnyapi gAkzayet parameSAni muktistasya kare sTitA raktotpanajavAvahnibanDUkAgastyakEH Si vAm pUrvavat parameSAni mAsamAtraM prapUjayet pAtakaM nASayitvA sO mama tulyo BavennaraH nAgakeSara kahlArabakulEH sinDuvArakEH pAwalaH pUjayeddevi SrIpIWAntarnisAsinIm pUrvavat pUjayeddevi mAsamAtraM prasannaDIH sahasrajanmajaM pApaM nASayejYAtra saMSayaH sOBAgyamatulaM tasya BaveddevI prasAdataH yoginI tantre notsfjya dadyAt puzpARi vanasyAni kadAcana na Saknuvanti vE devAH samAkarzitusudyatAH ekEkaM kusumaM yakzA rakzanti daSa vE yataH taTA yakzANganAH paYca kzarvataH kusumAvftAH tasmAdAhvaca kusumaM yajeddevAn pitFnapi iti vfkzasTapumpadAnanizeDaH matsyasUkte svAtvA maDyAhnasamaye na cCidyAt kusuma naraH tat puzperarccane devi rOrave paripacyate maDyAhna ityupA dAnAt prAtaHsnAtasya puzyAharaRe na dozaH aTa puzpa mAlA viSvasAratantre nIlotpalasahasreRa yasta mAlAM prayacCati durgAyE viDivaddevi tasya puRyaPalaM SfRu varzakowisahasrARi varzakowiSatAni ca davyA anucaro BUtvA rudraloke mahIyate yoginItantre navamapawale mAlatImAlayA vizRurarcito yena kArtike pApAkzarakftA mAlA nASitA tasya vizRunA taTA karavIrakftAM mAlAM gADavAya prayacCati devendro pi maheSAni karoti karasaMpuwam tatrEka na Bedayed yajYasUtraM mAlAYcEva na Bedayet vi Sizya mAlatImAlAM vyAGraDarma taTEva ca vfhannalItantre dvitIvapawale kokaRadaYca banDUkaM karRikAdvayameva ca vakamandAraraktARi karavIrARi Sasyate mallikAtritayaM jAtI kzOmapuzyaM jayantikA vilvapatraM kuruvakaM muni puzpaYca kesaram vAsantI cEva sOganDaM kAlapuzpaM manoharam AmalakaYca kAdambaM bakulaM yUTikA taTA bilvErmaruvakAdyeSca tulalovarjitEH SuBEH oqrapuzpE rviSezeRa vajrapuzpeRa SoBitam savaM puzpaM pradadyAcca Baktiyuktena cetasA javApuzpa maheSAni dadyAdvevyE viSezataH padmaM priyataraM devyA SePAlI bakulaM taTA raktotpalena deveSi pUjayet paramAM SivAma lakzavarza sahasrARAM pUjAyAH PamAdguyAt SirIzaM varama Page a devyAH pItida tagaraM taTA sTalapadmaM sututaraM lakza saMKyakrameRa tu sadi dadyAtmahekzAni karyasidDiH sureSvari tadEva mantrasidDiH syAnnAtra kAryyA vicA raRA dvijArgI tulasIM ramyAM tasyAH prItikarIM parAm kAYcanaM raktavarRaYca atipriyataraM mahat Baktiyukto mahaSAni sarvapuzpaM nivedayet vfhannIlatantre cAtu rmAsye tu lakzElamAlatyA yo rccayedDarim Satajanmakfta pApaM tatkzaRAdeva naSyati karavIrasya kusumErye rca yanti harerddine darSanAttasya deveSi sihAsyaYcEva mAlUraM DustUraYca caturviDam taTA rudrajawe dve ca guhyapuzpaYca SaNkari padme nIlotpale devi vakamandArakAYcane mADavIdve tamAlaYca guptametadvarArcane divArAtriBedena puzpaviSezeRa pUjanamuktaM tatrEva kanakAni suganDIni rAtrO deyAni SaNkari divA cAgyAni puzpARi divA rAtrO ca mallikA devAlayasya puzpeRa yo devaM pratipUjayeta anDatvaM prApnuyAt so pi daSa varzARi paYca ca devatA viSepe puzpaviSezavarjagamapi tatrEva Sive vivarjayet kundaM mADe mADyaM praSasyate gaReSe varjayenmADyamaSokaM tagara ntaTA sUryye mAGyaYca mandAraM kanakaYca taTEva ca mahAlakzmyE ca tulasIM praRa Syati na tat karoti viprendra tapasA tozito hariH yat karoti hfzIkeSo munipuzpEralaNkftaH vihAya sarvapuzpARi munipuzpeRa keSavam kArttike yo rccayed BaktyA vAjimeDaPalaM laBet munipuzpakftAM nAgakeSarapuzpEryaH pUjayed garuqaDvajam sa yAti vEzRavaM sTAnaM yatra gatvA na Socate kadamba kusumEryo vE pUjayenmaDusUdanam janmAyutArjitaM pApaM sPowitaM tena nArada na taTA ketakIpuzpErmAlatI naSyati SamIpuzpESca deveSaM pUjayedasuradvizam yamaM na paSyedviprarze na yAti durgatiM naraH pAdmottaraKa a lakzmotulya priyapuzpARi nAradIyasaM mAlatI bakulASoka SePAlInavamAlikAH lakzmItulyapiyAKi me keSavArcane nizidDapuzpARi vizRuDarmottare ugraganDInyaganDIni kusumAni na dApayet anyAyatanajAtAni kaRwakIni tayErva ca vaktAni yAni DarmajYe cEtyavfkzodBavAni ca antarjalakzAlitaYca puzpaM duzwamiti hariBakti nAmake granTe aBivAdyABivAdakakarasTapuzpaM prokza RAt karmaRyam iti kecit yAcitAdipuzpa dAnasya nizPalatvam yAcitaM nizPalaM puzpaM kraya krItaYca nizPalam iti vadanti vAmahastacitAdi puzpasyAdeyatvaM yaTA na puzpacCadanaM kAryyaM devArTaM vAmahastataH na dadyAttAni deveByaH saMsTApya vAmahastataH samitpuzpAdInAM svayamAharaRIyatvaM hArItaSAtA tapO samitpuzpakuSAdIni brAhmaRaH svayamAharet SUdrAnItEH krayakrItEH karma kurvan patatyaDaH kraye prati pramavamAha brahmapu puzpErDUpESca nEvedyErvIrakrayakriyA hftEH vIrakrayo vIravat yAcYASUnyena vikretu rusanyastamUlyena krayaH puzpadAnaprakAro jYAnamAlAyAM puzpaM vA yadi vA patraM PalaM nezwamaDomuKam puzpA YjaliviDiM hitvA yaTotpannaM taTArpaRam maDyAhna snAnAnantaraM puzpacayanasya dozo yaTA snAnaM kftvA tu ye kecit puzpaM gfhRanti vE dvijAH devatAstanna gfhRanti BasmIBavati dAruvat etattu dvitIyasnAnABiprAyam iti ratnAkaraH vyaktaM matsyasUkte snAtvA maDyAhna samaye na CindyAt kusumaM naraH tattatpuzpArcane devi rOrave paripacyate puzpABAve deyAni vizRu Darmottare puzpABAve pi deyAni patrARi ca janArdane patrABAve jalaM dadyAttena puRyamavApyate puzpadAna mAhAtmyaM yaTA na ratrErna suvarRena na vittena ca BU riRA taTA prasAdamAyAti yaTA puzpErjanArdanaH devatAviSeze varjanIyapuzpaM yaTA SAtAtapaH Sive vi varjayet kundamunmattaYca harestaTA devInAmarkamandArO sUryyasya tagarantaTA puzpaviSezARAM kAlaBede paryyu zitamuktaM Bavizye padmAni sitaraktAni kumudA nyutpalAni ca ezAM paryuzitASaNkA kAryyA paYca dinottaram puzviSezasyAparyuzitatvaM yaTA tu lasyagastyavilvAnAM na ca paryuzitAtmatA yoginI tantre vilvapatraYca mAGyaYca tamAlAmalakodalam ka hlAraM tulasIYcEva padmaYca munipuzpakam etat paryu Page a pita na syAt yaccAtyat kakikAtmakam kalikAtmakaM prasPuwanayogyam ekA ta anyat paryuzitaSabde dfSyam
pyuza pyuza pyuza utsarge cu uBa saka sew pyozayati te apupyuzat ta pyuza viBAge dAhe ca di para saka sew pyuzyate irit apyuzat apyOzIt puzyoza pyuza utsarge cu uBa saka sew pyozayati te apupyuzat ta pyuza viBAge dAhe ca di para saka sew pyuzyate irit apyuzat apyOzIt puzyoza
qa qa qa qakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH mUrdDanyaH ardDamAtrAkAloccAryyaH wavagIryaH tasyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyena murdDasTAnasya sparSa AByantarayatnaH saMvAranAdaGIzA alpaprARaSca bAhyapra yatnAH mAtfkAnyAse sya dakzapAdagulPe nyasyatA asya vAcakaSabdA yaTA qaH smftirdArukA nandi rUpiRI yogitIpriyaH kOmArI SaNkarastrAsastrivaktro vyApakoDvaniH durUho jawilI BImA dvijihvaH pfTivI satI kollagiriH kzamA SAntirnABiH svAtI ca locanam varRABaDAnam tadaDizWA tfdevatArUpaM yaTA vyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRu zvAvahitA mama javAsindUrasaNkASAM varABayakarApa rAm trinetrAM varadAM nityAM paramokzapradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet iti varRo dDAratantram asya DyeyarUpaM yaTA qakAraM caYcalA pANgi sadA triguRasaMyutam paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARa Page b mayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM sadA caturjYAnamayaM varRamAtmAditattvasaMyutam pItavidyu llatAkAraM qakAraM praRamAmyaham iti kAmaDenutantram tasya mAtrAvftte praTamopanyAse SoBA Palam qaH SoBAM Qo viSoBAM BramaRamaTa ca Rastastu KaM Tastu yudDam vf ra wI DftavAkyokteH qa pu qI qa Sive Sabde trAse ca ekA ko bAqavAgnO vAqavAgnO qAkinyAM strI medi qa qakAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH mUrdDanyaH ardDamAtrAkAloccAryyaH wavagIryaH tasyoccAraRe jihvAmaDyena murdDasTAnasya sparSa AByantarayatnaH saMvAranAdaGIzA alpaprARaSca bAhyapra yatnAH mAtfkAnyAse sya dakzapAdagulPe nyasyatA asya vAcakaSabdA yaTA qaH smftirdArukA nandi rUpiRI yogitIpriyaH kOmArI SaNkarastrAsastrivaktro vyApakoDvaniH durUho jawilI BImA dvijihvaH pfTivI satI kollagiriH kzamA SAntirnABiH svAtI ca locanam varRABaDAnam tadaDizWA tfdevatArUpaM yaTA vyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRu zvAvahitA mama javAsindUrasaNkASAM varABayakarApa rAm trinetrAM varadAM nityAM paramokzapradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet iti varRo dDAratantram asya DyeyarUpaM yaTA qakAraM caYcalA pANgi sadA triguRasaMyutam paYcadevamayaM varRaM paYcaprARa Page b mayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM sadA caturjYAnamayaM varRamAtmAditattvasaMyutam pItavidyu llatAkAraM qakAraM praRamAmyaham iti kAmaDenutantram tasya mAtrAvftte praTamopanyAse SoBA Palam qaH SoBAM Qo viSoBAM BramaRamaTa ca Rastastu KaM Tastu yudDam vf ra wI DftavAkyokteH qa pu qI qa Sive Sabde trAse ca ekA ko vAqavAgnO qAkinyAM strI medi

rAhUtsfzwa rAhUtsfzwa rAhUtsfzwa pu ta laSune hArA
rAhucCatra rAhucCatra rAhucCatra na rAhorgrahasya Catramiva Ardrake rAjani
rAhucCattra rAhucCattra rAhucCattra na rAhogrehasya Cattramiva Ardrake rAjani
rAhumUrdDaBid rAhumUrdDaBid rAhumUrdDaBid pu rAhoH siMhikAsutasya mUrdDvAnaM Binatti mida kvip vizRO amftapAnakAle devapaNktO devarU peRa sTitvA mfta pibantaM dfzwvA vizRustasya SiraScicCe deti BAga a
rAhumUrdDaBida rAhumUrdDaBida rAhumUrdDaBida pu rAhoH siMhikAsutasya mUrdDAnaM Binatti Bida kvip vizRO amftapAnakAle devapaNktO devarUpeRa sTitvA mftaM pibantaM dfzwvA vizRustasya SiraScicCedeti BAga a

rAtrisatra rAtrisatra rAtrisatra na rAtrizu trayodaSAdidinezu vihitaM sattvam trayodaSAhAdizu vihite yAgaBede tatra cArTavAdikaM PalaM pratizWAdikam na viSvajinnyAyAt svargaPalamiti jE sUtre samarTitam yadyapi rAtriSabdena aTEza jyotiraTEza gOrityAdivAkyena vihitAni sOtrARi karmARyucyante dvAdaSAhAdUrDvaBAvinastrayodaSarAtracaturdaSarAtrAdayaSca sattraviSezAH rAtrisattrapadAvAcyAstrayodaSasaMKyakA rAtrayo yasmin sattraviSeze sa trayodaSarAtra iti vyutpatteH taTApi bahuvacanAntarAtriSabdena rAtrisattramucyate etA viMSatiM rAtrIH iti SravaRAt ta vo PalamAtreyo nirdeSAdaSrutO hyanumAnaM syAt jE mU nirdeSAdarTavAdena Palasya nirdeSAt PalamarTavAdoktam Atreya Aha aSrutO yatrArTavAdAdizu PalASrutistatrAnumAnaM svargaPalakalpanamvf nirdeSAttu pratizWEvaPalatvena vilapyatetaTA ca pratizWAkAma AyuzA yajeta pratizWAkAmo jyotizA yajeta ityAdiSrutipadaGawitA eva viDayaH kalpyante lAGavAt na tu svargakAmAdipadaGawitAH tattvabo rAtrisattranyAyo pi ArTavAdikaPalAnvayArTaH
rAtrisattra rAtrisattra rAtrisattra na rAtrizu trayodaSAdidinezu vihitaM sattram trayodaSAhAdizu vihite yAgaBede tatra GArTavAdikaM PalaM pratizWAdikam na viSvajinnyAyAt svargaPalamiti jE sUtre samarTitam yadyapi rAktiSabdena aTEza jyotiraTEza gOrityAdivAkyena vihitAni sOtrAKikarmA Ryucyante dvAdaSAhAdUrDvaBAvinastrayodaSarAtracaturdaSarA trAdayaSca sattraviSezAH rAtrisattrapadavAcyAstrayodaSasaMKyakA rAtrayo yasmin sattraviSeze sa trayodaSarAtra iti vyut patteH taTApi bahuvacanAntarAtriSabdena rAtrisattramucyate etA viMSatiM rAtrIH iti SravaKAt ta bo PalamAtreyo nirdeSAdaSrutO hyanumAnaM syAt jE mU nirdeSAdarTavAdena Palasya nirdeSAt PalamarTavAdoktam Atreya Aha aSrutO yatrArTavAdAdizu PalASrutista trAnumAnaM svargaPalakalpanam vf nirdeSAttu pratizWEva Palatvena vilapyate taTA ca patizWAkAma AyuzA yajeta pratizWAkAmo jyotizA yajeta ityAdiSrutipadaGawitA eva viDayaH kalpyante lAGavAt na tu svargakAmAdipadaGawitAH tattvavo rAtrisattranyAyo pi ArTavAdikaPalAtvayArTaH

rUkzapattra rUkzapattra rUkzapattra pu rUkza pattramasya SAKowavfkze rAjani

rahas rahas rahas na raha asun nirjane amaraH gopye yATArTye ramaRe ca medi nirjane avya amaraH ramante smin rama asun masya raH viSvAsayogyadeSe ujjvalada
rahasa rahasa rahasa na raha asun nirjane amaraH gopye yATArTye Page b ramaRe ca medi nirjane avya amaraH ramante smin rama asun masya raH viSvAsayogyadeSe ujjvalada

raktAkAru raktAkAru raktAkAru pu raktavarRa AkAro mUrttiryasya pravAle rAjani raktamUrttike tri

retas retas retas na rI asun tuw ca puM strI raktAdiparipAkajanye dehasTe majjahetuke caramaDAtO Sukre SivavIryye pArade ca medi

rohiRyAM rohiRyAM rohiRyAM kawkI suSrutaH tasyAH BadradAyakatvAttaTAtvam dArvI tvak pippalI SuRWI lAkzASakrayavErGftam saMyuktaM BadrarohiRyAM pakvaM peyAdimiSritam
rohin rohin rohin pu rohati punaH punacCinno pi prAdurBavati ruha Rini rohitakavfkze vawavfkze aSvatTavfkze ca medi rohaRavati tri striyAM NIp
rohina rohina rohina pu rohati punaHpunaSCinno pi prAdurBavati ruha Rini rohitakavfkze vawavfkze aSvatTavfkze ca medi rohaRavati tri striyAM NIp
rohit rohit rohit pu ruha iti sUryye medi varRaBede ca matsya Bede pu ujjvala latABede mfgyAYca strI NIp medi
rohita rohita rohita pu ruha iti sUryye medi varRaBede ca matsya Bede pu ujjvala latABede mfgyAYca strI NIp medi rohita na ruha itac ka ruDire kuNkume fjO indracAme medida indracApe Page b medi rohitakavfkze pu svanAmaravyAte svanAmaKyAte matsyaBede puMstrI striyAM NIz medi raktodaro raktamuKo raktAkzo raktapakzatiH kfSapakzo JasaSrezWo rohitaH kaTito buDEH rohitaH sarvamatsyAnAM varo vfzyo rdditArttijit rddi tArttijit kazAyAnurasaH syAdurvAtaGno nAtipittakft UrdvDajatrugatAn svAdurvAtaGno nAtipitta kft UrdDvajatrugatAn rogAn hanyAdrohitamuRqakam BAvapra raktavarRe pu tadvati tri amaraH striyAM NIz tasya natve Ratvam agnivAhane mfgaBede niGaRwuH niDa RwuH svArTe ka rohitaka uktArTe vfkzaBede amaraH rohita pu ruha iti sUryye medi varRaBede ca matsya Bede pu ujjvala latABede mfgyAYca strI NIp medi rohita na ruha itac ruDire kuNkume fjO indracApe Page b medi rohitakavfkze pu svanAmaKyAte matsyaBede puMstrI striyAM NIz medi raktodaro raktamuKo raktAkzo raktapakzatiH kfSapakzo JasaSrezWo rohitaH kaTito buDEH rohitaH sarvamatsyAnAM varo vfzyo rddi tArttijit kazAyAnurasaH svAdurvAtaGno nAtipitta kft UrdDvajatrugatAn rogAn hanyAdrohitamuRqakam BAvapra raktavarRe pu tadvati tri amaraH striyAM NIz tasya natve Ratvam agnivAhane mfgaBede niDa RwuH svArTe ka rohitaka uktArTe vfkzaBede amaraH

rucyakandaM rucyakandaM rucyakandaM pu rucyaH rucikaraH kando mUlamasya SUraRe ola rAjani

ruza ruza ruza baDe BvA para aka sew saka saw rozati arozIt ruza kroDe di para aka sew ruzyati irit aruzat caruzat arozIt ruza kroDe cu uBa aka sew rozayati te arUruzat ta ruza zA strI ruza sampa kvip vA wAp kroDe hemaca ruza baDe BvA para saka saw rozati arozIt ruza kroDe di para aka sew ruzyati irit caruzat arozIt ruza kroDe cu uBa aka sew rozayati te arUruzat ta ruza zA strI ruza sampa kvip vA wAp kroDe hemaca
sADAraRaDarma sADAraRaDarma sADAraRaDarma puM karma ahiMsA satyamasteyaM SOcamindriyanigrahaH damaH kzamArjavaM dAnaM Darma sADAraRaM viduH ityukte ahiMsAdO sarvavarRASramatulye Darme nyAyAdyukte saMSayahetO mAnaDarme ca taTAhi raNgaM rajataM nayeti saMSaye raNgarajatayoH sAmanyaDarmatAkacikyaSuBratvAdirhetuH prajAsarjanarUpe jantumAtraDarme ca prajanArTaM striyaH sfzwAH samantAnArTaYca mAnavAH tasmAt sADAraRoDarmaH SrutO patnyA sahoditaH manuH sa ca DarmaH sarvezAM jantUnAM sADAraRa iti mAnavA ityupalakzaRam
sADAraRaDarmma sADAraRaDarmma sADAraRaDarmma pu karma ahimsA satyamasteyaM SOcami ndriyanigrahaH damaH kzamArjjavaM dAnaM DarmaM sADAraRaM viduH ityukte ahiMsAdO sarvavarRASramatalye Darme nyAyAdyukte saMSayahetO samAnaDarme ca taTAhi raNgaM rajataM naveti saMSaye raNgarajatayoH sAminyaDarmaScAkacikya SuBratvAdirhatuH prajAsarjanarUpe jantumAtraDarme ca praja nArTaM striyaH sfzwAH santAnArTaYca mAnavAH tasmAt sADAraRoDarmaH SrutO patnyA sahoditaH manuH sa ca DarmaH sarvezAM janta nAM sADAraRa iti mAnavA ityupa lakzaRam

sAta sAta sAta suKe upAdAne ada cu uBa aka sew sAtayati te asasAtat ta ayaM sOtra ityeke sAta na sAta ac suKe BarataH sana kta datte nazwe ca sAta suKe upAdAne ada cu uBa aka sew sAtayati te asasAtat ta ayaM sOtra ityeke sAta na sAta ac suKe BarataH sana kta datte nazwe ca

saDarman saDarman saDarman tri samAno Darmo sya anic samA samAnasya saH sadfSe striyAM vA qAp

saDyac saDyac saDyac tri saha aYcati anca kvip sahasya saDriH sahacare amaraH Batve saDrIcaH striyAM NIp saDrIco sa ca BAryAyAM saKyAYca hemaca
saMGa saMGa saMGa pu sam hana qa ni samUhe jantusamUhe ca amara asya vA N saNGa iti vA rUpam

saMSaya saMSaya saMSaya pu sam SI ac sandehe ekasmin DarmiRi BAvA BAvayoH virudDaDarmadvayasya vA sandehe yaTA parvato vahnimanni vA ayaM sTARurvA puruzoveti sa saMSayo BavedyA DIrekatrAnAvaBAvayoH para taSca zoqaSa nAqyaH puRyasampAdakatvAt puRyA matAH sa mmatA sUryyasaMkrAntisamayAt pUrvaM zoqaSa paScAcca zoqaSa GawikAH puRyakAla iti dvAtriMSadGawikA BavantItyarTaH tadAha vasizWaH dinapatisaMkramaRAt prAk zoqaSa nAqyaSca puRyakAlaH saH parataH zoqaSa nAqyaH sarvatra snAnadAna kAryyezu brahmasidDAnte pi sakrAnteH prAkparastAcca sArdDAH zoqaSa nAqikAH trayastriMSat saMkramasya puRyAH sarvasya nAqikAH anena saMkrAnteH puRyakA lastu zoqaSoBayataH kalAH iti smftivAkye yEH pUrvataH parataScAzwAvazwO GawikAH puRyakAlaM ityevaM zoqaSeti vyAKyAtaM tadapAkftaM Bavati kiYcAyamarTovAsanAsidDaH sUryyasidDAnte BihitaH arkamAnakalAH zazwyA guRitA BuktiBAjitAH tadardDanAqyaH saMkrAnterarvAk puRyaM taTA pare sidDAntaSiromaRAvapi zazwiGnabimbaM graha BUktiBaktaM saMkrAntinAqyo KilaDarmakftye ravestu tAH puRyatamA grahaH svasaMkrAntigomiSraPalaM viDatte iti vAsanA ceyaM yadi grahaspazwagatitulyakalABirahorAtra mAnarUpAH zazwiGawikAlaByante tadA grahabimbakalABiH kimiti trErASikena grahe bimbakalAnAM zazwirguRako jahABuktirBAjako nizpanna ityarTaH evaM sarvagrahARAmapi saMkrAntiH syAt taduktaM sidDAnta eva atra tu vistaraBayA danupayuktatvAcca nAsmABiraleKi ataeva triM Sad eka triMSatsArdDadvAtriMSattrayastriMSadAdiBedena smftizu puRya GawikABivaDAna spazwIkftyA BedasaMBavAdBinnaM tadeva sAmA nyataH saMkrAntizu dvAtriMSat GawikArUpaH puRyakAlo nirRItaH devIpurARe tu mandAdisaMjYABedAt puRyakAla Page a viSeza evoktaH dvicatuHpaYcasaptAzwanapadvAdaSa eva ca kra BeRa GawikAhyetAstat puRyaM pAramArTikam iti asyArTaH mandAyAmantarAlavarttiGawikAdvayaM mandAkinyAYca tasro GawikAH DvANkzyAM paYca GorAyAM sapta mahodaryA mazwO rAkzarsyA nava miSrAyAM daSa prAgaBihitadevIpurA RoktamandAdisaMjYAvAkyAnnakzatrajanitasaMjYAsu mandAdizvayaM vicAro na vAraprayuktAsvacanAt evaM saMkrAntizu puRya kAlamaBiDAya idAnI rAtrisaMkrAntO viSezamupajA tyuttarArdDenAha niSITata iti niSITo rdDarAtraM tasmA davAk pUrvatra aparatra paScAcca saM krame saMkrAntikAle sati pUrvAparayorahnoH krameRAntimapUrvaBAgO puRyO syAtAM BA gakAviti svArTe kaH yadyardDarAtrAt prAksaMkrAntistadA pUrvadinasyottarArdDaM puRyaM yadyardDarAtrAdupari saMkrAnti stadIttaradinasya pUrvArdDameva puRyamityarTaH uktaYca brahma sidDAnte BavanAntaM bimbamaDyaM rAtryardDAt prAguveti cet snAnadAnAdi maDyAhAt kuryyAdUrDvaM gate dine rAtryardDAdupari kzetraM yAti cedanyaTAryamA ahnyAgA mini maDyAhnAt pUrvaM snAnAdi puRyadam BavanaM rASiH bimbamaDyaM raveH kzetraM rASiH vfdDavasizWo pi ahni saMkramaRe puRyamahaH kftsnaM prakIrtitam rAtrO saMkra maRe BAnordinArdDaM mnAnadAnayIH ardDarAtrAdaDAstasmin maDyAhnasyoparikriyA UrDvaM saMkramaRe corDvamudayAt praharadvayam iti nanu rAtrO SezadinasaMkrAntO vA rAtrAvapi GuRyakAlasattvAt tadA srAnAdi kuto na kriyate yadarTama yasudyama ArabDa ucyate rAtrO mnAnaM na kurvIta dAnaM cEva viSezataH iti sumantuvAkyAdrAtrO mnAnAdyaDikArAsa ttvAt yat tu nEmittikaM grahaRAdiprayuktaM tadBavatyeva nEmittikaYca kurvIta mnAnaM dAnaYca rAtrizu iti sumantuvA kyaSezAt ardDarAtrasamaye saMkramaRe makarakarkayoSca viSe zamupajAtikayAha pUrRe iti ardDarastraniSITO dvO dvO yAmapraharO samO itTaBiDAnAdardDarAtro niSITaSabda vAcyaH taRinniSITe pUrRe rAtridvitIyapraharAntimakalAva cCinne yadi saMkramaH syAt tadA prAgaparaM divadvaye puRya muktam uktaYca vfdDavasizWena pUrRe cedardDarAtre tu yadA saMkramate raviH prAhuH dinadvayaM puRyaM muktvA makarakarka wAviti brahmasidDAnte pi yadyardDarAtra eva syAt saMpUrRe saMkramo raveH tadA dinadvayaM puRya mnAnadAnAdi karmasu atra muktvA makarakarkawAvitya ktaM tatraH makarakarka Page b wayostu kaTamityata AhATeti aTAnantaramudayAstAt sUryyodayAt sUryyAstAcca pUrvaM parastAcca yadi yAmyasOmya yane karkawamakarasaMkrAntI BavatastadA pUrvaparadine puRye syAtAM yadi sUryyodayAt pUrvaM karkawasaMkramaRaM syAt tadA pUrvadina eva puRyakAlo na paradine tadAha vfdDagArgyaH yadAstamayavelAyAM makare yAti BAskaraH pradoze cArdDa rAtre vA snArna dAnaM pare hani ardDarAtre tadUrDvaM vA saMkrAntO dakziRAyane pUrvameva dinaM grAhyaM yAvannodayate raviH iti astamayavelAyA iti paYcamyantaM padaM vASabda ivArTe BavizyottarapurARe pi kArmukantu pari tyajya mfgaM saMkramate raviH pradoze cArdDarAtre vA kuryyA dahani pUrvataH iti pradozalakzaRaM skandapurARe tri muharttaH pradozaH syAdravAvastaM gate sati iti aTArdDodayAstAditi vacanasyApyavAdamindravajrACandasAha ardDoti ardDoditAdardDAstAccADa UrdDvaM ca kramAttriGawi kAstABiH pramitA sanDyAsanDyAkAlaH syAt ardDoditArka vimbAtpUrvaM triGawIpramitA prAtaHsanDyA taTArdDAstAdarka bimbAdupari trinAqIpramitA sAyasanDyetyarTaH tadAha varAhaH ardDAstamitAnuditAt sUryAdaspazwaBaM naBo yA vat tAvat sanDyAkAlaYcihnEretEH PalaM brUyAditi tatpramARamAha nAradaH ardDAstamanasanDyA hi GawikA trayasanmitA taTEvArdDodayAt prAtarGawikAtrayasa mmitA iti skandapurARe pi udayAt prAktanI sanDyA Gawikatrayamucyate sAyasanDyA triGawikA hyastAdu pari BAsvataH iti atra sanDyAMlakzaRe ardDAstamitA nuditavAkyasya skandapurARIyavAkyasya ca vrIhiya yavadvikalpaH aTaH sanDyAlakzaRaprayojanamAhAtreti aTa sanDyAyAM pAtaHsanDyAyAM sAyaMsanDyAyAM ca kramA ccedu yAmyasOmye ayane dakziRottarAyaRe tadAnIM para pUrvO GasrO divasO puRyA yAmyasOmye ayane ityatra yadi prAtaHsanDyAyAM dakziRAyanapravfttistadA sUryoda yAdanantara sampUrRamahaH puRyaM taTA yadi sAyaMsa nDyAyAmuttarAyaRapravfttistadA sUryyAstAtpUrvaM sampUrRa mahaH puRyaM syAdirTaH yadAha nAradaH sUryyasyodaya sanDyAyAM yadi yAmyAyanaM Bavet tadodayAdahaHpurRya pUrvAhaH pUrvato yadi sUryyAstamanasanDyAyAM yadi sO myAyanaM Bavet tadAhaH puRyakAlaH syAt parataScottare hani iti atra yadyudayasanDyAtaH prAkkarkasaMkrama Page a stadA prAgadina eva puRyakAlo nottaradine taTA yadya stasanDyAmatikramya makarasaMkrAntisvadottaradina eva puRya kAlonottaradine iti nizkfzwo rTaH ato vfdDagArgyA divAkyanAradavAkyayoH pradozasanDyApadopAdAnena sAmAnya viSazamAvo vagantavyaH yattu hemAdrO skandapurARIyaM vA kyam DanurmInAvatikramya kanyAM ca miTunaM tataH pUrvApara viBAgena rAtrO saMkramate yadA dinAnAnte paYca nAqryastu tadAH puRyatamAH smftAH udaye ca taTA paYca dEve pitrye ca karmaRi iti tadapi sanDyAvizayakamevetyAhuraBi yuktAH vazuve tu yaTASrutam eveti anyadapi sanDyA lakzaRaprayojanaM prAksanDyAgarjita ityAdizu vakzyati nanu nAyamayanapuRyakAloktyudyamaH saPalaH SAstrAntara virudDatvAttaTA hi ahni saMkramaRe puRyamahaH kftsnaM prakIrttitam rAtrO saMkramaRe BAnordinArdDaM snAnadA nayoH ardDarAtrAdaDastasmin maDyAhnasyoparikriyA UrdDaM saMkramaRe cordDvamudayAt praharadvayam pUrRe ceda rdDarAtre ca yadA saMkramate raviH prAhurdinadvayaM puRyaM muktvA makarakarkawO iti vfdDavasizWenAyanavyatiriktezu daSasu saMkramezu rAtrigatezu yAyAH sannihitA nAqya stAstAH puRyatamAH smftAH iti kaSyapoktasAmAnyavA kyAdrAtrAvevAnuzWAnaM prasaktamahaH saMkrama ityAdinApyeta devAnuzWAnaM vihitaM tasyApi paryudAsaH kriyate muktvA ma karakarkawAviti tasmAn makarakarkawayoH saMkramaRe rAtrA vevAnuzWAnaM karttavyamityuktaM Bavati ataevAha yAjYava lkyaH rAhudarSanasaMkrAntivivAhAtyayavfdDizu snAna dAnAdikaM kAryaM niSi kAmyavratezu ca iti vasizWo pi sutajanane saMkrAntAvuparAge candrasUryayorniyatam rAtrA vapi karttavyaM snAnaM dAnaM viSezato nFRAmiti sumantuSca grahaRodvAhasaMkrAntiyAtrArttiprasavezu ca SravaRe cetihAsasya rAtrO dAna praSasyate iti ezu vAkyezu sAmAnyavAcino pi saMkrAtipadasya makarakarkawasaMkrAnti paratvamavasIyate yastu rAtrO snAnaM na kurvIta dAnaM cEva viSezataH iti nizeDaH sa saMkrAntyantare vyavatizWate ata evoktaM kaSyapena snAnaM dAnaM grahaRavat sOmyayAmyA yanadvaye iti tasmAdayanasaMkrame rAtrO satyAM tatrEva snAnadAnAdyanuzWAtavyamitiH atrAhuH SAstradvayena tulya balatvAdvikalpasidDO tattaddeSaprasidDaSizwAcAreRa vyavasTA dazwavyA tatra gOrjarAstu kaSyapAdivAkyamaByupetya rAtrA Page b vayanasamBave sati rAtrO eva snAnadAnAdikaM kurvanti dAkziRAtyAstu vfdDagArgyAdivAkyamaNgIkftya divasa eva snAnadAnAdi kurvantItyalamatiprasaNgena yadA tu dine ka rkamakarasaMkramastadA krameRa pUrvottaraGawikAniyamamAha vfdDa vasizWaH atItAnAgate puRye dve tUdagdakziRAyane triMSat karkawake nAqyo makare viMSatiH smftA iti utta rAyaRamatItaM sat puRyaM karkawAyanamAgAmi puRyaM tatra karkawasaMkrAnteH prAktriSat GawakiH puRyAH makare tUttaraviMSatirGawikAH puRyA ityarTaH atra vAkye yadyapi dinapadAnupAdAnaM taTApi yadAstamayavelAyAmiti rAtri paraviSezavAkyAlocanAdidaM dinaparaM pratiBAti taTa sati kenApi hetunA samIpaTawIzu SrAdDAdyanuzWAnAsamBave paramAvaDitvena triMSadAdayo GawikA atrAnujYAyante yadA tu pratibanDastadA yAyAH sannihitA nAqyastAstAH pURya tamAH smftA iti kaSyopokteH samIpaGawikAsveva SrAdDAdi viDeyaM sannihitaparityAge kAraRABAvAditiM nyAyacci aTa pUrvAparAH zoqaSa GawikAH puRyA iti pUrvaM sAmAnyenoktamidAnIM vizRu padAdizu sa kra mezu viSezamanuzwa BAha yAmyati yAmyAyane karkamaM krAntO taTA vizRupade vfzasiMhavfScikakumBasaM krAntikAle AdyAH nAqyaH praTamAH zoqaSaGawikAH atipuRwadAH snAnadAnAdAvanantaPaladAjYeyAH apimAstu na taTeti nizkfzwo rTaH tulAjayostulAmezayoH maDyA uBayataH zoqaSa zoqaSa GawikAH puRyAH aTa vA zoqaSEva GawikAH puRyA zaqaSItyAnane miTunakanyADanurmInasaMkrAntizu taTA sOmye makarasaMkrAtO saMkrAntikAla tparA agrimAH zoqaSa GawikAH atipuRyadAH praTamAstu na taTeti niz kfzwo rTaH yadAha SrIpatiH yAmyAyane vizRupadetaTAdO dAnAdyanantaM vizuve ca maDye vadantyatIte zaqaSItivaktre maharzayaH Kalvayane ca sOmye tatra karke prAgeva makara saMkrAntO paScAdeva puRyakAla iti tu prANniraRAyi vizRupade tu agrimAdiGawInAM puRyakAle taratamaBAvaH puRyAyAM vizRupadyAM ca prAkapaScAdapi zoqaSeti vfdDa vasizWokteH vizuve tu sAmAnyanirRaya eveti kecit dIpikAwIkAkArastvevamAha meze tulAyAM saMkrAnti maDya eva saMkrAntikAlAtpUrvamazwO GawikAH parataScAzwO GawikA puRya iti yuktaM cEtat vizuve ca maDyapado padAnAn maDye zoqaSa DawikAH puRyAH ityucyate aspAt Page a kAlAn maDya ityapekzAyAM saMkrAntikAlAdevetyataH pUrva BazwO paScAccAzwO GawikAH puRyA ityarTaH yattUktaM vfha spatinA varttamAne tulAmeze nAqyastUBayato daSa iti tulAmezasakrAntikAlAt prAkpaScAcca paYca paYca zwawyaH puRyA ityuktam yadapyuktam AdyantasApekzatvAn maDyaSabdasya gaRitAgatapuRyakAlaGawikAnAM maDye triBAgaH sTUladfSA daSaGawikAtmako BavatIti yAyAH sannihitA nAqya iti kaSyapokteH zaqaSItimuKe pyAdyAgrimaGawInAM puRyakAle taratamaBAvaH yattu zaqaSItyAM vyatItAyAM zazwi stulyAstu nAqikA iti vfdDavasizWavAkyaM tat prAgGa wIzu prativanDavaSAt SrAdDAderasamBave satyantimaGawIzu SrA dDAdikriyAByanujYAyAH paramAvaDikAleyattArTam idaM sarvaM dinasaMkrAntivizayaM veditavyam ahni saM kramaRe puRyamahaH kftsvaM prakIrttitam iti sAmAnyavAkyasya sOmyAyane vizRupade ityasya ca viSezavAkyasyEkavAkyatA ataeva rAtrO saMkramaRe BAnordinArdDaM snAnadAnayoH iti rAtriparaviSezasya sattvAcca evaM nirRIte puRyakAle snAnadAnAdyavaSyaM viDeyamiti Palito rTaH tatra snA nadAnAdyakurvataSca pratyavAyamAha vasizWaH iti saYcintya vinirRayamAdezwavyaM sadEva dEvajYEH vizuvatyasane grahaRe saMkrAntO puRyadivase pi pitftfptiM yo na kurute dattvA SApaM vrajati tasya pitA Agatagatasamaye pi ca karoti yaddAnajapahomAdyam UzaravApitavoja yadvat tadvacca nizPalaM BavatIti ayate ayanaGravfttyAKye hala saMkramaRe Agatasamaye nirRIte puRyakAlAtikramasamaye snAdi nizPalamityarTaH saMkrAntizu snAnadAnAdeH Pa lamAha BaradvAjaH zaqaSItyAM tu yaddAnaM vizuvadvitaye taTA dfSyate sAgarasyAntastasyAnto nEva dfSate vfdDa vasizWo pi ayane kowiH puRyAni sahasraM yizuve Pa lam zaqaSItyAM sahasrantu PalaM vizRupadezu ca ityala matiprasaNgena iti sUyasaNkrAntinirRayaH aTa nAyaM kevalaM sUryasaNkramaRa eva puRyakAlaH kintu candrAdInAM grahARAM nakzatrasaNkrame rASisaNkrame ca puRyakAlo Bavati so pi sopapattikaH prasaNgataH procyate asmABiH yadAha jEminiH nakzatrarASyo ravisaNkrame syurarvAk paratrApi ramendunAdyaH puRyAstaTendostriGarApalE rpuk SuBEkanAqI supuRyAH AdyantamaDye japadA nahomaM kurvannavApnoti surendraDAma asyArTaH sUryasya nakzatrasaMkrame rASisaMkrame ca prAkparataSca zoqaSa GawikAH puRyAH evaM candrasyEkaDawI trayodaSa palAni BOmasya catasro GawikA ekaM palam buDasya tisro GawikAScatu rdaSa palAni guroScatuScatvAriMSatGawikAH sapta palAni Sukasya catasro GawikAH palamekaM SanerdvyaSItiGawikAH sapta palAni coBayataH puRyakAla buDaSukrO tu raverAsannA veva kadAcidagrataH kadAcit pfzWatastasyAnucarAviva sadA vrajantO dfSyete tatastayorapi raviBagaRatulyA eva BagaRA ityupapannamiti BAskareRABihitatvAt paWya mAnAnugatistacCIGrayoH SIGraPalAnayAnArTaM vAsanAsidDa jIrREH kalpitA tadevaM grahagataya imAstriprakAreRa sA DitAH puRyakAlaGawikAH sUryyasya yaTA triMSat GawikA evaM candrasya dve Dawike zaqviMSatipralAni BOmasya nava GawikAScatvAriMtpalAni buDasya zawGawikAH viMSatipalAni gurorazwASItirGawikA evaM Sukrasya nava GawikA azwO palAni SaneH zazwyaDikaM SataM GawikAH pUrvAparakAlO Page a militvA puRyakAla ityarTaH atra vAsanA prAguktA etadardDA nAdDya prAkparataScapuRyA atra gaRitAgataGawI palezu liKitajEminivAkye ca kvacit kiYcitpalaBedo GawikABedaSca sagatispazwakftivaSataH yuktaM cEtat AkASe hi veDAdinA spazwA eva svagA dfSyante na maDyamAH dinadvayaspazwaKagAntarAlakAlaH sPuwastu sPuwaBuktibimbE riti spazwagatyEva bimbasaMkrAntiGawyAnayanamucitam uktaYca keSavArkeRa kujAdikAnAmapi bimbaliptAH zazwyAguRAH svasvajavena BaktAH nAqyAdikaH saMkramaRAntarAla kAlaH sPuwastu sPuwaBuktivimbEriti apiSabdAt sUryacandrama sorgrahaRaM taTA sati maDyamAgrekzayA spazwagatibimbayo rupacayApacayAmyAM sAmyEstattadGawikAnAmapyupacayApaca yasAmyAtikrameRApatati tezAM cAniyatatvAtpadye upaniba nDAyogAjjIrRErniyatamaDyagatyA sUryyAdInAM grahARAM puRyakAlaGawIrAnIyopanibanDaH kftaH atra matkftaM pa dyam nAqyo rAmaguRA raveraTa viDoH zawdoH palE ryugdvayaM BOmasyAbDipalEryutAnava vido yu ktAH palEH KASviBiH zaRRAdDyo zwagajA guroraTa Bfgo rnandA palErazwaBiH puRyAH syuH KanfpAH Sane ruBayato rASyfkzayoH saMkrame ato yo jEminivAkye sA rdDAScatasraH palasaptayuktA guroritipAWo mADavAdiBirapAWi taTA hemAdriRApi dvinAganAqyaH iti padE nAgA azwO dvirAvfttA nAgA dvinAgAH zoqaSanAqikAH SanEScarasaM krAntO puRyakAla iti yat vyAKyAtavAn taduBayamapA kfta Bavati taTA rAmacandrAcAryyA api kAlanirRayadIpi kAyAM hemAdryAdimUlakamamumarTaM svapadyenopAnibaDnAt ataScintyoktayojYeyAH tasmAtsarvagrahARAM rASinakza trayoH saMkrAntizu puRyakAlatApyAsta BAskaro pi rave stu tAH puRyatazAH itivadaMScandrAdisaMkrAntizu nAqyaH puRyA ityasUcayat atiSAyane tamavizWanAviti pARinivacanAt grahaH svasaMkrAntigomiSraPalaM viDatte iti sUryyAdisaMkrAntisADAraRaM tatra sakalasaMkrAntizu dinarAtrivizRupadAdiBedena sUryasaMkramavannirRayoDyeyaH etatsaMkrAntimAnyatA hi gurjaradeSe stotyalaM prasaktA nuprasaktena iti sakalagrahasaMkrAntinirRayaH pI DA karaRaBede rkasaMkrAntiPalaM tatrEva nAradaH nivizwo vaRije vizwyAM vAlave ca yave gare kOlave SakunO BAnuH kiMstutre corNgasaMsTitaH catuzpA Page b ttEtile nAge suptaH krAntiM karoti saH DAnyArDavfzwizu samaM SrezWaM hInaM BavetkramAt krAntiM saMkrAntima ratnamAlA yAmapi catuzpade tEtilanAgayoSca supto raviH saMkramaRaM karoti vizwyAM vavAKye ca garAhvaye ca sa bAlavAKye baRije nibizwaH kiMstuGnanAmni SakunAvapi kOlavAKye cordDvasTitasya Kalu saMkramaRaM raveH syAt DAnyArGavfzwizu Bavet kramaSastvanizwamaDyezwateti munayaH pravadanti pUrve iti saMkrAntO grahaRarkzaM vA janmanyuBayapArSvayoH nezwaM trayaM zawSuBadaM paryyAyAcca punaHpunaH hAnirvfdDiH sTAna hAnistaTA prAptiriti kramAt nAradenoktam saMkrAnteryannakzatraM grahaRanakzatraM vA yadi janmaBaM BavedaTa vA tAByAmuBayapArSvagataM janmaBaM BavettadA anizwameva nakzatratrayaM nizidDaM tatro suKamaTa nijaBe vAkapate saMkramarkzAt Page b saMkrAntipuRyakAlavyavasTA ti ta saMkzepato darSitA yaTA tadayaM saMkzepaH dinasaMkamaRe kftsnaM dinaM puRyaM zaqa SIti muKe ityAdyuktaM puRyataraM mandAmandAkinI tyAdi rUpeRa tricaturAdiGawikAH puRyatamAH dina vfttottarAyaRAdivihitaviMSatidaRqAdInAM rAtripravizwa BAgasyApi puRyatvaM rAtrisaMkramaRe tu kalAnyUna praTamA rdDagate saMkzepa saMkzepa saMkzepa pu sam kzipa GaY BUyasI rTasyAlpavAkyAdinA prakASane BarataH lyuw tatrArTe na sarvatra samaH sTAne Jaripare vA parasavarRaH paYcamavarRaH
saMkzoBa saMkzoBa saMkzoBa pu sam kzuBa GaY cAYcalye kzoBe ca vA Na
saMlApa saMlApa saMlApa pu sam lapa GaY parasparakaTane amaraH prItyA anyonyAktipratyuktiByAM BAzaRe rahasi kaTane ca
saMlagna saMlagna saMlagna tri sam laga kta milite
saMlaya saMlaya saMlaya pu saMlIyate indriyavyApAro tra sam lI ADAre ac nidrAyAM hemaca BAve ac pralaye ca
saMmarda saMmarda saMmarda pu sam mfda GaY anyonyadfQasaMyogarUpe saMkzarze vA maH

saMrAva saMrAva saMrAva pu mam ru DaY Sabde amaraH
saMrUQa saMrUQa saMrUQa tri sam ruha kta prOQe jAtANkure ca medi

saMsAracakra saMsAracakra saMsAracakra na saMsAraScakramiva punaHpunarjanmamaraRAtmake jIvasya vyApAraBede svasvakarmaRAM dehagrahaRAnantaraM tatropaBujyamAnakarmaRo nASe maraRaM tadanantaraM ca svakarmAnusAreRa devatiryagAdiBAvApattirityevaM satatagatAgatapracuratvAt saMsArasya cakratulyatvAt taTAtvam tadetat vizRupuM saMsAracakranirupaRe nirUpitaM tatra dfSyam
saMsAracakrana saMsAracakrana saMsAracakrana samArakramiva punapanarjanmaBarakzAtmke jIvasya vyApAraBede tUmakamaRA dehagrahaRAnantaraM tatra parBukosAnakarmaRo nASe maraRaM taQanantaraM ca svakarmAnusA Page a reRa devatiryyagAdiBAvApattirityevaM satatagatAgatapracura tvAt saMsArasya cakratulyatvAt taTAtvam tadetat vizRupu saMsAracakranirUpaRe nirUpitaM tatra dfSyam

saMsarga saMsarga saMsarga pu sam sfja GaY sambabDe viBAgAnantaraM yattava DanaM tanmaneti kftasamayena ekatrAbasTAnarUpe DanasambanDe ca pApizWasaMsargasya pApaBade kAlaBedena pAtityAdijana katvaM maDyapaWi tasya pUrveRa yAjanAdinA sambanDo na tu pareRa yAnA dinA yAjanADyApanAt na tu saMvatsareRa patati kintu yAnAdiBirityAhuH tadasaNgatam sumantuvacanaviro DAt yaTA patitAnaBiDAyAha sumantuH yaScEtEryOna mOKasrOvARAM sambanDAnAmanyatamena saha saMvatsaraM sa mparkamiyAt nasyApyetadeva prAyaScittaM vidaDyAt iyAt kuryyAt etadeva dvAdaSavArzikavratam ityarTaH atra yAjanA dInAmanyatamena saMvatsareRa patatItyavagamyate taTA hA rItaH saMvatsareRa patati patitena sahAcaran yAja nADyApanAd yOnAdekaSayyEkaBojanAt ekaBojaname kapAtre kAlaBedena BojanaM jalapAnaYca taTA vfhaspatiH zARmAsike tu saMyoge yAjanADyApanAdinA eka trASanaSayyABiH prAyaScittArdDamAcaret taTA vatsarasaM sarge yoniyukte viSezataH pUrvoktena viDAnena patita vratamAcaret anena yAjanAdinA zARmAsikasaMsarge prAyaScittArdDaM vadatA vatsareRa samUrRaprAyaScittamarTAdu ktam uttaravacane punaH sPawIkftam yoniyuktapadena yAja nAdInAmapyu pasaMgrahaH ekatrASanaSavyAdiriti pAWo nAkAraH rAjYA liKitatvAt catvAri vAkyAni sTuH ataH kftveti padena tantreRa vAjanAdikarmacatuzwamAdAya patatIti sambanDe voDite na vAkyamedaH saMvatsarapadena pfTagupadvItAnAmapi kfnteti padena tantreRopanayanAt darSapOrRamAsAByAM svargakAmI yajetetyAgneyAdiyAgazaw kAnAmiva ata ekavAkyAnuroDAdyAjanAdInAM tantreRa Page a samuccitopanItAnAM patatItyanena sambanDe boDite yAja nAdInAM samuccitAnAM sadyaH pAtahetutvaM pUrvoktasumantvA divacanAdekEkezAM saMvatsareREva atrEvasaMsargatraya catumi rmAsEH saMsargadvaye zwaBirmAsErBAgahAreRa pAtahetutvamUha nAyam tanna kftveti padasya yAjanAdikarmatve samuccayaboDakasya dvanyasamAsAderaBAvAt na vA tantratAyAM samuccayo niyataH gargABEjyantAM saptadaSa prAjApatyAn paSUnAlaBedityatra vyaBicArAt patatIti pAWasya rAjYA liKitatvAcca kaTaM patatIti padAvfttiH na ca sumantuvacane yAjanAdInAmanyatamena vatsareRa pA tAvagamAdarTAnmilitEH sadyaH pAta iti kalpanIyaM nira pekzaSrutiviroDAt vakzyamARaprakAreRa vacanadvayasAmaYjasya samBavAt ucyate vatsarA rdDeneti vyavasTA taTA hi yAjanaM yonisambanDamityatra devalavacane patitena sahozitvA pUrvavacane jAnanniti pawasambanDAjjYAnakftatvaM darSitam gurutvaM ca devalavacane nEva yAjanADyApanayorupasaMhArAddarSitam yaTA devalaH AcAryyAdvrataniyamaSuSrUzAdiBistrayIvidyopAdAnasaDya yanaMtasya cAcArAnvayaH prakramasAmarTyaBaktiSIlaSuSrUzopa natAya Sizyaya pradAnasaDyApanam pApavyaktirutpadyate na BinnA kalpanAgOravApatteH puruzAparADasya ca saMsargalakzaRasya nimittakAraRasya tadvi SizwAtmanaHsaMyogasyAsamavAyikAraRasyEkatvAt prAya Scittantu gurusaMsargasyEva karaRIyaM pAtakya ntarasaMsarge pApasutpadyate eva AvfttavahmaDavadDetoSca sama tvAt atyaTA pAtakinaScARqAlAnnaBakzaRe pyadozaH syAt taTA pratikzaRaM pUrvapUrvotpannapApavyaktisahakftI saMstryAya saMstryAya saMstryAya pu sam stryE GaY saMcAte niviqasaMyoga rUpe sanniveSe amaraH vistftO saMsTAne ca medi karaRe DaY gfhe hemaca
saMstyAya saMstyAya saMstyAya puM sam styE GaY saMcAte niviqasaMyogarUpe sanniveSe amaraH vistftO saMsTAne ca medi karaRe GaY gfhe hemaca
saMvAha saMvAha saMvAha pu saMvAhayati sam vaha ac aNgasaMmardake BftTe jawA Rvul saMvAhaka tatrEva
saMvAhana saMvAhana saMvAhana na sam vaha Ric lyuw BArAdevAMhane aNga saMmardane ca medi
saMvAra saMvAra saMvAra pu sama vaY SikzAgraTokte varRoSvAraRArTe galanilasaMkoDAtmaka bAhyapayatnamede saNgopane ca
saMvAsa saMvAsa saMvAsa pu saMvasatyatra sam vasa GaY gfhe Sabdaca puravAsinAM purAdvahirvAmayogye anAvfte stAne jawA
saMvIkzaRa saMvIkzaRa saMvIkzaRa na samyagvIkzyate anvizyate vA sam vi Ikza BAve lyuw samyagdarSane izwavastuIlABAya agvezaRe ca
saMvIta saMvIta saMvIta tri sam vyeY kta Avfte rudDe ca amaraH sam vi iRa kta saNgate
saMvadana saMvadana saMvadana na sam vada lyuw Alocane vaSIkaraRe ca medi sam van lyuw saMvananamapyatra rAmASramaH
saMvaha saMvaha saMvaha pu mamyak vahati sama vaha ac saptavAyumaDya varttini vAyumade AvahaSabde pf dfSyam
saMvalita saMvalita saMvalita tri saMsa vaca kta milite
saMvara saMvara saMvara na sam vF karaRe ap jale karttari ac dEtyaBede matsyaBede mfgaBede ca puMstrI
saMvardDaka saMvardDaka saMvardDaka tri sam vfDa Ric Rvul sammAnanAkAriRi hemaca vfdDikArake ca
saMvartta saMvartta saMvartta pu samyak varttyate parAvarttyate tra sam vfta Ric ADAre ac pralayakAle amaraH smftikArakamuniBede karzaPalavfkze medi meDe Sabdaca meGanAyakaBede ca triyute SAkavarze tu caturBiH Sezite kramAt AvarttaM vidDi saMvarttaM puzkaraM drARamambudam Avartto nirjalo meGaH saMvarttaSca bahUdakaH puzkaro duzkarajalo droRaH SamyapapUrakaH jyA ta
saMvarttaka saMvarttaka saMvarttaka na sam vfta Ric Rvul baladevalANgale bAqavAnale pu hemaca tataH astvarTe ac bala deve Sabdara
saMvarttakin saMvarttakin saMvarttakin pu saMvarttakaM lANgalaBedo styasya ini bularAme trikA
saMvarttikA saMvarttikA saMvarttikA strI samyakavarttikA mam vfta Rvul wApi ata ittvaM vA dIpAdeH SiKAyAM padmAdeH kesarasamIpasTe dale amaraH navapattre maDusUdanaH
saMvasaGa saMvasaGa saMvasaGa pu sIvasatyammit mam vasa AGAre aTac grAme janamamUhanivAsasTAne amaraH
saMvat saMvat saMvat avya sam vaya kvip yalope tuk vikramAdityarAjyAvaDike tatpravarttitavatsare
saMvatsara saMvatsara saMvatsara pu saMvasanti ftavo tra sam vasa saran vatsare jyAtizokte idAdipaYcaka ntargate vatsaraBede ca idAvatsa raSabde pf dfSyam
saMveSa saMveSa saMveSa pu samyak viSatyatra sam viSa ADAre GaY ni drAyAm amaraH saMpUrvakasya tasya nidrArTakatvAttaTAtvam yaTA saMvizwaH kuSaSayane niSAM ninAyeti raDuH pIWe hemaca strIratibanDaBede medi
saMveSana saMveSana saMveSana na sam viSa Ric lyuw ratikriyAyAM hemaca taduttaraM hi nidrADikyena tasyA nidrAhetutvAttazAtvam
saMveda saMveda saMveda pu sam vida GaY jYAne amaraH svArTe Ricyuc saMvedanApyatra strI
saMvega saMvega saMvega pu sam vija GaY BayAdinA tvarAyAm amaraH samyag vege ca
saMvfta saMvfta saMvfta tri sam vf kta Avfte kftagopane saMvAharUpe varRoccAraRAByantayatne ca
saMviDAna saMviDAna saMviDAna na sam vi DA lyuw upAye Ayojane racanAyAYca
saMvid saMvid saMvid strI sam vida sampa kvip jYAne pratipattO medi samBAzAyAM budDO kriyAkaraRe yudDe a NgIkAre ca amaraH nAmani AcAro saNkate toze samADO ca Sabdaca
saMvidA saMvidA saMvidA strI saMvidyate nayA sam vida kvip wAp BuNga raM sidDi saMvidAsavayormaDye saMvidEva garIyaBI tantram
saMvidita saMvidita saMvidita tri sam vida kta aNgIkfte samyagjYAta ca
saMvidvyatikrama saMvidvyatikrama saMvidvyatikrama pu saMvidA NgIkArasya vyatikramA yatra kftANgIkArasyollaNGanahetuke vivAdaBede vIrami tannirUpaRaM yaTA tasya svarUpa vyatirekasKena darSayati nAradaH pAzaRqanEgamAdInAM sTitiH samaya ucyate samayasyA napAkama tadvivAdapadaM smftamiti pAzaRqAH vEdika mArgadveziRaH kzapaRakAdayaH nEgamAH sArTikA vaRija iti madanaratne nEgamAH zedaprAmARyAByu pagantAraH pASupatAdaya iti mitAkzarAyAm AdiSabdena vidvad brahmaRasamUhAdInAM grahaRam samayasyAnapAkarma vya tikramaH saMmayAparipAlanamiti yAvat tadvyatikramya mARaM vivAdapadamBavatItyarTaH tadrUpayogyArTamAha vfhasyatiH vedavidyAvidA viprAH tezAM vftti prakalpayet iti yAjYavalkyo pi rAjA kftvA pure sTAnaM brahmaRyaM nyasya tatra tu trEvidyaM vfttimad brU yAt svaGarmaH pAlyatAmiti brahmaRAnAM samUho brahma Ryam brAhmaRamAnavavAqavAdyaditi pA sUtreRa yat vidyA vedA tisfRAM vidyAnAM samAhArastrividyam trividyamaDIte iti tezAM vfttiM prakalyayedityasyA rTo vfhaspatinEva vivftaH anAcCedyakarAsteByaH prada dyAd gfhaBUmikAH yuktaBAvyaSca nfpatirleKayitvA svASAsanam iti anAcCedyakarAH agrAhya karAH etaduktamBavati AgAminfpatiBiragrAhya Page a karAH teByo sisfzwakarASca gfhaBUmikAH pradadyAditi evaM niyuktEryatkartavyaM tadAha yAjYavalkyaH nijaDarmA viroDena yastu sAmayiko Bavet so pi yatnena sarakzyo Darmo rAjakftaSca yaH iti nijaDarmAviroDena SrO tasmArttakarmAviroDena sAmayikaH samayAnnizpanno yo Darmo gopracArodakarakzaRadevagfhapAlanAdirUpaH so pi yatnena rakzaRIyaH yaSca rAjYA kfto nijaDarmAviroDenEva yaH sAmayiko Darmo yAvatpaTikamBojanandeyamasmadarAtima Rqale turagAdayo na prasTApanIyA ityevaMrUpaH so pi yatnena rakzaRIya ityarTaH vfhaspatirapi nityaM nEmi ttikaM kAmyaM SAntikampOzwikantaTA pOrARAM karma ku ryyuste sandigDe nirRarya taTeti pOrARAM puravAsi nAmityarTaH evaM rAjaniyuktasamudAyaviSezasya kAryya viSeza uktaH sarvasamudAyAtAYca kAryyamAha sa eva grAsaSreRigaRAnAYca saNketaH samayakriyA bADAkAle tu sA kArTyA DarmakAryye taTEva ca cAwacoraBaye vADAH sarvasADAraRAH smftAH tatropaSamanaM kAryyaM sarveScEkena kenaciditi gaRAnAYcetyatra caSabdaH pAzaRqanEga mAdInAM samuccayArTaH tataSaca gaRapAzaRqanEgamAdInAM lamayakaraRamantareRa yadyupadravo duHpariharaH DarmakAryyaM ca duHsADyantadA pAriBAzikI samayakriyA sarvormalitEH kAryyA cAwovfkaH cAwacorAdiByo Baye prApte tadupaSamanaM sarvEH kArvyamityarTaH DarmakAryyamapi samBUya kAryyamityuktaM tenEva maBAprapAdevagfhatawAkArAmasaM skatiH taTA nATadaridrARAM saMskAro yajanakrivA kulAyananiroDaSna kAryyamasmABiraMSataH yatrEtalliKitaM patre DarmyA sA samayakriyA pAlanIyAH samastEstEryaH samarTo visaMvadet sarvasvaharaRaM daRqastasya nirvAsanaM yurAditi samA maRqapaH prapA pAnIyaSAlikA ArAsaH upavanama saMskatiH jIrRodDAraH saMskAra upanayanAdikaH predadahamAdikaSca yajanakriyA soma yAgAdikarttfByo dAnama kulAyananiroDaH kulAyanasya durBikzAdyapagamaparyantasya DAraRam kulyAyanaviroDaSceti kalpatarO pAWaH kulyAyananiroDaH kulyAyAH pravarttana mapratisanDaSca evaM kftA samuyakriyA na kevalaM sayudAyi Bireva pAlanIyA api tu rAjYApi ityAha nAradaH pAzaRqanEganaSreRipUgavrAtagaRAdizu saMrakzet samayaM rAjA zwurgaM janapade taTeti pAzaRqA vedoktaliNga Page b DAraRavyatiriktAH sarve liNgimaH tezu vihita BikzAcaraRAdyAH santi nEgamAH sArTikA vaRik praBftayaH tezu sakaYcukasandeSaharapuruzatiraskAriRo daRqyA ityevamAdayobahavaH samayA vidyante aTa vA nEgamAH AptapraRetftvena ye vedaprAmARyamicCAnta pASu patAdayaH SreRayaH ekaSilpopajIvinaH tAsvidaBanayEva SreRyA vikreyamityevamAdikAH samayA varIvarttante pUgA hastyaSvArohAdayaH vrAtagaRaSabdayArarTamAha kAtyAyanaH nAnAyuDaDarA vrAtAH samavetAstu kI rttitAH kulAnAM hi samUhastu gaRaH samparikIrttitaH iti pUge vrAte vAstramutsfjya samare na gantavyamitye vamAdayaH samayA varttante gaRe tu paYcame dine paYcame varze vA karRaveDaH karttavya ityevamAdi samayaH samasti gaRAdItyatrAdiSabdena brahmapurInivizwasya mahAjanAdeH parigrahaH tatra gurudakziRAdyarTamAgatA mAnanIya i tyAdiH samayo sti durge tu DAnyAdikaM gfhItvA anyatra na tadvikreyamityAdirasti samayaH janapade tu kvaci dvikretfsakASAcCulkagrahaRamityAdyanekaviDaH samayo varovarttate tadevaM samayajAtaM yaTA na BraSyati taTA rAjA kuryyAdityarTaH samUhAdipuruzavizaye viSezamAha vfhaspatiH koSena leKyakriyayA maDyasTErvA parasparam viSvAsaM kftvA yaH kuryyuH kAryyARi samanantaram iti koSena devatAsnAnodakapAnena leKyakriyayA samayapa treRa maDyasTEH pratiBUBiH kAryyARi samUhatAryyARi etadaktaM Bavati samudAyiBiH parasparaM samayAtikra mABAvAya koSAdiBirviSvAsamutpAdya sAmayikakAryyARi karttavyAnIti kAtyAyano pi samUhAnAM tu yo Darma stena DarmeRa te sadA prakuryuH sarvakarmARi svaDarmezu vyavasTitAH iti sAmayikaDarmanijaDarmAnatikrameRa sa rAjaSAsanam tasyEvAcaraRaM pUrvaM sarttavyantu nfpAjYayeti Darmasya SrOtasmArttAdi Page a Darmasya nirjitaM kftamityarTaH rAjYA pravarttitAn DarmAn yo naro nAnupAlayet garhyaH sa pApo daRqyaSca lopa yan rAjaSAsanam iti vicitrabudDiBiH samudA yiBiranekErEkamatyena kAryyakaraRAsamBavAt dvitrAH paYca vA kAryyacintakAH karttavyA ityAha vfhaspatiH dvO trayaH paYca vA kAryyAH samUhAhatavAdinaH dakzA dAntAH kulodBavAH sarvakAryyapravIRASca karttavyAYca mahAttamAH iti SAlInAH aDfzwAH kAryyacintakAH sa mudAyakAryyasADakavicArakAH kAryyAcintakAnAmapi samUhahitavAdinAM vacanaM sarvEH samUhiBiH kAryyAmi tyAha yAjYavalkyaH karttavyaM vacanaM sarvEH samUhahita vAdinAm iti samUhapratikUlasya praTamasAhasaM daRqa ityAha sa eva yastatra viparItaH syAt sa dApyaH praTamaM damam iti praTamaM pUrvasAhasam kAtyAyano pi yuktiyuktaM vaco hanyAd vakturyo navakASataH ayuktaYcava yo vrUyAt sa dApyaH pUrvasAhasam iti vfhaspatirapi yastu sADAraRaM hiMsyAt kzipettrEvidyameva vA sanDikriyAM vihanTAcca sa nirvAsyastataH purAt iti sADAraRam samudAyagrAhyaM daRqAdi dravyam hiMsyAt daRqyAdeH sAhAyyakaraRAnnASayet kzipet vA tirazkuryyAdityarTaH samUhinAmapyaDarmeRa dvezAdinA kAryyakaraRe daRqamAha sa eva bADAM kuryurya ekasya samBUtA dvezasaMyutAH rAjYA tu vinivAryAste SAsyA ScEvAnuvanDataH iti anubanDataH nigrahatAratamyAnu sAreRa muKyAnAmnaparAkzaviSeze daRqaviSezamAha yAjYa valkyaH gaRadravyaM haredyasvu sa vidaM laNGavecca yaH sarvasvaharaRaM kftvA taM rAzwrAdvipravAsayet iti muKya daRqane samUhasyEvADikAraH ataeva kAtyAdDanaH sAha sI BedakArI ca gaRadravyavinASakaH ucCedyAH nAmaBiDAnAcca vAgdaRqaH pApizWo sItyAdi BAza Ram DigdaRqoDiktvAmiti BAzaRam parityAgo sa dvyavahAryyatva karaRaM nirvAsanaM vA uBayatrApi loke parityAgaSabdaprayogadarSanAt etaccArTadaRqAderupalakza vfhaspatirapi tatra BedamupekzAM vA yaH kaScit kurute naraH catuHGavarRaM zaRizkAMstaKa daRqo viDI yate iti muvarRacatuzwayazaRRizkayoH SaktyAditArata nyAnunAreRa guRavadaguRavadvizayatvena vA prAtaHprarDu zitamikzAdanAdiH upasyana biDiH zamUhakArTArTaM mfdaNgAdiDvanimAkarRyaM maRqa Page a pAdO mesanam pratTupAdAnaYjIvanAya tApasavezapari grahaH ezAM pAzaRqinAmityarTaH anyadapi rAjakftya mAha sa eva pratikUlaru yadrAjYaH prakftyA ca mataYca yat bADakaYca yadarTAnAM tattembo pi nivarttayet iti yadrAjYaH pratikUlam yaTA yasya rAjYarstu kurute SUdroDarma vivecagam tasya prakzuByate rAdraM balaM koSaSca naSyati iti evaYca sArTikAdiSUdravivAde GarmavivecanaM ca yadrAjYa ityasyodAharaRammantavyam prakftyA svaBA vata eva matam avajYAtArTaM pAzaRqAdizu tAmbU laBakzaRAdikam yaccArTAnAM vADakanDananASakacOrAdi saMbADAdikaM tatteByo pi nivarttayet yaTA te na kurvanti taTA kurvyAdityarTaH anyadapi nivarttyamAha sa eva dozaMvatkaraRaM yatsyAdanABrAyaprakalpitam pravfttamapi tadrAjA SreyaskAmo nivarttayet lomAdidozavatkaraRa SrutismftivirudDaM viDavAdO veSyAtvAdikaM pAzaRqA diBiH prakalpitam tadbahukAlapravfttamapi rAjYA niva rttanIyamityarTaH trEvidyAnAM pratipAditaM DarmaM SreRyA dizvatidiSati yAjYavalkyaH SroRinEgamapAzaRqigaRA nImapyayaM viDiH BedaYcEzAM nfporakzet pUrvavfttiM ca pAlayet iti samUhakAryArTamAgatAya yadrAjYA samUha pUjArTaM dattantadyadi samUhAyAsO na dadAti tadA ta ddattaM ekAdaSaguRaM dApya ityAha sa eva samUhakAryya AyAtAn kftakAryAn visarjayet sadAnamAnasatkArEH pUjayitvA mahIpatiH samUhakAryyaM prahitA yallaBeta tadarpayet ekAdaSaguRaM dApyo yadyasO nArpayet svayam iti yallaBeta samUhasamBAnanArTamiti SezaH yato rA jadattaM sarvasADArARamato yaTAMSato viBAgaM kftvA grAhyaM nisvAdiByo vA dAtavyamityAha vfhaspatiH tato laByeta yatkiYcit sarvezAmeva tatsamam zaRmAsikaM mAsikaM vA viBaktavyaM yaTAMSataH deyaM vA niHspavfdDAnGastrIyAlA turarogizu sAntAnikAdizu taTA Darma eva satAtanaH iti ekasya puruzasya zaRmAsanirvAhAya paryyAptaM kuwu mbasya vEkasya zaRmAsanirvAhAya paryyAptaM labDaM vA yaTAM SataH svasvAMSAnurUpeRa viBajanIyannisvAdiByo vA deya miti tAtparyArTaH rAjaprasAdalabDavadfRamapi sarvezAM sama mitpAha sa eva yattEH prAptaM rapitaM vA gaRArTaM vA vA fRaM kftam rAjaprasAdalabDaYca sarvezAmeva tatsamam iti ayamarTaH tEH samUhakAryyArTaM prahitEryatsImA Page b vivAdAvaDiM kzetrArAmAdikaM saMvigna saMvigna saMvigna tri sam vija kta udvigne izwavastulABAya tadaprAptyA BayAdinA vA jAtOtkaRWe

saMvyAna saMvyAna saMvyAna na saMvIyate sam vyeY karmaRi lyuw utta rIyavastre amaraH vastramAtre medi

saMyata saMyata saMyata tri sam yama kta badDe amaraH kftaSAstroktani yame ca
saMyatvara saMyatvara saMyatvara pu sam yama kvarap tukca jantusamUhe vAgyate tri saMkziptasA
saMyoga saMyoga saMyoga pu sam yuja GaY melane kriyAjanye dravyASrite guRaBede sambanDamAtre ca aprAptayostu yA prAptiH sEva saMyoga IritaH kIrttitastriviDaKyeza Adyo myatara karmajaH taToBayoH karmajanyo Bavet saMyogajo paraH AdimaH SyenaSElAdisaMyogaH parikIrttitaH mezayoH sannipAtoyaH sa dvitIya udAhftaH kapAlatarusaMyogAt saMyogastarukumBayoH tftIyaH syAt karmajo pi dviDEva parikIrttitaH aBiGAto godanaSca SabdaheturihAdimaH SabdAheturdvitIyaH syAt BAzA udayAt prAk daSa myAstu SezaH saMyoga ucyate uparizwAt praveSastu tasmAt tat parivarjayet ti ta ukte udayAt prAkdaSamyAH Seze ca
saMyogapfTaktva saMyogapfTaktva saMyogapfTaktva na saMyogena PalasambanDaBedena pfTaktvaM nAnArUpatvaM yatra ekasyEva karmaRo nityAnityatvapratipA dake mImAsakokte nyAyaBede sa ca ta ttvabo darSito yaTA Page a agnIzomIyapaSO SrUyate KAdire paSuM vaGnAti KA diraM vIryyakAmasya yUpaM kurvIta atra paSubanDanAya yUpovihataH sa ca nityatvenAvaSyakaH yAgasADanatvAt paSu kAmanAvataSca anyoyUpovihitaH sa ca kAmanADIna tvAnnAvaSyakaH atra saMsayaH kiM kAmya eva KAdiro nitye pi syAt uta ekaH KAdiraH kratupuruzoBayArTaH uta kAmya eva KAdiro nityastvanyakAzWanirmita iti tatra kAmyanityaprayogANgatA na samBavati kAmanADInatvena tasyAnAvaSyakatvAt nityaScAvaSyakaH nahyekasyAvaSyakatva manAvaSyakatvaYca samBavati viroDAt tasmAt kAmya eva KAdiraH nityaScAnyakAzWanirmitaH taduktaM SAstradIpi kAyAm etadaDikaraRIyodAharaRAntare daGnA juhoti daDnendriyakAmasyetyaDikftya pUrvADikaraRanyAyAt kAmyatvena SrutaM daDi anityArTasupAdeyamato nyannityamizyatAm anyaddravyAntaraM pUrvADikaraRanyAyAt prAguktApa praRaya nanyAyAt mADavAcAryyo pi nitye gnihotre pUrvADi karaRanyAyena daDi na prayoktavyaM kintu anyadeva kiYcit dravyam ityAha nanu nitye pi KAdira eva SrUyate Rato nitya ekaH svAdiraH kAmyaScAnyaH svAdira iti yUpadvayaM viDoyate anyaTA nitye KAdiratvaHBiDAnaM vyarTaM syAt taTA ca kva viroDaH yenEkasyoBayArTatve viroDamA SaNkya samAhitamiti cenna svAdireRa vIryyaM kuryyAdityarTa KAdirasya nityatvakAmyatvo BayarUpatve saMyogasya paSusambanDasya pfTakatvaM parasparanirape kzeRa pfTagaBiDAnaM niyAmakamiti SezaH ayamBAvaH yadi dvayorekasya vAkANkzA tadA dvayorekavAkyatA iha tu uBayameva nirAkANkzaM taTA hi nityavAkyaM yUpasya paSubanDanasamyanDe alOkikaM kimapi nApekzate paSubanDana dfzwaPasatvAt ccAmbarvAkyAmanupanyasyABiDAnAcca kAmyavA kyamapi ASrayasambanDakaraM kimapi pramARaM nApekzate sanniDAnAdevASrayalABe hi taTA syAt pfTakpfTak saMyogasya nirapekzeRa vAkyadvayenABiDAnAt kAsanAsattve ca KAdiraM dfzwaPaladvArA kratorupakarivyati puruzasya vI ryyamapyAvakzyati kistvayaM viSezaH kAmanAsattve tatsa hakAreRa puruzArTastadaBAvena ca katparTa iti taduktam Page b dvayorekasya vAkANkzA Baved yadi tayostataH prakalpyetE kavAkyatvaM nirAkANkzantvihoBayamiti tasmAduBayArTA KAdirateti nanu nitya eva KAdiro stu KAdiramityA dinA Ngasya praSaMsArTaM PalaSrutyarTavAdo stu yaTA yasya parRamayI juhUrBavati na sa pApaSlokaM SfRoti ityatreti saMyogavirudDa saMyogavirudDa saMyogavirudDa na saMyogena virudDam dravyAntarasaMyogena virudDaguRASraye dravyaBede tacca rAjavallaBena darSitaM yaTA SAkAmlapalapiRyAkakulatTalavaRAmizEH karIrada DimAzESca prAyaH kzIraM viruDyate prARahArI tu hArIto haridrAlavaREH SftaH rurostElAnalErBfzwaM vizaM mAyUramAmizam varAhavasayA BfzwA balAkA tu haratyasUn saMyuktA sEva vAruRyA kulmAzESca viru Dyate aviM kfsumBaSAkena matsyatElEH kaRAM tyajet mAMsErikzuvikArAMSca kAYjikEstilaSaskulIm kapotaH sArzape Bfzwo GftaM kAMsye daSAhikam vizaM GftasamaM kzOdraM maDunA gaganAmbu ca mUlakaM mAzasUpena maDunA ca na Bakzayet ekatra sarvamAMsAni viruDyante prasparam rAtryanDavIsarpadakodarARAM visPowikonmAdaBagandarA RAm mUrcCAmadADmAnagalagrahARAM pARqvAmayasyA mavi zasya cEva kilAsakuzWagrahaRIgadAnAM SoTAtisArajvara pInasAnAm santAnadozasya taTEva mftyorvirudDamannaM pravadanti hetum virudDAhArajAn rogAt vigihanti virecanam vaBanaM SamanaM vApi pUrvaM vA hitasevanam
saMyojana saMyojana saMyojana na sam yuja Ric ADArAdO lyuw mETune hArA samyagyojane ca
saMyojita saMyojita saMyojita tri sam yuja Ric kta kftamelane padArTAntareRa kftayojane padArTe
saMyuga saMyuga saMyuga na saMyujyate tra sam yuja ka nyaNkvA jasya gaH yudDe amaraH tatra sADu KaY sAMyugIna raResADO
saMyuj saMyuj saMyuj tri samyak yunakti sam yaja kvin guRAQye trikA saMyukte ca

saMyuta saMyuta saMyuta tri sam yu kta saMyukte
saNGAtapatrikA saNGAtapatrikA saNGAtapatrikA strI saNGAtayuktaM patramasyAH kap ata ittvam SatapuzpAyAM rAjani

saNGaSas saNGaSas saNGaSas avya saNGa vIpsArTe Sas BUriSaH ityarTe
saNgrAhin saNgrAhin saNgrAhin pu samyak gfhRAti malam sam graha Rivi kuwajavfkze rAjani malAvazwamBake saMgrahakArake ca tri
saNgrAma saNgrAma saNgrAma puM saNgrama yudDe ada cu uBa saka sew saNgrAmayati se asasaNgrAmat ta asyAPalavatkarttaryyapi A ityeke saNgrAma pu saNgrAma BAve ac yudDe amaraH saNgrAma yudDe ada cu uBa saka sew saNgrAmayati se asasaNgrAmat ta asyAPalavatkarttaryyapi A ityeke saNgrAma pu saNgrAma BAve ac yudDe amaraH
saNgrahin saNgrahin saNgrahin puM samyak gfhRAti malam sam graha Rina kuwajavfkze rAjani malAvazwamBake saNgrahakArake ca tri
saNkrAnti saNkrAnti saNkrAnti strI sam krama BAve ktin saNkramaRaSabdArTe saNkrAntipadArTaravisaNkrAntinAmaBedaPalaBedAdi su ci pI DA nirUpitaM yaTA GorA rkasaNkramaRasugraravO hi SUdrAn DvANkzI viSo laGuviDO ca cararkzaBOme cOrAn mahodarayutA nfpatIn jYamEtre mandAkinI sTiragurO suKayecca mandA viprAMSca miSramaBfgo tu paSUMSca miSrA tIkzRArkaje ntyajasuKA Kalu rAkzasI ca tryaMSe dinasya nfpatIn praTame nihanti maDye dvijAnapi viSo parake ca SUdrAn aste niSApraharakezu piSAcakAdonnaktaYcarAnapi nawAn paSupAlakAMSca sUryyodaye sakalaliNgijanaYca sOmyayAmyAyanaM makarakarkawayorniruktam zaqaSItyAnanaYcApanfyuktanyAJaze Bavet tulAjO vizuvaM vizRupadaM siMhAligo Gawe saNkrAntikAlAduBayatra nAqikAH puRyA matAH zoqaSazoqaSozRagoH niSITato rvAgaparatra saNkrame pUrvaparAhAntimapUrvaBAgakO pUrRe niSITe yadi saNkramaH syAddinadvayaM puRyamaTodayAstAt pUrvaM parastAd yadi yAmyasOmyAyane dine pUrvapare tu puRye sanDyA trinAqIpramitArkabimbAdardDoditAstAdaDaUrDvamatra caduyAmyasAmye ayane kramAtsfH puRyO tadAnIM parapUrvaGasrO yAmyAyane vizRupade cAdyA maDyAstulAjayoH zaqaSItyAnane sOmye parA nAqyo tipuRyadAH su ci tatra grahARAM prAgrASito pararASO saNkramaRaM saNkrAntiriti saNkrAntilakzaRaM sA ca dviviDA maDyamA spazwA ca zawkarmasaMskfto maDyamagraho rASyantaraM yadA saNkrAmati sA maDyamasaNkrAntirucyate yadA tu spazwIkftasaMskAraviSizwo graho rASyantaraM gacCet sA spazwasaNkrAntirucyate tatra maDyamamAnasya spazwIkaraRArTatvAdeva tajjanitasaMskArAnupayogAdatra tattyAgena spazwasaNkrAntireva gfhyate sApi dviviDA sAyanAMSA nirayanAMSA ceti tatra yadA sidDAntagaRanAgatAyanAMSasaMskftA grahArASyantaragamanamurarIkurvate sA sAyanAMSasaNkrAntirucyate yadA tvayanAMSasaMskArarahitA grahArASyantaragAstadA nirayanAMSA saNkrAntirucyate tatrAnyAsAM candrAdisaNkrAntInAntu devadvyaNkarttavo zwAzwO nAqyo NkAH KanfpAH kramAt varjyAM saNkramaRe rkAMdeH prAyo rkasyAtininditA iti varjya GawItvameva vivAhaprakaraRe vakzyati na tu PalakaTane AsAM saNkrAntInAM kaScidupayogaH sUryyasaNkrAntInAnta nakzatravArasamayaBedena vAgAdikaraRaBedena ca SuBASuBaPalakaTanayogyatA puRyakAlatA saNkrAntiviSeze varjyaGawInyUnADikaBAvaScAstItyato bahuvaktavyatvAt svatantrameva sUryyasaNkrAntiprakaraRamAripsurnakzatravAraBedena PalaM tAvat sArdDavasantatilakayAha Goreti arkasya sUryyasya saNkramaRaM nirayanAMSA saNkrAntirugraravAvugrasaMjYakanakzatre ravivAre rkavAre vA syAt tadA GorAnAmnI sA SUdrAn suKayet suKina utpAdayet atrArkasaNkramaRamiti padopAdAnasAmarTyAt sUryyasaNkrAntizvevAyaM vicAro nAKilagrahasaNkrAntizviti Palito rTaH aTa laGunakzatre viDO candravAre vA sUryyasaNkrAntirDvANkzInAmnI viSo vESyAn suKayet cararkze caranakzatre BOme maNgalavAre vA saNkrAntirmahodarayutA mahodarInAmnI corAn suKayet jYamEtre buDe mEtrasaMjYakanakzatre vA saNkrAntirmandAkinI nAmnI nfpatIn rAjYaH suKayet sTiranakzatre guruvAre vA saNkrAntirmandAnAmnI viprAn suKayet miSranakzatre BfguvAre vA saNkrAntirmiSranAmnI paSUn suKayet tIkzRanakzatre arkaje SanivAre vA saNkrAntiH Kalu niScayena rAkzasI nAmno antyajAMScARqAlAn suKayatotyantyasuKA syAdityarTaH yadAha kaSyapaH GorADvANkzImahodaryo mandA mandAkinI taTA viSrArAkzasikA sUryyakrAntizvarkavAsarAt vaSizWaH zorograrkze laGume carame mahodarI mfduBe mandAkinI cararkze mandA miSrA miSre ca rAkzaso tIkzRe atra CandoBaNgastvArzaH devIpurARe mandA Druvezu vijYeyA mfdO mandAkinI taTA kzipre DvANkzIM vijAnIyA dugre GorA prakIrttitA care mahodarI jYeyA krUrErugrEstu rAkzasI miSritA cEva vijYeyA miSrafkzEstu saNkrame iti ratnamAlAyAm ugrakzipracare mitraDruvamiSrAKyAdAruREH fkzEH saNkrAntirarkasya GorAdyA kramaSo Bavet nAradakaSyapO SUdrataskaravESye kzmAdevamUpagavAM kramAt anuktAnAYca sarvezAM GorAdyAH suKadAH smftAH kzmAdevAH brAhmaRAH anuktAnAM cARqAlAdInAm nanUktaM vakzyamARaM vA SuBASuBaPalaM sAyanAMSasaNkrAntitaH kuto na vicAryate iti cet ucyate sAyanAMSasaNkrAnteH snAnadAnajapAdAveva kAryaM na sarvatra yadAha pulastyaH snAnadAnajapaSrAdDavratahomAdikarmasu sukftaM calasaNkrAntAvakzayaM puruzo Srute iti calasaNkrAntiH sAyanAMSasaNkrAntiH ataScalasaNkrAnteH parigaRitasnAnAdikavizayatvAdeva kftyAntarezu vivAhAdiSuBakarmasu saNkrAntimAsANgIkAre SuBASuBaPalakaTanaYca nAsyA upayoga iti yuktamutpaSyAmaH idaM cAgre samyaktatayA nirRezyate aTa dinarAtriviBAgena saNkrAntyaSuBaPalamuttarAyaRadakziRAyanasaMjYAYca sArdDavasantatilakayAha tryaMSe iti atrArkasaNkramaRamityanuvarttate dinapramARaM triBirBaktaM GawyAtmakastftIyAMSo Bavatu tatra dinasya praTama tryaSe rkasaNkramaRaM nfpatIn hanti maDye dvitIyatryaMSe dvijAn brahmaRAn hanti aparake tftIyatryaMSe vESyAn ityevaM sarvatra vyAKyeyam ante sUryyAstasamaye rkasaNkramaRaM SUdrAn aTa rAtrisaNkrAntiPalaM tatra rAtripraTamaprahare piSAcakAdIn AdiSabdena BUtAdIn dvitIyaprahare naktaYcarAn rAkzasAn tftIyaprahare nawAn narttakAn caturTaprahare paSupAlakAn ABIrAn sUryyodayasamayakAle rkasaNkramaRaM sakalaliNgijanaM pAzaRqAdikaM hantItyarTaH pAzaRqAH sarvaliNgina ityaBiDAnAt yazwAhaturnAradakaSyapO pUrvAhRe nfpatIn hanti viprAn maDyadine viSaH aparAhRe stane SUdraHn pradoze ca piSAcakAn niSi rAtriYcarAnnAWyakArAnapararAtrake gocAriRaSca sanDyAyAM liNginaM ravisaNkramaH iti nasaNkrAnteH krUrasOmyavAraparatvena PalaviSezamAha vasizWA raviravijasOmavArE saNkrAntO dinakarasya tanmAse pittakaPAnilajAmayamarapatikalahastvavfzwinna buDagurumitacandrAhe sati saNkrAntAvanAmayaM nFRAm kzitipatinikarakzemaM sasya vivfdDirviDarmiRAM pIqA naatra mezasaNkrAntO viSezamAha kaSyapaH yadA mezagataH sUryyo BaraRyAdicatuzwaye sasyavfdDirBavettatra vfdDirAdrAM catuzwaye maGAdi daSake hAniH kzemaM cAnuktaBezu ca asyArTaH yasmin dine mezasaNkramastaddin candro yadi ajakanyAJazakarkiRi saNkrAntO yadi Bavedvarzam atulaM kzemasuBikzaM nfpasajjanagokulakzemam GawacApasiMhamiTunasaNkrAntO yadi Bavedvarzam AmayaqAmaraBUBfdyudDamanarTaM svavfzwiSca vfzavfScikatulamakare vfzwiH syAt saNkrame samaye visPowAmayataskarapIqAvfzwiH kfsAnuBayamiti aTa sOmyeti makarakarkawayoH saNkrAntiScet tadA krameRa sOmyayAmyAyanaM niruktaM kaTitaM makare saNkrAntiScet tadA zaqaSItisuKAnAmnI saNkrAntiH tulAmezayoH saNkrAntirvizuvanAmnI siMhavfScikavfzakumBezu saNkrAntirvizRupadAKyA uktaYca nAradena sTiraBezvarkasaNkrAntirjYeyA vizRupadAhvayA zaqaSItimuKaM jYeyaM dvisvaBAvezu rASizu tulADarAjayorjYeyaM vizuvaM sUryyasaNkramaH saMjYAprayojanaYca yAmyAyane vizRupade cAdyA maDyAstulAjayoH zaSItyAnane sOmye parA nAqyo tipuRyadAH iti granTakfdagre vakzyati atra manuH saNkrAntO yAni dattAni havyakavyAni dAtfBiH tAni nityaM dadAtyarkaH punarjanmani janmani ravisaNkramaRe puRye na snAyAdu yadi mAnava saptajanmasu rogI syAt duHKaBAgI hi jAyate iti SAtAtaprokteH snAnadAnaSrAdDAdikftyasya saNkrAntikAle vaSyakarttavyatA pratIyate tatra SrAdDAderanekakzaRasADyatvAdananuzWAnalakzaRamaprAmARyamApadyeta saNkrAntikAlasyAtisUkzmatvAt
