devalo pi saNkrAntisamayaH sUkzmo durjYeyaH piSitekzaREH iti piSitekzaREH manuzyEH atomuKyakAlAnupalabDO gORakAle pi kAryaM vacanapramARyAt sa ca gORakAlaH pratiniDirityato gORakAlamupajAtikAcCandaH pUrvArdDenAha saNkrAntIti gaRitamArgeRa yaH uzRagoH sUryyasya saNkrAntikAla Agatastata uBayatra pUrvataH parataSca zoqaSa nAqyaH puRyasampAdakatvAt puRyAM matAH sammatA sUryyasaNkrAntisamayAt pUrvaM zoqaSa paScAcca zoqaSaGawikAH puRyakAla iti dvAtriMSaduGawikA BavantItyarTaH tadAha vasizWaH dinapatisaNkramaRAt prAk zoqaSa nAqyaYca puRyakAlaH saH parataH zoqaSa nAqyaH sarvatra snAnadAnakAryezu brahmasidDAnte pi sakrAnteH prAkparastAcca sArdDAH zoqaSa nAqikAH trayastriMSat saNkramasya puRyAH sarvasya nAqikAH anena saNkrAnteH puRyakAlastu zoqaSoBayataH kalAH iti smftivAkye yEH pUrvataH parataScAzwAvazwO GawikAH puRyakAla ityevaM zoqaSeti vyAKyAtaM tadapAkftaM Bavati kiYcAyamarTovAsanAsidDaH sUryyasidDAnte BihitaH arkamAnakalAH zazwyA guRitA muktiBAjitAH tadardDanAqyaH saNkrAnterarvAk puRyaM taTA pare sidDAntaSiromaRAvapi zazwiGnabimbaM grahaBuktiBaktaM saNkrAntinAqyo KilaDarmakftye ravestu tAH puRyatamA grahaH svasaNkrAntigomiSraPalaM viDatte iti vAsanA ceyaM yadi grahaspazwagatitulyakalABirahorAtramAnarUpAH zazWiGawikA laByante tadA grahabimbakalABiH kimiti trErASikena grahe bimbakalAnAM zazwirguRako grahaBuktirBAjako nizpannaM ityarTaH evaM sarvagrahARAmapi saNkrAntiH syAt taduktaM sidDAnta eva atra tu vistAraBayAdanupayuktatvAcca nAsmABiraleKi ata eva triMSadu ekatriMSatsArdDadvAtriMSattrayastriMSadAdiBedena smftizu puRyaGawikABiDAnaM spazwIkftyA BedasaMvAdBinnaM tadeva sAmAnyataH saNkrAntizu dvAtriMSat GawikArUpaH puRyakAlo nirRItaH devIpurARe tu mandAdisaMjYABedAt puRyakAlaviSeza evoktaH dvicatuHpaYcasaptAzwanavadvAdaSa eva ca krameRa GawikAhyetAstat puRyaM pAramArTakim iti asyArTaH mandAyAmantarAlavatti GawikAdvayaM mandAkinyAYcatasro GawikAH DvANkzyAM paYca GorAyAM sapta mahodaryAmazwO rAkzasyAM nava miSrAyAM daSa prAgaBihitedevIpurARoktamandAdisaMjYAvAkyAnnakzatrajanitasaMjYAsu mandAdivyayaM vicAro na vAraprayuktAsvavacanAt evaM saNkrAntizu puRyakAlamaBiDAya idAnIM rAtrisaNkrAntO viSezamupajAtyuttarArdDenAha niSITata iti niSITo rdDarAtraM tasmAdavAk pUrvatra ataratra paScAcca saNkrame saNkrAntikAle satipUrvAparayorahnoH krameRAntisapUrvaBAgO puRyO syAtAM BAgakAviti svArTe kaH yadyardDarAtrAt prAksaNkrAntistadA pUrvadinasyottarArdDaM puRyaM yadyardDarAtrAdupari saNkrAntistadottaradinasya pUrvArdDameva puRyamityarTaH uktaYca brahmasidDAnte BavanAntaM bimbamaDyaM rAtryardDAt prAgudeti cet snAnadAnAdi maDyAhnAn kuryAdUrDvaM gate dine rAtryardDAdupari kzetraM yAti cedanyaTAryamA ahnyAgAmiti maDyAhnAt pUrvaM snAnAdi puRyadam BavanaM rASiH bimbamaDyaM raveH kzetraM rASiH vfdDavasizWo pi ahnisaNkramaRe puRyamahaH kftsnaM prakIrttitam rAtrO saNkramaRe BAnordinArDaM mrAnadAnayoH ardDarAtrAdaDastasmin maDyAhnasyoparikriyA UrDvaM saNkramaRe corDvamudAyAt praharadvayam iti nanu rAtrO SezadinasaNkrAnto vA rAtrAvapi puRyakAlasattvAt tadA snAnAdi kuto na kriyate yadarTamayasudyama ArabDa ucyate rAtrO mnAnaM na kurvIta dAnaM cEva viSezataH iti sumantuvAkyAdrAtrO snAnAdyaDikArAsattvAt yattu nEmittikaM grahaRAdiprayuktaM tadBavatyeva nEmittikaYca kurvIta snAnaM dAnaYca rAtrizu iti sumantuvAkyaSezAt ardDarAtrasamaye saNkramaRe makarakarkawoSca viSe zamupajAtikayAha pUrRe iti ardDarAtraniSITO dvO dvO yAmapraharO samO ityABiDAnAdardDarAtro niSITaSabdavAcyaH tasminniSITe pUrRe rAtridvitIyapraharAntimakalAvacCinne yadi saNkramaH syAt tadA prAgaparaM dinadvaye puRyamuktam uktaYca vfdDavasizWena pUrRe cedardDarAtre tu yadA saNka mate raviH prAhuH dinadvayaM puRyaM saktvA makarakarkawAviti brahmasidDAnte pi yadyardDarAtra eva syAt saMpUrRe saNkramo raveH tadA dinadvayaM puRyaM snAnadAnAdikarmasu atra muktA makarakarkawAvityuktaM tatra makarakarkawayostu kaTamityata AhATeti aTAnantaramudayAstAt sUryyodayAt sUryyAstAcca pUrvaM parastAcca yadi yAmyasOmyayane karkawamakarasaNkrAnti BavatastadA pUrvaparadine puRyesyAtAM yadi sUryyodayAt pUrvaM karkawasaNkramaRaM syAt tadA pUrvadina eva puRyakAlo na paradine tadAha vfdDagArgyaH yadAstamayavelAyAM makare yAti BAskaraH pradoze cArdDa rAtre vA snA dAnaM pare hani ardDarAtre tadUrDvaM vA saNkrantO dakziRAyane pUrvameva dinaM grAhyaM yAvannodayate raviH iti astamayavelAyA iti paYcamyantaM padaM vASabda ivArTe BavizyottarapurARe pi kArmukantu parityajya mfgaM saNkramate raviH pradoze cArdDarAtre vA kuryAdahani pUrvataH iti pradozalakzaRaM skandapurARe trimuhUrttaH pradozaH syAdravAvastaM gate sati iti aTArdDodayAstAditi vacanasyApyavodamindravajrACandasAha ardDeti ardDoditAdardDAstAccADa UrdDaM ca kramAtriGawikAstABiH pramitA sanDyAsanDayAkAlaH syAt ardDoditArkabimbAtpUrvaM triGawIpramitA prAtaHsanDyA taTArdDAstAdarkabimbAdupari tranAqIpramitA sAyaMsandyetyarTaH tadAha varAhaH ardDAstamitAnuditAt sUryyAdaspazwaBaM naBo yAvat tAvat sanDyAkAlaYcihnEretEH PalaM brUyAditi tatpramARamAha nAradaH ardDAstamanasanDyA hi GawikA trayasammitA tatrEvArdDodayAt prAtarGawikAtrayasammitA iti skanDapurARe pi udayAt prAktanI sanDyA GawikAtrayamucyate sAyaMsanDyA triGawikA hyastAdu pari BAsvataH iti atra sanDyAMlakzaRe ardDAstamitA nuditavAkyasya skandapurARIyavAkyasya ca vrIhiya yavadvikalpaH aTaH sanDyAlakzaRaprayojanamAhAtreti aTa sanDyAyAM pAtaHsanDyAyAM sAyaMsanDyAyAM ca kramA ccedu yAmyasOmye ayane dakziRottarAyaRe tadAnIM para pUrvO GasrO divasO puRyA yAmyasOmye ayane ityatra yadi prAtaHsanDyAyAM dakziRAyanapravfttistadA sUryoda yAdanantara sampUrRamahaH puRyaM taTA yadi sAyaMsa nDyAyAmuttarAyaRapravfttistadA sUryyAstAtpUrvaM sampUrRa mahaH puRyaM syAdirTaH yadAha nAradaH sUryyasyodaya sanDyAyAM yadi yAmyAyanaM Bavet tadodayAdahaHpurRya pUrvAhaH pUrvato yadi sUryyAstamanasanDyAyAM yadi sO myAyanaM Bavet tadAhaH puRyakAlaH syAt parataScottare hani iti atra yadyudayasanDyAtaH prAk rkasaMkrama stadA prAgadina eva puRyakAlo nottaradine taTA yadya stasanDyAmatikramya makarasaMkrAntisvadottaradina eva puRya kAlonottaradine iti nizkfzwo rTaH ato vfdDagArgyA divAkyanAradavAkyayoH pradozasanDyApadopAdAnena sAmAnya viSazamAvo vagantavyaH yattu hemAdrO skandapurARIyaM vA kyam DanurmInAvatikramya kanyAM ca miTunaM tataH pUrvApara viBAgena rAtrO saMkramate yadA dinAnAnte paYca nAqryastu tadAH puRyatamAH smftAH udaye ca taTA paYca dEve pitrye ca karmaRi iti tadapi sanDyAvizayakamevetyAhuraBi yuktAH vazuve tu yaTASrutam eveti anyadapi sanDyA lakzaRaprayojanaM prAksanDyAgarjita ityAdizu vakzyati nanu nAyamayanapuRyakAloktyudyamaH saPalaH SAstrAntara virudDatvAttaTA hi ahni saMkramaRe puRyamahaH kftsnaM prakIrttitam rAtrO saMkramaRe BAnordinArdDaM snAnadA nayoH ardDarAtrAdaDastasmin maDyAhnasyoparikriyA UrdDaM saMkramaRe cordDvamudayAt praharadvayam pUrRe ceda rdDarAtre ca yadA saMkramate raviH prAhurdinadvayaM puRyaM muktvA makarakarkawO iti vfdDavasizWenAyanavyatiriktezu daSasu saMkramezu rAtrigatezu yAyAH sannihitA nAqya stAstAH puRyatamAH smftAH iti kaSyapoktasAmAnyavA kyAdrAtrAvevAnuzWAnaM prasaktamahaH saMkrama ityAdinApyeta devAnuzWAnaM vihitaM tasyApi paryudAsaH kriyate muktvA ma karakarkawAviti tasmAn makarakarkawayoH saMkramaRe rAtrA vAnuzWAnaM karttavyamityuktaM Bavati ataevAha yAjYava lkyaH rAhudarSanasaMkrAntivivAhAtyayavfdDizu snAna dAnAdikaM kAryaM niSi kAmyavratezu ca iti vasizWo pi sutajanane saMkrAntAvuparAge candrasUryayorniyatam rAtrA vapi karttavyaM snAnaM dAnaM viSezato nFRAmiti sumantuSca grahaRodvAhasaMkrAntiyAtrArttiprasavezu ca SravaRe cetihAsasya rAtrO dAna praSasyate iti ezu vAkyezu sAmAnyavAcino pi saMkrAtipadasya makarakarkawasaMkrAnti paratvamavasIyate yastu rAtrO snAnaM na kurvIta dAnaM cEva viSezataH iti nizeDaH sa saMkrAntyantare vyavatizWate ata evoktaM kaSyapena snAnaM dAnaM grahaRavat sOmyayAmyA yanadvaye iti tasmAdayanasaMkrame rAtrO satyAM tatrEva snAnadAnAdyanuzWAtavyamitiH atrAhuH SAstradvayena tulya balatvAdvikalpasidDO tattaddeSaprasidDaSizwAcAreRa vyavasTA dazwavyA tatra gOrjarAstu kaSyapAdivAkyamaByupetya rAtrA vayanasamBave sati rAtrO eva snAnadAnAdikaM kurvanti dAkziRAtyAstu vfdDagArgyAdivAkyamaNgIkftya divasa eva snAnadAnAdi kurvantItyalamatiprasaNgena yadA tu dine ka rkamakarasaMkramastadA krameRa pUrvottaraGawikAniyamamAha vfdDa vasizWaH atItAnAgate puRye dve tUdagdakziRAyane triMSat karkawake nAqyo makare viMSatiH smftA iti utta rAyaRamatItaM sat puRyaM karkawAyanamAgAmi puRyaM tatra karkawasaMkrAnteH prAktriSat GawakiH puRyAH makare tUttaraviMSatirGawikAH puRyA ityarTaH atra vAkye yadyapi dinapadAnupAdAnaM taTApi yadAstamayavelAyAmiti rAtri paraviSezavAkyAlocanAdidaM dinaparaM pratiBAti taTa sati kenApi hetunA samIpaTawIzu SrAdDAdyanuzWAnAsamBave paramAvaDitvena triMSadAdayo GawikA atrAnujYAyante yadA tu pratibanDastadA yAyAH sannihitA nAqyastAstAH pURya tamAH smftA iti kaSyopokteH samIpaGawikAsveva SrAdDAdi viDeyaM sannihitaparityAge kAraRABAvAditiM nyAyacci aTa pUrvAparAH zoqaSa GawikAH puRyA iti pUrvaM sAmAnyenoktamidAnIM vizRu padAdizu sa kra mezu viSezamanuzwa BAha yAmyati yAmyAyane karkamaM krAntO taTA vizRupade vfzasiMhavfScikakumBasaM krAntikAle AdyAH nAqyaH praTamAH zoqaSaGawikAH atipuRwadAH snAnadAnAdAvanantaPaladAjYeyAH apimAstu na taTeti nizkfzwo rTaH tulAjayostulAmezayoH maDyA uBayataH zoqaSa zoqaSa GawikAH puRyAH aTa vA zoqaSEva GawikAH puRyA zaqaSItyAnane miTunakanyADanurmInasaMkrAntizu taTA sOmye makarasaMkrAtO saMkrAntikAla tparA agrimAH zoqaSa GawikAH atipuRyadAH praTamAstu na taTeti niz kfzwo rTaH yadAha SrIpatiH yAmyAyane vizRupadetaTAdO dAnAdyanantaM vizuve ca maDye vadantyatIte zaqaSItivaktre maharzayaH Kalvayane ca sOmye tatra karke prAgeva makara saMkrAntO paScAdeva puRyakAla iti tu prANniraRAyi vizRupade tu agrimAdiGawInAM puRyakAle taratamaBAvaH puRyAyAM vizRupadyAM ca prAkapaScAdapi zoqaSeti vfdDa vasizWokteH vizuve tu sAmAnyanirRaya eveti kecit dIpikAwIkAkArastvevamAha meze tulAyAM saMkrAnti maDya eva saMkrAntikAlAtpUrvamazwO GawikAH parataScAzwO GawikA puRya iti yuktaM cEtat vizuve ca maDyapado padAnAn maDye zoqaSa DawikAH puRyAH ityucyate aspAt kAlAn maDya ityapekzAyAM saMkrAntikAlAdevetyataH pUrva BazwO paScAccAzwO GawikAH puRyA ityarTaH yattUktaM vfha spatinA varttamAne tulAmeze nAqyastUBayato daSa iti tulAmezasakrAntikAlAt prAkpaScAcca paYca paYca zwawyaH puRyA ityuktam yadapyuktam AdyantasApekzatvAn maDyaSabdasya gaRitAgatapuRyakAlaGawikAnAM maDye triBAgaH sTUladfSA daSaGawikAtmako BavatIti yAyAH sannihitA nAqya iti kaSyapokteH zaqaSItimuKe pyAdyAgrimaGawInAM puRyakAle taratamaBAvaH yattu zaqaSItyAM vyatItAyAM zazwi stulyAstu nAqikA iti vfdDavasizWavAkyaM tat prAgGa wIzu prativanDavaSAt SrAdDAderasamBave satyantimaGawIzu SrA dDAdikriyAByanujYAyAH paramAvaDikAleyattArTam idaM sarvaM dinasaMkrAntivizayaM veditavyam ahni saM kramaRe puRyamahaH kftsvaM prakIrttitam iti sAmAnyavAkyasya sOmyAyane vizRupade ityasya ca viSezavAkyasyEkavAkyatA ataeva rAtrO saMkramaRe BAnordinArdDaM snAnadAnayoH iti rAtriparaviSezasya sattvAcca evaM nirRIte puRyakAle snAnadAnAdyavaSyaM viDeyamiti Palito rTaH tatra snA nadAnAdyakurvataSca pratyavAyamAha vasizWaH iti saYcintya vinirRayamAdezwavyaM sadEva dEvajYEH vizuvatyasane grahaRe saMkrAntO puRyadivase pi pitftfptiM yo na kurute dattvA SApaM vrajati tasya pitA Agatagatasamaye pi ca karoti yaddAnajapahomAdyam BaradvAjaH zaqaSItyAM tu yaddAnaM vizuvadvitaye taTA dfSyate sAgarasyAntastasyAnto nEva dfSate vfdDa vasizWo pi ayane kowiH puRyAni sahasraM yizuve Pa lam zaqaSItyAM sahasrantu PalaM vizRupadezu ca ityala matiprasaNgena iti sUyasaNkrAntinirRayaH aTa nAyaM kevalaM sUryasaNkramaRa eva puRyakAlaH kintu candrAdInAM grahARAM nakzatrasaNkrame rASisaNkrame ca puRyakAlo Bavati so pi sopapattikaH nava GawikA azwO palAni SaneH zazwyaDikaM SataM GawikAH pUrvAparakAlO militvA puRyakAla ityarTaH atra vAsanA prAguktA etadardDA nAdDya prAkparataScapuRyA atra gaRitAgataGawI palezu liKitajEminivAkye hAnirvfdDiHsTAnahAnistaTA prAptiriti kramAt nAradenoktam saNkrAnteryannakzatraM grahaRanakzatraM vA yadi janmaBaM BavedaTa vA tAByAmuBayapArSvagataM janmaBaM BavettadA anizwameva nakzatratrayaM aDikamayanasaNkrAntiSabde dfSyam sTUlatayA mezAdO ravisaNkrAntervAradaRqAdyAnayanaprakAraH jyo ta ukto yaTA navAzwaSakra hInena SakAvdANkena pUritAH BUrvARacandrAvekAgnI kurAmO vedayugmake aNkA anupalAdestu zazwyA labDANkamiSritAH daRqAt KAgnI hayezu ca palAdDitvA tataH punaH saptAviSizwA vArAH syustato daRqAdikAH pare mezasaNkramaRe mAnoH sidDAntasPuwasammatAH BujO aNgizUrAmAgnI kAlojAtirgajAvanI rAmaScandro gniyugmaYca tarko Nkadfk navASugO dvAvaNkadfg vedavARA abDirvARaSarO surAH zaRAgavedO SUnyendU ekaM SElaBuvO SarAH dvO zaqagnI taTA kAlA abDIrAmaH SarAvanI paYcAgnIzu taTA rudrA mezasaNkramavArataH aNkEryojyA vfzAdestu vArAdyAH saNkrame raveH rASiBede saNkrAntinAmaBede tsaNkramakAle svanakzatrasya puruzAkftisaNkrAnticakrastAnaviSezasTitO PalaBedaSca tatrokto yaTA mfgakarkawasaNkrAntI dve tUdagdakziRAyane vizuvatI tulA meze golamaDye taTAparAH DanurmiTunakanyAstu mIne ca zaqaSItayaH vfzavfScikakumBezu siMhe vizRu padI smftA mUrDni sapta suKe trIRi hfdaye paYca vinyaset tritayaM hastapAdezu mahAvizuvaBakramAt mastake BUpateH sOKyaM vadane pawutA SuBe hfdaye ca DanADyakzo rTaprAptirdakziRe kare vAme kare mahaduduHKaM suKaM pAde ca dakziRe BramaRaM vAmapAde ca kaTitaM vizuvat Palam zaqmUrDni vadane paYca catvAri hfdaye taTA tritayaM karapAdezu payovizuvataH kramAt mAnaM mUrDni muKe vEraM hfdaye suKasamBavaH doHpadordakzayorBogastrAsSca vAmayoH svaBe jalavizuvaPalam SIrze paYca muKe trIRi hastayocca trayaM trayam hfdi paYca SaSI nABO gude ca pAdayorasAH uttarAyaRaBAjjYeyaM svanakzatrasTiteH Palam SIrze Ta lABo vadane muKAni dakze kare NgrO hfdaye ca sOKyam nABO SuBaM yAmakare rTanaSo guhye BayaM vAmapade pravAsaH uttarAyaRaPalam SIrze trIRi muKe trIRi hfdaye paYca hastayoH azwO pAdadvaye pyazwO dakziRAyanasaNkramAt SIrze mAno muKe vidyA hfdaye vittasaYcayaH pravAsaH syAt kare vAme BikzAlABaSca dakziRe nizPalaM vAsapAde ca kiYcillABaSca dakziRe dakziRAyanaPalam fkze saNkramaRaM yatra vizRupadyAM muKe tu tat catvAri dakziRe vAhO trIRi trIRi padadvaye catvAri vAmavAhO ca hfdaye paYca nirdiSet akzRordvayaM dvayaM yonyAM mUrDni dve cEkEkaM gude rogo BogastaTA yAnaM banDanaM lABa eva ca ESvarya rAjapUjA ca apamftyuriti kramAt vizRupadIPalam suKe cEkaM kare vedAH pAdayugme dvayaM dvayam kroqo vARastaTA vedAH kare savyetare pi ca dvayaM dvayaM taTA netre mastake tritayaM taTA dvayaYcEva taTA guhye zaqaSItyAM svaBe sTite muKe duHKaM kare lABaH pAdayorBramaRaM hfdi kAntA syAdubanDanaM vAme haste syAt svIyame nFRAm sammAno netrayoScEva apamAnaSca mastake guhye cEva BavenmftyuH zaqaSItiPalaSrutiH zaqaSItiPalam gurusaNkrAntiPalamuktaM jyo ta yaTA SIrze catvAri rAjyaM jalaDirapi kare dakziRe cApi sOKyaM cEkaM kaRWe viBUtiM madanaSaramitaM vakzasi prItisaNgam pAdasTAH zaw ca pIqA punarapi jalaDirvAma haste ca mftyu netre trIRi pradadyuH suKamaTa nijaBe vAkpateH saNkramarkzAt saNkrAntipuRyAkAlavyavasTA ti ta saNkzepato darSitA yaTA tadayaMsaNkzepaH dinasaNkramaRe kftsnaM dinaM puRyaM zaqaSIti muKe ityAdyuktaM puRyataraM mandAmandAkinItyAdi rUpeRa tricaturAdiGawikAH puRyatamAH dinavfttottarAyaRAdivihitaviMSatidaRqAdInAM rAtripravizwabAgasyApi puRyatvaM rAtrisaNkramaRe tu lAnyUna praTamArdDagate taddivasIyasezayAmadvayaM puRyAm kAladvayAtmakamaDyarAtragate taddivasIyatiTeraBede taddivasIyaSezayAmadvayaM puRyaM Bede tu taddivasIyaSezayAmadvayaM paradivasIyAdyayAmadvayaYca puRyam uBayadine puRyakAle pi pUrvadinAkaraRa eva paradine tadvihitaM kAryam tiTiBedABedayordakziRAyane taddivasIyaSezayAmadvayam uttarAyaRe tu paradivasIyAdyayAmadvayaM puRyamiti maDyarAtrIyakalottara SezArdDarAtrasaNkramaRamAtre tu paradinAdyayAmadvayaM puRyamiti sanDyAsaNkramaRe tu dinadaRqe dinasya rAtridaRqe rAtrervyavasTitiH tatpramARaM ti ta dfSyam saNkrAntO kAlASudDidozAdikaM nAsti yaToktaM ti ta skAnde ekAntato mayA proktAH kAlAH saNkrAntisaMjYakAH nEtezu vidyate gizwaM yataScAkzayasaMjYitAH aSradDayApi yaddartta kupAtreByo pi mAnavEH akAle pi hi tatsarvaM sakyamakzayatAM vrajet
saYcAya saYcAya saYcAya puM saYcIyate gniratra sam ci Ryat ni yajYaBede
saYcAyya saYcAyya saYcAyya pu saYcIyate gniratra sam ci Ryat ni yajYaBede
sadAprasUna sadAprasUna sadAprasUna pu sadA prasUnamasya rohitakavfkze arka vfkze kunde ca rAjani
sadBan sadBan sadBan na sIdatyasmin sada manin gfhe amaraH jale ca medi
sadaya sadaya sadaya pu san ayaH karma sADuSuBAvahaviDO saha dayayA sahasya saH dayAnvite amaraH
sadman sadman sadman na sIdatyasmin sada manin nfhe amaraH jale ca medi
sadvfta sadvfta sadvfta na vfta BAve kta karma sADusvaBAve jawA sADuvarttane ba saccaritrayute tri saduvfttasannikarzAM hi kzaRArdDamapi Sasyate iti ti ta
sadvftta sadvftta sadvftta na vfta BAve ktva karma sADusvaBAve jawA sADu varttane ba saccaritfyate tri sadvfttasannikarzo hi kzaRArdDamapi Sasyate iti ti ta
sadyoBAvin sadyoBAvin sadyoBAvin pu sadyoBavati Ba Rini vatse Sabdaca ASujAte tri striyAM NIp
sagoca sagoca sagoca na saha sanAnaM gotram sahasya saH kule Sabdaca saha samaM gotramasya jYAtO tri amaraH
sagotra sagotra sagotra na saha samAnaM gotram sahasya saH kule Sabdaca saha samaM gotramasya jYAtO tri amaraH
sahAprasUta sahAprasUta sahAprasUta puM sadA prasUnamasya rohitakavfkze arkavfkze kunde ca rAjani
sahaBAvin sahaBAvin sahaBAvin tri saha Bavati BU Rini sahAye striyAM NIp
sahaMBAvin sahaMBAvin sahaMBAvin tri saha Bavati BU Rini sahAye striyAM NIp
sahacarI sahacarI sahacarI strI saha carati cara wa NIp pItaJiRwyAM saKyAM jawA saha carati Darmam cara wa NIp Darma patnyAM hemaca
sahasrapAda sahasrapAda sahasrapAda puM pu sahasraM bahavaH pAdA asya antalopaH samA vizRO parameSvare ca sahasrAkzaH sahasrapAd puruzasUktam sahasrapAda pu sahasraM pAdAH kiraRAscaraRA kiraRaScaraRA vA santyasya ac vizRO sUryye arkavfkze ca kAraRqaKage puM strI puMstrI medi striyAM NIz sahasrapAda pu sahasraM bahavaH pAdA asya antalopaH samA vizRO parameSvare ca sahasrAkzaH sahasrapAd puruzasUktam sahasrapAda pu sahasraM pAdAH kiraRaScaraRA vA santyasya ac vizRO sUryye arkavfkze ca kAraRqaKage puMstrI medi striyAM NIz
sahasrapAdu sahasrapAdu sahasrapAdu puM sahasraM bahavaH pAdA asya antalopaH samA vizRo parameSvare ca sahasrAkzaH sahasrapAdu puruzasUktam
sahasrapatra sahasrapatra sahasrapatra na sahasraM bahusaMKyakAni patrARi yasya padme amaraH sahasradalAdayo pyatra sArase Kage ca
sahasrapattra sahasrapattra sahasrapattra na sahasraM bahusaMKyakAni pattrARi yasya padme amaraH sahasradalAdayo pyatra sArase Kage ca
sahasravIryA sahasravIryA sahasravIryA strI sahasraM bahUni vIryARyasyAH dUrvAyAm amaraH mahASatAvaryAYca rAjani
sahasravIryyA sahasravIryyA sahasravIryyA strI sahasraM bahUni vIryyARyasyAH dUrvAyAm amaraH mahASatAvaryyAYca rAjani
sahva sahva sahva na sahAyasya BAvaH yat ni sAhAyye tatrArTe sahyasakArot purARam saha BAve yat Arogye sAmye mADurye ca Sabdara karmaRi yat soQavye tri punAKyadeSasamIpasTe parvataBede puM medi sa ca parvataH BAratavarzasya kulAcalaBedaH mAhendro malayaH sahyaH suktimAnfkzaparvataH binDyaSca pAripAtraSca saptE vAtra kulAcalA mArkaRqeyapuM a sa ca aparAntadeSasannikfzwo lavaRasamudrAt kiyadudUrasTaSca tadatikrameREva raGO aparAntadeSagamanokteH asahyavikramaH sahyaM dUrAnmuktasudajYatA nitambamiva medinyAH srastAMSukamalaNGayat tasyAnIkErvisarpadBiH aprarAntajayodyatEH rAmAstrotsAritI pyAsot sahyalagna idArRa raGu tatparvatapAdajA nadyaSca tApo payozRI nirbinDA kArevI pramuKA nadI gOdAvarIBImaraTIkfzRaveRvAyadikAstaTA sahyapAdodBatA nadyaH smftAH pApaBayApahAH vizRusa uktAH godAvarI BImaraTI kfzRaveRvAstaTA parA tuNgaBadrA supayoga sahyAt kAyeryaTApagAH mArkaRqeyapuM
sahya sahya sahya na sahAyasya BAvaH yat ni sAhAyye tatrArTe sahya makarot purARam saha BAve yat Arogye sAmye mADuryye ca Sabdara karmaRi yat so Qavye tri punAKyadeSasamIpasTe parvataBede pu medi sa ca parvataH BAratavarzasya kulAcalaBedaH mAhendro malayaH sahyaH SuktimAnfkzaparvataH binDyaSca pAripAtraSca saptE vAtra kulAcalAH mArkaRqeyapu a sa ca aparAntadeSasa nnikfzwo labaRasamudrAt kiyaddUrasTaSca tadatikrameREva raGO aparAntadeSagamanokteH asahyavikramaH sahyaM dUrAnmukta sudanvatA nitambamiva medinyAH srastAMSukamalaNGayat tasyAnIkErvisarpadBiH aparAntajayodyatEH rAmAstrItsA rito pyAsIt sahyalagna ivArRavaH raGu tatparvatapAdajA nadyaSca tApo payozRI nirbinDA kAvepI pramuKA nadI godAvarIBImaraTIkfzRaveRvAdikAstaTA sahyapAdo dBavA nadyaH smftAH pApaBayApahAH vizRusa uktAH godAvarI BImaraTI kfzRaveRvAstaTA parA tuNgaBadrA supayogA sahyAt kAveryyaTApagAH mArkaRqeyapu
sakAra sakAra sakAra UzmavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRasTAnaM dantamUlaM tasyoccAraRe AByalaraprayatnaH vivfte jihvAgreRa adDaMsparSanena cocA ryyamARatvAt ardDaspfzwam bAhyapayatnA vivAraSvAsA GozAH mahAprARaYca asya DyeyarUpaM yaTA sakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi SaktivIjaM parAtparam kowividyullatAkAraM kuRqalItrayasayutam paYcadevamayaM devi paYcapARA tmakaM sadA rajaHsattvatamoyuktaM tribindusahitaM sadA kAmaDenuta tasyADizWAtfdevatArUpaM yaTA SuklAmbarAM SuklavarRAM dviBujAM raktalIcanAm SvetacandanaliptANgI muktAhAropaSABitAm ganDarvagoyamAnAYca sadAnandamayIM parAm azwasidDipradAM nityAM BaktAnandavivardDinIm evaM DyAtvA sakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDArata asya vAcakaSabdAH sAhaMsaH suyaSA vizRurBfgvISa ScandrasaMjYakaH jagadvIjaM SaktinAmA sohaM veSavatI BfguH prakftirISvaraH SudDaH praBA SvetA kulojvalaH dakzapA do mftaM brAhmI paramAtmA paro kzayaH surUpA ca gu ReSo gOH kalakaRWo vfkAdarI prARAdyA ca parA devI lAkzmIH somo hiraRyapU durgottAraRasammohA jIvo mUrttirmanoharaH varRABiDA mAtfkAnyAme sya dakzapAda nyAsyatA kAvyAdo prayoge PalaM suKam saH sOKyaM hastu svaMdam vf ra wI zopadeSaDAtUnAM prayAge dantyAditvam sakArajaH zakAraScetyukteH sati nimitte punaH zatvam
sakarmaka sakarmaka sakarmaka tri saha karmaRA sahasya saH kap vyAkaraRokte karmayuktakriyAboDake DAtO PalavyApArayorekanizWatAyAmakarmakaH DAtustayorDarmiBede sakarmaka udAhftaH ityuktadiSA DAtoH sakarmakatvamavaseyam
sakarmmaka sakarmmaka sakarmmaka tri saha karmaRa sahasya saH kap hyAkaraRokte karmayuktakriyAboDake DAtO PalavyApArayorekanizWatA yAmakarmakaH DAtustayorDarmiBede sakarmaka udAhftaH ityuktadiSA DAtoH sakamakatvamavaseyam
sakftPalA sakftPalA sakftPalA strI sakft Palati Pala ac kadalIvfkze rAjani
samADmAta samADmAta samADmAta tri sam A DmA kta samyaggarvite samya kaSabdite ca
samADyAta samADyAta samADyAta tri sam A DmA kta samyaggarvite saMmyakSabdite ca
samAnodarya samAnodarya samAnodarya puM samAne udare BavaH yat vA na sAdeSaH ekodarajaBrAtrAdO BaginyAM strI amaraH
samAnodaryya samAnodaryya samAnodaryya pu samAne udare BavaH yat vA na sAdeSaH ekodarajaBrAtrAdO BaginyA KI amaraH
samacittA samacittA samacittA tri samaM sarvatra samaBAvaM cittaM yasya sarvatra tulyadarSake tattvajYAnini
samacitta samacitta samacitta tri samaM sarvatra samaBAvaM cittaM yasya sarvatra tulyadarSake tattvajYAnini
samantatam samantatam samantatam avya samta tasil sarvatra vyAptO amaraH
samantatas samantatas samantatas avya samanta tasil sarvatra vyAptO amaraH
samarTan samarTan samarTan na sam arTa lyuw idamitTameveti niScayahetUpanyAsena niScAyakavyApAraBede amaraH yuc tatra aSakye DyavasAye ca strI
samarTana samarTana samarTana na sam arTa lyuw idamitTameveti niScayahetU panyAsena niScAyakavyApAraBede amaraH yuc tatra aSa kye DyavasAye ca strI
samaraBa samaraBa samaraBa ratibanDaBede svajaNGAdvayasaMyuktaM kftvA yozitpada dvayam stanO DftvA ramet kAmI banDaH samaraBaH RftaH ratimaYju
samaryAda samaryAda samaryAda tri saha maryAdayA sahasya saH sImAyute samIpe puM Bedi
samaryyAda samaryyAda samaryyAda tri saha maryyAdayA sahasya saH sImAyute samIpe pu medi
samazWila samazWila samazWi zWI la pu samaM tizWiti sTA ilac pfzo zatvaM vA dIrGaH gu qiyA SAke amaraH
samazWizWIla samazWizWIla samazWizWIla puM samaM tizWati sTA ilac pfzo zatvaM vA dIrGaH guzqiyA SAke amaraH
samfdDi samfdDi samfdDi strI samyak fdDiH sam fDa ktin vA atisa mpattO amaraH samyagvfdDO ca maDusamfdDisameDita yA meDayA mAGaH
sammuKIna sammuKIna sammuKIna tri sammuKa patati Ka aBimuKe pAtini
sampArkin sampArkin sampArkin tri sam pfca GinuR sambanDayukte
sampAti sampAti sampAti pu sam pata Ric in jawAyuyo jyezWaBrAtari pakziBede rAmA svArTe ka tatrEva sAmpatiriva kA yati kE ka sampAtika garuqajyezWatanaye SabdamA
samparkin samparkin samparkin tri sam pfca cinuR sambanDayukte
sampuwa sampuwa sampuwa pu sam puwa ka kuruvakavfkze amaraH samyak puwamiva uBayavArSvavartti yasya ekajAtIyapadArTena BinnajAtIyasya uBayato vyApte tri sakAmEH sampu wojApyaH iti tantram
samrAj samrAj samrAj puM samyak rAjate rAja kvip nAnusvAraH kftarAjasUyayajYe sarvaBUmISvare nfpatO amaraH
samrAja samrAja samrAja pu samyak rAjate rAja kvip nAnusvAraH kfta rAjasUyayajYe sarvamUmISvare nfpatO amaraH
samucCasita samucCasita samucCasita tri sam udu Svasa kta samyagucCvAsayukte pratyujjIvite ca
samucCaya samucCaya samucCa cCA ya puM sam udu Sri ac GaY vA atyunnato viroDa utseDe ca medi
samucCita samucCita samucCita tri sam udu Sri kta atyunnate
samucCraya samucCraya samucCra cCrA ya pu sam vad Sri ac GaY vA atyu nnatO viroDe utseDe ca medi
samucCrita samucCrita samucCrita tri sam ud Sri kta atyunnate
samucCvasita samucCvasita samucCvasita tri sam ud Svasa kta samyagucCvAsayukte pratyujjIvite ca
samudDaraRa samudDaraRa samudDaraRa na sam uw hf lyaw uttolane kUpAderja Page b lonnayane BuktAnnasya vamane unmUlane ca karmaRi lyuw vAnte annAdO sanmUlite ca amaraH
samuddaraRa samuddaraRa samuddaraRa na sam uw hf lyuw uttAlena kUpAderjalonnayane BuktAnnasya yamane unmUlane ca karmaRi lyuw vAnte unnAdO sammUlite ca amaraH
sanDyA sanDyA sanDyA strI sam DyE aN ganDO BavaH yat vA ekarUpakAlottaraBAvipararUpakAlayoravakASaBede divArAtrasya maDyavarttikAle amaraH sa ca divASezadaRqasahitarAtripraTamapiRqAtmakaH kAlaH tayoScaturdaRqAtmakaH kAlaSca triyAmAM rajanIM pAhustyaktvAdyantacatuzwaye nAqInAM taduBe sanDye divasAdyantasaMjYite iti dakzaH AhorAtrasya yaH sanDiH sUryyanakzatravarjitaH sA ca sanDyA samAKyAtetismftiH sAyAhne sanDyAkAle upAsyadevatABede tadupAsanAyAm vyAsaH sanDyAmupAsate ye tu niyataM SaMsitavratA iti smftiH prAtaH sanDyAM tataH kftvA saNkalpaM buDa Acaret smftiH AnarhaH karmaRAM vipraH sanDyAhIno yataH smftaH etat sanDyAtrayaM proktaM brAhmaRyaM yadaDizWitam yasya nAstyAdarastatra na sa brAhmaRa ucyate Candogapa anyagatAntu yaH pUrvAM sAdityAYcEva paScimAm nopAsIta dvijaH sanDyAM sa zazWo brahmARaH smftaH SAtA atra sanDyAtrayasya nityatvABiDAnAt sarvakAlamupasTAnaM sanDyAyAH pArTivezyate anyatra sUtakASOcaviBramAturaBotitaH iti vizRupurARIye sanDyAyA ityekavacanAntapAWo Darmakozokto yuktaH evameva navyavardDamAnaH sarvakAlaM prAtarmaDyAhnasAyaMrUpakAlatraye anyaTA tadupAdAnaM vyarTaM syAt viBramaScittavikzepaH tena kzatAdAvapi sanDyAmAcaranti ata eva yAjYavalkyaH sarvAvasTo pi yo vipraH sananDyopAsanatatparaH brAhmaRyAcca na hIyate antyajanmagato pi san sarvAvasTo nityaM sevakAdikarmarato pi yaTocitaSOcetyaSakto pIti ratnAkaraH anDAdyavasTApanno pIti yuktam sanDyAtrayasADAraRalakzaRamAha yogiyAjYavalkyaH trayARAYcEva devAnAM brahmAdInAM samAgamaH sanDiH sarvasurARAYca tena sanDyA prakIrttitA sanDyAdvayakAlastu ahorAtrasambanDimuhUrttAtmakaH taTAca dakzaH ahorAtrasya yaH sanDiH sUryyanakzatravarjitaH sA ca sanDyA samAKyAtA muniBistattvavAdiBiH sUyyanakzatravarjitaH ardDAstamitArdDoditasUryyamaRqalaprakfzwatejonakzatravarjitaH ardDAstamitArdDoditasUryyamaRqalaprakfzwatejonakzatravarjitaH taTA ca varAhaH ardDAstamayAt sanDyA vyaktIBUtA na tArakA yAvat tejaHparihAnirUpA BAnorardDodayaM yAvat atra AdyantatA uktA parimARamAha dakzaH rAtryantakAle nAqyo dve sanDyAdiH kAla ucyate darSanAdravireKAyAstadanto muniBiH smftaH nAqI daRqaH yogiyAjYavalkyaH hrAsavfdDI ca satataM dinarAtryoryaTAkramam sanDyA muhUrttamAKyAtA hrAsavfdDO samA smftA atropAsanAyA api sanDyAtvamAha vyAsaH upAste sanDivelAyAM niSAyA divasasya ca tAmeva sanDyAM tasmAttu pravadanti manIziRaH upAste yadu vakzyamARaprARAyAmAdikriyayeti yAvat tatkAle upAsyApi devatA sanDyA taTA ca yAjYavalkyaH sanDO sanDyAmupAsIta nAstage nodugate ravO upAsanopakramamAha saMvarttaH prAtaH sanDyAM sanakzatrAmupAsIta yaTAviDi sAdityAM paScimAM sanDyAm ardDAstamitaBAskarAm sanakzatrAmityanena taduyuktakAle upakramya prAtaH sanDyAmupAsIta evamevArdDAstamitABAskArabDAM paScimAM sAdityAmityanena taduyuktakAle upakramya upAsItetyarTaH maDyAhnasanDyAyA azwamamuhUrttaM kAlamAha smftiH pUrvApare taTA sanDye sanakzatre prakIrttite samasUryye pi maDyAhne muhUrtte saptamopari sANKyAyanagfhyam araRye samitpARiH sanDyAmupAste nityaM vAmyata uttarAparABimuKo nvazwamadiSamAnakzatradarSanAt atikrAntAyAM mahAvyAhftIH sAvitrIM svastyayanAdi japtvA evaM prAtaH prANmuKastizWan AmaRqaladarSanAditi uttarAparABimuKo vAyukoRABimuKaH koRaM vivfRoti anvazwamamiSamiti uBayadigazwamaBAgamiti yAvat A ta aDikaM gAyatrISabde dfSyam yugasanDikAle nadIBede medi brahmapatnIBede strI cintAyAM saMSrave somAyAM sanDAne puzpaBede hemaca catvAryAhuH sahasrARi varzARAntu kftaM yugam tasya tAvacCatI sanDyA sanDyAMSaSca taTAviDaH itarezu samanDyezu sasanDyAMSezu ca trizu ekApAyena varttante sahasrARiM SatAni ca manuH catvAryAhuriti catvAri varzasahasrARi kftayugaM kAlaM manvAdayo vadanti tasya tAvadvarzaSatAni sanDyA sanDyAMSaSca Bavati yugasya pUrvAM sanDyA uttaraSca sanDyAMSaH taduktaM vizRupurARe tatpramAREH SatEH sanDyA pUrvA tatrABiDIyate sanDyAMSakaSca tattuMlyo yugasyAnantarohi saH sanDyAsanDyAMSayorantanDyAryaH kAlo munisattama yugAKyaH sa tu vijYeyaH kftatretAdisaMjYakaH ekApAyeneti trIRi sahasrARi tretAyugaM trIRi SatAni tasya sanDyA sanDyAMSaSca dve sahasre dvAparayugaM dve Sate tasya sanDyA sanDyAMSaSca ekasahasraM kaliyugamekaSataM tasya sanDyA sanDyAMSaSca BavatItyarTaH praboDasamprasAdayoH sanDiBave svapne sanDye sfzwirAha hi SA sU sanDyamiti svapnasTAnamAcazwe vede prayogadarSanAt sanDyaM tftIyaM svaprasTAnam dvayAlokasTAnayoH praboDamasamprasAdasTAnayoH sanDo BavatIti sanDyam BA tasmin sanDye sTAne tizWanneti uBe sTAne paSyati idaYca paralokasTAnaYca ratnapra SrutiH sumUrzoH sarvendriyopasaMhArAde tallokAnanuBave sati vAsanAmAtreRa imaM lokaM smarataH karmavaSAt hfdaye mAnasaM paralokasPUrttirUpaH svapno Bavati so yaM lokadvayasanDO BavatIti sanDyaH svapnaH ratnapra
sanat sanat sanat puM sama ati caturmuKe brahmaRi trilA sadetyarTe a ya rAmASramaH
sanata sanata sanata pu sana ati caturmuKe brahmaRi trilA sadetyarTe avya rAmASramaH
sanmuKIna sanmuKIna sanmuKIna tri sammuKaM patati Ka aBimuKe pAtini

sapatrAkaraRa sapatrAkaraRa sapatrAkaraRa na saha pattreRa pakzeRa sapatraH taTA kriyate mAtra qAc kf lyuw pakzeRa saha SaraveDanarUpe atyantavyaTane karmaRi kta sapatrAkftaH taTA pIqite tri
sapattrAkaraRa sapattrAkaraRa sapattrAkaraRa na saha pattreRa pakzeRa sapattraH taTA kriyate sapattra qAc kf lyuw pakzeRRa saha SaraveDanarUpe atyantavyaTane karmaRi kta sapattrAkftaH taTA pI qite tri

saranti saranti saranti puM saha rantinA rantiSabdArTe amarawIkA
sarapattikA sarapattikA sarapattikA strI sare jale patramastyasyAH Wan padmapatre padme ca Sabdaca
sarapattrikA sarapattrikA sarapattrikA strI sare jale pattramastyasyAH Wan padma pattre padme ca Sabdaca
saratni saratni saratni pu saha ratninA ratniSabdArTe amarawIkA
sarayasaMvara sarayasaMvara sarayasaMvara puM sasyaM saMvfRoti sam vf ac SAlavfkze amaraH
saritAmpati saritAmpati saritAmpati pu ta aluk samA samudre Sabdara saritAMnATAdayo pyatra
saritAmyati saritAmyati saritAmyati puM ta aluk samA samudre Sabdara saritAMnATAdayo pyatra
sarjaniryAsaka sarjaniryAsaka sarjaniryAsaka puM sarjasya niryAsa iva kAyati kE ka rAle DunA rAjani
sarjaniryyAsaka sarjaniryyAsaka sarjaniryyAsaka pu sarjasya niryAsa iva kAyati kE ka rAle DunA rAjani

satkarman satkarman satkarman na karma vedAdivihite yAgAdO karmaRi
satkarmman satkarmman satkarmman na karma vedAdivihite yAgAdO karmaRi
satpatra satpatra satpatra na sat SoBanaM patram padmasya navadale Sabdaca karma sundaradale tri
satpattra satpattra satpattra na sat SoBanaM pattram padmasya nabadale Sabdaca karma sundaradale tri
satputra satputra satputra puM karma vedAdivihitakAryakarttari putre punnAmnI narakAt yasmAtrAyate pitaraM sutaH muKasandarSanenApi tadutpattO yateta saH bfhaspatyuktanarakatAraRAya fRamasmin sannayati amftatvaYca vindati pitA putrasya jAtasya paSyeccejjIvato suKam iti vasizWoktarmApanayanAya ca yat paSyediti niyamaviDAnaM tadakftaputrakAryaputraparam satputrastu suKadarSanaM vinApi narakanistArakaH taTA ca vizRu puM satputreRa tu jAtena veno pi tridivaM yayO punnAmno narakAt trAtaH satena sumahAtmanA brahmapurARe pi samutpannena Bo viprAH satputreRa mahAtmanA trAtaH sa venaH puruza vyAGraH punnAmno narakAttadA Su ta
satputtra satputtra satputtra pu karma vedAdivihitakAryyakarttari puttre punnAmno narakAd yasmAttrAyate pitaraM sutaH muKasandarSanenApi tadutpattO yateta saH vfhaspatyuktanarakatAraRAya fRamasmin sannayati amftatvaYca vindati pitA putrasya jAtasya paSyeccejjIvato muKam iti vasizWokta rRApanayanAya ca yat paSyediti niyamaviDAnaM tada kftaputrakAryyaputraparam satputrastu muKadarSanaM vinApi narakanistArakaH taTA ca vizRupu satputreRa tu jA tena veno pi tridivaM yayO punnAmno narakAttrAtaH sa tena sumahAtmanA brahmapurARe pi samutpannena Bo viprAH satputreRa mahAtmanA tvAtaH sa venaH puruza vyAGraH punnAmno narakAttadA Su ta
satrAjit satrAjit satrAjit puM pu satreRAjayati lokAn A ji kpip SrIkfzRaSvaSure satyaBAmAjanake rAjaBede satrAjit puM satreRAjayati lokAn lAkAn A ji kvip SrIkfzRaSvaSure rAjaBede satrAjit pu satreRAjayati lAkAn A ji kvip SrIkfzRaSvaSure rAjaBede
satraSAlA satraSAlA satraSAlA strI ta annajalAderdAnArTe kalpine gfhe hemaca
satri satri satri puM sada bA tri meGe gare jayaSIle tri uRAdikozaH
satrin satrin satrin puM sattvaM gfhaM yajYo vA vidyate sya ini gfhapatO amaraH gfhasTe ca
sattrAjit sattrAjit sattrAjit pu sattreRAjayati lokAn A ji kvip SrIkfzRaSvaSure satyaBAmAjanake rAjaBede
sattraSAlA sattraSAlA sattraSAlA strI ta annajalAderdAnArTe kalpite gfhe hemaca
sattri sattri sattri pu sada bA tri meGe gaje jayaSIle tri WaRAdikozaH
sattrin sattrin sattrin pu sattvaM gfhaM yajYo vA vidyate sya ini gfhapatO amaraH gfhasTe ca

satyAnftaM satyAnftaM satyAnftaM na satyasahitamanftaM yatra baRigvfttO bARijyeamaraH

savidalla savidalla savidalla puM suvidataM rAjAnaM lAti lA ka nUpAntaHpure kftADikAre kaYcukini amaraH suvidatA rAjYA lIyate lA ka antaHpurasTanAryAm strI rAyamukuwaH
savyasAMcin savyasAMcin savyasAMcin pu savyena vAmenApi sacati sandaGAti bARaM saca Rini arjune hemaca uBO me dakziRO pARI gARqIvasya vikarzaRe tena dEvamanuzyezu savyasAcIti mAM vidu BA vi a
savyasAcin savyasAcin savyasAcin puM savyena vAmenApi sacati sandaDAti bARaM saca Rini arjune hemaca uBO me dakziRO pARI gARqIvasya vikarzaRe tena devamanuzyezu savyasAcIti sAM viduH BA vi a
sayya~ma sayya~ma sayya ma pu sam yama karaRe GaY samo vA parasavarRo nu nAsiko ya H pakze saMyamaH pAta sU pariBAzite DAra RADyAnasamADitraye trayamekatra saMyamaH pAta sU tadetasya Page a DAraRADyAnasamADitrayasyEkatra saMyamaH ekavizayARi trIRi sADanAni saMyama ityucyate tadasya trayasya tAntrikI pariBAzA saMyamaH iti BA
sfvftta sfvftta sfvftta puM suzWu vfttaH vartulaH SUraRe ola rAjani sundaravfttAnvite tri SatapatryAM kAkalyAM drAkzAyAYca strI rAjani suvarttule tri
siDma siDma siDma na siDa man kicca kilAsaroge hemaca
sidDma sidDma sidDma na siDa man kiYca kilAsaroge hemaca
sindUrAtalaka sindUrAtalaka sindUrAtalaka puMstrI sindUravarRAstabakaScihnagedo yasya hastini medi striyAM NIz saDavAyAm strI
sindUratilakapuMstrI sindUratilakapuMstrI sindUratilaka puMstrI sindUravarRAstilakasihnaBedo yasya hastini zedi striyAM NIme sADavAyAm strI
smarasmarya smarasmarya smarasmarya puM smaraH saryo yasya gardaBe trikA
smarasmaryya smarasmaryya smarasmaryya pu smaraH saryyo yasya gardaBe trikA
snAyvarman snAyvarman snAyvarman na netrarogaBede sTiraM prastArimAMsAdyaM SuzkaM snAzvarma paYcamam mADavanidAnam
snAyvarmman snAyvarmman snAyvarmman na netrarogaBede sTiraM prastArimAMsAQyaM SuzkaM snAzvarma paYcamam mADavanidAnam
snehabIja snehabIja snehabIja puM snehAdyaM bIjamasya piyAlavfkze rAjani ta snehakAraRe na
snehavIja snehavIja snehavIja pu snehAdyaM vIjamasya piyAkzavfkze rAjani ta sehakAraRe na
snigDapatraka snigDapatraka snigDapatraka puM snigDaM patramasya kap GftakaraYje gucCakaraYce garjaratfRe ca rAjani vadaryAM strI jawA pAlakyAM kASmaryAYca strI rAjani
snigDapattraka snigDapattraka snigDapattraka pu snigDaM pattramasya kap GftakaraYje gucCa karaYje garjaratfRe ca rAjani vadaryyAM strI jawAH pAlakyAM kASmaryyAYca strI rAjani
sodarya sodarya sodarya puM samAne udare SayitA yat sAdeSaH ekodarajAte BrAtari tAdfSaBaginyAM strI amaraH
sodaryya sodaryya sodaryya pu samAne udare SayitA yat sAdeSaH eko Page b darajAte BrAtari tAdfSaBaginyAM strI amaraH
somasidDAnta somasidDAnta somasidDAnta pu somakftaH sidDAntaH candraprokte jyo tizasidDAntagranTaBede jawA
sozyantIhoma sozyantIhoma sozyantIhoma puM sozyantIM SUlApannAmAsannaprasavAM jYAtvA kArsyaH homaH sozyantyA AsannaprasavAyA hitAya karttavye homaBede tatprakAraH saM ta dfSyaH
sozyantohoma sozyantohoma sozyantohoma pu sovyantIM SUlApannAmAsannaprasavAM jYAtvA kAyya hImaH sozyantyA AsannaprasavAyA hitAya karttavye homaBede tatprakAraH sE ta dfSyaH
sroto'Yjana sroto'Yjana sroto Yjana na srotasi yamu nAmroto jalasannikfzwasOvIradeSe Bavam aYjanam sOvIradeSakze Yjane amaraH valmIkasiKarAkAraM BinnaM nIlAYjanapraBam pfzWe ca gErikAvarRaM SrezWaM sroto YjanaSca tat rAjani sroto YjanaM tatra SrezWaM viSudDaM sinDusamBavam dfzweH kaRqUmalaharaM dAhakledarujApaham akzRo rUpAvahaYcEva sahate mArutAtapO netrarogA na jAyante tasmAdaYjanamAcaret aYjanaM yAmunaYcApi kApotAYjanamityapi tatra sroto YjanaM kfzRaM sOvIraM SvetamIrotam sroto YjanasamaM jYeyaM sOvIraM tattu pARqaram sroto Yjana Bavet svAdu cakzuzyaM kaPapittamat kazAyaM leKanaM srigDaM grAhi cCardivizApaham siDyakzayAsrahftaSItaM sevanIyaM sadA buDEH sOto YjanaguRAH sarve sOnIre pi matA buDEH kintu dvayoraYjanayo SrezWaM srato YajanaM smftam BAvapra
srotoYjana srotoYjana sroto Yjana na srotasi yamuMnAsroto jalasannikfzwasOvIradeSe Bavam aYjanam sOvIradeSaje Yjane amaraH valmIkaSiKarAkAraM BinnaM nIlAYjanapraBam Gfzwe ca gErikAvarRaM SrezWaM sroto YcanaYca tat rAjani sroto YjanaM tatra SrezWaM viSudDaM sinDusamBavam dfzweH kaRqUmalaharaM dAhakledarujApaham akzRo rUpAvaha YcEva sahate mArutAtapO netrarogA na jAyante tasmA daYjanamAcaret aYjanaM yAmunaYcApi kApotAYjana mityapi tatra sroto YjanaM kfzRaM sOvIraM SvetamIri tam sroto YjanasamaM jYeyaM sOvIraM tattu pARqaram sroto YjanaM Bavet svAdu cakzuzyaM kaPapittanut kazAyaM leKanaM snigDaM grAhi cCardivizApaham siDmakzayAsrahft SItaM sevanIyaM sadA buDEH sOto YjanaguRAH sarve sOvI re pi matA buDEH kintu dvayoraYjanayoH SrezWaM sroto YjanaM smftam BAvapra
srupa srupa srupa puM strI sru ka svadirakAzWaBave hastamite yatnapAtraBede yajYapAtraSabde dfSyam sallavyAm pUrvAyAYca strI medi
sruva sruva sruva puMstrI sru ka KadirakAzWaBave hastamite yattrazAtraBede yajYapatraSabde dfSyam sallakyAm mUrvAyAYca strI medi
stanayitnu stanayitnu stanayitnu puM stana itu meGe pustake amaraH meGaSabde medi vidyuti Sabdara mftyO roge ca hemaca
stanayitru stanayitru stanayitru pu stana ratnu meGe mustake amaraH meGaSabde medi vidyuti Sabdara mftyO roge ca hemava
strIDarma strIDarma strIDarma puM ta ftO nArIkusumavikASe rajasi hemaca
strIDarmma strIDarmma strIDarmma pu ta ftO nArIkusumavikASe rajasi hemaca
strIpuMDarma strIpuMDarma strIpuMDarma puM striyAH puMsaSca DarmaH tamaDikftya vyavahAro vA strIpuMsayoH yaTASAstrAcArarUpe Darme tadvizayake azwAdaSasu vivAdapadezu maDye vivAdapadaBede strIpuMsayogo pyatra vIra tat nyarUpi yaTA tatsvarUpamAha nAradaH vivAhAdiviDiH strIRAM yatra puMsAYca kIrttyate strIpuMsayogasaMjYaM tadvivAdapadamucyate iti vivAhAdiSabdena strIpuMDarmA gfhyante ata eva manurvyavahArapadoddeSakAle strIpuMDarmoviBAgaScetyuddiSya pratijYApUrvakaM tezAM nirUpaRaM cakAra puruzasya striyAScEva Darmye vartmani tizWatoH saMyoge viprayoge ca DarmAn vakzyAmi SASvatAn ityAdinA saMyoge anyonyasanniDAne viprayoge deSataH kAlato vA vyavaDAne SASvatAnnityAn avasyAnuzWeyAniti yAvat ke te DarmA ityAkAhkzAyAmAha sa eva asvatantrAH striyaH kAryAH puruzEH svErdivAniSam vizayezu ca sajjantyaH saMsTApyA hyAtmanA vaSe ityAdi puruzEH BartfpuruzEH vizaye daRqahetuBUtacAYcalyAdivizaye nArado pi svAtantryAdvipraRaSyanti kUle jAtA api striyaH asvAtantryamatastAsAM prajApatirakalpayat iti ato nyErapi svastrIRAmasvAtantryaM yaTA Bavati taTA kalanita navyamityASayaH puruzeRa svastrI vyaBicArAdavaSyaM rakzaRIyA taTA ca hArItaH ekavrataskannaBAvAt parendriyopahatatvAcca duzwAH kulasaNkarakAriRyo Bavanti jIvati jArajaH kuRqomfte Barttari golakastatmAdretopAGAtAjjAyAM rakzejjAyAnASe kulanASaH kulanASo tantu nASastantunASaM devapitfyajYanASo devapitfyajYanASe AtmanASaH AtmanASe sarvasvanASaH iti ekavrataskannaBAvAt strIRAm ekaBartteti niyamanASAt parendriyopahatatvAt parismin puMsi indriyasya manasorAgAdinA upahatatvAt kalasaNkarakAriRyastajjAtisvaBAvAnugata prajotpAdanena kulasANkaryakAriRyaH ata eva SaNKaliKitO yasmin BAvo rpitaH strIRAmArttave tAdfSaM tastuYjanayantIti banduH putrAdisantatiH sanurapi sUkzmeByo pi prasaNgeByaH striyo rakzyA piSezataH dvayorhi sakASAditi kalpatarvAdO pAWaH aDyagnyAdiSabdAstayogarUQAstAdfSastrIDanAdAveva prayogAt gfhopaskaraRAdInAM yanmUlyaM kanyArpaRApADitvena varAdiByaH kanyABaraRarUpeRa gfhyate tacCulkamiti madanaratne vyAKyAtam mitAkzarAyAM tu yadugfhItvA kanyA dIyate tacCulkamityuktam uBayatrApi pitrAdInAM kanyAyA idamityuddeSo vivakzitaH anyaTA tatsvatvABAvena strIDanatvavyapadeSatvAnupapatteH jImUtavAhanena tu karmiRAmiti paWitvA gfhAdirkarmiBiH SilpiBistatkarmakaraRe BartrAdipreraRArTaM striyE yadutkocadAnaM tacCulkaM tadeva mUlyaM prakftyarTatvAditi vyAKyAtam punaScoktam yadAnetu Bartfgfhe SulakantatparikIrttitamiti vyAsoktaM vA BartfgfhagamanArTamutkocAdi yaddattaM tacCulkamityarTa iti taduBayamapi strI svAmikaM Bavatyeva tasyA eva dattatvAditi tatra strIDanatvavyapadeSo nyastrIDanavat sugama eva ADivedanikaM KyAlaravivAhakAle pUrvamArtyyAyE yaddIyate yAdaha yAjYavalkyaH aDivinnastiTE dadyAdADevedanikaMsamam na dattaM strIDanaM vAsAM datte tvardDaM prakalpayet iti pitrAdiBirjjIvanAdyarTaM strIByo DanadAne viSezamAha kAtyAyanaH pitfmAtfpati BrAtfjYAtiBiH strIDanaM striyE yaTASaktyAdvisAhasrAddAtavyaM sTAvarodfte sTAvaretaradDanaM yaTASakti AkArzApaRasahasradvayaparyantaM deyamityarTaH vyAso pi dvisahasraH paro dAyaH striyE deyo Danasya tu AdvisahasrAditi kAtyAyanena para iti ca vyAsenotkeritIqaTikamiti DaninApi na nastrIByo deyamiti darSitam ayaYca niyamaH prativatasaramasakfdarpaRe jYeyastenAnekavatsarezu jIvanArTaM dIyamAnamito dikamapi Bavati cenna dozaH jIvanArTatvAddAnasya yAvajjIvaYca dvisAhasramAtreRa tannirvAhAsamBavAt strIDane pi BartranumatimantareRa strIRAnna svAtantryamityAha manuH na nirhAraM striyaH kuryuH kuwumbAdbahumaDyakAt svakAdapi ca vittAdDi svasya BartturanAjYayA iti nirhAro vyayaH kvacittu strIDane tAsAM svAtantryamasti yadAha sOdoyikasvarUpamuktA kAtyAyanaH sodAyikaM DanaM prApya strIRAM svAtantryamizyate yasmAttadAnfSasyArTaM tErdattamupajIvanam sOdAyike sadA strIRAM svAtantryaM parikIrttitam vikraye cEva dAne ca yaTezwaM sTAvarezvapi Barttfdatte tu sTAvaretaratrEva svAtantryAmityAha nAradaH BartrA prAtena yaddattaM striyE tasmin mfte pi tat sA yaTA kAmamaSrIyAddadyAdvA sTAvarAdfte sTAvare Battfdatte striyA nivAsAdyupaBogamAtraM na dAnavikrayAdikamityarTaH aputrA SayanaM BarturityAdi kAtyAyanavaco pi BartfdattasTAvaravizayameva nAradekavAkyatayeti kecit asmABistu patnI duhitara iti vyAKyAnAvasare sya vizayaH prapaYcitaH puruzARAmapi kasminnapi strIDane na svAtantryaM svAmyABAvAdityAha kAtyAyanaH na BarttA nEva ca suto na pitA BrAtaro na ca AdAne vA visarge vA strIDane praBavizRavaH yadi tvekataro pyezAM strIDanaM Bakzayedu balAt savfdDikaM sa dApyaH syAddaRqaYcEva samApnuyAt tadeva yadyanujYApya Bakzayet prItipUrvakam mUlameva tadA dApyo yadA sa DanavAn Bavet aTa cet sadviBAryaH syAnna ca tAM Bajate punaH protyA visfzWamapi cet pratidApyaH sa tadurbalAt grAsAcCAdanavAsAnAmucCedo yatra yozitaH tatra svamAdadIta strI viBAgaM rikTinAntaTA striyA DanaM gfhItvA yadyaparaBAryayA saha vasatyenAYcAvamanyate tadA gfhItaM tadDanaM rAjYA balAddApyaH BaktAcCAdananivAsAn yadi BarttA na dadAti tadA te pi striyA balAdugrAhyAstatparyAptaM DanaM vA grAhyamiti SlokadvayasyArTaH idamapi tasyA dozarAhitye boDyaM duzwA punaH kimapi strIDanaM na laBate ityAha sa eva apakArakriyAyuktA nirlajjA cArTanASikA vyaBicAraratA yA ca strIDanaM na tu sArhati nArhatItyanena tayA labDamapyAcCidya grAhyamiti sUcitam apakArakriyAyuktA sadA BartfpratikUlAcaraRaparA nirmaryAdArTanASikA ityapi pAWaH devalaH vfdDarABaraRaM SulkaM lABaSca strIDanaM Bavet BuNkte tat svayamevedaM patirnArhatyanApadi vfTA mokze ca Boge ca striyE dadyAt savfdDikam iti vfdDirbardDanArTaM pitrAdinA dattamiti smfticandrikAyAm madanaratne tu vfttiriti paWitam vfttirjjIvatArTaM pitrAdiBirdattamiti vyAKyAtaYca lABo gOryAdiprItyarTaM yallaByate kutaScit vfTA ApadamantareRa kulayo SokamAvaheyurarakzitAH imaM hisarvavarRAnAM paSyato Darmamuttamam yatante rakzituM BAryAM BarttAro durbalA api svAM prasUtiM caritraYca kulamAtmAnameva ca svaDarme hi prayatnena jAyAM rakzan hi rakzitaH iti dvayoH kulayoH BarttfpitfkulayoH anena kuladvayavfdDErapi rakzyA iti SokakayanasUKena darSitam ata eva bfhaspatiH sUkzmeByo pi prasaNgeByo nivAryA strI svabanDuBiH SvaSvAdiBiH pAlanIyA gurustrIBirdivAniSam manurapi kAle dAtA pitA vAcyo vAcya ScAnupayan patiH mfte Barttari putrastu vAcyo mAturarakzitA iti kAle kanyAdAnayogye kAle vAcyonindyaH amupayan ananugacCan sa eva pitA rakzati kOmAre BarttA rakzati yOvane putrastu sTAvire BAve na strI svAtantryamarhati yAjYavalkyo pi rakzetkanyAM pitA binnAM patiH putrastu vArdDake aBAve jYAtayastezAnna svAtantryaM kvacit striyAH iti vinnA vivAhitA patiputravihInAyAntu rakzaRaM patipakzAntargatena pratyAsannena kAryam taTA va nAradaH Bfte BarttaryaputrAyAH patipakzaH praBuH striyaH viniyogAtma rakzAsu BaraRezu ca ISvaraH parikzIRe pratikule nirmanuzye nirASraye tatsapiRqezu cAsatsu pitfpakzaH praBuH striyaH pitfpakzasyApyaBAve sa evAha pakzadvayAvasAne tu rAjA BarttA smftaH striyAH punaH nibitaM sa tasyA BaraRaM kuryAnnigfhRIyAtpakzaScutAm iti viniyogaH karmaRi niyAjanam BarttA pozakaH strIsvaBAvaM darSayati dakzaH jalOkAvat striyaH sarvA BUzaRAcCAdanAkzanEH suhitApi kftA nityaM puruzaM hyapakarzati jalOkA raktamAdatte kevalaM sA tapasvinI itarA tu DanaYcittaM mAMsaM vIryaM balaM suKam sASaNkA bAlaBAve tu yOvane BimuKI Bavet tfRavanmanyate nArI hfdDaBAveti svakampatim svakAmye varttamAnA sA snehAnna ca nivAritA apaTyA tu Bavet paScAdu yaTA vyADirupekzitaH iti suhitA tfptA kftApItyanvayaH apakarzati satatamAjYAmAtraM karoti svakAmye svecCAyAm apaTyA atyantAhitahetuBUtA manurapi nEtA rUpaM pratIkzante nAsaM vayasi saMsTitiH surUpaM vA virUpaM vA dumAnityeva BuYjate pOScalyAccalacittvatvAt nEHsnehyAcca svaBAvataH rakzitA yatrato pIha BartfzvetA vikurvate SayyAsanamalaNkAraM kAmaM kroDamanArjavam drohaBAvaM kucaryAYca strIByomanurakalpayat nAsti strIRAM kriyA mantrEriti Darmo vyavasTitaH nirindrayA hyamantrASca striyo mftamiti sTitiH taTA ca Srutayo bahvyA nigItA nigamezvapi strIlakzaRaparIkzArTantAsAM SfRute nizkftIH yanme mAtA praluluBe vicarantya pativratA tanme retaH pitA vfNktAmityuktEtannidarSanam DyAyatyanizwaM yatkiYcitpARigrAhasya cetasA tasyEza vyaBicArasya nihnavaH samyagucyate evaM svaBAvaM jYAtvA sAspajApatinisargajam paramaM yatramAtizWet purazo rakzaRaM prati iti nirindriyA nirvIryA DEryaprajYAdirahitA iti yAvat striyo nftamitiM prAyaSo mftavadanaSolatvAducyante SrutayaH SrutivAkyAni nigameza vedeza strIlakzaRaM svarUpaM tAsAM SrutivAkyAni nigameza vedeza strIlakzaRaM svarUpaM tAsAM SrutInAmmadye yA nizkftirUpA vyaBicAraprAyaScittarUpAstAH SrutIH SfRuta strIsvaBAvajYAnArTamityarTaH mahABArate pi kulInA rUpavatyaSca nArTavatyaSca yozitaH maryAdASca na tizWanti sa dozaH strIzu nArada anarTitvAnmanuzyasta BayAtparijanasya ca maryAdAyAmamaryAdAH striyastizWanti Bartfzu yOvane varttamAnAnAM mfzWABaraRavAsamAm nArIRAM svEravfttInAM smfhayanti kulastriyaH yadi puMsAmmatirbrahman kaTaYcinnopapadyate anyonyaYca pravanartante na ca tizWanti Bartfzu alABAt purAzARAYca anyonyaYca BayAtparijanasya ca baDabanDaBayAccEva svayaM guptA Bavanti tAH nAgnistfpyati kAzWAnAM nApagAmAM mahodaDiH nAntakaH sarvaBUtAnAnna puMsAM bAmalocanA kAmAnAmapi dAtAraM dAtAraM mAnasAnnayoH rakzitAranna mfzyanti BarttAraM yatnataH striyaH iti SrIrAmAyaRe pi nEvANganAnAndayito nApi dvezyo sti kaScana sarvamevAvalambante latA nahanajA iveti aTa raktaRaprakAraH tatra manuH na kaScidyoyitaH SaktaH prasahya parirakzitum etErupAyayOgEstu SakyAstAH parirakzitum iti prasahya Akramya avaruhyeti yAvat yadyapyavaroDena SarIravyaBicArAdrakzaRaM SakyantaTApi mAnasavyaBicArAdrakzaRamaSakyamityASayena manuza na kaScidyozitaH SaktaH prasahya parirakzitumityuktam na ca prAnasaDyaBicArAdrakzaRamanarTakamanyajatvABAvena prajAviSuDAtABAvAditi vaktavyam yata Aha sa eva yAdfSaM Bajate strI hi sutaM sUte taTAviDam tasmAt prajAviSuDyarTaM striyo rakzet prayatnataH iti yAdfSaM puruzamftukAle strI manasA Bajate tatsamAnaSIlaM putraM janayatIti pUrvArdDarTaH ata evAhatuH SaNKaliKitO yasmin BAvo rpitaH strIRAmArttave tacCIlaM janayantIti mAnasavyaBicArAdapi striyaM rakzediti SezaH taTA ca manunA tasmAdityAdinotta rArdDenAyamevArTo darSitaH parirakzaRopAyAnAha manureva arTasyasaNgrahe cEnAM vyaye cEva niyojayet SOce Darme ca paktyAYca pAriRAhyasya cekzaRe iti arTasya saNgrahe svena samAnItArTasaMviDAne vyaye svenoktavyaye SOce gfhAdiSudDikarasaMmArjanopalepanAdO Darme agnihotrAdyanukUlalOkikavyApAre paktyAM pAkavyApare pAriRAhyaM pIwAdi gfhopakaraRaM tasya IkzaRe vicAraRe nirantaragfhavyApAraniyojanAt puruzAntaracintArAhityaM yaTA Bavati BAryAyAH taTA kuryAditi tAtparyArTaH bfhaspatirapi Ayavyaye Ta saMskAre gfhIpaskararakzaRe SOcAgnikArye saMyojyAH strIRAM SudDiriya smftA iti evaviDavyApArAsaktacittatayA sADy iti vyapadiSyanta ityAha manuH AtmAnamAtmanA yAstu rakzeyustAH surakzitAH iti AtmanA gfhavyApArAsaktenAntaHkaraRena surakzitAH sADyaH AptapuruzarakzitAstu striyo na samyagrakzitA ityAha sa eva arakzitA gfhe rudDA puruzErAptakAriBiH iti AptakAriBiH puruzEH gfhe rudDA ityanvayaH AptASca te kAriRaScAptakAriRaH arakzitAH samyagrakzAvihInA ityarTaH BartturdDarmanizWatvamapi strIRAM rakzaRopAya iti darSayituM sa evAha yAdfgguRena BarttA strI saMyujyeta yaTAviDi tAdfgguRA sA Bavati samudreReva nimagnA akzamAlA vasizWena saMyuktA DamayonijA SAraNgo mandapAlena jagAmAByarhaRIyatAm iti BAryAyA BaraRamapyAvaSyakamityAha sa eva devadattAM patiBAMyAM vindatenecCayAtmanaH tAM sADvIM viBfyAnnityaM devAnAM priya mAcaran devErdattA devadattA dEvavaSAdAyAteti yAvat ta tAM BAryAM svayaMvare patirvindate tatra svavyApArABAvAddevadattAmityanena vivAhalakzaRasya strIpusayoH sambanDasya ka svAvInatvaM kintarhi devakftatvamiti darSitam devadattatvaYca strIRAm somodadganDarvAya ganDarvo dadadagnaye rayiScaputrAMScAdadagnirmahyamaTo imAm ityAdiByaH SrutivAkyaByo vagamyate tena devErdattAyA aBaraRena dAtFRAM devAnAM drAha ApAdyata ityarTavAda ityuktaM madanaratne na ca sADvImityasya pativratAmityarTaparatvena vyaBicAriRyA BaraRamanAvaSyakamiti vaktavyam tasyA api kadannAdinA vaSyaBaraRIyatvat taTA ca nAradaH vyaBicAre striyAmORqyamaDaHSayanameva ca kadannaYca kuvAsaSca karma cAvaskarojJanam iti striyAratyarTaM vyaBicAre jAte muRqanamaDaHSayanaYca sADayet kadannaM kuvAsaSca BaraRArTaM dadyAt ameDyaSoDanarUpaM karma kArayedityarTaH dozarahitAyA BAryAyAH parityAginaM pratyAha nAradaH anukUlABavAgdazwAM dakzAM sADvIM prajAvatIm tyajan BAryAmavasTApyA rAjYA daRqena BUyasA iti vizRurapi nirdIzAM parityajan patnIYceti cOravacCAsya ityanuzaNgaH nirdozA ntyAgahetuBUtardAMzarahitAm daRqena sTApayitumaSakye tvAha yogISvaraH AjYAmaBpAdinIM dakzAM vIrasUpriyavAdinAm tyajan dApyastftIyAMSamadravyoBaraRaM striyaH iti tftIyAMSantadDanatftIyAMSam rAjYA BAryAyA dApyaH alpaDanaH BaraRamAtraparyAptaM DanaM dApya ityarTaH
strIpuMDarmma strIpuMDarmma strIpuMDarmma pu striyAH puMsaSca DarmaH tamaDikftya vyavahAro vA strIpuM sayoH yaTASAstrAcArarUpe Darme tadvizayake azwA daSasu vivAdapadezu maDye vivAdapadaBede strIpuMsayogo pyatra vIra tat nyarUpi yaTA tatsvarUpamAha nAradaH vivAhAdiviDiH strIRAM yatra puMsAYca kIrttyate strIpuM sayogasaMjYaM tadvivAdapadamucyate iti vivA hAdiSabdena strIpuMDarmA gfhyante ataeva manurvyavahArapadoddeSakAle strIpuMDarmoviBAgaScetyuddiSya pratijYApUrvaMkaM tezAM nirUpaRaM cakAra puruzasya stri yAScEva Darmye vartmani tizWatoH saMyoge viprayoge ca DarmAn vakzyAmi SASvatAn ityAdinA saMyoge anyo nyasanniDAne viprayoge deSataH kAlato vA vyava DAne SASvatAnnityAn avaSyAnuzWeyAniti yAvat ke te DarmA ityAkANkzAyAmAha sa eva asvatantrAH striyaH kAryAH puruzEH svErdivAniSam vizayezu ca sajjantyaH saMsTApyA hyAtmano vaSe ityAdi puruzEH BartfpuruzEH vizaTe daRqahetuBUtacAYcalyAdivizaye nArado pi svAtantryAdvipraRaSyanti kUle jAtA api striyaH asvAtantryamatastAsAM prajApatirakalpayat iti ato nyErapi svastrIRAmasvAtantryaM yaTA Bavati taTA kalpayitavyamityASayaH puruzeRa svastrI vyaBicArAdavaSyaM rakzaRIyA taTA ca hArItaH ekavratsakannaBAvAt parendriyopahatatvAcca duzWAH kula saNkarakAriRyo Bavanti jIvati jArajaH kuRqomfte Barttari golakastasmAdretopAGAtAjjAyAM rakzejjAyA nASe kulanASaH kulanASe tantu nASastantunASe devapivf yajYanASo yarAdiByaH kanyA BaraRarUpeRa sfhyate tacCulkamiti madanaratne vyAkyA tam mitAkzarAyAM tu yadgfhItvA kanyA dIyate tacCulkamityuktam uBayatrApi pitrAdInAM kanyAyA idamityudDveSo vivakzitaH anyaTA tasyA eva dattatvAditi tatra strI DanatvavyapadeSo nyastrIDanavat sugama eva ADi vedanikaM stryantaravivAhakAle pUrvaBAryyAyE yaddIyate yadAha yAjYavalkyaH aDivinnastrayE dadyAdAGi vedanikaM samam na sadA strIRAM svAtantryaM parikIrttitam vikraye dAne ca yaTezwaM sTAvarezvapi Barttfdatte tu sTAva retaratrEva svAtantryamityAha nAradaH BartrA prAtana yaddattaM striyE tAsman mfta pi tat sA yaTA kAma balAdgrAhyaHstatparyyaptaM GanaM vA grAhyamiti SlokadvayanyArTaH idamapi tasyA dozarAhitye boDyaM duzwA punaH kimapi strIDanaM na laBate ityAha sa eva apakArakriyAyuktA nirlajjA cArTanA SikA prajAvatIm tyajan BAryAmavasTApyA rAjYA daRqena BUyasA iti vizRurapi nirdIzAM pari tyajan patnIYceti cOravacCAsya ityanuzaNgaH nirdozA ntyAgahetuBUtadAzarahitAm daRqena sTApayitu maSakye tvAca yomISvaraH AjYAmampAdinIM dakzAM vIrasU priyavAdinIm tyajan dApyastftIyAMSamadravyoBaraRaM striyaH iti tftIyAMSantadDanatftIyAMSam rAjYA BAryAyA dApyaH alpaDanaH BaraRamAtraparyyAptaM DanaM dApya strIsaNgrahaRa strIsaNgrahaRa strIsaNgrahaRa na striyAH saNgrahaRaM yatra parastrIharaRarUpe vivAdapadaBede tatsvarUpAdikaM vIrami darSita yaTA aTa strIsaNgrahaRAKyaM vyavahArapadam tasya trEviDyamAhe bfhaspatiH pApamUlaM saNgrahaRaM triprakAraM niveData balopaDikfte dve tu tftIyamanurAgajam iti etezAM svarUpaM darSayati sa eva anicCantyA yat kriyate mattonmattapramattayA vilapantyA vA rahasi balAtkArakftantu tat CadmanA gfhamAnIya datvA svaM madakAraRam saMyogaH kriyate yatra tattUpaDikftaM viduH anyonyaYcakzUrAgeRa dUtIsaMprezaRena vA kftaM rUpArTaloBena jYeyaM tadanurAgajam iti anurAgaja saNgrahasya triviDatvaM darSayati sa eva tatpunastriviDaM proktaM praTamaM maDyamottamam iti vyAso pi saNgrahastriviDojYeyaH praTamomaDyamastaTA uttamaSceti SAstrezu lakzaRaM ca pfTak pfTak iti etezAM svarUpamAhaturvyAmabfhaspatI kawAkzAvekzaRaMhAsyaM dUtIsaMprezaRaM taTA sparSoBazaRavastrARAM praTamaH saNgrahaH smftaH prezaRaM ganDamAlyAnAM PalaDUpAnnavAsasam samBAzaRaYca rahasi maDyamaM saNgrahaM viduH ekaSayyAsanaM krIqA cumbanAliNganaM taTA etat saNgrahaRaM proktamuttamaM SAstravediBiH iti strIsaNgrahaRasya jYAnopAyamAha yAjYavalkyaH pumAn saNgrahaRe grAhyaH keSAkeSi parastriyA sadyo vA kAmajEScihnEH pratipattO dvayostaTA iti paraBAryayA saha keSAkeSi krIqanena sadyaH aBinavEH kAmajEH kararuhadaSanAdikftavraRAdiliNgErdvayoH sampratipattAvayaM strIsaNgrahaRavAn iti pratipattavya ityarTaH upAyAntaramAha sa eva nIvIstanaprAvaraRasakTikeSAvamarSanam adeSakAla samBAzaH sahEkasTAname ca iti kurvARa iti SezaH sakTi UruH manurapi striya spfSedadeSe yaH spfzwo vA marzayet tayA parasparasyAnumate sarvaM saNgrahaRaM smftam yastu darpAdinA mayeyaM Bukteti vadati so pi taTAviDatvena grAhya ityAhaturmanunAradO darpAdvA yadi vA mohAt SlAGayA vA svayaM vadet pUrvaM BayeyaM Bukteti tacca saNgrahaRaM smftam iti balAtkArakftasya strIsaNgrahaRasya sAhasAntaBUtatvena tatrEva darsitatvAdupaDikfte daRqamAha bfhaspatiH darpAnnA kAmayedyastu tasya sarvaharodamaH aNgayitvA BagANkena purAnnirvAsayettataH iti sarvaharaH sarvasvaharaH etat sajAtoya vizayam hInotkfzwAgamane tu krameRArdDaM DanaM sarvasvaharaRarUpo baDasahitasarvasvaharaRarUpo vA daRqo vagantavyaH damAneyaH samAyAnviti sAhasavAdinirUpaRa darSitavacanAt tatra vacane puruzasyApakarzaH BAve yuko daRqi na striyA iti noktastasyAH daRqaH tena sAhasa strIsaNgrahaRavat prakfte pi sajAtIyApaBuktAyAH saMvyavahAryAyAH prAyaScittAcaraRAnantara punarapi tenopaBuktAyA iti jYAtavyamityuktaM madanaratne anurAgajatriviDa saNgrahaRe daRqamAha sa eva trayARAmapi cEtezAM praTamo maDyamottamO vinayaH kalpanoyaH syAdaDikodraviRADikaH iti aDikaH praTamasAhasAdiByA DikaH samBoge daRqamAha yAjYavalakyaH svajAtAvuttamA daRqa Anulomye tu maDyamaH prAtilomye baDaH puMsA nAryAH karRAdikarttanam iti caturRAmapi varRAnAM balAtkAreRa sajAtoyaparaBAryAgamane sASItipaRasahasro daRqaH yadA tyAnulomyena hInajAtIyAgamanaM tadA maDyamamAhamaH utkfzwajAtIyAgamane ganturbaDaH tasyAH karRAdikartanamityarTaH etaccAnura gajagrahaRavizayaM striyA api daRqABiDAnAt balAtkaropaDikftayostu striyA anaparADitvena daRqABAvAt asmAdeva prAtilomyena gamane puruzasya baDaM viDAya striyAstadardDatulyakarRanAmAdikarttanaviDAnAt sajAtIyAgamane puruzasya yAvuktAvuttamamaDyamasAhasO daRqO tadardDaM striyAdaRqa iti sUcitam ata eva kAtyAyanaH sarvezu cAparADezu puMsohyarTadamastaTA tadardDaM yozito dadyurbaDe puMsA Ngakarttanam iti striyA iti SezaH yadA punaH savarRAmaguptAm Anulomyena guptAM vA vrajati tadA viSezamAha manuH sahasraM brAhmaRo daRqyo guptAM viprAM balAdu vrajan SatAni paYca daRqyaH syAdicCantyA saha saNgataH sahasraM brAhmaRo daRqaM dApyo gupte tu te vrajan SUdrAyAM kzatriyaviSoH sahasrantu BaveddamaH iti te kzatriyavESye patacca gurusaKiBAryAdivyatiriktavizayam tatra daRqAntaraviDAnAt tadAha nAradaH mAtA mAvfzvasA SvaSrUrmAtulAnI pitfpvasA pitfvyasaKiSizyastrI BaginI tatsaKI snuzA duhitA cAryaBAryA ca sagotrA SaraRAgatA rAjYo pravajitA DAtrI sADvI varRottamA ca yA SiSrasyAtkarttanAlatra nAnyodaRqo viDIyate iti yattu prAtilomyena gamane kzatriyAdeH puruzasya vaDa ityuktaM yogISruravacane taduguptAvizayamanyaTA SedaRqaH taTA ca manuH uBAvapi hi tAveva brAhmaRyA guptayA saha viplutO SUdrakaddaRqO dagDavyO vA kadAgninA brAhmaRI yadyaguptAntu mevetAM vESyapArTivO vESyampaYcaSata kuryAt kzAtrayantu sahasriRam iti paYcaSatampaRaSatapaYcakadaRqaBAjamityarTaH eva sahasriRamityatrApi kzatriyasya guptavESyAgamane vESyasya ca guptakzatriyAgamane krameRa paRasahasrapaRaSatapaYcakaM tayordaRqa ityAha sa eva veSyaScet kzatriyANguptAM vESyAM vA kzatriyo vrajet yo brAhmaRyAmaguptAyAntAbuBO daRqamarhataH iti SUdrasyAguptotkfzwastrIgamane liNgacCedanasarvasvApaharaRe guptAgamane tu baDasarvasvApahArO taTA ca sa eva SUdro guptasamuptaM vA dvEjAtaM varRamAcaran aguptEkANgasarvasvo guptO sarveRa hIyate iti ayaYca baDAdyupadeSaH prajApAlanADikArAdrAjYa eva na dvijAtimAtrasya brAhmaRaH parIkzArTamapi SastraM nAdadoteti SastragrahaRasya nizidDatvAt yadA tu rAjYo nivedane kAlavilambena kAryAtipAtastadA dvijAtimAtrasyApi SastragrahaRe DikAro styeva SastraM dvijAtiBirgrAhyaM Darmo yatroparuDyate nAtatAyibaDe dozo hanturBavati kaScana pracCannaM vA prakASaM vA manyustaM manyumfcCati iti Sastra grahaRAByanujYAnAt parastriyA saha samBAzaRa karturdaRqamAha manuH parasya patnyA puruzaH saMlApaM yojayet saha pUrvasAkzArito dozEH prApnuyAt pUrvamAhasam iti AkzAritaH aBiSastaH dozaH nAnAstyupaBogavAYCABiH pApabudDyA yaH samBAzaRaM karoti tadvizayametat ata eva yastvanAkzAritaH pUrvamaBiBAzeta kAraRAt na dozaM prApnuyAt kiYcinna hi tasya vyatikramaH iti manubfhaspatyuktapUrvasAhasa maDyamasAhasayorutkfzwamajAtIyAsamBAzaRAdiyizayatvena vyavasTA parikalpanIyA parapuruzeRa saha pitrAdiBirnizidDaM samBAzaRaM yA karoti sA paRaSataM daRqyA parastriyA saha pitrAdiBirnizidDasamBAzaRaM yaH puruzaH karoti paRaSatadvayaM daRqanIyaH dvayorapi nizidDaparasparasamBAzaRAdi kurvatoH sammoge yo daRqaH sa eva daRqa ityAha yAjYavalkyaH strI nizeDe SataM dadyAtu dviSatantu damaM pumAn pratizeDe tayordaRqo yaTA grahaRe taTA iti niziDyata iti nizeDaH karmaRi halaSceti vaY cAraRAdistrIvyatiriktavizayametat nEza cAraRadarezu viDirnAtmopajIvizu sakzayanti hi te nArIrnigUQAScArayanti ca iti manusmaraRAt nawAH AtmopajIvinaH veSopajIvinaH etezAM dArezu eva viDine aBiBAzaRAdinimittakadaRqaviDirna paranare nArIH svaBAryAM sajjayanti puruzAntara saMyojanti pracCaNBIkftya cArayanti vetyarTaH sADAraRastrIgamane daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH avarudDAsude sIzu BujizyAsu taTEva ca gasyasvapi pumAndApyaH paYca SatpaRikandamam iti svAminA yA SuSrUzArTaM gfhe eva sTAtavyamityevaM puruzAntaropraBAmato nirudDAstAH avarudDAH puruzAntareRAvaruDya BujyamAnA BujajizyAH yA dAsyo BujizyA avarudDA vA tAsu sarvapuruzagamyAsvapi gamane paYcASatpaRaM daRqyaH tAmAsparaparigfhItatvena parastrItulyatvAt caSabdAdveSyAKEriRInAmapi grahaRam yAsvapi sarvapuruzasADAraRIsu paraparigfhItAsu gamane yameva daRqa iti mantavyam etadavABipretyAha nArado pi svEriRfbrAhmaRI veSyA dAsI nizkAsinI ca yA gamyAH syurAnulomyena striyo na pratilomataH Asveva tu BujizyAsu dozaH syAtparadAravat gamyAsvapi hi nopeyAdyattAH paraparigrahAH iti abrAhmaRIti svEriRyApiSezaRam svEriRI svatantrApaMScalI nizkAsinI kuwumbAnnirgateti madanaratne svAmyanavarudDA dAsIti vijYAneSvaramADavAcAryapraBftayaH BujizyA svA sveti sambanDaH vyAso pi paroparudDAgamane paYcASatpaRiko damaH prasadDya veSyAgamane daRqo daSapaqya smftaH iti prasahya vetanadAnaM vinA atrAnavarudDAsu veSyAdizu gamyatvABiDAnanna pApABAvapratipAdanArTaM kintu rAjadaRqABAvapratipAdanArTam paSuveSyAdigamane prAjApatyaM viDIyate ityAdivacanEH prAyaScittasmaraRAt balAtkAreRa anavarudDadAsyaBigamane daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH prasahya dAsyaBigame daRqo daSapaRaH smftaH bahUnAM yadyakAmAsO caturviMSatikaH pfTak iti puruzasamBogajIvikAsu dAsIzu svEriRyAdizu SulkadAnamantareRa balAtkAreRABigacCato daSapaRo daRqaH yadyanicCantImekAmbalAtkAreRa bahavo gacCanti tarhi pratyekaM caturviMSatipaRAtmako daRqa ityarTaH yadi punaH sA svecCayA BAwakaM gfhItvA paScAnnecCati tadA balAduvrajatAmapi bahUnAmadozaH vAdatasyA vyADyadyaBiBavo na Bavet ata eva nAradaH vyADitA saSramA vyagrA rAjakarmaparAyaRA AmantritA cennAgacCedadaRqyA baqavA smftA iti pAradArya prasaNgAt kanyAyAmapi daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH alaNkftAM haran kanyAmuttamaM tvanyaTA Damam daRqaM dadyAt savarRAsu pratilomye baDaH smftaH iti alaNkftAM vivAhABimuKIM tAM savarRAM kanyAmapaharan uttama sAhasaM daRqanIyaH tadanaBimuKIM haran praTamasAhasam utkfzwavarRajAtAM harataH kzatriyAderbaDa ityarTaH Anulomyena sakAmAharaRe na daRqastaTA ca sa eva sakAmAsvanulomAsu na dozastvanyaTA damaH iti kanyAdUzaRe daRqamAha sa eva dUzaRe tu karacCeda uttamAyAM baDaH smftaH SataM strIdUzaRe dadyAt dve tu miTyABiSaMsane iti paSUn gacCan SataM dApyo hInAM strINgAYca maDyamam iti yadyakAmAM kanyAnnaKakzatAdinA prasahya dUzayati tadA karacCedaH yadA tu aNguli prakzepeRa tAmeva yonikzatAM kurvan dUzayati tadA viSezamAha manuH aBizahya tu yaH kanyAM kuryAddarpeRa mAnavaH tasyASu karttye aNgulyO daRqaYcArhati zaw Satam iti sakAmadUzaRe pyAha sa eva sakAmAM dUzayan kanyAM nANgulicCedamarhati dviSataM tu damaM dApyaH prasaNgavinivfttaye iti yadA kanyA vidagDA vA kanyAM dUzayati tadApyAha sa eva kanyEva kanyAM yA kuryAttasyAstu dviSato damaH yA tu kanyAM prakuryAt strI sA sadyo mORNyamarhati aNgulyorevapa vA DvedaH KareRodvahanantaTA iti kuryAt yonikzatavatImiti SezaH yadA punarutkfzwajAtIyAM kanyAM sakAmAmakAmAM vABigacCati tadA hInasya kzatriyAderbaDaH yadA sakAmAM savarRAmaBigacCati tadA SulkaM gomiTunaM tatpitre dadyAt anicCati tasmin daRqarUpeRa rAjYe dadyAt savarRAmakAmANgacCato baDa eva tadAha manuH uttamAM sevamAnastu jaGanyovaDamarhati SulkaM dadyAt sevamAnaH mamAmicCeta pitA yadi yo kAmAM dUzayet kanyAM sa sadyo baDamarhati sakAmAM dUzayaM stulyo na baDaM prApnuyAnnaraH iti cARqAlyAdigamane daRqamAha yAjYavalakyaH antyAbigamane tvaNkyaM kuvarRena pravAsayet SUdrastaTAntya eva syAdantyasyAryAgame baDaH iti antyA cARqAlI tadgamane trEvarRikAn prApaSciTAM nABimuKAn sahasraM tvantyajastriyamiti manuvacanAnumAreRa paRasahasraM daRqayitvA kutsitavarRena BagAkAreRANkayitvA svarAdrAnnirvAsayet SUdraH punaScaRqAlINgacCaRqAla eva aNkya eveti mADavIye pAWaH cARqAlasya tUtkfzwajAtistryaBigamane baDa evetyarTaH yonivyatirikta sTale gacCato daRqamAha sa eva ayonO gacCato yozAM puruzaM vA BimohataH caturviMSatiko daRqastaTA prajitAgame iti yastu yozAM suKAdAvaBigacCati puruzaM vABimuKaM mohati taTA pravrajitAM vA gacCati asO caturviMSatipaRA daRqanIya ityarTaH strIkfte saNgrahaRe daRqamAha bfhaspatiH gfhamAgatya yA nArI praloBya sparSanAdinA kAmayet tatra sA daRqyA narasyArdDadamaH smftaH iti vacasA striyaM praloBya gacCataH puruzasya yo daRqastadardDaM daRqyA
strIsagrahaRa strIsagrahaRa strIsagrahaRa na striyAH sagrahaRaM yatra parastrIharaRarUpe vivAdapadamede tatsvarUpAdika vorami darSitaM yaTA aTa strIsaMgrahaRAKya vyavahArapadam tasya trEvi vyamAha vfhaspatiH pApamUlaM saMgrahaRaM triprakAraM Page a niToGata balopaDikfte dve tu tftIyamanurAgajam iti etezAM svarUpaM darSayati sa eva anicCantyA yat kriyata mattonmattapramatteyA vilapantyA vA rahasi balAtkArakftantu tat CadmanA gfhamAnIya dattvA svaM madakAraRam saMyogaH kriyate yatra tacUpaDikftaM viduH anyonyaYcakzUrAgeRa dUtIsaMprezaRena vA kftaM rUpArTaloBena jYeyaM tadanurAgajam iti anurAgaja saMgrahasya triviDatvaM darSayati sa eva tatpunastri viDaM proktaM praTamaM maDyamottamam iti vyAso pi saMgrahastriviDojYeyaH praTamomaDyamastaTA uttamaSceti SAstrezu lakzaRaM ca pfTak pfTaka iti etezAM svarUpa mAhaturvyAsavfhaspatI kawAkzAvekzaRaM hAsyaM dUtIsaMprezaRaM taTA sparSoBazaRavastrARAM praTamaH saMgrahaH smftaH pre zaRaM ganDamAlyAnAM PalaDUpAnnavAsasAm samBAzaRaYca rahasi maDyamaM saMgrahaM viduH ekaSayyAsanaM krIqA cumbanAliNganaM taTA etat saMgrahaRaM proktamuttamaM SAstravediBiH iti strIsaMgrahaRasya jYAnopAyamAha yAjYavalkyaH pumAn saMgrahaRe grAhyaH keSAkeSi parastriyA sadyo vA kAmajEScihnEH pratipattO dvayo staTA iti paraBAryayA sada keSAkeSi krIqanena sadyaH aBinavEH kAmajEH kararuhadaSanAdikftavraRA diliNgErdvayoH sampratipattAvayaM strIsagrahaRavAn iti pratipattavya ityarTaH upAyAntaramAha sa eva nIvIstanaprAvaraRasakTikeSAvamarSanam adeSakAla samBAzaH sahEkasTAnameva ca iti kurvARa iti SezaH sakTi UruH manurapi striyaM spfSedadeSe yaH spfzwo vA marzayet tayA parasparasyAnumate sarvaM saMgrahaRaM smftam yastu darpAdinA mayeyaM Bukteti vadati so pi taTAviGatvena grAhya ityAhaturmanunAradO darpAdvA yadi vA mohAt SlAGayA vA svayaM vadet pUrvaM mayeyaM Bukteti tacca saMgrahaRaM smftam iti balAtkArakftasya strIsaMgrahaRasya sAhasAntarBUtatvena tatrEva darSitatvAdupa Dikfta daRqamAha vfhampatiH darpAnnA kAmayedyastu tasya sarvaharodamaH aNkayitvA BagANkena purAnnirvAsaye ttataH iti sarvaharaH sarvasvaharaH etat sajAtIya vizayam hInotakfzwAgamane tu krameRArdDaM DanaM sarvasva haraRarUpo baDasahitasarvasvaharaRarUpo vya daRqA vaga ntavyaH damAneyaH samAyAntriti sAhagavAdanirUpaRa Page b darSitavacanAt tatra vacane puruzasyApakarzABAve yuko daRqA na striyA iti noktastasyAH daRqaH tena sADasa strAsaMgrahaRavat prakfta pi sajAtIyApaBuktAyAH savyava hAryyAvyAH prAyaScittAcaraRAnantaraM punarapi tenopaBuktAyA iti jYAtavyamityuktaM madanaratne anurAgajatriviGa sagrahaRe daRqamAhA sa eva trayARAmapi cEtezAM praTamo maDyamottamO vinayaH kalpanIyaH syAdADakodradiRA DikaH iti aDikaH praTamasAhasAdiByA DikaH samBoge daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH svajAtAvuttamo daRqa Anulomye tu maDyamaH prAtilomye baDaH puMmo nAryAH karRAdikarttanam iti caturRAmapi varRAnAM balAtkAreRa sajAtoyaparaBAryAvamane sASItipaRasa hasno daRqaH yadA tvAnulomyena hInajAtIyAgamanaM tadA maDyamamAhasaH utakfzwajAtIyAgamane ganturbaDaH tasyAH karRAdikarttanamityarTaH etaccAnurAgajagrahaRa vizayaM striyA api daRqABiDAnAt valAtkAropa Dikftayostu striyA anaparADatvena daRqABAvAt asmAdeva prAtilomyena gamane puruzasya baGaM viDAya stri yAstadardDatulyakarRanAsAdikarttanaviDAnAt sajAtI yAgamane puruzasya yAvuktAvuttamamaDyaBasAhasO daRqO tadardDaM striyAdaRqa iti sUcitam ataeva kAtyA yanaH sarvezu cAparADezu puMsohyarTadamastaTA tadardDaM yozitA dadyurbaDe pu so Ngakarttanam iti striyA iti SezaH yadA punaH savarRAmaguptAM Anulomyena guptAM vA vrajati tadA viSezamAha manuH sahasraM vrAhmaRo daRqyo guptAM viprAM balAd vrajan SatAni paYca daRqyaH syAdicCantyA saMha saNgataH sahasraM brahmaRI daRqaM dApyo gupte tu te vrajan SUdrAyAM kzatrayaviSoH sahasrantu BaveddamaH iti te kzatriyavESye etacca gurusaKiBAryyAdivyAtiriktavizayam tatra daRqAntara viDAnAt tadAha nAradaH mAtA mAtfzvasA SvaSrU rmAtulAnI pitfzvasA pivavyasaKiSizyastrI BaginI tatsaKI snuzA duhitA cAryaBAryyA ca sagotrA Sara RAgatA rAjYI pravrajitA DAtrI sADvI varRottamA ca yA SiSnasyotkarttanAttatra nAnyodaRqo viDIyate iti yattu prAtilomyena gamane kzatriyAdeH puruzasya vaDa ityuktaM yogoSvaravacane tadguptAvizayamanyaTA rTadaRqaH taTA ca manuH uBAvapi hi tAveva brA Page a hmaRyA guptayA saha viplutO SfdravaddaRqyO dagDavyO vA kawAgninA brahmaRIM yadyaguptAntu sevetAM vESya pArTivO vESyampaYcaSata kuryyAt kzAtrayantu sahasniRam iti paYcaSatampaRaSatapaYcakadaRqaBAjamityarTaH eva sahasriRamityatrApi kzatriyasya guptavESyAgamane vESyamya ca guptakzatriyAgamane krameRa paRasahasrapaRaSatapaYcakaM tayordaRqa ityAha sa eva vESyaScet kzatriyANguptAM vESyAM vA kzatriyo vrajet yo brAhmaRyAmaguptAyAntA vuBO daRqamahetaH iti SUdrasyAguptotkfzwastrIgamane liNgacCedanasarvasvApaharaRe guptAgamane tu baDasarvasvApa hArO taTA ca sa eva SUdro guptamaguptaM vA dvEjAtaM varRamAcaran aguptEkANgasarvasvo guptO sarveRa hIyate iti ayaYca baDAdyupadeSaH prajApAlanADikArAdrAjYa eva na dvijAtimAtrasya vrAhmaRaH parIkzArTamapi SastraM nAdadIteti SastragrahaRasya nizidDatvAt yadA tu rAjYo nivedane kAlavilambena kAryyAtipAtastadA dvijA timAtrasyApi SastragrahaRe DikAro styeva SastraM dvijAtiBirgrAhyaM Darmo yatroparuDyate myAtpAdAravat gamyA svapi hi nopeyAdyattAH paraparigrahAH iti abrAhma RIti svEriRyApiSezaRam svEriRI svatantrA puMScalI nizkAsinI kuwumbAnnirgateti madanaratne svAmyanavarudDA dAsIti vijYAneSvaramADavAcAryyapraBftayaH BujizyA svA sveti sambanDaH vyAso pi paroparudDAgamane paYcA SatpaRiko damaH prashya veSyAgamane daRqo daSapaRaH smftaH iti pramahya vetanadAnaM vinA atrAnavaru dDAsu peSyAdipu gamyatvABiDAnanna pApABAvapratipAda nArTaM kintu rAjadaRqABAvapratipAdanArTam paSu veTyAdisamane prAjApatyaM viDIyate ityAdivacanEH prAya TittasyaraRAt balAtkAreRa anavarudDadAsyaBigamane daRqa mAha yAjYavalkyaH prasahya dAsyaBigame daRqo daSa pasaH smftaH vahUnAM yadyakAmAsO caturviMSatikaH puTak iti puruzasamBogajIvikAsu dAsIzu svEri RyAdizu SulkadAnamantareRa valAtkAreRAmigacCato daSapaRo daRqaH yadyanicCantImekAmbalAtkAreRa bahavo gavarvAnta tarhi pratyekaM caturviSatipaRAtmako daRqa ittyarTaH yadi punaH sA svecCayA BAwakaM gfhItvA paScAnnecCati tadA balAdvrajatAmapi bahUnAmadozaH yadi Page a tasyA vyADyAdyaBiBavo na Bavet ataeva nAradaH vyADitA saSramA vyagrA rAjakarmaparAyaRA Ama ntritA cennAgacCedadaRqyA baqavA smftA iti pAradArya prasaNgAt kanyAyAmapi daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH ala NkftAM haran kanyAmuttamaM tvanyaTA Damam daRqaM dadyAt savarRAsu pratilomye baDaH smftaH iti ala NkftAM vivAhABimuKIM tAM savarRAM kanyAmapaharan uttama sAhasaM daRqanIyaH tadanaBimuKIM haran praTamasAha sam utkfzwavarRajAtAM harataH kzatriyAdebaDa ityarTaH Anulomyena sakAmAharaRe na daRqastaTA ca sa eva sakAmAsvanulomAsu na dozastvanyaTA damaH iti kanyAdUzaRe daRqamAha sa eva dUzaRe tu karacCeda utta mAyAM baDaH smftaH SataM strIdUzaRe dadyAt dve tu miTyA BiSaMsane iti paSUn gacCan SataM dApyo hInAM strINgAYca maDyamam iti yadyakAmAM kanyAnnaKakzatA dinA prasahya dUzayati tadA karacCedaH yadA tu aNguli prakzepeRa tAmeva yonikzatAM kurvan dUzayati tadA viSeza mAha manuH aBizahya tu yaH kanyAM kuryyAddarpeRa mAnavaH tasyASu karttye tadApyAha sa eva kanyEva kanyAM yA kuryyAttasyAstu dviSato damaH yA tu kanyAM prakuryyAt strI sA sadyo mORqyaBarhati aNgulyoreva vA CedaH KareRodvahanantaTA iti kuryyAt yonikzatavatImiti SezaH yadA punarutkfzwajAtIyAM kanyAM sakAmAmakAmAM vABigacCati tadA hInasya kzatriyAderbaDaH yadA sakAmAM savarRAmaBigacCati tadA SulkaM gomiTunaM tatpitre dadyAt anicCati tasmin daRqarUpeRa rAjYe dadyAt savarRAmakAmANgacCato baDa eva tadAha manuH uttamAM savamAnastu jaGanyobarDamarhati SulkaM dadyAt savamAnaH samAmicCet pitA yadi yo kAmAM dUzayet kanyAM sa sadyo vaDamarhati sakAmAM dUzayaM stulyo na baDaM prApnuyAnnaraH iti cARqAlyAdigamane daRqamAha yAjYavalkyaH antyABigamane tvaNkyaM kubarRena pravAsayet SUdrastaTAntya pava syAdantyasyAryAgame baDaH iti antyA cA RqAlI tadgamane trabarRikAn prAyaScittAnaBimuKAn Page b sahasraM trantyO yamiti manuvacanAnusAreRa paRasa hasraM daRqayitvA kutsitavarRene BAgAkAreRANkayitvA svarAzwrAnnirvAsayet SUdraH punaScARqAlINgacCaScaRqAla eva aNkya eveti mADavIye pAWaH cARqAlasya tUt kfzwajAtistryABigamane baDa evetyarTaH yonivyatirikta sTale gacCato daRqamAha sa eva ayonO gacCato yozAM puruzaM vA BimehataH caturviMSatiko daRqastaTA pravrajitAgame iti yastu yozAM muKAdAvaBigacCati puruzaM vaBimuKaM mehati taTA pravrajatAM vA gaccahati asO caturviMSatipaRA daRqanIya ityarTaH strIkfte saMgrahaRe daRqamAha vfhaspatiH gfhamAgatya yA nArI praloBya sparSanAdinA kAmayet tatra sA daRqyA nara syArdDadamaH smfta iti vacasA striyaM praloBya gacCataH puruzasya yo daRqastadardDaM daRqyA
suBru suBru suBru BrU strI suzWu BrUryasyAH vA UN nAryAm sundaraBruyukte tri
suBruBrU suBruBrU suBruBrU strI suzWu BruryasyAH vA UN nAryyAm su ndaraBruyukte tri
suDanvAcAryya suDanvAcAryya suDanvAcAryya pu vESyAttu jAyate vrAtyAt suDanvAcAryya eva ca kAruzaSca vijanmA ca mEtraH sAttvata eva ca manUkte vrAtyavESyAtsavarRAjAte jAtiBede
suDanvacArya suDanvacArya suDanvacArya puM vESyAttu jAyate vrAtyAt suDanvAcArya eva ca kAruzaSca vijanmA ca mEtraH sAttvata eva ca manUkte jYAtyavESyAtvrAsavarRAjAte jAtiBede
suDarmA suDarmA suDarmA strI suzWu Darmo yasyAH anicsamA vA NAp devasaBAyAm amaraH gOrA NIz suDarmItyapyatra amarawIkA
suDarman suDarman suDarman strI su Df manin devasaBAyAm kuwumbini ca puM uRA
suDarmmA suDarmmA suDarmmA strI suzWu Darmo yasyAH anicsamA vA qAp devasa BAyAm amaraH gOrA NIz suDarmItyapyatra amarawIkA
suDarmman suDarmman suDarmman strI su Df manin devasaBAyAm kuwumbini ca pu uRA
suKAyata suKAyata suKAyata puM suKenAyamyate A yama kta vinItASve SabdamA
suKAyataM suKAyataM suKAyataM pu suKenAyamyate A yama kta vinItASve SabdamA
sucitrabIjA sucitrabIjA sucitrabIjA strI sucitraM vicitraM bIjaM yasyAH viqaNgAyAM rAjani
sucitravIjA sucitravIjA sucitravIjA strI sucitraM vicitraM vIjaM yasyAH viqaNgAyAM rAjani

sujIvantO sujIvantO sujIvantO strI prA sa svarRajIvantyAm rAjani
sukarmBan sukarmBan sukarmBan pu suzWu karma yasmAt ba vizkamBAdizu maDye saptame yoge jyo SoBanakftyayute tri viSvakarmaRi pu medi prA sa SoBane kftye na

sulpaluRWa sulpaluRWa sulpaluRWa puM karpUrake Sabdaca
sumanIrajas sumanIrajas sumanIrajas na ta puzpaGUlO parAge amaraH
sumanorajas sumanorajas sumanorajas na ta puzpaDUlO parAge amaraH
sumpaluRWa sumpaluRWa sumpaluRWa pu karpUrake Sabdaca
sunAsIrya sunAsIrya sunAsI SI rya puM sunA SI sIro devatA sya yat yajYaBede Ca sunA SI sIrIyo pyatra sa ca cAturmAsyayAgaparvaBedaH kAtyA SrI kaRqikAyAmuktaH kAtyAyanaSabde dfSyam na vESvadevIye na sunAsIryeSrutiH
sunAsIryya sunAsIryya sunAsI SI ryya pu sunA SI sIro devatA sya yat yajYa Bede Ca sunA SI sIrIyo pyatra sa ca cAturmAsu yAgaparvaBedaH kAtyA SrO kaRqikAyAmuktaH kAtyAyanaSabde pf dfSyam na vESvadevIye na sunAsIryye SrutiH

sunizaRa sunizaRa sunizaRa na vgvsuzWu nizaRaM svapno yasmAt ba susuni SAke trikA kap tatrEva amaraH
supatraka supatraka supatraka puM suzWu patraM pakze sya kap SImAYjanavfkze jatukAyAM strI rAjani ata ittvam

surAcAryya surAcAryya surAcAryya pu ta vfhaspatO amaraH

suradAru suradAru suradAru na surapriyaM suralokaparyantamucCritaM vA sallatvAt dAru devadAruvfkze ratnamA

suvarRRabindu suvarRRabindu suvarRRabindu pu suvarRasya vinduyatra vizRO hemaca
suvarRa suvarRa suvarRa na suzWu varRo sya svanAmaKyAte DAtfBede amaraH haricandane medi svarRagErike ratnamA Dane hemaca nAgakesare rAjani karzaM suvarRasya suvarRasaMjYam ityukte karzamite kAYcane puM lIlA yajYaBede DustUre kaRaguggulO ca puM rAjani suzWu varRo rUpamakzaraM vAsya surUpe sundarAkzarayukte ca tri na suvarRamayI tanuH paraM nanu vAgapi tAvakI taTA nEza karzaparimARe vEdyaka agniretasSabde kanakaSabde ca suvarRaDAtUtpattiguRAdikaM dfSyam tasya SoDanamAraRaprakArAdikaM BAvapra uktaM yaTA tatraM mAraRAya yogyaM suvarRamAha dAhe raktaM sitaM Cede nizake kuNkumapraBam
