suvarRabaRij suvarRabaRij suvarRabaRij pu suvarRasya baRik krayavikrayAdikarttA jAtiBede sonAraveRe svarRabaRikpraBftayo pyatra suvarRajIvikaSabde dfSyam
suvarRabindu suvarRabindu suvarRabindu puM suvarRasya binduryatra vizRO hemaca
suvarRavaRij suvarRavaRij suvarRavaRij puM suvarRasya vaRik krayavikrayAdikarttA jAtiBede sonAraveRe svarRavaRikpraBftayo pyatra suvarRajIvikaSabde dfSyam
suvftta suvftta suvftta pu suzWu vfttaH vartulaH SUraRe ola rAjani sundaravfttAnvate tri SatapattryAM kAkalyAM drAkzA yAYca strI rAjani suvartule tri
suvidalla suvidalla suvidalla pu suvidataM rAjAnaM lAti lA ka nfpAstaHpure kftADikAre kaYcukini amaraH suvidatA rAjYA lIyata lA ka antaHpurasTanAryyAm strI rAyasukuwaH
suzuzkarA suzuzkarA suzuzkarA strI suzWu puzkaramasyAH ac sTalapadminyAm rAjani
svAmim svAmim svAmim puM sva astyarTe mini dIrGaH Barttari patyO DaraRiH kArttikeye medi rAjani amaraH viBO hare harO ca Sabdara vAtsyAyanamunO trikA aDipatO tri amaraH jEnaBede puM hemaca parivrAjakopADiBede puM tasyaBAvaH tva svAmitva svatvanarUpite krayAdyaDIne AtmavfttO padArTaBede svatvaSabde dfSyam
svAmin svAmin svAmin pu sava astyarTe mini dIrGaH Barttari patyO DaraRiH kArttikeye medi rAjani amaraH viBO hare harO ca Sabdara vAtsyAyanamunO trikA aDipatO tri amaraH jEnaBede pu hEmaca parivrA jakopADiBede pu tasya BAvaH tva svAmitva svatvanirUpite krayAdyaDIne AtmavfttO padArTaBede svatvaSabde dfSyam
svaDarma svaDarma svaDarma puM svasya yedAdivihito DarmaH svAnurUpe vedAdyukte AcArAdiDarme yo yasya vihito DarmaH sa tajjAtiH prakIrttitaH tasmAt svaDarmaM kuryAcca dvijo nityamanApadi narasiMhapuM SreyAn svaDarmo viguRaH paraDarmAt svanuzWitAt svaDarme niDanaM SreyaH paraDarmo BayAvahaH gItA
svaDarmma svaDarmma svaDarmma pu svasya yedAdivihato DarmaH svAnurupe vewAdyukte AcArAdiDarme yo yasya vihito DarmaH sa tajjAtiH prakIrttitaH tasmAt svavarmaM kuryyAcca dvijo nityamanA padi narasihapu SreyAn svaDarmo viguRaH para GarmAt svanuzWitAt svaDarme niDanaM SreyaH paraDarmo BayAvahaH gItA
svabIja svabIja svabIja puM svameva bIjaM yasya Atmani Sabdara putre kanyAyAM strI ta nijakAraRe na svasya vIrye ca na
svacCapatra svacCapatra svacCapatra na svacCa patraM yasya aBrake hemaca
svacCapattra svacCapattra svacCapattra ne svacCaM patyaM Tasya aBrake hemaca
svakarman svakarman svakarman na svasya karma svavarRocite kftye svakarmanirataH sadA gItA
svakarmman svakarmman svakarmman na svasya karma svavarRocite kftye svakarmanirataH sadA gItA
svalpapatraka svalpapatraka svalpapatraka puM svapaM patramasya kap gOraSAke maDUkaBede ratnamA
svalpapattraka svalpapattraka svalpapattraka pu svalpaM pattramasya kap gOraSAke maDUkaBede ratnamA
svanotamAha svanotamAha svanotamAha puM strI svane utsAho yasya gaRqake Sabdara striyAM NIz
svanotsAha svanotsAha svanotsAha puMstrI svane utsAho yasya gaRqake Sabdara striyAM NIz
svarRRakAya svarRRakAya svarRRakAya pu svarRamiva pItatvAt kAyo sya garuqe hemaca svarRavarRadehayute tri
svarRakAya svarRakAya svarRakAya puM svarRamiva pItatvAt kAyo sya garuqe hemaca svarRavarRadehayute tri
svarRakzIrI svarRakzIrI svarRakzIrI strI svarRamiva pItatvAt kzIraM niryyAso yasyAH gOrA NIz ozaDiBede sA ca himAlaye jAyate hemavarRo rasastasyA himabadBUmisamBavA sA nAga jihvikAkArA tanmUlaM vARijOzaDam svarRRakzIrI himA tiktA kfmipittakaPApahA mUtrakfcCASmarI SATadAhasvaraharA parA rAjani
svarRakzIro svarRakzIro svarRakzIro strI svarRamiva pItatvAt kzIraM niryAso yasyAH gOrA NIz ozaDiBede sA ca himAlaye jAyate hemavarRo rasastasyA himavaduBUmisamBavA sA nAgajihvakAkArA tanmUlaM vARijOzaDam svarRakzIro himA tiktA kfmipittakaPApahA mUtrakfcCrASmarI SATadAhasvaraharA parA rAjani
svasrIya svasrIya svasrIya pu svasurapatyam Ca BAgineye amaraRaH BAgi neyyAM strI wAp
svastrIya svastrIya svastrIya puM svasurapatyam Ca BAgineye amaraH BAgineyyAM strI wAp
svatam svatam svatam avya sva tasil AtmataH ityarTe
svatas svatas svatas avya sva tasil AtmataH ityarTe
svavIja svavIja svavIja pu svameva vIjaM yasya Atmani Sabdara putre kanyAyAM strI ta nijakAraRe na sTasya vIryye ca na
svid svid svid avya svida kvip paSne vitarke amaraH pAdapUraRe ca medi
svidu svidu svidu avya svida kvip praSne vitarke amaraH pAdapUraRe ca medi
tAdaS tAdaS tAdaS tri tasyeva darSanamasya tad dfSa kvip upa sa tattulye tAdfgguRA sA Bavati samudreReva nimnagA tAdfgrohati tattasmin vIjaM svErvyaYjitaM guREH manuH
tAdfS tAdfS tAdfS tri tasyeva daSanamasya tad dfSa kvip upa sa tattulye tAdfgguRA sA Bavati samudreReva nimnagA Page a tAdfgrohati tattasmin vIjaM svErvyaYjitaM guREH manuH
tAmrapuzpa tAmrapuzpa tAmrapuzpa pu tAmraM puzpaM yasya raktakAYcane jawA BUmi campake Sabdaca raktapuzpayuktamAtre tri tAmrapuzpESca SiKarErdIpyamAnaH sutejasA harivaM a karmma rakte puzpe na

tIrTamahAhnada tIrTamahAhnada tIrTamahAhnada pu tIrTarUpo mahAhradaH svanAmaKyAte tIrTaBede nandA cAparanandA ca taTA tIrTa mahAhradaH BA anu a nAnAtIrToktO
tIrTamahAhrada tIrTamahAhrada tIrTamahAhrada pu tIrTarUpo mahAhradaH svanAmaKyAte tIrTaBede nandA ca paranandA ca taTA tIrTamahAhradaH BA anu a nAnAtIrToktO
tIra tIra tIra pAragatO karmmasamAptO ca ada curA uBa aka sew torayati tIrayati te atitorat atitIrat ta tIra na tIra ac nadyAdeH kUle sImake sosake pu amaraH a maraH vARe pu trikA trapuRi pu medi sArdDa hastaSataM sArdDahastaSataM yAvat garBatastoramucyate BAdrakfzRacaturdaSyAM BAdrakfzRa caturdaSyAM yAvadAkramate jalam tAvadgarBaM vijAnIyAt vijAnI yAt tadanyattIramucyate prA ta ukte gaNgAkUlaBede na gaNgAtIrataraNgasaNgatajalEH snAtvA haro nArcitaH sA da aSUnyatIrAM munisanniveSEH raGuH avakASezu ava kASezu cokzozu nadItIrezu cEva hi manuH tIra pAragatO karmmasamAptO ca ada curA uBa aka sew tIrayati te atitIrat ta tIra na tIra ac nadyAdeH kUle sosake pu a maraH vARe pu trikA trapuRi pu medi sArdDahastaSataM yAvat garBatastoramucyate BAdrakfzRa caturdaSyAM yAvadAkramate jalam tAvadgarBaM vijAnI yAt tadanyattIramucyate prA ta ukte gaNgAkUlaBede na gaNgAtIrataraNgasaNgatajalEH snAtvA haro nArcitaH sA da aSUnyatIrAM munisanniveSEH raGuH ava kASezu cokzozu nadItIrezu cEva hi manuH
tOryyatriMka tOryyatriMka tOryyatriMka na trayaH parimARaBasya kan tOryyopalakzita trikam samuditezu nftyagItavAdyezu amaraH vane pi tOryyatrikamArarADa tam nEzaDam tOryyatrikaM vfTAdyA kAmajo daSako gaRaH manuH

tURa tURa tURa saNkoce ada curA uBa saka sew tURayati te atutURat ta tURa saNkoce cu uBa saka sew tURayati te atUtuRat ta tURa pUraRe cu A saka sew tURayate atUtuRat ta tURa pu tURyate pUryyate vAREH tURa pUraRe karmmaRi GaY izuDO bARADAre vARADAre amaraH tURa saNkoce ada curA uBa saka sew tURayati te atutURat ta tURa saNkoce cu uBa saka sew tURayati te atUtuRat ta tURa pUraRe cu A saka sew tURayate atUtuRat ta tURa pu tURyate pUryyate vAREH tURa pUraRe karmmaRi GaY izuDO vARADAre amaraH

tUla tUla tUla pUraRe curA A saka sew tUlayate atUtulata tUla iyattAparicCede nizkASane BvA para saka sew tUlati atUlIt atlIt tutUla tUla na tUlayati pUrayati tUlyate vA tUla ac sarvavyApake sarvavyA pake AkASe medi aSvatyAkAre aSvatTAkAre tUde vfkze BAvapra tUdaSabde dfSyam kArpAsAdivIjajAte tUlA KyAte padArTe sarvaM dahati gaNgAmBastUlarASimivAnalaH prA ta avyayIBAve sya kUlatIratUletyAdinA pA AdyudAttatA Adyu dAttatA upatUlam tUlaSabde pare IzikASabdasya zazWItatpuruze zazWI Page b tatpuruze hrasvaH IzikatUlaM muYjezIkAtUlam kaYjakaM kaYcarka tUlagarBaYca tUlikAm sUpavItikAM maYjizWArUpavAsAMsi taTA tUlavatIM pawIm UrRAmAni UrRAmayAni vAsAMsi yatiByo pi pradApayet kASI a tUla pUraRe curA A saka sew tUlayate atUtulata tUla iyattAparicCede nizkASane BvA para saka sew tUlati atlIt tutUla tUla na tUlayati pUrayati tUlyate vA tUla ac sarvavyA pake AkASe medi aSvatTAkAre tUde vfkze BAvapra tUdaSabde dfSyam kArpAsAdivIjajAte tUlA KyAte padArTe sarvaM dahati gaNgAmBastUlarASimivAnalaH prA ta avyayIBAve sya kUlatIratUletyAdinA pA Adyu dAttatA upatUlam tUlaSabde pare IzikASabdasya zazWI Page b tatpuruze hrasvaH IzikatUlaM muYjezIkAtUlam kaYcarka tUlagarBaYca tUlikAm sUpavItikAM maYjizWArUpavAsAMsi taTA tUlavatIM pawIm UrRAmayAni vAsAMsi yatiByo pi pradApayet kASI a
tUr tUr tUr tri tura karttari kvip vegayukte BAve sampa kvip vege strI pUrBirmayena vihitABiradfSyatUrBiH BA adfSyatUrBiH alakzyavegABiH SrIDaraH
tUrRASa tUrRASa tUrRASa na tUrRamaSnute aSa ac udake pratiSrutAyA vo vfzattUrRASaM na gireraDi f tUrRASamudakaM Bavati tUrRamaSnute niru BA
tUrRRASa tUrRRASa tUrRRASa na tUrRamaSnute aSa ac udake pratiSrutAyA vo vfzattUrRASaM na gireraDi f tUrRASa mudakaM Bavati tUrRRamaSnute niru BA
tUrRRa tUrRRa tUrRRa na tvara saMBrame BAve kta pakze iqaBAvaH UW tasya naH SIGre karttari kta tvarAyukte tri amaraH aByA jato ByAgatatUrRatarRakAn mAGaH cUrRamAnIyatAM tUrRaM pUrRacandraniBAnane parRAni svarRavarRAni sIda ntyAkarRalocane udBawaH
tUrRa tUrRa tUrRa na tvara saMBrame BAve kta pakze iqaBAvaH UW tasya naH SIGre karttari kta tvarAyukte tri amaraH aByAjato ByAgatatUrRatarRakAn mAGaH cUrRamAnIyatAM tUrRaM pUrRacandraniBAnane parRAni svarRavarRAni sIdantyAkarRalocane udBawaH
tUra tUra tUra hiMse saka vege aka divA Atma sew tUryyati atUrizwa tutUre tUra tri tura karttari kvip vegayukte BAve sampa kvip vege strI pUrBirmayena vihitABiradfSyatUrBiH BA adfSyatUrBiH alakzyavegABiH SrIDaraH tUra na tUryyate tAqyate muKamArutena tUra GaYarTe karmaRi ka vAdyaBede sAnAi hemaca tAqyamAne tAqalAne pawahAdO SabdArTaci tUra hiMse saka vege aka divA Atma sew tUryyati atUrizwa tutUre tUra tri tura karttari kvip vegayukte BAve sampa kvip vege strI pUrBirmayena vihitABiradfSyatUrBiH BA adfSyatUrBiH alakzyavegABiH SrIDaraH tUra na tUryyate tAqyate muKamArutena tUra GaYarTe karmaRi ka vAdyaBede sAnAi hemaca tAqalAne pawahAdO SabdArTaci
tUtaka tUtaka tUtaka na tutTa pfzo tutTe tu tiyA Sabdaca
tUtuka tUtuka tUtuka na tutTa pfzo tutTe tuztiyA Sabdaca
ta ta ta takAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH dantyaH ardDamAtrAkAleno ccAryyaH asyoccAraRe dantmUlena jihvAgrasya sparSa ABya ntaraprayatnaH bivAraSvAsADozA bAhyaprayatnAH mAtfkA nyAse sya vAmasPici nyasyatA asya vAcakaSabdA varRA BiDAne uktA yaTA taH pUtanA hariH SudDiSaktiH SuktirjawI DvajI vAmasPigvAmakawyO ca kAminI maGyakarRakaH AzAwI taRqatuBraSca kAmikApfzWapucCakaH ratnakaSca SyAmamuKo vArAhI makaro ruRA sugatordDa suKAcUrdDalAnuSca krozwupucCakaH ganDo viSvA marucCatra Page b ScAnurADA na sOrakaH jayantI punuko BrAntiranaNgamada nAturA tadaDizWAtfdevatADyAnaM varzRodDAratantroktaM yaTA DyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRuzva kamalAnane caturBujAM mahASAntAM mahAmokzapradAyinIm sadA zoqaSavarzIyAM raktAmbaraDarAM parAm nAnAlaNkAraBUzAdyAM sarvasidDi pradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA takArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet kAmaDenutantre asya svarUpamuktaM yaTA takAraM caYcalApANgi svayaM paramakuRqalI paYcadevAtmakaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRam AtmAditattvasaMyutam trivindusahitaM varRaM pItavidyut samapraBam tovyomAntalaGurDanApaharaRam iti vf ra wI tasya vyomadevatvaM mAtrAvftte praTamopanyAse DanApahAraH PalaYcoktam ta pu taka hasane sahane vA qa cOre amfte pucCe krIqe mlecCe ca medi garBe SaWe Sabdaca ratne srugate sugate deve gOravivarjjite krozwu pucCe krozwozwupucCe ca ekA ko taruRe puRye klI strI medi trivarRaprastAve Adyagurudvayake antyalaGuke gaRaBede so ntaguruH kaTito laTito ntyalaGustaH Candoma ta takAro vyaYjanavarRaBedaH dantyaH ardDamAtrAkAleno ccAryyaH asyoccAraRe dantmUlena jihvAgrasya sparSa ABya ntaraprayatnaH bivAraSvAsADozA bAhyaprayatnAH mAtfkA nyAse sya vAmasPici nyasyatA asya vAcakaSabdA varRA BiDAne uktA yaTA taH pUtanA hariH SudDiSaktiH SuktirjawI DvajI vAmasPigvAmakawyO ca kAminI maGyakarRakaH AzAwI taRqatuBraSca kAmikApfzWapucCakaH ratnakaSca SyAmamuKo vArAhI makaro ruRA sugatordDa suKAcUrdDalAnuSca krozwupucCakaH ganDo viSvA marucCatra Page b ScAnurADA na sOrakaH jayantI punuko BrAntiranaNgamada nAturA tadaDizWAtfdevatADyAnaM varzRodDAratantroktaM yaTA DyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRuzva kamalAnane caturBujAM mahASAntAM mahAmokzapradAyinIm sadA zoqaSavarzIyAM raktAmbaraDarAM parAm nAnAlaNkAraBUzAdyAM sarvasidDi pradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA takArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet kAmaDenutantre asya svarUpamuktaM yaTA takAraM caYcalApANgi svayaM paramakuRqalI paYcadevAtmakaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRam AtmAditattvasaMyutam trivindusahitaM varRaM pItavidyut samapraBam tovyomAntalaGurDanApaharaRam iti vf ra wI tasya vyomadevatvaM mAtrAvftte praTamopanyAse DanApahAraH PalaYcoktam ta pu taka hasane sahane vA qa cOre amfte pucCe krIqe mlecCe ca medi garBe SaWe Sabdaca ratne sugate deve gOravivarjjite krozwozwupucCe ca ekA ko taruRe puRye klI strI medi trivarRaprastAve Adyagurudvayake antyalaGuke gaRaBede so ntaguruH laTito ntyalaGustaH Candoma

takza takza takza kArSye tanUkaraRe cAzcA cA cA ColA vyApAre vA BvA pakze svA pa saka vew takzati takzRoti takzanti takzRuvanti atakzIt atAkzIt tatakza takzizyati takzyati tazwA takzaRam tazwaH takzya tazwvA prakAzWataw dAravAraRAYca dAravARAYca takzaRam manuH cazAlaM ye aSvayUpAya takzati f bAhyASakalamapatakzRuvanti Sata brA takza tvaco grahaRe saMvaraRe BvA pa saka sew takzati kAyaM varmmaRA yoDA atakzIt tatakza takza pu rAmAnujasya Baratasya putraBede takzaH puzkara ityAstAM Baratasya mahIpate BAga sa BarataH takzapuzkalO putrO rAjaDAnyostadAKyayoH aBizecyABizekArhO rAmAntikamagAt punaH raGuH tannAmake rAjaDAnIBede ca takza BAve GaY tanUkaraRe kavacAdi kavacAdiM saMvaraRe uBO kawyAM kaWyAM supArSve tu takzavantO ca SikzitO BA sa a takza kArSye tanUkaraRe cA cA ColA vyApAre vA BvA pakze svA pa saka vew takzati takzRoti takzanti takzRuvanti atakzIt atAkzIt tatakza takzizyati takzyati tazwA takzaRam tazwaH takzya tazwvA prakAzWataw dAravARAYca takzaRam manuH cazAlaM ye aSvayUpAya takzati f bAhyASakalamapatakzRuvanti Sata brA takza tvaco grahaRe saMvaraRe BvA pa saka sew takzati kAyaM varmmaRA yoDA atakzIt tatakza takza pu rAmAnujasya Baratasya putraBede takzaH puzkara ityAstAM Baratasya mahIpate BAga sa BarataH takzapuzkalO putrO rAjaDAnyostadAKyayoH aBizecyABizekArhO rAmAntikamagAt punaH raGuH tannAmake rAjaDAnIBede ca takza BAve GaY tanUkaraRe kavacAdiM saMvaraRe uBO kaWyAM supArSve tu takzavantO ca SikzitO BA sa a
takzaRI takzaRI takzaRI strI takzyate nayA takza karaRe lyuw NIp vASyAm vAisa kAzWatakzaRasADane astraBede Sabdara
tala tala tala pratizWAyAM vA curA uBa pakze BvA para aka sew tAlayati te talati atItalat ta atAlIt tAlayAm baBUya Asa cakAra tatAla telatuH talam tala pu na tala ac svarUpe SEleyanadDezu SilAtalezu kumA himaDAmni darpaRatale ca muhuH mAGaH vidANkurvantu vidANgurvantu mahatastalaM vidvizadamBasaH talaM svarUpaM pramARaM veti mallinA jyAGAtavAraRe kAnane kAryyavIje na medi gartte pu trikA pAdatalasya maDye hemaca idaM rasAtalaM nAma saptaBaM pfTivI talam BA vi a muvastalamiva Buvastalamiva vyoma kurvan vyomeva BUtalam raGuH tAlavfkze pu capewe caqa tsarO Kaq gamuzwO KaqgamuzwO savyahastena tantrovAdane pu medi goDAyAM pu hemaca tala pratizWAyAM vA curA uBa pakze BvA para aka sew tAlayati te talati atItalat ta atAlIt tAlayAm baBUya Asa cakAra tatAla telatuH talam tala pu na tala ac svarUpe SEleyanadDezu SilAtalezu kumA himaDAmni darpaRatale ca muhuH mAGaH vidANgurvantu mahatastalaM vidvizadamBasaH talaM svarUpaM pramARaM veti mallinA jyAGAtavAraRe kAnane kAryyavIje na medi gartte pu trikA pAdatalasya maDye hemaca idaM rasAtalaM nAma saptaBaM pfTivI talam BA vi a Buvastalamiva vyoma kurvan vyomeva BUtalam raGuH tAlavfkze pu capewe caqa tsarO KaqgamuzwO savyahastena tantrovAdane pu medi goDAyAM pu hemaca
tamo'paha tamo'paha tamo paha pu tamo pahanti apa ina qa sUryye candre vahnO boDe ca medi tamonASakamAtre pradIpAdO tri grasate hi tamo paraM muhuH mAGaH putraM tamo pahaM leBe naktaM jyotirivOzaDiH raGuH mohanASake AgamAdiva tamo pahAditaH kirA budDerajYAnanASakatvAt taTAtvam tatrAjYAnaM DiyA naSyet vedAntakA
tamo'ri tamo'ri tamo ri pu ta sUryye candre vahnO jYAne ca tamo ribimbaprativimbaDArI rurAva kAnte pavanASanASaH sundarasamasyApUraRam tamaH Satru paBftayo pyatra
tamopaha tamopaha tamo paha pu tamo pahanti apa ina qa sUryye candre vahnO boDe ca medi tamonASakamAtre pradIpAdO tri grasate hi tamo paraM muhuH mAGaH putraM tamo pahaM leBe naktaM jyotirivOzaDiH raGuH mohanASake Aga mAdiva tamo pahAditaH kirA budDerajYAnanASaka tvAt taTAtvam tatrAjYAnaM DiyA naSyet vedAntakA
tamori tamori tamo ri pu ta sUryye candre vahnO jYAne ca tamo rivimbaprativimbaDArI rurAva kAnte pavanASanASaH sundarasamasyApUraRam tamaHSatrupraBftayo pyatra
tana tana tana vistftO tanA uBa saka sew tanoti tanute atAnIt atanIt atata atanizwa tatAna tenatuH tene udit tanitvA tAntvA tataH vitAnaH tanoti BAnoH parivezakEtavAt nEza AcAryyastanute vivftimimAM dAyaBAgasya dAyaBAgawIkA tatAna sopAnaparamparAmiva sopAnaparamparA miva raGuH yasya tasya vinA zazWIM teneti karaRaM vinA udBawaH tenire Birucitezu taruRyaH mAGaH sa tamIM tamomiraBigamya tamoBiraBigamya tatAm mAGaH tanvatA praTamatAdfSi rAgam mAGaH ati atiSayavistAre atitat tattato titatAtitut tantato titatA titut mAGaH vi ati vyatitahAreRa vistAre Atma viyati vyatyatanvAtAM vyatyata nvAtAM mUrttI haripayoniDI BawwiH aDi Aropya vistAre DanuraDitanoti Sata brA a anu santatavistAre paScAdvistAre ca paripAlyAnutanuyAdeSaDarmaH paripAlyAnutanuyAdeza DarmaH sanAtanaH BA SA a apa aDovistAre apatAnakaH ava santatavistAre viSAlamUlAvatataM pavanAmBodaDAriRam harivaM a A dIrGatayA vistAre AtAnaH wAnA deoyA samyagvistAre samyag Page a vistAre ca mOrvI Danuzi cAtatA raGuH yaduta punarAtmAnusmftimozaRaM mAyAmayaBogESvaryyamevAtanuta BAga idaM te loBAnDasya cezwitaM cetasi camatkAramAtanoti pravoDa ca vi A viSezeRa vistAre vyAtene kiraRAvalImudayanaH kiraRAvalI ud UrdDato UrdDvato vistAre uttAnaH pra prakarzeRa vistAre PalaM prakalpya pUrvaM hi tato yajYaH pratAyataM pratAyate BA SA Slo tadurIkftya kftiBirvAcaspatyaM kfti BirvAcaspatyaM pratAyate mAGaH pakze pratanyate vi viSezeRa vistAre vitAnaH paqAna deoyA yaTA lUtA AtAnavitAnAmyAmiti AtAnavitAnAByAmiti vedAntapra sam samyagvistAre santAnaH santatiH santatam santatA SuSuBe BUmiH rAmA sa a tana upakAre SradDAyAM AGAte ca vA curA uBa pakze BvA saka Sabde aka sew tAnayati te tanati atotanat atItanat ta atAnIt atanIt vyupasargAt dEDye dErGye aka dIrGIkaraRe dIrGIka raRe saka vitAnayati dIrGo Bavati dIrGaM karoti vA vitAnayati yaH kIrttiM vitanatyamalaM yaSaH kavirahasyam kavi rahasyam ayaM vede gaRavyAtyasAt divA GozA GozAdindrAya GozA dindrAya tanyati bruvARaH f tanyati SabdaM karoti BA DOrAdikasya cOrAdikasya adantatvamiti tanayitruSabdArTe tana yitnuSabdArTe mADavaH tanayitnuSabde dfSyam tana vistftO tanA uBa saka sew tanoti tanute atAnIt atanIt atata atanizwa tatAna tenatuH tene udit tanitvA tAntvA tataH vitAnaH tanoti BAnoH parivezakEtavAt nEza AcAryyastanute vivftimimAM dAyaBAgasya dAyaBAgawIkA tatAna sopAnaparamparA miva raGuH yasya tasya vinA zazWIM teneti karaRaM vinA udBawaH tenire Birucitezu taruRyaH mAGaH sa tamIM tamoBiraBigamya tatAm mAGaH tanvatA praTamatAdfSi rAgam mAGaH ati atiSayavistAre atitat tantato titatA titut mAGaH vi ati vyatitahAreRa vistAre Atma viyati vyatyata nvAtAM mUrttI haripayoniDI BawwiH aDi Aropya vistAre DanuraDitanoti Sata brA a anu santatavistAre paScAdvistAre ca paripAlyAnutanuyAdeza DarmaH sanAtanaH BA SA a apa aDovistAre apatAnakaH ava santatavistAre viSAlamUlAvatataM pavanAmBodaDAriRam harivaM a A dIrGatayA vistAre AtAnaH wAnA deoyA samyag Page a vistAre ca mOrvI Danuzi cAtatA raGuH yaduta punarAtmAnusmftimozaRaM mAyAmayaBogESvaryyamevAtanuta BAga idaM te loBAnDasya cezwitaM cetasi camatkAramAtanoti pravoDa ca vi A viSezeRa vistAre vyAtene kiraRAvalImudayanaH kiraRAvalI ud UrdDvato vistAre uttAnaH pra prakarzeRa vistAre PalaM prakalpya pUrvaM hi tato yajYaH pratAyate BA SA Slo tadurIkftya kfti BirvAcaspatyaM pratAyate mAGaH pakze pratanyate vi viSezeRa vistAre vitAnaH paqAna deoyA yaTA lUtA AtAnavitAnAByAmiti vedAntapra sam samyagvistAre santAnaH santatiH santatam santatA SuSuBe BUmiH rAmA sa a tana upakAre SradDAyAM AGAte ca vA curA uBa pakze BvA saka Sabde aka sew tAnayati te tanati atItanat ta atAnIt atanIt vyupasargAt dErGye aka dIrGIka raRe saka vitAnayati dIrGo Bavati dIrGaM karoti vA vitAnayati yaH kIrttiM vitanatyamalaM yaSaH kavi rahasyam ayaM vede gaRavyAtyasAt divA GozA GozA dindrAya tanyati bruvARaH f tanyati SabdaM karoti BA cOrAdikasya adantatvamiti tana yitnuSabdArTe mADavaH tanayitnuSabde dfSyam
tanca tanca tanca gatO BvA para saka sew taYcati ataYcIt tataYca tatacatuH taktaH tacyate udit taYcitvA taktvA tanca saNkoce ruDA para saka sew pARinIyagaRe anja sAhacaryyAdayaM veqeva vopadevagaRe uditkaraRaM prAmAdikam prAmAdi kam kintu Udideva tanakti ataYcIt atANkzIt tataYca tanacmi vyoma vistftam BawwiH A AtaYcanaSabdoktArTezu dambaladetoyA indsya dambaladeoyA indrasya tvA BAgaM somenAtanacmi yaju udvAsyAtanakti prAgGftaSezeRendrasya tveti udvATAtanakti prAgGuta SezeRendrasyatveti kAtyA SrO tAM dugDasTAlImuttarata dugDasTAlImutta Page a rata udvAsya prAgGutaSezeRa pUrvadine kftAgni hotraSezeRa kftAgnihotraSezeRa daDnA dugDamAtanakti avaSizwaM daDi dugDamaDye prakzipati daDitvasampattyarTam karkaH BayahetukasaNkoce ca nyaNkvA kutvam AtaNkaH AtaNkyam tanca gatO BvA para saka sew taYcati ataYcIt tataYca tatacatuH taktaH tacyate udit taYcitvA taktvA tanca saNkoce ruDA para saka sew pARinIyagaRe anja sAhacaryyAdayaM veqeva vopadevagaRe uditkaraRaM prAmAdi kam kintu Udideva tanakti ataYcIt atANkzIt tataYca tanacmi vyoma vistftam BawwiH A AtaYcanaSabdoktArTezu dambaladeoyA indrasya tvA BAgaM somenAtanacmi yaju udvATAtanakti prAgGuta SezeRendrasyatveti kAtyA SrO tAM dugDasTAlImutta Page a rata udvAsya prAgGutaSezeRa pUrvadine kftAgnihotraSezeRa daDnA dugDamAtanakti avaSizwaM daDi dugDamaDye prakzipati daDitvasampattyarTam karkaH BayahetukasaNkoce ca nyaNkvA kutvam AtaNkaH AtaNkyam
tannasevanI tannasevanI tannasevanI strI tunnaM CinnaM sIvyate nayA siva karaRe lyuw NIp sUcIBede praveSya tunnasevanyA muzkO sIvyet tataH param suSrutaH
tannavAya tannavAya tannavAya pu tunnaM CinnaM vayati ve aR sOcike sUcyAjIvini darajI amaraH SElUzatunnavAyAnna kftaGnasyAnnameva ca manunA tadannaBakzaRaM nizidDam
tanuhnada tanuhnada tanuhnada pu tano rhrada iva pAyO trikA
tanuhrada tanuhrada tanuhrada pu tano rhrada iva pAyO trikA
tapa tapa tapa upatApe saka ESvaryye aka di A aniw tapyate atapta tape tepe taptA tapsyate taptaH taptiH ava aGastAse aDastAse avataptenakulasTitam si kO A samyaktApe AtaptajAmbUnadaBUzitANgaH harivaM a anu santatatApe anuSocane ca amutapye anutapye BfSaM tAta tava GoreRa karmaRA BA va Slo anvatapyata DarmAtmA putraM saMcintya tApasam rAmA ayo a vanaM prasTApya duzwAtmA nAnvatapyata durmatiH BA va a tapa dAhe cu uBa saka sew tapayati te atItapat ta saMpratyayogyasTitireza deSaH karAhimAMSorapi karA himAMSorapi tApayanti udBawaH na hi tApayituM SakyaM sAgarAmBastfRolkayA hito ko tra BUmivalaye janAn muDA tApayan sucirameti suci rameti sampadam mAGaH ava aDoBAge tApane aTAvatApya pfTivIM pUzA divasasaMkzaye divasasaM kzaye jagAmAstaM sahasrAMSuH mA BA u a tapa dAhe BvA uBa saka sew jvalane niru tapati te atApIt atapIt atapizwa tatApa tepe tapizyati te varzate tapate ko nyo jvalate tejasA ca kaH BA anu a tvamekEkastapase jAtavedAH BA A a tapAmyahamahaM varzaM nigfhRAmyutsfjAmi ca gItA tamastapati GarmAMSO Saku tapaH karmmakatve tapaHkarmmakatve sya karttaryyapi yak taNa ca tapyate tapastApasaH aBi paryyAlocane pfTivImantarikzaM divaM tAllozkAnamyatapat tAllo kA naByatapat Eta vrA aByatapat paryyAlocitavAn ud dIptO aka Atma svANgakarmakatve saka Atma uttapate utta pate dIpyate ityarTaH si kO pARAmuttapate pARimuttapate svANgetyukteH pa mEtrasya pARimuttamapi pARimuttapati anyakarmaRi tu pa uttapati suvarRaM vilApayatItyarTaH si kO Page b tIvramuttapamAno yamaSakyaH soQumAtapaH BawwiH karaRaM kusumezuruttapati yadviSiKaH mAGaH upa pIqAjanyatApe AhitAgniScedupatapet ASva gf upatapet vyADiBirutpIdyetetyarTaH vyADiBirutpIqyetetyarTaH ni nitarAM tApe tadAhurniSocati nitapati varzizyati vA CA u nis niH SezeRa niHSezeRa tApe pOnaH punya na tApe zatvam dagDEkadeSA dagDE kadeSA bahavo nizwaptASca taTApare BA A a nizwapati suvarRam Asevane tu naza tvaM nistapati suvarRaM suvarRakAraH yastu sUryyeRa nizwaptaM gANgeyaM pibate jalam BA Anu a zatve uBayatakA grahaRam pra prakarzeRa tApe vikramahetuke tApe ca BAsastavogrAH pratapanti vizRo gItA sUryyaH pratapatAM SrezWaH BA vi Slo BAskarAta pratapizyataH mA BA va a dvitIyasyeva sUryyasya yugAnte pratapizyataH BA va a vi uttApavat sarvam ravirvitapate tyarTam BawwiH dIpyate ityarTaH pARiM vitapate mEtrasya pARiM vitapati suvarRaM vitapatItyAdi vitapannarAtim aTa sam samyaktApe dattvApi ca DanaM kAle santapatyupakAriRe santapatyuH kAriRe BA SA a tapa pu tapa ac grIzme jyEzWAzAQAtmake ftO amaraH tamena tapena varzAH SaradA himAgamaH mAGaH taparttupUrttAvapimedasAmBarAH taparttupUrttA vapimedasAmBarAH nEza tapAtyaye vAriBirukzitAnavEH vAriBirukzitA navEH kumA kiYcit karmmopapade tApeH Kac hrasvaSca tattApake parantapaH BAve ap tapasi ca aSmakuwwA aSma kuwwA niraSanA daSapaYcatapA ime harivaM a tapa upatApe saka ESvaryye aka di A aniw tapyate atapta tepe taptA tapsyate taptaH taptiH ava aDastAse avataptenakulasTitam si kO A samyaktApe AtaptajAmbUnadaBUzitANgaH harivaM a anu santatatApe anuSocane ca anutapye BfSaM tAta tava GoreRa karmaRA BA va Slo anvatapyata DarmAtmA putraM saMcintya tApasam rAmA ayo a vanaM prasTApya duzwAtmA nAnvatapyata durmatiH BA va a tapa dAhe cu uBa saka sew tapayati te atItapat ta saMpratyayogyasTitireza deSaH karA himAMSorapi tApayanti udBawaH na hi tApayituM SakyaM sAgarAmBastfRolkayA hito ko tra BUmivalaye janAn muDA tApayan suci rameti sampadam mAGaH ava aDoBAge tApane aTAvatApya pfTivIM pUzA divasasaM kzaye jagAmAstaM sahasrAMSuH BA u a tapa dAhe BvA uBa saka sew jvalane niru tapati te atApIt atapIt atapizwa tatApa tepe tapizyati te varzate tapate ko nyo jvalate tejasA ca kaH BA anu a tvamekEkastapase jAtavedAH BA A a tapAmyahamahaM varzaM nigfhRAmyutsfjAmi ca gItA tamastapati GarmAMSO Saku tapaHkarmmakatve sya karttaryyapi yak taNa ca tapyate tapastApasaH aBi paryyAlocane pfTivImantarikzaM divaM tAllo kA naByatapat Eta vrA aByatapat paryyAlocitavAn ud dIptO aka Atma svANgakarmakatve saka Atma utta pate dIpyate ityarTaH si kO pARimuttapate svANgetyukteH pa mEtrasya pARimuttapati anyakarmaRi tu pa uttapati suvarRaM vilApayatItyarTaH si kO Page b tIvramuttapamAno yamaSakyaH soQumAtapaH BawwiH karaRaM kusumezuruttapati yadviSiKaH mAGaH upa pIqAjanyatApe AhitAgniScedupatapet ASva gf upatapet vyADiBirutpIqyetetyarTaH ni nitarAM tApe tadAhurniSocati nitapati varzizyati vA CA u nis niHSezeRa tApe pOnaH punya na tApe zatvam dagDE kadeSA bahavo nizwaptASca taTApare BA A a nizwapati suvarRam Asevane tu naza tvaM nistapati suvarRaM suvarRakAraH yastu sUryyeRa nizwaptaM gANgeyaM pibate jalam BA Anu a zatve uBayatakA grahaRam pra prakarzeRa tApe vikramahetuke tApe ca BAsastavogrAH pratapanti vizRo gItA sUryyaH pratapatAM SrezWaH BA vi Slo BAskarAta pratapizyataH BA va a dvitIyasyeva sUryyasya yugAnte pratapizyataH tapanacCada tapanacCada tapanacCada pu tapanapriyaH Cado sya damanakavfkze rAjani

tapasya tapasya tapasya tapaH karoti tapas kftO kyac aka sew tapasyati atapasyIt atapasIt tapasyA sTARuM tapasyantamaDityakAyAm kumA tapasya pu tapasi sADu yat PAlgune PAlguneM mAsi amaraH tapASca tapasyaSca SESirAvftUH yaju tapasyAya tvA arjUne tasya PAlgunanAmakatvAt taTAtvam BAve a tapasyA tapaScaryyAyAM strI tapasi BavaH yat tapoBave tri svidyAccet tapasyAByo dByaH svAhA kAtyA SrO tapasya BAve GaY tapaScarase tapaScaraRe pu aTAsyu aTAsya budDiraBavattapasye BaratarzaBa BA Anu a tAmasasya manoH putraBede pu putrAMScEva pravakzyAmi tAmasasya manornfpa CatristapasyaH sutapAstaposalastapo sutapAstapomulastapo SanaH taporatirakalmAzastanvI DanvI parantapaH harivaM a tapasya tapaH karoti tapas kftO kyac aka sew tapasyati atapasyIt atapasIt tapasyA sTARuM tapasyantamaDityakAyAm kumA tapasya pu tapasi sADu yat PAlguneM mAsi amaraH tapASca tapasyaSca SESirAvftUH yaju tapasyAya tvA arjUne tasya PAlgunanAmakatvAt taTAtvam BAve a tapasyA tapaScaryyAyAM strI tapasi BavaH yat tapoBave tri svidyAccet tapasyAByo dByaH svAhA kAtyA SrO tapasya BAve GaY tapaScaraRe pu aTAsya budDiraBavattapasye BaratarzaBa BA Anu a tAmasasya manoH putraBede pu putrAMScEva pravakzyAmi tAmasasya manornfpa CatristapasyaH sutapAstapomulastapo SanaH taporatirakalmAzastanvI DanvI parantapaH harivaM a
tapo'Sana tapo'Sana tapo Sana pu caturTamanvantare samarzimaDye pOlastye fziBede tapoDftiSabde dfSyam tAmasasya manoH putraBede tapasya Sabde dfSyam

taptakumBa taptakumBa taptakumBa pu taptaH kumBo yatra narakaBede tatsvarUpaM yaTA ataHparaM BImataraM taptakumBaM nivoDa me samantatastapta kumBo vahnijvAlAsamAvftaH jvaladagnicayodvftta tElAyaScUrRapUritaH mArka pu
taptukumBa taptukumBa taptukumBa pu taptaH kumBo yatra narakaBede tatsvarUpaM yaTA ataH paraM BImataraM taptakumBaM nivoDa me samantatastaptakumBo vahnijvAlAsamAvftaH jvaladagnicayodvfttatElAyaScUrRapUritaH mArka pu
taqa taqa taqa dIptO aka AhatO saka cu uBa sew tAqayati te atitaqat ta lAlayet paYca varzARi daSa varzARi varpARi tAqayet cARakyaH SizwyarTaM tAqayettataH manuH tAqanA tAqanam tAqitaH SroturvitantrIriva tAqyamAnA tAqya mAnA kumA dunduBistAqito sO veRIsaM taqa AhatO BvA Atma saka sew idit taRqate ataRqizwa ata Rqizwa tataRqe taqa dIptO aka AhatO saka cu uBa sew tAqayati te atitaqat ta lAlayet paYca varzARi daSa varpARi tAqayet cARakyaH SizwyarTaM tAqayettataH manuH tAqanA tAqanam tAqitaH SroturvitantrIriva tAqya mAnA kumA dunduBistAqito sO veRIsaM taqa AhatO BvA Atma saka sew idit taRqate ata Rqizwa tataRqe
tarja tarja tarja Bartsane BvA para saka sew tarjati atarjIt tatarja tarja Bartsane curA A saka sew tarjayate atatarjata tarjA tarjanA sItAmaByarTya tarjitaH tayA tu tarjitAH sarvA muKErBImA muKE rBImA yaTAgatam rAkzaso tarjayatsUtaM punaScAQOkaBayadraTam punaScAQOka yadraTam BawwiH bAlaM punargAtrasuKaM gfhRIyAnna cEnaM tarjayet tarja yet suSrutaH ArzatvAt padavyatyayaH tarja Bartsane BvA para saka sew tarjati atarjIt tatarja tarja Bartsane curA A saka sew tarjayate atatarjata tarjA tarjanA sItAmaByarTya tarjitaH tayA tu tarjitAH sarvA muKE rBImA yaTAgatam rAkzaso tarjayatsUtaM punaScAQOka yadraTam BawwiH bAlaM punargAtrasuKaM gfhRIyAnna cEnaM tarja yet suSrutaH ArzatvAt padavyatyayaH
tarka tarka tarka dIptO aka AkANkzAyAYca vitarke saka curA uBa sew tarkayati te atitarkat ta etattarkaya cakravAkahfdayASvAsAya cakravAkahfdayASvA sAya prasannarA taTA tarkayAmi yaTAnenAcirapravrajitena yaTAnenAcirapravraji tena Bavitavyam mfcCa dakziRenATa vAmena katareRa svidasyati iti mAM saNgatAH sarve tarkayizyanti SatravaH BA vi a vi utprekzAyAM tannUnaM mftyumApsyatIti vitarkayAmi paYcata tarka pu tarka BAve ac AkANkzAyAM vyaBicAraSaNkAnivarttake vyaBicAraSaNkAniva rttake UhaBede avijYAte rTe kAraRopapattitastattvajYAnArTe Uhe vyApyAropAt vyApakaprasaYjane mfSakarkaSe mama samaM lIlAyate BAratI prasannarA gadADaravinirmmitA vizamadurgatarkAwavI gadA mImAMsASAstre mImAM sASAstre arTavAde karkaH aktAH SarkarA upadaDAtIti viDiH SrUyate tatrAYjanasADanaM avijYAtatattve rTe kAraRopapattitastattvajYAnArTamUhastarkaH kAraRopapattitastattvajYA nArTamUhastarkaH gO sU avijYAyamAnatattve rTe jijYAsA tAvajjAyate jAnIyemamarTamiti jAnIye mamarTamiti aTa jijYAsitasya vastuno vyAhatO DarmO DarBO viBAgena vimfSati kiM sviditTamAho svinnetyamiti svidityamAho svinnetTamiti vimfSyamAnayorDarmayorekaM kAraRopapattyA nujAnAti samBavatyasmin samBa vatyasmin kAraRaM pramARaM heturiti kAraRopapattyA syAdevametannetaraditi tatra nidarSanam yo yaM jYAtvA Page a jYAtavyamarTaM jAnIte tacca taYca Bo jAnIyeti jijYAsA sa kimutpattiDarmako nutpattiDarmaka iti vimarSaH vimfSyamAne vimfSya mAne vijYAtatattve rTe yasya DarmasyAByanujYAkAraRamupapadyate DarmasyAByanujYAkAraRamupa padyate tamanujAnAti yadyayamanutpattiDarmakastataH svakftasya svakf tasya karmaRaH PalamanuBavati jYAtA duH KajanyapravfttidozamiTyAjYAnAnAmuttaramuttaraM duHKajanyapravftti dozamiTyAjYAnAnAmuttaramuttaraM pUrvasya pUrvasya kAraRamuttarottarApAye kAraRamuttaro ttarApAye tadanantarABAvAdapavarga iti syAtAM saMsArApavargO saMsArApa vargO utpattiDarmake jYAtari punarna syAtAm utpannaH Kalu jYAtA dehendriyabudDivedanABiH sambaDyata iti nAsyedaM svakftasya karmaRaH Palam utpannaSca BUtvA na BavatIti tasyAvidyamAnasya tasyA vidyamAnasya nirudDasya vA svakftakarmaRaH PalopaBogo nAsti tadevamekasyAnekaSarIrayogaH SarIrAdiviyogaScAtyantaM SarIrAdiviyoga ScAtyantaM na syAditi yatra kAraRamanupapadyamAnaM paSyati tatrAnujAnAti so yamevaMlakzaRa Uhastarka ityucyate kaTaM punarayaM tattvajYAnArTo na tattvajYAnameveti anavaDAraRAt anava DAraRAt anujAnAtyayamekataraM DarmaM kAraRopapattyA na tvavaDArayati na vyavasyati na niScinoti evamevedamiti evameveda miti kaTaM tattvajYAnArTa iti tattvajYAnavizayAByanujYAlakzaRAnugrahodBAvitAt prasannAdanantarapramARasAmarTyAt tattvajYAnavizayAByanujYA lakzaRAnugrahodBAvitAt prasannAdanantarapramARasAmaryyAt tattvajYAnamutpadyata ityeva tattvajYAnArTa iti so yaM tarkaH pramARAni pratisandaDAnaH pramARAByanujYAnAt pramARasahito vAde upadizwa ityavijYAtatattvamanujAnAtIti ityavijYAtatattvamanujAnA tIti yaTA so rTo Bavati tasya yaTABAvastattvamaviparyyaya yaTAtaTyam vAtsyAyanaBAzyam viSvanATavfttO cAnyaTA sUtramidaM vyAKyAtaM yaTA tarka iti lakzyanirdeSaH kAraRopapattita Uha iti lakzaRam avijYAtatattve rTe tattvajYAnArTamiti prayojanakaTanam prayojana kaTanam kAraRaM vyApyaM tasyopapattirAropastasmAt Uha AropaH arTAdvyApakasya taTAca vyApakABAvavattvena nirRIte vyApyasyAhAryyAropAdyovyApakasyAhAryyAropaH sa tarkaH yaTA nirvahnitvAropAnnirDUmatvAropaH prasannarA gadADaravinirmmitA vizamadurgatarkAwavI gadA mImAM sASAstre arTavAde karkaH aktAH SarkarA upadaDAtIti viDiH SrUyate tatrAYjanasADanaM GftaM tElaM vA tanmaDye ke nAktA iti saMSaye tejo vE GftamityarTavAdAt GftenAktA iti nirRIyate atastarko rTavAdaH tarko mImAMseti kalpatarukAraH tarkalakzaRaM gO sU BAzye uktaM yaTA avijYAtatattve rTe kAraRopapattitastattvajYA nArTamUhastarkaH gO sU samBa vatyasmin kAraRaM pramARaM heturiti kAraRopapattyA syAdevametannetaraditi tatra nidarSanam yo yaM jYAtvA Page a jYAtavyamarTaM jAnIte taYca Bo jAnIyeti jijYAsA sa kimutpattiDarmako nutpattiDarmaka iti vimarSaH vimfSya mAne vijYAtatattve rTe yasya DarmasyAByanujYAkAraRamupa padyate tamanujAnAti yadyayamanutpattiDarmakastataH svakf tasya karmaRaH PalamanuBavati jYAtA duHKajanyapravftti dozamiTyAjYAnAnAmuttaramuttaraM pUrvasya pUrvasya kAraRamuttaro ttarApAye tadanantarABAvAdapavarga iti syAtAM saMsArApa vargO utpattiDarmake jYAtari punarna syAtAm utpannaH Kalu jYAtA dehendriyabudDivedanABiH sambaDyata iti nAsyedaM svakftasya karmaRaH Palam utpannaSca BUtvA na BavatIti tasyA vidyamAnasya nirudDasya vA svakftakarmaRaH PalopaBogo nAsti tadevamekasyAnekaSarIrayogaH SarIrAdiviyoga ScAtyantaM na syAditi yatra kAraRamanupapadyamAnaM paSyati tatrAnujAnAti so yamevaMlakzaRa Uhastarka ityucyate kaTaM punarayaM tattvajYAnArTo na tattvajYAnameveti anava DAraRAt anujAnAtyayamekataraM DarmaM kAraRopapattyA na tvavaDArayati na vyavasyati na niScinoti evameveda miti kaTaM tattvajYAnArTa iti tattvajYAnavizayAByanujYA lakzaRAnugrahodBAvitAt prasannAdanantarapramARasAmaryyAt tattvajYAnamutpadyata ityeva tattvajYAnArTa iti so yaM tarkaH pramARAni pratisandaDAnaH pramARAByanujYAnAt pramARasahito vAde upadizwa ityavijYAtatattvamanujAnA tIti yaTA so rTo Bavati tasya yaTABAvastattvamaviparyyaya yaTAtaTyam vAtsyAyanaBAzyam viSvanATavfttO cAnyaTA sUtramidaM vyAKyAtaM yaTA tarka iti lakzyanirdeSaH kAraRopapattita Uha iti lakzaRam avijYAtatattve rTe tattvajYAnArTamiti prayojana kaTanam kAraRaM vyApyaM tasyopapattirAropastasmAt Uha AropaH arTAdvyApakasya taTAca vyApakABAvavattvena nirRIte vahnivyaBicArI syAt vahnijanyo na syAdityanena vyaBicAraSaNkAnirAse niraNkuSena vyApti jYAnenAnumitiriti parasparayEvAsyopayoga ityAhuH sa cAyaM paYcaviDaH AtmASrayAnyonyASrayacakrakAnavasTAta syAdeva vA sa cAyamanuttarastarkaH tatra SaNkAyAM vyAGAtApatteH tadeva hyASaNkyate yasminnASaNkyamAne sva kriyAvyAGAtAdayodozA nAvatarantIti lokamaryyAdA evaM sarvatrAnuttarastarko bAGako BiDeya iti kutaScidupajAyamAnaM vakta vyam tarkAdvA yadi praTamaH SaNkAstitvamapi tenEva pramARe nopeyaM SaNkAyAM satyAM vyAGAtAt yadi ca SaNkAM vinApi vyAGAtaH tadA SaNkyamAnASaNkyamAnayorvyAGAtasya sAmyaM sidDameva Bavatu SaNkAyAmapi tatpramARaM kimetAvatA praTamopajAtaSaNkAmavalambyAvasTitasya vyAGAtarUpasya viSe zasya darSanAttu SaNkAntaraM notpadyata iti cenna vyAGAta sattvakAle tadavalambikayA yaddarSanaM tadAhito vA saMskAraH tasya kAlAntare tatpratiDarmasaMSayaviroDitve avayavipAkapakze kumBasya paramARupAkapakze paramparayA tadAramBakasya paramARoH pUrvaM SyAmatayA jYAtasya kAlAntare samBavitayA kasya pAkajanyarUpaviSezavattAyAM saMSayo na syAt yadi ca SaNkAyAM vyAGAtastadA SaNkASrayasya viSezarUpasya vyAGAtasya darSanAcCaNkAyAM SaNkAntaraM mA BUt yadi tu vyaBicArA SrayastadA vyaBicAraH syAdeva vyAGAtASrayasya vyaBicAra syApi pramityApatteH anAdisidDavyAptikAste tarkA iti cenna tadbudDeH pramititvAsidDeH SarIre svAtma pratyayasya tAdfSasyAtmapramAtvopagamAt anAditvAsidDe vyAGAtApatteSca sAmyaM Sakyata eva tarkABAsAdBavato pi vyAGAta upanetum aTa tarkasya vyAptirmUlaBUtAByupagamyate tatrApi vyaBicAra SaNkAyAM punaranavasTEva tatrApi vyAGAtApAdane punaritya navasTEva tasmAdasmABirapyasminnarTe na Kalu duzpaWA tvadgATEvAnyaTAkAramakzarARi kiyantyapi vyAGAto yadi SaNkAsti na cecCaNkA tatastarAm vyAGAtA vaDirASaNkA tarkaH SaNkAvaDiH kutaH avyaBicAra sahacAra darSanaM vyAptigrAhakam jYAnaM ca niScayaH SaNkA ca sA ca kvacidupADisandehAt kvacidviSezAdarSanasahitasADA raRaDarmadarSanAt tadvirahaSca kvacidvipakzabADakatarkAt kvacit svataH sidDaeva tarkasya vyAptigrahamUlakatvenAnava sTeti cet na yAvadASaNkaM tarkAnusaraRAt yatra ca vyAGAtena SaNkEva nAvatarati tatra tarkaM vinEva vyAptigrahaH Page b taTAhi GUBo yadi vahnyasamavahitAjanyatve sati vahnisamavahitAjanyaH syAnnotpannaH svAdityatra kiM GUmo vahnereva Bavizyati kvacidvahniM vinApi Bavizyati ahetu kaeva votpatsyata iti SaNkA syAt sarvatra svakriyAvyA DAtaH syAt yadi hi gfhItAnvayavyatirekaM hetuM vinA kAryyotpattiM SaNketa tadA svayameva GUmArTaM vahneH tfptyarTaM Bojanasya parapraripattyarTaM Sabdasya copAdAnaM niyamataH kaTaM kuryyAt tena vinApi tatsamBavAt tasmAttattadupAdAna meva tAdfSaSaNkApratibanDakaM SaNkAyAM na niyatopAdAnaM niyatopAdAne ca na SaNkA tadidamuktaM tadeva hyASaNkyate yasminnASaNkyamAne svakriyAvyAGAto na BavatIti nahi samBavati svayaM vahnyAdikaM DUmAdikAryyArTaM niyamata upAdatte tat kAraRaM tannetyASaNkyate ceti etena vyADAto viroDaH saca sahAnavasTAnaniyata iti tatrApya navasTeti nirastaM svakriyAyAeva SaNkApratibanDakatvAt ataeva vyAGAto yadi SaNkAsti na cecCaNkA tatastarAm vyADAtAvaDirASaNkA tarkaH SaNkAvaDiH kutaH iti KaRqana kAramatamapyapAstam nahi vyAGAtaH SaNkASritaH kintu svakriyEva SaNkApratibanDiketi na vA viSezadarSanAt kkacit SaNkAnivfttireva syAt na cEtAdfSatarkAvatAro BUyodarSanaM vineti BUyodarSanAdaraH natu sa svataeva prayojakaH ata eva na tadAhitasaMskAro na mAnAntaraM tarkasyApramAtvAt tacca na pratyakzaM vyAptijYAne hetuH tadaBAve pi SabdAnumA nAByAM tadgrahAt nanu sahacAradarSanavyaBicArAdarSanava dvyaBicAraSaNkAvirahAnukUlatarkayorjYAnaM vyaBicArisADA raRamiti na tato pi vyAptiniScayaH iti cenna svarUpasa toreva tayorvyAptigrAhakatvAt sattarkAdvyAptipramA tadABA sAttadapramA viSezadarSanasatyatvAsatyatvAByAM puruzajYAnamiva apare tu yatra tarke vyAptyanuBavomUlaM tatra narkAntarA pekzA yatra tu vyAptismaraRaM hetuH tatra na tarkAntarApekzeti nAnavasTA asti ca jAtamAtrARAmizwAnizwasADanatAnu mitihetuvyAptismaraRaM tadAnIM vyAptyanuBAvakABAvAt tanmUlAnuBavamUlA cAgre pi vyAptismaraRaparampareti yattvanAdisidDakAryyakAraRaBAvaviroDAdimUlAH kecittarkA iti tanna tatra pramARAnupayoge numAna eva paryyavasAnAt naca vyAptigrahAnyaTAnupapattyEva tarkasyAnAdisidDavyApti katvajYAnamiti vAcyam anupapatterapyanumAnatvAt anye tu vipakzavADakatarkAdanOpADikatvagraha eva tadaDIno Page a vyAptigraha iti tadapi na tarkaMsyApramARatvAt vyaBi cArAdiSaNkAnirAsadvArA pratyakzAdisahakArI sa iti cenna anavasTABayena tarkaM vinA vyAGAtAt yatra SaNkA virahastatra vyAptigrahe tarkasya vyaBicArAt yattu yogyAnAmupADInAM yogyAnupalabDyABAvagrahaH ayo gyAnAntu sADyAvyApyatvasADanavyApakatvasADanAdaBAvagraha ityanOpADikatvaM sugrahamiti tattucCam anumAnena tatsADane navasTAnAt pramARAntarasyABAvAt ye cAnu kUlatarkaM vinEva sahacArAdidarSanamAtreRa vyAptigrahaM vadanti tezAM pakzetaratvasya sADyavyApakatvagrahe numAna mAtramucCidyeta anumAnamAtrocCedakatvAdeva pakzetarono pADiriti ceta BrAnto si nahi vayamupADitvena taruza taruza taruza tri tF vA bA uzan tArake BUraryaH patasyAntarasya taruzaH f taruzastarItA taruzaMstarItA BA taruza hiMsAyAM baDakarmmasu vanuzyati taruzyati niGaRwUkteH divA pa saka sew taruzyati atarozIt tvaM tUryya taruzyataH taruzyato bADakAn BA vanuzyatiH hantikarmA taruzyatirapyevaM karmA nika taruzyatirapyevaMkarmA niru indreRa yujA taruzema vfttamityapi nigamo Bavati niruktaDftaSrutiH vede gaRavyatyayaH taruza tri tF bA uzan tArake BUraryaH patasyAntarasya taruzaH f taruzaMstarItA BA taruza hiMsAyAM baDakarmmasu vanuzyati taruzyati niGaRwUkteH divA pa saka sew taruzyati atarozIt tvaM tUryya taruzyataH taruzyato bADakAn BA vanuzyatiH hantikarmA taruzyatirapyevaMkarmA niru indreRa yujA taruzema vfttamityapi nigamo Bavati niruktaDftaSrutiH vede gaRavyatyayaH
tasa tasa tasa alaNkAre vA curA uBa pakze BvA para saka sew idit taMsayati te taMsati atataMsat ta ataMsIt tataMsa pratijAnAmIti te pitA garBe muzwimataMsayat yaju avataMsaH uttaMsaH BvAditvapakze asya AtmanepaditvaM Atmane paditvaM kecidicCanti taMsate ataMsizwa tasa utkzepe divA para saka sew tasyati irit atasat atasIt atAsIt tatAsa tesatuH udit tasitvA tastvA tastaH yasya tasya vinA zazWIM teneti karaRaM vinA udBawaH tasa alaNkAre vA curA uBa pakze BvA para saka sew idit taMsayati te taMsati atataMsat ta ataMsIt tataMsa pratijAnAmIti te pitA garBe muzwimataMsayat yaju avataMsaH uttaMsaH BvAditvapakze asya Atmane paditvaM kecidicCanti taMsate ataMsizwa tasa utkzepe divA para saka sew tasyati irit atasat atasIt atAsIt tatAsa tesatuH udit tasitvA tastvA tastaH yasya tasya vinA zazWIM teneti karaRaM vinA udBawaH
tat tat tat tri tana kvip antyalope tuk vistArave amaraH parItat mugDa
tatra tatra tatra DAraRe cu Atma saka sew idit tantrayate atitantrata iditkaraRaM vede svaraviSezArTam tatra kuwumbaDAraRe BvA pa aka sew cAndrAH tantrati atantrIt tatantra itarAByo pi dfSyante pa pA ityukteH praTamAdyarTe tral tatra BavAn tatra BavantamityAdi tatra avya tasmin tral tasminnityarTa tasminnityarTe tatrApi tatraBavatI BfSasaMSayAloH nEza kaTaM tatra viBAgaH syAditi cet saMSayo Bavet manuH tatra DAraRe cu Atma saka sew idit tantrayate atitantrata iditkaraRaM vede svaraviSezArTam tatra kuwumbaDAraRe BvA pa aka sew cAndrAH tantrati atantrIt tatantra itarAByo pi dfSyante pA ityukteH praTamAdyarTe tral tatra BavAn tatra BavantamityAdi tatra avya tasmin tral tasminnityarTe tatrApi tatraBavatI BfSasaMSayAloH nEza kaTaM tatra viBAgaH syAditi cet saMSayo Bavet manuH
tawa tawa tawa ucCrAye BvA para saka sew tawati atAwIt avawIt atawIt tatAwa tewatuH tawam tawa AhatO cu uBa saka sew tAwayati te atItawat ta tawa tri tawa ac kUle nadyAdestIre amaraH tIraBUmeSca nadyAH pravAhAt nadyAHpravAhAt ucCritatvAt taTAtvam sinDostawAvoGa sinDostawA voGa iva pravfdDaH kumA striyAM NIp mAlaYcaYca SmaSAnaYca nadyAdInAM tawI taTA sA da uccakzetre na medi niH SezacyutacandanaM niHSezacyutacandanaM stanatawaM nirmfzwarAgo DaraH sA da stanaH stamaH tawamiva upa sa Sive pu tasya sarvOcCitatvAt sarvocCitatvAt taTAtvam namastawAya tawyAya tawInAM tawAnAM pataye namaH BA SA a ucCrite tri tawa ucCrAye BvA para saka sew tawati atAwIt atawIt tatAwa tewatuH tawam tawa AhatO cu uBa saka sew tAwayati te atItawat ta tawa tri tawa ac kUle nadyAdestIre amaraH tIraBUmeSca nadyAHpravAhAt ucCritatvAt taTAtvam sinDostawA voGa iva pravfdDaH kumA striyAM NIp mAlaYcaYca SmaSAnaYca nadyAdInAM tawI taTA sA da uccakzetre na medi niHSezacyutacandanaM stanatawaM nirmfzwarAgo DaraH sA da stamaH tawamiva upa sa Sive pu tasya sarvocCitatvAt taTAtvam namastawAya tawyAya tawAnAM pataye namaH BA SA a ucCrite tri
tejIyam tejIyam tejIyam tri tejasvin atiSaye Isun vinerluki qiqBAvaH atitejasvini tejIyasAM na dozAya vahneH sarvaBujo yaTA BAga striyAM NIp
tejIyas tejIyas tejIyas tri tejasvin atiSaye Isun vinerluki qi dBAvaH atitejasvini tejIyasAM na dozAya vahneH sarvaBujo yaTA BAga striyAM NIp
tfRAQya tfRAQya tfRAQya na tfRezu AQyam parvatajAte tfRe rAjani
tfRAwya tfRAwya tfRAwya na tfRezu AQyam parvatajAte tfRe rAjani
tfRa tfRa tfRa Bakze tanA uBa saka sew tfRoti tarRoti tfRute tarRute atarRIt atarRizwa udit tarRitvA tfRwvA tfRa na tfha nak halopaSca naqAdO Kawe Kaqa amaraH tfRena vAtyeva tayA nugamyate nEza laGurvahutfRaM laGu rvahutfRaM naraH mAGaH tfRasyAyaM SivA aR tArRa tfRajanye vahnO pu tArRAtArRoBayaM nAstIti jagadISaH tfRasampanDimAtre tri GozAdi uttarapadasTe uttara padasTe tfRaSabde pUrvapadamAdyudAttam grAmatfRamityAdi samUhArTe samUhArye pASA ya tfRyA tfRasamUhe tfRsamUhe strI tatra BavaH utkarA matvarTe Ca naqA kukca kuk ca tfRakIya tfRaBave tri svalpaM tfRaM kan tfRaka svalpatfRe krIRIzvetAstfRakenApi krIRIzvetAstfRa kenApi rAjan BA A A a svArTe ka tatrArTe tfRa Bakze tanA uBa saka sew tfRoti tarRoti tfRute tarRute atarRIt atarRizwa udit tarRitvA tfRwvA tfRa na tfha nak halopaSca naqAdO Kawe Kaqa amaraH tfRena vAtyeva tayA nugamyate nEza laGu rvahutfRaM naraH mAGaH tfRasyAyaM SivA aR tArRa tfRajanye vahnO pu tArRAtArRoBayaM nAstIti jagadISaH tfRasampanDimAtre tri GozAdi uttara padasTe tfRaSabde pUrvapadamAdyudAttam grAmatfRamityAdi samUhArye pASA ya tfRyA tfRsamUhe strI tatra BavaH utkarA matvarTe Ca naqA kuk ca tfRakIya tfRaBave tri svalpaM tfRaM kan tfRaka svalpatfRe krIRIzvetAstfRa kenApi rAjan BA A a svArTe ka tatrArTe
tfRazawapada tfRazawapada tfRazawapada pu tfRamiva zawpadaH volatA varole hArA
tfRazawpada tfRazawpada tfRazawpada pu tfRamiva zawpadaH volatA varole hArA
tfha tfha tfha hiMse tu para saka vew tfhati atarhIt atfkzat tfha hiMse vA cu u pakze ruDA para saka vew tarhayati te tfReQi atatarhat ta atItfhat ta atarhIt atfkzat tfReQu rAmaH aha saha lakzaRena BawwiH tfha hiMse tu para saka vew tfhati atarhIt atfkzat tfha hiMse vA cu u pakze ruDA para saka vew tarhayati te tfReQi atatarhat ta atItfhat ta atarhIt atfkzat tfReQu rAmaH saha lakzaRena BawwiH
tfkza tfkza tfkza gatO BvA para saka sew tfkzati atfkzIt tatfkza tfkza pu tfkza ac kASyape fzO tasyApatyaM gargA yaY tArkzya garuqe aruRe vihagamAtre ca tArkzya Sabde tArkzyaSabde dfSyam tfkza gatO BvA para saka sew tfkzati atfkzIt tatfkza tfkza pu tfkza ac kASyape fzO tasyApatyaM gargA yaY tArkzya garuqe aruRe vihagamAtre ca tArkzyaSabde dfSyam
tfpa tfpa tfpa prIRane svA para saka sew tfpnoti atapIt atarpIt tatarpa tfpa sandIpane prIRane ca vA curA uBa pakze BvA para saka sew tarpayati tarpayAta te tarpati atatarpatat atItfpatta atatarpatta atItfpat ta atarpIt tatarpa tatarpaTa tfpa prIRane di para saka vew irit tfpyati atarpIt atrApsIt atrA psIt artApsIt atfpat tatarpa tatarza tfpa prIRane tu para saka sew tfpati atarpIt tfpatsomaM pAhi f tfpa prIRane svA para saka sew tfpnoti atarpIt tatarpa tfpa sandIpane prIRane ca vA curA uBa pakze BvA para saka sew tarpayAta te tarpati atatarpatta atItfpat ta atarpIt tatarpa tatarpaTa tfpa prIRane di para saka vew irit tfpyati atarpIt atrA psIt artApsIt atfpat tatarza tfpa prIRane tu para saka sew tfpati atarpIt tfpatsomaM pAhi f
tija tija tija tIkzRIkaraRe curA uBa saka sew tejayati te atItijat ta kusumacApamatejayadaMSuBirhimakaraH raGuH tejayitvA tu tatsevyam rAmA ara sa tejitA baladarpAByAm harivaM sA mayoktena tejitA Slo tejaH tija kzAntO kzamAyAM svArTe san niSAne na san BvA Atma saka sew titikzate tejate atitikzizwa atejizwa AgamApAyinonityAstAMstitikzasva BArata gItA himaM GfRiM titikzizyate Sata brA ativAdAMstitikzeta manuH Apaste pAdaM titikzantAmalamApastitikzitum titikzantA malamApastitikzitum BA SA a titikzante titi kzante aBiSastiM janA nAma f tija tIkzRIkaraRe curA uBa saka sew tejayati te atItijat ta kusumacApamatejayadaMSuBirhimakaraH raGuH tejayitvA tu tatsevyam rAmA ara sa tejitA baladarpAByAm harivaM sA mayoktena tejitA Slo tejaH tija kzAntO kzamAyAM svArTe san niSAne na san BvA Atma saka sew titikzate tejate atitikzizwa atejizwa AgamApAyinonityAstAMstitikzasva BArata gItA himaM GfRiM titikzizyate Sata brA ativAdAMstitikzeta manuH Apaste pAdaM titikzantA malamApastitikzitum BA SA a titi kzante aBiSastiM janA nAma f
tika tika tika gatO BvA Atma saka sew tekate atekizwa fdit Ric atitekatat atitekat ta titeke tika Askande baDe ca BvA para saka sew tikloti atekIt titeka tika pu tika ka fziBede tasya gotrApatyam tikA PiY tEkAyani tadgotrApatye puMstrI tasya tikakitavAditvAt tika kitavAditvAt dvandve gotrapratyayasya gotrapratyayasyaM luk bahutvArTe tikakitavAH tika kitavAH tikakitavayorgotrApatyezu utkarzA caturarTyAM catu rarTyAM Ca tikIya tatsannikfzwadeSAdO tri tika gatO BvA Atma saka sew tekate atekizwa fdit Ric atitekat ta titeke tika Askande baDe ca BvA para saka sew tikloti atekIt titeka tika pu tika ka fziBede tasya gotrApatyam tikA PiY tEkAyani tadgotrApatye puMstrI tasya tika kitavAditvAt dvandve gotrapratyayasyaM luk bahutvArTe tika kitavAH tikakitavayorgotrApatyezu utkarzA catu rarTyAM Ca tikIya tatsannikfzwadeSAdO tri
tila tila tila gatO BvA para saka sew telati atelIt titela tila snehe tu para aka aniw tilati atelIt titela tila snehe curA uBa aka sew telayati te atItilat ta tila pu tila ka svanAmaKyAte SasyaBede BAvapra tadguRAdyuktaM yaTA tilaH kfzRaH sito rakta raktaH savarRyo lpatilaH smftaH tilo rase kawustikto maDurastuvaro guruH vipAke kawukaH ka wukaH svAduH snigDozRaH kaPapittanut bahyaH balyaH keSyo himasparSastvacyastanyovraRe hitaH dantyo lpamUtrakfdgrAhI lpamUtrakfd grAhI vAtaGno gnimatipradaH kfzRaH SrezWatamastezu Sukralo maDyasaH Su kralo maDyamaH sitaH anye hInatarAH proktAstajjYEraktAdayastilAH proktAstajjYE raktAdayastilAH tilapratigrahanizeDamAha brahmapurARam brAhmaRaH pratigfhRIyAt prati gfhaRIyAt vfttyarTaM sADutastaTA avyaSvamapi mAtaNgatilalOhAMSca mAtaNga tilalOhAMSca varjayet tiladAne PalamAha vizRuH tilapradaH prajAmizwAM dIpaScakzuruttamam dIpadaScakzuruttamam mahABArate kalyamutTAya yo vipra vipraH snAtaH Suklena vAsasA tilapAtraM tila pAtraM prayacCan vE sarvapApEH pramucyate Su Sa ta smftiH pretamuddiSya yo dadyAt hemagarBAMstilAnnfpa yAvantaste yAva ntaste tilAH svarge tAvatkAlaM sa modate saptamyAdivarjaM tilEH sadA snAnaM karttavyamAha mArkaRqeyaH sarvakAlaM tilEH snAnaM puRyaM vyAso bravInmuniH SrIkAmaH sarvadA snAnaM kurvItAmalakarnaraH kurvItAmalakErnaraH saptamIM navamIM cEva parvakAlaYca varjayet varja yet janmatiTO tilanizpAdyAH zaqvyApArAH kAryyAH yaTAha ti ta tilodvarttI tilasnAyI tilahomI tilapradaH tilaBuk tilavApI ca zawtilI nAvasIdati nAvasI dati kAlaviSeze tilatarpaRanizeDaH gaNgAdO ca sarvadA nizidDadine pi tilatarpaRakAryyatA ca tarpaRaSabde pf uktA rAtrO tilasaMbadDavastumAtrasyABakzyatA sarvaYca tilasaMbadDaM nAdyAdastamite ravO kASI tilAScampakasaMSlezAt prApnuvantyaDivAsatAm tilAScampakasaM SlezAt prApnu vantyaDivAsatAm kAmandakI vikrIRAti tilEstilAn paYcata tilatulye svalpapramARe ca tilaM tilaM samAdAya ratnAnAM ratnAmAM yadvinirmitA tilottameti tilo ttameti tattasyA nAma cakre pitAmahaH BA A Slo tilAkAre dehasTe tila KyAte tilakAlake ca devaguruprasAdena jihvAgre me sarasvatI tenAhaM nfpa jAnAmi BAnumatyAstilaM yaTA kAlidAsaH Page b tilasya vikAraH aR tEla tilaniryAse tilasnehe tilasadfSavastujAte snehe ca aduzwaM sArzapaM tElaM yattElaM puzpavAsitam aduzwaM pakvatElaYca snAnAByaNgezu nityaSaH tiTita parvaRi tannizeDamAha strItElamAMsasaMBogIviRmUtranarakaM strItElamAMsasaMBogI viRmUtranarakaM vrajet ti ta evamanyadine pi tElanizeDaH smftO dfSyaH tila gatO BvA para saka sew telati atelIt titela tila snehe tu para aka aniw tilati atelIt titela tila snehe curA uBa aka sew telayati te atItilat ta tila pu tila ka svanAmaKyAte SasyaBede BAvapra tadguRAdyuktaM yaTA tilaH kfzRaH sito raktaH savarRyo lpatilaH smftaH tilo tiladAne PalamAha vizRuH tilapradaH prajAmizwAM dIpadaScakzuruttamam mahABArate kalyamutTAya yo vipraH snAtaH Suklena vAsasA tila pAtraM prayacCan vE sarvapApEH pramucyate Sa ta smftiH pretamuddiSya yo dadyAt hemagarBAMstilAnnfpa yAva ntaste tilAH svarge tAvatkAlaM sa modate saptamyAdivarjaM tilEH sadA snAnaM karttavyamAha mArkaRqeyaH sarvakAlaM tilEH snAnaM puRyaM vyAso bravInmuniH SrIkAmaH sarvadA snAnaM kurvItAmalakErnaraH saptamIM navamIM cEva parvakAlaYca varja yet janmatiTO tilanizpAdyAH zaqvyApArAH kAryyAH yaTAha ti ta tilodvarttI tilasnAyI tilahomI tilapradaH tilaBuk tilavApI ca zawtilI nAvasI dati kAlaviSeze tilatarpaRanizeDaH gaNgAdO ca sarvadA nizidDadine pi tilatarpaRakAryyatA ca tarpaRaSabde pf uktA rAtrO tilasaMbadDavastumAtrasyABakzyatA sarvaYca tilasaMbadDaM nAdyAdastamite ravO kASI tilAScampakasaM SlezAt prApnu vantyaDivAsatAm kAmandakI vikrIRAti tilEstilAn paYcata tilatulye svalpapramARe ca tilaM tilaM samAdAya ratnAmAM yadvinirmitA tilo ttameti tattasyA nAma cakre pitAmahaH BA A Slo tilAkAre dehasTe tila KyAte tilakAlake ca devaguruprasAdena jihvAgre me sarasvatI tenAhaM nfpa jAnAmi BAnumatyAstilaM yaTA kAlidAsaH Page b tilasya vikAraH aR tilacUrRRa tilacUrRRa tilacUrRRa na ta cUrRIkftatile tilakuwA KAdya Bede tilakalke ca rAjani
tilacUrRa tilacUrRa tilacUrRa na ta cUrRIkftatile tilakuwA KAdyaBede tilakalke ca rAjani
tilaparRI tilaparRI tilaparRI strI tilasyeva parRyAnyasyAH NIp raktacandane amaraH nadIBede strI SabdArTaci tilaparRInadI AkaratvenAstyasyA ac gOrA NIz sihRake ganDadravyaBede strI hemaca svArTe ka tilaparRikA raktacandane hemaca
tilaparRRI tilaparRRI tilaparRRI strI tilasyeva parRyAnyasyAH NIp raktacandane amaraH nadIBede strI SabdArTaci tilaparRInadI AkaratvenAstyasyA ac gOrA NIz sihlake ganDadravyaBede strI hemaca svArTe ka tilaparRikA raktacandane hemaca
tilaparRRazwa tilaparRRazwa tilaparRRazwa pu tilasyeva parRRamasya SrIvezwe vfkze rAjani candane na rAjani ta tilavfkzasya patre na
tilaparRa tilaparRa tilaparRa pu tilasye va parRa masya SrIvezwe vfkze rAjani candane na rAjani ta tilavfkzasya patre na
tima tima tima ArdrIBAve ArdrImAve BvA para aka sew temati atemIt titema tima ArdrIkaraRe divA para saka lew sew timyati atemIt titema vAnarAn timyato valokya hito timitAScABavan ti mitAScABavan sarve tatra te hariyUTapAH rAmA sunda sa nadyaSca timitodakAH rAmA ara sa temanam tima ArdrImAve BvA para aka sew temati atemIt titema tima ArdrIkaraRe divA para saka sew timyati atemIt titema vAnarAn timyato valokya hito ti mitAScABavan sarve tatra te hariyUTapAH rAmA sunda sa nadyaSca timitodakAH rAmA ara sa temanam
tirIwaka tirIwaka tirIwaka pu tirIwa saMjYAyAM kan loDre amaraH
tirowaka tirowaka tirowaka pu tirIwa saMjYAyAM kan loDre amaraH

traKa traKa traKa gatO BvA para saka sew DAtupAWaH traKati atraKIt atra Kot atrAKIt tatrAKa traKa gatO BvA para saka sew idit DAtupAWaH traNKati atraNKIt tatraNKa traKa gatO BvA para saka sew DAtupAWaH traKati atra Kot atrAKIt tatrAKa traKa gatO BvA para saka sew idit DAtupAWaH traNKati atraNKIt tatraNKa
trasa trasa trasa gatO grahe nizeDe ca curA uBa saka sew trasayati te atitrasat ta trasa BAse bA curA uBa pakze BvA para aka sew idit traMsayati triMsayati te traMsati atatraMsat ta atraMsIt trasa Baye vA dibA pakze mbA BvA para aka sew trasati atrAsIt atrA sIt atrasIt tratrAsa PaRA tresatuH tatrasatuH Idit trastaH tasya divAditve sArvaDAtuke Syat Syan trasyati trasyantI calaSaParIviGawwitoruH mAGaH trasatturAdrisutAsasaMBramasvayaMgrahASleGasuKena trasa tturAdrisutAsasaMBramasvayaMgrahASleGasuKena nizkriyAm muhuratrasadBirapi yatra gOravAt mAGaH trasyan vE jAyamAneByaH jA yamAneByaH BawwiH tato rAmeti cakrandustresuH parididevire BawwiH kaperatrAsizurnAdAn mfgAH siMhaDvaneriva BawwiH rAkzasasya na cAtrAsIt pranazwumayatizwa pranazwu mayatizwa ca BawwiH ud utkawatrAse bAlAnuttrAsayanti ha harivaM trasa tri trasa Baye ADAre GaYarTe ka vane trikA trasagatO trasa gatO ac jaNgame tri amaraH trasareRuH trasa gatO grahe nizeDe ca curA uBa saka sew trasayati te atitrasat ta trasa BAse bA curA uBa pakze BvA para aka sew idit triMsayati te traMsati atatraMsat ta atraMsIt trasa Baye vA dibA pakze BvA para aka sew trasati atrA sIt atrasIt tratrAsa PaRA tresatuH tatrasatuH Idit trastaH tasya divAditve sArvaDAtuke Syan trasyati trasyantI calaSaParIviGawwitoruH mAGaH trasa tturAdrisutAsasaMBramasvayaMgrahASleGasuKena nizkriyAm muhuratrasadBirapi yatra gOravAt mAGaH trasyan vE jA yamAneByaH BawwiH tato rAmeti cakrandustresuH parididevire BawwiH kaperatrAsizurnAdAn mfgAH siMhaDvaneriva BawwiH rAkzasasya na cAtrAsIt pranazwu mayatizwa ca BawwiH ud utkawatrAse bAlAnuttrAsayanti ha harivaM trasa tri trasa Baye ADAre GaYarTe ka vane trikA trasa gatO ac jaNgame tri amaraH trasareRuH

trayastriSin trayastriSin trayastriSin na trayastriMSat fcaH santyasmin ini qicca trayastriM SadfgBirgIyamAne sAmaBede trayastriMSinAma sAma mADyandine pavamAne Bavati tEtti
triSaNkayAjin triSaNkayAjin triSaNkayAjin pu triSaNkuM yAjayati yaja Rini viSvAmitre hemaca triSaNkuSabde dfSyam

tridaSabaDU tridaSabaDU tridaSabaDU strI ta apsaraHsu tridaSavanitAdayo pyatra kElAsasya tridaSavanitAdarpaRasyAtiTiH syAH meGa

trikARqa trikARqa trikARqa pu trIRi kARqAnyasya svargavargAdikARqaBUmi vargAdikARqasAmAnyakARqarUpAtmake nAmaliNgAnuSAsane amarasiMhakfte kozaBede tasyEva SezaBUtastrikARqaSezaH puru zottamakftaH yaTAha tadupodGAte alOkikatvAdamaraH svakoze na yAni nAmAni samullileKa vilokya tErapyaDunA pracA ramayaM prayatnaH puruzottamasya nirukte tadapi trikARqaM taccAnukramaRikABAzye darSitam yaTA AdyaM nEGaRwukaM kARqaM dvitIyaM nEgamaM taTA tftIyaM dEvataM ceti samA mnAyastriDA mataH trayARAM kaRqAnAM samAhAraH NIp trikARqI kARqatraye strI trIRi kARqAni pramARa masya mAtrac dvigostasya luki kzetraparatve NIp trikARqI kzetraBaktiH trikARqamite rajjvAdO strI wAp
trinetracUqAmaRi trinetracUqAmaRi trinetracUqAmaRi pu ta candre trikA
trinetracuqAmaRi trinetracuqAmaRi trinetracuqAmaRi pu ta candre trikA
trisanDyAkusumA trisanDyAkusumA trisanDyAkusumA strI trisanDyaM kusumaM yasyAH trisanDi
trisanDyakusumA trisanDyakusumA trisanDyakusumA strI trisanDyaM kusumaM yasyAH trisanDikusume PAganiyA rAjani
trisnAna trisnAna trisnAna na trizu kAlezu snAnamatra trikAlasnAnANge vrataBede tacca vAnaprasTANgaM prAyaScittANgaYca tatrAdyaM kAmandakInItiSAstre uktaM yaTA vanavAsaH payo mUlanIvAraPalavfttitA pratigrahanivfttiSca trisnAnaM vratacAritA devAtiTInAM pUjA ca Darmo yaM vana vAsinaH dvitIyantu trizavaRaSabde darSitam
trisrAna trisrAna trisrAna na trizu kAlezu snAmatra trikAlasnAnANgevrataBede tacca vAnaprasTANgaM prAyaScittANgaYca tatrAdyaM kAmandakInotiSAstre uktaM yaTA vanavAsaH payomUlanIvAraPalavfttitA pratigrahanivfttiSca trisnAnaM vratacAritA devAtiTInAM pUjA ca Darmo yaM vanavAsinaH dvitIyantu trizavaRaSabde darSitam
trividA trividA trividA pu tisro vidyA sya trivedajYe dvije
trividya trividya trividya pu tisro vidyA sya trivedajYe Dije
trivistIrRa trivistIrRa trivistIrRa pu triBiH vistIrRaH SuBalakzaRaBedAnvite puruze tripfTuGugamBIro dvAtriM SallakzaRantviti Upa krame lalAwaPawizakzoBistrivistrIrRo yaTAhyAdO sarvatejo titigESvaryyaM taTA prApasTati nAnyaTA kASI a tripfzuSabdo pyatra vf sa a tu uro Page a lalAwaM vadanaYca puMsAM vistIrRametattritayaM praSastam vistIrRacatuzkapraSastatayoktamiti BedaH
trivistrIrRa trivistrIrRa trivistrIrRa pu triBiH vistIrRaH SuBalakzaRaBedAnvite puruze tripfTulaGugamBIro dvAtriM SallakzaRantviti Upakrame lalAwakawivakzoBistrivistIrRo yaTAhyAdO sarvatejo titigESvaryyaM taTA prApsyati nAnyaTA kASI a triprfTuSabdo pyatra vf sa a tu uro lalAwaM vadanaYca puMsAM vistIrRametattritayaM praSastam vistIrRacatuzkapraSastatayoktamiti BedaH
trivizwapasad trivizwapasad trivizwapasad pu trivizwape svarge sIdati sada kvip deve halA
trivizwapasada trivizwapasada trivizwapasada pu trivizwame svarge sIdati sada kvip deve halA
trizaparRa trizaparRa triza su parRa pu trayaH suparRAstadvAcakaSabdA yatra bahvfcavedaBAgabede trisOparRaSabde dfSyaM tadvrate ca tadyogAt tadvrataDAriRi puruze triRAciketaH paYcAgnistrisu zu parRaH zaqagnivit manuH vA kap tatrArTe vedArTavit jyezWasAmA trimaDustrisuparRakaH yAjYa
trizuparRa trizuparRa trizu su parRa pu trayaH suparRAstadvAcakaSabdA yatra bahvf cavedaBAgaBede trisOparRaSabde dfSyaM tadvrate ca tadyo gAt tadbrataDAriRi puruze triRAcikebaH paYcA gnistrisu zu parRaH zaqagnivit manuH bA kap tatrArTe vedArTavit jyezWasAmA trimaDustrisuparRakaH yAjYa
troqaka troqaka troqaka tri troqayati cu truwa Rvul Cedake saptAzwanavapaYcANkaM divyamAnuzasaMSrayam trowakaM nAma tat prAhuH pratyaNgaM savidUzakam sA da ukte dfSyakAvyaBede pratyaNgaM savidUzakatvAt SfNgAro trANgIti boDyam tatra saptANkaM stamBitaramBam paccANkaM vikramorvaSI
trowaka trowaka trowaka tri troqayati cu truwa Rvul Cedake saptA zwanavapaYcANkaM divyamAnuzasaMSrayam trowakaM nAma tat prAhuH pratyaNkaM savidUzakam sa da ukte dfSyakAvyaBede pratyaNkaM savidUzakatvAt Sf ro trANgIti boDyam tatra saptANkaM stamBitaramBam paYcANkaM vikramorvaSI
truwa truwa truwa Cedane vA divA pakze tudA ku para aka sew truwyati truwati atru tro wIp wIt tutrowa CedaScAtra avayavadviDABAva abayavadviDA BAva mAtram yAvanme dantA na truwyanti hito truwitaM payoDaratawe hAraM punaryojaya sA da truwita iva muktAmaRisaraH uttara vi virujIkaraRe saka kaRwakErenA virujeyuH kAtyA SrO virujeyuH vitruwyeyuH sa vyAKyA truwa Cedane curA A saka sew trowayate atutruwata truwa Cedane vA divA pakze tudA ku para aka sew truwyati truwati atru tro wIt tutrowa CedaScAtra abayavadviDA BAva mAtram yAvanme dantA na truwyanti hito truwitaM payoDaratawe hAraM punaryojaya sA da truwita iva muktAmaRisaraH uttara vi virujIkaraRe saka kaRwakErenA virujeyuH kAtyA SrO virujeyuH vitruwyeyuH sa vyAKyA truwa Cedane curA A saka sew trowayate atutruwata
tryaDan tryaDan tryaDan pu triBiH vasantaSaradDemantErftuBirUDo sya anaNhrasvaSca vasantAdirUpoDoyukte vatsararUpe vfzaBe uta tryuDA puruDa prajAvAn f
tryaNgala tryaNgala tryaNgala tri trisvo NgulyaH pramARamasya tadDitArTadDi dvayasac Page b tasya luki ac samA aNgulitrayamite dvyaNgulaM tryaNgulaM vA tardmAtikrAntaM yUpasya kAtyA SrO taTABUtaKAtAnvite ca striyAM wAp sA ca soma yajYasya vediH taM Kananta ivAnvIzustaM tryaNgule nvabindaM stasmAt tryaNgulA vediH syAttadu hApi pAYcistryaNgulAmeva sOmyasyADvarasya vediM cakre Sata brA pAYciH somayAgasyApi vediM tryaNgulaKAtAmeva mene BA
tryaNgula tryaNgula tryaNgula tri trisro hgulyaH pramARamasya tadDitArTadvi dvayasac tasya luki ac samA aNgulitrayamite dvyaNgulaM tryaNgulaM vA tardmAtikrAntaM yUpasya kAtyA SrO taTABUtaKAtAnvite striyAM wAp sA ca momayajYasya vediH taM Kananta ivAnvIzustaM tryaNgule nvavindaM stasmAt tryaNgulA vediH syAttadu hApi pAYcistryaNgulAmeva sOmyasyADvarasya vediM cakre Sata vrA pAYciH somayAgasyApi vediM tryaNgulaKAtAmeva mene BA
tryuDan tryuDan tryuDan pu triBiH vasantaSaradDemantErftuBirUDo sya anaN Page b hrasvaSca vasantAdirUpoDoyukte vatsararUpe vfzaBe uta tryuDA puruDa prajAvAn f
tsaru tsaru tsaru pu tsara ut KaqgamuzwO mA mAM padyena rapasA vidat tsaruH f KaqgaM ca kanakatsarum BA va Slo gfhItaKaqgacarmARastato BUyaH prahAriRaH tsarumArgAn yaToddizwAMSceruH sarvAsu BUmizu BA A Slo

tu tu tu vfttO vfdDO pA aka hiMsAyAM pUrttO ca saka adA para aniw tOti tavIti atOzIt atra nAByastasyAcipiti nAByastasyAci piti sArvaDAtuke sUtrataH sArvaDAtuke ityasyAnuvfttisamBave itya Page b syAnuvfttisamBave pi turustuSamyamaH sArvaDAtuke pA sUtre punaH sarvADAtukagrahaRamapidarTamiti sArvaDAtukagrahaRamapidarTamiti si kO tena uto vfdDirluki hali pA sUtrAt halItyasya bruvaiw bruvaIw pA sUtrAt IwaH yaNo vA sU vetyasya cAnuvattiH cAnuvfttiH na pitItyasya tena tuvItaH tutaH tuvITaH tuTaH aci tu na tuvanti mugDaboDakfttuhalotyasyAnuvfttivat pitItyasyAnuvfttiriti baBrAma vaBrAma tena tanmate tuta ityeva iti BedaH tutAva vede tujAdi aByAsadIrGaH sa tUtAva nEnamaSnotyaMhatiragne tUtAba nEnamaSnItyaMhatiragne f brahmA tUtodindro gAtumizman f tu vfdDAvityasya laNi bahulaM Candasi vikaraRasya SluH adDAgamABAvaSca aqAgamABAvaSca BA tu avya tuda mitadru qu pAdapUraRArTe nirarTake nirarTakaM nira rTakaM tuhItyAdi pUraREkaprayojanam candrAlokaH Bede avaDAraRe amaraH samuccaye pakzAntare niyoge praSaMsAyAM praSaM sAyAM vinigrahe Sabdara tatra pakzAntare AcAreRa tu saMyuktaH saMpUrRaPalaBAk Bavet manuH samuccaye uzwrayAnaM samAruhya KarayAnaM tu kAmataH snAtvA tu vipro digvAsAH prARAyAmena prA RAyAmena SuDyati manuH pUjAyAmetadyoge tupaSya paSyatAhEH pUjAyAm pA tiNantaM na nihanyate Adaha suDAma tu punargarBastu menire si kO DftA SrutiH tu vfttO vfdDO pA aka hiMsAyAM pUrttO ca saka adA para aniw tOti tavIti atOzIt atra nAByastasyAci piti sArvaDAtuke sUtrataH sArvaDAtuke itya Page b syAnuvfttisamBave pi turustuSamyamaH sArvaDAtuke pA sUtre punaH sArvaDAtukagrahaRamapidarTamiti si kO tena uto vfdDirluki hali pA sUtrAt halItyasya bruvaIw pA sUtrAt IwaH yaNo vA sU vetyasya cAnuvfttiH na pitItyasya tena tuvItaH tutaH tuvITaH tuTaH aci tu na tuvanti mugDaboDakfttuhalotyasyAnuvfttivat pitItyasyAnuvfttiriti vaBrAma tena tanmate tuta ityeva iti BedaH tutAva vede tujAdi aByAsadIrGaH sa tUtAba nEnamaSnItyaMhatiragne f brahmA tUtodindro gAtumizman f tu vfdDAvityasya laNi bahulaM Candasi vikaraRasya SluH aqAgamABAvaSca BA tu avya tuda mitadru qu pAdapUraRArTe nirarTake nira rTakaM tuhItyAdi pUraREkaprayojanam candrAlokaH Bede avaDAraRe amaraH samuccaye pakzAntare niyoge praSaM sAyAM vinigrahe Sabdara tatra pakzAntare AcAreRa tu saMyuktaH saMpUrRaPalaBAk Bavet manuH samuccaye uzwrayAnaM samAruhya KarayAnaM tu kAmataH snAtvA tu vipro digvAsAH prA RAyAmena SuDyati manuH pUjAyAmetadyoge tupaSya paSyatAhEH pUjAyAm pA tiNantaM na nihanyate Adaha suDAma tu punargarBastu menire si kO DftA SrutiH
tuBa tuBa tuBa hiMse BvA Atma lfNi xNi uBa saka sew toBate lfdit xdit atuBat atoBizwa atomizwa tutuBe tuBa hiMsAyAM divA kyrA ca para saka sew tuByati tuBrAti atoBIt tutoBa saMkrudDo muzwinAtuBnAdaNgado muzwinAtuBnAda Ngado nu mahodaram aSvAn viBIzaRo tuBnAt tumnAt BawwiH tuBa hiMse BvA Atma xNi uBa saka sew toBate xdit atuBat atomizwa tutuBe tuBa hiMsAyAM divA kyrA ca para saka sew tuByati tuBrAti atoBIt tutoBa saMkrudDo muzwinAtuBnAda Ngado nu mahodaram aSvAn viBIzaRo tumnAt BawwiH
tuRqakerI tuRqakerI tuRqa Rqi kerI strI praSastaM tuRqaM RqiH kan tad Ira yati Irtte vA Ira aR kArpAsyAm tasyAH PalamuKa vidAre hi vistIrRasUtrahetukArpAsotpattiH vimbikA yAm telAkucA tasyAH Palena hi muKANgozWasAdfSyadA nAt taTAtvam svArTe ka hrasvaH tuRqa Rqi keri kAzyatra amaraH saMjYAyA kan vimbikAyAM rAjani
tuRqakeri tuRqakeri tuRqa Rqi keri strI praSastaM tuRqaM RqiH kan tad Irayati Irtte vA Ira aR kArpAsyAm tasyAH PalamuKavidAre hi vistIrRasUtrahetukArpAsotpattiH bimbikAyAm telAkucA tasyAH Palena hi muKANgozWasAdfSyadAnAt taTAtvam svArTe ka hrasvaH tuRqa Rqi kerikApyatra amaraH saMjYAyAM kan bimbikAyAM rAjani
tugryA tugryA tugryA strI tuja rak nyaNkvA kuH svArTe yat jale niGaRwuH AvaH SamaM vfzaBaM tugryAsu f tugryAsu jalezu BA niGaRwO busaM tugryamiti pAWAntarAt jale na tadanusAreRa piba svaDEnavAnAmuta yastugrye sacA busaM tugryamityudakanAmasu pAWAt BA vastutastu niGaRwO busaM tugraM tugryAvarvaramityeva pAWaH mudritapustake tugramiti patitam tugrasya rAjarzerapatyaM bA yat tugraputre BujyO pu astaM vayo na tugryam f tugryaM tugraputram BA
tugryyA tugryyA tugryyA strI tuja rak nyaNkvA kuH svArTe yat jale ni GaRwuH AvaH SamaM vfzaBaM tugryyAsu f tugryAsu jalezu BA niGaRwO busaM tugryamiti pAWA ntarAt jale na tadanusAreRa piba svaDEnavAnAmuta yastugrye sacA busaM tugryamityudakranAmasu pAWAt BA vastutastu niGaRwO busaM tugraM tugryAvarvara mityeva pAWaH mudritapustake tugramiti patitam tugrasya rAjarzerapatyaM bA yat tugraputre BujyO pu astaM vayo na tugryam f tugryaM tugraputram BA
tuhuRqa tuhuRqa tuhuRqa pu danuvaMSye dAnavaBede aSvagrIvaSca sUkzmaSca tuhuRqaSca mahAbalaH ekapAdekacakraSca virUpAkzamaho darO nicandraSca nikumBaSca kupawaH kapawastaTA SaraBaH SalaBaScEva sUryyacandramasO taTA ete KyAtA dano rvaMSe dAnavAH parikIrttitAH BA A a DftarAzwraputraBede nandako bAhuSAlI ca tuhuRqovika wastaTA a
tuhuRqaM tuhuRqaM tuhuRqaM pu danuvaMSye dAnavaBede aSvagrIvaSca sUkzmaSca tuhuRqaSca mahAbalaH ekapAdekacakraSca virUpAkzamahodarO nicandraSca nikumBaSca kupawaH kapawasTaTA SaraBaH SalaBaScEva sUryyacandramasO taTA ete KyAtA danorvaMSe dAnavAH parikIrttitAH BA A a DftarAzwraputraBede nandako bAhuSAlI ca tuhuRqovikawastaTA a
tuja tuja tuja dIptO curA uBa aka sew idit tuYjayati te atutuYjat atu tuYjat tuYjyate tuja prApaRe hiMsAyAYca BvA para saka bale aka sew idit tuYjati atuYjIt tutuYja tutuYjatuH tuYje tuYjeya uttare stomAH f imAmfcamaDikftya imAmfvamaDikftya tuYjaterdAnakarmmaRaH tuYje tuYje dAne dAne iti niruktokteH dAne ca hiMsAyAM tuja hisAyAM BvA para saka sew tojati atojIt tutoja vede tujAdi aByAsasya dIrGaH tUtujAnaH preraRe ca A vAM toke tanaye tUtujAnAH f prAvattoke tanaye tUtujAnA tUtujAnAH preryyamARAH tUtu jAnAHpreryyamARAH BA asmA imu praBayA tUtujAnaH niru DftA fk tuja dIptO curA uBa aka sew idit tuYjayati te atu tuYjat tuYjyate tuja prApaRe hiMsAyAYca BvA para saka bale aka sew idit tuYjati atuYjIt tutuYja tutuYjatuH tuYje tuYjeya uttare stomAH f imAmfvamaDikftya tuYjaterdAnakarmmaRaH tuYje tuYje dAne dAne iti niruktokteH dAne ca tuja hisAyAM BvA para saka sew tojati atojIt tutoja vede tujAdi aByAsasya dIrGaH tUtujAnaH preraRe ca A vAM toke tanaye tUtujAnAH f prAvattoke tanaye tUtujAnA tUtu jAnAHpreryyamARAH BA asmA imu praBayA tUtujAnaH niru DftA fk
tumala tumala tumala puM na sO tu mulan paramparasaMGAtena saNkule yudDe kalivfkze medi vyAkulayudDe na trikA baBUva yudDaM tumulaM jayEziRoH raGuH saNkulamAtre tri uBayorapi pArSvavarttinAM tumulenArttaraveRa vejitAH raGuH
tumara tumara tumara na tumula lasya raH tumule amarawIkA

tumura tumura tumura na tumula lasya raH tumule amarawIkA
tunPa tunPa tunPa baDe BvA para saka sew tumPati atumPIt atamPIt tutumPa tutuPa mPa tuH tutumPiTa tunPa baDe saka kleSe aka tudA para sew tuPati tumPati tu mPati atu tu mPIt mPot tutu tu mPa tutuPa mPa tuH tutuPiTa tutumpiTa tutmpiTa tunPa baDe BvA para saka sew tumPati atamPIt tutumPa tutuPa mPa tuH tutumPiTa tunPa baDe saka kleSe aka tudA para sew tuPati tu mPati atu tu mPot tutu tu mPa tutuPa mPa tuH tutuPiTa tutmpiTa
