tundila tundila tundila tri tundaM vidyate sya Wan tundi Ba tunda ilac vA tundiyukte Buzqi yukte
tunnasevanI tunnasevanI tunnasevanI strI tunnaM CinnaM sIvyate nayA siva karaRe lyuw NIp sUcIBede praveSya tunnasevanyA muYkO sIvyet tataH param suSrutaH
tunnavAMya tunnavAMya tunnavAMya pu tunnaM CinnaM vayati ve aR sOcike sUcyAjIvini darajI amaraH SElUzatunnavAyAnna kftaGnasyAnnameva ca manunA tadannaBakzaRaM nizidDam
tunpa tunpa tunpa baDe bave BvA saka para sew tumpati tampati atumpIt tutumpa tutumpatuH tutumpiTa tunpa baDe saka kleSe aka tu para sew tupati tumpati atu at pI mpIt tutu ttu pa mpa tutu pa mpatuH tutupiTa tutumpiTa ttupiTa tutmpiTa tunpa bave BvA saka para sew tampati atumpIt tutumpa tutumpatuH tutumpiTa tunpa baDe saka kleSe aka tu para sew tupati tumpati at pI mpIt ttu pa mpa tutu pa mpatuH ttupiTa tutmpiTa
turIya turIya turIya gatO BvA saka sew gatikarmmasu niGaRWuH turIyati aturIyIt turIya tri turIya ac caturRAM pUraRaH catura Ca AdyalopaSca Adya lopaSca gatiyukte caturRAM pUraRe ca tArake tanasturIyamaDa pozayitnuH f turIyaM tArakam tAra kam BA guhA trIRi nihitAneNgayanti turIyaM vAco manuzyA vadanti f asyArTaH BAzye bahuDA vahuDA mataBedena darSitaH kintu vEKarIrUpA vAk caturTIti catu rTIti nizkfzwArTaH taTA hi parA paSyantI praSyantI maDyamA vESvarIti vEsvarIti catvAri ekEva nAdAtmikA nAdA tmikA vAk mUlADArAduditA satI paretyucyate nAdasya ca sUkzmatvena durnirUpatvAt sEva hfdayagAminI paSyantItyucyate paSyantI tyucyate yogiBirdrazwuM SakyatvAt sEva budDiM gatA vivakzAM prAptA maDyametyucyate maDye hfdayAKye udIyamAnatvAt udIyamAnatvAn maDyamAyAH aTa yadA sEva vaktre sTitA tAlvozWAdivyApAreRa tAlvozWAdivyA pAreRa bahirnirgacCati tadA veSvarItyucyate vEsvarItyucyate evaM catvAri vAcaH bAvaH padAni parimitAni manIziRo manasaH svAminaH svA minaH svADInamanaskA brAhmaRA vAco sya SabdabrahmaRo DigantAro yoginaH padAni catvAri padAni viduH jAnanti tezu maDye trIRi parAdIni guhAnihitAni hfdayAntarvarttitvAt turIyaM tu padaM vEKarIsaMjYakaM manuzyAH sarve vadanti sarvADAraBUte nupahitacEtanye parabrahmaRi vanavfkzatadavacCinnAkASayorjalASayajalatadgatapratibimbAkASayorvA ADArAnupahitAkASavadanayorajYAnatadupahitacEtanyayorADAraBUtaM vanavfkzatadavacCinnAkASayorjalASayajalatadgata prativimbAkASayorvA ADArAnupahitAkASavadanayorajYAna tadupahitacEtanyayorADAraBUtaM yadanupahitacEtanyaM tat turIyamityucyate vedAntasA ADAraScAsO anupahitaScAsO AkASaSca sa taTA tadvaditi yAvat yadyapyAkASasya vanASrayatvaM jalASrayatvaM jalASrayatva vA nAsti tadanAramBakatvAt Page b taTApyAkASamantareRa tayoH sTityanupapattestadADAratvavacanamiti sTityanupapattestadADAratvavacana miti drazwavyam asya cEtanyasya turIyatvaM viSvatEjasaprAjYApekzayA viSvatEjasa prAjYApekzayA drazwavyam SivamadvEtaM turIyaM manyante vedAnta sAraDftA SrutiH turIyo yajYo yatra havyamiti yaju turIyaH caturTaH AdO yajurjapaH tato hotrA tatohotrA fcAM paWanam brahmaRo pratiraTajapaH evaM ca turIyo homaH turIyohomaH taTA ca SrutiH aDvaryuH purastAdyajUziM purastAdyajUMzi japati hotA paScAdfco paScA dfco nvAha brahmA dakziRato pratiraTaM japatyeza eva turIyo yajYa iti vedadI turIyaH brahmahatyAyAH kzatriyasya baDe sTitaH manuH svArTe ka tatrArTe BaginyaSca nijAdaMSAt nijAdaSAt dattvAMSantu turIyakam yAjYa turIya gatO BvA saka sew gatikarmmasu niGaRWuH turIyati aturIyIt turIya tri turIya ac caturRAM pUraRaH catura Ca Adya lopaSca gatiyukte caturRAM pUraRe ca tArake tanasturIyamaDa pozayitnuH f turIyaM tAra kam BA guhA trIRi nihitAneNgayanti turIyaM vAco manuzyA vadanti f asyArTaH BAzye vahuDA mataBedena darSitaH kintu vEKarIrUpA vAk catu rTIti nizkfzwArTaH taTA hi parA praSyantI maDyamA vEsvarIti catvAri ekEva nAdA tmikA vAk mUlADArAduditA satI paretyucyate nAdasya ca sUkzmatvena durnirUpatvAt sEva hfdayagAminI paSyantI tyucyate yogiBirdrazwuM SakyatvAt sEva budDiM gatA vivakzAM prAptA maDyametyucyate maDye hfdayAKye udIyamAnatvAn maDyamAyAH aTa yadA sEva vaktre sTitA tAlvozWAdivyA pAreRa bahirnirgacCati tadA vEsvarItyucyate evaM catvAri bAvaH padAni parimitAni manIziRo manasaH svA minaH svADInamanaskA brAhmaRA vAco sya SabdabrahmaRo DigantAro yoginaH padAni catvAri padAni viduH jAnanti tezu maDye trIRi parAdIni guhAnihitAni hfdayAntarvarttitvAt turIyaM tu padaM vEKarIsaMjYakaM manuzyAH sarve vadanti sarvADAraBUte nupahitacEtanye parabrahmaRi vanavfkzatadavacCinnAkASayorjalASayajalatadgata prativimbAkASayorvA ADArAnupahitAkASavadanayorajYAna tadupahitacEtanyayorADAraBUtaM yadanupahitacEtanyaM tat turIyamityucyate vedAntasA ADAraScAsO anupahitaScAsO AkASaSca sa taTA tadvaditi yAvat yadyapyAkASasya vanASrayatvaM jalASrayatva vA nAsti tadanAramBakatvAt Page b taTApyAkASamantareRa tayoH sTityanupapattestadADAratvavacana miti drazwavyam asya cEtanyasya turIyatvaM viSvatEjasa prAjYApekzayA drazwavyam SivamadvEtaM turIyaM manyante vedAnta sAraDftA SrutiH turIyo yajYo yatra havyamiti yaju turIyaH caturTaH AdO yajurjapaH tatohotrA fcAM paWanam brahmaRo pratiraTajapaH evaM ca turIyohomaH taTA ca SrutiH aDvaryuH purastAdyajUMzi japati hotA paScA dfco nvAha brahmA dakziRato pratiraTaM japatyeza eva turIyo yajYa iti vedadI turIyaH brahmahatyAyAH kzatriyasya baDe sTitaH manuH svArTe ka tatrArTe BaginyaSca nijAdaSAt dattvAMSantu turIyakam yAjYa
tura tura tura tvaraRe juho para aka sew tutortti atorIt tutora vEdiko yam DAtuH apAmivedUrmayasturturARAH apAmivedUrmayastarturARAH f tAcCIlye cAnaS aByAsasyAto ttvaM ca sahizWe turatasturasya f arko vA yatturate tEsa tE sa vede gaRavyatyayaH padavyatyayaSca asyAdantacurAditvamapi asyAdanta curAditvamapi turayati turayannfjipyaH turayanna jizyaH f tura tri tura ka vegavati pra tavyaso nasa nama uktiM turasyAham turasyA ham f nahi tvA SUro na turo na DfzRurna Gf Page a zRurna f GaYarTe BAve ka vA vege turagaH tura tvaraRe juho para aka sew tutortti atorIt tutora vEdiko yam DAtuH apAmivedUrmayastarturARAH f tAcCIlye cAnaS aByAsasyAto ttvaM ca sahizWe turatasturasya f arko vA yatturate tE sa vede gaRavyatyayaH padavyatyayaSca asyAdanta curAditvamapi turayati turayanna jizyaH f tura tri tura ka vegavati pra tavyaso nama uktiM turasyA ham f nahi tvA SUro na turo na Gf Page a zRurna f GaYarTe BAve ka vA vege turagaH
tusa tusa tusa pu tuza pfzo tuze DAnyatvaci ramAnATaH DvanO BvA para saka sew tosati atosIt tutosa tusa pu tuza pfzo tuze DAnyatvaci ramAnATaH tusa DvanO BvA para saka sew tosati atosIt tutosa tusa pu tuza pfzo tuze DAnyatvaci ramAnATaH
tutTa tutTa tutTa stutO ada cu uBa saka sew tutTayati tutTayarti te atututTat ta tutTa pu tuda Tak grAvaRi uRA agnO saMkziptasA tuMte aYjanaBede turte aYjanamede na nIlyAm sUkzmElAyAYca strI hemaca svArTe ka tatrArTe rasanAYjanasya guRAdikaM gu RAdikaM BAvapra uktaM yaTA tutTaM tAmropaDAturhi kiYcittAmreRa tadBavet kiYcittAmraguRaM tasmAt vakzyamARaguRaYca tat tutTakaM kawukaM kzAraM kazAyaM vAmakaM laGu leKanaM BedanaM SItaM cakzuzyaM kaPapittahft vizASmakuzWakaRqUGnaM KarparaYcApi svarpara YcApi taduguRam BAvapra BAvapa asya SoDanam vizWAyAM mardayettutTaM mardaye ttutTaM mArjArakakapotayoH daSAMSaM waNkanaM dattvA pacet laGupuwe laGupawe tataH puwaM daGnA puwa daDnA puwaM kzOdrErdeyaM tutTaviSudDaye BAvapra kAsIsaM rocanAM tutTaM tutTa haritAlaM manaH SilAm suSrutaH tutTa stutO ada cu uBa saka sew tutTayarti te atututTat ta tutTa pu tuda Tak grAvaRi uRA agnO saMkziptasA turte aYjanamede na nIlyAm sUkzmElAyAYca strI hemaca svArTe ka tatrArTe rasanAYjanasya gu RAdikaM BAvapra uktaM yaTA tutTaM tAmropaDAturhi kiYcittAmreRa tadBavet kiYcittAmraguRaM tasmAt vakzyamARaguRaYca tat tutTakaM kawukaM kzAraM kazAyaM vAmakaM laGu leKanaM BedanaM SItaM cakzuzyaM kaPapittahft vizASmakuzWakaRqUGnaM svarpara YcApi taduguRam BAvapa asya SoDanam vizWAyAM mardaye ttutTaM mArjArakakapotayoH daSAMSaM waNkanaM dattvA pacet laGupawe tataH puwa daDnA puwaM kzOdrErdeyaM tutTaviSudDaye BAvapra kAsIsaM rocanAM tutTa haritAlaM manaH SilAm suSrutaH
tuza tuza tuza toze AnandaBede di pa lfdit za xdit aka sew tuzyati atuzat tutoza YIdit varttamAne ktaH tuzwaH tuzwiH tozaH tuzya drOpadi mA kruDa kruGa BA va Slo tuzyanti ca ramanti ca BA Anu Slo tutoza paSyan vitfRAntarAlAH BawwiH tuza pu tuza ka viBItakavfkze vayaqA DAnyatvaci svanAmaKyAte svanAma KyAte dravye ca amaraH vrIhIn jihAsati sitottamataRqulAdyAn ko nAma BostuzakaRopahitAn hitArTI hitATI prabo ca tuzeRApi parityaktA na prarohanti praro hanti taRqulAH hito satuzaM DAnyamucyate DAnayamucyate A ta tuza toze AnandaBede di za xdit aka sew tuzyati atuzat tutoza YIdit varttamAne ktaH tuzwaH tuzwiH tozaH tuzya drOpadi mA kruGa BA va Slo tuzyanti ca ramanti ca BA Anu Slo tutoza paSyan vitfRAntarAlAH BawwiH tuza pu tuza ka viBItakavfkze vayaqA DAnyatvaci svanAma KyAte dravye ca amaraH vrIhIn jihAsati sitottamataRqulAdyAn ko nAma BostuzakaRopahitAn hitATI prabo ca tuzeRApi parityaktA na praro hanti taRqulAH hito satuzaM DAnayamucyate A ta
tvadalakzyArTa tvadalakzyArTa tvadalakzyArTa pu tvamiti padasya lakzyo rTaH ajYAnAdizwyupADyupahitADAraBUte anupahitapratyagAnandarUpe turIyacEttagye
tvakpata tvakpata tvakpata na tvagiva patramasya guqatvaci dAracini tejapatre ca amaraBaratO candanAgurumuKyAni tvakpatrARAM vanAni ca BA SA a hiNgupatryAm strI gOrA NIp amaraH
tvakpatra tvakpatra tvakpatra na tvagiva patramasya guqatvaci dAracini tejapatre ca amaraBaratO candanAgurumuKyAni tvak patrARAM vanAni ca BA SA a hiNgupatryAm strI gOrA NIp amaraH
tvampadalakzyArTa tvampadalakzyArTa tvampadalakzyArTa pu tvamiti padasya lakzyo rTaH ajYAnAdi vyazwyupADyupahitADAraBUte anupahitapratyagAnandarUpe turIyacEtanye
tvanca tvanca tvanca gatO BvA para saka sew tvaYcati atvaYcIt tvatvaYca udit tvaYcitvA tvaktvA tvaktaH tvanca saNkoce ruDA para saka vew tvanakti atvANkzIt atvA NkzIt matAntare udit ktA ktvA vew anyatra sew tvaktaH tvanca gatO BvA para saka sew tvaYcati atvaYcIt tvatvaYca udit tvaYcitvA tvaktvA tvaktaH tvanca saNkoce ruDA para saka vew tvanakti atvA NkzIt matAntare udit ktvA vew anyatra sew tvaktaH
u u u Sabde BvAdi aka A anizw aniw avate Ozwa uve otA ozIzwa ozyate Ozyata avanam utaH uve amba sulABike yaTevANga Bavizyati f u avya u kvip na tuk samboDagane samboDane kopavacane anukampAyAM anuka mpAyAM niyoge avaDAraRe umeti mAtrA tapase nizidDA paScAdumAKyAM sumuKI jagAma kumA uduzya udu zya devaH savitA sa vAya f upo ruruce yuvatirna yozA f vetTo yaTemaM lokaM punarApadyanta iti vfha u eza e u evAsADu karmma kArayati tam SrutiH aNgIkAre praSne ca hemaca pAdapUraRe pA dapUraRe atati sAtatyena tizWati atf ata qu Sive pu svarUpArTe kAraH ukAro pi Sive akAro vizRuruddizwa ukArastu maheSvaraH maheSvaMraH makArastu smfto brahmA praRavastu trayArTakaH iti omityasya avayavArTanirUpaRe purA uSabdAt svarUpArTe kAraH ukAraH paYcamasvare sa ca uttAnudAcasvaritaBedena praTamaM Page b uttAnudAttasvaritaBedena prayamaM triDA punaH anunAsikA nanu nAsikABedena nanunAsikaBedena pratyekaM dviDeti zawviDaH kAratakArAnuttarastu hrasvadIrGaplutaBedena hrasvadIrGaptutaBedena triviDo pi pratyekaM prAguktaBedazawkAt azwAdaSaviDaH tasya varRasya kuRqalinIrUpatvAdinADyeyatvamuktam kURqalinIrUtvAdinA Dyeyatvamuktam kAmaDenutantre yaTA ukAraM parameSAni viduH kuRqalinIM svayam pItacampakasaNkASaM paYcadevaM sadA malam paYcaprARAmayaM paYcaprARamayaM devi caturvargapradAyakam tantrAntare akArokAramakArAtmakapraRavasya maDye dvAdaSakalAtmakArkamaRqalarUpeRa dvAdaSa kalAtmakArkamaRqalarUpeRa akArasya zoqaSakalAtmakacandramaRqalarUpeRa zoqaSakalAtmakacandra maRqalarUpeRa ukArasya daSakalAtmakavahnimaRqalarUpeRa ca makArasya DyeyatvoktyA aBedopacArAt zoqaSakalAtmake zoqaSakalA tmake candramaRqale ca tatra makArAntasyEva tannAmateti bahavaH u ityasya ekAj nipAtatvAt pragfhyAsaMjYA pragfhyasaMjYA tena aci pare na sanDiH u umeSaH si kO eza uvAsADukarmma u vAsADukarmma kArayati tam SrutiH sa cacAdigaRIyaH u uH SaNkarovarttulAkzo BUtaHkalyARavAcakaH amareSodakza karRRaH zaqvaktromohanaH SivaH ugraHpraBurDftirvizRuH viSva karmmA maheSvaraH SatruGnaSca kawiH puzwiH paYcamI vahnivA sinI kAmaGnaH kamalAveSo mohinI viGnahfnmahI tawasUH kuwilA SrotraM pArahIno vfzoharaH u ukAraM parameSAni aDaHkuRqalinIM svayam pItacampaka saNkASaM paYcadevamayaMsadA paYcaprARamayaM devi catu rvargapradAyakam u Sabde BvAdi aka A aniw avate Ozwa uve otA ozIzwa ozyate Ozyata avanam utaH uve amba sulABike yaTevANga Bavizyati f u avya u kvip na tuk ukArastu maheSvaMraH makArastu smfto brahmA praRavastu trayArTakaH iti omityasya avayavArTanirUpaRe purA uSabdAt svarUpArTe kAraH ukAraH paYcamasvare sa ca Page b uttAnudAttasvaritaBedena prayamaM triDA punaH anunAsikA nanunAsikaBedena pratyekaM dviDeti zawviDaH kAratakArAnuttarastu hrasvadIrGaptutaBedena triviDo pi pratyekaM prAguktaBedazawkAt azwAdaSaviDaH tasya varRasya kURqalinIrUtvAdinA Dyeyatvamuktam kAmaDenutantre yaTA ukAraM parameSAni viduH kuRqalinIM svayam pItacampakasaNkASaM paYcadevaM sadA malam paYcaprARamayaM devi caturvargapradAyakam tantrAntare akArokAramakArAtmakapraRavasya maDye dvAdaSa kalAtmakArkamaRqalarUpeRa akArasya zoqaSakalAtmakacandra maRqalarUpeRa ukArasya daSakalAtmakavahnimaRqalarUpeRa ca makArasya DyeyatvoktyA aBedopacArAt zoqaSakalA tmake candramaRqale ca tatra makArAntasyEva tannAmateti bahavaH u ityasya ekAj nipAtatvAt pragfhyasaMjYA tena aci pare na sanDiH u umeSaH si kO eza u vAsADukarmma kArayati tam SrutiH sa cacAdigaRIyaH u uH SaNkarovarttulAkzo BUtaHkalyARavAcakaH amareSodakza karRRaH zaqvaktromohanaH SivaH ugraHpraBurDftirvizRuH viSva karmmA maheSvaraH SatruGnaSca kawiH puzwiH paYcamI vahnivA sinI uYCaSila uYCaSila uYCaSila na Sila apahAre ka ta kzetrasvABinA gfhItaSasyAt kzetrAtkaRaSaH samuccayarUpe AharaRe asya Page a dantyamakAramaDyatAmapi kecit pfzodarAdi kalpayanti
ucCaSila ucCaSila ucCaSila na Sila apahAre ka ta kzetrasvAminA gfhItaSasyAt kzetrAtkaRaSaH samuccayarUpe AharaRe asya dantyamakAramaDyatAmapi kecit pfzodarAdi kalpayanti
ucCasita ucCasita ucCasita na ud Svasa kta vikASite jIvite sPurite viSadocCvasiteva mediniH raGuH prARezu ca sA Kalu BagavataH kaRvasya kulaparerucCasitam Saku karttari kta yanakIna ucCAsayukte ASvAsa yukte ca tri tvamutkaRWocCasitahfdayayAvIkzya saMBAvya cEvam meGadU
ucCizwamIdana ucCizwamIdana ucCizwamIdana na ucCizwaM BramarocCizwaM maDu tena modate vardDate muda lyu mosa sikTake
ucCizwamodana ucCizwamodana ucCizwamodana na ucCizwaM BramarocCizwaM BaDu tena modate vardDate muda lyu moma sikTake
ucCvasita ucCvasita ucCvasita na ud Svasa kta vikASite jIyite sPurite viSadocCvasiteva mediniH raGuH prARezu ca sA Kalu BagavataH kaRvasya kulapaterucCvasitam Saku karttari kta ucCvAsayukte ASvAsa yukte ca tri tvAmumutkaRWocCasitahfdayA vIkzya saMBAvya cEvam mezadU

udaDyA udaDyA udaDyA strI ud ada bA yat tElapipIlikAyAM SabdArTaci
udaKit udaKit udaKit na udakena jalena Svayati vardDate Svi kkip saMjYAyAm udAdeSaH ardDajalena maTite takre amaraH pAne mUtramudaSvicca daDi SuktaYca Bojane marddanaM daDyudaSvidByAmaTa vA taRqUlAmbunA sumu
udaSvit udaSvit udaSvit na udakena jalena Svayati vardDate Svi kkip saMjYA yAm udAdeSaH ardDajalena maTite takre amaraH pAne mUtramudaSvicca daDi SuktaYca Bojane marddanaM daDyudaSvidByA maTa vA taRqulAmbunA suSru
udaYc udaYc udaYc tri uda anca vic udakSabdArTe Batve udaYcaH udaYcA iti BedaH tataH praTamAntAdyarTe astAti tasyaluk udaNpraTamAntAdyerTa digdeSAdO avya yAn zaqudaNNeti tAn mAsAn CA u udaN uttarasyAm
udaYca udaYca udaYca tri uda anuc vic udakSabdArTe Batva udaYcaH udaYcA iti BedaH tataH praTamAntAdyarTe astAti tasya luk udaNpraTamAntAdyarTa digdeSAdO avya yAn zaqudaNNeti tAn mAsAn CA u udaN uttarasyAm
udadyA udadyA udadyA strI ud ada bA yat tElapipIlikAyAM SabdArTaci
udakIrRRa udakIrRRa udakIrRRa ryya pu udakena kIrRaH ryyaH saMjYAyAm udA deSaH mahAkaraYje rAjanirGa ryyAntaH ratnamA
udakIrRa udakIrRa udakIrRa ryya pu udakena kIrnaH ryyaH saMjYAyAm udAdeSaH mahAkaraYje rAjanirGa ryyAntaH ratnamA
udakecara udakecara udakecara pu udake jale carati ac vA saptamyA aluk jalacare matsyAdO aDvaryyurmatsya sAmadorAjetyAha tasyodakecarA viSasta iva Asata iti matsyASca Sata brA jalacare pakzikUrmAdO ca te ca suSrute viBAjitAH te ca AnUpaSabde pfzWe darSitAH sAptamyAluki udakacaro pyatra Rini uda kacArin apyatra striyAM NIp
udbanDaka udbanDaka udbanDaka pu DopA varRasaNkaraBede Ayogavena viprAyAM jAtAstAmropajIvinaH tasyEva nfpakanyAyAM jAtaH sUnika ucyate sUnikasya nfpAyAntu jAtA udbanDakAH smftAH nirRejayeyurvastrARi aspfSyASca BavantyataH uSanA

udgataSfNga udgataSfNga udgataSfNga pu udgatamutyitaM SfNgamasya jAtaSfNgAvasTApaSO
udrakecara udrakecara udrakecara pu udake jale carati ac vA saptamyA alfk jalacare matsyAdO aDvaryyurmatasya sAmAdo rAjetyAha tasyodakecarA viSasta iva Asata iti matsyASca Sata brA jalacare pakzikUrmAdO ca te ca suSrute viBAjitAH teca AnUpaSabde darSitAH saptamyAmaluki udakacaro pyatra Rini udakacArin apyatra striyAM NIp

udvAdika udvAdika udvAdika tri udvAhaH prayojanamasya Wak saMjYApUrvakaviDeranityatvAt na vfdDiH vivAhasADane mantrAdO nodvAhikezu mantrezu viDavAvedanaM kvacit manuH vfdDO OdvAhiko pyatra tri
udvAhika udvAhika udvAhika tri advAhaH prayojanamasya Wak saMjYApUrvakaviDera nityatvAt na vfdDiH vivAhasADane mantrAdO nod vAhikezu mantrezu viDavAvedanaM kvacit manuH vfdDO OdvAhiko pyatra tri
ugrAdeva ugrAdeva ugrAdeva pu ugreRAdIvyati A diva ac ta rAja rziBede agninA turvaSaM yaduM parAvata ugrAdeva havAmahe f ugrAdevanAmakaYca rAjarzim BA

ulUpin ulUpin ulUpin pu oH SamBoH rUpamastyasya ini rasya laH SiMSumAre amaraH pf hrasvapAWo pi tatrEva ulUpin ityapi pAWaH kvacit tatrArTe
ulUpina ulUpina ulUpina pu o SamBoH rUpamastyasya ini rasya laH SiSumAre amaraH pf hrasvapAWo pi tatrEva ulapin ityapi pAWaH kvacit tatrArTe
ula ula ula pu dohe srOtaH paraH sakavsew dAhe sOtraH para saka sew olati OlIt ula pu ula dAhe karmaRi GaYarTe GaYarye ka mfgaBede ulohalikzRo ulo halikzRo vfzadaMSaste DAtre yaju ulomfgaBedeH u lomfgaBedaH vedadI tataH caturarTyAM balA ya ulya matkasannikfzwadeSAdO matakasannikfzwadeSAdO tri ula dAhe sOtraH para saka sew olati OlIt ula pu ula dAhe karmaRi GaYarye ka mfgaBede ulo halikzRo vfzadaMSaste DAtre yaju u lomfgaBedaH vedadI tataH caturarTyAM balA ya ulya matakasannikfzwadeSAdO tri
ulkAmuKa ulkAmuKa ulkAmuKa pu ulkeva muKamasya pretaBede vAntASyulkAmuKaH pretoviproDarmmAt svakAt cyutaH manuH KyAqA seproyAli iti prasidDe jantuBede strI NIz
ulkApruKa ulkApruKa ulkApruKa pu ulkeva muKamasya pretaBede vAntASyulkAmuKaH preto viproDarmmAt svakAt cyutaH manuH KyANa seoyAli iti prasidDe jantuBede strI NIz
unda unda unda kledane ruDA para saka sew unatti untaH undanti u ndyAt unattu Onat OntAm Ondan OnaH O nat OndIt undAm baBUva Asa cakAra unditA undizyati Ondizyat undan undanam uttiH unnaH uttaH GftapruzA manasA havyamundan f yatra hyApa undantyastizWanti tadozaDayojAyante Sata BvAditvamapi Sirastrirundati aditiH keSAn vapatyApa undantu varcasaH iti ASva gf Ric undayati te Ondidat ta san undidizati
undra undra undra kledane ruDA para saka sew unatti untaH undanti undyAt unattu Onat OntAm Ondan OnaH Onat OndIt undAm baBUva Asa cakAra unditA undizyati Ondizyat undan undanam uttiH unnaH uttaH GftapruzA manasA havyamundan f yatra hyApa undantyastizWanti tadozaDayo jAyante Sata BvAditvamapi Sirastrirundati aditiH keSAn vapatyApa undantuvarcasaH iti ASva gf Ric undayati te Ondidat ta san undidizati
undurakarRI undurakarRI undura ru karRI strI undurasya karRa iva parRamasyAH gO NIz AKukarRyAm undurakAnI svArTe kan tatrEva
unmeya unmeya unmeya tri ud mA yat parimeye AcitaH Sakawon meye trikA unmAnameye suvarRAdO ca
unnidrA unnidrA unnidrA tri udgatA nidrA mudrA yasya vikasite nidrASabdasya mukalIBAvarUpanetranimIlanArTakacena taTAtvam unni drapuspa caRacampakapuzpaBAsA mAGaH nidrArahite ca tAmunnidrAmavaniSayanAM sODavAtAyanasTAm meGa SayyAprAntavivarttarnarvigamayatyunidraeva kzapAH Saku unnidratA ca jAgaraRaM tacca vipralamBaSfNgAre kAmakfta daSaviDAvasTABedaH tAScAvasTAH pf uktAH
unnidra unnidra unnidra tri udgatA nidrA mudrA yasya vikasite nidrASabdasya mukalIBAvarUpanetranimIlanArTakatvena taTAtvam unnidrapuzmacaRacampakapuzpaBAsA mAGaH nidrArahite ca tAmunnidrAmavaniSayanAM sODavAtAyanasTAm meGa SayyAprAntavivarttanervigamayatyunidra eva kzapAH Saku unnidratA ca jAgaraRaM tacca vipralamBaSfNgAre kAmakftadaSaviDAvasTABedaH tAYcAvasTAH uktAH
upAMsaka upAMsaka upAMsaka tri upa Asa Rvul sevake upAsanAkarttari cinmayasyAdvitIyasya nizkalasyASarIriRaH upAsakAnAM sidDyarTaM brahmaRorUpakalpanA vedA SUdre puMstrI tasya dvijasekkatvAt taTAtvam striyAM jAtitvAt NIz hemacandrokte vAkyadaSABede yaTA vAkyamupakramya AcArANgaM sUtrakftaM sTAnANgaM samavAyayuk paYcamaM BagavatyaNgaM jYAtA DarmmakaTApi ca upAsakAntakfdanuttaropapAtikA daSAH praSnavyAkaraRaYcEva vipAkaSrutameva ca ityekAdaSasopANgAnyaNgAni dvAdaSa punaH iti upAsanaYca cintanAparaMparaparyyAyamananAtmikA mAnaso kriyA sA ca kvacidguRAdikamAropya pravarttate yaTA nirguRe brahmaRi saguRatvAdyAropeRa prAguktavacane nirguRasya brahmaRo rUpAropeREva upAsanokteH ataeva sarvaM KalvidaM brahma tajjalAn iti SAnta upAsIt yaTAkraturasmin loke Bavati taTetya pretya Bavati sa kratuM kurvvIta ityupakramya manomayaH prARaSarIraH ityAdinA CA u upAsanAyAM tattaguRopADayo BihitA nirguRe praTamaM cittapraveSAsamBavena saguRe eva mano BiniveSyam tato nivizwamanasaH cittEkAgryam tataH upAsiteSvarAnugrahAdeva samADiyogasidDiH iti pAta sU BAzyayordarSitam ISvarapraRiDAnAdvA sU praRiDAnAdBaktiviSezAdAyarjita ISvarastamanugfhRAti SraBiDAnamAtreRa vyAsa BA praRiDAnAdBaktiviSezAt mAnasAdvAcikAt kAyikAdvA Avarjita aBimuKIBUtastamanugfhRAti aBiDyAnamanAgate rTe icCA idamasyABipretamastviti tAvanmAtreRa na vyApArAntareRa viva tAdfSeSvaropAsanA samarTasya tu praTamaM sTUlAdiByo vivicyAtmana indriyAdyAtmakatayA cintanaM kAryyaM taccintane ca PalamuktaM vAyupu daSa manvantarARIha tizWantIndriyacintakAH bOdDAH daSa sahasrARi tizWanti vigatajvarAH pUrRaM SatasahasraM tu tizWantyavyaktavantakAH vivftaYcEtat pAta BAzyavivftO vAcaspatinA avyaktamahadahaNkArapaYcatanmAtrezvanyanamamAtmatvena pratipannAH tadupAsanAgatatadvAsanAvAsitAntaHkaraRAH piRqapAtAnantaramavyaktAdInAmanyatame lInAH uktatattatkAlaparyyantaM tizWantItyarTaH upAsanaSabde DikaM vakzyate tantroktA upAsakASca paYcaviDA paYcadevatopAsakatvAt SAktaH SEvogARapatyaH sOraSca vEzRavaH kramAt upAsakAH paYcaviDAstantraSAstraviDAnataH punaste triviDAH sAtviko rAjasaScEva tAmasaSceti te triDA prakArAntareRApi yaTAsamBavaM triDA paSuvIMrastaTA divya AcAraBedatastriDA
upAdAnalakzaRA upAdAnalakzaRA upAdAnalakzaRA strI upAdAnAt svArTasya grahaRAt lakzaRA muKyarTasyetarAkzepo vAkyArTe nvayasidDaye syAdAtmano Page b pyupAdAnAdezopAdAnalakzaRA sA da ukte ajahat svATArUpe lakzaRABede yaTA kuntA paviSantItyAdO kuntaSa bdasya kuntaDAriRi lakzaRAByupagame pi tatra kuntarUp maKyArTasyApi viSezaRaviDayA nvayAttaTAtvam
upAdAnalakzaRa upAdAnalakzaRa upAdAnalakzaRa strI upAdAnAt svArTasya grahaRAt lakzaRA muKyArTasyetarAkzeso vAkyArTe nvayasidDaye svAdAtmano pyupAdAnAdezopAdAnalakzaRA sA da ukte ajahatsvArTArUpeya lakzaRABede yaTA kuntAHpraviSantItyAdO kuntaSabdasya kantaDAriRi lakzaRAByupagame pi tatra kuntarUpamuKyArTasyApi viSezaRaviDayA nvayAttaTAtvam
upAsaka upAsaka upAsaka tri upa Asa Rvul sevake upAsanAkarttari cinmayasyAdvitIyasya nizkalasyASarIriRaH upAsa kAnAM sidDyarTaM brahmaRorUpakalpanA vedA SUdre puMstrI tasya dvijasevakatvAt taTAtvam striyAM jAtitkat NIz hemacandrokte vAkyadaSABede yaTA vAkyamupakramya AcA rANgaM sUtrakftaM sTAnANgaM samavAyayuk paYcamaM BagavatyaNgaM jYAtA DarmmakaTApi ca upAsakAntakfdanuttaropapAtikA daSAH praSnavyAkaraRaYcEva vipAkaSrutameva ca ityekAdaSa sopANgAnyaNgAni dvAdaSa punaH iti upAsanaYca cinta nAparaparaparyyAyamananAtmikA mAnasI kriyA sA ca kvacidguRAdikamAropyapravarttate yaTA nirguRe brahmaRi sagu RatvAdyAropeRa prAguktavacane nirguRasya brahmaRorUpAropeREva upAsanokteH ataeva sarvaM KalvidaM brahma tajjalAn iti Page a SAnta upAsIta yaTAkraturasmin loke Bavati taTetya pretya Bavati sa kratuM kurvvIta ityupakramya manomayaH prARaSarIraH ityAdinA CA u upAsanAyAM tattaguRApADayo BihitA nirguRe praTamaM cittapraveSAsamBavena saguRe eva mano BiniveSyam tato nivizwamanasaH cittEkAgryam tataH upAsiteSvarAnugrahAdeva samADiyogasidDviH iti pAta sU BAzyayordarSitam ISvarapraRiDAnAdvA sU praRi DAnAdBaktiviSezAdAyarjita ISvarastamanugfhRAti SraBiDA namAtreRa vyAsaM BA praRiGAnAdBaktiviSezAt mAna sAdvAcikAt kAyikAdvA Avarjita aBimuKIBUtastamanu gfhRAti aBiDyAnamanAgate rTe icCA idamasyABipreta mastviti tAvanmAtreRa na vyApArAntareRa viva tAdfSe SvaropAsanA samarTasya tu praTamaM sTUlAdiByo vivicyAtmana indriyAdyAtmakatayA cintanaM kAryyaM taccintane ca PalamuktaM vAyupu daSa manvantarARIha tizWantIndriyacintakAH bOdDAH daSa sahasrARi tizWanti vigatajvarAH pUrRaM SatasahasraM tu tizWantyavyaktacintakAH vivftaYcE tat pAta BAzyavivftO vAcaspatinA avyaktamahadahaNkArapaYca tanmAtrezvanyanamamAtmatvena pratipannAH tadupAsanAgatatadvA sanAvAsitAntaHkaraRAH piRqapAtAnantaramavyaktAdInAma nyatame lInAH uktatattatkAlaparyyantaM tizWantItyarTaH upAsanaSabde DikaM vakzyate tantroktA upAsakASca paYca viDA paYcadevatopAsakatvAt SAktaH SEvogARapatTaH sOraSca vEzRavaH kramAt upAsakAH paYcaviDAstantra SmastraviDAnataH punaste triviDAH sAtviko rAja saScEva tAmasaSceti te triDA prakArAntareRApi yaTA sammavaM triDA paSurvIrastaTA divya AcAraBedatastriDA
upakAlApa upakAlApa upakAlApa avya viBaktyarTe sAmIpye vA vyayI kalApe ityarTe tatsAmIpye ca tapto BavArTe parimuKA YA OpakalApya tadBave tri
upakalApa upakalApa upakalApa avya viBaktyarye sAmIpye vA vyayIM kalApe ityarTe tatsAmIpye ca tato BavArTe parimuKA Yya OpakalApya tadBave tri
upakarRRa upakarRRa upakarRRa avya viBaktyarTe sAmIpye vA avyayI karRRa ityarTe SrotrasAmIpye ca tatra prAyaBavaH Wak OpakarRikaH tatra prAyaBave tri yaHsvAmI mama kAntA bAnOpakArRRakalocanaH BawwiH
upakarRa upakarRa upakarRa avya viBaktyarTe sAmIpye vA avyayI karRa ityarTe SrotrasAmIpye ca tatra prAyaBavaH Wak OpakarRikaH tatra prAyaBave tri yaHsvAmI mama kAntAvAnOpakArRakalocanaH BawwiH

upanandaka upanandaka upanandaka tri upa nanda Ric Rvul Anandajanake DftarAzwraputraBede pu UrRRanAmaH padmanABastaTAnandopa nandakO DftarAzwraputranAmoktO BA A a

upasaMkramaRa upasaMkramaRa upasaM saNka kramaRa na upa sam krama BAve lyuw vA NaH sanniveSe kasyacit vastunaH pUrvADAratyAgena samIpasTitavastuni saMkramaRe saviSezaRe hi viDinizeDO viSezaRamupasaMkrAmataH sati viSezye bADe ityAdO viSizwe viDinizeDabADe tadDarmaviSezaRe upasaMkramaRaM BavatItyuktaM yaTA SiKI vinazwaH puruzo na nazwa ityatra viSezaRIBUtaSiKAyAmeva nASaSyopasaMkramaRam upasaMkramaRe dIyate kAryaM vA vyuzwA aR OpasaMkramaRa tatra deye kArye tri striyAM NIp
upasaMkramaRe upasaMkramaRe upasaM saNkra kramaRe na upa saB krama BAve lyuw vA NaH sanniveSe kasyacit vastunaH pUrvADAratyAgena samIpasTita vastuni saMkramaRe saviSezaRe hi viDinizeDO viSezaRa mupasaMkrAmataH sati viSezye bADe ityAdO viSizwe viDi nizeDabADe tadDarmaviSezaRe upasaMkramaRaM BavatIvyuktaM yaTA SiKI vinazwaH puruzo na nazwa ityatra viSezaRABUtaSiKA yAmeva nASaSyopasaMkramaRam upasaMkramaRe dIyate kAryaM vA vyuzwA aR OpasaMkramaRa tatra deye kArye tri striyAM NIp
upasaMvyAna upasaMvyAna upasaMvyAna na upasaMvoyate nena upa sam vyeY saMvftO karaRe lyuw pariDAnavastre antara bahiryogopasaM vyAnayoH pA
upasavyAna upasavyAna upasavyAna na upasaMvIyate nena upa sam vyeY saMvftO karaRe lyuw pariDAnavastre antaraM bahiryogopasaMvyAnayoH pA
upodDAtaH upodDAtaH upodDAtaH pu samIpavarttinaH prakftasya udGAtaH udDananam jYAnaM cintanam yatra upa ud hana gatO gatyarTatvAt jYAnArTatA ADAre GaY prakftasidDyarTamAlocanAtmake saNgatipraBede cintAM prakftasadDyarTAmupodGAtaM vidurbuDAH avasaraSabde vivftiH tadarTavarRane ca lakzaRopodGAtena viSizwajYAnasya kAraRatvaM vyavasTApayati dIDi prAramBe ca
upodvAtaH upodvAtaH upodvAtaH pu samIpavarttinaH prakftasya udGAtaH udvananam jYAnaM cintanam yatra upa ud hana gatO gatyarTatvAt jYAnArTatA ADAre GaY prakftasidDyarTamAlocanAtmake saNgatipraBede cintAM prakftasadDyarTAmupodGAtaM vidurbuDAH avasaraSabde vivftiH tadarTavarRane ca lakzaRopodGAtena viSizwajYAnasya kAraRatvaM vyavasTApayati dIDi prAramBe ca

uraH uraH uraH sUtrikA strI ta muktAhAre amaraH
uraHsUtrikA uraHsUtrikA uraHsUtrikA strI ta muktAhAre amaraH
uraRa uraRa uraRa puMstrI f kyu DAtorucca raparaH meze striyAM jAti tvAt NIz vfkIvoraRamAsAdya mftyurAdAya gacCati BA SA a ya uraRaM jaGAna nava caKnvAMsaM navatiM ca bAhUn f dardruGnavfkze pu svAmI
urarI urarI urarI avya ura bA arIk aNgIkAre vistAre ca kfYi asya gatitvAt tena saha samAsaH urarIkftya iti kAlpanikaM BedamurarIkftya sA da GaY urarIkAra aNgIkAre pu kta urarIkfta svIkfte tri
uraro uraro uraro avya ura bA arIk aNgIkAre vistAre ca kfYi asya gartatvAt tena saha samAsaHurarIkftya iti kAlpanikaM BedamurarIkftya sA da GaY urarIkAra aNgIkAre pu kta urarIkfta svIkfte tri
urobfhatI urobfhatI urobfhatI strI vEdike CandoBede bfhatI jAgatastrayaSca gAyatrAH paTyA pUrvvaScettftIyaH nyaNkusAriRI dvitIyaH skanDagrIvI kOzwukeH urobfhatI yAskasya kAtyA ukteH yAskamate dvitIyacaraRasya jAgatAtmakatve anyEzAM trayARAM gAyatrAtmakatve ca sA BavatItyarTaH
urovfhatI urovfhatI urovfhatI strI vEdike CandoBede vfhatI jAgatastrayaSca gAyatrAH paTyA pUrvvaScettftIyaH tyaNkusAriRI dvitIyaH skanDagrIvI kOzwukeH urovfhatI yAskasya kAtyA ukteH yAskamate dvitIyacaraRasya jAgatAtmakatve a nyezAM trayARAM gAyatrAtmakatve ca sA BavatItyarTaH
urucakzam urucakzam urucakzam tri uru yaTA syAt taTA cazwe cakza asun mahAdarSane varzizWakzatrA urucakzasA narAH f sarvvadrazwratvAt sUryye pu namoBirurucakzo nFnviSvAn SaM naH sUryya urucakzA udetu

utAho utAho utAho avya uta ca Aho ca dva vikalpe praSne vicAre ca

utKacita utKacita utKacita tri ud Kaca banDe kta udgrazite racite ca kusumonKacitAn balIBftaH raGuH
utaNkameGa utaNkameGa utaNkameGa pu utaNkArTamISvareRa pravarttitomeGaH marudeSasTotaNkatoyAkANkzApUraRArTamISvareRa kfzRena niyojite meGe tatkaTA BA ASva a utaNka uvAca avaSyakaraRIyaYca yadyetanmanyase viBo toyamicCAmi yatrezwaM marupvetadDirdulaBam tataH saMhftya tatteja provAcotaNkamISvaraH ezwavye sati cintyo hamityuktvA dvArakAM yayO tataH kadAcidBagavAnutaNkastoyakANkzayA tfzitaH paricakrAma marO sasmAra cAcyutam tato digvAsasaM DImAnmAtaNgaMmalapaNkinam apaSyata marO tasmin SvayUTaparivAritam BIzaRaM badDanistriMSaM vARakArmukaDAriRam tasyADaH srotaso paSyat dvAri BUridvijottamaH smaranneva ca taM prAha mAtaNgaH prahasanniva ehyutaNka pratIcCasva matto vAri BfgUdvaha kfpA hi me sumahatI tvAM dfzwvA tfwsamASritam ityuktastena sa munistattoyaM nAByanandata cikzepa ca sa taM DImAn vAgBirugrABiracyutam punaH punaSca mAtaNgaH pibasveti tamabravIt na cApibat sa sakroDaH kzuDitenAntarAtmanA sa tayo niScayAttena pratyAKyAto mahAtmanA SvaBiH saha mahArAja tatrEvAntaraDIyata utaNkastaM taTA dfzwA tato vrIqitamAnasaH mene pralabDamAtmAnaM kfzRonAmitraGAtinA aTa tenEva mArgeRa SaNKacakragadADaraH AjagAma mahAbudDirutaNkaScEnamabravIt na dattaM tAdfSaM dAtuM tvayA puruzasattama salilaM vipramuKyeByo mAtaNgasrotasA viBo ityuktavacanaM tantu mahAbudDirjjanArddanaH utaNkaM SlakzRayA vAcA sAntvayannidamabravot yAdfSeneha rUpeRa yogyaM dAtuM Dftena vE tAdfSaM Kalute dattaM tacca tvaM nAvabuDyaTAH mayA tvadarTamukto vE vajvapARiH purandaraH utaNkAyAmftaM dehi toyarUpamiti praBuH sa mAmuvAca devendro na marTo martyatAM vrajet anyaprasmE varaM dehotyasakfdBfgunandana amftaM deyamityeva mayEvoktaH SacIpatiH sa mAM prasAdya devendraH punarevedamabravIt yadi deyamavaSyaM vE mAtaNgo hi mahAmate BUtvA mftaM pradAsyAmi BArgavAya mahAtmane yadyevaM pratigfhRAti BArgavo mftamadyavE pradAtumeza gacCAmi BArgavasyAmftaM viBo pratyAKyAtastvahaM tena dAsyAmi na kaTaYcana sa taTA samayaM kftvA tena rUpeRa vAsavaH upasTitastvayA cApi pratyAKyAto mftaM dadat cARqAlarUpI Bagavan sumahAMste vyatikramaH tanna SakyaM mayA karttuM BUya eva tavepsitam toyepsAM tava durdDarDAM karizye saPalAmaham yezvahaHsu ca te brahman salilepsA Bavizyati tadA marO Bavizyanti jalapUrRAH payoDarAH rasavacca pradAsyanti toyaM te Bfgunandana utaNkameGA ityuktAH KyAtiM yAsyanti cApi te ityuktaH prItimAn vipraH kfzRena sa baBUva ha adyApyataNkameGAcca marO varzanti BArata
utaNkameva utaNkameva utaNkameva pu utaNkArTamISvareRa pravarttitomeGaH marudeSasTota NkatoyAkANkzApUraRArTamISvareRa kfzRena niyojite meGe tatkaTA BA ASva a utaNka uvAca ava SyakaraRIyaYca yadyetanmanyase viBo toyamicCAmi yatrezwaM maruzvetadDi durlaBam tataH saMhftya tatteja pro vAcotaNkamISvaraH ezwavye sati cintyo hamityuktvA Page b dvArakAM yayO tataH kadAcidBagavAnutaNkastoyakA NkzayA tfzitaH paricakrAma marO sasmAra cAcyutam tato digvAsasaM DImAnmAtaNgaMmalapaNkinam apaSyata marO tasmin SvayUTaparivAritam BIzaRaM badDanistriMSaM vARa kArmukaDAriRam tasyADaH srotaso paSyat dvAri BUri dvijottamaH smaranneva ca taM prAha mAtaNgaH prahasanniva ehyutaNka pratIcCasva matto vAri BfgUdvaha kfpA hi me sumahatI tvAM dfzwvA tfwsamASritam ityuktastena sa munistattoyaM nAByanandata cikzepa ca sa taM DImAn vAgBirugrABiracyutam punaH punaSca mAtaNgaH piba sveti tamabravIt na cApibat sa sakroDaH kzuDitenAnta rAtmanA sa tayo niScayAttena pratyAKyAto mahAtmanA SvaBiH saha mahArAja tatrEvAntaraDIyata utaNkastaM taTA dfzwvA tato vrIqitamAnasaH mene pralabDamAtmAnaM kfzRe nAmitraGAtinA aTa tenEva mArgeRa SaNKacakragadA DaraH AjagAma mahAbudDirutaNkaScEnamabravIt na dattaM tAdfSaM dAtuM tvayA puruzasattama salilaM vipra muKyeByI mAtaNgasrotasA viBo ityuktavacanaM tantu ma hAbudDirjjanArddanaH utaNkaM SlakzRayA vAcA sAntva yannidamabravIt yAdfSeneha rUpeRa yogyaM dAtuM Dftena vE tAdfSaM Kalu te dattaM tacca tvaM nAvabuDyaTAH mayA tvadarTamukto vE vajvapARiH purandaraH utaNkA yAmftaM dehi tIyarUpamiti praBuH sa mAmuvAca deve ndrI na martyo martyatAM vrajet anyamasmE varaM dehI tyasakfdBfgunandana amftaM deyamityeva mayEvoktaH SacI patiH sa mAM prasAdya devendraH punarevedamabravIt yadi deyamavaSyaM vE mAtaNgo hi mahAmate BUtvA mftaM pradA syAmi BArravAya mahAtmane yadyevaM pratigfhRAti BArgavo mftamadya vE pradAtumeza gacCAmi BArgavasyAmftaM viBo pratyAKyAtastvahaM tena dAsyAmi na kaTaYcana sa taTA samayaM kftvA tena rUpeRa vAsavaH upasTita stvayA cApi pratyAKyAto mftaM dadat cARqAlarUpI Bagavan sumahAMste vyatikramaH tanna SakyaM mayA karttuM BUya eva tazepsitam toyepsAM tava durdDarzAM karizye saPalAmaham yezvahaHsu ca te brahman salilepsA Bavi zyati tadA marO Bavizyanti jalapUrRAH payoDarAH rasavacca pradAsyanti toyaM te Bfpunandana utaNkamezA ityuktAH KyAtiM yAsyanti cApi te ityuktaH prIti Page a mAn vipraH kfzRena sa baBUva ha adyApyutaNkameGASca marO varzanti BArata
utaTya utaTya utaTya pu aNgirasaH SradvAyAM patnyAmutpanne gurorjyezWaBrAtari trayohyaNgirasaH putrA ete sarvatra viSrutAH vfhaspati rutaTyaSca saMvarttaSca Df tavrataH BA A a tasyA patyam aR OtaTyaH sa ca utaTyena mamatAyAmutpannaH vfhaspatiSApAt jAtyanDatAM prAptastatkaTA yaTA aTotaTya iti KyAta AsIdDImAnfziH purA mamatA nAma tasyAsIdBAryyA paramasammatA utaTyasya yavI yAMstu puroDAstridivOkasAm dbahaspatirvfhattejA mama tAmanvapadyata uvAca mamatA tantu devaraM vadatAMvaram antarvvatnI tvahaM BrAtrA jyezWenAramyatABiti ayaYca Be sahABAga kukzAveva vfhaspate OtaTyo vedamatrApi zaqaNgaM pratyaDIyata amoGaretAstvaYcApi dvayonnAstyatra samBavaH tasmAdevaYca natvadya upAramitumarhasi eva muktastadA samyagvfhaspatiraDIraDIH kAmAtmAnaM tadA tmAnaM na SaSAka niyacCitum sa baBUva tataH kAmI tayA sArdDamakAmayA utsfjantantu taM retaH sa garBasTo ByaBAzata BostAta mA gamaH kAmaM dvayornnAstIha samBavaH alpAvakASo Bagavan pUrvvaM cAhamihAgataH amoGaretASca BavAnna pIqAM karttumarhasi aSrutvEva tu ta drAkyaM garBasTasya vfhaspatiH jagAma mETunAyEva mamatAM cArulocanAm SukrotsargaM tato budDvA tasyA garBagato muniH padByAmAroDayanmArgaM Sukrasya ca vfhaspateH sTAnamaprAptamapatadretaH pratihataM tadA papAta sahasA mUmO tataH krudDo vfhaspatiH tadfzwvA patitaM Sukra Sa SApa sa ruzA nvitaH utaTyaputtraM garBasTaM nirBartsya BagavAnfziH yanmAM tvamIdfSe kAle sarvvaBUtepsite sati evamAtTa vacastasmAttamo dIrGaM pravekzyasi sa vE dIrGatamA nAma SApAdfzirajAyata vfhaspatervfhatkIrttervfha spatirivOjasA jAtyanDo vedavitprAjYaH patnIM leBe sa viMdyayA taruRIM rUpasampannAM pradvezIM nAma brAhmaRIm sa putrAYjanayAmAsa gOtasAdIn mahAyaSAH fzeruta Tyasya tadA santAnakulavfdDaye DarmAtmA ca mahAtmA ca vedavedANgapAragaH goDarmaM sOraBeyAcca so DItya niKilaM muniH prAvarttata tadA karttuM SradDAvAMstamaSaNkayA BA A a SUdrAvedI patayatrerutaTyatanayasya ca manuH utaTyatanayasya gOtamasyeti kullU tasya Page b utaTyapOtratve pi tatkulavardDanAttaTAtvaM tasya jAtya nDatayA smftikarttftvABAvena tatpOtrasyEva gOtamasya smfti karttftvAt tasyEva sammatikaTanaM yuktamiti taTyAmutaTyA nuvajjagAdAgre gadAgrajaH mAGaH ayaYca ANgirasa gotrapravaramaDyasTa fziBedaH pf vivftaH
utakrISa utakrISa utakrISa pu ud kraSa ac kurarIpakziRi ayaYca pakzI suSru jalacaramaDye plavatvena saMGacAritvenoktaH haMsasArasakrOYcetyAdyupakrame madgUtkroSakAcAkzetyAnImuktvA plavAH saMGacAriRa ityantena utkroSarasasaMsiddAmanalpasnehAM yavAgUM pAyayet suSru uccEHkrandini tri tataH caturarTyAm utkarA Ca utkroSIya tatsannihite deSAdO
utayya utayya utayya pu aNgirasaH adDAyAM patryAmutpanne gurorjyezWaBrAtari trayohyaNgirasaH putrA ete sarvatra viSrutAH vfhaspatirutaTyaSca saMvarttaSca DftavrataH BA A a tasyApatyam aR OtaTyaH sa ca uttaTyena mamatAyAmutpannaH vfhaspatiSApAt jAtyanDatAM prAptastatkaTA yaTA aTotaTya iti KyAta AsIdDImAnfziH purA mamatA nAma tasyAsIdBAryyA paramasammatA utaTyasya yavIyAMstu puroDAstridivOkasAm bfhaspatirbfhattejA mamatAmanvapadyata uvAca mamatA tantu devaraM vadatAMvaram antarvvatnI tvahaM BrAtrA jyezWenAramyatAmiti ayaYca me sahABAga kukzAveva bfhaspate OtaTyo vedamatrApi zaqaNgaM pratyaDIyata amoGaretAstvaYcApi dvayornnAstyatra samBavaH tasmAdevaYca natvadya upAramitamarhasi evamuktastadA samyagbfhaspatiraDIraDIH kAmAtmAnaM tadAtmAnaM na SaSAka niyacCitum sa baBUva tataH kAmI tayA sArdDamakAmayA utsfjantantu taM retaH sa garmasto ByaBAzata BostAta mA gamaH kAmaM dvayornnAstIha samBavaH arlAvakASo Bagavan pUrvvaM cAhamihAnataH amoGaretASca BavAnna pIqAM karttumarhasi aSrutvEva tu tadvAkyaM garBasTasya bfhaspatiH jagAma sETunAyEva mamatAM cArulocanAm SukrotsargaM tato budDvA tasyA garBagato muniH padmyAmAroDayanmArgaM Sukrasya ca bfhaspateH sTAnamaprAptamapatadretaH pratihataM tadA papAta sahasA BUmO tataH krudDo bfhaspatiH tadfzwA patitaM SukraM SaSApa sa ruzA nvitaH utaTyaputtraM garBasTaM nirBartsTa BagavAnfziH yanmAM tvamIdfSe kAle sarvvaBUtepsite sati evamAtTa vacastasmAttamo dIrGaM pravekzyasi sa vE dIrGatamA nAmaSApAdfzirajAyata bfhaspaterdfhatkIrttervfhaspatirivOjasA jAnyanDo vedavitprAjYaH patnIM leBe sa vidyayA taruRI rUpasampannAM pradvezIM nAma brAhmaRIm sa putrAYjanayAmAsa gOtamAdIn mahAyaSAH fzerutaTyasya tadA santAnakulavfdDaye DarmAtmA ca mahAtmA ca vedavedANgapAragaH goDarmaM sOraBeyAcca so DItya niKilaM muniH prAvarttata tadA karttuM SradDAvAMstamaSaNkayA BA A a SUdrAvedI patatyatrerutaTyatanayasyacamanuH utaTyatanayasya gOtamasyeti kullU tasya utaTyapOtratve pi tatkulavardDanAttaTAtvaM tasya jAtyanDatayA smftikarttftvABAvena tatpOtrasyEya gOtamasya smfti karttftvAt tasyEya sammatikaTanaM yuktamiti taTyAmutaTyA nuvajjagAdAgre gadAgrajaH mAGaH ayaYca ANgirasagotrapravaramaDyasTa fziBedaH vivftaH
utkIrRRa utkIrRRa utkIrRRa tri ud kF kta ulliKite kftaveDe ca maRO vajrasamutkIrRe raGuH UrdDvaM kzipte ca rajomisturago tkIrRREH raGuH liKite utkIrRRApi vipralaBate kAda
utkIrRa utkIrRa utkIrRa tri ud kF kta ulliKete kftaveDe ca maRO vajrasamutkIrRe raGuH UrdDaM kzipte ca rajomisturagotkIrREH raGuH liKite utkIrRApi vipralaBate kAda
utkarRRa utkarRRa utkarRRa tri unnataHkarRo yasya yasmin vA prA ba vA nata lopaH kftakarRRottolane utkarRamudvAhitakanDareRa mAGaH
utkarRa utkarRa utkarRa tri unnataH karRo yasya yasmin vA prA ba vA natalopaH kftakarRottolane utkarRamudvAhitakanDareRa mAGaH
utkfti utkfti utkfti strI zaqviMSatyakzarapAdake CandoBede uktAtyukte tyupakramya vikftiH saNkatiScEva taTAtikftirutkftiH vf ra
utkrISa utkrISa utkrISa pu ud kruSa ac kurarIpakziRi ayaYca pakzI suSru jalacaramaDya plavatvena saMGacAritvenoktaH haMsasArasakrO YcetyAdyupakrame madgUtkroSakAcAkzetyAnI nuktvA plavAH saMGacAriRa ityantena utkroSarasasaMsidDA manalpasnehAM yavAgUM pAyayet suSru uccEHkrandini tri tataH caturarTyAm utkarA Ca utkroSIya tatsannihite deSAdO
utpaSya utpaSya utpaSya tri ud dfSa karttari Sa UrdDvaM prekzake unmuKe UrdDvadfzwO hema
utpaSye utpaSye utpaSye tri ud dfSa karttari Sa UrdDvaM prekzake unmuKe UrdDvadfzwO hema
utpatAMka utpatAMka utpatAMka tri uttolitA patAkA yatra prA ba vA tolitaSabdalopaH uttolitapatAke purAdO purandaraSrIH puramutpatAkam raGuH
utpatAka utpatAka utpatAka tri uttolitA patAkA yatra prA ba vA to litaSabdalopaH uttolitapatA ke purAdO purandaraSrIH puramutpapatAkam raGuH
uttAnapaSraka uttAnapaSraka uttAnapaSraka pu uttAnamUrdDamuKaM patramasya kap rakte eraRqe rAjani
uttAnapatraka uttAnapatraka uttAnapatraka pu uttAnamUrdDamuKaM patramasya kap rakte eraRqe rAjani
uttIrRRa uttIrRRa uttIrRRa tri ud tF kartari kta mukte pAraNgate karmmaRi kta kftottaraRe nadAdO tri
uttIrRa uttIrRa uttIrRa tri ud tF karttari kta mukte pAraNgate karmmaRi kta kftottaraRe nadAdO tri
uttaraBAdrapad uttaraBAdrapad uttaraBAdrapad strI BadrAya hitaH BAdraH pat pAdaScaturTAMSo yasyAH ba tataH karmma aSvinyAdinakzatrezu zaqviMSe nakzatre padaSabdena samAse wAp uttaraBAdrapadApyatra svarUpAdikamuqucakraSabde pfzWe uktam aDipatyA dikamaSlezASabde coktam iyaM DruvagaRaH DruvagaRastrI RyuttarARi svaBUH ityukteH mInarASiGawikA
uttaraBAdrapada uttaraBAdrapada uttaraBAdrapada strI BadrAya hitaH BAdraH pat pAdaScaturTAMSo yasyAH ba tataH karmma aSvinyAdinakzatrezu zaqviMSe nakzatre padaSabdena samAse wAp uttaraBAdrapadApyatra svarUpAdikamuqucakraSabde uktam aDipatyAdikamaSlezASabde coktam iyaM DruvagaRaH DruvagaRastrIRyuttarARi svaBUH ityukteH mInarASiGawikA
vADin vADin vADin tri vadati vada Rini vaktari arTini vAdakaTAkarttari vicArasTale praTamapakzapratipAdake ca
vASiMta vASiMta vASiMta na vASa BAve kta tiraScAM Sabde amaraH AhvAne ca
vASita vASita vASita na vASa BAve kta tiraScAM Sabde amaraH advAne ca
vAYCA vAYCA vAYCA strI vACi a icCAyAm izwasADanatADIjaMnye BIzwavizaye cittavfttiBede amaraH
vAcAWa vAcAWa vAcAWa tri vAk kutsAyAM vAhulye styarTe Awac BatvAt na kaH kutsitabahuBAziRi amaraH Alac vAcAlo pyatra
vAcAwa vAcAwa vAcAwa tri vAk kutsAyAM bAhulye styarTe Awac BatvAt na kaH kutsitabahumAziRi amaraH Alac vAcAlo pyatra
vAcCA vAcCA vAcCA strI vACi a icCAyAm izwasADanatADItyanye BIzWavizaye cittavfttiBede amaraH
vAdin vAdin vAdin tri vadati vada Rini vaktari arTini vAdakaTAkarttari vicArasTale praTamapakzapratipAdake ca
vAgdAna vAgdAna vAgdAna na ta kanyAyA vANmAtreRa dAne tato vAgdAnaparyyantaM yAvadekAhameva ca Su ta
vAgqambara vAgqambara vAgqambara pu ta vAkyastome bahulavAkye ca
vAgyama vAgyama vAgyama tri vAcaM tadvyApAraM yacCati yama ac munO amaraH
vAhama vAhama vAhama pu vAhaM gatiM syati so ka ajagare amaraH sunizaRake susani SAke parimARe ca medi
vAhasa vAhasa vAhasa pu vAhaM gatiM syati so ka ajagare amaraH sunizaRake susani SAke parimARe ca medi
vAlmIki vAlmIki vAlmIki pu valmIke BavaH iY pfzo rAmAyaRagranTakarttari muniBede dvirUpako
vAlmiki vAlmiki vAlmiki pu valmIke BavaH iY pfzo rAmAyaRa granTakarttari muniBede dvirUpako
vAnaprasTa vAnaprasTa vAnaprasTa pu vAne vanasamUhe pratizWati sTA ka maDUkavfkze palASavfkze vanaprasTa eva svArTe aR gfhasTastu yadA praSyet valIpalitamAtmanaH putrezu dAran nikzipya vanaM gacCet sahEva vA ityukte ASramaBede medi ca dviviDaH pacamAnaH apacamAnaSca tatra pacamAnaH aSmakuwwaH apacamAnastu dantolUKalikaH tasya Darmo yaTA BUsTA mUlaPalASitvaM svADyAyastapa eva ca saMviBAgo yaTAnyAyaM Darmo yaM vanavAsinaH tapastapyati yo rARye yajeddevAn juhoti ca svADyAye cEva nirato vanasTastApaso mataH tapasA karzitotyarTaM yastu DyAnaparo Bavet sannyAsInha sa vijYeyo vAnaprasTASrame sTitaH gAruqe a yAjYavalkya uvAca vAnaprasTASramaM vakzye tat SfRvantu maharzayaH putrezu BAryyAM niH kzipya vanaM gacCet sahEva vA vAnaprasTo brahmacArI sAgniH sopAsanaH kzamI aPAlakfzwenAgnIMSca pitfdevatirTIstaTA BftyAMstu tarpayet SmaSrujawAlomamaBfdAtmavAn dAntaH striza vaRasnAyI nivfttaSca pratigrahAt svADyAyavAn DyAnaSIlaH sarvaBUtahite rataH ahno mAsasya zaRAM vA kuryyAdvAnnaparigraham kftvA tyajedASvayuje nayet kAlaM vratAdinA pakze mAse tu vASnIyAddantolUKaliko Bavet cAndrAyaRI svapedBUmO karma kuryyAt PalAdinA grIzme paYcAgnimaDyasTo varzAsu sTaRqileSayaH ArdravAsAstu hemante yogAByAsAddinaM nayet a jawitvamagnihotritvaM BUSayyA jinaDAraRam vane vAsa payomUlanIvAraPalavfttitA pratizidDAnnivfttiSca trisnAnaM vrataDAritA devatAtiTipUjA ca Darmo yaM vanavAsinaH a evaM gfhAprame sTitvA dvitIyaBAgagamAyuzaH vAnaprasTASramaM gacCet sadAraH sAgnireva ca niHkzipya BAryyAM putrezu gacCedvanamaTApi dfzwvA patyasya cApatyaM jarjarIkftavigrahaH Suklapakzasya pUrvAhRe praSaste cottarAyaRe gatvApyaraRyaM niyamAMttapaH kuryyAt samAhitaH PalamUlAni patrARi nityamAhAramAharet yadAhAro Bavettena pUjayet pitfdevatAH pUjayedatiTiM nityaM snAtvA cAByarcayet surAn grAmAdAnIya vASnIyAdazwO prAsAn samAhitaH jawASca viBfyAnnityaM naKaromARi no tyajet svADyAyaM sarvadA kuryyAt niyacCedvAcamanyataH agnihotrantu juhuyAt paYca yajYAn samAcaret munyannErviviDErmeDyEH SAkamUlaPalena vA cIravAsA BavennityaM syAt stripravaRa SuciH sarvaBUtAnukampI syAt pratigrahavivarjitaH darSena pOrRamAsena yajeta niyataM dvijAH pakzezwyA SrAvaRe cEva cAturmAsyAni cAharet uttarAyaRaYca kramaSo dakzasyAyanameva ca vAsantaSAradErmaDyEmunyannEH svayamAharet puroqASaM caruM cEva viDivannirvapet pfTak devatAByaSca tadButvA vanyaM meDyataraM haviH Seza samupaBuYjIta lavaRaYja svayaMkftam varjayenmaDumAMsAdi BOmAni kavakAni ca BUstfRaM SigrukaYcEva SlezmAtakaPalAni ca na PAlakfzwamaSnIyAt utsfzwamapi kenacit na grAmajAyAnyArTo vA puzpARi ca PalAni ca SrAvaRe cEva viDinA vahniM paricaret sadA na druhyet sarvaBUtAni nirdvando nirmamo Bavet na nakta kiYcidaSnIyAt rAtrO DyAnaparo Bavet jitendriyo jitakroDastattvajYAnavicintakaH brahmacArI BavennityaM na patnImapi saMSrayet yastu patnyA vanaM gatvA mETunaM kAmataScaret taduvrataM tasya lupyeta prAyaScittI Bavet dvijaH tatra yo jAyate garBo na saMsmayo dvijAtiBiH na hi vedADikAro sya tattvamapyevameva hi aDaH SayIta satataM sAvitrIjapatatparaH SaraRyaH sarvaBUtAnAM saMviBAgaparo Bavet parIvAdaM mfzAvAdaM nidrAlasye ca varjayet ekAgniraniketaH syAt prokzitAM BUmimAtrayet mfgEH sahacaredvAsaM tEH sahEva ca saMvaset SilAyAM SarkarAyAM vA SayIta susamAhitaH sadyaH prakzAlako vA syAt mAsasaYcayiko pi vA zaRmAsanicayo vA syAt samAnicaya eva vA naktaYcAn samaSnIyAt divA vAhftya SaktitaH caturTakAliko vA syAt syAdu vA azwamakAlikaH cAndrAyaRavizARErvA Sukle kfzRe ca vartayet pakze pakze samaSrIyAt yavAgUkvaTitAM taTA puzpamUlaPalErvApi kevalErvarttayet rudA svABAvikEH svayaMSIRErvEKAnasamate sTitaH BUmO vA parivartteta tizWed vA prapadErdinam sTAnAsanAyyAM viharet na kvacidDEryyamutsfjet grIzme paYcatapASca syAd varyAsvaBrAvakASikaH ArdravAsAstu hemante kramaSo varttayaMstapaH upasmfSya trizavaRaM pitfn devAMSca tarpayet ekapAdena tizWeta marIcIrvAM pibet sadA paYcAgniDUmayo vA syAdUzmapaH somapo Ta vA payaH pibet Suklapakze kfzRapakze tu gomayam SIrRaparRASano vA syAt kfcCrErvA varttayet sadA yogAByAsaratovAsyAddrADyAyI Bavet sadA aTarvaSirasApeto vedAntAByAsatatparaH yamAn seveta satataM niyamAMScApyatandritaH kfzRajinI sopavItaH SuklayajYopavItavAn aTa vAgnIn samAropya svAtmani DyAnatatparaH anagniniketaH syAt nirmokzaparo Bavet tApasanveza viprezu yAtrikaM BEkzamAharet gfhameDizu cAnyezu dvijezu vanavAsizu grAmAdAhftya vASnIyAdazwO grAsAn vanevasan pratigfhya puwenEva pARinA Sakalena vA viviDAMScopanizad AtmasaMsidDaye japet vidyAviSezAn sAvitrIM rudrADyAyaM taTEva ca mahAprasTAnikaYcAsO kuryyAdanaSanantaTA agnipraveSamanyad vA brahmarpaRaviDO sTitaH ye tu samyagimamAtramaM SivamASrayantyaSuBapuYjanASanam te viSanti padamESvara paraM yAnti cEvajagato sya saMsTitim kUrmapu a
vAnaprasya vAnaprasya vAnaprasya pu vAne vanasamUhe pratizWati sTA ka maDUkavfkze palASavfkze vanaprasTa eva svArTe aR gfhasTastu yadA paSyet valIpalitamAtmanaH putrezu dArAn ni Page b kzipya vanaM gacCet sahEva vA ityukte ASramaBede medi sa ca dviviDaH pacamAnaH apacamAnaSca tatra pacamAnaH aSmakuwwaH apacamAnastu dantAlUKalikaH tasya Darmo yaTA BUsTA mUlaPalASitvaM svADyAyastapa eva ca saMviBAgo yaTAnyAyaM Darmo yaM vanavAsinaH tapastapyati yo raRye yajeddevAn juhoti ca svA DyAye cEva nirato vanasTastApaso mataH tapasA karzitotyarTaM yastu DyAnaparo Bavet sannyAsIha sa vijYeyo vAnaprasTASrame sTitaH gAruqe a yAjYavalkya uvAca vAnaprasTASramaM vakzye tat SfRvantu maharzayaH putrezu BAryyAM niHkzipya vanaM gacCet sahEva vA vAnaprasTo brahmacArI sAgniH sopAsanaH kzamI aPAlakfzwenAgnIMSca pitfdevAtiTIMstaTA BftyAMstu tarpayet SmaSrujawAlomaBfdAtmavAn dAntaH striza vaRasnAyI nivfttaSca pratigrahAt svADyAyavAn DyAna SIlaH sarvaBUtahite rataH ahlo mAsasya zaRAM vA kuryyAdvAnnaparigraham kftvA tyajedASvayuje nayet kAlaM vratAdinA pakze mAse tu vASnIyAddantolUKa liko Bavet cAndrAyaRI svapedBUmO karma kuryyAt PalAdinA grIzme paYcAgnimaDyasTo varzAsu sTaRqile SayaH ArdravAsAstu hemante yogAmyAsAddinaM nayet a jawitvama gnahotritvaMBUSayyA jinaDAraRam vane vAsaH payomUlanIvAraPalavfttitA pratizidDA nnivfttiSca trisnAnaM vrataDAritA devatAtiTipUjA ca Darmo yaM vanavAsinaH a evaM gfhASrame sTitvA dvitIyaBAgamAyuzaH vAnaprasTASramaM gacCet sadAraH sAgnireva ca niHkzipya BAryyAM putrezu gacCe dvanamaTApi dfzwvA patyasya cApatyaM jarjarIkftavigrahaH Suklapakzasya pUrvAhRe praSaste cottarAyaRe gatvApyaraRyaM niyamAMttapaH kuryyAt samAhitaH PalamUlAni pa trARi nityamAhAramAharet yadAhAro Bavettena pUjayet pitfdevatAH pUjayedatiTiM nityaM snAtvA cAByarcayet surAn grAmAdAnIya vASnoyAdazwO prAsAn samAhitaH jawASca viBfyAnnityaM naKaro mARi no tyajet svADyAyaM sarvadA kuryyAt niyacCe dvAcamanyataH agnihotrantu juhuyAt paYca yajYAn samA caret munyannErbiviDErmeDyEH SAkamUlaPalena vA cI ravAsA BavennityaM snAyAt strizavaRaM SuciH sarva Page a BUtAnukampI syAt pratigrahavivarjitaH darSena pOrRa mAsena yajeta niyataM dvijAH pakzezwyA SrAvaRe cEva cAturmAsyAni cAharet uttarAyaRaYca kramaSo dakzasyA yanameva ca vAsantaSAradErmaDyErmunyannEH svayamA haret puroqASaM caruM ceva viDivannirvapet pfTak devata ByaSca tadDutvA vanTaM meDyataraM haviH SezaM sa mupaBuYjIta lavaRaYja svayaMkftam varjayenmaDumAMsAdi BOmAni kavakAni ca BUstfRaM SigrukaYcEva SlezmA takaPalAni ca na PAlakfzwamaSnIyAt utsfzwamapi kenacit na grAmajAtAnyArtto vA puzpARi ca PalAni ca SrAvaRe cEva viDinA vahniM paricaret sadA na druhyet sarvaBUtAni nirdvandvo nirmamo Bavet na naktaM kiYcidaSnIyAt rAtrO DyAnaparo Bavet jitendriyo jitakroDastattvajYAnavicintakaH brahma cArI BavenityaM na patnImapi saMSrayet yastu patnyA vanaM gatvA nETunaM kAmataScaret tadvrataM tasya lupyeta prAyaScittI Bavet dvijaH tatra yo jAyate garBo na saMspfSyo dvijAtiBiH na hi vedADikAro sya tattva mapyevameva hi aDaH SayIta satataM sAvitrIjapa tatparaH SaraRyaH sarvaBUtAnAM saMviBAgaparo Bavet parIvAdaM mfzAvAdaM nidrAlasye ca varjayet ekAgni raniketaH syAt prokzitAM mUmimASrayet mfgEH saha caredvAsaM tEH sahEva ca savaset SilAyAM SarkarAyAM vA Sayota susamAhitaH sadyaHprakzAlako vA syAt mAsa saYcayiko pi vA zaRmAsanicayo vA syAt samAnicaya eva vA naktaYcAnnaM samaMSnIyAt divA vA hftya SaktitaH caturTakAliko vA syAt syAd vA azwamakAlikaH cAndrAyaRaviyAnErvA Sukle kfzRe ca vartayet pakze pakze samaSnIyAt yavAgUkaTitAM taTA puzpamUlaPalErvApi kevalErvarttayet sadAM svABAvikEH svayaMSIRErvEKAnasamate svitaH mUmO vA pari vartteta tizWed vA prapadErdinam sTAnAsanAByAM viha ret na kvacidDEryyamutsfjet grIzme paYcatapASca syAd varzAsvaBrAvakASikaH ArdravAsAstu hemante kramaSo varttayaMstapaH upasmfSya trizavaRaM pitfn devAMSca tarpa yet ekapAdena tizWeta marIcIrvA pibet sadA pa YcAgniGUsapo vA svAdUzmapaH somapo Ta vA payaH pibet Suklapakze kfzRapakze tu sopavIttaH SuklayajYopavItavAn aTa vAgnIn samAropya svAtyani DyAnatatparaH cana gniraniketaH syAnmunirmokzaparo Bavet tApasezveva viprezu yAtrikaM BEkzamAharet gfhameDizu cAnyezu dvijezu vanavAsizu grAmAdAhftya vASnIyAdazwO grAsAn vanevasan pratigfhya puwenEva pARinA Sakalena vA viviDAScopanizada AtmasaMsidDaye japet vidyAvi SezAn sAvitrIM rudrADyAyaM taTEva ca mahAprasTA nikaYcAsO kuryyAdanaSanantaTA agnipraveSamanyad vA brahmarpaRaviDO sTitaH ye tu samyagimamASrama Siva mASrayantyaSuBapuYjanASanam te viSanti padamESvaraM paraM yAnti cEva jagato sya saMsTitim kUrmapu a
vAneva vAneva vAneva na vane jase BavaH Qak kEvartImustake amaraH
vAneya vAneya vAneya na vane jale BavaH Qak kEvarttInustake amaraH
vAr vAr vAr na cu vf kvap apsu amaraH
vArAhakarRI vArAhakarRI vArAhakarRI strI varAhasyAyaM vArAha iva karRaH pattramasyAH NIp aSvaganaDAyAm rAjani
vArAhakarRo vArAhakarRo vArAhakarRo strI varAhasyAyaM vArAha iva karRaH pattra masyAH NIp aSvaganDAyAm rAjani
vArDaka vArDaka vArDaka na vfdDAnAM samUhaH tasya BAvaH karma vA vuY vfdDasamUhe vfdDasya BAve karmaRi ca medi
vAra vAra vAra na bu vf kvap apsa amaraH vAra pu vf GaY saNGo saNGe avasare amaraH svayogyakAle pAlA vAro NgarAjasvasuH sA pa dvAre Sive kusavfkze aRe kubjavfkze kzaRe medi vAr saMGe saGe aR jalasaMGe rarkodayAdUDvam Bavati pratIcyAM tu tasmAdaDaH yato laNkodaye vArAdi ata eva ataeva ca vArAduttaragocasTe carorDvaGawikABirUrDvam caro rDvaGawikAmirUrDvam yatastadA unmaRqalaM kzitijAdUrDvam kzitijA laNkodagyAmyasUtrAt praTamamaparataH pUrvadeSe ca paScAt aDvotTABirGawIBiH saviturudayato vAsare vA pravfttiH jYeyA sUryyodayAt prAk caraRakalaBavEScAsuBiryAmyagole caragakala BavEScAmuBiryAmyagole paScAt tEH sOsyagole yutiviyutivaSAScoBayoH sPuwakAlaH yutiviyuti vaSAccoBayoH spazwakAlaH anyo pyAha kecidvAraM saviturudayAt prAhuranye dinArdDAt BAnorardDAstamaya samayAdUcire kEcidevam vArasyAdi kecidevam vArasyAdiM yavananfpatirdiN muhUrtte muhrartte niSAyA lAwAcAryyaH kaTayati punaScArdDarAtre svatantre sva tantre evaM mataBede vyavasTA malamA uktA yaTA dvO dvo tiTyantAvekavAre yatra sa syAt dinakzayaH kUrmapu ekasmin sAvane tvahni tiTInAM tritayaM yadA tadA dinakzayaH proktastatra sAhasrikaM Palam vasizWaH kOrmapurARavAsizWavacanEkavAkyatayA sAvanadinavat vArapravfttiH vArapra vAra rUpaM sAvanagaRanayoktam yattu reKApUrvAparayoH ityAdinA jyotize ityA dinA jyAtize vArapravfttiruktA tat qyotizaSAstrokta jyotizaSAstro kAlahorAjYAnArTam vArARAM kftyaviSezaviDAnArTaM kftyaviSezaviDA nArTaM saMjYABedA yaTA caraH sOmyo guruH kzipro mfdaH mfduH Sukro raviDruvaH ravirDruvaH SaniSca dAruRo jYeyo BOma ugraH SaSI samaH carakziprEH prayoktavya pravezwavye prayAtavyaM devapUlA ca vastrAdyABaraRaM vastra dyABaraRaM gurO kanyAdAnaM gajArohaH Sukre syAt samayaH striyA sTApya sTApyaM gfhapraveSaSca gajabanDaH SanO gajabanDa SagO SuBaH garuqapu a vAra pu vf GaY saNGe vArabARa vArabARa vArabARa puM na vAryyate vf GaY vAro vAryyo bARo yasya kavace amaraH
vAralOka vAralOka vAralOka pu vArjalam alIkaM yatra vAduda tulasI kzupa Sabdara
vAraloka vAraloka vAraloka pu vArjalam alIkaM yatra vAvui tulasI kzupe Sabdara
vArasU vArasU vArasU strI vIraM sUte sU kvapi vIramAtari amaraH
vAravARa vAravARa vAravARa puMna vAryyate vf GaY vAro vAryyo vARe yasya kavace amaraH

vArivallaBA vArivallaBA vArivallaBA strI vAri vallaBamasyAH janakatvAt vida ryyAm rA jani
vArivallaBa vArivallaBa vArivallaBa strI vAri vallaBamasyAH janakatvAt vidaryyAm rAjani
vAsAKaRqakUzmARqaka vAsAKaRqakUzmARqaka vAsAKaRqakUzmARqaka na cakradattokte OzaDaBede paYcASacca palaM KinnaM kuzmARqAt prasTamAnataH grAhyaM palaSataM KaRqaM vAsAkkATAQake pacet saMstADAtrI SuBABArgI trisuganDESca kArzikEH EleyaviSvaDanyAkamaricESca palAMSikEH pippalalIkuqapaYcEva maDumAnIM pradApayet kAsaM SvAsaM kzayaM hikkAM raktapittaM halIsakam hfdrogamamlapittaYca pInasaYca vyapohati
vAsAKaRqakuzmARqaka vAsAKaRqakuzmARqaka vAsAKaRqakuzmARqaka na cakradattokte OzaDamede paYcASacca palaM svinnaM kuzmARqAt prasTamAnataH grAhyaM palaSataM KaRqaM vAsAkvATAQake pacet mustA GAtrI SuBABArgI trisuganDESca kArzikEH EleyaviSva DanyAkamaricESca palAMSikEH pippalIkuqabaYcEva maGu mAnIM pradApayet kAsaM SvAsaM kzayaM hikkAM raktapittaM halIsakam hfdrogamamlapittaYca pInasaYca vyapohati
vAsudevapriyaNgarI vAsudevapriyaNgarI vAsudevapriyaNgarI strI ta SatAvaryyAm rAjani
vAsudevapriyaNkarI vAsudevapriyaNkarI vAsudevapriyaNkarI strI ta SatAvaryyAm rAjani
vAtApisUdana vAtApisUdana vAtApisUdana pu vAtApi sUdayati hinasti sUda lyu agastye munO trikA BA va a tatkaTA dfSyA
vAtApisudana vAtApisudana vAtApisudana pu vAtApi rakadayati hinasti sUda lyu agasTe munO trikA BA ba a tatkaTA dfSyA
vAta vAta vAta gatO sevAyAM suKIkaraRe ca saka ada ca uBa sew vAtayati te avavAtat ta vAta pu vA ktA kta sparSamAtraviSezaguRake BUtaBede pavane amaraH anilaSabde pf dfSyam dehasTe DAtuBede ca gantari tri jAre DfzwanAyake ca praBAtavAtA hatIti BawwiH vAtajanye rogaBedeBAvapra rogaBede BAvapra yaTA kazAyakawutiktakapramitarUkzalaGvannataH puraHpavanajAgaraprataraRABiDAtatramEH puraHpavanajA garaprataraRABiGAtaSramEH himAdanaSanAt taTA niDuvanAcca ni kzuvanAcca DAtukzayAt malAdirayaDAraRAt madanaSoka cintABayEH atikzatajamokzaRAt gadakftAtimAMsakzayAdatIva vasanAn gadakftAtimAMsa kzayAdatIva vamanAn nfRAmativirecanAdAmataH payodasamaye payoda samaye dinakzaRadayostftIyAMSayorjarAmatigate Site SiSirasaMjYakAle pi ca dehe strotAMsi srotAMsi riktAni pUrayitvA pUra yitvA nilo balI valI karoti viviDAn rogAn sarvANgekANgasaMSrayAn pramitaccAtra sarvANgE kANgasaMSrayAn pramitaYcAtra vEparItye prApasargastena aparimitamityarTaH prakarzeRa mitamatyalpaM vA laGvannam atipurARaM sakuzwakaH makuzwakaH mAQA iti loke varawA varaWA varawikA vararE iti loke maNgalyakaH masUrI iti loke puraH pavanaH puraHpavanaH prAgvAtaH AmataH A mataH Amena mArgAvaraRAt yata uktam vAyodDAM vAyordDA tukzayAt kopo mArgasyAvaraRena ceti payodasamaye varzAsu jarAmatigate Site Bukte jIrRatANgate dehe strotAMsItyAdinA samprAptiruktA kazAyAdiBirhetuBirvarzAdO srotAMsItyAdinA saMprAptiruktA kazAyAdiBi rhetuBirvarzAdO samaye hetumate hetuBate balI anilaH pravfdDo vAyuH karoti viviDAn rogAn te rogAH kaTyante Sirograho Siro graho lpakeSatvaM jfmBAtyarTaM hanugrahaH jihvAstamBo gadugadatvaM taTA krozWuSIrzaka KalyO ca vAtakaRwaka eva ca pAdaharzo pAdadAha Akzepo daRqakABiDaH vAtapittakftAkzepastaTA daRqA patAnaka abiGAtakftAkzepa patAnakaH aBiGAtakftAkzepa AyAmo dvivaDaH dviviDaH smftaH kaRwakArikA kaRwa kArikA anyaH SoDanaviDiH gfhItvAgni gfhItvAgniM SuBe vajraM vyADIkandodare vyAGrIkandodare kzipet mAhizIvizWayA liptA kArIzAgnO vipAcayet triyAmAyAM caturRAmaM yAminyante caturyAmaM yAmi tyante SvamUtrake secayetpAcayedevaM saptarAtreRa SudDyati aTa vajrasya bajrasya mAraRaviDiH hiNgusEnDavasaMyukte kzipetkATe kzipet kATe kulatTaje taptaM taptaM punarvajramBavedBasya punarvajramBavedBasma trisaptaDA anyo sya mAraRaprakAraH mezaSfNgaBujaNgAsTikUrmapfzWAmlavetasam mezaSfNgaBujaNgAsTikUrmapfzWA mlavetasam SaSadantaM samampizwvA vajrIkzIreRa Belakam kftvA tanmaDyage tanmaDyagaM vajraM mriyate DBAtamevahi DmAtamevahi mAritasya vajrasya guRAH AyuHpuzwiM balaM vIryyaM varRaM sOKyaM karoti ca va sevitaM sarvarogaGnaM sarvarogaDnaM mftaM vajraM nasaMSayaH na saMSayaH aBraBedA taduguRASca tadguRASca BAvapra uktA yaTA purA vaDAya baDAya vftrasya vajriRA vajramudDftam visPuliNgAstatastasya visPu liNgAstatastasya gagane parisarpitAH te nipeturGanaDvAnAcCiKarezu nipeturGana DvAnAcCiKarezu mahIBftAm teBya eva samutpannaM samApannaM tattadgirizu cABrakam ca Brakam tadvajraM vajrajAtatvAdBramaBraravodBavAt vajrajAtatvAdaBramamrara GodBavAt gaganAt sKalitaM yasmAdgaganaYca tato matam viprakzatriyaviwSUdraBedAttat viprakzattriyaviwSUdraBedAttat syAccaturviDam krameREzAM krame REzAM sitaM raktaM pItaM kfzRaYca varRataH praSasyate sitantAraM raktaM tattu rasAyane pItaM hemani kfzRantu gadezu drutaye pi ca pinAkaM darduraM nAmaM nAgaM vajraYceti caturviDam muYcatyagnO viniHkziptaM pinAkandalamaYcayat ajYAnAdgakzaRaM pinAkandalasaYca yAt ajYAnAdBakzaRaM tasya mahAkuzWapradAyakam darduraM Page b tvagniniHkziptaM kurute darduraDvanim golakAn bahuSaH kftvA sa syAnmftyupradAyakaH nAgantu nAgavadvahnO PutkAraM parimuYcati tadBakzitamavaSyantu vidaDAti Bagandaram vajrantu vajravattizWettannAgnO vikftiM vrajet sarvAMsvezu sarvABrezu varaM vajraM vyADivArdDakyamftyuhft amramuttaraSElotTaM vyAvibArdDakyamftyuhft aBra muttaraSElotTaM bahusattvaM guRADikam dakziRAdriBavaM svalpasattvamalpaguRapradam amra aBra kazAyaM maDuraM suSItamAyuzkaraM suSIta mAyuzkaraM DAtuvivardDanaYca hanyAt tridozaM vraRamehakuzWaplIhodaragranTivizakramIMSca vraRameha kuzWaplIhodaragranTivizakramIMSca rogAn hinta draQayati hanti draQa yati vapurvIryyavfdDiM viDatte tAruRyAdyaM tAruRyAQyaM ramayati SataM yozitAM nityameva dIrGAyuzkAn janayati sutAnvikramEH sutAn vikramEH siMhatulyAn mftyoBItaM mftyormItiM harati satataM sevyamAnaM mftABram vajra pu sAmavedaprasidDe yajYaBede si kO vajra puMna vaja ran hIrake indrasyAstraBede ca tacca daDIcimunTasTito jAtam BAga a uktam brAlake DAtyAm na medi kAYjike jawA vajrapuzpe Sabdara lOhaBede aBramBede na BAvapra jyotizokte vizkumBAdizu saptaviMSatO yogezu maDye paYcadaSe yonaBede ca na kokilAkzavfkze SvetakuSe pu rAjani SrIkfzRasya prapOtre yaduvaMSye nfpaBede ca pu BAga sehuRqukavfkze BAvapra hIrakavajralakzaRAdi vf sa a uktaM yaTA ratnAni balAddEtyAddaDIcito nye vadanti jAtAni kecidBuvaH svaBAvAd vEcitryaM prAhurupalAnAm ityupakrame veRvAtawe viSudDaM SirIzakusumopamaM ca kOSaRakam sOrAzwrakamAtAmraM kfzRaM sOrpArakaM vajram pattAmraM himavati mataNgaja vallapuzpasaNkASam ApItaM ca dvO bajravarRO pfTivI patInAM sadBiH pratizWO na tu sArvajanyO yaH syAjjavA vidrumaBaNgaSoRo yo vA haridrArasasannikASaH ISa tvAt sarvavarRAnAM guRavat sArvacarRikam kAmato DArayedrAjA natvanyo nTat parIkzA tezu karttavyA vidvadBiH suparIkzakEH sukzAro lleKaSAlABistezAM kAryyaM parIkzaRam pfTivyAM yAni ratnAni ye cAnye lohaDAtavaH sarvARi vili svedvajraM tacca tErna viliKyate gurutA sarvaratnAnAM gOravADArakAraRam vajre tAnvEprarItyena sUrayaH pari cakzate jAtiBirajAtiM viliKanti vajrakuruvindAH vajrErvajraM viliKati nAnyena liKyate vajram vajrARi muktAmaRayo yASca kAScana jAtayaH na tezAM pratibadDAnAM BA BavatyurdDvagAminI tiryyakkzatatvAt kezAYcit kaTaYcidyadi dfSyate tiryyamAliKyamAnAnAM sA pArSve zvapi hanyate yadyapi viSIrRakowiH savindureKAnvito vivarRo vA tadapi DanaDAnyaputrAn karoti sendrA yuDo vajraH sOdAminIvisPuritABirAma rAjA yaToktaM kuliSaM daDAnaH parAkramAkrAntaparapratApaH samastasAmantaBuvaM Bunakti vidyudagnO tannibAraRa heturyaTA pracaRqapavanAGAte meGezu stanitezu yaH triHpaWejjEminIyo Ki prANmuKo vApyudaNmuKaH tasya mA BUdBayaM GoraM vidyutIyo vasIdati A ta Dftabrahma purARam muneH kalyARamitrasya jEmineScApikIrttanAt vidyudagniBayaM nAsti paWite ca gfhodare liKite ca gfhodare iti vA pAWaH jEminiSca sumantuSca vESampAyana eva ca pulastyaH pulahaScEva paYcE te vajra vArakAH purARam tatparyyAyAdi BAvapra uktaM yaTA hIrakaH puMsi vajro strI candro maRivaraSca saH sa tu SvetaH smfto vipro lohitaH kzattriyaH smftaH pIto vESyo sitaH SUdraScaturvarRAtmakaSca saH rasAyane mato vipraH sarvasidDipradAyakaH kzattriyo vyADivi DvaMsI jarAmftyuharaH smftaH vESyo DanapradaH prokta Page a staTA dehasya dArQyakft SUdro nASayati vyADIn vayaH stamBaM karoti ca puMstrInapuMsakAnIha lakzaRIyAni lakzaREH suvfttAH PalasaMpUrRAstejoyuktA vfhattarAH puruzAste samAKyAtA reKAvinduvivarjitAH reKAvindu samAyuktAH zaqaSrAste striyaH smftAH zaqaSrAH zawkoRAH trikoRASca sudIrGAste vijYeyASca napuM sakAH tezu syuH puruzAH SrezWA rasabanDanakAriRaH striyaH kfrvanti kAyasya kAntiM strIRAM suKapradAH napuMsakAstvavIryyA syurakAmAH sattvavarjitAH striyaH strIByaH pradAtavyAH klIvaM klIve prayojayet sarvaByaH sarvadA deyAH puruzAH vIryyavardDanAH aSudDaM kurute vajraM kuzWaM pArSvavyaTAntaTA pARqutAmpaNguratvaYca tasmAt saMSoDya mArayet tacCoDanaviDiryaTA kulatTakodravakkATe dolAyantre vipAcayet vyAGrI kandagataM vajraM tridinaM tadviSudDyati vyAGrI kaRwa kArikA anyaH SoDanaviDiH gfhItvAgniM SuBe vajraM vyAGrIkandodare kzipet mAhizIvizWayA liptA kArIzAgnO vipAcayet triyAmAyAM caturyAmaM yAmi tyante SvamUtrake secayetpAcayedevaM saptarAtreRa SudDyati aTa bajrasya mAraRaviDiH hiNgusEnDavasaMyukte kzipet kATe kulatTaje taptaM taptaM punarvajramBavedBasma trisaptaDA anyo sya mAraRaprakAraH mezaSfNgaBujaNgAsTikUrmapfzWA mlavetasam SaSadantaM samampizwvA vajrIkzIreRa Belakam kftvA tanmaDyagaM vajraM mriyate DmAtamevahi mAritasya vajrasya guRAH AyuHpuzwiM balaM vIryyaM varRaM sOKyaM karoti va sevitaM sarvarogaDnaM mftaM vajraM na saMSayaH aBraBedA tadguRASca BAvapra uktA yaTA purA baDAya vftrasya vajriRA vajramudDftam visPu liNgAstatastasya gagane parisarpitAH te nipeturGana DvAnAcCiKarezu mahIBftAm teBya eva samApannaM tattadgirizu ca Brakam tadvajraM vajrajAtatvAdaBramamrara GodBavAt gaganAt sKalitaM yasmAdgaganaYca tato matam viprakzattriyaviwSUdraBedAttat syAccaturviDam krame REzAM sitaM raktaM pItaM kfzRaYca varRataH praSasyate sitantAraM raktaM tattu rasAyane pItaM hemani kfzRantu gadezu drutaye pi ca pinAkaM darduraM nAgaM vajraYceti caturviDam muYcatyagnO viniHkziptaM pinAkandalasaYca yAt ajYAnAdBakzaRaM tasya mahAkuzWapradAyakam darduraM Page b tvagniniHkziptaM kurute darduraDvanim golakAn bahuSaH kftvA sa syAnmftyupradAyakaH nAgantu nAgavadvahnO PutkAraM parimuYcati tadBakzitamavaSyantu vidaDAti Bagandaram vajrantu vajravattizWettannAgnO vikftiM vrajet sarvABrezu varaM vajraM vyAvibArdDakyamftyuhft aBra muttaraSElotTaM bahusattvaM guRADikam dakziRAdriBavaM svalpasattvamalpaguRapradam aBra kazAyaM maDuraM suSIta mAyuzkaraM DAtuvivardDanaYca hanyAt tridozaM vraRameha kuzWaplIhodaragranTivizakramIMSca rogAn hanti draQa yati vapurvIryyavfdDiM viDatte tAruRyAQyaM ramayati SataM yozitAM nityameva dIrGAyuzkAn janayati sutAn vikramEH siMhatulyAn mftyormItiM harati satataM sevyamAnaM mftABram vajra pu sAmavedaprasidDe yajYaBede si kO
vajrabIjaka vajrabIjaka vajrabIjaka pu vajramiva kaWinaM bIjamasya kap latAkaraYje rAjanida
vajravIjaka vajravIjaka vajravIjaka pu vajramiva kaWinaM vIjamasya kap latAkaraYje rAjani
vakAraH vakAraH vakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH sa ca sparSozmavarRayorantaHsTitatvAt antaHsTavarRaBedaH asyoccAraRasTAnaM dantozwO dantyAzWyo vaH smfto buDEH SikzokteH asyoccAraRe jihvA greRa dantOzWayorIzatsparSAt IzatspfzwatA AByantara prayatnaH bAhyaprayatnAScAsya vivAranAdaGozA alpaprARaSca asya dantyOzWyatvAt dantyatvaM kvacicca ozWyatvamASritya kAryyaBedastena saMvupUrzatItyAdO ozWyatvamASritya laH aRa paraH dantyatvamASritya ca anusvArasTAne anunAsiko bo vA pakze anusvArasTitiH asya mAtfkAnyAse vAma skanDe nyasyatA kAvyAdO prayoge vyasanamaTa lavO vf ra wI ukteH vyasanaM Palam varRABiDAne asya vA cakaSabdA uktA yaTA vo vARo vAruRI sUkzmA varuRo medasaMjYakaH KaqgISo jvAlinI vaktraM kalaso vArivAcakaH utkArI SAlinI SAntA vAtaH sPika sAgaraH SuciH indraDArA ca vAmAMsaH karamUlaM ca na rttakaH jagadBAzI sAriRI ca devo liNgo nirudDakaH girirAjo nivfttAtmA vyaNkadyA nindinI karaH asya DyeyasvarUpaM yaTA vakAraM caYcalApANgi kuRqalI mokzamavyayama paYcaprARamayaM varRaM triSaktisahitaM sadA trivindusahitaM varRamAtmAdatattvasaMyutam paYcadevamayaM vfrRaM pItavidyullatopamam caturvargapradaM varRaM sarvasidDi pradAyakam kAmaDenuta asyADizWAtfDyeyarUpaM yaTA kunda puzpapraBAM devIM dviBujAM paNkajekzaRAm SuklamAlyAmbara DarAM ratnahArojjvalAM parAm sADakABIzwadAM sidDA Page a sidDidAM sidDasevitAm evaM DyAtvA vakAraM tu tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram
vakavrataDara vakavrataDara vakavrataDara pu vaka iva vrataM DArayati Df ac aDodfzwirnEkftikaH svArTamADanatatparaH SaWo miTyAvinItaSca vakavrataDaro dvijaH ityukte svArTasADanatatpare vaYcake viprAdO
vakavratapara vakavratapara vakavratapara pu vaka iva vrataM DArayati Df ac aDo dfzwirnEkftikaH svArTasADanatatparaH SaWo miTyAvinI taSca vakavrataDaro dvijaH ityukte svArTasADanatatpare vaYcake viprAdO
valavita valavita valavita tri valayamiva Acaritam valaya kvi kta vezwitetaM amaraH
valayita valayita valayita tri valayamiva Acaritam valaya kvi kta vezwite amaraH
valgA valgA valgA strI valga ac lAgAma aSvamuKasTe rajjuBede hemaca
valgupatra valgupatra valgupatra pu valgUni patrARi yasya vanamudge Sabdara
valgupattra valgupattra valgupattra pu valgUli pattrARi yasya vanamudge Sabdara
valkalIDra valkalIDra valkalIDra pu valkaBavA loDraH pawwikAloDre rAjani
valkaloDra valkaloDra valkaloDra pu valkaBavo loDraH pawwikAloDre rAjani
vana vana vana sevane saka Sabde aka BvA para sew vanati avAnIt avanIt vavanatuH vana vyApAre BvA para saka sew vanati avAnIt avanIt ava nIt jvalA vanaH vAnaH GawA vanayati vana yAcane dvika tanA A sew ktvA vew vanute avanizwa vana upakAre upatApe ca saka Sabde aka vA cu uBa pakze BvA para sew vAnayati te vanati avIvanat ta avanIt avAnIt vana na strI vana ac vfkzasamudAyAtmake araRye amaraH strItve strotve NIz suvanI sampravadatpikApi samprazadatpikApi kA nEza jale nivAse Alaye ca medi prastaraRe hemaca vana yAcane tanA Atma dvika sew vanute avanizwa vene udit ktvA vew vanitvA vAntvA vAntaH vana sevane saka Sabde aka BvA para sew vanati avAnIt avanIt vavanatuH vana vyApAre BvA para saka sew vanati avAnIt ava nIt jvalA vanaH vAnaH GawA vanayati vana yAcane dvika tanA A sew ktvA vew vanute avanizwa vana upakAre upatApe ca saka Sabde aka vA cu uBa pakze BvA para sew vAnayati te vanati avIvanat ta avanIt avAnIt vana na strI vana ac vfkzasamudAyAtmake araRye amaraH strotve NIz suvanI samprazadatpikApi kA nEza jale nivAse Alaye ca medi prastaraRe hemaca
vanca vanca vanca pratAraRe BvA para saka sew ktvA vew vaYcati avaYcIt
varANgin varANgin varANgin pu varANgamastyasyA ini amlavetase ratnamA SrezWANgayute tri striyAM NIp
varANgit varANgit varANgit pu varANgamastyasya ini ambuvetase ratnamA SrezWANgayute tri striyAM NIp
varIvardDa varIvardDa varI lI vardDa pu vfDa yaqa luk ac pfzo rasya vA saH vfzaBe amaraH
varIvardda varIvardda varI lI vardda pu vfDa yaq luk ac pfzo raKa vA laH vfzaBe amaraH
varRRa varRRa varRRa stutO vistAre SuklAdivarRakaraRe udyoge dIpane ca adu cu uBa saka sewa varRayati te avavarRat ta varRRa varRane cu uBa saka sew varRayati te avavarRat ta
varRRacAraka varRRacAraka varRRacAraka pu varRaM SuklAdirUpaM cArayati cara Ric Rvul citrakare SabdamA
varRRadAtrI varRRadAtrI varRRadAtrI strI varRaM rUpaM dadAti dA tuc NIp hari drAyAm rAjani varRadAtari tri
varRRadUta varRRadUta varRRadUta pu varRA eva dUto yatra lipO trikA
varRRada varRRada varRRada na varRaM dadAti dA ka kAlIyake ganDadravye jawA varRaprade tri
varRRajyezWa varRRajyezWa varRRajyezWa pu varRezu jyezWaH praTamamutpannatvAt agraje vipre svasvApekzayA SrezWavarRakUwayute tri varRa jyezWA ca yA nArI smftiH
varRRakUpikA varRRakUpikA varRRakUpikA strI varRAnAmakzarARAM leKanAya kzudraH kUpaH kUpI seva kan masyADAre trikA
varRRaka varRRaka varRRaka na varRayati varRa Rvul haritAle ratnamA anu lepanayogye amaraH pizwe Gfzwe vA candanAdO dravye ca hiNgalAdO puMstrI BarataH maRqane Sabdara ekasyEva sUtrAdeH pakzAntaravyAKyAnarUpe granTaBede na lipsAsUtre tftIyavarRake mitA cAraRe pu medi
varRRatUli varRRatUli varRRatUli lI strI varRAnAM leKanasADanaM tUliH leKa Page b nyAm Sabdara svArTe ka atrEva
varRa varRa varRa stutO vistAre SuklAdivarRakaraRe udyoge dIpane ca adu cu uBa saka sew varRayati te avavarRat ta varRa varRane cu uBa saka sew varRayati te avavarRat ta varRa na varRa aca kuNkume ac kuNkuma na svarRe vrate SuklAdirUpe akArAdyakzare Bede gItakrame citre tAlaBede aNgarAge pu hemaca majacitrakambale gajacitrakambale pu amaraH yaSasi guRe stutO pu medi mede Beda rUpe akzare pu na Bedi medi brAhmaRAdijAtO pu amaraH cAturvarRyaM mayA sfzwam gItA tatra viprAdivarRAnAM sfzwiH tadDarmASca manunA uktA yaTA lokAnAntu vivfdDyarTa muKabAhUrUpAdataH vivfdDyarTaM suKabAhUrUpAdataH brAhmaRaM kzatriyaM vESya kzattriyaM vESyaM SUdraYca niravarttayat muKabAhUrupajjAnAM pfTaka musvavAhUrUpajjAnAM pfTak karmARyakalpayat aDyApanamuDyayanaM aDyApanamaDyayanaM yajanaM Page b yAjanastaTA brAhmaRo sya mA muKamAsIdbAhUrAjanyaH kftaH urU UrU tadasya yaduvESyaH padmyAM yadvESyaH padByAM SUdro ajAyata yaju tezAM brAhmaRasya SrEzWye kAraRaM manunoktaM yaTA UrDvanABermeDyataraH UrDyanABermeDyataraH puruzaH parikIrttitaH tasmAnmeDyatamaM tvasya suKamuktaM svayammuvA uttamANgoNmavAt jyEzwyAdu muKamuktaM svayamBuvA uttamA NgodBavAt jyEzwyAd brahmaRaScEva DAraRAt sarvasyEvAsya sarvasyE vAsya sargasya Darmato brAhmaRaH praBuH varRaDarmASca jAtiDarmaSabde jAti DarmaSabde pf dfSyAH tatra akzararUpavarRotpattikramaH tatBedASca SabdArTaratne smABiruktA yaTA aTa varRotpattiprakArastAvadaBiDIyate cetanena jYAtArTavivakzayA jYAtA rTavivakzayA tadboDakaSabdanizpAdanAya preritamantaHkaraRaM mUlADArasTitamanalaM cAlayati taccAlitaScAnala tatsTalasTAnilacAlanAya taccAlitaScAnalaH tat sTalasTAnilacAlanAya praBavati taccAlitena cAnilena tatrEva sUkzmarUpeRotpAditaH SabdaH paro vAgityaBiDIyate parA vAgityaBi cIyate tatonABideSaparyyantaM calitena tena taddeSasaMyogAdutpAditaH taddeSa saMyogAdutpAditaH SabdaH paSyantIti vyavahriyate etaddvayasya sUkzmasUkzmataratayA eta dvayasya sfkzmasUkzmataratayA ISvarayogimAtragamyatA nAsmadIyaSrutigocaratA nAsma doyaSrutigIcaratA tatastenEva hfdayadeSaM parisaratA hfdayasaMyogena nizpAditaH Sabdo maDyeyametyucyate maDyetyucyate sA ca svakarRapiDAnena DvanyAtmakatayA sUkzmarUpeRa kadAcidasmAkamapi kadAcida syAkaBavi samaDigamyA tato suKaparyyantamAgacCatA tatI muKaparyyantamAgacCatA tena kaRWadeSaM prApya Ahatya mUrdDAnaM tatpratiGAtena parAvftya parA vftya ca suKavivare muKavivare kaRWAdizu tattadazwasTAnezu svABiGAtenotpAditaH svABiGAte notpAditaH Sabdo vEKarItyucyate vEsvarItyucyate taduktaM SikzAyAm AtmA budDyA sametyArTAn mano yuNkte vivakzayA manaH kAyAgnimAhanti sa prerayati mArutam sodIrRo mUrDnya Bihato mUrGnyamihato vaktramApadya mArutaH varRAn janayate tezAM viBAgaH paYcaDA mataH svarataH kAlataH sTAnAt prayatnAnupradAnataH iti saMskArarUpeRa svagatAnarTAn svagatA narTAn budDyA budDivfttyA sametya vizayIkftyerTaH vivayIkftyerTaH taTA prARApAnAntare devI vAgvE nityaM hi tizWati sTAnezu vikfte vAyO kftavarRaparigrahA vEKarI vAk prayoktFRAM prARavftinivanDinI prARavfttinivanDinI kevalaM budDyapAdAnA budDuvrapAdA nA kramarUpAnupAtinI prARavfttimanukramya maDyamA vAk pravarttate aviBAgA tu paSyanto paSyantI sarvataH saMhftakramA saMhfta kramA svarUpajyotirevAtaH parA vAganapAyinIti BArate pyuktam atra prARApAnAntare ityaDikaraRanirdeSAdAkASsTAyitA ityaDikaraRanide Page a SAdAkASasTAyitA nityamityaBiDAnAt yAvatpralayaparyyantasTAyitA paravorekaviDaH Page b paPayo parayoranyaviDaH kaRWyAtvaBedAditi jYApanAya kaRWyozWyatvaBedAditi jYApa nAya duHspfzwaH IzatspfzwaH lfkAraH xkAraH aco spfzwA aRastvIzannemaspfzwAH jYalastaTA saMvArA nAdaBAginaH ayugmA vargayamagAyaRaScAlyAsavaH vargayamagAyaRaScA Page a lpAsavaH smftAH iti sidDAntakOmudyuktadiSAvaseyAH KayAM sTAne jAtA ye yamAH pUrvoktAH prAtiSAKye prasidDAH KyaH KaraH KayaH SaraH SazasahAH ete SvAsAnupradAnA aGozAH kaRWaM vivfRvate ca anye etadviYcAH etadBiYcAH sarve varRAM GozasaMvAranAdavAhyaprayatnavantaH vargIyapraTamatftIyapaYcamavarRAH varRA GozasaMvAranAdabAhyaprayatnavantaH vargIyapraTamatftIya paYcamavarRAH praTamatftIyavargajAtayamASca pUrvoktAH yaRaSca ete alpaprARAstaNginnAH alpapARAstadBinnAH sarve mahAprARA iti vivekaH taTA udAttAnudAttasvaritarUpAstriviDAH svarA hrasvadIrGaplutakAlaBedASca svarARAM viSezADAne hetavo veditavyAH taTA hi viBAgaH paYcaDA mataH ityupakramya svarataH kAlataH sTAnAt prayatnAnupradAnataH iti svarakAlasTAnaprayatnAnupradAnABiDeyabAhyaprayatnAn varRaviBAjakAn varRavimAjakAn paYca sAmAnyato nirdiSya SikzAkftA udAttaScAnudAttaScetyAdinA acyeva svarakAlayorviBAjakatA svarakAlayorviBA jakatA BihitA tatra tAlvAdizu sTAnezUrdDaBAge nizpannojudAttaH nIccEruccAryyamARo nIcEruccAryyamARo nudAttaH praTamamardDamudAttatayoccAryya uttarArdDamanudrAttatayocAryyamARaH svaritaH praTamamardDa mudAttatayoccAryya uttarArdDamanudAttatayocAryyamARaH sva ritaH iti uccErudAttaH nIcEranudAttaH samAhAraH svaritaH tasya Adita udAttamardDahrasvamiti pARinisUtrajAteByaH pARini sUtrajAteByaH tadevaM parasparaviBAjakasTAnabAhyAByantaraprayatnasvarakAlakftaviSezAt parasparaviBAjakasTAnabAhyA ByantaraprayatnasvarakAlakftaviSezAt varRAnAM parasparaviSezarUpatA parasparaviSeza rUpatA sarve hi varRAH puraskftyatyEva puraskftyEva kiYcidviSezaM viSezatABAjo BavantIti vivAhopayogini nakzatraviSezakfte varRakUwe upayamaSabde upayama Sabde varRakUwoktO pf dfSyam varRa na varRa ac kuNkuma na svarRe vrate SuklAdirUpe akArAdyakzare Bede gItakrame citre tAlaBede aNgarAge pu hemaca gajacitrakambale pu amaraH yaSasi guRe stutO pu medi Beda rUpe akzare pu na medi brAhmaRAdijAtO pu amaraH cAturvarRyaM mayA sfzwam gItA tatra viprAdivarRAnAM sfzwiH tadDarmASca manunA uktA yaTA lokAnAntu vivfdDyarTaM suKabAhUrUpAdataH brAhmaRaM kzattriyaM vESyaM SUdraYca niravarttayat musvavAhUrUpajjAnAM pfTak karmARyakalpayat aDyApanamaDyayanaM yajanaM Page b yAjanastaTA brAhmaRo mA muKamAsIdbAhUrAjanyaH kftaH UrU tadasya yadvESyaH padByAM SUdro ajAyata yaju tezAM brAhmaRasya SrEzWye kAraRaM manunoktaM varRaDarmASca jAti DarmaSabde pf dfSyAH tatra akzararUpavarRotpattikramaH tatBedASca SabdArTaratne smABiruktA yaTA aTa varRotpattiprakArastAvadaBiDIyate cetanena jYAtA rTavivakzayA tadboDakaSabdanizpAdanAya preritamantaHkaraRaM mUlADArasTitamanalaM cAlayati taccAlitaScAnalaH tat sTalasTAnilacAlanAya praBavati taccAlitena cAnilena tatrEva sUkzmarUpeRotpAditaH SabdaH parA vAgityaBi cIyate tatonABideSaparyyantaM calitena tena taddeSa saMyogAdutpAditaH SabdaH paSyantIti vyavahriyate eta dvayasya sfkzmasUkzmataratayA ISvarayogimAtragamyatA nAsma doyaSrutigIcaratA tatastenEva hfdayadeSaM parisaratA hfdayasaMyogena nizpAditaH Sabdo maDyetyucyate sA ca svakarRapiDAnena DvanyAtmakatayA sUkzmarUpeRa kadAcida syAkaBavi samaDigamyA tatI muKaparyyantamAgacCatA tena kaRWadeSaM prApya Ahatya mUrdDAnaM tatpratiGAtena parA vftya ca muKavivare kaRWAdizu tattadazwasTAnezu svABiGAte notpAditaH Sabdo vEsvarItyucyate taduktaM SikzAyAm AtmA budDyA sametyArTAn mano yuNkte saMskArarUpeRa svagatA narTAn budDyA budDivfttyA sametya vivayIkftyerTaH taTA prARApAnAntare devI vAgvE nityaM hi tizWati sTAnezu vikfte vAyO kftavarRaparigrahA vEKarI vAk prayoktFRAM prARavfttinivanDinI kevalaM budDuvrapAdA nA kramarUpAnupAtinI prARavfttimanukramya maDyamA vAk pravarttate aviBAgA tu paSyantI sarvataH saMhfta kramA svarUpajyotirevAtaH parA vAganapAyinIti BArate yaRastvozan nemaspfzwAH SalastaTA SezAH spfzwA halaH proktA iti SikzAvAkyameva boDyam atrAcaH sparSABAvarUpavivftatvavantaH yaRaH yavaraRastvIzat spfzwA ityarTaH nemEtyardDavAcI SalaH SazasahA nema tulyAsyaprayatnaM savaRamiti pA sUtraBAzyAdO spazwam tena takArasTAne vivAraSvAsaGozAlpaprARarUpabAhyaprayatnasAmyena cakArawakA rAdeSaH sTAne ntaratamaH iti pA sUtraBAzyayoH spazwam bahusamAnaGarmatvamevAntaratamye heturiti boDyam bAhyAHprayatnAScAzwaviDAH kAkalakADaHsTalagalabilasaNkoca vikASaSvAsotpattiDvaniviSezaGozAlpaGozaprARAlpatvamahattva rUpakAryyakarA yaTAkramaM rdeSakAryyakaratvAt cEte bAhyA iti te ca svayAM yamAH KayaH ka pO visargaH Sara eva ca ete SvAsA nupradAnA aGozASca vivfRvate kaRWamanye tu GozAH syuH saMvArA nAdaBAginaH ayugmA vargayamagAyaRaScA Page a lpAsavaH smftAH iti sidDAntakOmudyuktadiSAvaseyAH KayAM sTAne jAtA ye yamAH pUrvoktAH prAtiSAKye prasidDAH KayaH SaraH SazasahAH ete SvAsAnupradAnA aGozAH kaRWaM vivfRvate ca anye etadBiYcAH sarve varRA GozasaMvAranAdabAhyaprayatnavantaH vargIyapraTamatftIya paYcamavarRAH praTamatftIyavargajAtayamASca pUrvoktAH yaRaSca ete alpapARAstadBinnAH sarve mahAprARA iti vivekaH taTA udAttAnudAttasvaritarUpAstriviDAH svarA hrasvadIrGaplutakAlaBedASca svarARAM viSezADAne hetavo veditavyAH taTA hi viBAgaH paYcaDA mataH ityupakramya svarataH kAlataH sTAnAt prayatnAnupradAnataH iti svarakAlasTAnaprayatnAnupradAnABiDeyabAhyaprayatnAn varRavimAjakAn paYca sAmAnyato nirdiSya SikzAkftA udAttaScAnudAttaScetyAdinA acyeva svarakAlayorviBA jakatA BihitA tatra tAlvAdizu sTAnezUrdDaBAge nizpannojudAttaH nIcEruccAryyamARo nudAttaH praTamamardDa mudAttatayoccAryya uttarArdDamanudAttatayocAryyamARaH sva ritaH iti uccErudAttaH nIcEranudAttaH samAhAraH svaritaH tasya Adita udAttamardDahrasvamiti pARini sUtrajAteByaH tadevaM parasparaviBAjakasTAnabAhyA ByantaraprayatnasvarakAlakftaviSezAt varRAnAM parasparaviSeza rUpatA sarve hi varRAH puraskftyEva kiYcidviSezaM
