varRacAraka varRacAraka varRacAraka pu varRaH SuklAdirUpaM cArayati cara Ric Rvul citrakare SabdamA
varRadAtrI varRadAtrI varRadAtrI strI varRaM rUpaM dadAti dA tac NIp haridrAyAm rAjani varRadAtari tri
varRadUta varRadUta varRadUta pu varRAM eva dUto yatra lipO trikA
varRada varRada varRada na varRaH dadAti dA ka kAlIyake ganDadravye jawA varRaprade tri
varRajyezWa varRajyezWa varRajyezWa pu varRezu jyezWaH praTamamutpannatvAt agraje vipre svasApekzayA SrezWavarRakUwayute tri varRajyezWA ca yA nArI smftiH
varRakUpikA varRakUpikA varRakUpikA strI varRAnAmakzarARAM leKanAya kzudraH kUpaH kUpI seva kan masyADAre trikA
varRaka varRaka varRaka na varRayati varRa Rvul haritAle ratnamA anulepanayogye amaraH pizwe vfzwe vA candanAdO dravye ca hiNgalAdO puM strI BarataH maRqane Sabdara ekasyEva sUtrAdeH pakzAntaravyAKyAnarUpe granTaBede na lipsAsUtre tftIyavarRake mitAda cAraRe pu medi
varRatUli varRatUli varRatUli lI strI varRAnAM leKanasADanaM tUliH leKanyAm Sabdara svArTe ka atrEva
varavAhlIka varavAhlIka varavAhlIka na karma kuNkume amaraH
varavAhnIka varavAhnIka varavAhnIka na karma kuNkume amaraH
varhizad varhizad varhizad pu ba va varhizi viprapARisTe gnO sIdanti varhis rada kvip pfzo pitfgaRaBede agnizvAttA varhizada UzmapA AjyapAstaTA manuH
varhizadu varhizadu varhizadu pu ba va varhizi viprapARisTe gnO sIdanti varhis rada kvip pfzo pitfgaRaBede agnizvAttA varhizada UzmapA AjyapAstaTA manuH
varsman varsman varsman na vfza manin dehe pAzARe ca amaraH atisundare tri
varzman varzman varzman na vfza manin dehe pAzARe ca amaraH atisundare tri
vasna vasna vasna na vasa man vetane mUlye vastre dravye ca viSvaH Dane mftyO ca amarawIkAyAM ramAnATaH mUlye pu amaraH
vasnasA vasnasA vasnasA strI vasnaMsyati so ka snAyO SramaraH
vastrEkasArA vastrEkasArA vastrEkasArA strI vasUnAmokasya sAro yatra indranagaryyAm indranadyAM kuverapuryyAM kuveranadyAYca hema
vastra vastra vastra na vasa dran zwran pariDAnAdyupayukte kArpAsAdO vasane vastraDAraRaguRAH yaTA snAtasyAnantaraM samyagvastreRa tanumArjanam kAntipradaM SarIrasya kaRqUyAdozanASanam kaRqUyAdozanASa nam kOzeyaM citravastraYca raktastraM raktavastraM taTEva ca vAtaSlezmaharaM vAta SlezmaharaM tattu SItakAle viDArayet viGArayet kOzeyaM pawwAmbaraM pawwA mbaraM tasaravastraYca meDyaM suSItaM pittaGnaM kAzAyaM vastrasucyate vastramucyate tadDArayeduzRakAle taccApi laGu Sasyate kAzAyaM kokawI iti loke kazAyarAgaraktaM vA Sukuntu Suklantu SuBadaM vastraM SItAtapanivAraRam SItAtapanivAraRamH nacozRaM naca vA SItaM tattu varzAsu DArayet yaSasyaM kAmyamAyuzyaM trImadAnandavardDanam kAmya mAyuzyaM SrImadAnandabardDanam tvacyaM vaSIkaraM rucyaM navaM nirmalamambaram kAmyaM kAmoddIpakam kadApi na janEH sadBirDAryaM sadBirDAryyaM malinamambaram tattu kaRqUkfmikaraM kaRqU kfmikaraM glAnyalakzmIkaraM param alakzmIraSoBA dAridryaM vA BAvapra asya pariDAnaviDiryaTA mfguH vikaYCo BfguH vikacCo nuttarIyaSca nagnaScAvastra eva ca trEtaM SrOtaM smArttaM taTA karma na nagnaScintayedapi nagna Scintayedapi vikacCaH parIDAnAdu parIGAnAd galitakacCaH taTA ca pariDAnAtvahiH parIDAnAtvahiH kacCA nibadDA hyAsurI Bavet smftiH vAme pUzWe pfzWe taTA nABO kacCatrayasudAhftam kacCatrayamudAhftam eBiH kacCEH parIDatte yo vipraH sa SuciH smftaH vODAyanaH nAmO nABO DftaYca yadvastramAccAdayati yadvastramAcCAdayati jAnunI antarIyaM praSastaM tadacCinnasuBayostayoH tadacCinnamuBayostayoH pracetAH daSA nABO prayojayet smftiH na syAt karmaRi kaYcukIti uttarIyaDAraRaM copavItayat copavItavat yaTA yajYopavItaYca DAryyate ca dvijottamEH taTA sanDAryyate yatnAduttarAcCAdanaM yatnAduttarA cCAdanaM SuBam smfteH atra yaTA dvijottamEH savyApasavyatvAdinA upavItaM DAryyate taTA uttarAcCAdanamapi uttarAcCA danamapi dvijottamEriti pradarSanamAtram prAguktaBfguvacanena prAguktaBfgu vacanena sarvezAM dvivastratApratIteH pAraskaraH ekaYcedvAso ekaYce dvAso Bavati tasya uttarArdDeRa pracCAdayatIti Ata A ta raGu vastraparIDAnanakzatrAdi brahmAnurADavasutizyaviSAKahastacitrottarAgnipavanAditirevatIzu brahmAnurADavasutizyavi SAKahastacitrottarAgnipavanAditirevatIzu janmarkzajIva buDaSukradinotsavAdO DAryaM DAryyaM navaM vasanamISvara devatuzyE devatuzwyE jyo ta sUryye cAlpaDanaM Page a vraRaH SaSidine kleSaH sadA BUmije vastrARAM bahutA buDe vuDe suragurO vidyAgamaH sampadaH nAnABomayutapramodaSayanaM nAnABogayutapramoda SayanaM vidyANganA BArgave SOrOsyuH Kalu rogaSokakalahA vastre Dfte nUtane karmalocanam asya jYAnasaMyoga nizidDadivAni kzArasaMyoga nizidDadinAni yaTA mandamaNgalaprazWIzu mandamaNgalazazWIzu dvAdaSyAM trAdDavAsare SrAdDa vAsare vastrARAM cArasaMyogAdadahatyAsaptamaM kzArasaMyogAtdahatyAsaptamaM kulam A ta marakIyavastraDAraRanizeDo parakIyavastraDAraRanizeDo yaTA ASanaM AsanaM vasanaM yyA jAyApatyaM SayyA jAyA patyaM kamaRqaluH AtmanaH SuciretAni na parezAM kadAcanaM kadA cana IzadDOtAdivastrasya paScimAyAdiprasAritavastrasya paScimAgrAdiprasAritavastrasya ca aDOtatvaM yaTA IzadDOtaM striyA DOtaM yadDOtaM rajakasya raja kasya tu aDOtaM tadvijAnIddaSAdakziRapaTise tadvijAnIddaSAdakziRapaScime karmalocanam satyatapAH prARagrasudagraM prAgagramudagraM vA GOtaM vastraM prasArayet paScimAgraM dakziRAgraM punaH prakzAlanAt prakzA lanAt Suci atrAgraM daSA vfkzavat pracetAH svayaM Dotena karttavyA kriyA DaryAM DarmyA vipaScitA na ca rajakaDOtena rajaka GOtena nADOtena Bavet kvacit putramitrakalatreRa svajAtibAnDavena ca dAsavargeRa yadDOtaM tat pavitramiti pavitra miti sTitiH snAnottaraM uzRIzavastrasya DAryyatvaM yaTA uzRIzaDAraRaM SirojalApanayanAya tena snAnAnantaraM mnAnAnantaraM DAryyam taTA ca mahABAratam AplutasyADivAsena Apluta syADivAsena jalena ca suganDinA rAjahaMsaniBaM prApya uzRIzaM SiTilArpitam jalakzayanimittaM vE vezwayAmAsa vezwayA mAsa mUrdDani SiTilArpitam amAQabadDam nizidDavastrARi yatA agAQabadvam nizidDa vastrARi yaTA BArate na syUtena na dagDena pArakyeRa pAra kyeRa viSezataH mUzikotkIrRajIrRena karma kuryyAdvicakzaRaH kuryyAdvica kzaRaH nArasiMhe na raktamulvalaM vAso raktamulvarRa vAsI na nIlaYca praSasyate malAktaYca daSAhInaM varjayedambaraM buDaH ulvaRam utkawaraktaviSezam AcAraratne uSanA daSAhInena vastreRa kuryyAt karmARyaBAvataH vizRuDarmottare vizRu Darmottare vastraM jAnyaDftaM DAryya nAnyaDftaM DAryyaM na raktaM malinaM taTA jIrRaM vA padaSaYcEva SvetaM DAryaM DAryyaM prayatnataH upAnahaM nAnyaDftAM brahmasUtraYca DArayet na jIrRamalavadvAsA jIrRamalava dvAsA Bavecca viBave sati yogiyAjYavalkyaH mrAtvEvaM vAsamI mnAtvEvaM vAsasI DOte aklinne pariDAya ca pralAlyorU pralA lyorU mfdadBiSca hastO prakzAlayettataH aBAve DOtavastrARAM DOta vastrARAM SARakzOmAvikAni ca kutapo yogapawwaM vA dvivAsA vena dvirvAsA yena vA Bavet aDOtena ca vastreRa nityanEmittikIM nityanEmi Page b ttikIM kriyAm kurvan PalaM na prApnoti cApnoti dattaM Bavati nizkalam kutapo nepAlakambalaH tatrApavAdaH rANgave pawwasUtre ca sUcIbidDaM sUcIvidDaM na duzyati viDAnapA bIlIraktaM nIlIraktaM na duzyati iti mitA pAWaH tarpaRAt pUrvaM svAnavastra mrAnavastra nizpIqane nizeDo yaTA nizpIqayati yaH pUrvaM snAnavastrantu tarpaRAt nirASAstasya gacCanti devAH pitfgaREH saha jAvAliH snAnaM kftvArdDavAsAntu mnAnaM kftvArdravAsAstu viRmUtraM kurute yadi prARAyAmatrayaM kftvA punaH snAnena SudDayati nArdamekaYca SuDyati nArdramekaYca vasanaM paridaDyAt kaTaYcana hArotaH ArdraYca saptavAtahatamapi saptavAtAhatamapi SudDamiti saMkrAntyAdO vastranizpIqananizeDo yaTA zawtriMSanmatanigamO zawtriMSanmata nigamO saMkrAntyAM paYcadaSyAYca dvAdaSyAM trAdDavAsare SrAdDavAsare vastraM na pIqayettatra naca kzAreRa yojayet ti ta vastra na vasa man veyane mUlye vastre dravye ca viSvaH Dane mftyO ca amarawIkAyAM ramAnATaH mUlye pu amaraH vastra na vasa zwran pariDAnAdyupayukte kArpAsAdO vasane vastraDAraRaguRAH yaTA snAtasyAnantaraM samyagvastreRa tanumArjanam kAntipradaM SarIrasya kaRqUyAdozanASa nam kOzeyaM citravastraYca raktavastraM taTEva ca vAta SlezmaharaM tattu SItakAle viGArayet kOzeyaM pawwA mbaraM tasaravastraYca meDyaM suSItaM pittaGnaM kAzAyaM vastramucyate tadDArayeduzRakAle taccApi laGu Sasyate kAzAyaM kokawI iti loke kazAyarAgaraktaM vA Suklantu SuBadaM vastraM SItAtapanivAraRamH nacozRaM naca vA SItaM tattu varzAsu DArayet yaSasyaM kAmya mAyuzyaM SrImadAnandabardDanam tvacyaM vaSIkaraM rucyaM navaM nirmalamambaram kAmyaM kAmoddIpakam kadApi na janEH sadBirDAryyaM malinamambaram tattu kaRqU kfmikaraM glAnyalakzmIkaraM param alakzmIraSoBA dAridryaM vA BAvapra asya pariDAnaviDiryaTA BfguH vikacCo nuttarIyaSca nagnaScAvastra eva ca SrOtaM smArttaM taTA karma na nagna Scintayedapi vikacCaH parIGAnAd galitakacCaH taTA ca parIDAnAtvahiH kacCA nibadDA hyAsurI Bavet smftiH vAme pfzWe taTA nABO kacCatrayamudAhftam eBiH kacCEH parIDatte yo vipraH sa SuciH smftaH vODAyanaH nABO DftaYca yadvastramAcCAdayati jAnunI antarIyaM praSastaM tadacCinnamuBayostayoH pracetAH daSA nABO prayojayet smftiH na syAt karmaRi kaYcukIti uttarIyaDAraRaM copavItavat yaTA yajYopavItaYca DAryyate ca dvijottamEH taTA sanDAryyate yatnAduttarA cCAdanaM SuBam smfteH atra yaTA dvijottamEH savyApasavyatvAdinA upavItaM DAryyate taTA uttarAcCA danamapi dvijottamEriti pradarSanamAtram prAguktaBfgu vacanena sarvezAM dvivastratApratIteH pAraskaraH ekaYce dvAso Bavati tasya uttarArdDeRa pracCAdayatIti A ta raGu vastraparIDAnanakzatrAdi brahmAnurADavasutizyavi SAKahastacitrottarAgnipavanAditirevatIzu janmarkzajIva buDaSukradinotsavAdO DAryyaM navaM vasanamISvara devatuzwyE jyo ta sUryye cAlpaDanaM Page a vraRaH SaSidine kleSaH sadA BUmije vastrARAM bahutA vuDe suragurO vidyAgamaH sampadaH nAnABogayutapramoda SayanaM vidyANganA BArgave SOrOsyuH Kalu rogaSokakalahA vastre Dfte nUtane karmalocanam asya kzArasaMyoga nizidDadinAni yaTA mandamaNgalazazWIzu dvAdaSyAM SrAdDa vAsare vastrARAM kzArasaMyogAtdahatyAsaptamaM kulam A ta parakIyavastraDAraRanizeDo yaTA AsanaM vasanaM SayyA jAyA patyaM kamaRqaluH AtmanaH SuciretAni na parezAM kadA cana IzadDOtAdivastrasya paScimAgrAdiprasAritavastrasya ca aDOtatvaM yaTA IzadDOtaM striyA DOtaM yadDOtaM raja kasya tu aDOtaM vastrasA vastrasA vastrasA strI vastraMsyati so ka CAyO amaraH
vasvOkasArA vasvOkasArA vasvOkasArA strI vasUnAmokasya sAro yatra indranagaryyAm indranadyAM kuverapuryyAM kuveranadyAYca hema
vatsakabIja vatsakabIja vatsakabIja na vatsakasya kuwajasya bIjam indrayave rAjani
vatsakavIja vatsakavIja vatsakavIja na vatsakasya kuwajasya vIjam indrayave rAjani
vatsarAja vatsarAja vatsarAja pu candravaMSye nfpaBede vatsarAjacaritam ratnA
vayoDas vayoDas vayoDas pu vayo yOvanaM Datte DA asun taruRe uRA
vayoDasa vayoDasa vayoDasa pu vayo yOvanaM Datte DA asun taruRe uRA
veRubIja veRubIja veRubIja na ta veRujAte yavAkAre padArTe rAjani
veRupatrI veRupatrI veRupatrI strI veRoriva patramasyAH vaMSapattrIvfkze ratnamA
veRupattrI veRupattrI veRupattrI strI veRoriva pattramasyAH vaMSapattrIvfkze ratnamA
veRuvIja veRuvIja veRuvIja na ta veRujAte yavAkAre padArTe rAjani
vejapila vejapila vejapila na vija ka pila ka karma paNke halAyuDaH
vfScipatrI vfScipatrI vfScipatrI strI vfScika iva patraM vizAktamasya pfzo kalopaH NIp vfScikAlyAm ratnamA
vfScipattrI vfScipattrI vfScipattrI strI vfScika iva patraM vizAktamasya pfzo kalopaH NIp vfScikAlyAma ratnamA
vfhadbIja vfhadbIja vfhadbIja pu bfhat bIjamasya AmrAtake Sabdaca
vfhadvIja vfhadvIja vfhadvIja pu vfhat vIjamasya AmrAtake Sabdaca
vfhaspati vfhaspati vfhaspati pu vfhatyAH vAcaH patiH pfzo ni jIve devA cAryye amaraH grahaBede sU si KagolaSabde tatkakzA dimAnaM tadrUpAdi ca grahayajYaSabde dvaSyam vfhaspatinA ca vOdDaDarmaH pravarttito yaTAktaM matsyapu a tato vfhaspatiH Sakramakarodbaladarpitam grahaSAntiviDAnena pOzwikena ca karmaRA gatvATa mohayAmAsa rajiputrAn vfhaspatiH jinaDarmaM samAsTAya vedavAhyaM sa vedavit vedatrayI pariBrazwAMScakAra DizaRADipaH vedavAhyAn parijYAya hetuvAdasamanvitAn jaGAna Sakro vajreRa sarvaDarmavahizkftAn vfhaspatisavaH yajYaBedaH
vfkaDUrtta vfkaDUrtta vfkaDUrtta puMstrI vfka iva DUrttaH SfgAle hArA striyAM NIz
vfkzacara vfkzacara vfkzacara puMstrI vfkze carati cara wa vAnare DanaYjayaH striyAM NIz
vfkzakzara vfkzakzara vfkzakzara puM strI vfkze carati cara wa vAnare DanaYjayaH striyAM NIz
vftaDUrtta vftaDUrtta vftaDUrtta puM strI vfka iva DUrttaH SfgAle hArA striyAM NIz
vfttabIja vfttabIja vfttabIja pu vfttAni bIjAnyasya BiRqAyAm AqakyAm strI rAjani
vfttaparRI vfttaparRI vfttaparRI strI vfttAni parRAnyasyAH NIp mahASaRapuzpikAyAm pAWAyAYca AkanAdi rAjani

vfzAkapAyI vfzAkapAyI vfzAkapAyI strI vfzAkapeH patnI NIz EN ca lakzmyAM gOryyAm amaraH svAhAyAM SacyAM jIvantyAM Sa tAvaryyAYca medi
vfzAkapAyo vfzAkapAyo vfzAkapAyo strI vfzAkapeH patnI NIz EN ca lakzmyAM gOryyAm amaraH svAhAyAM SacyAM jIvantyAM SatAvaryyAYca medi

vfzaBAnusutA vfzaBAnusutA vfzaBAnu na sutA strI ta rADikAyAm
viMSati viMSati viMSati strI dve daSatI ni dvidaSakasaMKyAyAM tatsaNKyAta ca nityEkava saNKyAviSezArTa tu dvi ba dva dve viMSatI trimno viMSatayaH iti

vid vid vid pu vida kvip paRqite amaraH buDagraha ca jyo
vida vida vida suKAdyatuBave suKAdyanuBave AKyAne vAde ca saka vAme aka vAse ala cu uBa sew vedayati te avIvidat ta vida lABe tu uBa saka aniw muwAzwi mucAdi vindati te udit xdit avidat avitta viveda vineda vivide vinnaM vittam vida mImAMse rUDA ruDA A saka aniw vinte avitta vida BAve divA A aka aniw vaka viniw vidyate avitta Avitta vida jYAne adA para saka sew vetti veda avedIt vida pu vida kvip paRqite amaraH buDagrahe ca jyo vida pu vida ka paRqite amaraH buDagrahe buDagraha ca jyo vida suKAdyanuBave AKyAne vAde ca saka vAse ala cu uBa sew vedayati te avIvidat ta vida lABe tu uBa saka aniw mucAdi vindati te xdit avidat avitta vineda vivide vinnaM vittam vida mImAMse ruDA A saka aniw vinte avitta vida BAve divA A vaka viniw vidyate Avitta vida jYAne adA para saka sew vetti veda avedIt vida pu vida ka paRqite amaraH buDagraha ca jyo
vidyAcuYcu vidyAcuYcu vidyAcuYcu pu vidyayA viKyAtaH vidyA caYcu vidyayA KyAte
vidyAttuYcu vidyAttuYcu vidyAttuYcu pu vidyayA viKyAtaH vidyA caYcu vidyayA KyAte
vidyumAlin vidyumAlin vidyumAlin pu rAkzasaBede BAga a rAmAyaRaprasidDe rAkzasaBede ca

vihfta vihfta vihfta na vi hf BAve kta vihAre strIRAM cezwABede hemacandre lIlAvilAso vicCittirvivDokaH kilakiYci tam mowwAyitaM kuwwamitaM lalitaM vihftaM taTA viBrama ScetyalaNkArAH strIRAM svABAvikA daSa vihftamityeva pAWaH sA da strIRAM sAttvikasvABAvikAlaNkAra maDye pikftamityeva paWitvA vaktavyakAle pya Page a vaco vrAqayA vikftaM matamiti lakzitam vikftaSabde pf daSitena ujjvalamaRivAkyena lakzitavikf tasya tulyArTatvAt atastatra vikftamityeva pAWo yuktaH
vihvata vihvata vihvata na vi hf BAve kta vihAre strIRAM cezwABede hemacandre lIlAvilAso vicCittirvivyokaH kilakiYcitam mowwAyitaM kuwwamitaM lalitaM vihftaM taTA viBramaScetyalaNkArAH strIRAM svABavikA daSa vihftamityeva pAWaH sA da strIRAM sAttvikasvABAvikAlaNkAramaDye vikftamityeva paWitvA vaktavyakAle pyavaco vrIqayA vikftaM matamiti lakzitaM vikftaSabde darSitena ujjvalamaRivAkyena lakzitavikftasya tulyArTetvAt atastatra vikftamityeva pAWo yuktaH
vijakft vijakft vijakft na bIjaM SukravfdDiM karoti kf kvip vAjIkaraRe rAjani
vijakoSa vijakoSa vijakoSa pu bIjAnAM koSa ivADAraH padmabIjADAre varAwake amaraH
vijalapa vijalapa vijalapa pu vyaktayA sUyayA gUQamAnamudrAntarAlayA aDa dvizi kawAkzoktirvijalpo viduzAM mataH ujjvalama Ryukte vAkyaBede
vijalpa vijalpa vijalpa pu vyaktayA sUyayA gUQamAnamudrAntarAlayA aGadvizi kawAkzoktirvijalpo viduzAM mataH ujjvalamaRyukte vAkyaBede
vijapila vijapila vijapila na vija ka pila ka karma paNke halAyuDaH
vijayA vijayA vijayA strI ASvinaSuklapakzIyadaSamyAm umAyAH saKIBede vAmanapu a kaTayatu vijayA iti mudrArAkzasam durgAyAM hemaca vijitya padmanAmAnaM dEtyarAjaM mahAbalam vijayA tena sA devI loke cEvAparAjitA devIpu a jayantyAM SePAlikAyAM maYjizWAyAM SamIBade agnimanTe rAjani BaNgAyAm sidDi hemaca tatparyyAyaguRAdi BAvapra uktaM yaTA BaNgA gaYjA mAtulAnI mAdinI vijayA jayA BaNgA kaPaharI Page b kaPaharo tiktA grAhiRI pAcanI laGuH tIkzRozRA pittalA mohamadAvAgvahni vardDinI mohamadavAgvahnivardDinI BAvapra azwadvAdaSImaDye yadA tu SukradvAdaSyAM SukladvAdaSyAM nakzatraM SravaRaM Bavet tadA sA tu mahApuRyA dvAdaSI vijayA smftA ityukte dvAdaSoBede dvAdaSIBede Suklapakzasya saptamyAM sUryyavAro yadA Bavet saptamI vijayA nAma ityukte saptamIBede ca yamaBAryyAyAM haritakyAM jawA vacAyAM ratnamA astravidyABede vidyAmaTEnaM vidyABaTEnaM vijayAM jayAYca BawwiH vijayA strI SacyAdizu mAtfzu mAtfBede vijayA strI ASvinaSuklapakzIyadaSamyAm umAyAH saKIBede vAmanapu a kaTayatu vijayA iti mudrArAkzasam durgAyAM hemaca vijitya padmanAmAnaM dEtyarAjaM mahAbalam vijayA tena sA devI loke cEvAparAjitA devIpu a jayantyAM SePAlikAyAM maYjizWAyAM SamIBade agnimanTe rAjani BaNgAyAm sidDi hemaca tatparyyAyaguRAdi BAvapra uktaM yaTA BaNgA gaYjA mAtulAnI mAdinI vijayA jayA BaNgA Page b kaPaharo tiktA grAhiRI pAcanI laGuH tIkzRozRA pittalA mohamadavAgvahnivardDinI BAvapra azwadvAdaSImaDye yadA tu SukladvAdaSyAM nakzatraM SravaRaM Bavet tadA sA tu mahApuRyA dvAdaSI vijayA smftA ityukte dvAdaSIBede Suklapakzasya saptamyAM sUryyavAro yadA Bavet saptamI vijayA nAma ityukte saptamIBede ca yamaBAryyAyAM haritakyAM jawA vacAyAM ratnamA astravidyABede vidyABaTEnaM vijayAM jayAYca BawwiH vijayA strI SacyAdizu mAtfzu mAtfBede
vikamita vikamita vika Si mita tri vi kaSa sa kta prakASayukte
vikasita vikasita vika Si sita tri vi kaSa sa kta prakASayukte
vikrIyAmampradAna vikrIyAmampradAna vikrIyAmampradAna na vikrIya na sampradAnaM kretre yatra azwAdaSavivAdAntargate vivAdaviSeze tatsvarUpAdikaM vIrami uktaM yaTA aTa vikrIyAsampradAnAKyavyavahArapadam tatsvarUpa mAha nAradaH vikrIya paRyaM mUlyena kreturyanna pradIyate vikrIyAsampradAnaM tadvivAdapadamucyate iti tatra vikreyadravyasya dvEviDyazaqviDatve krameRAha sa eva loke smin dviviDampaRyaM jaNgamaM sTAvaraM taTA zaq viDastasya ca buDErdAnAdAnaviDiH spftaH gaRitantulimaM meyaM kriyayA rUpataH Sriyeti dAnaM vikrayaH A dAnaM krayaH gaRayitvA yasya krayaH tadgaRitam gaRitaM saMKyeyaM kramukaPalAdikam evaM tulimAdikaM tulimantulADftaM hemacandanAdikam meyaM vrIhyAdi kam kriyayA vAhanadohanAdirUpayA yuktamiti SezaH Page b rUpataH rUpeRa yuktaM vastu paRyANganAdi SriyA dIptyA yuktaM padmarAgAdikam yadA vikretA mUlyaM gfhItvA yAcamAnAya kretre vikrItaM vastu na dadAti tadA yataka rttavyaM tadAha sa eva vikrIya paRyaM malyena kreturyo na prayacCati sTAvarasya kzayaM dApyo jaNgamasya kriyAPala miti yo gfhItamUlyovikretA ajAtAnuSayAya kretre prArTayamAnAya nArpayati tacca paRyaM yadi syAva rAtmakaM tadA kzayeRa sahitamasO dApyaH yadA tu jaNga mAtmakaM tadA kriyAPalena sahitam ityarTaH vikrayA nantaraM jAta upaBogo tra kzayaH kriyAPalaM doha nAdikriyAkalaM kzIrAdikam idaYca krayakAlApe kzayA arpaRakAle mUlyADikye veditavyam mUlyahrAse tvanyaTABiDAnAt taTA ca sa eva arTaScedapahI yeta sodayampaRyamAvahediti arvAk cedapacIyeteti valpatarO pAWaH arvAk vikrItasya kretre samarpaRAt pUrvaM apacIyeta hInamUlyaM BavetsodayampaRyamAvahet vikrayakAle yAvanmUlyaM gfhItaM tAvatA mUlyenArpaRa samaye mUlyahrAsavaSAdyAvadupacayasahitaM laByate tAva ddadyAdityarTaH yadA tu mUlyasAmyaM tadA paRyopacaya rUpasyAsamBavAt nikzepaM vfdDiSezaYca krayaM vikrayameva ca yAcyamAnamadattaYcedvardDate paYcakaM Satamiti vaca nokta vfdDisahitampaRyaM dApyaH ataeva yAjYa valkyaH gfhIta mUlyaM yaH paRyaM kreturnEva praya cCati sodayaM tasya dApyo sO diglABaM vA dinA gate iti gfhItamUlyampaRyaM vikretA yadi prA rTayamAnAya svadeSavaRije kretre na samarpayati tacca paRyaM yadi krayakAle bahumUlyaM satkAlAntare alpamU lyenEva laByate tadA sodayaM vfdDyA sahitaM vikretA kretre dApanIyaH yadA mUlyahrAsakftaH paRyasvodayo nAsti kintu krayakAle yAvatA mUlyena laByaM yAvatpaRya miti pratipannaM tAvadeva tadA tatpaRyamAdAya ta smin deSe vikrItasya deSAntaralABasahitapaRyadAnanna kevalamAdyaMSa sAmya eva kintu mUlyasya vfdDO kzaye potyAha nAradaH sTAyinAmeza niyamodiglAmaM digvicAriRAmiti Page a sTAyinAM vikretfdeSaKyAyinAm eza niyamaH vikreturyA dAzaH sa evAsya BavedityanyayaH kretu rdozABiDAnasya Pala paRyasya mUlyaM kretre vikretrA na pratyarpaRIyamiti dIyamAnanna nfhRAtIti vadatA dIya vAtagrahaRe na mUlyahAniriti darSitam vikrIyAsampradAna vikrIyAsampradAna vikrIyAsampradAna na vikrIya na sampradAnaM kretre yatra azwAdaSavivAdAntargate vizAdaviSeze tatsvarUpAdikaM vIrami uktaM yaTA aTa tadugaRitam gaRitaM saMKyeyaM kramukaPalAdikam evaM tulimAdikaM tulimantulADftaM hemacandanAdikam meyaM vrIhAdikam kriyayA zAhanadohanAdirUpayA yuktamiti SezaH rUpataH rUpeRa yuktaM vastu paRyANganAdi kevalamAdyaMSasAmya eva kintu mUlyasya vfdDO kzaye pItyAha nAradaH sTAyinAmeza niyamodiglABaM digvicAriRAmiti sTAyinAM vikretfdeSasTAyinAm eza niyamaH sTAvarasya kzaya dAzya ityAdivacanokto niyama vikrIyAnuSayavaSAnnArpayati yacca krItvA nuSayavaSAnna gfhRAti tO pratyAha kAtyAyanaH krItvA prAptAnna gfhRIyAdyo na dadyAdaduzitam sa mUlyAddaSaBAgantu dattvA svandravyamApnuyAt aprApte Ta kriyAkAle kfte nEva pradApayet eza Darmo daSAhAttu parato nuSayo natviti adUzitaM jalAdineti SezaH dohyavAhyAdipaRyasya dohanavAhanAdirUpaH kAlo lpakriyAkAlastasminnApte sati agrahaRe dAne vA kfte sati na daSamaBAgaM pradApayet kintu tamadattvEva svIyaM dravyaM prApnuyAditi eza Darmo daSAhAtprAgveditavyaH tata UrdDamanuSayo na karttavyaH vikrIyAsamprayacCato yadvikrItaM paRyaM vikretuH pArSvasTitaM tasya yadi nASaH syAttadA vikretureva hAnirityAha yAjYavalakyaH rAjadEvopaGAtena paRye dozamupAgate hAnirvikreturaMvAsO yAcitasyAprayacCataH iti atra yAcitasyeti viSezaRopAdAnAt yAcanABAve na vikreturhAnirityarTAdgamyate nArado pi upahanyeta vA paRyaM dahyetApahriyenata vA vikretureva so narTo vikrIyAsamprayacCataH iti yaTA yAcitasyAprayacCato vikrotfhAnistaTA dIyamAnaM paRyamagfhRataH kreturapItyAha sa eva dIyamAnanaSca gfhRAti krItasampaRyaYca yaH krayo sa evAsya BaveddozI vikreturyo prayacCataH iti aprayacCataH vikreturyo dozaH sa evAsya BavedityanvayaH kreturdozABiDAnasya PalaM paRyasya mUlyaM kretre vikretrA na pratyarpaRIyamiti dIyamAnaSca gfhRAtIti vadatA dIyavAtagrahaRe na mUlyahAniriti darSitam krayAnantaraM kretrA na yAcitaM vikretrA ca na samarpitaM jAtaScOrAdyuRdravastatra dvayoH samA hAniH kretfvikretroruBayorapi yAcanAnarpaRaSETilyena sAparADatvAdityuktaM devalaBawwEH smfticandrikAyAm yAjYavalkyo pi hAniScet kretudozeRa kretureva hi sA Bavediti kretfdoza dIyamAnasyAgrahaRam yatra punarjAtAnuSayaH kretA vikretrA dIyamAnaYca gfhRAti tatrApyAha nAradaH dIyamAnanna gfhRAti krItvA paRyaM ca yaH krayI vikrIRAnastadanyatra vikretA nAparADruyAditi krayI jAtAnuSaya iti SezaH yAjYavalkyo pi vikrItamapi vikreyaM pUrvakretaryyagfhRatIti yastaduzwaM paRyaM darSayitvA madozaM vikrIRIte yaScAnyahaste vikrItaM tatkretranuSayABAva evAnyatra vikrIRItaM tayoH samAnodaRqa ityAha nAradaH nirdozaM darSayitvA tu sadozaM yaH prayacCati sa mUlyAdudviguRaM dApyo vinayaM tAvadeva tu taTAnyahaste vikrIya yo nyasmE tatprayacCati dravyantaddviguRaM dApyo vinayaM tAvadeva tviti yAjYavalkye pi anyahaste ca vikrItaM duzwaM vA duzwavadyadi vikrIRIte damastasya mUlyAttu dviguRo Bavediti budDipUrvavizayametat jYAtvA sadozaM yaH paRyaM vikrIRIte vicakzaRaH tadEva viguRaM dApyastatsamaM vinayaM taTeti bfhaspatinoktatvAt abudDipUrvakavikraye tu krayaparAvarttanameva anyatrApi vizayaviSeze parAvarttanamAha bfhaspatiH mattonmattena vikrItaM hInamulyaM Bayena vA asvatantreRa mUQena tyAjyantasya punarBavediti etatsarvaM dattamUlye paRye drazwavyam ataeva nAradaH dattamUlyasya paRyasya viDireza prakIrttita iti yatra punarmUlyaM na dattaM tatrApi sa evAha adatte nyatra samayAnna vikreturavikrayaH iti adattamUlye tu paRye vANmAtreRa kraye kfte na parAvarttanIyamityevamAdisamayABAve sati pravfttO nivfttO na kaSciddoza ityarTaH yatra punarvANmAtrakrayaparihArArTaM vikreturhaste kretrA kiYciddravyaM dattaM tatra ketfdozA vaSena krayAsidDO tvAha vyAsaH satyaNkAraM ca yo dattvA yaTAkAlaM na dfSyate paRyaM BavennisfzwanaddIyamAnamagfhRataH iti nisfzwaM Bavet utsfzwaM BavedityarTaH atra paRyadravyasyotasageH satyaMNkAradravyotasarge BimataH anyaTA vANmAtrakrayakartftulyatvena vikretuH satyaNkAradravyagrAhakatvakftamayatra vikrayaRAdyaparADanimittikaM satyaNkAradravyasya dvEguRyena pratidAnaM na syAt atrApi vikrItamavikreyamityanusanDeyam asminneva vizaye vikretfdozavaSena krayAsidDO tvAha yAjYavalkyaH satyaNkArakftaM dravyaM dviguRaM pratidApayediti satyaNkAraH satyApanaM kftasya krayasya satyatAkaraRamiti yAvat klIbe satyApanaM satyaNkAraH satyAkftiH striyAm ityamara kozABiDAnAt satyaNkArAyaM kftaM samarpitaM satyaNakAra kftaM krayaM satyaM karttuM yadvikretfhaste kftamityarTaH
vilAma vilAma vilAma pu vi lasa GaY tatkAliko viSezastu vilA so NgakriyAdizu ityukte trIRAM SfNgAracezwAviSeze dIptO ca gatisTAnAsanAdInAM muKanetrAdikarmaRAm viSezastu vilAsaH syAdizwasandarSanAdinA ukte strIRAM sAttvikaBAvaBede sA da yadrupaM tadaBedena svarUpeRa vi rAjate AkftyAdimiranyAdfk sa tadekAtmarUpakaH sa vilAsaH svAMSa iti Datte BeddvayaM punaH svarUpamanyAkAra yattasya mAti vilAsataH pAyaRAtmamamaM SaktyA sa vikAso nigadyate BAgavatABftokte padArTe
vilAsa vilAsa vilAsa pu vi lasa GaY tatkAliko viSezastu vilAso NgakriyAdizu ityukte strIRAM SfNgAracezwAviSeze dIptO ca gatisTAnAsanAdInAM muKanetrAdikarmaRAm viSezastu vilAsaH syAdizwasandarSanAdinA ukte strIRAM sAttvikaBAvaBede sA da yadrUpaM tadaBedena svarUpeRA virAjate AkftyAdiBiranyAdfk sa tadekAtmarUpakaH sa vilAsaH svAMSa iti Datte BedadvayaM punaH svarUpamanyAkAraM yattasya BAti vilAsataH prAyeRAtmasamaM SaktyA sa vilAso nigadyate BAgavatAmftokte padArTe
vinDyavAsinA vinDyavAsinA vinDyavAsinA strI vinDye cale vasati vasa Rini NIp yaSodAgarBajAtAyAM durgAyAm mahasrAkzo pi tAM yaSodAgarBajakanyAm gfhya vinDyaM vegAjjagAma ha tatra gatvA taTovAca tizWasvAtra mahAvane pUjyamAnA surErnAmnA KyAtA tvaM binDyavAsinI vAmanapu a tatastO nASayizyAmi vinDyAcalanivAsinI devIpA Page a vyAqimunO pu hemaca vinDyasTo pyatra jawA
vinDyavAsinI vinDyavAsinI vinDyavAsinI strI vinDye cale vasati vasa Rini NIp yaSodAgarBajAtAyAM durgAyAm sahasrAkzo pi tAM yaSodAgarBajakanyAm gfhya vinDyaM vegAjjAgAma ha tatra gatvA taTovAca tizWasvAtra mahAvane pUjyamAnA sarErnAmnA KyAtA tvaM binDyavAsinI vAmanapu a tatastO nASayizyAmi vinDyAcalanivAsinI devImA vyA pu hemaca vinDyasTo pyatra jawA
vipad vipad vipad dA strI vi pada sampa kvip vA wAp vipattO jyo ukte janmatArAtaH tftIyadvAdaSEkaviMSatisaMKyAka nakzatre ca vipattAre guqaMdadyAt jyo ta
vipada vipada vipada dA strI vi pada sampa kip vA wAp vipattO jyo ukte janmatArAtaH tftIyadvAdaSEkaviMSatisaMKyAka nakzatre ca vipattAre guqaMdadyAt jyo ta
viprozita viprozita viprozita tri vi pra vasa kta gatapravAse
viprozite viprozite viprozite tri vi pra vasa kta gatapravAse
vipruz vipruz vipruz strI va vi pru za kvip vinduzu vedapAWakAle suKanirgatajalavinduzu amaraH makzikA vipruzacCAyA gOraSvaH sUryyaraSmayaH rajo BUrvAyuragniSca sparSameDyAni nirdiSet Su ta AcamanakAle suKaniHsftAnAM tAsAM nocCizwadozajanakatA yaTAha nocCizwaM kurvate muKyA vipruzo NgaM nayanti yAH dantavat dantalagnezu jihvAsparSe sucirBavet kUrma u a
vipruza vipruza vipruza strI ba va vi pruza kvip vinduzu vedapAWakAle muKanirgatajalavinduzu amaraH makzikA vipruzacCAyA gOraSvaH sUryyaraSmayaH rajo BUrvA yuragniSca sparSameDyAni nirdiSet Su ta AcamanakAle muKaniHsftAnAM tAsAM nocCizwadozajanakatA yaTAha nocCizwaM kurvate muKyA vipruzo qaM nayanti yAH danta van dantalagnezu jihvAsparSe SucirBavet kUrma u a
viqAlapadaka viqAlapadaka viqAlapadaka na karzaparimARe BAvapra karzaSabde pf dfSyam
viqalapadaka viqalapadaka viqalapadaka na karzaparimARe BAvapra karzaSabde dfSyam
virahotkaRWitA virahotkaRWitA virahotkaRWitA strI AgantuM kftacitto pi dEvAnnAyAti yatpriyaH tadanAgamaduHKArttAM virahotkaRWitA tu sA sA da pa lakzite nAyikABede
virahotpaRWitA virahotpaRWitA virahotpaRWitA strI Agantu kftacitto pi dEvAnnAyAti yatpriyaH tadanAgamaduHKArttA virahonkaRWitA tu sA sA da pa lakzite nAyikABede
visakaRWA visakaRWA visakaRWA strI viSaM saM zaM mfRAlamiva kaRWo syAH balAkAyAM rAjani zamaDyaH samaDyo pyatra
visakusuma visakusuma visakusuma na visayuktaM kusumam padme rAjani
vismayAnDita vismayAnDita vismayAnDita tri ta vismayayukte AScaryyayukte ca amaraH
vismayAnvita vismayAnvita vismayAnvita tri ta vismayayukte AScaryyayukte ca amaraH
visvasfj visvasfj visvasfj pu viSvaM sfjati sfja kvin caturmuKe brahmaRi amaraH halAdO kuH viSvasfk viSvasfgByAmityAdi
viz viz viz strI viza kvip vizWAyAm amaraH kanyAyAM ca viwpatiH
vizOzaDI vizOzaDI vizOzaDI strI ta nAgadantyAm ratnamA
vizRukAntA vizRukAntA vizRukAntA strI ta vizRustadvarRaH krAnto vA yayA a parAjitAyAm amaraH tasyAH vizRutulyavarRatvAt vizRu parityaktatvAcca taTAtvam
vizRukrAntA vizRukrAntA vizRukrAntA strI ta vizRustadvarRaH krAnto vA yayA aparAjitAyAm amaraH tasyAH vizRutulyavaraRatvAt vizRuparityaktatvAcca taTAtvam
viza viza viza vyAptO ju uBa saka aniw vivezwi vevezwi vevizwe irit aviPat avizat avikzat ta vizRuH viza viprayoge krayA kryA para aka aniw vizRAti avikzat viza secane BvA para saka aniw vezati sOvarRikAdayo zwAvasADyA praRiharAstAsAM lakzaRamAha SozaH SvetA sitA raktA pItA ca piqakA jvaraH prARAntiko BaveddAhaH SvAsahikkASirograhaH AKu dUzIvizalakzaRamAha AdaMSAcCoRitaM pARqumaRqalAni ro svaBAvAdekayEva dazwrayA dazwo Bavati matsyavizasya kAryya mAha matsyAstu savizA kuryurdAhaM SoTaM rujaM taTA jalOkAvizakAryyamAha vaRqUM SoTaM jvaraM mUrcCAM sa vizAstu jalOkasaH kuryuriti SezaH gfhagoDikA vizakAryyamAha vidAhaM SvayaTuM todaM prasvedaM gfha goDikAH kuryyuriti SezaH SatapadIvizakAryyamAha daMSe svedaM rujaM dAhaM kuryyAcCatapadIviza SatapadI gi jAI iti loke maSakavizakAryyamAha kaRqUmA nmaSakErIzacCoTaH syAnmandavedanaH asADvamaSakala kzaRamAha asADyakIwasadfSamasADyaM maSakakzatam asADyakIwasadfSaM asADyEH kIwErlUtAdiBiH kftaM yat kzataM tat sadfSavedanam makzikArdaSalakzaRamAha sadyaH saMsrAviRI SyAvAdAhamUrcCAjvarAnvitA piqakA makzikA daMSe tAsAntu sTagikA suhft tAsAmityAdi tAsAM suSrutoktAnAM zaRAM makzikARAM maDye sTigikA nAmnI SIGraM prARaM haratItyarTaH vyAGrAdivizARAM kAryyamAha catuzpAdBirdvipAdBirvA naKErdantESca yat kftam SUyate pacyate tattu sravati jvarayatyapi catuzpAdBiH vyAGrAdiBiH dvipAdBiH vanamanuzyAdimiH SUyate SUno Bavati vizojJitasya lakzaRamAha prasannadozaM prakfti sTaDAtumannABikAmaM samamUtraviwkam prasannavarRendriya cittacezwaM vEdyo vagacCedavizaM manuzyam prasannadozaM prakftisTadozaM SezaM sugamam
vizadarSanamftyu vizadarSanamftyu vizadarSanamftyu ka puM strI vizasya darSanena mftyurasya kap cakoraKage hemaca striyAM NIz
vizadarSanamftyuka vizadarSanamftyuka vizadarSanamftyuka puMstrI vizasya darSanena mftyurasya kap cakoraKage hemaca striyAM NIz
vizakaRWA vizakaRWA vizakaRWA strI viSaM saM zaM mfRAlamiva kaRWo syAH balAkAyAM rAjani zamaDyaH samaDyo pyatra
vizakusuma vizakusuma vizakusuma na vizayuktaM kusumam padme rAjani
vizkamBa vizkamBa vizkamBa pu vi skanBa ac sUryyacandayogajAtayoga maDye praTame yoge jyo ta vistAre pratibanDe rUpa kanAwakANgamede arTopakzepakAH paYca vizkamBakaprayeSakO cUlikANkAvatAro Ta syAdaNgamuKamityapi vfttavartti Page b mARAnAM kaTAMSAnAM nidarSakaH saMkziptArTastu vizkamBa AdAvaNkasya darSitaH maDyena maDyamAByAM vA pAtrAByAM samprayojitaH SudDaH syAt sa tu saNkIrRo nIcamaDyama kalpitaH sA da yoginAM banDaBede medi vfkze ajayaH avazwamBake amaraH kIlakAdO ca BarataH parvataBede vipulaSabde dfSyam
vizkanBa vizkanBa vizkanBa pu vi skanBa ac sUryya ScandrayogajAtayoga maDye praTame yoge jyo ta vistAre pratibanDe rUpakanAwakANgaBede arTopakzepakAH paYca vizkamBakapraveSakO cUlikANkAvatAro Ta syAdaNkasuKamityApi vfttavarttizyamARAnAM kaTAMSAnAM nidarSakaH saMkziptArTastu vizkanBa AdAvaNkasya darSitaH maDye na maDyamAByAM vA prAtrAByAM samprayojitaH SudDaH syAt sa tu saNkIrRo nIcamaDyamakalpitaH sA da yoginAM banDaBede medi vfkze ajayaH avazwamBake amaraH kIlakAdO ca BarataH parvataBede vipulaSabde dfSyam
vizozaDI vizozaDI vizozaDI strI ta nAgadantyAm ratnamA
vyAlamba vyAlamba vyAlamba pu viSezeRa Alambate vi A lavi ac raktEraRqe vEdyakam viSezeRa lambamane tri
vyAlamva vyAlamva vyAlamva pu viSezeRa Alambate vi A lavi ac raktEraRqe vEdyakam viSezeRa lambamAne tri
vyaMsita vyaMsita vyaMsita tri vi aMsa kta vaYcite pratArite trikA
vyasita vyasita vyasita tri vi aMsa kta vaYcite pratArite trikA
vyatihAra vyatihAra vyati tI hAra pu vi ati hf GaY vA dIrGaH parI vartte hemaca parasparEkajAtIyakriyAkaraRe
vyatitIhAra vyatitIhAra vyatitIhAra pu vi ati hf GaY vA dIrGa parIvartte hemaca parasparEkajAtIyakriyAkaraRe
vyfdDi vyfdDi vyfdDi strI virudDA fdDiH virudDasampattO tatrArTe avyayo duryyavanam yavanAnAM virudDasampattO si kO
vyudDi vyudDi vyudDi strI virudDA fdDiH virudDasampattO tatrArTe avyayo duryyavanam yavanAnAM virudDasampattO si kO
wa wa wa wakArovyaYjanavarRaBedaH ardDamAtrAkAlenoccAryyaH asyo ccAraRasTAnaM mUrdDA asyoccAraRe mUrdDasTAnena jihvA maDyasya sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH vivAraSvAsaDozA bAhya prayatnAH mAtfkAnyAse sya dakziRasPici nyAsyatA varRA BiDAne asya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA wakAraSca kapAlI ca someSaH KecarI DvaniH mukundo vinadA pfTvI vE zRavI vAruRI naraH dakzasPigardDacandraSca javA BUtiH puna rBavaH vfhaspatirDanurhastaH pramodA vimalA kawiH rAja girirmahADanurDrARAtmA sumuKI marut asya svarUpaM yaTA wakAraM caYcalApANgi svayaM pa ramakuRqalI kowivi dyullatAkAraM paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARayutaM varRaM guRatraya samanvitam triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM varaM sadA kAmaDenutantram etadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM yaTA DyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRuzva varavarRini mAlatI puzpavarRABAM pUrRacandraniBekzaRAm daSabAhusamAyuktAM sarvAlaNkArasaMyutAm paramokzapradAM nityaM sadA smeramuKIM parAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram mAtrAvftte sya praTamopanyAse KedaH Palam JaSabde pramARaM dfSyam wa pu wala qa vAmane pAde niHsvane ca medi wa wakArovyaYjanavarRaBedaH ardDamAtrAkAlenoccAryyaH asyo ccAraRasTAnaM mUrdDA asyoccAraRe mUrdDasTAnena jihvA maDyasya sparSaH AByantaraprayatnaH vivAraSvAsaDozA bAhya prayatnAH mAtfkAnyAse sya dakziRasPici nyAsyatA varRA BiDAne asya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA wakAraSca kapAlI ca someSaH KecarI DvaniH mukundo vinadA pfTvI vE zRavI vAruRI naraH dakzasPigardDacandraSca javA BUtiH puna rBavaH vfhaspatirDanurhastaH pramodA vimalA kawiH rAja girirmahADanurDrARAtmA sumuKI marut asya svarUpaM yaTA wakAraM caYcalApANgi svayaM pa ramakuRqalI kowivi dyullatAkAraM paYcadevamayaM sadA paYcaprARayutaM varRaM guRatraya samanvitam triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM varaM sadA kAmaDenutantram etadaDizWAtfdevatArUpaM yaTA DyAnamasya pravakzyAmi SfRuzva varavarRini mAlatI puzpavarRABAM pUrRacandraniBekzaRAm daSabAhusamAyuktAM sarvAlaNkArasaMyutAm paramokzapradAM nityaM sadA smeramuKIM parAm evaM DyAtvA brahmarUpAM tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDAratantram mAtrAvftte sya praTamopanyAse KedaH Palam JaSabde pramARaM dfSyam wa pu wala qa vAmane pAde niHsvane ca medi
x x x xkAraH svaravarRRaBedaH sa ca dantamUlIyaH udAttAnudAtta svaritaBedAt tniviDaH anunAsikAnanunAsikaBedAt pratyekaM punardviDeti zaqviDaH tasya mAtfkAnyAse dakza gaRqe nyasyatayA tacCabdenApyaBiDAnam tasya DyeyarUpaM kAmaDenutantre uktaM yaTA xkAraScaYcalApANgi kuRqalI paradevatA atra brahmAdayaH sarvve trayo sti satataM priye paYcadevamayaM varRRaM caturjYAnamayaM sadA paYca prARayutaM varRRaM taTAguRatrayAtmakam vindutrayAtmakaM varRRaM pItavidyullatA yaTA asya plutatvoktiScintyA ekamAtra trimAtratvAByAM tayorBedAt takArarahitastu dvAdaSAnAM boDaka iti si kO fSabde vivftiH x avya fgatO f kvip tugaBAvaH latvam devamAtari BUmO parvvate ca medi iti bAcaspatye xkArAdiSabdArTasaNkalanam x xHsTARuH SrIDaraH SudDo meGoDUmro vakoviyat deva yonirdakzagaRqorudraH kAkodarI guRa trayAtmakam vindutrayAtmakaM varRaM pItavidyullatAM yaTA x xkAraH svaravarRRaBedaH sa ca dantamUlIyaH udAttAnudAtta svaritaBedAt tniviDaH anunAsikAnanunAsikaBedAt pratyekaM punardviDeti zaqviDaH ya ya ya yakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH sparSavarRozmavarRayormaDyasTatvAt antaHsTavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRasTAnaM tAlu jihvAgreKa tAluna IzatsparSenoccAraRAdasyoccAraRe IzatsparSa ABya ntaraprayatnaH aco spfzwAyaRastvIzat SikzoktaH vAhya prayatnAH saMvAranAdaGozA alpaprARaSca varRABiDAne sya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA yo vARI vasuDA vAyurvikftiH puruzottamaH yugAntaH SvasanaH SIGroDUmArcciH prARisevakaH SaNkA Bramo jawI lolA vAyuvegI yaSaskarI saNkarzaRaH kzapA bAlo hfdayam kapilA praBA AgneyovyApakastyAgo mohoyAtA pramA suKam caRqaH sarveSvarI DUmrA cAmu RqA sumuKeSvarI tvagAtmA malayomAtrA haMsinI BfNginAyakaH Ne namaH SozakomInoDanizWAnaNgavedinI SizwaH somaH paNktinAmA pApahA prARasaMjYakaH asyADizWAtfdevatADyAnaM yaTA DUmravarRAM mahArOdrIM zaN BujAM raktalocanAm raktAmbaraparIDAnAM nAnAlaNkAra BUzitAm mahAmokzapradAM nityAmazwasidDipradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA yakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya DyeyasvarUpaM yaTA yakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi catuzkoRa mayaM sadA pulAlaDUmasaNkASaM svayaM paramakuRqalIm paYcaprARamayaM varRaM paYcadevamayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM taTA praRamAmi sadA varRaM mUrttimanmokzamavyayam kAmaDenutantram mAtfkanyAse asya hfdayanyAsyatA kAvyAdO asya praTamaprayoge lakzmIlABaH Palam yo lakzmIM rastu dAham vf ra wI ya pu ya yA qa vAyO yaSasi yoge gatO ca yAtari tri SabdaratnA yama qa saMyame AdilaGuSezaguruke AdilaGu Sezaguruke jaladEvate lakzmIPalake yagaRe ca ya yakAraH vyaYjanavarRaBedaH sparSavarRozmavarRayormaDyasTatvAt antaHsTavarRaBedaH tasyoccAraRasTAnaM tAlu jihvAgreKa tAluna IzatsparSenoccAraRAdasyoccAraRe IzatsparSa ABya ntaraprayatnaH aco spfzwAyaRastvIzat SikzoktaH vAhya prayatnAH saMvAranAdaGozA alpaprARaSca varRABiDAne sya vAcakaSabdA uktA yaTA yo vARI vasuDA vAyurvikftiH puruzottamaH yugAntaH SvasanaH SIGroDUmArcciH prARisevakaH SaNkA Bramo jawI lolA vAyuvegI yaSaskarI saNkarzaRaH kzapA bAlo hfdayam kapilA praBA AgneyovyApakastyAgo mohoyAtA pramA suKam caRqaH sarveSvarI DUmrA cAmu RqA sumuKeSvarI tvagAtmA malayomAtrA haMsinI BfNginAyakaH Ne namaH SozakomInoDanizWAnaNgavedinI SizwaH somaH paNktinAmA pApahA prARasaMjYakaH asyADizWAtfdevatADyAnaM yaTA DUmravarRAM mahArOdrIM zaN BujAM raktalocanAm raktAmbaraparIDAnAM nAnAlaNkAra BUzitAm mahAmokzapradAM nityAmazwasidDipradAyinIm evaM DyAtvA yakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet asya DyeyasvarUpaM yaTA yakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi catuzkoRa mayaM sadA pulAlaDUmasaNkASaM svayaM paramakuRqalIm paYcaprARamayaM varRaM paYcadevamayaM sadA triSaktisahitaM varRaM trivindusahitaM taTA praRamAmi sadA varRaM mUrttimanmokzamavyayam kAmaDenutantram mAtfkanyAse asya hfdayanyAsyatA kAvyAdO asya praTamaprayoge lakzmIlABaH Palam yo lakzmIM rastu dAham vf ra wI ya pu yA qa vAyO yaSasi yoge gatO ca yAtari tri SabdaratnA yama qa saMyame AdilaGu Sezaguruke jaladEvate lakzmIPalake yagaRe ca
yaTAsTita yaTAsTita yaTAsTita avya yaTA yena rUpeRa sTAtuM yogyaM taTAsTitam yogyatAyAm avyayI satyatAyAm hemaca arSa Adyac satye tri
yaTasTita yaTasTita yaTasTita avya yaTA yena rUpeRa sTAtuM yogyaM taTAsTitam yogyatAyAm avyayI satyatAyAm hemaca arSa Adyac satye tri

yamaGaRWa yamaGaRWa yamaGaRWa pu yogaviSeze dve maTApUrvaPalgunyO puRya SlezArkacandrayoH jyezWAnurADA BaraRI cASvinI kujavAsare hastArdrA candaje mUlA pUrvAzAQA ca revatI jIve hyuttaraBAdraSca SukrAhe svAtirohiRI SanivAre SataBizA SravaRA yamaGaRWakaH sArasaMgrahaH
yamaGaRwa yamaGaRwa yamaGaRwa pu yogaviSeze dve maGApUrvaPalagunyO puRyaSlezArkaMcandrayoH jyezWAnurADA BaraRI cASvinI kujavAsare hastAdrAM candraje mUlA pUrvAzAQA ca revatI jIve hyuttaraBAdraSca SukrAhe svAtirohiRI SanivAre SataBizA SravaRA yamaGaRWakaH sArasaMgrahaH
zRiha zRiha zRiha prItO di para saka udit vew udana vaw snihyati lfdit asne hat xdit asnehat snehitA sneWA snegDA sneQA BnegDA zRiha snehayuktaBavane cu uBa a aka sew snehayati te asizRihat ta zRiha prItO di para saka udana vaw snihyati xdit asnehat snehitA sneQA BnegDA zRiha snehayuktaBavane cu uBa aka sew snehayati te asizRihat ta
zU zU zU prasave garBavimocane ca adA Atma saka vew sUte sUvE suvE asavizwa asozwa zU prasave di A sa vew sUyate asavizwa asIzwa odita sUtaH asozwa aodit sUnaH zU kzepe pretaRe ca tudA para saka vew suvati asAvIt zU prasave garBavimocane ca adA Atma saka vew sUte suvE asavizwa asozwa zU prasave di A sa vew sUyate asavizwa asozwa aodit sUnaH zU kzepe pretaRe ca tudA para saka vew suvati asAvIt
zUda zUda zUda nivAraRe BvA A saka sew sUdate asUdizwa zUda mAraRe BvA para saka sew sUdati asUdIt zUda kzaraRe aka pratijYAyAM nirAse ca saka ada cu uBa sew sUdayati te teM asuzUdat ta zUda nivAraRe BvA A saka sew sUdate asUdizwa zUda mAraRe BvA para saka sew sUdati asUdIt zUda kzaraRe aka pratijYAyAM nirAse ca saka ada cu uBa sew sUdayati teM asuzUdat ta
zaRa zaRa zaRa na samBaktO samBakto BvA para saka sew zasya satve Rasya natvam sanati asanIt asAnIt dantyAnto yamityeke zaRa na dAne tanA uBa saka sew zasya satve Rasya natvam udit dantyAnta ityeke sanoti sanu asanIt asAnIt asanizwa asAta sizaRizati sisAMsati ityeke zaRa na samBakto BvA para saka sew zasya satve Rasya natvam sanati asanIt asAnIt dantyAnto yamityeke zaRa na dAne tanA uBa saka sew zasya satve Rasya natvam udit dantyAnta ityeke sanoti sanu asanIt asAnIt asanizwa asAta sizaRizati sisAMsati ityeke
zaca zaca zaca secane BvA Atma saka sew sacate paYcate asacizwa asIzacat asIH zacat ta zaca sambanDe BvA para saka sew sacati asacIt asacot asAcIt zaca secane BvA Atma saka sew paYcate asacizwa asIH zacat ta zaca sambanDe BvA para saka sew sacati asacot asAcIt
zada zada zada gatO hu cu uBa saka sew sAdayati te asIzadat zada vizAde AMkulIBAve AkulIBAve aka hiMsAyAM gatO ca saka tu pa aniw sIdati lfdit xdit asadat jvalA sadaH sAdaH zada gatO cu uBa saka sew sAdayati te asIzadat zada vizAde AkulIBAve aka hiMsAyAM gatO ca saka tu pa aniw sIdati xdit asadat jvalA sadaH sAdaH
zaha zaha zaha kzamAyAM vA cu laBa uBa pakze di para saka sew sAhayati te sahyati asIzahat asahIt zaha kzamAyAM BvA A zmA saka sew sahate asahizwa jvalA saha sAhaH tIzasaheti pA takArAdAvardDaDAtuke vA iw soQA sahitA sahitavyaH soQavyaH kta soQa ityeva tatra pakze pakzo nimitte sati na zatvam parisoQA ityeva pakze parizahitetyAdO zatvam zaha kzamAyAM vA cu uBa pakze di para saka sew sAhayati te sahyati asIzahat asahIt zaha kzamAyAM BvA zmA saka sew sahate asahizwa jvalA saha sAhaH tIzasaheti pA takArAdAvardDaDAtuke vA iw soQA sahitA sahitavyaH soQavyaH kta soQa ityeva tatra pakzo nimitte sati na zatvam parisoQA ityeva pakze parizahitetyAdO zatvam
zakAraH zakAraH zakAraH mUrdDanyaH UzmavarRaBedaH askoccAraRasTAnaM mUrdDA asyoccAraRe AByantaraprayatra vivftaTardDaspfzwatA yema spfzwAH SalastaDA SikzAkteH bAhyapravatyAYca vivArASvAsA Page b DozA mahAprARaSca UzmarUpavAyapraDAnatvAdasya Udmava rRatA asya DyeyasvarUpaM yaTA zakAraM SfRu cArvaNgi azwakoRamayaM sadA raktacandrapratIkASaM svayaMparamakuRqalI caturvargamayaM varRaM suDAnirmitavigraham paYcadevazayaM varRaM paYcaprARamayaM sadA rastaHsattvatamoyuktaM triSakti sahitaM sadA tribindusAhataM varRamAtmAditattvasaMyutam sarvadevamayaM varRaM hfdi BAvaya pArvati kAmaDenutantram etADazWAnadevatADyAnaM yaTA caturBujAM cakorAkzIM cArucandanacarcitAm SuklavarRAM trinayanAM varadAYca SucismitAm ratnAlaNkAramUzAQyAM SvetamAlyopaSo BitAm devavfndEraBibandyAM sevitAM mokzakANkziBiH eva DyAtvA zakArantu tanmantraM daSaDA japet varRodDA ratantram asya vAcakaSabdA yaTA zaH Sveto vAsudevaSca pitA prajYA vinAyakaH paramezWo vAmabAhuH SrezWo garBavimocanaH lambodaro yamo jeSaH kAmaDuk kAma cUmakaH suSrIrUzmA vfzo lajjA marudBakzyaH priyaH SivaH sUryyAtmA jaWaraH kozo mAtA rakzovidAriRI kalakaRWo maDyaBinnA yudDAtmA malapUH SivAH varRABi DAnam makAraH Sveta AKyAto mUrdDanyo vfzasaMjYaruH pittaM SaktiSca mAyA ca mahAyAniH svabindumat BantrA nizanam mAtfkAnyAse sya jaWare nyAsyatA kAvyAdO prayoge Ra Palam svedaH SaH muKaM zastu svewam vf ra wI atra zAdiSabdezu zAditayA ye DAtavaH paWitAstezAM prayogakAle dantyasAditvaM sati ca nimittaM punaH zatvam yaTA ziDa seDati niDeDati pawwavargastavargasvaH ityukteH yasya prayogakAle satve tannimittawavargala tavargAvirBavaH yaTA zwu stu stOti zWAsTA vasTO zRA snA snAti nimitte sati zatve ca wutve ca pratizwOti pratizWA nizWA nizRAti tatra zwyEzvakkazWivAntu na sAdeSastena zwyAyati zvakkati zWIva tItyevetetti BedaH zWivaparyudAse zWIvaDAtorapi paryudAsaH
zaqAmnAya zaqAmnAya zaqAmnAya pu zaqguRita AmnAyaH SAka Sivasya zaqvaktra vinirgate zaw prakAratantraBede aTedAnIM pravakzyAmi AmnAyakaTanaM pfTak pUrvAmnAyo yadA mantrastadA prAcyAM diSi sTitaH sadASivo haM BagavAnAcAraH parikIrttitaH evaM vE dakziRAmnAyo dakziRasyAM diSisTitaH evaM hi paScimAmnAyaH paScimAyAM diSi sTitaH evamevottarAmnAya uttarasyAM diSi sTitaH muKamUrdDvakftaM devi yat prokta tava sanniDO UrdDvAmnAyaSca kaTito devAnAmApi durlaBaH yadA cADomuKaM devi yat proktaM girije priye aDa AmnAya ityuktaH satyaM satyaM sumaDyame zaqAmnAyASca kaTitAScotpattikramayAmataH yasmin yasmiMScaye devAH kaTitASca varAnane tAndevAMSca pravakzyAmi sADakAnAM hitAya vE SrIvidyABedasahitA tArA ca tripurA taTA BuvaneSI cAnnapUrRA DUrvAmnAye prakIrttitAH vagalAmuKI ca vaSinI tvaritA DanadA taTA vaSinI vAlaBEravItyarTaH mahizaGnI mahAlakzmIrdakziRAmnAyakIrttitAH mahAsarasvatI vidyA taTA vAgvAdinI parA pratyaNgirA BavAnI ca paScimAmnAyakIrttitAH kAlikA BedasahitA tArA BedESca saMyutA mAtaNgI BEravI cCinnA taTA DUmAvatI parA uttarAmnAyakaTitAH kalO SIGraPalapradAH samastaBedasahitAH kAlikA yAH prakIrttitAH dvAviMSatyakzarI tAsAM dakziRAnmAyakIrttitA ekajawA zaqAmnAye mahAmokzapradAyinI tatparA paramA vidyA na vidyAntaragopitA parapraDAnamantrASca UrdDvAmnAye prakIrttitAH UrdDvAmnAyo hyaDaScEva kevalaM mokzado Bavet DarmArTakAmamokzArTe AmnAyAnye prakIrttitAH yaToktaviDinA Badre kftvA PalamavApnuyAt pUrvAmnAyAdisarvezAM viDAnaM SfRu mundari kftvA yenASu laBate PalaM yaduttavottasam zaw karma PaladA nfRAM zaqAmfnAyAH prakIrttitAH uttarAmnAyo deveSi tezAmASu PalapradaH iti samayAcAratantre pawale AmnAyaBedenAcA raBeda ukto yaTA pUrvAmnAyoditaM karma pASarva kaTitaM priye yaduktaM dakziRAmnAye tadeva pASarva smftam paScimAmnAyajaM karma paSuvIrA samASritam uttarAmnAyajaM karma divyavIrASritaM priye divyo pi vIraBAvena sADayet pitfkAnane vIrAsanaM vinA divyaH pUjayet pitfkAnane UrdDavAmnAyoditaM karma divyaBAvASritaM priye iti niruktatantre pawale
zaqAnAya zaqAnAya zaqAnAya pu zaqaguRita AmnAyaH SAka Sivasya zaqavaktra vinirBate zawprakAratantraBede aTedAnIM pravakzyAmi A mrAyakaTanaM pfTak pUrvAmnAyo yadA mantrastadA prAcyAM diSi svitaH sadASibo ha BagavAnAcAraH parikI rttitaH evaM vE daliRAmnAyo dakziRasyAM diSi svitaH evaM hi paScimAmnAyaH paYcimAyAM diSi sTitaH evamevottarAmnAya uttarasrAM diSi syitaH suKamUrdDvakftaM Page b devi yat proktaM tava sanniDO UrdDvAmrAyaSca kaTito devAnAmapi durlaBaH yadA cADomuKaM devi yat proktaM girija priye aDa AmnAya ityuktaH satyaM satyaM sumaDyame zaqAmnAyAYca kaTitAScotpattikramanAmataH yasmin yaRiMSca yedevAH kaTitASca varAnane tAndevAMSca pravakzyAmi sADakAnAM hitAya vE SrIvidyABedasahitA tArA ca tripurA taTA BuvaneSI cAnnapUrRA zUrvAmnAye prakIrttitAH vagalAmuKI ca vaSinI tvaritA DanadA taTA vaSinI vAlaBEravItyarTaH mahizaGnI mahA lakzmArdakziRAmnAyakIrttitAH mahAsarasvatI vidyA taTA vAgvAdinA para pratyaNgirA BavAnI ca paScimA mnAyakArttitAH kAlikA BedasahitA tArA BedESca saM yutA mAtafgI BEravI cCinnA taTA DUmAvatI parA uttarAmnAyakaTitAH kakO SOzraPalapradAH samastaBeda sahitAH lAlikA yAH prakIrttitAH dvAviMSatyakzarI tAsAM dakziRAmnAyakIrttitA ekajawA zaqAmnAye mahAmokzapradAyinI tatparA paramA vidyA na vidyA ntaragopitA parapraDAnamantrASca UrdDvAmnAye prakIrttitAH UrdDAmnAyo hyaDaScEva kevalaM mokzado Bavet DarmArTakA mamokzArTe AmnAyAnye prakIrttitAH yaToktaviDinA Badre kftvA PalamavApruyAt pUrvAmnAyAdisarvezAM viGAnaM SfRu sundari kftvA yenASu laBate PalaM yadu ttamottamam zawa karma PaladA nfRAM zaqAmnAyAH prakI rttitAH uttarAmanAyo deveSi tezAmASu PalapradaH iti samayAcAratantre zawale AmanAyaBedenAcA raBeda ukto yaTA pUrvAmnAyoditaM karma pASavaM kaTitaM priye yaduktaM dakziRAmnAye tadeva pASakaM smftam paScimAmnAyajaM karma paSuvIrasamASritam uttarAmnAyajaM karma divyavIrASritaM priye divyo pi vIraBAvena sADayet pitfkAnane vIrAsanaM vinA divyaH pUjayet pitfkAnane UrdDvAmnAyoditaM karmadivyaBAvA SritaM priye iti niruktatantre pawale
zaqaNKa zaqaNKa zaqaNKa pu zaRABaNAnAM samAhAraH pAtrA jaNGa bAhU Siro maDyaM zaqaNKadamuyat ityukte dehAvayaSazatrka Bede Sabdaca tantrAkte hfdayAdyapayataBede yatra hradayAdizu zawstu aNgezu mantra vaSezomyasyata tazu zawa aNgAnIva yasya SikzAkalpo vyAkaraRaM niruktaM CandasAM citiH jyAtipaHmayamaYcIva Page a pu kzudragokzurakzupe ca pu rAjani gomUtraM gomaya kzIraM sarpirdaDi ca rocanA zaqaNgametanmANgalyaM paWitaM sarvadA gavAm smftyukte rocanAsahite paYcagavye na
zaqaNga zaqaNga zaqaNga na asmAzaqaNgAnAM samahArAH pAtrA jaNGe bAhU Siro maDyaM zaqaNgamidamucyate ityukte dehAvayavazawkaBede Sabdaca tantrokte hfdayAdyavayavaBede yatra hfdayAdizu zawsu aNgezu mantraviSezonyasyate tezu zaw aNgAnIva yasya SikzAkalpo vyAkaraRaM niruktaM CandasAM citiH jyotizaH mayanaScEva zaqaNgo da izyate ityukte ve pu kzudragokzurakzupe ca pu rAjani gomantraM gomayaM kzIraM sarpirdaDi ca rocanA zaqaNgametanmANgalyaM paWitaM sarvadA gavAm smftyukte rocanAsahite paYcagavye na
zawacatvAriMSat zawacatvAriMSat zawacatvAriMSat strI zaqaDikA catvAriMSat CeyAlliSa saNKyABede tatsaMKyAnvite ca
zawcatvAriMSat zawcatvAriMSat zawcatvAriMSat strI zaqaDikA catvAriSat CeyAlliSa saMNKyABede tatsaMKyAntite ca
zawpadapriyA zawpadapriyA zawpadapriyA pu ta nAgakeSare SabdamA tasya hi pracuramaDuyatatvAt Bramarapriyatvam
zawpadapriya zawpadapriya zawpadapriya pu ta nAgakeSare SabdamA tasya hi pracu ramaDayuvatvArva Bramarapriyatvam
zazWihAyana zazWihAyana zazWihAyana pu zazwirhAyanA vayo sya zazwivarzavayaske gaje zazwidinapacyohAnayo vrIhiH SAka zazwikaDAnye ca medi
zazwihAyana zazwihAyana zazwihAyana pu zazwirhAyanA vayo sya zazwivarzavayaske gaje zazwidinapacyohAyano vrIhiH SAka zazwikaDAmye ca medi
ziDa ziDa ziDa mANgalye aka SAsane Sasane saka udit vew seDati aseDIt asEtsIt sidDaH ziDa gatO BvA para saka sew seDati aseDIt seDitaH ziDa sidDO divA para aka aniw ktvA yew vew siDyati asEtsIt Rici sADayati sizADayizati A rAjAjYayA varoDe saka AseDaH ut uccatAyAm aka utseDaH ni nivAraRe saka nizeDaH pari nivAraRe saka parizeDaH prati nivAraRe saka pratizeDaH vi A viSezeRa nizeDe vyAzeDaH vi prati virudDatve vyAcAte vyAGAte vipratizeDaH ziDa mANgalye aka Sasane saka udit vew seDati aseDIt asEtsIt sidDaH ziDa gatO BvA para saka sew seDati aseDIt seDitaH ziDa sidDO divA para aka aniw ktvA vew siDyati asEtsIt Rici sADayati sizADayizati A rAjAjYayA varoDe saka AseDaH ut uccatAyAm aka utseDaH ni nivAraRe saka nizeDaH pari nivAraRe saka parizeDaH prati nivAraRe saka pratizeDaH vi A viSezeRa nizeDe vyAzeDaH vi prati virudDatve vyAGAte vipratizeDaH
ziqBa ziqBa ziqBa pu ziwa gan tasya nettvam pfzo viwaM lampawa kAmuke hemaca
ziqga ziqga ziqga pu ziwa gan tasya nettvam pfzo viwe lampawa kAmuke hemaca
zu zu zu surAcyAvanarUpe sanDAne somAdeH pIqane manTane ca svA u saka snAne aka aniw luNi para sew sunoti sunute asAvIt asozwa sotA sAtA zu gatO BvA uBa saka aniw savati te asOzIt asozIt asozwa zu prasave ESvaryye ca BvA pa saka aniw savati asOzIt zu ESvaryye prasave ca adA para saka yew liwi nityew sOti asAvIt asOzIt suzuviva zu pu su vA bA qu pfzo zatvam garBavimocane garBavimocana ekAkzarakozaH zu surAcyAvanarUpe sanDAne somAdeH pIqane manTane ca svA u saka snAne aka aniw luNi para sew sunoti sunute asAvIt asozwa sAtA zu gatO BvA uBa saka aniw savati te asozIt asozwa zu prasave ESvaryye ca BvA pa saka aniw savati asOzIt zu ESvaryye prasave ca adA para saka yew liwi nityew sOti asAvIt asOzIt suzuviva zu pu su bA qu pfzo zatvam garBavimocana ekAkzarakozaH
zvida zvida zvida mohe snehe mnehe ca aka mocane saka BvA A luNi u sew svedate asvidA asvidat asvedizwa zvida gAtraprakzaraRe aka di para aniw svidyati lfdit xdit asvidat iti SrItArAnATatarkavAcaspatiBawwacAryya saNkalite vAcaspatyABiDAne zakArAdi SabdArTasaNkalanam zvida mohe mnehe ca aka mocane saka BvA A luNi u sew svedate asvidat asvedizwa zvida gAtraprakzaraRe aka di para aniw svidyati xdit asvidat iti SrItArAnATatarkavAcaspatiBawwacAryya saNkalite vAcaspatyABiDAne zakArAdi SabdArTasaNkalanam
zwUpa zwUpa zwUpa ucCrAye ada cu uBa aka sew stUpayati te atuzwUpat ta stUpaH zwUpa ucCAye di para aka sew stUpyati irit astUpat astUpIt zwUpa ucCrAye ada cu uBa aka sew stUpayati te atuzwUpat ta stUpaH zwUpa ucCAye di para aka sew stUpyati irit astUpat astUpIt
zwama zwama zwama vEkalye ada cu u sa sew stamayati te atastamat ta zwama vEkalye aka BvA para sew stamati astamot astamIta zwama vEkalye ada cu u sa sew stamayati te atastamat ta zwama vEkalye aka BvA para sew stamati astamIta
